verse_text: Re' hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' quibihnal take rima̱m rati't i Jesus risakomej lok wach chi re' Jesus, re' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric maj re're', ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Awraham eh ra̱' ri'sil wo' cho ma' Tawiy nqui rik'or i hu̱j re're' chi je' wili:
Re' ma' Awraham xac'unej cho Isahac, re' Isahac xac'unej cho Jacow, re' Jacow xac'unej cho Jurah ch'i̱l take junlaj chi ras richa̱k',
re' Jurah xac'unej cho i Pa̱res ch'i̱l i Sa̱ra naxic'am i Tama̱r chi rehq'ue̱n, re' Pa̱res xac'unej cho Hesrom eh re' Hesrom xac'unej cho i Aram.
Re' Aram xac'unej cho i Aminaraw, re' Aminaraw xac'unej cho i Nahason, re' Nahason xac'unej cho i Salmon,
re' Salmon xac'unej cho i Wohos naxic'am i Rahaw chi rehq'ue̱n, eh re' Wohos xac'unej cho i Ower naxic'am i Rut chi rehq'ue̱n, re' Ower xac'unej cho Isayih,
re' Isayih xac'unej i Tawiy. Re' Tawiy naxwih'ic cho chi k'atal k'oric chi quina̱ take ra̱' ri'sil cho Israhel, xac'unej cho i Salomon naxic'am chi rehq'ue̱n i rehq'ue̱n cahnok i Uri̱yas.
Re' Salomon xac'unej cho Rowoham, re' Rowoham xac'unej cho i Awi̱yas, re' Awi̱yas xac'unej cho i A̱sa,
re' A̱sa xac'unej cho i Josapat, re' Josapat xac'unej cho i Joram, re' Joram xac'unej cho i Usi̱yas.
Re' Usi̱yas xac'unej cho Jotam, re' Jotam xac'unej cho i Acas, re' Acas xac'unej cho i Esequi̱yas,
re' Esequi̱yas xac'unej cho i Manases, re' Manases xac'unej cho Amon, re' Amon xac'unej cho Josi̱yas,
eh pa ribihnal i Josi̱yas jenaj queh take rac'u̱n xac'unej cho i Jeconi̱yas ch'i̱l take richa̱k', re' xi'asjic chiwach take ha̱b nok re' take kama̱m kati't xic'amaric je ar pan tinamit Wawilo̱nya.
Nok wilque̱b chic ar Wawilo̱nya, re' Jeconi̱yas xac'unej cho Salatyel eh re' Salatyel xiq'uihsaj cho i Sorowawel.

Pa ribihnal aj i Sorowawel re' je' jenaj queh ra̱' ri'sil cho ru' xac'unej cho Awiyur, eh pa ribihnal i Awiyur, re' jenaj queh ra̱' ri'sil cho ru' xac'unej cho Elyaquim. Pa ribihnal wo' i Elyaquim, re' jenaj queh ra̱' ri'sil cho ru' xac'unej cho i Asor,

eh pa ribihnal i Asor, re' jenaj queh ra̱' ri'sil cho ru' xac'unej cho Saroc. Pa ribihnal i Saroc, re' jenaj queh ra̱' ri'sil cho ru' xac'unej cho i Aquim, eh pa ribihnal i Aquim, re' jenaj queh ra̱' ri'sil cho ru' xac'unej cho Elyur.

Pa ribihnal i Elyur, re' jenaj queh ra̱' ri'sil cho ru' xac'unej cho Elya̱sar, eh pa ribihnal i Elya̱sar re' jenaj queh ra̱' ri'sil cho ru' xac'unej cho i Matan. Pa ribihnal wo' i Matan, re' jenaj queh ra̱' ri'sil cho ru' xac'unej cho i Jacow,

eh pa ribihnal i Jacow, re' jenaj queh ra̱' ri'sil cho ru' xac'unej cho i Chep re' ribahi̱l i Mari̱ya. Ru̱c' i Mari̱ya wili, ar xasjic i Jesus, nqui rik'or i hu̱j re're'. Je' re' k'uru', chiri̱j i Jesus re' enkak'or chi til re' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric,

keht'alim hab wach take cho rima̱m rati't, re' take eriban chi enajlajic ri̱j chi xib tik ro̱k chi c'acharic ca'nam cho chi cajlaj buhr quiwi̱' chi je' wili: Cu ru̱c' cho ma' Awraham cu nponic ru̱c' ma' Tawiy wilic cajlaj buhr chi c'acharic. Chiri̱j chic cho re're', cu ru̱c' rik'ijil quic'amaric je kich katinami̱t ar Wawilo̱nya wilic wo' cajlaj buhr chi c'acharic. Cu ru̱c' cho rik'ijil re're', cu nponic ru̱c' rik'ijil ric'acharic kAja̱w Jesus, re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, wilic wo' cajlaj buhr chi c'acharic.

Re' asjic xiban i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric je' wili riwi̱': Re' ritu̱t i Jesus re' Mari̱ya ribihnal, nok ja' rituna̱' ta pe ri̱b chi c'acharic rich'i̱l i Chep, re' xpahkanic reh chi rehq'ue̱n, xcahnic pe' nchel chi yowa̱b ixok chic ru'um rajawric i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios.

Chi ma' reht'alim ta chaj wa'ric chi je' chic re' riwi̱' i Mari̱ya, re' Chep ma' xa̱j ta nak chic rituna̱b ri̱b rich'i̱l i Mari̱ya ru'um nok til ric'am na̱ chi coric nic' nimal rik'or i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Re' cok ru' reh chi ma' eta ncahnic i Mari̱ya pan q'uixbilal, xa̱j ricana̱b chi ma' xik'or ta queh take c'acharel chaj bih riwi̱' chi je' re' naribanam.

Chi je' re' ricapew-bal i Chep, pan jenaj chak'ab jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Dios xic'uhtaj ri̱b reh pa riwiric eh je' wili xik'or reh: «Re' hat Chep, ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Tawiy, chac'am i Mari̱ya chi awehq'ue̱n. Ma̱capaj chi mahc chaweh ric'amaric chi je' ricab wilic wi̱' maj re' ha'lac'un rihkam cho ru', re' rajawric i Lok' laj Uxlabal xbanic chi xcahnic chi je' re', nqui xitak'a̱' cho rik'ormojic aweh i Dios.

Re're' xitak'a̱' wo' rik'ormojic chi re' ha'lac'un narasjic ru̱c' i Mari̱ya chacoj tak ribihnal chi Jesus re' ra̱j rik'orom Aj Co'lonel. Je' re' ribihnal chacoj maj re're' narico'lonic queh awich atinamital chiwach i ti'c'axic wilic chi quina̱ ru'um quimahc, nqui xik'or i raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios.
Ru̱c' xik'or i aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' reh ma' Chep, xo̱j elok wach rik'orbal i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Dios rik'orom cho ru̱c' chi̱' raj k'orol C'uhbal, re' Isayi̱yas ribihnal

naxik'or cho chi je' wili: “Na ilirok chi narasjic i rac'u̱n jenaj k'ahxok cahnanak chi yowa̱b ixok chic chi cu ja' wih'inak ta ru̱c' winak, re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel kak'or tak i k'oric wili: “Emanwel”, nqui Isayi̱yas. Re' k'oric re're' keht'alim i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel maj re're' ra̱j rik'orom pan kak'orbal re' hewre̱yo ribihnal: “Re' Dios wilic chi kaxilac chi kaco'ljic”.

Je' re' k'uru' chi ribanaric xk'ormojic reh ru'um raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Dios, re' Chep naxc'a'chic ti wach chiwach i wahk'ek re're', xo̱j ti ru̱c' i Mari̱ya eh xitik'a̱' wo' chic wach chi naric'amam ri̱b rich'i̱l

eh chi je' re' xquic'am qui̱b, xa re' la' ru' cu rehtal asjanak chic i pe̱t rac'u̱n i Mari̱ya re' xquicoj ribihnal chi Jesus, cu re' aj ru' xquina'bej quiwach pan quic'acharic take qui̱b chi c'acharel re're'.

Chipam take cho k'i̱j naxasjic i Jesus ar pan tinamit Welen pa riyuk'ul i Jure̱ya re' wilic wi̱' i Hero̱res chi k'atal k'oric, xic'ulic lok ar Jerusalen quib xib chi winak je' ru̱c' aj no'jbal aj tijem take ri̱j ch'imi̱l. Re' take re' xichalic pan jenaj tinamit re' njohtic cho wi̱' i k'i̱j. Naxiponic ajic Jerusalen,

je' wili p'uht quipahkam queh take c'acharel ar: «Re' hoj keht'alim chi re' ha'lac'un naricahnic chi quik'atal k'oric take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xasjic chic maj cu pan katinami̱t re' xojchalic wi̱' xkilow cho wach rich'imilal. Chacuy, chak'or tak keh k'uru' haj tinamit xasjic ru'um nok re' hoj xojchalic chi riye'eric rilok'il, nqui take.

Nok ribiram chi asjanak chic i ha'lac'un naricahnic chi kak'atal k'oric, re' Hero̱res xoquic chi xa ntuquic chic pa ra̱mna ru'um reh ricapewjic chi re' chic i ha'lac'un re're' naroquic pa rijelow-bal wi til coric chi je' re'. Je' wo' re' xquic'ul take c'acharel ru'um reh ricapewjic chi re' Hero̱res naric'amam je jeno' c'axquilal chi quina̱ ru'um reh i ha'lac'un re're'.

Chi ntuquic i ra̱mna, re' Hero̱res k'uru' xitak'a̱' rimoloric quiwach take nahsil aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eh nok wilque̱b chic cok chiwach, xibiraj queh haj tinamit k'oro̱j cahnok ribiral chi narasjic wi̱' i c'acharel re' chi quiwach take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel til re're' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Re' take re' je' wili xquik'or reh Hero̱res: «Re' hoj keht'alim chi pa riyuk'ul Jure̱ya ar chipam i tinamit Welen ribihnal, ar narasjic i ha'lac'un re're' maj re' aj k'orol riC'uhbal cho i Dios, re' Mique̱yas ribihnal, xitz'ihmbaj cho chipam rihu̱j chi re' Dios je' wili rik'orom cho chiri̱j:

“Hat-tak c'acharel wilca̱t tak pa riyuk'ul Jurah ar pan tinamit Welen, ma' re' ta chic take toco̱m chic tinamit je' ru̱c' wilque̱b chipam i yuk'ul re're' nariq'uic na̱ quilok'il chiwach atinami̱t tak, maj pan atinami̱t tak narasjic i k'atal k'oric narik'atbic k'oric chana̱ hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' tilok'onic tak wi̱n nqui cho Dios aweh tak, nqui aj k'orol c'uhbal re're', nqui take reh.

Nok reht'alim chic i Hero̱res haj tinamit xasjic i ha'lac'un re're', chiri̱j chic naxi'elic take je nahsil re're' ru̱c', re' chic take winak aj tijem ri̱j ch'imi̱l re' take xiponic chipam i tinamit re're' xiyuk'ej take chi ma' hab ta wach neht'alanic reh eh ar xirak chiri̱j rihabil i ha'lac'un re're' naxquik'or reh jarub chic k'i̱j p'uhtunak quilom cho wach i ch'imi̱l re're'.

Chiri̱j chic re're', xitak'a̱' take je ar Welen chi reht'aljic haj cok reh tinamit re're' wilic i ha'lac'un eh je' wili tak'anic xiban je queh naxi'o̱j: «Hiy tak ar Welen k'uru' eh nok ana'bem tak chic chi coric haj wilic cok i ha'lac'un re're', hiy tak ru̱c'. Nacharak tak chatak'a̱' tak cho rik'ormojic wi̱n haj wilic cok, reh chi re' hin ewo' nitik'a̱' je wi̱b chi equino̱j chi riye'eric rilok'il, nqui je Hero̱res. Je' re' xik'or maj pa ricapew-bal cho ru' c'ahchi' ricapam ri̱j ricansjic i ha'lac'un re're'.

Je' aj re' chiri̱j nok quibiram chic je xik'or Hero̱res, re' take winak aj tijem ri̱j ch'imi̱l re're' xquichop je quibe̱h chi c'ahchi' quitahkem je i ch'imi̱l quilom cho wach cu pan quitinami̱t xichalic wi̱'. Re' ch'imi̱l re're' ma' xa ta re' xic'uhtaj i be̱h, til re' pe' wo' chic re' xit'ora̱' cho risakomil china̱ i pa̱t re' wilic wi̱' ha'lac'un naxiponic ar.
Naxquilow chi je' re', k'e̱' rinimal sukquil c'uxlis xoquic cho cu̱c' take winak re're'.

Ar ajic naxi'oquic chic cok chipam i pa̱t, re' take c'acharel re're' xquilow wach i ha'lac'un ch'i̱l i Mari̱ya re' ritu̱t eh xquiyew rilok'il chi xquixuc'a̱' qui̱b chiwach. Chiri̱j re're', p'uht quitehem na̱ quic'ola̱b chi resmejic cho k'an woric laj ch'ihch' je' ru̱c' q'uih tz'a̱k, ch'i̱l take se̱nsa ch'i̱l wo' take nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m Mi̱ra ribihnal eh xquik'ahsaj chi jenaj si̱ chiwach.

Chiri̱j chic quiwih'ic ru̱c' Mari̱ya ch'i̱l Chep, re' take winak aj tijem ri̱j ch'imi̱l xisoljic wo' chic je pan quitinami̱t, xa re' cok ru' pan toco̱m chic be̱h xisoljic je wi̱' ru'um nok re' jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xic'uhtaj ri̱b queh pan quiwiric, xik'or queh chi ma'xta chic quisoljic je ru̱c' Hero̱res.

Je' wo', pan jenaj chak'ab pa riwiric i Chep, jenaj wo' chic raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Dios xic'uhtaj ri̱b reh eh je' wili xik'or reh: «Chatik'a̱' awi̱b chi ric'amaric je ha'lac'un ch'i̱l i ritu̱t eh hiy ar pan tinamit Eji̱pto chi ric'oloric awi̱b tak ar maj re' Hero̱res naritok'om ribe̱h chi risiq'uiric riha'lac'u̱n i Mari̱ya reh chi naricansam. Tiwi̱' tak ar cu rehtal chic nik'or aweh jaruj chic tisoljic tak cho, nqui reh.
Chiwach i chak'ab re're' k'uru', xa re' wo' ti xc'a'chic wach, re' Chep xic'am ti je i ha'lac'un ch'i̱l i ritu̱t ar pa riyuk'ul i Eji̱pto

eh ar xo̱j cahnok chi c'acharic cu rehtal xquimic je Hero̱res. Chi je' re' k'uru' xponic wach rik'orbal i kAja̱w Dios rik'orom cho chi je' wili ru̱c' chi̱' raj k'orol riC'uhbal re' Ose̱yas ribihnal: “Cu pa riyuk'ul i Eji̱pto xnitak'a̱' je ric'amaric i wAc'u̱n, nqui Dios, nqui aj k'orol re're'.

Naxilow i Hero̱res chi xjot'oric cu'um take winak aj tijem ri̱j ch'imi̱l, k'e̱' naxchalic ric'a̱. Chi je' re', re're' ru'um chi xicapaj chi re' Jesus wilic pan tinamit Welen on ma' naht ta ar, xitak'a̱' rik'ormojic chi naquicansjic nic' nimal take cuc' ac'un cu re' xi'asjic cu rehtal quib ha̱b quihabil re' wilque̱b pan tinamit re're' ch'i̱l pan tak tinamit wilque̱b pa ric'ula't. Je' aj re' quihabil take cuc' ac'un xicansaj take ru'um chi je' re' habil xina'bej chi wilic reh i Jesus naxibiraj queh take aj tijem ri̱j ch'imi̱l jarub k'i̱j quip'utum rilmijic wach i ch'imi̱l re're'.
Ru̱c' aj cansanic xiban i Hero̱res re're', xo̱j elok wach i xik'or cho raj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios re' Jeremi̱yas ribihnal chi je' wili:

“Ar pan tinamit Ramah nbirmijic chi wilic take ixok xa naquitz'u̱y chic chi ok'ic ru'um yohbal wach riti'quil pan quic'ux. Re' take ixok quibirmijic chi ok'ic nca'n re're', re' pe' nchel take ra̱' ri'sil cho Raquel. Ru'um riti'quil quic'ux chi xcansjic je quiha'lac'u̱n, ma' hab ta chic wach nchol rik'unjic quiwach chi naquimayam ok'ic, nqui rik'or i xitz'ihmbaj cho aj k'orol c'uhbal re're'.
Chiri̱j chic ru' nok camnak chic i Hero̱res, ar aj pan tinamit Eji̱pto, re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Dios xic'uhtaj wo' chic ri̱b pa riwiric i Chep

eh je' wili xik'or reh: «Chep, yu'na ma'xta chic yohbal chi reh i ha'lac'un maj xquimic chic i Hero̱res re' til xa̱j nak ricansam. Chatik'a̱' awi̱b k'uru', chac'am wo' chic je i ha'lac'un ch'i̱l i ritu̱t eh hiy ar pan ayuk'ul i hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, nqui xik'or reh.

Naxc'a'chic wach i Chep reh wahk'ek re're', xichop wo' chic cho ribe̱h chi xicora̱' cho pan kayuk'ul i hoj rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi c'ahchi' ric'amam cho i ha'lac'un ch'i̱l wo' i ritu̱t. Je' re' k'uru' ar nak xcahnic pa riyuk'ul i Jure̱ya,

xa re' la' ru'um riyo'jic xoquic cho naxibiraj chi re' rac'u̱n i Hero̱res, re' Arquela̱yo ribihnal xcahnic chi k'atal k'oric pa rijelow-bal i raja̱w chipam i yuk'ul re're', ma' xcahnic ta chic ar, re' la' re' ru'um chi jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re' xic'uhtaj wo' chic ri̱b reh pa riwiric xik'or reh chi cu yohbal chi queh chi equicahnic ar, re're' xicora̱' je pa riyuk'ul i Calile̱ya

cu rehtal xponic pan tinamit Nasaret re' xcahnic wi̱' chi c'acharic. Chi je' aj re', re' k'oro̱j cho cu'um take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios xo̱j manlajok wach ru̱c' i k'oric xbanaric reh Jesus cu'um take c'acharel maj re' take re' xquibihnej i Jesus chi aj Nasaret.
Chiwach aj take k'i̱j nok re' winak aj kahsem ha', re' Wa̱n ribihnal, xponic pan tak chik yu̱k' ma'xta wi̱' patanel wilic pa riyuk'ul i Jure̱ya,
je' wili p'uht rik'orom queh tinamit: «Chajal tak wach ano'jbal tak ru'um nok re' ripahba̱b i Dios chi K'atal K'oric c'ulic chic lok reh, nqui queh.

Re' Wa̱n re're', re' wo' re' xk'ormojic cho ribiral chiri̱j ru'um aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios, re' Isayi̱yas ribihnal, naxik'or cho chi je' wili: “Re' hin xnibiraj chi je' wili xk'ormojic reh jenaj winak re' c'ahchi' riyuk'em take tinamit ar pan ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel: ‘Je' ricab nantik'injic jeno' be̱h ru'um ponic reh jeno' k'atal k'oric chi k'o'ronic, re' hat chatik'a̱' wo' take tinamit chi ric'uluric i Ajabe̱s Pahbamaj wu'um chi K'atal K'oric re' nariponic chi quik'o'rjic. Queh take tinamit re're' chak'or chi curman naquicorsam wach quic'acharic je' ricab nok jeno' winak ricorsaj wach take yocyoc laj be̱h ru'um reh riponic jeno' k'atal k'oric, nqui xk'ormojic reh, nqui xik'or cho ma' Isayi̱yas.

Re' Wa̱n naxwinakbic chic, ar pan chik yu̱k' xwih'ic. Nok xwih'ic ar xa chili'l wo' ti ch'i̱l ri̱s winak ca̱b xiwa'bej eh xa ritz'uhmal wo' ti ri̱j nim chicop came̱yo ribihnal xicoj chiri̱j chi jelow-bal riso' eh xa junrahp wo' ti chi tz'uhu̱m xibac'bej wi̱' ripa̱m.

Je' wo' naxwih'ic ar, yohbal wach take c'acharel xic'ulic lok ru̱c' i Wa̱n chi narikahsjic quiha̱', je' chi aj Jerusalen, je' chi aj pan toco̱m chic tinamit wilque̱b pa riyuk'ul Jure̱ya, je' chi aj pan toco̱m chic yuk'ul wilque̱b take c'ultar reh nim ro̱k ha' Jortan ribihnal.
Re' take tinamit re're' je' wili xquik'or chi quiju'junal naxkahsjic quiha̱' ru'um i Wa̱n ar pan nim ro̱k ha' Jortan: «K-Aja̱w Dios, re' hin nirak chiri̱j chi hin aj mahc, nqui xquik'or.

Tz'a̱b ru' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l take quicomonil take ra̱' ri'sil cho aj k'ahsem si̱ Saroc, re' ma' xca̱j ta quirakam chiri̱j chi aj mahc take, je' wili xk'ormojic queh ru'um i Wa̱n naxilow chi xic'ulic lok ru̱c' chi rikahsjic wo' quiha̱': «Re' hat-tak re' nawa̱j asiq'uim tak ri̱j elic chiwach i ti'c'axic chalic reh, je' ricab elic nca'n take a̱k' nanquilow wach i k'a̱k', ma̱coj tak wach re' xat-tijiljic tak wi̱' chi xa re' kahsanic ha' enco'lonic aweh tak chiwach i ti'c'axic chalic reh.
Reh aj chi enikahsaj aha̱' tak, cha'n tak i coric c'uhtbal reh chi xacana̱' tak chic amahc

eh ma̱k'or tak nchel pan ac'ux tak chi je' wili: ‹Re' hoj, hoj ritinami̱t i Dios maj re' hoj, hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Awraham. Nic' wach nachiban k'uru' chi hoj aj mahc, ma' tiqui tak pan ac'ux. «Ma̱capaj tak chic chi je' re' maj wi ta nak xa ru'um chi ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Awraham, re' take tinamit enca'n chi ritinami̱t i Dios, ra̱j rik'orom re' take abaj wili ewo' nak nca'n chi ritinami̱t i Dios ru'um nok re' Dios wilic rajawric chi enak ritik'a̱' take chi ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Awraham.

«Je' re' ajic, chac'uhtaj tak k'uru' chi xacana̱' chic amahc tak maj re' ti'c'axic til chalic chic reh chana̱ tak eh naric'uluric awu̱c' tak je' ricab jeno' winak tiklic chic chi naroquic chi riyoc'oric lok take che̱' ma' quiwachanic ta eh nok riyoc'om chic take lok, ric'at wo' take cok pan k'a̱k', nqui Wa̱n queh tinamit.

Je' re' xik'or naxik'or wo' chic chi je' wili: «Re' Ajabe̱s K'atal K'oric c'ulic lok reh chiwi̱j i hin, k'e̱' wo' chic niq'uic na̱ rajawric chi niwach chi xa ta nak re' t'uch wach camanic je' ricab resmejic lok riper xijab ajabe̱s riban jeno' aj camanom, eric'ul chi wi̱n chi eniban chiwach. Ru'um aj re', re' hin yu'na xa ru̱c' ti ha' c'ahchi' nikahsam quiha̱' take c'ahchi' quiyot'om quic'ux chiri̱j quimahc, raj la' Ajabe̱s k'atal k'oric re're', til naribanam chi naritak'a̱b cho i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios chi nariwih'ic pan ac'acharic hat-tak re' tiniminic tak reh Ajabe̱s re're' eh tz'a̱b ru' take ma' quiniminic ta reh, re' take re' narich'ukuric k'oric chi quina̱.

Je' re' k'uru', chatik'a̱' awi̱b tak chi ric'uluric i k'atal k'oric re're' maj nac'olok lok ru', xa chi yu'na ti narip'utum camanic je' ricab riban jeno' winak nok wilic chic pan k'ab rijachbal, rip'ut ti rijacharic lok ri̱j take rija̱l tehbal na̱ rica̱k' eh nok ricohlam chic rijacharic ri̱j rija̱l, riyew lok pan birin take rijal eh re' ritilubquil riyew cok pan k'a̱k' re' xa ntenic chic cho, nqui Wa̱n.
Chiwach wo' take k'i̱j nok re' Wa̱n kahsanic ha' riban, re' Jesus xelic cho pa riyuk'ul i Calile̱ya eh xo̱j chi chi̱' i nim ro̱k ha' re' Jortan ribihnal reh chi narikahsjic wo' riha̱' ru'um.

Ar aj ru' nok wilic chic i Jesus chiwach, re' Wa̱n je' wili xik'or reh pitbal reh chi re' Jesus ma' eta nak chic ripahkaj cok rikahsjic riha̱': «Re' hin ma' eta nikahsaj aha̱' maj ma' riwi̱' ta chi wi̱n chi je' re' eniban aweh i hat. Re' la' nak hat curman chi na̱kahsanic niha̱' i hin, nqui reh.
Chalic i Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Wa̱n, chakahsaj niha̱' maj riwi̱' chi keh chi nakanimem chi'nchel i tak'anic riban keh i Dios, nqui reh. Chi je' re' ma' xik'ihtaj ta chic ri̱b i Wa̱n,

xikahsaj la' riha̱' i Jesus eh naxuctic aj cho pan ha', cu re' pe' chic reh Wa̱n naxteh cho pa̱m i taxa̱j, xilow chi re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios xc'ulic lok china̱ i Jesus je' ricab riwi̱' jenaj rexba̱.

Chipam aj i junc'am re're', je' wili k'oric xiban cho Dios cu pan taxa̱j: «Re' wili i wAc'u̱n re' til k'e̱' ti' nwic'raj. K'e̱' wo' sukquil pa nic'ux chiri̱j ru'um chi xnipahba̱' chi Ajabe̱s K'atal K'oric, nqui cho Dios.

Nok chalanak chic i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios ru̱c' i Jesus, xc'amaric je ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal ar pan jenaj ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel re' xwih'ic wi̱' chi naripajaric ru'um aj Yahm.
Ar ajic nok yohbal wo' chic wach ric'ahric xjohtic cho Jesus chiri̱j chi ribanam chic lok ca'winak (40) k'i̱j chi ma' ribanam ta riwa' riha̱',
re' aj Yahm je' wili xponic rik'or reh xa chi pajbal reh: «Re' hat Jesus wilic rajawric ak'orbal ru'um nok hat rAc'u̱n i Dios. Chak'or reh abaj wili k'uru' chi mikrok caxlan wi'c, nqui reh.

Raj la' Jesus je' wili ric'u'ljic xiban: «Coric wilic rajawric nik'orbal, xa re' la' ma'xta nibiram k'oric chawach maj pa riC'uhbal i Dios tz'ihmbimaj chi je' wili: “Re' c'acharel reh chi naric'acharic curman chi naribanam riwa', xa re' la' til k'e̱' wo' chic curman chi naribiram haj wilic rik'or i Dios reh chi naric'acharic chi suk ru̱c', nqui rik'or, nqui ric'u'ljic xiban.

Chiri̱j chic ru' xc'amaric wo' chic je Jesus ru'um aj Yahm ar chipam tinamit Jerusalen re' xichih i Dios chi ar narilok'onjic wach. Ar xpahbabjic china̱ i ma' laj tz'ak nsutunic ri̱j i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios

eh je' wo' chic wili xk'ormojic reh ru'um aj Yahm: «Re' hat Jesus rAc'u̱n i Dios, re' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch quicha'janic aweh maj pan Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' i riC'uhbal i Dios je' wili tz'ihmbimaj: “Re' Dios eritak'a̱' cho take raj tz'e' wa̱ch chi etichalic quicha'jej i hat rac'u̱n, nqui tz'ihmbimaj. «Je' wo' chic tz'ihmbimaj wo' chi je' wili: “Wi ta nak etik'ehbic jok wach ac'al re' take re' etiquic'ul pan te̱w reh chi ma' eta nach'ey awi̱b wach abaj, nqui tz'ihmbimaj. «Chacut jok awi̱b k'uru' eh ru̱c' re're' enc'utunic chi til coric i chi'nchel re're', nqui reh Jesus.

Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Coric xak'or, xa re' la' ma' riyew ta ri̱b chi enipaj i Dios maj je' wili tz'ihmbimaj chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios: “Ma̱yew chi pajaric awAja̱w Dios, nqui tz'ihmbimaj, nqui Jesus.
Je' wo' chic, ar china̱ i jenaj yu̱k' k'e̱' nahtil na̱ re' xc'amaric je wi̱' i Jesus, re' aj Yahm xic'uhtaj reh nic' nimal take nimak wach tinamit wilque̱b wach ac'al ch'i̱l quibihomal
eh je' wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Chaxuc'a̱' awi̱b chi nilok'onjic eh enik'ahsaj pan ak'ab chi'nchel take re're' reh chi enak'at k'oric chi quina̱, nqui xik'or reh.

Re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh aj Yahm: «Coric nak'or, xa re' la' ma'xta ca̱t nilok'em maj pa riC'uhbal i Dios tz'ihmbimaj chi je' wili: “Xa re' wo' Ajabe̱s Dios na̱lok'em wach eh xa chiwach wo' re' naxuc'a̱b awi̱b, nqui tz'ihmbimaj. «Telen aj chi niwach, ma' nwilow chic awach, nqui reh.
Chi je' aj re', re' aj Yahm xicana̱' cahnok i Jesus eh chiri̱j chic re' xic'ulic lok take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios chi ritobjic.
Nok ribiram chic Jesus chi re' Wa̱n aj kahsem ha' xcojoric pan che̱' ru'um Hero̱res, xsoljic wo' chic je pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya,

ar pan tinamit Nasaret, re' cok ru' ma' xcahnic ta chi junpech chipam i tinamit re're' xelic la' je ar eh xo̱j wih'ok chipam i tinamit re' Capernahum ribihnal re' wilic chi chi̱' ha'. Ru̱c' aj ricahnic chi c'acharic chipam i tinamit re're', re' wilic chipam i yuk'ul re' quic'acharic wi̱' take ra̱' ri'sil cho Sawulon ch'i̱l i Neptalih,
xponic wach re' xik'or cho i aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios, re' ma' Isayi̱yas ribihnal, najtir k'i̱j chiri̱j i yuk'ul re're'. Re're' je' wili xik'or cho:

“Ar chipam i yuk'ul quic'acharic wi̱' take ra̱' ri'sil cho Sawulon ch'i̱l i Neptalih, re' wilic chi chi̱' ha' pa risec'a̱j i nim ro̱k ha' Jortan, Calile̱ya ribihnal, re' wilque̱b wo' wi̱' q'uihal take c'acharel ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel,

k'e̱' rinimal sukquil c'uxlis xchalic cu̱c' i tinamit xa je' na ricab nok re' take behel wilque̱b pan k'ekom ak'ab chi xa q'uisi̱n nak chic ma' quicansjic, k'e̱' nansukbic quic'ux nanquilow wo' chic wach risakomil i k'i̱j, nqui xik'or cho.

Ar aj chipam i tinamit Capernahum xa re' wo' ti xponic i Jesus, je' wili p'uht rik'orom queh tinamit: «Chajal tak wach ano'jbal ru'um nok xirak chic rik'ijil chi re' Dios narip'utum wo' chic k'atoj k'oric chi quina̱ take c'acharel, nqui queh.

Chipam wo' tinamit re're', re' Jesus p'uht rihch'iljic cu'um take pe̱t raj tahkanel chi je' wili riwi̱': Junpech nok c'ahchi' risutem chi̱' i nim laj ha' wilic ar pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya, re're' xilow quiwach take quib aj car c'ahchi' quicutum jok pan ha' i quiya'l chopbal quica̱r. Re' take re' xa quicha̱k' qui̱b eh je' wili quibihnal: Re' Simon re' ribihnej wo' chi Luch eh ch'i̱l i Tirix.

Naxik'o'rjic ar ru'um i Jesus, je' wili xk'ormojic queh: «Tak chiwi̱j chi na̱banam tak chi waj tahkanel. Chi jelow-bal i chopoj car na'n tak, re' hin eniban chi re' chic take awas acha̱k' ena'n tak chi enquichop quic'ux chiwi̱j i hin, nqui Jesus queh.
Naxquibiraj chi je' re', re' take quib re're' chi jumehk'il xquicana̱' cho quicamaj chi aj chopol car take eh xi'o̱j chiri̱j i Jesus chi raj tahkanel.

Chiri̱j i wili nok c'ahchi' ritikim ju' ribe̱h, re' Jesus xo̱j rirak take quib chic chi aj car re' xa quicha̱k' wo' qui̱b je' wili quibihnal: Re' Jaco̱wo ch'i̱l i Wa̱n. Re' take re' ch'i̱l i caja̱w, re' Sewere̱yo ribihnal, ar wilque̱b chipam i cano̱wa re' c'ahchi' quic'ojem wi̱' wach i quiya'l chopbal quica̱r naxk'ormojic queh ru'um Jesus chi naquipahbabjic chi raj tahkanel chic take wi xi'oquic chi ritahkaljic,
xa chiwach wo' ti junc'am re're' xquicana̱' cahnok i cano̱wa re' ncamanic queh chi aj chopol car eh nok quich'akam chic je qui̱b ru̱c' caja̱w, xi'o̱j chiri̱j i Jesus.

Je' re' ajic chi c'ahchi' ribehem pa̱m riyuk'ul i Calile̱ya rich'i̱l chic take raj tahkanel je' ru̱c' riyuk'em chic take, re' Jesus xiban i c'uhtunic chipam take pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Ar wo' chipam i yuk'ul re're', ma' xa re' ta rik'ormojic queh take c'acharel i holohic laj k'oric chi re' Dios re' nk'atbic k'oric ra̱j richopom quina̱ je' la' wo' xesaj wo' lok xa chaj bih jaric quiti'quilal take yowa'i̱b xic'amaric cho ru̱c'.

Ma' xa ta re' take c'acharel re're', q'uihal la' take aj Si̱rya naxponic ribiral pan quiyuk'ul chiri̱j nic' nimal take esenic ya'bilal riban Jesus, xquic'am cho quiyowa'i̱b reh chi naresmejic lok quiya'bilal ru'um. Je' re' ajic, chi'nchel take c'acharel je' ru̱c' si̱c take ch'i̱l take ma' suk ta pa̱m quina̱ ch'i̱l wo' take wilic ma' tob laj uxlabal cu̱c', xicowsjic ru'um Jesus.

Chi je' aj re', q'uihal take c'acharel chalanak take pan tinamit Jerusalen ch'i̱l pan toco̱m chic tinamit wilque̱b pa riyuk'ul Jure̱ya, pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya, pa riyuk'ul Reca̱polis ch'i̱l pa riyuk'ul i Pere̱ya re' wilic chi juntar nim ro̱k ha' Jortan, xquitahkej je Jesus.
Pan jenaj k'i̱j nok rilom chic Jesus chi k'e̱' q'uihal take tinamit xitahkanic je reh, xjohtic johtok china̱ jenaj yu̱k' eh naxoj-o̱j c'olok ru̱c' i hoj raj tahkanel, xitz'uka̱' jok ri̱b
chi kac'uhbaljic chi je' wili:
«Re' hat-tak re' xa jenaj ti nak'or tak je' ricab nc'uhtunic ru̱c' acapew-bal tak, sukbok ac'ux tak maj re' Dios re' nk'atbic cho k'oric cu pan taxa̱j, xiyew chic cho chana̱ tak i ricuse'sbal.
«Je' wo' re' cha'n i hat-tak re' suk tok'ic tak ru'um ti'c'axic nac'ul tak maj re' Dios nariyeb risukquil ac'ux tak nok je' re' wilca̱t tak wi̱'.
«Je' wo', sukbok wo' ac'ux hat-tak re' ch'ublic ti wach ac'ux tak maj re' Dios nariyeb aweh tak i k'oro̱j chi nariyeb je' ricab nok jeno' winak riyew cahnok riye'a̱b queh take ra̱' ri'sil.

«Re' hat-tak re' k'e̱' nawotowej tak chi naribanaric i coric, je' ricab rotowjic quiwa' quiha̱' nca'n take ma' quiniq'uem ta chic wi'c ha', sukbok ac'ux tak maj ru'um chi je' re' ano'jbal tak narimanlajic wach ru'um i Dios re' nawotowej tak re're'.
«Sukbok wo' ac'ux hat-tak re' naquetelej tak quiwach awas acha̱k' tak, maj re' aj wo' Dios nariquetelem wo' cho awach hat-tak.
«Je' wo', re' hat-tak re' risakbem chic wach awa̱mna tak i Dios sukbok wo' ac'ux tak, maj re' hat-tak nawilom tak wach i Dios nachic'uhtaj ri̱b aweh tak.

«Je' wo' re' cha'n i hat-tak re' tipitbic tak reh chi ma' noquic ta cho wolic, maj ru'um chi re' rino'jbal kAja̱w Dios nac'am tak tz'eht reh je' wili narik'ormojic chawi̱j tak cu'um take awich c'acharel: ‹Re' take re' til rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n take i Dios, nqui narik'ormojic chawi̱j tak.

«Je' re' ajic ru'um nok chi re' Dios re' nk'atbic k'oric ar pan taxa̱j xip'ut chic i k'atoj k'oric chana̱ tak ayu' wach ac'al, sukbok ac'ux tak wi ru'um reh rinimjic riC'uhbal enac'ul tak i ti'c'axic.
Nik'or chi je' re' maj wi ru'um reh nitahkaljic i hin enac'ul tak ti'c'axic, tz'ujuric on enk'ormojic chucuj k'oric chawi̱j tak, jenaj rinimal sukquil c'uxlis enye'eric aweh tak.

Je' re' nik'or ru'um chi eticojoric tak chiwach i Dios chi je' quicab take cho raj k'orol C'uhbal najtir k'i̱j. Je' ricab chi re' take cho aj k'orol c'uhbal re're' xye'eric cho ju'jun quisi̱ ru'um reh ric'uluric i ti'c'axic, re' hat-tak nariyeb wo' aweh tak i Dios jenaj asi̱ tak k'e̱' holonquilal ar pan taxa̱j. Sukbok aj ac'ux tak k'uru' nachac'ul tak i ti'c'axic xa ru'um chi hat-tak waj tahkanel.

«Tiwi̱' tak ayu' wach ac'al chi je' ricab ncamanic atz'a̱m nok cu wilic riqui'al. Ma' nac'ul nchel aweh tak je' ricab ric'ul atz'a̱m chi nanelic riqui'al nquiljic je cu'um take c'acharel ru'um nok ma'xta chic bih ricamanej queh. Ru'um chi je' re' nc'uluric ru̱c' atz'a̱m, re' take c'acharel nquiyak'abej wo' pan okis.

Je' re' k'uru' je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' jeno' tinamit wilic johtok china̱ jeno' yu̱k' chi ma' eta nsahchic pan nak' wachi̱s ru'um take sakombal quisakomonic cho chipam pan tak chak'ab, je' wo' re' hat-tak wilca̱t china̱ ac'al wili chi risakomsjic wach quino'jbal take tinamit reh chi naquina'bem wach i kAja̱w Dios.
Je' wo', je' ricab nok jeno' ok sakombal ma' nkoporic ta chi naritac'abjic na̱ pan jeno' tz'ak ac'al xun, nkoporic la' chi nariye'eric johtok wa taxa̱j chi sakombal queh take wilque̱b cok pan pa̱t,

je' aj wo' re' nic'uhtunic i hin re' nsakomonic pa̱m capew-bal, chac'uhtaj tak queh c'acharel reh chi re' Dios wilic cho ar pan taxa̱j entioxmojic johtok cu'um take c'acharel je' ru̱c' equi'eht'alanic reh chi k'e̱' ato̱b i c'uhtunic na'n tak re're'.

«Re' nic'uhtunic xchalic nik'or, ma̱capaj tak chi naribokom wach i C'uhbal ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l xquik'or take aj najtir raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios. Ma'xta! Ma' je' ta re' naribanam cu̱c' i c'uhbal re're'. Re' cok haj wilic naribanam cu̱c' re' chi narimanlajic wach.

Ru'um aj re' til coric nik'or aweh tak chi je' ricab chi cu rehtal ma'xta chic i taxa̱j rich'i̱l ac'al cu re' narisahchic wach i c'acharic, je' wo' re' chi'nchel k'oro̱j cahnok chiwi̱j i hin narojic elok wach cu rehtal nmanlajic wach chi'nchel take C'uhbal quik'oric chiwi̱j chipam i hu̱j wilic wi̱' i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, to̱b ta ma' na'lic ti take reh je' ricab jeno' t'uch rehtalil k'oric.

Je' re' k'uru', xa hab wach jeno' ma' rinimej ta take ma' na'lic ti take reh c'uhbal re're' eh ric'uhtaj queh take c'acharel chi ma'xta quinimem, re're' ma' re' ta so' holohic laj aj tijinel chiwach i Dios re' nk'atbic cho k'oric cu pan taxa̱j. Raj nchel aj tijinel re' rinimej take cuc' c'uhbal re're' eh ric'uhtaj queh tinamit chi naquinimem, re' cok re' til holohic laj aj tijinel chiwach i Dios.

Ru'um aj chi je' re', re' hat-tak k'uru' manlic wach c'uhtunic cha'n tak maj til nik'or aweh tak chi re' Dios re' nk'atbic cho k'oric cu pan taxa̱j ma'xta richopom ana̱ tak wi re' ato̱b laj ac'uhtunic na'n tak ma' k'e̱' ta wo' chic manlic wach chiwach i c'uhtunic nca'n take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal re're'.

«Re' hat-tak abiram tak chi re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal re're', je' wili risakomsjic wach nca'n i c'uhbal re' xk'ormojic cho najtir k'i̱j chi ma'xta ribanaric i cansanic: ‹Re' riban cansanic, re' aj cok re' tanlic chiri̱j chi narich'ukuric k'oric china̱, nqui take.

«To̱b ta nchel til coric chi je' re' nquik'or, ma' xa ta ru'um re're' tanlic chiri̱j jeno' c'acharel chi narik'ataric k'oric china̱, re' la' hin nik'or wo' aweh tak chi xa hab wach jeno' aweh tak njohtic cho josk'il pa ra̱mna chiri̱j i ras richa̱k' to̱b ta nak xa ritz'ujuric ta nak ti eriban, re're' tanlic wo' chiri̱j chi enk'ataric k'oric china̱ chi quiwach take ch'ukul wach mahc. Je' re' k'uru', ru'um chi xa hab wach jeno' c'acharel to̱b ta nchel xa eritz'uj i ras richa̱k', riyew ri̱b pan yohbal chi eno̱j pan k'a̱k' re' nc'ulmujic wi̱' ti'c'axic,

re' hat-tak wi wilic jeno' amahc tak chiwach jeno' awich c'acharel tak, pe̱t cha'n tak je' ricab nak eriban jeno' xa hab wach aweh tak wi ta nak enponic chi rik'ahsjic risi̱ chiwach i Dios ar chiwach i lok' laj ye'a̱b c'atbal si̱. Re're' nac'olok cho pa ric'ux ar chi rich'i'tam ri̱b ru̱c' i ras richa̱k', reh chi enc'ulmujic cho risi̱ ru'um i Dios,

pe̱t nak eno̱j ru̱c' i ras richa̱k' chi ripahkaljic cuybal rimahc eh nok cu ripahkam chic cho cuybal rimahc, cu re' chic ru' nsoljic wo' chic je chi rik'ahsjic risi̱ chiwach i Dios chiwach i lok' laj ye'a̱b c'atbal si̱, maje'? Je' wo' re' cha'n hat-tak k'uru'

nok atik'a̱b ok chic awi̱b tak ru̱c' awas acha̱k' tak, chatik'a̱' wo' tak awi̱b ru̱c' i Dios. «Je' re' ajic, nok jeno' aweh tak wilic rimahc chiwach jeno' rich c'acharel cha'n tak je' ricab nak eriban jeno' xa hab wach aweh tak re' wilic ric'a̱s ru̱c' jeno' ras richa̱k'. Re're' chi junc'am ritik'a̱' wach ric'axquilal rich'i̱l i ras richa̱k' nah be̱h, maje'? Je' re' riban nok chi cu ja' quiponic ta ru̱c' aj ch'ukul wach mahc, maj wi xk'ahsjic nchel pan k'ab aj ch'ukul wach mahc re' enk'ahsanic wo' reh pan k'ab aj cha'janel tz'ahpel chi naricojoric pan che̱',
til coric nik'or aweh tak chi ma' eta ta chic nelic cho ar, cu rehtal ritoj cho chi'nchel ric'a̱s wilic.

«Re' risakomsjic wach i c'uhbal k'oro̱j cho queh aj najtir k'i̱j chiri̱j chi ma'xta ribanaric i c'oyomal, re're' abiram wo' tak cu̱c' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal re're'.

Re' take re' coric nquik'or chi nok jeno' hab wach rituna̱' ri̱b ru̱c' jeno' ixok re' ma' re' ta rehq'ue̱n, re're' nkajic pan c'oyomal raj la' hin nik'or aweh tak chi re' c'acharel re' rilow je wach jeno' ixok ma' re' ta rehq'ue̱n eh ricapaj pa ra̱mna chi tunlic ta nak chic ru̱c', re're' nkajic wo' pan c'oyomal xa ru'um ricapewjic chi je' re'.

Je' re' k'uru' nik'or aweh tak chi chi'nchel take capew-bal ncutbic aweh tak pan mahc chak'eb tak lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak, je' ricab nak resmejic lok jenaj queh nak' awach tak ena'n wi ta nak xa ru'um reh ru' etitak'abjic tak je pan k'a̱k' re' nc'ulmujic wi̱' i ti'c'axic. Nik'or chi je' re' maj chaweh hat-tak, sakbih nak chi enawesaj tak lok i jenaj queh nak' awach tak wi ta nak ru̱c' re're' eriban chi ma' eta nak titak'majic tak je pan k'a̱k' chi manlic awach tak.

Je' wo' nak re' ena'n tak ru̱c' jeno' queh ak'ab tak wi ta nak xa cu'um queh ru' etitak'abjic tak je pan k'a̱k' re' nc'ulmujic wi̱' ti'c'axic, maje'? Nik'or chi je' re' maj chaweh hat-tak sakbih nak chi enayoc' tak lok ak'ab re're' wi ta nak ru̱c' re're' eriban chi ma' eta nak titak'abjic tak je pan k'a̱k' chi manlic awach tak.

«Je' wo', re' take winak re're' nok nca'n i c'uhtunic chiri̱j i c'oyomal nquic'uhtaj wo' i tak'anic xiban cahnok i Moyses chi je' wili: ‹Jeno' winak ra̱j rich'akam i rehq'ue̱n, pe̱t chitik'a̱' jeno' hu̱j re' eritz'ihmbaj wi̱' take riwi̱' chi narich'akam wi̱' ri̱b ch'i̱l i rehq'ue̱n eh nok riyeb chic reh rehq'ue̱n i hu̱j re're', cu re' aj ru' eriban chi erich'ak ri̱b chi c'acharic, nqui rik'or.

«Coric ru' chi je' re' nquic'uhtaj take re', raj la' hin nik'or aweh tak chi xa re' cok wi re' ehq'uenbe̱s rijop wach ricaxa̱ra ru̱c' toco̱m chic winak, xa re' aj re' ru' wilic rimahc chi nkajic pan c'oyomal. Tz'a̱b ru', wi re' bahilbe̱s rich'ak je i rehq'ue̱n chi ma'xta jeno' riwi̱', re' bahilbe̱s re're' wilic wo' rimahc chi re' rehq'ue̱n nkajic pan c'oyomal ch'i̱l jeno' chic winak re' enc'ambic reh chi rehq'ue̱n.

«Re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal re're', nabiraj wo' tak chi nok nca'n i c'uhtunic chiri̱j i c'uhbal k'oro̱j cho queh aj najtir k'i̱j chi naquinimem eh chi ma'xta quiyak'abem pan co̱k pa' bih quik'orbal nquiyew chiwach i Dios, re' take re' je' wili nquik'or: ‹Nanayew ak'orbal tak chiwach i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Dios, wi toco̱m chic k'oric nak'or tak chi rijelow-bal ribihnal i Dios, ru̱c' re're' ma' timahcanic ta tak chiwach wi ma' xanimej tak ak'orbal ayeb tak, nqui nquik'or.

«Coric ru' chi je' re' nquic'uhtaj take re', raj la' hin nik'or aweh tak chi nachayew ak'orbal tak ma̱k'or tak jeno' bihnal. Xa ta nak je' wili enak'or tak: ‹Til wili taxa̱j til coric i c'ahchi' nik'orom, ma' tiquitak. «Je' re' nik'or maj re' hat-tak ma'xta awajawric tak china̱ i nic' pa' nimal nc'uluric johtok ar, re' la' til wilic rajawric china̱ re're' xa re' wo' i Ajabe̱s Dios.

Je' wo', ma̱k'or tak chi je' wili: ‹Til wili kich ti'jolal, til coric i c'ahchi' nik'orom, ma' tiquitak. «Je' re' nik'or maj re' hat-tak ma'xta awajawric tak china̱ nc'uluric cu̱c' take c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al, re' la' til wilic rajawric china̱ re're' xa re' wo' i Ajabe̱s Dios. Je' re' k'uru', xa ta nak re' tinamit Jerusalen enak'or tak ribihnal chi riye'eric ak'orbal tak. Je' re' nik'or maj re' hat-tak ma'xta awajawric tak china̱ nic' nimal nc'uluric ru̱c' i tinamit re're', re' la' til wilic rajawric china̱ re're' xa re' wo' i Ajabe̱s Dios ru'um chi re're' wilic chi aj k'atal k'oric china̱.

Je' wo', xa ta nak re' rismal ana̱ tak enak'or tak bihnal nachayew ak'orbal tak maj xa ta nak wo' china̱ re're' wilic awajawric hat-tak. Je' re' nik'or maj wi ta nak sak chic i rismal ana̱ tak, ma'xta awajawric tak chi rimiksjic wo' chic chi k'ek, on wi ta nak k'ek, ma'xta wo' awajawric tak chi rimiksjic chi sak.

«Je' re' k'uru' nachayew achi̱' tak xa manlic ru̱c' i take k'oric wili re' raj rik'ormojic: ‹Re' hin til nanibanam re're' on re' hin til ma'xta nibanam re're', tiqui ok tak. «Je' re' nik'or maj xa re' wach i c'acharel wilic cho jot'o̱j pa ra̱mna curman chi reh chi erik'or jeno' bihnal reh chi encojoric wach i rik'orbal.

«Re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal re're' nabiraj wo' tak chi nok nca'n i c'uhtunic chiri̱j i c'uhbal k'oro̱j cho queh aj najtir k'i̱j, re' rik'or chi xa hab wach enpuch'uric i nak' wach ru'um jeno', chi puch' wo' chic nak' wach i hab wach xbanic reh on wi xpaxjic ware̱ chi k'abis, chi paxej wo' chic ware̱ i hab wach xbanic reh, re' take re' je' wili nquik'or: ‹Re' hab wach nbanic jeno' ti'c'axic, tare̱t chi naribanaric wo' chic rijelow-bal reh, nqui nquik'or.

«Coric ru' chi je' re' nquik'or, raj la' hin nik'or aweh tak chi ma̱ban tak chic rijelow-bal i chaj bih ti'c'axic nbanaric aweh tak. Je' ricab cu̱c' take quisec'bic aweh tak nik'or chi ma' tic'u'lunic tak chi quiwach. On wi re' take re' nca̱j wo' quitikim ju' aseq'ueric tak, chacana̱' tak chi enca'n aweh tak.

Je' wo', wi hab wach take equic'ambic je aweh tak chi wolic chiwach i ch'ukul wach mahc ru'um nca̱j quimak'am aso' tak, chayew tak k'ab queh chi enca'n chi je' re'. Wi cu nca̱j la' wo' quimak'am ajuc ro̱k tz'ih roxlo̱c' lok aso', chayew wo' tak k'ab queh chi enquimak' aweh tak.
Je' wo', wi xat-toljic tak cu'um take sol aj Ro̱ma chi ric'amaric je jeno' ihk, ma' xa ta junhi̱'l nahtil ro̱k chac'am tak je, ca'hi'l la' chic nahtil ro̱k chac'am tak je i ihk re're'.
Je' wo' chic, wi wilic jeno' ripahkaj rito'bal aweh tak, chayew tak reh i pa' bih ripahkaj. On wi xipahkaj riquime̱l aweh tak, ma̱ban wo' tak chi ma' eta nayew tak reh.

«Re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal re're', je' wili c'uhtunic nca'n chiri̱j i c'uhbal k'oro̱j cho queh take aj najtir k'i̱j: ‹Chac'ax awas acha̱k' eh chawixowej wach awaj ixowonel, nqui c'uhtunic nca'n.

«To̱b ta wo' je' re' c'uhtunic nca'n, re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi chac'ax tak take aj ixowonel je' wo' chato'bej tak take. Re' chic take quisihtinic aweh tak chi narichalic ti'c'axic chana̱ tak, cha'n ati̱j tak chiqui̱j chi ripahkaljic ricuse'sbal i Dios chi quina̱ to̱b ta tiquitz'uj tak on nca'n ti'c'axic aweh tak.

«Chac'ax take awaj ixowonel tak k'uru' reh chi ru̱c' re're' enc'utunic chi manlic chi hat-tak rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Ajabe̱s Dios re' wilic cho pan taxa̱j maj re're' ric'uhtaj cho ric'axbal ru̱c' riye'eric cho jab ch'i̱l i k'i̱j chi quina̱ take holohic ch'i̱l take ma' holohic ta quino'jbal.

«Chi je' aj re' riwi̱' rino'jbal i Dios, re' hat-tak chac'ax wo' tak take awaj ixowonel tak. Nik'or chi je' re' maj wi xa re' wo' ti take quic'axbic aweh tak nac'ax tak take je' ricab i no'jbal nca'n take aj molol to̱j reh Ro̱ma, re' hat-tak ma' jeno' asi̱ enac'ul tak ru̱c' i Dios wi je' re' tibanic tak.

Je' wo' ma' eta nac'ul tak asi̱ wi xa cu̱c' wo' awas acha̱k' tak je' ru̱c' suk wilque̱b awu̱c' tak, xa hat-tak chic chak'lam eh raj la' cu̱c' take je' ru̱c' quixowonic awach tak xa ta nak tic'alenic tak, je' ricab nca'n awu̱c' tak take ma' quilok'onic ta wach i kAja̱w Dios.
Je' re' ajic, re' hat-tak coric ok wach ac'ux tak cu̱c' chi'nchel c'acharel je' ricab i kAja̱w Dios wilic cho pan taxa̱j til coric wach ric'ux cu̱c' chi'nchel take c'acharel.

«Chayohbalej awi̱b tak chi re' ato̱b laj c'uhtunic c'uhtumaj aweh tak, ma̱k'or tak lok xa reh c'uhtbal awach tak chi quiwach take c'acharel chi re' hat-tak xa coric chic wach ano'jbal tak, maj wi je' re' ena'n tak xa ma'xta wo' ac'ulum tak jeno' asi̱ tak ru̱c' i kAja̱w Dios wilic ar pan taxa̱j.

Re' la' hat-tak nacha'n tak jeno' c'axo̱j, ma̱wesaj tak lok ribiral chaj bih na̱banam tak jeno' to'bonic je' ricab wilic take c'acharel je' re' nca'n ar pan tak pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses on ar pan tak be̱h. Je' re' nik'or ru'um nok re' take winak re're' xa banbal quiwach take maj nok nca'n jeno' c'axoj i̱b xa nchokonic chic i su̱b nquicoj chi c'uhtbal lok reh quibano̱j chi quiwach take c'acharel xa reh ti chi nariye'eric quilok'il. Ru'um chi je' re' nca'n, re' hin til nik'or aweh tak chi xa re' wo' ti riye'jic quilok'il cu'um take c'acharel nquic'ul chi je' ricab jeno' quisi̱.
Ru̱c' re're' til nik'or wo' aweh tak chi til ma̱ban aweh tak je' ricab nca'n take winak re're', nacha'n la' tak jeno' c'axoj i̱b, xa pan ac'ux ok tak wih'ok cho

eh chi je' re' chi ma' hab ta chic wach jeno' eneht'alanic reh, re' Ajabe̱s Dios re' xilbic cho reh chi xa pan ac'ux xwih'ic i c'axo̱j xa'n tak, xa je' na ricab nye'jic jeno' asi̱ tak, nariyeb cho aweh tak chi re' rato'bil wilic cho chana̱ tak, narilmijic wach cu'um i tinamit.

«Je' wo', nik'or aweh tak chi nacha'n ati̱j tak ma̱ban wo' aweh tak je' ricab wilic take c'acharel je' ru̱c' k'e̱' nponic chi quiwach ribanaric quiti̱j chi pa'alque̱b chipam take pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses on pan tak ritz'u'c be̱h. Re' take winak re're', re' xa banbal take quiwach, nca'n quiti̱j xa reh chi naquilmijic cu'um take c'acharel eh re' hin til nik'or aweh tak chi xa re' wo' ti quilmijic cu'um take c'acharel, xa re' wo' ti re' nquic'ul chi je' ricab jeno' quisi̱.

Chi je' re' k'uru', til nik'or wo' aweh tak chi ma̱ban aweh tak je' ricab nca'n take winak re're'. Nacha'n la' ati̱j tak, chasic' tak jeno' ye'a̱b pan apa̱t tak re' etiwih'ic tak wi̱' chi ti̱j chawutquel tak eh chi je' re' nok abanam chic ati̱j tak chiwach Ajabe̱s Dios re' xa re' wo' re' xwih'ic awu̱c' chi abirmajic tak, xa je' na ricab nye'jic jeno' asi̱ tak, nariyeb aweh tak chi re' take c'acharel naquilom ric'u'ljic cho ati̱j xa'n tak johtok chiwach i Dios chi xa re' wo' re' xwih'ic awu̱c' chi abirmajic tak.

«Je' wo' nacha'n ati̱j tak, re' hat-tak ma̱pahklom tak xa chaj bih ajwal wach chaweh tak je' ricab nca'n take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, re' nquicapaj chi equic'u'ljic cho ru'um i Dios xa ru'um chi nquipahklom johtok reh i chaj bih ajwal wach chi queh.

Pa' bih ajwal wach chaweh tak k'uru', ma̱pahklom wo' tak johtok reh Dios je' ricab nca'n take c'acharel re're', re' cok ru' ru'um chi re' kAja̱w Dios reht'alim chic cho chaj bih ajwal wach chaweh tak chi cu ja' ta pe napahkaj tak johtok reh, re' ok rito'bal chapahkaj tak johtok reh k'uru'.

Je' aj re' k'uru' je wili ti̱j nik'or aweh tak chi na̱banam tak johtok chiwach i Dios: ‹Lok' laj kAja̱w Dios wilca̱t cho pan taxa̱j, k'e̱' wo' chic nka̱j chi lok'omaj ok johtok abihnal cu'um take c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al.

Ru'um aj wo' re', nkapahkaj wo' aweh chi chalok chi kana̱ rinimal awajawric chi k'atal k'oric. Til re' aj hat titak'anok chi kana̱ ru'um nok nka̱j chi re' tak'anic na'n ar pan taxa̱j nimjok wo' ayu' wach ac'al.
Je' wo' chic, nkapahkaj johtok aweh chi re' kawa' kaha̱' re' curman chi keh reh ju'jun i k'i̱j, chayew wo' cho keh reh k'i̱j yu'na
kAja̱w Dios, chacuy wo' cho kamahc je' ricab nok re' hoj nkacuy quimahc take quimahcanic chi kawach.

Je' wo' chic, ma̱yew k'ab chi ekojkajic chipam k'etbal pa̱m be̱h ricoj aj Yahm chi ekojmahcanic, koj-aco'lej la' chiwach, reh chi ma' eta rijot' kac'acharic. Je' re' nkapahkaj aweh hat kAja̱w Dios ru'um chi re' hat k'e̱' rinimal wach awajawric wilic chi k'atal k'oric eh k'e̱' wo' nimal wach alok'il chi junelic k'i̱j sakom, nqui ti̱j cha'n tak johtok chiwach.
«Je' aj re' k'uru' cha'n tak i cuyuj mahc maj wi re' hat-tak enacuy tak quimahc take awas acha̱k' tak, re' kAja̱w Dios wilic cho pan taxa̱j ewo' ricuy amahc hat-tak.
Tz'a̱b ru' wi ma' nacuy tak quimahc awas acha̱k' tak, xa ma' eta wo' ncuyuric cho amahc tak ru'um i kAja̱w Dios.

«Cha'n ati̱j tak k'uru' eh wi nchel na̱cuyum awa' aha̱' tak chi ti̱j, re' hat-tak ma̱yew tak lok chi c'uhtjic je' ricab wilic take c'acharel je' re' nca'n. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take c'acharel re're' xa banol take quiwach chi quiwach take c'acharel maj nanquicuy quiwa' quiha̱' xa nquijal chic lok i quilbal reh chi naricojoric quehtalil cu'um take c'acharel chi cuyuj wi'c nca'n chi ti̱j. Ru'um chi je' re' nca'n, re' hin til nik'or aweh tak chi xa re' wo' ti quilmijic nbanaric cu'um take c'acharel, xa re' wo' ti re' nquic'ul chi je' ricab jeno' quisi̱.
Ru̱c' re're' til nik'or wo' aweh tak chi re' hat-tak ma̱ban aweh tak je' ricab nca'n take re', nacha'n la' tak cuyuj wi'c chi ti̱j, chacowsaj awilbal tak eh chatik'a̱' wo' ti awi̱b tak chi coric.

Je' re' cha'n tak reh chi ma' eta nac'uhtaj tak lok chi quiwach take tinamit chi cuyuj wi'c ha' na'n tak eh chi je' re' nok ak'orom tak chic johtok apahkanic tak chiwach i kAja̱w Dios re' xa re' wach re' xeht'alanic cho reh chaj bih xapahkaj tak johtok reh, re're' xa je' na ricab nye'jic jeno' asi̱ tak, nariyeb aweh tak chi re' take c'acharel naquilom i ric'u'ljic cho apahkanic xa'n tak chiwach chi ma' hab ta chic jeno' xeht'alanic reh.

«Ayu' wach ac'al re' take ric'oyil tz'ih nquic'ux take tz'ih, re' take ch'ihch' quimu'kric eh re' take aj lek' qui'oquic pan tak pa̱t, maje'? Ru'um chi je' re' nc'uluric, ma' tare̱t ta chi enayew ac'ux tak china̱ take bihomal nmoloric wach ayu' wach ac'al,

re' la' tare̱t chi enayew ac'ux tak chiri̱j take bihomal wilic ru̱c' Dios ar pan taxa̱j maj ar ma'xta take ric'oyil tz'ih quic'uxbic reh tz'ih, ma' quimu'kric ta take ch'ihch' eh ma'xta wo' take aj lek' qui'oquic pan tak pa̱t.

Chiri̱j ok i Dios chach'ica̱' tak ac'ux k'uru' maj je' ricab nok re' hoj ma' kojcapewenic ta chiri̱j kabihomal nok keht'alim haj c'olic cho chi coric, je' wo' re' ru̱c' i Dios, wi ar ru̱c' ch'iclic kac'ux, re' kacapew-bal ewo' nwih'ic chi suk
eh kojriyew wo' pan sakom je' ricab nok re' nak' kawach, re're' nbanic chi pan sakom kojwih'ic. Je' re' ajic wi re' nak' kawach sakom qui'ilbic, pan sakom wo' ekojwih'ic.

Tz'a̱b ru', wi ma' sakom chic qui'ilbic i nak' kawach xa pan k'ekom wo' enwih'ic chi'nchel kati'jolal. Je' re' ajic, wi k'e̱' nchel ti'quilal chi re' hoj wilco̱j pan k'ekom ru'um chi ma' sakom ta chic qui'ilbic take nak' kawach re' nye'bic nak keh pan sakom, ra̱j rik'orom chi k'e̱' wo' chic ti'quilal chi re' kacapew-bal enmoysjic pa̱m ru'um chi ma' re' ta chiri̱j i Dios ch'iclic, chiri̱j la' take bihomal ayu' wach ac'al.

«Je' aj re' ru', chi hat-tak chic chiho̱j chi raj camanom i Dios, ma' riban ta chi quib ta nak enach'ica̱' wi̱' ac'ux tak, chiri̱j ta nak i Dios eh je' wo' chiri̱j abihomal tak je' ricab chi jeno' aj camanom ma' riban ta chi encamanic ru̱c' quib ajabe̱s maj wi erich'ica̱' ric'ux chi ribanaric ricamaj i jenaj ajabe̱s, narik'ebem lok chiri̱j ric'ux i ricamaj i jenaj chic ajabe̱s. Wi chiri̱j ricamaj i jenaj chic ajabe̱s erich'ica̱' ric'ux, ra̱j rik'orom chi ewo' chic rik'eb cho chiri̱j ric'ux i ricamaj i jenaj chic ajabe̱s re' xich'ica̱' nak wi̱' ric'ux chi camanic chi pe̱t.

«Chi xa chiri̱j wo' i Dios ch'iclic ac'ux tak, re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi ma' tikajic tak capew chi risiq'uiric atumi̱n lok'bal reh awa' aha̱' re' na̱c'acharic tak wi̱' on lok'bal reh aso' socbal reh ati'jolal tak maj re' Dios re' ma' c'axic ta chi reh riye'eric cho ac'acharic tak on re' ritik'injic ati'jolal tak, ma' c'axic ta wo' chi reh riye'eric cho aso' tak on awa' aha̱' tak.

Re' hat-tak nacoj tak rehtal nic' wach riban cho cu̱c' take cuc' chicop quirupunic wa taxa̱j. Chawil take re', to̱b ta ma' quiticbic ta, ma' quijachbic ta on to̱b ta ma'xta wo' quipa̱t c'olbal wach i quitic, xa quiwi'c wo' ru'um i Dios wilic cho pan taxa̱j. Wi je' re' riban i Dios cu̱c' take chicop re're', re' ta na chic hat-tak ma' etiriquet tak? Til pan coric, re're' til naca̱t riquetem tak maj re' hat-tak k'e̱' wo' chic atz'akil tak chi quiwach take chicop re're'.
«Je' ricab k'uru', ma' ru'um ta chi nkajic njohtic acapew-bal tak, eta nak natik tak ro̱k xa ta nak jeno' chic k'i̱j ac'acharic tak,

re' hat-tak ma' riban wo' chi nkajic njohtic acapew-bal tak chiri̱j aso' tak maj re' take chi'nchel re're', re' Dios nariyeb cho aweh tak je' ricab wo' nacoj tak rehtal riban cho cu̱c' take ihtz'ub wilque̱b chiwach take yu̱k' q'uixca̱b. Re' take re' xa ma' naho̱l ta chic quiwach chi camanic, ma' xa naho̱l ta wo' chic quiwach chi riquemeric quiso' eh xa chak' chic wach holonquilal q'uihic nca'n tok. K'e̱' wo' chic holonquilal take, chi xa ta nak re' riholonquilal riso' i Salomon chi k'atal k'oric rijunehtej nech' ok ri̱b ru̱c' riholonquilal jeno' queh ihtz'ub wili!
K'e̱' wo' chic holonquilal take chi xa ta nak je re' riholonquilal riso' i Salomon chi k'atal k'oric rijunehtej nech' ok ri̱b ru̱c' riholonquilal jeno' queh ihtz'ub wili!

Je' re' ajic, wi re' aj wo' Dios xa holohic chic rixoyjic take q'uiche̱' riban watak yu̱k' q'uixca̱b to̱b ta nchel xa nic' yu' quiyoc'oric chi naquic'ataric cok pan k'a̱k', re' aj wo' re' nariye'bic cho aso' tak re' na̱so'em wi̱' awi̱b tak. Ru'um aj re', re' hat-tak re' ma' re' ta chic aweh tak chi ma' ta nak enachop ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Dios,

ma' riban chic chi nkajic njohtic acapew-bal tak chiri̱j awa' aha̱' tak on aso' tak eh xa ta nak eriban chi enak'or tak chi je' wili: ‹Chaj bih naka'nam yu'na? ma'xta chic kawa' kaha̱' on ma'xta chic kaso', xa ta nak nqui enak'or tak.

«Nik'or aweh tak chi ma̱ban tak je' re' maj re' take c'acharel re' ma' nquinimej ta i kAja̱w Dios, xa nok ti china̱ risiq'uiric quiwa' quiha̱' on rilok'oric quiso' no̱j quicapew-bal. Ra̱j hat-tak riwi̱' chi ma' je' ta re' ena'n tak maj re' chi'nchel re're', re' kAja̱w Dios wilic cho pan taxa̱j reht'alim chic cho chi curman chaweh tak re're' eh ru'um re' nariyeb cho aweh tak.

Ru'um aj re' ma̱ban aweh tak i quino'jbal ru', re' la' hat-tak chasic' tak ricojoric awi̱b tak chi rehquen rajawric i coric wach k'atoj k'oric riban i Dios. Wi je' re' na'n tak, re're' xa ewo' riyew cho aweh tak i pa' bih curman chaweh tak.

Je' re' ajic, ma' riban chi nkajic njohtic acapew-bal tak chiri̱j pa' bih curman chaweh tak eh xa ta nak chiri̱j reh awika̱l tak eriban chi je' re' ena'n tak. Nik'or chi je' re' maj re' k'i̱j reh ikal reh wo' chic chi reh take capewenic naric'amam cho. Je' wo' chic, c'olok pan ac'ux tak chi re' ju'jun i k'i̱j ric'am cho alahtz'il tak re' ticapewenic tak wi̱' eh re're' xa manlic aweh tak reh ju'jun i k'i̱j.
«Reh chi re' Dios ma' eta noquic chi rich'ukuric wach amahc tak, ma' toquic wo' tak chi rich'ukuric wach quimahc awas acha̱k' tak wi re' hat-tak pan mahc wo' wilca̱t tak. Nik'or chi je' re'

maj je' ricab chi jeno' aj c'a̱y re' wo' i ripajbal ncamanic reh chi ripajaric i ric'a̱y, je' aj wo' re' ru̱c' i Dios nic' pa' wach i ch'ukuj k'oric na'n tak, re' wo' re' ncamanic reh chi rik'ormojic wi coric wach on ma' coric wach i ch'ukuj wach mahc na'n tak.

Ru'um aj re', chacana̱' tak rich'ukuric wach quimahc take tinamit eh ma̱ban aweh je' ricab xiban jenaj winak re' ra̱j nak resam lok i t'uch mok'al wilic pan nak' wach i ras richa̱k'. Je' nak re' xa̱j ribanam xa re' la' ma' xicoj ta rehtal chi nujunak po' pa̱m take nak' wach ru' ru'um take riq'uihal risa̱' nak' wach.

Re' winak re're', ma' riwi̱' ta nak chi je' re' eriban eh ru'um chi ma' qui'ilbic ta wo' take nak' wach ru' ru'um i riq'uihal risa̱' nak' wach, ma' riwi̱' ta wo' chi reh chi je' ta nak wili erik'or reh ras richa̱k': ‹Ac'uh, nwesaj ti lok aweh i mok'al wilic pan nak' awach, nqui erik'or reh.

«Til k'e̱' wo' nak chic ti' reh winak re're' chi je' re' erik'or, maje'? Je' re' nik'or maj reh nak chi narilom chi coric i mok'al wilic pan nak' wach i ras richa̱k', pe̱t nak xesaj lok take riq'uihal risa̱' nak' wach wilic pan nak' wach ru'.

«Je' re' k'uru' chacoj tak rehtal re' xnik'or lok re're' eh chacoj wo' tak rehtal i nanik'orom wili: Je' ricab chi ma' riyew ta ri̱b chi nye'eric queh take tz'i' i chak'wach laj tiwic ye'o̱j chi si̱ chiwach i Dios, on je' ricab chi ent'uyu'njic chi calak take ahk i chak'wach laj abaj xoybal, ma' riyew ta wo' ri̱b chi enatik tak ju' k'oric cu̱c' take c'acharel re' ma' nca̱j ta wo' quic'amam na̱ ak'orbal tak. Nik'or chi je' re' maj je' ricab chi re' chak'wach xoybal laj abaj enyak'abic pan co̱k take ahk, je' wo' re' naric'uluric ru̱c' ak'orbal hat-tak chi naquiyak'abem wo' pan co̱k take c'acharel re're'. Je' wo' chic, ru'um reh ak'orbal tak re're', re' take c'acharel re're' naca'nam chi narichalic quijosk'il awu̱c' tak je' ricab nok re' take tz'i' nquitiw i quico̱' ru'um reh i tiwic quiyohk'em.

«Tipahkanok tak johtok ru̱c' i Dios. Je' re' cha'n tak maj je' ricab chi jeno' nk'oric cok chi chi̱' i pa̱t, rirak wo' i c'acharel re' c'ahchi' risiq'uim nanteheric cho reh i tz'ahp, je' wo' re' i Dios, ewo' tiric'u'lej tak cho ru̱c' riye'eric cho aweh tak i rito'bal wi re' hat-tak enasic' tak on enapahkaj tak johtok reh.

Je' re' nik'or aweh tak maj re' narik'oric johtok ru̱c' Dios na wo' ric'u'ljic cho. Cha'n tak ati̱j chiwach i Dios k'uru' ru'um nok re' c'acharel npahkanic johtok reh rato'bil i Dios, re' wo' re' nc'ulbic reh eh re' nsic'bic reh rato'bil re' wo' re' narirakbic reh.

Je' aj re' ru' tipahkanok tak johtok chiwach i Dios re' cok ru' nacha'n tak chacapaj tak chiri̱j i wili: Wilic na jeno' ajabe̱s wi re' rac'u̱n c'ahchi' ripahkam riwa', abaj chic eriyew reh chi jelow-bal?
On wi c'ahchi' ripahkam jeno' rica̱r, jeno' c'achlic laj a̱k' na chic eriyew reh chi jelow-bal?

Ma' je' ta re' riban, maje'? Ra̱j wo' chic i Dios k'uru', wi re' hat-tak xapahkaj tak jeno' ato'bil reh, ma' eta na tirito'bej tak ru̱c' apahkanic tak? Re' Dios til la' naca̱t rito'bem tak cho eh til je' re' naribanam maj wi re' hat-tak nac'ax aha'lac'u̱n tak chi coric nanquipahkaj jeno' ato'bil aweh tak, re' ta na ti chic i Dios re' wilic cho pan taxa̱j re' ma' re' ta aj mahc je' ricab hat-tak, chi ma' eriyew cho ricuse'sbal chana̱ tak?

«Je' aj re' k'uru' chapahkaj tak johtok reh Dios eh ru̱c' rito'bal i Dios nariyeb cho aweh tak, cha'n tak i coric laj no'jbal queh take awich c'acharel tak maj nic' pa' wach ac'axaric tak nawa̱j chi naribanjic aweh tak, je' wo' re' c'axo̱j cha'n tak cu̱c' take c'acharel chi pe̱t eh ru̱c' re're' enac'am tak na̱ take C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l xquik'or take aj najtir raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios.

«Ru'um chi re' ocbal chipam i nim wach i be̱h re' xa pan c'axquilal nc'ambic je, k'e̱' q'uihal take tinamit quicojbic reh ru'um chi re're' je' na ricab jenaj nim wach tz'ahp, re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi re' ok t'uch wach tz'ahp chacoj tak chi oquic

chipam i t'uch wach be̱h nc'ambic je chipam junelic laj c'acharic ru̱c' i Dios. Ru'um chi re' ocbal chipam i t'uch wach be̱h re' xa t'uch wach ritz'ahpil, xa nech' wo' ti take quirakbic reh ocbal re're'.

«Chayohbalej awi̱b tak chi quiwach take xa chucul aj k'orol c'uhbal take, re' nca'n qui̱b chi xa je' chic take cuc' me̱' xa ch'ublic chic quiwach naqui'oquic chaxilac tak xa re' la' ru' nok wilque̱b chic chaxilac tak, xa je' chic take josk' laj q'uiche̱' tz'i' chi cansanic tak me̱', equi'oquic wo' chi risacharic wach nitijbal.

Ru'um chi je' re' nca'n take c'acharel re're', curman chi na̱rakam tak chiri̱j i quino'jbal je' ricab nanarak tak chiri̱j i wachanic nca'n take che̱'. Re' hat-tak nacoj tak rehtal chi re' q'uix-toca̱n ma' eta riban chi eriwachej cho u̱wa on chi eriwachej cak'.
Je' wo', nacoj tak rehtal chi jeno' holohic laj che̱' ma' eta wo' riban chi ma' holohic ta eriwachej cho eh ma' eta wo' riban chi re' ma' holohic ta laj che̱', holohic ta nak eriwachej cho.

Je' aj re' ru' je' ricab chi ru̱c' quiwach take che̱' nacoj tak rehtal chi jeno' holohic laj che̱' ma' eta wo' riban chi ma' holohic ta eriwachej cho on re' ma' holohic ta laj che̱', ma' eta wo' riban chi holohic ta nak eriwachej cho,

je' aj wo' re' ru̱c' take bano̱j nca'n take winak re're', na̱rakam wo' tak chiri̱j chi ma' coric ta wach quino'jbal. Ru'um chi ma' coric ta quiwach, re' take winak re're' naquic'ulum queh je' ricab nquic'ul take che̱' re' nok cojo̱j chic rehtal ru'um aj ehcham reh, quiyoc'oric lok pa ra̱' eh quic'ataric cok pan k'a̱k'.

Nik'or aweh tak k'uru' chi je' ricab ru̱c' ricojoric rehtal i wachanic nca'n take che̱', re're' enana'bej tak chajaric quiche'lal, je' wo' re' take bano̱j nca'n take winak re're', re' wo' re' naribanic chi na̱rakam tak chiri̱j i quino'jbal.

«Wilic take quik'oric wi̱n chi je' wili: ‹K-Aja̱w Jesus re' hat wilca̱t chi ajabe̱s chi nina̱, nqui nquik'or wi̱n. Ru̱c' k'oric nca'n chi je' re' ma' ra̱j ta rik'orom chi xa ru'um ta nak re're' equi'oquic chi ri'sil ro̱k k'ab i Dios chi aj k'atal k'oric chi quina̱. Je' re' nik'or maj xa re' wach i c'acharel re' rinimej chaj bih rik'or i wAja̱w Dios wilic cho pan taxa̱j naroquic chi ri'sil ro̱k k'ab ru'.

Ru'um aj re', chipam i k'i̱j re' naquic'ulum wi̱' ti'c'axic take ma' xiniminic ta reh Dios, naric'ulmujic chi q'uihal take c'acharel je' wili naquik'orom wi̱n: ‹K-Aja̱w Jesus, re' hoj, hoj awaj tahkanel eh chi je' re' xa re' wo' hat xkak'or abiral chipam take c'uhbalanic xka'n. Je' wo', xka'n wo' cho chi re' take ma' tob laj uxlabal xi'elic lok cu̱c' take c'acharel. Ma' xa ta re' xka'n, je' la' wo' yohbal wach take lok' laj nawa̱l xka'n, nqui naquik'orom.

«To̱b ta wo' je' re' naquik'orom wi̱n, re' hin je' wili nanik'orom queh: ‹Re' hin ma' nic' ta nik'orom aweh tak chi hat-tak waj tahkanel. Telen tak chi niwach k'uru' i hat-tak banol reh c'ahbil laj no'jbal, nqui nanik'orom queh.

«Je' aj re' k'uru' chacoj tak rehtal haj wilic i c'uhbal na̱c'amam tak na̱. Wi na̱c'amam tak na̱ niC'uhbal c'ahchi' abiram tak wili, re' hat-tak na̱banam tak chi hat-tak t'ulic je' ricab xiban jenaj aj tz'ako̱l, re' naxilow chi pok-ac'al naritik'a̱b wi̱' ripa̱t, xoquic chi ric'otoric jok i jul eh cu rehtal xirak jok i cow laj ac'al cu re' aj ar xip'ut cho ritik'injic ripa̱t.

Je' re' k'uru', nok ritik'a̱b chic ripa̱t i winak re're' pan cow laj ac'al, re' pa̱t re're' xa ta nak xc'uyu'sjic so' ru'um ransil take ha' xc'ulic quik'ojobej qui̱b chiwach naxi'elic cho ru'um jenaj rinimal jab ch'i̱l jenaj rinimal te̱w xchalic.

«Ra̱j nchel wi ma' la' na̱c'amam tak na̱ niC'uhbal c'ahchi' abiram tak, re' hat-tak na̱banam tak chi ma' re' ta hat-tak t'ulic je' ricab xiban jenaj chic aj tz'ako̱l, re' to̱b ta nak xilow chi pok-ac'al naritik'a̱b wi̱' ripa̱t, xa ma' cha̱m ta wo' ti xikahsaj i jul re' xip'ut cho wi̱' ritik'injic ripa̱t.

Chi xa je' ti re' riwi̱' rich'iquinjic cho ripa̱t xiban i winak re're', re' pa̱t re're' hitlijic wach ac'al ru'um ma' xicuy ta ransil take ha' xc'ulic quik'ojobej qui̱b chiwach naxi'elic take cho ru'um jenaj rinimal jab ch'i̱l jenaj rinimal te̱w xchalic. Je' aj re' ru', xa ta nak chic rehtalil xcahnic so' i pa̱t re're', nqui Jesus queh raj tahkanel.
Nok ricohlam chic c'uhtunic re're', re' take tinamit xibirinic reh c'uhbalanic riban i Jesus, k'e̱' xsahchic quic'ux

maj xquicoj rehtal chi re' rajawric wilic chi c'uhtunic, ar nchalic ru̱c' i Dios eh chi je' re' rajawric, re're' ma' je' ta ricab i c'uhtunic nca'n take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses riban maj re' rik'orbal i Dios ric'uhtaj, raj la' take aj c'uhtunel re're' xa nquica'pechej i k'oro̱j cho cu'um take caj tijinel reh i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses.
Chiri̱j aj chic i c'uhtunic xiban china̱ i yu̱k' re're', re' Jesus p'uht rikajic cho ar chi ihch'ilimaj cu'um riq'uihal tinamit.

Ar ajic nok c'ahchi' rikajic cho Jesus, jenaj winak xilim ri̱j naxc'ulic lok ru̱c' je' wili xik'or reh chi xuclic cok chiwach: «K-Aja̱w Jesus, re' hin weht'alim chi wilic awajawric chi resmejic lok niya'bilal wi la' je' re' nawa̱j i hat chi ena'n. Nawa̱j na chi je' re' ena'n wu̱c' k'uru'? nqui reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh winak re're' naxiyew je k'ab china̱ chi ritz'a'jic: «Ho̱' nwa̱j! Elok lok aya'bilal k'uru', nqui reh. Xa re' wo' ti xik'or i Jesus chi je' re', xelic wo' ti lok i xilim wilic nak chiri̱j i winak re're'.

Chiri̱j re're', re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh: «Ma' hab pe wach aj eh nak'or chaj bih xc'uluric awu̱c', re' la' cha'n hiy ru̱c' aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios chi ric'uhtjic reh chi ma'xta chic awe̱t. Je' wo' chayew reh asi̱ je' ricab tak'amaj cahnok ribanaric chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Je' aj re' cha'n reh chi nok riyeb chic rik'orbal i aj k'ahsem si̱ chi suk chic ac'ux eneht'aljic wo' cu'um take tinamit chi re' hin ma' niyak'abej ta pan wo̱k i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, nqui xik'or reh.

Chiri̱j chic re' nok re' Jesus oquic riban cok chipam i tinamit re' Capernahum ribihnal, jenaj chic winak xchalic chi ric'uluric. Re' winak wili re' jenaj c'amol quibe̱h take sol aj Ro̱ma, xixuc'a̱' ri̱b chiwach i Jesus chi ripahkaljic reh chi narito'bem i raj camanom.
Je' aj wili xik'or cok reh: «K-Aja̱w Jesus, re' waj camanom wilic pan pa̱t jiclic wach yoca̱b ru'um riya'bilal eh k'e̱' ti'quilal wilic wi̱' ru'um chi sicrinak chic riti'jolal, nqui reh.
Chalic Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Tare̱t, equino̱j awu̱c' chi resmejic lok riya'bilal awaj camanom, nqui reh.

Chalic i winak re're' je' wo' chic wili xic'u'lej wi̱': «Ajabe̱s Jesus re' hin nwic'raj chi ma' ric'ul ta chi wi̱n chi etoquic pa nipa̱t xa re' la' chak'or chi elok lok riya'bilal i waj camanom maj re' hin weht'alim chi xa ru̱c' k'oric re're' encowjic i waj camanom.

Je' re' nik'or ru'um nok re' quik'orbal take wilic cajawric n-nimjic je' ricab niban i hin cu̱c' take ajabe̱s wilque̱b chi nina̱, on je' ricab nca'n take niso̱l ch'i̱l take waj camanom wilque̱b pa nik'ab, nquinimej wo' nik'orbal. Je' ricab wi re' hin nitak'a̱' take je niso̱l chi nacojic, chi jumehk'il qui'o̱j. On wi xnik'or queh chi naquichalic, chi jumehk'il wo' ti quichalic. Je' wo' cu̱c' take waj camanom, wi jeno' chi quixilac xnik'or reh chi naroquic chi camanic, chi jumehk'il wo' ti noquic chi ribanaric i pa' bih nik'or reh, nqui winak re're'.

Naxibiraj i Jesus chi je' re' k'e̱' naxsahchic ric'ux eh je' wili xik'or queh take c'ahchi' quitahkanic reh: «Re' winak wili, k'e̱' wo' chic ch'iclic ric'ux chiwi̱j. Til nik'or chi je' ricab ricapew-bal i winak wili, ma' ja' nirakam ta jeno' chi quixilac take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, nqui Jesus. Chi je' re' xiban wo' je' ricab xipahkaj cho cajawil sol re're'.

Chiri̱j re're', je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Til coric nik'or chi q'uihal take c'acharel re' quic'acharic xa rehreh ye'a̱b wilque̱b pa rijohsbal cho k'i̱j ch'i̱l wo' pa rikahsbal i k'i̱j naquic'ulic lok chi ihch'ilimaj take ru'um Awraham, ch'i̱l Isahac ch'i̱l wo' i Jacow, chi naquiwih'ic cok chiwach i kAja̱w Dios re' nk'atbic cho k'oric cu pan taxa̱j. Nok wilque̱b chic cok chiwach, re're' naribanam chi enquic'ul jenaj rinimal wach quilok'il je' ricab quilok'il nquic'ul take rula̱' jeno' aj ehcham nink'i̱j nok re're' riyew queh chi naquitz'uhkic cok nah rime̱xa rich'i̱l.

«Tz'a̱b ru' cu̱c' take q'uihal queh ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ma' je' ta re' naric'uluric, re' la' take re', to̱b ta k'oro̱j cahnok ribiral queh chi nariye'eric queh chi re' Dios nariwih'ic chi k'atal k'oric chi quina̱, naquit'ermejic lok chiwach. Ru̱c' re're' naquic'ulum je' ricab xquic'ul take rula̱' aj ehcham nink'i̱j chi xit'ermejic lok chiri̱j pa̱t eh ru'um re're' xi'oquic chi ok'ic ru'um riti'quil quic'ux chi xi'esmejic lok pa rinimal lok k'ekom, nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j re', je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh cajawil i sol re're': «Elok lok riya'bilal awaj camanom! Yu'na ajic echic riban chi eto̱j pan apa̱t maj xniban chic re' haj wilic xapahkaj wi̱n. Xniban chi je' re' ru'um nok xach'ica̱' ac'ux chiwi̱j chi wilic wajawric chi resmejic lok riya'bilal awaj camanom, nqui Jesus reh. Je' re' ajic re' sol xo̱j pa ripa̱t eh naxponic ar xina'bej chi re' raj camanom xelic lok riya'bilal chipam i junc'am nok re' Jesus xik'or chi je' re' xc'uluric ru̱c' aj camanom re're'.
Nok ojonak chic i cajawil sol re're', re' Jesus xo̱j pa ripa̱t i ma' Luch eh ar xilow chi re' ritu̱t rehq'ue̱n jiclic wach yoca̱b ru'um jenaj cak tz'a'.

Ar ajic nok re' Jesus xijil cok ri̱b eh naxitz'a'j cok rik'ab ixok re're', xa chiwach wo' ti junc'am re're' xelic ti i cak tz'a' wilic chiri̱j. Chi suk chic ric'ux, xuctic johtok chi kiliric i hoj rula̱'.

Chiwach aj wo' roquic k'i̱j re're', q'uihal take wilic ma' tob laj uxlabal cu̱c' ch'i̱l take wilic rehreh wach quiya'bilal xic'amaric cho ru̱c' Jesus eh re're' xa ru̱c' ti rik'orbal xic'saj quiya'bilal take yowa'i̱b. Je' wo', re're' xit'erej wo' lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal cu̱c' take c'acharel re' choplic na̱ quic'acharic cu'um.

Ru̱c' xiban i Jesus re're' k'uru', xo̱j elok wach i k'oro̱j cho ru'um i raj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios, re' Isayi̱yas ribihnal, chi je' wili: “Re' Lok' laj Ajabe̱s xesenic lok reh kati'quilal eh xesaj wo' lok kaya'bilal, nqui k'oro̱j cho ru'um.
Naxsak'ic lok je' ikal, re' Jesus xik'or keh hoj raj tahkanel chi nakak'ahxic je chi juntar ma' laj ha' cu'um queh riq'uihal tinamit xilow chi xquimol ti cok qui̱b chiri̱j.

Ar aj ru', jenaj aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xo̱j c'olok ru̱c' Jesus eh je' wili xik'or reh: «Ajabe̱s kaj tijinel, re' hin nwa̱j nibanam chi hin awaj tahkanel. Naca̱t nitahkem k'uru' xa pa' eto̱j, nqui reh.

Chalic Jesus eht'albal reh i c'axquilal ric'am cho ritahkaljic, je' wili xik'or reh: «Tare̱t, quinatahkej. Xa re' la' re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel ma'xta jeno' niye'a̱b haj ta nak nanihi'lic wi̱' chi eli̱c, ma' je' ta nicab take ya̱c xa pa' wilic quiju̱l on je' ricab take cuc' tz'iquin chi xa pa' wilic quike̱s, nqui reh.

Chiri̱j aj chic re', jenaj chic winak re' raj ritahkem wo' nak i Jesus, je' wili xik'or reh: «Ajabe̱s, re' hin nwa̱j naca̱t nitahkem xa pa' eto̱j, xa re' la' ru' nimuk'a̱' pe je i waja̱w naquimok je, cu re' aj wo' ru' etinitahkej, nqui reh.

Chalic i Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Re' hat ma̱ban aweh nca'n take tinamit maj re' take re' nanquimuk'a̱' je quicamnak ma' nquik'or ta ribiral i rajawric i Dios queh cahnel chic take cahnok. Je' re' nca'n ru'um nok je' wo' camnak take ru̱c' quino'jbal. Raj nchel i hat, quinatahkej eh cha'n chi hat chic aj tijem i̱b chiwi̱j, nqui Jesus reh.
Chiri̱j chic ru', re' Jesus xoquic cok pan cano̱wa chi tahkamaj wo' je ku'um hoj cablaj chi raj tahkanel.

Ar ajic nok behic chic nka'n je pan cano̱wa, xchalic jenaj rinimal cow laj te̱w, cu rehtal xa cuc' tak nak chic ma' risolq'uij i kacano̱wa chi kehque̱n ru'um take ribohl ha' xucsaj. Ru'um chi wiric riban i Jesus chipam i cano̱wa,
re' hoj raj tahkanel xkac'a'saj wach naxkilow chi pan yohbal chic wilco̱j eh je' wili xkak'or reh: «Ha̱w, Ha̱w, c'a'chok awach alah, nakacux'ic yu'na. Koj-aco'lej k'uru', kojqui reh.

Chalic i Jesus je' wili xik'or keh chi kak'iliric: «Re' hat-tak, k'e̱' la' nak chic na̱chopom ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Dios. Chaj wa'ric na tiyo'jic tak? nqui keh. Chiri̱j re', xuctic johtok eh xik'or reh te̱w ch'i̱l i ha' chi je' wili: «Tipa̱' hat te̱w eh titu̱k hat ha', nqui queh. Xa chiwach wo' ti junc'am re're', xpah'ic i te̱w eh tuklujic i ha'.

Naxkilow nic' wach xiban i Jesus, je' wili xkak'or chi kawach chi xa sahchanak chic kac'ux: «Re' cok i Jesus wili til niq'uic wo' chic na̱ rajawric. Coric nkak'or maj ma' xa re' ta take ma' tob laj uxlabal quibirinic chiwach, je' la' wo' i te̱w ch'i̱l i ha' quibirinic wo' k'oric chiwach, kojqui chi kawach.

Chiri̱j aj chic ru' nok pononak chic lok chi juntar ha' pan quiyuk'ul take aj Cara̱ra, re' Jesus xoquic je chi behic chipam i jenaj be̱h ma' hab ta wach riban wi̱' canar iq'uic cu'um queh take quib chi winak xa je' chic take josk' laj chicop naqui'elic cho xilac tak rijulil camnak. Chi je' re' elic xca'n cho, xichalic chi ric'uluric i Jesus. Re' take quib winak re're' chopo̱j na̱ i quic'acharic cu'um take ma' tob laj uxlabal

je' wili xquik'or cho reh Jesus chi xa q'ueric chic quichi̱': «Hat Jesus rAc'u̱n i Dios, re' hat xatc'ulic ti lok chi kaye'eric je pan ti'c'axic chi ja' nponic ta wo' rik'ijil. Ma'xta bih nacoj-atz'a̱b wi̱' k'uru' chi kat'ermejic lok, nqui take winak re're' chi ye'o̱j quik'orbal cu'um take ma' tob laj uxlabal wilic cu̱c'.
Je' wo', re' take ma' tob laj uxlabal re're' naxquilow chi juntuhm chi riq'uihal ahk wi'c nca'n wach yu̱k' cu naht je so' cu̱c',

je' wili xquik'or reh Jesus chi xa nch'uk chic quic'ux: «Ajabe̱s Jesus, wi naco̱j at'erem lok cu̱c' take winak wili, chayew k'ab keh chi cu̱c' ok chic take juntuhm chi ahk wulu' ekoj-oquic, nqui take reh Jesus. Je' re' xquik'or reh naxip'ut wo' ti rik'ormojic queh chi naquelic lok cu̱c' take winak re're'.

Je' re' k'uru', xa re' wo' ti xye'eric k'ab queh chi nacoquic cu̱c' take ahk, re' take ma' tob laj uxlabal re're' xi'elic lok cu̱c' take winak re're' eh nok oconak chic take cu̱c' take ahk xca'n chi re' take re' xa cajamem chic qui̱b xikajic cho chiwach i yu̱k' wi'c nca'n wi̱'. Chi je' re' xiquimic naxi'o̱j k'ehbok chipam jenaj ma' laj ha' wilic ar.

Naxquilow take aj cha'jem ahk chi je' re' xc'uluric, xa cajamem chic qui̱b xi'o̱j pan tinamit eh xponic quik'or nic' wach naxesmejic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal quichoponic nak quina̱ take quib chi winak re're'. Je' wo' xponic quik'or chaj bih xquic'ul take ahk cu'um take ma' tob laj uxlabal.
Nok birimaj aj chic re're', q'uihal take c'acharel pan tinamit Cara̱ra xi'o̱j ru̱c' Jesus eh naxiponic ru̱c' xquipahkaj ato'bil reh chi narelic je pan quiyuk'ul.

Chiri̱j chic naxpahkjic reh Jesus chi narelic je pan quiyuk'ul aj Cara̱ra, re're' xoquic je pan cano̱wa kich'i̱l hoj raj tahkanel eh xojk'ahxic je juntar ha' ar chipam i tinamit re' Capernahum ribihnal re' nponic patanok wi̱' i Jesus naribehsaj pa̱m take yuk'ul re're'.

Ar ajic, nok wilco̱j chic chipam i tinamit re're', xc'amaric cho ru̱c' Jesus jenaj si̱c yoclic wach rich'aht. Re' Jesus naxicoj rehtal chi re're' ch'i̱l take xic'ambic je reh, til ch'iclic quic'ux chiri̱j i rajawric chi esenic lok ya'bilal, je' wili xik'or reh si̱c: «Bi̱l, re' hat ch'iclic ac'ux chiwi̱j, ru'um aj re' yu'na nicuy chic amahc. Sukbok ac'ux k'uru', nqui xik'or reh.

Naxquibiraj chi je' re', wilic take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses wilque̱b wo' cok ar je' wili p'uht quik'orom pan quic'ux: «Re' Jesus wili til c'ahchi' riyak'abem pa ro̱k i Dios, nqui p'uht quik'orom. Je' re' xquik'or maj chi queh ru', ru̱c' take k'oric re're' c'ahchi' rijunehtem ri̱b ru̱c' i Dios.
Raj la' i Jesus, chi reht'alim chic chaj bih c'ahchi' quicapam cho pan quic'ux, je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' hat-tak mahc na'n tak ru̱c' rik'ormojic pan ac'ux tak

chi re' hin c'ahchi' nijot'om i winak wili ru̱c' i k'oric xnik'or. Je' re' nacapaj tak maj chaweh hat-tak re' rik'ormojic reh winak wili chi cuyu̱j chic rimahc ma' c'axic ta ti ribanaric maj ma' nilmijic ta wach. Ru'um aj re', je' wo' wili nak'or tak cho pan acapew-bal tak: «Wi til coric k'uru' chi wilic rajawric, chik'or reh winak re're' chi pa'lajok eh behok ru'um nok re' cok re' nc'uhtunic wach, tiquitak pan ac'ux.

‹C'uhtbal aj aweh tak chi wilic wajawric chi ricuyuric quimahc i tinamit ayu' wach ac'al, re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel nanik'orom reh si̱c wili chi pa'lajok johtok, nqui queh. Chiri̱j chic re', re' Jesus xik'or reh si̱c chi je' wili: «Ha̱w, yu'na echic riban chi enawihkaj je ach'aht. Tipa̱' johtok k'uru' maj yu'na na̱soljic je pan apa̱t chi behic chic ena'n je, nqui reh.
Naxibiraj i winak chi je' re', xa chiwach wo' ti junc'am re're' xuctic johtok eh chiri̱j chic ru' xo̱j pa ripa̱t chi behic chic riban.
Ar re' take tinamit xi'ilbic reh winak re're', chi xa sahchanak chic quic'ux xquitioxej johtok i Dios ru'um chi re' Jesus xye'eric rajawric chi ricuyuric quimahc take c'acharel china̱ ac'al wili.

Pan jenaj chic k'i̱j nok re' Jesus xa cu re' pe ti xip'ut ribehsjic pa̱m i tinamit Capernahum, re're' xilow niwach i hin ma' Tiyoh chi tz'ukulqui̱n ar re' wilic wi̱' i me̱xa re' nbanaric wi̱' to̱j ntak'abjic je Ro̱ma eh ar je' wili xik'or wi̱n: «Ha̱w tak chiwi̱j, nwa̱j chi na̱woquic chi hat waj tahkanel, nqui wi̱n. Naxinbiraj chi je' re', xnicana̱' cahnok i nicamaj eh xnitahkej je i Jesus.

Junpech ajic pan jenaj nink'i̱j tik'imaj wach wu'um, re' hin xnimol quiwach take xwihch'ilej cho chi moloj to̱j reh Ro̱ma, je' wo' take q'uihal winak wilic wo' quibiral chi aj mahc take eh xoj-oquic chi wi'c ch'i̱l i Jesus ch'i̱l wo' take wich aj tahkanel chiri̱j.

Nok wi'c chi nka'n, re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, naxquilow chi re' Jesus xituna̱' ri̱b ku̱c' i hoj, je' wili xk'ormojic queh take wich aj tahkanel: «Nic' wach nok re' awaj tijinel tak c'ahchi' ribanam riwa' riha̱' cu̱c' take aj molol to̱j ntak'abjic je Ro̱ma ch'i̱l wo' cu̱c' take tinamit wilic quibiral chi aj mahc take? nqui xk'ormojic queh.

Naxibiraj chi je' re' i Jesus, je' wili xik'or queh: «Je' ricab nk'ormojic chi ma' re' ta take suk quic'ux qui'o̱j ru̱c' aj ik'omonel, re' la' take yowa̱b, je' wo' re' wu̱c' i hin, re' wo' ti take nquic'raj qui̱b chi aj mahc take quichalic wu̱c' chi ribirmijic nik'orbal, nqui queh. Chiri̱j re', je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh:

«Re' hat-tak re' xa hat-tak c'u'tjem queh take wili xatchalic tak, quinatahkej tak eh chatijej tak ri̱j chaj bih ra̱j rik'orom take k'oric k'oro̱j wili ru'um i Dios: “Tare̱t chi enac'at tak cho asi̱ chi niwach, xa re' la' re' til wo' chic k'e̱' nwa̱j chi na̱banam tak, re' riqueteljic quiwach take awas acha̱k' tak, nqui i k'oro̱j cho re're'. «Je' re' ajic re' hin niban niwa' quich'i̱l take re' maj ma' re' ta nchel chi risiq'uiric take nquicapaj chi coric wach quic'ux xinchalic, xinchalic la' chi quisiq'uiric take nquic'raj wo' ti qui̱b chi aj mahc take chi rik'ormojic queh chi naquicana̱b i quimahc, nqui queh.

Junpech naxi'o̱j wo' c'olok ru̱c' i Jesus take raj tahkanel i Wa̱n, je' wili xquik'or cok reh: «Re' hoj xa q'uih pech wo' nkamol ki̱b chi ti̱j ru̱c' cuyuj wi'c je' ricab wo' nca'n take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Chaj wa'ric k'uru' chi re' take awaj tahkanel i hat ma' je' ta re' nca'n? nqui take reh.

Chalic i Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Je' ricab chi pan jeno' caxarahil ma' eta riban chi re' take rula̱' aj caxa̱ra enquiti'saj quic'ux chi ricuyuric quiwa' quiha̱' je' ricab chi wilic ta nak jeno' camnak chi quiwach, je' wo' re' take waj tahkanel i hin ma' eta wo' riban chi enquicuy quiwa' quiha̱' chi cu wilqui̱n pe hin chi quixilac. Re' cok ru', naponok i k'i̱j chi na̱wesmejic je nah ac'al i hin re' aj ye'ol sukquil c'uxlis je' ricab riban aj caxa̱ra cu̱c' take rula̱', cu re' aj wo' ru' re' take waj tahkanel naquicuyum quiwa' quiha̱' ru'um riti'quil quic'ux chi ma' wilqui̱n ta chic cu̱c', nqui queh.

Chiri̱j re're', xik'or wo' chic queh chi je' wili: «Ma' hab ta wach jeno' c'acharel riwek jeno' ac' laj we̱x chi c'ojbal wach jeno' k'echer laj we̱x, maje'? Je' re' nik'or maj nasuhbok i ac' laj c'ojbal, enwek je riman i k'echer laj we̱x ru'um nok ma' jenaj ta chic wach ricowil ch'i̱l i ac' laj c'ojbal.

Je' wo', ma' hab ta wach jeno' c'acharel ric'ol i ch'amsamaj ri̱s aji̱j pan jeno' k'echer laj suh maj wi xiban chi je' re', ma' xa re' ta i suh enq'uer ru'um ransil rich'amil i ri̱s aji̱j, ela' wo' no̱j chi k'e̱b i ri̱s aji̱j re're'. Je' re' k'uru', je' ricab chi ma' hab ta wach je' re' nbanic, je' wo' re' ru̱c' i niC'uhbal ma' eta wo' riban chi re' take aj tijem i̱b chiwi̱j nok quic'u'lem chic na̱ niC'uhbal xa cu nca̱j wo' quic'amam na̱ i c'uhbal tijimaj nak take cho wi̱'. Nik'or chi je' re' maj je' ricab chi re' ri̱s aji̱j pan ac' laj suh nc'olmojic reh chi quicabchelal ma'xta bih enoquic queh, curman wo' chi re' take waj tahkanel xa re' wo' niC'uhbal naquic'amam na̱ reh chi re' quicapew-bal ru' ch'i̱l i niC'uhbal i hin ma' eta no̱j riyoj ri̱b, nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic re', nok xa cu ja' ricohlaj ta wo' i k'oric i Jesus cu̱c' take c'acharel re're' chi tz'uklic cu̱c', xo̱j c'olok ar jenaj winak nim riwa'ric chi quixilac take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh je' wili xik'or reh Jesus chi xuclic cok chiwach: «Ha̱w, re' hin til nicapaj chi re' wixk'u̱n xquimic na chic cho yu'na maj xa chic q'uisi̱n ma' nquimic ru'um riya'bilal naxinchalic. Chacuy k'uru', tak chiwi̱j pan pa̱t eh chacoj ak'ab china̱ reh chi enc'acharic wo' chic, nqui reh.
Chi je' aj re', re' Jesus naxuctic je kich'i̱l i hoj cablaj chi raj tahkanel, xo̱j wo' chiri̱j i c'amol be̱h re're'.

Nok ojic chic nka'n, cu re' pe' chic ru' jenaj ixok cablaj chic ha̱b rip'utum cho riya'bilal chi re' ritz'ajo̱j re' nchalic chiri̱j eli̱c poh xa c'ahchi' chic cho chiri̱j chi xa ma'xta chic rik'ijil, xijil cok ri̱b chiri̱j i Jesus eh xitz'a'j cok i ro̱k risu't rijela̱' nah teleb, chi c'ahchi' ricapam chi ru̱c' re're' nariq'uic je riya'bilal.

Je' re' xiban maj je' wili c'ahchi' rik'orom pa ric'ux: «Xa re' wi xnitz'a'j i ro̱k i su't rijela̱' nah teleb i Jesus, enelic lok niya'bilal maj re're' wili wilic rajawric chi resmejic lok kaya'bilal i hoj yowa̱b, nqui c'ahchi' rik'orom.

Je' re' ajic naxiban chi je' re' xa chiwach wo' ti junc'am re're' xiq'uic ti je riya'bilal, xa re' la' nok xilow chi je' re' xc'uluric ru̱c', xoquic cho jenaj rinimal yo'jic ru̱c' maj xicoj rehtal chi re' Jesus xirak chiri̱j chi wilic xtz'a'anic cok reh riso'. Chi je' aj re', re' Jesus naxilwic je chiri̱j, je' wili xik'or reh ixok re're': «Bi̱l sukbok ac'ux, re' aya'bilal xiq'uic chic ru'um chi xach'ica̱' ac'ux chiwi̱j chi re' hin wilic wajawric chi je' re' xniban awu̱c', nqui reh.

Nok rik'orom chic chi je' re', re' Jesus xitik ju' ojic pa ripa̱t i winak nim riwa'ric re're'. Naxponic cok chi chi̱' i pa̱t re're', xilow chi wilic risi̱c take tinamit xa quichokonic chic chi ok'ic eh quich'i̱l take re' wilque̱b wo' i juntuhm chi aj su̱b xa ntz'iric chic quiwach banoj su̱b nca'n.

Ar ajic, re're' je' wili xik'or queh: «Chacuy, telen tak lok ayu' eh chamay tak ok'ic maj re' ixk'un wili ma' camnak ta, wiric la' riban, nqui queh. Re' take c'acharel re're' naxquibiraj i xik'or i Jesus, chi re' ixk'un re're' xa wiric riban, xi'oquic chi rise'ljic ru'um nok pan quic'ux ru' re' Jesus ma' reht'alim ta chi re' ixk'un re're' camnak chic,

xa re' la' i Jesus til reht'alim wo' chic cho re're'. Je' re' k'uru' nok elenak chic take lok ri̱j pa̱t chi'nchel i c'acharel, re' Jesus xoquic cok re' yoclic wi̱' ixk'un re're' eh ar aj ru' naxich'ihlej johtok chi k'ab, xucsaj johtok chi c'achlic chic.
Re' bano̱j xiban i Jesus re're' xelic lok ribiral chipam i tinamit Capernahum re're' eh ma' xa ta ar cahnic, je' la' wo' xelic lok junsut reh i yuk'ul re're'.

Junpech aj chic nok re' Jesus c'ahchi' riq'uic je chipam jenaj be̱h, quib take sot' p'uht quitahkem je eh je' wili nquik'or reh chi xa q'ueric chic quichi̱' chiri̱j: «Jesus ra̱' ri'sil cho k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy, chacuy chaquetelej ta wo' ti kawach chi ribanaric chi nakilbic, nqui take reh.

Naxi'o̱j c'olok chipam i pa̱t re' xponic wi̱' i Jesus, je' wili xibiraj queh: «Til na ch'iclic ac'ux tak chi wilic wajawric chi risakomsjic pa̱m i nak' awach tak? nqui queh. Naxquik'or chi til ch'iclic quic'ux chiri̱j,
re' Jesus xitz'a'j cok i nak' quiwach eh je' wili xik'or queh: «Ru'um chi xach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiwi̱j chi nanisakomsam pa̱m i nak' awach tak, sakombok wo' pa̱m i nak' awach tak k'uru', nqui queh.
Ar ajic xsakombic wo' ti pa̱m i nak' quiwach. Chiri̱j i wili, re' Jesus til xipahkaj queh chi ma' hab pe wach neht'alanic reh re' xiban cu̱c',
xa re' la' re' take re' ma' xca'n ta wo' i chaj bih xk'ormojic queh, xi'oquic la' ti chi resmejic lok ribiral chi junsut reh yuk'ul re're' naxi'elic je chipam i pa̱t re're'.
Chiri̱j chic ru' nok c'ahchi' quelic je take sot' re're', jenaj wo' chic winak memrenak ru'um ma' tob laj uxlabal nchopbic na̱ ric'acharic, xc'amaric je ru̱c' i Jesus

reh chi narit'erem wo' lok i ma' tob laj uxlabal wilic ru̱c' i winak re're'. Naxit'ermejic lok i ma' tob laj uxlabal, re' winak re're' p'uht pe' rik'oric cho eh ru'um re', re' take tinamit xi'ilbic reh i c'ulu̱j re're', je' wili p'uht quik'orom chi xa nsahchic chic quic'ux: «Ma' janc'al ta k'i̱j kilom ta nak pan kac'acharic yohbal wach lok' laj nawa̱l je' ricab c'ahchi' ribanam i Jesus chi kaxilac hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, nqui take chi quiwach.

Raj nchel take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ma' je' ta re' nquik'or, je' la' chic wili nquik'or ru': «Re' Jesus wili, re' cajawil take ma' tob laj uxlabal nye'bic rajawric chi quit'ermejic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal, nqui nquik'or.
