Nok p'uht wo' chic ribehem pa̱m take nimak chi cuc' tak tinamit wilque̱b pa riyuk'ul i Calile̱ya, re' Jesus xitik ju' ric'uhtunic chipam take pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Ar ajic chi c'ahchi' ric'sam wo' xa chaj bih quiti'quilal take yowa'i̱b, re' Jesus xik'or queh tinamit i holohic laj k'oric wili chi re' Dios re' nk'atbic k'oric ra̱j richopom quina̱ take c'acharel.

Ma' xa ta re're' xiban cu̱c' take c'acharel wilque̱b pa riyuk'ul i Calile̱ya, k'e̱' la' wo' xiquetelej quiwach take riq'uihal tinamit quituhbem qui̱b chiri̱j maj xicoj rehtal chi ma' re' ta chic ricorquilal riC'uhbal i Dios c'ahchi' quibiram cu̱c' take aj tijem queh, re' la' take c'acharel re're' xa je' na chic quicab take cuc' me̱' je' ru̱c' ma'xta chic aj ilol queh eh ru'um re' c'ul quipuhcam qui̱b eh ma' quiniq'uem ta wo' chic quiwa' quiha̱'.

Ru'um aj re', je' wili xik'or keh hoj raj tahkanel: «Je' ricab chi re' take aj jacho̱l junseht ok chi rinimal abi̱x ma' quimahnic ta chic ru'um chi nech' ti take chi jach, re' take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios til ma'xta wo' ti quimahnic chi rik'ormojic i c'uhbal queh riq'uihal tinamit wili.
Cha'n tak k'uru' ru̱c' i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Dios je' ricab nca'n take jacho̱l re're' chi nquipahkaj reh aj ehcham abi̱x chi naritak'a̱b je quiman chi jach, nqui Jesus.

Naxojresaj lok pa reh i hoj cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel, re' Jesus je' wili xik'or keh: «Tinipahba̱' tak chi wih'ok awajawric tak chi quit'ermejic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal cu̱c' take c'acharel choplic quina̱ cu'um eh je' wo' chi resmejic lok xa chajaric quiti'quilal take yowa'i̱b, nqui keh.

Je' wili kabihnal i hoj re' xojrichih chi hoj cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel: Re' ma' Simon re' xo̱j wo' cahnok ribihnal chi Luch ru'um i Jesus, re're' pe̱t xesmejic lok pa reh. Chiri̱j chic ru', re' chic ma' Tirix richa̱k' i ma' Simon, re' ma' Jaco̱wo rac'u̱n i ma' Sewere̱yo, re' ma' Wa̱n richa̱k' i ma' Jaco̱wo,
re' ma' Peh, re' ma' Warto̱lo, re' ma' Ma̱x, re' hin ma' Tiyoh re' xinwih'ic cho chi aj molol to̱j ntak'abjic je Ro̱ma, re' ma' Jaco̱wo rac'u̱n Alpe̱yo, re' Lewe̱yo re' ribihnej wo' chi Tare̱yo,

re' ma' Simon re' wilic nak chi quixilac take quibanic i k'ak'anic reh chi ma'xta nak chic riwih'ic rajawric i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma chi quina̱ take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Re' ma' Ju̱ras aj Caryot re' xk'ahsanic wo' reh Jesus pan quik'ab take raj ixowonel chi naricansjic.

Je' wo' chic naxojresaj lok pa reh i hoj cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel, je' wili i cojoj no'jbal xiban je keh i Jesus naxojritak'a̱' je chi rik'ormojic riC'uhbal: «Yu'na, ja' eta pe riban chi etoquic tak pan quitinami̱t take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh ja' eta wo' riban chi etoquic tak cu̱c' take aj Sama̱rya,
re' la' hat-tak hiy tak til xa chipam quitinamital take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' wilque̱b chi xa je' na take me̱' je' ru̱c' sahchel take.

Xa cu̱c' aj take re' k'uru' c'ahchi'ca̱t tak nitak'a̱b je eh xa queh take re' chak'or tak chi re' Dios re' nk'atbic cho k'oric cu pan taxa̱j, wilic chic chi quixilac take c'acharel chi narichopom quina̱.

Je' wo', nik'or aweh tak chi ma̱pahkaj tak ritz'akil i na̱banam tak ru'um nok ma' re' ta ru̱c' tumi̱n xniyew aweh tak i wajawric chi na̱banam wo' tak take wili: Re' quic'a'chsjic take camnak, re' quesmejic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal re' quichopbic na̱ take c'acharel eh je' wo' re' resmejic lok quiya'bilal take xilim qui̱j ch'i̱l xa pa' chic jaric ya'bilal wilic queh toco̱m chic yowa'i̱b.
Je' wo' chic, nik'or aweh tak chi ma̱c'am tak je atz'a̱k pan ac'ola̱b tak,

je' wo' ma̱c'am tak chic jeno' ajalba̱l tak ch'i̱l junc'uhl ok chic aper-xijab tak eh ma̱c'am wo' tak je achi̱m ch'i̱l ach'imim re' nacoj tak chi behic. Re' cok ru', to̱b ta na̱wojic tak chi ma'xta bih wilic aweh tak, ma' ticapewenic tak chiri̱j re're' maj je' ricab nok re' aj camanom ric'ul chi reh chi naric'ulum ritojbal ru̱c' ricamaj riban, re' hat-tak ric'ul wo' chaweh tak chi cu̱c' toco̱m na̱c'ulum tak chi'nchel re're'.

«Re' hat-tak, xa pa' wilic tinamit on abixbal na̱ponic tak wi̱', chasic' tak jeno' winak coric wach ric'ux re' ensukbic ric'ux ru̱c' awih'ic tak pa ripa̱t. Je' wili na̱na'bem tak wi̱' wi ru̱c' i c'acharel re're' etiwih'ic tak cu rehtal chic telic tak je chipam i tinamit re're':
Nachac'alenej tak, wi re're' ric'ul chi suk apahkanic chi nariyeb apatal tak, ra̱j rik'orom chi re' aj re' i c'acharel na̱cahnic tak wi̱'.

Re're' k'uru' ric'ul chi reh chi nariye'eric cho china̱ i sukquil c'uxlis re' xapahkaj tak johtok reh Dios naxatponic tak pa ripa̱t i c'acharel re're'. Tz'a̱b aj ru', wi re're' ma' xa̱j ta riyeb apatal tak, ma' ric'ul ta wo' chi reh chi nariye'eric reh ru'um i Dios re' sukquil c'uxlis re' xapahkaj tak johtok china̱ i c'acharel re're' naxatponic tak pa ripa̱t

Ma' xa ta re're', re' la' i c'acharel re're' ch'i̱l wo' take rich c'acharel chipam i tinamit re' ma' nquic'ul ta wi̱' i c'uhbal na̱k'orom tak, nariye'eric cho chi quina̱ jenaj rinimal ti'c'axic ru'um chi je' re' nca'n. Reh chi naqueht'alim chi narichalic ti'c'axic chi quina̱, chapuh tak lok i poklaj pa ro̱k aper-xijab tak natelok tak je cu̱c'.

Til coric nik'or aweh tak chi nachich'uk k'oric i Dios chiri̱j quimahc take c'acharel re're', nariq'uic wo' chic na̱ i ti'c'axic nariye'eric cho chi quina̱ chiwach i ti'c'axic xquic'ul take cho c'acharel aj najtir k'i̱j ar pan tinamit Soro̱ma ch'i̱l Como̱ra.

«Re' hat-tak re' c'ahchi'ca̱t nitak'a̱b tak je ar re' wilic wi̱' yohbal je' ricab naqui'o̱j chi behic take cu̱c' me̱' re' wilque̱b wi̱' take josk' laj q'uiche̱' tz'i', chabiraj tak i nanik'orom aweh tak wili: Xa ic'lic ok wo' ana̱ tak je' ricab nca'n take a̱k' eh xa ch'ublic ok wo' awach tak je' ricab take rexba̱.

Je' re' nik'or aweh tak chi rico'ljic awi̱b tak chi quiwach take c'acharel re' ma'xta quic'ulbic reh i c'uhbal na̱k'orom tak. Ru'um chi re' hin quinanimej tak, re' take re' naca̱t tak quik'ahsam pan quik'ab take aj c'amol quibe̱h take tinamit, re' take nok quimolom chic qui̱b pan tak pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, naquitz'akam k'oric chawi̱j tak eh naquitak'a̱b wo' atz'uhumjic tak ar.

Je' wo' ru'um chi re' hin quinanimej tak, wilic wo' aweh tak reh chi narich'ukjic k'oric chi quina̱, naquic'amaric je chi quiwach take k'atal k'oric on chi quiwach take caj to'o̱l chi k'atal k'oric chi quina̱ take tinamit wilque̱b wi̱' take awich rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Je' re' ajic chi quiwach aj chi'nchel re're' eh chi quiwach wo' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilque̱b wo' chipam take tinamital re're', ma̱cana̱' tak riye'eric achi̱' tak chiwi̱j.

Nac'ulurok awu̱c' tak chi je' re', ma' riban ntuquic awa̱mna tak chi risiq'uiric ri̱j nic' wach na̱k'orom tak nibiral on chaj bih na̱k'orom tak chi rico'ljic awi̱b tak chi quiwach natic'amarok tak je maj chiwach i junc'am re're' nariye'eric ak'orbal tak
ru'um Lok' laj rUxlabal i Ajabe̱s Dios, ma' re' ta nchel hat-tak na̱k'oric chawutquel awi̱b tak.

«Ru'um reh ninimjic, naric'uluric wo' chi wilic aweh tak naquik'ahsjic pan k'ab awaj cansanel tak cu'um take awaj pan pa̱t tak. Je' re' k'uru', wi re' nchel asbe̱s ac'un aj nimem wi̱n, narik'ahsjic pan quimic ru'um richa̱k'. On wi re' nchel i chak'be̱s ac'un aj nimem wi̱n, narik'ahsjic pan quimic ru'um i ras. Je' wo', wi re' ok nchel ajabe̱s aj nimem wi̱n, narik'ahsjic pan quimic ru'um i rac'u̱n eh wi re' ok ac'unbe̱s aj nimem wi̱n, narik'ahsjic wo' pan quimic ru'um i raja̱w.

Chi je' aj re', k'e̱' wo' chic q'uihal take c'acharel naquixowonic awach tak ru'um chi re' hin quinanimej tak. To̱b ta wo' je' re' naca'nam aweh tak, chatik tak ju' rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak chiwi̱j eh naponok i cohlsbal wach i ti'c'axic wilca̱t tak wi̱', xa cu choplic ok wo' ac'ux tak maj xa re' wo' i c'acharel je' re' riban, xa re' wo' re' narirakam rico'lbal wu̱c'.

«Wi pan jeno' tinamit re' take c'acharel quic'acharic ar qui'o̱c chi rixowjic awach tak ma' ticahnic tak ar, hiy la' tak pan jeno' chic tinamit. Til coric nik'or aweh tak chi re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel nanisoljic wo' chic cho nok re' hat-tak ja' ta wo' nacohlaj tak ojic pan tak tinamit wilque̱b wi̱' kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi ric'oloric awi̱b tak.

Ru'um aj chi narixowjic awach tak, c'olok pan ac'ux tak i k'oric nk'ormojic chi je' wili: “Re' cu aj tijem i̱b nok wilic, ma' k'e̱' ta wo' chic rino'jbal wilic chiwach raj tijinel eh re' aj camanom ma' k'e̱' ta wo' chic riwa'ric chiwach i ajabe̱s, nqui nk'ormojic.

«Je' wo' chacoj tak rehtal i jenaj chic k'oric nk'ormojic wo' chi je' wili: “Wi re' aj tijem i̱b rirak pa̱m rino'jbal i raj tijinel, re' wo' re' nsukbic wi̱' ric'ux eh re' aj camanom nanwih'ic wo' rilok'il je' ricab i ajabe̱s queh aj pan pa̱t, re' wo' re' nsukbic wi̱' ric'ux, nqui nk'ormojic. «Je' re' nik'or maj wi re' hin re' wilic wajawric chana̱ tak je' ricab nok jeno' ajabe̱s wilic rajawric chi quina̱ riha'lac'u̱n, xinquitz'uj take c'acharel naxinquitz'ak chi hin Welsewuh re' cajawil ma' tob laj uxlabal, re' ta na chic hat-tak ma' etitz'ujuric tak?

To̱b ta wo' je' re' naca'nam aweh tak, ma' tiyo'jic tak chi rik'ororic niC'uhbal. Je' re' nik'or aweh tak ru'um nok chiwach i Dios ma'xta bih jeno' no'jbal poyo̱j cho wach ma' ta nak naritehic cho wach eh ma'xta wo' bih jeno' capew-bal c'olo̱j cho, ma' ta nak eneht'aljic.

Je' wo' re' niC'uhbal ma' riban ta chi enapoy tak wach chi quiwach take tinamit. Je' re' k'uru' re' niC'uhbal nik'orom aweh tak pan tak chak'ab, on re' xnik'or aweh tak nok xa re' wach hat-tak xatbirinic tak reh, chasakomej tak lok wach ar pan tak ye'a̱b re' etiquibiraj tak wi̱' take tinamit.

Je' wo' chic, ma' tiyo'jic wo' tak chi rik'ormojic niC'uhbal chi quiwach take nimak quiwach. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' xa re' wo' ti acansjic enca'n canar. Haj cok wilic i chayohbalej tak wach chi coric chi quiwach take c'acharel, re' Dios maj re' cok re' wi xacana̱' tak rik'ormojic niC'uhbal, til wilic rajawric ma' xa ta re' chi resmejic ac'acharic tak je' la' wo' chi atak'abjic tak pan c'ulbal reh ti'c'axic.
Chi je' re' rajawric i Dios, ma' tiyo'jic tak chi rik'ormojic niC'uhbal maj je' ricab chi re' take cuc' tz'iquin quic'ayjic chi ma' q'uih ta ti quitz'akil, rilow take i Dios cu rehtal quiquimic je,
je' wo' re' naribanam awu̱c' tak, naca̱t wo' tak richa'jem je' ricab wo' riban ru̱c' i jarub pa' chi rismal ana̱ tak wilic til reht'alim quina̱ chi coric.
Je' re' ajic re' Dios til reht'alim chi re' hat-tak k'e̱' wo' chic nawa̱j tak ilmijic chi quiwach take cuc' tz'iquin. Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi ma' tiyo'jic tak

chi rik'ormojic chi hat-tak aj niminel wi̱n maj xa hab wach jeno' aweh tak ma'xta ripoyom wach chi quiwach i tinamit chi rik'ormojic chi re're' waj tahkanel, re' hin nanik'orom wo' chiwach i wAja̱w ar pan taxa̱j chi re're' til manlic waj tahkanel.
Tz'a̱b ru', wi jeno' aweh tak xipoy wach chi quiwach i tinamit chi waj tahkanel, re' hin nanik'orom wo' chiwach i wAja̱w ar pan taxa̱j chi til ma' re' ta so' waj tahkanel.

«Re' hat-tak, nacapaj na tak chi ru̱c' nic'ulic lok i hin, naribanam chi chi'nchel take tinamit xa pan sukquil c'uxlis chic naquic'acharic? Ma'xta, ma̱capaj tak chi je' re'. Chaweht'alij la' tak chi ru'um reh nic'ulic lok i hin, re' take naquiniminic wi̱n ma' xa suk ta chic c'acharic naca'nam ru'um narixowjic quiwach cu'um take ma' quiniminic ta wi̱n.

Ru'um aj re're' wilic wo' na naric'uluric wi̱' i wili chi quixilac take aj niminel wi̱n ch'i̱l take ma' re' ta take aj niminel wi̱n: Wi re' ok nchel ajabe̱s on tutbe̱s aj niminel wi̱n, narixowjic riwach ru'um rac'u̱n on rixk'u̱n. On wi re' il'i̱b aj niminel wi̱n, narixowjic wach ru'um ritu̱t ribahi̱l.
Je' re' ajic, ru̱c' re're' nkilow chi re' n-niminic wi̱n narixowjic wach cu'um take c'acharel chipam i pa̱t wilic wi̱'.

Ru̱c' ric'uluric re're', wi re' c'acharel equirik'eb lok chiri̱j ric'ux xa reh chi naricahnic pan sukquil c'uxlis ru̱c' i ritu̱t raja̱w on ru̱c' rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n, re're' ma' eta riban chi enoquic chi waj tahkanel.

Je' wo', ma' ric'ul ta wo' chi enoquic chi waj tahkanel i c'acharel re' ma' ra̱j ta qui̱n ritahkem pan ti'c'axic je' ricab ric'uluric ti'c'axic riban jeno' c'acharel re' chi ch'uku̱j chic ri̱j riquimic, ntoljic chi ric'amaric je ricuru̱s re' naricansjic wi̱'.

Tz'a̱b ru' take c'acharel re' xa suk wach c'acharic nca̱j quirakam pan quic'acharic ru'um chi ma' nca̱j ta quic'ulum i ti'c'axic ru'um reh nitahkaljic, re' take re' ma' eta nye'eric queh ru'um i Dios chi enquehchaj i junelic c'acharic, raj nchel i ma' rik'or ta bihnal ric'uluric i ti'c'axic nchalic china̱ ru'um reh nitahkaljic, re're' narehcham i junelic c'acharic.

«Yu'na k'uru' chi aweht'alim tak chic re're', re' hin tinitak'a̱' tak je cu̱c' take c'acharel chi rik'ormojic niC'uhbal. Xa hab wach queh take naquic'ulbic aweh tak pan sukquil c'uxlis, ra̱j rik'orom chi re' wo' hin quinquic'ul chi pan sukquil c'uxlis ch'i̱l i wAja̱w Dios re' xtak'anic cho wi̱n.

Ru'um aj chi je' re' enca'n, re' Dios nariyeb wo' jenaj quisi̱ je' ricab riban cu̱c' take c'acharel re' quic'ulbic reh pan sukquil c'uxlis take aj k'orol riC'uhbal on take c'acharel coric wach quic'ux. Re' Dios, re' k'orel nic' pa' wach quilok'il riyew take raj k'orol riC'uhbal ch'i̱l take c'acharel coric wach quic'ux, re' wo' re' lok'il xiyew queh take c'acharel xic'ulbic cho queh.

Nic' pa' wach xiban i Dios cu̱c' take re're', je' wo' re' naribanam cu̱c' take c'acharel naquic'ulbic aweh hat-tak. Je' re' nik'or maj xa hab wach jeno' c'acharel chi atioxjic hat-tak re' ma' nic' ta nchel nimal awach tak, eriyew aweh tak to̱b ta nchel xa jenaj culc ok ti chi jot'ic laj ha', til nik'or aweh tak re' c'acharel re're' naric'ulum ric'axbal ru̱c' i Dios ru'um i c'axo̱j xiban awu̱c' tak, nqui Jesus keh,

eh chiri̱j chi ricohlam chic ricojoric kano'jbal, re' hoj cablaj chi raj tahkanel xoj-o̱j wo' chi c'uhbalanic nok re're' xitik wo' chic ju' ribe̱h chi c'uhtunic je' wo' chi c'uhbalanic ar pan tak tinamit wilque̱b pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya.

Naxponic i k'oric pan xiquin i Wa̱n ar pan che̱' chiri̱j i nic' pa' nimal take lok' laj nawa̱l riban i Jesus, re' nc'uhtunic lok wi̱' chi re're' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' Wa̱n xitak'a̱' je quib chi aj tijem i̱b chiri̱j
reh chi naquibiram reh Jesus chi je' wili: «Til re' na hat i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric k'oro̱j cahnok ribiral chi naric'ulic lok on cu nakuy'em chic jeno'? tiquirok tak reh, nqui Wa̱n queh.

Re' Jesus naxibiraj i chaj bih xponic quik'or take raj tahkanel i Wa̱n, je' wili k'oric xiban queh: «Hiy tak, tisoljen wo' tak chic je ru̱c' i Wa̱n eh chak'or tak reh re' xabiraj tak chi c'ahchi' nic'uhbalem eh je' wo' chak'or take reh i c'ahchi' awilom tak wili:

Chi yohbal wach take sot' c'ahchi' chic qui'ilbic, chi yohbal wach take si̱c c'ahchi' chic quibehic, chi yohbal wach take xilim qui̱j c'ahchi' chic relic lok quiya'bilal eh chi wilic wo' camnak chic take c'ahchi' wo' chic quic'a'chsjic cho. Je' re' ajic, nachak'or wo' tak reh Wa̱n chi queh take cajwam wach ato'bil c'ahchi' nic'uhbalem i holohic laj c'uhbal chiri̱j i co'lbal c'ahchi' riyeb i Dios,
chak'or wo' tak reh chi k'e̱' ato̱b reh c'acharel re' ma' ripoh'aj ta ric'ux chiwi̱j, nqui Jesus queh.

Nok c'ahchi' cojic take aj tijem i̱b chiri̱j i Wa̱n, re' Jesus je' wili p'uht rik'orom queh tinamit chiri̱j i Wa̱n: «Nok cu wilic i Wa̱n chi kahsanic ha' ar pan tak ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel, xatponic na tak cho ar ilol reh jeno' winak je' ru̱c' xa chac'am je je' wulu' ru̱c' toco̱m laj no'jbal, je' ricab ric'ul jeno' t'uch xiq'uey xa pa' nc'amaric je ru'um i te̱w?

Ma'xta, maje'? Chaj bih xponic awilow tak cho ar k'uru'? Ma' re' ta nchel jeno' queh raj to'o̱l k'atal k'oric je' ru̱c' xa chak'wach laj tz'ih chic ricoj chiri̱j? Je' re' nik'or maj re' take c'acharel je' ricab re're', ar quicamanic pan tak chak'wach laj pa̱t re' quic'acharic wo' wi̱' take k'atal k'oric, maje'?

Chaj aj wo' bih xponic awilow tak cho ar? Re' hin til nik'or aweh tak chi jenaj winak nim riwa'ric xponic awilow tak cho ar. Je' re' xa'n tak maj re' hat-tak nacoj tak chi re' Wa̱n jenaj aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios. Coric, re' Wa̱n jenaj aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios, xa re' la' re' riwa'ric ricamaj xi̱c' wo' chic na̱ chiwach riwa'ric quicamaj take toco̱m rich aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios.

Je' re' nik'or maj chiri̱j aj i Wa̱n xtz'ihmjic cho naxik'or i Dios reh rAc'u̱n chi je' wili: “Re' hin naca̱t nitak'a̱b jok wach ac'al, xa re' la' chiwach jok awojic i hat, pe̱t nanitak'a̱b je cu̱c' i tinamit jenaj waj tz'e' wa̱ch. Re' aj re' nariye'bic rehtal queh aponic i hat, je' ricab chi jeno' winak c'ahchi' ta nak ritik'a̱' ribe̱h jeno' k'atal k'oric ponic reh, nqui xtz'ihmjic cho naxik'or i Dios chi je' re'.

«Je' aj re' ru', ru'um reh ricamaj i Wa̱n, til nik'or wo' chic aweh tak chi re' riwa'ric xiq'uic wo' chic na̱ chiwach quiwa'ric chi'nchel take asjanak take ayu' wach ac'al. Raj la' chawach hat-tak re' titahkanic tak wi̱n, to̱b ta nak ma' nim ta ti wach acamaj tak, ma' xiq'uic ta wo' chic na̱ riwa'ric i Wa̱n, re' la' hat-tak xiq'uic wo' chic na̱ awa'ric tak chiwach ru' maj re' hat-tak wilca̱t tak chi quixilac take choplic quic'ux chi coric chiri̱j i c'uhbal rik'or chi re' Dios richopom chic quina̱ chi k'atal k'oric.

Re' c'uhbal re're', re' Wa̱n xk'oric reh xa re' la' naxip'ut rik'ormojic, wilic take xicapewenic reh chi curman naribanaric k'ak'anic reh chi enbanjic canar oquic chi rehquen rajawric i Dios chi k'atal k'oric. Chipam i rik'ijil wili cu wilic wo' take nquicapaj chi xa re' take nca'n i k'ak'anic wilque̱b chipam rik'atoj k'oric i Dios.

Je' re' k'uru', nic' nimal rik'or chipam i c'uhbal xquik'or take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios eh chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chiri̱j k'atoj k'oric naribanam i Dios, re're' cu re' xo̱j elok wach nok p'uht rik'orom i Wa̱n queh tinamit chi naquijalam wach quino'jbal.

Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak to̱b ta wilic take je' ru̱c' c'axic chi queh ricojoric wach, til re' wili ricorquilal: Chi re' Dios naxik'or cho ribiral chi re' Eli̱yas naritak'a̱b cho chi pe̱t be̱h chi niwach i hin, xk'oric chiri̱j i Wa̱n re' xkahsanic quiha̱' take tinamit.
Chi je' aj re' i k'oric xiban i Dios chiri̱j ribiral i Wa̱n, til nipahkaj aweh tak chi re' hat-tak re' k'as axiquin tak chi birinic camanok aweh tak chi rirakmajic chiri̱j re' xnik'or lok wili

maj wi ma' k'as axiquin tak, re' hin nanijalwachem riwi̱' ano'jbal tak ru̱c' riwi̱' quino'jbal take c'acharel re' je' ricab quino'jbal juntuhm ok chi aj ux re' je' wili xca'n: Junpech naxquimol qui̱b pan c'aybal i juntuhm re're', ru'um chi ma' haj ta wilic quic'o'nic xca̱j wi̱' oquic,

je' wili xk'ormojic queh cu'um take quich'i̱l: ‹Xa pa' jaric c'o'nic xka'n ribanaric, ma' xawa̱j ta tak kihch'iljic. Xojco'nic chi xka'n banoj su̱b chi xa suk chic pan kac'ux, ma' xa'n ta wo' aso̱n tak. Xka'n wo' c'o'nic chi xa kok'im chic je' ricab nca'n nanquimic jeno' hab wach, ma' xa'n ta wo' awok'im tak, nqui banol queh.

«Nic' pa' wach quino'jbal take juntuhm re're', je' wo' re' quino'jbal take awich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Je' re' nik'or maj naxwih'ic i Wa̱n chi c'uhbalanic, re' take re' je' wili xquik'or reh ru'um nquilow chi re're' cuc'lam xilac ricuy riwa' riha̱' eh chi ma' no̱j ta wo' pan tak nink'i̱j: ‹Re' winak re're', ma' suk ta pa̱m na̱ maj cajawil ma' tob laj uxlabal nbehsenic reh, nqui take.

«Re' chic yu'na chi wilqui̱n chi c'uhbalanic i hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, je' wili nquik'or wi̱n ru'um nquilow chi niban niwa' niha̱' eh chi nic'u'lej na̱ ojic pan tak nink'i̱j: ‹Chak'or je winak re', xa suk reh wi'c ha' eh xa ric'u'lej wo' na̱ ojic pan tak nink'i̱j re' no̱j rimol wi̱' ri̱b cu̱c' take wilic quibiral chi aj mahc, je' ricab take aj molol to̱j ntak'abjic je Ro̱ma, nqui take wi̱n. «Ru̱c' aj nquik'or take c'acharel re're', til c'ahchi' quik'orom chi re' Dios ma'xta so' rino'jbal ru̱c' c'ahchi' ribanam, raj i hin nik'or aweh tak chi re' take c'acharel re' ye'o̱j chic quiwa'ric ru'um i Dios chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n take ma' je' ta re' nquik'or, re' la' nquik'or ru' chi re' Dios k'e̱' wo' chic rino'jbal wilic, nqui Jesus queh.
Re' take c'acharel chipam take tinamit c'ahchi' ribanam wi̱' q'uihal lok' laj nawa̱l i Jesus, ma' nca̱j ta quijalam wach quino'jbal. Ru'um aj re' je' wili quik'iliric xiban take:

«K'e̱' je quetal awach hat-tak aj Corasin ch'i̱l hat-tak aj Wetsa̱yra maj k'e̱' wo' chic ti'c'axic na̱c'ulum tak ru'um chi ma' najal ta tak wach ano'jbal to̱b ta nchel xawilow tak chi q'uihal take lok' laj nawa̱l nibanam chic chaxilac tak. Raj wili chi quixilac ta nak take aj Ti̱ro ch'i̱l aj Siron xniban take lok' laj nawa̱l je' ricab xniban awu̱c' tak, re' take re' xca'n nak je' ricab riban winak re' ritz'uka̱' ri̱b chi ok'ic, ricoj coxtal tz'ih chiri̱j eh rihamej ri̱b chi cha̱j c'uhtbal reh chi xti'bic ric'ux ru'um rimahc.

Ru'um aj chi ma' je' ta re' xa'n tak, re' Dios narik'atam k'oric chana̱ hat-tak aj Corasin ch'i̱l hat-tak aj Wetsa̱yra. Til k'e̱' wo' chic ti'quilal na̱c'ulum chi quiwach take aj Ti̱ro ch'i̱l aj Siron.

Je' wo' re' naquic'ulum take aj Capernahum re' xa ncuy'ej nak chic chi narijohsjic quiwach ru'um i Dios, re' take re' xa na wo' risacharic quiwach. Til coric nik'or, wi ta nak cu̱c' take aj Soro̱ma xbanaric take lok' laj nawa̱l xbanaric cu̱c' take aj Capernahum, re' take re' xquijal nak wach quino'jbal ru̱c' rilmijic take lok' laj nawa̱l eh ru̱c' re're' xa cu wilque̱b wo' nak yu'na.

Je' aj re', til nik'or chi nachich'uk k'oric i Dios chi quina̱ chi'nchel take c'acharel, til wo' chic k'e̱' ti'c'axic nariyeb chi quina̱ take aj Capernahum chi cu rehtal nariq'uic wo' chic na̱ chiwach i ti'c'axic xiyew cho queh take aj Soro̱ma, nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic ru', chipam i junc'am re're', re' Jesus je' wili p'uht rik'orom: «W-Aja̱w Dios, re' hat, hat Ajabe̱s ar pan taxa̱j je' wo' ayu' wach ac'al. Je' re' k'uru' re' hin k'e̱' nitioxej aweh ru'um chi re' take xa k'oro̱j chic quibiral chi wilic quino'jbal eh chi k'e̱' t'ulic take, xatz'ap wach quino'jbal chi ma'xta quirakam chiri̱j ricorquil ribiral awajawric, raj nchel take ma' nquinimsaj ta ti qui̱b, re' je' quicab take cuc' ha'lac'un, xateh wach quino'jbal.
Je' aj re' wAja̱w Dios k'e̱' nitioxej aweh ru'um chi xponic chawach chi re' take ma' nquinimsaj ta ti qui̱b xquibiraj wu̱c' re' ricorquilal ribiral awajawric.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' hin xnik'or wo' queh chi je' wili: ‹Xa re' wo' hin weht'alim wach chi coric i Ajabe̱s Dios eh xa re' wo' re' reht'alim niwach i hin chi coric. Ru'um aj re', xa re' wo' hin ch'i̱l take haj wilic nwa̱j chi naquibiram i ricorquilal re're', xa re' wo' hoj keht'alim wach chi coric i Ajabe̱s Dios, quinqui queh. «Je' wo', xnik'or queh chi je' wili: ‹Re' wAja̱w wilic rajawric china̱ chi'nchel eh ru'um re' xiripahba̱' i hin chi nariwih'ic wo' wajawric china̱ chi'nchel, quinqui queh, nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic ru', je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh tinamit: «Nic' nimal hat-tak k'uhtunak on ch'i'tjinak reh ano'jbal tak je' ricab jeno' k'uhtel laj aj camanom, re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi wu̱c' hin wilic hi'lsbal reh awa̱mna tak. Tichalok tak wu̱c' k'uru'
reh chi entuhkic acapew-bal tak nachatijej aweh tak nino'jbal chi ma' hin ta k'itk'it, je' wo' nachac'am tak na̱ niC'uhbal re' nik'or aweh tak.
Je' re' nik'or chiri̱j niC'uhbal maj re' c'uhbal nik'or i hin on niyew chana̱ tak, ma' c'axic ta ric'amaric na̱ eh ma' je' ta wo' ricab jeno' ihk wilic risi̱c rahlil, nqui queh.

Chiwach aj wo' take k'i̱j chi kich'i̱l chic i Jesus, pan jenaj hi'lbal k'i̱j chi keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, re' hoj cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel xoj-iq'uic ponok chipam junseht chi tic ncojoric chi wi'c. Ar aj ru' p'uht kap'ixim keh i riwachej i tic re're', xkabuquej wach pan kak'ab eh xoj-oquic chi ric'uxuric.

Naxquilow take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi je' re' xka'n i hoj cablaj, re' take re' je' wili xquik'or reh Jesus: «Chajaric cho wili, chi xa nawilow take awaj tahkanel chi c'ahchi' ca'nam i camanic je' ricab take ma' ye'o̱j ta k'ab chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi naribanaric chipam take hi'lbal k'i̱j? nqui take reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili xic'u'lej take wi̱': «Re' hat-tak xa ja' wo' nchel narak ta tak chiri̱j i ribiral nawilow tak wach chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios chiri̱j chaj bih xiban cho i ma' Tawiy re' k'atal k'oric najtir k'i̱j. Re're' ru'um reh jenaj rinimal laj c'ahric wilic ru̱c' ch'i̱l take jarub pa' quihch'ilinic ponok reh, xisic' ri̱j nic' wach naxca'n quiwa'.

Re' ribiral re're' rik'or chi naxchalic ric'ahric ma' Tawiy, xoquic cok chipam i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios re' wilic wo' wi̱' i caxlan wi'c ye'o̱j chi si̱ chiwach i Dios. To̱b ta wo' k'oro̱j chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi xa re' take aj k'ahsem si̱ naquic'uxuj reh caxlan wi'c re're', re' ma' Tawiy xic'ux reh eh xiyew wo' queh take rich'i̱l chi naquic'uxum caxlan wi'c re're' nok ye'o̱j chic k'ab reh chi naribanam chi je' re'.

Je' wo', ma' nacoj ta na tak rehtal i nawilow tak chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chiqui̱j take aj k'ahsem si̱? Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' ma' quicahnic ta chi aj mahc take chiwach i c'uhbal re're', to̱b ta nchel ru̱c' i quicamaj nca'n chi k'ahsanic tak si̱ chipam i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios pan tak hi'lbal k'i̱j nquiyak' wo' pan co̱k i c'uhbal chiri̱j i hi'lbal k'i̱j.

Wi ru'um rilok'il i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' i Dios ma' quicahnic ta chi aj mahc take aj k'ahsem si̱ ru̱c' i quicamaj nca'n, re' take waj tahkanel hin ma' ximahcanic ta wo' ru̱c' xca'n wili, maj til nik'or aweh tak chi re' hin re' wilqui̱n ayu', k'e̱' wo' chic nilok'il chiwach i pa̱t re're'.

Je' re' ajic til ta nak arakam tak chic chiri̱j chaj bih ra̱j rik'orom i wilic pa riC'uhbal i Dios chi je' wili: “Tare̱t chi enac'at tak cho asi̱ chi niwach, xa re' la' re' til wo' chic k'e̱' nwa̱j chi na̱banam tak, re' riqueteljic quiwach take awas acha̱k' tak, nqui rik'or. «Ma' riwi̱' ta nak chaweh tak chi c'ahchi' atz'akam tak quimahc take waj tahkanel wili re' ma' c'ahchi' ta quimahcanic

chi niwach i hin re' xinye'bic k'ab queh chi naca'nam chi je' re'. Je' re' nik'or aweh tak maj re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel wilic wo' wajawric chi rik'ormojic haj wilic i tare̱t eh haj wilic i ma' tare̱t ta chi banaric chipam i hi'lbal k'i̱j, nqui Jesus queh.
Chiri̱j chic ru' naxitik ju' rojic, re' Jesus xo̱j chipam i pa̱t re' ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, re' nquimol wo' wi̱' qui̱b take c'acharel chipam i yuk'ul re're'.

Ar ajic, re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ru'um nok xquilow chi ar wilic jenaj winak me̱c i jenaj k'ab, je' wili xquik'or reh Jesus tz'akbal nak jeno' rimahc: «Riyew ta wo' ti k'ab i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi naresmejic lok riya'bilal jeno' yowa̱b chipam i hi'lbal k'i̱j? nqui take reh.
Chalic i Jesus je' wili quic'u'ljic xiban: «Re' hat-tak re' wilic ame̱' tak, hab wach jeno' aweh tak ma' eta no̱j resaj cho jeno' rime̱' wi xk'ehbic jok pan jul chipam jeno' hi'lbal k'i̱j?

Wi re' hat-tak to̱j tak chi resmejic ame̱' tak re're', re' ta na chic jeno' c'acharel, re' k'e̱' wo' chic ritz'akil chiwach jeno' me̱', ma' enesmejic lok riya'bilal chipam i hi'lbal k'i̱j? Ru̱c' re're' nik'or aweh tak chi jeno' holohic laj bano̱j tare̱t chi banaric chipam i hi'lbal k'i̱j, nqui Jesus queh.

Chiri̱j re', je' wili xik'or reh i winak me̱c k'ab: «Quik'ochlojok take nah ak'ab quimequem qui̱b eh chayu̱w je take yu'na, nqui reh. Je' re' nok naxiyuw wach take nah k'ab i winak re're', xcorjic wo' ti wach je' ricab wilic i jenaj chic k'ab.
Naxquilow chi je' re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, xi'elic je chipam i pa̱t re're' eh xo̱j ti quimol qui̱b chi ritik'mijic wach nic' wach naquicansaj i Jesus.

Nok ribiram chic i chaj bih tik'inic c'ahchi' ca'nam take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, re' Jesus xelic je chipam i tinamit re're' eh xo̱j chipam jenaj chic ye'a̱b chi tahkamaj je cu'um riq'uihal tinamit. Ru'um aj chi xic'saj quiya'bilal take q'uihal queh tinamit quitahkanic reh,
re' Jesus til xipahkaj queh chi ma'xta quik'orom lok ribiral re' ic'sinic ya'bilal c'ahchi' ribanam.
Chi je' re' ajic, xponic wach i k'oro̱j cho wili ru'um i Dios ru̱c' chi̱' i raj k'orol C'uhbal, re' ma' Isayi̱yas ribihnal:

“Re' aj wili i waj tz'e' wa̱ch nichihim cho wach, re' k'e̱' ti' nwic'raj ru'um nok k'e̱' riyew sukquil nic'ux. Reh aj re' naniyeb cho i Lok' laj wUxlabal eh chi je' re', re' ribiral i ch'ukuj wach mahc nanibanam, narik'orom queh take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.
Re're' ma' hab ta wach aj u̱c' narichopom ri̱b chi wolic, ma' wo' chi hab wach ta nak naribirinic reh pan tak be̱h chi xa q'ueric chic richi̱' chi sachbal quic'ux i tinamit.

Re' waj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' cu pan ch'iquinbal cho reh ricamaj cu rehtal re' hin Dios re' coric niwach naniyak'abem pan wo̱k take ma' holohic ta quino'jbal, ma'xta ricojom riman quiti'quil take xa ti' chic wilque̱b je' ricab jeno' winak ma' ricana̱' ta chi enq'uer je riman i caxlan a̱j xa mahnic' chic ra̱j chi nariq'ueric chi junpech, on je' ricab chi ma' ricana̱' ta wo' chi enchuhpic chi junpech i riquichal jeno' cas cu koplic cho mahnic' ok rik'ak'il.

Chi je' aj re', re' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel naquich'ica̱b wo' quic'ux chiri̱j i waj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' chi naquico'ljic ru'um, nqui k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios ru̱c' chi̱' i ma' Isayi̱yas.

Naxc'amaric aj wo' cho ru̱c' Jesus i jenaj chic winak memrenak eh sot'ronak wo' ru'um ma' tob laj uxlabal nchopbic na̱ ric'acharic, re' Jesus xiban chi xilbic eh xiban wo' chi xk'oric chi coric naxit'erej lok i ma' tob laj uxlabal re're'.

Chi je' aj re', re' take tinamit je' wili p'uht quik'orom chi xa nsahchic chic quic'ux: «Re' Jesus wili, xa je' pe' nchel re' i ra̱' ri'sil cho k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy re' uyumaj chi naroquic chi k'atal k'oric, nqui take.

Ar ajic re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses je' wili xquik'or naxquibiraj re're': «Re' Jesus wili, ma' re' ta so' i Dios nye'bic rajawric chi quit'ermejic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal, re' la' i Welsewuh re' cajawil take ma' tob laj uxlabal nye'bic rajawric, nqui take.

Chi reht'alim chic i Jesus chaj bih c'ahbil laj capew-bal poyo̱j cho wach ru̱c' quik'orbal xquik'or take re're', je' wili xik'or queh: «Wi re' take pahbamaj chi raj to'o̱l jeno' k'atal k'oric nquixowej qui̱b, re' rilok'il ricamaj i k'atal k'oric chi quina̱, xa ewo' no̱j wach ac'al. On wi re' take c'acharel chipam jeno' tinamit quixowem quiwach chi quibil qui̱b, re' tinamit re're' xa na wo' risahchic wach. Je' wo', wi re' take c'acharel chipam jeno' pa̱t quixowem wo' quiwach, xa na wo' quich'aklom qui̱b?

Ru̱c' aj re're' nik'or aweh tak chi ma' re' ta ru̱c' rajawric aj Yahm c'ahchi' quit'ermejic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal maj wi ta nak ru̱c' re're' c'ahchi' nit'erem lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal, ra̱j nak rik'orom chi re' aj Yahm ch'i̱l take raj tz'e' wa̱ch c'ahchi' quixowem quiwach, maje'? Raj i wili ma' je' ta re' riwi̱' c'ahchi' ric'uluric maj wi ta nak c'ahchi' quixowem quiwach, nic' aj wach nok cu quitzokem qui̱b pan quicamaj.

«Je' wo' chic, chacapaj tak chiri̱j i wili: Wi ta nak re' Welsewuh nye'bic wajawric chi quit'ermejic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal, ra̱j nak rik'orom chi re' wo' re' nye'bic cajawric take awaj tahkanel tak nanquesaj lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal. Coric ta wo' nchel i nacapaj hat-tak chiwi̱j chi je' re', nicana̱' pe pan quik'ab take awaj tahkanel tak chi re' take re' naquik'oric aweh tak, wi coric on ma' coric ta i nacapaj tak re're'.

Je' aj re' ru', re' hin til nik'or aweh tak chi re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios nye'bic wajawric chi quit'ermejic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal. Ru'um aj chi re' Lok' laj Uxlabal nbanic re're', til nik'or aweh tak chi re' hin re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, wilqui̱n chic awu̱c' tak

chi quesmejic take c'acharel chi ri'sil cajawric take ma' tob laj uxlabal. Reh chi c'ahchi' ric'uluric chi je' re', cu pe̱t c'ahchi' niyeb pan ac'al i rajawric aj Yahm je' ricab riban jeno' winak xiq'uic na̱ ransil chi cu rehtal richopom chic eh ribac'am chic i jenaj winak re' k'e̱' wo' nak ransil, cu re' aj ru' noquic cok pa ripa̱t chi rimak'aric i pa' bih riyeb take chi ri'sil ro̱k k'ab.

«Chi wilqui̱n chic chaxilac tak, re' chic hat-tak na̱wiloj tak reh hab wach aj u̱c' nawa̱j acojom awi̱b tak, wi nchel wu̱c' i hin chi ribanaric je' ricab riban jeno' aj cha'jem me̱' chi rimol quiwach take rime̱', on na̱cojom awi̱b tak ru̱c' i cajawil i ma' tob laj uxlabal chi ribanaric je' ricab riban jeno' aj jot'o̱l chi rit'erej je take me̱'.

Xa hab wach jeno' aweh tak nmahcanic ru̱c' ribanaric take ma' holohic ta laj k'oric on riban i k'ihtinic i̱b, re're' cu wilic wo' ricuybal. Tz'a̱b ru' hab wach narik'ehtam ri̱b chiwach i Lok' laj Uxlabal ru̱c' ribanaric ma' holohic ta laj k'oric, re' cok re' ma' jaruj ta chic encuyuric rimahc.

«Je' re' k'uru' xa hab pa' wach rik'ihtaj ri̱b chiwach nik'orbal hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel xa cu na ricuyuric wo' rimahc, raj nachip'ut k'oric i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios, hab pa' wach xa c'ahchi' wo' rik'ehtam ri̱b chiwach rik'orbal ru', ma' jaruj ta chic encuyuric rimahc.

Je' wo' nik'or aweh tak i wili: Je' ricab nanwachanic cho jeno' che̱' cu re' wo' nana'bej tak wi nchel holohic on ma' holohic laj che̱', je' wo' re' hat-tak ru̱c' wo' ak'orbal tak naric'utunic lok nic' wach ano'jbal tak.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' kachi̱' nsakomonic lok wach chaj bih wilic cho pan ka̱mna. Je' re' ajic, wi re' hat-tak ma' holohic ta ano'jbal tak nac'uhtaj tak lok, no̱j aban tak chi je' acab tak juntuhm ok chi a̱k' eh chi je' re', ma' nic' ta wach nacha'n tak holohic laj k'oric chiri̱j i Dios,

maj re' holohic laj k'oric rik'or jeno' c'acharel re' holohic rino'jbal, cu pa ra̱mna wo' nelic cho re' wilic cho wi̱' i holohic. Je' wo' re' i ma' holohic ta laj k'oric rik'or lok jeno' c'acharel re' ma' holohic ta rino'jbal, cu pa ra̱mna wo' nelic cho re' wilic cho wi̱' c'ahbilal.

Re' hat-tak chak'or pe tak nic' pa' nimal ma' holohic ta laj k'oric nawa̱j ak'orom tak, xa re' cok ru', re' hin til nik'or aweh tak chi chipam i k'i̱j nachich'uk k'oric i Dios, re' take c'acharel til naquiyeb quichi̱' chiri̱j i ju'jun chi k'oric xquik'or chi ma'xta ricorquil.
Chayohbalej awi̱b tak k'uru' ru̱c' take k'oric na'n tak, maj re' Dios narik'orom chi coric awach tak on chi ma' coric ta awach tak nachiban i ch'ukuj k'oric chana̱ tak, nqui Jesus queh.

Nok k'oro̱j chic lok re're', ju'jun queh take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l take ju'jun cow laj aj niminel reh c'uhbal re're', je' wili xquik'or reh Jesus: «Ajabe̱s Jesus, rehtalil chi re' hat i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric re' hoj nka̱j chi na̱banam chic jeno' rinimal wach lok' laj nawa̱l chi kawach, nqui take reh.

Chalic Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' hat-tak re' c'acharic na'n tak chiwach rik'ijil yu'na, k'e̱' wo' chic c'ahbil ano'jbal tak chi no̱j riban je' ricab jeno' c'ahbil laj ixok chi banoj c'oyomal ru̱c' toco̱m chic winak maj je' wili nak'or tak wi̱n: ‹Cha'n chic jeno' lok' laj nawa̱l c'uhtbal reh chi re' hat i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, nqui nak'or tak wi̱n. «Ru'um aj chi je' re' riwi̱' ano'jbal tak, re' hin ma' eta chic niban jeno' lok' laj nawa̱l chawach tak, xa re' cok haj wilic enye'eric chawach chi rehtalil, xa re' wach je' ricab xbanaric reh i raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios, re' Jonas ribihnal.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' wili i rehtalil: Re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel xib k'i̱j naniwih'ic pan muk'unbal naquinquicansaj je eh chiri̱j chic re', re' Dios naribanam chi nawelic wo' chic cho chi c'achalqui̱n wo' chic je' ricab xiban ru̱c' i Jonas naxiq'uic chic xib k'i̱j xiban chi xelic wo' chic cho chi c'achlic chipam i ma' laj car re' xbik'bic reh.

Chiri̱j ru', re' Jonas xtak'abjic wo' chic je junpech cu̱c' aj Ni̱niwe eh re' take re' xquijal wach quino'jbal naxquibiraj i c'uhbal xponic rik'or queh, raj la' hat-tak ma' na'n ta tak chi je' re'. Ru'um aj re' chipam i k'i̱j nachik'at k'oric i Dios chana̱ hat-tak, re' take re' til naquiyeb quichi̱' chi na̱c'ulum tak i tojbal wach amahc tak maj to̱b ta nak re' niC'uhbal i hin k'e̱' wo' chic rajawric chiwach i c'uhbal xiban i Jonas, xa ta nak najal wach ano'jbal tak.

Ma' xa ta re' take aj Ni̱niwe naquiyeb quichi̱' chana̱ hat-tak c'acharel c'achalca̱t tak chiwach rik'ijil yu'na, wilic la' toco̱m chic c'acharel je' wo' re' naca'nam. Chi quixilac take re', wilic ixok re' xwih'ic cho chi k'atal k'oric pan tinamit Se̱wa ribihnal. Je' re' naribanam ru' maj re' ixok wili chi cu ma' wili yu̱k' q'uixca̱b xchalic xc'ulic ribiraj rino'jbal i Salomon eh xic'am na̱, raj nchel hat-tak, to̱b ta xiq'uic wo' chic na̱ nino'jbal chiwach rino'jbal i Salomon, xa ta nak je nac'am tak na̱, nqui Jesus queh winak re're'.

Chiri̱j wili, re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or: «Re' ma' tob laj uxlabal, nant'ermejic lok ru̱c' jeno' c'acharel, no̱j pan tak ye'a̱b je' ru̱c' ma'xta wi̱' c'acharel chi risiq'uiric ripatal chi hi'lsbal ri̱b. Narilow chi ma' haj ta rirak ripatal,

je' wili rik'or pa ric'ux: ‹Re' hin nanisoljic wo' chic je ru̱c' i c'acharel xint'ermejic cho wi̱', nqui rik'or. «Chiri̱j wili nanponic wo' chic ru̱c' c'acharel elenak je wi̱', no̱j rirak chi re' ra̱mna c'acharel re're' xa tehlic wo' pa̱m eh tiklic chic chi naroquic wo' chic pa̱m, je' ricab nok jeno' pa̱t mesoj chic pa̱m eh xoyomaj wo' chic pa̱m chi naroquic pa̱m. Je' re' ajic, narilow chi je' re',

re' ma' tob laj uxlabal re're' no̱j chi risiq'uiric wuku̱b chic chi rich'i̱l je' ru̱c' xi̱c' wo' chic na̱ balc'uxquilal wach quino'jbal chiwach ru' eh narirak take cho, qui'oquic chi c'acharic ru̱c' winak re're'. Ru'um aj re', re' balc'uxquilal wach rino'jbal i winak re're' nariq'uic wo' chic na̱ chiwach naxwih'ic cho ma' tob laj uxlabal re're' chi xa chi rutquel. Je' aj ricab chi re' c'acharel re're' no̱j riban chi k'e̱' wo' chic balc'uxquilal wach rino'jbal, til je' re' balc'uxquilal wach ano'jbal tak naribanam hat-tak re' ma' holohic ta laj c'acharel, nqui xik'or queh.

Nok cu c'ahchi' wo' chi k'oric i Jesus cu̱c' take c'acharel, jenaj chi quixilac take tinamit wilque̱b ar, naxilow chi re' ritu̱t i Jesus ch'i̱l take richa̱k' wilque̱b lok rij pa̱t chi nca̱j nak k'oric ru̱c'
je' wili xik'or cok reh: «Ha̱w, re' atu̱t ch'i̱l take acha̱k' wilque̱b lok ri̱j pa̱t, nca̱j ca̱t quik'o'rem, nqui cok reh.
Chalic i Jesus je' wili xic'u'lej wi̱': «Re' nitu̱t ch'i̱l take nicha̱k', lo̱k' take chi niwach xa re' la' hab wach take je' quicab take re' nanacapaj i hat? nqui reh.

Chiri̱j re', xijohsaj je k'ab chi kana̱ i hoj raj tahkanel eh je' wili xik'or queh tinamit: «Chawilow tak take waj tahkanel wili. Re' take re' k'e̱' lo̱k' take chi niwach, je' na ricab nitu̱t on nicha̱k' take.

Je' re' quilok'il chi niwach maj xa hab wach riban ribanaric haj wilic take ra̱j i wAja̱w Dios wilic cho pan taxa̱j, re' c'acharel re're' k'e̱' wo' chic lo̱k' chi niwach je' na ricab nitu̱t on nicha̱k' take, nqui Jesus.
Chiwach aj wo' k'i̱j re're', re' Jesus na xelic cho chipam i pa̱t wilic nak wi̱', xo̱j chi chi̱' i jenaj ma' laj ha' eh xitz'uka̱' ri̱b ar.
Ar ajic naxquimol qui̱b yohbal wach tinamit, re' Jesus xoquic cok pan jenaj ma' laj cano̱wa re' xitz'uka̱' cho wi̱' ri̱b chi naric'uhbalem take riq'uihal tinamit wilque̱b lok chi chi̱' i ha' re're'.

Ar aj ru', yohbal wach take c'uhtunic xiban queh tinamit re're' ru̱c' take jalwach k'oric je' ricab i xik'or queh chi je' wili: «Chacoj tak rehtal i nanik'orom wili: Junpech jenaj winak xo̱j tico̱l chipam riye'a̱b. Re're' xoquic je chi tic xa re' la' ru' re' banoj tic ocronak take wi̱' je' ru̱c' xa chaquilej je aweh nca'n.
Ru'um aj re' wilic take rija̱' xikajic pan be̱h eh naxic'ulic lok take cuc' tz'iquin xc'ulic quic'ux ija' re're'.
Wilic wo' rija̱' xikajic xilac tak abaj re' ma' k'e̱' ta wi̱' ac'al. Re' take re' xa nok wo' ti xipok' cho ru'um chi ma' cha̱m ta ti pa̱m ac'al xikajic wi̱',
xa re' la' ru' naxchalic ritz'a'quilal i k'i̱j, xic'ahtic take ritz'i̱' ra̱' eh ru'um chi ma'xta chic bih nariye'bic cansil, xichikic take cuc' tic re're'.
Wilic wo' take rija̱' xikajic xilac tak q'ui̱x xiq'uihic nak tok, xa re' la' xiquimic naxtz'aparic quina̱ cu'um take q'ui̱x xiq'uihic ti johtok chi nok chiwach i tic re're'.

Wilic aj take rija̱' je' re' xquic'ul, xa re' la' wilic wo' take xikajic pan holohic laj ac'al, re' cok take re' xipok' cho chi coric eh k'e̱' wo' chic xiwachanic cu rehtal wilic xquiwachej ho'c'ahl (100) t'ohr reh ju'jun wal, wilic xquiyew oxc'ahl (60) t'ohr eh wilic wo' xquiyew lajeb rica'winak (30) t'ohr chi nak' wach, nqui Jesus.
Naxicohlaj rik'ormojic i jalwach k'oric re're', je' wo' wili xik'or queh tinamit re're': «Re' k'as axiquin tak chi birinic camanok aweh tak chi rirakmajic chiri̱j re' xnik'or lok wili, nqui queh.
Nok xa kutquel chic ru̱c' Jesus, re' hoj raj tahkanel xkajil cok ki̱b ru̱c' eh je' wili xkak'or reh: «Chaj bih riwi̱' chi xa ru̱c' jalwach k'oric tik'oric cu̱c' take tinamit? kojqui reh.

Chalic i Jesus, je' wili kac'u'ljic xiban: «Ma' hab ta nak wach neht'alanic reh chi re' Dios re' wilic cho pan taxa̱j, wilic chic chaxilac tak chi k'atal k'oric xa re' la' ti hat-tak xye'eric k'ab aweh tak chi narisakomjic wach aweh tak, raj nchel take toco̱m chic ma' xye'eric ta k'ab chi narisakomjic wach queh.

Je' re' ajic re' hat-tak nariye'eric riman aweh tak reht'aljic niC'uhbal. Je' re' nik'or maj wi wilic ac'ux tak chi rinimjic, re' Dios til nariyeb aweh tak chi na̱rakam tak chiri̱j rino'jbal. Raj wi ma'xta ac'ux tak chi rinimjic, ma' xa re' ta eriban chi ma' eta narak tak chiri̱j rino'jbal, narimak'am la' wo' aweh tak i haj nak ti wilic i no'jbal nak'or tak chi xatijej tak ru̱c' nic'uhbal.

Ru'um aj re', re' hin nanik'orom aweh tak chaj bih nelic wi̱' i jalwach k'oric re're', raj nchel take junleh re' ma' quitahkanic ta wi̱n, xa ru̱c' jalwach k'oric nanik'orom queh niC'uhbal reh chi ma' eta nquirak chiri̱j re' niban on re' nik'or, to̱b ta nak nquilow on to̱b ta nak nquibiraj.

Chi je' re' ajic xo̱j elok wach cu̱c' i k'oric k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios chi je' wili reh ma' Isayi̱yas: “Re' take nitinami̱t ma'xta chic quirakam chiri̱j i k'oro̱j wu'um. Re' take re' xa naquitikim wo' ju' birinic eh xa naquilom wo' take nic' pa' nimal nanic'uhtam queh, xa re' la' ru' ma'xta quicojom rehtal.

Ru'um re', re' take re' xquicowsaj i ca̱mna, xquicupsaj qui̱b eh xquisot'saj wo' qui̱b ru̱c' quino'jbal. Ru̱c' xca'n chi je' re', re' hin ma'xta chic nito'bem take maj re' take re' chi ma' c'ahchi' ta chic quinquisic' yu'na, ma'xta chic quirakam chiri̱j i niC'uhbal ru̱c' ca̱mna. Ru'um aj re' naquicahnic wo' chi cuprunak take, je' wo' chi sot'ronak take ru̱c' quino'jbal. Chi je' re' ma' nquirak ta wo' chiri̱j i niC'uhbal eh ma' eta wo' nico'lej take, nqui k'oro̱j cho reh ma' Isayi̱yas ru'um Dios.
«Je' aj re' k'uru', k'e̱' je ato̱b aweh hat-tak re' c'ahchi' awilbic take reh niban eh c'ahchi' abirinic tak reh chaj bih nik'or

maj til pan coric nik'or aweh tak chi yohbal wach take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios ch'i̱l take c'acharel coric wach quic'ux xca̱j nak quilom re' c'ahchi' awilow tak eh xca̱j nak quibiram re' c'ahchi' abiram hat-tak yu'na.
«Chacoj tak rehtal, je' wili nelic wi̱' i jalwach k'oric chiri̱j i aj tico̱l:

Re' take ija' xikajic pan be̱h rijalwachej i c'acharel ribiraj i tijbal chiri̱j rik'atoj k'oric i Dios xa re' la' nok ma' rirak ta wo' chiri̱j, nc'ulic mak'arok pa ra̱mna ru'um i aj Yahm re' k'e̱' c'ahbil wach.
Re' chic take ija' xikajic xilac tak abaj rijalwachej i niC'uhbal xa suk chic quic'ux nanquibiraj take c'acharel,

xa re' la' ma' nquichop ta quic'ux ru̱c' chi coric, xa je' quicab junwal ok chi tic ma' cha̱m ta kajanak ritz'i̱' ra̱' pan ac'al. Je' re' nok, re' take c'acharel re're' xa junc'am ti nquicoj wach niC'uhbal eh je' re' nik'or chi nca'n maj nanchalic i ti'c'axic on ixowonic china̱ ru'um reh nic'uhbal, ricana̱' wo' chic rinimjic.

«Re' chic take ija' xikajic xilac tak q'ui̱x rijalwachej i niC'uhbal ribiraj i c'acharel, xa re' la' ma' riban ta wo' chi aj banol take reh chaj bih ra̱j i Dios. Ru'um aj re' je' ricab chi re' take tic ma' qui'o̱j ta wachanok, je' wo' re' i niC'uhbal ma' nwachanic ta wo' cu̱c' maj je' ricab chi re' take ija' ntz'aparic quina̱ cu'um take q'ui̱x, wilic wo' nk'etbic pan quibe̱h je' ricab nanquicoj quicapew-bal xa chiri̱j take risiq'uiric pa' bih queh on chiri̱j take c'axoj wach bihomal re' njot'bic wo' reh quicapew-bal.

«Re' aj chic take ija' xikajic pan holohic laj ac'al rijalwachej i niC'uhbal nquibiraj take c'acharel holohic wach quino'jbal. Je' ricab nok re' tic re're' xwachanic cho cu rehtal xiyew ho'c'ahl (100) t'ohr, oxc'ahl (60) t'ohr eh lajeb rica'winak (30) t'ohr chi nak' wach ru̱c' ju'jun wal, re' take c'acharel nquichop quic'ux ru̱c' niC'uhbal nquibiraj eh no̱j wo' ca'n chi aj banol take reh chaj bih ra̱j i Dios, nqui Jesus keh.

Re' Jesus xik'or wo' chic keh jenaj jalwach k'oric chi je' wili: «Re' nc'ulmujic nank'ormojic i tijbal chiri̱j i k'atoj k'oric riban cho Dios cu pan taxa̱j, re're' nanijalwachem ru̱c' re' xc'uluric ru̱c' jenaj winak re' xitic pa̱m i rac'a̱l ru̱c' holohic laj ija'

je' ru̱c' ncojoric chi wi'c. Nok re' winak re're' ritiquim chic pa̱m i rac'a̱l, pan jenaj chak'ab pa risukquil quiwiric take c'acharel, xchalic i raj ixowonel xitic take ma' holohic ta laj ija' chi xilac i ritic eh chiri̱j chic ru' xo̱j wo' chic.

Chi je' aj re' nok re' take tic re're' q'uihinak chic johtok take, p'uht quiq'ueric cho chi naquiwachanic. Cu re' aj ru', xc'utunic pe' cho chi quixilac take tic re're' chi tico̱j po' nchel take ma' holohic ta laj ija' je' ricab quica'yic wo' take tic re're'.

Ar ajic re' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i winak re're' naxquicoj rehtal re' xc'uluric, xo̱j quik'or reh ajabe̱s chi je' wili: ‹Ha̱w, re' hat holohic laj ija' xatic pan aye'a̱b, maje'? Haj xchalic i ma' holohic ta laj ija' wilic chipam aye'a̱b k'uru'? nqui take reh.

«Re' ajabe̱s re're', je' wili xik'or queh: ‹Re' xticbic reh ma' holohic ta laj ija', jenaj aj ixowonel wi̱n, nqui queh raj tz'e' wa̱ch. «Naxquibiraj chi je' re', je' wo' chic wili xquik'or reh ajabe̱s: ‹Ha̱w, ta na re̱t chi eno̱j kachuk take ma' holohic ta laj tic re're'? nqui take reh.
«Re' ajabe̱s je' wili xik'or queh: ‹Ma' chi bih pe aban tak yu'na, ma' ok nchel chi richukuric lok i ma' holohic ta laj tic re're' ewo' nachuk tak lok i nitic.

Chacana̱' tak k'uru', quiq'uihok pe johtok quicabchelal cu rehtal rirak rik'ijil sic'bal wach nitic. Cu re' aj ru', re' hin je' wili nanik'orom queh take aj sic'ol wach nitic: Nic' pa' nimal xiwachej nitic xniban, chasic' tak wi̱n eh chac'ol tak chipam nic'ola̱b. Re' cok ru', pe̱t chachuk tak lok take ma' holohic ta laj tic eh nok apixim tak chic pa̱m chi yuhtil, chac'at tak pan k'a̱k', nqui nanik'orom, nqui ajabe̱s re're', nqui Jesus.

Re' Jesus xik'or wo' chic keh jenaj jalwach k'oric chi je' wili: «Re' rijalwachjic i ric'am je' wi̱' ri̱b niC'uhbal chiri̱j i k'atoj k'oric riban cho i Dios cu pan taxa̱j, cu rehtal nq'uihic wach chi risuksjic i ca̱mna take c'acharel, nanijalwachem ru̱c' je' ricab xiban i t'uch ija' mosta̱sa ribihnal re' xc'amaric je ru'um jenaj winak chi naritiquim jok pa rac'a̱l.

Re' aj ija' re're' til ma' na'lic ti reh naxtiquiric jok, xa re' la' ru' naxq'uihic johtok, k'e̱' nimal xponic chi quiwach take mu'unumaj tic. Je' re' k'uru', nok nim laj che̱' chic, re' take cuc' tz'iquin xic'ulic lok china̱ take k'ab eh xca'n quike̱s china̱, nqui Jesus.

Re' Jesus xik'or wo' chic keh i jalwach k'oric wili: «Re' camanic riban i niC'uhbal chiri̱j k'atoj k'oric riban cho Dios cu pan taxa̱j, nanijalwachem wo' chic ru̱c' riban i rik'omil caxlan wi'c. Re' ik'o̱m re're', naxcojoric ru'um i jenaj ixok chi xilac i oxpaj chi rik'oril caxlan wi'c, xixilaquej ri̱b ch'i̱l i k'o̱r cu rehtal xisipsaj wach, nqui Jesus.
Ru̱c' aj wili xicohlaj wach chi'nchel ric'uhtunic i Jesus ru̱c' take jalwach k'oric xik'or queh tinamit. Ma'xta bih c'uhtunic xiban queh ma' ta nak ru̱c' jalwach k'oric.

Chi je' re' xo̱j elok wach rik'orbal i jenaj aj k'orol c'uhbal najtir k'i̱j, re' je' wili xk'ormojic cho reh ru'um i Dios: “Re' hin pan jalwach k'oric nanibanam i c'uhtunic eh nanisakomem wach nic' pa' nimal take c'uhbal ma' sakomomaj ta cho wach cu rich'ihquic cho c'acharic, nqui k'oro̱j cho.

Nok ojonak chic take tinamit, re' Jesus xoquic wo' chic chipam i pa̱t elenak je wi̱'. Ar ajic re' hoj raj tahkanel naxkajil cok ki̱b ru̱c', je' wili xkak'or reh: «Ajabe̱s, chacuy chasakomej wach keh chaj bih nelic wi̱' i jalwach k'oric xak'or chiri̱j ma' holohic ta laj tic, kojqui reh.
Re're', je' wili kac'u'ljic xiban: «Re' aj tico̱l c'ahchi' riticbic reh i holohic laj ija' quirijalwachej i hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel.

Re' ye'a̱b bano̱j wi̱' i tic rijalwachej take tinamit nquibiraj ritijbal i Dios. Re' holohic laj ija' rijalwachej take c'acharel oconak chic take chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios re' aj k'atal k'oric chi quina̱. Re' chic i ma' holohic ta laj ija' rijalwachej take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i aj Yahm re' k'e̱' c'ahbil wach

eh re' aj ixowonel re' xticbic reh ma' holohic ta laj ija' rijalwachej aj Yahm. Re' chic risiq'uiric wach i tic rijalwachej i cohlsbal wach ac'al wili eh re' take aj sic'ol wach tic rijalwachej take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios ar pan taxa̱j.

Je' re' ajic, pan cohlsbal wach ac'al wili, je' ricab naxponic rik'ijil chi xsiq'uiric take wach i tic, re' ma' holohic ta laj tic xc'ataric cok pan k'a̱k' nok chuku̱j chic take lok chi quixilac i holohic laj tic, je' wo' re' naquic'ulum take nic' pa' nimal ma' holohic ta quibanic.

Je' re' nik'or chi naquic'ulum maj re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel nanik'orom queh take waj tz'e' wa̱ch pan taxa̱j chi naquimolom wach take nic' nimal ma' holohic ta quibanic, ch'i̱l take quik'eb-bic pan mahc take quiniminic wi̱n eh chi naquesmejic lok pa reh chi quixilac take wilque̱b ri'sil wo̱k nik'ab.

Je' re' naca'nam reh chi naquicojoric chipam rinimal ti'c'axic re' xa je' chic ricab ntenic cho wi̱' jeno' rinimal k'a̱k'. Ar aj ru', nacok'ic eh naquitz'uyunic ru'um riti'quilal i ti'c'axic naquic'ulum.

Chipam i k'i̱j re're' nok je' re' naric'uluric, re' take coric wach quic'ux quiniminic wi̱n, nok k'ahsamaj chic take chi ri'sil ro̱k k'ab i wAja̱w, xa holohic chic i sakomonic naca'nam, xa je' chic ricab rich'abquilal i k'i̱j. Yu'na k'uru' re' hat-tak k'as ok axiquin tak chi rirakmajic chiri̱j i jalwach k'oric wili, nqui keh.

Chiri̱j wili re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or: «Re' nbanaric chiri̱j i wih'ic chi ri'sil ro̱k k'ab i Dios ar pan taxa̱j, je' na ricab xiban jenaj winak xrakbic reh jenaj rinimal bihomal c'olo̱j chipam jenaj ye'a̱b. Re' winak re're', xa suk chic ric'ux chiri̱j i bihomal re're', xic'ol wo' chic re' xirak wi̱' eh xo̱j ric'ayej take pa' bih wilic reh, reh chi narilok'om i ye'a̱b re're'. Je' re' xiban chi narehcham i bihomal c'olo̱j chipam.
«Je' wo', re' nbanaric chiri̱j i wih'ic chi ri'sil ro̱k k'ab i Dios ar pan taxa̱j, je' na ricab xiban jenaj winak aj yaco̱l sic'oj chak'wach laj abaj riban.
Re' winak aj yaco̱l re're', naxirak i k'e̱' wo' chic chak'wachquil laj abaj, xsoljic wo' chic je chi ric'ayjic take pa' bih reh eh xc'ulic rilok' i k'e̱' wo' chic chak'wachquil laj abaj re're'.

«Re' nc'uluric nank'ormojic i tijbal chiri̱j i k'atoj k'oric riban cho Dios cu pan taxa̱j, nijalwachej ru̱c' moloj rehreh wach car riban cho jeno' ya'l chopbal car re' ncuturic jok pan ha' eh je' re' rijalwachjic niban maj yu'na cu xilacamaj take coric quiwach ch'i̱l take banol reh c'ahbilal

xa re' la' ru', je' ricab nok re' take aj car nanquesaj lok chi chi̱' ha' i quiya'l chi nujunak reh chi'nchel wach car, quitz'uhkic chi riye'eric lok pan chacach take chak'wach laj car eh re' take ma' tare̱t ta chi c'uxuric nquicut je.

Nic' pa' wach nbanaric cu̱c' take car, je' wo' re' naric'uluric pan cohlsbal wach i ac'al wili, re' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios naquichalic chi rimoloric quiwach take c'ahbil quino'jbal eh naquicojom lok pa reh cu̱c' ch'akbal queh cu̱c' take coric wach quic'ux.

Chiri̱j chic re', re' take c'ahbil quino'jbal naquicojoric chipam rinimal ti'c'axic re' xa je' chic ricab ntenic cho wi̱' jeno' rinimal k'a̱k'. Ar aj ru' nacok'ic eh naquitz'uyunic wo' ru'um riti'quilal ti'c'axic naquic'ulum, nqui Jesus keh.
Naxicohlaj rik'ormojic chi'nchel take jalwach k'oric re're', re' Jesus xibiraj keh wi xkarak chiri̱j i xik'or eh re' hoj xkak'or reh chi til xkarak chiri̱j.

Chi je' aj re', je' wo' chic wili xik'or keh: «Wi jeno' aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ntijiljic wo' chic chipam i ac' laj tijbal chiri̱j i k'atoj k'oric riban cho Dios cu pan taxa̱j, re're' til nye'eric reh chi erirak chiri̱j chi manlic re' ricorquilal wilic chipam ac' laj tijbal je' wo' i ricorquilal wilic chipam i najtir laj c'uhbal. Ru'um aj re', re' hin nijalwachej re' nc'ulmujic ru̱c' c'acharel re're' ru̱c' nc'ulmujic ru̱c' jeno' ajabe̱s re' resaj cho take cu ac' laj c'olo̱j je' wo' take najtir laj c'olo̱j cho chipam ric'ola̱b, nqui Jesus keh.
Nok ricohlam chic rik'ormojic take jalwach k'oric re're', re' Jesus xelic je chipam i tinamit re're'

eh xo̱j chipam i tinamit Nasaret re' q'uihinak cho wi̱'. Nok wilic aj chic ar, xip'ut c'uhtunic chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, xa re' la' take tinamit je' wili nquik'or chiri̱j chi xa sahchanak chic quic'ux ru̱c' i c'uhtunic ch'i̱l take lok' laj nawa̱l riban: «Haj wo' rirak i rino'jbal i Jesus re're' chi k'e̱' nchol c'uhtunic? Eh haj wo' nchalic rajawric chi ribanaric take lok' laj nawa̱l riban chi kaxilac?
Re're' xa rac'u̱n wo' ti ma' Chep re' aj sehc, maje'? Je' wo', xa rac'u̱n wo' ti ixok re' Mari̱ya ribihnal eh xa casbe̱s wo' ti Jaco̱wo, re' Chep, re' Simon ch'i̱l i Ju̱ras.

Je' wo' chic ma' re' ta na nchel rana̱b take ixk'un quic'acharic ayu' pan katinami̱t pa ric'ux? Haj wo' xirak cho rino'jbal k'uru' chi k'e̱' nchol c'uhtunic eh haj wo' xchalic rajawric chi ribanaric take lok' laj nawa̱l riban? nqui take.

Je' aj re' nquik'or maj c'axic chi queh ricojoric wach chi re're' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Raj la' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' hat-tak na'n tak wu̱c' je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios re' xa ye'o̱j chic cho rilok'il pan tak toco̱m ye'a̱b eh tz'a̱b ru' cu̱c' take rich ritinami̱t on cu̱c' take raj pan pa̱t ma' ye'o̱j ta so' rilok'il, nqui Jesus queh.
Chi je' aj re' ru'um chi ma' xquicoj ta wach riC'uhbal, re' Jesus ma' yohbal ta wach lok' laj nawa̱l xiban ar.
Chiwach aj wo' take k'i̱j nok re' Jesus wilic ar Nasaret, re' Hero̱res re' k'atal k'oric pa riyuk'ul i Calile̱ya naxibiraj i k'oric nca'n i tinamit chiri̱j i Jesus,
je' wili xik'or queh take raj to'o̱l: «Re' ranxelex i Wa̱n aj kahsem ha' xc'acharic wo' chic cho eh re're' wilic ru̱c' i Jesus. Ru'um aj re', re' Jesus k'e̱' wo' chic rajawric wilic, nqui queh.

Je' re' xicapaj maj til re' wo' Hero̱res xtak'anic je richoporic chi naritz'aparic pan che̱' re' xpixaric wi̱' chi c'aham ch'ihch'. Re' riwi̱' chi je' re' xiban reh Wa̱n ru'um chi re' Hero̱res xic'am cok chi rehq'ue̱n i Herori̱yas re' rehq'ue̱n richa̱k' re' Pili̱po ribihnal.

Chi je' re' ajic re' Wa̱n je' wili rinakaric i Hero̱res riban chiri̱j i no'jbal xiban: «Re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ma' riyew ta k'ab chi enc'amaric chi ehq'uenbe̱s jeno' ixok cu c'achlic cho ribahi̱l. Re' xa'n k'uru' chi xamak' cho rehq'ue̱n acha̱k' ma' holohic ta, nqui rik'or reh.

Ru'um aj re', re' Hero̱res xa ra̱j nak chic ricansam i Wa̱n, xa re' la' ja'xta pe bih xiban reh ru'um chi nyo'jic chi quiwach take tinamit chi naricansam maj re' take re' queht'alanic chi re' Wa̱n jenaj raj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios nok wilic.
Pan jenaj aj k'i̱j nok re' Hero̱res xinink'ijej wach rihabil, re' rixk'u̱n i Herori̱yas xiban riso̱n chi quiwach take chi'nchel ula̱' eh ru'um chi k'e̱' xponic chiwach i Hero̱res i so̱n xiban,
je' wili xik'or reh ixk'un re're': «Re' hin til niyew nik'orbal aweh chi eniyew aweh i nic' pa' nimal nawa̱j apahkam wi̱n, nqui reh.

Re' ixk'un re're' naxhunjic pa̱m ru'um ritu̱t, je' wili xik'or reh Hero̱res: «Re' hin nwa̱j chi chatak'a̱' je riyoc'oric chi ralak i Wa̱n aj kahsem ha' eh chayew wi̱n pan jeno' perepic wach culc rehtalil chi xquimic chic, nqui reh.

Re' Hero̱res re' wilic chi raj to'o̱l i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma chipam i yuk'ul re're', naxibiraj i pahkanic xiban ixk'un re're', xchalic riyot'quil ric'ux, xa re' la' ru' ru'um chi xiyew chic rik'orbal reh ixk'un re're' chi quiwach take rula̱' wilque̱b pan nink'i̱j, xitak'a̱' wo' rik'ormojic chi nariye'eric reh rina̱ i Wa̱n.
Je' re' ajic xitak'a̱' riyoc'oric chi ralak i Wa̱n ar pan che̱'
eh naxc'amaric cho reh rina̱ i Wa̱n pan jenaj perepic wach culc, re' ixk'un re're' xo̱j rik'ahsaj reh ritu̱t.
Je' aj re', nok cansamaj chic i Wa̱n xponic molorok cho riti'jolal cu'um take raj tahkanel eh nok quimuk'a̱b chic je, cu re' aj ru' xponic wo' quik'or reh Jesus chi xcansjic je i Wa̱n.

Nok ribiram chic chi xcansjic i Wa̱n ru'um Hero̱res, re' Jesus xelic je chipam i tinamit Nasaret eh naxichop je jenaj cano̱wa, xo̱j wih'ok chipam jenaj ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel. Naxqueht'alij haj xicora̱' je i Jesus, q'uihal take tinamit xi'elic je chi co̱k pan tak quitinami̱t, xi'o̱j chi pe̱t be̱h reh chi naquik'etem ponok chiwach

ar chipam i ye'a̱b re' narojic elok lok wi̱' chi juntar ha'. Je' re' ajic naxilow quiwach take riq'uihal tinamit tubulque̱b chic ar, re' Jesus xiquetelej quiwach eh xoquic chi resmejic lok quiya'bilal take nic' pa' nimal yowa'i̱b wilque̱b chi quixilac take tinamit re're'.

Nok re' Jesus c'ahchi' ric'uhbalem take riq'uihal c'acharel, re' hoj raj tahkanel naxkilow chi xo̱j chic i k'i̱j, xkajil cok ki̱b ru̱c' eh je' wili xkak'or reh: «Ha̱w, re' ri'orahil i wa'bal reh xik'ek xiq'uic chic na̱ eh ayu' ma' haj ta enkarak wi'c quetbal queh tinamit wili maj wilco̱j pan jenaj ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel. Ra̱j wili chak'or ta nak queh chi equi'o̱j pan tak abixbal wilque̱b je ma' naht ta take ayu' reh chi eno̱j quilok' quiwa' quiha̱', kojqui reh.
Chalic i Jesus je' wili xik'or keh: «Coric nak'or tak, xa re' la' re' take tinamit wili re' hat-tak na̱quetbic tak queh, nqui xik'or keh.
Re' hoj je' wili xkac'u'lej wi̱': «Ha̱w, chaj bih quiqueteric naka'nam i hoj xa ru̱c' ti ho'o̱b chi caxlan wi'c ch'i̱l quib chi joxomaj car wilic ku̱c'? kojqui reh.
Re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or keh: «Chac'am tak cho wi̱n i caxlan wi'c ch'i̱l i joxomaj car re're', nqui keh.

Chi je' aj re', xik'or keh chi nakatz'uka̱b take tinamit chiwach i q'uim wilque̱b wi̱'. Chiri̱j re', nok richopom chic i ho'o̱b chi caxlan wi'c ch'i̱l i quib chi joxomaj car, re' Jesus naxilbic johtok pan taxa̱j, xitioxej johtok reh i Dios eh nok p'uht rixerem, xiyew keh hoj raj tahkanel chi nakacojom chi quiwach take riq'uihal i tinamit re're'.
Je' aj re' ru', nok re' take tinamit ca'nam chic quiwa' chi suk, re' hoj cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel cu cablaj chic chacach chi caxlan wi'c re' ma' xc'uhlic ta, xkamol wach cu̱c' tinamit re're',
re' ma' xa ta wilque̱b cablaj ik'ob lajc'ahl (5,000) ok riq'uihal xa re' take winak chi ma' cojo̱j ta pa riman take ixok ch'i̱l take ha'lac'un.

Chiri̱j aj chic quiqueteric take riq'uihal tinamit re're', re' Jesus xipahkaj keh hoj cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel chi nacoquic cok pan cano̱wa re' xojponic lok wi̱' ar chi juntar ha'. Naxoj-o̱j i hoj raj tahkanel, re' Jesus cu xcahnic pe cahnok chi rich'akaric je ri̱b cu̱c' take tinamit cu wilque̱b ar.

Nok rich'akam chic take cahnok i tinamit, re're' xo̱j riban riti̱j china̱ johtok i jenaj yu̱k' wilic ma' naht ta je ar. Je' re' ajic nok oconak chic i ak'ab eh nok re' Jesus chayew ti̱j riban chi rutquel ar china̱ i yu̱k' re're',
re' hoj raj tahkanel xoj-o̱j chic lok pan yejal ha' chipam i cano̱wa wilco̱j wi̱', xa re' la' kacano̱wa xa c'axic chic riban ru'um reh cow laj te̱w chalic riban chi kawach.
Naxoquic aj cho suk wach sak'ic, re' Jesus xojritahkej cho cu rehtal xo̱j c'olok ku̱c' chi behic riban nah ha'.
Naxkilow i hoj chi je' re', xkaq'uer kachi̱' ru'um reh rinimal yo'jic xchalic ku̱c' eh je' wili xkak'or chi kawach: «Chawilow tak je wulu'. Re're' jenaj yo'sonel, xa kojqui chic.
Raj la' Jesus, je' wili xik'or cho keh: «Ma' tiyo'jic tak, re' hin, hin i Jesus. Chacowej ac'ux tak k'uru', nqui cho keh.
Naxibiraj i ma' Luch chi re' Jesus xk'oric cho, je' wili xik'or je reh: «Ajabe̱s Jesus, wi til coric chi re' hat, chak'or cho wi̱n chi equino̱j awu̱c' chi behic niban je nah ha', nqui je reh.
Je' re' nok naxibiraj xk'ormojic cho reh ru'um i Jesus chi narojic ru̱c', re' ma' Luch xelic lok pan cano̱wa eh xo̱j ru̱c' chi behic riban je nah ha'.

Chiri̱j ru', re' ma' Luch naxilow take ribohl ha' qui'uctic ru'um ransil i te̱w, xoquic cho riyo'jic eh p'uht ribut'lujic jok pan ha'. Ru'um aj re' xiq'uer je chi̱' ru̱c' Jesus chi je' wili: «Chacuy Ha̱w, quinaco'lej, nqui je reh.

Re' Jesus xichohpaj chi k'ab i ma' Luch eh je' wili xik'or reh naxikerej johtok: «Ma' Luch, ma' riwi̱' ta chic chaweh chi xapoh'aj acapew-bal. Chaj wa'ric ma' ja' nach'ica̱' ta ac'ux chiwi̱j chi coric? nqui reh.
Chiri̱j chic ru' naxjohtic i Jesus ch'i̱l i ma' Luch chipam i cano̱wa, tz'ihrimaj xo̱j i cow laj te̱w
eh chi je' re', re' hoj raj tahkanel xkaxuc'a̱' ki̱b chiwach Jesus eh xkayew rilok'il chi je' wili: «Re' hat kAja̱w Jesus, til hat pe' nchel rAc'u̱n i Dios, kojqui reh.
Chiri̱j chic re' naxojponic lok juntar ha', xoj-oquic cok chipam i tinamit Jenesaret ribihnal.

Ar ajic nok re' take c'acharel xquicoj rehtal chi re' Jesus xponic wo' chic pan quiyuk'ul, xquesaj lok ribiral pan tak tinamit quica'ja̱ je ar chi re' Jesus wilic wo' chic chi quixilac. Chi je' aj re' q'uihal take c'acharel xquic'am cho take quiyowa'i̱b ru̱c' i Jesus

eh xquipahkaj reh chi eriyew k'ab queh chi enquitz'a'j to̱b ta xa re' ti i ro̱k i su't rijela̱' nah teleb, reh chi xa ru̱c' re're' enelic lok quiya'bilal. Je' re' ajic naxye'eric k'ab queh, chi'nchel take nic' pa' q'uihal xitz'a'nic reh chi̱' riso' i Jesus xelic wo' lok quiya'bilal.

Chiwach aj wo' take k'i̱j nok re' Jesus wilic ar Jenesaret kich'i̱l i hoj raj tahkanel, wilic take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l take ju'jun cow laj aj niminel reh c'uhbal re're', re' xichalic ar Jerusalen, xiponic ru̱c' Jesus eh je' wili xquik'or reh:

«Re' take awaj tahkanel c'ahchi' quiyak'abem pan co̱k i quic'uhbal cahnok take kama̱m kati't. Je' re' nkak'or maj re' take re' ma' c'ahchi' ta ca'nam i ritz'ajaric quik'ab nok nca'n quiwa' je' ricab i hoj tijimaj wi̱', nqui take reh.

Chalic Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' hat-tak c'ahchi' wo' ayak'abem pan awo̱k tak take tak'anic ye'o̱j aweh tak ru'um i Dios nok re' chic take quik'orom cahnok aweh tak ama̱m awati't tak nac'am tak na̱.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' Dios xitak'a̱' rik'ormojic chi je' wili: “Chalok'mej atu̱t awaja̱w tak, nqui cho. «Je' wo' chic, queh take aj ch'ukul wach mahc xitak'a̱' i wili: Xa hab pa' wach narisihtam i ritu̱t raja̱w, ma̱quetelej tak wach chi naricansjic je, nqui wo' tak'anic ribanam cho.

«To̱b ta wo' je' re' take tak'anic bano̱j cho, re' hat-tak nac'uhtaj tak pan atijbal tak chi xa tare̱t wo' chi jeno' c'acharel erik'or queh ritu̱t raja̱w chi re' tumi̱n nariyeb nak reh chi rito'bal ma'xta chic riyeb reh ru'um chi xik'ahsaj chic pan k'ab i Dios chi risi̱.

Ru̱c' aj c'uhtunic na'n tak re're', til ric'uhtaj lok chi re' c'acharel re' riyew ritumi̱n chi si̱ chiwach i Dios ma' tanlic ta chic chi reh chi erilok'mej ritu̱t raja̱w. Ru'um aj re' til nik'or aweh tak chi re' hat-tak nak'ihtaj awi̱b tak chi ric'amaric na̱ take tak'anic ye'o̱j aweh tak ru'um i Dios, nok re' hat-tak cow nak'or tak chi naribanaric i c'uhtumaj cahnok aweh tak cu'um take ama̱m awati't tak eh re' wo' chic re' nac'uhtaj tak queh take toco̱m chic c'acharel.
Re' hat-tak xa hat-tak banol awach tak ru̱c' riC'uhbal i Dios. Riwi̱' po' nchel chi re' Dios xik'or aweh tak chi je' wili ru̱c' chi̱' i raj k'orol C'uhbal re' Isayi̱yas ribihnal:
“Re' take c'acharel wili xa ru̱c' quichi̱' quinquilok'ej, ma' re' ta nchel ru̱c' chi'nchel quic'ux nca'n. Je' re' nik'or maj re' quicapew-bal ma' ch'iclic ta so' wu̱c'.
Je' re' k'uru' re' lok'onic nca'n wi̱n ma'xta bih ritik queh, ru'um nok ma' re' ta chic niC'uhbal nquic'uhtaj, re' la' chic i no'jbal ocronak take wi̱', nqui rik'orom cho Dios, nqui Jesus queh.
Chiri̱j re're', re' Jesus xik'or queh c'acharel chi naquijilim cok qui̱b ru̱c'. Naxca'n chi je' re' je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' hat-tak c'acharel chabiraj tak chi coric eh charak wo' tak chiri̱j

chi re' nbanic chi wilic i mahc pan ca̱mna take c'acharel ma' re' ta nchel i chaj bih nquic'ux jok chi tzajoj on ma' tz'ajo̱j ta quik'ab, re' la' chaj bih c'ahbil laj k'oric nelic cho pan quichi̱', nqui queh.

Nok rik'orom chic re're', re' hoj raj tahkanel xkajil cok ki̱b ru̱c' eh je' wili xkak'or reh: «Ha̱w, xacoj na rehtal chi re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xiban quib quic'ux ru̱c' take k'oric xak'or queh? kojqui reh.

Chalic i Jesus, je' wili kac'u'ljic xiban: «Je' ricab nansacharic wach jeno' tic ru'um jeno' ajabe̱s narichuk lok wi ma' re're' xticbic reh, je' wo' re' nasacharok wach ru'um i Ajabe̱s Dios wilic cho pan taxa̱j i c'uhbal re' ma' re' ta re' xye'bic cho reh.

Je' wo' re' naric'uluric ru̱c' je' ricab i quitijbal take cow laj aj niminel re' xa je' take sot' chi ric'amaric quibe̱h take tinamit re' je' wo' sot' take ru'. Nik'or chi je' re' maj re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak wi jeno' sot' eric'am ribe̱h jeno' chic rich sot', junk'ehbic take quicabchelal pan jeno' jul ne'el. Je' re' k'uru' chacana̱' tak chi je' re' enc'uluric cu̱c' ru̱c' quitijbal, nqui Jesus keh.
Chiri̱j aj chic re're', re' ma' Luch je' wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Chacuy Ha̱w, chasakomej wach keh i k'oric xak'or queh tinamit chiri̱j re' nch'uwa'rsanic wach i ka̱mna, nqui reh.
Chalic i Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Re' hat-tak, ma' ja' xta pe ok wo' nchel ano'jbal tak chi rirakmajic chiri̱j xnik'or?
Ma' narak ta na tak chiri̱j k'uru' chi re' pa' bih nkac'ux jok, xa chi kapa̱m wo' no̱j jok eh nok ribanam chic cho ricamaj nkesaj wo' chic lok chi k'ebo̱j chic?
Je' re' k'uru', ma' re' ta nkac'ux jok riban chi wilic ta nak i mahc pan ka̱mna, re' la' chaj bih c'ahbil laj k'oric nelic cho pan kachi̱' chi cu pan ka̱mna nasjic cho.

Re' aj re' nbanic chi kojmahcanic maj cu pa ra̱mna c'acharel njohtic cho c'ahbil laj no'jbal je' ricab take cansanic riban, on re' banoj tak c'oyomal chiri̱j lok i caxarahil, on re' tununic tak i̱b pan c'oyomal chi ma' caxa̱ra ta take, on re' banoj tak lek', on re' chucuj tak k'oric, on re' tz'uju̱j tak i̱b nca'n take c'acharel.
Chi'nchel take c'ahbil laj bano̱j xnik'or lok ribiral wili, re're' nbanic chi wilic i mahc pan ca̱mna take c'acharel ma' re' ta nchel i chaj bih ric'ux jok chi ma' ritz'ajam ta k'ab, nqui Jesus keh.
Chiri̱j chic riwih'ic ar Jenesaret, re' Jesus xelic je ar eh xo̱j chipam take quiyuk'ul aj Ti̱ro ch'i̱l aj Siron.

Ar aj ru' jenaj ixok ca̱' qui'sil cho take aj Canahan, re' nchalic pan jenaj queh take yuk'ul re're', xoquic chi ritahkaljic je i Jesus chi xa q'ueric chic je chi̱' chiri̱j chi je' wili: «Ajabe̱s Jesus, ra̱' ri'sil cho i k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy, chaquetelej niwach ch'i̱l wixk'u̱n. Chacuy, chawesaj lok wi̱n riya'bilal cojo̱j china̱ ru'um jenaj ma' tob laj uxlabal nchopbic na̱ ric'acharic, nqui reh.

Raj la' Jesus ma' xic'u'lej ta ixok re're'. Naxkilow i hoj raj tahkanel chi je' re', xkajil cok ki̱b ru̱c' Jesus eh je' wili xkak'or reh: «Ha̱w, chacuy, chawesaj wo' lok i riya'bilal rixk'u̱n ixok wili reh chi eno̱j pa ripa̱t. Je' re' nkapahkaj aweh maj xa chi'k'or riban chiki̱j, kojqui reh.

Chalic i Jesus je' wili xojric'u'lej wi̱': «Re' hin cu̱c' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' wilque̱b chi je' quicab take sahchel me̱' xintak'abjic cho chi quico'ljic take chi pe̱t, ma' ja' re' ta nchel cu̱c' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, nqui keh.
Naxibiraj ixok chi je' re', xijil cok ri̱b ru̱c' Jesus eh je' wili xik'or reh chi xuclic cok chiwach: «Ajabe̱s, til chacuy quinato'bej ru̱c' resmejic lok i riya'bilal i wixk'u̱n, nqui reh.

Chalic i Jesus je' wili ric'u'ljic xiban: «Je' ricab chi jeno' ajabe̱s ma' eta riban chi reh chi pe̱t ti eriyeh'aj lok riwa' i ritz'i̱' chi ja' riquet ta take riha'lac'u̱n, je' wo' re' chi niwach i hin, ma' riwi̱' ta wo' chi pe̱t ti enwesaj lok riya'bilal awixk'u̱n chi cu ja' ta wo' nwesaj ta lok riya'bilal chi pe̱t jeno' queh take ra̱' ri'sil take cho ma' Israhel wilque̱b chipam i yuk'ul wili, nqui Jesus reh.

Chalic wo' chic i ixok re're' je' wili xik'or reh: «Ha̱w, til coric aweh nak'or xa re' la' je' ricab naquiqueteric take ha'lac'un ma' xa re' ta take re' nca'n quiwa', je' la' wo' quehtric wo' ti chic take tz'i' ru̱c' rixe̱r caxlan wi'c quik'ehbic jok rehquen rime̱xa i quico̱', je' ok wo' ti re' cha'n ku̱c' i hoj ma' re' ta hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel koj-ehtrok wo' ti nech' ok ru̱c' i to'bal ye'o̱j chi queh take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, nqui ixok re're'.

Chalic i Jesus, naxibiraj chi je' re', je' wili xik'or reh: «Tuwe̱y, re' hat til xach'ica̱' ac'ux chiwi̱j chi coric. Je' re' nok nanibanam awu̱c' haj wilic ato'bil c'ahchi' apahkam wi̱n, nqui reh. Xa chiwach aj wo' ti i junc'am re're', re' rixk'u̱n ixok re're' xiq'uic wo' ti riya'bilal.

Chiri̱j chic ru' naxelic je i Jesus chipam take yuk'ul re're', xitok'a̱' ribehem chi̱' ma' laj ha' re' Calile̱ya ribihnal, cu rehtal xirak jenaj yu̱k' re' xjohtic johtok wi̱'. Ar ajic nok tz'uklic chic i Jesus,

yohbal wach take tinamit xic'ulic lok ru̱c' chi c'ahchi' quic'amam cho quiyowa̱b, je' ricab take me̱c co̱k, take sot', take me̱m, take ma' manlic ta wach quik'ab ch'i̱l wo' take wilic toco̱m chic quiya'bilal eh chi'nchel take yowa'i̱b re're' xicojoric chiwach i Jesus reh chi naric'sam je quiya'bilal. Je' re' ajic nok re' Jesus p'uht ric'sam quiya'bilal take c'acharel re're',

q'uihal take tinamit k'e̱' xsahchic quic'ux ru'um eh p'uht quiyeb johtok ritioxjic i Dios re' nkalok'ej wach i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Je' re' xca'n maj xquilow chi re' take me̱m quik'oric chic, re' take me̱c i co̱k quibehic chic, re' ma' manlic ta wach quik'ab xmanlajic wach eh re' take sot' xi'ilbic chic.

Nok wilco̱j chic pa ro̱x k'i̱j i kawih'ic ar, re' Jesus xojrik'o'rej cok ru̱c' i hoj cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel ru̱c' eh je' wili xik'or keh: «K'e̱' niquetelej quiwach take tinamit wili maj xi'o̱j chic pa ro̱x k'i̱j quiwih'ic ku̱c' eh yu'na ma'xta chic quiwa' quiha̱'. Chi eta nak nitak'a̱' take je chi ma' ca'nam ta quiwa', ma' nwa̱j ta maj ma' quik'ehbic nchel pan be̱h ru'um chi ma'xta chic cansil, nqui keh.
Re' hoj raj tahkanel je' wili xkak'or reh: «Ha̱w, chipam i ye'a̱b wilco̱j wi̱' ma'xta patanel. Haj enkarak cho i wi'c quetbal queh riq'uihal c'acharel wili? kojqui reh.
Chalic i Jesus xibiraj keh chi je' wili: «Jarub chi caxlan wi'c wilic awu̱c' tak? nqui keh. —Xa wuku̱b ti chi caxlan wi'c eh quib xib ti chi car wilic ku̱c', kojqui reh.
Chi je' re', re' Jesus xitak'a̱' quitz'ukunjic take tinamit re're' wach ac'al.

Chiri̱j chic re', re' Jesus xichop johtok i wuku̱b chi caxlan wi'c ch'i̱l take joxomaj car eh naxitioxej johtok reh i Dios, xixer take caxlan wi'c re're' eh p'uht riyeb take pan tak chacach, reh chi re' take nahsil raj tahkanel naquicojom chi quiwach i riq'uihal tinamit.

Je' aj re' ru', nok re' take tinamit ca'nam chic quiwa' chi suk, re' hoj cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel cu wuku̱b chic chacach til wo' nujunak chi caxlan wi'c je' ru̱c' ma' xc'uhlic ta, xkamol wach cu̱c' tinamit re're'.
Til wo' chic k'e̱' q'uihal take c'acharel xiwi'c, chi ma' xa ta wilque̱b lajeb ik'ob (4,000) xa re' take winak chi ma' cojo̱j ta pa riman take ixok ch'i̱l take ha'lac'un.
Je' re' k'uru' nok rich'akam chic je take tinamit, re' Jesus xoquic je pan cano̱wa kich'i̱l i hoj cablaj chi raj tahkanel eh xoj-o̱j chipam i tinamit Majta̱la ribihnal.

Ar chipam i yuk'ul re're', ju'jun queh take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l take junch'uk chic aj niminel reh c'uhbal re're' je' ru̱c' take ca̱' qui'sil cho aj k'ahsem si̱ Saroc, xiponic ru̱c' Jesus eh chi xa nca̱j nak chic quirakam chaj bih encalajic wi̱' chi quiwach, xquipahkaj reh chi naribanam jeno' lok' laj nawa̱l rehtalil chi re're' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric tak'amaj cho cu pan taxa̱j.
Je' re' k'uru', re' Jesus je' wili xic'u'lej take wi̱': «Re' hat-tak, nanawilow tak chi cak pa̱m i taxa̱j pan tak xik'ek, je' wili nak'or tak: ‹Holohic po' k'i̱j naribanam ikal, nqui nak'or tak.

«Je' wo', nanawilow tak pan tak wahk'ek chi muhlic pa̱m i taxa̱j, je' wo' wili nak'or tak: ‹Jab po' pa̱m i k'i̱j yu'na, nqui nak'or tak. «Wi je' aj re' na'n tak, ra̱j rik'orom chi xa hat po' tak banol awach tak maj wi narak tak chiri̱j nic' wach naribanam i k'i̱j xa ru̱c' rilmijic pa̱m i taxa̱j na'n tak, chaj wa'ric k'uru' chi ma' narak ta tak chiri̱j i c'ahchi' ribanam i Dios chipam take rik'ijil wili?

Re' hat-tak re' c'acharic na'n tak chiwach rik'ijil yu'na k'e̱' wo' chic c'ahbil ano'jbal tak chi no̱j riban je' ricab jeno' c'ahbil laj ixok chi banoj c'oyomal ru̱c' toco̱m chic winak, maj je' wili nak'or tak wi̱n: ‹Cha'n chic jeno' lok' laj nawa̱l c'uhtbal reh chi re' hat i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, nqui nak'or tak wi̱n. «Ru'um aj chi je' re' riwi̱' ano'jbal tak, re' hin ma' eta chic niban jeno' lok' laj nawa̱l chawach tak, xa re' cok haj wilic enye'eric chawach chi rehtalil, xa re' wach je' ricab xbanaric reh i raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios, re' Jonas ribihnal, nqui queh. Nok k'oro̱j chic re're', re' Jesus xicana̱' take cahnok, xelic je chipam i yuk'ul re're' chi kich'i̱l i hoj.
Nok hoj chic k'ahxanak je chi juntar ha', re' hoj cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus xkacoj rehtal chi xiq'uic pe' pan kac'ux ric'amaric cho kawa' chi sak bih.

Ru̱c' aj xkac'ul re're', re' Jesus je' wili xik'or keh: «Re' no'jbal nca'n take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l take junch'uk chic aj niminel reh c'uhbal re're' je' ru̱c' take ra̱' ri'sil cho aj k'ahsem si̱ Saroc, xa je' na ricab i camanic riban i rik'omal caxlan wi'c ncojoric chi sipsbal wach rik'oril. Ru'um aj re' chayohbalej awi̱b tak, ma̱ban aweh tak i quino'jbal ru', nqui keh.

Naxkabiraj chi je' re' i hoj raj tahkanel, je' wili p'uht kak'orom pan kac'ux: «Ha̱', re' Jesus c'ahchi' rik'orom keh wili ru'um chi xicoj chic rehtal chi ma' manlic ta kawa' xkac'am cho, nqui p'uht kak'orom.

Re' Jesus naxicoj rehtal chaj bih c'ahchi' kak'orom chikawach je' wili xik'or keh: «Re' hat-tak ma' riwi̱' ta chic chaweh tak chi xa cu china̱ wo' i wi'c no̱j acapew-bal tak. Chaj wa'ric chi ma' nach'ica̱' tak ac'ux tak chiwi̱j chi coric chi re' hin eniyew aweh tak re're', wi ekojcahnic chi ma'xta chic kawa'?

On ja' narak ta na tak chiri̱j chi wilic wajawric chi riye'eric aweh tak re're' je' ricab xniban ru̱c' i ho'o̱b chi caxlan wi'c xniquet wi̱' take c'acharel re' xiq'uic chi cablaj ik'ob lajc'ahl (5,000) q'uihal take? On xiq'uic na ti pan ac'ux tak cu jarub chic chacach chi caxlan wi'c xamol tak reh risowrahil i ho'o̱b ti chi caxlan wi'c re're'?
Je' wo', xiq'uic na ti pan ac'ux tak cu jarub chic chacach xamol tak xa reh i wuku̱b ti chi caxlan wi'c xniquet wo' wi̱' take xi̱c' chi lajeb ik'ob (4,000) chi c'acharel?

Charak tak chiri̱j k'uru' chi ma' re' ta chiri̱j i rik'omil caxlan wi'c xink'oric awu̱c' tak, til la' chiri̱j quino'jbal take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l take junch'uk chic aj niminel reh c'uhbal re're' je' ru̱c' take ra̱' ri'sil cho aj k'ahsem si̱ Saroc, nqui keh.

Cu re' aj naxik'or keh chi je' re', re' hoj raj tahkanel xkarak chiri̱j chi naxik'or chi nakayohbalem ki̱b chiwach rik'omil i caxlan wi'c, ma' re' ta po' chiri̱j re're' xk'oric, chiri̱j po' i quitijbal take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l quitijbal take aj k'ahsem si̱ je' ru̱c' take ra̱' ri'sil cho aj k'ahsem si̱ Saroc.

Nok pononak chic pan tinamit Sesare̱ya Pili̱po ribihnal, re' Jesus je' wili xibiraj keh hoj cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel: «Re' hin, hin i Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel xa re' la', chaj bih nquik'or take c'acharel chiwi̱j i hin? Hab wo' wach i hin chi quiwach ru'? nqui keh.

Re' hoj je' wili xkak'or reh: «Wilic tinamit quik'oric chi re' hat i Wa̱n re' aj kahsem ha' re' camnak chic je. Wilic wo' quik'oric chi re' hat, hat jenaj queh take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios je' ru̱c' aj najtir k'i̱j je' ricab i Eli̱yas. Wilic wo' quik'oric chi re' hat, hat i Jeremi̱yas re' aj k'orol wo' C'uhbal eh wilic wo' take quik'oric chi re' hat, hat chic jeno' queh take raj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios, nqui nquik'or, kojqui reh.
Chi je' aj re', xibiraj aj wo' chic keh chi je' wili: «Raj hat-tak, chajaric nacapaj chiri̱j nquik'or take re'? Hab wo' wach i hin chaweh hat-tak? nqui keh.
Chalic i ma' Simon re' ribihnej wo' chi Luch, je' wili xik'or reh: «Re' hat, hat rAc'u̱n i c'achlic Dios chi junelic eh re' wo' hat i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric ru'um, nqui reh.

Re' Jesus, je' wili xik'or reh: «Re' cok i hat Simon rac'u̱n i Jonas, k'e̱' ato̱b aweh maj chi xana'bej re're', ma' re' ta nchel jeno' c'acharel xye'bic aweh reht'aljic, re' la' i wAja̱w wilic cho pan taxa̱j.

Yu'na k'uru', re' take k'oric wili nanik'orom: Je' ricab til ch'iclic nic'ux chawi̱j chi re' hat Luch abihnal, til ch'iclic wo' nic'ux chi re' hin nanicowsonic quic'ux take moloj wach aj niminel wi̱n je' ricab chi china̱ ta nak abaj wili, c'ahchi' nijohsam jeno' pa̱t. Je' re' ajic, re' hin nanibanam chi re' take moloj wach aj niminel wi̱n til k'e̱' wo' chic naquich'ica̱b quic'ux chiwi̱j eh chi je' re', xa ta nak re' quimic nariwih'ic rajawric chi quina̱.

Je' wo', je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak niyeb aweh take rila̱wahil take ritz'ahpil jeno' pa̱t, je' wo' re' nanibanam chi nariye'eric aweh chi wilic awajawric chi quina̱ take c'acharel je' ru̱c' chopo̱j quina̱ ru'um i Dios re' aj k'atal k'oric cho ar pan taxa̱j. Chi je' aj re', nok wilic chic awu̱c' i awajawric re're', naribanjic wo' chi pa' wilic ma'xta ayeb k'ab queh take aj niminel re're' chi naribanaric ayu' wach ac'al, re' Dios ma'xta wo' riyeb k'ab queh ar pan taxa̱j chi naribanaric. Pa' wo' wilic na̱yeb k'ab queh chi naca'nam ayu' wach ac'al, re' Dios nariyeb wo' k'ab queh ar pan taxa̱j chi naca'nam, nqui Jesus reh ma' Luch.
Chiri̱j re', xik'or wo' keh chi kunchelal i hoj raj tahkanel chi ma' hab ta wach aj eh nakak'orom chi re're' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Xa ru̱c' aj wo' cho k'oric xik'or reh ma' Luch, re' Jesus p'uht risakomem wach keh hoj raj tahkanel chi til ajwal wach chi reh chi narojic ar Jerusalen. Je' aj wili xik'or keh: «Re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel k'e̱' nimal ti'c'axic nanic'ulum naquincansjok. Je' wo', re' niC'uhbal ma'xta wo' ric'ulmujic cu'um take nahsil chipam katinami̱t i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Je' wo' re' naca'nam take aj c'amol quibe̱h aj c'atol si̱ chiwach i Dios ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses maj curman chi chi'nchel re're' naric'ulmujic eh je' wo' chi re' hin nawuctic wo' chic cho pa ro̱x k'i̱j niquimic, nqui Jesus keh.

Nok cu re' ti pe̱t keh ribirmijic re're', re' ma' Luch xesaj lok pa reh i Jesus eh je' wili xik'or reh chi rinakaric: «Chaj wa'ric nanak'or chi je' re', Ha̱w! Chacapaj so' i Dios chi re' ta nak re're' quetelenok awach chi ma' eta nac'ul i ti'c'axic xak'or, nqui reh.

Chalic i Jesus, je' wili xik'or reh ma' Luch chi reh aj Yahm c'ahchi' rik'orom: «Telen chi niwach hat aj Yahm, nqui xik'or. Chiri̱j re' xa cow chic c'ahchi' ritz'ehtam pan nak' wach i ma' Luch, re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or: «Ma' Luch, re're' aj Yahm ncojbic cho reh capew-bal re're' awu̱c'. Ru'um aj re' ma' nacapaj ta ri̱j ribanaric haj wilic ra̱j i Dios, re' la' acapew-bal i hat riban jenaj wach ru̱c' quicapew-bal take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' nquich'ica̱' ta quic'ux chiri̱j i Dios, nqui Jesus reh.

Chiri̱j aj chic ru', re' Jesus je' wili xik'or keh hoj raj tahkanel: «Re' hab wach nariyeb ric'ux chi nitahkaljic chik'eb lok rij ric'ux nic' nimal nesenic lok reh ricapew-bal chiwi̱j i hin. Je' wo', ma' xa re' ok pan sukquilal naquiritahkem, je' la' ok wo' pan ti'c'axic je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak ritehlam ricuru̱s.

Nik'or chi je' re' maj hab wach re' xa re' sukquil c'uxlis ra̱j pa ric'acharic, ma'xta rehcham i junelic c'acharic ru̱c' i Dios, raj nchel i ma' rik'or ta bihnal ric'uluric i ti'c'axic nbanaric reh ru'um chi waj tahkanel, re're' narehcham i junelic c'acharic.
