Je' re' k'uru', ma̱yew acapew-bal tak chiri̱j nic' pa' nimal wilic aweh tak maj wi ma' xawehchaj tak i junelic c'acharic ma'xta chic jeno' ritz'akil enatojbej tak wi̱' ri̱j. Je' wo', to̱b ta yohbal wach abihomal tak wili, xa ma'xta bih eritik aweh tak, wi ma' ja' awehcham tak i junelic c'acharic naniyeb i hin naquinc'olok wo' chic lok.

Nik'or chi nanic'ulic lok maj re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel til nanic'ulic lok chi wich'i̱l rich'abquilal risakomil i wAja̱w eh chi wich'i̱l take raj tz'e' wa̱ch wilque̱b pan taxa̱j. Je' wo', re' hin nanibanam ch'ukuj k'oric chi quina̱ take c'acharel eh nanitak'a̱b wo' chi naquic'ulum i ti'c'axic take c'acharel je' ru̱c' c'ahbilal xca'n. Raj take coric xibanic, nanitak'a̱b chi naquic'ulum risukquil quic'ux.

Til coric nik'or aweh tak chi re' nic'ulic lok i hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, naric'uluric nok ye'o̱j chic wajawric chi k'atal k'oric eh wilic aweh hat-tak wilca̱t tak ayu' yu'na cu ja'xta pe aquimic tak je ma' ja' nawilow tak re're', nqui Jesus.

Nok waki̱b chic k'i̱j rik'orom cho keh chi narojic ar Jerusalen, re' Jesus xesaj lok pa reh i ma' Luch ch'i̱l Jaco̱wo ch'i̱l wo' i richa̱k' i Jaco̱wo re' Wa̱n ribihnal eh xic'am je take china̱ jenaj naht na̱ yu̱k'.

Ar ajic china̱ i yu̱k' re're', re' Jesus xo̱j riban chi toco̱m chic nca'yic rilbal chi quiwach take wich aj tahkanel re're' maj xa nch'abch'atic chic xiban je' ricab rich'a̱b i k'i̱j eh re' riso' xo̱j riban xa saksa̱k chic xa je' chic ricab i sakom riyew cho i k'i̱j.
Ar aj ru' ruhmumaj pe' chic cho quib aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios aj najtir k'i̱j, re' Moyses ch'i̱l Eli̱yas. Re' take quib re're' xi'oquic chi k'oric ru̱c' i Jesus.

Naxilow ma' Luch chi je' re', je' wili xik'or je reh: «K-Aja̱w Jesus, k'e̱' pe' tare̱t chi hoj awich'i̱l ayu'. Chayew k'ab keh k'uru' chi enkatik'a̱' xib ok chi cuc' pahpa'x. Jenaj aweh hat, jenaj reh Moyses eh jenaj wo' reh Eli̱yas, nqui reh.

Xa cu re' pe' wo' ti xicohlaj k'oric i ma' Luch, jenaj su̱tz' xa nsakomonic chic pa̱m xisutej qui̱j chi'nchel eh je' wili jenaj k'oric xbirmijic chipam i su̱tz' re're': «Re' Jesus wili til k'e̱' ti' nwic'raj maj wAc'u̱n aj nawil eh k'e̱' wo' nsukbic pa nic'ux ru'um. Chabiraj aj tak rik'orbal, nqui k'oric xbanjic cho.
Naxquibiraj re're' take xib chi kich aj tahkanel re're', xquixuc'a̱' jok qui̱b cu wach ac'al ru'um quiyo'jic xoquic cho,
xa re' la' Jesus xijil cok ri̱b cu̱c' eh naxitz'a'j take cok, je' wili xik'or queh: «Tipa̱' tak johtok. Ma' tiyo'jic tak chic, nqui queh xib kich'i̱l re're'.
Je' re' ajic naxquijohsaj johtok quilbal, ma'xta chic nquilow wach i Moyses ch'i̱l Eli̱yas, xa re' la' chic i Jesus pa'lic chi quiwach chi rutquel.

Chiri̱j chic re're', nok kajic chic nca'n cho china̱ i yu̱k' re're', re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Ma' hab pe wach aj eh nak'or tak i xawilow tak wili cu rehtal nok re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, hin ok chic uctunak cho chi quixilac take camnak, nqui xik'or queh.

Chiri̱j wili re' take xib chi kich aj tahkanel re're', je' wili xquik'or cok reh Jesus: «Ha̱w, re' hoj nkacoj wach chi re' hat i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' re' kacapew-bal i hoj xa re' la' chaj bih riwi̱' chi re' take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses nquik'or chi re' ma' Eli̱yas naric'ulic lok chi pe̱t chiwach i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric? nqui take reh.

Ar ajic re' Jesus je' wili quic'u'ljic xiban: «Coric nquik'or chi re' Eli̱yas naric'ulic lok chi pe̱t chi ribanaric chi re' take tinamit naquitik'a̱b qui̱b chi ric'uluric i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric,

xa re' la' take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ma'xta nquicoj rehtal chi xwih'ic chic chi quixilac jenaj winak re' xc'ulic chi rijelow-bal i Eli̱yas eh chi je' re' ma' xquic'ul ta chi suk re' la' chic xca'n ribanaric re' haj wilic i ti'c'axic xca̱j ca'nam reh je' ricab naca'nam wo' take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses wu̱c' i hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, nqui Jesus queh.
Ru̱c' i xik'or re're', cu re' aj ru' xquirak chiri̱j take xib chi kich aj tahkanel re're' chi naxk'oric i Jesus chiri̱j Eli̱yas chiri̱j la' po' i Wa̱n re' xkahsanic quiha̱' i tinamit, xk'oric.
Chiri̱j chic ru' jenaj winak xelic cho chi quixilac take tinamit re're' je' wili xik'or reh Jesus naxchalic rixuc'a̱' ri̱b chiwach:

«K-Aja̱w Jesus, chacuy chaquetelej wach wi̱n i wac'u̱n eh chato'bej ru̱c' resmejic lok riya'bilal. Re're' nanchalic risihkoral, k'e̱' ti'quil ric'ul eh xa pa' nk'ehbic. Wilic pech nk'ehbic pan k'a̱k' eh wilic pech nk'ehbic pan ha'.
Ru'um riya'bilal re're', xniyew chi quiwach take nahsil awaj tahkanel wili chi naquesam nak lok reh riya'bilal xa re' la' ma' xca'n ta wo' canar ru', nqui reh.

Ar ajic re' Jesus je' wili quic'u'ljic xiban take tinamit re're': «Ha̱', re' cok hat-tak tinamit, hat-tak chic cow chi rinimjic niC'uhbal ru'um jot'o̱j chic ano'jbal tak! Ma̱capaj tak nchel k'uru' chi chiwach i quib xib chic k'i̱j wilqui̱n chaxilac tak xa cu naca̱t wo' nicuyum tak ru̱c' ricowil ano'jbal tak re're', nqui chi k'ilbal queh. Chiri̱j chic ru', xik'or reh winak chi je' wili: «Chac'am cho wi̱n awac'u̱n, nqui reh.

Nok c'amoj chic cok ru̱c', re' Jesus xik'or reh ma' tob laj uxlabal chi narelic lok ru̱c' ac'un re're'. Naxelic lok i ma' tob laj uxlabal, xa chiwach wo' ti junc'am re're' xcahnic chi suk chic ric'ux ac'un re're'.

Nok re' hoj cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel Jesus xa kutquel chic wilco̱j lok, wilic take kich'i̱l je' wili xquik'or reh Jesus naxquijil cok qui̱b ru̱c': «Ha̱w, chaj wa'ric nok re' hoj ma' xka'n ta canar rit'ermejic lok i ma' tob laj uxlabal ru̱c' ac'un re're'? nqui take reh.

Chalic i Jesus je' wili xik'or keh: «Ma' xa'n ta tak lok canar resmejic ru'um chi ja' cowjonak ta acapew-bal tak ru̱c' i Dios. Wi ta re' acapew-bal tak pononak ta nak chic ricowil je' ricab riban t'uch ija' mosta̱sa ribihnal rirak ricowil nanrejbic, re' hat-tak ma'xta nak bih ma' ta nak eriban chawach. Je' ricab wi ta nak enak'or tak reh yu̱k' wili chi enelic je eh chi ar chic pan ma' laj ha' wulu' eno̱j riyew ri̱b, ma' eta nak na'n tak so' ric'axquilal resmejic je.
Je' re' k'uru' re' ena'n tak wi̱' quit'ermejic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal je' ricab take re', xa re' wach ribanaric i ti̱j ru̱c' cuyuj wi'c chiwach i Dios, nqui Jesus.

Nok wilco̱j chic ponok pa riyuk'ul i Calile̱ya, re' Jesus je' wo' chic wilic xik'or keh chiri̱j riquimic: «Re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel nanik'ahsjic pan quik'ab take c'acharel re' naquicansanic wi̱n.

Coric ru', re' take re' naqui̱nquicansam je xa re' la' pa ro̱x k'i̱j chic niquimic je, re' Dios naribanam chi nawuctic wo' chic cho chi quixilac camnak, nqui xik'or keh. Ru̱c' k'oric xiban re're' chi naricansjic, k'e̱' naxoquic cho ritz'irquilal pan kac'ux.

Chiri̱j chic ru', nok hoj chic pononak pan tinamit re' Capernahum ribihnal, re' take aj molol to̱j quicamanic chipam Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, xic'ulic lok ru̱c' ma' Luch eh je' wili xquik'or reh: «Re' awaj tijinel tak Jesus, riyew na i to̱j ncamanic chipam i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' i wach i Dios on ma' riyew ta? nqui take reh.

Chalic ma' Simon je' wili xik'or queh: «Ho̱', re' Jesus riyew i to̱j re're', nqui xik'or queh. Chiri̱j chic ru' nok hoj chic oconak cok chipam i pa̱t re' wilic wi̱' kapatal, re' Jesus xa re' wo' ti xojponic ar je' wili xik'or reh ma' Simon: «Chaj bih nacapaj hat chiri̱j wili: Nanquitak'a̱' rimoloric i to̱j take k'atal k'oric ayu' wach ac'al, hab wach aj u̱c' nquimol? Cu̱c' take wilque̱b pa ripa̱t on cu̱c' take c'acharel richop quina̱? nqui reh.

Nok rik'orom chic i ma' Luch chi re' take k'atal k'oric cu̱c' take c'acharel re' richopom quina̱ ritak'a̱' rimoloric i to̱j re're', re' Jesus je' wo' chi wili xik'or reh: «Wi re' take wilque̱b pan quipa̱t take k'atal k'oric ma' nquiyew ta i to̱j nmoloric, ra̱j rik'orom chi re' hin rAc'u̱n i Dios ma' riban ta wo' nak chi wi̱n chi eniyew i to̱j ncamanic chipam Lok' laj riPa̱t i wAja̱w,

xa re' la' nchel reh chi ma' eta quicahnic ch'i'c ku̱c', hiy yu'na chopol car chi chi̱' i ma' laj ha'. Re' pe̱t car enachop cho ru̱c' achopbal, chateh i chi̱' maj ar enarak jenaj tumi̱n manlic eritojbej ri̱j ato̱j i hat ch'i̱l i wi̱n. Je' re' k'uru' nacharak cho, chac'am cho eh chak'ahsaj queh aj molol to̱j re're', nqui Jesus reh.

Chiwach aj wo' junc'am naxicohlaj k'oric chiri̱j i to̱j ncamanic chipam i pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, re' hoj raj tahkanel xkajil cok ki̱b ru̱c' i Jesus, je' wili xkak'or reh: «K-Aja̱w Jesus, nok re' Dios re' nk'atbic cho k'oric cu pan taxa̱j, riyeb chic alok'il chi k'atal k'oric, hab wach keh hoj wili naricahnic chi pe̱t awaj to'o̱l? kojqui reh.
Re' Jesus naxibiraj re're', xik'o'rej je jenaj t'uch ac'un re' xipahba̱' pan kayejal

eh je' wili xik'or keh: «Til coric nik'or aweh tak, wi re' hat-tak ma' najal ta wach ano'jbal tak chi na̱banam tak je' ricab i t'uch ac'un wili re' ma' rinimsaj ta ti ri̱b, ma'xta awoquic tak chi rehquen rajawric i Dios re' wilic cho pan taxa̱j chi k'atal k'oric.

Chi ric'u'ljic apahkanic tak k'uru', re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi xa hab wach ma'xta rinimsam ri̱b je' ricab i t'uch ac'un wili, re're' naricahnic chi nahsil nok ye'o̱j ok chic nilok'il chi k'atal k'oric.

Je' wo' chic, re' waj tahkanel nanitak'a̱b je chi nijelow-bal curman chi naribanam chi xa ch'ublic ti wach rino'jbal je' ricab rino'jbal i t'uch ac'un. Ru'um aj re' xa hab wach nariniminic reh rik'orbal i nanitak'a̱b je chi nijelow-bal re' wo' nik'orbal i hin c'ahchi' rinimem.

«Re' c'acharel re' nyojbic ricapew-bal jeno' queh take aj tahkem wi̱n wili re' quik'ochsam chic wach i ca̱mna je' ricab i t'uch ac'un, sakbih nak chi reh chi encuturic jok pa richamil ha' chi bac'lic chi ralak chiwach jeno' ma' laj abaj ncamanic chi que'bal je' ru̱c' cu cawa̱y nc'uyu'sunic reh, maj k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal ti'c'axic nariye'eric china̱ ru'um i Dios ma' je' ta ti ricab i ti'c'axic enbanaric reh jeno' waj tahkanel.

Wi ma' nacoj ta tak wach re're', chacapaj tak chiri̱j i wili: Wi xa re' ti take tinamit ayu' wach ac'al k'e̱' ti' nquilow wach ru'um i yojoj capew-bal nbanaric chi quixilac, re' ta na chic nyojbic reh quicapew-bal take aj niminel wi̱n, ma' k'e̱' wo' chic eniq'uic na̱ ti'quilal erilow wach nachic'ul i ti'c'axic ru̱c' i Dios?

Ru'um aj re', nik'or aweh tak chi xa pa' jaric capew-bal nasjic cho pan awa̱mna tak re' nbanic chi timahcanic tak ru̱c' yojbal quic'ux awas acha̱k' tak, chawesaj lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak je' ricab nak resmejic lok awo̱k tak on ak'ab ena'n tak wi ta nak ru'um re're' ma' eta chic titak'abjic tak je chi manlic awach tak chipam i k'a̱k' re' xa koplic wo' cho chi junelic i k'i̱j sakom. Nik'or chi je' nak re' ena'n tak maj chaweh hat-tak, k'e̱' nak tare̱t chi enawesaj tak lok awo̱k on ak'ab tak, wi ta nak ru̱c' ribanaric re're' ena'n tak canar c'acharic chi junelic.

Je' wo' nak re' ena'n tak ru̱c' nak' awach tak, ewo' nak nawesaj tak lok wi ta nak ru'um ribanaric re're' ma' eta chic titak'abjic tak je chi manlic awach tak chipam i k'a̱k' re' nc'ulmujic wi̱' rinimal ti'c'axic. Nik'or chi je' nak re' ena'n tak maj chaweh hat-tak k'e̱' wo' nak tare̱t chi enawesaj tak lok i nak' awach tak, wi ta nak ru'um ribanaric re're' ena'n tak canar i junelic c'acharic.

«Ma̱nimsaj awi̱b tak chi quina̱ take c'acharel re' nca'n i no'jbal je' ricab rino'jbal t'uch ac'un wili. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re' quicha'janic queh c'acharel re're', til wilic cocbal chiwach i wAja̱w Dios ar pan taxa̱j chi aj k'orol reh chaj bih nc'uluric cu̱c', reh chi je' re' erico'lej wo' take.

Re' aj re' riwi̱' chi re' wAja̱w Dios xiritak'a̱' cho chi aco'ljic hat-tak waj niminel wi̱n. Ru'um aj re', re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, cu̱c' take tinamit re' je' take sahchel pan quimahc, xinc'ulic lok chi nanico'lem take.

Je' re' ajic, re' hin xchalic niban je' ricab eriban nak jeno' aj cha'jem me̱' wi ta nak ensahchic cho jeno' queh ho'c'ahl (100) ok rime̱' wilic reh. Ma' nacapaj ta na tak chi re' aj cha'janel me̱' re're' ericana̱' cahnok chi c'ololque̱b take belejlaj ro'c'ahl (99) chi rime̱' eh eno̱j chi risiq'uiric i risahchel me̱'? Je' re' eriban, maje'? Ma' xa re' ta wo' nak re're' eriban,

nachirak la' nak cho risahchel me̱', til nik'or aweh tak chi re' aj cha'janel me̱' re're', k'e̱' wo' nak chic ensukbic ric'ux chiri̱j i jenaj chi rime̱' erirak wo' chic cho, chiwach take ribelejlaj ro'c'ahl (99) ma' xisahchic ta.
«Re' kAja̱w Dios wilic cho pan taxa̱j ma' ra̱j ta chi xa ta nak jenaj aweh hat-tak waj niminel re' abanam tak chic je' ricab rino'jbal t'uch ac'un wili, enak'eb awi̱b tak pan mahc.

Ru'um aj re', wi xmahcanic nchel jeno' awich aj niminel tak chawach, chak'o'rej tak chi rutquel eh chak'il wo' tak pa ricorquil. Wi xiribiraj i k'ilo̱j ena'n tak reh, ma' curman ta chic chi enak'o'rej tak jeno' hab wach queh take awich aj niminel, maj ra̱j rik'orom chi xa'n tak chic canar ricorsjic wach rino'jbal awich aj niminel re're'.

Re' cok ru', wi ma' xibiraj i k'ilo̱j ena'n reh chawutquel, chak'o'rej chic jeno' on quib ok chi awich aj niminel tak, reh chi equi'o̱j chawi̱j tak chi naquibiram nic' pa' nimal wo' chic i k'ilo̱j ena'n tak reh chi quiwach. Je' re' cha'n tak reh chi ena'n je' ricab rik'or i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi cu ru̱c' quik'orbal quib on xib ok chic chi c'acharel naribirmijic wi coric on ma' coric i mahc nk'ormojic chiri̱j jeno' c'acharel.

Wi xa ta nak re' k'ilo̱j enca'n take wilque̱b ponok chawi̱j eribiraj, chac'am aj tak je chi quiwach take riq'uihal moloj wach aj niminel reh chi re' chic take re' equik'ilbic reh. Wi ma' aj wo' chic xibiraj i k'ilo̱j enca'n take moloj wach aj niminel, cahnok aj ribiral chi aj mahc chawach hat-tak chi'nchel je' ricab nok re' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ch'i̱l take aj molol to̱j ntak'abjic je ar Ro̱ma, k'oro̱j quibiral chi aj mahc take ku'um hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.

Je' aj re' cha'n tak maj re' hat-tak wilic awajawric tak. C'olok pan ac'ux tak re' xnik'or chic wili chi xa pa' jaric ma'xta ayeb tak k'ab hat-tak chi naribanaric ayu' wach ac'al, ar pan taxa̱j re' Dios ma'xta wo' riyeb k'ab eh nic' pa' nimal na̱yeb tak k'ab chi naribanaric ayu' wach ac'al, re' Dios nariyeb wo' k'ab ar pan taxa̱j.

Junpech wo' chic til nik'or aweh tak i wili: Re' Dios wilic cho pan taxa̱j, wi rilow cho chi tare̱t chaweh tak i xa pa' jaric pahkanic na'n tak chiwach chi xa jenaj wach ac'ux tak, re're' ewo' riyew cho aweh tak. Je' re' naribanam cho to̱b ta xa qui̱b ok ti aweh tak xamol awi̱b tak chi pahkanic pan ti̱j chiwach.

Nik'or chi je' re' maj to̱b ta xa quib on xib ok chi aj niminel wi̱n xquimol qui̱b chi ti̱j, wi re' take re' xquipahkaj wi̱n chi equinwih'ic cu̱c', ar wo' equinwih'ic i hin chi quixilac, nqui Jesus keh.

Naxicohlaj k'oric i Jesus, re' ma' Luch xijil cok ri̱b ru̱c' eh je' wili xik'or reh: «K-Aja̱w Jesus, cu wuku̱b na pech nanicuyum rimahc jeno' was nicha̱k' nmahcanic chi niwach, on cu jarub pech? nqui reh.
Re' Jesus je' wili xic'u'lej wi̱': «Re' awas acha̱k' ma' xa ta wukpech na̱cuyum rimahc, ma' ajlamaj ta la' pech, nqui reh.

Chiri̱j re' xik'or wo' chic reh chi je' wili: «Re' ch'ukuj k'oric riban cho i Dios cu pan taxa̱j chi aj k'atal k'oric, nanijalwachem ru̱c' i xiban jenaj k'atal k'oric re' xoquic chi ripahkaljic quic'a̱s take raj camanom.
Naxoquic chi pahkanic c'a̱s i k'atal k'oric re're', xc'amaric cok chiwach re' jenaj raj camanom xiq'uic na̱ q'uihal ric'a̱s ru̱c'.

Naxpahkaljic reh ritojoric ric'a̱s, re' aj camanom re're' ma' xiban ta chic canar ritojoric. Chi je' aj re', re' k'atal k'oric xitak'a̱' chi naric'ayjic take pa' bih wilic reh aj camanom re're'. Ma' xa re' ta re', je' la' wo' xitak'a̱' chi naric'ayjic raj camanom pan cow laj camanic ch'i̱l i rehq'ue̱n ch'i̱l wo' take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n, reh chi re' quitz'akil encamanic chi tojbal ric'a̱s,

xa re' la' aj camanom xa narixuc chic chiwach i k'atal k'oric xipahkaj ricuybal reh chi je' wili: ‹Ajabe̱s, chacuy quinawuy'ej pe chic so' ru̱c' nic'a̱s. Re' hin xa na wo' nitojom aweh, nqui xik'or reh.
«Ru'um aj re', re' k'atal k'oric re're' xiquetelej wach i raj camanom eh xitak'a̱' je chi cuyu̱j chic rimahc ru̱c' ric'a̱s.

Naxelic cho chiwach i k'atal k'oric re're', xic'uhlaj cok i jenaj rich aj camanom aj c'a̱s wo' ru̱c' i aj camanom re're'. To̱b ta nak mahnic' ti ric'a̱s i rich aj camanom, re're' xichop chi ralak eh je' wili p'uht rik'orom reh: ‹Chayew wi̱n ac'a̱s yu'na, nqui reh.
«Re' rich aj camanom je' wili rik'or reh chi xa nch'uk chic ric'ux: ‹Ha̱w, chacuy quinawuy'ej pe chic so' ru̱c' nic'a̱s. Re' hin xa na wo' nitojom aweh, nqui reh.
«Raj la' i aj camanom re' xa cu re' wo' ti xcuyuric cho rimahc, ma' xa̱j ta chic ruy'em i rich camanom chi ritojoric ric'a̱s, xic'am la' je chi xcojoric pan che̱' cu rehtal xitoj lok i ric'a̱s.
Ar ajic re' take toco̱m chic aj camanom xi'ilbic reh xiban i quich aj camanom re're', xa ti' chic pan quic'ux xponic quik'or reh k'atal k'oric nic' nimal xc'ulmujic je.

Naxibiraj i k'atal k'oric chaj bih xiban je raj camanom re're', xiyuk'ej wo' chic ru̱c' eh je' wili xik'or reh: ‹Hat c'ahbil laj aj camanom, re' hin xnicuy amahc ru̱c' riq'uihal ac'a̱s abanam wu̱c' ru'um nok xa nch'uk chic ac'ux xapahkaj wi̱n chi cu naca̱t wuy'em.
Je' ricab nok re' hin xniquetelej awach, je' wo' nak chic re' riqueteljic wach awich camanom xa'n i hat ru̱c' ric'a̱s awu̱c', nqui reh.

«Ar ajic nok yohbal wach rijosk'il xjohtic cho k'atal k'oric re're', xik'ahsaj pan quik'ab take aj cha'jem tz'ahpel reh chi naca'nam ti'c'axic reh. Je' re' xca'n ru̱c' aj camanom re're' cu rehtal xik'ahsaj chi'nchel ric'a̱s.

Je' re' k'uru', je' ricab xiban i k'atal k'oric re're', je' wo' re' naribanam i wAja̱w Dios wilic cho pan taxa̱j chi naritak'a̱b wo' cho ti'c'axic chana̱ tak wi ma' nacuy tak quimahc awas acha̱k' tak ru̱c' chi'nchel ac'ux tak, nqui Jesus keh.
Nok ricohlam chic k'oric chiri̱j i cuyuric mahc, re' Jesus xelic je chipam riyuk'ul i Calile̱ya eh xo̱j pa ric'ula't i yuk'ul i Jure̱ya re' wilic chi juntar nim laj ro̱k ha' Jortan ribihnal.
Chi quixilac take riq'uihal c'acharel quitahkanic reh, q'uihal take yowa'i̱b wilic eh ar, re' Jesus xoquic chi resmejic lok quiya'bilal.

Ar aj ru' re' wilic wi̱' i Jesus, xic'ulic lok juntuhm queh take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eh je' wili xquik'or cok reh chi xa pajbal reh chi haj ta nak encalajic ru̱c' rik'orbal chi quiwach: «Ha̱w, re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses riyew na k'ab chi jeno' winak caxa̱ra erich'ak ri̱b ru̱c' rehq'ue̱n ru'um chi xa pa' ti bih encalajic wi̱' chiwach? nqui take reh.

Chalic Jesus je' wili xic'u'lej take wi̱': «Re' hat-tak til ma' narak ta tak chiri̱j i nawilow tak chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios, chi re're' naxitik'a̱' i winak ch'i̱l ixok, wilic take k'oric rik'orom cho naxitik'a̱' take cho pan p'utbal cho reh c'acharic.

Je' aj wili wo' rik'orom cho chiqui̱j take re': ‹Ru'um aj chi re' hin xnitik'a̱' ixok chi ric'u'lil i winak, curman chi re' winak nok rirakam chic ric'u'lil ro̱k k'ab, naricana̱b wih'ic chi rehquen rajawric ritu̱t raja̱w eh re' chic ric'u'lil naric'u'lem pa ric'acharic. Je' re' k'uru' nok quic'amam chic qui̱b pan caxarahil, re' take quib chi c'acharel re're' no̱j riban chi xa jenaj chic quiwi̱', nqui rik'orom cho.

«Ru'um aj chi re' quib chi c'acharel nquic'am qui̱b pan caxarahil ma' quib ta chic quiwi̱' xa jenaj la' chic take, re' junc'uhl chi c'acharel ntununjic quiwach ru'um i Dios ma' hab ta chic wach ench'akbic quiwach, nqui Jesus queh.

Re' take cow laj aj niminel naxquibiraj re're', je' wo' chic wili xquik'or reh: «Re' Moyses xiyew k'ab chi jeno' bahilbe̱s erich'ak ri̱b chi c'acharic ru̱c' rehq'ue̱n. Re' cok ru' je' wili tak'anic xiban: ‹Jeno' winak ra̱j rich'akam i rehq'ue̱n, pe̱t chitik'a̱' jeno' hu̱j re' eritz'ihmbaj wi̱' take riwi̱' chi narich'akam wi̱' ri̱b ch'i̱l i rehq'ue̱n eh nok riyeb chic reh rehq'ue̱n i hu̱j re're', cu re' aj ru' eriban chi erich'ak ri̱b chi c'acharic, nqui cho. «Chaj wa'ric k'uru' chi je' re' xiban i Moyses? nqui take reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Coric ru', re' Moyses xiyew k'ab chi re' winak narich'akam ri̱b ru̱c' rehq'ue̱n. Je' re' xiban ru'um nok re' take ama̱m awati't tak xisip ri̱b quino'jbal chi ma' xca̱j ta chic rinimjic i Dios je' ricab wo' na'n hat-tak yu'na, xa re' la' pan ch'iquinbal cho reh c'acharic ma' je' ta re' xik'or cho Dios.

Ru'um aj re', re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi xa jenaj wo' riwi̱' wilic chi re' winak eriban chi ma' eta chic ric'am ixok re' naric'amam nak chi rehq'ue̱n. Re' aj wili riwi̱' re're': Xa re' cok i hab wach xiban lok i c'oyomal nok pahkamaj chic ru'um i winak re' naribanam nak chi ribahi̱l, xa re' wo' re' riwi̱' eriban chi ench'akaric wi̱' jeno' ixok. Je' re' k'uru' xa hab pa' wach winak re' rich'ak rehq'ue̱n eh ric'am chic jeno' toco̱m ixok chi rehq'ue̱n, nkajic pan c'oyomal. Xa ma' re' ta chic i winak re're' nkajic pan c'oyomal, je' la' wo' nanc'amaric wo' chic chi ehq'uenbe̱s re' ixok ch'ako̱j cho re're', nkajic wo' pan c'oyomal i winak re' nc'ambic reh, nqui Jesus queh.

Chiri̱j chic ru' re' hoj raj tahkanel i Jesus je' wili xkak'or reh nok ojonak chic take cow laj aj niminel re're': «Ru'um chi ma'xta jeno' riwi̱' chi re' jeno' winak erich'ak ri̱b ru̱c' rehq'ue̱n, sakbih nak chi reh chi ma' eta riban caxa̱ra, kojqui reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or keh: «Re' tijbal wili ma' chi'nchel ta quirakbic chiri̱j, xa re' wach take c'acharel re' ye'o̱j queh ru'um i Dios chi je' ricab jenaj quisi̱ chi ma' eta nca'n caxa̱ra, xa re' wo' take re' quirakbic chiri̱j.

Coric ru', wilic take ma' nca'n ta caxa̱ra ru'um chi pan casba̱l cho wilic jeno' quiya'bilal re' npitbic queh chi nca'n caxa̱ra ru̱c' jeno' ixok. Wilic wo' take ma' nca'n ta caxa̱ra je' ricab take bano̱j chi capu̱n winak chic take ru'um jeno' k'atal k'oric ru'um chi cojo̱j take chi aj cha'janel reh rehq'ue̱n. Wilic wo' take ma' nca̱j ta ca'nam caxa̱ra ru'um chi ar chic nquiyew quic'ux chiri̱j rik'ormojic chi re' Dios aj k'atal k'oric cho cu pan taxa̱j. Ru'um aj chi wilic riwi̱' chi ma' chi'nchel ta take winak ma' nquisic' ta quehq'ue̱n, xa hab wach ric'raj ri̱b chi ma' curman ta chi narisiq'uim rehq'ue̱n, cahnok wo' chi je' re', nqui Jesus keh.

Ar aj wo' pa riyuk'ul i Jure̱ya, wilic take tutbe̱s ajabe̱s xquic'am cok quiha'lac'u̱n chiwach i Jesus reh chi naricojom rik'ab chi quina̱ chi cuse'sbal queh pa riti̱j. To̱b ta nak re' hoj cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus xojcakric chi quina̱ take c'ahchi' quic'amam cok i quiha'lac'u̱n,

re' Jesus je' wili xik'or keh: «Ru'um aj chi re' Dios re' wilic cho pan taxa̱j, re're' nk'atbic k'oric chi quina̱ take quisic'bic reh nicuse'sbal je' ricab nca'n take ha'lac'un wili, ma̱k'et tak pan quibe̱h take chi naquijilim cho qui̱b wu̱c', chayew la' tak k'ab queh chi je' re' enca'n, nqui Jesus keh.
Chiri̱j re' xicoj rik'ab chi quina̱ take ha'lac'un re're' chi quicuse'sjic eh nok ricohlam chic ribanaric re're', xelic je chipam i ye'a̱b re're'.

Chipam aj wo' yuk'ul re're', jenaj c'acharel xc'ulic lok ru̱c' Jesus chi rik'ormojic reh chi je' wili: «Ha̱w ato̱b laj kaj tijinel, chak'or wi̱n, chaj bih ra̱j banaric reh chi equinehtric reh i junelic c'acharic? nqui reh.

Chalic Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Wi xa re' wo' Dios k'e̱' ato̱b, naxak'or wi̱n k'uru' chi hin wo' ato̱b, narak ta wo' nchel chiri̱j chi re' hin wilic wo' wajawric chi rik'ormojic aweh haj wilic ra̱j banaric? nqui reh. Chiri̱j re' je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh: «Reh chi na̱wehtric reh i junelic c'acharic, chac'am na̱ take tak'anic wilic chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic chipam riC'uhbal i Dios, nqui Jesus.

—Haj wilic take tak'anic nak'or re're', nqui c'acharel re're'. Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Re' wo' take wili: “Ma̱ban i cansanic, ma̱ban i c'oyomal, ma̱ban i lek', ma̱ban i chucuj k'oric chiri̱j awas acha̱k',
chalok'mej atu̱t awaja̱w, eh chac'ax wo' awas acha̱k' je' ricab ric'axaric awi̱b na'n i hat, nqui Jesus reh.

Re' c'acharel re're', re' cu q'uijol, je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Ha̱w, chi'nchel take tak'anic nak'or re're' cu pa nit'uchal nip'utum cho ric'amaric na̱. Chaj chic bih jeno' ra̱j banaric k'uru' chiri̱j lok take c'uhbal re're'? nqui reh.

Re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh: «Re' hat wi nawa̱j abanam chi manlic aj niminel reh riC'uhbal i Dios, tak chiwi̱j eh quinatahkej. Re' cok ru', chac'ayej pe cho chi pe̱t nic' pa' nimal wilic aweh eh re' ritz'akil chayew queh take niba̱' reh chi je' re' ma' xa ta je' chic ricab abihomal wilic ayu' wach ac'al enamol wach ru̱c' i Dios ar pan taxa̱j, nqui reh.

Naxibiraj chi je' re' k'oric xiban i Jesus, re' q'uijol laj c'acharel re're' xelic je ru̱c' chi xa ti' chic pa ric'ux ru'um ti' xibiraj chi naric'ayem pa' bih wilic reh maj yohbal cho wach ribihomal wilic.

Naxilow i Jesus chi je' re' xiban i q'uijol, je' wili xik'or keh hoj raj tahkanel: «Coric nik'or aweh tak, til k'e̱' nchel c'axquilal chi reh jeno' biho̱m chi enoquic chi ri'sil rajawric i Dios re' nk'atbic cho k'oric cu pan taxa̱j.

Til aj nica'pechej wo' chic aweh tak chi re' biho̱m wi ma' resaj lok chi ri̱j ric'ux i ribihomal, k'e̱' nchel c'axquilal chi reh chi enoquic chi ri'sil rajawric i Dios chi aj k'atal k'oric. Xa je' na ricab c'axquilal chi reh jeno' nim laj chicop came̱yo ribihnal chi enoquic chipam t'uch ritz'ahpil ocbal reh katinami̱t Jerusalen nok wilic i rihk, nqui Jesus.
—Wi k'e̱' nchel c'axquilal chi queh take bihomak chi equi'oquic chi ri'sil rajawric i Dios chi aj k'atal k'oric, hab wo' wach k'uru' eriban canar oquic? kojqui naxkabiraj i xik'or re're'.

Chi je' re' ajic, re' Jesus chi xa cow chic c'ahchi'co̱j ritz'ehtam, je' wili xik'or keh: «Chawach hat-tak c'acharel ma' eta riban chi hab wach c'acharel eriban canar oquic chi ri'sil rajawric i Dios chi aj k'atal k'oric, xa re' la' chiwach i Dios ma'xta bih c'axic chi ribanaric chi re' c'acharel enoquic chi ri'sil rajawric ru', nqui Jesus keh.

Chiri̱j chic ru', re' ma' Luch je' wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Ha̱w, re' cok i hoj til wo' chi'nchel pa' bih wilic keh xkacana̱' cho chi atahkaljic. Ra̱j na rik'orom k'uru' chi ru'um re're', re' Dios nariyeb rijelow-bal keh? nqui reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili xic'u'lej wi̱' i ma' Luch: «Til coric nik'or aweh chi nok uctunak chic take cho c'acharel camnak take je, re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel nanic'uhtam rinimal nich'abquilal naquinocok chi k'atoj k'oric. Ar aj ru' nok niyeb chic awajawric tak, na̱k'atam wo' tak k'oric chi quina̱ take kich c'acharel ca̱' qui'sil cho cablaj ch'uk chi tinamit tz'uhcrunak cho cu̱c' take rac'u̱n ma' Israhel.

Je' re' k'uru', re' hat-tak aj tahkanel wi̱n re' xacana̱' tak cho awaj pan pa̱t tak je' ricab take atu̱t awaja̱w tak, take awas acha̱k' tak, take awana̱b tak on awehq'ue̱n tak ch'i̱l take aha'lac'u̱n tak, on xacana̱' wo' tak cho aye'a̱b tak ru'um reh nitahkaljic, yohbal chic wach naca'nam chi je' awu̱c' chic take cho. Ma' xa ta re're' nariwih'ic aweh tak, na̱wehtric la' wo' tak reh i junelic c'acharic.

Je' wo' chic, nik'or aweh tak chi q'uihal aweh hat-tak re' ma'xta ti awa'ric tak ayu' wach ac'al, naribanam chi k'e̱' chic awa'ric tak nariwih'ic. Tz'a̱b ru' take c'acharel re' k'e̱' wo' chic quiwa'ric wilic ayu' wach ac'al, naribanam chi ma'xta chic riwih'ic quiwa'ric.

«Je' re' nik'or maj re' riwi̱' ye'o̱j co̱ch riban i Dios re' nk'atbic cho k'oric cu pan taxa̱j, til jenaj wach ch'i̱l je' ricab xiban i jenaj ajabe̱s re' cu wahk'ek ti xo̱j sic'ol mo̱sa reh camanic pa rac'a̱l.

Re' ajabe̱s re're' ajic naxirak take cho mo̱sa, xitik'a̱' wach cu̱c' chi re' tojbal nye'eric reh jenaj k'i̱j, re' wo' re' nariyeb queh eh nok rik'orom chic queh chi je' re', xitak'a̱' je take pa rac'a̱l chi camanic.
Nok je' chic beleje̱b o̱ra reh k'i̱j, re' ajabe̱s re're' xo̱j behok pan c'aybal eh naxilow quiwach take ju'jun winak wilque̱b ar chi ma'xta quicamaj

je' wili xik'or queh: ‹Chaj bih nak'eb tak wi̱' i k'i̱j ayu', tak-tak camanom chiwi̱j pan wac'a̱l eh haj pa' wilic ritz'akil acamaj tak nicapaj chi ric'ul chaweh tak re' wo' re' enac'ul tak, nqui queh. «Chi je' re', xi'o̱j wo' camanom take winak re're'.
«Naxo̱j wo' chic behok je' na cablaj o̱ra reh k'i̱j eh je' wo', je' na xib o̱ra reh k'i̱j, xirak wo' chic take ju'jun winak ma'xta bih c'ahchi'que̱b eh xic'am wo' je take chiri̱j chi camanic.

Je' na chic ho'o̱b o̱ra reh k'i̱j naxo̱j wo' chic behok, xirak wo' ju'jun chic take winak ma'xta bih c'ahchi'que̱b eh je' wili xik'or queh: ‹Chaj wa'ric ma' camanic ta na'n tak chiwach i k'i̱j wili? nqui queh.

—Ma' camanic ta nka'n maj ma' hab ta wo' wach nc'ulic k'orok kacamaj, nqui take winak re're'. «Re' ajabe̱s re're' je' wili xik'or queh: ‹Tak-tak camanom chiwi̱j pan wac'a̱l eh haj pa' wilic ritz'akil acamaj tak nicapaj chi ric'ul chaweh tak, re' wo' re' enac'ul tak, nqui queh. «Chi je' re' xi'o̱j wo' camanom take winak re're'.

Naxelic aj cho quik'i̱j take camanom, re' ajabe̱s re're' je' wili xik'or reh raj camanom ricojom chi aj ilol reh ricamaj: ‹Chatak'a̱' quic'amaric take aj camanom reh k'i̱j wili eh chatoj queh ritz'akil quicamaj, xa re' la' pe̱t chap'ut cho to̱j cu̱c' take xam xi'oquic chi camanic eh chacohlaj cu̱c' take xi'oquic chi pe̱t.
Je' wo' chic, re' take winak xi'oquic chi camanic je' na ho'o̱b o̱ra chayew queh manlic wach tojbal nye'eric reh jenaj k'i̱j, nqui reh.

«Cu re' chic ru', xi'oquic cok take wahk'ek xi'oquic chi camanic. Re' take re' ru'um chi pe̱t xi'oquic chi camanic quicapaj chi xa q'uih la' chic nariye'eric queh pan quic'ux, xa re' la' xa re' wo' ti ritz'akil i jenaj k'i̱j chi camanic xye'eric queh.
Nok quic'ulum chic quitz'a̱k take camanom re're', xi'oquic chi ric'u'tjic i ajabe̱s re're'

chi je' wili: ‹To̱b ta re' hoj xojk'uhtic chi camanic eh xkacuy ritz'a'quil i k'i̱j, re' ajabe̱s re're' xa jenaj wach ritz'akil kacamaj xiyew quich'i̱l take xa jenaj ti o̱ra xicamanic ru'um chi xam be̱h xi'oquic, nqui take.

«Re' Ajabe̱s re're' naxibiraj i chaj bih nquik'or, je' wili xik'or reh jenaj queh camanom re're': ‹Ha̱w, re' hin ma'xta bih jeno' c'ahbilal c'ahchi' nibanam aweh maj re' hat xac'u'lej na̱ wi̱n chi xa re' wo' ritz'akil i jenaj k'i̱j chi camanic naniyeb aweh chi atojbal.
Chac'am je atojbal k'uru', hiy eh ma' ti'ahnic chic cho wu̱c' chiri̱j chi xa jenaj wach tojbal nwa̱j niyeb aweh ch'i̱l take xam be̱h xi'oquic chi camanic wu̱c'.
Je' re' nik'or aweh maj re' hin pa nik'ab wilic i pa' bih nwa̱j nibanam ru̱c' nitz'a̱k, raj nchel i hat ma' riwi̱' ta chaweh chi enti'bic ac'ux ru'um chi k'e̱' hin ato̱b, nqui reh.

«Je' aj re' ru', je' ricab chi re' ajabe̱s re're' xa jenaj wach tojbal xiyew queh raj camanom, to̱b ta nchel wilic queh xi'oquic chi camanic chi pe̱t eh wilic wo' queh xi'oquic chi camanic chi xam, je' wo' re' nc'uluric awu̱c' hat-tak waj tahkanel chi re' take xi'oquic chi pe̱t be̱h chi nitahkaljic, xa jenaj wo' wach rehchjic i junelic c'acharic naca'nam quich'i̱l take cu xam nacoquic chi nitahkaljic. Re' cok ru' to̱b ta je' re' nc'uluric ru̱c' rehchjic i junelic c'acharic, ma' chi'nchel ta take c'acharel naquico'ljic. Coric ru', re' Dios riban i yuk'unic queh riq'uihal c'acharel chi naquico'ljic, xa re' la' to̱b ta wo' riyuk'ej take chi naquico'ljic, ma' q'uih ta ti take naquico'ljic chiwach i riq'uihal c'acharel ma'xta quico'ljic, nqui Jesus reh ma' Luch.
Nok kachopom chic je kabe̱h ar Jerusalen, re' Jesus je' wili xik'or keh hoj cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel nok xa kutquel chic:

«Chacoj tak rehtal, chipam i tinamit Jerusalen re' c'ahchi' kojic wi̱' wilic i jenaj re' narik'ahsjic wi̱n pan quik'ab take nahsil aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Re' take wili naquipahkam rich'ukuric ri̱j niquimic i hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel.

Ar nanik'ahsjic wo' pan quik'ab take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, re' naquise'lam pan nak' niwach, re' naquitz'uhumunic wi̱n eh re' naquijap'bic wo' wi̱n wach curu̱s. To̱b ta wo' je' re' naca'nam wi̱n, pa ro̱x k'i̱j niquimic na wo' chic wuctic cho chi quixilac take camnak, nqui keh.

Chiri̱j chic rik'ormojic ribiral keh riquimic i Jesus, re' rehq'ue̱n i Sewere̱yo xoquic cok ru̱c' i Jesus rich'i̱l take quib chi rac'u̱n eh naxixuc'a̱' ri̱b chiwach, xipahkaj reh chi naribanam jenaj ato'bil.

Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Chajaric i ato'bil nawa̱j, nqui reh. Re' ixok re're', je' wili p'uht rik'orom cok reh Jesus: «Nok wilca̱t chic chi k'atoj k'oric, chacuy Ha̱w chacoj ta take wi̱n i wac'u̱n wili chi quinahsil take awaj to'bonel, nqui reh.

Chalic i Jesus je' wili xic'u'lej wi̱': «Tu̱t, re' hat ma' narak ta chiri̱j chaj bih c'ahchi' apahkam wi̱n, nqui reh. Chiri̱j chic re', re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh quib chi ac'un re're': «Je' ricab chi curman ta nak chi wi̱n ruc'jic i c'ah laj ha' ye'o̱j pan jeno' culc, je' wo' curman chi wi̱n chi re' hin nanic'ulum i ti'c'axic re' naric'ambic je wi̱n ri'sil ac'al je' ricab naxmuhkic nina̱ pan ha' naxkahsjic niha̱'. Ena nacuy tak i ti'c'axic wilic chi nina̱ nanacapaj hat-tak? nqui queh. Nok re' take ac'un re're' xquik'or reh Jesus chi enquicuy ransil i ti'c'axic,

je' wo' chic wili xk'ormojic queh ru'um i Jesus: «Pan coric, re' hat-tak ewo' na nak nacuy tak ransil i ti'c'axic nanicuyum ransil i hin, xa re' la' hin ma' eta tinicoj tak chi quinahsil take waj to'bonel chi k'atoj k'oric maj re' take naquibanic re're', xa re' wo' take hab pa' wach chiho̱j take ru'um i wAja̱w, nqui Jesus queh.
Naxkabiraj chi je' re' i hoj riman chic aj tahkanel, xojcakric chi quina̱ i quib i kich'i̱l re're', re' xa quicha̱k' qui̱b.

Chiri̱j chic ru', re' Jesus naxojrik'o'rej chi nakajilim cok ki̱b ru̱c', je' wili xik'or keh: «Re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak nic' wach quino'jbal take k'atal k'oric ch'i̱l take caj to'o̱l naquik'atbic k'oric chi quina̱ take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Re' take re' nca̱j chi xa re' wach i tak'anic nca'n ru', xa re' wach re' curman chi naric'amaric na̱ cu'um chi'nchel,

ra̱j la' nchel chaxilac hat-tak ma' je' ta re' no'jbal na̱banam tak, je' la' wili na̱banam tak: Xa hab wach chaxilac tak ra̱j ribanam ri̱b chi nim wach, riwi̱' chi reh chi naribanam chi aj to'o̱l queh take rich c'acharel.
Je' wo' re' i c'acharel re' ra̱j chi encojoric ru'um i Dios chi aj c'amol be̱h, riwi̱' chi reh chi naribanam wo' chi aj to'o̱l queh take rich c'acharel

je' ricab nok re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, ma' xinc'ulic ta lok chaxilac tak reh chi re' ta nak hin na̱camanem tak niwach, xinc'ulic la' lok reh chi re' hin nanicamanem awach tak ru̱c' aco'ljic hat-tak chi'nchel c'acharel. Ru'um aj re' chi aco'ljic hat-tak, re' hin naniyeb nic'acharic pan quimic re' naricamanic chi je' jenaj tojbal ye'o̱j chi rijelow-bal i ti'c'axic naquic'ulum nak chi'nchel c'acharel ru'um reh nic' pa' q'uihal quimahc wilic, nqui Jesus keh.
Nok c'ahchi' kiq'uic ponok pan tinamit Jericoh ribihnal chi kich'i̱l take juntuhm chi c'acharel,

quib take sot' tz'ukulque̱b lok chi chi̱' i be̱h pan elbal lok reh tinamit re're', naxquibiraj chi c'ahchi' riq'uic ponok i Jesus ar xquiq'uer je quichi̱' chi je' wili: «Ajabe̱s Jesus ra̱' ri'sil cho k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy, chacuy chaquetelej ta wo' ti kawach chi ribanaric chi nakilbic, nqui take reh.

Ar ajic nok re' take tinamit p'uht quinakam take sot' re're' chi naquimayam ahnic, riman chic xquiq'uer je quichi̱' chi je' wili: «Ajabe̱s Jesus ra̱' ri'sil cho k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy, chacuy chaquetelej ta wo' ti kawach chi ribanaric chi nakilbic, nqui take reh.
Naxipahba̱' aj ri̱b i Jesus, xitak'a̱' quic'amaric take sot' re're' eh je' wili xik'or queh nok wilque̱b chic cok chiwach: «Chaj bih nawa̱j tak chi nanibanam awu̱c' tak? nqui queh.
—Ha̱w, re' hoj nka̱j nak chi ena'n chi ekoj-ilbic, nqui take reh.
Naxibiraj i Jesus chi je' re', xiquetelej quiwach eh xitz'a'j cok i nak' quiwach. Chiri̱j chic re', naxsakombic wo' ti pa̱m nak' quiwach take sot' re're', xi'oquic wo' ti je chi ritahkaljic i Jesus.

Nok wilco̱j chic ar pan tinamit Wetpaqueh ribihnal re' wilic je ma' naht ta je ru̱c' i tinamit Jerusalen re' wilic wo' chi rilahk' i ye'a̱b re' ribihnej “Ye'a̱b queh take tic Oli̱wo ribihnal”, re' Jesus xik'o'rej take je quib chi kich nahsil i hoj cablaj chi raj tahkanel chi naritak'a̱b je take.

Je' aj wili tak'anic xiban je queh: «Hiy tak cok chipam i tinamit wilic chi kawach wili eh nok wilca̱t tak chic cok ar, enarak tak jenaj rac'u̱n cawa̱y bac'lic ar ch'i̱l i ritu̱t. Nacharak tak, chachej tak take cho quicabchel eh chac'am take cho wi̱n ayu'.

Wi hab wach ok nchel xbirinic aweh tak chaj bih riwi̱' chi c'ahchi' achejem tak take chicop re're', chak'or tak reh chi naricamanic wi̱n hin Ajabe̱s Jesus eh chi xa re' wo' ti nanicohlam ricojoric i rac'u̱n ru' nanisolq'uim wo' chic take reh, nqui queh.
Chi je' re', xo̱j elok wach ru̱c' i Jesus i k'oric k'oro̱j cho ru'um jenaj aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios nok je' wili xk'ormojic cho reh ru'um i Dios:

“Je' wili chak'or queh chi'nchel take c'acharel aj Jerusalen re' nquibihnej cho chi aj Siyon: Chawilow tak, ar c'ahchi' ric'ulic lok i naroquic chi k'atal k'oric chana̱ tak. Re're' xa ch'ublic ti wach eh rehtalil chi ma' pan ehtil ta naroquic cho, re're' c'ahchi' ric'ulic lok awu̱c' tak chi tz'uklic china̱ jenaj chicop aj ihkom je' ru̱c' rac'u̱n cawa̱y, nqui k'oro̱j cho reh.
Chiri̱j aj chic re're', re' take quib kich'i̱l xi'o̱j chi ribanaric re' xk'ormojic je queh ru'um i Jesus.

Naxisoljic cho chi quich'i̱l chic i rac'u̱n i cawa̱y ch'i̱l wo' i ritu̱t, wilic keh hoj cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus xkacoj che'l ri̱j i rac'u̱n i cawa̱y i kajuc ro̱k tz'ih roxlo̱c' lok i kaso' eh je' wo' che'l ri̱j i ritu̱t. Chi je' aj re', re' Jesus xtz'uhkic je china̱ i rac'u̱n i cawa̱y re're'.

Nok behic chic nka'n je, chi quixilac take riq'uihal tinamit quitahkanic reh wilic take c'acharel xquiyew rilok'il i Jesus chi je' ricab jenaj k'atal k'oric naxquixoyej je pa̱m ribe̱h ru̱c' ricojoric je wach ac'al i quijuc ro̱k tz'ih roxlo̱c' lok i quiso' eh ch'i̱l wo' ricojoric je xak pac' pa ribe̱h.

Chi je' re' c'ahchi'que̱b take tinamit, je' chi pe̱t take chi kawach, je' chi xam take chiki̱j, chi cunchelal je' wili c'ahchi' quik'orom chi cow: «Kalok'ej wo' tak wach i Dios re' wilic cho ar pan taxa̱j eh kalok'ej tak wach i ra̱' ri'sil cho k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy wili. Kayew tak rilok'il k'uru' i c'ulic riban lok wili chi tak'amaj cho ru'um i Ajabe̱s Dios, nqui c'ahchi' quik'orom.

Chiri̱j chic re' naxojponic chipam i tinamit Jerusalen, q'uihal queh take c'acharel ar, naxquibiraj i ahnic c'ahchi' ca'nam take c'acharel quitahkanic keh, xi'uctubic cho chi ilo̱j eh je' wili p'uht quik'orom: «Hab wach i winak re're', re' xa q'ueric chic quichi̱' take c'acharel chiri̱j? nqui p'uht quik'orom.

Re' take c'acharel quitahkanic keh naxquibiraj re're', je' wili xquik'or: «Re' winak wili, re' i Jesus re' raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios k'oro̱j cho ribiral chi naric'ulic lok. Re're' ar nchalic pan tinamit Nasaret pa riyuk'ul i Calile̱ya, nqui take.

Ar aj chic Jerusalen, re' Jesus xoquic cok chi chi̱' i pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios. Naxilow chaj bih no'jbal nca'n take aj c'a̱y ch'i̱l take aj yaco̱l wilque̱b ar, xitok'a̱' rit'erem take lok. Je' wo', xitahch'aj je quime̱xa take aj ch'akol wach rehreh wach tumi̱n eh je' wo' re' xiban reh quitz'uka̱b take aj c'a̱y rexba̱.

Chiri̱j chic re', re' Jesus je wili xik'or queh chi'nchel take aj c'a̱y ch'i̱l take aj ch'akol wach tumi̱n wilque̱b ar: «Re' pa̱t wili lok'onbal reh Dios nok wilic. Je' re' tz'ihmbimaj pa riC'uhbal i Dios, xa re' la' hat-tak xacoj tak chi jenaj c'aybal re' nawelk'aj tak wi̱' take tinamit, nqui queh.
Ar aj wo' chi chi̱' lok i pa̱t re're', wilic take sot' ch'i̱l take si̱c xic'amjic cho ru̱c' i Jesus eh xic'saj wo' quiya'bilal.

Naxquilow aj take lok' laj nawa̱l c'ahchi' ribanam i Jesus, re' take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses k'e̱' naxchalic quic'a̱ eh xa riman chic quic'a̱ xchalic naxquibiraj chi re' take cuc' ac'un wilque̱b chipam i pa̱t re're' je' wili i k'oric c'ahchi' ca'nam: «Lok'omaj ta nak ribihnal i Jesus wili, re' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Tawiy, nqui k'oric nca'n. Je' re' ajic naxquibiraj chi je' re', re' take c'amol be̱h ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal re're'

je' wili xquik'or reh Jesus: «Ha̱w, nacoj na rehtal nquik'or take cuc' ac'un wili? Wi nacoj rehtal, chaj wa'ric k'uru' chi ma' c'ahchi' ta ak'ilim take? nqui take reh. Chalic Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Ho̱', re' hin c'ahchi' nicojom rehtal i chaj bih nquik'or take cuc' ac'un wili, xa re' la' hat-tak til ma' narak ta tak so' chiri̱j i nawilow tak pa riC'uhbal i Dios re' je' wili rik'or: “Ajabe̱s Dios, re' hat tibanic chi re' take nimak tak ac'un ixk'un, je' wo' take cu cuc'tak ti take nquibichej awach, nqui rik'or, nqui Jesus queh.
Chi je' re' xicana̱' take cahnok ar eh naxelic je pan tinamit Jerusalen, xsoljic je ar Weta̱nya re' xponic ric'saj wi̱' ak'ab.
Je' chic ikal, re' Jesus xsoljic wo' chic je ar Jerusalen eh ar nah be̱h xchalic ric'ahric.

Ru'um aj re', naxilow je wach i jenaj che̱' I̱co ribihnal re' wilic ma' naht ta chi' be̱h, re' Jesus xo̱j nak risic' reh wach i che̱' re're' xa re' la' ma'xta wo' rirak ru'um chi xa xak po' nchel hamlic reh i che̱' re're', xa je' quicab take aj Jerusalen chi xa quiwach chi aj nimem take reh riC'uhbal i Dios. Je' re' k'uru' chi rijalwachjic i ti'c'axic narichalic chi quina̱ take aj Jerusalen, re' Jesus xisihtaj i che̱' re're' ru̱c' i k'oric wili: «Yu'na ma' ne'el ikal chic na̱wachanic, nqui xik'or reh. Chiri̱j re' xchikic wo' ti i che̱' re're'.
Naxkilow chi je' re' i hoj cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel je' wili xkak'or chi xa sahchanak chic kac'ux: «Xa chi junc'am pe' ti xchikic i che̱' wili, nqui xkak'or.

Chalic Jesus, je' wili xojric'u'lej wi̱': «Til coric nik'or aweh tak chi re' hat-tak, wi til ch'iclic ac'ux tak chi ma' eta so' napoh'aj tak nech' ok, ma' xa re' ta nak richiksjic i che̱' re're' ena'n ru̱c' ak'orbal tak, yohbal la' nak wach ena'n tak ribanaric. Je' ricab wi ta nak reh yu̱k' wili enak'or tak chi narelic je ayu' eh chi ar chic pan nim laj ha' eno̱j riyew ri̱b, enak nbirinic chawach tak.
Je' re' nik'or aweh tak maj re' nic' pa' nimal enapahkaj tak pan ti̱j, ewo' nac'ul tak wi til ch'iclic ac'ux tak chiwi̱j, nqui keh.

Nok hoj chic pononak chi chi̱' i pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, re' Jesus xoquic chi c'uhtunic cu̱c' take tinamit. Ar ajic, re' take c'amol quibe̱h aj c'atol si̱ ch'i̱l take nahsil chipam tinamit xi'oquic cok ru̱c' Jesus eh je' wili xquik'or reh: «Hab wach aj u̱c' nchalic awajawric re' nacoj chi c'uhtunic cu̱c' take tinamit? Hab wach xpahbanic aweh chi wilic awajawric? nqui take reh chi xa cakranak chic take.
Chalic Jesus, je' wili xic'u'lej take wi̱': «Tare̱t, re' hin enik'or aweh tak haj nchalic wi̱n i wajawric chi c'uhtunic, xa re' la' quinac'u'lej pe tak cho ru̱c' i pahkanic nanibanam aweh tak wili:

Chak'or tak cho wi̱n, re' kahsanic ha' xiban i Wa̱n queh tinamit, cu ru̱c' na Dios xchalic rik'ormojic on xa pa ric'ux xchalic? nqui queh. Naxquibiraj chi je' re', re' take re' je' wili p'uht quik'orom chi quiwach: «Wi xkak'or reh chi cu ru̱c' Dios xchalic rik'ormojic, erik'or keh chi chaj wa'ric ma' xkanimej ta.
Wi nchel xkak'or reh chi xa pa ric'ux xchalic, ekoj-oquic pan yohbal cu̱c' i tinamit maj chi queh riq'uihal i tinamit re' Wa̱n xwih'ic chi jenaj aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios, nqui take chi quiwach.

Je' aj re' ru', re' take nahsil re're' je' wili ric'u'ljic i Jesus xca'n cok: «Ma' keht'alim ta hab wach u̱c' xchalic rik'ormojic i kahsanic ha' xiban i Wa̱n, nqui take reh. Chi je' re' k'uru', re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' hin ma' eta wo' nik'or aweh tak haj chalic wi̱n i wajawric chi c'uhtunic, nqui queh.

Chiri̱j wili re' Jesus je' wo' chi wili xik'or: «Chaj bih nacapaj tak chiri̱j i jenaj ribiral wili? Junpech jenaj ajabe̱s re' wilic qui̱b rac'u̱n je' wili xik'or reh pe̱t rac'u̱n: ‹Ac'un, yu'na nwa̱j chi nawojic camanom chipam i wac'a̱l, nqui reh.
«Re' ac'un re're' je' wili xik'or reh raja̱w: ‹Ma'xta ha̱w, re' hin ma' nwa̱j ta camanic, nqui reh. «Raj la' i ac'un re're' naxicapaj ri̱j chi ma' holohic ta xiban, xo̱j wo' riban ricamaj i raja̱w.

Chiri̱j chic ru', re' ajabe̱s re're' ru̱c' chic i ricab ac'un xo̱j k'orok. Re' ac'un re're' naxk'ormojic reh chi narojic camanom, xa suk chic pa ric'ux je' wili xik'or reh raja̱w: ‹Tare̱t ha̱w, re' hin eno̱j niban acamaj, nqui reh. «Raj la' i ac'un re're' to̱b ta je' re' xik'or reh raja̱w, ma' xo̱j ta wo' camanom.

Chaweh hat-tak k'uru', hab wach queh qui̱b ac'un re're' xinimej rik'orbal i raja̱w? nqui Jesus queh nahsil re're'. Re' take re' xquik'or reh Jesus chi re' wo' i pe̱t ac'un xniminic reh rik'orbal ajabe̱s maj re're' xo̱j riban i camanic ra̱j i raja̱w. Chi je' re' ajic, re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Til coric nik'or aweh tak chi re' pe' nchel take aj molol to̱j ntak'abjic je Ro̱ma ch'i̱l take c'oyo̱m laj ixok pe̱t take chawach tak chi oquic ri'sil ro̱k k'ab i Dios chi k'atal k'oric.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' xquinimej i c'uhbal chiri̱j nic' wach ricorquilal i c'acharic ra̱j i Dios, re' xc'ulic rik'or i Wa̱n. Raj nchel hat-tak re' ma' xatniminic ta tak reh c'uhbal re're', to̱b ta xawilow tak chi re' take c'acharel re're' c'ahchi' quinimem i c'uhbal, xa ma' xa jal ta wo' tak wach ano'jbal tak chi rinimjic i c'uhbal re're', nqui Jesus queh take c'amol be̱h re're'.

Chiri̱j chic ru', re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Chabiraj tak chi coric i jenaj chic jalwach k'oric wili: Junpech jenaj ajabe̱s xitic pa̱m i rac'a̱l chi u̱wa. Nok ritiquim chic pa̱m, xicoj pan cora̱l i rac'a̱l re're' eh xitik'a̱' jenaj yitz'bal u̱wa chipam. Je' wo' xijohsaj jenaj naht na̱ pa̱t cha'jbal reh wach ritic. Chiri̱j aj chic re', xiyew cahnok chi quimel queh ju'jun aj camanom re' naquicha'janic cahnok reh wach ritic eh xitik'a̱' wo' cahnok wach cu̱c' chi naquiyejalem wach i ritic re're' nawachanok cho. Nok ribanam chic cahnok i tik'inic re're' cu re' aj ru' xo̱j chi naht i ajabe̱s re're'.

«Naxirak aj cho rik'ijil rik'ahsjic wach i tic, re' ajabe̱s re're' xitak'a̱' cho juntuhm raj tz'e' wa̱ch cu̱c' take aj quimel riye'a̱b chi ric'uluric i haj pa' wilic i tiklic wach chi narehtric i ajabe̱s re're',

xa re' la' take aj quimel ye'a̱b re're', naxquilow chi xi'o̱j c'olok take aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' chi quiju'junal, wilic queh xquichop chi ribanjic ti'c'axic queh. Wilic take xquich'eylom je, wilic xquik'ojobej je chi abaj eh wilic xquicansaj je.

To̱b ta je' re' xca'n take aj quimel ye'a̱b re're', re' ajabe̱s xa cu xitik wo' ju' ritak'abjic take cho pa reh chic raj tz'e' wa̱ch cu̱c', xa re' la' xbanjic wo' chic ti'c'axic queh je' ricab xbanjic queh take pe̱t.

Cu chiri̱j aj chic re', re' chic i rac'u̱n xitak'a̱' cho i ajabe̱s re're' chi je' wili c'ahchi' rik'orom pa ric'ux: ‹Re' cok i wac'u̱n wili til naquiyohlem wach naponok cu̱c' take aj camanom re're', nqui pa ric'ux.

«Chaj nawa̱j reh ru' naxquilow take aj quimel ye'a̱b chi xo̱j c'olok i ac'unbe̱s, je' wili p'uht quik'orom chi quiwach: ‹Chawil tak, re' wulu' narehchenic reh ye'a̱b wili. Kacansaj tak cho reh chi re' hoj nakehchenic reh ye'a̱b wili, nqui take chi quiwach.
«Chi je' re' xquichop ac'unbe̱s re're', xquikerej lok chiri̱j i ye'a̱b re're' eh xquicansaj wo' je.

«Chi je' aj re' xca'n take aj camanom re're', re' hin nwa̱j nibiram aweh tak i wili: Nasoljok cho ajabe̱s re' aj ehcham ye'a̱b re're', chaj bih nacapaj tak chi naribanam queh take aj quimel ye'a̱b re're' ru̱c' xca'n ribanaric? nqui Jesus queh take c'amol be̱h re're'.

Re' take c'amol be̱h re're' je' wili xquik'or: «Re' ajabe̱s re're' chi ma'xta chic so' riquetelbal chi quina̱, naritak'a̱b quicansjic take c'ahbil laj aj quimel ye'a̱b eh queh chic take toco̱m aj quime̱l nariyeb riye'a̱b. Re' take re' naponok rik'ijil chi nariwachanic cho i tic, til naquiyeb reh haj wilic i tojbal ri̱j riye'a̱b k'oro̱j queh, nqui take reh.

Ru̱c' re're', re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Chaj bih nac'ul tak chi ma' narak ta tak chiri̱j i nawilow tak wach chipam i Lok' laj hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios? maj ar je' wili rik'or: “Re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel nakilow tak chi re' cajtz'u'c laj ma' laj abaj ma' cojo̱j ta pa riman cu'um take toco̱m chic aj tz'ako̱l, re' chic re' xoquic chi pe̱t ma' laj abaj ch'iquinbal cho reh ricajtz'u'c i pa̱t wili, til wo' chic sahchok kac'ux ru'um i kAja̱w Dios maj til wo' re're' xchihbic wach chi je' re' xicamanej, nqui rik'or.

«Chi je' re' rik'or riC'uhbal i Dios, re' hin til nik'or aweh tak chi naquinocok chi k'atoj k'oric, ma' re' ta chic chana̱ hat-tak naniyeb nilok'il chi k'atal k'oric, chi quina̱ la' chic take tinamit re' nca'n take bano̱j re' nc'utunic lok wi̱' chi wilque̱b chic chi rehquen wo̱k nik'ab.

Je' wo', til nik'or aweh tak i wili: Je' ricab chi xa hab wach jeno' enk'ehbic cho cu naht johtok eh enc'ulic kajok china̱ abaj re' ma' cojo̱j ta pa riman, xa xerxer chic encahnic on je' ricab nok hab wach enk'ehbic cho ma' laj abaj re're' china̱, ma' eta chic nc'utunic wach, je' wo' re' nanibanam i hin nanisacham wo' quiwach take nquik'ihtaj qui̱b chi niwach, nqui Jesus queh aj c'amol be̱h re're'.
Ar ajic re' take aj c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ ch'i̱l take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, naxquirak chiri̱j chi re' jalwach k'oric xquibiraj ru̱c' Jesus, chiqui̱j xk'oric,

xca̱j nak quichopom i Jesus chi ricansjic xa re' la' to̱b ta wo' xquirak nak nic' wach richopjic naca'nam, ma' xquichop ta wo' chic ru'um chi quiyo'jic chi quiwach i tinamit c'ahchi' quibirinic reh Jesus maj chi queh ru', re're' jenaj aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios.
Naxip'ut wo' chic k'oric cu̱c' take aj c'amol be̱h re're' pan jalwach k'oric, re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh:

«Re' quiyuk'unjic take c'acharel riban i Dios re' nk'atbic cho k'oric cu pan taxa̱j, reh chi naquic'ulum ric'axbal, nanijalwachem ru̱c' i riyuk'unic ula̱' xiban i jenaj ajabe̱s k'atal k'oric reh chi naquiwih'ic pan nink'i̱j reh ricaxarahil rac'u̱n.
Nok xirak chic ri'orahil i nink'i̱j, re' ajabe̱s re're' xitak'a̱' je take raj tz'e' wa̱ch chi quiyuk'unjic take rula̱' xa re' la' take ula̱' re're' ma' xquic'u'lej ta cho na̱ chalic.

Nok ma' xc'u'ljic ta cho na̱ quik'orbal take pe̱t aj tz'e' wa̱ch, re' ajabe̱s je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh toco̱m chic raj tz'e' wa̱ch: ‹Yu'na re' chic hat-tak hiy tak cu̱c' take wula̱' eh chak'or tak cho queh chi je' wili: Re' ajabe̱s xicansaj chic take richico̱p ch'i̱l take k'ena' laj ma̱s wacax eh xitik'a̱' chic i nink'i̱j. Tak-tak k'uru' maj tiklic chic chi'nchel tiquirok tak queh, nqui ajabe̱s re're'.

«Raj la' take ula̱', xa ta nak ru'um chi je' re' xponic k'ormojok queh xquic'u'lej cho na̱ i chalic, chi quiju'junal la' xquisic' quilahtz'il chi quiwach. Je' re' nok, wilic queh take yuk'umaj re're' xi'o̱j pan cabi̱x. Wilic xi'o̱j chi rilmijic quic'a̱y.
Wilic wo' take xquichop cho take aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' eh xquik'ojobej take cho cu rehtal xquicansaj take je.

Ru'um aj re', re' ajabe̱s k'atal k'oric re're' naxibiraj i quibano̱j take ula̱' re' xicansanic cho queh take raj tz'e' wa̱ch, xchalic ric'a̱ eh xitak'a̱' je take riso̱l chi risacharic quiwach take aj cansanel re're'. Je' wo' re' xiban ru̱c' i quitinamital xisach wo' wach naxitak'a̱' cho aj c'atol reh.

Chiri̱j chic ru', re' ajabe̱s re're', je' wili xik'or queh toco̱m chic raj tz'e' wa̱ch: ‹Re' take niyeb chiqui̱j chi naca'nam nak quiwa' quiha̱' wu̱c' ma' xquic'u'lej ta cho na̱ chalic to̱b ta nak xnitik'a̱' chic i wi'c reh caxarahil wili.
Ru'um aj re' nipahkaj aweh tak chi hiy tak pan tak be̱h re' nquimol wi̱' qui̱b take tinamit eh chayuk'ej tak take cho pan caxarahil xa hab pa' wach enarak tak cho ar, nqui queh.

«Je' re' k'uru' ru̱c' quiponic chi'nchel take ula̱' re're', xnujic pa̱m ripa̱t i ajabe̱s re're' cu'um riq'uihal rula̱' je' chi holohic quino'jbal, je' chi ma' holohic ta, re' k'orel nic' pa' q'uihal xiponic yuk'unjok cho cu'um take aj tz'e' wa̱ch ar pan tak be̱h.

Chipam aj wo' nink'i̱j re're', re' ajabe̱s k'atal k'oric naxoquic cok pan pa̱t chi quiliric take tinamit wilque̱b ar xilow chi jenaj winak wilic cok ar ma' ricojom ta riso' re' xye'eric reh, reh caxarahil.

Re' ajabe̱s re're' je' wili xik'or reh winak re're': ‹Ac'uh, nic' wach naxatoquic cho ayu' chi ma' acojom ta aso' xye'eric aweh reh caxarahil? nqui reh. «Re' winak re're' ma' xc'u'lunic ta naxbirmijic reh re're'.

Ru'um aj re', re' k'atal k'oric je' wili xik'or queh take aj ilol ula̱': ‹Chabac' tak wi̱n i winak wili eh chacut tak lok chipam rik'ekomil ak'ab wili je' ricab naquicuturic take lok wi̱' aj mahc pan k'ekom laj ye'a̱b nquic'ul wi̱' rinimal ti'c'axic, nqui k'atal k'oric re're'.

«Ru̱c' aj jalwach k'oric wili nrakmajic chiri̱j chi ma' chi'nchel ta take c'acharel naquico'ljic. Je' re' nik'or maj pa ricorquil re' Dios queh q'uihal chi c'acharel c'ahchi' ribanam i yuk'unic reh chi naquico'ljic, xa re' la' ru' to̱b ta re' Dios xichih take c'acharel chi naquico'ljic, ma' q'uih ta wo' ti take naquico'ljic chiwach take ma'xta quico'ljic, nqui Jesus queh.

Nok cu wilic pe wo' i Jesus chi chi̱' pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xquitik'a̱' wach chi quiwach nic' wach ricojoric rimahc i Jesus naca'nam xa ru̱c' jeno' k'oric encalajic wi̱' chi quiwach.

Nok quitik'a̱b chic wach quino'jbal, re' take cow laj aj niminel re're' xquitak'a̱' cok ru̱c' Jesus quib xib chi aj tahkem reh quic'uhbal. Je' re' ajic chi ihch'ilimaj take cu'um quib xib chi winak re' Herorya̱no ribihnal quicomonil, re' take tahkamaj cok re're' je' wili xquik'or reh Jesus: «Ha̱w aj tijinel keh, re' hoj keht'alim chi xa coric wo' wach k'oric na'n eh ru'um re're' ru̱c' coric wo' wach k'oric nac'uhtaj i c'uhbal nc'ambic quibe̱h take c'acharel chi naquiponic ru̱c' i Dios. Je' wo' keht'alim chi re' hat ma' nachih ta wach take c'acharel quibirinic reh coric awu̱c' ru'um chi nayohbalej awi̱b xa chi'nchel la' nac'ul take awu̱c' maj chawach i hat xa jenaj wach quiwa'ric take c'acharel.

Je' re' nok, chaj bih nak'or keh chiri̱j i wili: Re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, riyew na k'ab keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi nkayew i to̱j tak'amaj ritojoric ru'um i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma? Cu nakatikim ta wo' ti ju' ribanaric i to̱j re're' on ma'xta chic? nqui take reh.

Re' Jesus chi reht'alim cho i c'ahbil laj no'jbal wilic cho pan quicapew-bal, je' wili xik'or queh: «Ha̱', re' hat-tak xa hat-tak banol awach tak ru̱c' apahkanic tak wili, xa sic'bal reh chi xa haj ta nak equincalajic chawach tak ru̱c' jeno' k'oric, nqui queh.
Chiri̱j re' je' wili xik'or queh: «Charak tak ti cho wi̱n jeno' tumi̱n re' nye'eric chi to̱j reh k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma, nqui queh. Naxquiyew je reh,
re're' je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Hab wach aj eh i wachbal ch'i̱l i bihnal wilic chiwach i tumi̱n wili? nqui queh.

—Reh k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma, nqui take reh. Chi je' re', re' Jesus je' wo' wili xik'or queh: «Haj pa' wilic i k'oro̱j chi reh i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma, re' wo' re' chayew tak reh eh haj pa' wo' wilic i k'oro̱j chi reh i Dios, re' wo' re' chayew tak reh ru', nqui Jesus queh tak'amaj take cok re're'.
Chi je' aj re' chi xa tz'e'tz'e' chic quiwach ru̱c' i c'u'lunic xiban i Jesus, re' take re' xquicana̱' cahnok eh xi'o̱j chi ma' xca'n ta wo' canar ricojoric jeno' rimahc.

Chiwach wo' take k'i̱j re're' wilic take junch'uk chic aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses je' ru̱c' ra̱' ri'sil take cho aj k'ahsem si̱ Saroc, xi'o̱j c'olok ru̱c' i Jesus. Re' take re', re' ma' nquicoj ta wach cuctic cho take camnak xca'n jenaj pahkanic reh.

Je' aj wili i pahkanic xca'n cok reh: «Ha̱w kaj tijinel, chipam jenaj queh hu̱j xitz'ihmbaj i Moyses rik'or chi jeno' asbe̱s ac'un nquimic je chi ma' ja'xta cahnok riha'lac'u̱n ru̱c' i rehq'ue̱n, tanlic chiri̱j i chak'be̱s ac'un chi narehq'uenem cahnok rehq'ue̱n i ras reh chi enwih'ic quiha'lac'u̱n ch'i̱l i cahnel ixok re're' eh chi je' re' ma' eta no̱j sahchok wach ribihnal i asbe̱s ac'un camnak je.

Wi je' re' tz'ihmbimaj, chaj bih naquicahnic wi̱' take wuku̱b chi ac'un re' je' wili xquic'ul chi kaxilac i hoj? Pan jenaj cho k'i̱j re' asbe̱s ac'un xiban caxa̱ra ru̱c' jenaj ixok xa re' la' naxirak cho rik'ijil riquimic, xquimic je chi ma' jeno' riha'lac'u̱n xwih'ic. Chi je' aj re', re' ricab ac'un chi nimbal reh i tz'ihmbimaj cahnok ru'um i Moyses, xiban caxa̱ra ru̱c' rehq'ue̱n i ras,

xa re' la' re' ricab ac'un re're' xquimic wo' je chi ma'xta cahnok riha'lac'u̱n ru̱c' ixok re're'. Chiri̱j chic ru', xc'amaric wo' chic ixok re're' ru'um i ro̱x ac'un, xa re' la' xquimic wo' je chi ma'xta wo' nwih'ic cahnok riha'lac'u̱n ru̱c' ixok re're'. Je' aj re' ru', chi'nchel take wuku̱b chi ac'un re're' quehq'uenej ixok re're', xa re' la' chi'nchel xiquimic je chi ma'xta cahnok quiha'lac'u̱n ru̱c'.
Nok camnak chic take je chi'nchel chi wuku̱b chi ac'un re're', xponic wo' rik'ijil chi xquimic wo' je ixok xquehq'uenej cahnok take wuku̱b chi ac'un re're'.

Chak'or keh k'uru' ajabe̱s Jesus, chaj bih naquicahnic wi̱' take wuku̱b chi ac'un re're' pa rik'ijil cucsbal cho take camnak? Hab wo' wach queh ru' narehchenic reh ixok re're'? Je' re' nkabiraj aweh maj chi'nchel xquehq'uenej cahnok ixok re're', nqui take reh Jesus chi c'ahchi' nak cuy'em chi re' Jesus eta nak erik'or chi wilic banoj c'oyomal ar pan taxa̱j eh ru̱c' re're' enak ti nquitz'ak rimahc.

Naxibiraj i Jesus chi je' re', je' wili quic'u'ljic xiban: «Ma' riwi̱' ta nak'or tak chi je' re'. Re' hin nwilow chi ma' narak ta tak chiri̱j i rik'or chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios. Je' wo', ma' wo' narak ta tak chiri̱j chaj bih til nchol ribanaric i Dios ru̱c' rinimal wach rajawric.

Ru̱c' acapew-bal tak re're', re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi re' ixok re're' ma' hab ta wach narehchenic reh chi ehq'uenbe̱s maj naqui'uctok wo' chic cho take camnak chi naquic'acharic ru̱c' i Dios, re' take c'acharel caxa̱ra take naxiquimic je ma'xta chic quic'acharic chi quic'u'lil co̱k quik'ab qui̱b je' ricab naxiwih'ic wach ac'al eh re' take ma' caxa̱ra ta take naxiquimic je naquicahnic chi je' re' quiwi̱' maj ar pan taxa̱j chi'nchel take c'acharel naca'nam chi je' chic ricab quiwi̱' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios chi re' take re' wilque̱b chi junelic chi ma' nca'n ta caxa̱ra.

Ma' xa re' ta re' ma' narak ta tak chiri̱j, je' la' wo' ma' narak ta tak chiri̱j i nawilow tak chipam i Lok' laj riC'uhbal i Dios chiri̱j ribiral cuctic take cho camnak. Je' re' nik'or maj ar rik'or chi re' Dios je' wili rik'or:

“Re' hin, hin i Dios rilok'ej niwach i ma' Awraham ch'i̱l i ma' Isahac eh ch'i̱l wo' i ma' Jacow, nqui k'oric xiban i Dios. «Ru̱c' aj k'oric re're', re' Moyses xic'uhtaj chi re' Dios, nlok'onjic wach cu'um take quic'acharic wo' chic cho, ma' re' ta nchel cu'um take ma' quic'acharic ta chic cho, nqui Jesus queh winak re're'.

Nok quibiram ok chic chaj bih c'u'lunic xiban i Jesus queh aj niminel je' ru̱c' ra̱' ri'sil take cho aj k'ahsem si̱ Saroc, re' take c'acharel wilque̱b ar xquitik ju' ribirmijic i c'uhtunic riban Jesus chi xa sahchanak chic quic'ux,

raj la' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses naxquibiraj chi re' Jesus xitz'ap je quichi̱' take winak re're', xquimol wo' chic qui̱b chi cunchelal chi ritik'mijic wach jeno' pahkanic encalajic wi̱' chi quiwach i tinamit.

Ar ajic chi quixilac take c'ahchi' quibirinic reh, wilic wo' jenaj winak je' ru̱c' aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xiban cok jenaj ripahkanic reh Jesus xa pajbal ti reh chi haj ta nak encalajic ru̱c' take k'oric riban:
«Ajabe̱s kaj tijinel, haj wo' wilic i tak'anic tz'ihmbimaj chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses til ajwal wach chi naric'amaric na̱? nqui cok reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Re' wo' i tak'anic je' wili rik'or: “Re' hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ti' chawic'raj tak i Ajabe̱s Dios nalok'ej tak wach. Til chac'ax tak ru̱c' chi'nchel ac'ux tak, ru̱c' chi'nchel awa̱mna tak eh je' wo' re' ru̱c' chi'nchel acapew-bal tak, nqui rik'or.
«Re' aj re' i pe̱t c'uhbal re' til ajwal wach chi narinimjic
ch'i̱l wo' i jenaj chic c'uhbal til ajwal wo' wach wili: “Chac'ax awas acha̱k' je' ricab ric'axaric awi̱b na'n i hat, nqui rik'or.

«Je' re' ajic re' take qui̱b c'uhbal re're' ajwal wach rinimjic ru'um nok re' take re' quira'il toco̱m chic take C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l wo' i quic'uhbal take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios, nqui Jesus reh.
Chi quimolom chic qui̱b ru̱c' Jesus q'uihal take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, re're' je' wili birinic xiban queh:

«Chaj bih nak'or tak chiri̱j i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric re' c'ahchi' awuy'em tak chi naric'ulic lok? Hab wo' wach aj ra̱' ri'sil cho reh nanak'or tak? nqui queh. Re' take re' xquik'or cok reh chi ra̱' ri'sil ti cho ma' Tawiy.

Ar ajic re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Wi re' k'atal k'oric re're' xa ra̱' ri'sil ti cho ma' Tawiy, chaj bih riwi̱' k'uru' chi re' ma' Tawiy xik'or chi re' k'atal k'oric re're', re' i Ajabe̱s china̱? Je' re' nik'or maj najtir k'i̱j re' k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy chi ye'o̱j rik'orbal ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios je' wili xik'or chiri̱j:

“Re' Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Dios je' wili xik'or reh Ajabe̱s chi nina̱ re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric: ‘Je' ricab naric'ul rilok'il jeno' winak ntz'ukunjic cok chi riche̱l jeno' k'atal k'oric, je' aj wo' re' nachac'ul i hat alok'il wili: Chi na̱wih'ic chiniche̱l cu rehtal nawilow chi re' take awaj ixowonel naquiwih'ic ri'sil awo̱k, nqui xk'ormojic reh, nqui ma' Tawiy.

«Je' re' ajic wi re' ma' Tawiy Ajabe̱s chi nina̱ nqui rik'or reh k'atal k'oric re're', nic' aj wach k'uru' nanquik'or take aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal chi re' rilok'il i k'atal k'oric re're', xa je' ti ricab rilok'il cho jeno' queh ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Tawiy? nqui Jesus queh take cow laj aj niminel re're'.

Naxquibiraj i k'oric xik'or, re' take re' ma' xca'n ta chic cok canar ric'u'ljic i Jesus. Xa re' aj wo' cho wach ru', ma' cu ta chic xca̱j quiminim qui̱b pan c'axquilal ru̱c' pahkanic nca'n cok reh Jesus.
Chiri̱j chic k'oric xiban cu̱c' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, re' Jesus je' wili p'uht rik'orom keh hoj raj tahkanel ch'i̱l take tinamit hoj quihch'ihlem:
«Ru'um chi re' aj wo' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses nquic'uhtaj take cow laj aj niminel ch'i̱l wo' take aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal re're',

re' hat-tak chanimej tak i nic' pa' nimal i c'uhbal naquik'orom aweh tak chi na̱c'amam tak na̱, re' cok ru' ma̱ban aweh tak i no'jbal je' ricab nca'n take winak re're' chi xa re' rik'ormojic nca'n eh raj la' i ribanaric i c'uhbal nquic'uhtaj ma' nca'n ta.

Ma̱ban aweh tak nca'n take re' k'uru' maj je' ricab chi jeno' winak ma' ra̱j ta ricojom so' rik'ab chi ritobjic i raj ihkom re' rihamej je ahl laj ihk chiri̱j, je' wo' re' take winak re're' xa ta nak nquic'am na̱ take yohbal wach c'uhbal c'axic ric'amaric na̱ nquihamej chi quina̱ take tinamit.

Wi nchel nquic'am na̱, xa c'uhtbal quiwach chi quiwach take tinamit nanquic'am na̱. Je' aj re' riwi̱' nok k'e̱' suk queh ripixiric yejal tak quiwach on watak quiteleb take cuc' c'ola̱b tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' take ju'jun ch'ihl ok chi C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Je' aj wo' re' riwi̱' chi k'e̱' suk queh rinimsjic ro̱k quiso' ru̱c' take bolobak laj xoybal nquicoj chi chi̱'.

Naqui'o̱j pan tak pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, on naqui'o̱j wo' pan jeno' pa̱t re' yuk'umaj take wi̱' chi wi'c, k'e̱' nponic chi quiwach i tz'uhkic re' quitz'uhkic wi̱' take nimak quiwach.

Je' wo' k'e̱' nponic chi quiwach chi quic'alenjic cu'um take tinamit watak c'aybal chi nimak quiwach. Re' take re' k'e̱' wo' suk queh chi je' wili nk'ormojic queh chi ye'bal quilok'il: ‹Ajabe̱s kaj tijinel, nqui nk'ormojic queh.

«Raj hat-tak, ma̱c'ax tak wach chi je' re' enk'ormojic aweh tak. Nik'or chi je' re' maj re' hat-tak, xa jenaj wo' Ajabe̱s aj tijinel wilic chaxilac tak eh re're', re' hin Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Chi je' aj re', re' hat-tak xa awas acha̱k' awi̱b tak eh xa jenaj awi̱' tak chi niwach.

Je' re' ajic ma' hab wach wo' queh aj tijinel wilque̱b ayu' wach ac'al enak'or tak reh chi Ajabe̱s. Je' re' nik'or maj xa re' wo' i hin ch'i̱l i wAja̱w Dios re' wilic cho pan taxa̱j, tanlic chiki̱j chi enk'ormojic keh chi Ajabe̱s.

«Chi xa re' wo' hin Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, wilqui̱n chaxilac tak chi Ajabe̱s aj tijinel, ma̱c'u'lej tak na̱ hat-tak k'uru' chi enk'ormojic aweh tak chi Ajabe̱s aj tijinel chi xa nimsbal awach tak.

Re' la' hat-tak chasic' tak chi re' ok i Dios ye'bok alok'il tak. Ru'um aj re' nik'or chi re' hab wach ra̱j chi nariye'eric rilok'il ru'um i Dios eh ra̱j wo' chi en-nimsjic wach, chilow take ras richa̱k' je' ricab riban jeno' aj tz'e' wa̱ch.

Ma̱sic' tak k'uru' i lok'il nquiyew take c'acharel maj xa hab wach risic' i rilok'il ayu', re' Dios narimak'am i rilok'il re' nak nariyeb reh. Raj nchel re' xcahnic chi ma'xta rilok'il ru'um ta chi re' ta nak re' c'ahchi' risiq'uim cu̱c' take c'acharel, re're' nariye'eric rilok'il ru'um i Dios.

«Re' hat-tak aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l hat-tak cow laj aj niminel reh c'uhbal re're', xa hat-tak banol awach tak. Re' hat-tak k'e̱' rinimal ti'c'axic na̱c'ulum tak maj ma' xa re' ta ma' nawa̱j ta tak oquic hat-tak chi ri'sil ro̱k k'ab i Dios re' nk'atbic cho k'oric cu pan taxa̱j, c'ahchi' la' wo' ak'etem tak pa̱m quibe̱h take c'acharel c'ahchi' coquic ch'i̱l wo' take til c'ahchi' quicapam oquic chi ri'sil ro̱k k'ab i Dios.

«Je' wo' chic, re' hat-tak re' xa hat banol awach tak, k'e̱' rinimal ti'c'axic na̱c'ulum tak maj namak' tak i pa' bih wilic queh take cahnel ixok eh xa poybal chic na̱ ilek' na'n tak re're', xa k'e̱' chic nahtil ro̱k i ti̱j na'n tak.

Je' aj re', re' hat-tak re' xa hat banol awach tak k'e̱' rinimal ti'c'axic na̱c'ulum tak maj re' take riq'uihal c'acharel re' xa xat'ul chic awach tak chi quisiq'uiric xa haj yu̱k' q'uixca̱b reh chi xca'n chi awaj tahkanel chic take, awu'um aweh hat-tak xicowjic chic chi ritahkaljic ac'uhbal tak eh ru'um chi cowjonak chic take ru̱c' atahkaljic tak, k'e̱' wo' chic nariq'uic na̱ i ti'c'axic naquic'ulum awich'i̱l hat-tak chiwach i naquic'ulum toco̱m chic c'acharel.

«Je' wo', nik'or chi re' hat-tak re' tic'ambic tak quibe̱h i tinamit je' ricab c'amoj be̱h riban jeno' sot' ru̱c' jeno' chic rich sot', k'e̱' rinimal ti'c'axic na̱c'ulum tak ru'um reh riwi̱' i c'uhtunic na'n tak queh tinamit. Je' re' nik'or maj je' aj wili nac'uhtaj tak queh: Wi hab wach ric'saj pan k'oric i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios nariyew richi̱', re' hat-tak nak'or tak chi xa ma'xta bih xa̱j rik'orom wi̱' wi ma' xinimej i chaj bih xik'or. Raj nchel hab wach ric'saj pan k'oric take nworwotic laj ch'ihch' wilic chipam Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, re' hat-tak nak'or tak chi re' c'acharel re're' ma' iq'ue̱l ta wach na̱ i haj wilic xik'or chi naribanam.

Ru̱c' re're' nc'utunic chi re' hat-tak re' je' acab tak sot', til ma'xta so' ano'jbal tak. Nik'or chi je' re' ru'um nok ma' narak ta tak chiri̱j chi re' Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios k'e̱' wo' chic lo̱k' chiwach take nworwotic laj ch'ihch' wilque̱b chipam. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take nworwotic laj ch'ihch' nca'n chi lo̱k' chic take xa ru'um chi ar wilque̱b chipam i lok' laj pa̱t re're'.

«Je' wo' chic, re' hat-tak je' wo' wili nac'uhtaj tak queh c'acharel: Wi hab wach ric'saj pan k'oric i lok' laj ye'a̱b c'atbal si̱ chi wach i Dios nariyew richi̱', re' hat-tak nak'or tak chi xa ma'xta bih xa̱j rik'orom wi ma' xinimej i xik'or. Raj nchel hab wach ric'saj pan k'oric take si̱ ye'o̱j chiwach i lok' laj ye'a̱b re're', re' hat-tak nak'or chi re' c'acharel re're' ma' iq'ue̱l ta wach na̱ haj wilic xik'or chi naribanam.

Ru̱c' re're' nc'uhtunic wo' chic chi re' hat-tak re' je' acab tak sot', til ma'xta so' ano'jbal tak. Je' re' nik'or ru'um nok ma' narak ta tak chiri̱j chi re' lok' laj ye'a̱b c'atbal si̱ k'e̱' wo' chic lo̱k' chiwach take si̱, maj re' si̱ nye'eric ar no̱j riban chi lo̱k' chic take xa ru'um chi ar ye'o̱j take chiwach i lok' laj ye'a̱b re're'.

«Re' hat-tak k'uru', nachayew achi̱' tak chi ribanaric chaj bih nc'ulic pan ac'ux tak ribanaric, ma̱wic'saj tak pan k'oric i si̱ nye'eric chiwach i Dios on re' lok' laj ye'a̱b c'atbal si̱. Je' re' nik'or aweh tak maj re' ric'saj pan k'oric i lok' laj ye'a̱b re're' ma' xa ta re' i ye'a̱b re're' c'ahchi' ric'sam pan k'oric je' la' wo' i Dios re' nye'bic quilok'il i nic' pa' nimal wilic chiwach i ye'a̱b re're'.

Je' wo' nachayew achi̱' tak, ma̱wic'saj tak pan k'oric re' k'anworic laj ch'ihch' wilic chipam Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios on re' lok' laj pa̱t re're'. Je' re' nik'or aweh tak maj re' ric'saj pan k'oric i lok' laj pa̱t re're', ma' xa ta re' i pa̱t re're' c'ahchi' ric'sam pan k'oric je' la' wo' i Dios re' nye'eric rilok'il chipam i pa̱t re're'.

Je' wo', ma̱wic'saj tak pan k'oric i taxa̱j nachayew achi̱' tak maj hab wach ric'saj pan k'oric, ma' xa ta wo' re' i taxa̱j re' wilic cho wi̱' rik'atbal k'oric i Dios c'ahchi' ric'sam pan k'oric, je' la' wo' i Dios re' nk'atbic cho k'oric ar.

«Re' hat-tak k'uru' re' xa hat-tak banol awach tak, k'e̱' rinimal ti'c'axic na̱c'ulum tak ru'um chi ma' nanimej ta tak take c'uhbal til ajwal wach ribanaric. Chi jelow-bal la' chic take re', nanac'ayej asiq'ue̱j tak, awani̱s tak on i wach atic tak re' “comi̱no” ribihnal, re' chic riye'eric junpehr reh i laj pehr chi tumi̱n na'n tak ribanaric chi ric'amaric na̱ rik'ahsjic asi̱ tak chiwach i Dios, xa re' la' i tak'anic wilic chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses re' nk'oric chiri̱j ricorsjic wach ano'jbal tak, chiri̱j riqueteljic quiwach awas acha̱k' tak eh ch'i̱l wo' chiri̱j rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Dios, c'ahchi' ak'ebem tak lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak. Re' nak take re' curman chi na̱nimem tak chi ma'xta wo' acana̱b riye'eric lok asi̱ tak chiwach i Dios.

Je' re' ajic, re' hat-tak re' tic'ambic tak quibe̱h take c'acharel je' ricab i c'amoj be̱h riban jeno' sot' ru̱c' jeno' chic rich sot', ru'um chi xa re' ti take c'uhbal ma' ajwal ta wach nac'am tak na̱, c'ahchi' ac'ulum aweh tak je' ricab xic'ul jenaj winak re' xa re̱c' nak chic rimich' lok take cuc' utz' chipam ric'uxbal, raj nchel i ma' laj chicop wilic chipam ric'uxbal ma' xicoj ta rehtal naxibik' jok.

«Re' hat-tak k'uru' re' xa hat-tak banol awach tak, k'e̱' rinimal ti'c'axic na̱c'ulum tak eh nik'or chi je' re' maj re' hat-tak xa re̱c' chic natz'aj ak'ab tak ch'i̱l riculquil awa' aha̱' tak reh chi ma' eta nanih awi̱b tak ru̱c' i mahc nanacapaj tak, xa re' la' awa̱mna tak hamo̱j cho reh yohbal wach ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal je' ricab i quelk'jic take awas acha̱k' tak.

Re' hat-tak re' tic'ambic tak quibe̱h i tinamit je' ricab i c'amoj be̱h riban jeno' sot' ru̱c' jeno' chic rich sot', chawesaj tak lok i ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal wilic cho pan awa̱mna tak reh chi je' re', ru̱c' abano̱j ena'n tak ribanaric enc'utunic lok chawach tak chi re' chic i holohic laj no'jbal wilic cho pan awa̱mna tak.

Je' re' ajic, k'e̱' rinimal ti'c'axic na̱c'ulum hat-tak cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l wo' hat-tak aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal re're' ru'um nok re' hat-tak, xa hat-tak banol awach tak chi quiwach i tinamit. Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab chi re' take muk'unbal xa sak chic nca'n lok ru'um i chu̱n cojo̱j chi quiwach raj cho quipa̱m xa chuh chic cho ru'um take k'a̱ tak ba̱k wilque̱b cho ar,

je' wo' re' hat-tak xa coric wo' chic awach na'n tak nanac'uhtaj tak lok awi̱b chi quiwach take c'acharel, xa re' la' cho pa̱m awa̱mna tak yohbal cho wach i c'ahbilal wilic cho ar je' ricab i ribanaric lok awach tak.

«Chi je' aj re', junpech wo' chic nik'or aweh tak chi re' hat-tak cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l wo' hat-tak aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal re're', re' xa hat-tak banol awach tak, k'e̱' rinimal ti'c'axic na̱c'ulum tak eh je' re' nik'or maj na'n tak juneht ru̱c' quibano̱j take ama̱m awati't tak nok xa namahsaj tak chic wach ritik'injic eh xa naxoyej tak chic i quimuk'unbal take raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios xic'acharic cho chi coric wach quic'ux.

Nik'or chi je' re' maj je' aj wili nak'or tak, nanatik'a̱' tak on nanaxoyej tak quimuk'unbal take raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios: ‹Re' take kama̱m kati't, re' pe' take re' xicansanic cho queh raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios. C'achalco̱j ta nak cho hoj chiwach take k'i̱j re're', ma' xka'n ta nak jenaj wach ru̱c' quino'jbal take ru', nqui nak'or tak.
«Ru̱c' xak'or tak re're', c'ahchi' wo' ak'orom lok awi̱b tak chi hat-tak ca̱' qui'sil cho take aj cansanel queh aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios je' ru̱c' aj najtir take.
Eh nik'or wo' aweh tak chi chacohlaj wo' tak wach i cansanic xquip'ut ribanaric take aj najtir re're'.

Re' aj re' cha'n hat-tak re' xa c'ahbil chic ano'jbal tak eh ru'um chi na'n tak jenaj wach ano'jbal tak chi aj cansanel quich'i̱l ama̱m awati't tak, na'n tak chi je' acab tak juntuhm ok chi a̱k'! Re' cok ru', re' hin til nik'or aweh tak chi to̱b ta xa nasic' nak tak chic ri̱j rico'ljic awi̱b tak chiwach i Dios je' ricab nca'n take a̱k' chi xa quijuquic chic qui'elic je chiwach i k'a̱k', re' hat-tak ma'xta aco'lem awi̱b tak chiwach i Dios nachiyew i k'oric chi na̱ye'eric tak chipam i ye'a̱b re' naric'uluric wi̱' ti'c'axic.

«Je' re' k'uru', reh chi ma' eta chic niq'uic chana̱ tak i ti'c'axic re're', re' hin nanitak'a̱b je chaxilac tak take aj k'orol niC'uhbal ch'i̱l wo' take aj c'uhtunel reh niC'uhbal je' ru̱c' k'e̱' quino'jbal. Nok wilque̱b ok chic awu̱c' tak, chi quixilac take re', wilic queh na̱cansam tak wach curu̱s, wilic wo' queh na̱tz'uhumunem tak pan tak pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eh wilic wo' queh na̱siq'uim tak take chi ribanaric ti'c'axic queh xa haj pa' tinamit quiponic wi̱'.

Ru̱c' aj i na̱banam tak re're', narichalic chana̱ tak i ti'c'axic moloj cho wach ru'um i cansanic xca'n take cho ama̱m awati't tak queh raj camanom i Dios xic'acharic cho chi coric wach quic'ux. Til nik'or aj aweh tak chi ru'um chi re' hat-tak c'ahchi' atikim tak ju' i cansanic p'uhtunak cho ru̱c' riquimic Awel cu nponic ru̱c' i rac'u̱n Werequi̱yas, re' Sacari̱yas ribihnal. Re're' xcansjic cu'um take cho ama̱m awati't tak najtir k'i̱j ar chi chi̱' lok i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios chi ricorquil i wilic wi̱' i lok' laj ye'a̱b c'atbal si̱ chiwach i Dios.
Ru'um reh c'ahchi'ca̱t tak re're', re' ti'c'axic moloj wach ru'um take bano̱j re're', til nik'or aweh tak chi narichalic chana̱ hat-tak wich c'acharel tic'acharic chipam take k'i̱j wili.

«Hat-tak c'acharel aj Jerusalen re' ticansanic tak queh chi abaj take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios tak'amaj take cho awu̱c' tak, k'e̱' je njik'jitic i wa̱mna chawi̱j tak ru'um i ti'c'axic na̱c'ulum tak. Re' hin k'e̱' nak nwa̱j aco'ljic tak chiwach i ti'c'axic re're', je' ricab nok jeno' quixlan rimoh'ej take cuc' rac'u̱n pa rixi̱c' chi quico'ljic, xa re' la' hat-tak ma' jaruj nac'u'lej tak na̱ niC'uhbal.

Chi je' re' xa'n tak, chabiraj tak chi coric i wili: Je' ricab nancanabjic jeno' pa̱t cu'um take c'acharel naqui'elic je chipam, je' wo' re' naribanam i Dios chi naricana̱b atinami̱t tak chipam i ti'c'axic chalic reh chana̱ tak.

Je' wo' til nik'or wo' aweh tak aj Jerusalen chi ma' ja'xta pe chic awilom tak niwach cu rehtal chic na̱k'orom tak i je' ricab tz'ihmbimaj cho chi je' wili chipam Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios: “Kayew tak rilok'il k'uru' i c'ulic riban lok wili chi tak'amaj cho ru'um i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Dios, nqui rik'or, nqui Jesus.

Nok c'ahchi' chic relic je Jesus chipam i pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios re' hoj raj tahkanel xkajil cok ki̱b ru̱c' eh je' wili xkak'or reh: «Ha̱w, chawilow ti! K'e̱' wo' chic holonquilal ritik'injic bano̱j i pa̱t wili, kojqui reh.

Chalic i Jesus je' wili c'u'lunic xiban keh: «K'e̱' nak ru' holonquilal nc'utunic, xa re' la' nik'or aweh tak chi re' pa̱t wili til narisacharic wach chi junpech chi ma' jeno' chic abaj naricahnic chi tuslic wach, nqui xik'or keh.

Chiri̱j i wili, nok wilco̱j chic ponok chipam i ye'a̱b re' ribihnej “Ye'a̱b queh take tic Oli̱wo ribihnal”, re' hoj raj tahkanel naxkilow chi xa rutquel chic tz'uklic i Jesus, xkajil cok ki̱b ru̱c' eh xkabiraj reh chi je' wili: «Ajabe̱s, chacuy chak'or keh jaruj naric'uluric nic' nimal xak'or keh chiri̱j i k'i̱j natisoljok cho rica'pech eh je' wo' nic' wach nacux'ok wach chi'nchel ayu'. Chak'or wo' keh, haj wilic take rehtalil nariwih'ic chi pe̱t chi c'uhtbal reh chi q'uisi̱n chic ma' nponic i k'i̱j re're'? kojqui reh.
Re' Jesus je' wili kac'u'ljic xiban: «Xa na'lic ok wo' aweh tak reh chi ma' hab ta wach enjot'bic aweh tak.

Je' re' nik'or, maj yohbal wach take tinamit naquijot'oric cu'um take riq'uihal aj jot'o̱l nacuctic cho re' naca'nam qui̱b chi xa je' chic re' hin take eh je' wili naquik'orom: ‹Re' hin, i hin Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, nqui naquik'orom.

«Re' hat-tak na̱biram wo' tak ribiral chi wilic take tinamit c'ahchi'que̱b chi k'ak'anic chi quiwach on chi nacoquic chi k'ak'anic. Nachabiraj tak re're', ma' riban ti naho̱l awach tak chi ricapewjic chi xponic chic ricux'ic wach chi'nchel. Coric, re' rik'ijil sachbal wach chi'nchel nariponic wach xa re' la' ma' ja' yu'na ta ti maj curman chi pe̱t naric'uluric lok chi'nchel nanik'orom take wili:

Re' take nimak chi cuc'tak tinamit xa naquic'u'lem chic qui̱b chi k'ak'anic chi quiwach. Je' wo' xa haj chic ye'a̱b, nariwih'ic rehreh wach ya'bilal, nariwih'ic wi'jalel eh naribanam wo' take cow laj hihc.
Nac'ulurok take re're' chacoj tak rehtal chi xa cu re' pe ti p'uhtbal reh i c'axquilal c'ahchi' richalic china̱ ac'al wili.

Chi je' aj re', k'e̱' wo' chic q'uihal take c'acharel naquixowonic awach tak ru'um chi re' hin quinanimej tak. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' naca̱t tak quik'ahsam pan quik'ab take aj c'amol quibe̱h take tinamit reh chi naca'nam ti'c'axic aweh tak cu rehtal wilic aweh tak naquicansjic.

«Chiwach aj take rik'ijil i ti'c'axic re're', q'uihal queh take awich aj niminel tak nariyojic quic'ux chiwi̱j. Chi quixilac take je' re' naca'nam, wilic take c'ul naquixowem qui̱b eh wilic wo' c'ul naquik'ahsam qui̱b pan quik'ab aj ixowonel.
Je' wo' chi quixilac take re', q'uihal take nacuctic chi xa chucul aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios take eh yohbal wach take c'acharel naquijot'om ru̱c' i c'uhtunic naca'nam.
Chi je' aj re', ru'um chi chaxilac hat-tak aj niminel wi̱n naquiq'uihbic take aj banol reh c'ahbilal, q'uihal wo' aweh hat-tak narichuhpic wach i c'axoj i̱b cu̱c'.
Til nik'or k'uru', tiwi̱' tak chi xa na'lic ok wo' aweh tak maj xa re' wo' i c'acharel re' cu ch'iclic ric'ux chiwi̱j hin naponok wach ricux'ic take k'ijil re're', xa re' wo' re' narico'lem ri̱b.

«Je' wo', chiwach take k'i̱j re're', re' holohic laj k'oric nik'or i hin chi re' Dios narik'atbic k'oric chi quina̱ i tinamit, narojic lok rik'ormojic chi junsut wach ac'al wili reh chi naribirmijic cu'um chi'nchel c'acharel. Nok ojonak ok chic lok wach rik'ormojic niC'uhbal, cu re' aj ru' naric'ulic lok i ricux'ic wach chi'nchel.

Chi je' re' ajic, re' hat-tak re' tilbic tak wach i hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj cho ru'um aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios re' Tanyel ribihnal, nachawilow tak chi chipam i pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, re' yibel wach c'ahbilal chi kawach hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xbanaric chic cu'um take sachol wach i tinamit wili, charak tak chiri̱j chi re're' i rehtalil chi xponic chic i orahil chi nawelic tak je chipam i tinamit wili.
Nachawilow tak re're' k'uru', re' hat-tak re' wilca̱t tak chi junsut riyuk'ul Jure̱ya hiy tak pan tak q'uiche̱' chi ric'oloric awi̱b tak ar.
Je' ricab wi wilic ok nchel jeno' aweh tak rij ripa̱t wilic lok, ma' noquic chic cok chi ric'amaric pa' bih aweh tak.
On wi pan awabi̱x ok wilca̱t tak cho ma' tisoljic wo' tak chic cho pan apa̱t tak chi ric'amaric jeno' ajalba̱l tak.
«Ru'um chi k'e̱' c'axquilal wach i elic naribanjic chiwach take k'i̱j re're', k'e̱' niquetelej quiwach take yowa̱b ixok ch'i̱l take tutbe̱s cu wilic quicuc'ta̱k.

Ru'um aj re', til nik'or aweh tak chi cha'n tak ati̱j reh chi ma' ok chipam rik'ijil i k'elej enc'uluric reh chi suk elic ena'n tak je, on chi ma' wo' chipam jeno' hi'lbal k'i̱j reh chi ma' eta narak tak ac'axquilal ru̱c' rik'or i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses.

Nipahkaj aweh tak chi cha'n ati̱j tak maj re' ti'c'axic re're' til wo' chic cow wach naribanam chiwach take chi'nchel ti'c'axic c'ulu̱j cho cu rich'ihquic cho chi'nchel wach ac'al cu rehtal nponic rik'ijil i ti'c'axic re're'. Til wo' chic ma' ilo̱j ta wach i ti'c'axic naric'uluric re're' eh ma' wo' narilmijic chic johtok wach chiri̱j take k'i̱j nac'ulurok lok re're'.
