K'e̱' wo' chic ti'quilal naric'uluric chi re' Dios naritokom wach rinimal ro̱k rik'ijil ti'c'axic re're' awu'um aweh hat-tak re' xatrichih tak chi naca̱t tak rico'lem chiwach i ti'c'axic re're'. Ma' ta je' re' eriban, ma' hab ta wo' nak wach erico'lej ri̱b chiwach.

«Chiwach rik'ijil i ti'c'axic re're', q'uihal take c'acharel nacoquic chi jot'o̱j. Chi quixilac take re', wilic take naquik'orom chi je' wili: ‹Quim tak, chawilow tak: Ayu' wilic on wulu' wilic i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, nqui naquik'orom. «Nachabiraj tak chi je' re' ma̱coj tak wach

maj je' ricab chi yohbal wach take jot'o̱l nacuctic cho chi c'ahchi' quik'orom qui̱b chi re' take re' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, yohbal wo' wach take jot'o̱l nacuctic cho chi naquik'orom qui̱b chi aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios take. K'e̱' wo' chic naquijot'om take c'acharel ru̱c' take k'oric naca'nam eh ru̱c' take riq'uihal nimak tak wach lok' laj nawa̱l naca'nam, naquiniq'uem wo' quik'i̱j chi quijot'oric take richiho̱j i Dios chi naquico'ljic.
Je' re' k'uru' ma' riwi̱' ta chic chi etijot'oric tak maj re' hin pe̱t c'ahchi' nik'orom aweh tak chi'nchel re're' chi ja' nc'uluric ta.

Chi je' re' ajic ma̱tahkej tak je take je' wili enquik'or aweh tak: ‹Re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, ar wilic cho pan chik yu̱k', tak-tak kilow tak cho k'uru', nqui enquik'or. «Je' wo' ma̱coj tak wach quik'orbal take je' wili enquik'or aweh tak: ‹Re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric ar ric'olom cho ri̱b pan jenaj ye'a̱b, nqui enquik'or.

«Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab chi narirehpaj cho risakomil i cohok ar pan taxa̱j, cu nilmijic cho chi junsut wach ac'al, je' wo' re' naric'uluric naquinsoljok cho hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel
na̱weht'alim wo' tak haj wilqui̱n hin je' ricab naneht'aljic chi haj pa' nquimol wi̱' qui̱b take c'uch, ar wo' wilic jeno' camnak chicop.

«Chiri̱j chi iq'uinak chic nic' nimal ti'c'axic naric'uluric chipam take k'i̱j re're', re' take sakombal pan taxa̱j naripa'lajic quisakomil eh je' re' naric'uluric maj re' k'i̱j ch'i̱l i poh ma'xta chic quiyeb cho quisakomil. Je' wo' re' take ch'imi̱l, chi xa je' nak chic naquik'ehbic cho wach ac'al na'ilmijok, ma'xta wo' chic quisakomonic cho.

Cu chiri̱j aj chic re're', re' rehtalil cho nic'ulic hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel naric'uhtunic wo' cho pan taxa̱j. Ru'um reh rehtalil re're', k'e̱' riyot'quil c'uxlis naroquic cho cu̱c' take tinamit ma'xta quiniminic wi̱n ru'um chi naquirakam chiri̱j chi xinc'ulic lok chi rich'ukuric wach mahc. Je' re' nik'or maj naquinc'olok lok nah rinimal su̱tz' i hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, narilmijic wach rinimal risakomil nich'a̱b ch'i̱l wo' i wajawric wilic.

«Nachirak aj cho nichalbal, re' hin nanitak'a̱b take cho waj tz'e' wa̱ch reh chi nacojic chi junsut yu̱k' q'uixca̱b china̱ ac'al wili chi rimoloric quiwach take c'acharel chiho̱j take quiwach wu'um, je' ricab nanmoloric quiwach take tinamit cu'um take aj su̱b nok xa cow chic quik'o'rjic je chi su̱b.

Ru'um aj chi je' re' naric'uluric, re' hat-tak chacoj tak rehtal take rehtalil c'uhtbal reh nichalic je' ricab na'n tak ru̱c' i che̱' re' I̱co ribihnal. Nanawilow tak chi rip'ut cho toxlonic take ac' xak, naweht'alij tak chi re' sik'jil xiq'uic chic lok rik'ijil eh chi re' chic k'elej oquic cho reh.
Je' wo' re' cha'n tak chi nachawilow tak chi c'ahchi' chic ric'ulmujic take xnik'or lok aweh tak chi naric'ulmujic, charak tak chiri̱j chi ma' naht ta chic wilic i k'i̱j chi nanichalic.
Til coric nik'or chi re' xnik'or aweh tak naric'uluric nok cu ja' ta ncux'ic rinimal ro̱k quic'acharic take c'acharel c'achalque̱b yu'na.
Je' re' nik'or aweh tak maj chi'nchel re' xnik'or lok i hin, til wo' naric'uluric ma'xta nchel risahchic wach je' ricab naric'ulum i taxa̱j rich'i̱l i ac'al.

Re' cok ru' to̱b ta nchel xnik'or lok haj wilic take rehtalil naric'utunic wi̱' nichalic, ma' hab ta chic wach xa re' wo' Dios neht'alanic reh rik'ijil ch'i̱l ri'orahil chi naric'uluric re're'. Xa ta nak re' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i wAja̱w wilque̱b ar pan taxa̱j, queht'alim re're'. Ru'um aj chi xa re' wo' Dios neht'alanic reh re're',

re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi re' take tinamit quic'acharic naquinc'olok lok i hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, naquic'ulum queh je' ricab xquic'ul cho take tinamit xic'acharic cho pa rik'ijil cho ric'acharic i ma' Noheh.

Je' re' nik'or maj pa rik'ijil cho ric'acharic i Noheh naxchalic chi quina̱ tinamit i jenaj rinimal jab ch'i̱l buht ha' xelic cho pan ac'al, re' take re' xa suk chic quic'ux qui'iq'uic k'i̱j pan tak nink'i̱j on pan tak caxarahil eh ma' xquicoj ta so' rehtal chi chalic reh jenaj ti'c'axic chi quina̱. Je' aj re' xca'n cu rehtal xoquic i Noheh ch'i̱l take raj pan pa̱t chipam i jenaj ma' laj cano̱wa je' riwi̱' pa̱t.

Cu re' chic ru', ru'um chi ma' xquicoj ta rajawric re' xk'ormojic queh ru'um i Noheh chi narichalic jenaj rinimal jab, chi'nchel take c'acharel re're' xsahchic quiwach ru'um i buht ha' xelic cho pan ac'al. «Re' hin nik'or wo' aweh tak chi naquinc'olok lok i hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, je' wo' wili naric'uluric:
Wi wilic quib ok chi winak camanic nca'n ponok pan abixbal, jenaj queh naresmejic chiwach i ti'c'axic eh re' jenaj chic naricanabjic cahnok chipam.
Je' wo' re', wi wilic quib ok chi ixok que'c nca'n, xa jenaj wo' queh naresmejic chiwach i ti'c'axic eh re' jenaj chic naricanabjic cahnok chipam.

«Ru'um aj chi wilic take naquicanabjic pan ti'c'axic ru'um chi ma'xta quicojom rajawric i xk'ormojic queh, re' hin nik'or aweh tak chacoj tak rajawric i k'oric xnik'or chic aweh tak wili chi xa ic'lic ok wo' ana̱ tak chiri̱j nic'ulic lok i hin ajabe̱s chana̱ tak. Je' re' cha'n tak maj ma' aweht'alim ta tak jaruj nchel rirak cho k'i̱j reh nisoljic,

je' ricab xic'ul i jenaj ajabe̱s re' ma' xeht'alij ta i k'i̱j naxc'ulic lok jenaj aj lek' chi relk'jic pa̱m ripa̱t. Ar aj ru' xoquic pa ripa̱t eh xelk'aj je chi'nchel pa' bih wilic reh. Wi ta nak re' ajabe̱s re're' xeht'alij chaj bih k'ijal naric'ulic lok wi̱' aj lek' re're', til xicha'jej nak chi xa ic'lic chic na̱ eh ma' xiyew ta nak chi xelk'jic pa̱m ripa̱t, maje'?
Je' re' ajic, ru'um chi re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel nanic'ulic lok nok ma' hab ta wach ncapewenic reh, re' hat-tak xa ic'lic ok wo' ana̱ tak.

«Chacapaj tak ri̱j i wili: Re' jeno' ajabe̱s nok ojic chic reh chi naht, ma' re' ta na jeno' raj camanom je' ru̱c' wilic rino'jbal eh je' ru̱c' ch'iquem c'uxlis naripahba̱b cahnok chi ric'amaric quibe̱h chi'nchel raj camanom wilque̱b pa ripa̱t, on chi riye'eric quiwa' quiha̱' pa ri'orahil? Til pan coric re' aj camanom re' je' re' rino'jbal, re're' naricanabjic cahnok chi aj ilo̱l.
K'e̱' je ato̱b reh aj camanom npahbabjic cahnok chi c'amol be̱h ru'um i ajabe̱s, wi re' camanic k'oro̱j cahnok reh chi naribanam, re' wo' re' c'ahchi' rinimem i nac'olok rakmajok

maj til pan coric nik'or aweh tak chi re' camanom re're' narijohsjic wach ricamaj ru'um ajabe̱s chi c'axbal reh eh chi je' re' naricojoric cahnok chi chopol na̱ chi'nchel pa' bih wilic reh i ajabe̱s re're'.
Ra̱j nchel, wi re' c'ahbil laj camanom re're', ma' riban ta ricamaj chi coric ru'um ricapaj pa ra̱mna chi ja' c'ulic ta lok reh ajabe̱s
eh chi je' re' enoquic chi quich'eyeric take rich camanom je' wo' enoquic chi nink'ijinic on chi xohc'ric quich'i̱l take aj xohc'rel,

k'e̱' je ti'quil naric'ulum aj camanom re're'. Je' re' ajic nac'olok lok i ajabe̱s chipam i k'i̱j nok re' aj camanom re're' ma' reht'alim ta so', on chipam i junc'am nok ma' c'ahchi' ta ricapam so' ric'ulic lok i ajabe̱s,

naric'ulic rakmajok chi je' re' c'ahchi' ribanam. Je' aj re', re' aj camanom re're' naricahnic chiwach i ajabe̱s chi xa je' chic ricab jeno' queh take aj camanom je' ru̱c' xa cu re' nca'n quiwach chi camanic nok wilic cok i ajabe̱s cu̱c'. Ru̱c' aj naribanaric reh aj camanom re're', til narok'ic eh narikirich'em nah re̱ ru'um rinimal ti'quil c'uxlis naroquic cho ru̱c'.

«Nachirak cho rik'ijil nic'ulic lok i hin chi k'atoj k'oric chi quina̱ take tinamit, naribanam jenaj wach ru̱c' je' ricab xc'ulmujic cu̱c' take lajeb chi k'ahxokak je' ru̱c' aj behsem take reh jenaj quich k'ahxok naribanam caxa̱ra. Re' take k'ahxokak re're' xquitik'a̱' qui̱b ru̱c' quisakombal chi ruyu'njic pan be̱h ac'un naribanam caxa̱ra ru̱c' jenaj quich'i̱l, je' ricab ocronak take wi̱' nanbanaric jeno' caxarahil.

Re' cok ru', re' take lajeb chi k'ahxokak re're' na xquitik'a̱' qui̱b reh caxarahil, xa ho'o̱b ti queh xquisic' ri̱j nic' wach nok chi ma' eta nchuhpic quisakombal, raj take ho'o̱b chic ma'xta bih xquicapaj so'.
Je' re' ajic re' take ho'o̱b ma'xta bih xquicapaj so', xa xquichohpaj wo' ti je i quisakombal chi ma' xquic'am ta je riman quicas chiqui̱j.
Tz'a̱b ru', re' take ho'o̱b re' xquisic' ri̱j nic' wach nok chi ma' eta nchuhpic quisakombal, ma' je' ta re' xca'n, naxquichop la' je quisakombal xquic'am je riman quicas chiqui̱j.
Naxponic aj ri'orahil ruyu'njic ac'un re're', ru'um chi re're' cu xchahmic cho, re' take lajeb chi k'ahxokak xchalic quitahca'y eh xikajic chi wiric.

Cu re' chic ru' naxponic tic'lic ak'ab, ticlijic pan quixiquin i k'oric wili: ‹C'a'chok awach tak, re' ac'un naribanam caxa̱ra ponic chic reh. Chatik'a̱' awi̱b tak k'uru' chi ric'uluric, nqui k'oric xquibiraj.
«Chi je' re' ajic, re' take lajeb chi k'ahxokak re're' xi'uctubic cajim eh xi'oquic chi rilmijic i quisakombal wi cu wilic quicas.

Ar aj ru', re' take ho'o̱b chi k'ahxokak re' ma'xta bih xquicapaj so', je' wili xquik'or queh ho'o̱b chic quich'i̱l: ‹Chacuy chayew tak so' keh acas tak ru'um nok re' kasakombal i hoj chuhpic chic reh, nqui take.

«Re' take ho'o̱b chi k'ahxokak quisiq'uim cho ri̱j nic' wach nok chi ma' eta nchuhpic quisakombal, je' wili xquik'or queh: ‹Re' hoj ma' q'uih ta wo' kacas kich'i̱l chi nakayeb so' aweh tak. Reh aj chi ma' hoj ta juncahnic chi ma'xta chic kacas, sakbih chi re' hat-tak eto̱j tak cu̱c' take aj c'a̱y eh chalok' cho aweh tak cu̱c', nqui take.

«Nok k'oro̱j chic queh chi je' re', re' take ho'o̱b chi k'ahxokak re're' xi'o̱j wo', xa re' la' ru' nok sachalque̱b ponok, xc'ulic ti lok i ac'un naribanam caxa̱ra eh chi je' re', xa re' wach take ho'o̱b chi k'ahxok tikilque̱b chi ric'uluric, xi'oquic cok chiri̱j chipam i nink'i̱j reh ricaxarahil maj chiri̱j chic re're', xtz'aparic cho chi junpech i ocbal reh pa̱t reh chi ma' hab ta chic wach xye'eric k'ab reh chi oquic.
«Ru'um aj re', naxisoljic cho take ho'o̱b chic chi k'ahxokak, je' wili tohk' quik'orom cok reh ac'un re're': ‹Ha̱w, chacuy chateh cho keh apa̱t, nqui take cok reh.
Re're' je' wili quic'u'ljic xiban take cho: ‹Til coric nik'or aweh tak chi ma' weht'alim ta awach tak, nqui cho queh.

«Ru̱c' aj xc'ulmujic re're', nik'or aweh tak chi xa ic'lic ok wo' ana̱ tak reh nic'ulic lok ru'um nok re' hat-tak ma' aweht'alim ta tak jaruj rirak cho i k'i̱j ch'i̱l ri'orahil nic'ulic lok i hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel.

«Ru'um chi c'ulic lok wi̱n chi k'atoj k'oric chi quina̱ take c'acharel, re' hin nanibanam cahnok awu̱c' hat-tak je' ricab xiban jenaj ajabe̱s xitik'a̱' chic ri̱b chi ojic reh chi naht. Re' ajabe̱s re're' xiyuk'ej take raj camanom eh wilic tumi̱n xik'ahsaj cahnok pan quik'ab reh chi narac'unem ri̱b chi quiwach.

Ru'um aj chi ma' jenaj ta wach quino'jbal take aj camanom chi ricamanjic wach tumi̱n, re' ajabe̱s re're', ho'o̱b tahn chi tumi̱n xiyew reh jenaj. Reh jenaj chic, xiyew quib tahn chi tumi̱n reh eh re' jenaj chic xa juntahn ti xiyew reh. Chiri̱j chic ru', re' ajabe̱s xo̱j chi naht.
Chi je' re' ajic, re' aj camanom re' xic'ul cahnok ho'o̱b tahn chi tumi̱n, xoquic chi ricamanjic wach eh ho'o̱b chic tahn chi tumi̱n xac'unej ri̱b chiwach.
Re' jenaj chic camanom re' xic'ul je quib tahn chi tumi̱n, xoquic wo' chi ricamanjic wach tumi̱n eh quib tahn wo' chic xac'unej ri̱b chiwach,
raj nchel i camanom re' juntahn ti chi tumi̱n xic'ul je, xic'ot jenaj jul eh ar ximuk'a̱' i tumi̱n xye'eric reh ru'um ajabe̱s.
Naht chic pononak sahchok cho ajabe̱s re're', xsoljic wo' chic cho chipam riye'a̱b eh xiyuk'ej take raj camanom chi ripahkaljic queh nic' wach xca'n ru̱c' i tumi̱n xiyew cahnok queh.

Je' re' ajic, re' camanom re' xic'ul cahnok i ho'o̱b tahn chi tumi̱n, naxo̱j c'olok ch'i̱l ho'o̱b tahn chic chi tumi̱n xac'unej cahnok ri̱b chiwach, je' wili xik'or reh ajabe̱s: ‹Ha̱w, xa ho'o̱b ti tahn ru' chi tumi̱n xayew cahnok wi̱n, raj yu'na ho'o̱b chic tahn xac'unej ri̱b atumi̱n chi niwach, nqui reh.

«Chalic ajabe̱s re're' je' wili xik'or reh: ‹Re' cok hat, hat holohic laj aj camanom. Je' re' nik'or maj xanimej chi manlic i k'oro̱j cahnok aweh. Yu'na k'uru', je' ricab nok nsukbic nic'ux awu̱c' i hin ajabe̱s chana̱ ru̱c' xa'n, je' wo' re' sukbok ac'ux wu̱c' i hat ru̱c' i nanibanam wili chi yu'na k'e̱' chic nanich'ica̱b nic'ux chawi̱j ru̱c' jeno' camanic nim wach. Je' re' niban ru'um nok ru̱c' ti nech' nitz'a̱k xnich'ica̱' wi̱' nic'ux chawi̱j i hat chi na̱q'uihsam wach, re' hat xacamanej cahnok wach chi coric, nqui reh.

«Naxponic wo' i jenaj chic aj camanom re' xye'eric quib tahn chic tumi̱n reh, je' wili xik'or reh ajabe̱s: ‹Ha̱w, xa qui̱b ti tahn ru' chi tumi̱n xayew cahnok wi̱n, raj yu'na qui̱b chic tahn xac'unej ri̱b atumi̱n chi niwach, nqui wo' xik'or reh.

«Re' ajabe̱s je' wili xik'or reh raj camanom re're': ‹Re' cok i hat, hat holohic laj aj camanom. Je' re' nik'or maj xanimej chi manlic i k'oro̱j cahnok aweh wu'um. Yu'na k'uru', je' ricab nok nsukbic nic'ux awu̱c' i hin ajabe̱s chana̱ ru̱c' xa'n, je' wo' re' sukbok ac'ux wu̱c' i hat ru̱c' i niban wili chi yu'na k'e̱' chic nanich'ica̱b nic'ux chawi̱j ru̱c' jeno' camanic nim wach. Je' re' niban ru'um nok ru̱c' ti mahnic' nitumin xnich'ica̱' wi̱' nic'ux chawi̱j chi na̱q'uihsam wach, re' hat xacamanej wo' wach chi coric, nqui reh.

«Raj la' naxponic i jenaj chic aj camanom re' xc'ulbic cahnok reh juntahn ti chi tumi̱n, je' wili xik'or reh ajabe̱s: ‹Ha̱w, re' hin weht'alim chi re' ricamanjic wach tumi̱n awu̱c' i hat k'e̱' c'axquilal wach. Je' re' nik'or maj re' hat xa re' bihomric nawa̱j ru̱c' quicamaj take toco̱m je' ricab riban jeno' ajabe̱s re' ritak'a̱' rijacharic pa̱m riye'a̱b re' toco̱m xbanic wi̱' tic abi̱x on ritak'a̱' rixiric wach take jal re' ma' re' ta wo' xmolbic reh.

Ru'um aj chi je' re' riwi̱' ano'jbal, re' hin k'e̱' xinyo'jic chawach, ru'um re' ma' xnicamanej ta wach atumi̱n, xnic'ol la' pan ac'al ru'um quinyo'jic chi eno̱j pa ri̱j chi niwach. Je' re' k'uru', ayu' wilic wo' chic atumi̱n chi manlic wach, nqui reh.

«Chalic ajabe̱s re're', je' wili xik'or reh: ‹Hat ma' ato̱b ta laj aj camanom, ma' nanimej ta haj wilic nk'ormojic cahnok aweh. Ru'um chi aweht'alim wo' nak chi re' hin niban je' ricab i winak re' ritak'a̱' rijacharic pa̱m i ye'a̱b re' toco̱m xbanic i ticoj abi̱x on ritak'a̱' rixiric wach take jal ma' re' ta xmolbic cho reh,

ma' xamuk'a̱' ta nak i nitz'a̱k xo̱j la' nak ac'ol chipam jeno' pa̱t c'olbal tumi̱n reh chi naxinc'ulic nak lok i hin yu'na xo̱j nak nic'am i nitz'a̱k ch'i̱l i nic' pa' nak nimal xac'unej cahnok, nqui ajabe̱s reh.

«Chiri̱j chic ru', re' ajabe̱s re're' je' wili xik'or queh toco̱m chic raj camanom wilque̱b cok ru̱c': ‹Chamak' tak i nitz'a̱k wilic ru̱c' i winak wili eh chayew tak reh re' laj pech xiq'uihsaj wach nitz'a̱k.

Je' re' cha'n tak ru'um nok re' nchol riq'uihsjic wach i pa' bih ye'o̱j reh nariye'eric riman reh, ra̱j nchel re' ma' nchol ta riq'uihsjic wach i pa' bih ye'o̱j reh, narimak'aric reh re' haj nak ti wilic i mahnic' ye'o̱j pan k'ab.
Chiri̱j aj chic re', chacut tak lok ri̱j pa̱t pan k'ekom ak'ab i aj camanom wili, ar aj ru' narok'ic eh narikirich'em nah re̱ ru'um riti'quil ric'ux, nqui ajabe̱s re're'.

«Re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, naquinc'olok wo' chic lok quich'i̱l take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i wAja̱w Dios, nok nic'uhtam chic i rinimal nilok'il, nanitz'uka̱b cho wi̱b chipam lok' laj niye'a̱b k'atbal k'oric reh chi nanich'ukum k'oric chi quina̱ take tinamit.

Ar aj ru', chi'nchel take tinamit wach ac'al nacojic pa'lajok chi niwach eh nok pa'alque̱b chic chi niwach, nawesam lok pa reh take coric wach quic'ux chi quixilac take ma' coric ta wach quic'ux, je' ricab riban jeno' aj cha'jem me̱' naresaj lok pa reh take chi̱wa chi quixilac take rime̱'.

Re' take coric wach quic'ux, ar naniyeb take pa nisec'a̱j eh re' take ma' coric ta wach quic'ux ar naniyeb take pa nitz'e̱t, je' ricab riban aj cha'jem me̱' chi re' take me̱' pa risec'a̱j riyew take lok eh re' take chi̱wa pa ritz'e̱t riyew take lok.

Nok nich'akam chic quiyejal take c'acharel, re' hin chi pa'alqui̱n chic chi k'atal k'oric, je' wili nanik'orom queh naniyeb take pa nisec'a̱j: ‹Re' wAja̱w, xa nok wo' pan ch'iquinbal cho reh wach ac'al, xitik'a̱' cho wach chi re' hin nanich'ukuj k'oric chana̱ tak. Je' re' nok, re' hat-tak re' c'ahchi' chic ac'ulum tak i rato'bil i Dios, quim tak eh tocok tak chi ri'sil wo̱k nik'ab.

Re' hat-tak ric'ul chaweh tak chi je' re' eniban awu̱c' tak maj nok re' hin cuyuj wi'c cuyuj ha' niban ru'um ma'xta chic bih wilic wi̱n, re' hat-tak xayew tak niwa' niha̱'. Je' wo', naxinwih'ic cho chi xa hin behel pan atinami̱t tak xayew tak nipatal.

Naxiban wo' cho chi ma' rik'or ta chic coric niso' chiwi̱j, re' hat-tak xayew tak nijalba̱l eh xinponic wo' awilow tak cho naxinyowabjic. Je' wo' chic, na xinwih'ic cho pan che̱', xinponic wo' ak'o'rej tak cho, nqui nanik'orom queh.
«Ru̱c' take k'oric re're', re' take coric wach quic'ux naquibiram wi̱n chi je' wili: ‹Ha̱w, haj xkilow cho awach chi hat aj cuyul wi'c ha' eh re' hoj xkayew awa' aha̱'?
On, haj wo' xkilow awach chi xa je' hat behel pan katinami̱t eh xkayew apatal? Eh haj wo' xkilow awach chi xa ma' rik'or ta chic coric aso' chawi̱j eh re' hoj xkayew ajalba̱l?
Je' wo', haj nchel xkabiraj chi hat yowa̱b eh xatponic kilow cho, on chi wilca̱t cho pan che̱' eh xatponic kak'o'rej cho? nqui naquik'orom.

«Ar ajic chi quic'u'ljic, re' hin re' pa'alqui̱n chic chi k'atal k'oric je' wili nanik'orom queh: ‹Til coric nik'or aweh tak, chi'nchel take ato'bil xa'n tak queh take was nicha̱k' cu̱c' tak ti quiwach, wi̱n wo' hin xa'n tak, nqui nanik'orom queh.

«Chiri̱j aj chic re', je' wili nanik'orom queh ye'o̱j take je pa nitz'e̱t: ‹Telen tak chi niwach hat-tak re' ye'o̱j chic chawi̱j tak chi na̱c'ulum tak i ti'c'axic. Hiy tak chipam i k'a̱k' re' xa koplic wo' cho chi junelic i k'i̱j sakom. Re' k'a̱k' re're' tik'imaj chi reh aj Yahm ch'i̱l take ma' tob laj uxlabal quicamanic chi raj tz'e' wa̱ch.
Je' re' ric'ul chaweh tak chi enac'ul maj nok hin cho aj cuyul wi'c ha', re' hat-tak ma' xayew ta tak niwa' niha̱'.

Je' wo', naxinwih'ic cho chi xa hin behel pan atinami̱t tak, ma' xayew ta tak nipatal. Je' wo', naxiban cho chi ma' rik'or ta chic coric niso' chiwi̱j, re' hat-tak ma' xayew ta tak nijalba̱l. Ma' wo', xinponic ta awilow tak cho naxinyowabjic. Xa ta wo' xinponic ak'o'rej tak cho naxinwih'ic pan che̱', nqui nanik'orom queh.

«Ru̱c' take k'oric re're', re' take ma' coric ta wach quic'ux naquibiram wo' wi̱n chi je' wili: ‹Ha̱w, haj nchel xkilow cho awach chi re' hat, hat aj cuyul wi'c ha'? On chi xa je' hat behel pan katinami̱t? On chi ma' rik'or ta chic coric aso' chawi̱j? On chi hat yowa̱b? On chi naxatwih'ic cho pan che̱' eh ma'xta bih jeno' ato'bil xka'n aweh? nqui wo' naquik'orom wi̱n.

«Ar ajic chi quic'u'ljic, re' hin je' wili nanik'orom queh: ‹Til coric nik'or aweh tak ru̱c' chi ma' xa'n ta tak ato'bil queh take c'acharel cuc'tak ti quiwach je' ru̱c' cajwam wach jeno' ato'bil, wi̱n wo' hin ma' xa'n ta tak ato'bil re're', nqui nanik'orom queh.

«Chi je' aj re' k'uru', nanibanam chi re' take ma' coric ta wach quic'ux nacojic chipam i junelic ti'c'axic eh re' take coric wach quic'ux nanibanam chi nacoquic chi ri'sil wo̱k nik'ab re' naquic'acharic wi̱' chi junelic, nqui Jesus.
Chiri̱j chic ru' nok ricohlam chic kac'ulbaljic i hoj raj tahkanel ru̱c' take k'oric re're', re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or keh:

«Re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi re' nink'i̱j re' Pa̱scuwa ribihnal re' n-nimjic wi̱' i quelbal cho pan ti'c'axic take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, xa chic qui̱b k'i̱j ra̱j chi narip'uhtic. Chiwach i nink'i̱j re're', re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel nanik'ahsjic pan quik'ab take sol aj Ro̱ma reh chi naqui̱nquicansam wach curu̱s, nqui xik'or keh.

Chiwach wo' ti k'i̱j re're' nok je' re' xik'or i Jesus keh hoj cablaj chi raj tahkanel, ar chi chi̱' ripa̱t i ma' Caypas re' nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱, xquimol ponok qui̱b take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, ch'i̱l wo' take nahsil chipam tinamit
eh chi quimolom chic qui̱b xquitik'a̱' wach quino'jbal chi ricansjic i Jesus. Xquitik'a̱' wo' wach nic' wach richoporic naca'nam chi ma' queht'alim ta take tinamit quitahkanic reh.

Je' aj wili tik'inic xca'n pan quimoloj i̱b: Re' richoporic i Jesus naka'nam ma' re' ta chiwach take rik'ijil nink'i̱j reh chi ma' eta nkajohsaj quic'a̱ take tinamit quitahkanic reh, nqui tik'inic xca'n.

Nok wilic chic i Jesus pan tinamit Weta̱nya ribihnal, jenaj winak re' xilim nak cho ri̱j, xiyuk'ej i Jesus kich'i̱l hoj cablaj chi raj tahkanel reh chi naka'nam kawa' ru̱c' ar pa ripa̱t. Re' winak re're', re' Simon ribihnal, re' wo' re' xesmejic lok riya'bilal ru'um i Jesus.

Ar ajic nok tz'uklic cok i Jesus nah me̱xa chi wi'c, jenaj ixok re' rich'i̱l cho jenaj nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m q'uih ritz'akil c'olic chipam jenaj t'uch c'ola̱b tik'imaj ru̱c' holohic laj abaj, xijil cok ri̱b ru̱c' i Jesus eh xicoj wach na̱ re' nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m re're'.
Naxkilow chi je' re' i hoj raj tahkanel, wilic take kich'i̱l xicakric eh je' wili quitok'a̱' quik'orom chi quiwach: «K'e̱' memil reh ixok wili chi xiyew chi k'e̱b ik'o̱m re're'.
Ta nak re̱t chi xic'ayej ik'o̱m wili chi q'uih ritz'akil eh ru̱c' ritz'akil re're' xitobjic nak take c'acharel c'axic ti nca'n, nqui take.

Re' Jesus, naxina'bej chaj bih nquik'or chi quiwach take kich'i̱l re're', je' wili xik'or queh: «Ma̱wolej tak ixok wili chiri̱j i xiban maj til jenaj ato'bil xiban wi̱n ru̱c' nibuch'uric chipam nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m.
Je' wo', c'olok pan ac'ux tak chi re' take c'acharel c'axic ti nca'n, eriban chi xa nic' pa' ena'n tak ato'bil queh,

raj nchel i hin ma' xa eli̱c ta naniwih'ic chaxilac tak maj xa ma' naht ta chic wilic je rik'ijil chi nanicansjic je. Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi wi̱n i hin tare̱t xiban ixok wili maj chi nok chi cu c'achalqui̱n pe, xa̱j ric'uhtam riye'jic nilok'il c'ahchi' ribanam ru̱c' richihcjic nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m chi nina̱ je' ricab naquibuch'uric take quiquimic je.

Ru̱c' xiban ixok wili, til nik'or chi ma' jaruj ta narojic sahchok wach ribiral ribano̱j. Je' re' nik'or maj xa haj yu̱k' q'uixca̱b narik'ormojic i c'uhbal chiri̱j niquimic, xa nariq'uic wo' pan k'oric i ato̱b laj ato'bil xiban wi̱n, nqui Jesus queh kich tahkanel re're'.

Chiwach aj junc'am re're', to̱b ta wo' nak re' Ju̱ras aj Caryot, re' nak jenaj chi kaxilac i hoj cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus, xo̱j cu̱c' take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios

eh ar xponic ribehsaj cho rik'ahsjic i Jesus pan quik'ab chi je' wili xik'or queh: «Jarub nak tumi̱n enayew tak wi̱n ru̱c' chi enik'ahsaj i Jesus pan ak'ab tak? nqui xik'or queh. Naxquibiraj chi je' re', re' take re' xquitik'a̱' wach riye'eric reh lajeb rica'winak (30) chi sak wach tumi̱n.
Chi je' re' ajic, re' Ju̱ras p'uht risiq'uim ri̱j i junc'am haj suk rik'ahsjic i Jesus eriban pan quik'ab.

Chipam aj chic i pe̱t k'i̱j reh nink'i̱j nc'uxuric wi̱' i caxlan wi'c ma' cojo̱j ta rik'omal sipsbal wach, re' hoj aj tahkanel xkajil cok ki̱b ru̱c' i Jesus eh je' wili xkak'or reh: «Ha̱w, haj wilic i ye'a̱b nawa̱j chi nakatik'a̱b wi̱' i wi'c xik'ekbal re' nakac'uxum wi̱' i q'uijol me̱'? kojqui reh.

Ar ajic re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh quib xib kich'i̱l: «Hiy tak cok pan tinamit Jerusalen ru̱c' jenaj winak re' cu re' na̱weht'alim tak wach eh je' wili chak'or tak reh natiponok tak ru̱c': ‹Re' Jesus re' kaj tijinel je' wili xik'or cho: Re' rik'ijil i ni̱m nik'orom chic ribiral aweh, q'uisi̱n chic ma' nponic wach. Je' re' k'uru' je' ricab nitik'a̱b wach awu̱c', pan apa̱t i hat nwa̱j chi nanibanam niwa' niha̱' wich'i̱l take waj tahkanel chipam i nink'i̱j Pa̱scuwa wili re' nc'uxuric wi̱' i q'uijol me̱', nqui cho, tiquirok tak reh, nqui Jesus.
Je' aj re' ru', re' take kich'i̱l re're' xca'n nic' pa' wach xk'ormojic queh ru'um Jesus eh je' aj re' xi'oquic wo' chi ritik'injic i ni̱m chipam ripa̱t i winak xiponic wi̱'.

Chiri̱j chic ru' nok wilic chic ponok chipam i pa̱t re' tik'imaj wi̱' i nim, re' Jesus nok oconak chic ak'ab reh k'i̱j re're', xoquic nah me̱xa chi naribanam riwa' riha̱' kich'i̱l i hoj cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel
eh nok c'ahchi' chic co̱j chi wi'c, je' wili xik'or keh: «Til coric nik'or, jenaj aweh hat-tak naquirik'ahsam pan quik'ab take naquicansanic wi̱n, nqui xik'or keh.

Ru̱c' k'oric re're', yohbal wach riti'quil kac'ux xoquic cho eh chi je' re' chi kaju'junal p'uht kak'orom reh chi je' wili: «Re' hat aweht'alim chi ma' re' ta i hin nanik'ahsanic aweh, maje' Ha̱w? kojqui reh.

Ar ajic nok jenaj chic kich'i̱l naxibiraj cok reh hab wach i winak narik'ahsanic reh, re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Re' narik'ahsanic wi̱n pan quik'ab take naquicansanic wi̱n, re' wo' awich'i̱l tak wili re' c'ahchi' ric'uxum ricaxlan wi'c wich'i̱l yu'na.

Coric ru', re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel nanicansjic eh je' re' nanic'ulum maj je' re' tz'ihmbimaj cahnok chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios, raj nchel awich'i̱l tak re' naribanam i to'bonic chi naqui̱nquichopom, k'e̱' je quetal wach. Ru'um chi je' re' naribanam, k'e̱' wo' chic ti'quilal naric'ulum. Sakbih nak chi reh chi ma' ta nak xasjic chiwach k'i̱j sakom, nqui Jesus.

Xa chiwach aj wo' junc'am re're', re' Ju̱ras re' xk'ahsanic reh Jesus, je' wili xik'or cok reh: «Ma' re' ta i hin nanik'ahsanic aweh, maje' Ha̱w? nqui cok reh. Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Ma' re' ta na nchel i hat ru' maj ru̱c' ak'orbal c'ahchi' ak'orom chi je' re' na̱banam, nqui reh.

Nok cu wilco̱j wo' nah me̱xa, re' Jesus xichop johtok i caxlan wi'c re' ma' cojo̱j ta rik'omal chi sipsbal reh, xitioxej johtok reh Dios. Chiri̱j chic ru' xich'ak yejal eh xiyew keh hoj cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel chi je' wili c'ahchi' rik'orom keh: «Chach'uy aweh tak eh chac'ux aweh tak i caxlan wi'c wili re' rijalwachej i niti'jolal nibakil, nqui keh.

Chiri̱j chic ru' xichop johtok i jenaj ch'ihch' culc re' wilic wi̱' i ha' tik'imaj ru̱c' ri̱s u̱wa, xitioxej johtok reh Dios eh xiyew keh chi je' wili c'ahchi' rik'orom keh: «Chawuq'uej aweh tak chawunchelal i ha' tik'imaj ru̱c' ri̱s u̱wa re' wilic chipam i culc wili.

Je' re' cha'n tak maj re' ha' tik'imaj ru̱c' ri̱s u̱wa wilic chipam i ch'ihch' culc wili, rijalwachej i niquiq'ue̱l re' narichihquic naquincansjok eh re're' naricamanic chi tik'inbal wach i jenaj chic ac' tik'inic riban i Dios chi yohbal wach c'acharel echic ncuyuric quimahc.

Chawuq'uej aweh tak i ha' tik'imaj ru̱c' ri̱s u̱wa wili k'uru' maj til coric nik'or aweh tak chi ayu' johtok chi kawach ma' ja'xta pe chic wuq'uem chi wilic jalwachanic nariban je' ricab yu'na, cu re' la' chic chipam i k'i̱j nok re' wAja̱w Dios wilqui̱n chic chi k'atal k'oric ru'um, cu re' chic nawuq'uem nok wilic chic jenaj ac' jalwachanic nanibanam ru̱c', nqui Jesus keh.

Chiri̱j chic wili, xquibichej wach i bi̱ch ocronak take chi ribichjic wach chiwach ak'ab je' ricab re're' eh naxquicohlaj wach i quiwa' quiha̱' xquicora̱' je chipam i ye'a̱b re' ribihnej “Ye'a̱b queh take tic Oli̱wo ribihnal”.

Nok behic chic nka'n je, re' Jesus je' wili p'uht rik'orom keh: «Chiwach ak'ab wili chawunchelal hat-tak naquinacana̱b tak chi wutquel nachachop tak elic reh chi ma' eta tichoporic tak eh je' re' nik'or maj chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios je' wili tz'ihmbimaj cahnok: “Naniyeb pan quimic aj cha'jem queh me̱' eh ru̱c' re're' naquipuhcam qui̱b take me̱', nqui tz'ihmbimaj cahnok.

«Re' cok ru', to̱b ta chac'ul aweh tak je' ricab tz'ihmbimaj re're', re' hat-tak na̱soljic wo' tak chic cho wu̱c' chi na̱banam wo' tak chic chi hat-tak waj tahkanel. Re' hin til ch'iclic nic'ux chi je' re' na̱banam tak maj naquinuctok wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak, re' hin nawojic chi pe̱t be̱h chawach tak ar Calile̱ya chi awuyu'njic tak ponok ar, nqui keh.
Ar ajic re' ma' Luch je' wili xic'u'lej wi̱' i Jesus: «Ha̱w, to̱b ta chi'nchel wich aj tahkanel etiquicana̱' chawutquel, re' hin ma' jaruj ta eniban aweh chi je' re', nqui reh.
Chalic i Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Ma' Luch, til coric nik'or chi re' hat chiwach i chak'ab wili na'ok'ok cho rica'pech i las, re' hat oxpech chic ak'orom chi ma' re' ta hat waj tahkanel, nqui reh.

Chalic ma' Luch, je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Ha̱w, wi til nchel curman chi equinquimic chawi̱j, re' hin ma' ru'um ta re' enik'or chi ma' re' ta hin awaj tahkanel, nqui reh. Nic' pa' wach xik'or i Luch reh Jesus, je' wo' re' xkak'or chi'nchel i hoj rich'i̱l.
Chiri̱j chic ru' naxojponic chipam i ye'a̱b Jetsemanih ribihnal, re' Jesus je' wili xik'or keh hoj raj tahkanel: «Titz'uhkok tak cahnok ayu', niban pe cho niti̱j wulu' je, nqui keh.
Chiri̱j re', xo̱j eh xa re' wach ma' Luch ch'i̱l take quib chi rac'u̱n Sewere̱yo xic'am je take chiri̱j. Nok xa nyot'ic chic i ra̱mna xchalic ru'um ritz'irquilal pa ric'ux,

je' wili xik'or queh kich'i̱l re' xic'am je take chiri̱j: «K'e̱' wo' chic ti'quil pan wa̱mna chi xa je' chic naquiricansam nanwic'raj. Ticahnen tak cahnok ayu' k'uru' eh ticuyunok tak chi ti̱j chiwi̱j, nqui queh.

Naxbehic chic je so' chi quiwach je ru', xixuc'a̱' ri̱b eh xoquic chi ti̱j chi je' wili c'ahchi' rik'orom: «W-Aja̱w Dios, re' hin k'e̱' nak nwa̱j chi enawic'saj chi nina̱ i ti'c'axic c'ahchi' nicora̱b je wi̱' wi ta la' nak je' re' enponic chawach, xa re' la' cha'n re' nawa̱j i hat, ma' ok re' nwa̱j i hin, nqui johtok pa riti̱j.

Chiri̱j chic ru', xsoljic wo' chic cho cu̱c' take xib kich'i̱l re're' eh xirak take chi wiric nca'n. Ar ajic je' wili quinakaric xiban: «Ta wo' chic ru' i hat ma' Luch, ma' wo' nchel xacuy tak jenaj o̱ra chi wihch'iljic chi ti̱j?

Pa ricorquil, re' ka̱mna kuxlabal xa rotowej wo' nak cho ribanaric i holohic xa re' la' wilic pech ma' nka'n ta chic ribanaric re're' ru'um k'uhtunak chic kati'jolal. Ru'um aj re', re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi c'a'chok awach tak eh cha'n ati̱j tak reh chi enacuy tak ransil i pajaric c'ulic lok reh chana̱ tak, nqui queh.

Chiri̱j re', xo̱j wo' chic rica'pech chi ribanaric riti̱j chi je' wili c'ahchi' rik'orom: «W-Aja̱w Dios, wi ma' eriban chawach chi enawic'saj chi nina̱ i ti'c'axic c'ahchi' nicora̱b je wi̱', tare̱t chi enic'ul wi la' je' re' nawa̱j i hat, nqui wo' chic johtok pa riti̱j.
Naxsoljic wo' chic cho cu̱c', re' Jesus xirak wo' chic take chi wiric nca'n maj til chopolque̱b take chi coric ru'um wiric.
Naxilow chi je' re' i Jesus xelic je cu̱c' eh xo̱j wo' chic roxpech chi ti̱j chi je' ricab riwi̱' ribanam lok ca'pech.

Naxsoljic wo' chic cho cu̱c' take xib kich'i̱l re're', je' wili xik'or queh naxic'a'saj take cok: «Re' hat-tak xa cu wiric pe' wo' na'n tak chi rihi'lsjic ati'jolal tak! Nic' wach nana'n tak chi je' re' k'uru'? Chacoj tak rehtal, xponic chic wach i junc'am re' take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' coric ta wach quic'ux, xic'ulic lok chi nichoporic i hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel.
Yu'na k'uru' tucten tak cho eh tak-tak. Chawilow tak, re' c'acharel re' c'ahchi' chi to'bonic chi nanichoporic i hin, c'ulic chic lok rich'i̱l take aj chopo̱l, nqui queh.

Xa cu re' wo' ti xicohlaj k'oric i Jesus cu̱c' kich'i̱l re're', re' Ju̱ras re' jenaj keh hoj cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel, xo̱j ti c'olok rich'i̱l take juntuhm chi winak xa yok'o̱k' chic quik'as laj ch'ihch' eh xa yok'o̱k' chic quiche̱'. Re' take re' xitak'abjic cho cu'um take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱, je' wo' cu'um take nahsil chipam tinamit reh chi naquichopom i Jesus

eh ru'um chi re' take re' ma' queht'alim ta wach i Jesus, re' Ju̱ras riyeb nak chic cho queh i jenaj rehtalil chi je' wili: «Haj pa' wilic i winak enitz'ub i pan wach, re're' chachop tak, nqui cho queh.
Chi je' aj re' naxi'o̱j c'olok ru̱c' i Jesus, re' Ju̱ras xijil cok ri̱b ru̱c' eh je' wili xik'or reh: «C'ale̱n Ha̱w waj tijinel, nqui reh. Chiri̱j chic ru' xitz'ub cok i pan wach i Jesus.

Chalic i Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Hat Ju̱ras, re' hat sukquil wu̱c'. Re' pa' jaric xchalic aban, cha'n wo' ti ribanaric, nqui reh. Xa re' wo' ti naxik'or i Jesus chi je' re', re' juntuhm chi winak re're' xquimol ti qui̱b chiri̱j i Jesus chi richoporic.

Naxilow chi je' re' i jenaj keh hoj nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus, xehsaj ti cho rik'as laj ch'ihch' eh xicoj ti je chi ti' jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios, naxiniq'uej nak ricansjic xa re' la', xa re' wo' ti i jenaj chi xiquin xirak je riyoc'oric lok.

Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh raj tahkanel re're': «Chacoj wo' chic ak'as laj ch'ihch' pa ripatil maj ma' riwi̱' ta chi tic'u'lunic ru̱c' re're' ru'um nok re' hab wach k'as laj ch'ihch' rik'ak'ej, je' wo' re' naricansjic wi̱'.

Re' hat wi nchel nacapaj chi re' hin ma' eta riban chi equinpahkanic johtok ru̱c' wAja̱w reh chi equirico'lej cho, ma̱capaj chic chi je' re' maj wi ta la' equinpahkanic johtok ru̱c' i wAja̱w yu'na, xa chiwach wo' nak ti junc'am wili eritak'a̱' cho cablaj tuhm ok chi raj tz'e' wa̱ch chi nico'ljic.
Raj wili ma' je' ta re' c'ahchi' ribanam cho ru'um nok curman chi xo̱j elok wach i tz'ihmbimaj cho pa riC'uhbal i Dios chi naric'uluric je' ricab c'ahchi' ric'ulmujic yu'na, nqui Jesus reh.

Chiri̱j aj chic ru', re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh winak re're': «Chaj wa'ric yu'na chi xa awich'i̱l chic ak'as laj ch'ihch', xa awich'i̱l chic ache̱', xatc'ulic tak lok chi nichoporic je' ricab nanchoporic jeno' aj lek'? Tz'a̱b ru' naxinwih'ic cho kalakal chi ac'uhbaljic tak chi chi̱' i pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, re' hat-tak ma' xinachop ta tak cho ar maj xacoj tak rehtal chi ma' re' ta hin aj ilek'.

Ha̱', re' hat-tak xa'n tak chi je' re' ru'um nok cu re' yu'na xo̱j elok wach nic' nimal tz'ihmbimaj cho chiwi̱j pan Lok' laj Hu̱j cu'um take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios, nqui queh tinamit re're'. Xa re' aj wo' xchoporic i Jesus, xkachop elic i hoj raj tahkanel chiri̱j eh xkacana̱' chi rutquel.

Chiri̱j chic richoporic i Jesus, re' take xichopbic reh xquicora̱' je ru̱c' i Caypas re' nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios. Re're' ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xquimol qui̱b ar pa ripa̱t ch'i̱l wo' take nahsil chipam tinamit.

Nok re' take xichopbic cho reh Jesus xquicana̱' cahnok pan quik'ab take ajabe̱s re're', xi'elic lok chi tz'uhkic chiwach i pa̱t re're'. Chi rilmijic aj chaj bih naric'uluric ru̱c' Jesus, re' ma' Luch re' xa cu naht wo' xitahkej je i Jesus naxc'amaric je, xo̱j wo' ritz'uk'a̱b ri̱b cu̱c' take re'.

Chi je' re' k'uru' ar chipam cok i pa̱t re're', re' quicomonil take nahsil aj no'jbal chi quixilac take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ricab take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱, ch'i̱l wo' take nahsil chipam i tinamit, p'uht quisiq'uim take c'acharel re' enquitz'ak cok rimahc i Jesus reh chi ru̱c' re're' ench'ukuric ri̱j riquimic cu'um take k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma,

xa re' la' ja'xta pe wo' nquirak jeno' rimahc naquitz'akam nak chiri̱j, to̱b ta q'uih take xik'oric cok chucuj k'oric chiri̱j. Chayew aj risiq'uiric ri̱j jeno' rimahc nca'n, cu rehtal xiponic wo' i qui̱b chic aj chucul k'oric

re' je' wili xponic quik'or chiri̱j: «Re' winak wili je' wili nkabiraj chi xik'or cho: Rehtalil chi re' hin, hin i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, eriban chi eniyoj i pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios eh xa chiwach xib k'i̱j ewo' chic enitik'a̱' rijelow-bal, nqui xik'or, nqui take cok.

Chalic i nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱, naxibiraj re're', xpa'lajic tok eh je' wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Xa nabiraj na nquik'or aweh chi je' re'? Chaj bih nacapaj chiri̱j i k'oric c'ahchi' quik'orom chawi̱j take c'acharel wili? nqui reh.

Naxilow chi re' Jesus ma' xc'u'lunic ta, re' nahsil re're' je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh: «Chak'or keh, til na re' hat rAc'u̱n i Dios Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Re' cok ru' chi c'ahchi' ayeb ak'orbal chiwach i kAja̱w Dios c'achlic chi junelic, til nipahkaj aweh chi chak'or wo' keh ricorquil, nqui xik'or reh.

Chalic i Jesus je' wili xic'u'lej wi̱': «Til coric chi je' re' je' ricab xak'or ru̱c' achi̱' eh til coric wo' chi re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, naqui̱nawilom tak chi ar ru̱c' i wAja̱w Dios re' k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal wach rajawric, xnic'ul chic rinimal wach nilok'il je' ricab nok jeno' c'acharel ric'ul rinimal wach rilok'il nanye'eric k'ab reh chi ntz'uhkic cok chi riche̱l jeno' k'atal k'oric. Nok nic'ulum chic nilok'il re're', nanic'ulic wo' chic lok nah rinimal su̱tz' chi k'atoj k'oric chana̱ tak, nqui queh.

Naxibiraj re're' i nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱, c'uhtbal reh chi ma' xponic ta chiwach i k'oric xiban i Jesus xiwek i riso' chiri̱j eh je' wili xik'or: «Re' winak wili k'e̱' wo' chic mahc xiban chiwach i Dios ru̱c' take k'oric re're'. Yu'na k'uru' ma'xta chic camaj keh chi cu enkasic' chic jeno' hab wach eriyew richi̱' chi cojbal rimahc maj re' hoj til xkabiraj chic ru̱c' chi̱' i mahc xiban chiwach i Dios ru̱c' take k'oric xik'or.

Chaj bih nak'or hat-tak k'uru' chiri̱j i winak wili? Chaj bih naka'nam reh? nqui queh rich'i̱l. Re' take re' je' wili xquik'or: «Re' winak re're' nim wach i mahc xiban ru̱c' i xik'or. Til ric'ul chi reh chi naricansjic, nqui take.

Nok quik'orom chic riquimic i Jesus, ar aj ru' wilic take p'uht quichuhbam pan nak' wach, wilic take p'uht quiyeb chi k'abis eh wilic wo' take p'uht quitz'aram cok pan wach chi quipoyom chic pan nak' wach chi tz'ih
eh je' wili nquik'or cok reh chi xa quise'lbal: «Re' hat re' nak'or chi re' Dios xpahbanic aweh chi k'atal k'oric, chak'ijej hab wach c'ahchi' risec'bic cok aweh, nqui take reh.

Cu tz'uklic pe wo' ma' Luch chi chi̱' lok i pa̱t c'ahchi' wi̱' chi k'ixinic, jenaj aj chipoh je' wili xik'or reh naxilow cok wach: «Re' hat, hat wo' jenaj chi quixilac take raj tahkanel i Jesus nchalic pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya, re' wilic cok chipam i pa̱t re're', nqui reh.
Re' ma' Luch je' wili xik'or reh aj chipoh re're' chi quiwach chi'nchel wilque̱b ar: «Tu̱t, ma' weht'alim ta pa' jaric nak'or, nqui reh.

Chiri̱j chic ru', narelic nak chic lok i ma' Luch pan elbal lok reh chi̱' pa̱t re're', jenaj chic ixok xilbic wach je' wili xik'or queh take wilque̱b cok ma' naht ta ru̱c': «Re' winak re're', re' wo' jenaj chi quixilac take raj tahkanel i Jesus re' ribihnej chi aj Nasaret! nqui xik'or queh.
Raj la' ma' Luch je' wili xic'u'lej wi̱': «Tu̱t, til chiwach i Dios, re' winak nak'or re're' ma' weht'alim ta nech' ok wach, nqui xic'u'lej wi̱'.

Junc'am wo' chic chiri̱j ru', wilic queh take tinamit wilque̱b ar chi chi̱' i elbal reh i pa̱t re're' xquijil cok qui̱b ru̱c' i ma' Luch eh je' wili xquik'or reh: «Til coric, re' hat, hat wo' jenaj chi quixilac take raj tahkanel i Jesus. Je' re' nkak'or maj re' ak'orbal chi hat aj pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya, re're' nkarak wi̱' chiri̱j chi hat wo' raj tahkanel i Jesus, nqui take reh.

Chi je' re' ajic re' ma' Luch p'uht rik'orom chi je' wili: «Til wili taxa̱j, re' hin ma' weht'alim ta nech' ok wach i rik'ebil laj winak nak'or tak re're'. Kajok chi nina̱ jeno' ti'c'axic ru'um i Dios wi ma' coric i c'ahchi' nik'orom aweh tak, nqui queh. Xa cu re' wo' ti xicohlaj k'oric i ma' Luch, xok'ic wo' chic cho i jenaj las wilic ar.

Ru̱c' re're', re' ma' Luch xc'ulic cho pa ric'ux i k'oric k'oro̱j cho reh ru'um Jesus chi je' wili: «Na ok'ok wo' chic cho i las, re' hat ma' Luch oxpech chic ak'orom chi ma' re' ta hat waj tahkanel, nqui k'oro̱j cho reh. Chi je' aj re', re' Luch xelic lok chi chi̱' i pa̱t re're' eh til wo' xo̱j riyot' ha' chi ok'ic.

Naxsak'ic chic lok, chi'nchel take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ ch'i̱l take nahsil chipam katinami̱t xquimol qui̱b chi risiq'uiric ri̱j nic' wach ritz'akaric cok rimahc naca'nam chiwach i raj to'o̱l i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma chi nariyeb i Jesus pan quimic.
Je' re' k'uru' nok quirakam chic chaj bih naquik'orom, xquic'am je Jesus chi bac'lic eh xquik'ahsaj pan k'ab i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to re' raj to'o̱l i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma pa riyuk'ul i Jure̱ya.

Nok pan k'ab chic i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to wilic i Jesus, re' Ju̱ras re' xk'ahsanic reh, naxilow chi nariye'eric pan quimic i Jesus, xoquic cho ti'quil ric'ux eh xo̱j wo' chic co̱k cu̱c' take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ ch'i̱l take nahsil chipam tinamit chi risolc'jic queh i lajeb rica'winak (30) chi sak wach tumi̱n, re' xquiyew reh chi xik'ahsaj Jesus pan quik'ab,

eh je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' hin k'e̱' nimal wach mahc xniban maj re' Jesus re' jenaj winak ma'xta nech' ok rimahc, xnik'ahsaj pan ak'ab tak, nqui xik'or queh. Re' take c'amol be̱h re're' je' wili xquic'u'lej wi̱': «Wi nchel mahc xa'n nawic'raj, chaj bih nka̱j reh hoj ru'? xa re' la' wi wilic chic pan kak'ab i Jesus. Je' re' nok, hiy lok wulu' ma'xta chic bih keh awu̱c' i hat, nqui take reh.

Chi je' re', re' Ju̱ras xihilej cho i lajeb rica'winak (30) chi sak wach tumi̱n chi quiwach take c'amol be̱h re're' eh naxelic cho chi chi̱' i pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, xo̱j rijihc'a̱j ri̱b.

Chiri̱j chic, chi re' Ju̱ras xihilej cho i lajeb rica'winak (30) chi sak wach tumi̱n chi quiwach take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱, re' take xquimol i tumi̱n re're' eh je' wili xquik'or chi quiwach: «Re' tumi̱n wili ma' tare̱t ta chic chi enkac'ol chipam i c'ola̱b reh tumi̱n nye'eric chi si̱ chiwach i Dios maj ritz'akil cansbal reh jenaj winak, nqui take chi quiwach.

Je' re' ajic chiri̱j chi quimolom chic wach quino'jbal take nahsil re're', xquitik'a̱' wach chi quiwach chi naquilok'om jenaj ye'a̱b re' nc'ulic quesaj wi̱' k'antz'a'p take aj tik'inel tz'ak ac'al xun. Je' re' ajic xquilok' i ye'a̱b re're' reh chi naricamanic chi ye'a̱b muk'unbal queh take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel aj toco̱m chic tinamit, re' quiquimic ar Jerusalen.

Re' ye'a̱b re're' ru'um chi xlok'oric ru̱c' ritz'akil cansbal reh jenaj winak, xcahnic ribihnal chi je' wili: “Ye'a̱b Lok'o̱j Ru̱c' Ritz'akil Cansbal Reh Jenaj Winak”. Xa cu je' wo' re' ribihnal yu'na chiwach take k'i̱j c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam wi̱' i hu̱j wili.

Ru̱c' xca'n take nahsil re're', xo̱j elok wach i k'oric wilic chipam i hu̱j xitz'ihmbaj i raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios re' Jeremi̱yas ribihnal. Chipam i hu̱j re're' je' wili rik'or: “Re' take nahsil chi quina̱ take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, lajeb rica'winak (30) chi sak wach tumi̱n xquibehsaj chi tojbal ri̱j ricansjic i winak re' k'e̱' ti' nic'rijic ru'um i Dios. Re' tumi̱n xquiyew chi tojbal re're', xquimol wo' chic,

eh ru̱c' re're' xquilok' i ye'a̱b nc'ulic quesaj wi̱' k'antz'a'p take aj tik'inel tz'ak ac'al xun. Re' take re' je' re' xca'n nimbal reh k'oric xitak'a̱' cho rik'ormojic wi̱n i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Dios, nqui rik'or chipam i hu̱j re're'.

Nok re' Jesus pa'lic chic chiwach i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to re' raj to'o̱l i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma, je' wili xk'ormojic reh: «Jesus, til na coric chi re' hat i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi quina̱ take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel? nqui xk'ormojic. Chalic Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Ho̱', coric. Re' wo' hat c'ahchi' ak'oric chi je' re', nqui xik'or.

Chi je' re', nok re' take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ ch'i̱l take nahsil chipam katinami̱t wilque̱b cok ar, p'uht quitz'akam cok riman rimahc i Jesus, re're' ma' xik'or ta jeno' k'oric queh c'amol be̱h re're'.
Naxilow i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to chi re' Jesus ma' nc'u'lunic ta, re're' je' wili xik'or reh: «Xa nabiraj na amahc nquitz'ak chawi̱j take wili? nqui reh.
Re' Jesus xa ta nak chi je' re' xik'or jeno' k'oric. Chi xa nsahchic chic ric'ux i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to ru'um chi ma' nc'u'lunic ta Jesus,

xc'ulic cho pa ric'ux nic' nak wach rok'tjic naribanam je maj wilic jenaj bano̱j rocsam wi̱' ri̱b chi eli̱c ha̱b rok'taj je jeno' tz'ahpel chiwach i nink'i̱j Pa̱scuwa, re' k'orel hab pa' wach nquipahkaj i tinamit chi narok'tjic je.
Je' re' ajic ru'um chi wilic cho pan che̱' jenaj winak wilic ribiral chi aj cansanel re' Warawas ribihnal,

re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to je' wili xik'or queh take tinamit quimolom qui̱b ru̱c': «Hab wach nawa̱j tak chi nawok'tam je queh take aj pan che'enel, re' Warawas on re' Jesus re' nak'or tak chi c'ahchi' rik'orom chi re're' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chana̱ hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel? nqui xik'or queh. Je' re' xik'or chi ma' ra̱j ta nak riyeb i Jesus pan quimic
ru'um xirak chiri̱j chi re' take c'amol be̱h re're', xa ixowbal wach i Jesus xquik'ahsaj pan k'ab.

Je' wo' chic, nok tz'uklic i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to pa riye'a̱b re' riban wi̱' k'atoj k'oric, je' wili xtak'abjic cho rik'ormojic reh ru'um rehq'ue̱n: «Re' winak wili ma'xta nech' ok rimahc eh chi rehtalil chi je' re', re' hin xniban jenaj ma' holohic ta laj ilo̱j pa niwiric ntunah. Ma' chi bih amin wi̱' awi̱b ru̱c' i winak re' k'uru', nqui xk'ormojic reh.

Je' re' ajic re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to xa̱j nak rok'tam je i Jesus xa re' la' take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ ch'i̱l take nahsil chipam katinami̱t, xca'n cok chi re' take c'acharel xa nch'uk chic quic'ux chi xquipahkaj reh Po̱nsyo Pila̱to chi narok'tam je i Warawas eh chi re' Jesus naritak'a̱b ricansjic.

Chi je' aj re', naxbirmijic wo' chic queh tinamit ru'um i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to chi hab wach queh qui̱b winak re're' nca̱j chi narok'tam je, re' take re' je' wili xquik'or cok: «Re' Warawas nka̱j chi nawok'tam je, nqui take reh.

Naxibiraj chi je' re' i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to je' wili xik'or queh: «Chaj bih nawa̱j tak chi nanibanam ru̱c' i Jesus re' xquik'or wi̱n take aj nahsil chana̱ tak chi nk'oric chiri̱j chi re're' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, nqui queh. Chi cunchelal take c'acharel chi xa junk'oric chic take, je' wili xquik'or: «Re' Jesus re're' chacansaj wach curu̱s, nqui take.

Ru'um aj re', re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to je' wili xik'or wo' chic queh tinamit: «Chaj bih mahc xiban i winak wili k'uru' chi naricansjic wach curu̱s, nqui queh. Re' take c'acharel ma' re' ta chic re' nquibiraj xa re' la' chic riquimic i Jesus wach curu̱s cow c'ahchi' quipahkam cok.

Je' re' ajic naxilow i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to chi ma'xta chic bih ntihkic wach cu̱c' i tinamit re're', ojic la' chic c'ahchi' ribanam chi nim i wolic, xipahkaj je nech' ha' eh p'uht ritz'ajam rik'ab chi quiwach i tinamit c'uhtbal reh chi xesaj ri̱b chipam i mahc re're'. Chiri̱j chic ru' je' wo' wili xik'or queh: «Re' hin ma'xta chic nimahc ru̱c' riquimic i winak coric wach ric'ux wili. Chana̱ aj tak hat-tak kajok i mahc re're', nqui queh.

Re' take tinamit naxquibiraj re're', je' wili xquik'or: «Wi re' winak re're' ma'xta rimahc, chi kana̱ i hoj ch'i̱l take ka̱' ki'sil, kajok i ti'c'axic eriyew cho i Dios ru'um ricansjic enka'n je, nqui take.

Chi je' aj re' pahkanic xca'n take tinamit re're', re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to xok'taj je i Warawas eh re' Jesus xik'ahsaj pan quik'ab take riso̱l chi naquitz'uhumem eh chiri̱j chic ru' naquicansam wo' wach curu̱s.
Chiri̱j chic re', re' take riso̱l i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to xquic'am lok Jesus chi chi̱' lok i pa̱t quiwih'ic wi̱'. Nok wilque̱b chic ar chi cunchelal take sol xquisutej ri̱j i Jesus
eh nok p'uht quesam lok riso' chiri̱j, jenaj chic cak moyic laj tz'ih je' ricab ncojoric reh jenaj k'atal k'oric, xquicoj chiri̱j.

Ma' xa re' ta re' xca'n reh, xquicoj la' wo' wach na̱ jenaj pach'amaj wach eh cotomaj rij jenaj ku̱l q'ui̱x. Je' wo', xquiyew pan risec'a̱j k'ab jenaj caxlan a̱j je' ricab ribasto̱n jeno' k'atal k'oric eh chi je' re' p'uht quixuc'a̱b qui̱b chiwach chi je' wili c'ahchi' quik'orom cok reh: «C'ale̱n, hat quik'atal k'oric take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel! nqui take reh chi xa quise'lbal.
Re' take re', je' wo' xquichuhmlom pan nak' wach eh quik'ojlom wo' cok rij na̱ reh bolobic laj che̱' nquimak' reh.

Chiri̱j chic ribanaric reh xa nic' pa' nimal xca̱j ca'nam reh Jesus chi xa quise'elbal, xquesaj wo' chic lok cak moyic laj tz'ih xquicoj chiri̱j eh naxca'n chi je' re', xquic'am je i Jesus chiri̱j lok i tinamit reh chi naricansjic ar wach curu̱s.

Nok c'ahchi' chic quicora̱b je chipam i ye'a̱b re' narijap'aric wi̱' i Jesus wach curu̱s, re' take sol xquic'ul cok jenaj winak aj Sire̱ne Simon ribihnal, xquitolej chi ritobjic i Jesus chi ritehljic je riche'lal ro̱k i curu̱s eh xibiraj wo' k'oric chi quiwach.
Chiri̱j ru', nok pononak chic china̱ i yu̱k' “Co̱lcota” ribihnal re' ribihnej wo' chi “Ribakil Na̱ Camnak”,

re' take sol xquiyew reh Jesus ch'amsamaj laj ri̱s u̱wa xilacamaj ch'i̱l c'ah laj ha' chi naruq'uem, xa re' la' ru' naxic'raj chi je' ru̱c' ik'o̱m kahsbal wach ti' c'ahchi' quiyeb cok reh, ma' xa̱j ta chic ruq'uem.

Ar aj ru' nok jiclic chic wach curu̱s i Jesus chi naquijap'am, re' take sol p'uht quik'ijem ri̱j riso' chi naquipuhcam chi quiwach eh chi je' re' xo̱j elok wach i k'oro̱j cho ru'um jenaj raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios naxk'oric cho chiri̱j i Jesus chi je' wili: “Re' take c'acharel p'uht quik'ijem ri̱j niso', reh chi naquipuhcam chi quiwach, nqui xik'or cho.
Chiri̱j chic chi re' take sol xquipuhcaj chi quiwach riso' i Jesus eh xitz'uhkic cok chi richa'jaljic ar,

juntuhm chic take sol xquijap' jenaj rehtalil ma' naht ta wach na̱ i Jesus. Re' rehtalil re're', re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' chaj bih aj chiri̱j narijap'aric wi̱' wach curu̱s, je' wili rik'or: “Re' Jesus wili, quik'atal k'oric take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, nqui rik'or.

Chiri̱j chic ricojoric i rehtalil re're', re' take sol xquijap' i Jesus wach curu̱s eh xquijohsaj johtok. Je' wo' re' xca'n cu̱c' take qui̱b chic aj lek'. Jenaj queh xjohsjic johtok chiwach ricuru̱s pa risec'a̱j je i Jesus eh re' jenaj chic ar xquijohsaj johtok pa ritz'e̱t.
Nok johsomaj chic johtok i Jesus wach curu̱s, xa hab wach tinamit qui'iq'uic je ma' naht ta ru̱c', xa nquitz'ujlom chic johtok.

Je' wili nquik'or johtok reh chi xa quise'elbal: «Re' hat re' tik'oric chi enayoj i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios eh chi enatik'a̱' wo' chic chiwach i xib k'i̱j, chaco'lej awi̱b yu'na k'uru'. Wi til coric chi re' hat, hat rAc'u̱n i Dios, chac'uhtaj keh chi je' re' ru̱c' akajic cho wach curu̱s, nqui nquik'or johtok reh.

Je' wo', re' take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, ch'i̱l take cow laj niminel reh c'uhbal re're', ch'i̱l wo' take toco̱m chic nahsil chipam katinami̱t, je' wili xquik'or chi xa se'lbal pan nak' wach:

«Re' take toco̱m chic c'acharel xico'lej take cho chipam quic'axquilal eh tz'a̱b ru' chi ribil ri̱b ma' c'ahchi' ta rico'lem ri̱b chipam i ti'c'axic wilic wi̱'. Re' hat xak'or chi re' hat i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi kana̱ hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, maje'? Wi til aj coric chi je' re', tikajen cho wach curu̱s reh chi ewo' nkacoj awach i hat.

Til je' re' nkak'or maj wi rik'or chi re're' rAc'u̱n i Dios eh chi ch'iclic ric'ux chiri̱j, re' Dios riwi̱' wo' chi reh chi enchalic chi ritobjic wi til coric chi k'e̱' ti' nic'rijic i Jesus, nqui take.
Je' wo', jenaj queh qui̱b aj lek' xijap'aric wach curu̱s ar chi riche̱l i Jesus, xoquic chi ritz'ujuric ru' eh ru̱c' re're' xic'uhtaj chi ma' ch'iclic ta ric'ux chiri̱j Jesus.
Naxponic cablaj o̱ra reh k'i̱j re're', xoquic cho k'ekom wach ac'al cu rehtal xponic je' na q'uisi̱n ma' xib o̱ra risoljic i k'i̱j.

Ar aj ru' nok q'uisi̱n na chic ma' riban xib o̱ra, re' Jesus xk'oric ru̱c' ansil naxik'or chi je' wili pan k'oric hewre̱yo: «Eli̱, Eli̱, la̱ma sawacta̱ni? nqui xik'or. Re' k'oric re're', re' tz'ihmbimaj wo' cho pan Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios, je' wili ra̱j rik'orom: “Hat Lok' laj wAja̱w Dios, chaj wa'ric nok nwic'raj chi xinacana̱' chi wutquel chipam i ti'c'axic wili? nqui ra̱j rik'orom.

Chi quixilac take c'acharel xibirinic reh k'oric xiban i Jesus, wilic take je' wili xquik'or: «Re' wili, re' aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios, re' Eli̱yas ribihnal c'ahchi' rik'o'rem johtok chi naric'ulic tobjok chipam ric'axquilal, nqui take.

Ru'um aj re', xa chiwach wo' ti junc'am re're' jenaj queh take xibirinic reh k'oric re're' xo̱j ric'ahmaj jenaj mi̱x, ximuh pan ch'amsamaj laj ri̱s u̱wa eh naxipix chi ju' jenaj caxlan a̱j, xiyew nak johtok reh Jesus chi naritz'ubem so' reh chi to'bal reh chipam riti'quilal,
xa re' la' wilic take xipitbic reh winak re're' chi je' wili: «Chacana̱', chiban pe ar maj wi xato'bej ma' eta chic nkilow wi enc'ulic tobjok ru'um Eli̱yas chipam riti'quilal, nqui take reh.
Ar ajic, xa cu re' wo' junc'am quik'orom re're', re' Jesus xiq'uer johtok chi̱' chi cow eh xelic ruxla̱b.

Xa chiwach aj wo' junc'am re're', re' tz'ih poybal reh lok' laj ye'a̱b wilic chipam i pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, xwek yejal cu china̱ xip'ut cho wekic cu xponic jok chi ro̱k. Je' wo', xiban jenaj cow laj hihc chiwach ri'orahil naxquimic Jesus cu rehtal re' take abaj wilque̱b watak yu̱k' xiq'uerebic take cho.

Je' wo', re' take muk'unbal wilque̱b watak yu̱k' xitehebic wo' cho chi̱' eh ru̱c' re're', yohbal wach take c'acharel coric wach quic'ux chiwach i Dios re' camnak take cho najtir k'i̱j, xi'uctic cho chi xic'acharic wo' chic.

Re' take c'acharel xi'elic cho pan quimuk'unbal re're', re' aj wo' re' xi'oquic cok chipam i lok' laj tinamit Jerusalen pa ro̱x k'i̱j chiri̱j chi uctunak chic cho Jesus chi quixilac camnak eh xquic'uhtaj qui̱b queh yohbal wach c'acharel ar.

Je' wo' naxquimic i Jesus, re' c'amol quibe̱h take sol aj Ro̱ma ch'i̱l take riso̱l c'ahchi' quicha'janic reh Jesus, je' wili xquik'or chi yo'jonak take: «Re' winak wili til po' wo' nchel coric chi rAc'u̱n i Dios, nqui take naxquilow i hihc ch'i̱l nic' pa' nimal xc'uluric chi quiwach.

Nic' pa' nimal xc'uluric re're', xilmijic wo' ru'um juntuhm take ixok re' take nok cu c'achlic i Jesus, xquicana̱' cho quitinami̱t pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya chi ritahkaljic i Jesus eh xquito'bej wo' cho ru̱c' riye'eric pa' bih reh. Chi quixilac take ixok c'ahchi' quilom je chi naht i ricansjic i Jesus,

wilque̱b take ixok je' wili quibihnal: Re' Mari̱ya aj Majta̱la, re' Mari̱ya re' ritu̱t i Jesus eh ritu̱t wo' i Chep ch'i̱l i Jaco̱wo re' ro̱x ac'un. Wilic wo' ar i ritu̱t i San ch'i̱l i Wa̱n, rac'u̱n take i Sewere̱yo.
Nok q'uisi̱n nak chic ma' noquic i k'i̱j, jenaj biho̱m laj winak aj Arimate̱ya Chep ribihnal, aj tahkanel wo' reh Jesus,

xo̱j ru̱c' i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to eh xipahkaj chi eriyew k'ab reh chi erimuk'a̱' riti'jolal i Jesus. Je' re' k'uru' nok re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to riyeb chic cho k'ab chi narik'ahsjic reh riti'jolal i Jesus chi narimuk'a̱b,
re' Chep re're' ch'i̱l take toco̱m chic c'acharel xo̱j ribotej riti'jolal i Jesus pan jenaj sak laj tz'ih eh chiri̱j chic ru', xquic'am je

pan jenaj muk'unbal ma' ja' cojo̱j ta re' tik'imaj ru'um pan jenaj ma' laj abaj. Chipam aj muk'unbal re're', xquicoj riti'jolal i Jesus eh nok quitz'apam chic cho chi̱' i muk'unbal re're' ru̱c' jenaj nim coten laj abaj, re' Chep ch'i̱l take rich'i̱l xelic je ar
chi cu xquicana̱' pe cahnok i Mari̱ya aj Majta̱la ch'i̱l wo' i Mari̱ya re' quitu̱t i Jaco̱wo ch'i̱l i Chep, chi tz'ukulque̱b ar chi chi̱' i muk'unbal chi ok'ic nca'n chiri̱j Jesus.

Nok iq'uinak chic lok i k'i̱j tik'inbal wi̱' ki̱b hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi nakahi'lic, re' take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ ch'i̱l take i cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xo̱j quimol qui̱b chiwach i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to,

eh je' wili xquik'or reh: «Ajabe̱s ma' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to, re' hoj nc'ulic pan kac'ux chi re' Jesus re' ritz'ak ri̱b chi kak'atal k'oric, je' wili rik'orom cho chi cu c'achlic: ‹Pa ro̱x k'i̱j niquimic, re' hin nawuctic wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak, nqui rik'orom.

«Ru'um aj re' nkapahkaj aweh chi chatak'a̱' richa'jaljic chi coric i rimuk'unbal. Je' re' cha'n cu rehtal nponic i ro̱x k'i̱j maj ma' qui'o̱j nchel chak'ab take raj tahkanel chi resmejic riti'jolal eh equi'oquic chi rik'ororic queh tinamit chi xuctic wo' chic rica'pech. Wi xa xkacana̱' chi je' re' enca'n take raj tahkanel, k'e̱' nchel c'ahbil enca'n keh maj k'e̱' chic q'uihal take tinamit equicojbic wach i chucuj k'oric enca'n lok, ma' xa je' ta chic q'uihal take tinamit xicojbic wach chi re're' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, nqui take reh.

Chalic i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to, je' wili xik'or queh: «Hiy tak k'uru', chajap' tak cho chi̱' i muk'unbal re're' je' ricab tichol tak ribanaric hat-tak. Je' wo' chic, ayu' c'ahchi' wo' niyeb je aweh tak juntuhm niso̱l wili chi richa'jaljic i muk'unbal re're', nqui queh.

Chi je' re', re' take c'amol be̱h re're' ch'i̱l take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xi'o̱j re' wilic wi̱' rimuk'unbal i Jesus eh naxiponic ar, quilutz' chi̱' chi coric. Chiri̱j chic ru' xquipix cho jenaj rehtalil ilbal reh wi hab wach entz'a'anic reh muk'unbal eh ar xquicana̱' wo' cho take sol chi cha'janic.

Xa re' wo' ti xponic waki̱b o̱ra reh xik'ek re' ncux'ic wi̱' i hi'lbal k'i̱j eh np'uhtic cok i tomincu' k'i̱j re' pe̱t k'i̱j reh xama̱na chi keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, re' Mari̱ya aj Majta̱la ch'i̱l i jenaj chic Mari̱ya xi'o̱j ti chi riliric rimuk'unbal i Jesus reh chi cu wahk'ek ti nasak'ok lok reh Tomincu' k'i̱j nacojic wo' chi aj buch'unel reh riti'jolal.

Naxiponic aj pan muk'unbal reh tomincu' k'i̱j, xquicoj rehtal chi xiban pe' lok jenaj ma' laj hihc eh xquilow wo' chi jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Dios kajanak cho pan taxa̱j rijilim cok ri̱b chi chi̱' i muk'unbal chi ric'uyu'sjic lok i ma' laj abaj ntz'apbic chi̱' i muk'unbal re're'. Re' aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' xitz'uka̱' wo' ri̱b china̱ i ma' coten laj abaj c'uyu'sumaj chi lok ru'um
eh re' rilbal xa nch'abch'atic chic xa je' chic ricab rich'a̱b i cohok. Re' riso' xa nrepretic chic risakil, xa je' chic ricab sak laj su̱tz'.

Ar aj ru' re' take ixok re're' k'e̱' wo' chic xiyo'jic eh je' wo' re' xquic'ul take sol quicha'janic reh rimuk'unbal i Jesus. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' ma' cu ta chic xic'uyu'jic ru'um yo'jic, xicahnic la' chi xa je' chic take camnak nok c'ahchi' nak ti que̱b chi cha'janic.

Chi je' re' k'uru', re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios je' wili xik'or queh take ixok re're': «Ma' tiyo'jic tak ru'um chi wilqui̱n ayu'. Re' hin weht'alim chi xatc'ulic tak lok ayu' chi risiq'uiric i Jesus re' xcansjic wach curu̱s,
xa re' la' ma'xta chic ayu' ru'um nok xuctic chic chi quixilac take camnak je' ricab rik'orom wo' cho aweh tak. Quim tak k'uru', toque̱n tak cho pa rimuk'unbal eh chawilow tak chi ma'xta chic ayu'.

Yu'na chi xawilow tak chic chi coric re' xnik'or aweh tak, hiy chaloq'uej awi̱b tak chi ojic cu̱c' take awich aj tahkanel tak eh chak'or tak queh chi re' Jesus xuctic chic chi quixilac take camnak. Je' wo', chak'or tak queh chi nachimol ri̱b awich'i̱l tak ar pa riyuk'ul i Calile̱ya, re're' pe̱t narojic chawach tak eh ar na̱rakam awi̱b tak rich'i̱l. Til chacoj tak rehtal chi til coric take k'oric xnik'or aweh tak wili, nqui raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios.

Je' re' ajic, re' take ixok re're' xi'elic je chipam i muk'unbal chi xa suk chic quic'ux eh xa cu yo'jonak wo' take so', xi'o̱j cajim chi rik'ororic queh quich aj tahkanel i holohic laj k'oric xquibiraj je. Nok xa cajamem aj chic je qui̱b chi ojic,
re' Jesus xelic cho pan quibe̱h eh xic'alenej take. Ar aj ru' re' take ixok re're' xquijil cok qui̱b ru̱c', xquixuc'a̱' qui̱b chiwach eh xquitok'a̱' quik'ahchem chi ro̱k chi ye'bal rilok'il.

Chiri̱j chic ru' re' Jesus je' wili xik'or wo' queh: «Hiy tak, ma' tiyo'jic tak chi rik'ormojic queh waj tahkanel i holohic laj k'oric chi c'achalqui̱n wo' chic. Je' wo' chic, reh chi re' take re' equi'o̱j ar Calile̱ya, chak'or tak queh chi ar nakilom kawach quich'i̱l, nqui Jesus queh.

Nok c'ahchi' cojic take ixok chi rik'ororic re' xk'ormojic je queh ru'um Jesus, wilic wo' take sol aj cha'janel reh rimuk'unbal i Jesus xi'oquic cok pan tinamit Jerusalen chi rik'ormojic queh c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ nic' nimal xc'ulmujic chi quiwach.

Naxquibiraj re' chaj bih xponic k'ormojok queh, re' take c'amol be̱h re're' xquimol ti qui̱b ch'i̱l take quich nahsil chipam katinami̱t eh xquitik'a̱' ti wach quino'jbal chiri̱j chaj bih naca'nam. Je' re' nok xquitik'a̱' wach chi xquiyew q'uihal tumi̱n queh aj cha'janel re're' reh chi naquic'amam na̱ i hunu̱j

xk'ormojic chi je' wili: «Wi xquibiraj aweh tak chaj bih xc'uluric ru̱c' riti'jolal i Jesus, re' hat-tak je' wili chak'or tak: ‹Naxkajic mahnic' kawiric pan chak'ab, xic'ulic lok take raj tahkanel i Jesus eh xquesaj je riti'jolal, tiquirok tak.
«Wi nchel xina'bej i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to chi pan awiric tak xc'ulic esmejok riti'jolal i Jesus, re' chic hoj ekojk'oric chawi̱j tak reh chi ma' eta riyew ti'c'axic chana̱ tak, nqui xk'ormojic queh.

Je' re' ajic re' take sol re're' xquic'am je tumi̱n re're', xi'oquic wo' lok chi rik'ororic re' xk'ormojic cho queh. Ru'um aj re' cu chiwach take k'i̱j re' c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam wi̱' i hu̱j wili, xa cu c'ahchi' wo' relic lok ribiral chi kaxilac hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi re' riti'jolal i Jesus xa xponic esmejok cho cu'um take raj tahkanel.

Chiri̱j chic take k'i̱j reh ructic i Jesus, re' hoj junlaj pahbamaj chi quinahsil take aj tahkanel ch'i̱l wo' take quitahkanic reh Jesus xoj-o̱j pa riyuk'ul i Calile̱ya chipam i jenaj yu̱k' xitak'a̱' rik'ormojic keh Jesus chi nakarakam wi̱' ki̱b rich'i̱l.

Naxojponic ajic chipam i yu̱k' re're', re' hoj nahsil raj tahkanel xkalok'ej wach i Jesus naxkilow wach, xa re' la' ma' chi kunchelal ta xca'n chi je' re', maj wilic ju'jun wilque̱b chi kaxilac ma' til ta xquicoj wach chi til re' Jesus wilic chi kaxilac.

Chi je' re', re' Jesus xijil cok ri̱b ku̱c' eh je' wili xik'or keh: «Ru'um nok re' wAja̱w Dios xiyew chic wi̱n i wajawric wilic chi quina̱ take nic' nimal wilque̱b pan taxa̱j je' wo' chi quina̱ take nic' nimal wilque̱b wach ac'al,

re' hin tinitak'a̱' tak je chi rik'ormojic niC'uhbal queh chi'nchel i tinamit chi junsut wach ac'al. Je' re' na̱banam tak reh chi naquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiwi̱j take tinamit, ewo' nca'n chi waj tahkanel chic take. Re' take naquic'ambic na̱ niC'uhbal, chakahsaj tak quiha̱' chi c'ahchi' ak'orom tak johtok ribihnal i Ajabe̱s Dios, ch'i̱l hin Ac'unbe̱s ch'i̱l wo' Lok' laj Uxlabal.

Je' wo', pan ac'uhbalanic tak chak'or tak queh chi riwi̱' chi queh chi enquinimej i tak'anic c'ahchi' nibanam aweh tak wili maj riwi̱' chaweh hat-tak chi'nchel waj tahkanel chi enak'or tak niC'uhbal. Je' re' k'uru', hiy tak chi ribanaric xnik'or aweh tak eh ma' tiyo'jic tak maj re' hin xa eli̱c wo' naniwih'ic awu̱c' tak chi atobjic tak pan uxlabal cu rehtal ncux'ic wach ac'al wili, nqui Jesus keh. Re' aj i wili ricorquilal xnitz'ihmbaj i hin ma' Tiyoh chiri̱j ric'acharic i Jesus.
Je' wili xch'ihquic wi̱' ato̱b laj rik'ormojic chiri̱j co'lbal i̱b xic'am cho i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh rAc'u̱n wo' i Dios:

Najtir cho k'i̱j jenaj raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios re' Isayi̱yas ribihnal, je' wili xitz'ihmbaj cho: “Re' hin xnibiraj naxik'or i Dios reh rAc'u̱n chi je' wili: ‘Re' hin naca̱t nitak'a̱b jok wach ac'al, xa re' la' chiwach jok awojic i hat, pe̱t nanitak'a̱b je cu̱c' i tinamit jenaj waj tz'e' wa̱ch. Re're' nariye'bic rehtal queh aponic, je' ricab chi jeno' winak c'ahchi' ta nak ritik'a̱' ribe̱h jeno' k'atal k'oric ponic reh, nqui Dios reh rAc'u̱n.

“Chiri̱j wili re' hin xnibiraj chi je' wili xk'ormojic reh jenaj winak c'ahchi' riyuk'em take tinamit ar pan jenaj ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel: ‘Je' ricab nantik'injic jeno' be̱h ru'um ponic reh jeno' k'atal k'oric chi k'o'ronic, re' hat chatik'a̱' wo' take tinamit chi ric'uluric i Ajabe̱s Pahbamaj wu'um chi K'atal K'oric re' nariponic chi quik'o'rjic. Queh take tinamit re're' chak'or chi curman naquicorsam wach quic'acharic je' ricab nok jeno' winak ricorsaj wach take yocyoc laj be̱h ru'um reh riponic jeno' k'atal k'oric, nqui Dios nqui xitz'ihmbaj cho ma' Isayi̱yas.

Je' aj wo' re' xc'uluric. Re' kAja̱w Dios xitak'a̱' wo' cho i raj k'orol re' Wa̱n ribihnal. Naxip'ut ricamaj i Wa̱n je' wili quic'uhbaljic take tinamit xiban: «Chacana̱' tak ribanaric i mahc reh chi re' Dios ericuy amahc tak eh cu re' aj ru' re' hin enikahsaj aha̱' tak, nqui queh.

Je' aj wo' re' xiban i Wa̱n ar pan nim ro̱k ha' Jortan ribihnal. Xikahsaj wo' quiha̱' take nic' pa' q'uihal take c'acharel aj Jerusalen ch'i̱l wo' take toco̱m chic c'acharel aj pa riyuk'ul Jure̱ya take, xa re' la' ru' xa re' xikahsaj riha̱' i xasjic cho pan ra̱mna rik'ormojic chi je' wili: «K-Aja̱w Dios, re' hin nirak chiri̱j chi hin aj mahc, nqui xik'or.

Re' Wa̱n naxwih'ic ar pan chik yu̱k', chili'l ch'i̱l ri̱s winak ca̱b xiwa'bej. Xa ritz'uhmal ti ri̱j nim laj chicop came̱yo ribihnal xicoj chiri̱j chi jelow-bal riso' eh xa junrahp wo' ti chi tz'uhu̱m xibac'bej wi̱' ripa̱m.

Ar ajic je' wili rik'or queh tinamit naric'uhbalej take: «Chiwi̱j i hin naric'ulic lok i Ajabe̱s K'atal K'oric re' nic' wo' chic na̱ rajawric chi niwach. Re're' ma' eta riyew ri̱b chi xa ta nak re' t'uch wach camanic je' ricab resmejic lok riper xijab ajabe̱s riban jeno' aj camanom, eric'ul chi wi̱n chi eniban chiwach.

Re' hin yu'na xa ru̱c' ti ha' c'ahchi' nikahsam aha̱' tak raj la' Ajabe̱s K'atal K'oric re're' til naribanam chi naritak'a̱b cho i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios chi nariwih'ic pan ac'acharic hat-tak re' tiniminic tak reh, nqui Wa̱n queh.

Chipam take k'i̱j nok kahsanic ha' riban i Wa̱n, re' Jesus xelic cho pan tinamit Nasaret re' wilic pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya eh ar aj ru' xchalic chi rikahsjic riha̱' ru̱c' i Wa̱n ar pan nim laj ha' Jortan.
Naxelic cho pan ha' i Jesus xilow chi tehlic pa̱m i taxa̱j eh chi re' Lok' laj Uxlabal kajic riban cho china̱ chi je' ricab jenaj rexba̱.

Re' Jesus xibiraj naxk'oric cho i Dios pan taxa̱j chi je' wili: «Re' hat wAc'u̱n, til k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj. K'e̱' wo' sukquil pa nic'ux chawi̱j ru'um chi xatnipahba̱' chi Ajabe̱s K'atal K'oric, nqui cho Dios.
Nok kahsamaj chic riha̱' i Jesus xc'amaric je ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal chipam jenaj ye'a̱b chik yu̱k'

re' xwih'ic wi̱' chiwach ca'winak (40) k'i̱j. Chipam i ye'a̱b re're', re' wilque̱b wo' wi̱' take josk' laj chicop eh re' xiwih'ic wo' wi̱' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios chi aj to'o̱l reh Jesus, re' aj Yahm xisic' ri̱j ripajaric i Jesus chi narik'ebem nak pan mahc.
Chiri̱j chic ru' nok tz'ahpanak chic i Wa̱n pan che̱', re' Jesus xo̱j ar Calile̱ya chi ribanaric i c'uhbalanic chiri̱j holohic laj ribiral wili chiri̱j i Dios chi xip'ut chic k'atoj k'oric.

Je' wili i quic'uhbaljic i tinamit xiban: «Xirak chic rik'ijil chi re' Dios xa loq'uil chic ritok'a̱' wo' chic k'atoj k'oric chi quina̱ take c'acharel. Chajal tak wach ano'jbal k'uru' eh chanimej tak i holohic laj ribiral re're', nqui rik'or.

Chiri̱j i wili nok behic riban chi chi̱' nim laj ha' wilic ar pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya, re' Jesus xilow quiwach take qui̱b chi aj car re' Simon ch'i̱l i Tirix re' richa̱k' ru' eh nok c'ahchi' quicutum jok pan ha' i quiya'l chopbal car,

je' wili xik'or queh: «Tak tak chiwi̱j chi na̱banam tak chi waj tahkanel. Chi jelow-bal i chopoj car na'n tak, re' hin eniban chi re' chic take awas acha̱k' ena'n tak chi enquichop quic'ux chiwi̱j i hin, nqui queh.
Naxquibiraj chi je' re', re' take qui̱b re're' chi jumehk'il xquicana̱' cho quicamaj chi aj chopol car take eh xi'o̱j chiri̱j i Jesus chi raj tahkanel.

Chiri̱j wili nok c'ahchi' ritikim ju' ribe̱h, re' Jesus xo̱j rirak take rac'u̱n ma' Sewere̱yo, re' Jaco̱wo ch'i̱l i Wa̱n re' richa̱k'. Re' take re' ar wilque̱b pan quicano̱wa ch'i̱l i caja̱w, c'ahchi' quic'ojem wach i quiya'l chopbal quica̱r.

Nok je' re' c'ahchi'que̱b, re' Jesus xiyuk'ej take qui̱b re're' chi naca'nam wo' chi raj tahkanel eh naxquibiraj i yuk'unic xiban i Jesus xi'o̱j wo' chiri̱j. Chi je' re' naxquicana̱' cahnok i cano̱wa, xquich'ak cahnok qui̱b ru̱c' i caja̱w ch'i̱l take raj camanom.

Chi tahkamaj chic cu'um take xichih chi raj tahkanel, re' Jesus xponic ar pan tinamit Capernahum. Naxirak rik'ijil i hi'lbal k'i̱j, xoquic cok chipam pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal ye'o̱j reh i Moyses. Ar naxoquic chi c'uhbalanic i Jesus,

re' take wilque̱b chipam i pa̱t re're' k'e̱' xsahchic quic'ux chi ribirmijic i c'uhbalanic riban maj xquicoj rehtal chi ar ru̱c' i Dios nchalic i rajawric wilic chi c'uhtunic eh ru̱c' rajawric wilic, re' c'uhtunic riban ma' je' ta ricab i c'uhtunic nca'n take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Ma' je' ta re' riban maj re're' til re' riC'uhbal i Dios ric'uhtaj raj la' take aj c'uhtunel re're' xa nquica'pechej i k'oro̱j cho cu'um take caj tijinel reh i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses.
Chipam i pa̱t re're' wilic jenaj winak re' chopo̱j na̱ ric'acharic ru'um jenaj ma' tob laj uxlabal. Re' winak re're' je' wili p'uht rik'orom cok reh Jesus chi xa cow chic c'ahchi' rik'oric:

«Hat Jesus re' nabihnej chi aj Nasaret, re' hin weht'alim chi re' hat xa hat t'erenel nok xatc'ulic lok eh wilic awajawric chi ribanaric re're' maj re' hat, hat Lok' laj rAc'u̱n i Dios. Chaj bih awocal cho ku̱c' k'uru'? nqui reh.
Nok je' re' p'uht rik'orom, re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh ma' tob laj uxlabal ru̱c' rajawric rik'orbal: «Chatz'ap achi̱'. Telen lok ru̱c' winak wili, nqui reh.
Naxbiraj chi je' re' i ma' tob laj uxlabal, xiquich'quij wach i winak re're' eh xelic wo' ti lok ru̱c' chi xa q'ueric chic chi̱'.

Naxquilow chaj bih xiban i Jesus, re' take wilque̱b ar je' wili xquik'or chi sahchanak quic'ux: «Chaj bih xc'uluric wili? Cu ac' na chic i c'uhbal c'ahchi' rik'orom i Jesus? Til wo' wilic rajawric ra̱j rik'orom maj narik'or queh chi naquelic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal til wo' quibirinic k'oric chiwach, nqui take.
Je' re' nok, xquesaj lok ribiral i Jesus pan tak tinamit wilque̱b pa riyuk'ul i Calile̱ya chi re're' wilic rajawric chi quina̱ take ma' tob laj uxlabal.
Naxelic je chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, re' Jesus ihch'ilimaj je ru'um Jaco̱wo ch'i̱l i Wa̱n xo̱j pan quipa̱t take Simon ch'i̱l i Tirix.
Ar re' ritu̱t rehq'ue̱n i Simon jiclic wach yoca̱b ru'um jenaj cak tz'a'. Naxponic ar i Jesus xquik'or ti reh chi yowa̱b ixok re're'.

Chi je' re', re' Jesus xoquic cok re' wilic wi̱' ixok re're', xichop chi k'ab naxucsaj johtok eh chi jumehk'il xelic ti i cak tz'a' wilic chiri̱j. Chi suk chic ric'ux, chi jumehk'il p'uht rilom take rula̱' chi suk.
Chiri̱j chic ru' naxoquic i k'i̱j, chi'nchel take c'acharel wilic quiyowa̱b xquic'am cho ru̱c' i Jesus. Je' wo' take wilic ma' tob laj uxlabal cu̱c' xic'amaric wo' cho ru̱c'.
Je' re' k'uru' nok ar chiwach ritz'ahpil i pa̱t re' wilic wi̱' i Jesus quituhbaj cok qui̱b yohbal wach q'uihal tinamit,

re' Jesus xoquic chi resmejic lok take rehreh wach ya'bilal wilic queh take q'uihal yowa'i̱b xic'amaric cho ru̱c'. Je' wo' take wilic ma' tob laj uxlabal cu̱c' xit'erej wo' lok queh. Re' cok ru' narit'erej lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal ma' riyew ta k'ab queh chi quik'oric chi rik'ormojic chi re' Jesus rAc'u̱n i Dios maj re' take re' queht'alim chi je' re' xa re' la' i Jesus ja' xa̱j ta pe chi xeht'aljic ti chi je' re' riwi̱'.

Junpech, nok xa cu rumrum wo' ti wach risak'ic, re' Jesus xuctic je eh xelic je pan tinamit re' wilic nak wi̱'. Ar xicora̱' je pan jenaj ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel chi ribanaric riti̱j.
Nok je' re' c'ahchi' ribanam cho i Jesus, re' ma' Simon ch'i̱l take rich aj tahkanel xi'o̱j chi risiq'uiric
eh naxquirak je' wili xquik'or reh: «Kojsoljok wo' chic je pan tinamit maj yohbal wach q'uihal take tinamit c'ahchi'ca̱t quisiq'uim ar, nqui take reh.

Chalic Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Ma'xta, tak la' tak chipam take toco̱m chic tinamit wilque̱b ma' naht ta je ayu'. Re' riwi̱' nichalic ayu' wach ac'al, re' i quic'uhbaljic take tinamit. Ru'um aj wo' re' curman chi nawojic chi c'uhbalanic ar, nqui queh.

Je' aj re' naxi'o̱j chipam take toco̱m chic tinamit je' ru̱c' wilque̱b wo' pa riyuk'ul i Calile̱ya eh nok wilque̱b chic ar, re' Jesus xiban i c'uhtunic ar chipam take pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Ar re' Jesus xesaj wo' take lok ma' tob laj uxlabal wilic cu̱c' take c'acharel wilque̱b wi̱'.

Junpech nok wilic pan jenaj queh tinamit reh riyuk'ul i Calile̱ya, jenaj winak xilim ri̱j xixuc'a̱' ri̱b chiwach i Jesus naxo̱j c'olok ru̱c' eh je' wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Re' hin weht'alim chi wilic awajawric chi resmejic lok niya'bilal wi la' je' re' nawa̱j i hat chi ena'n. Nawa̱j na chi je' re' ena'n wu̱c' k'uru'? nqui reh.
Naxibiraj re're' i Jesus xiyew je k'ab china̱ chi ritz'a'jic i winak re're' eh je' wili xik'or reh: «Ho̱' nwa̱j! Elok lok aya'bilal k'uru', nqui reh.
Naxik'or Jesus chi je' re', re' winak re're' xcahnic wo' ti chi suk chic ric'ux naxelic lok i xilim chiri̱j.
Ar aj ru' re' Jesus xik'or reh chi echic riban chi eno̱j, xa re' la' ru' cow xipahkaj reh chi je' wili:

«Ma' hab pe wach aj eh nak'or chaj bih xc'uluric awu̱c', re' la' cha'n hiy ru̱c' aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios chi ric'uhtjic reh chi ma'xta chic awe̱t. Je' wo' chayew reh asi̱ je' ricab tak'amaj cahnok ribanaric chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Je' aj re' cha'n reh chi nok riyeb chic rik'orbal i aj k'ahsem si̱ chi suk chic ac'ux eneht'aljic wo' cu'um take tinamit chi re' hin ma' niyak'abej ta pan wo̱k i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, nqui Jesus reh.

Xa re' la' i c'acharel re're' xa re' wo' ti xelic lok chiwach i Jesus xip'ut ti je resmejic lok ribiral i nic' pa' nimal xc'uluric ru̱c'. Ru'um aj re' ma' xiban ta chic chi re' Jesus xa suk wach oquic riban pan quitinami̱t maj ar la' chic chi' tinamit ncahnic lok chipam take ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel. Cu ar aj chic no̱j rakmajok cu'um take c'acharel quichalic xa haj ye'a̱b.
Iq'uinak chic lok jarub ok k'i̱j, re' Jesus xsoljic wo' chic je ar Capernahum. Naxelic lok ribiral chi wilic wo' chic ar chipam i pa̱t re' nponic cahnok wi̱' pan tinamit re're',

junpech nok c'uhbalanic riban chipam i pa̱t re're', k'e̱' wo' chic q'uihal naxquituhbaj qui̱b take tinamit chi ribirmijic cu rehtal xiban chi ma'xta chic ye'a̱b chipam i pa̱t eh je' wo' re' chi chi̱' lok i ocbal reh pa̱t re're'.
Nok c'uhbalanic riban i Jesus, xi'o̱j c'olok ar juntuhm chi c'acharel re' take xquic'am cho jenaj si̱c t'uhyumaj wach ch'aht cu'um quejeb queh c'acharel re're'.

Re' take re' naxquilow chi ma' eta chic nca'n canar ric'amaric cok i si̱c cu chiwach cok i Jesus ru'um reh riq'uihal i tinamit quimolom qui̱b ar, xquisic' ri̱j chi xijohtic nah pa̱t reh chi cu china̱ cho naquitehem jenaj ocbal re' naquikahsam jok wi̱' i si̱c. Nok quitehem chic cho rocbal nah pa̱t, re' take winak re're' xquikahsaj jok i si̱c wach rich'aht til manlic re' wilic wi̱' i Jesus.

Ar ajic re' Jesus naxicoj rehtal chi re're' ch'i̱l take xic'ambic je reh, til ch'iclic quic'ux chiri̱j i rajawric chi esenic lok ya'bilal, je' wili xik'or reh si̱c: «Bi̱l, chi'nchel amahc xnicuy chic yu'na, nqui reh.
Wilic wo' take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses tz'ukulque̱b cok ar. Naxquibiraj chi je' re' xik'or i Jesus, xquitok'a̱' quik'orom pan quic'ux chi je' wili:

«Chaj wa'ric naxik'or i winak wili chi je' re'? Ru̱c' i xik'or re're' c'ahchi' riyak'abem pa ro̱k i Dios. Je' re' nkak'or maj xa re' wo' Dios wilic rajawric chi ricuyuric i mahc. Chaj ti jaric riban ri̱b i winak re're' k'uru'? nqui take.

Chalic i Jesus chi reht'alim chic chaj bih c'ahchi' quicapam cho pan quic'ux, je' wili xik'or queh: «Ma' holohic ta na'n tak chi nacapaj tak chi re' hin ma'xta wajawric chi ricuyuric rimahc i winak wili.

Je' re' nacapaj tak maj chaweh hat-tak re' rik'ormojic reh winak wili chi cuyu̱j chic rimahc ma' c'axic ta ti ribanaric maj ma' nilmijic ta wach. Ru'um aj re', je' wo' wili nak'or tak cho pan ac'ux tak: ‹Wi til coric k'uru' chi wilic rajawric, chik'or reh winak re're' chi pa'lajok, behok eh chic'am wo' je rich'aht. Je' re' nkak'or ru'um nok re' cok re' nc'uhtunic wi̱' chi wilic rajawric, nqui nak'or tak.

«C'uhtbal aj aweh tak chi wilic wajawric chi ricuyuric quimahc i tinamit ayu' wach ac'al, re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel nanik'orom reh si̱c wili chi pa'lajok johtok, nqui queh. Chiri̱j chic re', re' Jesus xik'or reh si̱c chi je' wili:
«Bi̱l, yu'na echic riban chi enawihkaj je ach'aht. Tipa̱' johtok k'uru' maj yu'na na̱soljic je pan apa̱t chi behic chic na'n je, nqui reh.

Naxibiraj re're', chi jumehk'il xuctic wo' ti johtok i si̱c re're', ximol wach rich'aht eh xelic je chi behic chic riban chi quixilac i riq'uihal i tinamit wilque̱b ar. Naxquilow re're', chi'nchel xsahchic quic'ux eh xquiyew rilok'il i Dios. Ar ajic je' wili xquik'or: «Re' cok wili ma' janc'al ta pe' kilom ribanaric, nqui take chi quiwach.

Chiri̱j chic naxelic je ar Capernahum, re' Jesus xitik ju' ribehsjic chi̱' i nim laj ha' re' wilic ar pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya eh nok je' re' c'ahchi' ribanam, yohbal wach q'uihal i tinamit xi'o̱j rakbok reh. Ar aj ru' nok mololque̱b chic cok ru̱c', re' Jesus xoquic chi quic'uhbaljic.

Nok ric'uhbalem chic take, re' Jesus behic wo' chic je junc'am ok eh xilow wach i jenaj winak rac'u̱n i ma' Alpe̱yo, Lewih ribihnal re' wilic ricamaj chi aj molol to̱j ntak'abjic je Ro̱ma. Naxilow wach i winak re're' chi tz'uklic ar re' wilic wi̱' i me̱xa re' nbanaric wi̱' to̱j ntak'abjic je Ro̱ma, je' wili xik'or reh: «Ha̱w tak chiwi̱j, nwa̱j chi na̱woquic chi hat waj tahkanel, nqui reh. Xa chiwach wo' ti junc'am re're', re' Lewih xinimej i k'oric xk'ormojic reh eh xitahkej je i Jesus.

Junpech ajic pan jenaj nink'i̱j tik'imaj wach ru'um i ma' Lewih ar pa ripa̱t, re' Jesus xponic ar ch'i̱l take raj tahkanel eh xoquic chi wi'c quich'i̱l take xi'o̱j c'olok ar. Chi quixilac take re' wilque̱b take wilic quibiral chi aj mahc je' ricab take aj moloj to̱j ntak'abjic je Ro̱ma.

Re' take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l wo' take cow laj aj niminel reh c'uhbal re're' naxquilow chi je' re', je' wili p'uht quik'orom cok queh take raj tahkanel i Jesus: «Chaj bih risic' i Jesus chi wi'c chi quixilac take wilic quibiral chi aj mahc take je' ricab take aj molol to̱j ntak'abjic je Ro̱ma wilque̱b ayu'?

Naxibiraj chi je' re' i Jesus, je' wili xik'or queh: «Je' ricab nk'ormojic chi ma' re' ta take suk quic'ux qui'o̱j ru̱c' aj ik'omonel, re' la' take yowa̱b, je' wo' re' wu̱c' i hin, re' wo' ti take nquic'raj qui̱b chi aj mahc take quichalic wu̱c' chi ribirmijic nik'orbal. Je' re' nok re' hin niban niwa' quich'i̱l take re' maj ma' re' ta nchel chi quisiq'uiric take nquicapaj chi coric wach quic'ux xinchalic i hin, xinchalic la' chi quisiq'uiric take nquic'raj wo' ti qui̱b chi aj mahc take, nqui Jesus.

Junpech nok re' take raj tahkanel i Wa̱n ch'i̱l take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses cuyuj wi'c ha' nca'n chiwach i Dios, wilic take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xi'o̱j c'olok ru̱c' i Jesus eh je' wili xquik'or reh: «Chaj wa'ric chi re' take awaj tahkanel i hat ma' c'ahchi' ta que̱b chi cuyuj wi'c ha', nok re' hoj aj c'amol na̱ i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses on nok re' take aj tijem i̱b chiri̱j ric'uhbal i Wa̱n nkamol ki̱b chi ti̱j ru̱c' cuyuj wi'c ha'? nqui take reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Je' ricab chi pan jeno' caxarahil ma' eta riban chi re' take rula̱' aj caxa̱ra enquiti'saj quic'ux chi ricuyuric quiwa' quiha̱' je' ricab chi wilic ta nak jeno' camnak chi quiwach, je' wo' re' take waj tahkanel i hin ma' eta wo' riban chi enquicuy quiwa' quiha̱' chi cu wilqui̱n pe hin chi quixilac.

Re' cok ru', naponok i k'i̱j chi na̱wesmejic je nah ac'al i hin re' aj ye'ol sukquil c'uxlis je' ricab riban aj caxa̱ra cu̱c' take rula̱', cu re' aj wo' ru' re' take waj tahkanel naquicuyum quiwa' quiha̱' ru'um riti'quil quic'ux chi ma' wilqui̱n ta chic cu̱c', nqui Jesus.

Re' Jesus xk'oric wo' chic chi je' wili: «Ma' hab ta wach jeno' c'acharel riwek jeno' ac' laj we̱x chi c'ojbal wach jeno' k'echer laj we̱x, maje'? Je' re' nik'or maj nasuhbok i ac' laj c'ojbal, enwek je riman i k'echer laj tz'ih ru'um nok ma' jenaj ta chic wach ricowil ch'i̱l i ac' laj c'ojbal.

Je' wo', ma' hab ta wach jeno' c'acharel ric'ol i ch'amsamaj ri̱s aji̱j pan jeno' k'echer laj suh maj wi xiban chi je' re', ma' xa re' ta i suh enq'uer ru'um ransil rich'amil i ri̱s aji̱j, ela' wo' no̱j chi k'e̱b i ri̱s aji̱j re're'. Je' re' k'uru' je' ricab chi ma' hab ta wach je' re' nbanic, je' wo' re' ru̱c' i niC'uhbal ma' eta wo' riban chi re' take aj tijem i̱b chiwi̱j nok quic'u'lem chic na̱ niC'uhbal xa cu nca̱j wo' quic'amam na̱ i c'uhbal tijimaj nak take cho wi̱'.
