Je' re' ajic je' ricab chi re' ri̱s aji̱j pan ac' laj suh nc'olmojic reh chi quicabchelal ma'xta bih enoquic queh, curman wo' chi re' take waj tahkanel xa re' wo' niC'uhbal naquic'amam na̱ reh chi re' quicapew-bal ru' ch'i̱l i niC'uhbal i hin ma' eta no̱j riyoj ri̱b, nqui xik'or Jesus.

Pan jenaj hi'lbal k'i̱j chi keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, nok re' Jesus xiq'uic ponok chipam junseht chi tic ncojoric chi wi'c, re' take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel p'uht quip'ixim queh i riwachej i tic re're' reh chi naquic'uxum.

Re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses naxquilow re're' xquik'o'rej i Jesus chiri̱j re're' maj chi queh ru' camanic la' c'ahchi'que̱b take raj tahkanel. Je' aj wili xquik'or reh Jesus: «Chajaric cho wili, chi xa nawilow take awaj tahkanel chi c'ahchi' ca'nam i camanic je' ricab take ma' ye'o̱j ta k'ab chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi naribanaric chipam take hi'lbal k'i̱j? nqui take reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili xic'u'lej take wi̱': «Re' hat-tak xa ja' wo' nchel narak tak chiri̱j i ribiral nawilow tak wach chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios chiri̱j chaj bih xiban cho i ma' Tawiy re' k'atal k'oric najtir k'i̱j nok ru'um jenaj rinimal laj c'ahric wilic ru̱c' ch'i̱l take jarub pa' quihch'ilinic ponok reh, xisic' ri̱j nic' wach naxca'n quiwa'.

Re' ribiral re're' rik'or chi nok re' Awiya̱tar wilic chi nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱, re' ma' Tawiy xoquic cok chipam i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios re' wilic wo' wi̱' i caxlan wi'c ye'o̱j chi si̱ chiwach i Dios. To̱b ta wo' k'oro̱j chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi xa re' take aj k'ahsem si̱ naquic'uxuj reh caxlan wi'c re're', re' ma' Tawiy xic'ux reh eh xiyew wo' queh take rich'i̱l chi naquic'uxum caxlan wi'c re're' nok ye'o̱j chic k'ab reh chi naribanam chi je' re', nqui queh.

Chiri̱j chic re', re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' Dios pe̱t xojritik'a̱' hoj c'acharel eh chi c'axbal keh xicana̱' jenaj k'i̱j reh chi nakahi'lic. Re're' ma' pe̱t ta xicana̱' i k'i̱j re're' eh ma' re' ta wo' chi ye'bal rilok'il i k'i̱j re're' xojritik'a̱' i hoj c'acharel.

Je' re' ajic chaweht'alij wo' tak i wili: Chi re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel wilic wo' wajawric chi rik'ormojic haj wilic i tare̱t eh haj wilic i ma' tare̱t ta chi banaric chipam i hi'lbal k'i̱j, nqui Jesus.
Pan jenaj chic hi'lbal k'i̱j chi keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, re' Jesus xo̱j pe' wo' chic c'olok chipam i pa̱t re' ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses.

Ar re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xa c'ahchi' chic quicojom rehtal wi re' Jesus ericorsaj wach rik'ab i winak re're' pan hi'lbal k'i̱j. Nok je' re' c'ahchi'que̱b chi risiq'uiric ri̱j chi haj ta nak enquirak jeno' mahc enquitz'ak chiri̱j,
re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh winak me̱c k'ab re're': «Tucten cho, tik'ahxen cho ayu' cu chiwach, nqui reh.

Chiri̱j i wili xik'or queh chi je' wili: «Haj wilic riyew k'ab keh i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi banaric, re' ribanaric i holohic laj bano̱j on re' ribanaric i c'ahbil laj bano̱j. Re' rico'ljic ri̱j on re' risacharic wach i c'acharic? nqui queh, xa re' la' take re' ximemric jok pan quiye'a̱b.

Chi cakranak cu̱c' take c'acharel re're', re' Jesus p'uht ritz'ehtam take je chi cow eh naxilow chi ma' xjahlic ta wo' nech' ok quicapew-bal chi naritobjic i winak re're', re' Jesus k'e̱' naxti'bic ric'ux. Chiri̱j i wili je' wili xik'or reh winak re're': «Quik'ochlojok take nah ak'ab quimequem qui̱b eh chayu̱w je take yu'na, nqui reh. Ar aj ru' naxiban chi je' re', xcorjic wo' ti wach i k'ab chi manlic.

Naxquilow re're' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, xi'elic je chipam i pa̱t re're' eh xo̱j ti quimol qui̱b cu̱c' take quich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' Herorya̱no ribihnal quicomonil. Quich'i̱l take re' p'uht quisiq'uim ri̱j nic' wach naquicansaj i Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic ru' re' Jesus rich'i̱l take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel xi'elic je chipam i tinamit re're' eh q'uihal take tinamit xitahkanic je reh nok c'ahchi' ribehsam chi̱' i nim laj ha' Calile̱ya ribihnal. Re' take c'acharel xitahkanic je reh wilic take aj pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya, wilic wo' take aj pa riyuk'ul i Jure̱ya

je' ricab take aj pan tinamit Jerusalen. Wilic wo' xichalic ar pa riyuk'ul Irume̱ya eh wilic wo' take xichalic ar pan tak tinamit wilque̱b je chi juntar nim laj ha' Jortan ribihnal. Je' wo', wilic take xichalic pan tinamit Ti̱ro ch'i̱l i Siron. Chi'nchel take c'acharel wili re' xchalic quisic' i Jesus ru'um reh ribiral quibiram cho chiri̱j chaj bih take bano̱j riban,

k'e̱' wo' chic q'uihal naxquimol qui̱b chi cu rehtal re' Jesus xipahkaj queh take raj tahkanel chi naquitik'a̱b jeno' riye'a̱b pan jeno' cano̱wa reh chi cu ar suk quic'uhbaljic take tinamit naribanam cho, maj ma' xa̱j ta chi re' riq'uihal tinamit xquimulej qui̱b chiri̱j enquituylom cok.

Chi quixilac riq'uihal take c'acharel re're', q'uihal wo' queh xicahnic chi suk chic quic'ux nok re' Jesus xesaj lok quiya'bilal take yowa'i̱b. Yohbal wo' chic wach c'ahchi' ric'uluric chi wilic take c'acharel wilic quiya'bilal xa nquiyuw chic je quik'ab chi naquitz'a̱b je i Jesus reh chi naquicahnic chi suk chic quic'ux.

Je' wo' chic, q'uihal take je' ru̱c' wilic ma' tob laj uxlabal cu̱c' xicahnic chi suk chic quic'ux nok re' Jesus p'uht resam lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal. Re' take ma' ato̱b laj uxlabal wilque̱b cu̱c' take c'acharel, nanquilow wach i Jesus, nca'n chi re' take c'acharel nquixuc'a̱' qui̱b chiwach rehtalil chi re' Jesus wilic rajawric chi quina̱ eh je' wili nquik'or take ma' tob laj uxlabal chi cow: «Re' hat, hat rAc'u̱n i Dios, nqui take.

Xa re' la' naribiraj chi je' re' nquik'or reh, re' Jesus ru̱c' i rajawric rik'orbal wilic, rik'or queh chi ma'xta chic quik'orom re're' reh chi ma' ja' eta pe nquirak chiri̱j take c'acharel chi je' re'.

Junpech, re' Jesus nok tahkamaj je cu'um juntuhm chi c'acharel xjohtic johtok china̱ jenaj yu̱k'. Nok wilic chic cho nah yu̱k', wilic take c'acharel xiyuk'ej ru̱c', re' take xa̱j chi naquiwih'ic ru̱c'. Xa re' aj wo' ti take re' xi'o̱j johtok ru̱c'.
Nok mololque̱b chic ru̱c', re' Jesus xipahba̱' take cablaj chi nahsil reh chi re' take re' til xa naquiwih'ic wo' ru̱c' eh reh wo' chi re' take re' enca'n i c'uhbalanic nachitak'a̱' take je.

Je' wo' chic re' Jesus xiyew cajawric take cablaj re're' reh chi enca'n resmejic lok quiya'bilal take yowa'i̱b eh chi ewo' nca'n resmejic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal cu̱c' take c'acharel choplic quina̱ cu'um.
Re' aj wili quibihnal take cablaj re're': Re' ma' Simon re' xcahnic wo' ribihnal chi Luch ru'um i Jesus.

Re' Jaco̱wo re' rac'u̱n i Sewere̱yo. Re' Wa̱n, re' richa̱k' i Jaco̱wo. Re' take quib re're', xcojoric ricab quibihnal ru'um i Jesus chi “Woyanerjes”, re' ra̱j rik'orom: “Re' take winak je' quicab cohok”. Je' re' quibihnal xcojoric ru'um chi xa je' take cohok ru̱c' quino'jbal.

Re' Tirix, re' Peh, re' Warto̱lo, re' Tiyoh, re' Ma̱x, re' Jaco̱wo re' rac'u̱n i ma' Alpe̱yo, re' Tare̱yo, re' Simon re' wilic nak chi quixilac take quibanic i k'ak'anic reh chi ma'xta nak chic riwih'ic rajawric i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma chi quina̱ take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.
Re' Ju̱ras aj Caryot, re' xtojoric chiri̱j rik'ahsjic i Jesus pan quik'ab take raj ixowonel.

Nok ripahba̱b chic take cablaj re're', re' Jesus chi rich'i̱l chic take, xsoljic wo' chic je chipam i pa̱t re' ncahnic wi̱' ar Capernahum. Nok wi'c chic nca'n, xo̱j pe' wo' chic quituhbaj qui̱b take tinamit ar ru̱c' i Jesus cu rehtal chi xa c'axic laj wi'c nak chic nca'n ru'um riq'uihal tinamit!

Ar aj ru' nok re' take richa̱k' ch'i̱l ritu̱t i Jesus naxquibiraj chi ar wilic ponok chipam i tinamit re're', xquichop je quibe̱h chi ric'amaric nak cho i Jesus maj xquibiraj chi wilic take c'ahchi' quik'oric chi re' Jesus saban chic.

Chiwach take k'i̱j re're', ar pan tinamit Jerusalen xichalic juntuhm chi aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Re' take re' naxquibiraj chi re' Jesus resaj lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal, p'uht quik'orom chi je' wili queh take c'acharel: «Re' Jesus chopo̱j na̱ ricapew-bal ru'um i aj Yahm re' cajawil take ma' tob laj uxlabal re' ribihnej wo' chi Welsewuh. Ru'um aj re' wilic rajawric chi quit'ermejic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal cu̱c' take c'acharel choplic quina̱ cu'um, nqui take.

Re' Jesus naxibiraj chi je' re' c'ahchi' quik'orom xik'o'rej take je chi naquijilim cok qui̱b ru̱c' eh je' wili xik'or queh: «Ma' riwi̱' ta so' i nak'or tak. Nic' wach nachiban chi re' aj Yahm eriyak'abej pa ro̱k i rajawric chi ribil ri̱b? nqui queh. Chiri̱j wili xic'uhbalej take ru̱c' i jalwach k'oric wili:
«Wi re' take pahbamaj chi raj to'o̱l jeno' k'atal k'oric nquixowej qui̱b, re' rilok'il ricamaj i k'atal k'oric re're', xa ewo' no̱j wach ac'al.

Je' wo' re' nc'uluric chi quixilac take c'acharel je' ru̱c' xa cas quicha̱k' qui̱b chipam jeno' pa̱t. Wi re' take c'acharel re're' ma' nquic'am ta qui̱b chi suk pan quipa̱t, xa na wo' quich'aklom qui̱b.

Je' aj re' k'uru' nic' pa' nimal i rehtalil xnik'or lok re're' je' wo' re' nc'uluric ru̱c' aj Yahm maj wi ta nak ru̱c' re' rajawric ru' c'ahchi' nit'erem lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal, ra̱j nak rik'orom chi re' aj Yahm ch'i̱l take raj tz'e' wa̱ch c'ahchi' quixowem quiwach, maje'? Raj i wili ma' je' ta re' riwi̱' i c'ahchi' ric'uluric maj wi ta nak c'ahchi' quixowem quiwach, nic' aj wach nok cu quitzokem qui̱b pan quicamaj eh ja' ta wo' no̱j wach ac'al chi manlic.

Re' la' riwi̱' i c'ahchi' ric'uluric wili re' chi cu pe̱t c'ahchi' niyeb pan ac'al i rajawric aj Yahm je' ricab riban jeno' winak xiq'uic na̱ ransil chi cu rehtal richopom chic eh ribac'am chic i jenaj winak re' k'e̱' wo' nak ransil, cu re' aj ru' noquic cok pa ripa̱t chi rimak'aric i pa' bih riyeb take chi ri'sil ro̱k k'ab, nqui queh.

Chiri̱j chic ru', re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Chacoj rehtal i wili: Xa hab wach jeno' aweh tak nmahcanic ru̱c' ribanaric take c'ahbil laj k'oric on riban i k'ihtinic i̱b chiwach i Dios, re're' til cu wilic wo' ricuybal.

Tz'a̱b ru' hab wach narik'ehtam ri̱b chiwach i Lok' laj Uxlabal ru̱c' ribanaric ma' holohic ta laj k'oric, re' cok re' ma' jaruj ta chic encuyuric rimahc, til naric'ulum la' ti'c'axic chi junelic k'i̱j sakom nachik'at k'oric i Dios china̱, nqui Jesus.

Je' aj re' quic'uhbaljic take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xiban i Jesus maj re' take re' ma' xquic'u'lej ta na̱ chi re' Lok' laj Uxlabal nto'bonic reh, re' la' chic nquik'or chi jenaj ma' tob laj uxlabal nye'bic rajawric.

Chiri̱j chic ru' nok ricohlam chic c'uhbalanic cu̱c' take aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal re're', re' ritu̱t i Jesus ch'i̱l take richa̱k' xi'o̱j c'olok ru̱c' i pa̱t re' wilic wi̱' Jesus, xa re' la' ru'um reh riq'uihal i tinamit xa chi' pa̱t xicahnic lok eh xa xquitak'a̱' cok k'oric chi c'ahchi' risiq'uiric.

Je' re' nok re' take c'acharel tz'ukulque̱b chi quisutem cok ri̱j i Jesus je' wili xquik'or reh: «Ha̱w, re' atu̱t ch'i̱l take acha̱k' awana̱b wilque̱b lok rij pa̱t, nca̱j ca̱t quik'o'rem, nqui take cok reh.
Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' nitu̱t ch'i̱l take nicha̱k', lo̱k' take chi niwach xa re' la' hab wach take je' quicab take re' nanacapaj i hat? nqui reh.

Chiri̱j re' nok c'ahchi' rilom je take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel tz'ukulque̱b cok c'ultar reh, je' wili xik'or queh tinamit: «Chawilow tak take waj tahkanel wili. Re' take re', k'e̱' lo̱k' take chi niwach je' na ricab nitu̱t wana̱b on nicha̱k' take.

Je' re' quilok'il chi niwach maj xa hab wach riban ribanaric take haj wilic ra̱j i wAja̱w Dios chi naribanam, re' c'acharel re're' k'e̱' wo' chic lo̱k' chi niwach je' na ricab nitu̱t on nicha̱k' take, nqui Jesus.

Pan jenaj chic k'i̱j re' Jesus xoquic chi c'uhbalanic ar chi chi̱' i nim laj ha' Calile̱ya. Ar k'e̱' q'uihal take tinamit xo̱j quimol qui̱b ru̱c' chi ribirmijic eh ru'um re' curman chi xjohtic chipam i jenaj cano̱wa re' wilic ma' naht ta chi chi̱' i ha' tzokolque̱b lok wi̱' take tinamit. Naxitz'uka̱' ri̱b ar,
p'uht ric'uhbalem take tinamit ru̱c' rehreh wach jalwach k'oric chi rik'ormojic queh rehreh wach no'jbal. P'utbal reh ric'uhtunic p'uht rik'orom queh i jalwach k'oric wili:
«Chacoj tak rehtal i nanik'orom wili: Junpech jenaj winak xo̱j tico̱l chipam riye'a̱b.

Re're' xoquic je chi tic xa re' la' ru' re' banoj tic ocronak wi̱' je' ru̱c' xa chaquilej je aweh riban. Ru'um aj re' wilic take xikajic pan be̱h eh naxic'ulic lok take cuc' tz'iquin xc'ulic quic'ux ija' re're'.
Wilic wo' rija̱' i winak re're' xikajic xilac tak abaj re' ma' k'e̱' ta wi̱' ac'al. Re' take re' xa nok wo' ti xipok' cho ru'um chi ma' cha̱m ta ti pa̱m ac'al xikajic wi̱',
xa re' la' ru' naxchalic ritz'a'quilal i k'i̱j xic'ahtic take ritz'i̱' ra̱' eh ru'um chi ma'xta chic bih nariye'bic cansil, xichikic take cuc' tic re're'.

Wilic wo' take rija̱' xikajic xilac tak q'ui̱x, xiq'uihic nak tok xa re' la' xiquimic naxtz'aparic quina̱ cu'um take q'ui̱x xiq'uihic ti johtok chi nok chiwach i tic re're' eh ru'um re' ma' xiwachanic ta wo'.

Wilic aj take rija̱' je' re' xquic'ul, xa re' la' wilic wo' take rija̱' xikajic pan holohic laj ac'al, re' cok take re' xipok' cho chi coric eh naxiq'uihic johtok k'e̱' wo' chic xiwachanic cu rehtal wilic xquiwachej lajeb rica'winak (30) t'ohr, wilic wo' quiwachej oxc'ahl (60) t'ohr eh wilic quiwachej ho'c'ahl (100) t'ohr reh ju'jun wal, nqui xik'or i Jesus. Ar aj ru' naxicohlaj i c'uhbalanic re're',
re' Jesus je' wili xik'or: «Re' k'as axiquin tak chi birinic camanok aweh tak chi rirakmajic chiri̱j re' xnik'or lok wili, nqui xik'or.

Chiri̱j chic ru' nok ojonak chic take riq'uihal tinamit, re' take ju'jun chic tinamit xicahnic quich'i̱l take i cablaj chi raj tahkanel i Jesus, je' wili xquik'or cok reh: «Chaj bih nelic wi̱' i jalwach k'oric re're'? nqui take reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili xic'u'lej take wi̱': «Ma' hab ta nak wach neht'alanic reh ribiral chi re' Dios re' nk'atbic k'oric ra̱j richopom quina̱ take c'acharel, raj yu'na re' hat-tak xye'eric chic k'ab aweh tak chi narisakomjic wach aweh tak re're'. Ru'um aj re' nanik'orom aweh tak chaj bih nelic wi̱' i jalwach k'oric re're' raj nchel take junleh re' ma' quitahkanic ta wi̱n, xa ru̱c' jalwach k'oric nanik'orom queh niC'uhbal

reh chi je' re' narojic elok wach i tz'ihmbimaj cho wili ru'um i najtir aj k'orol c'uhbal ma' Isayi̱yas ribihnal: “Re' take nitinami̱t ma'xta chic quirakam chiri̱j i k'oro̱j wu'um. Re' take re' xa naquitikim wo' ju' birinic eh xa naquilom wo' take nic' pa' nimal nanic'uhtam queh, xa re' la' ru' ma'xta quicojom rehtal. Je' re' k'uru' ru'um chi re' take re' ma' nca̱j ta wo' chic quichopom quic'ux chiwi̱j, re' hin Dios ma'xta chic nicuyum quimahc, nqui tz'ihmbimaj cho ru'um i ma' Isayi̱yas, nqui Jesus.

Nok re' Jesus xisakomej wach i jalwach k'oric chiri̱j i aj tico̱l cu pe̱t xinak take raj tahkanel chi je' wili: «Wi re' hat-tak ma' narak ta tak chiri̱j nic' wach nelic wi̱' i jalwach k'oric wili, nic' aj wach nacharak tak chiri̱j take toco̱m chic jalwach k'oric? nqui queh. Chiri̱j chic re', je' wili xik'or queh:
«Re' winak aj tico̱l rijalwachej i aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios.

Re' take ija' xkajic pan be̱h rijalwachej chaj bih ric'ul i niC'uhbal cu̱c' take c'acharel quibirinic reh xa re' la' ru' ma' nquic'ol ta pan ca̱mna. Cu̱c' take c'acharel re're' nc'uluric i wili: Nc'ulic lok i aj Yahm chi resmejic lok pan quic'ux i nic' pa' nimal xquibiraj.
«Re' take ija' xikajic xilac tak abaj re're' rijalwachej i niC'uhbal xa suk chic quic'ux nanquibiraj take c'acharel,

xa re' la' ma' nquichop ta quic'ux ru̱c' chi coric, xa je' quicab junwal ok chi tic ma' cha̱m ta kajanak rira'il pan ac'al. Je' re' nok, re' take c'acharel re're' xa junc'am ti nquicoj wach niC'uhbal eh je' re' nik'or chi nca'n maj nanchalic i ti'c'axic on ixowonic china̱ ru'um reh niC'uhbal ricana̱' wo' chic rinimjic.
«Re' take ija' xikajic xilac tak q'ui̱x rijalwachej i niC'uhbal nquibiraj take c'acharel,

xa re' la' ma' riban ta wo' chi aj banol take reh chaj bih ra̱j i Dios. Ru'um aj re' je' ricab chi re' take tic ma' qui'o̱j ta wachanok je' wo' re' i niC'uhbal, ma' nwachanic ta wo' cu̱c' maj je' ricab chi re' take ija' ntz'aparic quina̱ cu'um take q'ui̱x, wilic wo' nk'etbic pan quibe̱h je' ricab nanquicoj quicapew-bal xa chiri̱j take risiq'uiric pa' bih queh on chiri̱j take c'axoj wach bihomal re' njot'bic wo' reh quicapew-bal, on nok pan quicapew-bal xa ncotowej chic cho rehchmejic chi'nchel take pa' bih.

«Re' aj chic take ija' xikajic pan holohic laj ac'al rijalwachej i niC'uhbal nquibiraj take c'acharel holohic wach quino'jbal. Je' ricab nok re' tic re're' xwachanic cho cu rehtal xiyew ho'c'ahl (100) t'ohr, oxc'ahl (60) t'ohr eh lajeb rica'winak (30) t'ohr chi nak' wach ru̱c' ju'jun wal, re' take c'acharel nquichop quic'ux ru̱c' niC'uhbal nquibiraj, no̱j wo' ca'n chi aj banol take reh chaj bih ra̱j i Dios, nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic ru' re' Jesus xik'or wo' chic queh i jenaj jalwach k'oric chi je' wili: «Jenaj sakombal, re're' ncamanic keh chi naco̱j risakomem, maje'? Ru'um re' nankakop jeno' sakombal nkach'ila̱' johtok eh ma' nkatz'ap ta nchel na̱ chi rehquen jeno' tz'ak ac'al xun on chi enkac'ol cok chi rehquen jeno' yoca̱b. Je' wo' re' nc'uluric ru̱c' niC'uhbal ma' c'ahchi' ta nic'olom rik'ormojic chi quiwach i tinamit, c'ahchi' la' nik'orom queh

maj re' niC'uhbal nsakomsonic wach chi'nchel rino'jbal i Dios je' ricab riban i sakombal chi'nchel risakomej lok cu rehtal ma'xta chic bih wilic chi ma' ta nak enrakmajic on chi ma' ta nak enilmijic wach ru'um reh risakomil.
Re' hat-tak re' til nawa̱j tak arakam chiri̱j chi coric re' xnik'or lok re're', til k'as ok axiquin tak chi ribirmijic re're', nqui queh.

Chi je' re', re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Chacoj tak rehtal chi coric nic' wach ribirmijic niC'uhbal na'n tak maj je' ricab chi jeno' aj c'a̱y, re' wo' i ripajbal ncamanic reh chi ripajaric i ric'a̱y, je' wo' re' ru̱c' i Dios. Nic' pa' wach ribirmijic niC'uhbal na'n tak, re' wo' re' encamanic reh chi rilmijic wi xarak tak chiri̱j nino'jbal. Je' re' ajic wi re' hat-tak nabiraj tak chi coric niC'uhbal, re' Dios ma' xa re' ta chic rirakmajic chiri̱j rino'jbal chi manlic eriyew aweh tak, ela' wo' riban chi k'e̱' wo' chic enarak tak chiri̱j chi quiwach toco̱m chic c'acharel.

Chacoj tak rehtal k'uru' nic' wach ribirmijic niC'uhbal ena'n tak. Je' re' nik'or maj wi wilic ac'ux tak chi rinimjic, re' Dios til nariyeb aweh tak chi na̱rakam tak chiri̱j rino'jbal. Raj wi ma'xta ac'ux tak chi rinimjic, ma' xa re' ta eriban chi ma' eta narak tak chiri̱j rino'jbal, narimak'am la' wo' aweh tak i haj nak ti wilic i no'jbal nak'or tak chi xatijej tak ru̱c' niC'uhbal, nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j re're', re' Jesus xik'or wo' chic jenaj jalwach k'oric chi je' wili: «Re' Dios, til wilic rinimal wach rajawric chi rijalaric wach quino'jbal take c'acharel nk'atbic k'oric chi quina̱. Ru̱c' i jalwach k'oric nanik'orom wili enisakomej wach aweh tak re' xnik'or lok re're'. Junpech jenaj winak xitic rija̱' pa rac'a̱l.

Chiri̱j chi ribanam chic i tic, re' winak re're' ma' eli̱c ta chic xicapaj rilmijic nic' wach q'uihic xiban johtok i ritic. Je' re' ajic nok eli̱c chak'ab no̱j wirok i winak re're' eh eli̱c wahk'ek nuctic wo' chic cho chi ma'xta bih ricapaj, re' ija' re're' xq'uihic johtok chi rutquel chi ma' c'ahchi' ta ricojom rehtal i winak re're' nic' wach riwi̱' i q'uihic c'ahchi' ribanam johtok.

Xa re' aj wach ransil i ac'al xbanic chi re' ija' re're' xq'uihic johtok. Je' re' ajic chi pe̱t, re' tic re're' xip'ut johtok q'uihic chi xa xak ti wilic. Chiri̱j chic ru' xip'ut cho xmac'anic eh chiri̱j chic re', re' chic i wach xiyew cho.
Ar aj ru' nok rijeb chic wach i tic, re' winak re're' xitak'a̱' take aj sic'ol reh wach i ritic maj xponic chic rik'ijil chi narisiq'uiric i wach, nqui Jesus.
Chiri̱j chic ru' re' Jesus xik'or wo' chic jenaj jalwach k'oric chi je' wili: «Chaj bih nanijalwachem wi̱' i niC'uhbal nik'or chi re' Dios ra̱j richopom quina̱ take c'acharel chi k'atal k'oric?

Re' rijalwachjic i ric'am je' wi̱' ri̱b niC'uhbal cu rehtal nq'uihic wach chi risuksjic i ca̱mna take tinamit nanijalwachem i jenaj t'uch nak' wach rija'quil i che̱' mosta̱sa ribihnal. Re' ija' re're' to̱b ta nantiquiric jok pan ac'al ma' na'lic ti reh chiwach take rehreh wach ija' wilic,

k'e̱' wo' chic nimal laj che̱' riban chi quiwach take chi'nchel mu'unumaj tic nanq'uihic johtok. Chiri̱j chic ru' nariban je take k'ab, k'e̱' wo' tak quiponic cu rehtal re' take cuc' tz'iquin xa suk chic queh chi ribanaric quike̱s nah tak k'ab, nqui Jesus.
Q'uihleh aj wach take jalwach k'oric xic'uhbalej wi̱' take c'acharel eh je' re' ritikiric ju' c'uhbalanic xiban re' k'orel nic' pa' wach nquirak chiri̱j take tinamit.

Je' aj re' ru' ma'xta bih c'uhtunic xiban i Jesus ma' ta nak ru̱c' jalwach k'oric, re' cok ru' queh take raj tahkanel chi cutquel chic risakomej wach queh chaj bih qui'elic take wi̱' i jalwach k'oric.
Chiri̱j re're' naxoquic i chak'ab reh k'i̱j re're', re' Jesus xik'or queh take raj tahkanel chi je' wili: «Kojk'ahxok tak je pan cano̱wa chi juntar ma' laj ha' wili, nqui queh.

Je' re' k'uru' nok re' take raj tahkanel i Jesus xquich'ak cahnok qui̱b quich'i̱l take tinamit, xi'oquic cok pan cano̱wa re' wilic chic cho wi̱' i Jesus eh chi quich'i̱l ru' xquip'ut je k'ahxic nah ha' chi tahkamaj wo' take cu'um toco̱m chic take c'acharel wilque̱b pan toco̱m chic cano̱wa.

Chiri̱j re're' nok ojic chic nca'n je nah ha', xchalic jenaj rinimal cow laj te̱w cu rehtal xucsaj take ribohl ha' eh chi je' re', re' cano̱wa re' wilque̱b wi̱' p'uht rinujic ru'um i ha' xoquic chipam narik'oj ri̱b ribohl i ha' chiwach i cano̱wa re're'.

Nok je' re' c'ahchi' quic'ulum, re' take raj tahkanel xo̱j quic'a'saj wach i Jesus re' xa suk chic wiric riban nah rich'itnah ar je chiri̱j i cano̱wa. Je' aj wili xquik'or cok reh: «Ajabe̱s aj tijinel! Ta wo' chic ru' i hat! Wiric chic na'n eh re' hoj q'uisi̱n chic ma' kojquimic ru'um i ha', nqui take reh.

Ar aj ru', re' Jesus xuctic cho eh ru̱c' rajawric rik'orbal xik'or reh te̱w chi naritz'irlijic eh reh ribohl i ha' je' wili xik'or reh: «Titu̱k hat ribohl ha', ma' tirojlonic chic! nqui xik'or. Xa chiwach ti junc'am re're' ximay i te̱w eh tuklujic i ha'.

Chiri̱j chi iq'uinak chic lok re're', re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh take raj tahkanel chi nakbal queh: «Chaj wa'ric chi xatyo'jic tak? Ma' ja' wo' ncowjic ta ac'ux tak chiwi̱j i hin chi re' hin wilic wajawric chi aco'ljic tak? nqui queh.

Je' re' k'uru', re' take raj tahkanel re're' xicahnic chi sachlic quic'ux ru̱c' rilmijic chaj bih xiban i Jesus eh je' wili xquik'or chi quiwach: «Re' cok i Jesus wili til niq'uic wo' chic na̱ rajawric. Ma' xa ta re' take ma' tob laj uxlabal quibirinic chiwach je' la' wo' i te̱w ch'i̱l i ha' nquibiraj wo' k'oric chiwach, nqui take.
Chiri̱j chic re' Jesus ch'i̱l take raj tahkanel xik'ahxic lok juntar ma' laj ha' ar pan quiyuk'ul take aj Cara̱ra.

Nok elenak chic take je chipam i cano̱wa, ar lok ma' naht ta ru̱c' i tinamit re're', re' wilic wi̱' jenaj ye'a̱b muk'unbal camnak, xelic cho jenaj winak chopo̱j na̱ ric'acharic cu'um take ma' tob laj uxlabal eh xchalic ru̱c' i Jesus.
Re' winak re're' ar c'acharic riban chipam i ye'a̱b take camnak re're' eh ma' hab ta wach ncuybic ransil chi ribac'aric. Xa ta nak ru̱c' c'aham ch'ihch' nca'n canar ribac'aric chi ralak k'ab

on chi rilutz'uric take ralak ro̱k ru̱c' ch'ihch' maj jarpech pa' xquiniq'uej ribac'aric ralak k'ab ru̱c' c'aham ch'ihch', xit'up take eh xitok wo' take ch'ihch' re' nlutz'bic reh take ralak ro̱k. Re' winak re're' ma'xta pe' bih riponbej!
Je' wo' chic, re' winak wili rihoplom ri̱b chi k'as ju' abaj eh chi k'i̱j chi ak'ab niq'uic chi xa q'ueric wo' chi̱' nanbehic chipam i ye'a̱b re're' on nah tak yu̱k'.
Re' winak re're' k'uru' naxilow cho wach i Jesus chi cu naht cho, xchalic rajim cu re' wilic wi̱' i Jesus eh naxc'ulic lok ru̱c', xixuc'a̱' ri̱b chiwach rehtalil chi c'ahchi' riyeb rilok'il.

Je' aj wili k'oric xiban reh chi cow: «Chacuy Jesus, til chayew achi̱' chiwach Dios chi ma' eta quinayew pan ti'c'axic. Chaj bih nimahc awu̱c' i hat rAc'u̱n i Dios re' k'e̱' nimal rajawric chi naquinayeb pan ti'c'axic? nqui reh.
Je' re' xik'or i winak re're' maj re' Jesus je' wili xik'or chi pe̱t: «Hat ma' tob laj uxlabal, telen lok ru̱c' i winak wili, nqui reh.

Je' aj re' nok re' Jesus c'ahchi' rit'erem lok i ma' tob laj uxlabal, xibiraj wo' reh chi je' wili: «Chaj bih abihnal? nqui reh. Re' ma' tob laj uxlabal je' wili xik'or: «Tuhbil nibihnal maj k'e̱' hoj q'uihal chi ma' tob laj uxlabal nok hoj oconak cho ru̱c' i winak wili, nqui reh.
Nok re' ma' tob laj uxlabal c'ahchi' rit'ermejic lok ru̱c' winak re're', tohk' ripahkam ricuyuric reh Jesus chi ma'xta ritak'abjic chiri̱j lok i yuk'ul re're' ch'i̱l take rich'i̱l.
Nok je' re' c'ahchi' quik'orom, xa ma' naht ta pe' je ar wilque̱b juntuhm chi ahk c'ahchi' quibehsjic chi wi'c ar.

Je' re' k'uru' re' take ma' tob laj uxlabal re're' xquipahkaj wo' reh Jesus chi je' wili: «Chacuy chayew k'ab keh chi ru̱c' kat'ermejic lok ayu', enayew k'ab keh chi ar chic ekoj-oquic pan quiti'jolal take ahk re're', nqui take reh.

Chi je' aj re', re' Jesus xiyew k'ab queh chi xi'oquic chipam i quiti'jolal take ahk re' wilque̱b na ho'ik'ob ok (2,000). Xa re' wo' ti xye'eric k'ab queh, re' take ma' tob laj uxlabal xi'oquic wo' ti pan quiti'jolal take ahk re're'. Ru'um aj re' chi'nchel take ahk re're' xa cajamem chic qui̱b xikajic jok chiwach pa'lic wach yu̱k' wilque̱b wi̱' eh quicora̱' jok pan ha' re' xijihk'ic wi̱' chi'nchel.

Chiri̱j chic ru', re' take aj cha'jem ahk naxquilow chi je' re' xc'uluric, xa cajamem chic qui̱b xi'o̱j pan tak abi̱x eh je' wo' chipam cok i tinamit re're' chi rik'ormojic ribiral chaj bih xc'uluric. Naxquibiraj take c'acharel chi je' re', xichalic ar chipam i ye'a̱b re' wilic wi̱' i Jesus chi rilmijic wi coric re' chaj bih xc'uluric ru̱c' i winak re're'.

Chi je' aj re' naxi'o̱j c'olok take i c'acharel re' wilic wi̱' Jesus, xquilow chi re' winak re' wilic nak juntuhm chi ma' tob laj uxlabal ru̱c', tz'uklic chic, wilic chic riso' eh na'lic chic reh k'oric riban. Re' take c'acharel re're' k'e̱' wo' chic naxsahchic quic'ux ru̱c' chaj bih xbanjic ru̱c' winak re're'.

Ar aj ru' jarub pa' take xquiwachej chi coric re' chaj bih xc'uluric ru̱c' i winak re're', xquik'or ricorquil nic' wach naxit'ermejic lok take i ma' tob laj uxlabal, je' wo' chaj bih xc'uluric cu̱c' take riq'uihal i ahk naxoquic take ma' tob laj uxlabal cu̱c'.
Chalic take c'acharel re're' naxquibiraj chi'nchel re're', p'uht quik'orom reh Jesus chi je' wili: «Chacuy telen je chipam i kayuk'ul wili, nqui take reh.

Chiri̱j aj chic ru' nok re' Jesus johtic chic riban johtok chipam i cano̱wa, re' winak re' chopo̱j nak na̱ ric'acharic ru'um ma' tob laj uxlabal, xipahkaj reh chi je' wili: «Chacuy ha̱w, chayew k'ab wi̱n chi equino̱j chawi̱j, nqui reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili ric'u'ljic xiban: «Ma'eta riban, re' la' cha'n hiy pan apa̱t cu̱c' take atu̱t awaja̱w, awas acha̱k' eh chak'or queh i rinimal wach ato'bil xiban i Dios awu̱c' chi riqueteljic awach, nqui reh.

Re' winak re're' ma' xa ta chic re' chaj bih xk'ormojic reh ru'um Jesus i xo̱j riban, xo̱j la' wo' chipam take tinamit wilque̱b pan yuk'ul re're', re' Reca̱polis ribihnal. Ar xip'ut rik'ormojic queh c'acharel re' nic' pa' nimal ato'bil xiban i Jesus ru̱c'. Nanquibiraj take c'acharel re' chaj bih xc'uluric ru̱c' i winak re're', chi'nchel nsahchabic quic'ux ru'um.
Chiri̱j chic re', re' Jesus xk'ahxic wo' chic je pan cano̱wa chi juntar ha' Calile̱ya eh ar chi̱' i ha' re're', k'e̱' q'uihal take c'acharel xo̱j quimol qui̱b ru̱c' i Jesus.

Chi quixilac take wilque̱b ar, wilic jenaj winak aj c'amol be̱h chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, Ja̱yro ribihnal. Re' winak wili naxilow wach i Jesus xponic rixuc'a̱' ri̱b chiwach

eh je' wili xik'or reh chi xa nch'uk chic ric'ux: «Ha̱w, re' wixk'u̱n xa chic q'uisi̱n ma' nquimic ru'um riya'bilal naxinchalic. Chacuy, tak chiwi̱j pan pa̱t eh chacoj ak'ab china̱ reh chi enelic lok riya'bilal. Wi je' re' xa'n ma' eta nquimic je, nqui reh.
Je' re' k'uru' re' Jesus xo̱j chiri̱j i Ja̱yro chi tahkamaj je cu'um yohbal wach q'uihal tinamit re' xa nquiminlom chic qui̱b chiri̱j.

Chi quixilac take tinamit re're' wilic jenaj ixok wilic jenaj riya'bilal c'axic wach. Re' riya'bilal ixok wili re' chi re' ritz'ajo̱j re' nchalic chiri̱j eli̱c poh, xa c'ahchi' chic cho chiri̱j chi xa ma'xta chic rik'ijil eh cablaj chic ha̱b rip'utum cho chi je' re'.

Je' re' nok ru'um reh riya'bilal re're', k'e̱' wo' chic ti'quilal ric'ul ixok re're'. Je' wo' chic, xisach chi'nchel ritz'a̱k cu̱c' take rehreh wach aj ik'omonel chi tojbal rik'omal nak riya'bilal xa re' la' ma'xta bih xicamanej, uhtic la' chic xiban wach riya'bilal.

Re' ixok re're' k'uru', naxibiraj chi re' Jesus riban resmejic lok quiya'bilal take yowa'i̱b, xchalic re' wilic wi̱' i Jesus, ximin cok ri̱b chi quixilac take riq'uihal c'acharel eh nok chiri̱j chic i Jesus wilic cok, xitz'a'j cok i chi̱' risu't rijela̱' nah teleb.
Je' re' xiban ixok re're' maj c'ahchi' rik'orom pa ricapew-bal chi je' wili: «Xa re' wi xnitz'a'j cok i ro̱k i su't rijela̱' nah teleb i Jesus, enelic lok niya'bilal, nqui pa ricapew-bal.
Je' aj wo' re' k'uru' naxitz'a'j cok riso' i Jesus, re' ixok re're' xic'raj chi xpah'ic ti ritz'ajo̱j chiri̱j eh ru̱c' re're' xeht'alij chi xcahnic chi suk chic ric'ux chi junpech.

Ar aj wo' ru', re' Jesus xic'raj wo' ti chi re' rajawric xelic lok ru̱c' wilic camanic xiban, ru'um re' naxilbic je chiri̱j chi quina̱ take tinamit je' wili xik'or: «Hab wach xtz'a'anic reh niso'? nqui queh.

Naxquibiraj chi je' re', re' take raj tahkanel xquik'or reh: «Chaj bih nac'ul i hat? Ma' nawil ta na chi re' q'uihal take tinamit c'ahchi'ca̱t quiminlom. Chaj wa'ric k'uru' chi c'ahchi' abiram chi hab wach xtz'a'anic aweh? nqui take reh.
To̱b ta je' re' xquik'or reh, re' Jesus xitik ju' ilo̱j je chiri̱j chi risiq'uiric chi quixilac take tinamit hab wach xtz'a'anic reh i riso'.

Nok je' re' c'ahchi' ribanam i Jesus, re' ixok re're' xa nquirquitic chic ru'um riyo'jic xoquic cho ru'um chi reht'alim chi ru̱c' xiban re're', mahc xiban chiwach i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. To̱b ta reht'alim chi je' re', xchalic ru̱c' Jesus eh xponic rixuc'a̱' ri̱b chiwach chi risakomsjic wach chi'nchel xc'uluric ru̱c'.

Ar ajic re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh ixok re're': «Bi̱l, re' hat xiq'uic je aya'bilal ru'um chi xacoj wach chi wilic wajawric chi ic'sinic ya'bilal. Yu'na k'uru', tisoljen je pan apa̱t ru̱c' i sukquil c'uxlis xiyew aweh i Dios, nqui reh.

Nok je' aj re' c'ahchi' rik'orom i Jesus reh ixok re're', xiponic ar ju'jun take winak chalanak take pa ripa̱t i Ja̱yro re' jenaj queh aj c'amol be̱h chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Nok wilque̱b chic cok chiwach, je' wili xquik'or reh ma' Ja̱yro: «Ha̱w, re' awixk'u̱n junc'am chic riquimic je. Ta chic bih ritik aweh chi cu enawolej cok i ajabe̱s aj tijinel wili, nqui take reh.
Naxibiraj i Jesus chi je' re', je' wili xik'or reh ma' Ja̱yro: «Ma̱poh'aj ac'ux ma' Ja̱yro. Chach'ica̱' ac'ux chiwi̱j chi wilic wajawric chi quic'a'chsjic take camnak, nqui reh.

Chiri̱j chic re', re' Jesus xitik ju' ribe̱h chi ojic ar pa ripa̱t i aj c'amol be̱h re're', re' cok ru' ma' chi'nchel ta chic take raj tahkanel xiyew k'ab queh chi xi'o̱j chiri̱j xa re' la' chic i ma' Luch, re' ma' Jaco̱wo ch'i̱l richa̱k' re' Wa̱n, xic'am je take chiri̱j.
Naxiponic chi chi̱' ripa̱t i Ja̱yro, re' Jesus xibiraj chi chi'nchel take wilque̱b ar xa ti' chic pan quic'ux ok'ic nca'n chiri̱j rixk'u̱n i ma' Ja̱yro.
Naxoquic cok pan pa̱t i Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Chamay tak ahnic eh ma' tok'ic tak chic. Re' ixk'un wili ma' camnak ta, xa wiric la' riban, nqui queh.

Naxquibiraj chi je' re' take wilque̱b ar xi'oquic chi rise'ljic i Jesus xa re' la' re' xa ma' xicoj ta wo' ru̱c' ricapew-bal xca'n, re' la' xiban xipahkaj queh take chi'nchel wilque̱b pan pa̱t chi naquelic lok. Chiri̱j re're', chi xa rutquel chic wilic ch'i̱l take ritu̱t raja̱w i t'uch ixk'un ch'i̱l wo' take xib chi raj tahkanel, xi'oquic cok ar re' wilic wi̱' ixk'un camnak chic eh nok wilque̱b chic cok chiwach,

re' Jesus xichop johtok chi k'ab ixk'un re're' eh je' wili xik'or reh: «Tali̱ta, cu̱mi, nqui reh. Re' xik'or re're', je' wili ra̱j rik'orom pan kak'orbal hewre̱yo: “Ixk'un, til nik'or aweh chi tucten cho, nqui ra̱j rik'orom.
Naxk'ormojic aj reh re're', re' ixk'un re' cablaj chic ha̱b wilic reh, xuctic johtok eh xoquic chi behic. Re' take xi'ilbic reh xc'uluric re're' xsahchic quic'ux ru'um chi xc'acharic wo' chic.

Chi je' aj re', re' Jesus je' wili tak'anic xiban queh i ritu̱t raja̱w i t'uch ixk'un re're': «Re' xc'uluric wili xa chacana̱' pan ac'ux tak, ma' hab wach aj eh nak'or tak lok ribiral. Yu'na k'uru' chaquet tak i t'uch ixk'un, nqui queh.
Chiri̱j chic ru' nok re' Jesus xelic je pan tinamit Capernahum, re're' xo̱j pa ritinamital Nasaret chi ihch'ilimaj je ru'um take raj tahkanel.

Naxirak rik'ijil i hi'lbal k'i̱j chi keh i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, re' Jesus nok wilic chic cok chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, tohk' ric'uhbalem take c'acharel wilque̱b ar. Chi quixilac take c'ahchi' quibirinic reh, wilic take xicahnic chi xa sachlic chic quic'ux eh wilic wo' take je' wili pahkanic nca'n chi quiwach: «Haj ti xitijej cho take c'uhbal c'ahchi' rik'orom keh wili? Hab ti wach xye'bic reh no'jbal ricoj? Hab ti wach xye'bic rajawric chi ribanaric take lok' laj nawa̱l nkilow chi riban?

Ma' keht'alim ta na nchel pa ric'ux chi xa t'uch aj sehc wo' ti i Jesus? Ma' keht'alim ta na nchel k'uru' chi re' Mari̱ya i ritu̱t eh chi casbe̱s take Jaco̱wo ch'i̱l Chep, ch'i̱l Ju̱ras eh ch'i̱l wo' i Simon? Je' wo' chic ma' re' ta na nchel rana̱b take ixk'un quic'acharic ayu' pan katinami̱t pa ric'ux? nqui take pan quic'ux. Je' re' xquik'or maj c'axic chi queh ricojoric wach chi re' Jesus i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Ar aj ru' re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' hat-tak na'n tak wu̱c' je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios re' xa ye'o̱j chic cho rilok'il pan tak toco̱m ye'a̱b eh tz'a̱b ru' cu̱c' take rich ritinami̱t on cu̱c' take raj pan pa̱t on cu̱c' take ru̱c' take cho, ma' ye'o̱j ta so' rilok'il, nqui queh.

Je' re' nok chipam ritinami̱t Nasaret re' Jesus xa ju'jun ti take yowa̱b xesaj lok quiya'bilal naxicoj rik'ab chi quina̱, raj nchel cu̱c' take toco̱m chic c'acharel ma'xta chic ritik ju' ribanaric take lok' laj nawa̱l ru'um chi ma' xquicoj ta wach riC'uhbal.

Ru̱c' aj quino'jbal take c'acharel re're' chi ma' xquic'ul ta i riC'uhbal, re' Jesus k'e̱' xsahchic ric'ux eh chi je' re' pan tak toco̱m chic abixbal wilque̱b je ma' naht ta ar, xitik ju' ric'uhtunic chi rik'ormojic queh tinamit i holohic laj k'oric chiri̱j i Dios.

Chiri̱j chic ru' naxitik ju' behic chi c'uhtunic ar pan tak toco̱m chic ye'a̱b ma' naht ta je ar pan tinamit Nasaret, re' Jesus xiyuk'ej take cok ru̱c' i cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel eh xik'or queh chi naritak'a̱b take je chi quica'cabil chi quic'uhbaljic take c'acharel. Chiri̱j chic re' nok riyeb chic i rajawric chi quina̱ chi quit'ermejic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal cu̱c' take c'acharel wilque̱b wi̱',
xiyew wo' queh take tak'anic wili: «Ma̱c'am awa' aha̱' tak. Ma' wo' achi̱m tak, ma' wo' atz'a̱k tak. Xa re' ti wach ach'imim chac'am tak je.
Je' wo', xa re' wo' ti aper-xijab wilic chawo̱k tak na̱cojom tak je eh ma̱c'am tak je jeno' chic ajalba̱l tak, nqui queh.

Chiri̱j chic ru' je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Xa haj pa' ye'a̱b xa suk laj oquic ena'n tak chi c'uhbalanic, chapahkaj apatal tak chi eticahnic tak ar eh tiwi̱' tak ar cu rehtal chic telic tak je chipam i tinamit re're'.

Tz'a̱b ru', pa' ma' eta nquiyew wi̱' apatal tak eh ma' wo' re' c'uhbal nak'or tak enquicoj rehtal, telen tak je ar xa re' la' ru' chapuh tak cahnok i poklaj wilic pan awo̱k tak rehtalil chi quiwach take c'acharel chi ma' holohic ta xca'n. Til coric re' take c'acharel je' re' enca'n, k'e̱' wo' chic nimal wach i ti'c'axic narichalic chi quina̱ chiwach i ti'c'axic xic'ul i tinamit Soro̱ma ch'i̱l i Como̱ra, nqui Jesus.
Nok k'ilo̱j aj chic take cablaj re're', xi'o̱j chi ca'cabil chi quic'uhbaljic take c'acharel reh chi naquiyot'om quic'ux chiri̱j i quimahc chiwach i Dios.

Je' wo', re' take re' q'uihal take ma' tob laj uxlabal nchopbic quina̱ take c'acharel xquit'erej wo' lok eh q'uihal wo' take yowa'i̱b xelic lok quiya'bilal naxibuch'uric pan yolic laj ik'o̱m cu'um take cablaj re're'.

Ru'um chi xa haj ta chic ma' xo̱j lok ribiral i Jesus, junpech xponic ribiral re're' pan xiquin i Hero̱res Anti̱pas, re' raj to'o̱l i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma ar pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya. Ru̱c' take rehreh wach ribiral xponic pan xiquin chi c'ahchi' rik'ormojic, re' Hero̱res je' wili xik'or: «Re' wili re' ranxelex i Wa̱n aj kahsem ha' xc'acharic wo' chic cho eh re're' wilic ru̱c' i Jesus. Ru'um aj re', re' Jesus k'e̱' wo' chic rajawric wilic, nqui xik'or.

Chi quixilac take k'oric xibiraj, wilic wo' c'ahchi' quik'oric chi re' Jesus re' wo' chic i Eli̱yas re' aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios najtir k'i̱j on jeno' chic queh take rich aj k'orol cho riC'uhbal i Dios.

Je' re' ajic re' Hero̱res naxibiraj chi'nchel re're' je' wili i rik'or: «Ha̱', re' Jesus wili re' wo' chic i Wa̱n re' xnitak'a̱' riyoc'oric lok i na̱, xuctic pe' wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak, nqui xik'or. Je' re' xik'or chi c'ahchi' ricapam chi re' Wa̱n xchalic chi ribanaric jelow-bal reh re' chaj bih xbanaric reh.

Je' re' xicapaj maj til re' wo' Hero̱res xtak'anic je richoporic chi naritz'aparic pan che̱' re' xpixaric wi̱' chi c'aham ch'ihch'. Re' riwi̱' chi je' re' xiban reh Wa̱n ru'um chi re' Hero̱res xic'am cok chi rehq'ue̱n i Herori̱yas re' rehq'ue̱n richa̱k' re' Pili̱po ribihnal.
Chi je' re' ajic re' Wa̱n je' wili rinakaric i Hero̱res riban chiri̱j: «Re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ma' riyew ta k'ab aweh chi xac'am chi awehq'ue̱n re' ixok cu rehq'ue̱n wo' acha̱k', nqui reh.
Ru'um aj reh k'oric riban i Wa̱n, re' Herori̱yas k'e̱' nanchalic ric'a̱ ru̱c' i Wa̱n chi xa ra̱j nak chic risacham wach chi junpech xa re' la' ma' xiban ta canar

ru'um nok chiwach i Hero̱res, re' Wa̱n wilic rilok'il maj reht'alim chi coric wach ric'ux eh sak wo' wach rino'jbal. Ru'um aj re', re' Hero̱res rico'lej ri̱j ric'acharic i Wa̱n chiwach i Herori̱yas eh suk wo' ribiraj take k'oric riban i Wa̱n to̱b ta nchel ma' rirak ta chiri̱j chaj bih naribanam ru̱c'.

Nok je' re' riban i Hero̱res, re' Herori̱yas xirak nic' wach ricansjic i Wa̱n naribanam. Je' re' nok junpech nok re' Hero̱res xinink'ijej wach rihabil xiyuk'ej take aj nahsil queh take quito'bonic reh chi k'atoj k'oric ch'i̱l take aj nahsil queh take sol ch'i̱l wo' take aj walak chipam i yuk'ul Calile̱ya. Chipam aj i nink'i̱j wili nok wi'c nca'n take c'acharel re're' ch'i̱l Hero̱res,

re' rixk'u̱n Herori̱yas xoquic cok re' mololque̱b wi̱' take ula̱' eh ar xiban riso̱n chi quiwach. Ru'um chi re' Hero̱res re' wilic chi raj to'o̱l i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma ch'i̱l take rula̱' xquilow chi holohic i so̱n xiban i rixk'u̱n i Herori̱yas, re' Hero̱res je' wili xik'or reh ixk'un re're': «Chapahkaj wi̱n pa' bih nawa̱j eh re' hin eniyew aweh, nqui reh.

Chiri̱j wili je' wili xik'or reh: «Wi re' hat enapahkaj wi̱n chi re' yejal reh yuk'ul wilic wi̱' wajawric eniyew aweh, re' hin til niyew nik'orbal chi pa' bih enapahkaj wi̱n eniyew aweh eh wi ma' xniban haj wilic i nik'or, re' ok Dios ye'bok i ti'c'axic chi nina̱, nqui reh.

Naxibiraj chi je' re' rixk'u̱n i Herori̱yas, xelic je ar chi risiq'uiric ritu̱t eh xponic rik'or reh chaj bih xik'or i Hero̱res. Chi je' aj re' xibiraj reh chi je' wili: «Chaj bih enipahkaj reh Hero̱res? nqui reh ritu̱t. Re're' je' wili xik'or: «Chapahkaj reh chi eriyew aweh rina̱ i Wa̱n aj kahsem ha' chi cansbal je reh, nqui ritu̱t.

Je' re' nok re' ixk'un re're' xsoljic wo' ti chic cok rajim re' wilic wi̱' Hero̱res eh ar xipahkaj reh haj wilic i xik'or ritu̱t reh. Je' aj wili xik'or reh: «Nwa̱j chi yu'na ti chatak'a̱' riyoc'oric lok chi ralak i Wa̱n aj kahsem ha' eh chiri̱j re' chayew wi̱n pan jeno' perepic wach culc rehtalil chi xquimic chic, nqui reh.
Re' Hero̱res xchalic riyot'quil ric'ux naxibiraj chi je' re', xa re' la' ru'um chi xiyew chic rik'orbal reh chi quiwach take rula̱', xiban wo' haj wilic c'ahchi' ripahkam ixk'un.
Je' re' ajic re' Hero̱res xitak'a̱' wo' je jenaj sol re' tz'aplic cho wi̱' i Wa̱n pan che̱' eh je' wili tak'anic xiban reh: «Chayoc' lok chi ralak i Wa̱n eh chac'am cho wi̱n ayu' i rina̱, nqui reh.

Re' sol re're' xo̱j wo' chi riyoc'oric lok chi ralak i Wa̱n. Chiri̱j chic ru' xic'am cho pan jenaj perepic wach culc eh xiyew reh rixk'u̱n i Herori̱yas. Chiri̱j re', re' ixk'un re're', xo̱j rik'ahsaj reh ritu̱t.
Je' aj re', nok cansamaj chic i Wa̱n xponic molorok cho riti'jolal cu'um take raj tahkanel eh xquimuk'a̱' je.

Chiri̱j chic ru' naxquicohlaj cho quicamaj take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel re' tak'amaj take je chi c'uhbalanic, re' take re' xisoljic wo' chic cho ru̱c' i Jesus eh nok quimolom chic qui̱b ru̱c', p'uht quik'orom reh nic' nimal i camanic xponic ca'n cho eh je' wo' haj wilic take c'uhbal xquik'or chi quixilac take c'acharel.

Nok ribiram chic chi'nchel chaj bih xquik'or take raj tahkanel, re' Jesus xipahkaj queh chi nacojic chiri̱j pan jenaj ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel reh chi ar equihi'lic so' chi suk chi cutquel. Je' re' xik'or queh ru'um reh riq'uihal tinamit quimolom qui̱b ar chi xa ta nak re' chic ribanaric i quiwa' quiha̱' nca'n canar.
Je' aj re' k'uru' re' Jesus ch'i̱l take cablaj re're' xi'o̱j pan jenaj cano̱wa ar pan jenaj ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel.

To̱b ta nchel re' Jesus xa̱j nak wih'ic so' chi rutquel ch'i̱l take cablaj re're', yohbal pe' wach c'acharel je' ru̱c' xquilow naxi'elic je, xi'o̱j wo' chi co̱k chi ritahkaljic je maj xqueht'alij haj ye'a̱b xi'o̱j wi̱'. Re' take c'acharel wili re' xichalic pan tak rehreh tinamit wilque̱b chipam i yuk'ul re're', pe̱t be̱h pe' wo' chic take ponok chiwach i Jesus ch'i̱l take cablaj chi raj tahkanel.

Je' re' ajic naxponic i Jesus cu̱c' riq'uihal take tinamit wilque̱b ar chi uyunic, k'e̱' xiquetelej quiwach take riq'uihal tinamit re're' naxilow quiwach maj naxelic lok pan cano̱wa xicoj rehtal chi xa je' na chic quicab take cuc' me̱' je' ru̱c' ma'xta chic aj ilol queh nok wilque̱b. Chi je' aj re', re' Jesus tohk' wo' chic ric'uhbalem take ru̱c' rehreh wach c'uhbal.

Nok re' Jesus c'ahchi' ric'uhbalem take riq'uihal c'acharel, re' take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel naxquilow chi xo̱j chic i k'i̱j, xquijil cok qui̱b ru̱c' i Jesus eh je' wili xquik'or reh: «Ha̱w, re' ri'orahil i wa'bal reh xik'ek xiq'uic chic na̱ eh ayu' ma' haj ta enkarak wi'c quetbal queh tinamit wili maj wilco̱j pan jenaj ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel.

Ra̱j wili chak'or ta queh chi equi'o̱j pan tak abixbal on pan tak tinamit wilque̱b je ma' naht ta ayu' chi eno̱j quilok' nech' ok pa' bih queh chi naquic'uxum maj ma'xta quiwa' quiha̱' ayu', nqui take reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili quic'u'ljic xiban: «Coric nak'or tak, xa re' la' take tinamit wili, re' hat-tak na̱quetbic tak queh, nqui queh. Naxquibiraj chi je' re' take raj tahkanel, je' wo' chic wili xquik'or reh: «Ha̱w, chaj wa'ric nanak'or keh chi je' re'? Chi eta nak nkaquet take chi'nchel riq'uihal c'acharel wili, ma' nech' ta ti chi tumi̱n enka̱j chi lok'bal quiwa' quiha̱'. Ena nchel nka̱j re' ritz'akil jenaj ha̱b chi ritojbal jeno' aj camanom, nqui take reh.

Re' Jesus xik'or queh raj tahkanel chi je' wili: «Chawilow tak cho nic' q'uihal chi caxlan wi'c wilic ku̱c', nqui queh. Naxisoljic cho quik'or reh chi je' wili: «Wilic ho'o̱b chi caxlan wi'c eh quib chi joxomaj car, nqui take reh.
Chi je' aj re', re' Jesus xipahkaj queh i raj tahkanel chi naquitz'uka̱b take tinamit wach q'uim chi tzohkil.

Re' take tinamit naxquibiraj re' xk'ormojic queh xquitz'uka̱' wo' qui̱b wach q'uim chi tzohkil. Wilic take xquitzoka̱' quib chi lajeb roxc'ahl (50) quiwi̱' eh wilic wo' take xquitzoka̱' qui̱b chi ho'c'ahl (100) quiwi̱'.

Chiri̱j i wili, re' Jesus xichop johtok i ho'o̱b chi caxlan wi'c ch'i̱l i quib chi joxomaj car, xilbic johtok pan taxa̱j eh xitioxej johtok reh Dios. Cu re' aj ru' xixer i caxlan wi'c ch'i̱l take joxomaj car re're' eh nic' pa' q'uihal i caxlan wi'c ch'i̱l i joxomaj car xelic, p'uht quiyeb pan tak chacach. Ar aj ru' re' take cablaj chi raj tahkanel i Jesus xquicoj chi quiwach take ju'jun tzohk chi tinamit.
Je' aj re' riwi̱' chi xa ru̱c' ti ho'o̱b chi caxlan wi'c ch'i̱l i quib chi car, re' chi'nchel take c'acharel xca'n quiwa' chi suk.

Je' wo', k'e̱' wo' chic q'uihal i wi'c ch'i̱l i joxomaj car xmikric chi re' take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus naxquimol wach i joxomaj car ch'i̱l i wi'c re' ma' xc'uhlic ta, cu cablaj chic chacach xquimol wach.

Ma' xa re' ta re', k'e̱' la' wo' chic q'uihal i caxlan wi'c ch'i̱l i joxomaj car xmikric chi ma' xa re' ta ti cablaj ik'ob lajc'ahl (5,000) chi winak xca'n quiwa', je' la' wo' chi'nchel take ixok ch'i̱l take ha'lac'un wilque̱b ar xca'n wo' quiwa'.

Chiri̱j aj chic quiqueteric take riq'uihal tinamit re're', re' Jesus xipahkaj queh take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel chi nacoquic cok pan cano̱wa re' xiponic lok wi̱' chi juntar ha' re' wilic wi̱' i tinamit Wetsa̱yra ribihnal. Naxi'o̱j take raj tahkanel, re' Jesus cu xcahnic cahnok chi rich'akaric je ri̱b cu̱c' take tinamit cu wilque̱b ar.
Nok rich'akam chic take cahnok tinamit, re're' xo̱j johtok chi ti̱j china̱ i jenaj yu̱k' wilic ma' naht ta je ar.
Ar aj ru' china̱ i yu̱k' re're', nok xa chic rutquel wilic i Jesus eh re' cano̱wa wilque̱b wi̱' take raj tahkanel wilic chic ponok pan yejal ha', xoquic pe' cho ak'ab.

Cu china̱ je i yu̱k' re're', re' Jesus xiban wo' je canar quilmijic take raj tahkanel chi xa c'axic chic nca'n chi ribehsjic je quicano̱wa ru'um reh cow laj te̱w chalic riban chi quiwach. Naxoquic aj cho suk wach sak'ic, re' Jesus xitahkej je take cu rehtal xo̱j c'olok cu̱c' take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel chi behic riban je nah ha' xa re' la' nok ma' naht ta chic wilic cok cu̱c', xiban ri̱b chi je' nak xa̱j iq'uic je chi quiwach.
Naxquilow take raj tahkanel chi re' Jesus behic riban nah ha', re' take re' xquicapaj chi jenaj yo'sonel c'ahchi' quilom wach. Ru'um aj re' xquiq'uer quichi̱'
ru'um reh rinimal yo'jic xchalic cu̱c'. Chalic Jesus, je' wili xik'or queh: «Ma' tiyo'jic tak, re' hin Jesus. Chacowej ac'ux tak k'uru', nqui queh.
Chiri̱j re', re' Jesus xjohtic johtok cu̱c' pan cano̱wa eh chipam i junc'am re're', tz'ihrimaj xo̱j i cow laj te̱w. Naxquilow chi je' re', re' take raj tahkanel xsahchic quic'ux ru'um.

Je' aj re' xca'n maj re' take re' to̱b ta nchel xquilow i lok' laj nawa̱l xiban i Jesus naxiq'uihsaj wach i caxlan wi'c, ma' ja' xponic ta pe quicapew-bal chi rirakmajic chiri̱j chi re' Jesus til wilic rajawric. Je' re' xquic'ul maj re' quicapew-bal ja' nsakombic ta pe wach chi manlic.
Chiri̱j chic re' naxiponic lok juntar ha' chi chi̱' cok i tinamit Jenesaret ribihnal, xi'oquic cok ar.
Xa re' wo' ti xi'elic lok pan cano̱wa eh xi'oquic cok ar, re' take c'acharel reh tinamit re're' xquicoj rehtal chi re' Jesus xponic ar.

Chi je' re', re' q'uihal take c'acharel xi'o̱j chi xa cajamem chic qui̱b chi rik'ormojic chipam take chi'nchel ye'a̱b reh yuk'ul re're' chi re' Jesus xo̱j c'olok ar. Naxbirmijic chi je' re', hab pa' wach take c'acharel wilic cho quiyowa'i̱b, xquicoj cho wa tak ch'aht eh xquic'am cho cu pa' ye'a̱b nquibiraj chi wilic wi̱' i Jesus.

Je' wo', re' Jesus nanponic chipam jeno' tinamit on abixbal on xa pa' chic jeno' ye'a̱b, re' take c'acharel nquiyew lok i quiyowa̱b chi' tak be̱h eh naniq'uic ponok i Jesus ar, re' take yowa̱b xquipahkaj reh chi eriyew k'ab queh chi enquitz'a'j cok to̱b ta xa re' ti ro̱k i su't rijela̱' nah teleb ru', reh chi xa ru̱c' re're' enelic lok i quiya'bilal. Je' re' ajic naxye'eric k'ab queh, chi'nchel take nic' pa' q'uihal xitz'a'nic reh chi̱' riso' i Jesus xelic wo' lok quiya'bilal.
Pan jenaj k'i̱j re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l wo' take aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal re're', re' xichalic ar Jerusalen, xquimol cok qui̱b ru̱c' i Jesus.
Nok quimolom chic cok qui̱b ar, xquilow chi wilic take raj tahkanel i Jesus xca'n quiwa' quiha̱' chi ma' xquitz'aj ta quik'ab chi pe̱t eh xquik'or reh Jesus chi ma' holohic ta xca'n chi je' re'.

Je' re' xquik'or reh ru'um chi re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l take toco̱m chic ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel nquich'ilej qui̱b chi ribanaric i c'uhtumaj cahnok queh cu'um take quima̱m cati't, ma' jaruj ta nca'n quiwa' quiha̱' wi ma' xquinimej chi chaklic chi̱' i tz'ajo̱j k'abis ocronak take wi̱'.

Til k'e̱' wo' chic nquic'am na̱ i no'jbal re're' chi je' ricab naquisoljic chi lok' pan c'aybal, ma' nca'n ta quiwa' quiha̱' chi ma' tz'ajo̱j nech' ok quik'ab. Ma' xa re' ta quik'ab nca'n ritz'ajmajic, wilic la' wo' ju'jun chic nca'n ritz'ajmajic wach maj re' riwi̱' chi je' re' nca'n ar xquitijej cho cu̱c' take quima̱m cati't eh ru'um re're' cow nquik'or chi nacojorok take culc, take mel xun ch'i̱l take ch'ihch' xun, til curman chi naritz'ajaric quiwach. Je' wo' re' nquik'or chiri̱j take yoca̱b curman wo' chi naritz'ajaric wach.

Je' re' ajic ru'um chi re' ritz'ajaric wach chi'nchel re're' cow nquik'or ribanaric, re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l wo' take aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal re're' p'uht quibiram reh Jesus chi je' wili: «Re' take awaj tahkanel c'ahchi' quiyak'abem pan co̱k i quic'uhbal cahnok take kama̱m kati't. Je' re' nkak'or maj re' take re' ma' c'ahchi' ta ca'nam i ritz'ajaric quik'ab nok nca'n quiwa' je' ricab i hoj tijimaj wi̱', nqui take reh.

Re' Jesus naxic'u'lej take je' wili xik'or: «Re' hat-tak xa hat-tak banol awach tak ru̱c' riC'uhbal i Dios. Riwi̱' po' nchel chi re' Dios xik'or aweh tak i wili je' ricab tz'ihmbimaj cahnok ru'um i raj k'orol c'uhbal re' Isayi̱yas ribihnal: “Re' take c'acharel wili xa ru̱c' quichi̱' quinquilok'ej, ma' re' ta nchel ru̱c' chi'nchel quic'ux nca'n. Je' re' nik'or maj re' quicapew-bal ma' ch'iclic ta so' wu̱c'.
Je' re' k'uru' re' lok'onic nca'n wi̱n ma'xta bih ritik queh, ru'um nok ma' re' ta chic niC'uhbal nquic'uhtaj, re' la' chic i no'jbal ocronak take wi̱', nqui rik'orom cho Dios.

«Re' hat-tak ajic je' acab tak take ama̱m awati't tak chi nak'ihtaj wo' awi̱b tak chi ric'amaric na̱ take tak'anic ye'o̱j aweh tak ru'um i Dios. Je' re' k'uru' chi jelow-bal take tak'anic re're', re' hat-tak re' chic take i c'uhtumaj cahnok aweh tak cu'um take ama̱m awati't tak cow nayew ac'ux je' ricab na'n tak ru̱c' ritz'ajaric wach take mel, take xun, on re' ritz'ajaric wach culc ch'i̱l wo' take toco̱m chic pa' bih natz'aj tak quiwach, nqui Jesus queh.

Chiri̱j wili, re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or: «Re' hat-tak c'ahchi' wo' ayak'abem pan awo̱k tak take tak'anic ye'o̱j aweh tak ru'um i Dios nok re' chic take quik'orom cahnok aweh tak ama̱m awati't tak nac'am tak na̱.

Chacapaj tak, ar chipam Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj cahnok ru'um i Moyses, rik'or chi re' Dios xiyew take tak'anic chi je' wili: “Chalok'mej atu̱t awaja̱w tak, nqui tak'anic xiban. «Je' wo' chic queh take aj ch'ukul wach mahc xitak'a̱' i wili: “Xa hab pa' wach narisihtam i ritu̱t raja̱w, ma̱quetelej tak wach chi naricansjic je, nqui wo' tak'anic ribanam cho.

«To̱b ta wo' je' re' take tak'anic bano̱j cho, re' hat-tak nac'uhtaj tak pan atijbal tak chi xa tare̱t wo' chi jeno' c'acharel erik'or queh ritu̱t raja̱w chi re' tumi̱n nariyeb nak reh chi rito'bal, ma'xta chic riyeb reh ru'um chi xik'ahsaj chic pan k'ab i Dios chi risi̱.
Ru̱c' aj c'uhtunic na'n tak re're', til ric'uhtaj lok chi re' c'acharel re' riyew ritumi̱n chi si̱ chiwach i Dios, ma' tanlic ta chic chi reh chi erito'bej ritu̱t raja̱w.

Je' aj re' k'uru' til nik'or aweh tak chi re' hat-tak nak'ihtaj awi̱b tak chi ric'amaric na̱ take riC'uhbal i Dios, nok re' hat-tak cow nak'or tak chi naribanaric i c'uhtumaj cahnok aweh tak cu'um take ama̱m awati't tak eh re' wo' chic re' nac'uhtaj tak queh take toco̱m chic c'acharel. Nic' pa' wach na'n tak ru̱c' re're', je' wo' re' nc'uluric cu̱c' take toco̱m chic abano̱j na'n tak, nqui Jesus queh.

Chiri̱j re're', re' Jesus xik'or queh c'acharel chi naquijilim cok qui̱b ru̱c' eh chiri̱j re' je' wili xik'or queh: «Chi'nchel hat-tak c'acharel chabiraj tak chi coric eh charak wo' tak chiri̱j i nanik'orom wili:
Re' nbanic chi wilic i mahc pan ca̱mna take c'acharel ma' re' ta nchel i chaj bih nquic'ux jok chi tzajoj on ma' tz'ajo̱j ta quik'ab, re' la' chaj bih c'ahbil laj k'oric nelic cho pan quichi̱'.
Je' re' k'uru' re' k'as axiquin tak chi birinic camanok aweh tak chi rirakmajic chiri̱j re' chaj bih xnik'or lok, nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j chi ricohlam chic take k'oric re're', re' Jesus xicana̱' cahnok i q'uihal i tinamit re're' eh xo̱j pan jenaj pa̱t. Nok ar chic wilic ch'i̱l take cablaj chi raj tahkanel, re' take cablaj re're' xquibiraj reh chaj bih nelic wi̱' i c'uhtunic xiban chi xam.

Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' hat-tak, ma' ja' xta pe ok wo' nchel ano'jbal tak chi rirakmajic chiri̱j xnik'or? Ma' narak ta na tak chiri̱j k'uru' chi ma'xta bih jeno' pa' bih nkac'ux jok, riban ta nak chi wilic i mahc pan ka̱mna hoj c'acharel.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' pa' bih nkac'ux jok ma' re' ta nchel pan ka̱mna ncahnic, xa k'e̱' la' no̱j jok chikapa̱m eh chiri̱j chic ru' nelic wo' chic lok chikapa̱m, nqui Jesus. Re' k'oric re're' xik'or i Jesus reh chi re' take re' naquirakam chiri̱j chi chi'nchel i pa' bih wilic chi c'uxuric, tare̱t wo' take chi c'uxuric.

Chiri̱j chic rica'pechjic rik'ormojic queh chi re' nbanic chi wilic i mahc pan ca̱mna take c'acharel ma' re' ta nchel i chaj bih nquic'ux jok chi tzajoj on ma' tz'ajo̱j ta quik'ab, re' la' chaj bih c'ahbil laj k'oric nelic cho pan quichi̱', re' Jesus xik'or wo' queh chi je' wili:

«Charak tak chiri̱j chi re' nbanic chi nmahcanic jeno' c'acharel, re' take pa' bih wilic cho pa ra̱mna maj cu pa ra̱mna c'acharel njohtic cho c'ahbil laj no'jbal je' ricab take banoj tak c'oyomal chiri̱j lok i caxarahil, on tununic tak i̱b pan c'oyomal chi ma' caxa̱ra ta take, on re' cansanic tak i̱b.

Je' wo' re' i banoj tak lek' on c'axoj tak wach bihomal, re' yibel tak wach no'jbal, re' jot'oj tak i̱b, re' rotowjic tak ixok on rotowjic tak winak, re' ixowonic tak i̱b, re' ribanaric ma' holohic ta laj c'uta̱j, re' nimsinic tak i̱b ch'i̱l wo' ribanaric jeno' xa chajaric chi ma' capewemaj ta ri̱j.

Je' re' k'uru' chi'nchel i c'ahbil laj bano̱j xnik'or lok ribiral aweh tak wili, re're' til pa ra̱mna i c'acharel nasjic cho ribanaric eh re're' nbanic chi nwih'ic i mahc pan ca̱mna take c'acharel, nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic ru' re' Jesus xelic je pa riyuk'ul i Calile̱ya eh xo̱j chipam take quiyuk'ul aj Ti̱ro ch'i̱l aj Siron. Nok wilic chic pan jenaj pa̱t ar chipam i yuk'ul re're', re' Jesus xa̱j nak chi ma' hab tak wach eneht'alanic reh chi wilic ponok ar xa re' la' ma' xiban ta wo' canar ric'oloric ri̱b
maj jenaj ixok re' wilic jenaj rixk'u̱n chopo̱j na̱ ric'acharic ru'um i ma' tob laj uxlabal, xchalic ru̱c' i Jesus naxibiraj ribiral chi re're' wilic ponok ar eh xchalic rixuc'a̱' ri̱b chiwach.

Re' ixok wili ar asjanak cho pan tinamit Peni̱sya ribihnal re' wilic pa riyuk'ul i Si̱ro eh re' take rima̱m rati't aj criye̱co take. Je' re' ajic to̱b ta re're' ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho i ma' Israhel, je' wili xipahkaj reh Jesus naxponic ru̱c': «Ha̱w chacuy chawesaj lok wi̱n i ma' tob laj uxlabal wilic ru̱c' i wixk'u̱n, nqui reh.

Chalic i Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Je' ricab chi jeno' ajabe̱s ma' eta riban chi reh chi pe̱t ti eriyeh'aj lok riwa' i ritz'i̱' chi ja' riquet ta take riha'lac'u̱n, je' wo' re' chi niwach i hin, ma' riwi̱' ta wo' chi pe̱t ti enwesaj lok riya'bilal awixk'u̱n chi cu ja' ta wo' nwesaj ta lok riya'bilal chi pe̱t jeno' queh take ra̱' ri'sil take cho ma' Israhel wilque̱b chipam i yuk'ul wili, nqui Jesus.

Re' ixok re're', je' wo' chic wili xic'u'lej wi̱' i Jesus: «Ha̱w, til coric aweh nak'or xa re' la' je' ricab naquiqueteric take ha'lac'un ma' xa re' ta take re' nca'n quiwa', quehtric la' wo' ti chic take tz'i' ru̱c' rixe̱r caxlan wi'c nquimol rehquen rime̱xa i quico̱', je' ok wo' ti re' cha'n ku̱c' i hoj ma' re' ta hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, koj-ehtrok wo' ti nech' ok ru̱c' i to'bal ye'o̱j chi queh take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, nqui ixok re're'.

Naxibiraj i Jesus chi je' re', je' wili xik'or reh ixok re're': «Etinito'bej maj ru̱c' i xak'or lok wili xc'utunic chi ch'iclic ac'ux chiwi̱j. Yu'na k'uru' tisoljen je pan apa̱t chi suk chic ac'ux maj re' ma' tob laj uxlabal nchopbic na̱ ric'acharic awixk'u̱n xelic chic lok ru̱c', nqui reh.
Je' aj re' k'uru' naxponic ixok re're' pa ripa̱t, xirak i rixk'u̱n chi hi'lic chic riban wach yoca̱b chi suk chic ric'ux eh re' ma' tob laj uxlabal elenak chic lok ru̱c'.

Chiri̱j chic relic je i Jesus chipam i yuk'ul Ti̱ro ribihnal, re're' ch'i̱l take cablaj chi raj tahkanel xichop je ribe̱h chi ojic ar pan yuk'ul re' “Lajeb chi Tinamit” ribihnej. Reh chi nariponic ar, pe̱t xiq'uic je pa riyuk'ul i tinamit Siron eh je' wo' chipam i yuk'ul re' wilque̱b wi̱' take tinamit wilque̱b je chi chi̱' i ha' Calile̱ya ribihnal.

Ar ajic chipam i yuk'ul “Lajeb chi Tinamit” ribihnal, pan jenaj k'i̱j xc'amaric cho chiwach i Jesus jenaj winak cup eh tasrak' wo'. Re' take xic'ambic cho reh xquipahkaj ato'bil reh i Jesus chi naricojom i k'ab china̱ chi esbal lok ric'axquilal.

Naxibiraj chi je' re' i Jesus xesaj je i winak re're' chi quixilac take riq'uihal i c'acharel. Chiri̱j chic re' ximin cok i ju' k'ab chipam i ju'jun chi xiquin i winak re're' eh chi xichuhbaj ju' k'ab, xitz'a'j wo' cok i ju' ra̱k'.

Chiri̱j chic ru', re' Jesus xilbic johtok pan taxa̱j eh rehtalil chi c'ahchi' ricapewenic chiri̱j i winak re're' xijik'ej ruxla̱b chi cow. Chiri̱j chic re' pan jenaj queh xiquin i winak re're', je' wili xik'or reh pan k'oric arame̱yo: «E̱pata, nqui reh. Re' k'oric re're' ra̱j rik'orom pan jenaj chic kak'orbal i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel “titehok”.
Chiri̱j chic ru', xa chiwach wo' ti junc'am re're' naxk'oric i Jesus, re' take xiquin i winak re're' xitehebic wo' ti cabchel eh ximay wo' ti reh i tasrak'.

Cu re' aj ru' xic'am wo' chic cho i winak re're' cu̱c' take xic'ambic cho reh chiwach eh je' wili i tak'anic xiban queh: «Nipahkaj aweh tak chi til ma' haj nawesaj tak lok rik'ormojic re' xniban ru̱c' winak wili, nqui queh. To̱b ta nchel q'uih pech xik'or queh chi je' re' i Jesus, re' take c'acharel re're' ma' xquic'am ta wo' na̱ chaj bih xk'ormojic queh, riman la' chic xquesaj lok ribiral chaj bih xiban i Jesus.

Je' aj re' xca'n maj k'e̱' wo' chic naxsahchic quic'ux chi xa je' chic wili nquik'or chi quiwach: «Re' cok i Jesus wili til chi'nchel riban chi coric. Re're' riban chi quibirinic chic take cup eh chi quik'oric take me̱m, nqui take.
Chipam jenaj chic i k'i̱j nok quimolom wo' chic qui̱b riq'uihal tinamit chi ribirmijic i Jesus, re're' xik'o'rej cok ru̱c' take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel ru̱c' eh je' wili xik'or queh:
«K'e̱' niquetelej quiwach take tinamit wili maj xi'o̱j chic pa ro̱x k'i̱j quiwih'ic ku̱c' eh yu'na ma'xta chic quiwa' quiha̱'.
Eta wo' nak nitak'a̱' take je pan quipa̱t chi ma' ca'nam ta quiwa' yohbal chi queh chi equik'ehbic je pan be̱h maj wilic cu naht yuk'ul quichalic, nqui queh.
Re' take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel je' wili xquic'u'lej wi̱': «Ha̱w, chipam i ye'a̱b wilco̱j wi̱' ma'xta patanel. Haj enkarak cho i wi'c quetbal queh riq'uihal c'acharel wili, nqui reh.
Chi je' aj re', re' Jesus xibiraj queh chi je' wili: «Jarub chi caxlan wi'c wilic awu̱c' tak? nqui queh. —Xa wuku̱b ti, nqui take reh.

Chi je' re', re' Jesus xitak'a̱' quitz'ukunjic take tinamit re're' wach ac'al. Chiri̱j chic re' Jesus xichop johtok i wuku̱b chi caxlan wi'c eh naxitioxej johtok reh i Dios, xixer take caxlan wi'c re're' eh p'uht riyeb take pan tak chacach, reh chi re' take nahsil raj tahkanel naquicojom chi quiwach i riq'uihal tinamit.

Nok oquic nak chic queh chi puhcunic, xquirak wo' cok qui̱b xib chi cuc' joxomaj car wilic cu̱c'. Re' Jesus xichop wo' take joxomaj car re're' eh xitioxej wo' johtok reh Dios. Chiri̱j chic ru' xi'o̱j wo' chi ripuhcjic take joxomaj car re're' ch'i̱l i wi'c queh take c'acharel.

Je' aj re' ru', nok re' take tinamit ca'nam chic quiwa' chi suk, re' take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel cu wuku̱b chic chacach chi caxlan wi'c je' ru̱c' ma' xc'uhlic ta, xquimol wach cu̱c' tinamit re're'.
Til wo' chic k'e̱' q'uihal take c'acharel xiwi'c, chi ma' xa ta wilque̱b lajeb ik'ob (4,000). Nok quicohlam aj chic quiwa' take c'acharel, re' Jesus xich'ak je take tinamit re're'.
Chiri̱j chic re', chi rich'i̱l take cablaj chi raj tahkanel xi'oquic pan jenaj cano̱wa eh xi'o̱j ar pa riyuk'ul Talmanu̱ta ribihnal.

Chipam take k'i̱j re're', wilic queh take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xi'o̱j c'olok ru̱c' i Jesus eh chi xa nca̱j nak chic quirakam chaj bih encalajic wi̱' chi quiwach, xquipahkaj reh chi naribanam jeno' lok' laj nawa̱l chi quiwach c'uhtbal reh chi re're' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric tak'amaj cho cu pan taxa̱j. Naxquilow chi ma' xc'u'ljic ta na̱ queh i pahkanic, re' take re' p'uht quichopom qui̱b chi k'oric ru̱c' i Jesus.

Re' no'jbal re're' ma' xponic ta so' chiwach i Jesus. Je' re' nok k'e̱' wo' chic xcakric cu̱c' eh naxijik'ej ruxla̱b chi narik'oric cu̱c' ru̱c' cow laj k'oric, je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' hat-tak re' c'acharic na'n tak chiwach rik'ijil yu'na, k'e̱' wo' chic c'ahbil ano'jbal tak. To̱b ta xawilow tak chic take toco̱m chic lok' laj nawa̱l nibanam xa cu c'ahchi' wo' apahkam tak wi̱n chi nanibanam chic jeno' lok' laj nawa̱l. Til coric nik'or aweh tak, ma' jeno' chic lok' laj nawa̱l nanibanam chawach hat-tak c'acharel c'achalca̱t tak chiwach rik'ijil yu'na, nqui queh.
Xa cu re' wo' ti junc'am rik'orom chi je' re', re' Jesus xicana̱' take cahnok ar, xoquic cok pan cano̱wa eh xo̱j chi juntar ha' Calile̱ya.

Nok behic chic riban je cano̱wa nah ha', re' take cablaj chi nahsil aj tahkanel xquicoj rehtal chi xa jenaj ti chi wi'c wilic cu̱c' reh wach quibe̱h. Re' take re' xiq'uic pe' cho pan quic'ux ric'amaric cho i quiwa' chi manlic!

Nok capewenic nca'n chiri̱j quiwa', re' Jesus p'uht rik'ilim take chiwach quino'jbal take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, je' wo' chiwach i rino'jbal i Hero̱res re' Anti̱pas. Chi cojbal rehtal i c'ahchi' rik'orom queh, re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' no'jbal nca'n take c'acharel re're' xa je' na ricab i camanic riban i rik'omal caxlan wi'c re' ncojoric chi sipsbal wach i k'o̱r. Ru'um aj re' chayohbalej awi̱b tak, ma̱ban aweh tak i quino'jbal ru', nqui queh.
Re' take raj tahkanel je' wili xquik'or chi quiwach naxquibiraj chi'nchel re're': «Ha̱', re' Jesus c'ahchi' rik'orom keh wili ru'um chi xicoj rehtal chi ma' manlic ta kawa' xkac'am cho, nqui take.

Re' Jesus naxicoj rehtal chaj bih c'ahchi' quik'orom chi quiwach je' wili xik'or queh: «Chajaric cho re' chi xatik'ulic tak chawach chi k'oric chiri̱j chi ma' manlic ta awa' tak xac'am cho? Chi awilow tak chic i lok' laj nawa̱l xniban ru̱c' i wi'c, riwi̱' nak chic chaweh tak chi xarak tak chiri̱j chi re' hin eriban chi eniban jeno' chic lok' laj nawa̱l je' ricab re're'. Chajaric cho re' k'uru' chi ma' ncamanic ta so' aweh acapew-bal tak?

Re' hat-tak je' acab tak i sot' re' wilic wo' nak nak' wach xa re' la' ma' ncamanic ta wo' reh chi ilo̱j on je' acab tak i cup re' wilic wo' nak xiquin xa re' la' ma' ncamanic ta wo' reh chi naribirinic. Re' hat-tak ja' niq'uic ta pan ac'ux tak i lok' laj nawa̱l xniban cho junpech chi xa ru̱c' ti ho'o̱b chi caxlan wi'c xniquet wi̱' take cablaj ik'ob lajc'ahl (5,000) chi winak, maje'?

Chak'or aj tak wi̱n wili k'uru': Naxnipuhcaj i ho'o̱b chi caxlan wi'c re're' chi quina̱ take cablaj ik'ob lajc'ahl (5,000) chi winak, jarub aj chic chacach xamol tak je' ru̱c' ma' xc'uhlic ta? nqui queh. —Cablaj chic chacach, nqui jenaj queh.

—Coric xak'or! Eh naxinpuhcaj wuku̱b chi caxlan wi'c chi quina̱ take lajeb ik'ob (4,000) chi c'acharel, jarub chic chacach xamol tak je' ru̱c' i ma' xc'uhlic ta? nqui queh. —Wuku̱b chic chacach, nqui wo' chic cho jenaj.

—Coric aweh! Wi chi niwach i hin eriban chi eniban chic jeno' lok' laj nawa̱l je' ricab re're', chaj wa'ric k'uru' chi ma' narak ta tak chiri̱j chi ma' riwi̱' ta chaweh tak chi ntuquic awa̱mna tak chiri̱j xa ru'um chi xa jenaj ti chi wi'c xac'am tak cho? nqui Jesus queh.

Chiri̱j chic naxo̱j c'olok i Jesus ch'i̱l take cablaj chi raj tahkanel ar pan tinamit Wetsa̱yra, xc'amaric cho ru̱c' Jesus jenaj winak sot'. Re' take xic'ambic cho reh xquipahkaj ato'bil reh chi naricojom i k'ab china̱ reh chi naresam lok ric'axquilal.

Naxibiraj chi je' re' i Jesus, xichop chi k'ab eh xic'am lok chi chi̱' i tinamit. Ar aj ru' xichuhbaj pan nak' wach i sot' re're', xicoj take ju' k'ab rij nak' wach eh xibiraj reh i wili: «Tilbic na chic so'? nqui reh.
—Ho̱', nwilow chic so' quiwach take c'acharel re' cok ru' xa rumrum wach ilo̱j niban chi xa je' take che̱' behic nca'n nanwilow, nqui winak re're'.

Naxibiraj chi je' re', re' Jesus xiyew wo' chic ju' k'ab ri̱j nak' wach chi sakombal pan nak' wach. Je' re' nok re' winak re're' k'unk'u̱n p'uht risakombic pan nak' wach cu rehtal xilbic pe' chi coric.

Chi je' re', re' Jesus xik'or reh chi je' wili: «Ma' tiq'uic pah'ok xa haj reh tinamit hiy la' chi coric pan apa̱t reh chi je' re' ma' hab ta wach aj eh enak'or re' haj wilic xniban awu̱c', queh la' take awaj pan pa̱t enak'or chi pe̱t, nqui Jesus reh.

Chiri̱j chic chi xi'elic je pan tinamit Wetsa̱yra, re' Jesus ch'i̱l take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel xquimol je be̱h ar pan tak abixbal wilque̱b chipam i tinamit Sesare̱ya Pili̱po ribihnal. Ar wach be̱h re' Jesus je' wili xibiraj queh: «Chaj bih nquik'or take c'acharel chiwi̱j? nqui queh.

—Wilic tinamit quik'oric chi re' hat i Wa̱n re' aj kahsem ha' re' camnak chic je. Wilic wo' quik'oric chi re' hat, hat jenaj queh take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios je' ru̱c' aj najtir k'i̱j je' ricab i Eli̱yas, nqui jenaj queh aj tahkanel.
Chalic Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Raj hat-tak, chaj bih nacapaj tak chiwi̱j i hin? nqui queh. Ar re' ma' Luch je' wili xik'or reh: «Ha̱', re' hat, hat i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, nqui reh.
Naxibiraj chi je' re' i Jesus xiyew queh i tak'anic chi re' xik'or i ma' Luch ma' hab ta wach aj eh c'acharel naquik'orom.

Chiri̱j aj chic i k'oric xiban i ma' Luch, re' Jesus p'uht ribanam c'uhbalanic chiri̱j ribiral i riquimic. Je' aj wili xik'or queh take cablaj chi raj tahkanel: «Re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel k'e̱' nimal ti'c'axic nanic'ulum nanicansjic. Je' wo', re' niC'uhbal ma'xta wo' ric'ulmujic cu'um take nahsil chipam katinami̱t i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Je' wo' re' naca'nam take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses maj chi'nchel re're' curman chi naric'ulmujic, je' wo' chi re' hin nawuctic wo' cho pa ro̱x k'i̱j niquimic, nqui Jesus.

Je' aj re' riwi̱' k'oric xiban i Jesus naxiyew chi eht'aljic chi quiwach take cablaj chi raj tahkanel, re' ricorquilal ribiral riquimic. Chiri̱j chic rik'ormojic re're', re' ma' Luch xesaj lok pa reh i Jesus chi rinakaric ru'um take k'oric xik'or chiri̱j riquimic maj chi reh ma' Luch ma' jaruj ta so' naribanam chi re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric nariquimic je.

Naxibiraj chaj bih xk'ormojic reh ru'um ma' Luch, re' Jesus xisolq'uij je rilbal chi quina̱ take riman chic raj tahkanel eh je' wili k'oric xik'or chi reh aj Yahm: «Telen chi niwach hat aj Yahm, nqui xik'or. Chiri̱j chic re' xinak i ma' Luch chi quiwach take rich'i̱l: «Re' aj Yahm ncojbic cho reh capew-bal re're' awu̱c'. Ru'um aj re' ma' nacapaj ta ri̱j ribanaric haj wilic ra̱j i Dios, re' la' acapew-bal i hat riban jenaj wach ru̱c' quicapew-bal take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' nquich'ica̱' ta quic'ux chiri̱j i Dios, nqui Jesus reh.

Chiri̱j chic ru' naxinak i ma' Luch, re' Jesus xik'o'rej je take tinamit chi naquimolom cok qui̱b ru̱c' ch'i̱l take cablaj chi raj tahkanel eh je' wili xik'or queh pan junwachil: «Re' hab wach nariyeb ric'ux chi nitahkaljic chik'eb lok chiri̱j ric'ux nic' nimal nesenic lok reh ricapew-bal chiwi̱j i hin. Je' wo', ma' xa re' ok pan sukquilal naquiritahkem, je' la' ok wo' pan ti'c'axic je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak ritehlam ricuru̱s.

Je' re' nik'or maj hab wach re' xa re' sukquil c'uxlis ra̱j pa ric'acharic, ma'xta rehcham i junelic c'acharic ru̱c' i Dios, raj nchel i ma' rik'or ta bihnal ric'uluric i ti'c'axic nbanaric reh ru'um chi waj tahkanel on ru'um wo' chi aj k'orol reh niC'uhbal re' nye'bic risukquilal quic'ux take quic'ulbic reh, re're' narehcham i junelic c'acharic.
Je' re' k'uru' ma̱yew acapew-bal tak chiri̱j i nic' pa' nimal wilic aweh tak maj wi ma' xawehchaj tak i junelic c'acharic ma'xta chic jeno' ritz'akil enatojbej tak wi̱' ri̱j.
Ma'xta wo' bih eritik aweh tak chi yohbal wach abihomal tak wilic chi rilok'oric xa chaj bih aweh tak maj ru̱c' re're' ma' eta wo' nawehchaj tak i junelic c'acharic.

Je' re' k'uru' re' c'acharel ra̱j oquic chi waj tahkanel, chibiraj chi coric i k'oric wili: Re' c'acharel nanwih'ic chi quiwach take c'ahbil quino'jbal re' je' quicab jeno' c'ahbil laj ixok chi banoj c'oyomal, wi nq'uix'ic chi rik'ormojic chi waj tahkanel on chi aj k'orol reh niC'uhbal, re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel xa quinq'uix'ic chic nanik'orom wo' reh chi ma' re' ta waj tahkanel naquinsoljok wo' chic cho wich'i̱l take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i wAja̱w chi sutumaj wi̱j ru̱c' rinimal wach sakomil re' nsutunic ri̱j i Dios, nqui i Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic wili, re' Jesus xik'or wo' chic queh wilque̱b ar chi je' wili: «Til coric nik'or chi wilic aweh tak je' ru̱c' wilca̱t tak ayu' yu'na cu na̱wilom tak nic' wach riwi̱' k'atoj k'oric riban i Dios ru̱c' rinimal rajawric. Re' hat-tak re're' cu ja'xta pe aquimic tak je ma' ja' nawilow tak re're', nqui queh.

Waki̱b ok chic k'i̱j chiri̱j ru', re' Jesus xesaj lok pa reh chi cutquel re' ma' Luch ch'i̱l Jaco̱wo ch'i̱l wo' i Wa̱n eh xic'am je take china̱ jenaj naht na̱ yu̱k'. Ar aj china̱ i yu̱k' re're', re' Jesus xo̱j riban chi toco̱m chic rilbal chi quiwach take aj tahkanel re're' maj xa nch'abch'atic chic xiban.

Re' riso' xiban chi xa saksa̱k chic xa je' chic risakil sak laj su̱tz', xiban wo' chi xa nch'abch'atic chic risakil chi ma' wo' jeno' c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al ericana̱' chi je' re' risakil jeno' tz'ih ritz'aj wach.
Ar aj ru' ruhmumaj pe' chic cho quib aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios aj najtir k'i̱j, re' Moyses ch'i̱l Eli̱yas. Re' take quib re're' xi'oquic chi k'oric ru̱c' i Jesus.

Naxilow ma' Luch chi je' re', je' wili xik'or je reh: «Ha̱w kaj tijinel, k'e̱' pe' tare̱t chi wilco̱j ayu'! Chayew k'ab keh k'uru' chi enkatik'a̱' xib ok chi cuc' pahpa'x. Jenaj aweh hat, jenaj reh Moyses eh jenaj wo' reh Eli̱yas, nqui reh.
Je' re' xik'or ma' Luch ru'um chi ma' xirak ta chic jeno' chajaric k'oric narik'orom maj re're' ch'i̱l i quib chic rich'i̱l xa yo'jic chic wilque̱b ru'um i c'ahchi' ric'uluric chi quiwach.

Chiri̱j wili xkajic cho jenaj su̱tz' chi quina̱ cu rehtal xicahnic chi rehquen rimujal. Ar xelic cho take k'oric xik'or i Dios chi je' wili: «Re' Jesus wili til k'e̱' ti' nwic'raj maj wAc'u̱n aj nawil. Chabiraj tak rik'orbal k'uru', nqui k'oric xbanjic cho.
Je' re' ajic naxquijohsaj johtok quilbal, ma'xta chic nquilow wach i Moyses ch'i̱l Eli̱yas, xa re' la' chic i Jesus pa'lic chi quiwach chi rutquel.

Chiri̱j aj wili nok kajic chic riban cho Jesus rich'i̱l take xib chi raj tahkanel xi'ihch'ilanic je reh, je' wili tak'anic xiban queh ar wach be̱h: «Ma' hab pe wach aj eh nak'or tak i xawilow tak wili cu rehtal nok re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, hin ok chic uctunak cho chi quixilac take camnak, nqui queh.

Chi je' aj re', re' take xib re're' ma' haj ta pe xquesaj lok ribiral re' xc'uluric china̱ i yu̱k' re're', xa re' la' ru' re' take re' ru'um chi ma' xquirak tak chiri̱j i k'oric xiban i Jesus chiri̱j ructic wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak, tohk' wo' quibiram chi quiwach chaj bih nelic wi̱' i k'oric re're'.

Chiri̱j chic re' je' wili xquik'or cok reh Jesus: «Ha̱w, re' hoj nkacoj wach chi re' hat i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' re' kacapew-bal i hoj xa re' la' chaj bih riwi̱' chi re' take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses nquik'or chi re' ma' Eli̱yas naric'ulic lok chi pe̱t chiwach i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric? nqui take reh.

Ar ajic re' Jesus je' wili quic'u'ljic xiban: «Coric nquik'or chi re' Eli̱yas naric'ulic lok chi pe̱t chi ribanaric chi re' take tinamit naquitik'a̱b qui̱b chi ric'uluric i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Re' wili k'oro̱j wo' cho ribiral ru'um i Dios ar chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal, re' rik'or wi̱' chi re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, curman chi re' niC'uhbal ma'xta ric'ulmujic eh curman wo' chi k'e̱' rinimal wach ti'c'axic nanic'ulum naquincansjok je.

Coric aj ru' nquik'or take aj tijem ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chiri̱j i Eli̱yas, xa re' la' ma'xta nquicoj rehtal chi xwih'ic chic chi quixilac jenaj winak re' xc'ulic chi rijelow-bal i Eli̱yas. Til pan coric nik'or aweh tak chi nic' pa' wach tz'ihmbimaj cho pan Lok' laj Hu̱j chi naric'ulic lok, xc'ulic wo' lok re' cok ru' ma' xquic'ul ta chi suk re' la' chic xca'n ribanaric re' haj wilic ti'c'axic xca̱j ca'nam reh, nqui Jesus chi c'ahchi' rik'oric chiri̱j Wa̱n aj kahsanel ha'.

Chiri̱j chic ru' re' Jesus ch'i̱l take xib chi raj tahkanel xi'o̱j c'olok re' wilque̱b cho wi̱' quich'i̱l take aj tahkanel re're'. Ar xquilow chi sutumaj chic qui̱j cu'um juntuhm chi tinamit c'ahchi'que̱b chi c'ulwa̱ch ch'i̱l take aj tahkanel. Chi quixilac take tinamit re're' wilque̱b wo' take queh aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses.
Re' take tinamit re're' naxquilow chi xponic i Jesus ar xi'o̱j chi ric'alenjic chi xa suk chic quic'ux maj chi queh ru' ma'xta nak quilom wach ar.
Chalic Jesus xibiraj queh chi je' wili: «Chaj bih aj chiri̱j c'ahchi'ca̱t tak chi banoj c'ulwa̱ch cu̱c' take waj tahkanel? nqui queh.

Jenaj queh riq'uihal tinamit wilque̱b ar, je' wili xik'or reh: «Ha̱w aj tijinel keh, re' hin xnic'am cho ayu' i wac'u̱n reh chi naresmejic lok ric'axquilal maj jenaj ma' tob laj uxlabal xiban chi xcahnic chi me̱m chic.

Je' wo' chic, xa nic' pa' nchoporic ru'um ma' tob laj uxlabal, re' wac'u̱n riban chi xa nquirquitic chic, nelic cho woxk' pan chi̱' eh richeq'uej ri̱b. Nok ma' xatnirak ta ayu', xnik'or queh take nahsil awaj tahkanel reh chi naquit'erem lok i ma' tob laj uxlabal ru̱c' i wac'u̱n, xa re' la' ma' xca'n ta lok canar rit'ermejic, nqui reh Jesus.

Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh take raj tahkanel: «Ha̱'! Re' cok hat-tak cow chic ana̱ tak chi ma' nanimej ta tak niC'uhbal! Ma̱capaj tak k'uru' chi chiwach i quib xib chic k'i̱j wilqui̱n chaxilac tak xa cu naca̱t wo' nicuyum tak ru̱c' ricowil ano'jbal tak re're', nqui chi k'ilbal queh. Chiri̱j chic ru', xik'or reh winak chi je' wili: «Chac'am cho wi̱n awac'u̱n, nqui reh.

Je' aj re' naxc'amaric cho i ac'un re're' chiwach i Jesus, re' ma' tob laj uxlabal xilow wach i Jesus xiban chi re' ac'un re're' xa nquirquitic chic, p'uht ribalem ri̱b wach ac'al eh xa nelic chi cho woxk' pan chi̱'.
Naxilow chi je' re', re' Jesus xibiraj reh raja̱w i ac'un re're' chi je' wili: «Jarub ha̱b oconak i c'axquilal wili ru̱c' awac'u̱n? nqui reh. —Xa pa rit'uchal wo' oconak cho.

Ma' xa re' ta re' riban i ma' tob laj uxlabal reh. Wilic pech ricut pan k'a̱k' on pan ha' chi ricansjic nak je. Ru'um aj re', wi eriyew ri̱b chawach katobjic, koj-aban ato'bil eh chaquetelej kawach, nqui ajabe̱s re're'.
Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Ma̱k'or wi eriyew ri̱b chi niwach maj re' hin til niban canar xa pa' jaric lok' laj nawa̱l to'bal reh c'acharel re' rich'ica̱' ric'ux chiwi̱j, nqui Jesus.

Chipam i junc'am naxik'or chi je' re' i Jesus, re' ajabe̱s re're' je' wili xik'or: «Re' hin til ch'iclic nic'ux chawi̱j Jesus, xa re' la' pa' wo' ti ma' nponic ta wi̱' nicapew-bal, quinato'bej ru̱c' re're', nqui xik'or.

Nok cu k'oric wo' riban ru̱c' ajabe̱s re're', re' Jesus xilow chi q'uihal take tinamit p'uht quituhbam cok que̱b ru̱c'. Ru'um chi ma' xa̱j ta chi q'uihal tinamit enquimol cok qui̱b ru̱c', je' wili xik'or reh i ma' tob laj uxlabal: «Ma' tob laj uxlabal re' tibanic chi re' ac'un wili memrenak eh cuprunak wo', yu'na nik'or aweh chi telen lok chipam ric'acharic i ac'un wili eh ma' tisoljic chic cho ru̱c' chi junpech, nqui reh.

Ar aj ru' naxibiraj i ma' tob laj uxlabal chi je' re' xiq'uer chi̱' chi cow, xiquich'quij wach ac'un re're' eh chiri̱j chic ru' xelic lok ru̱c'. Ru'um chi re' ac'un re're' xcahnic junc'am chi cutlic wach ac'al, re' take riq'uihal c'acharel xi'ilbic reh chi je' re' p'uht quik'orom chi re' ac'un re're' xquimic chic
xa re' la' ma' je' ta wo' re', maj re're' xpah'ic wo' ti johtok chipam i junc'am naxchoporic johtok chi k'ab ru'um i Jesus to'bal reh chi xpa'lajic johtok.

Chiri̱j aj chic re' nok re' Jesus ch'i̱l take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel wilque̱b chic chi cutquel pan jenaj pa̱t, wilic queh take re', xquibiraj cok reh chi je' wili: «Ha̱w, chaj wa'ric nok re' hoj ma' xka'n ta canar rit'ermejic lok i ma' tob laj uxlabal ru̱c' ac'un re're'? nqui take reh.
Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' ena'n tak wi̱' canar quit'ermejic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal je' ricab take re', xa re' wach ribanaric i ti̱j ru̱c' cuyuj wi'c ha' chiwach i Dios, nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic naxi'elic je chipam i yuk'ul re're', re' Jesus ch'i̱l take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel xquibehsaj pa̱m i yuk'ul i Calile̱ya. Nok wilque̱b chipam i yuk'ul wili, re' Jesus chi ma' ra̱j ta nak chi enpitiric chipam i c'uhbalanic riban queh take cablaj chi raj tahkanel ma' xa̱j ta chi hab wach xeht'alanic reh chi wilic ponok ar.

Je' aj wili rik'or queh chi quic'uhbaljic: «Re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel nanik'ahsjic pan quik'ab take c'acharel re' naquicansanic wi̱n. Coric ru' re' take re' naqui̱nquicansam je xa re' la' pa ro̱x k'i̱j niquimic, re' Dios naribanam chi nawuctic wo' chic cho chi quixilac camnak, nqui queh.

To̱b ta nchel xk'ormojic queh chi je' re', re' take cablaj re're' ma' xquirak ta chiri̱j chaj wa'ric naxik'or i Jesus chi je' re' maj chi queh ru' ma' eta nak riban chi re' Jesus nariquimic je wi re're' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Ma' xa re' ta ma' xquirak ta chiri̱j xik'or i Jesus, ma' xquibiraj ta la' wo' reh chaj wa'ric naxik'or chi je' re' maj quiyo'jic wo' chiwach chi ripahkaljic reh.

Naxiponic chipam i tinamit Capernahum, re' Jesus chi wilic chic chipam jenaj pa̱t rich'i̱l take cablaj chi raj tahkanel xibiraj queh chi je' wili: «Chaj la' bih nac'u'tjaj tak chawach naxo̱j chalic nah be̱h? nqui queh.
Re' take re' ma'xta bih xquik'or reh ru'um chi xiq'uix'ic maj ar cho nah be̱h c'ahchi' nak quic'u'tjam chi quiwach, hab wach queh naricahnic chi pe̱t aj to'o̱l reh i Jesus nachitok'a̱' k'atoj k'oric.

Ru̱c' aj k'oric xca'n take raj tahkanel, re' Jesus xitz'uka̱' jok ri̱b eh xiyuk'ej take cok chi naquijilim chic cok so' quib ru̱c'. Ar aj ru' je' wili xik'or queh: «Xa hab wach jeno' ra̱j chi enpahbabjic ru'um i Dios chi jenaj c'acharel re' k'e̱' wo' chic rajawric nariwih'ic chi quixilac take rich c'acharel, riwi̱' chi reh chi pe̱t naribanam chi re' ricapew-bal je' ok ricab ricapew-bal i jenaj c'acharel re' ma' nim ta ti wach eh chi je' chic re' ricapew-bal chicoj aj ri̱b chi aj to'o̱l queh rich c'acharel, nqui queh.
Chiri̱j chic re' xic'am cok jenaj t'uch ac'un ru̱c', xipahba̱' pan quiyejal eh nok rik'ahchem je' wili xik'or queh:

«Re' waj tahkanel nanitak'a̱b je chi nijelow-bal curman chi naribanam chi xa ch'ublic ti wach rino'jbal je' ricab rino'jbal i t'uch ac'un wili. Ru'um aj re', re' nariniminic reh rik'orbal i nanitak'a̱b je chi nijelow-bal, re' wo' nik'orbal i hin c'ahchi' rinimem je' ricab wo' c'ahchi' ric'uluric yu'na chi re' rinimej nik'orbal i hin, re' wo' rik'orbal xtak'anic cho wi̱n c'ahchi' rinimem, nqui Jesus queh take raj tahkanel.

Chiri̱j chic re', re' Wa̱n xik'or reh Jesus chi je' wili: «Ha̱w kaj tijinel, re' hoj xkilow chi jenaj winak c'ahchi' resam lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal ru̱c' jenaj c'acharel, chi c'ahchi' rik'orom re' hat xatye'bic rajawric. Re' hoj xkapit chi ribanaric re're' maj ma' re' ta chi kaxilac wilic, nqui reh Jesus.
