Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or: «Ma'xta, ma̱pit tak chi ribanaric re're' maj ma' hab ta wach jeno' pahbamaj wu'um i hin chi nariwih'ic rajawric chi ribanaric jeno' lok' laj nawa̱l, erik'or c'ahbil laj k'oric chiwi̱j.
Je' re' nik'or maj re' c'acharel wi ma' yojo̱l nok wilic, ra̱j rik'orom chi kato'oric c'ahchi' ribanam.

«Wilic jenaj chic k'oric nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak: Xa hab wach jeno' c'acharel aj niminel wi̱n eriyew jeno' culc aha̱' tak chi reht'alim chi hat wo' tak rich raj tahkanel wi̱n i hin re' hin Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, til nik'or aweh tak chi re' c'acharel re're' naric'ulum ric'axbal ru̱c' i Dios ru'um i c'axo̱j xiban awu̱c' tak, nqui Jesus.

Re' Jesus xik'or wo' chic queh chi je' wili: «Re' c'acharel re' nyojbic ricapew-bal jeno' queh take aj tahkem wi̱n wili re' quik'ochsam chic wach i ca̱mna je' ricab i t'uch ac'un, sakbih nak chi reh chi encuturic jok pa richamil ha' chi bac'lic chi ralak chiwach jeno' ma' laj abaj ncamanic chi que'bal, maj k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal ti'c'axic nariye'eric china̱ ru'um i Dios ma' je' ta ti ricab i ti'c'axic enbanaric reh jeno' waj tahkanel.

«Je' wo', nik'or aweh tak chi xa pa' jaric capew-bal nasjic cho pan awa̱mna tak re' nbanic chi timahcanic tak ru̱c' yojbal quic'ux awas acha̱k' tak, chawesaj lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak je' ricab nak resmejic lok ak'ab ena'n tak wi ta nak ru'um re're' ma' eta chic titak'abjic tak je chi manlic awach tak chipam i k'a̱k' re' ma' jaruj ta nchuhpic ar chipam i ye'a̱b re' nc'ulmujic wi̱' ti'c'axic. Nik'or chi je' nak re' ena'n tak maj chaweh hat-tak, k'e̱' nak tare̱t chi enawesaj tak lok ak'ab tak, wi ta nak ru̱c' ribanaric re're' ena'n tak canar c'acharic chi junelic.
Ma' xa re' ta re're', chipam la' i k'a̱k' re' ma' eta nchuhpic chi junelic k'i̱j sakom, re' quisa'hil take c'acharel wilque̱b ar, ma' jaruj ta naquiquimic chi junelic k'i̱j sakom.

«Je' wo', nik'or aweh tak chi xa pa' jaric capew-bal nasjic cho pan awa̱mna tak re' nbanic chi timahcanic tak ru̱c' yojbal quic'ux awas acha̱k' tak, chawesaj lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak je' ricab nak resmejic lok awo̱k ena'n tak wi ta nak ru'um re're' ma' eta chic titak'abjic tak je chi manlic awach tak chipam i k'a̱k' re' ma' jaruj ta nchuhpic ar chipam i ye'a̱b re' nc'ulmujic wi̱' ti'c'axic. Nik'or chi je' nak re' ena'n tak maj chaweh hat-tak, k'e̱' nak tare̱t chi enawesaj tak lok awo̱k tak, wi ta nak ru̱c' ribanaric re're' ena'n tak canar c'acharic chi junelic.
Ma' xa re' ta re're', chipam la' i k'a̱k' re' ma' eta nchuhpic chi junelic k'i̱j sakom, re' quisa'hil take c'acharel wilque̱b ar, ma' jaruj ta naquiquimic chi junelic k'i̱j sakom.

«Je' wo' chic, nik'or aweh tak chi je' wo' nak re' ena'n tak ru̱c' nak' awach tak, ewo' nak nawesaj tak lok wi ta nak ru'um ribanaric re're' ma' eta chic titak'abjic tak je chi manlic awach tak ar chipam i ye'a̱b re' nc'ulmujic wi̱' ti'c'axic. Je' nak re' nik'or chi ena'n tak maj chaweh hat-tak k'e̱' wo' nak tare̱t chi enawesaj tak lok i nak' awach tak, wi ta nak ru'um ribanaric re're' ena'n tak canar oquic chi ri'sil rajawric i Dios chi k'atal k'oric.
Ar chipam i ye'a̱b re're', re' chi junelic k'i̱j sakom ma' nchuhpic ta wi̱' i k'a̱k' re're', ma' jaruj ta nariquimic quisa'hil take c'acharel wilque̱b ar.

«Yu'na nik'or wo' chic aweh tak wili: Re' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' reh chi narimanlajic wach riwi̱', cu nquic'at wach pan k'a̱k', maje'? Re' i tiwic reh chi ma' eta rijot' ri̱b cu ncatz'amej wo' chi coric, maje'? Je' wo' re' awu̱c' hat-tak chi'nchel aj niminel wi̱n, curman wo' chaweh tak chi na̱wiq'uic tak pan ti'c'axic chi pe̱t reh chi naribanam coric chic wach ac'ux tak.

Chi k'oro̱j chic lok chi'nchel re're', nik'or wo' chic aweh tak i wili: Je' ricab chi re' atz'a̱m reh chi naricamanic chi coric ru̱c' c'uxbal, curman chi wilic ok cho riqui'al. Je' wo' re' hat-tak chapahba̱' awi̱b tak chi coric chi re' Dios erilow cho chi re' ac'acharic tak wilic riwi̱' chiwach. Ma̱cana̱' tak ribanaric re're' reh chi ma' eta nac'ul aweh tak je' ricab ric'ul i atz'a̱m chi nanelic riqui'al, ma' ncamanic ta chic chi atz'ambal reh c'uxbal. Je' wo' chic, nik'or aweh tak pan sukquil ok wo' tiwih'ok tak chawach chawunchelal tak, nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic relic je chipam i tinamit Capernahum, re' Jesus ch'i̱l take raj tahkanel xi'o̱j chipam riyuk'ul Jure̱ya eh chiri̱j re' xichalic chi juntar nim laj ro̱k ha' Jortan ribihnal. Je' ricab rocsam wi̱' ri̱b, re' Jesus xoquic chi quic'uhbaljic take c'acharel re' nquimol qui̱b ru̱c'.

Nok je' re' c'ahchi' ribanam, wilic take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xiponic ru̱c' eh je' wili pahkanic xca'n cok reh chi xa pajbal reh chi haj ta nak encalajic ru̱c' rik'orbal chi quiwach: «Ha̱w, re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses riyew na k'ab chi jeno' winak caxa̱ra erich'ak ri̱b ru̱c' rehq'ue̱n? nqui take reh.
Naxibiraj chi je' re' i Jesus je' wili xic'u'lej take wi̱': «Chaj bih xiban i Moyses eh chaj bih tak'anic xiyew queh take ama̱m awati't tak? nqui queh.

Re' take cow laj aj niminel re're' je' wo' chic wili xquik'or reh: «Re' Moyses xiyew k'ab chi jeno' bahilbe̱s erich'ak ri̱b chi c'acharic ru̱c' rehq'ue̱n. Re' cok ru' je' wili tak'anic xiban: Jeno' winak wi ra̱j rich'akam i rehq'ue̱n, pe̱t chitik'a̱' jeno' hu̱j re' eritz'ihmbaj wi̱' take riwi̱' chi narich'akam wi̱' ri̱b ch'i̱l i rehq'ue̱n eh nok riyeb chic reh rehq'ue̱n i hu̱j re're', cu re' aj ru' eriban chi erich'ak ri̱b chi c'acharic, nqui cho, nqui take.

Naxibiraj i Jesus chi je' re', je' wili xik'or queh chi quic'u'ljic: «Re' awa̱mna hat-tak yu'na k'e̱' wo' chic cowil je' wo' ricab i ca̱mna take xiban cho ama̱m awati't tak. Ru'um aj re', chi cowjonak chic i ca̱mna chi riye'eric quic'ux chiri̱j i ch'akoj i̱b, re' Moyses xiyew queh i tak'anic tz'ihmbimaj cho re're'.

Re' cok ru' ma' je' ta re' riwi̱' cho pan p'uhtbal reh c'acharic naxitik'a̱' i Dios chi'nchel. C'olok pan ac'ux tak chi pan Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios rik'or chi naxitik'a̱' i winak ch'i̱l ixok, xicana̱' wo' chi re' ixok wilic chi ric'u'lil i winak.

Je' aj wili rik'or chipam i c'uhbal re're': “Ru'um aj re', re' winak nok rirakam chic ric'u'lil ro̱k k'ab, naricana̱b wih'ic chi rehquen rajawric ritu̱t raja̱w eh re' chic ric'u'lil naric'u'lem pa ric'acharic.

Je' re' k'uru' nok quic'amam chic qui̱b pan caxarahil, re' take quib chi c'acharel re're' no̱j riban chi xa jenaj chic quiwi̱', nqui rik'or. «Ru'um aj chi re' quib chi c'acharel nquic'am qui̱b pan caxarahil ma' quib ta chic quiwi̱' xa jenaj la' chic quiwi̱'
re' junc'uhl chi c'acharel ntununjic quiwach ru'um i Dios ma' hab ta chic wach ench'akbic quiwach, nqui Jesus.
Chiri̱j wili nok wilque̱b chi ponok pan jenaj pa̱t re' xiponic wi̱', re' take raj tahkanel xquipahkaj reh chi naritikim ju' rik'ormojic queh chiri̱j i k'oric xiban cho re're'.
Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' winak re' rich'ak rehq'ue̱n eh ric'am chic jeno' toco̱m ixok ma' xa re' ta chiwach i Dios nmahcanic je' la' wo' chiwach i pe̱t rehq'ue̱n nankajic pan c'oyomal.
Je' wo' re' nc'uluric ru̱c' ixok re' nok rich'akam chic je ri̱b ru̱c' ribahi̱l, ric'am chic jeno' toco̱m winak chi ribahi̱l, nqui Jesus queh.

Junpech wilic take tutbe̱s ajabe̱s xquic'am cok quiha'lac'u̱n chiwach i Jesus reh chi naricojom rik'ab chi quina̱ chi cuse'sbal queh. Nok je' re' c'ahchi' ca'nam, re' take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus, xicakric chi quina̱ take c'ahchi' quic'amam cok i quiha'lac'u̱n chiwach i Jesus.

Naxilow i Jesus chi je' re' c'ahchi' ca'nam take aj tahkanel, je' wili xik'or queh naxcakric chi quina̱: «Ru'um aj chi re' Dios nk'atbic k'oric chi quina̱ take quisic'bic reh ricuse'sbal je' ricab nca'n take ha'lac'un wili, ma̱k'et tak pan quibe̱h chi naquijilim cho qui̱b wu̱c' take ha'lac'un wili, chayew la' tak k'ab queh chi je' re' enca'n.

Til coric nik'or aweh tak chi jeno' c'acharel re' ma' ric'ul ta rik'orbal i Dios chi k'ochlic ra̱mna je' ricab chi k'ochlic i ra̱mna jeno' ha'lac'un nank'o'rjic ru'um raja̱w, re' c'acharel re're' ma'xta roquic chi rehquen rajawric i Dios chi k'atal k'oric, nqui Jesus.
Chi je' aj re', re' Jesus xitok'a̱' rik'ahchem take ha'lac'un eh xicoj rik'ab chi quina̱ chi quicuse'sjic.

Nok re' Jesus ch'i̱l take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel tikilque̱b chic chi naquichopom je quibe̱h chi elic je chipam i yuk'ul wilque̱b wi̱', xc'ulic lok ru̱c' Jesus jenaj c'acharel eh je' wili xik'or reh naxixuc'a̱' cok ri̱b chiwach: «Ha̱w ato̱b laj kaj tijinel, chak'or wi̱n, chaj bih ra̱j banaric reh chi equinehtric reh i junelic c'acharic? nqui reh Jesus.

Naxibiraj i Jesus chi je' re', je' wili xik'or reh: «Wi xa re' wo' Dios k'e̱' ato̱b, naxak'or wi̱n k'uru' chi hin wo' ato̱b, narak ta wo' nchel chiri̱j chi re' hin wilic wo' wajawric chi rik'ormojic aweh haj wilic ra̱j banaric? nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic re', je' wili xik'or reh: «Re' hat aweht'alim take lajeb chi tak'anic xic'ul i Moyses ru̱c' i Dios. Chac'am na̱ k'uru' take tak'anic je' ricab take wili: Ma̱ban i c'oyomal, ma̱ban cansanic, ma̱ban i lek', ma̱ban chucuj k'oric chiri̱j awas acha̱k', ma̱ban rijot'oric awas acha̱k' eh chayew wo' rilok'il atu̱t awaja̱w, nqui Jesus reh.
Re' c'acharel re're' je' wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Ha̱w aj tijinel keh, chi'nchel take tak'anic nak'or re're' cu pa nit'uchal nip'utum cho ric'amaric na̱, nqui reh.

Naxibiraj chi je' re' i Jesus, xitz'ehtaj pan nak' wach i q'uijol re're' eh je' wili xik'or ru̱c' rinimal wach chak'lamil: «Jenaj chic bano̱j ma' ja' na'n ta ribanaric, re' nitahkaljic. Quinatahkej k'uru' re' cok ru', pe̱t chac'ayej cho chi'nchel nic' pa' nimal wilic aweh eh re' ritz'akil na̱c'ayem re're', chayew queh take niba̱' reh chi je' re' ma' xa ta je' chic ricab abihomal wilic ayu' wach ac'al enamol wach ru̱c' i Dios ar pan taxa̱j, nqui Jesus.
Naxibiraj chi je' re' k'oric xiban i Jesus, re' c'acharel re're' xelic je ru̱c' chi xa ti' chic pa ric'ux ru'um ti' xibiraj chi naric'ayem pa' bih wilic reh maj yohbal cho wach ribihomal wilic.

Naxilow chi je' re' i Jesus, xilbic je chi quina̱ take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel eh je' wili p'uht rik'orom: «Til k'e̱' nchel c'axquilal chi reh jeno' biho̱m chi enoquic chi ri'sil rajawric i Dios chi aj k'atal k'oric china̱, nqui queh.

Naxquibiraj take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel chi je' re', xsahchic quic'ux ru̱c' xik'or i Jesus maj chi queh ru', re' rato'bil i Dios xa wilic wo' chi quina̱ take biho̱m. Chi je' aj re', re' Jesus xitik ju' i k'oric chi je' wili: «Hat-tak wich k'orom, nik'or aweh tak, re' c'acharel re' china̱ ribihomal ch'iclic ric'ux, til k'e̱' nchel c'axquilal chi reh chi enoquic chi ri'sil rajawric i Dios chi aj k'atal k'oric.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' biho̱m wi ma' resaj lok rij ric'ux i ribihomal, k'e̱' nchel c'axquilal chi reh chi enoquic chi ri'sil rajawric i Dios chi aj k'atal k'oric. Xa je' na ricab c'axquilal chi reh jeno' nim laj chicop came̱yo ribihnal, chi enoquic chipam t'uch ritz'ahpil ocbal reh katinami̱t Jerusalen nok wilic i rihk, nqui Jesus.

Naxquibiraj chi je' re', riman chic xsahchabic quic'ux take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel. Ru'um aj re' je' chic wili xquik'or chi quiwach: «Wi k'e̱' nchel c'axquilal chi queh take bihomak chi equi'oquic chi ri'sil rajawric i Dios chi aj k'atal k'oric, hab wo' wach k'uru' enca'n canar oquic? nqui take.

Chalic i Jesus xitz'ehtaj je take eh je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Chawach hat-tak c'acharel ma' eta riban chi hab wach c'acharel eriban canar oquic chi ri'sil rajawric i Dios chi aj k'atal k'oric xa re' la' chiwach i Dios ma'xta bih c'axic. Je' re' nik'or maj chiwach ru' xa ewo' riban chi re' c'acharel enoquic chi ri'sil rajawric, nqui queh.

Chi je' aj re', re' Luch je' wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Ha̱w, re' cok i hoj til wo' chi'nchel pa' bih wilic keh xkacana̱' cho chi atahkaljic i hat. Ra̱j na rik'orom k'uru' chi ru'um re're', re' Dios nariyeb rijelow-bal keh? nqui reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili quic'u'ljic xiban: «Til coric nik'or aweh tak chi chi'nchel hat-tak re' xacana̱' cho awaj pan pa̱t tak je' ricab atu̱t awaja̱w tak ch'i̱l awas acha̱k' tak, awana̱b tak on awehq'ue̱n tak ch'i̱l aha'lac'u̱n tak on re' aye'a̱b tak ru'um chi xayew ac'ux tak chi nitahkaljic on chi rik'ormojic niC'uhbal re' nye'bic risukquil quic'ux take c'acharel, ma'xta acahnic tak chi ma' ta hab wach naquijilow-bem junc'am ok ru'. Ru'um chi je' re' xa'n tak, k'e̱' wo' chic q'uihal na̱c'ulum tak chiwach i xacana̱' tak cho.

Je' re' k'uru' chiwach ac'acharic tak ayu' wach ac'al, q'uihal chic take c'acharel naca'nam chi je' awas acha̱k' tak, awana̱b tak, atu̱t awaja̱w tak on chi je' chic take aha'lac'u̱n tak. Je' wo' xa haj nariye'eric apatal tak reh chi na̱c'acharic tak ar chi xa je' chic apa̱t tak, on nariye'eric awac'a̱l tak chi na̱camanem tak wach chi je' chic aweh tak. Ma' xa ta re're', je' la' wo' natiquimok tak je nariye'eric wo' aweh tak chi na̱c'acharic tak chi junelic ar pan taxa̱j.

Ar aj ru' q'uihal take c'acharel re' k'e̱' wo' chic quiwa'ric wilic ayu' wach ac'al, naribanam chi ma'xta chic quiwa'ric. Ra̱j take riq'uihal c'acharel re' ma'xta ti quiwa'ric ayu' wach ac'al, naribanam chi k'e̱' chic quiwa'ric nariwih'ic, nqui Jesus.

Nok c'ahchi' chic cojic nah be̱h, re' Jesus ch'i̱l take i cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel xquichop jok kojic chipam i be̱h no̱j ar pan tinamit Jerusalen. Re' take cablaj behic nca'n chiri̱j i Jesus, xa nsahchic chic quic'ux ru'um chi re're' nc'ambic quibe̱h chi ojic chipam i tinamit re' wilque̱b wi̱' riq'uihal c'acharel re' ma' nquic'ul ta riC'uhbal. Tz'a̱b ru' take pa reh chic c'acharel quitahkanic reh, xa yo'jic chic wilque̱b ru'um reh riyohbaljic chi xa pa' jaric enca'n reh Jesus. Ar ajic re' Jesus xesaj lok pa reh take cablaj chi nahsil re're' eh xi'oxpechej rik'ormojic queh chiri̱j riquimic. Je' aj wili xik'or queh:

«Chacoj tak rehtal chi chipam i tinamit Jerusalen re' c'ahchi' kojic wi̱', wilic i jenaj re' narik'ahsjic wi̱n pan quik'ab take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Re' take wili naquipahkam rich'ukuric ri̱j niquimic i hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel eh chiri̱j chic re' nanik'ahsjic pan quik'ab take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel,

re' naquise'lam pan nak' niwach, re' naquik'ojbic wi̱n, re' naquichuhbunic wi̱n eh chiri̱j aj chic re' naqui̱nquicansam je. To̱b ta wo' je' re' naca'nam wi̱n, pa ro̱x k'i̱j niquimic na wo' chic wuctic cho chi quixilac take camnak, nqui Jesus.

Ar chic nah be̱h, re' take quib chi rac'u̱n i ma' Sewere̱yo quitahkanic reh Jesus, re' Jaco̱wo ch'i̱l i Wa̱n, xquijil cok qui̱b ru̱c' eh je' wili xquik'or reh: «Ha̱w kaj tijinel, nka̱j nak chi ena'n ku̱c' i ato'bil nakapahkam aweh wili, nqui take reh.
—Chajaric ato'bil nawa̱j tak chi eniban awu̱c' tak? nqui Jesus queh.
Xichalic take quib re're' je' wili xquik'or reh: «Nok wilca̱t chic chi k'atoj k'oric ru̱c' rinimal wach awajawric, chacuy Ha̱w, koj-acoj chi quinahsil take awaj to'bonel, nqui take reh.

—Re' cok hat-tak ma' narak ta tak chiri̱j chaj bih c'ahchi' apahkam tak wi̱n. Nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak i wili: Je' ricab chi curman ta nak chi wi̱n ruc'jic i c'ah laj ha' ye'o̱j pan jeno' culc, je' wo' curman chi wi̱n chi re' hin nanic'ulum i ti'c'axic re' naric'ambic je wi̱n ri'sil ac'al je' ricab naxinmuhkic pan ha' naxkahsjic niha̱'. Ena nacuy tak i ti'c'axic wilic chi nina̱ nanacapaj hat-tak? nqui queh.
—Ewo' nak ru' nkacuy Ha̱w, nqui take. Re' Jesus je' wili xic'u'lej take wi̱': «Pan coric, re' hat-tak ewo' na nak nacuy tak ransil i ti'c'axic nanicuyum ransil i hin,

xa re' la' ma' re' ta pa nik'ab wilic chi etinicoj tak chi quinahsil take waj to'bonel chi k'atoj k'oric maj re' take nacoquic chi je' re', xa re' wo' take hab pa' wach chiho̱j quiwach, nqui Jesus queh.
Chiri̱j wili naxquibiraj chi je' re' take riman chic aj tahkanel, xicakric chi quina̱ i Jaco̱wo ch'i̱l i Wa̱n.

Ar ajic re' Jesus xik'o'rej take je chi naquijilim cok qui̱b ru̱c' eh je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak nic' wach quino'jbal take k'atal k'oric ch'i̱l take caj to'o̱l, naquik'atbic k'oric chi quina̱ take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Re' take re' nca̱j chi xa re' wach i tak'anic nca'n ru', xa re' wach re' curman chi naric'amaric na̱ cu'um chi'nchel.

Ra̱j nchel chaxilac hat-tak re' titahkanic tak wi̱n ma' je' ta re' i no'jbal naribanaric. Xa hab wach chaxilac tak ra̱j ribanam ri̱b chi nim wach, riwi̱' chi reh chi naribanam chi aj to'o̱l take queh rich c'acharel.
Je' wo' re' i c'acharel re' ra̱j chi encojoric ru'um i Dios chi aj c'amol be̱h, riwi̱' chi reh chi naribanam wo' chi aj to'o̱l take queh rich c'acharel

je' ricab nok re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, ma' xinc'ulic ta lok chaxilac tak reh chi re' ta nak hin na̱camanem tak niwach, xinc'ulic la' lok reh chi re' hin nanicamanem awach tak ru̱c' aco'ljic hat-tak chi'nchel c'acharel. Ru'um aj reh aco'ljic hat-tak, re' hin naniyeb nic'acharic pan quimic re' naricamanic chi je' jenaj tojbal ye'o̱j chi rijelow-bal i ti'c'axic naquic'ulum nak chi'nchel c'acharel ru'um reh nic' pa' q'uihal quimahc wilic, nqui Jesus.

Nok cu behic nca'n chi ojic ar Jerusalen, re' Jesus ch'i̱l take cablaj chi raj tahkanel xiponic chipam i tinamit Jericoh. Naxelic je chipam i tinamit re're' chi xam take juntuhm chi c'acharel chiri̱j, xiq'uic cok chi chi̱' i be̱h re' wilic wi̱' jenaj sot' Wartime̱yo ribihnal. Re' sot' wili re' rac'u̱n i Time̱yo, ar tz'uklic chi' be̱h chi pahkanic tumi̱n queh take behel.

Re're' ajic, naxibiraj cu̱c' take c'acharel chi re' Jesus re' ribihnej chi aj Nasaret iq'uic riban je ar, xik'o'rej je chi cow chi je' wili: «Jesus ra̱' ri'sil cho k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy, chacuy chaquetelej ta wo' ti niwach chi ribanaric chi na̱wilbic chic, nqui je.

Naxquibiraj take c'acharel quitahkanic reh Jesus chi re' sot' re're' xa nchokonic chic chiqui̱j, p'uht quinakam chi narimayam ahnic. Re' sot' re're' ma' xicoj ta rehtal rinakaric xca'n, riman chic xiq'uer je richi̱' chi je' wili: «Jesus ra̱' ri'sil cho k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy, chacuy chaquetelej ta wo' ti niwach chi ribanaric chi na̱wilbic chic, nqui reh.

Re' Jesus naxibiraj chi je' re' xpa'lajic eh xik'or reh jenaj queh take rich'i̱l chi naric'amam cho i sot' ru̱c'. Re' tak'amaj je ru̱c' i sot' re're' je' wili xik'or reh naxponic ru̱c': «Sukbok ac'ux. Re' Jesus c'ahchi'ca̱t rik'o'rem cho. Tucten k'uru', naca̱t nic'amam je ru̱c', nqui reh.

Naxibiraj i sot' chi je' re', ma' wo' re' chic i rijuc ro̱k tz'ih roxlo̱c' lok riso' xicapaj je ric'amaric naxiyew jok wach ac'al. Chi je' re' xuctic ti je chipam i junc'am re're' eh xc'amaric je ru̱c' i Jesus.
Naxponic ru̱c', re' Jesus xibiraj reh chi je' wili: «Chaj bih nawa̱j chi nanibanam awu̱c'? nqui reh. —Ajabe̱s aj tijinel, cha'n chi echic quinilbic, nqui sot' reh.

Chalic i Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Yu'na ti tilwok maj xach'ica̱' ac'ux chiwi̱j, nqui reh. Chipam aj ti junc'am naxk'ormojic reh chi narojic pa ripa̱t, re' sot' re're' xilbic wo' ti eh chi nilbic chic, xo̱j chiri̱j i Jesus naxitik ju' ribe̱h.

Chiri̱j chic ru' re' Jesus ch'i̱l take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel xi'iq'uic ponok chi quixilac take tinamit Wetpaqueh ch'i̱l i Weta̱nya quibihnal re' nc'utunic chic je wi̱' i ye'a̱b re' ribihnej “Ye'a̱b queh take tic Oli̱wo ribihnal”, re' wilic wo' chi rilahk' i tinamit Jerusalen. Ar k'uru' ma' naht ta chic je ru̱c' i tinamit Jerusalen, re' Jesus xik'o'rej take je qui̱b queh cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel chi naritak'a̱b je take

chi je' wili tak'anic xiban queh: «Hiy tak cok chipam i tinamit wilic chi kawach wili eh nok wilca̱t tak chic cok ar, enarak tak jenaj rac'u̱n cawa̱y bac'lic ar, re' ja' hab ta wach johtonak china̱. Chachej tak cho eh chac'am tak cho wi̱n ayu'.

Wi hab wach ok nchel xbirinic aweh tak chaj bih riwi̱' chi c'ahchi' achejem tak i chicop re're', chak'or tak reh chi naricamanic wi̱n hin Ajabe̱s Jesus eh chi xa re' wo' ti nanicohlam ricojoric nanisolq'uim wo' chic reh, nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j wili nok quibiram chic chi'nchel k'oro̱j queh re're', re' take quib chi raj tahkanel re're' xi'o̱j chipam i tinamit re' xitak'a̱' take je wi̱' i Jesus. Naxiponic ar, xo̱j wo' quirak i rac'u̱n cawa̱y chi bac'lic chi chi̱' ribehil cok i jenaj pa̱t eh xquichej cho.
Naxi-ilmajic chi je' re' xca'n take quib re're', jenaj queh winak je' ru̱c' wilque̱b ar je' wili xik'or cho: «Chaj bih riwi̱' chi c'ahchi' achejem tak i rac'u̱n cawa̱y re're'? nqui xik'or.

Re' take qui̱b aj tahkanel re're' nic' pa' wach xk'ormojic queh ru'um i Jesus chi rajwam wach i rac'u̱n i cawa̱y, re' wo' re' xquik'or queh take winak re're' eh chi je' re' xye'eric wo' k'ab queh chi xquic'am je.

Chiri̱j wili nok re' take re' xisoljic cho ru̱c' i Jesus chi quich'i̱l chic i rac'u̱n cawa̱y, wilic queh take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel, re' quijuc ro̱k tz'ih roxlo̱c' lok quiso', xquicoj je che'l ri̱j i rac'u̱n i cawa̱y re're' reh chi naritz'uhkic chi suk i Jesus eh chi je' re' chi wilic chic china̱ i rac'u̱n cawa̱y, re're' xitic ju' ojic chipam i tinamit Jerusalen.

Nok behic chic riban je, wilic take c'acharel xquiyew rilok'il i Jesus chi je' ricab jenaj k'atal k'oric naxquixoyej je pa̱m ribe̱h ru̱c' ricojoric je wach ac'al i quijuc ro̱k tz'ih re' roxlo̱c' lok quiso' eh ch'i̱l wo' ricojoric je xak pac' pa ribe̱h.

Je' wo', re' take riq'uihal i tinamit je' chi xam take chiri̱j eh je' chi pe̱t take chiwach je' wili nquik'or chi cow: «Kalok'ej wo' tak wach i Dios re' wilic cho ar pan taxa̱j. Kayew tak rilok'il i c'ulic riban lok wili chi tak'amaj cho ru'um i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Dios
eh kayew wo' tak rilok'il i naroquic wili chi k'atal k'oric chi kana̱ je' ricab naxwih'ic cho chi k'atal k'oric i kaj najtir k'i̱j ma' Tawiy, nqui take.

Je' aj re' riwi̱' ponic xiban i Jesus chipam i tinamit Jerusalen. Nok wilic chic cok ar, re're' xoquic cok pan Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios. Chiri̱j chi rilom chic take nic' pa' nimal wilic ar, re're' xelic je ar Jerusalen maj nok oconak chic i k'i̱j, xilow chi tare̱t chi reh chi ar chipam i tinamit Weta̱nya narojic wirok. Chi je' aj re', re' Jesus xo̱j ar ch'i̱l take cablaj chi raj tahkanel.
Nok sak'anak chic lok je' ikal, re' Jesus rich'i̱l take raj tahkanel xi'elic wo' chic je ar Weta̱nya eh ar nah be̱h re' Jesus xchalic ric'ahric.
Ar ajic xilow je wach junwal chi che̱' I̱co ribihnal xa hetlic chic i xak eh naxo̱j nak risic' so' reh i wach i tic re're', ma' jenaj i wach xirak maj ma' ja' re' ta nak rik'ijil chi nariwachanic.

Chalic Jesus je' wili xik'or reh riche'lal i̱co re're': «Yu'na ma' ne'el ikal chic narilmijic wach i wachanic na'n reh chi naquic'uxum i tinamit, nqui reh. Pa ricorquilal, re' take k'oric re're' xa ru̱c' ti riche'lal i̱co xk'ormojic cok, xa re' la' take raj tahkanel i Jesus cu xquibiraj wo' cho take k'oric re're'.

Naxponic wo' chic ar Jerusalen ch'i̱l take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel, re' Jesus xoquic cok ar chi chi̱' i pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios. Naxilow chaj bih no'jbal nca'n take aj c'a̱y ch'i̱l take aj yaco̱l wilque̱b ar, xitok'a̱' rit'erem take lok. Je' wo', xitahch'aj je quime̱xa take aj ch'akol wach tumi̱n eh je' wo' re' xiban reh quitz'uka̱b take aj c'a̱y rexba̱.
Je' wo' chic, re' Jesus ma' xiyew ta k'ab chi hab wach enbehic chipam i lok' laj Pa̱t re're', je' ru̱c' c'ahchi' ric'amam cok ric'a̱y ar.

Ar ajic, nok ribanam chic chi'nchel re're', re' Jesus xoquic chi c'uhbalanic chi je' wili: «Ma' holohic ta c'ahchi'ca̱t tak maj pan Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios je' wili tz'ihmbimaj cahnok: “Re' pa̱t wili lok'onbal reh Dios nok wilic re' naca'nam wi̱' quiti̱j take c'acharel quichalic chi junsut tinamit. Je' re' tz'ihmbimaj pa riC'uhbal i Dios, xa re' la' hat-tak xacoj tak chi jenaj c'aybal re' nawelk'aj tak wi̱' take tinamit, nqui tz'ihmbimaj cahnok. «To̱b ta wo' aweht'alim tak chi je' re', re' hat-tak xacoj tak chi jenaj c'aybal re' nawelk'aj tak wi̱' take c'acharel ru̱c' take c'a̱y na'n tak queh, nqui Jesus.

Chi'nchel k'oric xiban i Jesus chipam i lok' laj Pa̱t re're' xponic pan quixiquin take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios, re' take re' xquitok'a̱' quisiq'uim ri̱j chaj bih ricansjic i Jesus naca'nam xa re' la' queht'alim wo' chi re' c'ahchi' quicapam ribanaric re're', ric'am cho c'axquilal chi quina̱ cu'um queh riq'uihal take c'acharel re' xa nsahchic chic quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus nanquibiraj i c'uhbalanic riban. Ru'um aj reh quiyo'jic chi quiwach take c'acharel re're', ma' xquichop ta wo' i Jesus chipam i k'i̱j re're'.
Chi je' aj re' k'uru' naxoquic i k'i̱j, re' Jesus xelic je chipam i tinamit re're'.

Nok sak'anak chic lok je' ikal, re' Jesus ch'i̱l take raj tahkanel xi'iq'uic wo' chic ponok re' wilic wi̱' i riche'lal i̱co re' xk'ormojic reh ru'um i Jesus chi ma'xta chic riwachanic chi junpech. Re' take raj tahkanel i Jesus xquilow chi re' riche'lal i̱co re're' chikinak chic cu pa ra̱'.

Chi je' aj re', re' Luch naxilow re're' xc'ulic cho pa ric'ux i k'oric xiban i Jesus eh ru'um re' je' wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Ha̱w kaj tijinel, chawilow ti i riche'lal i̱co re' xak'or chi ma'xta chic riwachanic, chikic pe' nchel! nqui reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili xic'u'lej wi̱' chi c'ahchi' wo' quibiram rich aj tahkanel: «Ma' nsahchic ac'ux tak ru'um chi re' Dios xiban je' ricab xnik'or reh che̱' wili. Chach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chi re' Dios naric'u'lem cho na̱ apahkanic na'n tak chiwach.

Til coric nik'or aweh tak chi hab ta nak wach eriban jeno' pahkanic chi ma' eta ripoh'aj nech' ok ric'ux, til wo' nak erilow wach haj wilic i ripahkanic. Je' re' nok re're' eta nak rik'or reh Dios chi je' wili: ‹Cha'n chi re' yu̱k' wilic chi kawach wili, enelic je ayu' eh eno̱j riyew ri̱b pan nim laj ha', nqui ta nak reh, re' Dios ewo' nak ric'u'lej cho na̱ i pahkanic re're'.

Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi chach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Dios ru̱c' apahkanic tak maj re' nic' pa' nimal enapahkaj tak reh pan ti̱j, ewo' ric'u'lej cho na̱ aweh tak i pahkanic na'n tak chiwach.

Je' wo' chic, nik'or wo' aweh tak chi nacha'n ati̱j tak, wi hab wach jeno' wilic rimahc awu̱c' tak, chacuy tak rimahc reh chi je' re', wi wilic jeno' amahc tak chiwach i kAja̱w Dios ar pan taxa̱j, ewo' ncuyuric aweh tak.
Cha'n tak cuyuj mahc k'uru' maj wi ma' ticuybic tak mahc, re' kAja̱w Dios wilic cho pan taxa̱j ma' eta wo' ricuy amahc tak, nqui Jesus.

Junpech chic naxponic wo' chic i Jesus ar Jerusalen, re' take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios ch'i̱l wo' take nahsil chipam tinamit, xi'o̱j c'olok ru̱c' i Jesus nok behic riban ch'i̱l take raj tahkanel ar chi chi̱' i pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios.

Ar je' wili xquik'or reh chi rinakaric: «Chak'or keh, hab wach aj u̱c' nchalic awajawric re' xacoj chi ribanaric take xa'n ayu' e̱w? Hab wach xpahbanic aweh k'uru' chi wilic awajawric re're'? nqui take reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili xic'u'lej take wi̱': «Tare̱t, re' hin enik'or aweh tak haj nchalic wi̱n i wajawric chi ribanaric take re're', xa re' la' quinac'u'lej pe tak cho ru̱c' i pahkanic nanibanam aweh tak wili:
Chak'or tak cho wi̱n k'uru', re' kahsanic ha' xiban i Wa̱n queh tinamit, cu ru̱c' na Dios xchalic rik'ormojic on xa pa ric'ux xchalic ribanaric? nqui queh.
Naxquibiraj chi je' re', re' take re' je' wili p'uht quik'orom chi quiwach: «Wi xkak'or reh chi cu ru̱c' Dios xchalic rik'ormojic, erik'or keh chi chaj wa'ric ma' xkanimej ta.

Wi nchel xkak'or reh chi xa pa ric'ux xchalic ribanaric, ma' keht'alim ta chaj bih enc'uluric ku̱c'? nqui take chi quiwach. Je' re' xquik'or ru'um chi xquic'raj chi equi'oquic pan yohbal cu̱c' i tinamit maj chi queh riq'uihal i tinamit re' Wa̱n xwih'ic chi jenaj aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios.

Ru'um aj re', je' wili ric'u'ljic i Jesus xca'n cok: «Ma' keht'alim ta hab wach u̱c' xchalic rik'ormojic i kahsanic ha' xiban i Wa̱n, nqui take reh. —Re' hin ma' eta wo' nik'or aweh tak haj xchalic wi̱n i wajawric chi ribanaric pa' bih xniban take lok re're', nqui Jesus queh.

Re' wili i jalwach k'oric xik'or i Jesus naxip'ut wo' chic i c'uhbalanic cu̱c' take re': «Junpech jenaj ajabe̱s xitic pa̱m i rac'a̱l chi u̱wa. Nok ritiquim chic pa̱m, xicoj pan cora̱l i rac'a̱l re're' eh xitik'a̱' jenaj yitz'bal u̱wa chipam. Je' wo' xijohsaj jenaj naht na̱ pa̱t cha'jbal reh wach ritic. Chiri̱j aj chic re' xiyew cahnok chi quimel queh ju'jun aj camanom re' naquicha'janic cahnok reh wach ritic eh xitik'a̱' wo' cahnok wach cu̱c' chi naquiyejalem wach i ritic re're' nawachanok cho. Nok ribanam chic cahnok i tik'inic re're' cu re' aj ru' xo̱j chi naht i ajabe̱s re're'.

Naxponic rik'ijil rik'ahsjic wach i tic, re' ajabe̱s re're' xitak'a̱' cho jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch cu̱c' take aj quimel riye'a̱b chi ric'uluric i haj pa' wilic i tiklic wach chi narehtric i ajabe̱s re're'.
Naxponic i aj tz'e' wa̱ch tak'amaj cho cu̱c' take aj quimel ye'a̱b, re' take re' ma'xta bih xquiyew je reh, rich'eyeric la' chic xca'n je.

Re' ajabe̱s re're' naxilow chi je' re' xca'n ru̱c' i raj tz'e' wa̱ch, xitak'a̱' wo' chic cho jenaj chic raj tz'e' wa̱ch cu̱c'. Naxponic wo' chic cu̱c', re' take aj quimel ye'a̱b re're' xquitz'ujlom eh k'e̱' ti'c'axic xca'n reh cu rehtal xquisolq'uij wo' chic je ru̱c' ajabe̱s chi ch'eych'ey chic rina̱.

Chiri̱j chic re', re' ajabe̱s re're' xitak'a̱' wo' chic cho cu̱c' i jenaj chic raj tz'e' wa̱ch, xa re' la' xcansjic wo' je cu'um take aj quimel ye'a̱b re're'. Jarub pa' chic chi aj camanom tak'amaj take cho ru'um ajabe̱s, je' wo' re' xbanjic je queh. Wilic take queh xicansjic je eh wilic wo' xich'eyebic je.

«Ru̱c' chi'nchel xca'n take aj quimel ye'a̱b re're', re' ajabe̱s re're' xa chic ti jenaj c'acharel xcahnic ru̱c' chi naritak'a̱b cho eh re' c'acharel re're', re' pe' nchel i rac'u̱n. Chi je' aj re' chi ma' hab ta chic wach naritak'a̱b cho, re' ajabe̱s re're' xitak'a̱' cho rac'u̱n re' k'e̱' ti' ric'raj. Je' wili xik'or pa ric'ux naxitak'a̱' cho: ‹Re' cok i wac'u̱n wili til naquiyohlem wach take aj quimel ye'a̱b naponok cu̱c', nqui pa ric'ux.

«Je' re' xicapaj xa re' la' naxponic i ac'unbe̱s cu̱c' take aj ilol ye'a̱b, ma' je' ta re' xca'n, je' la' chic wili xquik'or chi quiwach naxquilow wach: ‹Chawil tak, re' wulu' narehchenic reh ye'a̱b wili. Kacansaj tak k'uru' reh chi re' hoj nakehchenic reh ye'a̱b wili, nqui take chi quiwach.
«Chi je' aj re' naxquichop i ac'unbe̱s re're', xquicansaj je eh xquikerej lok riti'jolal chiri̱j lok i ye'a̱b re're'.

Yu'na ajic, re' hin nwa̱j nibiram aweh tak i wili: Chaj bih xiban i ajabe̱s re're' naxibiraj chaj bih xc'uluric ru̱c' rac'u̱n nanacapaj hat-tak? Re' hin enik'or aweh tak chi re' ajabe̱s re're' xitak'a̱' quicansjic take aj quimel ye'a̱b re're' eh queh chic take toco̱m xiyew riye'a̱b chi naquehcham i wach i tic wilic? nqui Jesus queh.

Chiri̱j aj re', je wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Chaj bih nac'ul tak chi ma' narak ta tak chiri̱j i nawilow tak wach chipam i lok' laj hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios? Je' re' nik'or maj ar je' wili rik'or: “Re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel nakilow tak chi re' cajtz'u'c laj ma' laj abaj ma' cojo̱j ta pa riman cu'um take toco̱m chic aj tz'ako̱l, re' chic re' xoquic chi pe̱t ma' laj abaj ch'iquinbal cho reh ricajtz'u'c i pa̱t wili,
til wo' chic sahchok kac'ux ru'um i kAja̱w Dios maj til wo' re're' xchihbic wach chi je' re' xicamanej, nqui rik'or, nqui Jesus queh.

Naxquibiraj xik'or i Jesus ru̱c' i rijalwach k'oric re're', re' take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios ch'i̱l wo' take nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take nimak quiwach, xquirak chiri̱j chi chiqui̱j po' c'ahchi' rik'oric. Chi je' aj re' k'uru', xa xca̱j nak chic quichopom xa re' la' ru'um chi quiyo'jic chiwach i tinamit quitahkanic reh Jesus ma' xca'n ta wo' chi je' re', elic la' chic xca'n je chiwach.

Nok elenak chic take je chiwach i Jesus, re' take c'acharel re're' xa cu xquitik wo' ju' risiq'uiric ri̱j chi haj ta nak encalajic chi quiwach ru̱c' jeno' k'oric. Chi je' aj re', xquitak'a̱' je ru̱c' i Jesus juntuhm chi cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l wo' take quib xib chi winak re' Herorya̱no ribihnal quicomonil.

Naxiponic ru̱c' i Jesus, je' wili xquibiraj cok reh: «Ha̱w aj tijinel keh, re' hoj keht'alim chi xa coric wo' wach k'oric na'n eh ru'um re're' ru̱c' wo' coric wach k'oric nac'uhtaj i c'uhbal nc'ambic quibe̱h take c'acharel chi naquiponic ru̱c' i Dios. Je' wo' keht'alim chi re' hat ma' nachih ta wach take c'acharel quibirinic reh coric awu̱c' ru'um chi ma' nayohbalej ta awi̱b xa chi'nchel la' nac'ul take awu̱c' maj chawach i hat xa jenaj wach quiwa'ric take c'acharel. Je' re' nok chak'or keh, riyew na k'ab i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, chi re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel enkayew i to̱j tak'amaj ritojoric ru'um i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma? Cu nakatikim na ju' ribanaric i to̱j re're' on ma'xta chic? nqui take reh.

Re' Jesus chi reht'alim chi banbal quiwach c'ahchi'que̱b cok chi birinic re're' ru̱c' c'ahbil laj no'jbal, je' wili xik'or queh: «Ha̱', re' hat-tak xa'n tak cho wi̱n i pahkanic wili xa sic'bal reh chi xa haj ta nak equincalajic chawach tak ru̱c' jeno' k'oric! Charak tak cho wi̱n k'uru' jeno' tumi̱n re' nye'eric chi to̱j, nqui queh.
Chi je' re' naxquiyew cok reh jenaj tumi̱n, xipahkaj queh chi je' wili: «Hab wach aj eh i wachbal ch'i̱l i bihnal wilic chiwach i tumi̱n wili? nqui queh. —Reh k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma, nqui take reh.

Naxibiraj chi je' re' i Jesus, je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Haj pa' wilic i k'oro̱j chi reh i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma, re' wo' re' chayew tak reh eh haj pa' wo' wilic i k'oro̱j chi reh i Dios, re' wo' re' chayew tak reh ru', nqui queh. Chi je' aj re' chi xa tz'e'tz'e' chic quiwach ru̱c' i c'u'lunic xiban i Jesus, re' take re' ma' xca'n ta wo' canar ricojoric jeno' rimahc.

Chiri̱j aj chic re', xiponic ru̱c' i Jesus junch'uk chic aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses je' ru̱c' take ca̱' qui'sil cho aj k'ahsem si̱ Saroc. Re' take re', re' ma' quicojbic ta wach cuctic cho take camnak, je' wili pahkanic xca'n cok reh:

«Ha̱w aj tijinel keh, chipam jenaj queh hu̱j xitz'ihmbaj i Moyses rik'or chi je' wili: “Wi jeno' asbe̱s ac'un nquimic je chi ma' ja'xta cahnok riha'lac'u̱n ru̱c' i rehq'ue̱n, tanlic chiri̱j i chak'be̱s ac'un chi narehq'uenem cahnok rehq'ue̱n i ras reh chi enwih'ic quiha'lac'u̱n ch'i̱l i cahnel ixok re're' eh chi je' re' ma' eta no̱j sahchok wach ribihnal i asbe̱s ac'un camnak je, nqui tz'ihmbimaj.

«Wi je' re' tz'ihmbimaj chaj bih naquicahnic wi̱' take wuku̱b chi ac'un re' je' wili xquic'ul? Pan jenaj cho k'i̱j re' asbe̱s ac'un xiban caxa̱ra ru̱c' jenaj ixok xa re' la' naxirak cho rik'ijil riquimic, xquimic je chi ma' jeno' riha'lac'u̱n xwih'ic.

Chi je' aj re', re' ricab ac'un chi nimbal reh i tz'ihmbimaj cahnok ru'um i Moyses, xiban caxa̱ra ru̱c' rehq'ue̱n i ras, xa re' la' xquimic wo' je ru' chi ma' jeno' riha'lac'u̱n ru̱c' ixok re're'. Chiri̱j chic ru', xc'amaric wo' chic ixok re're' ru'um i ro̱x ac'un, xa re' la' xquimic wo' je chi ma'xta wo' nwih'ic cahnok riha'lac'u̱n ru̱c' ixok re're'.

Je' aj re' ru', chi'nchel take wuku̱b chi ac'un re're' quehq'uenej cahnok ixok re're', xa re' la' chi'nchel xiquimic je chi ma'xta cahnok quiha'lac'u̱n ru̱c'. Nok camnak chic take je chi'nchel chi ac'un re're', xponic wo' rik'ijil chi xquimic je ixok re' xquehq'uenej cahnok take wuku̱b chi ac'un re're'.

Chak'or keh k'uru' ajabe̱s Jesus, chaj bih naquicahnic wi̱' take wuku̱b chi ac'un re're' pa rik'ijil cucsbal cho take camnak? Hab wo' wach queh wuku̱b chi ac'un re're' narehchenic reh ixok re're'? Nkabiraj aweh re're' maj chi'nchel xquehq'uenej je ixok re're', nqui take cok reh.

Naxibiraj i Jesus chi je' re', je' wili quic'u'ljic xiban: «Ma' riwi̱' ta nak'or tak chi je' re'. Re' hin nwilow chi ma' narak ta tak chiri̱j i rik'or chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios. Je' wo', ma' wo' narak ta tak chiri̱j chaj bih til nchol ribanaric i Dios ru̱c' rinimal wach rajawric.

Ru̱c' acapew-bal tak re're', re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi re' ixok re're' ma' hab ta wach narehchenic reh chi ehq'uenbe̱s maj naqui'uctok wo' chic cho take camnak chi naquic'acharic ru̱c' i Dios, re' take c'acharel caxa̱ra take naxiquimic je ma'xta chic quic'acharic chi quic'u'lil co̱k quik'ab qui̱b je' ricab naxiwih'ic wach ac'al. Re' chic take ma' caxa̱ra ta take naxiquimic je xa naquicahnic wo' chi je' re' quiwi̱' maj ar pan taxa̱j chi'nchel take c'acharel naca'nam chi je' chic ricab quiwi̱' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios chi re' take re' wilque̱b chi junelic chi ma' nca'n ta caxa̱ra.

«Ma' xa ta re' chi ma' narak ta tak chiri̱j, je' la' wo' ma' narak ta tak chiri̱j i nawilow tak chipam i Lok' laj riC'uhbal i Dios chiri̱j ribiral cuctic take cho camnak. Je' re' nik'or maj xa cu ja' narak ta wo' tak chiri̱j i nawilom tak chipam jenaj queh take hu̱j xitz'ihmbaj i Moyses ru̱c' ribiral chaj bih xk'ormojic reh ru'um i Dios nok c'ahchi' rilom chi koplic i rik'ak'il i cak q'ui̱x. Ar rik'or chi re' Dios je' wili xik'or: “Re' hin, hin i Dios rilok'ej niwach i ma' Awraham ch'i̱l i ma' Isahac eh ch'i̱l wo' i ma' Jacow, nqui rik'or.
«Ru̱c' aj k'oric re're', re' Moyses xic'uhtaj chi re' Dios nlok'onjic wach cu'um take quic'acharic wo' chic cho, ma' re' ta nchel cu'um take ma' quic'acharic ta chic cho, nqui Jesus queh.

Chi quixilac take c'acharel cu re' xik'o'rjic lok ru'um i Jesus, wilic jenaj aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Re're' naxibiraj chi til coric c'u'lunic xiban i Jesus, xijil cok ri̱b ru̱c' eh je' wili birinic xiban cok reh Jesus xa pajbal ti reh chi haj ta nak encalajic ru̱c' take k'oric riban: «Ajabe̱s, haj wo' wilic i tak'anic tz'ihmbimaj chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses til ajwal wach chi naric'amaric na̱, nqui reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili c'u'lunic xiban reh: «Re' tak'anic re're', re' aj i je' wili rik'or: “Chabiraj i wili hat-tak wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel: Re' Ajabe̱s Dios lok'omaj wach ku'um i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, xa re' wo' i Ajabe̱s Dios wilic chi kawach chi nakalok'em wach, nqui rik'or.

«Chi je' aj re' riwi̱' i lok'onic ra̱j ribanaric, tanlic chi narinimjic wo' i jenaj chic je' wili rik'or: “Re' hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ti' chawic'raj tak i Ajabe̱s Dios nalok'ej tak wach. Til chac'ax tak ru̱c' chi'nchel ac'ux tak, ru̱c' chi'nchel awa̱mna tak, ru̱c' chi'nchel awansil tak eh je' wo' re' ru̱c' chi'nchel acapew-bal tak, nqui rik'or. «Til nik'or aweh chi re' aj re' i tak'anic k'e̱' wo' chic ajwal wach chi c'amaric na̱

ch'i̱l wo' i jenaj chic tak'anic je' wili rik'or: “Chac'ax awas acha̱k' je' ricab ric'axaric awi̱b na'n i hat, nqui rik'or. «Re' aj take quib chi tak'anic wili til k'e̱' wo' ajwal wach chi c'amaric na̱, nqui Jesus reh.

Naxibiraj chi je' re', re' aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal re're' je' wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Ha̱w aj tijinel keh, coric i xak'or maj je' re' riwi̱' chi xa jenaj wo' chi Ajabe̱s Dios nkalok'ej wach i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh ma'xta chic jeno' Dios ra̱j lok'onjic wach chiri̱j ru'.

Je' wo', coric aweh chi re' Ajabe̱s Dios nkalok'ej wach i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, riwi̱' chi keh chi ti' nakic'ram eh chi nakac'axam ru̱c' chi'nchel kac'ux, ru̱c' chi'nchel ka̱mna, ru̱c' chi'nchel kacapew-bal eh ru̱c' wo' chi'nchel kansil. Ma' xa re' ta re', coric wo' xak'or chi riwi̱' chi keh chi nakac'axam take kas kacha̱k' je' ricab ric'axaric ki̱b nka'n i hoj. Til aj coric xak'or chi re' ribanaric chi'nchel re're', k'e̱' wo' chic nponic chiwach i Dios chi quiwach quik'ahsjic take chicop chi ric'ataric chi si̱ chiwach i Dios ru'um aj k'ahsem si̱, nqui i c'acharel re're'.

Re' c'u'lunic xiban i c'acharel re're' xic'ul ric'ux i Jesus. Ru'um aj re' je' wili xik'or reh: «Re' hin nwilow chi re' hat xa loq'uil chic nayew k'ab chi re' chic i Dios richop ana̱ chi k'atal k'oric, nqui Jesus reh. Ru̱c' i k'oric xiban i Jesus, ma' cu ta pe chic hab wach chi quixilac take c'acharel wilque̱b ar xinima̱' ric'ux chi ribanjic chic cok jeno' pahkanic reh.

Nok re' Jesus c'ahchi' chi c'uhbalanic chipam i pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, je' wili xik'or queh take quibirinic reh: «Re' take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ma' coric ta nquik'or chi re' rira'il i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xa ar ti nchalic cu̱c' take ra̱' ri'sil cho i aj najtir k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy eh ma' re' ta ru̱c' i Dios nanquik'or.

Je' re' nik'or maj najtir k'i̱j re' k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy chi ye'o̱j rik'orbal ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios je' wili xik'or chiri̱j: “Re' Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Dios je' wili xik'or reh Ajabe̱s chi nina̱ re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric: ‘Je' ricab naric'ul rilok'il jeno' winak ntz'ukunjic cok chi riche̱l jeno' k'atal k'oric, je' aj wo' re' nachac'ul alok'il wili: Chi na̱wih'ic chiniche̱l cu rehtal nawilow chi re' take awaj ixowonel naquiwih'ic ri'sil awo̱k, nqui xk'ormojic reh, nqui ma' Tawiy.

«Je' re' ajic wi re' ma' Tawiy Ajabe̱s chi nina̱ nqui rik'or reh k'atal k'oric re're', nic' aj wach k'uru' nanquik'or take aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal chi re' rilok'il i k'atal k'oric re're', xa je' ti ricab rilok'il cho jeno' queh ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Tawiy? nqui Jesus. Re' c'uhbalanic riban i Jesus chipam i pa̱t re're' k'e̱' nponic chi quiwach take riq'uihal c'acharel wilque̱b cok ru̱c' chi xa suk chic quic'ux chi ribirmijic.

Chipam i c'uhbalanic xiban queh c'acharel, re' Jesus, xik'or wo' queh chi je' wili: «Chayohbalej awi̱b tak, ma̱nih awi̱b tak ru̱c' quino'jbal take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses maj re' take re' k'e̱' nponic chi quiwach ric'uhtjic lok qui̱b queh tinamit chi nimak quiwach. Ru'um aj re', naquibehic lok k'e̱' nponic chi quiwach ricojoric nimak tak ro̱k tz'ih reh chi xa suk chic equic'alenjic wa tak c'aybal.

Eh naqui'o̱j wo' pan tak pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, on naqui'o̱j wo' pan jeno' pa̱t re' yuk'umaj take wi̱' chi wi'c, k'e̱' suk queh tz'uhkic re' quitz'uhkic wi̱' take nimak quiwach.

Je' wo' chic, re' take re' nquimak' pa' bih wilic queh take cahnel ixok eh xa poybal chic na̱ i lek' nca'n, xa k'e̱' chic nahtil ro̱k ti̱j nca'n. Ru'um aj chi'nchel nca'n re're' k'e̱' rinimal ti'c'axic naquic'ulum, nqui Jesus.

Ar wo' chipam i pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, re' Jesus chi tz'uklic cok ru̱c' i caxo̱n molbal tumi̱n ncamanic chipam i pa̱t re're', xilow take c'acharel c'ahchi' quiyeb quitz'a̱k chipam i caxo̱n re're'. Chi quixilac take c'acharel re're', re' Jesus xilow chi wilic q'uihal take biho̱m je' re' c'ahchi' ca'nam.
Nok c'ahchi' chi ilo̱j i Jesus, xponic ar jenaj cahnel ixok niba̱' ti eh xiyew chipam i caxo̱n re're' i quib chi cuc' tumi̱n ma' q'uih ta ti quitz'akil.

Ar aj ru', re' Jesus xipahkaj queh take cablaj chi raj tahkanel chi xquijil cok qui̱b ru̱c' chi ribirmijic i xik'or chi je' wili: «Til coric nik'or aweh tak chi re' tumi̱n xiyew i niba̱' cahnel laj ixok re're', xiq'uic wo' chic na̱ riwa'ric chiwach i tumi̱n xquiyew pan caxo̱n chi'nchel take bihomak re're'.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' cahnel ixok re're' to̱b ta xa niba̱' ti xiyew i tumi̱n re' haj nak ti wilic naricamanic reh pa ric'acharic, ra̱j nchel take bihomak xa re' chic i tumi̱n re' ma' xquic'uhsaj ta xquiyew ar, nqui Jesus.

Nok c'ahchi' chic relic je Jesus rich'i̱l take cablaj chi raj tahkanel chipam i pa̱t re're', jenaj queh raj tahkanel xik'or cok reh chi je' wili nok wilque̱b chic lok rij pa̱t: «Ha̱w aj tijinel keh, chawilow ti! K'e̱' wo' chic holonquilal ritik'injic bano̱j i pa̱t wili re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios! Xa chawilow ti take abaj cojo̱j reh, til k'e̱' wo' chic tak take, nqui reh.

Chalic i Jesus je' wili c'u'lunic xiban queh: «Coric, re' ma' laj pa̱t nawilom tak wili k'e̱' nak ru' holonquilal nc'utunic, xa re' la' nik'or aweh tak chi re' pa̱t wili til narisacharic wach chi junpech chi ma' jeno' chic abaj naricahnic chi tuslic wach, nqui xik'or.

Chiri̱j chic naxiponic chipam i ye'a̱b re' ribihnej “Ye'a̱b queh take tic Oli̱wo ribihnal”, re' nc'utunic je chiwach i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, re' ma' Luch ch'i̱l i ma' Jaco̱wo ch'i̱l ma' Wa̱n ch'i̱l wo' ma' Tirix xiponic ru̱c' Jesus nok tz'uklic chi rutquel eh je' wili xquik'or reh:

«Ajabe̱s, chacuy chak'or keh jaruj naric'uluric nic' nimal xak'or keh. Chak'or wo' keh haj wilic take rehtalil nariwih'ic chi pe̱t chi c'uhtbal reh chi q'uisi̱n chic ma' nc'uluric take re're', nqui take reh.
Re' Jesus chi quic'u'ljic je' wili p'uht rik'orom queh: «Xa na'lic ok wo' aweh tak reh chi ma' hab ta wach enjot'bic aweh tak.

Je' re' nik'or maj yohbal wach take tinamit naquijot'oric cu'um take riq'uihal aj jot'o̱l nacuctic cho re' naca'nam qui̱b chi xa je' chic re' hin take eh je' wili naquik'orom: ‹Re' hin, i hin Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, nqui naquik'orom. «Chawic'raj awi̱b tak chi quiwach take c'acharel re're' k'uru' maj ru̱c' i k'oric naca'nam, naribanam chi q'uihal take c'acharel naquijot'oric.

«Re' hat-tak na̱biram wo' tak ribiral chi wilic take tinamit c'ahchi'que̱b chi k'ak'anic chi quiwach on chi nacoquic chi k'ak'anic. Nachabiraj tak re're', ma' riban ti naho̱l awach tak chi ricapewjic chi xponic chic ricux'ic wach chi'nchel. Coric, chi'nchel re're' nariponic wach xa re' la' ma' ja' yu'na ta ti maj curman chi pe̱t naric'uluric chi'nchel nanik'orom take wili:

Re' take nimak chi cuc'tak tinamit xa naquic'u'lem chic qui̱b chi k'ak'anic chi quiwach on chi naquimolom wo' qui̱b jarub ok chi tinamit reh chi naquic'u'lem juntuhm ok chi tinamit chi k'ak'anic. Je' wo' xa haj chic ye'a̱b, nariwih'ic wi'jalel eh naribanam wo' take cow laj hihc. Nac'ulurok take re're' chacoj tak rehtal chi xa cu re' pe ti p'uhtbal reh i c'axquilal c'ahchi' richalic china̱ ac'al wili.

«Chipam take k'i̱j re' c'ahchi' nik'oric chiri̱j, tikilca̱t ok tak chi ricuyuric i ti'c'axic naca'nam aweh tak take c'acharel. Je' re' nik'or maj ru'um chi re' hin quinanimej tak, na̱c'amaric tak je chi quiwach take k'atal k'oric on chi quiwach take aj to'o̱l queh eh re' take re' naca̱t tak quik'ahsam pan quik'ab take aj c'amol quibe̱h take awich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Re' take re' nok quimolom chic qui̱b pan tak pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, naquitz'akam k'oric chawi̱j tak eh naquitak'a̱b wo' atz'uhumjic tak ar. Je' re' ajic chi quiwach aj chi'nchel re're' ma̱cana̱' tak riye'eric achi̱' tak chiwi̱j
maj re' nibiral re' nye'bic sukquil c'uxlis queh take quic'ulbic reh, curman chi narik'ormojic queh c'acharel chipam chi'nchel tinamit reh wach ac'al wili.

«Natic'amarok tak je chi na̱k'ahsjic tak chi quiwach take k'atal k'oric on take caj to'o̱l, ma' riban ntuquic awa̱mna tak chi risiq'uiric ri̱j chaj bih na̱k'orom tak maj nik'or aweh tak chi chipam i junc'am re're', ma' awu̱c' ta tak narichalic take k'oric na̱k'orom tak, ru̱c' la' i Lok' laj Uxlabal narichalic. Chi je' aj re' xa pa' wilic take k'oric nariye'eric aweh tak, re' wo' re' chak'or tak.

«Ma' xa re' ta re' na̱c'ulum tak, til nik'or la' chi wilic aweh tak naquik'ahsjic pan k'ab awaj cansanel tak cu'um take awaj pan pa̱t tak. Je' re' k'uru', wi re' nchel asbe̱s ac'un aj nimem wi̱n, narik'ahsjic pan quimic ru'um richa̱k'. On wi re' nchel i chak'be̱s ac'un aj nimem wi̱n, re're', narik'ahsjic pan quimic ru'um i ras. Je' wo', wi re' ok nchel ajabe̱s aj nimem wi̱n, narik'ahsjic pan quimic ru'um i rac'u̱n eh wi re' ok ac'unbe̱s aj nimem wi̱n, narik'ahsjic wo' pan quimic ru'um i raja̱w.

Chi je' aj re' k'e̱' wo' chic q'uihal take c'acharel naquixowonic awach tak ru'um chi re' hin quinanimej tak. To̱b ta wo' je' re' naca'nam aweh tak, chatik tak ju' rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak chiwi̱j maj xa re' wo' i c'acharel re' cu ch'iclic ric'ux chiwi̱j hin naponok i cohlsbal wach i ti'c'axic wilca̱t tak wi̱', xa re' wo' re' narico'lem ri̱b.

«Re' hat-tak re' tilbic tak wach i hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj cho ru'um aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios re' Tanyel ribihnal, charak tak chiri̱j chi re' ricux'ic wach chi'nchel i wach ac'al wili xoquic chic cho nachawilow tak chi chipam i pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, re' take aj sachol wach i tinamit wili, xca'n chic i yibel wach c'ahbilal k'oro̱j cho ribiral ru'um i aj k'orol re're'. Nachawilow tak k'uru' chi xbanaric chic i yibel wach c'ahbilal re' ma' riwi̱' ta nak chi naribanaric ar, hat-tak re' wilca̱t tak chi junsut riyuk'ul Jure̱ya hiy tak pan tak q'uiche̱' chi ric'oloric awi̱b tak ar.
Je' ricab wi wilic ok nchel jeno' aweh tak rij ripa̱t wilic lok, ma' noquic chic cok chipam chi ric'amaric pa' bih reh.
On wi pan awabi̱x wilca̱t tak cho ma' tisoljic wo' tak chic cho pan apa̱t tak chi ric'amaric jeno' ajalba̱l tak.
Ru'um chi k'e̱' c'axquilal wach i elic naribanjic chiwach take k'i̱j re're', k'e̱' niquetelej quiwach take yowa̱b ixok ch'i̱l take tutbe̱s cu wilic quicuc'ta̱k.
Ru'um aj re', til nik'or aweh tak chi cha'n ati̱j tak reh chi re' ti'c'axic re're' ma' ok re' chipam rik'ijil i k'elej enc'uluric reh chi suk elic ena'n tak je.

Nipahkaj aweh tak chi cha'n ati̱j tak k'uru' maj re' ti'c'axic re're' til wo' chic cow wach naribanam chiwach take chi'nchel ti'c'axic c'ulu̱j cho cu rich'ihquic cho chi'nchel nic' pa' nimal ritik'a̱b i Dios cu rehtal nponic rik'ijil i ti'c'axic re're'. Til wo' chic ma' ilo̱j ta wach i ti'c'axic naric'uluric re're' eh ma' wo' narilmijic chic johtok wach chiri̱j take k'i̱j nac'ulurok lok re're'.

K'e̱' wo' chic ti'quilal naric'uluric chi re' Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Dios naritokom wach rinimal ro̱k rik'ijil ti'c'axic re're' awu'um aweh hat-tak re' xatrichih tak chi naca̱t tak rico'lem chiwach i ti'c'axic re're'. Ma' ta je' re' eriban, ma' hab ta wo' nak wach erico'lej ri̱b chipam.

Chiwach rik'ijil i ti'c'axic re're', q'uihal take c'acharel nacoquic chi jot'o̱j. Chi quixilac take re', wilic take naquik'orom chi je' wili: ‹Quim tak, chawilow tak: Ayu' wilic on wulu' wilic i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, nqui naquik'orom. «Nachabiraj tak chi je' re' ma̱coj tak wach

maj je' ricab yohbal wach take jot'o̱l nacuctic cho chi c'ahchi' quik'orom chi re' take re' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' wo', yohbal wo' wach take jot'o̱l nacuctic cho chi naquitz'akam qui̱b aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios take eh rehtalil chi til xa coric wo' chic queh k'oric nca'n nachak'or, yohbal wach lok' laj nawa̱l naca'nam. Ru̱c' re're' naquiniq'uem wo' quik'i̱j chi quijot'oric take richiho̱j i Dios chi naquico'ljic.
Chayohbalej awi̱b tak chi quiwach k'uru', ma' riwi̱' ta chic chi etijot'oric tak maj re' hin pe̱t c'ahchi' nik'orom aweh tak chi'nchel re're' chi ja' nc'uluric ta.
«Chiri̱j chi iq'uinak chic nic' nimal ti'c'axic naric'uluric chipam take k'i̱j re're', re' k'i̱j ch'i̱l i poh ma'xta chic quiyeb cho quisakomil.
Je' wo' re' take ch'imi̱l, chi xa je' nak chic naquik'ehbic cho wach ac'al na'ilmijok, ma'xta wo' chic quisakomonic cho. Je' aj re' ru' nok re' take sakombal pan taxa̱j naripa'lajic quisakomil,
re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel naquinc'olok lok pa rinimal su̱tz', narilmijic wach risakomil nich'a̱b ch'i̱l rinimal wach wajawric wilic.
Nachirak aj cho nichalbal, re' hin nanitak'a̱b take cho waj tz'e' wa̱ch reh chi nacojic chi junsut yu̱k' q'uixca̱b china̱ ac'al wili chi rimoloric quiwach take c'acharel chiho̱j take quiwach wu'um.

«Ru'um aj chi je' re' naric'uluric, re' hat-tak chacoj tak rehtal take rehtalil c'uhtbal reh nichalic je' ricab na'n tak ru̱c' i che̱' re' I̱co ribihnal. Nanawilow tak chi rip'ut cho toxlonic take ac' xak, naweht'alij tak chi re' sik'jil xiq'uic chic lok rik'ijil eh chi re' chic k'elej oquic cho reh.
Je' wo' re' cha'n tak chi nachawilow tak chi c'ahchi' chic ric'ulmujic take xnik'or lok aweh tak chi naric'ulmujic, charak tak chiri̱j chi ma' naht ta chic wilic i k'i̱j chi nanichalic.
Til coric nik'or chi re' xnik'or aweh tak naric'uluric nok cu ja' ta ncux'ic rinimal ro̱k quic'acharic take c'acharel c'achalque̱b yu'na.
Je' re' nik'or aweh tak maj chi'nchel re' xnik'or lok i hin, til wo' naric'uluric ma'xta nchel risahchic wach je' ricab naric'ulum i taxa̱j rich'i̱l i ac'al.

«Re' cok ru' to̱b ta nchel xnik'or lok haj wilic take rehtalil naric'utunic wi̱' nichalic, ma' hab ta chic wach xa re' wo' Dios neht'alanic reh k'i̱j ch'i̱l ri'orahil chi naric'uluric re're'. Xa ta nak re' hin Ac'unbe̱s ch'i̱l take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i wAja̱w wilque̱b ar pan taxa̱j, keht'alim re're'.

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um chi ma' hab ta chic wach neht'alanic reh, chawic'raj awi̱b tak chi ma' nchel riban chi ma' tikilca̱t ta tak chi nic'uluric. Reh chi ma' eta tican tak chi ma' tikilca̱t ta tak, nipahkaj aweh tak chi xa eli̱c ok wo' cha'n tak ati̱j reh chi xa tikilca̱t ok wo' tak chi nic'uluric.

Cha'n tak je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' aj camanom ncha'janic reh ripa̱t jeno' ajabe̱s re' nok ritik'a̱b chic ri̱b chi ojic chi naht, ricana̱' cahnok ripa̱t pan k'ab aj camanom re're'. Chiri̱j chic chi re' ajabe̱s re're' ricana̱b chic cahnok pa' bih wilic reh pan quik'ab take raj camanom eh rehreh wach camanic xiyew cahnok queh chi quiju'junal, je' wili xik'or cahnok reh aj cha'janel re're':

‹Chi k'i̱j chi ak'ab cu rehtal nisoljic cho, xa ic'lic ok wo' ana̱. Je' re' nik'or aweh maj re' hin ajabe̱s chana̱, ma' aweht'alim ta jaruj nchel rirak cho k'i̱j reh nisoljic, wi nchel johtonak chic ak'ab, on wi nchel tic'lic ak'ab, on wi nchel nachip'ut cho k'oric i las chiwach i suk wach sak'ic.
Na'lic ok aweh k'uru' reh chi ma' eta tic'ulic nirak chi wiric na'n naquinsoljok cho, nqui xik'or reh.

«Je' re' k'uru' je' ricab tak'anic xiyew i ajabe̱s reh aj cha'jem ripa̱t re're', re' hin je' wo' re' tak'anic niban aweh tak chi xa tikilca̱t ok wo' tak chi nic'uluric. Ma' xa aweh ta tak nik'or i wili, je' la' wo' queh nic' pa' q'uihal quitahkanic wi̱n, nqui Jesus queh.

Quib ok chic k'i̱j chiri̱j ru', narip'uhtic johtok i rinimal nink'i̱j Pa̱scuwa ribihnal re' n-nimjic wi̱' i quelbal cho pan ti'c'axic take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh re' nink'i̱j re're', ribihnej wo' chi nink'i̱j reh Caxlan Wi'c ma' cojo̱j ta rik'omal chi sipsbal wach. Nok xa quib aj chic k'i̱j ra̱j chi narip'uhtic i nink'i̱j re're' k'uru', re' take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xquisic' pe' ri̱j nic' wach richoporic i Jesus naca'nam eh xquitik'a̱' wach chi naquicojom rimahc chi quiwach take wilque̱b chi k'atal k'oric reh chi enquitak'a̱' ricansjic.

Re' take ca'ch'uk re're' je' wili xquik'or chi quiwach: «Re' richoporic i Jesus naka'nam ma' re' ta chiwach take rik'ijil nink'i̱j reh chi ma' eta nkajohsaj quic'a̱ take tinamit quitahkanic reh, nqui take.

Nok wilic chic i Jesus pan tinamit Weta̱nya ribihnal, jenaj winak re' xilim nak cho ri̱j, xiyuk'ej i Jesus quich'i̱l take cablaj chi raj tahkanel reh chi naca'nam quiwa' ru̱c' ar pa ripa̱t. Re' winak re're', re' Simon ribihnal, re' wo' re' xesmejic lok riya'bilal ru'um i Jesus. Ar ajic nok tz'uklic chic cok i Jesus nah me̱xa chi wi'c, jenaj ixok xic'am je pa rik'ab jenaj t'uch c'ola̱b tik'imaj ru̱c' holohic laj abaj re' c'olic wi̱' jenaj nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m q'uih ritz'akil ru'um tik'imaj ru̱c' rihtz'uba̱l i tic “Na̱rto” ribihnal. Re' ixok re're' naxijil cok ri̱b ru̱c' i Jesus, xesaj lok ritz'apa̱b na̱ i c'ola̱b re're' eh xibuch' rina̱ i Jesus pan nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m re're'.

Naxquilow chi je' re' take raj tahkanel, wilic queh xicakric pan quic'ux maj chi queh ru' ma' riwi̱' ta nak chi je' re' xbanaric ru̱c' ik'o̱m re're' eh ru'um re' xquik'or reh Jesus chi je' wili: «K'e̱' memil reh ixok wili chi xiyew chi k'e̱b ik'o̱m re're'.

Ta nak re̱t chi xic'ayej ik'o̱m wili eh xtojoric nak reh ritz'akil ricamaj riban jenaj c'acharel chiwach q'uisi̱n ma' jenaj ha̱b. Ru̱c' riq'uihal tumi̱n re're' xitobjic nak take c'acharel c'axic ti nca'n, nqui take. Chiri̱j re' xi'oquic chi rik'ilmijic ixok re're'
xa re' la' Jesus naxibiraj chi je' re' nca'n, re're' je' wili xik'or queh: «Ma̱wolej tak ixok wili chiri̱j i xiban maj til jenaj ato'bil xiban wi̱n.

Re' take c'acharel c'axic ti nca'n, eriban chi xa nic' pa' ena'n tak ato'bil queh, raj nchel i hin ma' xa eli̱c ta naniwih'ic chaxilac tak maj xa ma' naht ta chic wilic je rik'ijil chi nanicansjic je.

Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi wi̱n i hin tare̱t xiban ixok wili maj chi nok chi cu c'achalqui̱n pe, xa̱j ric'uhtam riye'jic nilok'il c'ahchi' ribanam ru̱c' ribuch'uric nina̱ pan nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m je' ricab naquibuch'uric take quiquimic je.

Ru̱c' xiban ixok wili, til nik'or chi ma' jaruj ta narojic sahchok wach ribiral ribano̱j. Je' re' nik'or maj xa haj yu̱k' q'uixca̱b re' narik'ormojic i c'uhbal chiri̱j niquimic, xa nariq'uic wo' pan k'oric i ato̱b laj ato'bil xiban wi̱n, nqui Jesus.

To̱b ta wo' nak re' Ju̱ras aj Caryot, re' nak jenaj chi quixilac take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus, xo̱j cu̱c' take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios chi rik'ororic queh chi narito'bem take ru̱c' rik'ahsjic Jesus pan quik'ab.

Naxquibiraj chi je' re' take c'amol be̱h re're', k'e̱' naxsukbic quic'ux ru̱c'. Je' re' nok xquitik'a̱' wach chi quiwach chi naquiyeb ritz'a̱k i Ju̱ras chi ritojbal. Xa chiwach aj wo' ti junc'am re're' nok ric'ulum chic ritojbal, re' Ju̱ras p'uht risiq'uim ri̱j i junc'am haj suk rik'ahsjic i Jesus eriban pan quik'ab.

Chipam aj chic i pe̱t k'i̱j reh nink'i̱j nc'uxuric wi̱' i caxlan wi'c ma' cojo̱j ta rik'omal chi sipsbal wach eh re' canamaj wo' chi ar quicansjic take q'uijol me̱' quic'uxuric chipam i nink'i̱j re're', re' take nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus je' wili xquibiraj cok reh: «Ha̱w, haj wilic i ye'a̱b nawa̱j chi nakatik'a̱b wi̱' i wi'c xik'ekbal re' nakac'uxum wi̱' i q'uijol me̱'? nqui take reh.

Ar ajic re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh quib raj tahkanel: «Hiy tak cok pan tinamit Jerusalen. Ar nachawilow tak i jenaj winak ritehlam jenaj tz'ak ac'al icom nujunak chi ha', chatahkej tak je cu rehtal narak tak i pa̱t naroquic cok wi̱'.

Natiponok tak chipam i pa̱t xoquic cok wi̱', toque̱n tak cok ar eh chak'or tak reh ajabe̱s aj ehcham pa̱t chi je' wili: ‹Re' Jesus re' kaj tijinel je' wili xik'or cho: Haj wilic i ye'a̱b re' nanibanam wi̱' niwa' niha̱' wich'i̱l take waj tahkanel chipam i nink'i̱j Pa̱scuwa wili re' nc'uxuric wi̱' i q'uijol me̱', nqui cho, tiquirok tak reh.

«Ar aj ru' haj pa' wilic i wa'bal naric'uhtam aweh tak re' ritik'a̱b chic ar johtok nah ca'tik pa̱t, ar chatik'a̱' tak chi'nchel kawa' kaha̱' re' nakac'uxum chipam i ni̱m reh xik'ek wili, nqui Jesus queh.

Je' aj re' ru', re' take quib chi raj tahkanel re're' xi'o̱j wo' eh naxiponic ar Jerusalen xc'ulmujic wo' je' ricab nic' pa' wach xik'or i Jesus queh. Chi je' aj re' xi'oquic wo' chi ritik'injic i ni̱m. Nok ca'nam chic cho chi'nchel tik'inic, xisoljic wo' chic cho ru̱c' i Jesus.
Chi je' aj re' naxoquic ak'ab reh k'i̱j re're', re' Jesus ch'i̱l take cablaj chi raj tahkanel xo̱j c'olok chipam i pa̱t re' tik'imaj chic wi̱' i wi'c ha' naquic'uxum chiwach i chak'ab re're'.

Nok c'ahchi'que̱b chic chi wi'c ar nah me̱xa, je' wili xik'or i Jesus queh take cablaj chi nahsil re're': «Til coric nik'or, jenaj aweh hat-tak re' c'ahchi'ca̱t tak chi wi'c wu̱c', naquirik'ahsam pan quik'ab take naquicansanic wi̱n, nqui xik'or queh.

Naxquibiraj chi je' re' take raj tahkanel, yohbal wach ti'quilal quic'ux xoquic cho eh chi je' re' chi quiju'junal p'uht quik'orom cok reh chi je' wili: «Re' hat aweht'alim chi ma' re' ta i hin nanik'ahsanic aweh, maje' Ha̱w? nqui take reh.

Ar ajic je' wili xik'or i Jesus: «Re' junmuhuric i caxlan wi'c c'ahchi' ka'nam pan culc wili, re' aj re' i jenaj chaxilac i hat-tak cablaj chi nahsil waj tahkanel, narik'ahsanic wi̱n pan quik'ab take naquicansanic wi̱n.

Coric ru', re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel nanicansjic eh je' re' nanic'ulum maj je' re' tz'ihmbimaj cahnok chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios, raj nchel i c'acharel re' naribanam i to'bonic chi naqui̱nquichopom, k'e̱' je quetal wach. Ru'um chi je' re' naribanam, k'e̱' wo' chic ti'quilal naric'ulum chi sakbih nak chi reh chi ma' ta nak xasjic chiwach k'i̱j sakom, nqui Jesus.

Nok cu wilco̱j wo' nah me̱xa, re' Jesus xichop johtok i caxlan wi'c, xitioxej johtok reh Dios. Chiri̱j chic ru' xich'ak yejal eh xiyew queh cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel chi je' wili c'ahchi' rik'orom queh: «Chach'uy aweh tak eh chac'ux aweh tak i caxlan wi'c wili re' rijalwachej i niti'jolal nibakil, nqui queh.

Chiri̱j chic ru' xichop johtok i jenaj ch'ihch' culc re' wilic wi̱' i ha' tik'imaj ru̱c' ri̱s u̱wa eh xitioxej johtok reh Dios. Chiri̱j chic re' xiyew queh chi naquik'ahsam je chi quiwach eh nok chi cunchelal cuq'uem chic queh i ha' tik'imaj ru̱c' ri̱s u̱wa re' wilic chipam i ch'ihch' culc re're',

re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' ha' tik'imaj ru̱c' ri̱s u̱wa wilic chipam i ch'ihch' culc wili, rijalwachej i niquiq'ue̱l re' narichihquic naquincansjok eh re're' naricamanic chi tik'inbal wach i jenaj chic ac' tik'inic riban i Dios chi yohbal wach c'acharel echic ncuyuric quimahc.

Yu'na, chabiraj tak chi coric i wili: Ayu' johtok chi kawach, re' ha' tik'imaj ru̱c' ri̱s u̱wa wili ma' ja'xta pe chic wuq'uem chi wilic jalwachanic c'ahchi' ribanam je' ricab yu'na, cu re' la' chic chipam i k'i̱j nok re' wAja̱w Dios ribanam chic chi wilqui̱n chi k'atal k'oric, cu re' chic ar nawuq'uem nok jenaj chic ac' laj jalwachanic nanibanam ru̱c', nqui Jesus queh.

Chiri̱j chic wili, xquibichej wach i bi̱ch ocronak take chi ribichjic wach chiwach ak'ab je' ricab re're' eh naxquicohlaj wach i quiwa' quiha̱' xquicora̱' je chipam i ye'a̱b re' ribihnej “Ye'a̱b queh take tic Oli̱wo ribihnal”.

Nok behic chic nca'n je, re' Jesus je' wili p'uht rik'orom queh cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel: «Chiwach ak'ab wili chawunchelal hat-tak naquinacana̱b tak chi wutquel nachachop tak elic reh chi ma' eta tichoporic tak eh je' re' nik'or maj chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios je' wili tz'ihmbimaj cahnok: “Naniyeb pan quimic aj cha'jem queh me̱' eh ru̱c' re're' naquipuhcam qui̱b take me̱', nqui tz'ihmbimaj cahnok.

«Re' cok ru', to̱b ta chac'ul aweh tak je' ricab tz'ihmbimaj re're', re' hat-tak na̱soljic wo' tak chic cho wu̱c' chi na̱banam wo' tak chic chi hat-tak waj tahkanel. Re' hin til ch'iclic nic'ux chi je' re' na̱banam tak maj naquinuctok wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak, re' hin nawojic chi pe̱t be̱h chawach tak pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya. Ar naca̱t tak wuy'em ponok, nqui Jesus queh.
Chalic ma' Luch naxibiraj chi je' re', je' wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Ha̱w, to̱b ta chi'nchel wich aj tahkanel etiquicana̱' chawutquel, re' hin ma' jaruj ta eniban aweh chi je' re', nqui reh.

Naxibiraj i Jesus chi je' re', je' wili xik'or reh: «Ma' Luch, til coric nik'or chi re' hat chiwach i chak'ab wili na'ok'ok cho rica'pech i las, re' hat oxpech chic ak'orom chi ma' re' ta hat waj tahkanel, nqui reh.

To̱b ta wo' je' re' xk'ormojic reh, re' ma' Luch je' wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Ha̱w, wi til nchel curman chi equinquimic chawi̱j, re' hin ma' ru'um ta re' enik'or chi ma' re' ta hin awaj tahkanel, nqui ma' Luch. Nic' pa' wach xik'or i ma' Luch, je' wo' re' xquik'or chi'nchel rich aj tahkanel i ma' Luch.
Chiri̱j chic ru' naxiponic chipam i ye'a̱b Jetsemanih ribihnal, re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh raj tahkanel: «Titz'uhkok tak cahnok ayu', niban pe cho niti̱j wulu' je, nqui queh.
Chiri̱j chic re', re' Jesus xic'am je take chiri̱j i ma' Luch, ch'i̱l Jaco̱wo ch'i̱l wo' i Wa̱n chi nacojic chiri̱j eh chi xa nyot'ic chic i ra̱mna xchalic ru'um ritz'irquilal pa ric'ux,
je' wili xik'or queh take xic'am je chiri̱j: «K'e̱' wo' chic ti'quil pan wa̱mna chi xa je' chic naquiricansam nanwic'raj. Ticahnen tak cahnok ayu' k'uru' eh ticuyunok tak chi ti̱j chiwi̱j, nqui queh.

Naxbehic chic je so' chi quiwach je ru', xixuc'a̱' ri̱b chi ti̱j chi c'ahchi' ripahkam reh Dios chi eta nak je riban chiwach, til nak k'e̱' ra̱j ru' chi eta nak ric'saj china̱ i ti'c'axic c'ahchi' ricora̱b je wi̱'.

Je' aj wili xik'or reh Dios pa riti̱j: «Pah, ru'um chi chi'nchel ma' c'axic ta chawach ribanaric, nipahkaj aweh chi eta nak je riban chawach, chi enawic'saj chi nina̱ i ti'c'axic c'ahchi' nicora̱b je wi̱' wi ta la' nak je' re' enponic chawach, xa re' la' cha'n re' nawa̱j i hat, ma' ok re' nwa̱j i hin, nqui reh.

Chi je' aj re' naxicohlaj cho riti̱j, xsoljic wo' chic cho cu̱c' take xib chi raj tahkanel xic'am take je chiri̱j, xa re' la' xirak take chi wiric nca'n. Je' re' k'uru' xic'a'chsaj cok quiwach eh je' wili xik'or reh ma' Luch re' ribihnej wo' chi Simon: «Simon, chajaric cho re' chi xatc'ulic nirak chi wiric na'n eh je' pe' wo' chic re' take awich'i̱l? Ta wo' chic ru' i hat-tak, ma' wo' nchel xacuy tak jenaj o̱ra chi wihch'iljic chi ti̱j? nqui reh.

Chiri̱j wili je' wili xik'or queh xib re're': «Pa ricorquil re' ka̱mna kuxlabal xa rotowej wo' nak cho ribanaric i holohic xa re' la' wilic pech ma' nka'n ta chic ribanaric re're' ru'um k'uhtunak chic kati'jolal. Ru'um aj re', re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi c'a'chok awach tak eh cha'n ati̱j tak reh chi enacuy tak ransil i pajaric c'ulic lok reh chana̱ tak, nqui queh.
Chiri̱j chic re', re' Jesus xo̱j wo' chic rica'pech chi ribanaric riti̱j. Nic' pa' wach ti̱j xiban pan pe̱t, je' wo' chic re' k'oric xiban pa rica'pech.

Naxsoljic wo' chic cho cu̱c', re' Jesus xirak wo' chic take chi wiric nca'n maj til chopolque̱b take chi coric ru'um wiric. K'e̱' wo' chic xiq'uix'ic naxc'achsjic cok quiwach ru'um Jesus chi ma' nquirak ta chic chaj bih ric'u'ljic naca'nam.

Naxsoljic wo' chic cho cu̱c' pa roxpech riti̱j, xirak wo' chic take chi xa cu wiric wo' nca'n. Je' re' nok je' wili xik'or queh naxic'a'saj take cok: «Chacoj tak rehtal, xponic chic wach i junc'am chi re' take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' coric ta wach quic'ux, xic'ulic lok chi nichoporic i hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel. Xiban chic k'uru' manlic chic i wiric xa'n tak chi rihi'lsjic ati'jolal tak.
Tucten tak cho k'uru' eh tak-tak. Chawilow tak, re' c'acharel re' c'ahchi' rito'bonic chi nanichoporic i hin, c'ulic chic lok rich'i̱l take aj chopo̱l, nqui queh.

Chiri̱j chic ru' nok xa cu re' wo' ti xicohlaj k'oric i Jesus cu̱c', re' Ju̱ras re' jenaj queh i cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel, xo̱j ti c'olok rich'i̱l take juntuhm chi winak xa yok'o̱k' chic quik'as laj ch'ihch', xa yok'o̱k' chic quiche̱'. Re' take re' xitak'abjic cho cu'um take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱, ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l wo' take nahsil chipam tinamit reh chi naquichopom i Jesus

eh ru'um chi re' take re' ma' queht'alim ta wach i Jesus, re' Ju̱ras riyeb nak chic cho queh i jenaj rehtalil chi je' wili: «Haj pa' wilic i winak enitz'ub i pan wach, re're' chachop tak eh chac'am tak je chi til wo' cha'jamaj chi coric awu'um tak, nqui xik'or cho queh.
Chi je' aj re' naxi'o̱j c'olok ru̱c' i Jesus, re' Ju̱ras xijil cok ri̱b ru̱c' eh je' wili xik'or reh: «C'ale̱n Ha̱w waj tijinel, nqui reh. Chiri̱j chic ru' xitz'ub cok pan wach i Jesus.
Nok re' Ju̱ras ritz'ubum chic pan wach i Jesus re' take winak re're' xquimol ti qui̱b chiri̱j i Jesus chi richoporic.

Naxilow chi je' re' i jenaj queh cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus, xehsaj ti cho rik'as laj ch'ihch' eh xicoj ti je chi ti' jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios, naxiniq'uej nak ricansjic xa re' la', xa re' wo' ti i jenaj chi xiquin xirak je riyoc'oric lok.

Ar ajic re' Jesus je' wili quic'u'ljic xiban take winak re're': «Chaj wa'ric yu'na chi xa awich'i̱l chic ak'as laj ch'ihch', xa awich'i̱l chic ache̱', xatc'ulic tak lok chi nichoporic je' ricab nanchoporic jeno' aj lek'?

Tz'a̱b ru' naxinwih'ic cho kalakal chi ac'uhbaljic tak chi chi̱' i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, re' hat-tak ma' xinachop ta tak cho ar maj xacoj tak rehtal chi ma' re' ta hin aj ilek'. Ha̱', re' hat-tak xa'n tak chi je' re' ru'um nok cu re' yu'na xo̱j elok wach nic' nimal i c'uhbal tz'ihmbimaj cho chiwi̱j pan Lok' laj Hu̱j, nqui queh.
Xa re' aj wo' xchoporic i Jesus, xquichop elic take raj tahkanel eh xquicana̱' chi rutquel.

Nok je' re' xca'n ru', xa chic jenaj queh take raj tahkanel re' cu q'uijol xitahkej pan c'olic. Re' q'uijol wili xa ribotem nak ti ri̱b pan jenaj tz'ih naxiponic take aj chopo̱l eh chi je' re' xitahkej je take chi xa ma' naht ta xam je chiqui̱j, xa re' la' nok re' take re' xca̱j wo' nak quichopom
xelic chi quiwach. Je' re' ajic xicana̱' cahnok pan quik'ab i tz'ih ribotem nak wi̱' ri̱b eh xelic je chi ma'xta chic riso' chiri̱j.

Chiri̱j chic richoporic i Jesus, re' take xichopbic reh xquicora̱' je ru̱c' i nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios. Re're' ch'i̱l take toco̱m chic c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eh ch'i̱l wo' take nahsil chipam tinamit, xquimol qui̱b ar pa ripa̱t.

Nok re' take aj chopo̱l xicha'janic reh i Jesus, xquicana̱' chic cahnok ru' pan quik'ab take ajabe̱s re're', xi'oquic lok chi k'ixinic ri̱j k'a̱k' wilic lok chiwach i pa̱t re're'. Cu̱c' take xi'oquic lok chi k'ixinic, xponic wo' i ma' Luch re' xa cu naht xitahkej je i Jesus nok c'ahchi' ric'amaric je.

Chi je' re' k'uru' ar chipam cok i pa̱t re're', re' quicomonil take nahsil aj no'jbal chi quixilac take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ricab take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ ch'i̱l take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l wo' take aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal re're', p'uht quisiq'uim take c'acharel re' equitz'akbic cok rimahc i Jesus. Je' re' xca'n reh chi ru̱c' rimahc entz'akmajic chiri̱j, ench'ukuric ri̱j riquimic cu'um take k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma xa re' la' ja'xta pe wo' nquirak jeno' mahc naquitz'akam chiri̱j.
Q'uih nak ru' take xca'n cok chucuj k'oric chiri̱j xa re' la' ma' xiban ta wo' jenaj wach quino'jbal ru̱c' jeno' mahc nquitz'ak cok chiri̱j i Jesus.
Chi quixilac take c'acharel wilic i jenaj xpa'lajic johtok eh to̱b ta ma' ricorquilal ta c'ahchi' quik'orom chiri̱j i Jesus, je' wili xik'or chi ritz'akaric rimahc:

«Re' hoj wilco̱j ayu' til xkabiraj i winak wili chi xik'or chi je' wili: ‹Re' pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios nanihihtam wach ac'al chi junpech. Nok nibanam chic chi je' re' ru̱c' i pa̱t tik'imaj cu'um take c'acharel, re' hin xa chiwach xib k'i̱j ewo' chic enitik'a̱' rijelow-bal chi ma' re' ta chic c'acharel naquitik'inic reh, nqui rik'or, nqui cok.
Je' re' k'uru' to̱b ta je' re' xk'ormojic chiri̱j i Jesus xa ta wo' nak chi je' re' xiban chi xa jenaj chic wach no'jbal xquik'or chi ritz'akaric rimahc i Jesus.

Cu chiri̱j aj chic re', re' nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ xpa'lajic johtok eh je' wili xik'or reh i Jesus: «Xa nabiraj na nquik'or aweh chi je' re'? Chaj bih nacapaj chiri̱j i k'oric c'ahchi' quik'orom chawi̱j take c'acharel wili? nqui reh

To̱b ta wo' je' re' xk'ormojic reh, re' Jesus ma' xc'u'lunic ta, xa ma'xta la' wo' bih xik'or reh. Chi je' aj wo' re', re' nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ xibiraj reh chi je' wili: «Chak'or keh, til na re' hat rAc'u̱n i lok'omaj wach Dios eh re' na hat i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, nqui reh.

Cu re' aj ru' re' Jesus je' wili xic'u'lej wi̱': «Til coric chi je' re' eh til coric wo' chi re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, naqui̱nawilom tak chi xnic'ul chic rinimal wach nilok'il ru̱c' i wAja̱w Dios re' k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal wach rajawric. Re' nilok'il re're' je' ricab nok jeno' c'acharel ric'ul rinimal wach rilok'il nanye'eric k'ab reh chi ntz'uhkic cok chi riche̱l jeno' k'atal k'oric. Nok awilom aj tak chic chi xnic'ul chic re're', nanic'ulic wo' chic lok pa rinimal su̱tz' chi k'atoj k'oric chana̱ tak, nqui queh.

Naxibiraj chi je' re' i nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱, c'uhtbal reh chi ma' xponic ta chiwach i k'oric xiban i Jesus xiwek i riso' chiri̱j eh je' wili xik'or queh rich'i̱l: «Re' winak wili k'e̱' wo' chic mahc xiban chiwach i Dios ru̱c' take k'oric re're'. Yu'na k'uru' ma'xta chic camaj keh chi cu enkasic' chic jeno' hab wach eriyew richi̱' chi cojbal rimahc

maj re' hoj til xkabiraj chic ru̱c' chi̱' i mahc xiban chiwach i Dios ru̱c' take k'oric xik'or. Chaj bih nak'or hat-tak k'uru' chiri̱j i winak wili? nqui queh. Re' take re' xquik'or chi til coric chi xmahcanic eh til riwi̱' wo' chi reh chi naricansjic je chi junpech.

Nok quik'orom chic riquimic i Jesus, ar aj ru' wilic take p'uht quichuhbam pan nak' wach, wilic take p'uht quipoyom cok i pan nak' wach chi tz'ih eh wilic wo' take p'uht quitz'aram cok pan wach nok je' wili nquik'or cok reh chi xa quise'lbal: «Chak'ijej, hab wach c'ahchi' risec'bic aweh? nqui nquik'or reh. Je' wo' chic, nok k'ahsamaj chic i Jesus pan quik'ab take aj cha'janel reh i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, re' take re' p'uht wo' quiyeb chi k'abis.

Chi je' aj re' nok re' Jesus cu wilic johtok nah rica'tik pa̱t re' xc'amaric johtok wi̱', jenaj raj chipoh i nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ xiq'uic je chi chi̱' lok i pa̱t tz'uklic wo' cok wi̱' i ma' Luch chi quixilac take aj cha'janel ar.

Naxilow cok wach i ma' Luch chi k'ixinic riban ar, je' wili xik'or reh: «Re' hat, hat wo' jenaj chi quixilac take raj tahkanel i Jesus re' ribihnej chi aj Nasaret, re' wilic cok chipam i pa̱t re're', nqui reh.

Ar ajic re' ma' Luch naxik'or ri̱b chi ma' re' ta raj tahkanel i Jesus, je' wili xik'or reh ixok re're': «Pa' bih nac'ul tu̱t! Re' hin ma' weht'alim ta pa' jaric nak'or. Re' Jesus re're' ma' weht'al ta wach, nqui reh. Re' ma' Luch xa re' wo' xik'or re're' xelic lok chi' tz'ahp reh ye'a̱b wilic wi̱' i pa̱t re're' eh ar aj ru' xibiraj chi xok'ic cho i las.

Junc'am chic ru', re' aj chipoh re're' xilow wo' chic wach i ma' Luch eh je' wili xik'or queh take wilque̱b cok ma' naht ta ru̱c': «Re' winak re're', re' wo' jenaj chi quixilac take raj tahkanel i Jesus, nqui queh.

Chi quiwach take wilque̱b ar, re' ma' Luch xik'or wo' chic chi ma' re' ta raj tahkanel i Jesus. Junc'am wo' chic c'ulu̱j lok re're', wilic take c'acharel wilque̱b ar je' wili xquik'or reh: «Til coric, re' hat, hat wo' jenaj chi quixilac take raj tahkanel i Jesus. Je' re' nkak'or maj re' ak'orbal chi hat aj pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya, re're' nkarak wi̱' chiri̱j chi hat wo' jenaj chi quixilac take raj tahkanel, nqui take reh.

Chi je' re' ajic re' ma' Luch p'uht rik'orom chi je' wili: «Til wili taxa̱j, re' hin ma' weht'alim ta nech' ok wach i rik'ebil laj winak nak'or tak re're'. Kajok chi nina̱ jeno' ti'c'axic ru'um i Dios wi ma' coric i c'ahchi' nik'orom aweh tak, nqui queh.

Xa cu re' wo' ti xicohlaj k'oric i ma' Luch, xok'ic wo' chic cho rica'pech i jenaj las wilic ar. Ar aj ru' re' ma' Luch xc'ulic cho pa ric'ux i k'oro̱j cho reh ru'um i Jesus naxik'or cho reh chi je' wili: «Na'ok'ok wo' chic cho rica'pech i las, re' hat ma' Luch oxpech chic ak'orom chi ma' re' ta hat waj tahkanel, nqui k'oro̱j cho reh. Nok c'ahchi' chi capewenic chiri̱j take k'oric re're', xoquic chi ok'ic.

Xa cu wahk'ek wo' ti naxsak'ic lok, re' quicomonil take nahsil aj no'jbal chi quixilac take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ricab take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ ch'i̱l take nahsil chipam tinamit ch'i̱l wo' take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, xquimol qui̱b chi risiq'uiric ri̱j nic' wach rik'ormojic cok rimahc naca'nam chiwach i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to re' raj to'o̱l i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma ar pa riyuk'ul i Jure̱ya. Je' re' k'uru' nok quirakam chic chaj bih naquik'orom, xquic'am je Jesus chi bac'lic eh xquik'ahsaj pan k'ab ru'.

Ar aj ru' re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to je' wili xibiraj reh: «Til na coric chi re' hat i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi quina̱ take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel? nqui reh. Chalic Jesus je' wili ric'u'ljic xiban: «Ho̱', coric. Re' wo' hat c'ahchi' ak'oric chi je' re', nqui reh.
Chiri̱j re', re' take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ p'uht quitz'akam cok riman rimahc i Jesus chiwach i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to
eh ru'um re', je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh i Jesus: «Chabiraj nic' nimal i mahc nquitz'ak chawi̱j, ta na bih so' na̱k'orom chi co'lbal awi̱b? nqui reh.
To̱b ta wo' je' re' xk'ormojic reh, re' Jesus xa ta nak chi je' re' xik'or jeno' k'oric. Ru'um re', re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to xsahchic ric'ux ru'um chi ma' nc'u'lunic ta Jesus.

Chi je' aj re' wilic i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to, xc'ulic cho pa ric'ux jenaj no'jbal re' je' ricab nbanaric eli̱c i ha̱b chipam i nink'i̱j re're'. Re' aj wili no'jbal nbanaric: Xa hab wach wilic chi raj to'o̱l i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma chipam i yuk'ul re're', curman chi narok'tam je jenaj queh aj tz'ahpel re' k'orel hab pa' wach naquipahkam i tinamit chi je' re' naribanaric ru̱c'.

Chi je' aj re' nbanaric, chiwach wo' take k'i̱j re're' wilic pan che̱' jenaj winak Warawas ribihnal. Re're' ch'i̱l juntuhm take quitahkanic reh, wilque̱b ar ru'um reh ricansjic jenaj sol xca'n naxbanjic jenaj peletenic cu̱c' take riso̱l i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to reh chi re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to re're' naricana̱b nak k'atoj k'oric chi quina̱ take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.
Ar ajic nok re' take c'acharel p'uht quipahkam chi narok'tjic je jeno' tz'ahpel je' ricab ocronak take wi̱' chi nbanjic chi quiwach eli̱c i ha̱b,
re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to je' wili xik'or queh: «Nawa̱j na tak chi enwok'taj je i winak re' nk'ormojic chi xik'or chi re're' i aj k'atal k'oric chana̱ hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel? nqui queh.

Je' re' xik'or ru'um xa̱j nak chi re' Jesus xcahnic chi tehlic ri̱j maj reht'alim chi re' take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ c'ahchi' ca'nam re're' chi ixowbal wach i Jesus ru'um chi q'uihal take c'acharel p'uht coquic pa rinimjic riC'uhbal eh re' aj re' riwi̱' chi xquik'ahsaj pa rik'ab ru'.

To̱b ta wo' je' re' xik'or i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to queh take c'acharel, c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ p'uht quihunum pa̱m take tinamit eh chi johtonak chic quic'ux p'uht quipahkam chi re' Warawas narok'tam je i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to eh ma' re' ta chic i Jesus.

Naxibiraj i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to chi je' re' c'ahchi' quipahkam, je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Wi enwok'taj je i Warawas, chaj bih nawa̱j tak chi eniban ru̱c' i winak wili re' nk'ormojic chi xik'or chi re're' i aj k'atal k'oric chana̱ hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel? nqui queh.
Re' take re' je' wili xquik'or chi cow: «Re' Jesus re're' chacansaj wach curu̱s! nqui take.

Re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Chaj wa'ric xapahkaj tak wi̱n chi je' re'? Chaj bih mahc xiban i winak wili k'uru' chi naricansjic wach curu̱s? nqui queh. Re' take c'acharel ma' re' ta chic re' nquibiraj xa re' la' chic riquimic i Jesus wach curu̱s cow c'ahchi' quipahkam cok chi je' wili: «Re' Jesus re're' chacansaj wach curu̱s! nqui take.

Chi je' re' k'uru' re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to reh chi naricahnic pan sukquil cu̱c' take c'acharel, xok'taj wo' je Warawas eh chiri̱j xich'uk k'oric china̱ i Jesus chi naricansjic. Je' aj re' xik'ahsaj pan quik'ab take riso̱l chi naquiyeb chi tz'uhu̱m eh chiri̱j chic ru' naquicansam ar wach curu̱s.

Nok k'ahsamaj aj chic i Jesus pan quik'ab take riso̱l i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to, xquic'am lok chi chi̱' i pa̱t quiwih'ic wi̱' eh re' nc'acharic wo' wi̱' i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to. Nok wilque̱b aj chic lok ar, chi cunchelal take sol xquisutej ri̱j i Jesus

eh xquicoj jenaj cak moyic laj tz'ih chiri̱j je' ricab ncojoric reh jenaj k'atal k'oric naxquesaj lok i riso'. Je' wo' xquicoj wo' wach na̱ jenaj pach'amaj wach ku̱l q'ui̱x eh cotomaj rij. Je' re' xca'n reh chi xa quise'lbal je' wo' chi ehtz'bal reh jeno' k'atal k'oric.
Je' re' ajic je' wili nquik'or cok reh chi xa quise'lbal: «C'ale̱n, hat quik'atal k'oric take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel! xa nqui chic nquik'or reh.
Je' wo', p'uht quik'ojom cok i pana̱ chi caxlan a̱j, quichuhbaj pan nak' wach eh xquixuc'a̱' wo' qui̱b chiwach chi xa je' chic c'ahchi' quiyeb rilok'il nanca'n qui̱b.

Naxquicohlaj ribanaric reh chi'nchel re're' chi se'lbal reh, xquesaj wo' chic lok i cak moyic laj tz'ih chiri̱j eh naxquicoj wo' chic i riso' wilic nak chiri̱j, xquic'am je i Jesus chiri̱j lok i tinamit reh chi naricansjic ar wach curu̱s.

Nok ojic chic nca'n nah be̱h chi re' Jesus c'ahchi' ritehlam nah teleb riche'lal ro̱k ricurusil, re' take sol xquic'ul cok jenaj winak aj Sire̱ne xponic cho chiri̱j lok i tinamit Jerusalen. Re' aj sire̱ne re're' Simon ribihnal eh caja̱w i Lej ch'i̱l Ru̱po. Re' winak re're', xquitolej chi ritobjic i Jesus chi ritehljic je riche'lal ro̱k i curu̱s.
Chi je' aj re' xitik ju' ribe̱h i Jesus chi c'ahchi' ric'amaric je' cu'um take sol chipam i ye'a̱b “Co̱lcota” ribihnal re' ribihnej wo' chi “riBakil Na̱ Camnak”.

Ar aj ru' nok naquiyeb nak chic wach curu̱s, re' take sol xquiyew reh i Jesus chi naruq'uem nak i ha' tik'imaj ru̱c' ch'amsamaj ri̱s u̱wa xilacamaj ru̱c' ik'o̱m “Mi̱ra” ribihnal reh chi narikajic nak wach riti'quilal, xa re' la' ma' xuq'uej ta wo'.
