Chiri̱j chic ru' naxquesaj lok riso' i Jesus, re' take sol re're' xi'oquic chi rijap'aric i Jesus wach curu̱s eh nok wilic take je' re' c'ahchi'que̱b, wilic wo' take p'uht quik'ijem ri̱j riso' chi quiwach, ilbal reh haj wilic reh riso' naquehtric chi quiju'junal.
Re' rijap'aric i Jesus wach curu̱s xbanjic je' na beleje̱b o̱ra reh k'i̱j re're'.

Chiwach i curu̱s ma' naht ta tok china̱ i Jesus, re' take sol xquicoj jenaj rehtalil re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' chaj bih aj chiri̱j naxjap'aric wach curu̱s. Re' rehtalil re're' je' wili rik'or chiwach: “Re' wili quik'atal k'oric take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, nqui rik'or.

Je' wo', ar chi riche̱l i Jesus re' take sol, xquipahba̱' wo' quib chic chi curu̱s re' xijap'aric wi̱' quib chi aj lek'. Jenaj queh xcojoric wach curu̱s pa nisec'a̱j je eh re' jenaj chic xquicoj je pa ritz'e̱t.

Ru̱c' rijap'aric i Jesus wach curu̱s, xmanlajic wach i tz'ihmbimaj cahnok chipam Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios. Ar rik'or chi je' wili: “Re're' xcojoric pan quiman take aj mahc, nqui rik'or.

Chi quixilac take c'acharel qui'iq'uic je ma' naht ta re' jap'lic wi̱' i Jesus wach curu̱s, q'uihal queh nquitz'ujlom johtok eh nquic'uhtaj chi je' re' nok xa banoj chic ri̱b quik'ab. Je' wo', je' wili nquik'or johtok reh: «Re' hat re' tik'oric chi enayoj i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios eh chi xa chiwach chic xib k'i̱j enajohsaj wo' chic rijelow-bal,
chaco'lej awi̱b chipam i ti'c'axic wilca̱t wi̱'. Wi til coric k'uru' chi re' hat, hat rAc'u̱n i Dios chac'uhtaj keh chi je' re' ru̱c' akajic cho wach curu̱s, nqui take.

Je' wo' take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, je' wili nquik'or chi quiwach chi xa se'lbal pan nak' wach: «Re' take toco̱m chic c'acharel xico'lej take cho chipam quic'axquilal eh tz'a̱b ru' chi ribil ri̱b ma' c'ahchi' ta rico'lem ri̱b chipam i ti'c'axic wilic wi̱'.

Re' hat xak'or chi re' hat i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi kana̱ hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, maje'? Wi til aj coric chi je' re', tikajen cho wach curu̱s reh chi nok re' hoj enkilow re're' ewo' nkacoj awach i hat, nqui take reh. Je' wo' take aj lek' xijap'aric wach curu̱s ar chi riche̱l i Jesus, jenaj queh ru' xoquic chi ritz'ujuric ru'.
Naxponic cablaj o̱ra reh k'i̱j re're', xoquic cho k'ekom wach ac'al cu rehtal xponic je' na q'uisi̱n ma' xib o̱ra risoljic i k'i̱j.

Ar aj ru' nok q'uisi̱n na chic ma' riban xib o̱ra re' Jesus nok q'uisi̱n chic ma' nquimic je, xk'oric ru̱c' ansil naxik'or chi je' wili pan k'oric hewre̱yo: «Eloyih, Eloyih, la̱ma sawacta̱ni? nqui xik'or. Re' k'oric re're', re' tz'ihmbimaj wo' cho pan Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios, je' wili ra̱j rik'orom: “Lok' laj wAja̱w Dios, chaj wa'ric nwic'raj chi xinacana̱' chi wutquel chipam i ti'c'axic wili? nqui ra̱j rik'orom.

Chi quixilac take c'acharel xibirinic reh k'oric xiban i Jesus, wilic take je' wili xquik'or: «Chabiraj tak, re' wili re' aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios, re' Eli̱yas ribihnal c'ahchi' rik'o'rem johtok chi naric'ulic tobjok chipam ric'axquilal, nqui take.

Ar aj ru' jenaj queh sol xo̱j ric'ahmaj jenaj mi̱x, ximuh pan ch'amsamaj laj ri̱s u̱wa eh naxipix chi ju' jenaj caxlan a̱j, xiyew nak johtok reh Jesus chi naritz'ubem so' reh chi to'bal reh chipam riti'quilal, xa re' la' wilic take xipitbic reh sol re're' chi je' wili: «Chacana̱', chiban pe ar maj wi xato'bej ma' eta chic nkilow wi enc'ulic kahsjok wach curu̱s ru'um Eli̱yas, nqui take reh.
Chiri̱j chic ru', re' Jesus xiq'uer johtok chi̱' chi cow eh xelic ruxla̱b.
Xa chiwach aj wo' junc'am re're', re' tz'ih poybal cok wach i lok' laj ye'a̱b wilic chipam i pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios xwek yejal, cu china̱ xip'ut cho wekic cu xponic jok chi ro̱k.
Je' wo', re' c'amol quibe̱h take sol re' wilic ma' naht ta cok ru̱c' i Jesus, je' wili xik'or naxilow i riquimic ru': «Re' winak wili til po' wo' nchel coric chi rAc'u̱n i Dios, nqui xik'or.

Naxquimic i Jesus wilic wo' ju'jun chi ixok c'ahchi' quilom je chi naht i ricansjic xbanaric. Chi quixilac take ixok re're', wilque̱b wo' ar i Mari̱ya aj Majta̱la, re' Salomeh ch'i̱l wo' i Mari̱ya re' ritu̱t i Jesus eh ritu̱t wo' i Chep ch'i̱l i Jaco̱wo re' ro̱x ac'un.
Re' aj take ixok re're' xquito'bej i Jesus ru̱c' ricamaj naxwih'ic cho ar Calile̱ya eh chi ritahkaljic i Jesus xi'o̱j wo' chiri̱j ar Jerusalen.
Ru'um chi xoquic chic cho xik'ek eh xponic chic ri'orahil nok re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel nkatik'a̱' ki̱b chi ric'uluric i k'i̱j re' kojhi'ilic wi̱',

jenaj winak aj Arimate̱ya Chep ribihnal, re' k'e̱' lo̱k' riwa'ric chi quiwach take rich aj nahsil aj no'jbal chi quixilac take ra̱' ri'sil cho i ma' Israhel, xponic ar ru̱c' i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to. Re' winak wili, re' wilic chi quixilac take c'acharel c'ahchi' cuy'em rik'ijil nok re' Dios naricojom chi K'atal K'oric i pahbamaj ru'um, maj reht'alim chi re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ma' riyew ta k'ab chi encahnic wach curu̱s i riti'jolal jeno' hab wach ncansjic je. Je' re' nok xicowej ric'ux chi ripahkaljic k'ab reh Po̱nsyo Pila̱to chi narikahsam cho riti'jolal i Jesus ar wach curu̱s reh chi narimuk'a̱b je.

Naxibiraj i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to chi re' Jesus xquimic chic, k'e̱' naxsahchic ric'ux eh ru'um re' xitak'a̱' ric'amjic je i c'amol quibe̱h take sol c'ahchi' quicha'janic reh i Jesus ar chiwach cok i curu̱s, reh chi naribiram reh wi til wo' coric chi xquimic chic i Jesus.
Naxibiraj ricorquil chi re' Jesus camnak chic, re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to xiyew k'ab chi re' riti'jolal i Jesus narikahsjic cho wach curu̱s eh chi nariye'eric je reh i ma' Chep.

Nok pononak chic re' wilic wi̱' riti'jolal Jesus ar wach curu̱s, re' ma' Chep xikahsaj cho riti'jolal i Jesus eh xibotej pan jenaj tz'ih lok'o̱j ru'um. Chiri̱j chic ru', xo̱j rimuk'a̱' pan jenaj muk'unbal tik'imaj ru'um pan jenaj ma' laj abaj. Ar ru̱c' i muk'unbal wili wilic wo' jenaj ma' laj coten abaj re' tik'imaj chi tz'apbal wo' chi̱' i muk'unbal re're'. Je' re' nok re' wo' abaj re're' xcojoric chi tz'apbal chi̱' i muk'unbal re're' nok cojo̱j chic cho ar i riti'jolal i Jesus.
Ar ma' naht ta ru̱c' i muk'unbal re're', re' Mari̱ya aj Majta̱la ch'i̱l wo' i Mari̱ya re' ritu̱t i Chep re' richa̱k' i Jesus, xiponic chi ricojoric rehtal haj xmuk'unjic i Jesus ru'um ma' Chep.

Xa re' wo' ti xponic waki̱b o̱ra reh xik'ek re' ncux'ic wi̱' i hi'lbal k'i̱j, re' Mari̱ya aj Majta̱la, ch'i̱l Salomeh eh ch'i̱l wo' Mari̱ya re' ritu̱t Jaco̱wo re' ricab richa̱k' i Jesus, xi'o̱j chi rilok'oric jenaj nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m buch'bal riti'jolal i Jesus.

Naxsak'ic lok reh Tomincu' k'i̱j re' pe̱t k'i̱j reh xama̱na chi keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, xa cu suksuk wo' ti relic cho i k'i̱j re' take xib chi ixok re're' xquic'am je nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m eh xi'o̱j cu re' muklic cho wi̱' i Jesus.
Nok behic chic nca'n je, xi'oquic chi ribirmijic chi quiwach chi hab wo' wach narito'bonic queh chi ric'uyu'sjic lok i ma' laj abaj ntz'apbic chi̱' i muk'unbal,
xa re' la' naxi'o̱j c'olok ar, xquilow chi re' ma' laj abaj re're' c'uyu'sumaj chic lok.

Chi tehlic chic chi̱' i muk'unbal, xi'oquic cok chipam eh nok wilque̱b chic cok ar xquilow wach jenaj q'uijol re' tz'uklic cho chi ricorquil je pan quisec'a̱j take ixok re're'. Re' riso' i q'uijol wili xa nim chic ro̱k eh xa nrepretic chic risakil. Re' take ixok re're' yohbal wach naxiyo'jic ru'um.

Ar aj ru', re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios je' wili xik'or queh take ixok re're': «Ma' tiyo'jic tak ru'um chi wilqui̱n ayu'. Re' hat-tak xatc'ulic nak tak lok ayu' chi risiq'uiric i Jesus re' ribihnej chi aj Nasaret, maje'? Coric, re're' xcansjic wach curu̱s xa re' la' ma'xta chic ayu' ru'um nok xuctic chic chi quixilac take camnak. Quim tak k'uru', toque̱n tak cho pa rimuk'unbal eh chawilow tak chi ma'xta chic ayu'.

Yu'na chi xawilow tak chic chi coric re' xnik'or aweh tak, hiy chaloq'uej awi̱b tak chi ojic cu̱c' take awich aj tahkanel tak eh chak'or tak queh chi re' Jesus xuctic chic chi quixilac take camnak. Je' wo', chak'or tak queh chi nachimol ri̱b awu̱c' tak ar pa riyuk'ul i Calile̱ya, re're' pe̱t narojic chawach tak eh ar na̱rakam awi̱b tak rich'i̱l je' ricab wo' rik'orom cho aweh tak nok ja' ncansjic ta nak. Chi'nchel i wili curman chi til nareht'alim wo' i Luch. Je' re' nok til chak'or wo' tak reh ru', nqui queh.

Chi je' re' ajic re' take ixok re're' xi'o̱j cajim chi rik'ormojic i nic' pa' nimal xk'ormojic je queh. Re' take re' chi xa yo'jic chic wilque̱b naxi'elic cho chipam i muk'unbal eh ru'um re're' nok ojic nca'n, ma' hab ta wach aj eh je' ru̱c' xquic'ul je wach be̱h, xquik'or re' xquibiraj eh xquilow cho pan muk'unbal re're'.

Nok uctunak aj chic cho Jesus chi quixilac take camnak chipam i Tomincu' k'i̱j, re' Mari̱ya aj Majta̱la, re're' i pe̱t be̱h chi rilmijic wach i Jesus naxic'uhtaj ri̱b reh cu wahk'ek ti. Re' Mari̱ya wili ru̱c' aj wo' re' xesmejic lok ru'um i Jesus take wuku̱b chi ma' tob laj uxlabal re' nchoponic nak na̱ ric'acharic.

Je' re' ajic nok rilom chic wach i Jesus, xo̱j cu̱c' take aj tahkanel tzoklic quiwach pan jenaj ye'a̱b re' ok'ic nak nca'n wi̱' ru'um riti'quilal quic'ux chiri̱j riquimic i Jesus eh ar xik'or queh chi re' Jesus c'achlic wo' chic,
xa re' la' naxik'or i Mari̱ya chi re' Jesus c'achlic wo' chic eh chi til xilow wach ru', re' take re' ma' xquicoj ta wach reh.

Chi je' aj wo' re', re' Jesus xic'uhtaj wo' chic ri̱b chi quiwach take qui̱b chic chi raj tahkanel ojic nca'n pan quipa̱t ar chiri̱j lok i tinamit Jerusalen, xa re' la', ru'um chi toco̱m chic riwi̱' rilbal naxic'uhtaj ri̱b, ma' xquina'bej ta wach chi re' po' nchel i Jesus xic'uhtaj ri̱b queh.

Naxquirak chiri̱j chi re' po' nchel i Jesus xquilow wach, re' take re' xisoljic wo' chic je ar Jerusalen chi rik'ormojic queh quich'i̱l chi xquilow wach i Jesus chi c'achlic wo' chic, xa re' la' ru' re' take re' xa ta wo' nak chi je' re' xquicoj wach chi xc'acharic wo' chic cho.

Chiri̱j aj chic chi'nchel re're', re' Jesus ruhmumaj chic cok chi quiwach take junlaj chi raj tahkanel nok tzokolque̱b chi wi'c nca'n. Ar aj ru' re're' xinak take ru'um reh ricowil quic'ux re' xbanic queh chi ma' xquicoj ta wach chaj bih xk'ormojic queh. Je' re' xiban maj naxk'ormojic queh cu'um take xi'ilbic reh chi c'achlic chic naxuctic cho chi quixilac camnak, ma'xta bih xquicoj wach.

Nok ojic chic johtok reh Jesus pan taxa̱j, je' wili xik'or queh take junlaj chi raj tahkanel: «Re' hin tinitak'a̱' tak chi nawojic tak cu̱c' chi'nchel tinamit chi junsut wach ac'al eh chak'or tak queh i niC'uhbal re' nye'bic sukquil c'uxlis, reh chi enquicoj wach.

«Til nik'or aweh tak chi xa hab pa' wach ericoj wach niC'uhbal, re're' narico'ljic ru'um i Dios chiwach i take ti'c'axic nariye'eric chi quina̱ take aj mahc. Re' naricojbic wach niC'uhbal, chatak'a̱' wo' tak reh chi kahsjok riha̱', tz'a̱b ru' hab pa' wach ma' eta ricoj wach niC'uhbal, re're' narich'ukuric k'oric china̱ ru'um i Dios chi naric'ulum ti'c'axic, nqui queh.

Je' wo', xik'or wo' queh chi je' wili: «Re' take quicojbic wach niC'uhbal je' wili take lok' laj nawa̱l naca'nam: Ru̱c' rinimal wach wajawric naniyeb queh, re' take re' naquesam take lok ma' tob laj uxlabal nchopbic na̱ quic'acharic take c'acharel. Je' wo', naquicholic wo' k'oric pan toco̱m chic k'oric.

Wi jeno' a̱k' je' ru̱c' k'e̱' wo' chic riqui̱ chi cansanic, eritiw take on wi xye'eric queh chi uc'jic jeno' ik'o̱m ncansanic, re' take re' ma'xta wo' wi̱' naroquic queh. Ma' xa re' ta re', je' la' wo' naca'n quiti̱j chiri̱j jeno' yowa̱b, ewo' nelic lok riya'bilal i c'acharel re're' naquicoj i quik'ab china̱, nqui queh.

Nok k'oro̱j chic chi'nchel re're' queh take raj tahkanel i Jesus, cu re' aj ru' re' Dios xiban chi re' Jesus xc'amaric johtok pan taxa̱j re' xye'eric wi̱' reh jenaj rinimal rilok'il ru'um i Dios je' ricab rilok'il ric'ul jeno' c'acharel nanye'eric reh chi ntz'uhkic cok pa nisec'a̱j jeno' k'atal k'oric.

Chiri̱j chic re' xponic wo' k'i̱j chi re' take raj tahkanel i Jesus xi'elic je chipam tinamit Jerusalen eh xi'o̱j wo' chi c'uhbalanic xa haj yu̱k' q'uixca̱b. Je' re' nca'n chi c'ahchi' quitobjic ru'um i Ajabe̱s Jesus chi ribanaric take rehreh wach i lok' laj nawa̱l re' ncamanic chi c'uhtbal chi quiwach take c'acharel chi re' take raj tahkanel i Jesus, re' wo' i coric laj c'uhbal c'ahchi' quik'orom ribiral. Re' wili ribiral ncohlsjic wi̱' wach i hu̱j wili.

Ajabe̱s ma' Teyo̱pilo, q'uih wo' take aj tz'ihminel xquiyew quic'ux chi ritz'ihmjic chi chaklic chi̱' chaj bih xiban i Jesus chi kaxilac i hoj raj tahkanel. Re' xquitz'ihmbaj take aj tz'ihmenel re're', re' hoj keht'alim chi til coric
maj nic' pa' wach xquitz'ihmbaj ru' je' wo' re' xkabiraj cu̱c' take pahbamaj chi rik'ormojic nic' wach ric'uhtunic i Jesus, re' take xi'ilbic wo' cho reh nic' wach naxip'ut cho ricamaj.

Je' re' k'uru' ajabe̱s ma' Teyo̱pilo, je' ricab xca'n nic' nimal take aj tz'ihminel reh chaj bih xiban i Jesus, re' hin xasjic cho pa nic'ux chi nanitz'ihmbam je aweh ribiral i Jesus chi chaklic chi̱' je' ricab nic' pa' wach xnirak chiri̱j ru̱c' i tijinic xnitok'a̱' cho cu ru̱c' ch'iquinbal cho reh ric'acharic.
Je' aj re' ru' yu'na c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh re' xnirak chiri̱j, reh chi je' re' encowjic ac'ux chiri̱j ricorquilal i tijinic c'uhtumaj aweh chiri̱j i Jesus.

Pa rik'ijil cho Hero̱res nok wilic ar pa riyuk'ul i Jure̱ya chi raj to'o̱l i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma, xwih'ic cho jenaj aj k'ahsem quisi̱ i tinamit chiwach i Dios Sacari̱yas ribihnal, je' ru̱c' quicomonil take aj k'ahsem si̱ Awi̱yas quibihnal. Re' rehq'ue̱n i Sacari̱yas Elisawet ribihnal eh ra̱' ri'sil cho i pe̱t aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios A̱ron ribihnal.
Re' take quib re're' coric wach quic'ux chiwach i Dios eh ma'xta bih equik'iliric wi̱' maj nquinimej chi coric riC'uhbal i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Dios ye'o̱j reh Moyses.
To̱b ta je' re' riwi̱' quino'jbal, ma'xta nak quiha'lac'u̱n ru'um chi re' Elisawet ma' re' ta ac'unom laj ixok eh yu'na xirejbic chic chi ma'xta quiha'lac'u̱n.
Junpech ajic nok camanic riban i Sacari̱yas chi k'ahsanic si̱ chiwach i Dios ru'um re' chic i comonil wilic wi̱' xoquic chi camanic chipam Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios,

re' take ricomonil re're' je' ricab cocsam wi̱' qui̱b, xi'oquic chi rik'ijiljic ri̱j hab wach naric'atbic reh se̱nsa chiwach i Dios eh tz'eht xkajic china̱ i Sacari̱yas. Chi je' aj re' xoquic cok chi camanic chipam lok' laj ye'a̱b nc'ataric wi̱' i se̱nsa chiwach i Dios.
Nok re' Sacari̱yas je' re' c'ahchi' ribanam cok ar eh re' take riq'uihal c'acharel ti̱j nca'n lok ar chiri̱j i pa̱t re're',
cu re' pe' chic reh ru' jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Ajabe̱s Dios ruhmumaj chic cok chiwach ar chipam i ye'a̱b re're' eh xpah'ic je pan sec'aj reh i lok' laj ye'a̱b c'atbal se̱nsa.
Naxilow i Sacari̱yas chi je' re', yohbal wach naxyo'jic

xa re' la' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios je' wili xik'or reh: «Ma' tiyo'jic Sacari̱yas maj re' Dios xtak'anic cho wi̱n chi rik'ormojic aweh chi xibiraj cho ati̱j abanam johtok chiwach. Chi je' aj re' yu'na nik'or aweh chi re' awehq'ue̱n Elisawet nariwih'ic jenaj riha'lac'u̱n eh re' ha'lac'un re're' Wa̱n ribihnal na̱cojom.
Je' wo' chic, ru̱c' rasjic aha'lac'u̱n re're' yohbal wach tinamit naca̱t quihch'ilem ru̱c' risukquil ac'ux tak nariwih'ic.

Re' ricamaj naribanam, awac'u̱n re're' lo̱k' riwa'ric naribanam chiwach i Dios ru'um reh ricamaj naribanam chiwach. Je' wo', ru'um ricamaj re're' ma' ne'el ikal naruq'uem i ha' nxohc'sonic. Ru̱c' ru' nariwih'ic i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios chi cu ja' nc'ulic ta wo' wach sakom.

«Ru̱c' i c'uhbalanic naribanam awac'u̱n, yohbal wach take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel naquichopom wo' chic quic'ux chiri̱j rinimjic Ajabe̱s Dios re' lok'omaj wach cu'um take awich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel quibirinic k'oric chiwach.

Je' aj wili naribanam i awac'u̱n: Je' ricab nok xye'eric rik'orbal i Eli̱yas ru'um Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios, je' wo' re' nariye'eric rajawric rik'orbal awac'u̱n ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal. Re're' pe̱t narasjic chiwach i Ajabe̱s re' Dios wo' riwi̱' eh nariyeb rehtal queh take tinamit chi naric'ulic lok. Chiri̱j re', ru̱c' ric'uhbalanic naribanam re' take c'acharel naquijalam wach quino'jbal reh chi tikilque̱b chic take chi ric'uluric i Ajabe̱s re' Dios riwi̱'. Je' wo' chic, ru'um reh i c'uhbalanic naribanam awac'u̱n, re' take tutbe̱s ajabe̱s ma' nquic'ax ta chic cac'u̱n quixk'u̱n naquic'axam wo' chic take eh re' take ac'un ixk'un re' ma' nquiyohbalej ta chic wach quitu̱t caja̱w, naquitijem wo' chic riyohbaljic quiwach je' ricab nca'n take quiniminic reh Dios, nqui raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios.

Chalic i Sacari̱yas je' wili xik'or: «Nic' wach nanweht'alij chi coric i xak'or wi̱n? maj eht'alamaj chi re' hin ma' eta chic nwih'ic niha'lac'u̱n ch'i̱l wehq'ue̱n ru'um hin chic rijeb winak eh rijeb ixok wo' chic i wehq'ue̱n, nqui reh raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios.

Chalic raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios je' wili xik'or reh: «Re' hin, hin Cawriyel lo̱k' nilok'il wilqui̱n cok chiwach i Dios chi re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch. Je' re' nok chacoj wach i xnik'or aweh maj re' wo' i Dios xtak'anic cho wi̱n chi rik'ormojic aweh i ato̱b laj k'oric wili

re' ma' nacoj ta pe wach. Ru'um aj chi je' re' xa'n, yu'na nanibanam chi na̱cahnic me̱m. Cu rehtal chic narasjic aha'lac'u̱n cu re' aj chic ru' na̱k'oric maj re' xik'or i Dios til naribanam naponok wach rik'ijil, nqui raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios.

Nok je' re' c'ahchi' ric'uluric cok chipam i lok' laj ye'a̱b nc'ataric wi̱' se̱nsa, re' take tinamit uyunic nca'n lok rij pa̱t je' wili nquik'or chi quiwach: «Chaj wo' bih richam cho wi̱' ri̱b aj k'ahsem si̱ ma' Sacari̱yas chipam cok lok' laj ye'a̱b re're'? nqui nquik'or. Je' re' nquik'or ru'um nok c'ahchi' cuy'em chi narelic cho chi quicuse'sjic take.

Raj la' naxelic cho ma' Sacari̱yas memrenak chic, ma' xchol ta chic k'oric cu̱c' take tinamit uyunic nca'n lok chiwach i junc'am re're', xa ru̱c' la' chic nah k'ab xic'uhtaj queh chaj bih xic'ul cok ar. Xa chi je' chic re' naxquirak chiri̱j chi re' Dios wilic xic'uhtaj reh Sacari̱yas chipam lok' laj ye'a̱b re're'.
Chiri̱j aj chic ru' naxicohlaj je wach jarub k'i̱j naribanam ricamaj chiwach i Dios, re' Sacari̱yas cu re' chic xo̱j pa ripa̱t.
Chiri̱j wili, re' Elisawet re' rehq'ue̱n ma' Sacari̱yas xcahnic chi yowa̱b ixok chic eh ho'o̱b poh ma' xelic ta chic pa ripa̱t chi ricapewjic ri̱j i xiban i Dios ru̱c'. Re' wili rik'or pa ric'ux:

«Ru̱c' i c'axo̱j xiban wi̱n wili chi riye'eric cho jenaj niha'lac'u̱n, re' Dios c'ahchi'qui̱n resam chipam i q'uixbilal wilqui̱n nak wi̱' chi quiwach i tinamit chi ma' nwih'ic ta niha'lac'u̱n ch'i̱l nibahil, nqui pa ric'ux.
Nok waki̱b chic poh wilic reh Elisawet chi yowa̱b ixok, re' Ajabe̱s Dios xitak'a̱' wo' chic cho raj tz'e' wa̱ch Cawriyel pan tinamit Nasaret ribihnal re' wilic pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya.

Ar xitak'a̱' cho ru̱c' jenaj k'ahxok Mari̱ya ribihnal re' ma' wih'inak ta ru̱c' winak xa re' la' pahkamaj chic chiwach ritu̱t raja̱w ru'um jenaj ac'un re' Chep ribihnal ra̱' ri'sil cho k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy.

Re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios, naxoquic cok pa ripa̱t i Mari̱ya, xic'alenej eh je' wili xik'or reh: «K'e̱' ato̱b aweh hat Mari̱ya! Je' re' nik'or maj chi quixilac take chi'nchel ixok re' hat xatrichih i Ajabe̱s Dios chi na̱c'axmajic. Ru'um aj re', re' Dios xa awu̱c' wo' nariwih'ic chi atobjic, nqui raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios reh.
Naxibiraj chi je' re', re' Mari̱ya xsahchic ric'ux eh je' wili xik'or pa ric'ux: «Chaj wa'ric narik'or wi̱n chi je' re'? nqui pa ric'ux.
Chiri̱j re're', re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh: «Mari̱ya, ma' ticapewenic chi ma' nim ta ti awach maj chiwach i Dios yu'na re' hat nim chic awach ru'um i camanic na̱banam.
Je' re' nok re' hat na̱cahnic chi yowa̱b ixok chic eh nariwih'ic jenaj awac'u̱n re' na̱bihnem chi Jesus.

Re' awac'u̱n wili nim rilok'il nariye'eric maj re' Dios re' k'e̱' rinimal rajawric til re' wili wac'u̱n nqui narik'orom. Ru̱c' re're', re' Dios nariyeb wo' rajawric chi k'atal k'oric chi quina̱ take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, je' ricab naxiyew cho rajawric i aj najtir k'i̱j, re' ma' Tawiy.

Je' re' ajic, re' awac'u̱n nariye'eric rajawric eh re' ricamaj nariye'eric, ma' jaruj ta chic naricux'ic wach maj re're' narik'atam k'oric chi junelic chi quina̱ take ra̱' ri'sil cho i ma' Jacow, nqui raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios.
Chalic i Mari̱ya je' wili xik'or reh i raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios: «Nic' wach naquincahnok chi hin yowa̱b ixok maj re' hin ma' hin ta wih'inak ru̱c' winak? nqui reh.

Re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh: «Re' Dios re' k'e̱' rinimal rajawric, re're' naribanic chi je' re' nachiyew cho chana̱ i Lok' laj rUxlabal. Ru'um aj re' na̱sjok i ac'un wili, re' tinamit naquik'orom chi je' wili: “K'e̱' lo̱k' i rAc'u̱n i Dios wili, nqui naquik'orom, nqui reh Mari̱ya.

Chiri̱j chic re', re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xik'or wo' chic reh Mari̱ya chi je' wili: «Chacapaj i Elisawet re' awu̱c' cho, waki̱b chic poh cahnanak cho chi yowa̱b ixok. To̱b ta nak re' tinamit nquik'or chi ma' n-nac'ununic ta, nariwih'ic jenaj riha'lac'u̱n pa rirejbil.
Je' aj re' naric'uluric ru̱c' maj chiwach i Dios ma'xta bih c'axic chi banaric, nqui raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios.

Naxibiraj chi je' re', re' Mari̱ya je' wili xik'or: «Quincamanok aj chiwach i Ajabe̱s Dios eh chiban wu̱c' re' xak'or i hat, nqui xik'or reh. Xa re' wo' xicohlaj k'oric i Mari̱ya, xo̱j wo' chic i raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios.

Cu ja' naht ta wo' pononak cho aj tz'e' wa̱ch ru̱c' i Mari̱ya, re're' xitik'a̱' ri̱b eh xo̱j chi xa rajamem chic ri̱b chi rik'o'rjic i Elisawet chipam jenaj tinamit wilic johtok wach yu̱k' pa riyuk'ul Jure̱ya.
Naxponic chi chi̱' ripa̱t i Sacari̱yas xoquic cok ar eh xic'alenej Elisawet.
Xa re' la' wo' ti xic'alenjic ru', xip'ut ti cho c'uyu'jic riha'lac'u̱n. Ar ajic xchalic i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios xichop na̱ ric'acharic i Elisawet.
Je' re' nok xa suk chic pa ric'ux xik'or chi je' wili: «Re' po' nchel hat Mari̱ya. Nim alok'il ye'o̱j chi quiwach chi'nchel take ixok eh re' aha'lac'u̱n awihkam k'e̱' wo' nim rilok'il ye'o̱j!
K'e̱' wo' chic ac'axbal k'uru' chi xinchal ak'o'rej i hat ritu̱t i kAjabe̱s K'atal K'oric narasjic, nqui reh.

Chiri̱j wili, xik'or wo' chic reh: «Ru'um xnicoj rehtal xiban i niha'lac'u̱n, re' hin xnirak chiri̱j chi hat ritu̱t kAjabe̱s K'atal K'oric narasjic maj re' niha'lac'u̱n xip'ut ti cho c'uyu'jic ru'um risukquil ric'ux naxibiraj i c'alenenic xa'n wi̱n.
Je' aj re' k'uru' je' ricab naxsukbic ric'ux niha'lac'u̱n je' wo' re' sukbok ac'ux i hat Mari̱ya ru'um chi xacoj wach chi narimanlajic wach awu̱c' re' xik'or aweh i Ajabe̱s Dios, nqui Elisawet reh.
Naxibiraj chi je' re' i Mari̱ya je' wili xik'or: «Re' hin nanik'orom chi re' Dios k'e̱' nimal rajawric
eh k'e̱' wo' narisukbic nic'ux ru̱c' kAja̱w Dios re' waj co'lonel.

Je' re' nik'or maj to̱b ta ma' nim ta ti niwach, xirichih chi nanicamanic chiwach. Ru'um aj reh i nim laj c'axo̱j re're', yu'na johtok chi kawach re' tinamit naquik'orom chi k'e̱' wo' chic ato̱b wi̱n,
maj naquilom chi re' Dios re' xi̱c' na̱ rajawric k'e̱' nimal ato'bil xiban wu̱c'. Je' wo', naquik'orom chi re' Dios k'e̱' lo̱k' ribihnal.
Je' re' narik'ormojic chiri̱j maj re're' til riquetelej wo' quiwach take nquiyohbalej wach
eh ru̱c' rajawric yohbal wach camanic riban, je' ricab chi re' take nquinimsaj qui̱b re' nquik'or pan quic'ux chi xi̱c' na̱ cajawric, riban chi nsacharic quiwach,
on chi re' take nimak wach quilok'il chi k'atal k'oric nmak'aric cajawric eh queh chic take ma'xta cajawric nye'eric,
on je' ricab chi re' rinimal ric'axbal i Dios ma' re' ta chic queh take wilic chi'nchel queh nye'eric, queh la' chic take ma'xta bih wilic queh nye'eric.
Je' wo' ku̱c' i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, re' Dios xa naco̱j wo' rito'bem chi nakacamanic chiwach maj ma' ja' iq'uinak ta pa ric'ux rik'orbal chi nariquetelem kawach,
re' rik'orom cho queh kama̱m kati't chi je' wili: “Re' hin xniquetelej wach i Awraham eh xa na wo' niquetelem quiwach take ra̱' ri'sil, nqui rik'orom cho, nqui Mari̱ya.
Chiri̱j chic ru', re' Mari̱ya xcahnic ru̱c' Elisawet eh xib na poh xiban ar. Cu re' aj chic ru', xsoljic wo' chic cho pa ripa̱t.
Naxponic rik'ijil chi narasjic riha'lac'u̱n i Elisawet, jenaj wo' ac'un xilow wach.

Re' Elisawet ch'i̱l i Sacari̱yas k'e̱' naxsukbic quic'ux ru̱c' quiha'lac'u̱n eh re' take rica'ja̱ ch'i̱l take pa' cho queh Sacari̱yas ch'i̱l Elisawet k'e̱' wo' xsukbic quic'ux naxquina'bej chi re' Dios k'e̱' rinimal c'axo̱j xiban ru̱c' Elisawet.

Chiri̱j re', xponic rik'ijil chi naresmejic lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ric'achanbal i ha'lac'un je' ricab ocronak take wi̱' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi ribanaric ru̱c' quiha'lac'u̱n pa riwahxak k'i̱j, xic'ulic lok take quica'ja̱ ch'i̱l take pa' cho queh Sacari̱yas ch'i̱l Elisawet eh nok wilque̱b chic ar, p'uht quik'o'rem cok i t'uch ha'lac'un ru̱c' ribihnal raja̱w. —Sacari̱yas, nqui nca'n cok reh.
—Ma' je' ta re' ribihnal. Wa̱n ru' ribihnal, nqui Elisawet queh.
—Nic' wach nachiban chi je' re', ma' hab ta jeno' wach Wa̱n ribihnal chaxilac tak? nqui take reh.
Je' re' nok re' take c'acharel re're' p'uht quibiram cok reh i Sacari̱yas ru̱c' nah quik'ab chaj bih naribihnem i rac'u̱n.
Re' Sacari̱yas xipahkaj queh jenaj tz'ihmbal eh je' wili xitz'ihmbaj chiwach: «Wa̱n ribihnal, nqui xitz'ihmbaj. Naxquilow chi je' re' ribihnal, chi'nchel cahtzic quiwach.
Xa chipam aj wo' ti junc'am re', xteh wo' chic rik'orbal i Sacari̱yas eh xa re' wo' ti xteh rik'orbal, xilok'ej ti johtok i Dios chi pe̱t.

Chiri̱j aj chic re' naxisoljic wo' chic je pan quitinami̱t, re' take wilque̱b ponok ru̱c' i Sacari̱yas, xquesaj lok ribiral cu̱c' quica'ja̱ chipam riyuk'ul i Jure̱ya chiri̱j i chaj bih xic'ul i Sacari̱yas. Chi'nchel take ca'ja̱ xibirinic reh xsahchic quic'ux
eh ru'um naxquirak chiri̱j chi re' riha'lac'u̱n i Sacari̱yas pan k'ab i Ajabe̱s Dios wilic, je' wili p'uht quik'orom pan quic'ux: «Chaj wo' jaric ricamaj naribanam i ha'lac'un re're'? nqui take.
Je' re' k'uru' naxteh wo' rik'orbal i Sacari̱yas, je' wili i tioxonic xiban nok re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios xichop na̱ ric'acharic:
«Hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel kayew tak rilok'il i kAja̱w Dios maj yu'na wilic wo' chic ku̱c' eh chi co'lbal keh hoj ritinami̱t,
c'ahchi' riyeb chi asjic jenaj Ajabe̱s yohbal wach rajawric. Re' Ajabe̱s wili ra̱' ri'sil cho i k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy, re're' narico'lonic keh chi quiwach take quixowonic kawach,
je' ricab xik'or cho i Dios chi naribanam. Re' rik'orom cho Dios, re' i quik'orom cho take lok' laj raj k'orol c'uhbal najtir k'i̱j naxquik'or cho chi je' wili:
“Re' Dios naco̱j rico'lem pan quik'ab take kaj ixowonel re' take xa chajaric nca̱j ca'nam keh, nqui take cho.

«Re' Dios k'uru' c'ahchi' riyeb cho keh jenaj ajabe̱s yohbal wach rajawric reh chi narimanlajic wach i k'oric rik'orom cho queh kama̱m kati't chi je' wili: “Re' hin naniquetelem awach tak, nqui cho queh. «Je' wo', re' Dios c'ahchi' riyeb cho keh i Ajabe̱s re're' reh chi narimanlajic wach i lok' laj tik'inic ribanam cho ru̱c' Awraham, naxiyew cho rik'orbal chi je' wili: “Re' hin ma' jaruj ta nariq'uic pa nic'ux quico'ljic take awa̱' awi'sil chiwach caj ixowonel,
nqui cho queh naxiyew cho rik'orbal reh ma' Awraham. «Je' re' ajic ru̱c' riye'eric cho k'ab chi kana̱
chi kaco'ljic chiwach take kaj ixowonel, re' Dios c'ahchi' ribanam chi re' hoj ma' eta chic kojyo'jic chi quiwach take kaj ixowonel chi rilok'onjic wach kAja̱w Dios.
Re're' c'ahchi' wo' ribanam chi echic nkalok'ej wach chi junelic ru̱c' coric laj no'jbal, nqui Sacari̱yas.

Chiri̱j re' je' wili i k'oric xik'or reh t'uch rac'u̱n: «Re' chic i hat wac'u̱n, reh chi re' ritinami̱t i Ajabe̱s K'atal K'oric asjic reh tikilque̱b ok chi ric'ulic, re' hat pe̱t na̱wojic ayeb rehtal queh ric'ulic. Ru'um aj re', re' Dios re' k'e̱' nimal rajawric je' wili narik'orom chawi̱j: ‹Re' wili aj k'orol niC'uhbal i hin, nqui narik'orom i Dios.

«Natiwih'ok cu̱c' take tinamit, re' take re' naquina'bem wo' riwi̱' nic' wach naquico'ljok chiwach caj ixowonel, maj reh chi equico'ljic chi wach caj ixowonel, re' hat na̱k'orom queh chi riwi̱' chi queh chi enquicana̱' i c'ahbilal reh chi re' Dios naricuyum quimahc, nqui reh t'uch rac'u̱n.

Chiri̱j re're', je' wo' chic wili xik'or: «Yu'na k'uru' hoj tak chi'nchel ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, kalok'ej tak wach kaDios ru̱c' rinimal ric'axbal wilic cho chi kana̱. Re're' k'e̱' wo' chic kojric'ax chi ru̱c' ric'ulic lok ac'un wili, c'ahchi' wo' ritak'a̱b cho i kajco'lonel re' xa je' na ricab risakomil i sak'ic, naric'ulic wo' lok ku̱c' chi kasakomjic.

Re' kasakomjic naribanam xa je' ricab naquisakomjic take behel ru'um i k'i̱j naquicahnic pan k'ekom ak'ab chi xa yo'jic chic wilque̱b chi equicansjic. Ru̱c' ric'ulic lok i kajco'lonel wili k'uru', re' Dios c'ahchi' ribanam chi nakawih'ic wo' chic pan sukquil c'uxlis je' ricab nc'uluric cu̱c' take behel chi nok pan sakom chic wilque̱b naqui'esmejic cho pan k'ekom, nquitik ju' quibe̱h chi suk chic quic'ux, nqui Sacari̱yas.

Re' rac'u̱n i Sacari̱yas k'uru', rehreh xip'ut johtok q'uihic eh rehreh wo' xc'ulic lok rino'jbal. Nok yohbal chic wach rino'jbal naxwinakbic, ar xwih'ic pan tak ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel cu rehtal xponic k'i̱j chi xic'uhtaj ri̱b ru̱c' ricamaj queh take rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.

Nok re' Mari̱ya q'uisi̱n nak chic ma' nc'ulic ric'ux ru̱c' riha'lac'u̱n, manlic pe' re' k'atal k'oric wilic ar Ro̱ma re' Awu̱sto ribihnal je' wili xik'or: «Chiwach johtok take k'i̱j wili chatak'a̱' tak rik'ormojic pan tak tinamit chi qui'ajlajok nic' pa' q'uihal take c'acharel choplic quina̱ wu'um. Nitak'a̱' ribanaric i ajlanic re're' reh chi narimoloric i to̱j nbanaric reh Ro̱ma, nqui xik'or.

Re' ajlanic i̱b xitak'a̱' ribanaric i k'atal k'oric Awu̱sto, xnimjic cu'um take raj to'bonel i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma. Je' ricab ar Si̱rya, xnimjic i k'oric wili nok wilic chi raj to'bonel i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma re' winak Sire̱nyo ribihnal.
Naxponic aj i k'oric cu̱c' tinamit, chi'nchel xi'o̱j pa riyuk'ul quima̱m cati't reh chi naqui-ajlajic take ar.

Je' ricab i Chep re' wilic ar pan tinamit Nasaret ar pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya, ru'um chi ra̱' ri'sil cho i k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy xo̱j chi narajlajic ar pa riyuk'ul i Jure̱ya ar chipam i tinamit Welen ribihnal re' asjanak wi̱' i k'atal k'oric re're'.
Naxo̱j chipam i tinamit re're' reh chi narajlajic ar, xic'am je i Mari̱ya chiri̱j re' ripahkam chic chi rehq'ue̱n. Ru'um chi yowa̱b ixok chic ru'um rajawric i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios,
re' Mari̱ya naxiponic ar Welen, manlic pe' xo̱j c'olok ric'ux ar. Je' aj re' xc'uluric ru̱c' maj q'uisi̱n nak chic ma' nponic rik'ijil naxelic je ar Nasaret.

Je' re' nok naxc'ulic ric'ux ar Welen, jenaj wo' ac'un xilow wach ar pan jenaj quiwarbal wacax ru'um nok naxiponic chipam i tinamit re're' ma' xquirak ta chic jeno' pa̱t je' ru̱c' ncamanic chi ye'bal quiwarbal take behel. Re' Mari̱ya naxc'ulic ric'ux, xibotej pan quich i pe̱t rac'u̱n eh xiyoc'a̱' chi nariwiric pan jenaj riwa'bal wacax.
Chipam ak'ab re're', ar chiri̱j lok i tinamit Welen cu̱c' take nquicha'jej quime̱' pan tak chak'ab,

jenaj pe' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Ajabe̱s Dios ruhmumaj chic cok chi quiwach eh xisakomjic take ru'um risakomil rilbal re' xa je' chic ricab risakomil i Ajabe̱s Dios. Re' take re' naxquilow chi je' re', yohbal wach naxiyo'jic ru'um.

Re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios je' wili xik'or queh: «Ma' tiyo'jic tak. Chabiraj tak chi coric i holohic laj k'oric nanik'orom yu'na maj re' hat-tak k'e̱' nasukbok ac'ux tak ch'i̱l take tinamit nachabiraj tak i k'oric wili:
Ar chipam i tinamit asjanak wi̱' i k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy, chipam ak'ab yu'na xasjic i Ajabe̱s Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric re' narico'lonic aweh tak.

Reh aj chi na̱na'bem tak wach i ha'lac'un re're', re' wili nanik'orom aweh tak chi rehtalil: Ar pan jenaj riwa'bal wacax na̱rakam tak i ha'lac'un re're' botomaj pan quich ru'um ritu̱t, nqui i raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios.

Chiri̱j wili cu re' chic queh take aj cha'jem me̱', nquilow chi ruhmumaj chic take cok chi riche̱l i raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re're' juntuhm chic chi rich'i̱l. Re' take juntuhm re're' p'uht quitioxem johtok reh i Dios chi je' wili:

«Yu'na re' take c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al naquic'acharic chic pan sukquil c'uxlis, ru'um nok re' Dios k'e̱' raj chi suk laj c'acharic chic naca'nam. Katioxej aj tak johtok reh Dios wilic cho pan taxa̱j chi je' re' c'ahchi' ribanam cho cu̱c' take c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al, nqui take.

Xa re' wo' xquik'or re're', re' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Ajabe̱s Dios xi'o̱j wo' chic johtok pan taxa̱j. Chiri̱j wili re' take aj cha'jem me̱' je' wili xquik'or chi quiwach: «Kat'oclom tak ki̱b, tak-tak pan tinamit. Ar nakilom tak wach i ha'lac'un xasjic je' ricab xik'or i Dios ru̱c' quichi̱' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch, nqui take.
Je' re' nok re' take aj cha'jem me̱' re're' xa cajamem chic qui̱b xi'o̱j pan tinamit. Naxquirak i Chep ch'i̱l i Mari̱ya, xquilow chi re' ha'lac'un ar yoclic pa riwa'bal wacax.
Chiri̱j wili p'uht quik'orom queh take chi'nchel wilque̱b ar i nic' pa' nimal xk'ormojic queh chiri̱j i ha'lac'un re're'
eh k'e̱' xsahchic quic'ux naxquibiraj re' xquik'or take aj cha'jem me̱' re're'.
Re' Mari̱ya, naxibiraj re're', xoquic chi ricapewjic ri̱j chi'nchel i k'oro̱j reh eh ma'xta chic nsahchic pa ric'ux.

Je' aj re' naxisoljic cho take aj cha'jem me̱', xa c'ahchi' chic quitioxem johtok i Dios nah be̱h ru'um xquilow wach i ha'lac'un je' ricab xk'ormojic queh eh xquitioxej wo' johtok reh i Dios ru̱c' chi'nchel xquilow ch'i̱l xquibiraj cu̱c' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch.

Nok wahxaki̱b chic k'i̱j asjanak cho i quiha'lac'u̱n, re' Mari̱ya ch'i̱l i Chep xquicoj ribihnal i cac'u̱n chi Jesus, je' ricab k'oro̱j cho reh Mari̱ya ru'um raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios nok cu ja' yowa̱b ixok ta cho. Re' wili xca'n ribanaric chipam i k'i̱j naxesmejic lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ric'achanbal i t'uch ac'un re're'.

Chiri̱j chic ru' naxponic wach nic' nimal i k'i̱j k'oro̱j ru'um i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses nok sak chic wach i tutbe̱s ru̱c' rasjic riha'lac'u̱n, re' Mari̱ya ch'i̱l i Chep xi'o̱j ar Jerusalen re' xquic'am je wi̱' i Jesus re' pe̱t cac'u̱n, chi rik'ahsjic pa rik'ab i Ajabe̱s Dios.

Je' re' xca'n nimbal reh je' ricab rik'or i C'uhbal ye'o̱j reh Moyses ru'um i Ajabe̱s Dios re' rik'or chi je' wili: “Re' pe̱t ac'un nasjic, k'ahsjok pan k'ab i Dios reh chi naricamanic chiwach, nqui rik'or.

Je' wo', ar ponok Jerusalen, re' Mari̱ya xo̱j rik'ahsaj risi̱ chiwach i Dios je' ricab rik'or wo' chipam i C'uhbal re're' chi je' wili: “Re' tutbe̱s nok sak chic wach ru̱c' rasjic riha'lac'u̱n, junc'uhl chi cuc' c'o̱t on junc'uhl chi rexba̱ narik'ahsam chi si̱ chiwach i Ajabe̱s Dios, nqui rik'or.

Chiwach take k'i̱j nok wilque̱b ponok i Mari̱ya ch'i̱l Chep ar Jerusalen, chipam i tinamit re're' wilic wo' jenaj winak Simyon ribihnal coric wach rino'jbal eh aj niminel wo' chiwach i Ajabe̱s Dios. Ru'um nok wilic i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios ru̱c', re' Simyon re're' wilic chic ha̱b rip'utum ruyu'njic i k'i̱j re' narilom wi̱' wach i naresenic queh rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chipam quiti'quilal
maj re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios rik'orom chic cho reh chi je' wili: «Re' hat ma' ja'xta aquimic je wi cu ja' nawilow ta wach i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric ru'um i Ajabe̱s Dios, nqui k'oro̱j cho reh.

Yu'na k'uru' nok chi re' Mari̱ya ch'i̱l Chep xquic'am je quiha'lac'u̱n chi naquik'ahsam pan k'ab i Dios, je' ricab rik'or i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, re' Simyon re're' xo̱j wo' chipam Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, naxk'ormojic reh ru'um Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios chi narojic ar.
Je' re' ajic, naxilow wach i ha'lac'un re're', ximehraj johtok eh xitioxej johtok i Dios chi je' wili:
«Ha̱w, re' ak'orbal ayeb cho wi̱n xponic wach. Yu'na ajic quinquimok pe chic je chi suk nic'ux,
maj xwilow chic wach i kajco'lonel
re' pahbamaj cho awu'um chi quico'ljic chi'nchel i tinamit.

K'e̱' nitioxej aweh k'uru' ru̱c' awAc'u̱n wili maj chi xa je' na ricab jenaj sakom, re're' narisakomem pa̱m quino'jbal take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh naric'uhtam wo' rinimal alok'il chi kawach i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, nqui Simyon.
Je' re' ajic re' Chep ch'i̱l i Mari̱ya k'e̱' wo' chic xsahchic quic'ux ru̱c' take k'oric xk'ormojic chiri̱j i cac'u̱n.

Chiri̱j chic ru', re' Simyon xipahkaj ric'axbal i Dios chi quina̱ ritu̱t raja̱w i Jesus eh chiri̱j chic re' je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh ritu̱t i t'uch ha'lac'un Jesus: «Mari̱ya, chabiraj chi coric i wili: Re' Dios ritik'a̱b chic cho wach chi re' ric'uhbal awac'u̱n q'uihal take c'acharel ma'xta cajwanic wach, je' ricab nbanaric reh jeno' rehtalil be̱h nok ma' n-nimjic ta chic cu'um tinamit. Je' re' ajic re' Dios xitik'a̱' wo' cho wach chi re' awac'u̱n wili nariyeb ti'c'axic chi quina̱ q'uihal queh ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' ma'xta quiniminic reh ric'uhbal. Je' wo', xitik'a̱' wo' cho wach chi narico'lem take riq'uihal queh take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' naquiniminic reh ric'uhbal.

Chiri̱j awac'u̱n wili, re' tak'amaj cho chi risakomsjic lok wach i ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal wilic pan ca̱mna take riq'uihal tinamit, re' hat Mari̱ya ti' na̱wilom wach. Naroquic cho jenaj nyot'ic awu̱c', xa je' chic ricab lamoj ta nak jeno' ch'ihch' chi' ac'ux na̱wic'ram, nqui Simyon.

Chi quixilac take c'ahchi' quilom rik'ahsjic i Jesus pan k'ab i Dios, wilic wo' ar jenaj rijeb laj ixok rixk'u̱n i Panwel ra̱' ri'sil wo' cho Aser, A̱n ribihnal eh je' ru̱c' wo' take aj k'oro̱l reh k'oric nye'eric reh ru'um Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios. Re' A̱n wili camnak chic je ribahi̱l, xa wuku̱b ti ha̱b xc'acharic ru̱c'

eh yu'na quejeb ro'c'ahl (84) ha̱b chic ricahnic cahnok ru'um ribahi̱l, xa re' la' nchel to̱b ta wo' rijeb ixok chic, xa kalakal wo' wilic chipam Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios ru'um xa eli̱c wo' ricuy riwa' riha̱' chi ti̱j chi lok'onbal wach i Dios.

Je' re' ajic re' A̱n wili nok wilic ponok chipam lok' laj pa̱t re're' eh c'ahchi' rilom rik'ahsjic i Jesus, p'uht ritioxem johtok i Dios eh je' wili k'oric xiban chiri̱j i ha'lac'un re're' queh take aj Jerusalen re' c'ahchi' cuy'em i k'i̱j chi naquico'ljic: «Naq'uihok i ha'lac'un wili naco̱j rico'lem i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, nqui k'oric xiban.

Nok ca'nam chic cho ribanaric chi'nchel re're' chipam Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios chi rinimjic je' ricab nic' pa' wach tz'ihmbimaj cahnok chipam i C'uhbal ye'o̱j reh Moyses ru'um i Ajabe̱s Dios eh quibiram wo' chic chi'nchel xk'ormojic chiri̱j i quiha'lac'u̱n, re' Chep ch'i̱l Mari̱ya xisoljic wo' chic je pan quipa̱t ar pan tinamit Nasaret pa riyuk'ul i Calile̱ya.
Re' Jesus p'uht riq'uihic johtok eh nok c'ahchi' riq'uijolbic p'uht rik'asamric rino'jbal maj re' rato'bil i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios wilic china̱.

Chi je' re' q'uihic riban johtok i Jesus, re' take ritu̱t raja̱w ru'um chi ocronak take chi eli̱c ha̱b qui'o̱j ar Jerusalen pan nink'i̱j re' nquinink'ijej wi̱' i quelic cho ra̱' ri'sil ma' Israhel chipam i ti'c'axic najtir k'i̱j ar Eji̱pto,
re' take re' xi'o̱j ar Jerusalen je' ricab nca'n eli̱c ha̱b eh xquic'am je Jesus chiqui̱j.

Nok cux'unak chic i nink'i̱j re're', re' Chep ch'i̱l Mari̱ya xisoljic wo' chic je pan quitinami̱t ch'i̱l take nic' pa' nimal xiponic cho pan nink'i̱j re're', xa re' la' ma' xquicoj ta rehtal chi re' Jesus xcahnic po' cho ar Jerusalen

maj pan quic'ux take ritu̱t raja̱w, xa chi quixilac la' wo' tinamit xchalic. Je' re' nok xca'n je jenaj k'i̱j chi behic. Naxoquic aj cho k'ekom, re' take re' p'uht quisiq'uim i cac'u̱n chi quixilac take queht'alim quiwach quich'i̱l, je' wo' chi quixilac take cu̱c' cho,
xa re' la' ma' xquirak ta wo'. Je' re' nok pa ricab k'i̱j xquichop wo' chic je quibe̱h chi risiq'uiric i Jesus ar Jerusalen

eh cu re' chic pa ro̱x k'i̱j xponic quirak chipam Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios. Naxponic quirak, xquilow chi ar wilic chi quiyejal take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses c'ahchi' ribiram i c'uhbalanic nca'n take ru' eh c'ahchi' wo' cok chi pahkanic chiri̱j i c'uhbal nquik'or.
Je' wo', xquilow chi chi'nchel take c'ahchi' quibirinic reh k'oric riban i cac'u̱n, xa sahchanak chic quic'ux ru'um chi k'e̱' t'ulic chi quic'u'ljic.

Naxquilow chi je' re' take ritu̱t raja̱w, k'e̱' xsahchic quic'ux xa re' la' ru'um quiyo'jic chi xsahchic nak i cac'u̱n je' wili xik'or i ritu̱t reh: «Wac'u̱n, ma' holohic ta xa'n keh chi je' re' maj re' hin ch'i̱l awaja̱w xiban naho̱l kawach chi asiq'uiric, nqui reh.

Chalic Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Re' hat-tak narak wo' nak tak chiri̱j chi re' hin tanlic chi wi̱n chi nanibanam i camanic ye'o̱j chi nina̱ ru'um i wAja̱w Dios. Je' re' nok ayu' nak xinasic' tak chi pe̱t, nqui xik'or.
Re' k'oric re're' ma' xquirak ta chiri̱j take ritu̱t raja̱w

xa re' la' re' ritu̱t ma' xsahchic ta chic pa ric'ux i k'oric re're'. Chi je' re', re' Jesus xsoljic je chiqui̱j ar pan quitinami̱t Nasaret. Ar chic ponok xa ma' haj ta wo' xik'ihtaj ri̱b chiwach ritu̱t raja̱w, xa eli̱c la' wo' xinimej take.
Je' wo' chic, nok c'ahchi' riq'uijolbic johtok, k'e̱' c'ahchi' rik'asamric rino'jbal eh ru̱c' re're', ma' pajoj ta naxirak ric'axbal chiwach i Dios je' wo' chi quiwach take tinamit.

Naxk'o'rjic i Wa̱n ru'um i Dios chi naricamanic chiwach, xa re' nok re' winak Tiwe̱ryo ribihnal ho'lajuj chic ha̱b wilic reh chi k'atal k'oric ar Ro̱ma. Chipam take k'i̱j re're', re' take wili wilque̱b chi raj to'bonel: Re' ma' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to raj to'bonel ar pa riyuk'ul i Jure̱ya, re' ma' Hero̱res raj to'bonel ar pa riyuk'ul i Calile̱ya, re' ma' Pili̱po re' richa̱k' i Hero̱res raj to'bonel ar pan tak quiyuk'ul Iture̱ya ch'i̱l Taraconi̱ta, eh re' ma' Lisa̱nyas raj to'bonel ar pa riyuk'ul i Awili̱nya.

Je' wo', naxk'o'rjic i Wa̱n re' rac'u̱n ma' Sacari̱yas ru'um i Dios ar pan chik yu̱k' laj ye'a̱b re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel, xa re' nok re' ma' Anas ch'i̱l ma' Caypas wilque̱b chi nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios ar pa riyuk'ul i Jure̱ya.

Nok k'o'romaj chic ru'um i Dios, re' Wa̱n p'uht risutem pa̱m take ye'a̱b wilque̱b ma' naht ta chi chi̱' i ma' laj ha' Jortan ribihnal eh je' wili rik'or queh tinamit: «Chacana̱' tak ribanaric i mahc reh chi re' Dios ericuy amahc tak eh cu re' aj ru' re' hin enikahsaj aha̱' tak, nqui queh.

Re' camanic c'ahchi' ribanam i Wa̱n, re' wo' je' ricab ritz'ihmbam cho pa rihu̱j i ma' Isayi̱yas re' aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios. Re're' je' wili xitz'ihmbaj cho: “Re' hin xnibiraj chi je' wili xk'ormojic reh jenaj winak c'ahchi' riyuk'em take tinamit ar pan chik yu̱k' laj ye'a̱b: ‘Je' ricab nantik'injic jeno' be̱h ru'um ponic reh jeno' k'atal k'oric chi k'o'ronic, re' hat chatik'a̱' wo' take tinamit chi ric'uluric i Ajabe̱s Pahbamaj wu'um chi K'atal K'oric re' nariponic chi quik'o'rjic. Queh take tinamit re're' chak'or chi curman naquicorsam wach quic'acharic je' ricab nok jeno' winak ricorsaj wach take yocyoc laj be̱h ru'um reh riponic jeno' k'atal k'oric.

Nik'or chi je' re' maj re' winak je' re' ricamaj, wi juljul pa̱m take be̱h, narinuksam pa̱m take jul re're', on wi yohbal wach take tantan, naritik'a̱b na̱ chi coric. Je' wo', wi cotcot riban take be̱h, nariyeb chi coric on wi luc'luc' riban narich'eyem na̱ chi coric. Je' aj re' riban reh chi naricahnic chi xa jenaj chic wach i be̱h, nqui banol reh winak re' c'ahchi' riyuk'em take tinamit ar pan chik yu̱k'.

Re' xnibiraj re're', xa ma' naht ta chic wilic i k'i̱j chi naric'uluric eh nac'ulurok, chi'nchel take tinamit naquilom wach i aj co'lonel re' naritak'a̱b cho i Dios, nqui xitz'ihmbaj cho ma' Isayi̱yas.

Je' wo', queh take yohbal wach tinamit ma' ja' nquicana̱' ta quimahc re' p'uht quiponic ru̱c' i Wa̱n, je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' hat-tak re' nawa̱j asiq'uim tak ri̱j elic chiwach i ti'c'axic chalic reh, je' ricab elic nca'n take a̱k' nanquilow wach i k'a̱k', ma̱coj tak wach re' xat-tijiljic tak wi̱' chi xa re' kahsanic ha' enco'lonic aweh tak chiwach i ti'c'axic chalic reh

maj reh chi na̱co'ljic tak, til curman chi cha'n tak i coric c'uhtbal reh chi xacana̱' tak chic amahc eh ma̱k'or tak nchel pan ac'ux tak chi je' wili: ‹Re' hoj, hoj ritinami̱t i Dios maj re' hoj, hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Awraham. Nic' wach k'uru' chi ma' eta kojco'ljic chiwach i ti'c'axic? ma' tiqui tak pan ac'ux. «Ma̱capaj tak chic chi je' re' maj wi ta nak xa ru'um chi ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Awraham, re' take tinamit enca'n chi ritinami̱t i Dios, ra̱j rik'orom chi re' take abaj wili ewo' nak nca'n chi ritinami̱t i Dios ru'um nok re' Dios wilic rajawric chi enak ritik'a̱' take chi ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Awraham.

Je' re' ajic chac'uhtaj tak k'uru' chi xacana̱' chic amahc tak maj re' ti'c'axic til chalic chic reh chana̱ tak eh naric'uluric awu̱c' tak je' ricab jeno' winak tiklic chic chi naroquic chi riyoc'oric lok take che̱' ma' quiwachanic ta eh nok riyoc'om chic lok take ric'at wo' take cok pan k'a̱k', nqui Wa̱n queh tinamit.
Xichalic take tinamit je' wili xquik'or reh Wa̱n: «Chaj bih raj banaric k'uru' chi nakaco'ljic chiwach i ti'c'axic re're'? nqui take reh.

Re' Wa̱n je' wili xik'or queh: «Pa' bih wilic aweh tak chasi̱j tak so' queh take ma'xta bih wilic queh. Je' ricab, wi wilic quib ok aso' tak, chayew tak reh jeno' awas acha̱k' tak. Je' wo', chayew wo' tak quiwa' quiha̱' i ma'xta bih wilic queh, nqui Wa̱n.

Wilic wo' take aj pahkem to̱j ntak'abjic je reh aj k'atal k'oric Ro̱ma xi'o̱j wo' c'olok ru̱c' i Wa̱n chi narikahsjic quiha̱'. Re' take re' je' wili xquipahkaj reh: «Ha̱w ma' Wa̱n, raj wo' i hoj chaj bih naka'nam? nqui take reh.
—Re' hat-tak ma' wic'saj tak na̱ ripahkaljic i tumi̱n re' k'oro̱j aweh tak chi na̱pahkam tak, nqui queh.

Chalic take ju'jun i sol wilque̱b wo' cok ru̱c' i Wa̱n, je' wili xquik'or cok reh: «Raj wo' hoj k'uru', chaj wo' bih naka'nam? nqui take reh. —Re' hat-tak ch'ihcok ac'ux tak ru̱c' atojbal tak. Ma' chi bih amak' tak reh xa hab wach xa ru'um atoxtotil tak. Ma̱tz'ak wo' tak k'oric chiri̱j hab wach jeno' ma'xta rimahc, nqui Wa̱n queh.

Ru̱c' aj c'uhbalanic re're', chi'nchel take tinamit wilque̱b ru̱c' i Wa̱n chi narikajic quiha̱' p'uht quik'orom pan quic'ux chi je' wili: «Re' ta wo' ti i winak wili i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric? nqui take pan quic'ux ru'um chi til c'ahchi'que̱b chi ruyu'njic i k'atal k'oric re're'.

Re' Wa̱n je' wili xik'or queh chi risakomsjic wach queh i birinic nca'n pan quic'ux: «Ma'xta, ma' re' ta hin i nacapaj tak re're'. Re' k'atal k'oric re're' c'ulic lok reh chiwi̱j hin. Je' wo' chic, re're' nic' wo' chic na̱ rajawric chi niwach, chi xa ta nak re' t'uch wach camanic je' ricab resmejic lok riper xijab ajabe̱s riban jeno' aj camanom, eric'ul chi wi̱n chi eniban chiwach. Je' wo' chic, yu'na xa ru̱c' ti ha' c'ahchi' nikahsam aha̱' tak i hin, ra̱j nac'olok lok ru', til naribanam chi naritak'a̱b cho i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios chi nariwih'ic pan ac'acharic hat-tak re' tiniminic tak reh Ajabe̱s re're' eh tz'a̱b ru' take ma' quiniminic ta reh, re' take re' narich'ukum k'oric chi quina̱.

«Chi je' aj re' i rajawric, chatik'a̱' awi̱b tak chi ric'uluric i k'atal k'oric re're' maj nac'olok lok ru', xa chi yu'na ti narip'utum camanic je' ricab riban jeno' winak nok wilic chic pan k'ab rijachbal, rip'ut ti rijacharic lok ri̱j rija̱l tehbal na̱ i rica̱k' eh nok ricohlam chic rijacharic ri̱j rija̱l, riyew lok pan birin take jal eh re' tilub riyew cok pan k'a̱k' re' xa ntenic chic cho, nqui queh.

Ru̱c' aj take k'oric je' ricab re're', re' Wa̱n q'uih pech wo' xik'or queh tinamit i holohic laj k'oric chi re' Ajabe̱s K'atal K'oric loq'uil chic nc'ulic lok eh xik'il wo' take chi naquicana̱b c'acharic pan mahc.

Je' ricab ma' Hero̱res je' wili xk'ormojic reh ru'um i Wa̱n: «Re' hat mahc i na'n chi c'ahchi' awehq'uenem cok i Herori̱yas re' rehq'ue̱n acha̱k' Peh. Til riwi̱' chaweh chi chacana̱' i rehq'ue̱n acha̱k' je' wo' re' take nic' nimal i mahc na'n cu yu'na chi k'i̱j, nqui reh.
To̱b ta je' re' xik'or i Wa̱n, re' Hero̱res ma' xinimej ta re' xk'ormojic reh re're', ritz'aparic la' chic xiban pan che̱' eh ru̱c' re're' jenaj chic riman rimahc xicoj china̱.

Nok cu kahsanic ha' wo' riban i Wa̱n, pan jenaj k'i̱j nok re' tinamit c'ahchi' quikahsam quiha̱', re' Jesus xo̱j wo' c'olok chi rikahsjic riha̱'. Je' re' ajic nok wilic cok pan ha' eh c'ahchi' ribanam riti̱j, xteh pe' pa̱m i taxa̱j

eh re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios xkajic cho china̱ i Jesus je' ricab riwi̱' jenaj rexba̱. Chiri̱j wili, re' Dios xk'oric wo' cho pan taxa̱j chi je' wili: «Re' hat wAc'u̱n, til k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj. K'e̱' wo' sukquil pa nic'ux chawi̱j ru'um chi xatnipahba̱' chi Ajabe̱s K'atal K'oric, nqui cho Dios.

Ru̱c' aj re', re' Jesus xichop ricamaj nok wilic na pa rilaje̱b rica'winak (30) ha̱b. Re' aj wili ritikim cho wi̱' ri̱b ric'acharic i Jesus: Re' Jesus rac'u̱n i Chep je' ricab nquicapaj i tinamit; re' Chep rac'u̱n i Elih;
re' Elih rac'u̱n cho i Matat; re' Matat rac'u̱n cho i Lewih; re' Lewih rac'u̱n cho Melquih; re' Melquih rac'u̱n cho i Janay; re' Janay rac'u̱n cho i Chep;
re' Chep rac'u̱n cho i Matati̱yas; re' Matati̱yas rac'u̱n cho i Amos; re' Amos rac'u̱n cho i Nahum; re' Nahum rac'u̱n cho i Eslih; re' Eslih rac'u̱n cho i Nacay;
re' Nacay rac'u̱n cho i Mahat; re' Mahat rac'u̱n cho i Matati̱yas; re' Matati̱yas rac'u̱n cho i Semeyih; re' Semeyih rac'u̱n cho i Chep; re' Chep rac'u̱n cho i Jurah;
re' Jurah rac'u̱n cho i Joha̱na; re' Joha̱na rac'u̱n cho i Re̱sa; re' Re̱sa rac'u̱n cho i Sorowawel. Re' Sorowawel rac'u̱n cho i Salatyel; re' Salatyel rac'u̱n cho i Ne̱ri;
re' Ne̱ri rac'u̱n cho i Me̱lqui; re' Me̱lqui rac'u̱n cho i Arih re' Arih rac'u̱n cho i Cosam; re' Cosam rac'u̱n cho i Elmoram; re' Elmoram rac'u̱n cho i Er;
re' Er rac'u̱n cho i Chus re' Chus rac'u̱n cho i Elye̱ser; re' Elye̱ser rac'u̱n cho i Jorim; re' Jorim rac'u̱n cho i Matat; re' Matat rac'u̱n cho i Lewih;
re' Lewih rac'u̱n cho i Simyon; re' Simyon rac'u̱n cho i Jurah; re' Jurah rac'u̱n cho i Chep; re' Chep rac'u̱n cho i Jonam; re' Jonam rac'u̱n cho i Elyaquim;
re' Elyaquim rac'u̱n cho i Mele̱ya; re' Mele̱ya rac'u̱n cho i Maynan; re' Maynan rac'u̱n cho i Matatah; re' Matatah rac'u̱n cho i Natan; re' Natan rac'u̱n cho i Tawiy.
Re' Tawiy rac'u̱n cho i Isayih; re' Isayih rac'u̱n cho i Ower; re' Ower rac'u̱n cho i Wohos; re' Wohos rac'u̱n cho i Salmon; re' Salmon rac'u̱n cho i Nahason;
re' Nahason rac'u̱n cho i Aminaraw; re' Aminaraw rac'u̱n cho i Aram; re' Aram rac'u̱n cho i Hesrom; re' Hesrom rac'u̱n cho i Pa̱res; re' Pa̱res rac'u̱n cho i Jurah;
re' Jurah rac'u̱n cho i Jacow; re' Jacow rac'u̱n cho i Isahac; re' Isahac rac'u̱n cho i Awraham. Re' Awraham rac'u̱n cho i Tareh; re' Tareh rac'u̱n cho i Naho̱r;
re' Naho̱r rac'u̱n cho i Seruc; re' Seruc rac'u̱n cho i Racaw; re' Racaw rac'u̱n cho i Pelec; re' Pelec rac'u̱n cho i Ewer; re' Ewer rac'u̱n cho i Sa̱la;
re' Sa̱la rac'u̱n cho i Caynan; re' Caynan rac'u̱n cho i Arpaxah; re' Arpaxah rac'u̱n cho i Sem. Re' Sem rac'u̱n cho i Noheh; re' Noheh rac'u̱n cho i Lamec;
re' Lamec rac'u̱n cho i Matusalem; re' Matusalem rac'u̱n cho i Henoc; re' Henoc rac'u̱n cho i Jareh; re' Jareh rac'u̱n cho Mahalalel; re' Mahalalel rac'u̱n cho i Caynan;
re' Caynan rac'u̱n cho i Enos; re' Enos rac'u̱n cho i Set; re' Set rac'u̱n cho i Aran; re' Aran rac'u̱n cho i Dios.
Chiri̱j chic ru' nok chalanak chic i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios ru̱c' Jesus, xelic cho ar Jortan eh xc'amaric je ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal ar pan jenaj ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel.

Ar xwih'ic wo' aj Yahm chi ripajaric i Jesus eh je' re' xiban reh chiwach ca'winak (40) k'i̱j xwih'ic i Jesus ar. Chiri̱j ru' naxiq'uic lok take k'i̱j re're', re' aj Yahm xipaj wo' chic i Jesus naxchalic ric'ahric. Je' re' xiban aj Yahm ru'um nok ma'xta bih riniq'uem i Jesus chiwach take k'i̱j re're'.
Re' aj Yahm je' wili p'uht rik'orom reh Jesus: «Re' hat Jesus wilic rajawric ak'orbal ru'um nok hat rAc'u̱n i Dios. Chak'or reh abaj wili k'uru' chi mikrok wi'c, nqui reh.

Chalic Jesus je' wili xik'or reh aj Yahm: «Coric nak'or, xa re' la' ma'xta nibiram k'oric chawach maj pa riC'uhbal i Dios tz'ihmbimaj chi je' wili: “Re' c'acharel reh chi naric'acharic curman wo' chi naribanam riwa', xa re' la' k'e̱' wo' chic curman chi naribiram haj wilic rik'or i Dios reh chi naric'acharic chi suk ru̱c' i Dios, nqui rik'or, nqui Jesus.
Chiri̱j wili ar chic china̱ jenaj yu̱k' k'e̱' nahtil na̱ re' xc'amaric je wi̱' i Jesus, re' aj Yahm chi jumehk'il xic'uhtaj wo' chic reh nic' nimal take nimak wach tinamit wilque̱b ayu' wach ac'al

eh re' aj Yahm je' wili xik'or reh: «Re' hin eriban chi eniyew chi'nchel take nimak wach tinamit wulu' ch'i̱l nic' nimal quibihomal reh hab wach aj eh nwa̱j niyeb. Re' hin til wilic wajawric chi ribanaric chi je' re' maj k'ahsamaj take pa nik'ab.
Re' hat k'uru' chaxuc'a̱' awi̱b chi nilok'onjic chi je' re' enik'ahsaj take pan ak'ab chi'nchel re're' reh chi enak'at k'oric chi quina̱, nqui reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili ric'u'ljic xiban: «Coric nak'or, xa re' la' ma'xta ca̱t nilok'em maj pa riC'uhbal i Dios tz'ihmbimaj chi je' wili: “Xa re' wo' Ajabe̱s Dios na̱lok'em wach eh xa chiwach wo' re' naxuc'a̱b awi̱b, nqui tz'ihmbimaj. «Telen aj chi niwach, ma' nwilow chic awach, nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic ru' xc'amaric wo' chic je Jesus ru'um aj Yahm ar chipam tinamit Jerusalen eh naxpahbabjic china̱ i ma' laj tz'ak nsutunic ri̱j i pa̱t re' nk'ahsjic wi̱' take si̱ chiwach i Dios, je' wili xk'ormojic reh Jesus: «Hat Jesus, to̱b ta nak naht etik'ehbic jok ma'xta bih enac'ul ru'um nok hat rAc'u̱n i Dios. Chacut jok awi̱b ayu' k'uru'
maj pan Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' i riC'uhbal i Dios je' wili tz'ihmbimaj: “Re' Dios eritak'a̱' take cho raj tz'e' wa̱ch chi etichalic quicha'jej, nqui tz'ihmbimaj.

«Je' wo', chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re're' tz'ihmbimaj wo' chi je' wili: “Wi ta nak etik'ehbic jok wach ac'al, re' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios ewo' tiquic'ul pan te̱w reh chi ma' eta nach'ey awi̱b wach abaj, nqui tz'ihmbimaj, nqui aj Yahm reh Jesus.

Re' Jesus je' wili xic'u'lej wi̱': «Coric xak'or, xa re' la' ma' riyew ta ri̱b chi enipaj i Dios maj je' wo' wili tz'ihmbimaj pan Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal: “Ma̱yew chi pajaric awAja̱w Dios, nqui tz'ihmbimaj, nqui xic'u'lej wi̱'.
Chiri̱j re', re' aj Yahm, naxilow chi ma'xta n-nimjic rik'orbal, xicana̱' cahnok i Jesus. Ru̱c' aj re', ximay ripajaric cu rehtal wo' chic xirak cho chaj bih naripajbem wi̱'.

Chiri̱j chic ru', re' Jesus, naxcanabjic cahnok ru'um aj Yahm, xsoljic cho pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya eh ru'um rajawric i Lok' laj Uxlabal ye'o̱j reh, xelic ribiral cu̱c' chi'nchel i tinamit chi re' Jesus wilic ricowil rik'orbal chi c'uhtunic.

Je' re' rik'or chiri̱j i Jesus maj re' take quibirinic reh i c'uhtunic riban pan tak pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal ye'o̱j reh i Moyses, je' wili nquik'or chiri̱j: «Re' cok i winak wili til wilic ricowil rik'orbal chi c'uhtunic, nqui nquik'or.

Chi je' aj re' k'oric nca'n chiri̱j, re' Jesus xo̱j c'olok chipam i tinamit Nasaret re' q'uihinak cho wi̱'. Junpech ajic naxponic i hi'lbal k'i̱j chi keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, xo̱j chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses je' ricab rocsam wi̱' ri̱b chi no̱j chi c'uhtunic pan tak pa̱t re're'. Ar ajic naxponic ri'orahil i c'uhtunic xpa'lajic johtok
eh xye'eric reh i hu̱j ritz'ihmbam i raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios re' ma' Isayi̱yas. Naxihel wach i hu̱j re're', manlic xponic rirak take k'oric xitz'ihmbaj ma' Isayi̱yas chi je' wili:

“Re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios wilic wu̱c' reh chi nanibanam ricamaj chi aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios. Re're' wilic wu̱c' maj re' Dios xiripahba̱' chi nanik'orom i holohic laj k'oric wili queh take cajwam wach tobjic: Je' ricab ntak'abjic jeno' aj tz'e' wa̱ch chi rik'ormojic chi naquelic lok pan che̱' take tz'apalque̱b, on chi naquilom wo' chic wach sakom take moyronak chic pa̱m nak' quiwach ru'um rik'ekomil i pa̱t tz'apalque̱b wi̱', je' wo' re' hin, xintak'abjic wo' cho cu̱c' take ti' c'ahchi' quic'ulum pan quik'ab take caj ixowonel chi rik'ormojic queh chi re' Dios naresam take chipam quiti'quilal re're'.
Je' wo', xintak'abjic wo' cho chi rik'ormojic queh chi xirak chic rik'ijil chiwach i Dios chi k'e̱' ra̱j rito'bem take, nqui tz'ihmbimaj cho ru'um ma' Isayi̱yas.
Naxicohlaj rilmijic wach i hu̱j, re' take tinamit xa cow chic xquitz'ehtaj i Jesus. Chiri̱j ru', xibotej wach i hu̱j, xiyew wo' chic reh raj to'o̱l i nahsil nilbic reh pa̱t re're' eh tz'uhkic jok.

Chiri̱j wili re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' k'oric rik'orom cho ma' Isayi̱yas xmanlajic chic wach eh re' hin wilqui̱n chawach tak re' wo' hin quinbanic chi manlajic wach i k'oric re're', nqui Jesus.

Naxquibiraj i k'oric re're', re' take wilque̱b ar je' wili xquik'or: «Coric xik'or i Jesus eh je' wo' k'e̱' suk rik'or chi re' Dios naco̱j rito'bem, nqui xquik'or. Re' cok ru' to̱b ta je' re' xquik'or, ma' til ta xquicoj wach chi re' Jesus, re' i aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios. Re' take re', je' la' wili xquik'or: «Nic' wach nachiban ru' chi aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios maj xa rac'u̱n wo' ti Chep? nqui take.

Chiri̱j i wili re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' hat-tak xc'ulic ribiral awu̱c' tak chi yohbal wach take lok' laj nawa̱l xniban cho ar Capernahum eh ru'um re' pahkbal wi̱n chi nanibanam wo' lok' laj nawa̱l chaxilac tak, na̱k'orom tak wi̱n i c'uta̱j nbanjic chiri̱j aj ik'omonel: “Re' aj ik'omonel ar rip'ut je ik'omonic pa ripa̱t, nqui rik'or i c'uta̱j re' enak'or tak wi̱n.
«Coric, je' re' rik'or i k'oric re're', xa re' la' coric wo' rik'or jenaj chic k'oric wili: “Ma' jeno' aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios ma' ta nak ixowomaj wach pa ritinami̱t, nqui i k'oric re're'.

«Chi risakomsjic wach i c'uta̱j re're', chacoj tak rehtal nic' wach xic'ul i Eli̱yas nok chiwach i xib ha̱b rime̱ra yohbal wach sik'jil xiban eh xwih'ic wo' jenaj wi'jalel ayu' wach ac'al. Til nik'or chi chiwach take k'i̱j re're', ayu' chipam i katinami̱t i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel yohbal nak wach take cahnel ixok wilque̱b chi ma'xta chic quiwa' quiha̱',

xa re' la' ma' re' ta wo' cu̱c' xtak'abjic cho Eli̱yas chi quitobjic maj ixowomaj wach chipam i tinamit re're'. Chi je' re' ajic ar xtak'abjic je pa riyuk'ul i Siron ru̱c' jenaj cahnel ixok aj Sare̱pta.

«Je' wo' re' xc'uluric cho chiwach Elise̱yo re' aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios, yohbal wo' nak wach take xilim qui̱j wilque̱b ayu' pan katinami̱t i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, xa re' la' wach i winak aj Si̱rya Nahaman ribihnal xesmejic lok riya'bilal, raj take xilim qui̱j wilque̱b ayu' pan katinami̱t ma'xta nesmejic lok quiya'bilal, nqui Jesus queh.
Naxquibiraj chi je' re' take wilque̱b chipam pa̱t re're', k'e̱' naxjohtic cho quic'a̱.
Je' re' nok naxipa'lajic johtok, xquikerej lok i Jesus eh xquic'am lok chiri̱j i tinamit wilic china̱ i yu̱k' reh chi naquicutum nak jok ar,
xa re' la' Jesus xok'taj ri̱b pan quik'ab, xiq'uic je pan quiyejal eh xicana̱' cahnok i tinamit re're'.

Naxelic je Jesus ar Nasaret, xo̱j jok pan tinamit Capernahum re' wilic wo' chipam riyuk'ul i Calile̱ya. Pan tak hi'lbal k'i̱j chi keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, re' Jesus xiban wo' c'uhtunic ar.
Re' cok ar k'e̱' xsahchic quic'ux i tinamit chi ribirmijic i c'uhbalanic riban maj naxiban c'uhbalanic i Jesus xquicoj rehtal chi wilic rajawric chi c'uhtunic,

je' ricab xquilow chi xc'uluric pan jenaj queh hi'lbal k'i̱j re're' ar chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal ye'o̱j reh i Moyses. Ar ajic jenaj winak re' chopo̱j na̱ ric'acharic ru'um jenaj ma' tob laj uxlabal je' wili p'uht rik'orom cok reh Jesus chi xa cow chic c'ahchi' rik'oric:

«Hat Jesus re' nabihnej chi aj Nasaret, re' hin weht'alim chi re' hat xa hat t'erenel naxatc'ulic lok eh wilic awajawric chi ribanaric re're' maj re' hat, hat Lok' laj rAc'u̱n i Dios. Chaj bih awocal cho ku̱c' k'uru', koj-acana̱' chi suk? nqui p'uht rik'orom.

Nok je' re' p'uht rik'orom, re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh ma' tob laj uxlabal ru̱c' rajawric rik'orbal: «Chatz'ap achi̱'. Telen lok ru̱c' winak wili, nqui reh. Xa re' wo' ti xibiraj i k'oric re're', re' ma' tob laj uxlabal xelic wo' ti ru̱c' i winak re're' eh xicut wach ac'al chi quiyejal take wilque̱b ar, xa re' cok ru' ma' xch'eyeric ta wo' naxbanaric reh chi je' re'.

Naxquilow chaj bih xiban i Jesus, re' take wilque̱b ar je' wili xquik'or chi quiwach chi sahchanak quic'ux: «K'e̱' rajawric rik'orbal i winak wili. Re' cok wili, wilic rajawric chi quina̱ take ma' tob laj uxlabal. Je' re' nkak'or maj narik'or queh chi naquelic lok, xa chi yu'na wo' ti qui'elic lok, nqui take.
Je' re' nok xquesaj lok ribiral i Jesus pan tak cuc' tinamit wilque̱b ar Capernahum chi re're' wilic rajawric chi quina̱ take ma' tob laj uxlabal.
Chiri̱j chic ru' na xelic cho Jesus chipam i pa̱t re're', xo̱j pa ripa̱t i Simon re' k'o'romaj wi̱' chi narito'bem ritu̱t rehq'ue̱n i Simon maj jiclic wach yoca̱b ru'um jenaj cak tz'a'.

Je' re' naxponic ar, re' Jesus xijil cok ri̱b re' yoclic wi̱' ixok re're' eh xik'or reh cak tz'a' chi narelic lok ru̱c'. Naxik'or chi je' re', xelic ti i cak tz'a' wilic chiri̱j eh chi je' re', re' ritu̱t rehq'ue̱n i Simon xuctic johtok chi riliric take rula̱'.

Chiri̱j ru' naxo̱j chic i k'i̱j, wilic wo' take tinamit xichalic ru̱c' i Jesus chi xquic'am cho take yowa'i̱b rehreh wach quiya'bilal reh chi naquicowsjic. Chi quiju'junal take yowa'i̱b re're' xelic lok quiya'bilal nok re' Jesus xicoj rik'ab chi quina̱.

Ru'um nok chi yohbal wach take wilic ma' tob laj uxlabal cu̱c' xic'ulic lok ru̱c', re' Jesus xit'erej wo' lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal chi c'ahchi' rik'orom queh chi naquitz'apam quichi̱' maj re' take ma' tob laj uxlabal reh chi ma'xta nak quit'ermejic lok, je' wili k'oric nca'n: «Re' hat Jesus, hat rAc'u̱n i Dios, nqui take reh ru'um queht'alim chi re' Jesus re' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Chiri̱j chic ru' naxsak'ic lok je' ikal, re' Jesus xelic je pan tinamit Capernahum eh xicora̱' je pan jenaj ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel. Ar xo̱j rakmajok cu'um aj Capernahum maj ma' nca̱j ta nak chi narelic je pan quitinami̱t. Je' wili xquik'or reh: «Chacuy, tiwih'ok ku̱c', nqui take reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili xic'u'lej take wi̱': «Re' hin xiritak'a̱' cho i Dios chi nanik'orom queh chi'nchel tinamit i ribiral chi re' Dios re' nk'atbic k'oric ra̱j richopom quina̱ take c'acharel. Ru'um aj re' curman chi nawojic maj re' k'oric wili curman chi nanik'orom wo' queh toco̱m chic tinamit, nqui xik'or queh.

Je' re' nok re' Jesus xelic je pan tinamit Capernahum eh queh chic take tinamit wilque̱b pan tak riyuk'ul Calile̱ya xitik ju' i c'uhtunic chiri̱j i k'oric re're' chipam take pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses.

Chiri̱j chic ru' nok re' Jesus c'ahchi' ritikim ju' rojic pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya, xponic chipam jenaj tinamit Jenesaret ribihnal re' wilic wi̱' jenaj cho̱. Ar ajic pan jenaj k'i̱j, ar chi chi̱' i cho̱ re're' nok yohbal wach tinamit xa nquiminlom chic qui̱b chi ribirmijic riC'uhbal i Dios ru̱c' Jesus,
re're' xilow je chi ar chi chi̱' i ha' wilic qui̱b cano̱wa xquicana̱' ar take aj chopol car naxi'oquic chi ritz'ajaric wach quiya'l chopbal reh quica̱r.

Je' re' ajic naxye'eric k'ab reh i Jesus chi narijohtic johtok chipam jenaj queh cano̱wa re're' eh nok wilic chic cok chipam, xipahkaj ato'bil reh ehcham cano̱wa re' Simon ribihnal chi narijilim chic cok so' pan ha'. Ar aj ru' nok tz'uklic chic chipam cano̱wa re're', re' Jesus xoquic wo' chic chi c'uhtunic cu̱c' tinamit.

Chiri̱j aj wili naxicohlaj i c'uhtunic xiban, xik'or wo' chic reh Simon chi je' wili: «Chaj bih nak'or wi enajil chic cok so' acano̱wa pa richamil ha' reh chi suk richoporic aca̱r ena'n ru̱c' aya'l? nqui Jesus reh.

Chalic Simon je' wili xik'or reh: «Ay Ha̱w aj tijinel! Xojsak'ic la' wo' chi banoj car eh xa ta nak jenaj xka'n lok canar. Raj nchel yu'na ru'um chi re' hat c'ahchi' ak'oric wi̱n nanibanam i xak'or, nqui xik'or reh.
Je' re' nok re' Simon xiban wo' je' ricab xik'or i Jesus eh naxikerej cho riya'l chopbal rica̱r, xa cuc' tak nak chic ma' nwek ru'um nok yohbal wach i car ximol cho.

Ru̱c' aj re', re' Simon ch'i̱l take rich'i̱l quik'o'rej je quich aj car wilque̱b cho pan jenaj chic cano̱wa reh chi naquichalic to'bonel. Naxic'ulic lok take quich'i̱l, quinuksaj cabchel i cano̱wa cu rehtal xa cuc' tak nak chic ma' nmuhkic na̱ quicano̱wa ru'um riyohbalil wach car quiham chipam.

Je' aj re' nok re' Simon re' ribihnej wo' chi Luch, naxilow chi xc'uluric je' ricab xik'or i Jesus, xixuc'a̱' ri̱b chiwach eh je' wili xik'or reh: «Hat Jesus, hat Lok' laj Ajabe̱s. Ma' riyew ta ri̱b chi enajunehtej cho awi̱b wu̱c' ru'um nok re' hin, hin aj mahc, nqui reh.
Je' re' xik'or reh ru'um chi ma' q'uisi̱n ta xsahchic ric'ux ch'i̱l take rich'i̱l, naxquilow chi yohbal wach i car xquichop lok xa ru'um rik'orbal i Jesus.

Je' re' nok ru'um wo' i yo'jic xoquic cho ru̱c' Simon ch'i̱l take rihch'ilej chi banoj car, re' Wa̱n ch'i̱l i Jaco̱wo rac'u̱n take i Sewere̱yo, re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh Simon: «Ma' tiyo'jic Simon. Hat nak cho ru' aj chopol car, raj yu'na tinipahba̱' chi waj tahkanel reh chi ena'n chi re' take awas acha̱k' enquichop quic'ux chiwi̱j i hin, nqui Jesus reh.

Chi je' aj re' xk'ormojic reh ru'um i Jesus, re' Simon naxponic lok chi chi̱' ha' xicana̱' cahnok ricamaj chi aj chopol car eh xo̱j chiri̱j i Jesus chi raj tahkanel ch'i̱l i Wa̱n ch'i̱l wo' i Jaco̱wo.

Chiri̱j chic ru' nok xipahba̱' chic i Simon chi jenaj queh take cablaj chi raj tahkanel, pan jenaj k'i̱j ar chipam jenaj tinamit re' wilic wi̱' i Jesus, jenaj winak xilim ri̱j naxilow cho wach i Jesus xchalic ru̱c' eh xc'ulic rixuc'a̱' ri̱b chiwach. Re' winak re're' chi muc'lic jok wach ac'al je' wili xik'or reh Jesus: «K-Aja̱w Jesus, re' hin weht'alim chi wilic awajawric chi resmejic lok niya'bilal wi la' je' re' nawa̱j i hat chi ena'n. Nawa̱j na chi je' re' ena'n wu̱c'? nqui reh.

Re' Jesus k'uru' xiyew je k'ab china̱ chi ritz'a'jic je eh je' wili xik'or: «Ho̱' nwa̱j! Elok lok aya'bilal k'uru', nqui reh. Xa re' wo' ti xik'or i Jesus chi je' re', xelic wo' ti lok i xilim wilic nak chiri̱j i winak re're'.

Chiri̱j wili re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Ma' hab pe wach aj eh nak'or chaj bih xc'uluric awu̱c', re' la' cha'n hiy ru̱c' aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios chi ric'uhtjic reh chi ma'xta chic awe̱t eh chi reh ru' enayew i si̱ k'oro̱j ru'um i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh i Moyses. Je' aj re' cha'n reh chi nok riyeb chic rik'orbal i aj k'ahsem si̱ chi suk chic ac'ux eneht'aljic wo' cu'um take tinamit chi re' hin ma' niyak'abej ta pan wo̱k i c'uhbal re're', nqui xik'or reh.

Raj la' winak re're' naxo̱j, xesaj ti lok ribiral chi re' Jesus xk'omonic reh. Ru'um aj re' yohbal wach take tinamit nquimol qui̱b chi ribirmijic nak i Jesus, je' wo' chi naresmejic nak lok quiya'bilal ru'um,
xa re' la' Jesus, elic chic riban je chi quiwach eh ar chic no̱j chi rutquel ar pan tak ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel. Nok wilic chic ar, re're' noquic chi ti̱j.

Chiri̱j chic ru', nanelic je Jesus pan tak ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel, ritik ju' resmejic lok quiya'bilal take tinamit. Je' re' riban maj re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios re' nye'bic rajawric chi resmejic lok ya'bilal, xa wilic wo' ru̱c'. Je' re' nok junpech ar chipam i pa̱t c'ahchi' wi̱' chi c'uhtunic i Jesus, re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l wo' take aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal re're', re' xichalic ar Jerusalen je' wo' pan tak toco̱m chic tinamit wilque̱b pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya ch'i̱l Jure̱ya, xitz'uhkic wo' cok chi birinic chi quixilac take tinamit quimolom qui̱b ar.

Nok c'uhtunic aj riban i Jesus chi quiwach take c'acharel re're', xi'o̱j c'olok chi chi̱' i pa̱t quib xib take winak xquic'am cho jenaj si̱c yoclic wach rich'aht. Re' take xquiniq'uej nak cok iq'uic chipam i tz'ahp chi ric'amaric cok i si̱c chiwach i Jesus

xa re' la' naxquilow chi ma' eta nca'n canar iq'uic ru'um reh riq'uihal i tinamit quimolom qui̱b ar, xquisic' ri̱j chi xijohtic nah pa̱t reh chi cu china̱ cho naquitehem jenaj ocbal re' naquikahsam jok wi̱' i si̱c. Nok quitehem chic cho rocbal nah pa̱t, re' take winak re're' xquikahsaj jok i si̱c wach rich'aht til manlic re' wilic wi̱' i Jesus.

Re' Jesus naxicoj rehtal chi re're' ch'i̱l take xic'ambic je reh, til ch'iclic quic'ux chiri̱j i rajawric chi esenic lok ya'bilal, je' wili xik'or reh i si̱c: «Ha̱w, chi'nchel amahc xnicuy chic yu'na, nqui reh.

Ar ajic naxquibiraj chi je' re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal re're' je' wili xquik'or pan quic'ux: «Re' winak wili rik'or chi ricuy i mahc. Ru̱c' i k'oric re're' c'ahchi' riyak'abem pa ro̱k i Dios. Je' re' nkak'or maj xa re' wo' Dios wilic rajawric chi ricuyuric i mahc. Chaj ti jaric riban ri̱b i winak re're' k'uru'? nqui take.
Re' Jesus chi reht'alim chic chaj bih c'ahchi' quicapam cho pan quic'ux, je' wili xik'or queh: «Ma̱capaj tak chic i k'oric re' xa pan ac'ux tak wilic cho.

Je' re' nik'or aweh tak maj chaweh hat-tak re' rik'ormojic reh winak wili chi cuyu̱j chic rimahc ma' c'axic ta ti ribanaric maj ma' nilmijic ta wach. Ru'um aj re' je' wo' wili nak'or cho pan acapew-bal tak: ‹Wi til coric k'uru' chi wilic rajawric, chik'or reh winak re're' chi pa'lajok eh behok ru'um nok re' cok re' nc'uhtunic wach, nqui nak'or tak.

«C'uhtbal aj aweh tak chi wilic wajawric chi ricuyuric quimahc i tinamit ayu' wach ac'al, re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel nanik'orom reh si̱c wili chi pa'lajok johtok, nqui queh. Chiri̱j chic re', re' Jesus xik'or reh si̱c chi je' wili: «Ha̱w, yu'na echic riban chi enawihkaj je ach'aht. Tipa̱' johtok k'uru' maj yu'na na̱soljic je pan apa̱t chi behic chic na'n je, nqui Jesus reh.
Naxibiraj chi je' re' i si̱c, xa chi yu'na ti xuctic johtok chi quiwach chi'nchel i tinamit. Chiri̱j wili xihkaj je rich'aht xo̱j pa ripa̱t chi xa c'ahchi' chic ritioxem johtok i Dios.

Je' wo' re' take tinamit re' xi'ilbic reh xiban i Jesus, xquitioxej wo' johtok i Dios ru̱c' xquilow. Re' tinamit re're' ru'um xsahchic quic'ux je' wili xquik'or: «Ha̱', re' cok wili xa cu ra̱j ti nanc'uluric eh re' pe' wo' chic i hoj xoj-ilbic reh yu'na, nqui take.

Chiri̱j chic ru', pan jenaj k'i̱j naxelic je chipam i tinamit re' xicowsaj wi̱' i si̱c, re' Jesus xilow wach i jenaj winak Lewih ribihnal re' wilic ricamaj chi aj molol to̱j ntak'abjic je Ro̱ma. Re' Jesus naxilow wach i winak re're' chi tz'uklic ar re' wilic wi̱' i me̱xa re' nbanaric wi̱' to̱j, je' wili xik'or reh: «Ha̱w, nwa̱j chi na̱woquic chi hat waj tahkanel. Tak chiwi̱j k'uru', nqui reh.
Re' Lewih, naxibiraj chi je' re', xinimej i k'oric xk'ormojic reh eh naxicana̱' cahnok ricamaj xitahkej je i Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic ru', nok oconak chic i Lewih chi jenaj queh cablaj chi raj tahkanel i Jesus, re're' xiyuk'ej i Jesus chi wi'c ar pa ripa̱t ch'i̱l wo' take rich aj tahkanel. Ar xiyuk'ej take tinamit re' wilic quibiral chi aj mahc je' ricab take aj molol to̱j ntak'abjic je Ro̱ma, re' take xihch'ilej take cho.

Ru'um aj re', re' take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l wo' take cow laj aj niminel reh c'uhbal re're', p'uht quijihcam take raj tahkanel i Jesus maj xquilow chi re' Jesus ch'i̱l take raj tahkanel xquitz'uka̱' qui̱b chi quixilac take tinamit re're'. Je' aj wili tohk' quik'orom take re': «Nic' wach nana'n cok awa' aha̱' tak cu̱c' take aj molol to̱j ntak'abjic je Ro̱ma ch'i̱l wo' cu̱c' take tinamit wilic quibiral chi aj mahc take? nqui take reh Jesus.
Re' Jesus naxibiraj chi je' re' xquik'or take winak re're', je' wili xik'or queh: «Je' ricab nk'ormojic chi ma' re' ta take suk quic'ux qui'o̱j ru̱c' aj ik'omonel re' la' take yowa'i̱b,

je' wo' re' wu̱c' i hin, re' wo' ti take nquic'raj qui̱b chi aj mahc take quichalic wu̱c' chi ribirmijic nik'orbal. Je' re' nok re' hin niban niwa' quich'i̱l take re' maj ma' re' ta nchel chi risiq'uiric take nquicapaj chi coric wach quic'ux xinchalic, chi quisiq'uiric take nquic'raj wo' ti qui̱b chi aj mahc xinchalic chi rik'ormojic queh chi naquicana̱b i quimahc, nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j wili re' take winak aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, je' wili xquik'or reh Jesus: «Re' take awaj tahkanel xa nca'n wo' quiwa' quiha̱' chipam take k'i̱j nok re' hoj aj c'amol na̱ i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses on nok re' take aj tijem i̱b chiri̱j ric'uhbal i Wa̱n, xa q'uih pech wo' nkamol ki̱b chi ti̱j ru̱c' cuyuj wi'c ha'. Chaj bih riwi̱' k'uru' chi re' take awaj tahkanel i hat je' re' nca'n? nqui take reh.

Naxibiraj chi je' re' i Jesus, je' wili xik'or queh: «Je' ricab chi pan jeno' caxarahil ma' eta riban chi re' take rula̱' aj caxa̱ra enquiti'saj quic'ux chi ricuyuric quiwa' quiha̱' je' ricab chi wilic ta nak jeno' a̱mna chi quiwach, je' wo' re' take waj tahkanel i hin ma' eta wo' riban chi enquicuy quiwa' quiha̱' chi cu wilqui̱n pe hin chi quixilac.

Re' cok ru', naponok i k'i̱j chi na̱wesmejic je nah ac'al i hin re' aj ye'ol sukquil c'uxlis je' ricab riban aj caxa̱ra cu̱c' take rula̱', cu re' aj wo' ru' re' take waj tahkanel naquicuyum quiwa' quiha̱' ru'um riti'quil quic'ux chi ma' wilqui̱n ta chic cu̱c', nqui Jesus queh.

Chiri̱j aj re', xik'or queh jenaj jalwach k'oric chi je' wili: «Ma' hab ta wach jeno' c'acharel eriwek jeno' ac' laj tz'ih chi c'ojbal wach jeno' k'echer laj tz'ih, maje'? Je' re' nik'or maj wi je' re' riban, re' k'echer laj tz'ih ch'i̱l ac' laj tz'ih ma' eta ric'u'lej ri̱b. Je' ta nak re' eriban, xa rijot'oric nak i ac' laj tz'ih eriban.

Je' wo', ma' hab ta wach jeno' c'acharel ric'ol i ch'amsamaj ri̱s aji̱j pan jeno' k'echer laj suh maj wi xiban chi je' re', ma' xa re' ta i suh enq'uer ru'um ransil rich'amil i ri̱s aji̱j, ela' wo' no̱j chi k'e̱b i ri̱s aji̱j re're'. Je' re' k'uru' je' ricab chi ma' hab ta wach je' re' nbanic, je' wo' re' ru̱c' i nic'uhbal ma' eta wo' riban chi re' take aj tijem i̱b chiwi̱j nok quic'u'lem chic na̱ nic'uhbal xa cu nca̱j wo' quic'amam na̱ i c'uhbal tijimaj nak take cho wi̱'.

Je' re' ajic je' ricab chi re' ri̱s aji̱j pan ac' laj suh nc'olmojic reh chi quicabchelal ma'xta bih enoquic queh, curman wo' chi re' take waj tahkanel xa re' wo' nic'uhbal naquic'amam na̱ reh chi re' quicapew-bal ru' ch'i̱l i nic'uhbal i hin ma' eta no̱j riyoj ri̱b.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' nic'uhbal wilic rajawric to̱b ta nak re' hat-tak nak'or tak chi re' najtir C'uhbal Ye'o̱j ru'um Moyses k'e̱' wo' chic tare̱t chiwach nic'uhbal i hin. Re' hat-tak re' tik'oric tak reh chi je' re', na'n tak je' ricab i winak ocronak chi ruc'jic i ha' nxohc'sonic je' ru̱c' najtir chic tik'imaj cho eh ma' ra̱j ta chic ruq'uem i cu re' c'ahchi' ritik'injic maj je' chic wili rik'or: ‹Re' ha' re' najtir chic tik'imaj cho, k'e̱' wo' chic tare̱t chiwach i cu re' c'ahchi' ritik'injic cho, nqui rik'or, nqui Jesus queh cow laj aj niminel re're'.

Pan jenaj hi'lbal k'i̱j chi keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, re' Jesus xiq'uic ponok chipam junseht chi tic ncojoric chi wi'c, re' take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel p'uht quip'ixim queh i riwachej i tic re're' eh p'uht quibuquem wach pan quik'ab i wach i tic re're' reh chi naquic'uxum.

Ar ajic wilic queh take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses je' wili xquik'or reh Jesus: «Chaj wa'ric nok re' hat-tak na'n tak ribanaric i camanic ma' ye'o̱j ta k'ab chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi naribanaric chipam take hi'lbal k'i̱j? nqui take reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili xic'u'lej take wi̱': «Re' hat-tak xa ja' wo' nchel narak ta tak chiri̱j i ribiral nawilow tak wach chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios chiri̱j chaj bih xiban cho i ma' Tawiy re' k'atal k'oric najtir k'i̱j nok ru'um jenaj rinimal laj c'ahric wilic ru̱c' ch'i̱l take jarub pa' quihch'ilinic ponok reh, xisic' ri̱j nic' wach naxca'n quiwa'.

Re' ribiral re're' rik'or chi naxchalic ric'ahric ma' Tawiy, xoquic cok chipam i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios re' wilic wo' wi̱' i caxlan wi'c ye'o̱j chi si̱ chiwach i Dios. To̱b ta wo' k'oro̱j chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi xa re' take aj k'ahsem si̱ naquic'uxuj reh caxlan wi'c re're', re' ma' Tawiy xic'ux reh eh xiyew wo' queh take rich'i̱l chi naquic'uxum caxlan wi'c re're' nok ye'o̱j chic k'ab reh chi naribanam chi je' re'.

Wi je' re' xca'n take aj k'ahsem si̱ ru̱c' ma' Tawiy, re' ta na chic i hin ma' je' re' eniban cu̱c' take waj tahkanel? Je' re' nik'or maj re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, wilic wo' wajawric chi rik'ormojic haj wilic i tare̱t eh haj wilic i ma' tare̱t ta chi banaric chipam i hi'lbal k'i̱j, nqui Jesus queh.

Pan jenaj chic hi'lbal k'i̱j chi keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, re' Jesus xoquic cok chi c'uhtunic chipam i pa̱t re' ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Ar ajic ru'um nok ar wilic jenaj winak me̱c i sec'aj k'ab,

re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l wo' take aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal re're' xa cow chic p'uht quitz'ehtam i Jesus ilbal reh wi chiwach i hi'lbal k'i̱j re're' ericorsaj wach k'ab i me̱c re're' maj wi je' re' xiban, enak ti nquitz'ahkaj rimahc.

Je' re' nok re' Jesus, ru'um nok xeht'alij nic' wach pa̱m i quicapew-bal, je' wili xik'or reh winak me̱c k'ab re're': «Tucten cho, tik'ahxen cho ayu' cu chiwach, nqui reh. Naxibiraj chi je' re' i winak, xuctic je eh xo̱j pah'ok cu chiwach.

Chiri̱j wili re' Jesus xik'or queh winak re're' chi je' wili: «Re' hin nwa̱j nibanam ju'jun ok pahkanic awu̱c' tak: Riyew na k'ab keh i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi naka'nam ato'bil queh tinamit pan hi'lbal k'i̱j on ma'xta? Haj wilic riyew ri̱b k'uru', re' chi naresmejic lok quiya'bilal i tinamit on re' chi naquicanabjic pan quiti'quilal? nqui queh.

Ru̱c' aj re', re' Jesus xitz'ehtaj je take chi'nchel wilque̱b ar xa re' la' ma' hab ta wach xc'u'lunic cho reh. Je' re' nok je' wili xik'or reh winak me̱c i k'ab re're': «Quik'ochlojok wach take nah ak'ab quimequem qui̱b eh chayu̱w take je, nqui reh. Naxiyuw je k'ab i winak re're' xcorjic wo' ti wach.

Naxquilow take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l wo' take aj tijem ri̱j i c'uhbal re're' chi xcorsjic wach k'ab i winak chipam i hi'lbal k'i̱j, k'e̱' naxchalic quic'a̱. Je' aj re' chipam i k'i̱j re' p'uht quik'orom chi quiwach chi je' wili: «Chaj wo' nak bih raj banaric chi nakacansam i Jesus? nqui take chi quiwach.

Chiwach take cho k'i̱j nok c'ahchi' ricapewjic ri̱j i ricansjic cu'um take winak re're', re' Jesus xo̱j riban riti̱j china̱ jenaj yu̱k'. Ar xiq'uic ak'ab chi ripahkaljic rato'bil i Dios ru'um xirak chic chiwach chi narichihim quiwach take naricojom chi nahsil take raj tahkanel.

Naxsak'ic lok ximol quiwach take aj tahkanel chiri̱j eh chi quixilac take chi'nchel quitahkanic reh, cablaj take xichih lok chi nahsil eh je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' hin tinipahba̱' tak chi aj k'orol reh niC'uhbal, nqui queh.

Re' aj wili quibihnal take winak xichih lok: Re' ma' Simon re' xo̱j wo' cahnok ribihnal chi Luch ru'um i Jesus, re' ma' Tirix richa̱k' i ma' Simon, re' ma' Jaco̱wo, re' ma' Wa̱n, re' ma' Peh, re' ma' Warto̱lo,

re' ma' Tiyoh, re' ma' Ma̱x, re' ma' Jaco̱wo rac'u̱n i ma' Alpe̱yo, re' ma' Simon re' Selo̱te nquik'or reh maj wilic nak chi quixilac take quibanic i k'ak'anic reh chi ma'xta nak chic riwih'ic rajawric i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma chi kana̱ chi'nchel i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel;
re' ma' Ju̱ras richa̱k' i ma' Jaco̱wo, eh ch'i̱l i jenaj chic Ju̱ras aj Caryot re' xk'ahsanic wo' reh Jesus pan quik'ab take aj ixowonel chi naricansjic.

Chiri̱j chi ripahba̱b chic take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel, re' Jesus xkajic cho china̱ i yu̱k' re're' chi rich'i̱l chic take nahsil re're', ch'i̱l wo' take riq'uihal tinamit quitahkanic reh re' xichalic take pa riyuk'ul Jure̱ya, je' ricab ar Jerusalen ch'i̱l ar Ti̱ro ch'i̱l wo' i Siron re' wilque̱b chi juntar i ma' laj ha'. Je' re' ajic naxquirak jenaj t'uch q'uixca̱b, re' Jesus xpah'ic ar ch'i̱l take riq'uihal tinamit xic'ulic lok ru̱c' chi ribirmijic i c'uhtunic riban je' wo' chi naresmejic lok quiya'bilal.
Ar aj ru' re' Jesus p'uht ric'sam quiya'bilal take yowa'i̱b je' wo' take ma' suk ta quic'ux cu'um take ma' tob laj uxlabal oconak cu̱c'.
Ru'um aj take ric'sjic ya'bilal xiban i Jesus, yohbal wach take tinamit xa nca̱j nak chic quitz'a̱b cok i Jesus maj ru'um rajawric nelic lok ru̱c' ru', niq'uic je chi'nchel wach ya'bilal.

Ru̱c' aj re', re' Jesus xilbic je chi quina̱ take quitahkanic reh eh je' wili xik'or queh: «To̱b ta nak re' hat-tak xa jenaj ti nak'or tak, sukbok ac'ux tak maj re' Dios re' nk'atbic cho k'oric cu pan taxa̱j xiyew chic cho chana̱ tak i ricuse'sbal.

Ru'um aj re' sukbok ac'ux hat-tak re' nacuy tak c'ahric, maj xirak chic rik'ijil chi suk chic awa' aha̱' na̱banam tak ru'um i Dios. «Je' wo', re' hat-tak re' k'e̱' suk tok'ic tak ru'um i ti'c'axic sukbok wo' ac'ux tak maj xirak chic rik'ijil chi narisukbic ac'ux tak chiwach i ti'c'axic

ru'um nok natiquixowej tak take c'acharel, re' Dios naribanam wo' chi ensukbic ac'ux tak.
