Je' aj re' naribanam awu̱c' tak i Dios maj re' hat-tak xa ru'um nitahkaljic i hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, naca̱t tak quitz'ujum take c'acharel. Je' wo', naquitz'akam k'oric chawi̱j tak eh ma'xta wo' chic ca̱t quic'ulum tak cu̱c'.

«Nachalok i ti'c'axic chana̱ tak cu'um take c'acharel, ma' nti'bic ac'ux tak, sukbok la' ac'ux tak chi ric'uluric i ti'c'axic je' ricab xquic'ul cho najtir k'i̱j take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios je' ru̱c' xquic'ul wo' cho ti'c'axic cu'um take quima̱m cati't take c'acharel re're'. Je' re' nok re' hat-tak sukbok ac'ux tak, ru'um nok ar pan taxa̱j wilic jenaj si̱ k'e̱' holohic re' nariyeb aweh tak i Dios.
Raj take bihomak re' quibanic ti' aweh tak, quiti'saj quic'ux maj re' risukquilal quic'ux wilic yu'na xa junc'am wo' ti naribanam cu̱c'.
Coric, yu'na suk quiwa' quiha̱' xa re' la' ru' nariponic i k'i̱j chi naquicuyum quiwa' quiha̱' eh to̱b ta wo' yu'na se'el quiwach, nariponic wo' i k'i̱j chi suk nacok'ic ru'um ti'quil quic'ux.

«Wi re' hat-tak xacana̱' tak nitahkaljic reh chi re' tinamit suk chic etiquik'o'rej tak, chati'saj wo' ac'ux tak. Je' re' nik'or maj wi je' re' na'n tak, ra̱j rik'orom chi re' hat-tak xiban jenaj awach tak cu̱c' take xa chucul aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios re' xa suk chic xik'o'rjic cho cu'um q'uihal queh kama̱m kati't, nqui Jesus.
Chiri̱j re', re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or: «Chi'nchel hat-tak re' c'ahchi'qui̱n abiram tak chabiraj tak i nanik'orom aweh tak wili: Chac'ax awaj ixowonel tak eh cha'n tak ato'bil queh.

Je' ricab wi re' take re' tiquisihtaj tak chi narichalic ti'c'axic chana̱ tak on wi nquitz'ak k'oric chawi̱j tak, cha'n ati̱j tak chiqui̱j eh chapahkaj tak johtok ricuse'sbal i kAja̱w Dios chi quina̱.
Je' wo' wi xatquisec' tak, ma' tic'u'lunic tak. Wi xca̱j quimak'am ajuc ro̱k tz'ih roxlo̱c' lok aso' tak, chayew tak k'ab queh chi enquic'am je ch'i̱l rica'lo̱c' aso' tak.
Je' re' nok, xa pa' bih aweh tak nca̱j quelk'am on nca̱j quimak'am, chayew tak queh eh ma̱pahkaj tak chic queh chi enquisolq'ui̱j aweh tak.
«Je' wo' nik'or aweh tak chi nic' pa' wach ac'axaric tak nawa̱j chi naribanjic aweh tak, je' wo' re' c'axo̱j cha'n tak cu̱c' take c'acharel chi pe̱t.

Ru'um aj re' chac'ax wo' take awaj ixowonel tak eh ma' ok xa re' nac'axam tak take quic'axbic aweh tak je' ricab nca'n take ma' ja' cuyu̱j ta quimahc ru'um i Dios. Je' re' nik'or chi na̱banam tak maj wi xa re' wo' ti take quic'axbic aweh tak nac'ax tak take, ma' jeno' asi̱ na̱c'ulum tak ru̱c' i Dios.

Je' wo' re' cu̱c' take ma' tiquito'bej ta tak, chato'bej wo' tak take eh ma' xa re' ok take quito'bonic aweh tak enato'bej tak take je' ricab nca'n take ma' ja' cuyu̱j ta quimahc ru'um i Dios. Je' re' nik'or chi na̱banam tak ru̱c' ato'bonic tak maj wi xa re' wo' ti take quito'bonic aweh tak nato'bej tak take, ma' jeno' asi̱ na̱c'ulum tak ru̱c' i Dios.

«Je' wo', chayew wo' tak riquime̱l i ma' riban ta chic canar riye'eric jelow-bal ric'a̱s aweh tak eh ma' xa re' ok take wilic chic rac'u̱n naquiyew aweh tak na̱yeb tak quiquimel je' ricab nca'n take ma' ja' cuyu̱j ta quimahc ru'um i Dios. Cha'n tak je' ricab nik'or maj wi xa queh wo' take nca'n canar riye'eric jelow-bal quic'a̱s nayew tak quimel, ma' jeno' asi̱ na̱c'ulum tak ru̱c' i Dios.

Re' hat-tak k'uru' chac'ax awaj ixowonel tak eh chato'bej wo' tak take ma' tiquito'bej ta tak. Nachayew tak i quimel, chayew wo' tak queh ma' nca'n ta chic canar riye'eric rijelow-bal quic'a̱s maj wi re' hat-tak je' re' na̱banam tak, re' Dios re' k'e̱' nimal rajawric nariyeb aweh tak chi na̱k'orom tak chi je' wili: ‹Re' si̱ wili k'e̱' lo̱k', nqui na̱k'orom tak. «Je' re' na̱k'orom tak nachik'or i Dios chi je' wili chawi̱j tak: ‹Re' hat-tak til hat-tak manlic wac'u̱n, nqui narik'orom. «Je' aj re' k'uru' ru'um nok re' Dios ma' xa re' ta take holohic quino'jbal ric'ax take je' la' wo' re' take c'ahbil quino'jbal,
re' hat-tak chac'ax tak take chi'nchel c'acharel je' ricab wo' riban i kAja̱w Dios.

«Reh chi re' Dios ma' eta noquic chi rich'ukuric wach amahc tak, ma' toquic wo' tak chi rich'ukuric wach quimahc awaj ixowonel tak. Ma' riban ta k'uru' chi enacoj tak quimahc take awaj ixowonel tak, chacuy la' tak quimahc reh chi je' re', re' Dios ma' eta ricoj amahc tak ela' wo' ricuy amahc tak.

Je' re' nik'or aweh tak maj wi re' hat-tak nacuy tak quimahc i tinamit, nim wo' cuybal amahc tak nariyeb i Dios xa je' na nchel naribanam jeno' chak'lam laj aj c'a̱y ixi̱m rinuksaj chi coric i ripajbal eh cu riyew chic je so' na̱ queh raj lok'o̱l. Chacoj tak rehtal k'uru' je' ricab chi jeno' aj c'a̱y, re' wo' i ripajbal ncamanic reh chi ripajaric i ric'a̱y, je' aj wo' re' ru̱c' i Dios, nic' pa' wach ricuyuric quimahc take awaj ixowonel na'n tak, je' wo' re' encamanic reh chi rilmijic wi ericuy on ma' ericuy amahc tak, nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j wili, re' Jesus xik'or queh jenaj c'uhtunic chi je' wili: «Chaj bih enc'uluric wi jeno' sot' eric'am wo' chic ribe̱h jeno' chic rich sot'? Ma' junk'ehbic ta na take pan jul, wi xquirak jeno' nim laj jul pan be̱h?

Je' aj wo' re' naquic'ulum take tinamit, wi re' hat-tak ma' holohic ano'jbal tak. Je' re' nik'or maj cu̱c' take tinamit nc'uluric je' ricab rik'or i k'oric nk'ormojic chi je' wili: ‹Re' cu aj tijem i̱b nok wilic ma' k'e̱' ta wo' chic rino'jbal wilic chiwach i raj tijinel, nqui nk'ormojic. «Je' re' nik'or maj xa re' wo' haj wilic i tijimaj take wi̱' nca'n ribanaric, tz'a̱b ru' nok re' aj tijem i̱b wi xitijej chi'nchel nic' nimal nc'uhtjic reh, no̱j wo' riban chi jenaj chic wach rino'jbal ch'i̱l i raj tijinel.

Chacana̱' tak k'uru' rich'ukuric wach quimahc take tinamit eh ma̱ban aweh tak je' ricab xiban jenaj winak re' ra̱j nak resam lok i t'uch mok'al wilic pan nak' wach i ras richa̱k' xa re' la' ma' xicoj ta rehtal chi nujunak po' pa̱m take nak' wach ru'um take riq'uihal risa̱' nak' wach.

Re' winak re're', to̱b ta nak ma' qui'ilbic ta chic take nak' wach ru'um i riq'uihal risa̱' nak' wach wilic chipam, je' wili xik'or reh ras richa̱k': ‹Ac'uh, nwesaj lok aweh i mok'al wilic pan nak' awach, nqui reh. «Til k'e̱' wo' chic ti' reh winak re're', maje'? Je' re' nik'or maj reh nak chi narilom chi coric i mok'al wilic pan nak' wach i ras richa̱k', pe̱t nak xesaj lok take riq'uihal risa̱' nak' wach wilic pan nak' wach.

«Je' re' nok nik'or aweh tak chi chajal tak wach ano'jbal maj ru̱c' ano'jbal tak nareht'aljic nic' wach i c'uhtunic na'n tak je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' junwal ok chi che̱'. Re' che̱' neht'aljic chi ma' holohic ta laj che̱' wi ma' holohic ta wo' riwachej. Raj wi holohic riwachej raj wo' rik'orom chi holohic laj che̱' wo'.
Je' re' nik'or maj re' take che̱' re' k'orel chajaric quija'quil je' wo' re' wachanic nca'n. Je' ricab junwal ok chi cak q'ui̱x ma' eta riban chi eriwachej cho u̱wa on chi eriwachej cho cak'.

«Je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' i che̱' je' wo' re' nc'uluric ru̱c' i c'acharel maj re' holohic laj k'oric rik'or jeno' c'acharel re' holohic rino'jbal, cu pa ra̱mna wo' nelic cho re' wilic cho wi̱' i holohic. Tz'a̱b ru' i ma' holohic ta laj k'oric rik'or lok jeno' c'acharel re' ma' holohic ta rino'jbal, cu pa ra̱mna wo' nelic cho re' wilic cho wi̱' c'ahbilal. Je' re' k'uru' re' c'acharel re' holohic rino'jbal, holohic laj k'oric wo' nelic cho cu pa ra̱mna, nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j i wili, re' Jesus xik'or wo' chic queh chi je' wili: «Re' hat-tak, wi ma' xachop tak ribanaric i c'ahchi'ca̱t tak nitijem wi̱', ma̱k'or tak wi̱n chi je' wili: ‹K-Aja̱w Jesus, re' hat c'ahchi'ca̱t katahkem, ma' tiqui tak wi̱n.

«Je' re' nik'or maj re' naritahkanic wi̱n curman chi narinimem chi coric i nic'uhbal c'ahchi' ribiram. Je' aj re' ru', re' waj tahkanel re' narinimem i nic'uhbal naribanam jenaj wach ru̱c' xic'ul jenaj aj tz'ako̱l naxitik'a̱' ripa̱t.

Je' wili xic'ul i winak re're': Naxoquic chi ritik'injic ripa̱t, cha̱m xikahsaj i jul cu rehtal xirak jok i cow laj ac'al re' xich'ica̱' cho wi̱' i tz'ak. Pan jenaj k'i̱j xchalic jenaj cow laj jab cu rehtal xesaj take cho ha'. Nok re' take ha' xponic quik'oj qui̱b chi cow chiwach i pa̱t re're', xa ta nak je xc'uyu'sjic so' i pa̱t. Je' re' xc'uluric ru̱c' i pa̱t re're' maj cu pan cow laj ac'al ch'iquimaj cho i ra̱'.

Tz'a̱b ru' wi re' jeno' waj tahkanel ma' rinimej ta i nic'uhbal ribiraj, naribanam jenaj wach ru̱c' xic'ul jenaj chic aj tz'ako̱l. Re're' naxip'ut ritik'injic ripa̱t xa ma' cha̱m ta wo' ti xikahsaj i jul re' xip'ut cho wi̱' ritik'injic ripa̱t eh ru'um re' naxponic rik'oj ri̱b pan ansil i ha', re' ripa̱t i aj tz'ako̱l re're' ma' xicuy ta ransil eh xhitlijic wach ac'al. Je' aj re' ru' xa ta nak chic rehtalil xcahnic so' i pa̱t re're', nqui Jesus.
Chiri̱j wili nok re' Jesus xicohlaj k'oric cu̱c' i tinamit c'ahchi' quibirinic reh, xkajic cho china̱ yu̱k' re're' eh xo̱j wo' chic pan tinamit Capernahum
re' wilic wi̱' jenaj c'amol quibe̱h take sol aj Ro̱ma. Re' winak re're' wilic jenaj raj camanom q'uisi̱n nak chic ma' nquimic ru'um riya'bilal. Ru'um chi k'e̱' ti'quil ric'raj i raj camanom,

naxibiraj ribiral chi re' Jesus wilic ar Capernahum eh je' wo' chi ric'saj take ya'bilal, je' wili xik'or queh quib xib chi rijeb tak winak chi quixilac take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel: «Chacuy, hiy tak wi̱n ru̱c' Jesus eh chapahkaj tak ato'bil reh chi c'olok ricowsaj wi̱n niyowa̱b, nqui queh.

Je' re' nok re' take winak re're' xi'o̱j ru̱c' Jesus eh je' wili xquik'or cok reh: «Ha̱w chacuy, koj-aban ato'bil chato'bej keh i cajawil take sol aj Ro̱ma. Je' re' nkapahkaj aweh maj wilic jenaj raj camanom q'uisi̱n ma' nquimic. Re' winak re're' ric'ul chi na̱to'bem

maj k'e̱' chak'lamquil ku̱c' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilco̱j chipam i tinamit wili eh ru'um re're' xitak'a̱' ritik'injic i pa̱t nkamol wi̱' ki̱b chi ritijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh i Moyses, nqui take reh.

Chi je' re', re' Jesus xo̱j wo' chiqui̱j take winak re're'. Re' cajawil i sol naxilow chi ma' naht ta chic wilque̱b ru̱c' ripa̱t, xitak'a̱' je quib xib winak wilque̱b ru̱c' chi rik'ormojic reh Jesus chi je' wili: «Ajabe̱s, ma̱ch'i'taj chic awi̱b chi chalic maj re' hin nwic'raj chi ma' ric'ul ta chi wi̱n chi etoquic pa nipa̱t

xa ta wo' nak chi equino̱j chi ac'uluric ar. Haj cok wilic nipahkaj aweh, xa re' chak'or cho chi elok lok riya'bilal i waj camanom maj ru̱c' i k'oric re're', re' hin weht'alim chi naricowjic i waj camanom.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' quik'orbal take wilic cajawric n-nimjic je' ricab niban i hin cu̱c' take ajabe̱s wilque̱b chi nina̱, on je' ricab nca'n take niso̱l ch'i̱l take waj camanom wilque̱b pa nik'ab, nquinimej wo' nik'orbal. Je' ricab, wi re' hin nitak'a̱' take je niso̱l chi nacojic, chi jumehk'il wo' ti qui'o̱j. On wi xnik'or queh chi naquichalic, chi jumehk'il wo' ti quichalic. Je' wo' cu̱c' take waj camanom, wi jeno' chi quixilac xnik'or reh chi naroquic chi camanic, chi jumehk'il wo' ti noquic chi ribanaric i pa' bih nik'or reh, nqui xitak'a̱' rik'ormojic i cajawil sol re're'.

Naxibiraj Jesus i k'oric re're', k'e̱' naxsahchic ric'ux eh je' wili xik'or queh tinamit quitahkanic reh, naxilbic je chi quina̱: «Re' winak wili, k'e̱' wo' chic ch'iclic ric'ux chiwi̱j. Til nik'or chi je' ricab ricapew-bal i winak wili, ma' ja' nirakam ta jeno' chi quixilac take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, nqui Jesus. Chi je' re' xiban wo' je' ricab xipahkaj cho cajawil sol re're'.
Je' re' ajic naxiponic pan pa̱t take xitak'abjic je ru̱c' Jesus, xponic quirak aj camanom re're' chi ma' yowa̱b ta chic, suk la' chic ric'ux.
Pan jenaj chic k'i̱j nok tahkamaj je cu'um juntuhm chi tinamit je' wo' cu'um take riq'uihal raj tahkanel, re' Jesus xo̱j pan jenaj tinamit Nayin ribihnal.
Naxponic cok chi chi̱' i tinamit re're', xic'ul jenaj cahnel ixok ch'i̱l juntuhm chi tinamit aj Nayin ojic nca'n chi rimuk'unjic i rac'u̱n ixok re're', re' xa jenaj wo' ti chiwach.
Je' re' k'uru' naxilow i Jesus chi re' ixok re're' chi xa nyot'ic chic pa ric'ux chiri̱j rac'u̱n, xiquetelej wach eh je' wili xik'or reh: «Tu̱t, chamay ok'ic chiri̱j awac'u̱n, nqui reh.

Chiri̱j chic ru' xijil cok ri̱b cu̱c' take aj tehlem a̱mna eh xitz'a'j cok i ca̱xa tehlemaj wi̱' i a̱mna. Chi je' re' ajic re' Jesus je' wili xik'or cok reh i a̱mna re're': «Ac'un, nik'or aweh yu'na chi tucten cho, nqui reh.
Ru̱c' k'oric xik'or i Jesus xc'acharic wo' chic ac'un re're', re' camnak nak chic eh chi k'oric chic riban ac'un xye'eric wo' chic reh ritu̱t.

Naxquilow re're' xsahchic quic'ux take tinamit eh ru'um re' je' wili xquik'or: «Re' Jesus wili, til re' po' i tak'amaj cho keh ru'um i Dios chi aj k'orol riC'uhbal. K'e̱' chak'lamquil i Dios chi wilic chi kaxilac yu'na chi katobjic, nqui take.
Ru̱c' xiban re're' i Jesus, xquitok'a̱' quesam lok ribiral pan tak tinamit wilque̱b chi rica'ja̱ i tinamit re're', cu rehtal xponic ar pan tak tinamit wilque̱b pa riyuk'ul Jure̱ya.

Ar aj ru' naxquibiraj ribiral re' take aj tijem qui̱b chiri̱j i Wa̱n, xi'o̱j ru̱c' i caj tijinel re' tz'aplic cho wi̱' pan che̱' chi rik'ormojic reh chaj bih xquibiraj je. Naxibiraj i Wa̱n, xiyuk'ej qui̱b chi aj tijem i̱b chiri̱j

eh xitak'a̱' take je ru̱c' i Jesus chi naquibiram reh chi je' wili: «Til re' na hat i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric k'oro̱j cahnok ribiral chi naric'ulic lok on cu nakuy'em chic jeno'? tiquirok tak reh, nqui je Wa̱n queh.

Naxiponic take winak wili ru̱c' i Jesus je' wili xquik'or cok reh: «Ajabe̱s Jesus, re' Wa̱n re' xkahsanic quiha̱' i tinamit xojritak'a̱' cho awu̱c' chi nakabiram aweh chi je' wili: Til re' na hat i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric k'oro̱j cahnok ribiral chi naric'ulic lok on cu nakuy'em chic jeno'? nqui take cok reh.

Naxca'n cok i k'oric re're', xa re' nok re' Jesus je' wili c'ahchi' ribanam: C'ahchi' risakomem pa̱m nak' quiwach take sot'. Je' wo', c'ahchi' resam lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal cu̱c' take c'acharel oconak take wi̱'. Je' re' ajic nok yohbal wach take yowa'i̱b c'ahchi' ricowsam take Jesus,

je' wili k'oric xiban queh aj tijem i̱b re're': «Hiy tak, tisoljen wo' tak chic je ru̱c' i Wa̱n eh chak'or tak reh re' xabiraj tak chi c'ahchi' nic'uhbalem eh je' wo' chak'or take reh i c'ahchi' awilom tak wili: Chi yohbal wach take sot' c'ahchi' chic qui'ilbic, chi yohbal wach take si̱c c'ahchi' chic quibehic, chi yohbal wach take xilim qui̱j c'ahchi' chic relic lok quiya'bilal eh chi wilic wo' camnak chic take c'ahchi' wo' chic quic'a'chsjic cho. Je' re' ajic nachak'or wo' tak reh Wa̱n chi queh take cajwam wach ato'bil re' hin c'ahchi' nic'uhbalem i holohic laj c'uhbal chiri̱j i co'lbal c'ahchi' riyeb i Dios,
chak'or wo' tak reh chi k'e̱' ato̱b reh c'acharel re' ma' ripoh'aj ta ric'ux chiwi̱j, nqui Jesus queh.

Chiri̱j wili nok soljonak chic je take aj tijem i̱b chiri̱j i Wa̱n, re' Jesus je' wili p'uht rik'orom queh tinamit chiri̱j i Wa̱n: «Nok cu wilic i Wa̱n chi kahsanic ha' ar pan tak ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel, xatponic na tak cho ar ilol reh jeno' winak je' ru̱c' xa chac'am je je' wulu' ru̱c' toco̱m laj no'jbal je' ricab ric'ul jeno' t'uch xiq'uey xa pa' nc'amaric je ru'um i te̱w?

Ma'xta, maje'? Chaj bih xponic awilow tak cho ar k'uru'? Ma' re' ta nchel jeno' queh raj to'o̱l k'atal k'oric je' ru̱c' xa chak'wach laj tz'ih chic ricoj chiri̱j maj re' take c'acharel je' ricab re're', ar quicamanic eh quiwih'ic pan suk laj c'acharic ar pan tak chak'wach laj pa̱t re' quic'acharic wo' wi̱' take k'atal k'oric, maje'?

Chaj wo' bih xponic awilow tak cho ar k'uru'? Re' hin til nik'or aweh tak chi ar xponic awilow tak cho jenaj winak nim riwa'ric. Je' re' xa'n tak maj re' hat-tak nacoj tak chi re' Wa̱n jenaj aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios. Coric, re' Wa̱n jenaj aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios xa re' la' re' riwa'ric ricamaj xi̱c' wo' chic na̱ chiwach riwa'ric quicamaj take toco̱m rich aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios.

Nik'or chi je' re' riwa'ric maj chiri̱j i Wa̱n xtz'ihmjic cho naxik'or i Dios reh rAc'u̱n chi je' wili: “Re' hin naca̱t nitak'a̱b jok wach ac'al, xa re' la' chiwach jok awojic i hat, pe̱t nanitak'a̱b je cu̱c' i tinamit jenaj waj tz'e' wa̱ch. Re' aj re' nariye'bic rehtal queh aponic i hat je' ricab chi jeno' winak c'ahchi' ta nak ritik'a̱' ribe̱h jeno' k'atal k'oric ponic reh, nqui xtz'ihmjic cho naxik'or i Dios chi je' re'.

«Ru'um aj re' til nik'or chi re' riwa'ric i Wa̱n xiq'uic wo' chic na̱ chiwach quiwa'ric chi'nchel take asjanak take ayu' wach ac'al. Raj la' chawach hat-tak re' titahkanic tak wi̱n to̱b ta nak ma' nim ta ti wach acamaj tak, ma' xiq'uic ta wo' chic na̱ riwa'ric i Wa̱n, re' la' hat-tak xiq'uic wo' chic na̱ awa'ric tak chiwach ru' maj re' hat-tak wilca̱t tak chi quixilac take choplic quic'ux chi coric chiri̱j i c'uhbal rik'or chi re' Dios re' nk'atbic k'oric ra̱j richopom quina̱ take c'acharel,

je' ricab xca'n wo' take aj molol to̱j ntak'abjic je Ro̱ma naxquibiraj i c'uhbal re're' ru̱c' i Wa̱n. Je' aj re' xiq'uic wo' chic na̱ quiwa'ric take toco̱m chic c'acharel re' xquichop quic'ux chiri̱j i c'uhbal re're' maj re' take re' naxkajic quiha̱' ru'um i Wa̱n xquirak chiri̱j chi k'e̱' tare̱t rino'jbal i Dios chi xitak'a̱' cho rik'ormojic i kahsanic ha'.

Raj take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l wo' take aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal re're' je' wili xquik'or: ‹Chaj camaj keh hoj rino'jbal i Dios chi narikahsjic kaha̱'? nqui take eh ru'um re' ma' xi'o̱j ta ru̱c' i Wa̱n chi rikahsjic quiha̱'.
«Chi je' re' quino'jbal take c'acharel re' hin nibiraj aweh tak i wili: Nic' aj wach quiwa'ric take c'acharel re're', re' ma' quicojbic ta wach nic'uhbal chiwach rik'ijil nic'acharic ayu'?

Re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi re' quiwa'ric take re', je' na ricab quiwa'ric take juntuhm ok chi aj ux je' wili no'jbal xca'n: Junpech, naxquimol qui̱b pan c'aybal i juntuhm chi aj ux re're', ru'um chi ma' haj ta wilic quic'o'nic xca̱j wi̱' oquic, je' wili xk'ormojic queh cu'um quich'i̱l: ‹Xa pa' jaric c'o'nic xka'n ribanaric ma' xawa̱j ta tak kihch'iljic. Xojco'nic chi xka'n banoj su̱b chi xa suk chic pan kac'ux, ma' xa'n ta wo' aso̱n tak. Xka'n wo' c'o'nic xa kok'im chic je' ricab nca'n nanquimic jeno' hab wach, ma' xa'n ta wo' awok'im tak, nqui banol queh.

«Je' aj re' no'jbal nik'or chi nca'n take tinamit ma' quicojbic ta wach nic'uhbal re're' maj naxwih'ic i Wa̱n aj kahsem ha' chi quic'uhbaljic, re' take re' je' wili xquik'or reh Wa̱n ru'um nquilow chi re're' cuc'lam xilac ricuy riwa' riha̱' eh chi ma' no̱j ta wo' pan tak nink'i̱j: ‹Re' winak re're', ma' suk ta pa̱m na̱ maj cajawil ma' tob laj uxlabal nbehsenic reh, nqui take.

«Re' chic yu'na chi wilqui̱n chi c'uhbalanic i hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, je' wili nquik'or wi̱n ru'um nquilow chi niban niwa' niha̱' eh chi nic'u'lej na̱ ojic pan tak nink'i̱j: ‹Chak'or je winak re', xa suk reh wi'c ha' eh xa ric'u'lej wo' na̱ ojic pan tak nink'i̱j re' no̱j rimol wi̱' ri̱b cu̱c' take wilic quibiral chi aj mahc, je' ricab take aj molol to̱j ntak'abjic je Ro̱ma, nqui take wi̱n.

«Ru̱c' aj nquik'or take c'acharel re're' til c'ahchi' quik'orom chi re' Dios ma'xta so' rino'jbal ru̱c' c'ahchi' ribanam, raj i hin nik'or aweh tak chi re' take c'acharel re' ye'o̱j chic quiwa'ric ru'um i Dios chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n take ma' je' ta re' nquik'or, re' la' nquik'or ru' chi re' Dios k'e̱' wo' chic rino'jbal wilic, nqui Jesus queh.

Ar aj wo' pan tinamit re're', jenaj winak je' ru̱c' cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses je' wili xik'or reh i Jesus: «Chacuy Ha̱w, ojok ti aban cho awa' wu̱c' pa nipa̱t, nqui reh. Naxponic i Jesus pa ripa̱t i winak re're', xoquic nah me̱xa eh xoquic chi wi'c.

Chipam i tinamit re're' wilic wo' jenaj ixok wilic ribiral chi aj mahc. Re' ixok re're' naxibiraj chi re' Jesus wi'c riban pa ripa̱t i winak re're', xic'ahmaj cho jenaj t'uch c'ola̱b wilic nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m chipam eh xo̱j ru̱c' Jesus.

Naxponic pa ripa̱t i winak re're' xijil cok ri̱b ru̱c' Jesus eh xitz'uka̱' jok ri̱b ju' ro̱k. Chiri̱j ru' xitok'a̱' ok'ic, xit'aksaj take ro̱k i Jesus ru̱c' ri̱s nak' wach eh naxichiksaj take ro̱k i Jesus ru̱c' rismal na̱, xitz'ub take eh xibuch' wo' take chipam nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m.

Naxilow i cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi je' re' xiban ixok re're', je' wili xik'or pa ric'ux: «Ha̱', wi ta nak re' winak wili aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios, xirak nak chic chiri̱j chi re' ixok ntz'a'anic cok reh take ro̱k ma'xta chic so' ricorquil ric'acharic maj wilic ribiral chi aj mahc, nqui xik'or pa ric'ux.
Ru'um aj re', re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh Simon: «Simon, jenaj k'oric nwa̱j nik'orom aweh, nqui reh. —Tare̱t Ha̱w, chak'or cho, nqui Simon. Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh:
«Junpech cho, quib take winak wilic quic'a̱s ru̱c' jenaj aj ye'ol quime̱l. Re' ric'a̱s i jenaj, laj pech chic niq'uic johtok riq'uihal chiwach ric'a̱s i jenaj.

Naxponic rik'ijil i tojbal reh quic'a̱s, ma' hab ta wach queh quib aj c'a̱s re're' xiban canar ritojoric ric'a̱s. Ru'um aj re', re' aj ye'ol quime̱l xc'ulic pa ric'ux ricuyuric quimahc. Yu'na k'uru' Simon, hab wach queh quib aj c'a̱s re're' k'e̱' wo' chic ritioxbal xic'uhtaj ru̱c' aj ye'ol quime̱l nanak'or i hat? nqui Jesus.
Chalic Simon je' wili xik'or: «Nanik'or hin, re' wo' i yohbal wach q'uihal ric'a̱s xcuyuric, nqui xik'or. —Je' re', coric xak'or, nqui Jesus.

Je' re' nok re' Jesus xilow jok ixok re're' eh je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh Simon: «Simon, chawilow riban ixok wili: Je' ricab chi hin ta nak jenaj rula̱' re' xinc'ulic lok pa ripa̱t, re're' xitz'aj take wo̱k ma' re' ta nchel ru̱c' ha', til pe' ru̱c' la' ri̱s nak' wach xiban. Je' wo' chic xichiksaj pe' take wo̱k ma' re' ta ru̱c' jenaj quich til la' ru̱c' rismal i na̱. Raj nchel hat naxinc'ulic lok pan apa̱t, xa ta nak xayew so' tz'ajbal wo̱k.
Ru'um aj re' nik'or chi ma' ru̱c' ta wo' risukquil ac'ux xinac'ul pan apa̱t maj ma' xinatz'ub ta chi nitioxjic, raj ixok wili ma' rimay ta ritz'uburic take wo̱k
eh je' wo', ma' xinahi'lsaj ta chi coric maj ma' xabuch' ta wo' nina̱ ru̱c' ik'ombal wach nahis, raj ixok wili til xibuch' take wo̱k ru̱c' nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m q'uih ritz'akil.

Je' re' k'uru' Simon, re' hat xak'or chi re' yohbal wach q'uihal ric'a̱s xcuyuric, re're' k'e̱' wo' chic ritioxbal xic'uhtaj chiwach aj ye'ol quime̱l, raj i mahnic' ti ric'a̱s xcuyuric, mahnic' wo' ti ritioxbal xic'uhtaj. Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh chi re' ixok wili til weht'alim i hin chi yohbal wach q'uihal rimahc xcuyuric maj k'e̱' wo' chic ritioxbal xic'uhtaj wu̱c', nqui Jesus reh.
Chiri̱j aj re', re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh ixok re're': «Tu̱t, re' amahc cuyu̱j chic chi'nchel, nqui reh.

Naxquibiraj chi je' re' take rich'i̱l i Simon re' wi'c nca'n cok ch'i̱l Jesus, je' wili xquik'or chi quiwach: «Chaj ti jaric rajawric i winak wili pa ric'ux chi xik'or reh ixok re're' chi cuyu̱j chic rimahc? nqui take chi quiwach.

Je' aj re' ru' nok ojic chic reh ixok re're', re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh: «Le̱y, re' amahc xnicuy chic yu'na maj re' hat xach'ica̱' ac'ux chiwi̱j chi wilic wajawric chi ricuyuric amahc. Yu'na k'uru' tisoljen je pan apa̱t eh re' sukquil c'uxlis riyew i Dios wih'ok awu̱c', nqui reh.

Nok ritikim chic ju' rojic pa riyuk'ul i Calile̱ya, re' Jesus xik'or queh tinamit i holohic laj ribiral wili chi re' Dios re' nk'atbic k'oric ra̱j richopom quina̱ take c'acharel. Je' re' rik'or naribehsaj pa̱m take nimak chi cuc' tak tinamit wilque̱b chipam i yuk'ul re're' nok c'ahchi' ribe̱h rich'i̱l take cablaj chi raj tahkanel,

ch'i̱l wo' take quib xib ixok re' xic'saj quiya'bilal je' ru̱c' nquicoj take ma' tob laj uxlabal. Je' ricab i Mari̱ya re' ribihnej wo' chi aj Majta̱la, re' wuku̱b chi ma' tob laj uxlabal xesmejic lok ru̱c', re' wo' jenaj chiri̱j i Jesus,

ch'i̱l ti' Susa̱na, ch'i̱l ti' Juwa̱na re' rehq'ue̱n i Cu̱sa aj ilol camanom chipam ripa̱t i Hero̱res. Re' take ixok re're' ma' xa ta nquitahkej i Jesus, nquito'bej la' ru̱c' tumi̱n, je' ricab nca'n wo' take toco̱m chic ixok quitahkanic wo' reh Jesus.
Nok ihch'ilimaj cu'um take raj tahkanel chi'nchel re're', pan jenaj k'i̱j je' wili jenaj jalwach k'oric xik'or Jesus queh juntuhm chi c'acharel xquimol qui̱b ru̱c' re' chalanak take chi sut tinamit:

«Junpech jenaj winak xo̱j tico̱l rija̱' chipam riye'a̱b. Re're' xoquic je chi tic xa re' la' ru' re' banoj tic ocronak take wi̱' je' ru̱c' xa chaquilej je aweh nca'n. Ru'um aj re' wilic take xikajic pan be̱h, xyak'aric quipa̱m cu'um take behel eh xic'uxuric cu'um take cuc' tz'iquin.
Wilic wo' rija̱' xikajic xilac tak abaj xipok' nak cho xa re' la' xichikic maj re' ritz'i̱' ra̱' ma' xirak ta rex laj ac'al.
Wilic wo' rija̱' xikajic xilac tak q'ui̱x, xipok' wo' nak cho xa re' la' naxtz'aparic quina̱ cu'um take q'ui̱x xiq'uihic ti johtok chi nok chiwach take tic re're', xiquimic je.

Wilic aj take rija̱' je' re' xquic'ul, xa re' la' wilic wo' take rija̱' xikajic pan holohic laj ac'al, re' cok take re' xipok' cho chi coric eh naxiq'uihic johtok k'e̱' wo' chic xiwachanic cu rehtal xiwachej ho'c'ahl (100) t'ohr i ju'jun wal, nqui xik'or Jesus. Naxicohlaj rik'ormojic i jalwach k'oric wili i Jesus, xijohsaj pa̱m rik'orbal eh je' wili xik'or queh xquimol qui̱b ar: «Re' k'as axiquin tak chi birinic camanok aweh tak chi rirakmajic chiri̱j re' xnik'or lok wili, nqui Jesus.
Chiri̱j chic ru', re' take raj tahkanel i Jesus je' wili xquik'or reh: «Chaj bih nelic wi̱' i jalwach k'oric re're'? nqui take reh.

Chalic Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Ma' hab ta nak wach neht'alanic reh ribiral chi re' Dios re' nk'atbic k'oric ra̱j richopom quina̱ take c'acharel, raj la' yu'na re' hat-tak xye'eric chic k'ab aweh tak chi narisakomjic wach aweh tak re're'. Ru'um aj re', re' hin nanik'orom aweh tak chaj bih nelic wi̱' i jalwach k'oric re're' raj nchel take junleh re' ma' quitahkanic ta wi̱n, xa ru̱c' jalwach k'oric nanik'orom queh niC'uhbal reh chi ma' eta nquirak chiri̱j re' niban on re' nik'or, to̱b ta nak nquilow on to̱b ta nak quibiraj.
Re' jalwach k'oric re're' je' aj wili nelic wi̱': Re' take ija' rijalwachej riC'uhbal i Dios c'ahchi' nik'orom.

Re' ija' xkajic pan be̱h eh xc'uxuric ru'um tz'iquin rijalwachej i niC'uhbal ma' nquic'ol ta pan ca̱mna take tinamit nanquibiraj eh ru'um re' nc'ulic lok aj Yahm chi resmejic lok pan ca̱mna reh chi ma' eta nquiyew quic'ux ru̱c' i Dios. Je' re' riban aj Yahm reh chi ma' eta quico'ljic.

«Re' chic take ija' xikajic xilac tak abaj rijalwachej i niC'uhbal xa suk chic quic'ux nanquibiraj take c'acharel, xa re' la' ma' nquichop ta quic'ux ru̱c' chi coric, xa je' quicab junwal ok chi tic ma' cha̱m ta kajanak rira'il pan ac'al. Je' re' nok re' take c'acharel re're' xa junc'am ti nquicoj wach niC'uhbal eh je' re' nik'or chi nca'n maj naquipajaric ilbal reh wi xquicoj wach chi coric, nquicana̱' wo' chic rinimjic.

«Re' take ija' xikajic xilac tak q'ui̱x rijalwachej i niC'uhbal nquibiraj take c'acharel, xa re' la' nquitz'ap jok na̱ pan ca̱mna ru'um nquiyew quic'ux chi risiq'uiric quibihomal pan quic'acharic. Ru̱c' lahtz'il nquicoj chi quina̱ reh chi naquiwih'ic chi suk quic'ux, re' take tinamit re're' xa je' quicab junwal ok chi tic ma' nwachanic ta eh je' re' nik'or chi nca'n maj re' take re' ma' nca'n ta ribanaric haj wilic rik'or niC'uhbal.

Re' take ija' xikajic pan holohic laj ac'al rijalwachej i niC'uhbal nquibiraj take c'acharel holohic wach quino'jbal. Re' take c'acharel re're' ru'um nok nquichop quic'ux ru̱c' niC'uhbal nquibiraj, no̱j wo' ca'n chi aj banol take reh chaj bih ra̱j i Dios to̱b ta c'olok lok ti'c'axic chi quina̱. Ru̱c' aj re', re' take c'acharel re're' je' na quicab junwal ok chi tic xa c'ahchi' wo' chi wachanic.

«Re' niC'uhbal je' wo' ricab jeno' sakombal. Je' re' nik'or maj ma' hab ta wach rikop jeno' sakombal reh chi naritac'a̱b na̱ pan jeno' tz'ak ac'al xun, on reh chi naric'olom cok rehquen jeno' yoca̱b, rit'uya̱' la' johtok wa taxa̱j sakombal queh take qui'oquic cok pan pa̱t. Je' wo' re' niC'uhbal ma' c'ahchi' ta nic'olom chi quiwach i tinamit, c'ahchi' la' nik'orom lok queh.

Je' re' niban maj re' niC'uhbal, re're' risakomonej pa̱m quicapew-bal take c'acharel reh chi naqueht'alim chi'nchel rino'jbal i Dios, je' ricab riban i sakombal chi'nchel risakomej, ma'xta bih wilic chi ma' ta nak enrakmajic, on chi ma' ta nak enilmijic wach ru'um risakomil i sakombal.

«Yu'na k'uru' chi sakomomaj chic wach aweh tak i qui̱b chi jalwach k'oric re're', chacoj tak rehtal nic' wach ribirmijic niC'uhbal ena'n tak. Je' re' nik'or maj wi wilic ac'ux tak chi rinimjic, re' Dios til nariyeb aweh tak chi na̱rakam tak chiri̱j rino'jbal. Raj wi ma'xta ac'ux tak chi rinimjic, ma' xa re' ta eriban chi ma' eta narak tak chiri̱j rino'jbal, narimak'am la' wo' aweh tak i haj nak ti wilic i no'jbal nak'or tak chi xatijej tak ru̱c' niC'uhbal, nqui Jesus.
Chi cu c'ahchi' wo' chi k'oric i Jesus, xponic i ritu̱t ch'i̱l take richa̱k' ar re' wilic wi̱'. Ru'um nok ma' xca'n ta cok canar oquic ru̱c' ru'um reh riq'uihal i tinamit quimolom qui̱b chiri̱j,
je' wili xk'ormojic cok reh: «Re' atu̱t ch'i̱l take acha̱k' wilque̱b lok rij pa̱t nca̱j ca̱t quik'o'rem, nqui take cok reh Jesus.

Re' Jesus naxibiraj chi je' re', je' wili xik'or queh take wilque̱b ar: «Re' hat-tak re' nabiraj tak eh nanimej tak riC'uhbal i Dios re' c'ahchi' nik'orom, k'e̱' hat-tak lo̱k' chi niwach. Je' na ricab hat-tak nitu̱t nicha̱k' chi niwach, nqui Jesus queh.

Nok cu c'ahchi' chi c'uhbalanic pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya, pan jenaj k'i̱j re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh raj tahkanel: «Kojk'ahxok tak je pan cano̱wa chi juntar ma' laj ha' wili, nqui queh. Je' re' naxi'oquic je pan jenaj nim laj cano̱wa

eh nok naquibe̱h chic je nah ha', re' Jesus xkajic chi wiric. Junc'am chic ru', xchalic jenaj rinimal cow laj te̱w cu rehtal xucsaj take ribohl ha'. Re' take raj tahkanel, naxquilow chi pan yohbal chic wilque̱b maj xa cuc' tak nak chic ma' nsoljic quicano̱wa chi quehqueh ru'um ribohl i ha',

xo̱j quic'a'saj wach i Jesus eh je' wili xquik'or cok reh: «Ajabe̱s aj tijinel, c'a'chok awach! Nakacux'ic yu'na, nqui take reh. Re' Jesus xuctic cho eh je' wili xik'or: «Tipa̱' hat te̱w eh tituklujok hat ha', nqui xik'or. Xa chiwach wo' ti junc'am re're' xpa'lajic i te̱w eh tuklujic wo' ti i ha'.

Re' take raj tahkanel naxquilow nic' wach xiban i Jesus, xsahchic quic'ux eh je' wili xquik'or chi quiwach: «Re' cok i Jesus wili til niq'uic wo' chic na̱ rajawric. Ma' xa ta re' take ma' tob laj uxlabal quibirinic chiwach, je' la' wo' i te̱w ch'i̱l i ha' quibirinic wo' k'oric chiwach, nqui take. Je' re' ajic ru'um chi k'e̱' xiyo'jic chiwach ransil i te̱w ch'i̱l ribohl i ha', re' Jesus xinak take raj tahkanel chi je' wili: «Re' hat-tak ma' xatyo'jic ta nak tak, xach'ica̱' la' nak ac'ux tak chiri̱j rajawric Dios, nqui queh.
Chiri̱j ru' re' Jesus quich'i̱l take cablaj chi raj tahkanel xik'ahxic lok juntar ha' pan quiyuk'ul take aj Cara̱ra re' c'ul ha' take ch'i̱l quiyuk'ul aj Calile̱ya.

Xa re' wo' ti xi'elic lok pan nim laj cano̱wa xchalic chi quic'uluric jenaj winak aj Cara̱ra. Re' winak re're' najtir chic chopo̱j na̱ ric'acharic cu'um take ma' tob laj uxlabal eh ru'um re' naribe̱h chi ma'xta chic riso' chiri̱j eh ma' nc'acharic ta wo' chic pa ripa̱t, xa ar la' chic nah a̱mna chi xilac tak rijulil camnak nc'acharic.

Je' aj re' nok c'ahchi' rijilim cok ri̱b ru̱c' Jesus, xchowonic johtok chi xa tohlic chic pa ralak eh je' wili xik'or naxponic rixuc'a̱' ri̱b chiwach: «Chacuy Jesus, ma' quinayew pan ti'c'axic. Chaj bih nimahc awu̱c' i hat rAc'u̱n i Dios re' k'e̱' rinimal rajawric chi naquinayeb pan ti'c'axic? nqui reh.

Je' re' xik'or maj p'uht rik'orom reh ma' tob laj uxlabal re're' chi narelic lok ru̱c' i winak re' najtir rip'utum cho richoporic na̱ ric'acharic eh q'uih pech wo' ric'am je pan tak ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel, nariyew ransil chi rit'upuric je take c'aham ch'ihch' nbac'aric wi̱' cu'um i tinamit.

Je' re' ajic nok re' Jesus c'ahchi' rit'erem lok i ma' tob laj uxlabal, xibiraj wo' reh chi je' wili: «Chaj bih abihnal? nqui reh. —Tuhbil nibihnal, nqui ma' tob laj uxlabal. Je' re' xik'or maj k'e̱' q'uihal take chi ma' tob laj uxlabal oconak take cho ru̱c' i winak re're'.

Chi je' re' k'uru' re' ma' tob laj uxlabal re're' naxibiraj chi naritak'abjic je ch'i̱l take rich'i̱l ar chipam richamil i jul cahk re' nquic'ul wi̱' ti'c'axic take quich ma' tob laj uxlabal, tohk' ripahkam ricuyuric reh Jesus chi ma'xta ritak'abjic je ar ch'i̱l take rich'i̱l.
Chi je' re' xquipahkaj reh Jesus chi ar chic nacoquic cu̱c' juntuhm chi riq'uihal ahk wi'c nca'n je ma' naht ta chiwach jenaj yu̱k'. Xa re' wo' ti xye'eric k'ab queh ru'um Jesus,

re' take ma' tob laj uxlabal ar chic xi'oquic cu̱c' take ahk re're', re' xa cajamem chic qui̱b xikajic jok chiwach pa'lic laj yu̱k' wilque̱b wi̱' cu rehtal xi'o̱j k'ehbok chipam ma' laj ha' re' xijihk'ic wi̱' chi'nchel.

Ar aj ru' re' take aj cha'jem ahk naxquilow chi je' re' xc'uluric, xa cajamem chic qui̱b xi'o̱j pan tak abi̱x eh je' wo' chipam cok i tinamit re're' chi rik'ormojic ribiral chaj bih xc'uluric. Ru'um aj re', re' take c'acharel aj Cara̱ra

xquicana̱' cho quitinami̱t, xi'o̱j chi riliric chaj bih xc'uluric. Naxi'o̱j c'olok ru̱c' Jesus, xquirak chi rich'i̱l chic i winak re' xi'elic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal ru̱c'. Je' re' k'uru' nok re' take tinamit re're' xquilow chi re' winak re're' tz'uklic chic cok chi ribirmijic ric'uhbal i Jesus je' wo' chi wilic chic riso' chiri̱j eh chi na'lic chic reh i k'oric riban, k'e̱' naxoquic cho quiyo'jic chiwach i Jesus.

Je' re' xca'n to̱b ta wo' re' take jarub pa' xquiwachej chi coric re' chaj bih xc'uluric ru̱c' i winak re're', xquik'or wo' nak ricorquil nic' wach i cowjic xiban i winak re're', re' wilic nak take ma' tob laj uxlabal ru̱c'.

Ru'um quiyo'jic xchalic take tinamit aj Cara̱ra, tohk' quipahkam reh Jesus chi je' wili: «Chacuy Ha̱w, telen je chi kaxilac, nqui take reh. Naxibiraj chi je' re', re' Jesus xelic cho chi quixilac eh naxoquic cok pan nim laj cano̱wa ch'i̱l take raj tahkanel chi naquichopom je quibe̱h,

re' winak re' chopo̱j nak na̱ ric'acharic ru'um ma' tob laj uxlabal, je' wili tohk' ripahkam reh Jesus: «Chacuy ha̱w, chayew k'ab wi̱n chi equino̱j chawi̱j, nqui reh. Raj la' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh winak re're', naxich'ak cahnok chi chi̱' ha':

«Tisoljen je pan apa̱t eh chak'or queh awas acha̱k' i rinimal wach ato'bil xiban i Dios awu̱c', nqui Jesus. Je' aj re' ru' re' winak re're' xo̱j wo' pa ripa̱t eh naxponic pa ritinami̱t, c'ul xesaj ribiral rinimal c'axo̱j xiban i Jesus pa ric'acharic.

Chiri̱j chic ru' naxelic cho pan quiyuk'ul take aj Cara̱ra, re' Jesus xsoljic wo' chic je pan quiyuk'ul aj Calile̱ya. Re' take re' k'e̱' xsukbic quic'ux naxquilow wach maj xa c'ahchi' chic cuy'em chi nariponic wo' chic cu̱c'.

Je' aj re' pan jenaj k'i̱j xponic ru̱c' Jesus i jenaj winak Ja̱yro ribihnal nim riwa'ric chi quixilac take c'amol be̱h chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Re're' naxixuc'a̱' ri̱b chiwach, xa nch'uk chic ric'ux xipahkaj reh Jesus chi narojic pa ripa̱t

maj re' xa jenaj wo' ti chi rixk'u̱n re' cablaj na ha̱b wilic reh xa chic q'uisi̱n ma' nquimic ru'um riya'bilal. Re' Jesus naxibiraj chi je' re' xo̱j chiri̱j eh nok c'ahchi' rojic, q'uihal tinamit xa nquilutz'ej chic quib chiri̱j chi ritahkaljic je.

Chi quixilac take tinamit re're' wilic jenaj ixok wilic jenaj riya'bilal c'axic wach. Re' riya'bilal ixok wili re' chi re' ritz'ajo̱j re' nchalic chiri̱j eli̱c poh xa c'ahchi' chic cho chiri̱j chi xa ma'xta chic rik'ijil eh cablaj chic ha̱b rip'utum cho reh chi je' re'. Ru'um reh riya'bilal re're', chi'nchel i ritz'a̱k wilic xisach cu̱c' take aj ik'omonel, xa re' la' ma' jeno' queh xrakbic rik'omal riya'bilal.

Je' aj re', xa chiwach wo' i junc'am re're' nok re' ixok re're' xijil cok ri̱b chiri̱j i Jesus eh xitz'a'j cok ro̱k i su't rijela̱' nah teleb ru', ximay wo' ti je riya'bilal re're'. Chi je' re' xcahnic wo' chic pa riwi̱' i ripohal.

Ar ajic re' Jesus je' wili xik'or: «Hab wach xtz'a'anic wi̱n? nqui xik'or. —Ma' hab ta wach c'ahchi' ritz'a'anic aweh, nqui take tinamit. Nok je' re' xquik'or i tinamit, re' ma' Luch je' wili xik'or cok reh Jesus: «Ajabe̱s aj tijinel keh, hab wach xtz'a'anic wi̱n, tiqui. Ma' nawil ta na chi re' take riq'uihal tinamit c'ahchi'ca̱t quiminlom eh c'ahchi'ca̱t quilutz'um? nqui xik'or reh.
Ar re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or: «Re' ransil i wajawric chi resmejic lok ya'bilal xwic'raj chi wilic jeno' ya'bilal xesaj lok. Ru'um aj re' weht'alim chi wilic xtz'a'anic wi̱n, nqui Jesus.

Re' ixok re're' naxilow chi ma' xpohyic ta na̱ i xiban, xa nt'ort'otic chic i ra̱mna xchalic rixuc'a̱' ri̱b chiwach i Jesus. Je' re' nok chi quiwach take riq'uihal i tinamit je' wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Chiwach i junc'am nok re' hin xnitz'a'j cok aso' xiq'uic je niya'bilal, nqui reh. Chiri̱j chic re' xisakomej wo' wach reh Jesus chaj bih riwi̱' naxitz'a'j cok i riso'.

Ar ajic re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Le̱y, re' hat xiq'uic je aya'bilal ru'um chi xacoj wach chi wilic wajawric chi ic'sinic ya'bilal. Yu'na k'uru' tisoljen je pan apa̱t ru̱c' i sukquil c'uxlis xiyew aweh i Dios, nqui reh.

Cu k'oric aj wo' riban i Jesus ru̱c' ixok re're', jenaj winak xchalic pa ripa̱t i ma' Ja̱yro re' jenaj queh aj c'amol be̱h chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, xponic chi rik'ormojic reh chi je' wili: «Ha̱w, re' awixk'u̱n junc'am chic riquimic je. Chak'or reh ajabe̱s aj tijinel wili chi ma' rich'ey chic ri̱b chi ojic pan apa̱t, nqui reh.

Naxibiraj i Jesus chi je' re', je' wili xik'or reh ma' Ja̱yro: «Ma̱poh'aj ac'ux ma' Ja̱yro. Chach'ica̱' la' ac'ux chiwi̱j chi wilic wajawric chi quic'a'chsjic take camnak eh re' awixk'u̱n ewo' chic nc'acharic cho, nqui reh.

Je' aj re' ru' xquitik ju' cojic eh xi'o̱j c'olok pa ripa̱t i ma' Ja̱yro. Ar re' Jesus ma' xa̱j ta chi hab wach xoquic cok chiri̱j re' wilic wi̱' ixk'un, xa re' ti wach i ma' Luch ch'i̱l i ma' Jaco̱wo ch'i̱l i Wa̱n eh ch'i̱l wo' take ritu̱t raja̱w ixk'un xi'oquic cok chiri̱j.

Naxi'oquic aj cok pan pa̱t, chi'nchel take wilque̱b ar xa ti' chic pan quic'ux ok'ic nca'n chiri̱j ixk'un. Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' rixk'u̱n ma' Ja̱yro wili ma' camnak ta wiric la' riban. Je' re' nok chamay tak wi̱n ok'ic, nqui queh.
Re' take tinamit xi'oquic chi rise'ljic i Jesus maj queht'alim chi re' ixk'un camnak chic.
Chi je' aj re', re' Jesus xich'ihlej johtok chi k'ab ixk'un re're' eh cow xik'or reh chi je' wili: «Ixk'un, tucten cho, nqui reh.
Xa chiwach wo' junc'am re're', re' ixk'un xc'acharic wo' chic cho eh xuctic johtok chiwach riyoca̱b. Ar ajic re' Jesus xik'or queh ritu̱t raja̱w chi naquiyeb riwa' riha̱'.

Je' wo', xik'or wo' queh chi je' wili: «Re' xc'uluric wili ma' hab wach aj eh nak'or tak lok ribiral, nqui queh. Re' take ritu̱t raja̱w xquibiraj i xik'or i Jesus chi xa nsahchic chic quic'ux ru̱c' xc'ulmujic lok re're'.

Nok cu wilic pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya, pan jenaj k'i̱j re' Jesus ximol quiwach take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel eh je' wili xik'or queh: «Tinipahba̱' tak chi wih'ok awajawric tak chi quit'ermejic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal cu̱c' take c'acharel choplic quina̱ cu'um, je' wo' chi resmejic lok quiya'bilal take yowa'i̱b, nqui queh.
Ru̱c' take k'oric re're' xitak'a̱' je take cu̱c' i tinamit chi quicowsjic take yowa'i̱b je' wo' chi rik'ormojic queh chi re' Dios re' nk'atbic k'oric ra̱j richopom quina̱ take c'acharel.

Je' wo', xk'ormojic wo' queh chi je' wili ru'um Jesus naxi'o̱j: «Ma'xta bih aweh tak na̱c'amam tak je reh wach abe̱h tak ru'um aloq'uem ti awi̱b na̱wojic tak. Chi je' aj re' ma̱c'am je ach'imim tak, ma̱c'am je awa' aha̱' tak, ma̱c'am je atz'a̱k tak eh ma̱c'am wo' chic jeno' ajalba̱l tak.
Wi xatquic'ul pan jeno' tinamit re' na̱ponic tak wi̱', to̱b ta xa nic' pa' ti wach i pa̱t nariye'jic wi̱' apatal tak, ar tiwi̱' tak cu rehtal chic telic tak je chipam tinamit re're'.

Tz'a̱b ru' wi ma' xatquic'ul tak chipam tinamit re're' telen tak je ar eh chi quiwach take c'acharel re're' chapuh tak lok i poklaj pa ro̱k aper-xijab tak, reh chi enquirak chiri̱j chi re' Dios naritak'a̱b cho ti'c'axic chi quina̱, nqui xk'ormojic queh ru'um Jesus.

Nok quibiram chic take k'oric re're', re' take cablaj re're' xi'o̱j wo' pan tak tinamit eh xquik'or i holohic laj k'oric chi re' Dios xichop chic quina̱ chi k'atal k'oric. Je' wo', xquicowsaj wo' take yowa'i̱b wilque̱b chipam take tinamit xi'iq'uic ponok wi̱'.

Nok re' take cablaj re're' c'ahchi'que̱b chi ribanaric i camanic xye'eric je chi quina̱, re' Hero̱res re' nk'atbic k'oric chipam riyuk'ul Calile̱ya ch'i̱l i Pere̱ya, naxibiraj ribiral i Jesus k'e̱' naxsahchic ric'ux maj chi quixilac take tinamit ribiraj chi wilic take je' wili nquik'or chiri̱j i Jesus: «Re' ranxelex i Wa̱n aj kahsem ha' xc'acharic wo' chic cho eh re're' wilic ru̱c' i Jesus, nqui nquik'or.

Wilic wo' nquik'or chi re' Eli̱yas re' k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios najtir k'i̱j wilic wo' chic chi quixilac ru'um chi xuctic cho chi quixilac camnak. Wilic wo' take quik'oric chi jeno' chic rich'i̱l i Eli̱yas je' ru̱c' rich k'orol cho riC'uhbal i Dios xuctic wo' cho chi quixilac camnak.

Ru̱c' take k'oric re're', re' Hero̱res je' wili xik'or pa ric'ux: «Re' nquik'or i tinamit chiri̱j i winak re're' k'e̱' nc'ulic lok ribiral pa nixiquin. Hab wo' wach i winak re're' k'uru'? Re' winak re're' ma' re' ta Wa̱n aj kahsem ha' maj re' Wa̱n til hin xintak'anic reh riyoc'oric lok i na̱, nqui pa ric'ux. Je' re' nok, xa ji̱k' chic pa ric'ux chi narina'bem hab wach i Jesus.

Chiri̱j aj wili naxquicohlaj cho camanic take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel, xisoljic wo' chic cho eh p'uht quik'orom reh Jesus nic' nimal i camanic xponic ca'n cho. Chiri̱j chic ru' re' Jesus xo̱j pan jenaj yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel re' wilic pa riyuk'ul tinamit Wetsa̱yra ribihnal eh xa re' wo' ti take cablaj re're' xic'am je take chiri̱j

xa re' la' naxqueht'alij take tinamit chi re' Jesus ar xo̱j chipam tinamit re're', xquitahkej je. Naxquirak je wach be̱h, re' Jesus xiyew k'ab queh chi xiwih'ic ru̱c'. Ar aj ru' xitok'a̱' rik'ormojic queh chi re' Dios re' nk'atbic k'oric ra̱j richopom quina̱ take c'acharel eh xicowsaj wo' take yowa'i̱b wilque̱b chi quixilac i tinamit re're'.

Chiri̱j re' naxquilow take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel chi xo̱j chic i k'i̱j, xquijil cok qui̱b ru̱c' i Jesus eh je' wili xquik'or reh: «Ha̱w, enak riban chi enatak'a̱' je take tinamit wili pan tak abixbal on pan tak pa̱t ma' naht ta je ayu' reh chi enquirak quipatal eh enca'n quiwa' quiha̱'. Je' re' nkacapaj maj ayu' ma' haj ta enquirak quiwa' quiha̱' ru'um wilco̱j pan jenaj chik yu̱k' ma'xta wi̱' c'acharel, nqui take reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Coric nak'or tak, xa re' la' re' take tinamit wili re' hat-tak na̱quetbic tak queh, nqui Jesus. Re' take cablaj re're' je' wili xquik'or wo' chic reh: «Xa re' wo' chi eta nak koj-o̱j i hoj lok'ol wi'c enak nka'n canar quiqueteric i riq'uihal tinamit wili maj xa re' ti wach ho'o̱b chi caxlan wi'c ch'i̱l quib chi joxomaj car wilic ku̱c', nqui take reh.

Je' re' xquik'or reh Jesus ru'um chi xquicoj rehtal chi k'e̱' wo' chic q'uihal i tinamit xquimol qui̱b ar, xa re' ti take winak wilque̱b na cablaj ik'ob lajc'ahl (5,000) ok take. Chi je' re' ajic re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Chak'or tak queh tinamit chi quitz'uka̱' qui̱b chi tzohkil chi laj tak roxc'ahl (50) quiwi̱', nqui queh.
Re' take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel naxquibiraj chi je' re', xquinimej xik'or i Jesus eh xquitz'uka̱' wo' take tinamit re're'.

Chiri̱j chic ru' re' Jesus xichop johtok i ho'o̱b chi caxlan wi'c ch'i̱l quib chi joxomaj car eh naxilbic johtok pan taxa̱j xitioxej johtok reh i Dios. Chiri̱j chic re' xixer i caxlan wi'c ch'i̱l take joxomaj car re're' eh p'uht riyeb take pan tak chacach, reh chi re' take nahsil raj tahkanel naquicojom chi quiwach take ju'jun tzohk chi tinamit.

Je' aj re' ru' re' take tinamit re're' xca'n quiwa' chi suk eh to̱b ta wo' k'e̱' q'uihal take tinamit xiwi'c, cu cablaj chic chacach chi caxlan wi'c re' ma' xc'uhlic ta xquimol wach take cablaj chi nahsil re're'.

Chiri̱j chic ru' pan jenaj chic k'i̱j nok xa re' ti take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel wilque̱b ru̱c' Jesus chipam i ye'a̱b c'ahchi' wi̱' chi ti̱j, re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh cablaj re're': «Chaj wo' bih nquik'or i tinamit chiwi̱j i hin? nqui queh.

Re' take cablaj re're' je' wili xquik'or reh: «Wilic tinamit nquik'or chi re' hat, hat i Wa̱n re' aj kahsem ha' re' camnak chic je. Wilic wo' take quik'oric chi re' hat, hat i Eli̱yas on jeno' chic queh rich aj k'orol riC'uhbal cho i Dios najtir k'i̱j xuctic cho chi quixilac camnak, nqui take reh.

Re' Jesus naxibiraj chi je' re', je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Raj hat-tak, chaj bih nak'or tak chiwi̱j hin? nqui queh. Chalic ma' Luch je' wili xik'or reh: «Re' hat, hat i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios chi naritak'a̱b cho, nqui reh.
—Til ma' hab wach eh nak'or tak i wili, nqui Jesus queh. Je' aj re' ru' re' xik'or ma' Luch til xipahkaj queh chi ma'xta pe rik'ororic lok.

Je' wo' chic, xik'or wo' queh chi je' wili: «Re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel k'e̱' nimal ti'c'axic nanic'ulum naquincansjok. Je' wo', re' nic'uhbal ma'xta ric'ulmujic cu'um take nahsil chipam katinami̱t i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Re' chic take aj c'amol quibe̱h aj c'atol si̱ chiwach i Dios ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses je' wo' re' naca'nam maj chi'nchel re're' ch'i̱l i wuctic cho chi quixilac camnak pa ro̱x k'i̱j niquimic, curman chi naric'ulmujic, nqui Jesus queh raj tahkanel.

Chiri̱j re're', je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Re' hab wach nariyeb ric'ux chi nitahkaljic chik'eb lok chiri̱j ric'ux nic' nimal nesenic lok reh ricapew-bal chiwi̱j i hin. Je' wo', ma' xa re' ok pan sukquilal naquiritahkem, je' la' ok wo' pan ti'c'axic je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak ritehlam ricuru̱s kalakal.

Je' re' nik'or maj hab wach re' xa re' sukquil c'uxlis ra̱j pa ric'acharic, ma'xta rehcham i junelic c'acharic ru̱c' i Dios raj nchel i ma' rik'or ta bihnal ric'uluric i ti'c'axic nbanaric reh ru'um chi waj tahkanel, re' cok re' narehcham i junelic c'acharic.

Je' re' k'uru' ma' quinak'eb lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak ru'um chi chiri̱j chic i bihomal enayew ac'ux tak maj chaj bih eritik aweh tak i moloj wach bihomal, wi enak'eb tak i sukquil ac'ux tak ru̱c' i Dios? Xa ta chic re' nic' pa' nimal i bihomal nmoloric wach ayu' wach ac'al enye'bic jelow-bal aweh tak i sukquil c'uxlis enak'eb tak re're'!

«Ma' quinak'eb tak lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak k'uru' eh ma' tiq'uix'ic wo' tak chi rik'ormojic chi hat-tak waj tahkanel maj wi je' re' xa'n tak, re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel naquinsoljok wo' chic cho chi sutumaj wi̱j ru̱c' rinimal wach sakomil nsutunic ri̱j i wAja̱w ch'i̱l nsutunic qui̱j take raj tz'e' wa̱ch, xa quinq'uix'ic chic nanik'orom wo' aweh tak chi ma' re' ta hat-tak waj tahkanel, nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic ru', re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Til coric nik'or chi wilic aweh tak je' ru̱c' wilca̱t tak ayu' yu'na cu na̱wilom tak nic' wach riwi̱' k'atoj k'oric riban i Dios. Re' hat-tak re're' cu ja'xta pe aquimic tak je ma' ja' nawilow tak re're', nqui queh.
Wahxaki̱b na chic k'i̱j k'oro̱j cho k'oric re're', re' ma' Luch ch'i̱l i Wa̱n ch'i̱l i Jaco̱wo xic'amaric je ru'um i Jesus china̱ jenaj yu̱k' re' xo̱j riban wi̱' riti̱j.
Ar china̱ i yu̱k' re're' nok c'ahchi' chi ti̱j i Jesus, xo̱j riban chi toco̱m chic nca'yic rilbal maj xa nch'abch'atic chic xiban. Re' riso' xiban xa saksa̱k chic eh xa nrepretic wo' chic xiban.
Ar aj ru' ruhmumaj pe' chic cho quib aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios aj najtir k'i̱j, re' Moyses ch'i̱l Eli̱yas. Re' take quib re're' xi'oquic chi k'oric ru̱c' i Jesus
eh chi xa nrepretic chic sakomil quiti'jolal c'ahchi' wo' quik'oric chiri̱j i Jesus chi ar Jerusalen nariquimic reh chi je' re' narojic elok wach re' k'oro̱j cho chiri̱j ru'um i Dios.

Nok je' re' k'oric nca'n take qui̱b re're', re' ma' Luch ch'i̱l take rich'i̱l to̱b ta chopolque̱b nak chi coric ru'um wiric, cu xquicowej qui̱b chi rilmijic risakomil rilbal i Jesus je' wo' take quib chi winak wilque̱b ru̱c'.

Chiri̱j wili nok c'ahchi' chic cojic Moyses ch'i̱l Eli̱yas, re' ma' Luch je' wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Ha̱w kaj tijinel, k'e̱' tare̱t chi wilco̱j ayu'. Chayew k'ab keh k'uru' chi enkatik'a̱' xib ok chi cuc' pahpa'x. Jenaj aweh hat, jenaj reh ma' Moyses eh jenaj wo' reh Eli̱yas, nqui reh. Je' re' xik'or ma' Luch ru'um chi ma' xirak ta chic jeno' chajaric k'oric narik'orom.
Xa cu re' pe' wo' ti xicohlaj k'oric i ma' Luch, jenaj su̱tz' xkajic cho china̱ i ye'a̱b wilque̱b wi̱' eh naxisutej qui̱j, re' ma' Luch ch'i̱l take rich'i̱l chalic jenaj yo'jic cu̱c'.

Ar chipam su̱tz' re're', re' xi'oquic wi̱' Moyses ch'i̱l ma' Eli̱yas xelic cho jenaj k'oric chi je' wili: «Re' Jesus wili til k'e̱' ti' nwic'raj maj wAc'u̱n aj nawil. Chabiraj aj tak rik'orbal k'uru', nqui k'oric xbanjic cho.

Xa re' wo' xquicohlaj ribirmijic i k'oric re're', re' ma' Luch ch'i̱l take rich'i̱l xquilow chi xa rutquel wo' chic xcahnic ar i Jesus. Je' aj re' xquilow take xib chi nahsil aj tahkanel re're', xa re' la' nok chi cu c'achlic i Jesus ma' hab ta wach eh xquik'or xa xquic'ol la' pan quic'ux chi'nchel xquilow re're'.
Je' chic ikal naxkajic cho Jesus china̱ yu̱k' re're' ch'i̱l take xib chi nahsil raj tahkanel, juntuhm chi tinamit xi'o̱j c'ulul reh.
Chi quixilac take riq'uihal tinamit wilque̱b ar, jenaj winak xiq'uer je chi̱' chi je' wili: «Ha̱w aj tijinel keh, chacuy chawilow ti wi̱n wac'u̱n wili re' xa jenaj ti chi niwach

maj ntz'a'jic ru'um ma' tob laj uxlabal. Ru'um aj re' ritok'a̱' xa nchokonic chic chi rutquel nancuturic wach ac'al eh ritok'a̱' xa ritolem chic ri̱b cu rehtal riban xa nwoxk'onic chic ri̱s chi̱'. Je' re' ric'ul, cu c'axic chic nancanabjic ru'um ma' tob laj uxlabal.

Re' take nahsil awaj tahkanel xacana̱' take cahnok ayu' xnipahkaj ato'bil queh chi naquit'erem nak lok ma' tob laj uxlabal ru̱c' i wac'u̱n xa re' la' ma' xca'n ta lok canar rit'ermejic, nqui reh Jesus.

Ar ajic re' Jesus je' wili c'u'lunic xiban: «Ha̱', re' cok hat-tak til cow chic ana̱ tak chi rinimjic nic'uhbal ru'um jot'o̱j chic ano'jbal tak! Ma̱capaj tak nchel k'uru' chi chiwach i quib xib chic k'i̱j wilqui̱n chaxilac tak xa cu naca̱t wo' tak nicuyum ru̱c' ricowil ano'jbal tak re're', nqui quik'ilmijic xiban. Chiri̱j chic ru' je' wili xik'or reh winak: «Chac'am cho wi̱n awac'u̱n ayu', nqui reh.

Chalic i winak re're' xic'am wo' cho i rac'u̱n ru̱c' i Jesus, xa re' la' nok re' rac'u̱n c'ahchi' rijilim cok ri̱b ru̱c' Jesus, xk'ojoric wo' chic pan ac'al ru'um ma' tob laj uxlabal eh cow xiquich'quij wach. Re' Jesus naxilow chi je' re', xik'or reh ma' tob laj uxlabal chi narelic lok ru̱c' ac'un re're'. Je' re' nok naxelic lok i ma' tob laj uxlabal, re' Jesus xik'ahsaj je ac'un re're' pan k'ab i raja̱w chi suk chic ric'ux.

Chiri̱j chic ricowsjic ac'un re', re' take tinamit sahchic quic'ux je' wili xquik'or pan quic'ux: «K'e̱' wo' chic nimal rajawric i Dios, nqui take. Je' aj re' chi cu xa nsahchic chic quic'ux i tinamit, re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh nahsil raj tahkanel:

«Til ma' niq'uic pan ac'ux tak i k'oric nquik'or i tinamit chiri̱j i rajawric i Dios maj naponok i k'i̱j chi re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel nanik'ahsjic pan quik'ab take c'acharel re' naquicansanic wi̱n, re' Dios naric'uhtam rajawric chi wucsjic cho chi quixilac camnak, nqui queh.

Re' take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel ma' xquirak ta chiri̱j chaj wa'ric naxik'or i Jesus chi je' re' maj poylic wach quino'jbal chi rirakmajic chiri̱j re're'. Ma' xquibiraj ta wo' reh Jesus chaj bih ra̱j rik'orom ru'um chi quiyo'jic chiwach.

Ar aj ru' chi ma' xquirak ta chiri̱j take k'oric xik'or i Jesus, wilic take nahsil raj tahkanel p'uht quichokonem qui̱b chiri̱j hab wach queh naricahnic chi pe̱t aj to'o̱l reh Jesus nachitok'a̱' k'atoj k'oric.
Je' re' nok naxina'bej chi je' re' wilic pan quicapew-bal re' Jesus xic'am cho jenaj t'uch ac'un, xipahba̱' cok ru̱c'

eh je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' waj tahkanel nanitak'a̱b je chi nijelow-bal curman chi naribanam chi xa ch'ublic ti wach rino'jbal je' ricab rino'jbal i t'uch ac'un wili. Ru'um aj re' xa hab wach nariniminic reh rik'orbal i nanitak'a̱b je chi nijelow-bal, re' wo' nik'orbal i hin c'ahchi' rinimem je' ricab wo' c'ahchi' ric'uluric yu'na chi re' rinimej nik'orbal i hin, re' wo' rik'orbal xtak'anic cho wi̱n c'ahchi' rinimem. Je' re' k'uru' re' til k'e̱' wo' chic ch'ublic wach rino'jbal, re're' naricahnic chi pe̱t aj to'o̱l wi̱n, nqui queh.

Chiri̱j wili, re' Wa̱n je' wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Ha̱w kaj tijinel, re' hoj xkilow chi jenaj winak c'ahchi' resam lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal chi c'ahchi' rik'orom chi re' hat xatye'bic rajawric. Re' hoj xkapit chi ribanaric re're' maj ma' re' ta chi kaxilac wilic, nqui take reh.
Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or: «Ma'xta, ma̱pit tak chi ribanaric re're' maj re' c'acharel wi ma' yojo̱l nok wilic, ra̱j rik'orom chi kato'oric c'ahchi' ribanam, nqui Jesus.
Nok re' Jesus c'ahchi' chic riponic rik'ijil chi naric'uluric wo' chic cho pan taxa̱j, xichop je ribe̱h ar Jerusalen chi xa jenaj wach ric'ux.

Je' re' nok pan jenaj k'i̱j je' wili xik'or queh ju'jun raj tz'e' wa̱ch: «Hiy tak, c'ahchi' ok abe̱h tak je, nqui queh. Je' re' nok xi'o̱j wo' take aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' eh xi'oquic cok chi sic'oj ripatal i Jesus pan jenaj t'uch ye'a̱b ar pan quiyuk'ul aj Sama̱rya.
Chiri̱j chic ru', re' Jesus xichop je ribe̱h chipam t'uch ye'a̱b re're', xa re' la' naxponic ar ma' xye'eric ta k'ab reh chi nariwih'ic ar ru'um xquilow chi ojic riban ar Jerusalen.

Ar ajic naxquilow chi je' re' take quib chi nahsil aj tahkanel, re' Jaco̱wo ch'i̱l i Wa̱n, je' wili xquik'or reh Jesus: «Ha̱w, nawa̱j chi enkasach quiwach take tinamit wili ru̱c' ripahkaljic johtok k'a̱k' pan taxa̱j je' ricab xiban i Eli̱yas najtir cho k'i̱j reh? nqui take reh.
Re' Jesus xitz'ehtaj je take eh je' wili quik'iliric xiban: «Re' hat-tak xa cu ja' narak ta wo' tak chiri̱j chi re' nicapew-bal hin toco̱m wo' chiwach acapew-bal hat-tak.

Je' re' nik'or aweh tak maj re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel ma' xinchalic ta chi risacharic quiwach i tinamit, xinchalic la' chi quico'ljic chiwach i ti'c'axic, nqui queh. Chiri̱j wili xi'o̱j wo' chic chi sic'oj patal pan toco̱m chic ye'a̱b.

Nok c'ahchi' cojic chi sic'oj patal, wilic take winak xquirak je pan be̱h. Jenaj queh take winak re're' je' wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Ajabe̱s, re' hin nwa̱j nibanam chi hin awaj tahkanel. Naca̱t nitahkem k'uru' xa pa' eto̱j, nqui reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili ric'u'ljic xiban: «Tare̱t, quinatahkej. Xa re' la' re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel ma'xta jeno' niye'a̱b haj ta nak nanihi'lic wi̱' chi eli̱c, ma' je' ta nicab take ya̱c xa pa' wilic quiju̱l on je' ricab take cuc' tz'iquin chi xa pa' wilic quike̱s, nqui c'u'lunic xiban Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic ru' jenaj chic queh winak re're' xyuk'unjic ru'um Jesus eh je' wili xk'ormojic reh: «Quinatahkej i hat, nqui xk'ormojic reh. Raj la' i winak re're' je' wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Ajabe̱s, chayew pe k'ab wi̱n chi cu pe̱t nanimuk'a̱b cahnok i waja̱w. Cu re' aj ru' naca̱t nitahkem xa pa' eto̱j, nqui reh Jesus.

Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Re' hat ma̱ban aweh nca'n take tinamit maj re' take re' nanquimuk'a̱' je quicamnak ma' nquik'or ta ribiral i rajawric i Dios queh take cahnel chic cahnok. Je' re' nca'n ru'um nok je' wo' camnak take ru̱c' quino'jbal. Re' aj hat hiy chi rik'ormojic i ribiral chi re' Dios re' nk'atbic k'oric ra̱j richopom quina̱ take c'acharel, nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j wili jenaj wo' chic queh winak je' wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Ha̱w, re' hin til nwa̱j ojic chawi̱j xa re' la' chayew pe k'ab wi̱n chi pe̱t nawojic cho pan pa̱t chi rik'ororic wi̱b queh hab wach wi̱n, nqui reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Je' ricab jeno' aj camanom ma' re' ta risurcahil ritic c'ahchi' rilom cok nok c'ahchi' ric'otom je pan rac'a̱l, ma' re' ta holohic laj aj camanom, je' wo' re' jeno' aj c'uhbalanel wi ma' china̱ ricamaj chi c'uhbalanic wilic ricapew-bal, re're' ma' ric'ul ta chi erik'or queh tinamit i ribiral chi re' Dios re' nk'atbic k'oric ra̱j richopom quina̱ take c'acharel, nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic ru' je' ricab naxichih take raj tz'e' wa̱ch xitak'a̱' je take ar Sama̱rya, re' Jesus xichih wo' chic lajeb ricaj winak (70) chi quixilac take aj tahkem reh eh xitak'a̱' je take chi quica'cabil pan tak nimak tinamit, je' wo' pan tak cuc' ye'a̱b re' nariq'uic ponok wi̱'.

Je' aj wili xik'or je queh naxi'o̱j: «Re' hat-tak ma' nic' ta hat-tak q'uihal chi enacuy tak ransil quic'uhbaljic i riq'uihal tinamit na̱wojic tak wi̱'. Ru'um aj re' chapahkaj tak johtok reh Dios chi eriyew cho aman tak chi c'uhbalanic, je' ricab nca'n take aj jacho̱l junseht ok chi rinimal abi̱x nanquilow chi ma' quimahnic ta chic ru'um chi nech' ti take chi jach, nquipahkaj reh aj ehcham abi̱x chi naritak'a̱b je quiman chi jach.

Je' wo' chapahkaj atobjic tak reh Dios maj re' c'ahchi'ca̱t nitak'a̱b tak je wi̱' hin k'e̱' yohbal, xa je' na ricab naqui'o̱j chi behic take cu̱c' me̱' re' wilque̱b wi̱' take josk' laj q'uiche̱' tz'i'. Hiy tak k'uru'

xa re' la' ma' chi bih nac'am je aweh tak je' ricab awa' aha̱' tak, atumi̱n tak, achi̱m tak, on junc'uhl ok chic axijab tak. Je' wo', ru'um chi xa aloq'uem ti awi̱b na̱wojic tak ma' haj acham awi̱b tak chi c'uta̱j ru̱c' jeno' xa hab wach pan be̱h.
Natiponok tak pan jeno' pa̱t chi pahkanic apatal tak, pe̱t chac'alenej tak aj ehcham pa̱t chi je' wili: ‹Re' Dios ra̱j riyeb sukquil c'uxlis chipam pa̱t wili, tiquirok tak reh.

«Wi re' aj ehcham pa̱t re're' ma' xiyew apatal tak, re' sukquil c'uxlis xak'or tak ribiral reh, ma'xta wo' ric'ulum. Tz'a̱b ru' wi xiyew apatal tak, re' sukquil c'uxlis riyew i Dios na wo' riye'eric reh aj ehcham pa̱t re're'.

Je' aj re' ru', re' naric'ulbic aweh tak cha'n apatal tak ru̱c' chi coric eh pa' nimal awa' aha̱' tak nariyeb, chac'ul tak reh eh ma' ticahnic tak ch'i'c ru'um. Je' re' nik'or ru'um chi re' hat-tak je' acab tak jeno' camanom ric'ul chi reh chi naric'ulum ritojbal ru̱c' ricamaj riban.
«Je' re' k'uru' xa pa' chic tinamit na̱wojic tak lok wi̱', xa re' wo' re' i no'jbal na̱banam tak ru̱c' hab wach nariye'bic apatal tak.

Je' aj re' chipam i tinamit na̱ponic tak wi̱' chacowsaj tak take yowa'i̱b wilque̱b ar eh chak'or wo' tak queh tinamit chi je wili: ‹Xirak chic rik'ijil chi re' Dios xa loq'uil ritok'a̱' wo' chic k'atoj k'oric chi quina̱ take c'acharel, tiquirok tak queh.
«Re' cok ru' wi ma' xatquic'ul tak pan jeno' tinamit, je' wili chak'or tak cahnok queh c'acharel natelok tak je ar:

‹Ru'um nok ma' xawa̱j ta ac'ulum risukquil ac'ux tak, re' hoj nakapuhum cahnok ripoklajil atinamital tak re' ch'ihlic pan ko̱k, rehtalil chi ti'c'axic chic na̱c'ulum tak chi jelow-bal i sukquil c'uxlis. Xa re' la' chana'bej tak xirak chic rik'ijil chi re' Dios narip'utum wo' chic k'atoj k'oric chi quina̱ take c'acharel, tiquirok tak queh.

«Je' aj re' ru', re' tinamit ma'xta ric'ulbic aweh tak til pan coric nariq'uic wo' chic na̱ i ti'c'axic nariye'eric cho china̱ chiwach i ti'c'axic xquic'ul take cho c'acharel aj najtir k'i̱j ar pan tinamit Soro̱ma nachich'uk k'oric i Dios chiri̱j quimahc.

Ru̱c' aj re' k'e̱' je quetal quiwach take aj Corasin ch'i̱l take aj Wetsa̱yra maj k'e̱' wo' chic ti'c'axic naquic'ulum ru'um chi ma' nquijal ta wach quino'jbal to̱b ta nchel xquilow chi q'uihal take lok' laj nawa̱l xniban chic chi quixilac. Raj wili chi quixilac ta nak take aj Ti̱ro ch'i̱l aj Siron xniban take lok' laj nawa̱l je' ricab xniban cu̱c', re' take re' xca'n nak je' ricab riban winak re' ritz'uka̱' ri̱b chi ok'ic, ricoj coxtal tz'ih chiri̱j eh rihamej ri̱b chi cha̱j c'uhtbal reh chi xti'bic ric'ux ru'um rimahc.

Ru'um aj chi ma' je' ta re' xca'n, re' Dios narich'ukum k'oric chi quina̱ take aj Corasin ch'i̱l hat-tak aj Wetsa̱yra. Til k'e̱' wo' chic ti'quilal naquic'ulum chi quiwach take aj Ti̱ro ch'i̱l aj Siron
maj xa na wo' risacharic quiwach ru'um i Dios je' ricab wo' naquic'ulum take aj Capernahum re' xa ncuy'ej nak chic chi narijohsjic quiwach ru'um i Dios.

«Yu'na k'uru' hiy tak eh re' naquicojbic wach ac'uhbal tak re' wo' nic'uhbal i hin naquicojom wach. Tz'a̱b ru' wi ma' xquic'ul ac'uhbal tak, re' wo' nic'uhbal hin ma'xta quic'ulum. Je' re' ajic xa hab wach ma'xta ric'ulbic reh nic'uhbal ra̱j wo' rik'orom chi re' wo' ric'uhbal re' xtak'anic cho wi̱n hin ma'xta ric'ulum, nqui Jesus queh.

Je' aj re' ru', naxisoljic cho take aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're', je' wili xc'ulic quik'or reh Jesus chi xa suk chic pan quic'ux: «Ha̱w, re' hat xoj-apahba̱' chi wilic kajawric eh chi je' re' ma' xa re' ta take ya'bilal qui'elic lok chi kawach, til je' la' wo' re' take ma' tob laj uxlabal nankak'or queh chi naquelic lok, nqui take reh.
Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' hin xwilow chi re' cajawil ma' tob laj uxlabal xo̱j wach ac'al xa chi yu'na ti je' ricab riban i ra̱k' cohok xa nrepretic chic nk'ehbic cho wach ac'al.

Je' aj re' chacoj rehtal i wili: Re' hin xniyew chic awajawric tak chi ma'xta bih eticuchej tak take ma' tob laj uxlabal. Ru'um aj re' chayak'abej pan awo̱k tak chi'nchel ch'uk wach cajawric ma' tob laj uxlabal, je' ricab chi pa'alca̱t ta nak tak china̱ jeno' a̱k' on china̱ jeno' tzina'j.

Sukbok ac'ux tak k'uru' xa re' la' ma' xa ru'um ta ok chi tiquinimej tak take ma' tob laj uxlabal, sukbok la' ac'ux tak ru'um chi re' abihnal tak wilic chic pa ric'ux i Dios xa je' ricab xitz'ihmbaj ta nak pan jeno' hu̱j ar pan taxa̱j. Je' re' awi̱' tak chiwach i Dios reh chi na̱c'ulum tak i rato'bil, nqui queh.

Je' aj re' ru̱c' take k'oric xiban re're', re' Jesus xchalic jenaj nimal sukquil ric'ux ru'um Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios. Je' re' nok je' wili xik'or johtok: «W-Aja̱w Dios, re' hat, hat Ajabe̱s ar pan taxa̱j je' wo' ayu' wach ac'al. Je' re' k'uru' re' hin k'e̱' nitioxej aweh ru'um chi re' take xa k'oro̱j chic quibiral chi wilic quino'jbal eh chi k'e̱' t'ulic take xatz'ap wach quino'jbal chi ma'xta quirakam chiri̱j ricorquil ribiral awajawric. Raj nchel take ma' nquinimsaj ta qui̱b re' je' quicab take cuc' ha'lac'un xateh wach quino'jbal. Je' aj re' wAja̱w Dios k'e̱' nitioxej aweh ru'um chi xponic chawach chi re' take ma' nquinimsaj ta ti qui̱b, xquibiraj wu̱c' hin re' ricorquilal ribiral awajawric.

Ru'um aj re', re' hin xnik'or wo' queh chi je' wili: Xa re' wo' hin weht'alim wach chi coric i Ajabe̱s Dios eh xa re' wo' re' reht'alim niwach i hin chi coric. Ru'um aj re' xa re' wo' hin ch'i̱l take nic' pa' q'uihal nwa̱j chi naquibiram i ricorquilal re're', xa re' wo' hoj keht'alim awach chi coric i hat Ajabe̱s Dios. «Je' wo', xnik'or queh chi je' wili: Re' wAja̱w wilic rajawric china̱ chi'nchel eh ru'um re' xiripahba̱' i hin chi nariwih'ic wo' wajawric china̱ chi'nchel, nqui Jesus pa riti̱j.

Chiri̱j chic ru' nok xa chic cutquel take cablaj chi nahsil aj tahkanel, re' Jesus tz'ehtenic je chi quina̱ eh je' wili xik'or queh: «K'e̱' ato̱b aweh hat-tak, je' wo' take tinamit re' c'ahchi' quilo̱j wo' reh re' nic' nimal c'ahchi' awilom hat-tak,

ru'um nok re' hat-tak c'ahchi' abiram tak nic'uhbal eh c'ahchi' wo' awilom tak wajawric xiyew Dios. Nik'or chi k'e̱' ato̱b aweh tak maj re' c'ahchi' ric'uluric yu'na xca̱j nak quilom eh xca̱j nak quibiram take cho aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios je' wo' re' take cho k'atal k'oric china̱ katinami̱t xiwih'ic cho najtir k'i̱j, nqui Jesus.

Pan jenaj k'i̱j nok re' Jesus c'ahchi' chi c'uhtunic, wilic wo' jenaj winak je' ru̱c' aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xiban cok jenaj ripahkanic ru̱c' i Jesus chi xa pajbal ti reh. Je' wili i pahkanic xiban cok naxipahba̱' johtok ri̱b: «Ajabe̱s aj tijinel keh, chaj bih ajwal wach chi nanibanam reh chi nawehcham i junelic c'acharic? nqui reh.
Re' Jesus je' wili ric'u'ljic xiban: «Chipam rihujil i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ar tz'ihmbimaj chaj bih ra̱j banaric. Nic' wach rik'or nanawilow chi quina̱ i tinamit k'uru'? nqui reh.

Re' winak re're', je' wili xik'or: «Re' wili rik'or ar: “Re' hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ti' chawic'raj tak i Ajabe̱s Dios re' nalok'ej tak wach. Til chac'ax tak ru̱c' chi'nchel ac'ux tak, ru̱c' chi'nchel awa̱mna tak, ru̱c' chi'nchel awansil tak eh je' wo' re' ru̱c' chi'nchel acapew-bal tak. Chac'ax wo' awas acha̱k' je' ricab ric'axaric awi̱b na'n i hat, nqui tz'ihmbimaj, nqui reh Jesus.
—Coric xak'or. Je' aj re' ric'axaric i Dios cha'n. Je' wo' re' cha'n cu̱c' take awas acha̱k', chi je' re' na̱wehcham junelic c'acharic, nqui Jesus.

Raj nchel i winak re' ma' xsukbic ta ric'ux ru̱c' xik'or i Jesus. Je' re' nok ru'um xa̱j ribanam ri̱b chi je' wo' ti chic coric wach ric'acharic, re're' je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Chak'or wi̱n k'uru' hab wo' wach was nicha̱k' reh chi eniban je' ricab xak'or wi̱n, nqui reh.

Chalic i Jesus je' wili ric'u'ljic i winak re're' xiban ru̱c' i jalwach k'oric wili: «Jenaj winak xelic cho ar pan tinamit Jerusalen ojic riban ar Jericoh. Nok c'ahchi' rojic, xk'eteric pa ribe̱h cu'um aj lek'. Re' take aj lek' re're' ma' xa ta xquimak' chi'nchel chaj bih wilic reh, je' la' wo' quik'ojlom cahnok cu rehtal xquirip'a̱' cahnok wach ac'al.
«Ar aj ru' chipam i be̱h re're', tz'eht xiq'uic ponok jenaj winak aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach Dios. Naxilow cok wach i winak re're', xicot ri̱j eh xo̱j chi coric.
Je' wo' chic re' xiban jenaj winak caj to'bonel aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach Dios. Re're', naxilow cok wach i winak re're', xa xiq'uic wo' je chi coric.
Chiri̱j chic ru' xo̱j aj c'olok jenaj winak aj Sama̱rya. Re're' naxilow chi re' winak re're' riplic chic wach ac'al, xiquetelej wach.

Je' re' nok xkajic lok chiri̱j ricawa̱y, xijil cok ri̱b ru̱c' i winak re're' eh xik'omej take riti'quil ru̱c' yolic laj ik'o̱m tik'imaj ru̱c' ri̱s u̱wa. Chi je' re', xibuch' chipam ik'o̱m re're' eh xiyut wo' wach chi tz'ih take riti̱'. Chiri̱j chic ru', xijohsaj johtok chiri̱j ricawa̱y, xic'am je pan jenaj pa̱t quimel warbal eh xicha'jej chiwach ak'ab re're'.

Naxsak'ic je' ikal, re' winak re're' xesaj cho pa richi̱m i tumi̱n reh quib k'i̱j chi tojbal eh je' wili xik'or reh aj ehcham reh pa̱t quimel warbal: ‹Ha̱w, naniyeb aweh i tumi̱n wili eh chawilow wi̱n niyowa̱b. Wi ma' xmahnic i tumi̱n wili, nic' pa' chic nimal na̱sacham cahnok cu re' chic nariq'uic niyeb rijelow-bal aweh naquinsoljok cho, nqui reh.
«Yu'na k'uru' chak'or wi̱n acapew-bal i hat: Hab wach queh xib chi winak re're' til manlic ras richa̱k' i winak re' xk'eteric pa ribe̱h cu'um aj lek'? nqui Jesus reh.

—Re' nicapaj i hin chi re' wo' xquetelenic wach i winak re' xk'eteric pa ribe̱h cu'um aj lek', re're' til manlic ras richa̱k', nqui aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal re're'. —Coric xak'or. Je' aj re' ru' hiy i hat cu̱c' awas acha̱k' eh nacharak jeno' wilic pan ti'quilal cha'n chi awas acha̱k' wo' i winak re're' je' ricab xiban i winak aj sama̱rya, nqui Jesus naxicohlaj k'oric ru̱c'.

Chiri̱j chic ru', re' Jesus ch'i̱l take aj nahsil raj tahkanel xquitik ju' cojic pan tinamit Jerusalen eh xi'o̱j c'olok pan jenaj t'uch tinamit re' xye'eric wi̱' quipatal ru'um jenaj ixok Ma̱rta ribihnal.
Nok wilque̱b chic chipam pa̱t re're', re' Mari̱ya re' richa̱k' i Ma̱rta xichuna̱' cok ri̱b ru̱c' Jesus eh xoquic chi ricojoric rehtal i c'uhbal

nok re' Ma̱rta xa naho̱l chic cho wach chi camanic chi' k'a̱k'. Ru'um aj re', re' Ma̱rta je' wili xchalic rik'or reh Jesus: «Ha̱w, xa nawil na nicha̱k' chi xiricana̱' cho chi wutquel chipam yohbal wach camanic chi' k'a̱k'? Chacuy, chak'or reh wi̱n chi narojic quirito'bem so', nqui reh Jesus.
Re' Jesus je' wili ric'u'ljic xiban: «Hat Ma̱rta, k'e̱' hat k'uhtel eh ma' suk ta chic wilca̱t ru'um riq'uihal alahtz'il xachih wach ribanaric.

Re' hat xa je' wo' re' c'ahchi' abanam to̱b ta nchel xa jenaj wo' nak i k'e̱' ajwal wach chi na̱banam re' je' ricab xichih wach ribanaric i Mari̱ya. Je' aj re' ru̱c' xichih wach ribanaric i Mari̱ya, re' hin ma' eta nipit, nqui Jesus reh Ma̱rta.

Pan jenaj k'i̱j nok re' Jesus xicohlaj riti̱j pan jenaj ye'a̱b re' xo̱j wi̱' chi ti̱j, jenaj queh take quitahkanic reh je' wili xik'or cok reh: «Ha̱w, chac'uhtaj keh nic' wach ti̱j naka'nam i hoj awaj tahkanel je' ricab nok re' Wa̱n xic'uhtaj cho queh take quitahkanic reh nic' wach riwi̱' i ti̱j naca'nam, nqui cok reh.

—Tare̱t, nqui Jesus. Je' re' nok je' wili xik'or queh: «Natocok tak chi ti̱j je' wili chak'or tak johtok: ‹Lok' laj kAja̱w Dios wilca̱t cho pan taxa̱j, k'e̱' wo' chic nka̱j chi lok'omaj ok johtok abihnal cu'um take c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al. Ru'um aj wo' re' nkapahkaj wo' aweh chi chalok chi kana̱ rinimal awajawric chi k'atal k'oric. Til re' aj hat titak'anok chi kana̱ ru'um nok nka̱j chi re' tak'anic na'n ar pan taxa̱j nimjok wo' ayu' wach ac'al.
Je' wo' chic, nkapahkaj johtok aweh chi re' kawa' kaha̱' re' curman chi keh reh ju'jun i k'i̱j, chayew wo' cho keh reh k'i̱j yu'na.

K-Aja̱w Dios, chacuy wo' cho kamahc je' ricab nok re' hoj nkacuy quimahc take quimahcanic chi kawach. Je' wo' chic, ma̱yew k'ab chi ekojkajic chipam i k'etbal pa̱m be̱h ricoj aj Yahm chi ekojmahcanic, koj-aco'lej la' chiwach reh chi ma' eta rijot' kac'acharic, tiquirok tak johtok chi ti̱j, nqui Jesus queh.

Chiri̱j re're', xik'or wo' queh jalwach k'oric wili: «Kak'or chi re' hat-tak wilic jeno' aca'ja̱ tak eh pan jenaj k'i̱j eto̱j tak c'olok ru̱c' ripahkaljic reh chi je' wili tic'lic ak'ab: ‹Chacuy ha̱w, nijal ti oxpehr ok niwa' awu̱c'
xa reh nak ti jenaj wula̱' xinchalic rik'o'rej maj re' hin yu'na ma'xta bih wilic nech' ok wi̱n chi naniquetem, nqui enak'or tak cok reh.

«Nachak'or tak cok chi je' re', chaj nak bih eriban aca'ja̱ tak re're' nanacapaj hat-tak? Je' na nak wili erik'or cho cu pa riyoca̱b: ‹Re' hin ma' eta quinuctic je chi riye'eric aweh i c'ahchi' apahkam cho wi̱n ru'um nok yocolqui̱n chic pa niyoca̱b ch'i̱l take niha'lac'u̱n. Je' wo', ch'ito̱j chic ri̱j nipa̱t chi cow. Hiy k'uru' ma' quinach'i'tslom cho wi̱n, nqui ta wo' ac'u'ljic eriban cho?

«Re' aca'ja̱ tak re're' til pan coric enuctic cho chi riye'eric aweh tak nic' nimal napahkaj tak cok reh, re' cok ru' ma' ru'um ta chi hat ta nak tak rica'ja̱, xa ru'um la' chi ma' ra̱j ta chi eno̱j ribihnal chi c'u'tjbal eh chi je' re' encahnic pan q'uixbilal.

Ru̱c' aj k'oric re're' til nik'or aweh tak chi tipahkanok tak johtok ru̱c' i Dios maj je' ricab chi jeno' nk'oric cok chi chi̱' i pa̱t, rirak wo' i c'acharel re' c'ahchi' risiq'uim nanteheric cho reh i tz'ahp, je' wo' re' etiric'u'lej tak cho i Dios chi riye'eric cho aweh tak i rito'bal wi re' hat-tak enasic' tak on re' enapahkaj tak johtok reh.

Je' re' nik'or aweh tak maj re' narik'oric johtok ru̱c' Dios na wo' ric'u'ljic cho. Cha'n tak ati̱j chiwach i Dios k'uru' ru'um nok re' c'acharel npahkanic johtok reh rato'bil i Dios re' wo' re' nc'ulbic reh eh re' nsic'bic reh rato'bil re' wo' re' narirakbic reh, nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic ru' je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Wilic na jeno' ajabe̱s, wi re' rac'u̱n c'ahchi' ripahkam riwa', abaj chic eriyew reh chi jelow-bal? On wi c'ahchi' ripahkam jeno' rica̱r, jeno' c'achlic laj a̱k' na chic enayew tak reh chi jelow-bal?
Je' wo', wi re' rac'u̱n c'ahchi' ripahkam jeno' miloj reh, tzina'j na chic eriyew reh chi jelow-bal?

Ma'xta, maje'? Ra̱j wo' chic i Dios k'uru' wi re' hat-tak xapahkaj tak jeno' ato'bil reh, ma' eta na tirito'bej tak ru̱c' apahkanic tak? Re' Dios til la' naca̱t rito'bem tak cho eh til je' re' naribanam maj wi re' hat-tak aj mahc awi̱' tak nac'ax aha'lac'u̱n tak chi coric nanquipahkaj jeno' ato'bil aweh tak, re' ta na ti chic i Dios re' ma' re' ta aj mahc, ma' eritak'a̱' cho aweh tak i Lok' laj rUxlabal? nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic quitijiljic take raj tahkanel, re' Jesus xoquic chi rit'ermejic lok jenaj ma' tob laj uxlabal re' nmensenic reh jenaj winak. Naxelic lok i ma' tob laj uxlabal re're', re' winak re're' p'uht pe' rik'oric cho eh chi je' re' wilic tinamit k'e̱' xsahchic quic'ux naxquilow nic' wach naxt'ermejic lok i ma' tob laj uxlabal ru'um i Jesus.

Je' re' ajic wilic take je' wili tohk' quik'orom pan quic'ux: «Re' Welsewuh re' cajawil take ma' tob laj uxlabal, re're' nye'bic rajawric i Jesus chi quit'ermejic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal, nqui take.

Je' wo', wilic take je' wili xquik'or reh Jesus chi xa nca̱j nak chic quirakam chaj bih encalajic wi̱' chi quiwach: «Cha'n chic jeno' lok' laj nawa̱l rehtalil chi kawach chi re' hat i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric tak'amaj cho cu pan taxa̱j, nqui take reh.

Re' Jesus naxirak chiri̱j i c'ahbil laj capew-bal poyo̱j cho wach cu̱c' take c'ahchi' quik'oric pan quic'ux chi re' Welsewuh nye'bic rajawric, re're' je' wili xik'or queh: «Wi re' take pahbamaj chi raj to'o̱l jeno' k'atal k'oric nquixowej qui̱b, re' rilok'il ricamaj i k'atal k'oric chi quina̱, xa ewo' no̱j wach ac'al. Je' wo' re' pan jeno' pa̱t, wi re' take c'acharel wilque̱b chipam c'ahchi' quixowem quiwach, xa na wo' quich'aklom qui̱b.

Ar ajic chacapaj tak ri̱j i wili: Wi ta nak re' Welsewuh nye'bic wajawric chi quesmejic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal, ra̱j rik'orom chi re' Welsewuh ch'i̱l take raj tz'e' wa̱ch c'ahchi' quixowem quiwach, maje'? Raj i wili ma' je' ta re' riwi̱' c'ahchi' ric'uluric maj wi ta nak c'ahchi' quixowem quiwach, nic' aj wach nok cu quitzokem qui̱b pan quicamaj?

Je' wo' chic, chacapaj tak chiri̱j i wili: Wi ta nak re' Welsewuh nye'bic wajawric chi quit'ermejic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal, ra̱j rik'orom chi re' wo' re' nye'bic cajawric take awaj tahkanel tak nanquesaj lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal. Coric ta wo' nchel i nacapaj hat-tak chiwi̱j chi je' re', nicana̱' pe pan quik'ab take awaj tahkanel tak chi re' take re' naquik'oric aweh tak, wi coric on ma' coric ta i nacapaj tak re're'.

Je' aj re' ru', re' hin til nik'or aweh tak chi re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios nye'bic wajawric chi quit'ermejic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal. Ru'um aj chi re' Lok' laj Uxlabal nbanic re're', til nik'or aweh tak chi re' hin re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric wilqui̱n chic awu̱c' tak.

Ru̱c' aj re're', re' Welsewuh c'ahchi' ric'ulum reh je' ricab xic'ul jenaj k'atal k'oric re' je' wili ribiral wilic: Re' k'atal k'oric re're', re' nak ra̱j chi ma' hab ta wach entz'a'anic reh nic' pa' nimal wilic reh pa ripa̱t, q'uih take riso̱l xicoj chi richa'jaljic

xa re' la' naxo̱j c'olok i jenaj chic k'atal k'oric re' xi̱c' wo' chic na̱ rajawric chiwach, xa xi'o̱j wo' wach ac'al take riso̱l wilque̱b nak chi cha'janic. Je' aj re' ru', re' chi'nchel nic' pa' nimal wilic reh k'atal k'oric re're' xmak'aric reh ru'um i jenaj chic k'atal k'oric re' xi̱c' wo' chic na̱ rajawric eh chi je' re', re' k'atal k'oric re' xi̱c' na̱ rajawric, chi quina̱ chic take riso̱l ru' xipuhcaj i pa' bih wilic nak reh k'atal k'oric re' xiyew wach ac'al.

Ru̱c' aj re' chacoj tak rehtal haj c'ahchi'ca̱t tak chi to'o̱j maj re' hat-tak wilca̱t tak chi nitobjic i hin on wilca̱t tak chi ritobjic i cajawil ma' tob laj uxlabal je' ricab nok jeno' winak noquic chi ritobjic aj cha'jem me̱' chi rimoloric quiwach take rime̱' on noquic chi quit'ermejic je take me̱' chi jot'bal reh aj cha'jem me̱', nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j wili re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Re' ma' tob laj uxlabal nant'ermejic lok ru̱c' jeno' c'acharel, no̱j pan tak ye'a̱b je' ru̱c' ma'xta wi̱' c'acharel chi risiq'uiric ripatal chi hi'lsbal ri̱b. Narilow chi ma' haj ta rirak ripatal je' wili rik'or pa ric'ux: ‹Re' hin nanisoljic wo' chic je ru̱c' i c'acharel xint'ermejic cho wi̱', nqui rik'or.

«Chiri̱j wili nanponic wo' chic ru̱c' c'acharel elenak je wi̱', no̱j rirak chi re' ra̱mna c'acharel re're' xa tehlic wo' pa̱m eh tiklic chic chi naroquic wo' chic pa̱m je' ricab nok jeno' pa̱t mesoj chic pa̱m eh chi xoyomaj chic chi naroquic pa̱m. Je' re' ajic narilow chi je' re',

no̱j chi risiq'uiric wuku̱b chic chi rich'i̱l je' ru̱c' xi̱c' wo' chic na̱ balc'uxquilal wach quino'jbal chiwach ru' eh narirak take cho, qui'oquic chi c'acharic ru̱c' winak re're'. Ru'um aj re', re' balc'uxquilal wach rino'jbal i winak re're' nariq'uic wo' chic na̱ chiwach naxwih'ic cho ma' tob laj uxlabal re're' chi xa chi rutquel, nqui Jesus.

Xa cu re' wo' c'ahchi' rik'orom take k'oric re're' i Jesus, jenaj ixok xiq'uer je chi̱' chi quixilac take i tinamit je' wili xik'or je: «Til k'e̱' wo' chic je ato̱b reh ixok xye'bic aweh wach sakom eh xatriq'uihsaj cho, nqui je reh.
—Ho̱', k'e̱' ato̱b reh ixok re're' xa re' la' k'e̱' wo' ato̱b aweh hat-tak wi nanimej tak i riC'uhbal i Dios nanabiraj tak, nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic wili nok sutumaj chic ri̱j ru'um riq'uihal tinamit, re' Jesus je wili xik'or queh take nca̱j nak quilow chic jeno' lok' laj nawa̱l: «Re' hat-tak was tak nicha̱k' re' c'acharic na'n tak chiwach rik'ijil yu'na, k'e̱' wo' chic c'ahbil ano'jbal tak maj je' wili nak'or tak wi̱n: ‹Cha'n chic jeno' lok' laj nawa̱l c'uhtbal reh chi re' hat i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, nqui nak'or tak. «Coric, je' re' nawa̱j tak chi nanibanam xa re' la' hin ma' eta niyew jeno' rehtalil chawach tak xa re' la' i rehtalil je' ricab xbanaric reh i aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios, re' Jonas ribihnal.

Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab chi re' c'uhbal xiban i Jonas re're' xc'uhtunic queh aj Ni̱niwe chi re' rajawric cu ar ru̱c' i Dios xchalic, je' wo' re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, xa re' wo' i c'uhbal nik'or naric'uhtunic aweh tak was tak nicha̱k' c'achalca̱t tak chiwach rik'ijil yu'na, chi re' hin, hin i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Ru'um aj re' til nik'or aweh tak was tak nicha̱k', wi re' hat-tak ma' nanimej ta tak nic'uhbal, charak tak chiri̱j chi nachirak rik'ijil chi re' Dios narich'ukum k'oric chana̱ hat-tak c'acharel c'achalca̱t tak chiwach rik'ijil yu'na, wilic take tinamit naquiyeb quichi̱' chawi̱j tak chi na̱c'ulum tak tojbal amahc tak. Chi quixilac take naquiyeb quichi̱' wilic ixok re' xwih'ic cho chi k'atal k'oric pan tinamit Se̱wa ribihnal. Je' re' naribanam ru' maj re' ixok wili chi cu ma' wili yu̱k' q'uixca̱b xchalic xc'ulic ribiraj rino'jbal i Salomon eh xic'am na̱, raj nchel hat-tak to̱b ta xiq'uic wo' chic na̱ nino'jbal chiwach rino'jbal i Salomon xa ta nak je nac'am tak na̱.

«Je' wo' nachirak cho i rik'ijil re're', re' take tinamit aj Ni̱niwe naquiyeb wo' quichi̱' chiwach Dios chi na̱c'ulum tojbal amahc tak. Je' re' naca'nam maj re' take aj Ni̱niwe xquijal wach quino'jbal chiwach Dios naxquibiraj i c'uhbalanic xiban i Jonas, raj hat-tak was tak nicha̱k' c'achalca̱t tak chiwach i rik'ijil yu'na, to̱b ta nak re' rajawric nic'uhbal k'e̱' wo' chic chiwach i c'uhbal xik'or i Jonas, xa ta nak chi je' re' najal wach ano'jbal tak, nqui queh.

Chiri̱j chic ru' xik'or wo' chic queh chi je' wili: «Ma' hab ta wach aweh tak rikop jeno' sakombal reh chi naritac'a̱b na̱ pan jeno' tz'ak ac'al xun on reh chi nariyeb cok pan c'olic. Ma' je' ta re' na'n tak, nanakop la' tak jeno' sakombal, nat'uya̱' tak johtok wa taxa̱j sakombal queh take qui'oquic cok pan pa̱t, maje'?

Re' sakombal k'uru', re're' nsakomonic reh pa̱m jeno' pa̱t ra̱j re' nsakomonic aweh hat-tak re' je' ricab jeno' sakombal re' i nak' awach tak. Je' re' nik'or maj wi re' nak' awach tak sakom qui'ilbic, pan sakom wo' wilca̱t tak. Tz'a̱b aj ru' wi re' nak' awach tak ma' qui'ilbic ta chic, xa pan k'ekom wo' etiwih'ic tak.
Je' aj re' ru' chawic'raj awi̱b tak chi pan sakom ta nak wilca̱t tak, ma' ok nchel pan k'ekom wilca̱t tak.

Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab chi xa ru̱c' risakomil jeno' sakombal xa sakom chic nawil tak natirisakomej tak, je' wo' re' hat-tak xa re' wo' wi sakom pa̱m acapew-bal tak, enarak tak chiri̱j chi re' wajawric cu ru̱c' i Dios nchalic. Tz'a̱b ru' wi k'ekom pa̱m acapew-bal tak, ma' jaruj ta enarak tak chiri̱j haj nchalic wajawric, nqui Jesus queh.

Chiri̱j chic take k'oric re're', jenaj winak je' ru̱c' cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xiyuk'ej je i Jesus pa ripa̱t chi narojic ribanam riwa' ru̱c'. Nok wilic chic i Jesus nah me̱xa, xquic'am cho riwa' eh xoquic chi wi'c.
Re' winak re're' naxilow chi re' Jesus ma' xo̱j ta ritz'aj rik'ab k'e̱' naxsahchic ric'ux.

Ar ajic re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Pan acomonil hat-tak cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, xa re̱c' chic natz'aj ak'ab tak ch'i̱l riculquil awa' aha̱' tak reh chi ma' eta nanih awi̱b tak ru̱c' i mahc nanacapaj tak, xa re' la' awa̱mna tak hamo̱j cho reh yohbal wach balc'uxquilal je' ricab i quelk'jic take awas acha̱k' tak.
Re' cok hat-tak til awu̱c' tak hamlic memil laj no'jbal maj ma' narak ta na tak chiri̱j chi re' Dios re' xtik'inic reh ak'ab tak re' wo' re' xtik'inic reh awa̱mna tak?
Reh chi ma' eta nanih awi̱b tak ru̱c' i mahc chasi̱j tak so' queh niba̱' i pa' bih wilic aweh tak, chi je' re' enc'utunic lok chi sak wo' wach awa̱mna tak eh ma' xa re' ta nchel ak'ab tak, nqui reh.
