Chiri̱j wili re' Jesus xik'or wo' chic reh winak re're' chi je' wili: «Re' hat-tak cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses k'e̱' rinimal ti'c'axic na̱c'ulum tak ru'um chi ma' nanimej ta tak take c'uhbal til ajwal wach ribanaric. Chi jelow-bal la' chic take re', nanac'ayej awaru̱ta tak, asiq'ue̱j tak on xa pa' chic jaric q'uiche'al nac'ayej tak, re' chic riye'eric junpehr reh i laj pehr chi tumi̱n na'n tak ribanaric chi ric'amaric na̱ rik'ahsjic asi̱ tak chiwach i Dios, xa re' la' i tak'anic wilic chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses re' nk'oric chiri̱j ricorsjic wach ano'jbal tak ch'i̱l wo' re' nk'oric chiri̱j ric'axaric i Dios, c'ahchi' ak'ebem tak lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak. Re' nak take re' curman chi na̱nimem tak chi ma'xta wo' acana̱b riye'eric lok asi̱ tak chiwach i Dios.

«Je' wo', nik'or aweh tak chi k'e̱' rinimal ti' na̱c'ulum tak ru'um chi re' hat-tak k'e̱' nponic chawach tak rinimsjic awi̱b tak ru̱c' i tz'uhkic na'n tak pan quitz'uka̱b take nimak quiwach ar pan tak pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal ye'o̱j reh i Moyses on nok k'e̱' nponic chawach tak ric'uhtjic lok awi̱b tak chi quiwach take tinamit chi nimak awach tak natic'alenjic tak cu'um ar watak c'aybal.

Je' wo' nik'or aweh tak chi k'e̱' rinimal ti'c'axic na̱c'ulum hat-tak cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l wo' take aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal re're' ru'um nok re' hat-tak, xa hat-tak banol awach tak chi quiwach i tinamit, xa je' acab tak rijulil camnak re' ma' nc'utunic ta chic cho natic'ok china̱. Ru̱c' aj ano'jbal tak re're', re' take awaj tahkanel tak c'ahchi' quinihim qui̱b ru̱c' ac'uhtunic tak je' ricab xic'ul jenaj winak xinih ri̱b ru̱c' i mahc naxiq'uic china̱ jenaj rijulil camnak ru'um chi ma' nc'utunic ta chic cho, nqui Jesus.

Naxibiraj chi je' re' i jenaj aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, je' wili xik'or cok reh Jesus: «Ha̱w, ru̱c' take k'oric na'n chi je' re' ma' suk ta koj-acana̱' i hoj pan kacomonil, nqui cok reh Jesus.

Chalic Jesus je' wili ric'u'ljic xiban: «K'e̱' wo' rinimal ti'c'axic na̱c'ulum i hat-tak aj tijem ri̱j riC'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses maj yohbal wach i c'uhbal c'axic wach chi nimjic nac'uhtaj tak queh tinamit, xa re' la' hat-tak xa ta nak je na'n tak so' rinimjic take c'uhbal nak'or tak. Re' hat-tak je' acab tak i winak re' ma' ra̱j ta ricojom so' rik'ab chi ritobjic i raj ihkom rihamej je ahl laj ihk chiri̱j.

Je' aj re' k'uru' k'e̱' rinimal ti'c'axic na̱c'ulum tak eh je' re' nik'or maj nok xa namahsaj tak chic wach ritik'injic take quimuk'unbal take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios xicansjic cho cu'um ama̱m awati't tak najtir k'i̱j,

c'ahchi' ayeb tak lok chi eht'aljic chi re' cansanic xca'n ama̱m awati't tak tare̱t chaweh tak eh ru'um re're', yu'na chi c'uhtbal reh chi toquic tak jenaj ru̱c' quino'jbal take ama̱m awati't tak, re' chic hat-tak c'ahchi' acohlsonic tak wach ritik'injic take muk'unbal quip'utum cho ritik'injic take ama̱m awati't tak chi queh take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios re' xicansjic cho cu'um.

Ru'um aj re', re' Dios re' neht'alanic reh chi'nchel je' wo' wili rik'orom cho: “To̱b ta nak wilic take waj camanom naquisiq'uiric chi ribanaric ti'c'axic queh on chi naquicansjic cu'um take caj ixowonel, re' hin xa nanitak'a̱b wo' je take waj camanom je' ricab take aj nahsil aj tahkanel wi̱n chi niminic eh je' wo' take aj k'orol niC'uhbal, nqui rik'orom cho.

«Je' aj re' xik'or i Dios chi naribanam reh chi nachipahkaj aweh tak chaj bih aj ru'um xicansjic take cho aj k'orol riC'uhbal p'uhtunak cho quicansjic cu pan p'utbal cho reh c'acharic, re' hat-tak c'acharel re' tic'acharic chipam take k'i̱j wili, na̱sakomem wo' tak wach reh re're' to̱b ta ma' re' ta hat-tak xatp'utbic tak cho reh cansanic re're'.

Til coric nik'or aweh tak chi re' Dios naripahkam aweh tak chiri̱j quicansjic take raj k'orol p'uhtunak cho ru̱c' riquimic i Awel, cu nc'ulic lok ru̱c' riquimic i Sacari̱yas re' xcansjic cho najtir k'i̱j chi chi̱' lok i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios ar chi ricorquil i wilic wi̱' i lok' laj ye'a̱b c'atbal si̱ chiwach i Dios.

«Je' aj re' naribanam i Dios eh ru'um re're' til nik'or wo' chic chi k'e̱' ti'quilal na̱wilom tak wach hat-tak aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Re' riwi̱' chi nik'or junpech chic chi je' re', ru'um chi re' c'uhbal re' nc'uhtunic queh tinamit chi naquinimem i Dios re' hat-tak ma' nanimej ta tak eh ma' wo' c'ahchi' ta ac'uhtam tak queh nca̱j nak quinimem. Ru̱c' re're' k'uru', re' hat-tak na'n tak je' ricab xiban jenaj winak re' wilic nak ru̱c' i tehbal reh ritz'ahpil i pa̱t, xa re' la' ru'um chi ma' xa̱j ta ritehem i tz'ahp ma' xoquic ta cok ru̱c' chipam pa̱t eh ma' xiyew ta wo' k'ab chi xi'oquic take jarub chi c'acharel xca̱j nak oquic chipam i pa̱t re're', nqui Jesus.

Ru̱c' aj wili re' Jesus xicohlaj k'oric cu̱c' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l wo' take quitijinic ri̱j c'uhbal re're', re' quimolom qui̱b chipam ripa̱t i winak xyuk'unic reh Jesus. Chiri̱j aj chic ru', naxelic je Jesus chi quixilac take winak re're', xcahnic jenaj ixowonic pan ca̱mna take aj niminel ch'i̱l aj tijinel ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses wilque̱b ar eh p'uht quitik'a̱b wach quino'jbal chi ripahkaljic reh xa chaj bih jeno' k'oric xa tok'bal reh chi c'uta̱j
reh chi xa haj ta nak encalajic ru̱c' take k'oric riban enak ti nquitz'ahkaj wach jeno' k'oric chiri̱j. Je' aj re' ru' xa ic'lic chic cok quixiquin nanquibiraj take k'oric riban i Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic re're' nok re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xquitok'a̱' xa ic'lic chic quixiquin chi ribirmijic i Jesus, q'uihal chic take tinamit xquimol qui̱b chi ribirmijic i Jesus eh xa nquituylom wo' chic qui̱b chiri̱j. Chi je' re' ajic re' Jesus chi pe̱t k'oric je' wili xik'or queh take raj tahkanel: «Re' no'jbal nca'n take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xa je' na ricab i camanic riban i rik'omal caxlan wi'c ncojoric chi sipsbal wach i k'o̱r. Ru'um aj re' chayohbalej awi̱b tak, ma̱ban aweh tak i quino'jbal ru' chi xa banol take quiwach chi quiwach i tinamit.
Je' re' nik'or ru'um nok chiwach i Dios ma'xta bih jeno' no'jbal poyo̱j cho wach ma' ta nak naritehic cho wach eh ma'xta wo' bih jeno' capew-bal c'olo̱j cho ma' ta nak eneht'aljic.

Je' re' k'uru' re' xa pa' bih na̱tik'a̱b tak wach pan tak chak'ab xa na wo' relic lok wach sakom on re' xa pa' bih k'oric na̱banam tak xa pan axiquin tak to̱b ta tz'aplic cho pa̱t, xa na wo' relic lok ribiral chi quina̱ riq'uihal tinamit. Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi ma̱poy tak lok wach chi hat-tak waj tahkanel.
«Re' hat-tak re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak, chacoj tak rehtal i wili: Ma' tiyo'jic tak chi quiwach awaj cansanel tak maj re' take re' xa re' wo' ti acansjic tak enca'n canar.

Re' cok i Dios til chayohlej tak wach wi xacana̱' tak nitahkaljic xa ru'um ayo'jic tak. Je' re' nik'or maj re' cok re' til wilic rajawric ma' xa ta re' chi resmejic ac'acharic tak je' la' wo' chi atak'abjic tak je pan c'ulbal reh ti'c'axic.

«Chi je' aj re' i rajawric i Dios wilic, nik'or wo' chic aweh tak chi til chach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiri̱j maj re're' ncha'janic aweh tak je' ricab riban cu̱c' take cuc' tz'iquin quic'ayjic. Naquic'ayjic ho'o̱b ok chi cuc' tz'iquin, til wo' ma' q'uih ta ti quic'ayjic wi̱' cu'um take tinamit, xa re' la' ma' jeno' queh re' niq'uic ta nak pa ric'ux i Dios quicha'jaljic.

Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi ma' tiyo'jic tak chi quiwach awaj cansanel tak maj wi re' Dios til reht'alim quic'oloric i jarub pa' rismal ana̱ tak wilic, ma' cu re' ta na chic richa'jaljic ac'acharic tak ma' reht'alim? C'olok pan ac'ux tak chi chiwach i Dios, re' atz'akil hat-tak yohbal wo' chic wach q'uihal chiwach quitz'akil nic' q'uihal ok chi cuc' tz'iquin. Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi chach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chi re' Dios naca̱t richa'jem tak chiwach i ti'c'axic.

«Ru̱c' xnik'or chic lok aweh tak re're', nik'or wo' aweh tak chi ma̱poy tak wach chi quiwach i tinamit chi rik'ormojic chi hat-tak waj tahkanel. Wi na'n tak je' ricab nik'or aweh tak, re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel nanik'orom wo' chi quiwach raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios chi hat-tak manlic waj tahkanel.
Tz'a̱b ru' wi jeno' aweh tak xipoy wach chi quiwach i tinamit chi waj tahkanel, re' hin nanik'orom wo' chi quiwach take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios chi til ma' re' ta so' waj tahkanel.

«Yu'na k'uru' xa hab pa' wach rik'ihtaj ri̱b chiwach nik'orbal hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel xa cu na ricuyuric wo' rimahc, raj nachip'ut k'oric i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios hab pa' wach xa c'ahchi' wo' rik'ehtam ri̱b chiwach rik'orbal ru', ma' jaruj ta chic encuyuric rimahc.

Ru'um chi re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios narik'oric ru̱c' achi̱' tak, re' hat-tak ma' riban ntuquic awa̱mna tak chi risiq'uiric ri̱j nic' wach na̱k'orom tak nibiral on chaj bih na̱k'orom tak chi rico'ljic awi̱b tak natic'amarok tak cho pan tak pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ar chi quiwach take wilic cajawric chi rich'ukuric wach mahc.
Je' re' nik'or maj chiwach i junc'am re're', re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios narik'oric aweh tak chaj bih raj k'ormojic queh, nqui Jesus queh.

Jenaj winak wilic chi quixilac riq'uihal tinamit c'ahchi' quibiram ric'uhbalanic i Jesus je' wili xik'or cok reh: «Ha̱w aj tijinel keh, chacuy chak'or reh wi̱n i was chi nakach'akam chi kawach i ye'a̱b ricana̱b cahnok keh i kaja̱w, nqui reh.

Chalic i Jesus je' wili ric'u'ljic xiban: «Chabiraj nanik'orom aweh wili: Re' hin ma' pa'alqui̱n ta ayu' chi ch'ukul wach wolic. Je' wo', ma' k'oro̱j ta wo' wi̱n chi hin aj ch'akol ye'a̱b chana̱ tak, nqui reh.

Chiri̱j chic ru', je' wili xik'or queh riq'uihal tinamit: «Chacoj tak rehtal i nanik'orom wili: Wilic take xa re' chic i bihomal nponic chi quiwach. Raj hat-tak ma' je' ta re' na̱banam tak, chayohbalej la' tak awi̱b ru̱c' i no'jbal re're' maj re' yohbal wach bihomal rimol wach ma' ra̱j ta rik'orom chi c'ahchi' ta nak ritikim rinimal ro̱k ric'acharic, nqui xik'or.
Chiri̱j wili re' Jesus xik'or wo' chic queh i jalwach k'oric wili: «Wilic jenaj biho̱m laj winak xiban je tic pa rac'a̱l. Re' biho̱m re're' naxilow chi yohbal wach naxwachanic cho i ritic xitic jok,

xoquic chi ricapewjic ri̱j pa ric'ux chaj bih naribanam ru̱c' chi'nchel re're'. Je' aj wili capewenic xiban: ‹Chaj bih nanibanam ru̱c' riq'uihal wach nitic? maj re' take nic'ola̱b wach nitic ma'xta chic ric'ulum chi'nchel re're', nqui pa ric'ux.

«Nok je' re' c'ahchi' ricapam, xc'ulic lok jenaj capew-bal ru̱c' eh je' wili xik'or: ‹Ha̱', re' wili nanibanam: Naniyojom take nic'ola̱b wilque̱b yu'na eh nimak chic take nanitik'a̱b. Ar nanihamam chi'nchel wach i nitic ch'i̱l take chi'nchel nic' pa' nimal wilic wi̱n, nqui xik'or.

«Nok ricapam chic re're', je' wo' chic wili xik'or: ‹Nanicohlaj rihamaric pa nic'ola̱b take chi'nchel wach i nitic ch'i̱l chi'nchel nic' pa' nimal wilic wi̱n, nanik'orom chi wibil wi̱b chi je' wili: ‹Hat niti'jolal nibakil, tihi'lok aj je yu'na eh chasuksaj ac'ux ru̱c' awa' aha̱' wilic maj re' nic' nimal i c'olo̱j wili, jarub ta wo' nchel ha̱b na̱c'uhsam wi̱', nqui nanik'orom, nqui pa ric'ux.

«Chiri̱j re're', xa re' aj wo' ti xicohlaj rinimsjic take ric'ola̱b je' wili xk'ormojic reh ru'um i Dios: ‹Hat winak, ma'xta so' ano'jbal maj pan ac'ux i hat xa aweh nak ti naxamol wach i chi'nchel pa' bih aweh xac'ol. Yu'na k'uru' re' chi'nchel ac'olom re're', hab chic wach narehchenic reh? Je' re' nik'or aweh maj chipam ak'ab wili re' hat na̱quimic je, nqui xk'ormojic reh ru'um i Dios.

«Je' aj re' ru' je' ricab k'ehbic xiban ric'olo̱j i biho̱m re're', je' wo' re' k'ehbic naribanam quibihomal take nquimol wach chi xa queh chi quibil qui̱b. Ru'um aj re', re' take je' re' nca'n ma' re' ta so' biho̱m take chiwach i Dios, nqui Jesus.
Chiri̱j re', re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh raj tahkanel: «Ma' tikajic tak capew chi risiq'uiric atumi̱n lok'bal reh awa' aha̱' re' na̱c'acharic tak wi̱' on lok'bal reh aso' socbal reh ati'jolal tak.
Je' re' nik'or maj re' Dios re' ma' c'axic ta chi reh riye'eric cho ac'acharic tak on re' ritik'injic ati'jolal tak, ma' c'axic ta wo' chi reh riye'eric cho aso' tak on awa' aha̱' tak.

Chi risakomsjic wach i ricorquilal re' xnik'or lok re're', chacoj tak rehtal i nanik'orom aweh tak wili je' ricab nc'uluric cu̱c' take ko'ch: Chawil take re', to̱b ta ma' quiticbic ta, ma' quijachbic ta on to̱b ta ma'xta wo' quipa̱t c'olbal wach i quitic, xa quiwi'c wo' ru'um i Dios. Wi je' re' riban i Dios cu̱c' take ko'ch re're', re' ta na chic hat-tak ma' etiriquet tak? Til pan coric, re're' til naca̱t riquetem tak maj re' hat-tak k'e̱' wo' chic atz'akil tak chi quiwach take chicop re're'.
«Chi je' aj re' k'uru' ma' tikajic tak capew chi rimoloric yohbal wach abihomal tak maj hab wach jeno' aweh hat-tak eritik chic jeno' k'i̱j ro̱k ric'acharic xa ru̱c' eriban chi je' re'?

Wi ma' hab wach jeno' aweh tak eriban canar ritikiric xa ta nak jeno' chic k'i̱j ro̱k ric'acharic, chaj wa'ric k'uru' chi xa nic' chic na̱ i capewenic na'n tak chiri̱j take xa pa' chic jaric ajwal wach aweh tak pan ac'acharic tak?

Ma̱ban tak chic je' re' chiri̱j aso' tak k'uru' maj re're' xa nariye'eric wo' cho aweh tak ru'um i Dios. C'uhtbal reh ricorquilal xnik'or lok re're' chacoj tak rehtal je' ricab nc'uluric cu̱c' take ihtz'ub wilque̱b chawach tak wili: Re' take re' xa ma' naho̱l ta chic quiwach chi camanic, ma' xa naho̱l ta wo' chic quiwach chi riquemeric quiso' eh xa chak' chic wach holonquilal q'uihic nca'n tok. K'e̱' wo' chic holonquilal take chi xa ta nak je re' riholonquilal riso' i Salomon chi k'atal k'oric rijunehtej nech' ok ri̱b ru̱c' riholonquilal jeno' queh ihtz'ub wili!

«Ru'um aj chi re' Dios ncha'janic aweh tak, ma' re' ta chic aweh tak chi ma' ta nak enachop ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Dios. Je' re' nik'or maj wi watak yu̱k' q'uixca̱b xa holohic chic rixoyjic take cu̱c' q'uiche̱' riban i Dios to̱b ta xa nic' yu' ti quic'ataric cok pan k'a̱k', re' ta na chic hat-tak ma' eriyew aso' tak re' na̱so'em wi̱' awi̱b tak?
Ma' tikajic tak chic capew k'uru' chiri̱j i tumi̱n lok'bal reh awa' aha̱' tak eh je' wo' ma' riban naho̱l awach tak chiri̱j aso' re' na̱so'em wi̱' awi̱b tak.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' aso' ch'i̱l awa' aha̱' tak, xa na wo' riye'eric aweh tak ru'um i kAja̱w Dios ru'um nok reht'alim chic cho chi curman chaweh tak. Ma̱ban aweh tak k'uru' je' ricab nca'n take tinamit chi xa chiri̱j wo' chi'nchel re're' choplic quic'ux eh chiri̱j i Dios ma' choplic ta so' quic'ux.
Re' la' hat-tak chasic' tak ricojoric awi̱b tak chi rehquen rajawric i Dios chi k'atal k'oric eh chi je' re', re're' ewo' riyew cho aweh tak i pa' bih curman chaweh tak.

«Je' re' nok re' hat-tak waj tahkanel re' je' na acab tak juntzuhm ok ti chi me̱' ma' tiyo'jic tak chi nitahkaljic maj re' Dios xponic chiwach chi re' chi'nchel pa' bih wilic pa rik'ab chi k'atal k'oric re' hat-tak na̱wehchenic tak reh.

Je' aj re' ru' chac'ayej tak pa' bih wilic aweh tak eh ru̱c' tumi̱n re're' chato'bej tak take c'axic nca'n. Ru̱c' chi je' re' ena'n tak, ar chic pan taxa̱j enamol tak wach toco̱m chic bihomal re' ma' jaruj ta chic narisahchic wach. Ru'um chi ar pan taxa̱j ma' noquic ta aj ilek' eh ma'xta wo' take ric'oyil tz'ih, re' hat-tak til na̱ch'ica̱b ac'ux tak chi ric'oloric abihomal tak ar je' ricab na'n ru̱c' atumi̱n tak nanac'ol tak pan jeno' t'uch coxtal tz'ih je' ru̱c' ma' ch'ukic ta reh.

Je' re' ajic wi ru̱c' i Dios ar pan taxa̱j nach'ica̱' ac'ux tak, re' acapew-bal tak ewo' nwih'ic chi suk je' ricab nok re' hoj ma' kojcapewenic chiri̱j kabihomal nok keht'alim haj c'olic cho chi coric.
«Ru'um chi re' hin na wo' chic nisoljic cho, re' hat-tak xa tikilca̱t ok wo' tak chi uyu'unic xa je' ta nak xa koplic wo' asakombal tak.

Cha'n tak k'uru' je' ricab nca'n take raj camanom jeno' ajabe̱s wilic ponok pan nink'i̱j reh jeno' caxarahil. Re' take re' xa koplic wo' quisakombal chi ric'uluric i cajabe̱s eh xa tikilque̱b wo' chi riteheric reh tz'ahp nak'orok cho.

K'e̱' je ato̱b queh take aj camanom re're' k'uru' naponok i ajabe̱s cu̱c' maj til nik'or aweh tak chi ru'um chi cu c'achlic quiwach na'ojok c'olok i ajabe̱s, naquic'axaric chi je' wili: Re' ajabe̱s re're' naribac'am jeno' tz'ih wach ritu̱k, naricojom take nah me̱xa i raj camanom re're' eh nariyeb quiwa' quiha̱'.

Ru̱c' aj eriban ajabe̱s re're', nik'or aweh tak chi k'e̱' je ato̱b queh take camanom re're' maj til ric'ul chi equic'axaric chi je' re' ru'um nok to̱b ta nak cu tic'lic ak'ab on cu pa risoljic ak'ab ensoljic cho ajabe̱s, re' take re' xa cu c'achlic wo' nak quiwach chi ruyu'njic.

«Re' hat-tak k'uru' xa ic'lic ok wo' ana̱ tak. Ma̱c'ul nchel aweh tak je' ricab xic'ul i jenaj ajabe̱s re' ma' xeht'alij ta i k'i̱j naxc'ulic lok jenaj aj lek' chi relk'jic pa̱m ripa̱t. Ar aj ru' xoquic pa ripa̱t eh xelk'aj je chi'nchel pa' bih wilic reh. Wi ta nak re' ajabe̱s re're' xeht'alij chaj bih k'ijal naric'ulic lok wi̱' aj lek' re're', til coric nik'or chi xicha'jej nak chi xa ic'lic chic na̱ eh ma' xiyew ta nak chi xelk'jic pa̱m ripa̱t.
Je' re' ajic ru'um chi re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel nanic'ulic lok nok ma' hab ta wach ncapewenic reh, re' hat-tak xa ic'lic ok wo' ana̱ tak, nqui Jesus.
Chalic ma' Luch je' wili xik'or cok reh Jesus: «Ha̱w, hab wach aj eh c'ahchi' ak'orom take tijbal wili? Xa keh na hoj chi kutquel on reh wo' chi'nchel tinamit? nqui cok reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Re' jeno' ajabe̱s nok ojic chic reh chi naht, ma' re' ta na jeno' raj camanom je' ru̱c' wilic rino'jbal eh je' ru̱c' ch'iquem c'uxlis naripahba̱b cahnok chi ric'amaric quibe̱h chi'nchel raj camanom wilque̱b pa ripa̱t je' wo' chi riye'eric quiwa' quiha̱' pa ri'orahil? Til pan coric re' aj camanom re' je' re' rino'jbal, re're' naricanabjic cahnok chi aj ilo̱l.
K'e̱' je ato̱b reh aj camanom npahbabjic cahnok chi c'amol be̱h, wi re' pa' bih i camanic k'oro̱j cahnok reh chi naribanam, re' wo' re' c'ahchi' rinimem nac'olok rakmajok

maj til pan coric nik'or aweh tak chi re' camanom re're' narijohsjic wach ricamaj ru'um ajabe̱s chi c'axbal reh eh chi je' re' naricojoric cahnok chi chopol na̱ chi'nchel pa' bih wilic reh i ajabe̱s re're'.

Ra̱j nchel wi re' camanom re're' ma' riban ta ricamaj chi coric ru'um ricapaj pa ra̱mna chi ja' c'ulic ta lok reh ajabe̱s eh chi je' re' enoquic chi quich'eyeric take rich camanom je' wo' enoquic chi nink'ijinic on chi xohc'ric,

k'e̱' je ti'quil naric'ulum aj camanom re're'. Je' re' ajic nac'olok lok i ajabe̱s chipam i k'i̱j nok re' aj camanom re're' ma' reht'alim ta so' on chipam i junc'am nok ma' c'ahchi' ta ricapam so' ric'ulic lok i ajabe̱s, naric'ulic rakmajok chi je' re' c'ahchi' ribanam. Je' aj re', re' aj camanom re're' naricahnic chiwach i ajabe̱s chi xa je' chic ricab jeno' queh take aj camanom re' take ma' quiniminic ta wo' reh ricamaj.

Je' re' k'uru' re' camanom ncanabjic cahnok pan k'ab chi'nchel pa' bih wilic reh ajabe̱s, chi rinimej cahnok ricamaj chi coric reh chi ma' eta ric'ul reh je' ricab xic'ul jenaj aj camanom ma' q'uisa ta tz'uhu̱m xic'ul. Re're' tanlic chi reh chi je' re' xic'ul maj to̱b ta nak xeht'alij chaj bih camanic xa̱j i ajabe̱s, ma' xiban ta wo' ribanaric eh xa ta wo' nak xitik'a̱' ri̱b chi ruyu'njic.

Je' re' nok re' camanom re're' q'uih i tz'uhu̱m naric'ulum chiwach i jenaj chic rich aj camanom re' ma' rinimej ta chi coric ricamaj ajabe̱s ru'um chi ma' reht'alim ta chi coric chaj bih camanic naribanam. Chi je' aj re' ru', nim wach ti'c'axic naric'ulum aj camanom re' xcanabjic cahnok pan k'ab chi'nchel pa' bih wilic reh ajabe̱s. Je' re' nik'or wi jeno' aj camanom nk'ahsjic cahnok pan k'ab jeno' nim wach camanic ru'um chi aj ch'iquem ric'ux i ajabe̱s, holohic laj camanic wo' naripahkaljic reh chi naribanam cahnok, nqui Jesus reh ma' Luch.

Chiri̱j chi re' je' wo' chic wili xik'or i Jesus: «Je' ricab nok re' k'a̱k' nkoporic chi reh c'atbal wach riye'a̱b jeno' aj tico̱l, je' wo' re' riwi̱' i nic'ulic lok i hin ayu' wach ac'al, reh wo' chi narip'uhtic i k'atoj k'oric chi quina̱ tinamit. Je' re' k'uru' re' hin k'e̱' nak nwa̱j chi xp'uhtic ta nak chic i k'atoj k'oric re're',

xa re' la' curman chi pe̱t nanimuk'unjic pan ac'al je' ricab chi je' pan kahsanic ha' wilqui̱n. Ru'um aj re' k'e̱' wo' chic riyot'quil i wa̱mna noquic cho cu rehtal nariponic wach nimuk'unjic pan ac'al.

«Ma' coric ta na chi re' hat-tak nacapaj tak chi ru̱c' nic'ulic lok i hin, naribanam chi chi'nchel take tinamit xa pan sukquil c'uxlis chic naquic'acharic? Til nik'or aweh tak chi ma' chi'nchel ta tinamit xa suk ta nak chic c'acharic naca'nam, re' la' take naquiniminic wi̱n narixowjic quiwach ru'um chi waj tahkanel take.

Chi je' aj re' k'uru' yu'na johtok chi kawach je' wili naric'uluric chi quixilac take aj niminel wi̱n ch'i̱l take ma' re' ta take aj niminel wi̱n: Wi pan jeno' pa̱t, kak'or chi wilic ho'o̱b ok chi c'acharel, wi xib ok take aj tahkem wi̱n, narixowjic quiwach cu'um take qui̱b. On wi re' quib aj tahkem ok take wi̱n, narixowjic quiwach cu'um take xib.

On pan jeno' chic pa̱t, kak'or chi re' ac'unbe̱s aj niminel wi̱n, narixowjic wach ru'um i raja̱w. On wi re' ajabe̱s aj nimem wi̱n, narixowjic wach ru'um rac'u̱n. On wi re' tutbe̱s aj niminel wi̱n, narixowjic wach ru'um rixk'u̱n. On wi re' ok nchel ixk'unbe̱s aj niminel wi̱n, narixowjic wach ru'um ritu̱t. Je' wo', wi re' il'ibe̱s aj niminel wi̱n, narixowjic wo' wach ru'um ritu̱t ribahi̱l. Wi re' ritu̱t ribahi̱l aj niminel wi̱n, narixowjic wo' wach ru'um ril'i̱b, nqui Jesus.

Naxicohlaj Jesus rik'ormojic wili queh nahsil raj tahkanel, je' wili xik'or queh riq'uihal tinamit: «Re' hat-tak tinamit til narak tak chiri̱j re' nc'uluric ayu' wach ac'al nanawil tak johtok i k'i̱j ar pan taxa̱j. Je' ricab nanawil tak chi re' su̱tz' nchalic ar re' nkajic wi̱' i k'i̱j, naribanam po' jab, tiqui tak eh je' wo' re' riban.
On nanawil tak chi re' su̱tz' nsoljic wo' chic je, je' wili nak'or tak: ‹Tz'a' po' k'i̱j naribanam ikal, tiqui tak eh je' wo' re' riban.

«Wi je' aj re' na'n tak, ra̱j rik'orom chi xa hat po' banol awach tak maj wi wilic aj ano'jbal tak chi narak tak chiri̱j re' nc'uluric ayu' wach ac'al nanawil tak johtok i k'i̱j ch'i̱l i su̱tz' ar pan taxa̱j, chaj wa'ric k'uru' chi ru̱c' pahkanic c'ahchi' nibanam aweh tak chipam take k'i̱j wili na'n tak awi̱b chi xa je' ma' narak ta tak chiri̱j?

«Reh aj chi na̱capam tak chiri̱j wi tare̱t on ma' tare̱t i coric wach i pahkanic c'ahchi' nibanam aweh tak chiri̱j chi na̱pahkam cuybal amahc tak chiwach i Dios, toque̱n tak so' chi ricapewjic ri̱j i no'jbal nayew tak chawibil awi̱b tak.

Re' hat-tak je' wili no'jbal nak'or tak chawach: ‹Wi wilic so' ac'a̱s ru̱c' awas acha̱k' eh c'ahchi'ca̱t ric'amam je ru̱c' i wilic rajawric chi rich'ukuric wach mahc, chacowej awi̱b chi ritik'injic wach ac'a̱s nah be̱h chi cu ja' tiponic ta pe tak chiwach aj ch'ukul wach mahc re're' maj ma' je' re' xa'n tak, xa na̱ponic wo' tak chiwach aj ch'ukul wach mahc eh ar natik'ahsjok pan k'ab aj ilol tz'ahpel eticojoric pan che̱'.

Je' aj re' k'uru' chacowej awi̱b chi ritik'injic wach ac'a̱s ru̱c' awas acha̱k' chi nok, maj til coric nik'or chi ma' ja' eta pe chic telic cho pan che̱', wi cu ma' ja' natoj chi'nchel ac'a̱s, nqui nak'or chawach tak, nqui Jesus queh tinamit.

Xa chiwach wo' junc'am re're' wilic take xik'oric cok reh i Jesus chi je' wili: «Re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to xitak'a̱' quicansjic take winak aj Calile̱ya re' xiponic ar Jerusalen chi rik'ahsjic quisi̱ chiwach i Dios. Re're' ar xc'uluric chipam ye'a̱b re' nc'atjic wi̱' si̱ chiwach i Dios, nqui take cok reh.

Chalic Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Ma' coric ta na chi re' take winak re're', je' re' quimic xquic'ul ru'um chi k'e̱' wo' chic nim wach quimahc chi quiwach take quich ti'jolal wilque̱b ar Calile̱ya nacapaj tak?

Ma̱capaj tak chic chi je' re' maj til nik'or wo' aweh tak, wi ma' nacana̱' ano'jbal tak xa na̱quimic wo' tak je' ricab xiquimic take winak re're'. Re' take re' xiquimic ma' ru'um ta chi re' quimahc k'e̱' ta wo' chic nim wach chiwach i quimahc take quich ti'jolal wilque̱b ar Calile̱ya.

Je' re' ajic chacana̱' amahc tak maj wi ma' nacana̱' tak na̱c'ulum aweh tak je' ricab xquic'ul take wahxaklaj chi winak aj Jerusalen re' xiquimic ar Siloheh ru'um chi xk'ehbic cho jenaj naht na̱ tz'ak chi quina̱. —Ha̱', re' take winak re're' xiquimic je maj k'e̱' wo' chic nim wach quimahc chi quiwach take quich ti'jolal wilque̱b ar Jerusalen, nqui nak'or pan ac'ux tak.

«Coric chi je' re' nacapaj tak, ra̱j la' hin til nik'or aweh tak chi ma' je' ta re' riwi̱'. Ma̱capaj tak chic chi je' re' maj til nik'or wo' chic aweh tak, wi ma' nacana̱' ano'jbal na'n tak, xa na̱quimic wo' tak je' ricab xiquimic take winak re're', nqui Jesus queh.

Chiri̱j chic re' xik'or queh i jalwach k'oric wili: «Jenaj winak wilic junseht riye'a̱b re' tico̱j wi̱' junwal riche̱' jal suk riwachej I̱co ribihnal. Re' winak re're' naricoj rehtal chi rik'ijil nak chic chi re' che̱' nariwachanic cho, eli̱c ha̱b nchalic chi risiq'uiric nak i wach riche̱' xa re' la' ru' ma' rirak ta wo' jeno' wach.

Naxch'i'tjic reh che̱' re're', je' wili xik'or reh ncha'janic reh riye'a̱b: ‹Re' che̱' wili xa lahtz' riban chiwach i wac'a̱l. Chawil! Eli̱c ha̱b quinc'ulic lok chi risiq'uiric nak wach eh xa ta je junpech nirakam jeno' wach chiwach i xib ha̱b re' ritok'a̱b nak cho wi̱' wachanic. Chayoc' lok wi̱n k'uru', nqui winak re're' reh raj cha'jem ye'a̱b.
«Chalic aj cha'jem ye'a̱b, je' wili xik'or reh winak re're': ‹Ha̱w, chawuy'ej ta pe chic jeno' ha̱b, niniq'uej pe ric'otoric so' pa̱m ac'al chiri̱j eh nanicojom so' rik'ahisal wara̱'.
K'i̱j ta nak chi je' re', chip'ut cho wachanic. Tz'a̱b ru', wi ma' wo' wachanic chi je' re', cu re' aj wo' naniyoc'om lok, nqui aj cha'jem ye'a̱b, nqui Jesus.
Junpech pan jenaj hi'lbal k'i̱j, re' Jesus xoquic chi c'uhbalanic chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j C'uhbal ye'o̱j reh Moyses.

Ar chi quixilac riq'uihal tinamit wilic jenaj ixok wahxaklaj ha̱b richopic cho chi yowabjic ru'um jenaj ma' tob laj uxlabal. Re' ixok re're' xic'unej ri̱b i ri̱j eh ma' jaruj ta chic nk'ochjic johtok wach chi junpech.
Ar ajic naxilow je wach ixok re're', re' Jesus xik'o'rej je eh naxo̱j c'olok ru̱c', je' wili xik'or reh: «Tuwe̱y, chiwach i junc'am wili narelic lok aya'bilal, nqui reh.

Chiri̱j ru' xicoj i cabchel k'ab china̱ ixok re're' eh naxiban chi je' re', xa chi junc'am wo' ti xk'ochlojic johtok wach i ri̱j. Re' ixok re're' naxilow chi je' re' xc'uluric ru̱c', p'uht ritioxem johtok Dios

raj nchel i ma' winak re' aj c'amol be̱h chipam i pa̱t re're' k'e̱' naxchalic ric'a̱ ru'um chi je' re' xiban i Jesus chipam i hi'lbal k'i̱j. Je' re' nok je' wili xik'or queh tinamit: «Re' hat-tak tinamit ma' tichalic tak ayu' pan hi'lbal k'i̱j xa reh chi naresmejic lok aya'bilal tak. Ma̱ban tak chi je' re' maj re' esenic lok ya'bilal jenaj wo' camanic nok k'oro̱j cho. Wi nawa̱j aj tak chi naresmejic lok aya'bilal tak, tichalok tak chiwach i waki̱b k'i̱j ye'o̱j chi camanbal, nqui queh.

Chalic Jesus je' wili xik'or reh ma' winak re're': «Re' hat ch'i̱l take awich'i̱l xa hat banol awach tak. Je' re' nik'or maj xa nak'or nak tak chic chi ma' na'n ta tak so' camanic pan hi'lbal k'i̱j eh ma' je' ta wo' re' na'n tak. Re' hat-tak, wi bac'lic cho aboyex tak on wi bac'lic cho a-ihkom laj cawa̱y tak ar pa riwarbal, ma' re' ta na ti so' camanic na'n tak pan hi'lbal k'i̱j nato̱j chi richejeric reh chi na̱yeb tak riha̱'?

Wi je' re' na'n reh achico̱p tak, re' na ti chic ixok wili je' ru̱c' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Awraham, ma' eriyew ri̱b chi chipam i hi'lbal k'i̱j enesmejic pan k'ab riya'bilal, re' wahxaklaj ha̱b ricojoric cho reh ru'um cajawil ma' tob laj uxlabal? nqui Jesus reh.
Je' aj re' ru' ru̱c' take k'oric xik'or i Jesus, k'e̱' naxchalic quiq'uix'ic take raj ixowonel raj take riq'uihal i tinamit xa nsukbic chic quic'ux ru'um take rinimal ato'bil riban ru'.
Ru'um aj chi nsukbic quic'ux i tinamit, re' Jesus je' wili rik'or queh: «Chaj bih nanijalwachem wi̱' i niC'uhbal nik'or chi re' Dios re' nk'atbic k'oric ra̱j richopom quina̱ take c'acharel?

Re' rijalwachjic i ric'am je' wi̱' ri̱b niC'uhbal cu rehtal nq'uihic wach chi risuksjic i ca̱mna take tinamit, nanijalwachem ru̱c' ric'ul i jenaj ija' “Mosta̱sa” ribihnal re' xc'amaric je ru'um jenaj winak chi naritiquim jok pa rac'a̱l. Re' ija' re're' til wo' t'uch ti naxtiquiric jok, xa re' la' naxelic cho nah ac'al xq'uihic johtok cu rehtal xponic jenaj nim laj che̱' re' xca'n wi̱' quike̱s take cu̱c' tz'iquin xilac tak k'ab, nqui Jesus queh.

Chiri̱j re're', je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Raj wo' cu̱c' take waj ixowonel, chaj bih jeno' jalwach k'oric nanijalwachem wi̱' i camanic riban i niC'uhbal nik'or chi re' Dios re' nk'atbic k'oric ra̱j richopom quina̱ take c'acharel?

Re' niC'uhbal re're' nanijalwachem ru̱c' riban i rik'omil caxlan wi'c. Re' ik'o̱m re're', naxcojoric ru'um i jenaj ixok chi xilac i oxpaj chi rik'oril caxlan wi'c, xixilaquej ri̱b ch'i̱l i k'o̱r cu rehtal xisipsaj wach, nqui Jesus queh tinamit.
Chiri̱j chic ru' naxelic je chipam ye'a̱b re're', re' Jesus xitik ju' rojic ar Jerusalen. Xa pa' tinamit on xa pa' abixbal niq'uic ponok wi̱', xa niq'uic wo' rik'or ponok i c'uhbal queh tinamit.

Junpech, nok tijinic riban i Jesus jenaj winak je' wili xik'or cok reh: «Ha̱w, q'uih na take naquico'ljic chiwach ti'c'axic on ma' q'uih ta wo' ti take? nqui cok reh. Chalic Jesus je' wili ric'u'ljic xiban:

«Chacowej ac'ux tak yu'na chi ric'uluric ric'axbal i Dios, je' ricab xca'n take xi'oquic pan jenaj nink'i̱j xquicowej quic'ux chi oquic chipam i jenaj t'uch wach tz'ahp. Je' re' nik'or chi na̱banam tak maj til coric nik'or aweh tak chi yohbal wach take tinamit naquiniq'uem nak quik'i̱j chi ric'uluric i ric'axbal i Dios, xa re' la' ma'xta wo' quic'ulum. Cu̱c' take re' naric'uluric je' ricab xc'uluric wo' chipam i nink'i̱j re're' chi yohbal nak wach xquiniq'uej cok quik'i̱j chi oquic, xa re' la' ma' xca'n ta chic canar

ru'um chi naxi'o̱j c'olok tz'apo̱j chic i tz'ahp ru'um aj ehcham nink'i̱j. Nik'or aweh tak yu'na chi cu wilic pe ric'axbal i Dios, chac'ul tak. Ma' nk'ormojic nchel aweh tak je' ricab xk'ormojic queh take k'oro̱j chic cho ribiral re' xicahnic lok rij pa̱t. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' je' wili tohk' quik'orom cok reh ajabe̱s re're': ‹Ha̱w, chacuy chateh cho keh apa̱t, nqui take cok reh. «Nok je' re' xquik'or je' pe' chic wili xk'ormojic cho queh: ‹Ma' weht'alim ta awach tak. Ma' wo' weht'alim pa' tichalic tak, nqui xk'ormojic cho queh.

«Re' hat-tak k'uru', chac'ul tak i ric'axbal i Dios chi cu wilic cho chi riye'eric chana̱ tak maj nariponic i k'i̱j chi ma'xta chic riwih'ic cho ric'axbal i Dios. Chipam i k'i̱j re're' je' wili na̱k'orom tak: ‹Ha̱w, re' hoj xka'n cho kawa' kaha̱' chi hat kich'i̱l. Ha̱w, re' hat xa'n cho c'uhbalanic pan katinami̱t, nqui na̱k'orom tak.

«To̱b ta nak je' chic re' chak'or tak, ma'xta chic abirmajic tak cho, je' la' chic wili narik'ormojic cho aweh tak: ‹Til coric nik'or aweh tak chi ma' weht'alim ta awach tak. Telen tak chi niwach hat-tak banol reh c'ahbil laj no'jbal, nqui narik'ormojic cho aweh tak.

«Je' aj re' ru' yu'na chac'ul tak i ric'axbal i Dios chi cu wilic cho riye'eric, reh chi chipam i k'i̱j nok re' Dios k'atoj k'oric chic riban, ma' eta nac'ul aweh tak je' ricab xquic'ul take rula̱' aj ehcham nink'i̱j chi xit'ermejic lok chiri̱j pa̱t eh ru'um re're' xi'oquic chi ok'ic ru'um riti'quil quic'ux chi xi'esmejic lok pa rinimal lok k'ekom. Wi je' re' xac'ul tak k'uru', ma'xta chic abanam tak canar oquic re' wilque̱b wi̱' ma' Awraham, ma' Isahac ch'i̱l ma' Jacow. Naponok i k'i̱j re're', re' aj take re' naquimolom qui̱b quich'i̱l chi'nchel take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios,

je' wo' quich'i̱l take aj niminel naquichalic take chi junsut wach ac'al eh naquiwih'ic cok chiwach i kAja̱w Dios re' K'atal K'oric china̱ chi'nchel. Nok wilque̱b chic cok chiwach, re're' naribanam chi enquic'ul jenaj rinimal wach quilok'il je' ricab quilok'il nquic'ul take rula̱' jeno' aj ehcham nink'i̱j nok re're' riyew queh chi naquitz'uhkic cok nah rime̱xa rich'i̱l.

Chipam i k'i̱j re're', re' take xca'n nak qui̱b chi wilic nak quilok'il chi quiwach i tinamit, chiwach i Dios ma'xta riwih'ic so' quilok'il eh re' take nc'utunic lok chi ma'xta nak ti so' quilok'il chi quiwach i tinamit, re' chic take re' nariye'eric quilok'il ru'um i Dios, nqui Jesus.

Xa chiwach wo' k'i̱j re're', juntuhm take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xiponic ru̱c' Jesus re' c'ahchi' wi̱' chi c'uhtunic eh je' wili xquik'or reh: «Ha̱w, re' Hero̱res re' nk'atbic k'oric pan katinami̱t ra̱j ritak'a̱b cho acansjic. Ru'um aj re' nkak'or aweh yu'na, sakbih nak chi etelic je ayu', nqui take reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' winak re're' xa je' ricab jenaj ya̱c chi wi̱n ru'um chi ma' quiriyo'saj ta so' ru̱c' rik'orbal. Hiy tak k'uru', chak'or tak reh chi je' wili: ‹Re' Jesus xik'or cho chi ru'um chi cu c'ahchi' resam lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal cu̱c' take c'acharel eh je' wo' chi cu wilic take c'acharel c'ahchi' resam lok quiya'bilal, re're' cu naricahnic chic quib xib ok k'i̱j chipam ye'a̱b wilic wi̱' cu rehtal ricohlaj wach ricamaj, nqui cho, tiquirok tak reh Hero̱res, nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic ru' je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «To̱b ta nak cu wilic raj banaric chaxilac tak ayu', re' hin curman chi nanitikim ju' nibe̱h reh ojic ar Jerusalen chipam quib xib ok k'i̱j. Je' re' nanibanam maj nic' wach nachiban chi ayu' naniquimic? Ar nawojic k'uru' ru'um nok re' take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios xa ar wo' Jerusalen quicansjic, nqui queh.

Chiri̱j chic ru' je' wili xik'or chiqui̱j tinamit aj Jerusalen: «Hat-tak c'acharel aj Jerusalen re' ticansanic tak queh chi abaj take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios tak'amaj take cho awu̱c' tak, k'e̱' je njik'jitic i wa̱mna chawi̱j tak ru'um i ti'c'axic na̱c'ulum tak. Re' hin k'e̱' nak nwa̱j aco'ljic tak chiwach i ti'c'axic re're' je' ricab nok jeno' quixlan rimoh'ej take cuc' rac'u̱n pa rixi̱c' chi quico'ljic, xa re' la' hat-tak ma' jaruj nac'u'lej tak na̱ nic'uhbal.

Chi je' re' xa'n tak chabiraj tak chi coric i wili: Je' ricab nancanabjic jeno' pa̱t cu'um take c'acharel naqui'elic je chipam, je' wo' re' naribanam i Dios chi naricana̱b atinami̱t tak chipam i ti'c'axic chalic reh chana̱ tak. Je' wo' til nik'or wo' aweh tak aj Jerusalen chi ma' ja'xta pe chic awilom tak niwach cu rehtal chic nariponic rik'ijil chi na̱k'orom tak i je' ricab tz'ihmbimaj cho chi je' wili chipam Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios: “Kayew tak rilok'il k'uru' i c'ulic riban lok wili chi tak'amaj cho ru'um i Dios, nqui rik'or, nqui Jesus.

Pan jenaj hi'lbal k'i̱j chi keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, nok re' Jesus xo̱j riban riwa' ru̱c' jenaj winak nim riwa'ric chi quixilac take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, juntuhm chi c'acharel je' ru̱c' ricomonil take winak re're' xquitok'a̱' wo' chic xa ic'lic chic quina̱ chi rilmijic chi haj ta nak encalajic i Jesus chi quiwach.
Nok je' re' c'ahchi'que̱b take winak re're', re' Jesus xicoj rehtal chi ar wilic jenaj winak aj k'an ha'.

Ru'um aj re' je' wili xik'or queh ricomonil i winak re're' ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses wilque̱b wo' ar: «Riyew na k'ab riC'uhbal i Dios Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi pan tak hi'lbal k'i̱j naric'sjic quiya'bilal take yowa'i̱b? nqui queh.

Re' take winak re're' ma' xic'u'lunic ta. Chi je' re' k'uru' re' Jesus naxicoj i k'ab china̱ i yowa̱b re're', xiq'uic ti je riya'bilal eh nok iq'uinak chic riya'bilal je' wili xk'ormojic reh winak re're' ru'um i Jesus: «Ta chic re̱t chi eto̱j yu'na, nqui reh.

Chiri̱j chic ru' re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh ricomonil winak re're' ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses: «Re' ato'bil wili, re' nak hat-tak xatbanic tak je' ricab na'n tak ru̱c' jeno' acawa̱y tak on aboyex tak maj hab wach aweh hat-tak ma' eno̱j resaj ricawa̱y on riboyex wi xk'ehbic jok pan jeno' rijulil ha' to̱b ta nak pan jeno' hi'lbal k'i̱j? nqui Jesus queh.
Chiwach rik'orbal i Jesus re're', re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal re're' xa nquiquipa̱' chic qui̱b ru'um.

Chiri̱j chic ru' naxic'saj riya'bilal i winak re're', re' Jesus xicoj je rehtal chi re' take rula̱' i winak re' xyuk'unic reh chi wi'c chayew chiho̱j tak wach tz'uka̱b nca'n re' quitz'uhkic wi̱' take nimak quiwach. Ru'um aj re' xik'or queh jenaj no'jbal chi je' wili:

«Nok jeno' hab wach xiban caxa̱ra eh xatriyuk'ej ok tak nchel chi na̱wih'ic ru̱c' pan nink'i̱j, ma' no̱j achih tak wach i tz'uka̱b re' quitz'uhkic wi̱' take nimak quiwach. Je' re' ajic natiyuk'unjok tak chi wi'c nah me̱xa ma̱ban aweh no'jbal je' re' maj chaj bih na̱na'bem wi wilic ok chic cho jeno' ula̱' ja' nponic ta je' ru̱c' k'e̱' nim wach chawach hat-tak?

Kak'or wi re' hat-tak tz'ukulca̱t tak chipam i ye'a̱b re're', cu re' chic aweh tak ru' je' wili eno̱j k'ormojok aweh tak ru'um aj ehcham reh nink'i̱j naponok i rula̱' re're': ‹Chacuy, chayew ti wi̱n atz'uka̱b reh ma' winak wili, nqui eno̱j k'ormojok aweh. «Wi je' aj re' eno̱j k'ormojok aweh tak, re' hat-tak chi xa ti q'uix'ic tak chic cu re' chic enap'ut risiq'uiric jeno' atz'uka̱b tak chi quixilac take tz'ukulque̱b wi̱' take ma' nimak ta ti quiwach.

Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak wili: Je' ricab wi xatyuk'unjic tak pan jeno' nink'i̱j, chatz'uka̱' ti awi̱b tak re' quitz'uhkic wi̱' take ma' nimak ta tiquiwach. Wi je' re' xa'n tak, enjohsjic awach chi quiwach take tz'ukulque̱b nah me̱xa re' chiho̱j lok chi xa queh take nimak quiwach nak'ormojok aweh chi je' wili ru'um aj ehcham nink'i̱j: ‹Ha̱w, titz'u̱k ti wi̱n chi quixilac take wula̱' wili, nqui banol aweh ne'el.

«Chacoj tak rehtal i no'jbal wili k'uru' maj chiwach i Dios je' wo' re' nc'uluric. Re' hab wach rinimsaj ri̱b narit'uchsjic wach ru'um i Dios eh re' hab wach rit'uchsaj ti ri̱b, re're' narinimsjic wach ru'um i Dios, nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j wili re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh ma' winak re' xyuk'unic je reh chi wi'c: «Nachacoj chic jeno' ani̱m ma' xa re' ta ok take awas acha̱k', ma' xa re' ta ok take awu̱c' take cho, ma' xa re' ta ok take aca'ja̱ je' ru̱c' biho̱m take, ma' xa re' ta ok take suk quik'oric awu̱c' na̱yuk'em take cho awu̱c'. Ma' xa re' ta ok take re' nayuk'ej take k'uru' maj chaj bih na̱weht'alim nachirak cho rik'ijil jeno' quini̱m ru', ewo' chic tiquiyuk'ej cu̱c' eh xa ru̱c' re're', re' c'axo̱j xa'n queh ewo' chic nac'ul rijelow-bal cu̱c'?

Re' la' hat-tak nacha'n jeno' ani̱m, chayuk'ej wo' je awu̱c' take tinamit re' ma' hab ta wach nyuk'unic queh, je' ricab take niba̱' ch'i̱l take ma' manlic ta wach co̱k quik'ab ch'i̱l wo' take sot' wach.

Wi je' re' xa'n, k'e̱' nimal wach ato'bil na̱c'ulum chipam i k'i̱j nok re' nic' nimal take coric wach quino'jbal narijohsjic quiwach ru'um i Dios. Je' re' nik'or maj re' rijelow-bal i c'axo̱j na̱banam ma'xta chic riye'eric jelow-bal aweh ayu' cu'um take tinamit, re' la' chic i Dios nariye'bic aweh naponok i k'i̱j re're', nqui Jesus reh ma' winak re're'.

Naxibiraj chi je' re' i jenaj winak tz'uklic cok ar je' wili xik'or cok reh Jesus: «Nachicoj rini̱m i Dios ru'um chi re' rAc'u̱n k'atoj k'oric chic riban, k'e̱' ato̱b reh c'acharel re' naritz'uhkic chi quixilac take rula̱' i Dios, nqui i winak re're'.
—Coric, nqui Jesus reh. Chiri̱j re', xik'or reh jenaj jalwach k'oric chi je' wili: «Pan jenaj k'i̱j jenaj ajabe̱s xitak'a̱' rik'ormojic queh riq'uihal ula̱' chi naricojom jenaj nink'i̱j pa ripa̱t.
Naxponic rik'ijil i nink'i̱j re' ajabe̱s re're' xitak'a̱' je raj tz'e' wa̱ch chi quiyuk'unjic take rula̱' chi je' wili: ‹Quim tak, naroquic chic i nink'i̱j, nqui yuk'unic xiban je.

«Naxponic c'amol queh ula̱', chi quiju'junal p'uht quipahkam quicuyuric. Re' jenaj je' wili xik'or: ‹Ha̱w, chacuy nimahc. Re' hin til ma' eta niban canar ojic pan nink'i̱j ru̱c' ajabe̱s maj junseht niye'a̱b xnilok' curman chi nawojic wilom cho, nqui xik'or.

«Jenaj chic, je' wo' chic wili xik'or: ‹Ha̱w, chacuy nimahc. Re' hin til ma' eta niban canar ojic pan nink'i̱j ru̱c' ajabe̱s maj ho'c'uhl niboyex xnilok' eh yu'na nwa̱j chi nawojic niniq'uem take cho chi camanic, nqui xik'or.
«Jenaj chic ula̱' je' wo' wili xik'or: ‹Ha̱w, chacuy nimahc. Re' hin til ma' eta niban canar ojic pan nink'i̱j ru̱c' ajabe̱s maj cu wili ti xniban caxa̱ra, nqui reh raj tz'e' wa̱ch ajabe̱s.

«Je' re' k'uru' naxsoljic je aj tz'e' wa̱ch chi rik'ormojic reh ajabe̱s chaj bih xquik'or take ula̱', re' ajabe̱s re're' xa nc'ul chic ri̱j je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh raj tz'e' wa̱ch re're': ‹Yu'na chaloq'uej awi̱b. Hiy pan tinamit eh ar pan tak be̱h je' wo' pan tak ye'a̱b re' nquimol wi̱' qui̱b take tinamit. Nic' pa' nimal take niba̱' ch'i̱l take ma' manlic ta wach co̱k quik'ab, ch'i̱l wo' take sot' enarak take chayuk'ej take cho chi naquichalic chipam i nink'i̱j. Je' re' ajic wi xquic'u'lej cho na̱ chalic, chac'am take cho ayu', nqui ajabe̱s re're'.

«Chalic i aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' xo̱j wo' riban i xk'ormojic reh. Chiri̱j ru', naxsoljic cho ch'i̱l take tinamit re're' je' wili xc'ulic rik'or reh aj ehcham ni̱m: ‹Ha̱w, xniban chic i xak'or wi̱n xa re' la' xa cu wilic wo' ye'a̱b tehlic pa̱m, nqui reh ajabe̱s.

«Re' aj ehcham ni̱m je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh raj tz'e' wa̱ch: ‹Yu'na ajic ru'um nok nwa̱j chi narinujic nipa̱t, ar chic hiy pan tak cuc' be̱h re' no̱j pan tak abixbal eh nic' pa' nimal tinamit na̱c'ulum take chatok awi̱b chi quiwach chi quic'amaric cho ayu', nqui wo' chic je ajabe̱s reh raj tz'e' wa̱ch.

«Je' ricab ribiral i ajabe̱s re're' k'uru', re' hat chacoj rehtal i yuk'unic niban i hin reh chi re' Dios ma' eta rik'or chawi̱j je' ricab xik'or ajabe̱s re're' chiqui̱j take ma' xiniminic ta reh yuk'unic xiban. Chiqui̱j take re', je' wili xik'or i ajabe̱s queh take xiponic chi quijelow-bal: ‹Til nik'or aweh tak chi re' take ma' xiniminic ta cho reh yuk'unic xniban queh ma'xta ca'nam risukquil i nink'i̱j wili, nqui ajabe̱s re're', nqui Jesus reh winak re're'.
Chiri̱j nok elenak chic je chipam i pa̱t re're', pan jenaj k'i̱j nok ma' q'uisa ta tinamit xitahkanic je reh Jesus, re're' xisolq'uij je ri̱b eh je' wili xik'or queh tinamit re're':

«Jeno' c'acharel je' ru̱c' ra̱j quiritahkem, wi pe̱t rinimej rino'jbal chi rutquel ri̱b chi niwach i hin on wi pe̱t rinimej queh take wilque̱b pa ripa̱t je' ricab ritu̱t raja̱w, take ras richa̱k', take rana̱b, take rixuba̱l on re' rehq'ue̱n on ribahi̱l on take riha'lac'u̱n, ma' ric'ul ta so' chi eriban chi waj tahkanel. Je' wo' re' i c'acharel re' xa re' wo' sukquil c'uxlis risic', ma' ric'ul ta wo' chi eriban chi waj tahkanel, Je' re' nik'or maj curman chi naquiritahkem to̱b ta pan ti'c'axic.
Je' re' ajic re' c'acharel re' naquiritahkem pan ti'c'axic je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak ritehlam jeno' ricuru̱s, xa re' wo' c'acharel re're' riyew ri̱b chi eriban chi waj tahkanel.

Chi je' re' k'uru' chacapaj tak ri̱j chi coric i nitahkaljic na̱banam tak je' ricab i capewenic na'n tak natoquic tak chi ritik'injic jeno' apa̱t tak. Re' hat-tak nok nawa̱j atik'a̱b jeno' apa̱t tak, ma' pe̱t aj ta na titz'uhkic tak chi ribanaric ri̱j jarub na̱sacham tak chipam ilbal reh wi enacuy tak ritz'akil ricohlsjic wach?

Curman chi je' re' na'n tak chi pe̱t, maje'? Je' re' nik'or maj wi ma' xacohlaj wach ritik'injic apa̱t tak xa re' ok ti rich'iquinjic xa'n tak canar, re' tinamit naquilow chi je' re' naquitok'a̱b ac'u'tjic tak chi je' wili:
‹K'e̱' q'uixbilal reh winak re're' maj xitok'a̱' wo' nak rijohsjic ripa̱t eh ma' xicohlaj ta wo' chic wach, nqui naquik'orom chi xa quise'lbal.

«Kacoj wo' tak rehtal riban jeno' k'atal k'oric re' raj ojic chi k'ak'anic ru̱c' jeno' chic k'atal k'oric. Re're', wi xa juninak ik'ob ho'ik'ob (10,000) ok ti riso̱l wilic, pe̱t wo' ntz'uhkic chi ricapewjic ri̱j wi manlic eric'u'lej i jenaj chic k'atal k'oric re' wilic ca'winak ik'ob lajeb ik'ob (20,000) ok riso̱l.

Wi xicapaj ri̱j chi ma' eta ricuy ransil k'ak'anic, xa nok wo' ti chi cu ja' np'uhtic ta k'ak'anic naritak'a̱b je take raj tz'e' wa̱ch ru̱c' jenaj chic k'atal k'oric chi rik'ormojic reh chi je' wili: ‹Chacuy Ha̱w, kacana̱' ki̱b pan sukquil c'uxlis. Pa' wo' bih nawa̱j ewo' nkayew aweh, nqui narik'orom je i k'atal k'oric re're'.

«Je' aj wo' re' na̱banam hat-tak ru̱c' nitahkaljic. Pe̱t, na̱capam tak ri̱j maj re' c'acharel wi ma' xik'eb lok chiri̱j ric'ux i nic' nimal wilic reh chi nitahkaljic i hin ma' ric'ul ta chi eriban chi waj tahkanel.

Tz'a̱b ru', wi chi'nchel xik'eb lok chiri̱j ric'ux, re' c'acharel re're' holohic laj camanic naribanam je' ricab i camanic riban i atz'a̱m nok cu wilic riqui'al. Raj i c'acharel wi xich'ica̱' wo' chic je ric'ux chiri̱j nic' nimal wilic reh, narojic chi k'e̱b i ricamaj je' ricab ric'ul atz'a̱m nanelic riqui'al ma'xta chic bih ricamanej.

Ma' xa ta je' re' nc'uluric ru̱c' je' la' wo' re' atz'a̱m re' ma'xta chic riqui'al ncuturic je ru'um nok xa ta nak chic chi rik'ahisal take tic ncamanic wi̱'. «Reh aj chi ma' eta no̱j chi k'e̱b acamaj tak k'uru', k'as ok axiquin tak chi birinic reh chi enarak tak chiri̱j i no'jbal wili, nqui Jesus.
Ru'um chi re' take wilic quibiral chi aj mahc je' ricab take aj molol to̱j ntak'abjic je Ro̱ma, nquijil cok qui̱b ru̱c' Jesus chi richa'jaljic ric'uhbal,

re' take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l wo' take cow laj aj niminel reh c'uhbal re're' je' wili ric'u'tjic xca'n pan ja̱s k'oric: «Chak'or je Jesus xa ric'ul wo' cok ru̱c' take aj mahc re're'. Je' wo', xa no̱j wo' cu̱c' take re' nanyuk'unjic chi wi'c, nqui ric'u'tjic xca'n.
Re' Jesus naxibiraj chi je' re' nquik'or p'uht rik'orom queh jenaj jalwach k'oric chi je' wili:

«Kak'or chi jeno' aj ehcham me̱' wilic ho'c'ahl (100) ok rime̱' eh xsahchic ok cho jeno' queh rime̱' re're', ma' eta ricana̱' cahnok chi c'ololque̱b take belejlaj ro'c'ahl (99) chi rime̱' eh eno̱j chi risiq'uiric sahchel me̱' cu rehtal erirak cho?
Wi xirak wo' chic cho risahchel me̱' re're', xa suk chic pa ric'ux naricutum cho nah teleb

eh naponok pa ripa̱t nariyuk'em take suk quik'oric ru̱c' ch'i̱l take rica'ja̱ reh chi naca'nam quiwa' ru̱c'. Je' wili narik'orom queh take nariyuk'em: ‹Quinc'olok awichnimej tak chipam risukquil nic'ux maj re' nak nisahchel me̱' xnirak wo' chic cho, nqui narik'orom queh.

«Je' ricab sukquil c'uxlis nwih'ic ru̱c' i winak re're', je' wo' re' sukquil c'uxlis nwih'ic ru̱c' i Dios ar pan taxa̱j nok jeno' chi aj mahc rijal wach rino'jbal. Nok je' re' nc'uluric chi jenaj aj mahc rijal wach rino'jbal, til coric k'e̱' wo' chic nsukbic ric'ux i Dios ru̱c' re're' chiwach risukquilal ric'ux nwih'ic chi wilic ta nak belejlaj ro'c'ahl (99) chi c'acharel re' nca'n qui̱b chi coric quiwach.

«Kak'or chi jenaj niba̱' laj ixok wilic lajeb ritz'a̱k q'uih wach eh xk'ehbic jenaj queh ritz'a̱k re're', ma' eta na rikop jeno' risakombal eh enoquic chi rimeseric pa̱m ripa̱t chi risiq'uiric ritz'a̱k chi coric cu rehtal wo' chic erirak? Je' re' eriban maje'?

Je' wo', wi xirak wo' chic ritz'a̱k nariyuk'em wo' take suk quik'oric ru̱c' ch'i̱l take rica'ja̱ reh chi naca'nam quiwa' ru̱c'. Je' wili narik'orom queh take nariyuk'em: ‹Quinc'olok awichnimej tak chipam risukquil nic'ux maj re' nitz'a̱k re' xnik'eb nak xnirak wo' chic yu'na, nqui narik'orom queh.
«Je' aj re' k'uru' til re' Dios je' wo' re' riban ma' pajoj ta wo' nsukbic ric'ux ch'i̱l take raj tz'e' wa̱ch nok jeno' aj mahc rijal wach rino'jbal, nqui Jesus queh.
Chiri̱j chic ru', re' Jesus p'uht wo' chic rik'orom queh jenaj jalwach k'oric chi je' wili: «Jenaj ajabe̱s wilic quib rac'u̱n.

Pan jenaj k'i̱j re' chak'be̱s ac'un je' wili xik'or reh raja̱w: ‹Ha̱w, re' ac'al na̱yeb keh natiquimok chayew wi̱n yu'na, nqui reh raja̱w. —Tare̱t, eniyew aweh tak, nqui ajabe̱s. «Je' re' nok, re' ajabe̱s re're' tohk' rich'akam rac'a̱l queh rac'u̱n.

Chiri̱j chic re' nok xa cu re' wo' ti quib xib k'i̱j ric'ulum rac'a̱l i chak'be̱s ac'un, xiyew ti je chi c'a̱y eh ru̱c' ritz'akil ac'al xic'ul, xo̱j pan jenaj chic tinamit chi naht. Ar xa ma' xilow ta chic ricorquil nic' wach xisahchlom wi̱' chi'nchel ritz'a̱k.
«Chiri̱j chic ru' nok risacham aj chic chi'nchel ritz'a̱k, pan jenaj k'i̱j naxchalic jenaj wi'jalel chipam i tinamit wilic wi̱', re' ac'un re're' xip'ut chi ma' riniq'uej ta chic wi'c
eh ru'um re're' xoquic chi sic'oj camanic ar. Naxirak ricamaj ru̱c' jenaj winak patanel chipam i tinamit re're', re' ac'un re're' xtak'abjic je pan abixbal chi quicha'jaljic take rahk i winak re're'.
Nok c'ahchi' chi cha'janic ahk, xa ta nak je hab wach ncapewenic so' reh ac'un re're' chi riye'eric riwa' riha̱'. Ru'um re're' xa ric'ax nak chic wach chi rinuksjic ri̱b ru̱c' quiwa' take ahk.

Nok je' re' c'ahchi' ric'ulum, na'lajic reh ac'un re're' eh je' wili xik'or pa ric'ux: ‹Jarub ta wo' nchel chi aj camanom xa suk chic cho quiwa' quiha̱' ar pa ripa̱t i waja̱w, ra̱j hin ayu' xa cuc' tak chic ma' quinquimic ru'um i c'ahric.

Ha̱', re' hin nanicana̱b cahnok i ye'a̱b wili. Til nawojic ru̱c' i waja̱w eh je' wili nanik'orom reh naquinponok ru̱c': ‘Pah, re' hin xinmahcanic chiwach kAja̱w Dios pan taxa̱j, je' wo' chawach i hat.

Je' re' k'uru' chacuy quinac'ul wo' chic pan aye'a̱b re' cok ru' xa je' ok chic hin jeno' awaj camanom, ma' je' ta ok chic chi hin awac'u̱n maj ma' ric'ul ta chic chi wi̱n chi equinacoj chi hin awac'u̱n, quinquirok reh, nqui xik'or naxna'lajic reh ac'un re're'.

«Je' re' nok re' ac'un re're' xicana̱' je ye'a̱b wilic wi̱' eh xsoljic wo' chic je ru̱c' raja̱w. Nok ponic chic riban i ac'un re're' ma' naht ta je ru̱c' pa̱t, re' raja̱w xa nyot'ic chic i ra̱mna xjohtic cho ru'um i rac'u̱n naxihlaj je wach. Je' re' nok re' ajabe̱s re're' xo̱j rajim chi ric'uluric eh naxponic ru̱c', xik'ahchej chi ralak eh xitz'ub i wach ru'um risukquil ric'ux chi xsoljic wo' chic je ru̱c'.

Ar ajic re' ac'un re're' je' wili xik'or reh raja̱w: ‹Pah, re' hin mahc xniban chiwach kAja̱w Dios pan taxa̱j je' wo' re' xniban chawach i hat. Ru'um aj re' ma' ric'ul ta chic chi wi̱n chi equinacoj chi hin awac'u̱n, nqui reh raja̱w.

«Re' ajabe̱s k'e̱' xiquetelej wach i rac'u̱n eh xic'am cok pan pa̱t. Chiri̱j chic ru' c'uhtbal reh chi re' rac'u̱n wilic wo' chic rilok'il chi ac'unbe̱s, je' wili xik'or queh raj camanom: ‹Chac'am tak cho wi̱n chak'wach laj tz'ih ch'i̱l junc'uhl ok xijab ch'i̱l wo' jeno' mutk'ab eh chatik'a̱' tak wi̱n i wac'u̱n chi coric.
Nok abanam tak chic re're', re' chic i rac'u̱n wacax chiho̱j lok chi xa reh kani̱m chac'am tak cho eh chacansaj tak reh chi nakac'uxum maj yu'na nakacojom jenaj ni̱m pa ribihnal i wac'u̱n.

Je' aj re' naka'nam maj re' wac'u̱n wili re' xnicapaj chi sahchanak nak chic, on chi camnak nak chic, xwilow wo' chic wach yu'na chi c'achlic, nqui ajabe̱s queh raj camanom. «Chiri̱j i wili nok quip'utum chic nink'ijinic i ajabe̱s re're' ch'i̱l i rac'u̱n,
xc'ulic lok i asbe̱s ac'un soljic riban cho reh camanic pan abixbal. Naxponic ma' naht ta chic ru̱c' pa̱t, xibiraj chi bi̱ch nca'n take aj k'ojonel je' wo' chi xa qui'ahnic chic take aj so̱n.
Ru'um aj re' xiyuk'ej cok jenaj raj camanom i raja̱w eh xibiraj reh chaj bih riwi̱' chi c'ahchi' nink'i̱j pan pa̱t.

Re' aj camanom je' wili xik'or reh: ‹Re' acha̱k' xsoljic wo' chic cho pan pa̱t. Ru'um chi xilmijic wo' chic wach chi manlic ro̱k k'ab re' awaja̱w xitak'a̱' ricansjic i rac'u̱n wacax chiho̱j lok chi xa reh ni̱m reh naric'uxuric chipam nink'i̱j wili, nqui aj camanom re're'.

«Naxibiraj asbe̱s ac'un chi je' re' xiban i raja̱w, k'e̱' naxchalic ric'a̱ eh ma' xa̱j ta chic cok oquic pan pa̱t. Ru'um aj re' xelic cho raja̱w chi ritokoric ri̱b chiwach chi naroquic nak cok pan pa̱t,

xa re' la' ac'un re're' je' wili xik'or reh raja̱w: ‹Pah, re' hin jarub ta wo' ha̱b nip'utum cho ribanaric acamaj ma' jeno' pech nik'ihtam wi̱b chawach. To̱b ta wo' je' re' niban chawach, re' hat xa ta nak je janc'al ayeb wi̱n jeno' t'uch nichi̱wa chi nanibanam ninink'i̱j wich'i̱l take suk quik'oric wu̱c'.

Ra̱j yu'na naxc'ulic lok i chak'be̱s awac'u̱n, re' hat xatak'a̱' ricansjic i rac'u̱n wacax chiho̱j lok chi xa reh banoj ni̱m. Je' aj re' xa'n reh awac'u̱n re're' to̱b ta nchel xisach wach chi'nchel atz'a̱k cu̱c' take c'oyo̱m laj ixok, nqui reh raja̱w.

«Chalic i ajabe̱s je' wo' wili xik'or reh: ‹Ac'un, nic' pa' nimal wilic wi̱n pan ak'ab wo' hat wilic. Je' wo' chic, re' ribanaric jeno' nink'i̱j je' ricab wili ma' til ta curman chi enbanaric chawi̱j i hat ru'um nok xa eli̱c wo' wilca̱t wu̱c'.

Ra̱j nchel ni̱m chiri̱j acha̱k' til curman chi xnicoj chi suksbal kac'ux maj re' wac'u̱n re're' xnicapaj chi sahchanak nak chic on chi camnak nak chic, xa re' la' yu'na xwilow wo' chic wach chi c'achlic, nqui ajabe̱s re're', nqui Jesus queh winak re're'.

Chiri̱j chic re', re' Jesus jenaj wo' chic tijbal xik'or queh take raj tahkanel ru̱c' jalwach k'oric wili: «Junpech, wih'ic cho jenaj biho̱m laj winak wih'ic jenaj raj camanom ilol reh chi'nchel rac'a̱l. Pan jenaj k'i̱j xponic quik'or rimahc aj ilol re're' ru̱c' i biho̱m laj winak chi je' wili: ‹Ha̱w, re' tojbal ri̱j awac'a̱l ma' c'ahchi' ta rimolom awaj camanom. Je' re' k'uru' xa k'ebol atz'a̱k nok wilic, nqui xponic quik'or reh.

«Chalic i biho̱m laj winak naxibiraj chi je' re' xitak'a̱' je ric'amaric i raj camanom. Naxc'ulic lok ru̱c' je' wili xk'ormojic reh ru'um i biho̱m re're': ‹Re' hat ma'xta chic acamanic wu̱c' chi waj camanom maj re' hin xnirak chiri̱j chi xa hat k'ebol nitz'a̱k nok wilca̱t. Yu'na k'uru' chac'am cho wi̱n ahu̱j re' natz'ihmbaj take wi̱' hab wach wilic quic'a̱s wu̱c' reh chi nawilom, nqui xk'ormojic reh.

«Re' aj camanom naxibiraj chi je' re' je' wili xik'or pa ric'ux: ‹Re' nicamaj chi hin ilol reh rac'a̱l i wajabe̱s narimak'am wi̱n yu'na. Chaj wo' bih nanibanam k'uru'? maj re' hin ma' quinchol ta cow laj camanic eh chi nawoquic ta nak chi pahkanic wi'c chi' tak pa̱t k'e̱' quinq'uix'ic.

Ha̱', re' hin xnirak chic chiri̱j chaj bih nanibanam: Nanito'bem take wilic quic'a̱s ru̱c' biho̱m wili eh chi je' re' nachimak' nicamaj chi aj ilol ru', re' take re' equinquic'ul cu̱c' chi equinquito'bej, nqui xik'or pa ric'ux.

«Je' re' k'uru' naxelic je aj camanom re're' ru̱c' biho̱m laj winak, xiyuk'ej chi quiju'junal take wilic quic'a̱s ru̱c' biho̱m re're'. Naxc'ulic lok i pe̱t aj c'a̱s je' wili xk'ormojic reh ru'um camanom re're': ‹Chaj bih ac'a̱s ru̱c' ajabe̱s? nqui reh.

—Ha̱', re' hin ho'c'ahl (100) chi nimak lo̱sa xun chi k'ena' nic'a̱s ru̱c', nqui reh. —Chac'ul rihujil ac'a̱s wili k'uru', titz'u̱k ayu' eh xa chic ok lajeb roxc'ahl (50) chi nimak lo̱sa xun ac'a̱s chatz'ihmlom chiwach, nqui reh.

«Je' wo', naxc'ulic wo' lok jenaj chic aj c'a̱s je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh aj camanom re're': ‹Chaj bih ac'a̱s ru̱c' ajabe̱s? nqui reh. —Ha̱', re' hin ho'c'ahl (100) birin chi ixi̱m nic'a̱s ru̱c', nqui reh. —Chac'ul rihujil ac'a̱s wili eh xa chic ok caj winak (80) birin chi ixi̱m ac'a̱s chatz'ihmlom chiwach, nqui reh.

«Je' aj re' ru' ru̱c' no'jbal xiban i ma' holohic ta laj aj camanom re're', re' ajabe̱s je' wili xik'or reh: ‹K'e̱' hat t'ulic ru̱c' acapew-bal chi xacapaj ri̱j nic' wach ritobjic awi̱b na̱banam, nqui reh. «Ru̱c' ribiral i aj camanom re're' nc'uhtunic chi re' take c'acharic chic nca'n pa risakomil rik'orbal i Dios ma' k'e̱' ta wo' chic quichol risiq'uiric ri̱j nic' wach ritobjic qui̱b naca'nam ru̱c' ato'bil nca'n, je' ricab nca'n take nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j quibihomal ayu' wach ac'al.

Ru'um aj re', re' hin til nik'or aweh tak chi ru̱c' abihomal re' namol tak wach ayu' wach ac'al ticholok tak ric'amaric awi̱b tak pan sukquilal cu̱c' awas acha̱k' tak. Chi je' re' nok ma'xta chic camaj aweh abihomal tak ru'um nok hat-tak chic camnak, holohic ac'uluric tak naribanaric ru̱c' i Dios re' wilic wi̱' c'acharic chi junelic.

«Re' hat-tak k'uru' chacoj tak rehtal i coric laj k'oric wili: Re' coric laj aj camanom to̱b ta t'uch wach on to̱b ta nim wach ricamaj, re're' xa ewo' rinimej ricamaj. Raj la' re' ma' coric ta laj aj camanom to̱b ta t'uch wach on to̱b ta nim wach ricamaj, re're' xa ma' eta wo' rinimej ricamaj.

Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi chanimej tak chi coric acamaj tak riyew i Dios eh chacamanej tak wach abihomal tak chi coric maj wi ma' na'n ta tak i coric ru̱c' abihomal tak, nic' wach nok chi re' Dios erich'ica̱' ric'ux chawi̱j tak chi enacamanej tak wach ribihomal?
On wi ma' xa'n tak i coric ru̱c' abihomal tak re' xa okxa'namaj pan ak'ab tak, nic' wo' wach nok re' Dios erich'ica̱' ric'ux chi riye'eric pan ak'ab tak i ribihomal re' na̱wehcham tak?

Je' aj re' ru', ma' eta riban chi quib ta nak enach'ica̱' wi̱' ac'ux tak, chiri̱j ta nak i Dios eh je' wo' chiri̱j abihomal tak je' ricab nok ma' eta riban chi jeno' camanom encamanic ru̱c' quib chi ajabe̱s ru'um nok, wi erich'ica̱' ric'ux chi ribanaric ricamaj i jenaj ajabe̱s, narik'ebem lok chiri̱j ric'ux i ricamaj i jenaj chic ajabe̱s. Wi chiri̱j ricamaj i jenaj chic ajabe̱s erich'ica̱' ric'ux, ra̱j rik'orom chi ewo' chic rik'eb cho chiri̱j ric'ux ricamaj i jenaj chic ajabe̱s re' xich'ica̱' nak wi̱' ric'ux chi camanic chi pe̱t, nqui Jesus queh.
Chiri̱j wili re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses naxquibiraj i k'oric xik'or i Jesus, tohk' quise'lam ru'um nok ji̱k' quic'ux chiri̱j quibihomal.

Ru'um aj re' je' wili xk'ormojic queh ru'um Jesus: «To̱b ta re' hat-tak nac'uhtaj tak lok awi̱b chi quiwach i tinamit chi xa coric chic wach ac'ux tak, chiwach i Dios re' neht'alanic reh awa̱mna tak sakom wach chi xa ji̱k' chic ac'ux tak chiri̱j bihomal. Je' re' nok re' Dios nyi'bic cho ru'um atijbal tak eh to̱b ta nak k'e̱' nim rilok'il atijbal tak chi quiwach i tinamit, yu'na p'uht rojic wach ac'al.

Ru'um aj chi je' re', re' Wa̱n re' xbanic cho kahsanic ha' ma' xitik ta chic ju' rixermejic wach i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, ch'i̱l i quic'uhbal take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios. Chi je' aj re' ru̱c' Wa̱n xp'uhtic cho rik'ormojic chi re' Dios re' nk'atbic k'oric ra̱j richopom quina̱ take c'acharel eh ru'um aj re' yohbal wach take c'acharel c'ahchi' quichopom quic'ux chi re' Dios nariwih'ic chi quina̱ chi k'atal k'oric.

Ru'um aj chi je' re', re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi re' atijbal hat-tak c'ahchi' rojic wach ac'al to̱b ta nchel re' hat-tak nak'or chi je' wili: ‹Coric, re' taxa̱j rich'i̱l ac'al narisahchic wach nacux'ok wach i c'acharic, xa re' la' ma' jeno' t'uch k'ilo̱j je' ru̱c' wilic chipam C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses je' ricab jeno' t'uch rehtalil k'oric, narojic wach ac'al, nqui nak'or tak.

«Raj la' hin nik'or aweh tak chi ma' je' ta re'. Je' ricab yu'na chi rijelow-bal atijbal na'n tak chiri̱j i k'ilo̱j re' rik'or chi re' winak rich'ak rehq'ue̱n eh ric'am chic jeno' toco̱m ixok nkajic pan c'oyomal, re' chic nic'uhtunic i hin chiri̱j i k'ilbal re're' nbirmijic eh re' c'uhtunic re're' rik'or chi re' winak ric'am chi rehq'ue̱n jeno' toco̱m ixok ch'ako̱j cho ru'um ribahi̱l, nkajic wo' pan c'oyomal, nqui Jesus queh.

Chiri̱j chic ru', re' Jesus xik'or wo' chic queh jenaj jalwach k'oric chi je' wili: «Pan jenaj tinamit xwih'ic cho jenaj biho̱m laj winak re' xc'acharic cho chi je' ricab riwi̱' jenaj k'atal k'oric maj kalakal xa chi'nchel wach c'uxbal wilic nah rime̱xa chi naric'uxum eh xa chak' wach laj tz'ih wo' wilic chiri̱j.
Chipam wo' tinamit re're' xc'acharic cho jenaj niba̱' laj winak nujunak ri̱j chi k'a̱ La̱saro ribihnal. Re' La̱saro re're' eli̱c nponic canabjok cho chiwach ritz'ahp ripa̱t i biho̱m re're'.

Nanwih'ic ar xa ric'ax nak chic wach chi narinuksam ri̱b reh take rixe̱r wi'c ricana̱' i winak re're' nah rime̱xa, xa re' la' ma' nye'eric ta wo' reh. Haj ti wilic i qui'oquic cok ru̱c' La̱saro xa re' ti take tz'i' re' no̱j quirek' wach i rik'a̱.

«Jenaj aj chi re', xponic rik'ijil chi re' take quib chi winak re're' xiquimic je. Re' niba̱' laj winak xc'amaric johtok cu'um take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios ar pan taxa̱j re' wilic wi̱' jenaj nink'i̱j eh chi je' re' xcojoric nah me̱xa ar chi riche̱l i ma' Awraham. Ra̱j nchel i biho̱m laj winak, naxmuk'unjic je

xo̱j c'olok chipam i ye'a̱b Ha̱res ribihnal re' nquic'ul wi̱' ti'c'axic take ma' holohic ta quino'jbal. Nok wilic chic chipam i ti'c'axic re're', re' biho̱m laj winak xilow johtok wach i La̱saro chi tz'uklic cok chi riche̱l ma' Awraham cu ma' wili johtok

eh xiq'uer johtok chi̱' chi je' wili: ‹Ajabe̱s ma' Awraham, re' hin yohbal wo' chic wach ti'quil c'ahchi' nic'ulum chipam i k'a̱k' wili. Chacuy, chak'or wi̱n reh La̱saro chimuh cho jeno' ju' k'ab pan ha' eh c'olok rit'aksaj so' wi̱n pa nichi̱' chi jot'sbal so' wach niti'quil, nqui johtok i biho̱m re're'.

«Chalic ma' Awraham je' wili ric'u'ljic xiban cho: ‹Bi̱l, c'olok pan ac'ux chi nok wilca̱t tak cho wach ac'al, re' hat xa sukquil c'uxlis xac'ul cho, raj i La̱saro wili xa re' wo' ti'quil c'uxlis xic'ul cho ar. Yu'na, re' chic i La̱saro naric'ulum sukquil ric'ux ayu' eh re' hat na̱c'ulum i ti'c'axic ar.
Je' wo' chic, chi kaxilac i hoj ch'i̱l i hat-tak wilic jenaj rinimal jul cahk reh chi re' hoj ch'i̱l hat-tak, to̱b ta nak c'ultar nka̱j je k'ahxic, ma' eta nka'n canar, nqui banol cho reh.
«Re' biho̱m re're' je' wo' chic wili xik'or: ‹Ha̱w ma' Awraham wi ma' riban chi je' re' k'uru', chacuy chatak'a̱' je wi̱n i La̱saro pa ripa̱t i waja̱w,

ar cu̱c' take ho'o̱b chi was ch'i̱l nicha̱k' chi rik'ororic queh i ti'c'axic wilqui̱n wi̱' hin. Je' re' nipahkaj aweh chi cha'n maj wi ma' xo̱j rik'or queh, ewo' quichalic ayu' chipam ti'c'axic wili, nqui johtok reh.

«Re' ma' Awraham je' wo' chic wili xik'or cho reh: ‹Bi̱l, ma' eta riban je' ricab napahkaj i hat. Re' take awas ch'i̱l take acha̱k' wi ma' nca̱j chi nacojic chipam i ti'c'axic wilca̱t wi̱', quinimej i riC'uhbal i Dios canamaj cahnok ru'um i Moyses je' wo' i riC'uhbal i Dios quicana̱b cahnok take aj k'orol riC'uhbal najtir k'i̱j maj re' aj camaj naxcanabjic cahnok take c'uhbal, nqui xik'or cho reh.

«Chalic i biho̱m je' wo' chic wili xik'or johtok reh: ‹Je' nak re' ru' Ha̱w ma' Awraham, xa re' la' ma' nquicoj ta wach i c'uhbal re're'. Ru'um aj re' nipahkaj aweh chi eta nak natak'a̱' je jeno' hab wach chi kaxilac i hoj camnak, ewo' nak nquijal wach quino'jbal, nqui wo' chic i biho̱m re're'.

Re' ma' Awraham, naxibiraj chi je' re' je' wili xik'or cho reh: ‹Wi re' take awas ch'i̱l take acha̱k' ma' nquijal ta wach quino'jbal nanquibiraj i riC'uhbal i Dios ru'um Moyses, je' wo' i c'uhbal quicana̱b cahnok take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios najtir k'i̱j, ma' nic' ta wo' chic wach naquijal wach quino'jbal, to̱b ta nak uctok je jeno' hab wach chi kaxilac i hoj camnak chi rik'ormojic queh i c'uhbal, nqui Awraham, nqui Jesus queh.

Chiri̱j chic ru', re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel: «Chi'nchel i hoj keht'alim chi ma'xta bih ra̱j chi ma' ta nak enwih'ic re' nyojbic reh capew-bal, xa re' la' hin nik'or aweh tak chi k'e̱' nti'bic nic'ux chiri̱j

i hab wach jeno' aj tijinel enyojbic ricapew-bal jeno' queh take aj tahkem wi̱n wili re' quik'ochsam chic wach i ca̱mna je' ricab i jeno' t'uch ac'un, sakbih nak chi reh chi encuturic jok pa richamil ha' chi bac'lic chi ralak chiwach jeno' ma' laj abaj ncamanic chi que'bal. Je' re' nik'or maj k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal ti'c'axic nariye'eric china̱ ru'um i Dios ma' je' ta ti ricab i ti'c'axic enbanaric reh jeno' waj tahkanel.

Je' re' k'uru' chawic'raj awi̱b tak. Ma̱yoj tak ricapew-bal awas acha̱k' tak je' ricab wi xmahcanic chawach tak. Wi je' re' xiban chawach tak, chak'il tak eh chacuy wo' tak rimahc naripahkaj ricuybal aweh tak.

Je' ricab wi chiwach jenaj k'i̱j, wukpech ok nchel enchalic awu̱c' tak chi ripahkaljic cuybal rimahc ru'um chi wukpech ok xmahcanic chawach tak, chacuy wo' tak rimahc ru̱c' i ju'jun pech eripahkaj ricuybal aweh tak, nqui Jesus queh.

Naxquibiraj chi je' re' take nahsil raj tahkanel, je' wili xquik'or reh: «Ha̱w, re' hat xoj-ato'bej chi ricojoric wach chi wilic awajawric. Ru'um aj re' yu'na nkapahkaj aweh chi koj-ato'bej wo' chic chi enkacoj wach chi ru'um awajawric i hat enka'n ribanaric i xak'or keh chiri̱j i cuyuj mahc, nqui take reh.

Re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Re' hat-tak wi enacoj tak wach chi naca̱t wo' tak chic nito'bem ru̱c' wajawric, naribanam chi k'e̱' chic ransil ak'orbal tak je' ricab ransil i t'uch rija'quil i che̱' Mosta̱sa ribihnal. Re're' to̱b ta til t'uch ti nantiquiric jok til nq'uihic johtok cu rehtal riban jenaj nim laj che̱'. Je' aj wo' re' enc'uluric ru̱c' ak'orbal i hat-tak ru̱c' nito'bal, wi eta nak nak'or tak reh i che̱' sico̱moro wili chi erichuk je ri̱b re' wilic wi̱' eh chi ar chic pan nim laj ha' eno̱j wih'ok, enak tiribiraj tak, nqui Jesus queh.

Chiri̱j i wili re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Xa kak'or re' hat-tak wilic ok jeno' awaj tz'e' wa̱ch tak c'ahchi' ok ricamanem cho pa̱m awabixba̱l tak on c'ahchi' ok rilom ponok awaca̱x tak. Nasoljok cho reh ricamaj je' na nak wili enak'or tak reh chi ric'uluric?: ‹Le̱y, toque̱n cho. Toque̱n nah me̱xa, cha'n awa', tiqui na nak tak reh?

«Ma'xta, maje'? Re' la' nak enak'or tak reh je' wili: ‹Le̱y, chajal cho awi̱b. Toque̱n chi ritik'injic niwa'. Nok tiklic chic chi'nchel, chayew wi̱n nah me̱xa eh nok nicohlam chic niwa', cu re' aj cha'n aweh i hat, nqui nak enak'or tak reh.

«Chiri̱j chic re', niban aweh tak i birinic wili: Nok ribanam chic chi'nchel ricamaj pahkamaj reh aj camanom re're', riwi̱' na chi reh ajabe̱s chi cu naritioxem ricamaj i raj camanom? Chi wi̱n hin ma'xta.

Wi je' re' nbanaric xa ayu' wach ac'al, je' wo' re' awu̱c' hat-tak ru̱c' i camanic niyew chana̱ tak, ma̱ban tak i camanic re're' chi xa ru'um ta nak chi nawa̱j chi enye'eric alok'il tak. Raj nchel hat-tak, nachak'or tak ribiral acamaj xa'n tak je' wili chak'or tak: ‹Re' hoj xa re' wo' camanic riyeb chi kana̱ i Jesus chi raj camanom, xa re' wo' re' nka'n ribanaric. Je' aj re' ru' ma' ric'ul ta chi keh chi nariye'eric kalok'il ru̱c' kacamaj nka'n, tiquirok tak, nqui Jesus queh.

Naxicohlaj cahnok k'oric cu̱c' riq'uihal tinamit quitahkanic reh, re' Jesus xichop wo' chic ribe̱h chi ojic ar Jerusalen. Je' aj re' nok c'ahchi' riq'uic ponok pan jenaj ye'a̱b re' wilic chi quixilac riyuk'ul Sama̱rya ch'i̱l Calile̱ya
ar chi chi̱' lok ric'ula't i ye'a̱b re're', lajeb take winak xilim qui̱j naxquilow cho wach i Jesus, xichalic chi ric'uluric. Re' take re' xa cu naht cho ru̱c', xquipahba̱' cho qui̱b
eh xquiq'uer cho quichi̱' chi je' wili: «Jesus aj tijinel keh, chaquetelej ti kawach, nqui take cho reh.

Chalic i Jesus naxilow je quiwach take winak re're' je' wili xik'or je queh: «Hiy tak cu̱c' aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios eh chac'uhtaj cho awi̱b tak chi quiwach ilbal reh chi ma'xta chic aya'bilal tak, nqui je queh. Re' take lajeb chi winak xilim qui̱j re're' xquic'am na̱ chaj bih xk'ormojic queh ru'um Jesus eh nok c'ahchi' cojic wach be̱h, ar aj xelic lok quiya'bilal.
Jenaj queh take winak re're' naxilow chi je' re' xc'uluric ru̱c' xsoljic wo' chic cho ru̱c' i Jesus chi xa q'ueric chic chi̱' chi ritioxjic johtok reh Dios.
Naxponic ru̱c' xuhquic cok chiwach eh xoquic chi ritioxjic reh ric'sjic reh riya'bilal. Ar ajic re' Jesus xicoj rehtal chi aj Sama̱rya po' i winak re're'.
Chiri̱j chic ru' re' Jesus je' wili xik'or: «Re' hin lajeb take xwesaj lok i xilim chiqui̱j, raj take beleje̱b k'uru' chaj bih xquic'ul

chi ma' hab ta chic wach queh xisoljic cho chi ritioxjic johtok reh Dios? Xa re' ti wach i jenaj winak wili je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xc'ulic lok chi ritioxjic i chaj bih xbanaric ru̱c', nqui xik'or.

Chiri̱j chic ru' je' wili xik'or reh winak aj Sama̱rya: «Ha̱w, re' hat xiq'uic aya'bilal maj xacoj wach chi wilic wajawric chi esenic ya'bilal. Yu'na k'uru' tipa̱' johtok, tisoljen wo' chic je cu̱c' take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios eh chac'uhtaj queh chi ma'xta chic aya'bilal, nqui reh.

Chipam wo' i tinamit re're', re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xquibiraj reh Jesus jaruj nponic rik'ijil chi narik'atam k'oric i Dios chi quina̱ c'acharel. Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Naponok rik'ijil nok re' Dios narik'atam k'oric chi quina̱ c'acharel ma' hab ta wach narik'oric aweh tak chi na̱tik'a̱b ta nak tak awi̱b ru̱c' riponic.

Ru'um chi ma' narak ta tak chiri̱j chi re' Dios wilic chic chaxilac tak chi k'atal k'oric, ma' hab ta chic wach narik'oric aweh tak chi c'ulic chic lok rik'ijil chi re' Dios xoquic chic chi k'atoj k'oric chi quina̱ tinamit, nqui queh.

Chiri̱j ru' je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh take quitahkanic reh: «Chawach tak johtok nariwih'ic take k'i̱j chi ja'xta pe chic awilom tak wach junc'am ok queh k'i̱j chi c'ahchi' chic qui̱n chi k'atoj k'oric i hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, to̱b ta la' xa nawa̱j nak tak chic chi na̱wilom tak wach jeno' queh k'i̱j re're'.

Chiwach aj take k'i̱j re're', wilic take naquiye'bic rehtal aweh tak chi je' wili naquik'orom: ‹Re' Jesus ayu' wilic, nqui naquik'orom. «Wilic wo' toco̱m chic je' wili naquik'orom: ‹Ma'xta, re' Jesus wulu' wilic, nqui naquik'orom. «Coric, je' re' naquik'orom ra̱j la' hat-tak ma̱tahkej tak je take.

Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab chi narirehpaj cho risakomil i cohok ar pan taxa̱j, cu nilmijic cho chi junsut wach ac'al, je' wo' re' naric'uluric wu̱c' i hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, chi re' k'i̱j nap'uhtok johtok wi̱' rik'ijil nik'atbal k'oric chi quina̱ tinamit naric'uhtunic wo' chi quiwach chi'nchel c'acharel.

Re' cok ru' reh chi naric'uhtunic lok wach i k'i̱j re're', curman chi pe̱t nanik'ahsjic pan quik'ab take sol aj Ro̱ma cu'um take wich c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' xquic'ul ta nic'uhbal eh nok wilqui̱n chic pan quik'ab ru', naqui̱nquiyeb chi ti'c'axic cu rehtal naqui̱nquicansam je.

«Re' aj re' ru' naric'uluric chi pe̱t. Chiri̱j chic ru' cu rehtal riponic rik'ijil nik'atbal k'oric chi quina̱ c'acharel i hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, re' take tinamit wach ac'al naquic'acharic chi je' ricab xic'acharic cho take tinamit pa rik'ijil cho ric'acharic i ma' Noheh. Je' re' nik'or maj

pa rik'ijil cho ru', re' take tinamit xa suk chic quic'ux qui'iq'uic k'i̱j pan tak nink'i̱j on pan tak caxarahil eh ma' xquicoj ta so' rehtal chi chalic reh jenaj ti'c'axic chi quina̱. Je' aj re' xca'n cu rehtal xoquic i Noheh ch'i̱l take raj pan pa̱t chipam i jenaj ma' laj cano̱wa je' riwi̱' pa̱t eh chi je' re', naxchalic i jenaj rinimal jab ch'i̱l buht ha' xelic cho pan ac'al xisachabej quiwach chi'nchel take tinamit ma' xca̱j ta quicojom wach i k'oric xiban i Noheh.

«Je' wo' re', re' take tinamit ayu' wach ac'al naquic'acharic wo' je' ricab xic'acharic cho take aj Soro̱ma pa rik'ijil cho ric'acharic i Lot maj pa rik'ijil cho ru', re' take tinamit re're' xa quikajic quijohtic wo' chic chi banoj tak nink'i̱j, chi banoj tak c'a̱y, chi banoj tak lok', chi tik'inic tak pa̱t, je' wo' chi banoj tak tic eh ma' xquicoj ta so' rehtal chi chalic reh jenaj ti'c'axic chi quina̱.

Je' aj re' riwi̱' c'acharic nca'n take aj Soro̱ma cu rehtal xelic je i Lot chipam i tinamit re're' ch'i̱l take raj pan pa̱t. Ar aj ru' naxikajic cho nimak tak k'a̱k' pan taxa̱j ch'i̱l rik'olil, xisachabej quiwach i tinamit re're'.

«Ru̱c' aj take qui̱b ribiral re're', nkarak chiri̱j chi nic' pa' wach c'acharic xca'n cho take tinamit aj najtir k'i̱j re're' chi ma' xquicoj ta so' rehtal i ti'c'axic xchalic chi quina̱, je' wo' re' c'acharic naca'nam take tinamit ayu' wach ac'al cu rehtal rirak cho rik'ijil i c'uhtbal reh rinimal wajawric wilic i hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel.

Chi je' aj re' naric'uluric chacoj tak rehtal i wili: Nachirak cho rik'ijil i c'uhtbal reh wajawric, je' ricab wi wilic ok nchel jeno' aweh tak rij ripa̱t wilic lok, ma' toquic tak chic cok chipam, on wi pan awabi̱x wilca̱t tak cho, ma' tisoljic wo' tak chic cho pan apa̱t tak chi ric'amaric pa' bih aweh tak.
Til c'olok pan ac'ux tak nic' wach xic'ul rehq'ue̱n i Lot naxiyew je ricapew-bal china̱ i pa' bih reh xicana̱' cho!

Je' re' ajic, cha'n tak je' ricab nik'or aweh tak maj hab wach re' xa re' wach i risiq'uiric i sukquil c'uxlis riyew wi̱' ric'ux pa ric'acharic, re're' ma'xta wo' rehcham i junelic c'acharic ru̱c' i Dios, ra̱j nchel i ma' rik'or ta bihnal ric'uluric i ti'c'axic nbanaric reh, re're' narehcham i junelic c'acharic.

«Ru'um chi wilic take nquiyew quicapew-bal china̱ i pa' bih wilic queh, til coric ma' chi'nchel ta c'acharel naquesmejic take chiwach i ti'c'axic re're'. Kak'or wi pan jeno' ok chak'ab enchalic i ti'c'axic re're', wi wilic quib ok chi c'acharel wiric nca'n jenaj queh naresmejic chiwach i ti'c'axic eh re' jenaj chic naricanabjic cahnok chipam.

Je' wo' re' naric'uluric wi pan k'i̱j ok nchel enchalic i ti'c'axic. Wi wilic quib ok chi ixok que'c nca'n chi quich'i̱l qui̱b, xa jenaj wo' queh naresmejic je chiwach i ti'c'axic eh re' jenaj chic naricanabjic cahnok chipam.
On wi quib ok chi winak camanic nca'n pan abi̱x, jenaj queh naresmejic je chiwach i ti'c'axic eh re' jenaj chic naricanabjic cahnok chipam, nqui Jesus queh.

Naxquibiraj chi je' re', re' take quitahkanic reh je' wili xquik'or reh: «Ha̱w, haj naric'ulmujic i ti'c'axic re're'? nqui take reh. Chalic Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Je' ricab naneht'aljic chi haj pa' nquimol wi̱' qui̱b take c'uch, ar wo' wilic jeno' camnak chicop, je' wo' re' i ti'c'axic re're', pa' wo' tinamit nanik'ahsjic wi̱' pan quik'ab take sol aj Ro̱ma ar wo' naric'uluric, nqui Jesus queh.
Junpech wo' chic, re' Jesus xik'or queh raj tahkanel jenaj tijbal ru̱c' jenaj jalwach k'oric. Je' re' xiban reh chi ma' eta nquimay quiti̱j chi xa eli̱c ok wo' c'ahchi'que̱b.

Je' aj wili xik'or queh: «Pan jenaj tinamit xc'acharic jenaj winak aj ch'ukul wach mahc re' xa ta nak je riyohlej wach i Dios eh xa ta wo' nc'uyu'jic so' ra̱mna chi riqueteljic quiwach take tinamit quiponic chiwach.

Chipam i tinamit re're' xc'acharic wo' jenaj cahnel ixok re' xbanaric ti'c'axic reh ru'um jenaj rica'ja̱. Ru'um aj re', re' cahnel ixok re're' xa eli̱c wo' nponic chiwach i aj ch'ukul wach mahc chi ripahkaljic reh chi narich'ukum k'oric china̱ rica'ja̱,

xa re' la' aj ch'ukul wach mahc re're' ma' ribiraj ta k'oric chiwach nanponic ru̱c'. Je' re' xiban i cahnel ixok chiwach jarub ta wo' k'i̱j xiq'uic lok, cu rehtal re' aj ch'ukul wach mahc re're' xoquic chi ricapewjic ri̱j chi je' wili: ‹Re' hin ma' niyohlej ta wach i Dios eh ma' nc'uyu'jic ta wo' so' wa̱mna chi riqueteljic quiwach take tinamit,

xa re' la' ru'um chi re' cahnel ixok re're' k'e̱' quiricoj pan ch'i'c, re' hin nanich'ukum k'oric china̱ rica'ja̱ chiwach chi eno̱j pan wo̱k i nibihnal wi xelic lok chi c'u'tjbal. Je' re' eriban wi̱n maj xa nsolic wo' cho wu̱c' chi ripahkaljic wi̱n rich'ukuric wach ric'axquilal, nqui xik'or.
«Ru̱c' je' ricab xik'or i ma' ato̱b ta laj ch'ukul wach mahc re're' cha'n tak ri̱j i wili:

Naponok rik'ijil reh k'atoj k'oric chi quina̱ i tinamit, wi re' take chiho̱j ru'um Dios chi naquesmejic pan ti'c'axic nca'n quiti̱j chi k'i̱j chi ak'ab, naquic'u'ljic ta wo' cho chi nok ru'um i Dios on cu narichahmic cho chi quic'u'ljic?

Re' Dios ma' eta nchahmic cho, maje'? Til la' nik'or chi xa loq'uil ti ric'u'lej take cho. Wi je' aj re' riban i Dios, nic' aj wo' wach wilque̱b take tinamit naquinc'olok wo' chic cho hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel? Cu nanirakam ta wo' take chi cu ch'iclic quic'ux chiri̱j i Dios chi naquesmejic pan ti'c'axic, on nanirakam take chi ma' ch'iclic ta chic quic'ux? nqui Jesus queh.

Chiri̱j chic ru' jenaj chic i tijbal xk'ormojic queh take k'e̱' nquinimsaj qui̱b je' ru̱c' til xa coric chic quiwach nca'n qui̱b eh ru'um re' xa nquitz'ehtaj ti pan nak' quiwach take wilic quibiral chi aj mahc take. Je' aj wili xk'ormojic queh ru'um i Jesus ru̱c' i jalwach k'oric wili:

«Junpech, quib take winak xi'o̱j chi ti̱j chipam Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios. Re' jenaj winak je' ru̱c' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eh re' jenaj chic je' ru̱c' take aj pahkem to̱j ntak'abjic je Ro̱ma.

Ar aj chipam lok' laj pa̱t re're', re' winak cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xipahba̱' lok ri̱b pa reh eh p'uht ric'u'tjam ri̱b pa riti̱j chi je' wili: ‹K-Aja̱w Dios, nitioxej aweh chi re' hin ma' jenaj ta niwach cu̱c' take ma' holohic ta quino'jbal, je' ricab take aj lek', take aj banol c'oyomal to̱b ta caxa̱ra chic take eh xa ta wo' je' nicab take aj pahkem to̱j je' ricab i winak wulu'.
Ma' xa re' ta re' Ha̱w, re' hin niyew wo' junpehr reh laj pehr chi tumi̱n niban canar eh ca'pech wo' chipam xama̱na nicuy niwa' niha̱' chi alok'onjic, nqui johtok pa riti̱j.

«Ra̱j i winak aj pahkem to̱j cu je' wulu' pa'lic je. Xa ta nak ra̱j rijohsam johtok rilbal pan taxa̱j ru'um riq'uix'ic. Ru'um riyot'quil ric'ux chiri̱j rimahc xa rik'oj chic chi' ric'ux narik'or chi je' wili: ‹K-Aja̱w Dios, chacuy nimahc i hin rinimal aj mahc. Chaquetelej ta nak cho niwach, nqui rik'or johtok pa riti̱j.

«Ru̱c' aj riti̱j xiban aj pahkem to̱j re' hin til nik'or aweh tak chi re're' xsoljic je pa ripa̱t chi cuyu̱j chic rimahc ru'um Dios. Ra̱j i winak cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ma' xcuyuric ta je rimahc. Je' re' nik'or maj re' k'e̱' rinimsaj ri̱b, re're' narit'uchsjic wach ru'um i Dios ra̱j nchel re' rit'uchsaj ti ri̱b, re're' narinimsjic wach ru'um i Dios, nqui Jesus queh.

Chipam aj wo' i tinamit re're' wilic wo' take xquic'am cok quiha'lac'u̱n chiwach i Jesus reh chi naricojom rik'ab chi quina̱ chi cuse'sbal queh. Naxquilow chi je' re' take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus, xicakric chi quina̱ take c'ahchi' quic'amam cok i quiha'lac'u̱n.

Ru'um aj re', re' Jesus xiyuk'ej je take nahsil raj tahkanel eh je' wili xik'or queh: «Ru'um aj chi re' Dios nk'atbic k'oric chi quina̱ take quisic'bic reh ricuse'sbal je' ricab nca'n take ha'lac'un wili, ma̱k'et tak pan quibe̱h take ha'lac'un wili chi naquijilim cho qui̱b wu̱c', chayew la' tak k'ab queh chi je' re' enca'n.

Til coric nik'or aweh tak chi jeno' c'acharel re' ma' ric'ul ta rik'orbal i Dios chi k'ochlic ra̱mna je' ricab k'ochonquil i ra̱mna jeno' ha'lac'un nank'o'rjic ru'um raja̱w, re' c'acharel re're' ma'xta roquic chi rehquen rajawric i Dios chi k'atal k'oric, nqui xik'or queh.

Ar wo' chipam i tinamit re're', jenaj winak nim riwa'ric xibiraj cok reh Jesus chi je' wili: «Ha̱w ato̱b laj aj tijinel, chak'or wi̱n, chaj bih ra̱j banaric reh chi equinehtric reh i junelic c'acharic? nqui cok reh Jesus.

Chalic i Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Wi xa re' wo' Dios k'e̱' ato̱b, naxak'or wi̱n k'uru' chi hin wo' ato̱b, narak ta wo' nchel chiri̱j chi re' hin wilic wo' wajawric chi rik'ormojic aweh haj wilic ra̱j banaric? nqui reh.

Chiri̱j re', je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh: «Re' hat aweht'alim take lajeb chi tak'anic xic'ul i Moyses ru̱c' i Dios. Chac'am na̱ k'uru' take tak'anic je' ricab take wili: Ma̱ban i c'oyomal, ma̱ban cansanic, ma̱ban chucuj k'oric chiri̱j awas acha̱k', eh chalok'mej wo' atu̱t awaja̱w, nqui wo' chic reh.
Chalic i c'amol be̱h re're' je' wo' wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Ha̱w, chi'nchel take tak'anic nak'or re're' cu pa nit'uchal nip'utum cho ric'amaric na̱, nqui reh.

Re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh: «Jenaj chic bano̱j ma' ja' na'n ta ribanaric, re' nitahkaljic. Quinatahkej k'uru' re' cok ru', pe̱t chac'ayej cho chi'nchel nic' pa' nimal wilic aweh eh re' ritz'akil na̱c'ayem re're', chayew queh take niba̱' reh chi je' re' ma' xa ta je' chic ricab abihomal wilic ayu' wach ac'al enamol wach ru̱c' i Dios ar pan taxa̱j, nqui Jesus reh.
Naxibiraj chi je' re' k'oric xiban i Jesus, re' c'amol be̱h re're' k'e̱' ti'quil xibiraj chi naric'ayem pa' bih wilic reh maj yohbal cho wach ribihomal wilic.
Naxilow i Jesus chi je' re', je' wili p'uht rik'orom: «Til k'e̱' nchel c'axquilal chi reh jeno' biho̱m chi enoquic chi rehquen rajawric i Dios chi aj k'atal k'oric china̱!

Je' re' nik'or maj re' biho̱m wi ma' resaj lok chi rij ric'ux i ribihomal, k'e̱' nchel c'axquilal chi reh chi enoquic chi rehquen rajawric i Dios chi aj k'atal k'oric china̱. Xa je' na ricab c'axquilal chi reh jeno' nim laj chicop came̱yo ribihnal, chi enoquic chipam t'uch ritz'ahpil ocbal reh katinami̱t Jerusalen nok wilic i rihk, nqui Jesus.

Re' take xibirinic reh xik'or i Jesus je' wili xquik'or: «Wi k'e̱' nchel c'axquilal chi queh take bihomak chi equi'oquic chi ri'sil rajawric i Dios chi aj k'atal k'oric chi quina̱, hab wo' wach k'uru' enca'n canar oquic? nqui take.

Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Chawach hat-tak c'acharel ma' eta riban chi hab wach c'acharel eriban canar oquic chi ri'sil rajawric i Dios chi aj k'atal k'oric xa re' la' chiwach i Dios ma' c'axic ta chi ribanaric chi re' c'acharel enoquic chi ri'sil rajawric ru', nqui Jesus.
