Chiri̱j chic ru', re' ma' Luch je' wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Ha̱w, re' cok i hoj chi atahkaljic i hat til wo' xkacana̱' cho pa' bih keh ch'i̱l wo' take kaj pan pa̱t. Ra̱j na rik'orom k'uru' chi ru'um re're', re' Dios nariyeb rijelow-bal keh? nqui reh Jesus.

Chalic i Jesus je' wili xik'or queh take wilque̱b cok ar chi birinic: «Til coric nik'or aweh tak chi chi'nchel hat-tak re' xacana̱' cho awaj pan pa̱t tak je' ricab atu̱t awaja̱w tak ch'i̱l awas acha̱k' tak on awehq'ue̱n tak ch'i̱l awac'u̱n awixk'u̱n tak, reh chi nawoquic tak chi rehquen rajawric i Dios chi aj k'atal k'oric chana̱ tak,

yohbal chic wach tinamit naquijilow-bem take xacana̱' tak take cho. Re' hat-tak ma' xa re' ta wo' re're' na̱c'ulum tak chipam take k'i̱j chi cu wilqui̱n chaxilac tak, chipam la' wo' take k'i̱j chalic reh nok chi ma'xta chic niwih'ic chaxilac tak, na̱c'ulum wo' tak re' nye'bic i junelic c'acharic, nqui queh.

Chiri̱j chic ru' nok re' Jesus resam chic lok pa reh take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel chi naquiwih'ic chi cutquel, re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Chacoj tak rehtal chi nic' pa' nimal k'oro̱j cho pan quihu̱j take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios chiwi̱j i hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, ar narojic elok wach chipam i tinamit Jerusalen re' c'ahchi' kojic wi̱'.
Ar aj ru' naquink'ahsjok pan quik'ab take sol aj Ro̱ma, re' take re' naquise'lam pan nak' niwach, naqui̱nquitz'ujlom eh naqui̱n wo' quichuhbam.
Re' cok ru' nok hin chic quitz'uhumem eh hin wo' chic quicansam je, re' hin nawuctic wo' chic cho pa ro̱x k'i̱j reh niquimic, nqui Jesus queh.
Re' k'oric xiban i Jesus chiri̱j riquimic, ma' xquirak ta chiri̱j take cablaj re're' eh re' riwi̱' chi ma' xquirak ta chiri̱j ru'um chi ma' ja' sakom ta wach chi queh.
Chiri̱j chic ru' naxelic je chipam i tinamit re're', re' Jesus xponic ma' naht ta ru̱c' tinamit Jericoh. Ar ajic jenaj winak sot' wach re' pahkanic tumi̱n riban chi tz'uklic chi̱' be̱h,
naxibiraj i ahnic nca'n take riq'uihal tinamit c'ahchi' quiq'uic je chi rik'eteric i Jesus, xibiraj queh chaj bih c'ahchi' ric'uluric.
Naxquik'or reh chi re' Jesus re' ribihnej chi aj Nasaret iq'uic riban ponok ar,
re' sot' re're' p'uht riq'uerem je richi̱' chi je' wili: «Jesus ra̱' ri'sil cho k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy, chacuy chaquetelej ta wo' ti niwach chi ribanaric chi na̱wilbic chic, nqui je reh.

Nok iq'uinak chic je Jesus ar, re' sot' re're' riman chic xiq'uer je richi̱' chi je' wili: «Jesus ra̱' ri'sil cho k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy, chacuy chaquetelej ta wo' ti niwach chi ribanaric chi na̱wilbic chic, nqui p'uht rik'orom je. Je' re' xitik ju' rik'ormojic to̱b ta nchel re' take tinamit p'uht quinakam chi narimayam ahnic.
Je' aj re' ru' nok xa cow chic c'ahchi' rik'oric je sot' re're', re' Jesus xipahba̱' ri̱b eh xitak'a̱' je ric'amaric. Naxquic'am je chiwach, re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh sot':
«Chaj bih nawa̱j chi nanibanam awu̱c'? nqui reh. Re' sot' je' wili xik'or reh: «Ajabe̱s Jesus, quisakombok ti pa̱m take nak' niwach, nqui reh.
Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Ru'um chi xach'ica̱' ac'ux chiwi̱j, quisokombok wo' ti pa̱m take nak' awach chi na̱wilbic, nqui reh.

Xa chiwach aj wo' ti junc'am re're', re' sot' xilbic wo' ti eh ar xoquic chi ritahkaljic je Jesus chi xa c'ahchi' chic ritioxem johtok i Dios ru̱c' xbanaric reh. Je' wo' re' xca'n take tinamit xi'ilbic reh xc'uluric ru̱c' i sot', xquip'ut wo' ritioxjic johtok i Dios.
Chiri̱j chic ru' re' Jesus nok oconak chic chipam i tinamit Jericoh chi c'ahchi' chic ribehem pa̱m tinamit re're',
jenaj biho̱m laj winak Saque̱yo ribihnal re' ru̱c' cajawil take aj pahkem to̱j ntak'abjic je Ro̱ma,
xa cow chic c'ahchi' riyeb ric'ux chi rilmijic wach i Jesus, xa re' la' ru'um chi t'uch ti ro̱k ma' riban ta canar rilmijic wach cu'um queh riq'uihal tinamit quik'etbic wach.

Chi je' aj re' ru', re' Saque̱yo xo̱j rajim chi rik'eteric chiwach i Jesus eh xjohtic johtok china̱ jenaj t'uch che̱' sico̱moro ribihnal reh chi narilom wach. Je' aj re' xiban maj re' Jesus ar iq'uic ponok reh.

Naxponic i Jesus chi rehquen i che̱' re're' xilbic johtok china̱ eh xa ilo̱j chic riban johtok reh i Saque̱yo je' wili xik'or reh: «Saque̱yo, tikajen cho ar xa chi yu'na ti eh hiy pan apa̱t ru'um nok chiwach i k'i̱j wili curman chi nanihi'lic ar awu̱c', nqui reh.
Naxibiraj chi je' re' i Saque̱yo xa rajamem chic ri̱b xkajic cho china̱ i che̱' re're' eh xo̱j pa ripa̱t. Naxponic i Jesus ru̱c' xic'ul pan sukquil c'uxlis.

Chiri̱j chic ru' nok re' Jesus oconak chic cok chipam i ripa̱t i Saque̱yo, chi'nchel take tinamit xi'ilbic reh naxoquic cok ar p'uht quic'u'tjam chi je' wili: «Chak'or je Jesus, xoquic pe' chi hi'lic pa ripa̱t jenaj winak wilic ribiral chi aj mahc, nqui take.

Chi je' aj re' nok wilque̱b chic ar chi'nchel rula̱' nah me̱xa, re' Saque̱yo xpa'lajic johtok eh je wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Ajabe̱s Jesus, re' aj wili nanibanam hin yu'na: Re' nic' pa' nimal wilic wi̱n naniyejalem queh take niba̱' eh jarub pa' c'acharel xwelk'aj take cho ru̱c' i to̱j nbanaric reh Ro̱ma cajpech chic rijelow-bal naniyeb queh, nqui.

Naxibiraj chi je' re' i Jesus je' wili xik'or: «Je' ricab nok re' ma' Awraham xich'ica̱' ric'ux ru̱c' i Dios, je' wo' re' xiban i ra̱' ri'sil wili. Ru'um chi je' re' xa'n chipam i k'i̱j wili, re' hin nanibanam chi re' hat quich'i̱l take awaj pan pa̱t enye'eric aweh tak risukquil ac'ux tak.

Je' re' nanibanam maj re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, re' take aj mahc xchalic nisic' chi nanico'lem take chiwach i ti'c'axic je' ricab riban jeno' ehcham me̱' nano̱j chi risiq'uiric rik'ehbel me̱', nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic ru', re' Jesus xik'or jenaj jalwach k'oric queh tinamit c'ahchi' quibirinic reh chaj bih xik'or reh Saque̱yo. Re' riwi̱' naxik'or Jesus i jalwach k'oric re're' reh esbal lok pan quina̱ i capew-bal wilic cu̱c' chi ru'um xa ma' naht ta chic wilque̱b je ar Jerusalen, xa loq'uil chic wilic i k'i̱j re' narilmijic wi̱' chi re' Dios narip'utum k'atoj k'oric chi quina̱ chi'nchel.

Je' wili rik'or i jalwach k'oric xik'or queh: «Pan jenaj ye'a̱b wilic jenaj ajabe̱s nim rajawric. Junpech, re' ajabe̱s re're' p'uht ritik'a̱b ri̱b chi ojic pan jenaj chic ye'a̱b k'e̱' nahtil ponok re' nariye'eric cho wi̱' rajawric reh chi nasoljok wo' chic cho pa ritinami̱t, naroquic chi raj to'o̱l i k'atal k'oric ar.

Je' re' ajic nok ojic chic reh, xiyuk'ej take lajeb raj camanom chi quixilac chi'nchel raj camanom eh je' wili xik'or queh naxiyew cahnok queh ritz'a̱k chi xa jenaj wach q'uihal: ‹Chiwach take k'i̱j nawojic sahchok cho, chacamanej tak cahnok wach nitz'a̱k wili reh chi nariq'uihbic wach awu̱c' tak, nqui cahnok queh. «Cu re' aj ru', re' ajabe̱s re're' xo̱j chi ric'uluric rajawric chi naroquic chi raj to'o̱l i k'atal k'oric.

Nok je' re' xiban i ajabe̱s re're', juntuhm take rich ritinamital re' quixowonic wach, naxquibiraj chi xo̱j ru̱c' i k'atal k'oric re' naripahbanic cho reh chi naroquic chi aj to'o̱l reh, re' take re' xquitak'a̱' je juntuhm chi quich tinamital chi rik'ormojic reh i k'atal k'oric re're' chi ma' nca̱j ta chi naricahnic chi raj to'o̱l chi quina̱.

Raj la' i ajabe̱s re're' xye'eric wo' cho rajawric chi naroquic chi raj to'o̱l i k'atal k'oric eh chi je' re' naxsoljic wo' chic cho pa ritinami̱t, xitak'a̱' quic'amaric chi quiju'junal take lajeb chi raj camanom re' xicana̱' cahnok wi̱' ritz'a̱k. Je' re' xiban reh chi narilom nic' wach ricamanjic wach xca'n cahnok.
Re' pe̱t aj camanom xyuk'unjic, je' wili xik'or reh ajabe̱s naxponic chiwach: ‹Ha̱w, re' atz'a̱k xayew cahnok wi̱n laj pech chic xq'uihbic chi niwach, nqui reh.

«Re' ajabe̱s je' wili xik'or: ‹Hat ato̱b laj waj camanom, holohic acamaj xa'n ru̱c' i nitz'a̱k xnicana̱' cahnok aweh. Ru'um chi xatcamanic chi coric ru̱c' ti nech' nitz'a̱k xniyew cahnok aweh, yu'na naca̱t nicojom chi waj to'o̱l chi quina̱ lajeb chi tinamit chi hat aj ilol queh, nqui reh.
«Chiri̱j chic re' jenaj chic aj camanom xponic chiwach ajabe̱s je' wili xik'or reh: ‹Ha̱w, re' atz'a̱k xayew cahnok wi̱n ho'pech chic xq'uihbic chi niwach, nqui reh.
«Re' ajabe̱s je' wo' wili xik'or reh: ‹Re' hat naca̱t wo' nicojom chi waj to'o̱l chi quina̱ ho'o̱b chi tinamit chi hat aj ilol queh, nqui reh.

«Raj nchel i jenaj chic aj camanom naxponic chiwach ajabe̱s je' wili xik'or cok reh: ‹Ha̱w, wili atz'a̱k xacana̱' cahnok wi̱n. Re' cok ru' ma' xac'unej ta ri̱b chi niwach ru'um chi xa xnic'ol pan jenaj su't.

Je' re' ajic ma'xta nicamanej wach atz'a̱k ru'um xinyo'jic chawach maj re' hat k'e̱' hat cow ru̱c' ricamanjic wach atz'a̱k. Je' ricab wi xo̱j pa ri̱j atz'a̱k, namak' ripa̱t re' ncahnic pan c'a̱s awu̱c', to̱b ta ma' re' hat xat-tik'inic reh pa̱t. On natak'a̱' rijacharic pa̱m i ye'a̱b re' toco̱m xbanic wi̱' tic abi̱x, nqui reh.

«Re' ajabe̱s je' wili xik'or reh: ‹Hat waj camanom, xa ru̱c' i k'oric xak'or re' hin nik'or chi hat ma' ato̱b laj aj camanom. Wi aweht'alim wo' nak chi hin cow ru̱c' ricamanjic wach nitz'a̱k eh wi xo̱j nchel pa ri̱j nitz'a̱k nimak ripa̱t re' ncahnic pan c'a̱s wu̱c' to̱b ta ma' re' hin xintik'inic reh pa̱t on nimak i rabi̱x to̱b ta ma' re' wo' hin xinticbic reh abi̱x,
chaj wa'ric k'uru' ma' xo̱j ac'ol nitz'a̱k pan jeno' pa̱t c'olbal tumi̱n reh chi naxinc'ulic lok yu'na xak'ahsaj nak wi̱n nitz'a̱k ch'i̱l i xac'unej cahnok? nqui reh.
«Chiri̱j aj ru' re' ajabe̱s re're' je' wili xik'or queh take wilque̱b chiwach: ‹Chamak' tak nitz'a̱k reh winak wili eh chayew tak reh re' laj pech xiq'uihsaj wach nitz'a̱k, nqui queh.

«Naxquibiraj chi je' re' take wilque̱b cok ru̱c' xsahchic quic'ux, je' wili xquik'or reh: ‹Ha̱w, chaj wa'ric ru' chi reh wo' chic i laj pech q'uihbic wach atz'a̱k chiwach na̱yeb i tumi̱n re're'? nqui take.

«Re' ajabe̱s je' wili xik'or queh: ‹Reh aj re' naniyeb i nitz'a̱k maj til nik'or aweh tak chi re' nchol riq'uihsjic wach i pa' bih ye'o̱j reh nariye'eric riman reh, ra̱j nchel re' ma' nchol ta riq'uihsjic wach i pa' bih ye'o̱j reh, narimak'aric reh re' haj nak ti wilic i mahnic' ye'o̱j pan k'ab.

Nok abanam tak chic xnik'or aweh tak re're', chac'am tak cho wi̱n ayu' take waj ixowonel re' ma' xca̱j ta nak chi xincahnic chi raj to'o̱l i k'atal k'oric chi quina̱ eh chayoc' tak lok chi calak chi niwach, nqui ajabe̱s re're', nqui jalwach k'oric xik'or i Jesus queh take c'ahchi' quibirinic reh.
Nok ricohlam chic rik'ormojic i jalwach k'oric re're', re' Jesus xicora̱' je ar Jerusalen eh xic'am je quibe̱h take aj tahkem reh.

Nok re' Jesus ch'i̱l take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel c'ahchi' quiq'uic ponok chi quixilac take tinamit Wetpaqueh ch'i̱l i Weta̱nya re' nc'utunic chic je wi̱' i ye'a̱b re' ribihnej “Ye'a̱b queh take tic Oli̱wo ribihnal”, xik'o'rej take je qui̱b queh cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel chi naritak'a̱b je take

chi je' wili tak'anic xiban queh: «Hiy tak chipam t'uch tinamit wilic je chi kawach. Natiponok tak ar, enarak tak jenaj rac'u̱n cawa̱y bac'lic ar, re' ja' hab ta wach johtonak china̱. Chachej tak cho eh chac'am tak cho wi̱n ayu'.

Wi hab wach xbirinic aweh chaj bih riwi̱' chi c'ahchi' achejem tak i rac'u̱n cawa̱y wili, chak'or tak reh chi je' wili: ‹C'ahchi' kachejem maj naricamanic reh Ajabe̱s Jesus, tiquirok tak queh, nqui Jesus.
Je' aj re', re' take xitak'abjic je xi'o̱j chipam t'uch tinamit re're' eh naxiponic ar xquirak wo' rac'u̱n cawa̱y je' ricab xk'ormojic je queh ru'um i Jesus.

Nok re' take quib chi nahsil aj tahkanel re're' p'uht quichejem i rac'u̱n cawa̱y, xiponic take ehcham reh eh je' wili xquik'or: «Chaj bih riwi̱' chi c'ahchi' achejem tak i rac'u̱n cawa̱y wili? nqui take.
Re' take re' je' wili xquik'or: «C'ahchi' kachejem maj naricamanic reh Ajabe̱s Jesus, nqui take.

Chi je' aj re', re' take quib chi nahsil aj tahkanel re're' xquic'am je rac'u̱n cawa̱y ru̱c' Jesus eh naxponic ru̱c', xquicoj je che'l ri̱j i rac'u̱n i cawa̱y i quijuc ro̱k tz'ih roxlo̱c' lok quiso' eh xquijohsaj johtok i Jesus china̱.

Nok behic chic nca'n je, wilic take c'acharel xquiyew rilok'il i Jesus chi je' ricab jenaj k'atal k'oric naxquixoyej je pa̱m ribe̱h ru̱c' ricojoric wach ac'al i quijuc ro̱k tz'ih roxlo̱c' lok quiso' eh ch'i̱l wo' ricojoric je xak pac' pa ribe̱h.

Chiri̱j chic ru' xiponic chipam i ye'a̱b re' ribihnej “Ye'a̱b queh take tic Oli̱wo ribihnal”. Ar ajic nok naquimolom chic jok i kajic chipam i be̱h rimol jok ar Jerusalen, re' take quitahkanic reh Jesus p'uht quitioxem johtok i Dios. Re' take tinamit re're', ru'um quilom cho nic' nimal lok' laj nawa̱l ribanam cho i Jesus, xa suk chic pan quic'ux

je' wili c'ahchi' quik'orom chi cow: «Ar pan taxa̱j wilic sukquil c'uxlis! Tioxomaj ta nak ar i Dios k'uru' eh ayu' wach ac'al, kayew tak rilok'il i k'atal k'oric re' c'ulic riban lok wili chi tak'amaj cho ru'um i Dios, nqui c'ahchi' quik'orom.

Naxquibiraj chi je' re' take ju'jun winak cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses re' wilque̱b wo' chi quixilac take tinamit, je' wili xquik'or reh Jesus: «Ha̱w, chak'or queh tinamit quitahkanic aweh chi ma' nquik'or chic k'oric nca'n, nqui take reh.

Ra̱j i Jesus je' wili quic'u'ljic xiban: «Re' hin til nik'or aweh tak i wili: Wi re' take tinamit wili eta nak nquitz'ap quichi̱', re' nak chic take abaj wili equik'oric chi cow chi quijelow-bal, nqui queh.
Chiri̱j chic ru', re' Jesus xoquic cok ma' naht ta ru̱c' Jerusalen. Naxilow je wach i tinamit re're' xchalic rok'im chiqui̱j take aj Jerusalen ru'um i ti'c'axic naquic'ulum.

Je' wili xik'or chiqui̱j pa rok'im: «Hat-tak aj Jerusalen, chiwach i k'i̱j wili je' ta nak enarak tak chiri̱j chi re' hin xinc'ulic lok chaxilac tak chi riye'eric sukquil c'uxlis. Ra̱j i wili, ma' sakom ta wach chaweh tak i riwi̱' nic'ulic lok awu̱c' tak.

Ru'um aj re' narichalic i ti'c'axic chana̱ tak maj naric'ulic lok i rik'ijil chi re' take quixowonic awach tak naquic'ulic lok chi risutjic awi̱j tak chi ribanaric i ti'c'axic aweh tak. Re' take re' xa je' chic ricab risutjic ri̱j jeno' ye'a̱b chi cora̱l naca'nam aweh tak, reh chi ma' haj ta chic etelic tak.

Je' aj re', re' take quixowonic awach tak naca̱t tak quicansam eh naquituhbam wach ac'al apa̱t tak reh chi ma' jeno' chic abaj tuslic wach naricahnic naquiyoj. Je' aj re' riwi̱' ti'c'axic na̱c'ulum tak ru'um nok ma'xta arakam tak chiri̱j chi chiwach take k'i̱j wili xinwih'ic chaxilac tak chi aco'ljic nak tak chiwach i ti'c'axic re're', nqui Jesus pa rok'im.

Chiri̱j aj chic ru' nok wilic chic cok chipam i tinamit Jerusalen, re' Jesus xoquic cok chi chi̱' i pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios. Naxilow chaj bih no'jbal nca'n take aj c'a̱y ch'i̱l take aj yaco̱l wilque̱b ar, xitok'a̱' rit'erem take lok.

Je' aj wili xik'or queh naxesaj take lok: «Re' pa̱t wili lok'onbal reh Dios nok wilic. Je' re' tz'ihmbimaj pa riC'uhbal i Dios, xa re' la' hat-tak xacoj tak chi jenaj c'aybal re' nawelk'aj tak wi̱' take tinamit, nqui queh.

Ar aj chi chi̱' i pa̱t re're', re' Jesus eli̱c i k'i̱j xic'uhbalej take tinamit, ra̱j take nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l wo' take nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take nimak quiwach, xquitok'a̱' quisiq'uim ri̱j chaj bih ricansjic i Jesus naca'nam ru'um reh take c'uhbalanic riban.

To̱b ta wo' je' re' c'ahchi' quicapam, ma' xquirak ta jeno' riwi̱' nic' wach ricansjic i Jesus naca'nam maj re' take tinamit xa eli̱c wo' quiwih'ic cok ru̱c' eh xa ic'lic wo' chic cok quixiquin chi ribirmijic i c'uhbalanic riban.

Junpech ar chi chi̱' i pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh tinamit: «Re' Dios wilic chic chaxilac tak. Ru'um aj re' chajal wach ano'jbal tak, nqui queh. Je' re' ajic nok c'uhbalanic riban i Jesus, re' take nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l wo' take nahsil chipam tinamit, xi'o̱j c'olok ru̱c'

eh je' wili xquik'or cok reh chi rinakaric: «Chak'or keh, hab wach aj u̱c' nchalic awajawric re' nacoj chi ribanaric take lok' laj nawa̱l? Hab wach xpahbanic aweh k'uru' chi wilic awajawric re're'? nqui take reh.
Chalic Jesus je' wili xic'u'lej take wi̱': «Tare̱t, re' hin enik'or aweh tak, xa re' la' quinac'u'lej pe tak cho ru̱c' i pahkanic nanibanam aweh tak wili:
Chak'or tak cho wi̱n k'uru', re' kahsanic ha' xiban i Wa̱n queh tinamit, cu ru̱c' na Dios xchalic rik'ormojic on xa pa ric'ux xchalic? nqui queh.
Naxquibiraj chi je' re', re' take re' je' wili p'uht quik'orom chi quiwach: «Wi xkak'or reh chi cu ru̱c' i Dios xchalic rik'ormojic, erik'or keh chi chaj wa'ric ma' xkanimej ta.

Wi nchel xkak'or reh chi xa xic'am pa ric'ux, re' take tinamit ekojquicansaj chi abaj maj chi queh riq'uihal i tinamit re' Wa̱n xwih'ic chi jenaj aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios, nqui p'uht quik'orom chi quiwach.
Ru'um chi ma' xquirak ta chaj bih ric'u'ljic naca'nam, xquik'or cok reh Jesus chi ma' queht'alim ta hab wach u̱c' xchalic rik'ormojic i kahsanic ha' xiban i Wa̱n.
Ru'um aj re' je' wili xik'or Jesus queh: «Re' hin ma' eta wo' nik'or aweh tak haj chalic wi̱n i wajawric chi c'uhtunic je' wo' chi ribanaric take lok' laj nawa̱l, nqui queh.

Chiri̱j chic ru' re' Jesus xoquic wo' chic chi k'oric cu̱c' take tinamit ru̱c' i jalwach k'oric wili: «Junpech jenaj ajabe̱s xitic pa̱m i rac'a̱l chi u̱wa. Pan jenaj k'i̱j nok naht xo̱j sahchok i ajabe̱s re're' cu chi naht ye'a̱b, xiyew cahnok chi quimel queh ju'jun aj camanom re' naquicha'janic cahnok reh wach ritic eh xitik'a̱' wo' cahnok wach cu̱c' chi naquiyejalem wach i ritic re're' nawachanok cho.

Naxponic rik'ijil rik'ahsjic wach i tic, re' ajabe̱s re're' xitak'a̱' cho jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch cu̱c' take aj quimel riye'a̱b chi ric'uluric i haj pa' wilic i tiklic wach chi narehtric i ajabe̱s re're', xa re' la' take aj quimel ye'a̱b re're', ma'xta bih xquiyew je reh aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're', rich'eyeric la' chic xca'n je.

Chiri̱j chic re', re' ajabe̱s re're' xitak'a̱' wo' chic cho jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch, xa re' la' take aj quimel ye'a̱b re're' xquitz'ujlom je eh chi xa ch'eych'ey chic riban, xquisolq'uij wo' je chi ma'xta bih xquiyew je reh.

Pa ro̱x pech ajic, re' ajabe̱s re're' xitak'a̱' wo' chic cho jenaj chic raj tz'e' wa̱ch cu̱c' take aj quimel ye'a̱b re're', xa re' la' xquesaj wo' chic lok chiri̱j i ye'a̱b chi xa q'uisi̱n chic ma' nquimic.

Chiri̱j aj chic ru', re' winak ehcham ye'a̱b re're' je' wili xik'or pa ric'ux: ‹Chaj wo' bih nanibanam cu̱c' aj quimel ye'a̱b k'uru'? Ha̱', re' wili nanibanam: Re' wac'u̱n re' k'e̱' ti' nwic'raj nanitak'a̱b je cu̱c'. K'i̱j ta nak je enquiyohlej wach naquilow chi re' wac'u̱n narojic c'olok cu̱c', nqui pa ric'ux.

«Je' re' k'uru' re' ac'un re're' xtak'abjic je cu̱c' aj quimel ye'a̱b eh naxquilow chi xo̱j c'olok ar p'uht quik'orom chi quiwach chi je' wili: ‹Chawil tak, re' wulu' narehchenic reh ye'a̱b wili. Kacansaj tak k'uru' reh chi re' hoj nakehchenic reh ye'a̱b wili, nqui take chi quiwach.

«Je' aj re' naxponic ac'un re're' cu̱c' take aj quimel ye'a̱b, xquikerej lok chiri̱j ye'a̱b re're' eh xquicansaj wo' je. Naxibiraj chi xquimic i rac'u̱n, chaj bih xiban aj ehcham ye'a̱b re're' ru̱c' xca'n take aj quimel ye'a̱b, nacapaj hat-tak?

Re' hin enik'or aweh tak chi re' ajabe̱s re're', xitak'a̱' quicansjic take aj quimel ye'a̱b re're' eh queh chic take toco̱m xiyew riye'a̱b chi naquehcham i wach i tic wilic, nqui Jesus. Naxquibiraj chi je' re' xik'or i Jesus je' wili xquik'or take tinamit: «Nqui ta nak je Dios chi ma' nka'n keh hoj i no'jbal xbanjic re're', nqui take.

Chalic Jesus xa ilo̱j chic riban queh tinamit re're' je' wili xik'or queh: «Chaj bih nac'ul tak chi ma' narak ta tak chiri̱j i nawilow tak wach chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios? maj ar je' wili rik'or: “Re' cajtz'u'c laj ma' laj abaj ma' cojo̱j ta pa riman cu'um take toco̱m chic aj tz'ako̱l, re' chic re' xoquic chi pe̱t ma' laj abaj ch'iquinbal cho reh ricajtz'u'c i pa̱t wili, nqui tz'ihmbimaj cahnok.

«Je' re' ajic til nik'or aweh tak i wili: Je' ricab chi xa hab wach jeno' enk'ehbic cho cu naht johtok eh enc'ulic kajok china̱ abaj ma' cojo̱j ta pa riman re're', xa xerxer chic encahnic on je' ricab nok hab wach enk'ehbic cho ma' laj abaj re're' china̱, ma' eta chic nc'utunic wach, je' wo' re' nanibanam i hin nanisacham wo' quiwach take nquik'ihtaj qui̱b chi niwach, nqui Jesus queh.

Naxquibiraj i jalwach k'oric re're', re' take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios, xca̱j nak richoporic i Jesus chiwach i junc'am re're' ru'um xquirak chiri̱j chi queh xk'ormojic i jalwach k'oric re're', xa re' la' ma' xquichop ta wo' ru'um chi quiyo'jic chiwach i tinamit quitahkanic reh.

Re' la' chic xca'n take winak re're', riman chic xquip'ut ricojoric rehtal i Jesus reh chi xa haj ta nak encalajic chi quiwach ru̱c' jeno' k'oric. Ru'um aj re' junpech xquitak'a̱' cok ru̱c' Jesus quib xib chi winak re' naca'nam qui̱b chi xa coric chic cok wach quic'ux chi ribanaric jenaj pahkanic chiri̱j i to̱j nbanaric reh Ro̱ma. Xa haj ta nak ti encalajic so' ru̱c' i pahkanic re're', enak ti nquitz'ahkaj rimahc chi k'ahsbal pan k'ab i raj to'bonel i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma wilic ar Jerusalen.

Je' re' ajic naxiponic take tak'amaj je re're' ru̱c' i Jesus, je' wili xquik'or cok reh: «Ha̱w aj tijinel keh, re' hoj keht'alim chi xa coric wo' wach k'oric na'n ru̱c' take tijbal nak'or eh ru'um re're' xa ru̱c' wo' coric laj k'oric nac'uhtaj i c'uhbal nc'ambic quibe̱h take c'acharel chi naquiponic ru̱c' i Dios. Je' wo' keht'alim chi re' hat ma' nachih ta wach take c'acharel quibirinic reh coric awu̱c', xa chi'nchel la' nac'ul take awu̱c' maj chawach i hat xa jenaj wach quiwa'ric take c'acharel. Ru'um aj re' chaj bih nak'or keh i hat chiri̱j i pahkanic wili:

Re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses riyew na k'ab chi re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel enkayew i to̱j tak'amaj ru'um i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma chi naritojoric? Je' wo' cu nakatikim na ju' ribanaric i to̱j re're' on ma'xta chic? nqui take reh.
Re' Jesus chi rina'bem chic chaj bih c'ahchi' quik'inem wi̱' ru̱c' i pahkanic c'ahchi' ca'nam, je' wili xik'or queh:

«Charak tak cho wi̱n jeno' tumi̱n, nqui queh. Naxye'eric reh jenaj tumi̱n re' Jesus je' wili xik'or: «Hab wach aj eh i wachbal ch'i̱l i bihnal wilic chiwach i tumi̱n wili? nqui queh. —Reh k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma, nqui take reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Haj pa' wilic i k'oro̱j chi reh i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma, re' wo' re' chayew tak reh eh haj pa' wo' wilic i k'oro̱j chi reh i Dios, re' wo' re' chayew tak reh ru', nqui Jesus queh.

Je' aj re' ru' re' take tak'amaj cok ru̱c' Jesus chi risiq'uiric rimahc chi quiwach i tinamit xa ru̱c' take c'uhtunic riban, ma' xquirak ta wo' chaj bih jeno' mahc naquitz'akam chiri̱j, chi xa tz'e'tz'e' la' chic quiwach ru̱c' i c'u'lunic xiban i Jesus, ma' cu ta chic xik'oric cok ru̱c'.

Chiri̱j chic ru', wilic queh junch'uk chic aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses je' ru̱c' take ca̱' qui'sil cho aj k'ahsem si̱ Saroc xiponic ru̱c' i Jesus. Re' take re', re' ma' nquicoj ta wach cuctic cho take camnak je' wili pahkanic xca'n cok reh:

«Ha̱w kaj tijinel, chipam jenaj queh hu̱j xitz'ihmbaj i Moyses rik'or chi jeno' asbe̱s ac'un nquimic je chi ma' ja'xta cahnok riha'lac'u̱n ru̱c' i rehq'ue̱n, tanlic chiri̱j i chak'be̱s ac'un chi narehq'uenem cahnok rehq'ue̱n i ras reh chi enwih'ic quiha'lac'u̱n ch'i̱l i cahnel ixok re're' eh chi je' re' ma' eta no̱j sahchok wach ribihnal i asbe̱s ac'un camnak je.

Wi je' re' tz'ihmbimaj, chaj bih naquicahnic wi̱' take wuku̱b chi ac'un re' je' wili xquic'ul? Pan jenaj cho k'i̱j re' asbe̱s ac'un xiban caxa̱ra ru̱c' jenaj ixok xa re' la' naxirak cho rik'ijil riquimic, xquimic je chi ma' jeno' riha'lac'u̱n xwih'ic.
Chi je' aj re', re' ricab ac'un chi nimbal reh i tz'ihmbimaj cahnok ru'um i Moyses xiban caxa̱ra ru̱c' rehq'ue̱n i ras, xa re' la' xquimic wo' je ru' chi ma' jeno' riha'lac'u̱n ru̱c' ixok re're'.

Chiri̱j chic ru', xc'amaric wo' chic ixok re're' ru'um i ro̱x ac'un, xa re' la' xquimic wo' je chi ma'xta wo' nwih'ic cahnok riha'lac'u̱n ru̱c' ixok re're'. Je' aj re' ru', chi'nchel take wuku̱b chi ac'un re're' quehq'uenej cahnok ixok re're', xa re' la' chi'nchel xiquimic je chi ma'xta cahnok quiha'lac'u̱n ru̱c'.
Nok camnak chic take je chi'nchel chi ac'un re're', xponic wo' rik'ijil chi xquimic je ixok re' xquehq'uenej cahnok take wuku̱b chi ac'un re're'.

Chak'or keh k'uru' Ajabe̱s Jesus, chaj bih naquicahnic wi̱' take wuku̱b chi ac'un re're' pa rik'ijil cucsbal cho take camnak? Hab wo' wach queh wuku̱b chi ac'un re're' narehchenic reh ixok re're'? Nkabiraj aweh re're' maj chi'nchel xquehq'uenej je ixok re're', nqui take reh. Ru̱c' pahkanic re're', re' nak xca̱j chiri̱j chi re' Jesus nariyak'abem nak pa ro̱k i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses wi ta nak erik'or chi wilic c'oyomal ar pan taxa̱j.

Naxibiraj i Jesus chi je' re', je' wili quic'u'ljic xiban: «Chabiraj tak k'oric wili chiri̱j i caxarahil: Chiwach take k'i̱j yu'na chi cu quimic pe ki̱j, re' take tinamit cu nca'n caxa̱ra reh chi ma' eta nsahchic wach quibihnal,

ra̱j naponok rik'ijil chi ma' quimic ta chic ki̱j, hab pa' wach take c'acharel capewemaj take cho ru'um i Dios chi wilic chiqui̱j chi naquic'acharic chiwach rik'ijil re're' eh chi nacuctic wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak, re' take re' ma'xta chic quisiq'uim ric'u'lil co̱k quik'ab.

Chipam i rik'ijil re're', re' take c'acharel re're' ma' xa ta re' naquibihnem chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios chic take ru'um chi xi'ucsjic cho chi quixilac take camnak, je' la' wo' naca'nam je' chic ricab take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios ar pan taxa̱j ru'um chi naquic'acharic chi junelic.

«Yu'na ajic re' chic k'oric chiqui̱j take camnak chi nacuctic wo' chic rica'pech xa nok wo' k'oro̱j cho ru'um Moyses chipam ric'uhbal. Ru'um aj re' naxk'oric chiri̱j i q'ui̱x koplic rik'ak'il, re' Moyses xik'or chi re' Dios je' wili xik'or: “Re' hin, hin i Dios rilok'ej niwach i ma' Awraham ch'i̱l i ma' Isahac eh ch'i̱l wo' i ma' Jacow, nqui k'oric xiban i Dios, nqui xik'or Moyses.

«Ru̱c' aj k'oric re're', re' Moyses xic'uhtaj chi re' take camnak c'achalque̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios maj re' Dios, nlok'onjic wach cu'um take quic'acharic wo' chic cho, ma' re' ta nchel cu'um take ma' quic'acharic ta chic cho, nqui xik'or Jesus.
Naxquibiraj chi je' re' take ju'jun chi aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, je' wili xquik'or reh Jesus: «Ha̱w aj tijinel keh, ricorquil xak'or queh, nqui take reh.
Chiri̱j chic re', ma' cu ta chic hab wach chi quixilac take c'acharel wilque̱b ar xinima̱' ric'ux chi ribanjic cok jeno' pahkanic reh.

Chiri̱j chic ru' re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh tinamit: «Re' take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ma' coric ta nquik'or chi re' rira'il i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xa ar ti nchalic cu̱c' take ra̱' ri'sil cho i aj najtir k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy eh ma' re' ta ru̱c' i Dios nanquik'or.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' wo' ma' Tawiy xtz'ihminic reh i wili chipam i hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' take moloj wach bi̱ch lok'onbal reh Dios: “Re' Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Dios je' wili xik'or reh Ajabe̱s chi nina̱ re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric: ‘Je' ricab naric'ul rilok'il jeno' winak ntz'ukunjic cok chi riche̱l jeno' k'atal k'oric, je' aj wo' re' nachac'ul i hat alok'il wili: Chi na̱wih'ic chiniche̱l
cu rehtal nawilow chi re' take awaj ixowonel naquiwih'ic ri'sil awo̱k, nqui Dios, nqui ma' Tawiy.

«Je' re' ajic wi re' ma' Tawiy wAjabe̱s nqui rik'or reh k'atal k'oric re're', nic' aj wach k'uru' nanquik'or take aj tijem ri̱j c'uhbal chi re' rilok'il i k'atal k'oric re're', xa je' ti ricab rilok'il cho jeno' queh ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Tawiy? nqui Jesus queh tinamit.
Chiri̱j chic re', je' wili xik'or i Jesus queh nahsil raj tahkanel chi quiwach riq'uihal tinamit c'ahchi' quibirinic reh:

«Chayohbalej awi̱b hat-tak, ma̱nih awi̱b tak ru̱c' quino'jbal take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses maj re' take re' k'e̱' nponic chi quiwach ric'uhtjic lok qui̱b queh tinamit chi nimak quiwach. Ru'um aj re' naquibehic lok, k'e̱' nponic chi quiwach ricojoric nimak tak ro̱k tz'ih reh chi xa suk chic equic'alenjic watak c'aybal. Naqui'o̱j wo' pan tak pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, on naqui'o̱j wo' pan jeno' pa̱t re' yuk'umaj take wi̱' chi wi'c, k'e̱' suk queh tz'uhkic re' quitz'uhkic wi̱' take nimak quiwach.

Je' wo' chic, re' take re' nquimak' pa' bih wilic queh take cahnel ixok eh xa poybal chic na̱ quilek' nca'n, xa k'e̱' chic nahtil ro̱k quiti̱j nca'n. Ru'um aj chi'nchel nca'n re're', k'e̱' rinimal ti'c'axic naquic'ulum, nqui Jesus queh nahsil raj tahkanel.

Nok ricohlam chic k'oric cu̱c' take nahsil raj tahkanel, re' Jesus xicut je rilbal chi quina̱ take tinamit. Ar xilow je take biho̱m chi xa tzohkil chic ye'o̱j tumi̱n nca'n chipam caxo̱n molbal tumi̱n nye'eric chiwach Dios.
Je' wo' xilow chi xponic ar jenaj cahnel ixok niba̱' ti eh xiyew chipam i caxo̱n re're' i quib chi cuc' tumi̱n ma' q'uih ta ti quitz'akil.

Je' aj wili xik'or naxilow chi je' re': «Til nik'or aweh tak chi re' tumi̱n xiyew i niba̱' cahnel ixok re're', xiq'uic wo' chic na̱ riwa'ric chiwach i tumi̱n xquiyew pan caxo̱n chi'nchel take bihomak re're',

maj re' cahnel ixok re're' to̱b ta nak k'e̱' niba̱', xiyew i tumi̱n re' haj nak ti wilic naricamanic reh pa ric'acharic ra̱j nchel take bihomak xa re' chic i tumi̱n re' ma' xquic'uhsaj ta xquiyew chiwach i Dios, nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j wili nok wilic take c'ahchi' quic'u'tjam i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios chi xa holohic chic rixoyjic bano̱j ru̱c' take chak'wach laj abaj ye'o̱j cu'um take nimak quiwach, re' Jesus je' wili xik'or:
«Chi'nchel take abaj nawilow tak wili narihitlijic wach ac'al maj nariponic i k'i̱j chi narisacharic wach chi junpech chi ma' jeno' chic abaj naricahnic chi tuslic wach, nqui Jesus queh.

Chiri̱j wili re' take raj tahkanel je' wili xquik'or cok reh Jesus: «Ajabe̱s kaj tijinel, jaruj naric'uluric nic' nimal xak'or keh eh haj wilic take rehtalil nariwih'ic chi pe̱t chi c'uhtbal reh chi q'uisi̱n chic ma' nc'uluric take re're'? nqui take reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Xa na'lic ok wo' aweh tak reh chi ma' hab ta wach enjot'bic aweh tak. Je' re' nik'or maj q'uihal take aj jot'o̱l nacuctic cho re' naca'nam qui̱b chi xa je' chic re' hin take eh je' wili naquik'orom: ‹Re' hin, hin Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, nqui naquik'orom. «Je' wo' naquik'orom wo' aweh tak chi q'uisi̱n chic ma' nponic rik'ijil chi narico'ljic katinami̱t. To̱b ta je' re' naquik'orom aweh tak, re' hat-tak ma̱tahkej tak take je nachabiraj tak chi je' re'.

«Re' hat-tak na̱biram wo' tak ribiral chi wilic take tinamit c'ahchi'que̱b chi k'ak'anic chi quiwach ru'um chi xi'uctubic china̱ caj k'atal k'oric. Nachabiraj tak re're', ma' riban ti naho̱l awach tak chi ricapewjic chi xponic chic ricux'ic wach chi'nchel. Coric, re' rik'ijil sachbal wach chi'nchel re're', nariponic wach xa re' la' ma' ja' yu'na ta ti maj curman chi pe̱t naric'uluric lok chi'nchel re're', nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j re' je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Chiwach take k'i̱j wili cu rehtal nponic wach rik'ijil sachbal wach i pa̱t wili, re' take nimak chi cuc'tak tinamit xa naquic'u'lem chic qui̱b chi k'ak'anic chi quiwach.

Je' wo' xa haj chic ye'a̱b, nariwih'ic rehreh wach ya'bilal, nariwih'ic wi'jalel eh naribanam wo' take cow laj hihc. Ma' xa re' ta re', je' la' wo' ar pan taxa̱j naric'utunic cho nimak tak rehtalil re' nariyo'sonic queh tinamit.

Je' aj re' naric'ulmujic, xa re' la' ru' pe̱t naca̱t tak quisiq'uim take awaj ixowonel tak chi ribanaric ti'c'axic aweh tak. Je' wo' naca̱t tak quichopom eh naca̱t wo' tak quik'ahsam chi rich'ukuric k'oric chana̱ tak chipam take pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xa cojbal aweh tak pan che̱'. Je' wo' ru'um chi re' hin quinanimej tak, wilic wo' aweh tak naquic'amaric je chi quiwach take k'atal k'oric on chi quiwach take caj to'o̱l chi k'atal k'oric chi quina̱ take tinamit wilque̱b wi̱' take awich rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel reh chi naquich'ukum k'oric chana̱ tak.
Je' re' ajic chi quiwach aj chi'nchel re're' ma̱cana̱' tak riye'eric achi̱' tak chiwi̱j.
Ru'um aj reh naric'uluric awu̱c' tak, re' wili til chacoj pan acapew-bal tak: Ma̱tik'a̱' pe tak wach pan awa̱mna tak chaj bih k'oric na̱k'orom tak chi rico'ljic awi̱b tak

maj re' hin naniye'bic ak'orbal tak ch'i̱l ano'jbal tak reh chi na̱weht'alim tak chaj bih k'oric na̱k'orom tak. Chi je' re', re' take awaj ixowonel ma'xta chic quicuyum ransil ak'orbal tak eh ma'xta wo' chic quisolq'uim cho chana̱ tak.

«Re' hat-tak re' titahkanic tak wi̱n, ma' xa cu'um ta awaj ixowonel na̱k'ahsjic tak pan quik'ab take aj ye'ol ti'c'axic china̱ tak, je' la' wo' cu'um take awu̱c' take cho, je' ricab atu̱t awaja̱w tak, awas acha̱k' tak on awica̱n ch'i̱l take suk quik'oric awu̱c' tak. Cu'um aj queh take re', wilic take ju'jun awich tahkanel naquicansjic je.
Chi je' aj re' k'e̱' wo' chic q'uihal take c'acharel naquixowonic awach tak ru'um chi re' hin quinanimej tak,
xa re' la' to̱b ta wo' je' re' naric'uluric awu̱c' tak, ma'xta bih naritz'a'nic so' aweh tak,
na̱co'lem la' tak ri̱j ac'acharic nachacuy tak ransil i ti'c'axic.

«Nok c'ahchi' chic awilom tak wach ti'c'axic re're', ma̱capaj tak chi xponic chic rik'ijil i sachbal wach i pa̱t wili. Ma'xta ru', cu rehtal la' nachawilow tak chi re' tinamit Jerusalen wili sutumaj chic ri̱j cu'um take sol aj Ro̱ma, cu re' aj ru' charak tak chiri̱j chi xponic chic i rik'ijil risacharic wach i pa̱t wili.

Chipam rik'ijil re're', re' hat-tak re' wilca̱t tak chi junsut riyuk'ul Jure̱ya hiy tak pan tak q'uiche̱' chi ric'oloric awi̱b tak ar. Re' hat-tak aj Jerusalen wi chipam ok atinami̱t tak wili wilca̱t tak, telen tak je chipam. Tz'a̱b ru' wi chiri̱j wilca̱t tak lok, ma' toquic tak chic cho chipam.
Je' re' cha'n tak maj chiwach rik'ijil re're', re' Dios naritak'a̱b cho china̱ junsut Jure̱ya re' take ti'c'axic tz'ihmbimaj cahnok ribiral chi nariponic wach.

Til nik'or chi chipam rik'ijil re're', ru'um reh rinimal ti'c'axic ch'i̱l rijosk'il i Dios nariwih'ic chi quina̱ i tinamit, re' hin k'e̱' niquetelej quiwach take c'acharel eh til wo' chic k'e̱' niquetelej quiwach take yowa̱b ixok ch'i̱l take tutbe̱s cu wilic quicuc'ta̱k,

maj q'uihal queh take re' ma'xta ca'nam canar elic chipam i ti'c'axic, naquicansjic la' chi k'as laj mache̱t cu'um take sol on naquic'amaric je chi pixi̱x co̱k quik'ab pan tak toco̱m chic tinamit. Je' aj re' ru' nok pononak chic rik'ijil i sachbal wach i pa̱t wili, re' tinamit Jerusalen wili nariq'uic pan quik'ab take tinamit ma' nquilok'ej ta wach i Dios eh je' re' narojic tok wi̱' cu rehtal no̱j lok wach quik'ijil chi naquilom wach i wajawric.

«Chiri̱j chic re' nok q'uisi̱n chic ma' no̱j elok wach quik'ijil take ma' nquilok'ej ta wach i Dios, wilic take rehtalil naric'uhtunic pan taxa̱j ru̱c' i k'i̱j, ru̱c' i poh eh je' wo' re' cu̱c' take ch'imi̱l. Je' wo' ayu' wach ac'al re' take tinamit xa narisahchic chic quic'ux ru'um i ahnic naribanam i ribohl nim laj ha' eh ru'um re', naroquic cho rinimal yo'jic cu̱c'.
Je' aj re' ru' nok re' take sakombal pan taxa̱j naripa'lajic quisakomil, re' take tinamit naca'nam xa ic'lic chic quina̱ ru'um take ti'c'axic narichalic ayu' wach ac'al.
Chiri̱j re're' naquinc'olok lok nah jenaj rinimal su̱tz' i hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel, narilmijic wach rinimal risakomil nich'a̱b ch'i̱l wo' i wajawric wilic.

Nachawilow tak i p'utbal reh i naric'uluric cu̱c' take tinamit ma' nquilok'ej ta wach i Dios, re' hat-tak aj Jerusalen purunok awa̱mna tak ru'um sukquil ac'ux tak eh chajohsaj awilbal tak maj ma' naht ta chic wilic i k'i̱j chi re' atinami̱t tak nariye'eric wo' chic pan ak'ab tak, nqui queh.

Chiri̱j aj re', re' Jesus xik'or wo' queh jenaj k'ilo̱j ru̱c' jalwach k'oric wili: «Chacoj tak rehtal xnik'or aweh tak je' ricab cojo̱j rehtal na'n tak ru̱c' i che̱' I̱co ribihnal ch'i̱l take toco̱m chic che̱'.
Je' re' nik'or maj re' hat-tak nanawilow tak chi nquip'ut cho toxlonic take ac' xak che̱', naweht'alij tak chi re' sik'jil xiq'uic chic lok rik'ijil eh chi re' chic k'elej oquic cho reh.

Je' wo' re' cha'n tak chi nachawilow tak chi c'ahchi' chic ric'ulmujic take xnik'or lok aweh tak chi naric'ulmujic, charak tak chiri̱j chi xa loq'uil chic wilic i k'i̱j chi re' Dios narip'utum k'atoj k'oric chi quina̱ chi'nchel.
Til coric nik'or chi re' xnik'or aweh tak naric'uluric nok cu ja' ta ncux'ic rinimal ro̱k quic'acharic take c'acharel c'achalque̱b yu'na.
Je' re' nik'or aweh tak maj chi'nchel re' xnik'or lok i hin, til wo' naric'uluric ma'xta nchel risahchic wach je' ricab naric'ulum i taxa̱j rich'i̱l i ac'al.

«Ru'um aj chi naric'uluric je' ricab xnik'or aweh tak, ma' riban xa naho̱l chic wach acapew-bal tak chiri̱j take xa chaj bih jaric nye'bic sukquil c'uxlis on chiri̱j banoj tak nink'i̱j ch'i̱l banoj tak xohc'ric maj ma' nc'ulic nchel lok chana̱ tak i k'i̱j re're' chi ma' aweht'alim ta tak

je' ricab nanc'ulic lok i ti' china̱ jeno' chicop ncojoric jeno' xirab pa ribe̱h. Je' re' ajic chacoj rehtal i nik'or wili ru'um nok re' k'i̱j re're', wilic take c'axic naric'amam cho eh re're' narichalic chi quina̱ tinamit chi junsut wach ac'al wili chi ma'xta bih so' c'ahchi' quicapam.

Ru'um aj re', re' hat-tak xa ic'lic ok wo' ana̱ tak chi'nchel k'i̱j eh xa c'ahchi' ok wo' ca̱t tak chi ti̱j chi je' wili: ‹K-Aja̱w Dios, chayew keh chi re' Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic rajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel ma' ta rich'uk k'oric chi kana̱ nakoj-ojok pah'ok chiwach. Je' wo', chayew keh chi wilic ta nak kansil chi rico'ljic ki̱b chiwach i ti'c'axic naric'ulic lok, tiquirok tak pan ati̱j, nqui Jesus queh take raj tahkanel.

Je' aj re' niq'uic wi̱' k'i̱j i Jesus chi c'uhtunic cu̱c' take tinamit ar chi chi̱' i pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios xa re' cok ru' nanoquic i k'i̱j, ricana̱' cahnok i ye'a̱b re're' eh ar chic no̱j chipam i ye'a̱b re' ribihnej “Ye'a̱b queh take tic Oli̱wo ribihnal” chi ric'sjic i ak'ab.
Chi je' aj re' ru', pan k'i̱j quic'ulic lok take tinamit ru̱c' i Jesus chi ribirmijic i c'uhtunic riban chi chi̱' i pa̱t re're'.
Nok xa ma' naht ta chic wilic rik'ijil i nink'i̱j Pa̱scuwa ribihnal re' ribihnej wo' chi nink'i̱j reh Caxlan Wi'c ma' cojo̱j ta rik'omal chi sipsbal wach,

re' take nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, riman chic xquitik ju' risiq'uiric ri̱j ricansjic i Jesus xa pan c'olic ru'um chi quiyo'jic chiwach i tinamit quibirinic reh.

Nok je' re' c'ahchi' ca'nam, re' cajawil ma' tob laj uxlabal xoquic pa ra̱mna i Ju̱ras re' wilic wo' chi ricab bihnal aj Caryot eh chi je' re', re' Ju̱ras wili to̱b ta re' wo' nak jenaj chi quixilac take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus,

xo̱j cu̱c' take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios nok quimolom qui̱b ch'i̱l take quinahsil aj cha'janel reh Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios eh xik'or queh nic' wach nak nachik'ahsaj i Jesus pan quik'ab.
Naxquibiraj chi je' re' take quimolom qui̱b ar, k'e̱' naxsukbic quic'ux ru̱c' i Ju̱ras. Je' re' nok xquitik'a̱' wach chi quiwach chi naquiyeb ritz'a̱k chi tojbal reh.

Ru̱c' re're', re' Ju̱ras xiyew rik'orbal chi narik'ahsam i Jesus pan quik'ab eh chi je' re' p'uht risiq'uim ri̱j i junc'am haj suk rik'ahsjic i Jesus eriban pan quik'ab take c'amol be̱h re're' rij quina̱ take tinamit quibirinic reh Jesus.

Chi je' aj re', xponic rik'ijil i nink'i̱j nc'uxuric wi̱' caxlan wi'c ma' cojo̱j ta rik'omal chi sipsbal wach. Ru'um nok chipam i k'i̱j re're' curman chi quicansjic take q'uijol me̱' quic'uxuric chipam i nink'i̱j re're',
re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh ma' Luch ch'i̱l i Wa̱n: «Hiy tak cok pan tinamit Jerusalen eh chatik'a̱' tak cho kanink'i̱j re' nakac'uxum wi̱' i q'uijol me̱', nqui queh.
—Ha̱w, haj wilic i ye'a̱b nawa̱j chi nakatik'a̱b wi̱' i wi'c xik'ekbal re' nakac'uxum wi̱' i q'uijol me̱'? nqui take reh.

—Chabiraj tak chi coric i wili: Natocok tak cok pa̱m tinamit, enawilow tak i jenaj winak ritehlam jenaj tz'ak ac'al icom nujunak chi ha', chatahkej tak je cu rehtal narak tak i pa̱t naroquic cok wi̱'.

Natiponok tak chipam i pa̱t xoquic cok wi̱', toque̱n tak cok ar eh chak'or tak reh ajabe̱s aj ehcham pa̱t chi je' wili: ‹Re' Jesus re' aj tijinel keh je' wili xik'or cho: ‹Haj wilic i ye'a̱b re' nanibanam wi̱' niwa' niha̱' wich'i̱l take waj tahkanel chipam i nink'i̱j Pa̱scuwa wili re' nc'uxuric wi̱' i q'uijol me̱', nqui cho, tiquirok tak reh.
«Ar aj ru' haj pa' wilic i wa'bal naric'uhtam aweh tak re' ritik'a̱b chic ar johtok nah ca'tik pa̱t, ar chatik'a̱' tak chi'nchel kawa' kaha̱' reh ni̱m, nqui Jesus queh.

Je' aj re' ru', re' take quib chi raj tahkanel re're' xi'o̱j wo' eh nic' pa' wach xik'or i Jesus queh, je' wo' re' xquik'or reh ajabe̱s re're' naxquirak. Chi je' aj re' xi'oquic wo' chi ritik'injic i ni̱m.
Chiri̱j i wili naxponic ri'orahil chi naquic'uxum i rac'u̱n me̱', re' Jesus xoquic nah me̱xa chi naribanam riwa' riha̱' quich'i̱l take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel
eh je' wili xik'or queh: «Til wo' xa ji̱k' chic pa nic'ux chi nanic'uxum wi̱n i ritibquilal i rac'u̱n me̱' wili chi hat-tak wich'i̱l nok chi cu ja' nic'ul ta pe i ti'c'axic nanic'ulum.

Je' re' nik'or maj til coric nik'or aweh tak chi cu rehtal narojic elok wach i jalwachamaj ru̱c' nink'i̱j wili, re' ritibquilal i rac'u̱n me̱' cu ja'xta pe chic nic'ux wi̱n. Cu rehtal chi re' k'atoj k'oric riban i Dios xo̱j chic lok wach, cu re' chic nanic'uxum wi̱n, nqui queh.

Chiri̱j aj re', re' Jesus xichop johtok jenaj culc re' yitz'o̱j wi̱' ri̱s u̱wa, xitioxej johtok reh i Dios eh je' wili xik'or queh: «Chawic'saj je chawach tak i culc wili eh chawuq'uej aweh tak i wilic chipam

maj til coric nik'or aweh tak chi ayu' johtok chi kawach, re' ha' tik'imaj ru̱c' ri̱s u̱wa wili ma' ja'xta pe chic wuq'uem cu rehtal chic chipam i k'i̱j nok re' wAja̱w Dios ribanam chic chi wilqui̱n chi k'atal k'oric, nqui queh.

Chiri̱j chic ru', re' chic i caxlan wi'c xichop xitioxej johtok i Dios eh xich'ak yejal. Cu re' aj chic ru' je' wili xik'or naxipuhcaj je queh: «Re' caxlan wi'c wili rijalwachej niti'jolal nibakil re' naniyeb pan quimic chawi̱j hat-tak c'acharel. Re' ric'uxuric i caxlan wi'c je' ricab i wili, xa eli̱c cha'n tak ribanaric reh chi naric'ulic cho pan ac'ux tak re' nanibanam chawi̱j tak, nqui queh.

Chiri̱j wili nok ricohlam chic riwa' riha̱', re' chic i jenaj ch'ihch' culc wilic i ri̱s i u̱wa chipam xichop wo' johtok eh je' wili xik'or queh naxiyew wo' chic queh chi nacuq'uem: «Re' ha' tik'imaj ru̱c' ri̱s u̱wa wilic pan ch'ihch' culc wili, rijalwachej i niquiq'ue̱l re' narichihquic naquincansjok eh re're' naricamanic chi tik'inbal wach i jenaj chic ac' tik'inic riban i Dios chi re' hat-tak c'acharel echic ncuyuric amahc tak, nqui queh.
Chiri̱j chic re' je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Re' winak narik'ahsanic wi̱n pan quik'ab take naquicansanic wi̱n chaweht'alij tak chi ayu' wilic ku̱c' nah me̱xa.

Re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel naniquimic je' ricab ritak'a̱b cho rik'ormojic i Dios, raj nchel i c'acharel re' naribanam i to'bonic chi naqui̱nquichopom, k'e̱' je quetal wach, nqui Jesus.
Chiri̱j aj re', re' take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel p'uht quichopom qui̱b chiri̱j hab wach queh narik'ahsanic reh.
Je' wo' p'uht quichopom qui̱b chiri̱j hab wach queh naricahnic chi pe̱t aj c'amol be̱h.

Naxilow nic' wach naxquichop qui̱b je' wili xik'or i Jesus queh: «Chi quixilac take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, re' take k'atal k'oric quibanic i tak'anic chi quina̱ tinamit eh ru'um i to'bonic nca'n, k'oro̱j quibiral chi k'e̱' ato̱b take.

Ra̱j nchel chaxilac hat-tak ma' je' ta re' i no'jbal naribanaric, je' la' wili ra̱j banaric: Xa hab wach ra̱j ribanam ri̱b chi nim wach chiban ri̱b chi t'uch ok ti wach. On hab wach ra̱j ribanam chi ajabe̱s, chiban chi je' ok ti ricab jeno' aj tz'e' wa̱ch reh jeno' ni̱m.

Je' ricab pan jeno' ni̱m, chak'or tak wi̱n, hab wo' wach i nim wach? Re' ntz'uhkic nah me̱xa chi wi'c on re' nc'ambic cho reh wi'c nah me̱xa? Ma' re' ta na ntz'uhkic nah me̱xa chi wi'c? Je' re' k'uru' ma̱nimsaj awi̱b tak, cha'n la' tak aweh je' ricab c'ahchi'qui̱n i hin yu'na maj to̱b ta nak hin Ajabe̱s nok wilqui̱n chaxilac tak, c'ahchi' nibanam wi̱b chi xa je' hin jeno' awaj to'o̱l tak, nqui queh.
Chiri̱j re're' je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Re' hat-tak ru'um nok xa quinawihch'ilej wo' tak chipam take nic'axquilal
c'ahchi' niyeb awajawric tak chi na̱tak'anic tak chi quina̱ awich tahkanel tak. Ru̱c' niban re're' c'ahchi' nibanam awu̱c' tak je' ricab naxiyew wajawric i Dios chi k'atal k'oric chana̱ tak.

Ru'um wajawric re're', re' hin niyew alok'il tak chi wih'ic nah nime̱xa chi ribanaric awa' aha̱' tak je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak ac'ulum tak alok'il chi tz'ukulca̱t tak pa ritz'uk'a̱b jeno' k'atal k'oric. Je' wo' niyew awajawric tak chi na̱k'atbic tak k'oric chi quina̱ take kich ca̱' qui'sil cho cablaj ch'uk chi tinamit tz'uhcrunak cho cu̱c' take rac'u̱n ma' Israhel, nqui Jesus queh.

Chiri̱j re', je' wo' wili xk'ormojic reh ma' Luch ru'um kAja̱w Jesus: «Simon, chabiraj chi coric i wili: Re' cajawil ma' tob laj uxlabal xa nch'uk chic ric'ux chi ripahkaljic reh Dios chi naca̱t tak ripajam chi cow je' ricab nchahchjic wach ixi̱m ru'um aj ixo̱l,

xa re' la' hin xinpahkanic wo' ru̱c' i Dios chawi̱j chi ma' chi junpech na̱poh'am acapew-bal chiwi̱j. Je' re' k'uru' natuhkok wo' chic acapew-bal chiwi̱j chayew ricowil quic'ux take awich'i̱l, nqui reh.
Re' ma' Luch je' wili xik'or reh: «K-Aja̱w Jesus, ma' re' ta pan che'jic ma' re' ta quimic enk'etbic pa nibe̱h chi atahkaljic wi la' je' re' enac'ul i hat, nqui reh.
Raj la' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Til coric nik'or aweh ma' Luch, chiwach ak'ab wili pa ro̱x pech rok'ic i las re' hat ak'orom chic oxpech chi ma' re' ta hat waj tahkanel, nqui reh.

Chiri̱j re', re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh chi cunchelal: «Naxatnitak'a̱' tak je junpech chi c'uhbalanic chi ma'xta nac'am tak je atumi̱n, achi̱m, ma' wo' junc'uhl chic axijab tak, chaj bih jeno' ti' xawilow tak cho wach? nqui queh. —Ma'xta bih Ha̱w, maj re' tinamit xojquito'bej cho, nqui take reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Yu'na johtok chi kawach ma' je' ta chic re' naca'nam aweh tak take tinamit. Yu'na, curman chic chi hab wach wilic ritz'a̱k chic'am chiri̱j pan jeno' chi̱m lok'bal jeno' rimache̱t co'lbal ri̱b. Hab wach ma'xta ritz'a̱k chi c'ayej i rijuc ro̱k tz'ih roxlo̱c' lok riso' eh chi lok' jeno' rimache̱t

maj til nik'or aweh tak chi re' tz'ihmbimaj cho chiwi̱j i hin narojic elok wach. Ru'um aj re', re' hin nawoquic jenaj pan quiman take johtonak wach quimahc maj til curman chi narojic elok wach wu̱c' i k'oro̱j cho pan Lok' laj Hu̱j re' rik'or wi̱' chi je' wili: “Re' xipahba̱' i Dios chi k'atal k'oric xcojoric pan quiman take johtonak wach quimahc, nqui rik'or, nqui queh.

Chiri̱j chic ru' re' take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel je' wili xquik'or reh: «Ha̱w, ayu' ku̱c' wilic quib mache̱t, nqui take reh. Ar ajic re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh naxicoj rehtal chi ma' xquirak ta chiri̱j re' xik'or queh: «Manlic chic xak'or tak, nqui queh.
Naxelic je Jesus chipam i pa̱t re're' chi tahkamaj je cu'um take nahsil raj tahkanel, xo̱j wo' chic chipam ye'a̱b re' ribihnej “Ye'a̱b queh take tic Oli̱wo ribihnal”, je' ricab riban chi'nchel ak'ab.
Naxiponic chipam ye'a̱b re're', je' wili xik'or queh raj tahkanel: «Cha'n ati̱j tak reh chi enacuy tak ransil i pajaric c'ulic lok reh chana̱ tak, nqui queh.
Chiri̱j re', re' Jesus xelic je chi quixilac eh chi je' na chic quib on xib c'aham wilic je cu̱c', xixuc'a̱' ri̱b ar.

Naxoquic chi ti̱j chi je' wili p'uht rik'orom: «W-Aja̱w Dios, re' hin k'e̱' nak nwa̱j chi enawic'saj chi nina̱ i ti'c'axic c'ahchi' nicora̱b je wi̱' wi ta la' nak je' re' enponic chawach, xa re' la' cha'n re' nawa̱j i hat, ma' ok re' nwa̱j i hin, nqui johtok pa riti̱j.
Chipam aj junc'am re're' jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xchalic pan taxa̱j chi riye'eric ricowil ric'ux

maj jenaj rinimal ti'quil c'uxlis xoquic cho pa ra̱mna i Jesus. Chi je' aj re', re' Jesus nok c'ahchi' ribanam riti̱j p'uht ritz'awubric cho cu rehtal re' ritz'awumal yejal wach xiban chi xa je' chic nt'uhrunic jok quic' wach ac'al.

Chiri̱j chic ru' nok ricohlam chic cho riti̱j, re' Jesus xsoljic wo' chic cu̱c' take raj tahkanel xa re' la' naxponic cu̱c', xirak take chi wiric nca'n ru'um xa k'uhtunak chic take ru'um tz'irquil pan quic'ux.
Je' re' nok je' wili xik'or queh: «Chaj wa'ric nok wiric na'n tak? Tucten la' tak eh cha'n ati̱j tak reh chi enacuy tak ransil i pajaric c'ulic lok reh chana̱ tak, nqui queh.

Xa cu c'uta̱j aj wo' riban i Jesus, xi'o̱j c'olok i juntuhm chi winak eh re' nc'ambic quibe̱h, re' i Ju̱ras re' jenaj queh cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel. Re' Ju̱ras wili xijil cok ri̱b ru̱c' Jesus eh xitz'ub pan wach.

Naxiban chi je' re' je' wili xk'ormojic reh ru'um Jesus: «Ju̱ras, nic' wach nok chi ru̱c' nitz'uburic xa'n chi nic'alenjic c'ahchi'qui̱n ak'ahsam pan quik'ab i tinamit wili i hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel? nqui reh.
Ar ajic re' take junlaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus, naxquilow chi naquichopom nak chic je, je' wili xquik'or reh: «Ha̱w, re' hoj nakac'u'lunic ru̱c' kamache̱t, nqui take reh.

Chi je' aj re' jenaj queh nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus xicoj ti je chi ti' i jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios, naxiniq'uej nak ricansjic xa re' la', xa re' wo' ti i jenaj chi xiquin xirak je riyoc'oric.

Re' Jesus naxilow chi je' re', je' wili xik'or reh nahsil raj tahkanel re're': «Ma' tic'u'lunic chic, nqui reh. Chiri̱j re' naxtz'a'jic cok rixiquin i aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' ru'um i Jesus, xik'olej wo' chic ri̱b i xiquin.

Chiri̱j aj chic ru' re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios ch'i̱l take quinahsil aj cha'jem reh Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, ch'i̱l wo' take nahsil chipam tinamit naxi'o̱j c'olok chi richoporic: «Chaj wa'ric yu'na chi xa awich'i̱l chic ak'as laj ch'ihch', xa awich'i̱l chic ache̱' tak xatc'ulic tak lok chi nichoporic je' ricab nanchoporic jeno' aj lek'?

Re' hin ma' re' ta hin aj lek'. Ru'um aj re' ma' xinachop ta tak nok kalakal xinwih'ic awu̱c' tak chi c'uhtunic chi chi̱' i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, maje'? Cu re' la' chic yu'na nok xponic ri'orahil chawach tak, xatc'ulic tak lok chi nichoporic nok re' cajawil ma' tob laj uxlabal richopom na̱ k'ekom ak'ab wili, nqui queh.
Chiri̱j chic ru' nok quichopom i Jesus, re' ma' Luch xa chi naht xam je chiqui̱j take xic'ambic je reh Jesus pa ripa̱t i nahsil c'amol quibe̱h aj take k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios.

Naxponic chi chi̱' i pa̱t re're', re' ma' Luch xo̱j ritz'uka̱' ri̱b chi quixilac take aj cha'jem Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, re' tz'ukulque̱b cok chiri̱j quik'a̱k' xquikop lok chi chi̱' i pa̱t re're' nok quik'ahsam chic i Jesus pan quik'ab toco̱m chic sol.

Ar ajic jenaj aj chipoh c'ahchi' rilom cho ma' Luch naxtz'uhkic cok chiri̱j k'a̱k' xitz'ehtaj chi cow eh je' wili xik'or: «Re' winak re're', re' wo' jenaj chi quixilac take raj tahkanel i Jesus re' wilic cok chipam i pa̱t re're'! nqui xik'or.
Chalic ma' Luch je' wili xik'or: «Tu̱t, hab pa' wach nak'or ma' weht'alim ta wach, nqui.

Xa cu re' wo' junc'am ru', jenaj wo' chic xilbic cho reh ma' Luch eh je' wili xik'or reh: «Re' hat, hat wo' jenaj chi quixilac take raj tahkanel i Jesus, nqui reh. Re' ma' Luch je' wo' chic wili xik'or: «Ha̱w, ma' re' ta hin raj tahkanel i Jesus, nqui reh.

Junc'am aj wo' chic chiri̱j ru', jenaj chic winak je' wo' chic wili xik'or: «Til coric, re' hat, hat wo' jenaj chi quixilac take raj tahkanel i Jesus. Je' re' nik'or maj re' ak'orbal nkarak wi̱' chiri̱j chi hat aj pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya, nqui xik'or.
Re' ma' Luch je' wo' chic wili xik'or: «Ha̱w, til ma' weht'alim ta chaj bih nak'or, nqui reh. Xa cu re' wo' ti xicohlaj k'oric i ma' Luch, xok'ic cho i jenaj las wilic ar.

Chiwach aj wo' junc'am re're', re' Jesus xisolq'uij je rilbal chi rilmijic i ma' Luch eh chi je' re', re' ma' Luch xc'ulic cho pa ric'ux i k'oric xk'ormojic reh ru'um i Jesus chi je' wili: «Til coric nik'or, na'ok'ok wo' chic cho i las, re' hat ma' Luch oxpech chic ak'orom chi ma' re' ta hat waj tahkanel, nqui k'oro̱j cho reh.
Chi je' aj re', re' Luch xelic lok chi chi̱' i pa̱t re're' eh til wo' xo̱j riyot' ha' chi ok'ic.
Chipam aj ripa̱t c'amol quibe̱h aj k'ahsem si̱, re' take sol c'ahchi' quicha'janic reh Jesus xquich'eylom eh xquise'laj wo' pan nak' wach.
Je' wo', nok re' take re' xquiyut chi tz'ih pan nak' wach, nquitz'ar cok pan wach eh je' wili nquik'or cok reh: «Raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios, chak'ijej hab wach c'ahchi' risec'bic aweh, nqui take reh.
Je' aj re' ru' k'e̱' xquitz'ujlom i Jesus eh yohbal wo' wach k'oric xquik'or cok reh.

Chiri̱j wili nok pan k'i̱j chic, xquimol quib take nahsil chipam tinamit ch'i̱l take nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ ch'i̱l wo' take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eh nok c'amoj chic cho i Jesus chiwach quicomonil take nahsil aj no'jbal re're', je' wili xquik'or reh:
«Chak'or keh yu'na, til na re' hat i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric? nqui take reh. Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Wi eta nak nik'or aweh tak chi hin, ma' eta wo' nak nacoj tak wach.

On wi eta nak nibiraj aweh tak hab wach aj chiri̱j nk'oric riC'uhbal i Dios, ma' eta wo' nak quinac'u'lej tak cho. Je' aj re' to̱b ta wo' nak enabiraj tak ricorquil, re' hat-tak ma' eta wo' nak quinawok'taj tak je ru'um chi cu nach'ukum tak k'oric chi nina̱.

Xa re' cok ru' chaweht'alij tak i wili: Ayu' johtok chi kawach, re' chic i hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel nanich'ukbic k'oric chana̱ tak, nachawilow tak chi ar ru̱c' i wAja̱w Dios re' k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal wach rajawric, xnic'ul chic rinimal wach nilok'il je' ricab nok jeno' c'acharel ric'ul rinimal wach rilok'il nanye'eric k'ab reh chi ntz'uhkic cok chi riche̱l jeno' k'atal k'oric, nqui queh.

Chi'nchel take wilque̱b ar je' wili xquik'or: «Ru̱c' k'oric xak'or raj rik'orom k'uru' chi hat rAc'u̱n i Dios, nqui take. Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Je' ricab xak'or tak chi hin, til hin wo', nqui queh.
Re' take re' je' wili xquik'or: «Ma' curman ta chic chi hab wach enc'ulic k'orok keh jeno' rimahc i winak wili maj ru̱c' chi̱' xkabiraj chic chi xik'or chi re're' i rAc'u̱n i Dios, nqui take.

Chiri̱j chic ru' nok quicohlam chic i moloj i̱b chi quich'i̱l i Jesus, re' take juntuhm chi nahsil re're' xipah'ic johtok eh xquic'am je i Jesus chiwach i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to re' raj to'o̱l i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma ar pa riyuk'ul i Jure̱ya.

Re' aj wili rimahc p'uht quitz'akam chiri̱j Jesus naxi'o̱j c'olok chiwach Po̱nsyo Pila̱to: «Ha̱w, re' winak wili xca'n chiri̱j chi c'ahchi' rijot'om quicapew-bal take katinami̱t maj c'ahchi' rik'orom queh chi je' wili: ‹Til re' hin i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chana̱ tak. Ma̱yew tak chic i to̱j reh k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma, nqui c'ahchi' rik'orom, nqui take reh.

Chalic Po̱nsyo Pila̱to xibiraj reh Jesus chi je' wili: «Re' ok ti hat quik'atal k'oric i tinamit re're', nqui reh. Chalic Jesus je' wili ric'u'ljic xiban: «Ho̱', coric. Re' wo' hat c'ahchi' ak'oric chi je' re', nqui Jesus.

Chiri̱j wili re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to je' wili xik'or queh take nahsil c'amol be̱h je' ru̱c' aj c'atol take si̱ ch'i̱l take tinamit wilque̱b ar: «Re' hin ma' nirak ta jeno' mahc chiri̱j i winak wili, nqui queh.

Ra̱j take nahsil re're' xquica'pechej wo' chic cok ritz'akaric wach rimahc chi je' wili: «Re' ritijbal i winak wili rip'utum cho pa ric'ula't i Calile̱ya cu xc'ulic lok ayu'. Je' re' nok chi junsut tinamit pan kayuk'ul Jure̱ya hunuric quipa̱m ru'um i winak wili, nqui take reh.
Re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to naxibiraj chi xquik'or bihnal i Calile̱ya je' wili xik'or queh: «Aj Calile̱ya on i winak wili k'uru'? nqui xik'or queh.

Chi je' re' ajic nok ribiram chic chi re' Jesus ar nchalic chipam i yuk'ul re' nk'atbic wi̱' k'oric i Hero̱res, re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to xitak'a̱' je i Jesus ru̱c' ar Jerusalen ru'um chi re're' ar wilic wo' ponok chipam take k'i̱j re're'.

Naxc'amaric je Jesus chiwach i Hero̱res, k'e̱' xsukbic ric'ux naxilow wach maj ru'um chi'nchel ribiral ribiram chiri̱j, wilic cho k'i̱j xa ra̱j nak chic rilow wach. Ru'um chi xa c'ahchi' chic ruy'em chi narilom jeno' lok' laj nawa̱l ru̱c' Jesus,
yohbal wach take birinic xiban reh chiri̱j take lok' laj nawa̱l riban, xa re' la' i Jesus xa ta nak jenaj queh take birinic re're' xic'u'lej.

Ru̱c' re're', re' take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios ch'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xa riman chic p'uht quiq'uerem cok quichi̱' chi ritz'akaric wach riman rimahc i Jesus.

Ar ajic re' Hero̱res ch'i̱l take riso̱l xa c'ahbil chic rilmijic Jesus nca'n eh chi je' re' chi xa se'lbal reh, xquicoj jenaj chak'wach laj tz'ih chiri̱j je' ricab i tz'ih ricoj jeno' k'atal k'oric. Chiri̱j re're', re' Hero̱res c'uhtbal reh Po̱nsyo Pila̱to chi riyohlej wach ricamaj chi raj to'o̱l i k'atal k'oric ar Jerusalen, xitak'a̱' wo' chic je Jesus ru̱c'.

Ru'um aj re' xa chiwach wo' cho k'i̱j re're', re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to ch'i̱l Hero̱res xquic'am wo' chic qui̱b pan sukquil c'uxlis maj nok cu ja' nchoporic ta i Jesus re' take re' quixowem nak cho quiwach.
Naxc'amaric wo' chic je Jesus chiwach i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to, re're' xiyuk'ej take nahsil c'amol quibe̱h aj c'atol si̱ chiwach i Dios ch'i̱l take nimak quiwach chi quina̱ tinamit ch'i̱l wo' take tinamit

eh je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' winak wili c'ahchi' rijot'om quicapew-bal katinami̱t, tiqui tak wi̱n naxac'am tak cho chi niwach. Ra̱j la' naxnipech' chawach tak xa ta jeno' rimahc je' ricab natz'ak tak wach, xnirak chiri̱j.
Je' aj re' ru' ru'um nok ma' nirak ta jeno' rimahc chi ric'ul ta nak chi nariquimic eh ru'um chi xa ta wo' re' Hero̱res xirak cho jeno' rimahc naxatnitak'a̱' tak je ru̱c',
re' hin nanitak'a̱b ritz'uhumjic eh chiri̱j re' nawok'tam je, nqui Po̱nsyo Pila̱to. Re' Pila̱to je' re' xik'or chi rinimjic i tanlic china̱ chi quiwach i tinamit,
ru'um nok chiwach i nink'i̱j re're' tanlic chiri̱j chi narok'tam je jeno' tz'ahpel pan che̱'.
Raj la' chi'nchel take wilque̱b ar chi xa jenaj chic wach quicapew-bal je' wili xquik'or: «Chuhpok wach i winak re're'. Re' Warawas nka̱j chi narelic je, nqui take.
Je' re' nquik'or chiri̱j i winak xcojoric pan che̱' ru'um cansanic xiban, je' wo' ru'um chi xik'or queh tinamit chi ma'xta quibiram k'oric chiwach k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma.
Je' aj re', re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to ru'um ra̱j nak rok'tam je i Jesus xik'or wo' chic queh tinamit chi narok'tam je,
xa re' la' take re' quiq'uer wo' chic quichi̱' chi rik'ormojic chi je' wili: «Re' winak re're' cansjok wach curu̱s, til cansjok wach curu̱s, nqui take.

—Chaj bih rimahc i winak wili xarak tak chi niban i xak'or tak? Re' hin ma' nirak ta jeno' rimahc chi ric'ul ta nak chi reh chi nariquimic. Je' aj re' nanitak'a̱b ritz'uhumjic eh chiri̱j re' narok'tjic je, nqui wo' chic Po̱nsyo Pila̱to queh pa ro̱x pech.

Ra̱j take tinamit re're' ch'i̱l take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios, chi xa cow chic nquipahkaj cok, xquica'pechej wo' chic rik'ormojic chi naricansjic wach curu̱s i Jesus. Chi je' aj re' naxpa'lajic quik'orbal take tinamit,
re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to je' wili xik'or queh: «Nanibanam je' ricab napahkaj tak wi̱n, nqui queh.

Chiri̱j aj re' xok'taj je i Warawas je' ricab xquipahkaj i tinamit. Re' winak wili wilic nak pan che̱' ru'um i cansanic xiban je' wo' ru'um rik'ormojic queh tinamit chi ma'xta quibiram k'oric chiwach i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma. Re' chic i Jesus xik'ahsaj pan quimic je' ricab nca̱j take tinamit re're'.

Chi je' re' nok c'ahchi' chic ric'amaric je Jesus cu'um take sol chi c'ahchi' ritehlam je riche'lal ro̱k ricuru̱s, re' take sol xquichop jenaj winak aj Sire̱ne Simon ribihnal re' xponic cho chiri̱j lok i tinamit Jerusalen eh xquitolej chi ritobjic i Jesus chi ritehljic je riche'lal ro̱k i curu̱s.
Chiri̱j i wili nok tahkamaj je Jesus cu'um riq'uihal tinamit, je' wo' cu'um take juntuhm chi ixok re' xa suk chic qui'ok'ic chiri̱j,

re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh naxilow chi ok'ic nca'n: «Hat-tak ixok aj Jerusalen ma' ok nchel xa chiwi̱j hin ok'ic na'n tak. Tok'ok la' wo' tak chiri̱j awac'u̱n awixk'u̱n tak je' wo' chiri̱j ac'acharic tak

maj re' hin weht'alim chi naric'ulic lok i k'i̱j chi ru'um i yo'jic naroquic cho cu̱c' awac'u̱n awixk'u̱n tak ru'um i c'axquilal narichalic chi quina̱, je' wili narik'ormojic: ‹Re' take ixok ma' ac'unom ta take ch'i̱l take ma' xch'ihquic ta cho quiha'lac'u̱n pan quic'acharic ch'i̱l wo' take ma' xca'n ta queh i q'uihs, k'e̱' je ato̱b queh, nqui narik'ormojic.

Je' re' narik'ormojic ru'um nok nac'olok lok i k'i̱j re're', re' take awac'u̱n awixk'u̱n tak chi xa nca̱j nak chic quic'olom qui̱b chiwach i ti'c'axic re're' naquip'utum rik'ormojic chi je' wili: ‹Sak bih nak chi keh chi quik'ehbok ta nak take cho yu̱k' chi kana̱, quik'ehbok ta wo' nak chi kana̱ take sakrehp eh chipoy ta nak kana̱ chi junpech, nqui naquik'orom.

«Je' aj re' ru' wi re' hin nanic'ulum i ti'c'axic, re' ta na chic hat-tak ch'i̱l take awac'u̱n awixk'u̱n tak ma' enac'ul tak ti'c'axic? Je' re' na̱c'ulum tak je' ricab i k'oric rik'or chi je' wili: “Wi re' rex laj che̱' nc'ataric cok chi si̱', re' ta wo' na chic i chik che̱' ma' enc'ataric cok ru'? nqui rik'or, nqui Jesus queh.
Nok c'ahchi' ric'amaric je Jesus ch'i̱l wo' take quib chi aj lek' chi naquicansjic,

xiponic china̱ jenaj yu̱k' “Ribakil Na̱ Camnak” ribihnal. Ar ajic p'uht quijap'am i Jesus wach ricurusil. Je' wo' take quib chi aj lek' xicojoric wo' wach quicuru̱s, jenaj pa risec'a̱j eh jenaj pa ritz'e̱t.

Chiri̱j chic ru' re' Jesus je' wili xik'or johtok: «W-Aja̱w Dios, chacuy quimahc i tinamit wili maj ma' nquirak ta chiri̱j chaj bih c'ahchi' ca'nam wili, nqui xik'or johtok. Re' k'oric xik'or re're' i Jesus xa re' nok re' take sol c'ahchi' quik'ijem ri̱j riso' reh chi naquipuhcam chi quiwach

nok c'ahchi' qui'ilmijic cu'um take tinamit re' xa nelic chic lok nak' quiwach chi riliric chaj bih c'ahchi' ric'ulmujic ar. Nok quesam chic riq'uixbilal i Jesus chi je' re', re' chic take quinahsil i tinamit je' wili xquik'or chi xa se'lbal pan nak' wach i Jesus: «Re' winak re're' xa ripahba̱' chic ri̱b chi re're' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Re' take toco̱m xico'lej take cho chipam quic'axquilal eh tz'a̱b ru' chi ribil ri̱b, ma' c'ahchi' ta rico'lem ri̱b chipam i ti'c'axic wilic wi̱'. Wi til aj wo' coric chi re' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, chico'lej ri̱b chipam i ti'c'axic re're', nqui take.
Je' wo' re' take sol xa nquibik chic cok qui̱b ru̱c' ricurusil i Jesus chi riye'eric johtok pan chi̱' i mi̱x muhu̱j pan ch'amsamaj laj ri̱s u̱wa eh chase'lom wo' johtok pan nak' wach nca'n
nok je' wili nquik'or johtok reh: «Wi til re' aj i hat quik'atal k'oric take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, chaco'lej awi̱b chipam i ti'c'axic wilca̱t wi̱', nqui take johtok reh.

Je' wo' chic, chi xa jot'bal reh Jesus xquitz'ihmbaj jenaj rehtalil eh xquijap' johtok wach curu̱s ma' naht ta johtok wach na̱ i Jesus. Je' wili rik'or i ehtalil re're': “Re' winak wili quik'atal k'oric take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, nqui rik'or chiwach i rehtalil tz'ihmbimaj pan criye̱co, pan latin je' wo' pan hewre̱yo.

Nok ca'nam ok chic reh Jesus chi je' re', jenaj queh aj lek' wilque̱b pa riche̱l p'uht wo' ritz'ujum chi je' wili: «Wi til coric chi re' hat i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi kana̱, chaco'lej awi̱b chiwach i ti'c'axic wili eh koj-aco'lej wo' hoj, nqui reh Jesus.

Ra̱j i jenaj chic aj lek' xinak je rich'i̱l chi je' wili: «Ma' riban ta chi je' re' nak'or i hat ru'um xa jenaj wach ti'c'axic c'ahchi' kac'ulum ch'i̱l i winak wili. Chayohbalej so' wach i Dios k'uru' ru̱c' k'oric i na'n

ru'um nok re' ti'c'axic wilco̱j wi̱' i hoj til ric'ul chi keh chi c'ahchi' kac'ulum ru'um take kabano̱j, ra̱j la' ti'c'axic wilic wi̱' i winak wili ma' ric'ul ta so' chi reh maj ma'xta bih nech' ok mahc ribanam cho, nqui rich'i̱l reh.
Chiri̱j re', je' wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Ha̱w, c'olok wo' ti pan ac'ux nibihnal natocok chi K'atal K'oric reh chi equinwih'ic awu̱c', nqui reh.
Chalic Jesus je' wili xik'or reh: «Til coric nik'or aweh chi xa chiwach wo' ti k'i̱j yu'na eto̱j wih'ok wu̱c' chipam i ye'a̱b Parayi̱so ribihnal, nqui reh.
Chiri̱j aj wili nok q'uisi̱n chic ma' cablaj o̱ra reh k'i̱j re're', xoquic cho k'ekom wach ac'al cu rehtal xponic je' na q'uisi̱n ma' xib o̱ra risoljic i k'i̱j.
Chi je' aj re' naxponic je' na xib o̱ra reh risoljic i k'i̱j, xk'ekomric wach i k'i̱j eh xwek yejal i tz'ih npoybic reh lok' laj ye'a̱b chipam i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios.
Naxc'uluric re're', re' Jesus xiq'uer johtok chi̱' chi cow chi je' wili: «W-Aja̱w, pan awo̱k ak'ab nwokxo'nej johtok i wuxlabal, nqui xik'or. Xa re' wo' xik'or re're', xelic ti ruxla̱b i Jesus.

Ar ajic nok ilo̱j chic nic' wach xc'ulmujic ru̱c' riquimic i Jesus, re' c'amol quibe̱h take sol xiyew johtok rilok'il i Dios ru̱c' i k'oric xik'or chi je' wili: «Ajabe̱s Dios, til po' wo' nchel coric chi re' winak wili ma'xta nech' ok rimahc, nqui xik'or.

Chiri̱j i wili re' riq'uihal tinamit wilque̱b ponok chi rilmijic nic' wach rijap'aric i Jesus xca'n wach curu̱s, xa nquituytuj chic chi' quic'ux naxisoljic je pan quipa̱t ru'um xquirak chiri̱j chi quimahc naxquimic i Jesus.
Re' chic take tinamit qui'eht'alanic wach i Jesus ch'i̱l take ixok re' xitahkanic cho reh cu ar Calile̱ya, cu xicahnic cahnok ar chi rilmijic je chi naht nic' wach nakahsjok cho i Jesus wach curu̱s.

Ar aj wo' Jerusalen wilic jenaj winak aj pan tinamit Arimate̱ya Chep ribihnal, xa coric ti wach ric'ux eh holohic rino'jbal. Re' winak re're' to̱b ta wo' re' nak ru̱c' quicomonil take nimak quiwach re' xquimol qui̱b chi risiq'uiric rimahc i Jesus,

ma' xiban ta jenaj wach ricapew-bal ru̱c' take rich'i̱l xa ta wo' nak xoquic jenaj ru̱c' quibano̱j. Nok camnak aj chic i Jesus wach ricuru̱s, re' winak re're', re' c'ahchi' ruy'em i k'i̱j chi re' Dios narik'atbic k'oric chi quina̱ ritinami̱t,
xo̱j ru̱c' i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to eh xipahkaj chi nariyeb k'ab reh chi narimuk'a̱b riti'jolal i Jesus.

Nok ye'o̱j chic cho k'ab reh chi ribanaric i pahkanic xiban, re' ma' Chep xo̱j rikahsaj riti'jolal i Jesus wach curu̱s, xibotej cho pan jenaj tz'ih eh xo̱j ricoj pan jenaj muk'unbal ma' ja' cojo̱j ta, re' tik'imaj ru'um pan jenaj ma' laj abaj.
Je' re' ajic re' ma' Chep ximuk'a̱' i Jesus chipam i roquic k'i̱j re' nquitik'a̱' wi̱' qui̱b take tinamit chi naquihi'lic reh hi'lbal k'i̱j je' ikal.
Re' take ixok xichalic ar Calile̱ya xquitahkej wo' je ma' Chep naxponic rimuk'a̱' cho Jesus. Je' aj re' nok quilom chic cho haj wilic i muk'unbal xmuhkic wi̱' i Jesus eh nic' wach muhkic xiban,

re' take ixok re're' xisoljic wo' chic je pan tinamit. Nok wilque̱b chic pan quipa̱t, xquitik'a̱' je' ru̱c' nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m ch'i̱l wo' buch'bal reh riti'jolal i Jesus eh chiri̱j chic ru' xihi'lic wo' naxponic i hi'lbal k'i̱j je' ricab k'oro̱j pa riC'uhbal i Dios chi naca'nam.

Naxsak'ic lok reh tomincu' k'i̱j re' pe̱t k'i̱j reh xama̱na xa cu rumrum wo' ti risak'ic, re' take ixok xicojbic cho rehtal haj xmuhkic i Jesus xi'o̱j wo' chic ar quich'i̱l quib xib chic take ixok eh xquic'am je nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m ch'i̱l wo' i buch'bal xquitik'a̱'.
Naxi'o̱j c'olok ru̱c' muk'unbal xquilow chi re' abaj ntz'apbic chi̱' i muk'unbal re're' c'uyu'sumaj chic.
Chi je' re' ajic re' take ixok re're' xi'oquic cok chipam muk'unbal xa re' la' ma' xquirak ta chic ar riti'jolal i kAja̱w Jesus.
Nok wilque̱b chic cok chipam muk'unbal take ixok re're' chi xa tz'e-tz'e chic quiwach, cu re' chic queh ruhmumaj chic take cok chi quiwach quib chi winak xa nrepretic chic quiso'.

Chi je' re' riman chic quiyo'jic xoquic cho eh ru'um re' xquimuc'a̱' jok quilbal wach ac'al. Nok je' re' nca'n je' wili xk'ormojic queh cu'um take qui̱b winak re're': «Re' Jesus c'achlic wo' chic. Chaj wa'ric chi c'ahchi' asiq'uim tak chi quixilac take camnak?
Re' Jesus xuctic wo' chic rica'pech, ma' xcahnic ta ayu' chi camnak. Xa re' c'olok pan ac'ux tak nic' wach xik'or cho aweh tak nok cu wilic cho chaxilac tak ar Calile̱ya,

naxik'or aweh tak chi re' Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic rajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel curman chi narik'ahsjic pan quik'ab take winak ma' nquiyohlej ta wach i Dios je' wo' chi naricansjic wach curu̱s, xa re' la' pa ro̱x k'i̱j riquimic naructic wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak, nqui take winak re're'.
Nok quibiram chic chaj bih xquik'or take quib chi winak re're', re' take ixok re're' xc'ulic cho pan quic'ux nic' wach k'oro̱j cho queh ru'um i Jesus.

Chi je' aj re' xisoljic wo' chic je cu̱c' take junlaj chi raj tahkanel i Jesus ch'i̱l wo' take toco̱m chic quich aj tahkanel eh xponic quik'or chaj bih xquilow je eh chaj bih xquibiraj je pa rimuk'unbal i Jesus.

Re' aj take ixok re're' je' wili quibihnal: Re' Mari̱ya aj Majta̱la, re' Juwa̱na, re' Mari̱ya re' ritu̱t i Jaco̱wo eh ch'i̱l wo' take ixok xichalic cu ar Calile̱ya chi ritahkaljic i Jesus nok cu c'achlic cho. Re' take re' xik'oric queh nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus chaj bih xquibiraj cho pan muk'unbal,
xa re' la' take nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus ma' xquicoj ta wach chaj bih xk'ormojic queh maj chi queh ru' xa sabanil la' nbanic queh ixok re're'.

Xa re' ti wach i ma' Luch naxibiraj chi je' re' xuctic je eh xo̱j rajim pa rimuk'unbal i Jesus. Ar ajic naxtz'ehtenic cok pan muk'unbal, xilow chi xa chic re' tz'ih botomaj nak wi̱' riti'jolal i Jesus tzuclic ar. Chi je' aj re', re' ma' Luch xsoljic wo' chic je pan pa̱t re' wilque̱b cho wi̱' rich'i̱l eh xoquic chi capewenic chiri̱j chaj bih xc'ulmujic lok.
Xa chipam wo' k'i̱j re're' qui̱b take raj tahkanel i Jesus ojic nca'n pan t'uch tinamit Emahus ribihnal re' je' na xib le̱wa wilic je ru̱c' tinamit Jerusalen.
Re' take quib re're' c'ahchi' nak quic'u'tjam chi quiwach chaj bih xic'ul i Jesus je' wo' chaj bih xquik'or take ixok re' xiponic cho pa rimuk'unbal ru'.
Nok je' aj re' c'ahchi' quic'u'tjam, re' pe' wo' chic i Jesus xijil cok ri̱b cu̱c' eh p'uht rihch'ilem je take chi behic,
xa re' la' ru' wilic xbanic queh chi ma' xquina'bej ta wach.
—Chaj la' bih nac'u'tjaj tak chawach nah be̱h eh chaj wa'ric ntz'iric awach tak? nqui Jesus naxik'o'rej take cok.

Re' jenaj queh quib re're', re' Quelyo̱pas ribihnal je' wili xik'or reh Jesus: «Chi quixilac take aj nink'i̱j quiponic ar Jerusalen re' ok ti hat ma' abiram ta chaj bih xc'ulmujic chiwach take k'i̱j xelic lok? nqui reh.

—Chaj bih xc'ulmujic k'uru'? nqui Jesus queh. Re' take re' je' wili xquik'or reh: «Re' Jesus re' ribihnej chi aj Nasaret, re' nquik'or i tinamit chi aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios ru'um chi yohbal wach rajawric wilic chi c'uhbalanic eh je' wo' chi ribanaric take lok' laj nawa̱l,

xjap'aric wach curu̱s cu'um take sol eh je' re' quimic xiban ru'um nok re' take nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios ch'i̱l take nimak quiwach, xquik'ahsaj pan k'ab i raj to'o̱l k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma re' xye'bic k'ab chi xcansjic je.

Re' hoj til xkach'ica̱' kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus chi re're' i raj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios eh je' wo' xkach'ica̱' kac'ux chi re're' naresenic nak keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chipam kac'axquil wilic chi kana̱ ru'um wilco̱j chi ri'sil rajawric i tinamit Ro̱ma. Ru'um chi'nchel xc'uluric lok re're' k'e̱' ntz'iric kawach i hoj eh je' wo' ru'um chi yu'na wilco̱j chic pa ro̱x k'i̱j riquimic je eh ma' ja' nuctic ta wo' cho je' ricab xik'or cahnok chi naribanam.
Je' wo' chic, hoj so' sahchel cu'um take ixok kich'i̱l take chi ritahkaljic i Jesus maj re' take re' xiponic cho pan muk'unbal ntunah wahk'ek

eh ma' xponic ta chic quirak riti'jolal i Jesus ar. Chi je' re' xisoljic wo' chic cho eh xc'ulic quik'or keh chi xquilow wach i quib chi raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xquic'uhtaj qui̱b queh, re' xik'oric queh chi re' Jesus c'achlic wo' chic.

Je' re' k'uru' wilic take kich'i̱l xi'o̱j pa rimuk'unbal i Jesus, xa re' la' ma' xquilow ta wo' wach, xa chic re' tz'ih botomaj nak wi̱' xquirak chi tzuclic ar je' ricab til nic' pa' wach xquik'or take ixok re're', nqui take reh.
Ar ajic re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' hat-tak ma'xta pa̱m ana̱ tak! K'e̱' po' nchel hat-tak cowil chi ricojoric wach nic' nimal xquik'or cho take raj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios najtir k'i̱j!

Ma' k'oro̱j ta na cho k'uru' cu'um take raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios chi re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric tanlic chiri̱j chi pe̱t naric'ulum i ti'c'axic reh chi naroquic chipam rinimal wach camanic chi k'atal k'oric? nqui queh.

Je' aj re' ru', cu ru̱c' cho take hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj ru'um Moyses cu rehtal xponic ru̱c' quihu̱j take raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios, re' Jesus p'uht rich'ahba̱b wach queh nic' nimal tz'ihmbimaj cho chiri̱j pa riC'uhbal i Dios.
Je' aj re' c'uhbalanic xiban je queh cu rehtal xiponic chipam t'uch tinamit re' ojic nca'n wi̱'. Ar ajic nok re' Jesus xiban ri̱b chi xa je' nchel cu naht narojic,

re' take qui̱b re're' xquipahkaj reh chi naricahnic cu̱c' naxquik'or reh chi je' wili: «Ha̱w, xo̱j chic i k'i̱j. Ticahnen la' ku̱c' maj re' ak'ab oquic chic cho reh, nqui take reh. Je' aj re' ru', re' Jesus xcahnic cu̱c' reh chi naribanam riwa' quich'i̱l.
Nok wilic chic cu̱c' nah me̱xa, xichop i caxlan wi'c, xitioxej johtok reh Dios eh naxich'ak yejal i caxlan wi'c xiyew je queh chi naca'nam quiwa'.
Cu re' aj chic ar, re' Dios xisakomej pa̱m quicapew-bal reh chi xquina'bej wach chi re' po' nchel i Jesus wilic cok cu̱c', xa re' la' chiwach i junc'am re're' sahchamaj wo' chic i Jesus chi quiwach.

Chiri̱j re're' nok ma'xta chic i Jesus cu̱c', je' wili p'uht quik'orom chi quiwach: «Til po' nchel re' i Jesus xk'oric ku̱c' maj xa suk chic pan ka̱mna riban cho ru̱c' take k'oric xiban cho keh nah be̱h. Je' wo' re' nok c'ahchi' rich'ahba̱b cho wach keh i tz'ihmbimaj cho chiri̱j pa riC'uhbal i Dios, xa nsukbic wo' chic i ka̱mna, nqui take chi quiwach.

Xa chiwach wo' junc'am re're', re' take quib chi aj tahkanel re're' xquitik'lom ti qui̱b eh xisoljic wo' chic je ar Jerusalen re' xquirak wi̱' take junlaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus quich'i̱l toco̱m chic aj tahkanel.
Re' take re' je' wili c'ahchi' quik'orom chi quiwach naxiponic take quib re're': «Re' kAja̱w Jesus til xuctic wo' chic rica'pech. Re're' xic'uhtaj ri̱b reh ma' Simon, nqui take.
Chi je' aj re', re' take quib xisoljic cho ar Emahus p'uht quic'u'tjam cok chaj bih xquic'ul je nah be̱h, je' wo' nic' wach naxquina'bej wach i Jesus naxich'ak yejal i caxlan wi'c.
Cu c'uta̱j aj wo' nca'n chiri̱j chaj bih take xquic'ul, re' Jesus ruhmumaj chic cok chi quixilac eh je' wili xik'or queh chi quic'alenjic: «C'ale̱n tak, re' Dios cuse'senok aweh tak, nqui queh.
Chiri̱j chic ru' ru'um chi yo'jonak take raj tahkanel maj xquicapaj chi xa re' ranxelex i Jesus c'ahchi' quilow wach,
re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Chaj wa'ric xa nt'ort'otic chic awa̱mna tak eh nak'or pan ac'ux tak chi ma' re' ta hin?

Chawilow tak nik'ab ch'i̱l take wo̱k eh chatz'a'j tak. Charak tak chiri̱j chi til re' hin wilqui̱n ayu' ma' xa re' ta wanxelex maj re' anxelex ma'xta ritibquilal ma' wo' ribakil, ma' je' ta ricab quinawil tak cho hin yu'na, nqui queh.
Nok rik'orom chic re're', re' Jesus xic'uhtaj queh rik'ab ch'i̱l take ro̱k c'uhtbal reh chi til re' wo' Jesus wilic chi quiyejal,

raj nchel take aj tahkanel re're' ma' ja' xquicoj ta wo' ti wach ru'um risukquil quic'ux chi xquilow wo' chic wach. Cu sachlic pe wo' quic'ux take aj tahkanel, re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh: «Chaj so' bih wilic awu̱c' tak chi nanic'uxum? nqui queh.
Je' re' ajic naxquiyew reh i nech' joxomaj car ch'i̱l wo' nech' ri̱s ca̱b wilic cu̱c',
re' Jesus xic'ul queh eh chi quiwach xic'ux i chaj bih xye'eric reh.

Chiri̱j chic ru', je' wili xik'or queh: «Chi'nchel xnic'ul take lok wili re' aj wo' nik'orom cho aweh tak nok cu kalakal nkilow cho kawach. Re' hin je' wili nik'orom cho aweh tak: ‹Curman chi nariponic wach i tz'ihmbimaj cho chiwi̱j chipam take hu̱j wilic wi̱' i C'uhbal ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l pan quihu̱j take raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios, ch'i̱l wo' chipam i hu̱j wilic wi̱' moloj wach bi̱ch lok'onbal wach i Dios, nqui nik'orom cho aweh tak, nqui Jesus queh.
Ru̱c' aj re' xteh pa̱m quicapew-bal chi naquirakam chiri̱j i rik'or riC'uhbal i Dios chiri̱j ru'.

Chiri̱j aj re' je' wili xik'or queh: «Ru'um nok til tz'ihmbimaj cho pa riC'uhbal i Dios chi re' hin, re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, nawuctic wo' chic chi quixilac camnak pa ro̱x k'i̱j, tanlic chiwi̱j chi pe̱t xnic'ul i ti'c'axic, nqui queh.

Chiri̱j chic ru' xik'or wo' chic queh chi je' wili: «Re' hin tinipahba̱' tak chi wilic awajawric tak chi aj k'orol reh nik'orbal. Chi je' aj re' acamaj tak, riwi̱' chaweh tak chi ar Jerusalen enap'ut tak chi pe̱t ribanaric acamaj tak re're'. Nok abanam tak chic c'uhbalanic ar, nik'or wo' aweh tak chi hiy tak chi junsut wach ac'al chi rik'ormojic queh chi'nchel take tinamit chi re' Dios naricuyum quimahc eh chi riwi̱' chi queh chi quicana̱' ribanaric mahc.
Je' aj re' ru', ru'um chi re' hat-tak na̱k'oric tak reh k'oric xnik'or aweh tak wili,

re' hin nanitak'a̱b cho Lok' laj Uxlabal awu̱c' tak re' rik'orom cho wi̱n i wAja̱w chi nanitak'a̱b cho aweh tak ru'um reh wajawric nariyeb. Je' re' nok re' hat-tak ticahnok pe tak ayu' Jerusalen cu rehtal ticowjic tak ru'um i awajawric tak narichalic ar pan taxa̱j, nqui queh.

Nok ricohlam chic rik'ormojic take re', re' Jesus xic'am je take raj tahkanel chiri̱j lok tinamit Jerusalen cu rehtal xiponic ar Weta̱nya. Nok ar chic wilque̱b ponok, xijohsaj johtok cabchel k'ab eh xipahkaj ricuse'sbal i Dios chi quina̱ take raj tahkanel.
Chiri̱j chic ru' nok p'uht rijilim lok ri̱b cu̱c', re' Jesus xc'amaric johtok pan taxa̱j.
Chi je' aj re', re' take raj tahkanel xquiyew johtok rilok'il i Jesus eh chiri̱j chic ru' xisoljic wo' chic cok pan tinamit Jerusalen chi xa suk chic pan quic'ux.

Chi je' re' xa kalakal chic quiponic chi ritioxjic johtok i Dios ar chi chi̱' i lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach ar Jerusalen. Til coric nik'or chi nic' pa' nimal take k'oric xnitz'ihmbaj je wili, til coric take.

Nok cu ma' ja' ch'ihquinak ta wo' cho wach ac'al, re' Nsakomonic Wach rino'jbal i Dios xa wilic wo' chic cho. Re're' xa wilic wo' cok ru̱c' i Dios chi k'oric eh re' riwi̱' rinimal wach rilok'il i Dios, re' wo' re' riwi̱' ru'.
Je' re' ajic re' Nsakomonic Wach rino'jbal i Dios, xa wilic wo' cho ru̱c' i Dios cu pan ch'iquinbal cho reh chi'nchel,
eh ru'um chi re' Dios xicana̱' pan k'ab ru' ritik'injic chi'nchel, re' wo' re' xtik'inic reh nic' nimal wilic chiwach k'i̱j sakom. Ma' ta nak ru'um ru', ma'xta wo' nak bih xtik'injic.
Re' Nsakomonic Wach rino'jbal i Dios, re' wo' re' wilic wi̱' rira'il i nic' pa' nimal wilic quic'acharic. Chi re're' rira'il cho i c'acharic, re' wo' re' nsakomonic reh i coric chiri̱j i Dios

je' ricab nok jeno' sakom xa risakomej chic pa̱m i k'ekom eh chi je' re', re' wilic rajawric chi rimoysjic pa̱m quino'jbal take c'acharel, to̱b ta xa riniq'uej nak chic rik'i̱j chi ripitiric risakomsjic wach ricorquilal ribiral i Dios, ma' xiban ta canar ripitiric je' ricab nok re' k'ekom ma' xiban ta canar rimoysjic wach i sakom.
Nok re' Nsakomonic Wach rino'jbal i Dios chalic nak chic reh ayu' wach ac'al, re' Dios xitak'a̱' cho jenaj winak Wa̱n ribihnal

reh chi nariyeb chi̱' chiri̱j Aj Sakomonel Wach rino'jbal i Dios. Re' Wa̱n re're' xc'ulic riyew chi̱' reh chi re' take tinamit naquibiraj rik'orbal i Aj Sakomonel Wach rino'jbal i Dios naquicojom wach chaj bih narik'orom nac'olok lok.
Ru̱c' aj xiban i Wa̱n re're', ra̱j rik'orom chi til re' Nsakomonic Wach rino'jbal i Dios ma' re' ta i Wa̱n, re' la' re' xtak'abjic cho chi riye'eric chi̱' chiri̱j Aj Sakomonel Wach rino'jbal i Dios.
Re' til Nsakomonic Wach rino'jbal i Dios eh re' nbanic chi nsakombic pa̱m quino'jbal take tinamit, re're' xc'ulic lok ayu' wach ac'al,
xa re' la' q'uihal queh tinamit re're' ma' xquicoj ta rehtal chi re' xwih'ic ayu' wach ac'al, re' wo' re' xtik'inic queh.
Naxc'acharic chi quixilac take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' chiho̱j take najtir k'i̱j ru'um i Dios chi ritinami̱t take, q'uihal queh ma' xca'n ta ric'uluric chi coric.

Ru'um aj re' ma' xye'eric ta k'ab queh chi narik'ormojic queh chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n chic i Dios take. Haj cok wilic take tinamit xicojbic wach eh xquic'ul chi coric, re' take re' xiyew k'ab queh chi xk'ormojic queh chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n chic i Dios take.

Nok k'oro̱j chic quibiral chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios chic take, ma' xa̱j ta rik'orom chi xiban ta nak je' ricab riban jeno' winak ch'i̱l jeno' ixok chi nquituna̱b qui̱b chi c'acharic ru'um chi nca̱j jeno' quiha'lac'u̱n, xc'uluric la' chi je' re' ru'um chi re' Dios xa̱j chi xi'oquic chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n chic take.
