Ajabe̱s ma' Teyo̱pilo: Chipam i pe̱t nihu̱j xnitak'a̱' je aweh, ar xnik'or je aweh ribiral i Jesus chiri̱j haj wilic take xiban pa ric'acharic je' wo' chiri̱j haj wilic take c'uhtunic xiban. Re' ribiral re're' cu pa ri'sil xnip'ut je rik'ormojic aweh

cu rehtal xponic ru̱c' i k'i̱j naxc'amaric wo' chic johtok pan taxa̱j. Nok cu ma' ja' nc'amaric ta johtok pan taxa̱j, re' Jesus chi c'ahchi' riye'eric rik'orbal ru'um Lok' laj Uxlabal xik'or queh nahsil raj tahkanel nic' wach naquinimej i tak'anic xiban cahnok queh.

Chi je' aj re' k'uru', re' Jesus chiri̱j nok uctunak chic cho chi quixilac take camnak naxcansjic je, xic'uhbalej cahnok take nahsil raj tahkanel nok ja' no̱j ta johtok pan taxa̱j eh je' wo' xic'uhtaj ri̱b queh take nahsil raj tahkanel chi manlic ro̱k rik'ab eh ma' hab ta wach enk'oric chi ma' ta coric chi xuctic wo' chic i Jesus maj ma' xa jenaj ta pech xic'uhtaj ri̱b je' la' re' xiban chiwach ca'winak k'i̱j. Chiwach take k'i̱j re're' xic'uhbalej wo' take nahsil raj tahkanel chiri̱j rajawric i Dios chi k'atal k'oric.

Chiri̱j aj chic ru' naxponic i k'i̱j chi re' Jesus naric'amaric chic johtok pan taxa̱j, junpech re' take junlaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel naxquimol qui̱b rich'i̱l chipam pa̱t wilque̱b wi̱', je' wili xk'ormojic queh ru'um i Jesus: «Ma' telic tak je ayu' pan tinamit Jerusalen. Chawuy'ej pe tak naponok wach i k'oro̱j ru'um kAja̱w Dios chi nariyeb cho aweh tak maj re' hat-tak abiram tak chic wu̱c' chi re're' xik'or chi naritak'a̱b cho i Lok' laj Uxlabal chana̱ tak. Je' re' nok ti'uyunok tak ayu'
maj je' ricab chi til coric chi re' Wa̱n xikahsaj aha̱' tak, til coric wo' chi re' Dios nariyeb cho aweh tak i Lok' laj rUxlabal chipam quib xib ok k'i̱j, nqui queh.

Chiri̱j chic wili re' take quimolom qui̱b ru̱c' i Jesus je' wili xquik'or reh: «K-Aja̱w Jesus, re' Dios, naripahba̱b na i kaK'atal K'oric hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel? Wi je' re', chipam na take k'i̱j wili na̱cojoric chi kaK'atal K'oric? nqui take reh.

Re' Jesus je' wili quic'u'ljic xiban: «Re' k'i̱j, ch'i̱l i o̱ra rik'atam ri̱j i wAja̱w Dios chi naribanam re're', xa pan k'ab wo' wilic. Je' aj re' ru' ma' ye'o̱j ta aweh hat-tak chi na̱weht'alim tak re're'.

Haj cok wilic riyeb aweh tak i Dios chi na̱weht'alim tak, re' chi nachitak'a̱' cho Lok' laj rUxlabal chana̱ tak, re' hat-tak na̱c'ulum ricowil ak'orbal tak reh chi na̱k'orom tak ribiral niC'uhbal. Je' re' ajic re' hat-tak na̱yeb achi̱' tak chiwi̱j i hin, re' cok ru' ayu' pan tinamit Jerusalen na̱p'utum tak je cu rehtal nasutej tak pa̱m chi'nchel tinamit pa riyuk'ul Jure̱ya, je' wo' pan quiyuk'ul take aj Sama̱rya cu rehtal na̱wojic tak lok chi junsut wach ac'al, nqui queh.

Chiri̱j chic ru' nok ricohlam chic k'oric i Jesus, xc'amaric johtok pan taxa̱j chi c'ahchi' rilmijic johtok cu'um take quimolom qui̱b ar. Re' take wilque̱b ar quilow nic' wach oquic xiban i Jesus pan jenaj su̱tz' xsahchic wi̱' chi quiwach eh ma' cu ta chic xquilow wach.

Ar aj ru' nok xa cu c'ahchi' wo' quilom johtok i ojic xiban i Jesus pan taxa̱j, cu re' chic queh take nahsil re're' quib take winak xa sak chic quiso' xi'o̱j pah'ok chi quiche̱l take ilo̱j nca'n johtok pan taxa̱j.

Re' take quib winak re're' je' wili xquik'or: «Hat-tak aj Calile̱ya chabiraj tak i wili: Re' Jesus re' xawilow tak nic' wach naxc'amaric johtok pan taxa̱j, re' wo' chic re' narisoljic cho rica'pech xa re' la' nic' pa' wach chi pan jenaj su̱tz' ojic xiban johtok, je' wo' chic re' c'ulic naribanam lok. Je' re' k'uru' ma' ntz'iric chic awach tak chi ilo̱j johtok pan taxa̱j, nqui banol queh.

Chi je' aj re', re' take nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus xi'elic cho chipam i ye'a̱b re' ribihnej “Ye'a̱b queh take tic Oli̱wo ribihnal” re' je' na q'uisi̱n ma' me̱ra o̱ra chi behic wilic je ru̱c' tinamit Jerusalen eh xisoljic wo' chic cho chipam i tinamit Jerusalen.

Naxiponic chipam i tinamit re're', xi'oquic cok chipam jenaj pa̱t eh xijohtic johtok chi rimoloric qui̱b pa rica'tik pa̱t. Chi quixilac take xquimol qui̱b ar wilque̱b take je' wili quibihnal: Re' ma' Luch, re' ma' Jaco̱wo, re' ma' Wa̱n, re' ma' Tirix, re' ma' Peh, re' ma' Ma̱x, re' ma' Warto̱lo, re' ma' Tiyoh. Je' wo' ar wilic i Jaco̱wo ch'i̱l ma' Ju̱ras re' rac'u̱n take ma' Alpe̱yo. Wilic wo' ar ma' Simon re' wih'inak chipam quicomonil take quixowonic wach aj Ro̱ma Selo̱te quibihnal.

Re' take aj niminel re're' xiban xa jenaj chic wach quic'ux quich'i̱l take ixok quitahkanic wo' reh Jesus, je' wo' quich'i̱l take richa̱k' i Jesus, ch'i̱l wo' i quitu̱t re' Mari̱ya ribihnal eh chi je' re' xquiyew quic'ux chi ti̱j chi ripahkaljic johtok chi naritak'abjic cho Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios chi quina̱.

Chiwach take cho k'i̱j nok quip'utum chic rimoloric qui̱b take aj niminel, junpech naxquimol qui̱b je' na wakc'ahl (120) chi aj niminel chi richihiric rijelow-bal i Ju̱ras, re' ma' Luch xpa'lajic johtok chi quixilac eh je' wili xik'or queh:

«Was tak nicha̱k', xa najtir wo' cho k'i̱j nok ja' ricansaj ta ri̱b i Ju̱ras re' xc'ambic quibe̱h take xicansanic reh i Jesus, re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios xk'oric chic cho chiri̱j re're' naxquimeljic cho richi̱' i ma' Tawiy. Ru'um aj re', re' k'oric k'oro̱j cho chiri̱j i Ju̱ras chi toco̱m chic narichopbic reh ricamaj, til curman chi xponic wach.
Re' Ju̱ras re're', re' kich'i̱l nak cho hoj eh chiho̱j wo' nak wach ru'um Jesus reh camanic wili,

xijihc'aj ri̱b chipam junseht ye'a̱b xlok'oric ru̱c' i tojbal xye'eric reh ru'um i ma' holohic ta laj mahc xiban ru̱c' rik'ahsjic i Jesus. Re're' naxijihc'aj ri̱b, xk'ehbic wo' jok wach ac'al chi pachlic eh naxq'uer i pa̱m xi'elic take lok rak'sa̱'. Re' quimic xiban i Ju̱ras ar xc'uluric

chipam i ye'a̱b re' xibihnej cu'um take aj Jerusalen chi “Hase̱ltama” chiri̱j chi camnak chic je i Ju̱ras eh je' re' ribihnal xquicoj maj je' wili ra̱j rik'orom pan kak'orbal: “Re' Ye'a̱b xlok'oric ru̱c' ritz'akil ribano̱j i jenaj winak re' xicansaj ri̱b”.

«Re' xc'uluric cho ru̱c' Ju̱ras, nwilow i hin chi ar wilic ribiral chipam i hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' take moloj wach bi̱ch maj ar je' wili rik'or: “Cahnok ta nak riye'a̱b chi cahnel ye'a̱b chic eh ma' ta nak chic hab wach nc'acharic chipam, nqui rik'or. Je' wo' chic wili rik'or chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re're': “Re' ricamaj chi c'amol be̱h, toco̱m ok chic chopbok reh, nqui wo' rik'or.

«Chi je' re' k'uru', chihirok wach jeno' rijelow-bal i Ju̱ras chi quixilac take kich aj tahkanel oconak take cho chi kaxilac chiwach take cho k'i̱j nok re' Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus nkajic njohtic chi behic chi kaxilac.

Je' re' ajic re' kich aj tahkanel re' rip'utum cho behic chiri̱j i Jesus cu ru̱c' cho rikahsjic riha̱' ru'um i Wa̱n cu rehtal naxc'amaric johtok pan taxa̱j nok ilo̱j nka'n johtok reh, re' aj re' cojorok chi rijelow-bal i Ju̱ras chi kaman i hoj chi rik'ormojic ribiral chi re' Jesus xuctic wo' chic chi quixilac take camnak, nqui ma' Luch.
Chiri̱j aj re', re' take mololque̱b ar p'uht quic'sam pan k'oric take qui̱b chi winak je' wili quibihnal: Re' ma' Mati̱yas rich'i̱l i ma' Chep re' ribihnej wo' chi Warsawas on Ju̱sto.

Je' re' nok xi'oquic chi ti̱j chiwach i Dios eh je' wili xquik'or johtok reh: «Hat kAja̱w Dios re' teht'alanic reh pa̱m i ca̱mna take c'acharel wili, chac'uhtaj keh haj wilic queh i qui̱b wili achiho̱j i hat,

reh chi naroquic chi kaman chipam i camanic wili i hoj pahbamaj chi aj k'oro̱l. Je' re' nkapahkaj aweh ru'um nok re' camanic wili xicana̱' cahnok i Ju̱ras ru'um reh rimemil laj no'jbal re' xichihbej je wi̱' riye'a̱b chi naric'ulum i ti'c'axic, nqui take pan quiti̱j naxquisic' ri̱j hab wach narichopbic reh camanic re're'.

Je' re' nok naxquisic' ri̱j hab wach naricahnic pa rijelow-bal i Ju̱ras, tz'eht xkajic china̱ i ma' Mati̱yas. Je' aj re' ru', re' ma' Mati̱yas xoquic chi quiman take i junlaj chi nahsil take raj tahkanel i Jesus.
Chiri̱j chic ru' naxponic rik'ijil i nink'i̱j Pentecostes ribihnal, chi'nchel take aj niminel quimolom qui̱b chi xa jenaj chic wach quic'ux.

Je' aj re' nok quimolom qui̱b chi je' re', cu re' chic queh ru' nquibiraj chi xa njumic chic xkajic cho pan taxa̱j i xa je' chic ricab jenaj cow laj te̱w eh cu xoquic cok chipam i pa̱t tz'ukulque̱b wi̱'.

Je' re' k'uru' re' take aj niminel re're' xquilow chi wilic chic chi quina̱ xa je' ricab riwi̱' ju' ca̱k' take c'acharel eh xc'utunic chi xa je' chic ricab xak i k'a̱k' take. Je' re' ajic re' take je' riwi̱' ju' ca̱k' c'acharel re're', xquipuhcaj qui̱b china̱ ju'jun chi aj niminel wilque̱b ar

eh chi je' re' chi'nchel take aj niminel re're' xye'eric cajawric chi naquik'oric ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal. Chi je' re' xquip'ut k'oric pan toco̱m chic k'oric re' k'orel nic' pa' wach quik'orbal xye'eric queh ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal

maj chipam rik'ijil i nink'i̱j re're', k'e̱' q'uihal take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' til aj nimem take reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, xquimol qui̱b ar Jerusalen naxic'ulic lok chi junsut tinamit wilque̱b chi ri'sil ro̱k k'ab i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma.

Re' take tinamit tubulque̱b ponok ar Jerusalen chi nink'ijinic, naxo̱j quimol qui̱b re' xiban wi̱' i xa je' chic cow laj te̱w re're', k'e̱' naxsahchic quic'ux maj re' chic quik'orbal quik'oric wi̱' chi quiju'junal, xquibiraj chi c'ahchi' quik'oric wi̱' take raj tahkanel i Jesus.
Je' aj re' ru' chi k'e̱' sahchanak quic'ux je' wili xquik'or: «Ma' re' ta na nchel aj Calile̱ya take c'acharel c'ahchi' quik'oric wili?
Chaj wa'ric k'uru' nkabiraj chi c'ahchi' quik'oric pan kak'orbal re' hoj q'uihinak cho wi̱'
chi kunchelal i hoj re' je' wili ribihnal katinamital? Re' hoj aj Pa̱rtiya, aj Me̱rya, aj Elam, aj pa riyuk'ul Mesopota̱mya ch'i̱l Jure̱ya, aj Caparo̱sya, aj Po̱nto, aj A̱sya,

aj Pirji̱ya, aj Panpi̱lya, aj Eji̱pto ch'i̱l wo' aj pa riyuk'ul A̱prica re' wilic pa ric'ula't i Sire̱ne. Nic' wach k'uru' chi re' hoj, je' chi aj Ro̱ma je' ru̱c' c'achalco̱j pan tinamit ayu', je' chi ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, je' chi ma' re' ta take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' xa quicojom qui̱b chipam kaniminic i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel

c'ahchi' kabiram pan kak'orbal i k'oric nca'n take c'acharel wili? Je' re' k'uru' nic' wach nok re' hoj, je' chi hoj aj Cre̱ta, je' chi hoj aj Ara̱wya c'ahchi' kabiram pan kak'orbal i k'oric nca'n take wili chiri̱j nic' nimal sachbal c'uxlis riban i Dios? nqui take.

Je' aj re' ru' chi quixilac take chi'nchel i tinamit xquimol qui̱b ar wilic take je' wili xquik'or chi quiwach chi k'e̱' sahchanak quic'ux: «Chaj bih nchel ra̱j rik'orom re' xc'uluric wili? nqui xquik'or chi quiwach.

Xa re' la' wilic wo' take toco̱m je' wili tohk' quik'orom chi xa quise'lbal: «Re' take wili hamo̱j take chi ha' je' ru̱c' nxohc'sonic, nqui take. Je' re' xquik'or ru'um ma' xquirak ta chiri̱j i k'oric xca'n take aj niminel re're'.

Chi quic'u'ljic aj take tinamit re're', re' ma' Luch xpa'lajic johtok ch'i̱l take junlaj chi rich nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus eh je' wili xik'or queh ru̱c' cow laj k'oric: «Hat-tak wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' xatc'ulic tak lok ayu' Jerusalen ch'i̱l wo' hat-tak re' tic'acharic tak pan tinamit ayu', chacoj tak rehtal i nanik'orom, reh chi na̱na'bem tak chaj bih ra̱j rik'orom re' xc'uluric. Chabiraj tak i wili k'uru':

Re' nacapaj hat-tak chi hoj hamo̱j chi ha' je' ru̱c' nxohc'sonic, ma' coric ta maj wi ta nak xkuq'uej i ha' re're' ma' re' ta nak chipam i o̱ra wili xka'n ru'um nok re' beleje̱b o̱ra wili wilic chi cuybal wi'c chi banoj ti̱j.
Re' xc'uluric wili re' la' je' ricab rik'orom cho raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios ma' Johel ribihnal:

“Re' Dios je' wili xik'or: ‘Re' hin Dios, chic ok q'uisi̱n ma' nponic i rik'ijil chi nawoquic chi k'atal k'oric chi quina̱ i tinamit nanitak'a̱b jok i Lok' laj wUxlabal chi quina̱ take c'acharel eh naniban chi je' re' je' wili naric'uluric: Re' take re're' naquik'orom i niC'uhbal; re' take q'uijolak wilic take naric'uhtjic queh pan nak' quiwach. Re' chic take rijeb tak winak naquilom take la'wa̱ch pan quiwiric.
Til aj coric chiwach take k'i̱j re're' nanitak'a̱b jok i Lok' laj wUxlabal chi quina̱ take waj tz'e' wa̱ch chi winak chi ixok reh chi naquik'orom i niC'uhbal.

Je' wo', nanibanam chi ayu' pan taxa̱j enc'utunic take rehtalil chi sachbal c'uxlis eh ar jok wach ac'al enc'utunic wo' take rehtalil je' ricab ru̱c' take k'ak'anic re' nchihcjic wi̱' quic' eh re' nelic wo' cho wi̱' risibil i k'a̱k' koplic, nqui Dios.

Je' aj re' ru' nok xa q'uisi̱n ok chic ma' nponic i k'i̱j re're', re' naquilom wi̱' i tinamit chi re' Lok' laj Ajabe̱s naric'uhtam ri̱b ru̱c' rinimal rajawric, re' risakomal i k'i̱j narik'ekombic wach eh re' risakomil i poh naricakbic wach, xa je' chic ricab nca'yic i quic' naribanam.

Chipam aj i k'i̱j nac'ulurok take wili, re' xa hab pa' wach queh aj niminel reh Lok' laj Ajabe̱s eripahkaj reh pan ti̱j chi enco'ljic, xa re' wo' re' narirakam rico'lbal, nqui Dios, nqui rik'orom cho ma' Johel.

«Je' aj re' ru' wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chabiraj tak i nanik'orom wili: Re' Dios xiyew chi eht'aljic chaxilac tak chi re' Jesus re' ribihnej chi aj Nasaret xa re' wo' re' ye'o̱j rajawric. Re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chic re're' maj chaxilac hat-tak yohbal wach take rehtalil ch'i̱l take lok' laj nawa̱l sachbal c'uxlis xiban i Dios ru̱c' ro̱k k'ab i Jesus.

Xa re' la' chic ru', ru'um nok tik'imaj chic cho wach ru'um i Dios eh eht'alamaj wo' chic cho ru'um, re' Jesus naxk'ahsjic pan ak'ab tak, re' hat-tak xacansaj tak je naxayew tak pan quik'ab take sol aj Ro̱ma.
To̱b ta jenaj rinimal ti'c'axic xic'ul i Jesus naxquimic je, re' Dios xucsaj wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak maj ma' jaruj ta xiban chi xcahnic chi camnak chi junpech.

Je' re' nik'or maj je' re' xitz'ihmbaj cho i ma' Tawiy chiri̱j i Jesus naxik'or chi je' wili: “Re' hin xa nwilow wo' chi re' hat lok' laj wAja̱w xa wilca̱t wo' wu̱c' chi nitobjic. Ru'um aj re' ma'xta bih equinyo'jic so' wi̱' chiwach i quimic.

K'e̱' chic risukquil i wa̱mna nchalic chi quinbichinic chi suk ru̱c' nichi̱'. Je' wo', ru'um chi re' hat lok' laj wAja̱w xa wilca̱t wo' wu̱c' chi nitobjic naric'uluric chi chiwach i junc'am reh nic'acharic chi quixilac take camnak, re' hin naniwih'ic chi ch'iclic nic'ux chawi̱j i hat
maj ma'xta quinacana̱b chipam quiye'a̱b take camnak, re' “Ha̱res” ribihnal eh xa ta wo' nak na̱cana̱b chi narit'u'lujic niti'jolal i hin Lok' laj awAc'u̱n re' k'e̱' quinac'ax.

Je' re' k'uru' xa je' ta nak ricab chi re' hat c'ahchi' ac'uhtunic wi̱n haj wilic i be̱h nanichopom je, re' hin xa awu'um wo' i hat weht'alim chaj bih ra̱j banaric chi nanic'acharic wo' chic. Je' re' ajic ru'um chi xa quinawihch'ilej wo', re' hin k'e̱' nsukbic nic'ux ru'um re're', nqui xitz'ihmbaj cho ma' Tawiy.

«Je' re' ru' was tak nicha̱k', til ricorquil nik'or aweh tak chi re' kaj najtir k'i̱j ma' Tawiy ma' re' ta chiri̱j ric'acharic xk'oric cho maj re're' camnak chic cho eh ru'um aj re' cu yu'na chi k'i̱j cu nkilow wo' wach rimuk'unbal re' xmuk'unjic cho wi̱' najtir k'i̱j.

Raj ma' Tawiy naxk'oric cho chiri̱j la' i Jesus xk'oric. Je' re' nok naxk'oric cho ma' Tawiy, xk'oric cho chi je' ricab jenaj raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios eh ru'um re' xeht'alij chi re' Dios xiyew rik'orbal naxik'or reh chi je' wili: ‹Re' hin niyew nik'orbal aweh, chi quixilac take awa̱' awi'sil nawucsam i k'atal k'oric re' nanipahba̱b chi re're' narik'atbic k'oric, nqui Dios reh.

«Chi je' re', re' ma' Tawiy xa je' na nchel c'ahchi' ta nak chic rilom chi na'lic reh ructic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, xik'or cho chi re're' ma'xta ricahnic chipam i ye'a̱b “Ha̱res” ribihnal eh je' wo' chi re' riti'jolal ma'xta rit'u'lujic. Je' aj re' xik'or ma' Tawiy maj xc'uhtjic cho reh najtir k'i̱j chi re' Jesus naructic wo' chic chi quixilac camnak.

Je' re' k'uru' nic' pa' wach rik'orom cho ribiral ma' Tawiy, re' Dios xucsaj wo' cho Jesus chi quixilac take camnak eh yu'na chi'nchel hoj raj tahkanel i Jesus c'ahchi' kayeb kachi̱' chi til coric chi xuctic wo' chic cho.

«Je' wo' chic, re' hat-tak yu'na nawilow tak eh nabiraj wo' tak chi c'ahchi' kak'oric pan ak'orbal chi'nchel hat-tak eh re' wili xa ru'um reh rajawric i Jesus xc'ulmujic chi je' re', maj naxye'eric wo' chic rilok'il chi xwih'ic wo' chic cok chi riche̱l i Dios, xitak'a̱' cho keh i Lok' laj Uxlabal re' k'oro̱j cho ribiral ru'um kAja̱w Dios chi nariyeb cho keh. Je' re' ajic re' Jesus xitak'a̱' cho keh Lok' laj Uxlabal reh chi nakak'orom i riC'uhbal.

Til nik'or ajic chi re' xjohtic johtok pan taxa̱j chi na'lic reh ma' re' ta ma' Tawiy, re' la' i kAja̱w Jesus maj re' aj wo' ma' Tawiy xtz'ihminic reh take k'oric xik'or chi je' wili: “Re' Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Dios je' wili xik'or reh Ajabe̱s chi nina̱ re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric: Je' ricab naric'ul rilok'il jeno' winak ntz'ukunjic cok chi riche̱l jeno' k'atal k'oric, je' aj wo' re' nachac'ul i hat alok'il wili: Chi na̱wih'ic chiniche̱l
cu rehtal nawilom take awaj ixowonel nachayak'abej take pan awo̱k, nqui xk'ormojic reh, nqui take k'oric xitz'ihmbaj cho ma' Tawiy.

«Je' re' k'uru', re' hat-tak wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chaweht'alij tak chi manlic i coric wili chi re' Jesus re' xayew tak chi cansjic wach curu̱s xye'eric rilok'il ru'um i Dios chi Ajabe̱s eh je' wo' xpahbabjic chi K'atal K'oric chi quina̱ chi'nchel tinamit, nqui ma' Luch.

Naxquibiraj chi je' re' nic' q'uihal take wilque̱b ar, xchalic riti'quil quic'ux ru'um xquirak chiri̱j chi mahc xca'n. Je' re' nok je' wili xquik'or reh ma' Luch ch'i̱l take rich nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus: «Hat-tak kas kacha̱k', chaj bih ra̱j banaric reh chi encuyuric i kamahc? nqui take.

Re' ma' Luch je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Was tak nicha̱k', reh chi encuyuric amahc tak chajal wach ano'jbal tak eh re' hoj enkakahsaj aha̱' chi aju'junal tak reh chi etoquic tak chi hat-tak raj tahkanel i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Chi je' re' enye'eric wo' aweh tak i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak riye'eric jeno' asi̱ tak

maj re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios k'oro̱j chi nariye'eric queh take nic' nimal nariyuk'em i kAja̱w Dios chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n take. Je' re' ajic re' Lok' laj Uxlabal nariye'eric aweh hat-tak ch'i̱l take awa̱' awi'sil tak, je' wo' nariye'eric queh take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, nqui ma' Luch.

Ru̱c' take k'oric xik'or re're' ch'i̱l wo' take toco̱m chic k'oric xiban, re' ma' Luch xik'or ribiral i Jesus eh xik'il wo' take tinamit chi je' wili: «Re' quino'jbal take kich ti'jolal ma' holohic ta. Ru'um aj re', re' hat-tak chajal wach ano'jbal tak reh chi etico'ljic tak chiwach i ti'c'axic narichalic chi quina̱ kich ti'jolal, nqui k'ilo̱j xiban queh.

Je' aj re' chipam i k'i̱j re're', je' na wuk-ik'o'b lajc'ahl (3,000) chi c'acharel xquinimej rik'orbal i Dios xik'or ma' Luch eh chi je' re' xkahsjic wo' quiha̱' chi'nchel re're'. Chi je' aj re', re' take c'acharel re're' xi'oquic jenaj chi quixilac take aj niminel reh Jesus

eh chi xa jenaj chic wach quic'ux, xa eli̱c wo' xquimol qui̱b chi ribirmijic i c'uhbalanic nca'n take aj nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus, je' wo' xa eli̱c wo' xquimol qui̱b chi ric'uxuric i caxlan wi'c rehtalil riquimic i Jesus je' wo' chi ribanaric quiti̱j chiwach i Dios.
Xa chiwach aj wo' k'i̱j re're', re' take aj nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus ma' q'uisi̱n ta take lok' laj nawa̱l xca'n ribanaric eh ru̱c' re're' q'uihal queh aj Jerusalen xoquic cho quiyo'jic.

Nic' pa' q'uihal take xiniminic reh riC'uhbal i Dios, xa xic'acharic wo' chi xa jenaj wach quic'ux eh xquicoj wo' pan quicapew-bal chi re' pa' bih wilic queh chi quiju'junal, queh wo' chi quiwach pan comonil.
Je' aj re', re' ritz'akil quiye'a̱b on xa pa' chic bih queh nquic'ayej, re' take aj niminel re're' nquipuhcaj chi quina̱ take quich aj niminel nok nwih'ic jeno' quic'axquilal.

Ma' xa re' ta re' nca'n je' la' wo' re' take aj niminel re're', chi cunchelal chi xa jenaj chic wach quic'ux xa eli̱c wo' nquimol qui̱b chipam i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios. Je' wo', nquiyuk'ej qui̱b pan tak quipa̱t chi ribanaric quiwa' quiha̱' eh chi je' re' chi pan jenaj sukquil c'uxlis je' wo' chi pan ch'ublic laj c'uxlis wilque̱b, nquic'ux wo' i caxlan wi'c rehtalil riquimic i Jesus.

Je' aj re' ru', re' quino'jbal take aj niminel re're' ru̱c' ritioxjic i Dios nca'n johtok k'e̱' nponic chi quiwach take tinamit eh chi je' re', re' kAja̱w Jesus p'uht riq'uihsam cho wach quicomonil take moloj wach aj niminel ru̱c' coquic pan niminic take ye'o̱j chiqui̱j chi naquico'ljic chiwach i ti'c'axic chalic reh.
Junpech, re' ma' Luch rich'i̱l Wa̱n xi'o̱j johtok chipam i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, pa ri'orahil i ti̱j nbanaric xib o̱ra reh rikajic i k'i̱j.

Ar ajic pan ocbal reh pa̱t re're', re' “Holohic” ribihnal nponic canabjok cho jenaj winak si̱c ro̱k, cu pa rasbal wo' cho chi je' re'. Re' winak re're' kalakal nponic cahnok cho chi chi̱' i ocbal reh pa̱t re're' reh chi naripahkam rilimoxna queh take qui'oquic cok ar.
Je' re' ajic naxilow chi re' ma' Luch ch'i̱l i Wa̱n oquic nca'n cok ar, xa nch'uk chic ric'ux p'uht ripahkam rilimoxna queh.
Re' ma' Luch ch'i̱l i Wa̱n naxquibiraj chi je' re' je' wili xquik'or reh nok xa cow chic nquitz'ehtaj: «Koj-atz'ehtaj cho chi coric, nqui take reh.
Naxibiraj chi je' re' i si̱c re're', xa cow chic xitz'ehtaj take maj pa ric'ux ru' naric'ulum la' nak so' ritz'a̱k cu̱c',

xa re' la' ma' Luch je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh: «Re' hoj ma'xta katz'a̱k chi enkayew aweh, haj cok wili eriban chi enkak'or aweh re' chi re' Jesus re' ribihnej chi aj Nasaret eh re' Pahbamaj wo' chi K'atal K'oric, re' wo' re' xye'bic rajawric kak'orbal chi quicowsjic take yowa̱b i̱b. Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh yu'na: Tipah'ok johtok eh tibehok chi coric, nqui ma' Luch.
Chi je' re' ajic, re' ma' Luch xichop johtok chi risec'a̱j k'ab i si̱c re're' eh xucsaj johtok. Xa chiwach wo' junc'am re're' xk'ochlojic ti wach chi coric take ro̱k i si̱c re're'

eh chi je' re' xip'ut behic naxpa'lajic johtok pan pur. Je' re' ajic xa naripur chic chi behic naxoquic cok rich'i̱l ma' Luch ch'i̱l i Wa̱n ar chipam i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios eh je' wo' xa c'ahchi' chic ritioxem johtok Dios ru̱c' ju'jun xa̱k' riban je.
Naxquilow take tinamit chi re' si̱c re're' behic chic riban eh chi c'ahchi' ritioxem johtok i Dios,

k'e̱' naxsahchic quic'ux ru̱c' xc'ulmujic ar maj re' take tinamit xquina'bej wach chi re' winak re're', re' nak i si̱c nwih'ic chi pahkanic limo̱xna chi chi̱' i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios ar pan ocbal re' “Holohic” ribihnal.

Je' aj re' ru', re' take tinamit xa sahchanak chic quic'ux xichalic chi chi̱' Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, ar chi chi̱' i mujbal “Salomon” ribihnal. Ar xquirak i winak re' xcorsjic wach take ro̱k. Re're' pan quiyejal chic i ma' Luch ch'i̱l i Wa̱n wilic chi ma' ricana̱' ta chic quik'ahchjic ru'um risukquil ric'ux.

Naxilow ma' Luch chi xquimol qui̱b ar take tinamit je' wili xik'or queh: «Hat-tak wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, ma' holohic ta chi re' hat-tak xacow chic koj-awil tak chi sahchanak ac'ux tak ru̱c' xka'n wili, xa je' nchel kajawric on xa kachak'lamil i hoj xbanic chi re' si̱c wili xcowjic take ro̱k chi xbehic.

Til pa ricorquil re' winak wili xbehic reh chi re' Dios re' xilok'ej cho wach i kaj najtir k'i̱j ma' Awraham, ma' Isahac ch'i̱l wo' i ma' Jacow, eric'uhtaj nic' wach nimal rajawric ye'o̱j reh Jesus re' rAc'u̱n i kaDios. Re' Jesus re're', re' wo' i xak'ahsaj hat-tak pan quik'ab take nimak wach cajawric. Nok re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to xa̱j nak rok'tam je ru'um ma' xirak ta rimahc, re' hat-tak ma' xawa̱j ta tak chi xok'taj je,
re' la' chic xapahkaj hat-tak chi re' winak aj cansanel xok'tjic je chi rijelow-bal i Jesus re' jenaj winak coric wach rino'jbal eh lo̱k' riwa'ric.

Je' re' ajic re' hat-tak xacansaj tak i Jesus re' aj ye'ol reh kac'acharic, xa re' la' xucsjic wo' chic ru'um i Dios chi quixilac take camnak eh ru'um aj re', re' hoj yu'na c'ahchi' kayeb kachi̱' chi re' Jesus c'achlic wo' chic.

«Je' aj re' ru' was tak nicha̱k', ma' re' ta ru'um kajawric i hoj xcowjic i winak wili re' aweht'alim tak wach chi si̱c nak cho eh yu'na nawilow tak cho chi corjonak chic wach take ro̱k. Re' winak wili xcowjic ru'um chi re' hoj xkach'ica̱' kac'ux chiri̱j xiban i Dios ru̱c' i Jesus. Ma' xa re' xcowsjic, xye'eric la' wo' reh chi nareht'alim chi re' Jesus til coric chi xye'eric rajawric ru'um i Dios eh je' wo' chi nareht'alim chi re' wo' re' xcorsonic wach take ro̱k.

«Coric was tak nicha̱k', re' hat-tak xak'ahsaj tak pan quimic i Jesus, xa re' la' hin nirak chiri̱j chi je' re' xa'n tak ru'um nok re' hat-tak ch'i̱l take nahsil china̱ katinami̱t ma' xarak ta tak wo' chiri̱j chi re' Jesus, re' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi kana̱.

Chi je' aj re' ru̱c' ricansjic i Jesus xa'n tak, re' Dios xiban chi xponic wach re' rik'orom cho najtir k'i̱j ru̱c' quichi̱' take raj k'orol c'uhbal naxquik'or cho chi re' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric til naric'ulum i ti'c'axic.

«Yu'na aj ru' nik'or aweh tak chi chajal wach ano'jbal tak eh chachop ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus reh chi re' Dios ericuy amahc tak eh chi je' re' ewo' nponic rik'ijil chiwach ru' chi eriyew cho risukquil ac'ux tak
nachitak'a̱' wo' chic cho Jesus re' k'oro̱j cho ribiral aweh tak najtir k'i̱j chi re're' xpahbabjic chi K'atal K'oric.

Nik'or aweh tak chi re' Jesus naritak'abjic wo' chic cho ayu' wach ac'al maj re' Dios xilow chi yu'na til curman chi cu nariwih'ic cho pan taxa̱j, cu rehtal nponic rik'ijil chi nari'ac'sam wach chi'nchel i wilic china̱ ac'al je' ricab rik'orom cho najtir k'i̱j ru̱c' quichi̱' take lok' laj raj k'orol c'uhbal. Je' re' ajic chi cu wilic pe cho pan taxa̱j i Jesus, chanimej tak i k'oric riban

maj re' Moyses je' wili xik'or cho queh take cho kama̱m kati't najtir k'i̱j: “Re' kaDios re' kojbirinic chiwach chi Ajabe̱s chi kana̱, naribanam chi re' jenaj i t'uch ac'un narasjic chi quixilac take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, nariq'uihic johtok chi raj k'orol c'uhbal je' ricab nok wilqui̱n i hin yu'na. Je' re' ajic nic' pa' nimal k'oric narik'orom aweh tak i aj k'orol c'uhbal re're', chanimej tak

maj naric'ulmujic chi re' c'acharel re' ma'xta riniminic chiwach aj k'orol c'uhbal re're', ma'xta rehtric cok chi quixilac take moloj wach chi ritinami̱t i Dios, na la' risacharic wach chi junpech, nqui rik'orom cho Moyses.

«Je' aj re' ru' chanimej tak i k'oric riban i Jesus reh chi enponic wach i k'oro̱j cho cu'um take raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios re' xp'uhtic cho rik'ormojic cu ru̱c' i Samwel, chi re' take k'i̱j re' narisuksjic wi̱' kac'ux chalic chic reh

chi kana̱ i hoj ca̱' qui'sil take cho aj k'orol c'uhbal re're', maj re' hoj, hoj wo' cho ca̱' qui'sil take cho kaj najtir k'i̱j re' xi'ehtric cho reh tik'inic xiban i Dios ru̱c' ma' Awraham naxik'or reh chi je' wili: “Re' hin pe̱t nanicuse'sam take awa̱' awi'sil i hat eh chi je' re' na wo' qui'ehtric nicuse'sbal take toco̱m chic tinamit, nqui xik'or reh ma' Awraham.

«Chi ric'ulmujic aj cuse'sbal re're', re' Dios xiban chi re' rac'u̱n xq'uihic cho chi raj k'orol ric'uhbal eh chi je' re' xitak'a̱' cho awu̱c' tak chi pe̱t chi rik'ormojic aweh tak chi na̱cana̱b tak amahc, nqui ma' Luch.

Chiri̱j chic ru' nok cu c'uhbalanic pe wo' riban ma' Luch ch'i̱l i Wa̱n cu̱c' take tinamit, re' take aj k'ahsem si̱ quich'i̱l i c'amol quibe̱h take cha'janel reh Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, ch'i̱l wo' take junch'uk chic chi aj k'ahsem si̱ je' ru̱c' ca̱' qui'sil cho aj k'ahsem si̱ Saroc ribihnal, xi'o̱j cakrok chi quina̱ ma' Luch ch'i̱l i ma' Wa̱n.
Je' re' ajic yohbal wach naxicakric take winak re're' ru'um chi re' take qui̱b re're' c'ahchi' quik'orom reh tinamit ru̱c' i c'uhtunic nca'n, chi re' Jesus xuctic wo' chic chi quixilac take camnak.

Ru'um aj re' xichoporic je ma' Luch ch'i̱l i ma' Wa̱n ch'i̱l wo' i winak re' si̱c nak eh xic'amaric je chi narich'ukuric k'oric chi quina̱ xa re' la' ru'um chi ojonak chic i k'i̱j ma' xbanaric ta wo' chic re're', xi'o̱j la' cojorok pan che̱' reh chi cu je' chic ikal narich'ukuric k'oric chi quina̱.

Ma' ru'um ta ru' chi je' re' xc'ulmujic, xa cu q'uih wo' take tinamit chi quixilac take xibirinic reh c'uhbal xquik'or ma' Luch ch'i̱l i Wa̱n xquinimej i k'oric xquibiraj. Chi je' re' ru̱c' take xi'oquic chi niminic re're', xponic cablaj ik'ob lajc'ahl (5,000) take aj niminel chipam i k'i̱j re're'.

Chiri̱j chic ru' naxsak'ic je' ikal, re' take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ quich'i̱l take nahsil chipam tinamit xquimol qui̱b ar Jerusalen quich'i̱l take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses.

Je' wo' quich'i̱l take chiho̱j chi naquiwih'ic pan quicomonil take nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ je' ricab i Wa̱n ch'i̱l i Lej, wilque̱b wo' ar chi quihch'iljic take nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ re' ma' Anas ch'i̱l ma' Caypas.

Chi je' re' xic'amaric cho ma' Luch ch'i̱l i Wa̱n eh naxipahbabjic cok chi quiwach, je' wili pahkanic xbanaric queh: «Chaj bih ribihnal xye'bic awajawric tak chi ricowsjic i winak wili chi xbehic? nqui take.
Re' ma' Luch, sakomomaj pa̱m rino'jbal ru'um Lok' laj Uxlabal, je' wili xik'or queh: «Hat-tak chi'nchel aj c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ ch'i̱l wo' hat-tak nahsil chipam katinami̱t,
ru'um nok yu'na re' hat-tak c'ahchi' apahkanic tak chiri̱j ato'bil xka'n reh winak re' si̱c nak wili eh je' wo' ru'um chi c'ahchi' apahkam tak nic' wach naxpa'lajic,

re' hin nanisakomem wach pan junwachil, je' chi aweh hat-tak je' wo' chi queh take katinami̱t chiri̱j chaj bih xc'uluric lok wili. Je' aj wili riwi̱': Re' winak re' nawilow tak cho wach wili chi suk chic ric'ux, xbehic xa ru'um reh rajawric i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Coric ru', re' Jesus wili re' ribihnej chi aj Nasaret, xcansjic wach curu̱s ru'um reh kamahc xa re' la' re' Dios xucsaj wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak.

Re' aj i Jesus re're', re' hat-tak xa'n tak reh je' ricab rik'or i C'uhbal chi je' wili: “Re' cajtz'u'c ma' laj abaj ma' cojo̱j ta pa riman cu'um take toco̱m chic aj tz'ako̱l, re' chic re' xoquic chi pe̱t ma' laj abaj ch'iquinbal cho reh ricajtz'u'c i pa̱t wili, nqui rik'or. «Je' aj re' xa'n tak reh Jesus maj xak'e'b lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak xa re' la' to̱b ta wo' je' re' xa'n tak reh, re' Dios xiyew reh jenaj camanic xiq'uic wo' chic na̱ rilok'il chi co'lonic

eh ru'um aj re' xa re' wo' i Jesus ekojrico'lej chiwach i ti'c'axic maj ma' hab ta chic wach jeno' enco'lonic keh ru'um nok ma' jeno' chic c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al ye'o̱j ta nak rajawric chi aj co'lonel, nqui ma' Luch.

Naxquibiraj chi je' re', chi'nchel take c'amol be̱h quimolom qui̱b ar xsahchic quic'ux ru'um i c'uhtunic nca'n maj queht'alim chi re' ma' Luch ch'i̱l i Wa̱n ma' xa nimak ta chic quiwach eh ma' xa yohbal ta wo' chic wach tijinic ca'nam cho, re' cok ru' xquicoj rehtal chi re' take re' xquitijej po' nic' wach i c'uhtunic riban i Jesus naxiwih'ic cho cu̱c'. Je' re' ajic re' take c'amol be̱h re're' naxquilow chi re' ma' Luch ch'i̱l i Wa̱n xik'oric chi ma'xta nech' ok quiyo'jic,
ma'xta chic bih k'oric xquik'or chiri̱j xbanaric ru̱c' winak re're' maj xquilow chi re' winak re' si̱c nak re're', suk chic ric'ux pa'lic chi quiyejal ma' Luch rich'i̱l i Wa̱n.
Chi je' re', re' take c'amol be̱h re're' xquitak'a̱' quesmejic lok junc'am take qui̱b re're' chipam i moloj i̱b wilque̱b wi̱' eh p'uht quik'orom chi quiwach

chi je' wili: «Re' cok xca'n ribanaric take qui̱b winak wili ma'xta chic bih k'oric ra̱j chiri̱j. Xa ta wo' nak eriban chi enkak'or chi ma' coric ta ru'um nok re' rinimal wach lok' laj nawa̱l xca'n ru̱c' i winak wili til xeht'aljic chic cu'um tinamit ayu' Jerusalen.

Re' cok ru' reh chi ma' eta chic nquitik ju' rik'ormojic ribiral i Jesus queh tinamit, kak'or tak queh chi je' wili: ‹Yu'na johtok chi kawach chacana̱' tak c'uhbalanic chiri̱j i Jesus chi re're' xye'bic awajawric tak chi banaric take lok' laj nawa̱l maj ma' xabiraj tak k'oric chi kawach cu re' aj ru' nakach'ukum k'oric chana̱ tak, kojquirok queh, nqui take chi quiwach.

Nok quitik'a̱b chic wach quino'jbal take c'amol be̱h re're', xik'o'rjic wo' chic cok take ma' Luch ch'i̱l i ma' Wa̱n eh je' wili xk'ormojic queh: «Til ma̱ban tak chic k'oric ma' wo' c'uhbalanic chiri̱j i Jesus, nqui xk'ormojic queh.
Re' ma' Luch ch'i̱l i Wa̱n je' wili xquik'or: «Cha'n tak ri̱j i wili: Haj wilic i k'e̱' wo' chic tare̱t chiwach i Dios chi enka'n i hoj, re' animjic hat-tak on re' rinimjic Dios?
Ru'um nok curman chi re' Dios nakanimem i hoj chiwach chi etikanimej hat-tak, re' hoj ma' jaruj enkacana̱' rik'ormojic ribiral chaj bih kilom cho ch'i̱l chaj bih kabiram cho ru̱c' Jesus, nqui take.

Je' re' k'uru' re' take c'amol be̱h re're' ma' xquirak ta jeno' mahc chiqui̱j ma' Luch ch'i̱l i Wa̱n chi naquiye'eric pan ti'c'axic. Ru'um aj re' xi'ok'tjic je chi je' wili xk'ormojic je queh chi yo'sbal queh: «Hiy tak, xa re' la' ma̱k'or tak chic ribiral i Jesus queh tinamit maj wi xatik tak ju' i c'uhtunic na'n tak, na̱c'ulum tak ti'c'axic, nqui take je queh. Je' aj re' xca'n je ru'um chi re' take tinamit xa c'ahchi' chic quitioxem johtok reh Dios ru'um chi jenaj rinimal wach lok' laj nawa̱l xca'n ma' Luch ch'i̱l i Wa̱n
chi ricowsjic take ro̱k i jenaj winak re' iq'uinak chic chi ca'winak ha̱b rihabil.

Chiri̱j naxi'elic je ma' Luch ch'i̱l i Wa̱n, xi'o̱j cu̱c' take quich aj tahkanel eh xponic quic'u'tjaj queh nic' nimal xk'ormojic je queh cu'um take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ ch'i̱l take nahsil chipam katinami̱t.

Naxquibiraj chi je' re', chi cunchelal take aj niminel tohk' ca'nam johtok quiti̱j chi je' wili chi xa jenaj wach quic'ux: «K-Aja̱w Dios aj tik'inel reh taxa̱j, tik'inel reh wach ac'al, tik'inel queh ha', aj tik'inel wo' queh nic' nimal quic'acharic chipam take ye'a̱b re're', pan ak'ab i hat wilic chi'nchel nic' nimal nc'uluric.

Ru'um aj re' xponic wach i xak'or cho ru̱c' chi̱' awaj tz'e' wa̱ch re' kaj najtir k'i̱j ma' Tawiy naxik'or cho chi je' wili: “Chaj bih riwi̱' chi re' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel k'e̱' johtonak quic'ux? Chaj wo' bih riwi̱' chi re' take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xa c'ahchi' wo' quicapam c'ahbil laj no'jbal to̱b ta xa narojic wo' pa ri̱j quino'jbal?

Re' wili riwi̱': Re' take re' wolic nca'n ru̱c' i kAja̱w Dios eh je' wo' re' ru̱c' i xipahba̱' chi kaK'atal K'oric. Ru'um re're', re' take quik'atal k'oric take tinamit ch'i̱l take caj to'o̱l chi k'atal k'oric xquimol qui̱b chi wolic chi xa jenaj chic wach quic'ux, nqui cho ma' Tawiy.

«Coric aj ru' chi xmanlajic wach re're' maj ayu' pan katinami̱t Jerusalen re' take raj to'o̱l i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma, re' Hero̱res ch'i̱l i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to ch'i̱l take kich katinami̱t ch'i̱l wo' take ma' re' ta take cho kich katinami̱t, xquimol qui̱b chi ritik'injic wach riquimic Lok' laj awAc'u̱n Jesus re' xapahba̱' chi kaK'atal K'oric.

Re' cok ru' re' hat xa nok wo' atik'a̱b cho wach riquimic awAc'u̱n nok cu ja' ribiral ta wo' cho chi kaxilac eh ac'ux wo' xch'ukbic wach chi xmanlajic wach re're' maj ru'um wo' reh rinimal awajawric wilic, re' hat xayew k'ab chi je' re' xc'ulmujic.

Chi je' aj re' ru'um chi pan ak'ab aj i hat Ha̱w wilic chi'nchel nic' nimal nc'uluric eh ru'um chi c'ahchi' wo' awilom cho take c'ahchi' quik'oric keh chi ma'xta chic ka'nam c'uhbalanic, re' hoj awaj tz'e' wa̱ch nkapahkaj aweh yu'na chi nakoj-ato'bem reh chi enkak'or ribiral i Lok' laj aC'uhbal chi ma'xta nech' ok kayo'jic.

Chi je' re' nakak'or wo' ribiral i lok' laj awAc'u̱n Jesus, enac'uhtaj i rinimal wach awajawric. Ru̱c' aj re', re' hoj ma' xa ta re' take yowa̱b enkacowsaj take je' la' wo' enka'n take yohbal wach lok' laj nawa̱l rehtalil chi til coric i c'ahchi' kak'orom i hoj, nqui take johtok pan quiti̱j.

Chipam aj i junc'am re're' naxquicohlaj quiti̱j, re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios xkajic cho, xic'uyu'saj pa̱m i pa̱t quimolom wi̱' qui̱b eh naxoquic pan ca̱mna xiyew ransil quik'orbal take nic' pa' q'uihal quimolom qui̱b ar. Chi je' aj re' xquitik ju' rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios chi ma'xta nech' ok quiyo'jic.

Nic' pa' q'uihal take quiniminic reh riC'uhbal i Dios xiban xa jenaj chic wach quic'ux, xa jenaj chic wach ca̱mna quicapew-bal. Je' wo', ma' hab ta wo' wach chi quixilac xik'or ta nak chi re' pa' bih wilic reh, xa reh ta nak chi rutquel, xiban la' chi queh chi quiwach pan comonil.

Je' aj re' ru', re' take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus yohbal wach quitobjic nbanaric ru'um Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios nanquik'or ribiral i kAja̱w Jesus chi xuctic wo' chic chi quixilac camnak, je' wo' xitobjic take chi ribanaric take lok' laj nawa̱l.

Je' wo' chic, ru̱c' ribanaric chi xa jenaj wach quic'ux take aj niminel, ma' hab ta wach jeno' chi quixilac c'axic ta nak riban maj nanquic'ayej cho quipa̱t on quiye'a̱b, pan comonil nquic'ux i ritz'akil i pa' bih nquic'ayej cho.
Je' wo', re' ritz'akil i pa' bih nquic'ayej, nquic'am je chi quiwach take aj nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus reh chi re' take re' quipuhcunic reh chi quina̱ take quich aj niminel re' c'axic ti nca'n.

Junpech aj cho naxchalic jenaj c'axquil chi quina̱ take aj niminel, wilic take aj niminel xquic'ayej je pa' bih queh je' ricab xiban aj niminel aj Chi̱pire je' ru̱c' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Lewih re' Chep ribihnal eh Wernaweh wo' ribihnej cu'um take cablaj chi nahsil. Re' Wernaweh wili re' “aj ye'ol sukquil c'uxlis” nelic wi̱' ribihnal,
naxic'ayej cho junseht rac'a̱l, xic'am cho ritz'akil eh xik'ahsaj chi manlic wach pan quik'ab take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus.
Raj nchel i jenaj chic winak re' Anani̱yas ribihnal rich'i̱l i rehq'ue̱n re' Sapi̱ra ribihnal, naxquic'ayej cho junseht quiye'a̱b

xquitik'a̱' wach chi quiwach chi naquesam lok so' ru̱c' ritz'akil i quiye'a̱b re're'. Je' re' ajic xa re' ti nic' pa' nimal i tumi̱n xca̱j chi naquik'ahsam, xa chic ti re're' xic'am cho Anani̱yas chi quiwach take cablaj chi nahsil eh xik'ahsaj cok pan quik'ab chi xa je' wo' ti chic manlic wach i tumi̱n re're'.

Je' re' k'uru' naxik'ahsaj cok i tumi̱n re're' je' wili xk'ormojic reh ru'um ma' Luch: «Anani̱yas, k'e̱' c'ahbil ano'jbal. Re' hat xayew riye'a̱b aj Yahm pan awa̱mna ru̱c' chi xachuc k'oric chiwach i Lok' laj Uxlabal eh je' wo' chi c'ahchi' achucum k'oric yu'na ru̱c' ricanabjic cho awu̱c' i nic' pa' q'uihal i tumi̱n xawesaj lok ru̱c' ritz'akil aye'a̱b xac'ayej je. Re' xa'n re're' ma' holohic ta

maj re' awac'a̱l ma' ta xac'ayej je, xa cu pan ak'ab wo' nak wilic eh yu'na chi xac'ayej chic je, xa pan ak'ab wo' wilic riye'eric i nic' pa' nak q'uihal ritz'akil nawa̱j ayeb pan ac'ux. Je' re' on ma' je' ta re' chaweh? Je' aj re' ma' holohic ta so' xa'n chi xatik'a̱' wach pan ac'ux ribanaric i chucuj k'oric wili maj ma' xa ta chi kawach i hoj xachuc k'oric til la' wo' chiwach i Dios xa'n i chucuj k'oric, nqui xk'ormojic reh ru'um ma' Luch.

Xa chic wo' re' xicohlaj ribirmijic take k'oric re're' i Anani̱yas, xk'ehbic ti je wach ac'al chi camnak chic ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal. Chi je' re' chi'nchel take xibirinic reh chaj bih xiban i Lok' laj Uxlabal ru̱c' Anani̱yas, k'e̱' naxoquic cho quiyo'jic.
Nok camnak aj chic i Anani̱yas, wilic take q'uijolak xi'oquic chi ribotoric pan jenaj tz'ih eh naxquesaj lok xi'o̱j chi rimuk'unjic.
Chiri̱j chic ru' je' na chic xib o̱ra c'ulu̱j cho re're', re' rehq'ue̱n Anani̱yas Sapi̱ra ribihnal, xo̱j c'olok cu̱c' take aj c'amol be̱h chi ma'xta so' pa ric'ux chaj bih xc'ulmujic lok.

Ar je' wili xk'ormojic reh ru'um ma' Luch: «Ti' Sapi̱ra, coric na xik'or abahi̱l chi re' aye'a̱b xac'ayej tak, je' na wili ritz'akil xayew tak wi̱'? nqui ma' Luch. —Ho̱', coric. Je' re' tz'akil xkac'ayej wi̱', nqui ti' Sapi̱ra.

Nok je' re' xik'or je' wo' chic wili xk'ormojic reh ru'um ma' Luch: «Ma' nech' holohic xa'n tak chi xa'n tak xa jenaj wach no'jbal ru̱c' rik'ormojic chi je' wili: ‹C'uhtbal lok chi re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios ma' re' ta ye'ol ti'c'axic kachuc k'oric chiwach, tiqui tak. «Rehtalil aj chi re' cok i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Dios til ye'ol ti'c'axic, yu'na re' chic i hat na̱wesmejic lok cu'um take q'uijolak xic'ulic lok pan ocbal reh pa̱t wili, re' xiponic muk'unok cho reh abahi̱l, nqui xk'ormojic reh.

Xa chiwach wo' ti junc'am re're' rihpimaj je wach ac'al eh xquimic ar chiwach ma' Luch. Je' re' nok naxi'oquic cok take q'uijolak re're', xquirak i Sapi̱ra chi camnak chic eh naxquesaj lok xi'o̱j wo' chic chi rimuk'unjic chi riche̱l re' xquimuk'a̱' wi̱' ribahi̱l.
Naxelic aj ribiral riquimic i Anani̱yas ch'i̱l i Sapi̱ra, yohbal wach yo'jic xoquic cho cu̱c' comonil moloj wach aj niminel, ch'i̱l take nic' nimal xibirinic reh xc'ulmujic re're'.

Chi je' aj re' ru', re' take cablaj chi nahsil aj c'amol be̱h yohbal wach lok' laj nawa̱l c'ahchi' ca'nam rehtalil chi til coric wach i quik'orbal. Je' wo', re' take re' xquitik ju' rimoloric qui̱b chi chi̱' i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, ar chi chi̱' mujbal “Salomon” ribihnal, chi rik'ormojic ribiral Jesus queh tinamit chi xa jenaj wach quic'ux.

Chi quixilac take tinamit re're' wilic take k'e̱' quiyo'jic chi rimoloric qui̱b cu̱c' take cablaj chi nahsil aj c'amol be̱h, to̱b ta nak wilic wo' take xa nsahchic chic quic'ux ru̱c' nca'n take aj c'amol be̱h re're'.
Cu'um aj take cablaj chi nahsil c'amol be̱h re're' xq'uihic wach quicomonil take quiniminic reh rik'orbal kAja̱w Jesus maj q'uihal take chi winak chi ixok qui'oquic chi niminic

eh je' wo' yohbal wach take lok' laj nawa̱l xbanaric cu'um take c'amol be̱h re're'. Ru'um aj re', re' take tinamit aj Jerusalen xquiyew je wach tak ch'aht i quiyowa̱b eh xquic'am je chi chi̱' tak be̱h reh chi na ic'ok ponok ma' Luch to̱b ta xa re' rina̱ch encutbic chi quina̱,

equicowjic nic' nimal take yowa'i̱b. Je' aj re' k'uru' q'uihal take yowa̱b i̱b aj Jerusalen xicowjic je' ricab wo' xquic'ul take nic' q'uihal take yowa'i̱b ch'i̱l take wilic ma' tob laj uxlabal cu̱c' re' xic'amaric cho pan tak tinamit wilque̱b lok chi' ric'ula't i Jerusalen.

Nok re' ribiral xca'n take cablaj chi c'amol be̱h xponic ru̱c' nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios, xjohtic ric'a̱ ch'i̱l take rich ricomonil je' ru̱c' ca̱' qui'sil cho aj k'ahsem si̱ Saroc eh xquitok' quibe̱h chi ribanaric ti'c'axic queh cablaj re're'.
Je' re' nok xtak'abjic quichoporic take cablaj chi nahsil aj c'amol be̱h eh xic'amaric je pan che̱' reh chi naquimayam nak c'uhbalanic.

Xa re' la' chiwach wo' chak'ab re're' jenaj aj tz'e' wa̱ch i kAja̱w Dios nchalic pan taxa̱j xiteh take tz'ahp tz'apalque̱b wi̱' take cablaj chi nahsil aj c'amol be̱h eh je' wili xik'or queh naxesaj take lok:
«Hiy tak chi chi̱' i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios eh natiwih'ok tak ar chak'or tak queh tinamit ribiral i c'acharic riyew kAja̱w Jesus, nqui xik'or queh.

Je' aj re', re' xa cu wahk'ek wo' ti xi'oquic cok take cablaj re're' chi chi̱' i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios eh xquip'ut rik'ormojic i k'oric xc'ulic k'ormojok queh ru'um raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios. Nok je' aj re' c'ahchi'que̱b take cablaj re're', re' nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ ch'i̱l ricomonil xiyuk'ej take pan jenaj moloj i̱b quich'i̱l take nimak quiwach chi quixilac take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, ch'i̱l wo' chi'nchel take raj cojol no'jbal eh nok mololque̱b chic take chi'nchel, xitak'a̱' je take riso̱l ar pan che̱' chi ric'amaric cho take cablaj chi c'amol be̱h chi narich'ukuric nak k'oric chi quina̱,
xa re' la' naxiponic ar ma' xirakmajic ta chic pan che̱' take cablaj re're'. Chi je' re' xisoljic wo' chic cho take cha'jem tz'ahpel cu̱c' take xitak'anic je queh eh je' wili xc'ulic quik'or:

«Re' hoj naxojponic pan che̱' xkarak take tz'ahp chi til wo' lutz'ulque̱b chi coric, je' wo' take cha'janel til wo' c'acha̱ch quiwach chi cha'janic chi chi̱' tak tz'ahp xa re' la' naxkateh cok i tz'ahp re' tz'apalque̱b nak wi̱' take cablaj chi c'amol be̱h ma' hab ta chic wach queh xkarak ar, nqui xquik'or.

Re' nahsil re're' quich'i̱l take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱, quich'i̱l wo' c'amol quibe̱h take aj cha'jem i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, naxquibiraj chi je' re' je' wili xquik'or chi quiwach: «Chaj bih xc'uluric cu̱c' take cablaj re're' k'uru'? nqui xquik'or.

Xa cu k'oric pe wo' nca'n xo̱j c'olok jenaj winak chi rik'ormojic queh chi je' wili: «Re' take winak xacoj tak pan che̱' ar pe' wo' chic wilque̱b chi chi̱' i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios. Ar c'ahchi' quic'uhbalem take tinamit, nqui queh.

Nok k'oro̱j chic queh re're', re' c'amol quibe̱h take aj cha'jem reh Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios xic'am je take riso̱l chi quichoporic take cablaj chi c'amol be̱h eh naxi'o̱j rakmajok, pa ricorquilal xic'amaric cho ru'um chi re' take sol quiyo'jic chi quiwach take tinamit chi equik'ojoric chi abaj.
Nok pa'alque̱b chic take cablaj re're' chi quiwach take nimak quiwach re're', re' nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ je' wili xik'or queh:

«Re' hat-tak ma' xanimej ta tak kak'orbal naxkak'or aweh tak chi ma'xta chic ak'orom tak c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus. Chi je' re' k'uru' re' C'uhbal nak'or tak chiri̱j ru', xa haj reh katinami̱t Jerusalen c'ahchi' ribirmijic. Ma' xa re' ta re', c'ahchi' la' wo' ak'orom tak lok chi quiwach i tinamit chi re' hoj xojcansanic reh rik'ebil laj winak re're', nqui nahsil aj k'ahsem si̱.
Chalic ma' Luch je' wili xik'or pan quibihnal take rich nahsil chi c'amol be̱h: «Chi keh hoj til curman chi re' Dios nakanimem chiwach chi naca̱t kanimem hat-tak kich winak.

Je' aj re' ma' riban ta chi keh hoj chi enkacana̱' rik'ormojic ribiral i Jesus. Coric, re' Jesus re're' xtak'abjic cho chi naricansjic ar wach curu̱s awu'um hat-tak, xa re' la' ru' xucsjic wo' chic chi quixilac take camnak ru'um kaDios lok'omaj wo' cho cu'um take kama̱m kati't.

Chiri̱j chi xiban chi je' re', re' Dios re' k'e̱' rinimal rajawric, xiyew wo' rilok'il chi K'atal K'oric je' wo' chi Aj Co'lonel reh chi re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel enkajal wach kano'jbal je' wo', reh chi encuyuric kamahc.
Chiri̱j aj nic' nimal xiban i Dios wili ru̱c' Jesus, re' hoj c'ahchi' kayeb kachi̱' chi kich'i̱l i Lok' laj Uxlabal re' ye'o̱j wo' cho ru'um i Dios queh take quiniminic reh, nqui ma' Luch.
Naxquibiraj chi je' re' xk'ormojic queh take nic' pa' q'uihal take quimolom qui̱b ar, k'e̱' naxchalic quic'a̱ eh xca̱j nak quicansam take cablaj chi c'amol be̱h re're'.

Ar aj ru' chalic jenaj aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses je' ru̱c' wilic pan quicomonil take cow laj aj niminel reh c'uhbal re're', Camalyel ribihnal xpa'lajic johtok chi quixilac take mololque̱b ar. Re' winak wili re' wilic riwa'ric chi quiwach take tinamit xipahkaj chi xi'esmejic lok junc'am take cablaj re're'
eh chiri̱j chic ru' je' wili xik'or queh ricomonil: «Hat-tak wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, chayohbalej awi̱b tak ru̱c' na̱banam tak queh winak wili.

C'olok pan ac'ux tak chi ja' naht ta wo' re' Te̱wras re' xik'or chi wilic rajawric chi naritahkaljic, junik'ob (400) chi tinamit xi'oquic chi ritahkaljic xa re' la' naxcansjic je ru', xquipuhclom qui̱b take nic' nimal quitahkanic reh eh chi je' re' xo̱j wach ac'al ricomonil ximol wach.

Je' wo' chic re' xic'ul i Ju̱ras re' chalanak ar Calile̱ya, q'uihal wo' take tinamit xitahkanic reh pa rik'ijil cho ajlanic i̱b tak'amaj rik'ormojic ru'um i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma xa re' la' naxquimic wo' je ru', xquipuhcaj wo' qui̱b take xitahkanic reh.

Je' aj re' ru' nik'or aweh tak chi chacana̱' tak take winak re're', re' quic'uhbalanic chiri̱j i Jesus eh ma̱min awi̱b tak cu̱c'. Je' re' nik'or maj re' camanic nca'n ru̱c' quic'uhbalanic, wi xa pan quic'ux nchalic xa narojic wo' wach ac'al.

Tz'a̱b aj ru' wi re' Dios xtak'anic queh ribanaric, ma'eta riban chi enkapit queh ribanaric re're'. Chayohbalej awi̱b tak k'uru' maj chaj bih na̱na'bem tak chi ru'um re're', c'ahchi' ok nchel acojom awi̱b tak chi raj ixowonel i Dios? nqui xik'or queh rich'i̱l.

Nok quibiram aj chic i xik'or i ma' Camalyel, re' take rich'i̱l re're' xquic'u'lej na̱ xik'or eh chi je' re' ma' xquicapaj ta chic pan ca̱mna quicansjic take cablaj chi nahsil re're'. Re' cok ru', re' take re' xquik'o'rej wo' chic cok take cablaj chi nahsil eh nok wilque̱b chic cok chi quiwach, xquiyew i tak'anic queh take sol chi xiye'eric chi tz'uhu̱m. Cu chiri̱j aj chic re', xi'ok'tjic je eh xk'ormojic je queh chi ma'xta chic ca'nam c'uhbalanic chiri̱j i Jesus maj wi xca'n wo' chic naquiye'eric wo' chic chi tz'uhu̱m.

Re' take cablaj chi nahsil re're' xi'elic cho chi quiwach take re're' chi xa suk chic pan quic'ux ru̱c' i Dios. Je' re' xca'n maj pa ricapew-bal cho Dios ric'ul chi queh i lok'il chi ric'uluric ti'c'axic chiri̱j,

ma' xquicana̱' ta c'uhbalanic chiri̱j i Jesus xquitik la' ju' quic'uhtunic chi re're' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' re' xca'n nok kalakal nquimol qui̱b chi chi̱' i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios on pan quipa̱t take quich aj niminel.

Chipam aj wo' take cho k'i̱j nok c'ahchi' rijohtic wach riq'uihal aj niminel, re' take aj niminel quik'oric pan criye̱co xo̱j quik'or cu̱c' cablaj chi nahsil c'amol be̱h chaj bih c'ahchi'que̱b take aj niminel quik'oric pan hewre̱yo. Je' aj wili xo̱j quik'or: «Re' take cahnel ixok quik'oric pan kak'orbal ma' c'ahchi' ta quic'ulum i to'bal npuhcjic kalakal cu'um take niminel quik'oric pan hewre̱yo. Ru'um aj re', re' ok chic hat-tak tipuhcunok tak reh to'bal nye'eric, nqui take cok.

Naxquibiraj chi je' re' c'ahchi' ric'uluric, re' take cablaj chi nahsil aj c'amol be̱h xquimol wach chi'nchel take aj niminel eh je' wili xquik'or: «Re' hoj c'amol be̱h ma' riwi̱' ta chi keh chi enkacana̱' lok wulu' i kacamaj chi rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios reh chi re' chic i to'bonic nye'eric queh take cahnel ixok enkilow.

Ru'um aj re', re' hat-tak kas kacha̱k' chasic' chaxilac tak wuku̱b ok chi aj niminel je' ru̱c' til wilic quino'jbal chi manlic ru'um chi wilic i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios cu̱c'. Je' wo' holohic ok wo' ribiral quic'acharic chi quiwach i tinamit reh chi re' take re' equichopbic reh i camanic reh ripuhcjic i to'bal chi quina̱ take cahnel ixok.

Je' re' nipahkaj aweh chi na̱banam tak reh chi re' hoj enkachop kac'ux chiri̱j i kacamaj chi rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios, je' wo' chi ribanaric johtok kati̱j chiwach, nqui take cablaj chi c'amol be̱h.

Je' re' ajic re' take aj niminel xic'ul quic'ux re' xquik'or take cablaj re're' eh xquichih lok take winak je' wili quibihnal: Re' Te̱wan, jenaj winak cow ric'ux chi niminic ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal, re' Peh, re' Porco̱ro, re' Nicanor, re' Timon, re' Parme̱nas ch'i̱l i Cola̱x nchalic ar Antiyoqui̱ya re' najtir rip'utum cho ric'amaric na̱ quic'uhbal take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.

Chiri̱j re're' nok chiho̱j chic lok quiwach take wuku̱b chi aj niminel re're' xic'amaric cho chi quiwach take cablaj chi nahsil aj c'amol be̱h, reh chi xquicoj quik'ab chi quina̱ eh je' wo' chi ribanaric i ti̱j chi quina̱.

Chi je' aj re' xq'uihbic wach take c'acharel quibirinic reh riC'uhbal i Dios xquitik ju' rik'ormojic take cablaj chi c'amol be̱h re're' quich'i̱l take quich aj niminel eh ru̱c' re're', k'e̱' wo' naxq'uihbic wach i quicomonil take aj niminel ar Jerusalen. Ma' xa re' ta wo' re're' xc'uluric, q'uih la' wo' take aj k'ahsem si̱ xquinimej i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i kAja̱w Jesus.

Chipam take k'i̱j re're' xc'uluric wo' chi re' Te̱wan re' jenaj queh wuku̱b chi aj niminel chiho̱j quiwach, k'e̱' take lok' laj nawa̱l riban chi quixilac take tinamit c'uhtbal queh chi til coric i c'uhbalanic riban. Ma' xa re' ta re', je' la' wo' k'e̱' wo' rajawric i rik'orbal wilic chi c'uhbalanic ru'um chi re' rato'bil i Dios wilic china̱.

Ru'um aj take lok' laj nawa̱l riban i Te̱wan re're', wilic take winak je' ru̱c' nquimol qui̱b chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses “Molbal qui̱b take esemaj cho pan ti' laj camanic” ribihnal, xi'oquic chi risolc'jic pa ri̱j rik'orbal. Chi quixilac take winak wili wilque̱b take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chalanak take ar Sire̱ne, ar Alejantri̱ya, ch'i̱l chalanak take pa riyuk'ul Sili̱sya, ch'i̱l wo' pa riyuk'ul i A̱sya.
Re' take winak re're' k'uru', ru'um chi ma' xca'n ta canar risolc'jic pa ri̱j rik'orbal i Te̱wan ru̱c' rino'jbal nye'eric reh ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal,

chi tz'akbal rimahc, xquitoj juntuhm chi c'acharel chi je' wili chucuj k'oric naca'nam chiri̱j: «Re' hoj kabiram i Te̱wan wili chi c'ahchi' rik'orom ma' holohic ta laj k'oric chiri̱j rik'orbal i Dios k'oro̱j cho ru'um Moyses, nqui take chi chucuj k'oric.

Je' re' nok re' xquik'or re're' xiban chi re' take tinamit xibirinic reh, ch'i̱l take nimak quiwach chi quina̱ i tinamit, ch'i̱l wo' take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, yohbal wach naxjohtic quic'a̱ eh ru'um re' xo̱j quichop i Te̱wan pan ehtil eh xquic'am cho chiwach quicomonil take nahsil chipam katinami̱t re' chopo̱j na̱ ru'um i nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱.

Ar aj ru' re' take xitojmojic chi naquiyeb quichi̱' chi chucuj k'oric je' wili xquik'or cok: «Re' winak wili ma' ricana̱' ta so' ribanaric ma' holohic ta laj k'oric rik'or lok chiri̱j Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios je' wo' chiri̱j i C'uhbal ye'o̱j reh Moyses.

Je' wo', til kabiram wo' chi c'ahchi' rik'orom chi re' pa̱t wili naribokoric ru'um i Jesus re' ribihnej chi aj Nasaret. Ma' xa re' ta re', xkabiraj la' wo' ru̱c' chi re' Jesus naribanam wo' chi re' no'jbal hat-tak tijimaj wi̱' pa ric'uhbal i Moyses narijalaric wach, nqui take cok.

Naxquibiraj chi je' re', re' take nahsil quimolom qui̱b xa cow chic xquitz'ehtaj i Te̱wan eh ar aj ru' xquilow wo' chi xiban xa nrepretic chic i rilbal xa je' chic ricab rilbal jeno' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios nchalic pan taxa̱j.
Chiri̱j chic re', re' nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ je' wili xik'or reh Te̱wan: «Coric na take k'oric c'ahchi' quik'orom chawi̱j? nqui reh.

Re' Te̱wan chi rico'ljic ri̱b chiwach take k'oric nquitz'ak chiri̱j ru̱c' i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, je' wili k'oric xiban queh: «Hat-tak wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, ch'i̱l hat-tak nahsil china̱ katinami̱t, chabiraj tak i nanik'orom wili: Nok re' kama̱m ma' Awraham cu c'acharic pe riban cho pa riyuk'ul i Mesopota̱mya nok ja' no̱j ta c'acharok ar Haran, re' lok' laj kaDios xic'uhtaj ri̱b reh pan jenaj rinimal wach risakomal
eh je' wili xik'or reh: ‹Awraham, chacana̱' cahnok i ye'a̱b wili ch'i̱l take pa' aweh ayu' eh ar chic hiy chipam jenaj toco̱m chic ye'a̱b re' nanik'orom aweh, nqui xik'or reh.

Je' aj re' xelic cho chipam i yuk'ul re' Calte̱ya ribihnal eh ar chic xi'o̱j c'acharok chipam i tinamit Haran ribihnal. Ar aj chipam i tinamit re're', nok camnak chic je raja̱w i Awraham, re' Dios xik'or reh chi narichalic chipam i yuk'ul wili re' c'achalco̱j wi̱' yu'na i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.

To̱b ta wo' re' Dios je' re' xik'or reh ma' Awraham, xa ta nak xye'eric junseht ok riye'a̱b ru'um i Dios naxc'ulic lok chi c'acharic ayu'. Re' cok ru' re' Dios xiyew rik'orbal reh chi je' wili: ‹Til niyew nik'orbal aweh chi re' take awa̱' awi'sil naquehcham i ye'a̱b wili. Je' re' naric'uluric reh chi naquilok'em niwach ayu', nqui cho reh. «Yu'na chacoj tak rehtal i wili: To̱b ta wo' re' ma' Awraham ja'xta nak cho riha'lac'u̱n chipam take cho k'i̱j re're', re' Dios til wo' xik'or cho reh chi je' re' naribanam ru̱c' ra̱' ri'sil.

Je' wo', re' Dios xik'or wo' reh chi je' wili: ‹Chiwach junik'ob (400) ha̱b re' take awa̱' awi'sil nacojic c'acharok cho chipam jenaj toco̱m chic tinamit. Ar naquicojoric pan cow laj camanic chi ma'xta quitojbal eh ma'xta wo' riqueteljic quiwach.

Nok iq'uinak chic lok rik'ijil quiwih'ic chipam i tinamit re' naquicojoric wi̱' chi cow laj camanic, re' hin Dios naniyeb ti'c'axic china̱ i tinamit re're'. Cu chiri̱j aj re' naquelic wo' chic cho take awa̱' awi'sil chipam i tinamit re're' eh ayu' chic chipam i yuk'ul wili naqui̱nquilok'em, nqui xik'or cho reh.

«Nok re' Dios xiyew rik'orbal reh ma' Awraham, xipahkaj wo' reh chi narik'atam lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ric'achanbal. Chi je' re', re' ma' Awraham ch'i̱l take ra̱' ri'sil eh ch'i̱l wo' take cac'u̱n ra̱' ri'sil cho ru', je' re' naca'nam chi rehtalil chi xic'u'lej ri̱b quik'orbal ch'i̱l i Dios chi naquilok'em wach ch'i̱l take ra̱' ri'sil cho ru'. Ru'um aj re', re' ma' Awraham naxasjic i rac'u̱n re' Isahac ribihnal, xik'at wo' lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ric'achanbal i rac'u̱n pa riwahxak k'i̱j rasjic. Re' chic Isahac je' wo' re' xiban ru̱c' rac'u̱n, re' Jacow ribihnal. Re' Jacow je' wo' re' xiban cu̱c' take cablaj chi rac'u̱n re' xtz'uhcric cho wi̱' take cablaj ch'uk chi ra̱' ri'sil.

«Chi quixilac take pe̱t lajeb rac'u̱n i Jacow xoquic cho ch'i'c pan ca̱mna chiri̱j i quicha̱k' Chep. Ru'um aj re' xquic'ayej je quicha̱k' queh take ju'jun aj yaco̱l re' xic'ayanic wo' chic reh chi aj tz'e' wa̱ch ar pan tinamit Eji̱pto. Re' cok ru', re' Dios ma' xicana̱' ta chi rutquel i Chep ar Eji̱pto,

xito'bej la' chipam take ti'c'axic xiq'uic wi̱'. Ma' xa re' ta re' xiban, xiyew la' wo' rino'jbal chi xirak rilok'il chiwach i k'atal k'oric aj Eji̱pto. Til wo' chic k'e̱' nim rilok'il xwih'ic chiwach chi xipahba̱' chi raj to'o̱l chi k'atoj k'oric china̱ ritinami̱t eh je' wo' chi aj ilol china̱ take pa' bih wilic reh.

Chi je' aj re' ricamaj, pan jenaj k'i̱j xc'uluric cho chi re' take tinamit pa riyuk'ul i Eji̱pto ch'i̱l wo' take tinamit ayu' Canahan re' yuk'ul wilco̱j wi̱' yu'na, k'e̱' ti' xquilow wach ru'um reh jenaj rinimal wi'jalel re' xbanic chi re' take kama̱m kati't xa ta nak chic chi lok' xquirak quiwa' chipam i quiyuk'ul.

Ru'um aj re', re' Jacow naxeht'alij chi ar Eji̱pto wilic cho wi'c, xitak'a̱' je take lajeb chi rac'u̱n chi rilok'oric quiwa' ar. «Re' take re' naxiponic chipam i tinamit re're' ma' xquina'bej ta wach i quicha̱k' Chep naxquilow wach pan pe̱t,

cu re' la' chic pa rica'pech nok re' Chep xik'or ri̱b queh take ras, cu re' chic ar xquirak chiri̱j chi re' po' nchel quicha̱k' wilic ar chi raj to'o̱l i k'atal k'oric. Je' wo', xiyew wo' chi eht'aljic reh k'atal k'oric hab wach i raja̱w, hab wach take ras je' wo' hab wach i richa̱k'.

Naxeht'alij re're' i k'atal k'oric, xiyew k'ab reh Chep chi xitak'a̱' je ric'amaric raja̱w re' Jacow ch'i̱l take ru̱c' take cho. Je' aj re' riwi̱' k'uru' chi re' take ho'lajuj ricajwinak (75) chi c'acharel xquimol je qui̱b re're'
xi'o̱j c'acharok ar Eji̱pto. «Chipam i tinamit re're' xc'uluric chi re' kaj najtir k'i̱j ma' Jacow ch'i̱l take rac'u̱n, xponic rik'ijil chi xiquimic je chi quiju'junal.

Xa re' la' ma' Jacow ch'i̱l i Chep re' rac'u̱n, ma' re' ta wo' ar ximuk'unjic. Re' ma' Jacow xc'amaric je chi xo̱j muk'unjok ar chipam i ye'a̱b re' lok'o̱j ru'um i rima̱m re' ma' Awraham eh re' Chep xc'amaric je chi xo̱j muk'unjok chipam i junseht ye'a̱b ar Siquem re' lok'o̱j cho ru'um i ma' Jacow cu̱c' take rac'u̱n i jenaj winak Hamor ribihnal.

«Chiri̱j wili nok camnak chic ma' Jacow ch'i̱l take chi'nchel rac'u̱n, p'uht aj roquic cho rik'ijil chi nariponic wach i xik'or cho i Dios reh ma' Awraham chi je' wili: ‹Re' hin til niyew nik'orbal aweh chi re' take awa̱' awi'sil naquehcham quiyuk'ul take aj Canahan, nqui xik'or cho reh. «Je' re' nok xc'uluric chi re' take cho kama̱m kati't nok c'ahchi' quimoljic ar Eji̱pto, xa xquitic wo' qui̱b chi ma'xta bih npitbic queh.
Je' aj re' riwi̱' c'acharic xca'n cu rehtal xoquic cho jenaj k'atal k'oric aj Eji̱pto re' ma' xeht'alij ta ribiral chiri̱j ric'acharic i Chep.

Re' k'atal k'oric re're' xoquic chi quijot'oric take kaj najtir k'i̱j ru̱c' riye'eric cow laj camanic chi quina̱ reh chi ma'xta chic quitiquim qui̱b. Ma' xa ta re're' xquic'ul pan k'ab, k'e̱' la' wo' ti'quilal xquilow wach maj naxk'ormojic queh chi ma'xta chic quic'a'chsam take cuc' cac'u̱n, tok'lic npon quicana̱' cho quiha'lac'u̱n pan jeno' ye'a̱b reh chi ar naquiquimic chi cutquel.
«Je' aj re' chipam cho ric'axquilal take k'i̱j re're' xasjic jenaj t'uch ac'un k'e̱' c'axbal wach chiwach i Dios, Moyses ribihnal. Re're' nok q'uihsimaj chic xib poh ru'um ritu̱t raja̱w ar pan pa̱t,

xponic wo' cahnok cho pan jenaj ye'a̱b re' nariquimic nak wi̱' chi rutquel xa re' la' tz'eht xponic rakmajok ru'um rixk'u̱n i k'atal k'oric aj Eji̱pto, re' xc'ambic je reh chi nariq'uihsam chi je' riwi̱' jenaj rac'u̱n chiwach.
Re' Moyses wili k'uru' naxq'uihic chic so', xtijiljic ru̱c' nic' nimal quino'jbal take aj Eji̱pto eh ru'um re're' k'e̱' ye'o̱j rilok'il ru̱c' take k'oric rik'or je' wo' re' ru̱c' take camanic riban.
«Pan jenaj k'i̱j re' Moyses nok wilic chic reh ca'winak (40) ha̱b, xc'ulic pa ric'ux rilmijic nic' wach wilque̱b take ras richa̱k' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.

Nok wilic chic ponok i Moyses chi rilmijic take rich tinamit, xilow chi jenaj aj Eji̱pto c'ahchi' rik'ojom jenaj rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh ru'um re' xoquic chi rico'ljic i ras richa̱k' re're', xa re' la' chic ru' naxiban nak ti rijelow-bal reh, xa quimic xiban aj Eji̱pto pan k'ab.

Naxilow chi je' re' i Moyses, je' wili xik'or pa ric'ux: ‹Ru̱c' xniban wili, naquirakam chiri̱j take was nicha̱k' chi ru̱c' wo̱k nik'ab i hin re' Dios naresam take pan ti'c'axic, nqui xik'or pa ric'ux. «Re' take ras richa̱k' ma' xquirak ta chiri̱j chi je' re'.

Je' re' nik'or maj je' chic ikal je' wili xc'uluric: Re' Moyses xo̱j rirak take quib kich katinami̱t chi k'abisinic nca'n eh je' wili xik'or nak ti queh chi ch'akbal quiwach pan sukquil c'uxlis: ‹Hat-tak was nicha̱k', xa atinamital awi̱b tak. Ma' riban ta chi c'ahchi' aseq'uem awi̱b tak, nqui queh.

«Naxich'ak nak ti quiwach je' pe' chic wili xk'ormojic reh ru'um i jenaj re' c'ahchi' risec'bic reh rich'i̱l chi ma' xa̱j ta ribiram k'oric chiwach i Moyses: ‹Hab ti wach pahbanic aweh i hat chi aj nahsil eh chi aj ch'ukul wach mahc chi kana̱ i hoj?
Ma' re' ta na nchel nicansjic wo' chic nawa̱j je' ricab xa'n reh aj Eji̱pto e̱w? nqui xik'or reh.

«Naxibiraj chi je' re', re' Moyses xoquic cho riyo'jic ru'um chi xirak chiri̱j chi ma' xpohyic ta na̱ ribano̱j. Ru'um re', xirupej je elic chipam i tinamit Eji̱pto eh xo̱j c'acharok pa riyuk'ul i Maryan chi quixilac take ma' re' ta ritinami̱t. Ar aj ru' xirak rehq'ue̱n eh xi'asjic quib quiha'lac'u̱n.

«Nok ca'winak chic ha̱b riwih'ic chi c'acharic ar Maryan, pan jenaj k'i̱j nok re' Moyses wilic ar chipam jenaj ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel ar pa ric'ula't i ye'a̱b Yu̱k' Sinayih ribihnal, re' Dios xic'uhtaj ri̱b reh chi je' ricab riwi̱' jeno' raj tz'e' wa̱ch wilque̱b ar pan taxa̱j. Re're' xic'uhtaj ri̱b reh pan yejal jenaj cak q'ui̱x koplic rik'ak'il.
Naxilow i Moyses i cak q'ui̱x che̱' re' xkop rik'ak'il, k'e̱' naxsahchic ric'ux ru'um. Chi je' re' nok c'ahchi' rijilim cok ri̱b ru̱c', xibiraj chi xk'oric cho i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Dios chi je' wili:

‹Re' hin, hin i Dios re' ric'u'lem cho ri̱b kak'orbal ch'i̱l i ma' Awraham, ch'i̱l i ma' Isahac ch'i̱l wo' i ma' Jacow, nqui xibiraj. «Ru̱c' re're', re' Moyses xoquic cho ribarbatic ma' xa̱j ta chic ritz'ehtam je k'a̱k' ru'um riyo'jic.

Ar ajic xk'o'rjic wo' chic cho ru'um i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Dios chi je' wili: ‹Moyses, re' ye'a̱b pa'alca̱t wi̱' ayu', re're' jenaj ye'a̱b lo̱k' reh lok'onbal wi̱n. Chawesaj lok aper-xijab k'uru' rehtalil chi c'ahchi' ayeb nilok'il, nqui xik'or cho reh.

«Chiri̱j re', je' wo' chic wili xik'or i Dios reh Moyses: ‹Ru'um chi xwilow take cho ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi k'e̱' ti'quil c'ahchi' quilom wach cu'um take aj Eji̱pto eh je' wo' ru'um chi xnibiraj jok chi k'e̱' q'ueric cho quichi̱' wu̱c' reh chi nanito'bem take chipam i ti' wilque̱b wi̱', re' hin xinc'ulic lok chi quitobjic. Ru'um aj re' chajil cho awi̱b maj re' hat naca̱t nitak'a̱b je ar Eji̱pto chi aj esenel queh nitinami̱t pan ti'c'axic, nqui reh.

«To̱b ta chi quixilac take rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilic take ma' xca̱j ta quibiram k'oric chiwach i Moyses je' ricab xca'n take qui̱b xik'oric reh chi hab wach xpahbanic reh chi aj nahsil eh chi aj ch'ukul wach mahc chi quina̱, ru̱c' xik'or i Dios re're' nc'utunic chi re' Moyses re' aj re' i pahbamaj ru'um Dios chi nahsil aj esem queh rich ritinami̱t pan ti'c'axic nok ar chipam jenaj cak q'ui̱x koplic cho rik'ak'il xic'uhtaj ri̱b reh chi je' riwi̱' jeno' raj tz'e' wa̱ch.

Je' re' k'uru' re' Moyses xesenic cho queh take kich katinami̱t ar Eji̱pto najtir k'i̱j. Je' wo' chi c'uhtbal reh chi tak'amaj je ru'um i Dios, re're' yohbal wach take lok' laj nawa̱l xiban je' ricab xiban ru̱c' i ma' laj ha' “Cak Ha'” ribihnal on je' ricab take xiban chiwach ca'winak ha̱b re' xbehic wi̱' pan ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel ch'i̱l take q'uihal rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.

Re' Moyses re're', je' wo' wili xik'or cho queh kama̱m kati't: ‹Re' kaDios re' kojbirinic chiwach chi ajabe̱s chi kana̱ nariyeb chi asjic chi quixilac take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel i jenaj c'acharel re' naribanam chi aj k'orol reh ric'uhbal je' ricab c'ahchi' nibanam i hin yu'na. Chanimej tak k'uru' chaj bih narik'orom aweh tak aj k'orol c'uhbal re're', nqui cho queh. «To̱b ta wo' nak xk'ormojic cho queh ru'um i Moyses chi re're' jenaj aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios,

re' take kama̱m kati't xa ma'xta wo' nquibiraj k'oric chiwach. Chi je' re' k'uru' re' Moyses xwih'ic cho cu̱c' take kama̱m kati't naxquimol cho qui̱b chiwach i rik'ijil cho quiwih'ic chipam i ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel eh re' wo' re' xk'oric cho i ma' sahchel ta laj riK'orbal i Dios re' xic'ul cho chi keh i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ar china̱ ye'a̱b “Yu̱k' Sinayih” ribihnal naxk'o'rjic ru'um i raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xchalic ar pan taxa̱j.

«Je' re' ajic to̱b ta re' Moyses jenaj wo' aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios, re' take kama̱m kati't ma' xca̱j ta quinimem rik'orbal, xquik'eb la' lok chiri̱j quic'ux chaj bih take xik'or ch'i̱l chaj bih take xiban. Je' re' xca'n maj pan quicapew-bal ru' xiban chi xa je' na wa'ric xisoljic wo' chic je ar Eji̱pto chi rilok'onjic wo' chic wach take tiyo̱x,

je' ricab xca̱j ribanaric nok je' wili xquik'or reh ma' A̱ron: ‹Ma' A̱ron, re' rik'ebil laj Moyses re' c'amol kabe̱h xesenic cho keh ar Eji̱pto ma' keht'alim ta chaj bih xic'ul cho ar china̱ i yu̱k' xo̱j johtok wi̱'. Je' re' k'uru' koj-ato'bej chi ritik'injic take katiyo̱x reh chi re' chic take re' equic'ambic je kabe̱h chi soljic ar Eji̱pto chi tehlemaj je ku'um, nqui take reh.

«Chi je' aj re' k'uru' ru̱c' i to'bonic xiban ma' A̱ron, xtik'injic jenaj quitiyo̱x je' nca'yic rac'u̱n wacax xca'n reh. Chiwach aj chic i tiyo̱x re're' xquitok qui̱b chi riye'eric quisi̱ chiwach naxi'oquic chi rinimjic wach ru'um risukquil quic'ux chi xtihkic.

Re' cok ru' ru'um reh lok'onic tiyo̱x xca'n, re' Dios xicana̱' take eh ma' ximin ta chic ri̱b cu̱c' nok wilque̱b chic chipam ye'a̱b wili. Ru'um reh no'jbal re're' xc'uluric wo' chi re' take aj najtir cho ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, xik'eb take chipam i no'jbal chi riye'eric rilok'il i k'i̱j ch'i̱l i poh ch'i̱l wo' take ch'imi̱l wilque̱b pan taxa̱j. Ru'um aj reh no'jbal re're', xik'ahsaj wo' take pan quik'ab caj ixowonel chi naquic'amjic je chi naht, je' ricab wo' rik'orom cho i Dios chi je' wili re' xitz'ihmbaj cho jenaj queh aj k'orol riC'uhbal najtir k'i̱j: “Re' hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel naxatbehic tak cho ca'winak ha̱b chipam ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel, ma' re' ta hin xinalok'ej tak naxacansaj tak cho achico̱p chi asi̱ tak.

Je' aj wo' re' yu'na chi c'acharic chic na'n tak chipam i ye'a̱b wili, ma' re' ta hin quinalok'ej tak, re' la' chic take xacoj tak chi atiyo̱x nayew tak quilok'il je' ricab nanatehlaj tak rijalwachil rich'imilal atiyo̱x tak “Renpan” ribihnal, on nanatehlaj tak i ripatil atiyo̱x tak “Moloc” ribihnal. Ru'um chi je' re' na'n tak, re' hin Dios naca̱t wesam tak je chipam ye'a̱b wili eh cu ma' wili chic ponok chiri̱j quiyuk'ul aj Wawilo̱nya na̱wojic awic'ram awi̱b tak, nqui rik'or Hu̱j re're', nqui Te̱wan. Je' re' xik'or i Te̱wan chi rico'ljic ri̱b chiri̱j i k'oric nquitz'ak chiri̱j ru̱c' C'uhbal ye'o̱j reh Moyses.

Chiri̱j chic ru' je' wo' chic wili rico'ljic ri̱b xiban i Te̱wan chiwach i tz'akoj wach c'uta̱j nca'n chiri̱j ru', chiri̱j i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios: «Je' ricab riwi̱' i pa̱t xc'uhtjic reh Moyses china̱ i yu̱k' Sinayih, je' wo' re' riwi̱' i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' lok'onbal wi̱' wach i Dios xitik'a̱' i Moyses naxk'ormojic reh ru'um i Dios chi naritik'a̱b. Re' lok' laj pa̱t re're', re' xtik'injic ar chipam chik yu̱k' ru̱c' pi̱m laj tz'ih xwih'ic cho chi quiwach take kama̱m kati't chi jenaj ye'a̱b re' nc'utunic wi̱' chi re' Dios wilic cu̱c'.

Chi k'e̱' wo' rilok'il i lok' laj pa̱t re're' chi quiwach take ca̱' qui'sil cho kama̱m kati't naxquic'ul cho, re' lok' laj pa̱t re're' xc'amaric cho cu'um chipam i ye'a̱b wili re' xic'ulic c'acharok wi̱' nok re' Dios xit'erej lok take patanel aj ayu' nak take eh ximak' i quiye'a̱b ru̱c' ricowil ro̱k k'ab i Joswe re' c'amol quibe̱h take ca̱' qui'sil cho kama̱m kati't. «Chiri̱j ric'amaric cho ayu', re' lok' laj pa̱t re're' ma' xcahnic ta xa pan jenaj riye'a̱b xa jaljal la' nak cho riye'a̱b cu'um take katinami̱t eh je' re' xca'n cho cu rehtal xoquic cho chi k'atal k'oric i ma' Tawiy.

Re' ma' Tawiy re're' naxiyew pan ac'al take raj ixowonel ru̱c' ritobjic xbanaric ru'um i Dios, xipahkaj johtok reh chi nariye'eric cho k'ab reh chi naritik'a̱b jenaj lok' laj pa̱t re' encamanic chi jenaj ye'a̱b re' enc'utunic wi̱' chi re' Dios xa wilic wo' chi kaxilac i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Jacow.

To̱b ta wo' je' re' pahkanic xiban i ma' Tawiy chi naritik'a̱b i lok' laj pa̱t re're', ma' xye'eric ta wo' k'ab reh ru'um i Dios chi re're' naritik'inic reh, re' la' chic i Salomon re' rac'u̱n i ma' Tawiy xtik'inic reh jenaj Lok' laj Pa̱t re' narilok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios.

Je' aj re' xiban i Salomon chi reht'alim wo' nak chi re' Dios re' k'e̱' nimal rilok'il ma' npatanic ta chipam jeno' pa̱t tik'imaj xa ru'um winak, je' ricab wo' rik'orom cho ru̱c' chi̱' jenaj raj k'orol C'uhbal chi je' wili:

“Re' jeno' k'atal k'oric wi k'e̱' nimal wach rajawric, ra̱j rik'orom chi k'e̱' wo' chic nimal wach i ripa̱t ntik'injic, maje'? Je' wo' re' wu̱c' i hin, xa re' la' wi je' ta nak re' nbanaric wu̱c' i hin, nic' aj wo' nak chic nahtil na̱ i pa̱t naritik'injic wi̱n? Je' re' nik'or maj re' hin k'e̱' rinimal wach wajawric wilic chi k'atal k'oric, re're' nc'utunic chi je' re' ayu' pan taxa̱j je' wo' chi ar wach ac'al
maj chi'nchel nic' nimal wilic ayu' pan taxa̱j ch'i̱l wo' i wach ac'al nitik'inic i hin, nqui rik'orom cho i Dios, nqui Te̱wan.

Chiri̱j aj chic re', je' wili xik'or i Te̱wan queh: «Was tak nicha̱k', re' hat-tak je' wo' acab tak take cho kama̱m kati't chi rik'ehtjic awi̱b tak chiwach rik'orbal i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios maj re' take re', chi je' na nchel ma' ja' k'atoj ta lok ritz'uhmal na̱ quic'achanbal rehtalil chi naquilok'em wach i Dios, je' re' xca'n cho naxquicowsaj quic'ux eh ma' xquik'ochsaj ta qui̱b chiwach i Dios. Je' wo' chic, xquic'saj wo' lok rij quixiquin chaj bih xquik'or cho take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios.

Ru'um chi je' re' xca'n, ma' hab ta chic wach queh take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios xquicol na̱ chi ma' ta nak xca'n ti'c'axic reh, xquicansaj la' take je jarub queh xik'oric cho ribiral najtir k'i̱j chi naric'ulic lok i lok' laj Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' aj re' ru', re' hat-tak je' wo' acab tak take cho kama̱m kati't je' ru̱c' xquicansaj take cho aj k'orol c'uhbal re're' maj chipam take k'i̱j wili re' hat-tak xacansaj tak i lok' laj Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' re' xa'n tak naxak'ahsaj tak pan quik'ab take sol aj Ro̱ma eh xapahkaj tak ricansjic reh Po̱nsyo Pila̱to.

Ma' xa re' ta wo' re' xa'n tak, je' la' wo' take k'ilo̱j c'ulu̱j cho chaweh tak ru'um Moyses china̱ i yu̱k' Sinayih naxk'o'rjic cu'um take raj tz'e' wa̱ch xichalic pan taxa̱j, ma' c'ahchi' ta ac'amam tak na̱, nqui xik'or Te̱wan.
Naxquibiraj haj wilic xk'ormojic queh, re' take nahsil quimolom qui̱b ar xquic'uhtaj lok ru̱c' quilbal chi xa nwuk'ic chic cho quic'a̱ pan ca̱mna,

xa re' la' Te̱wan chi behsemaj ru'um Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios tz'ehtenic johtok pan taxa̱j ru'um chi c'ahchi' rilom johtok wach risakomal rilok'il i Dios, je' wo' chi c'ahchi' rilom johtok wach i Jesus chi pa'lic pa risec'a̱j i Dios

eh je' wili xik'or queh: «Chabiraj tak i wili: Re' hin nwilow johtok chi tehlic cok pa̱m i taxa̱j eh ar nwilow johtok wach i Jesus re' Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic rajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel chi ar pa'lic pan risec'a̱j i Dios, nqui xik'or queh.

Re' take nahsil re're' ru'um chi ma' nca̱j ta chic quibiram chaj bih rik'or i Te̱wan, p'uht quitz'apam quixiquin eh chi xa chi'k'or chic nca'n, xa junojic chic take china̱ Te̱wan chi ricansjic chiri̱j lok i tinamit.

Ar ajic nok wilque̱b chic chiri̱j lok i tinamit, re' take winak cojo̱j take chi ritz'akaric wach rimahc i Te̱wan, xipahbabjic cu'um nahsil reh chi naquicansam i Te̱wan eh chi je' re' xquesaj lok i quijuc ro̱k tz'ih roxlo̱c' lok quiso', reh chi suk cutuj abaj enca'n chi ricansjic i Te̱wan. Je' re' k'uru' naxquituba̱' take su't re're' chiwach i jenaj q'uijol Sa̱wlo ribihnal re' naricha'janic reh, p'uht quicansam i Te̱wan chi abaj.
Nok je' re' c'ahchi' ca'nam, re' Te̱wan je' wili p'uht rik'orom johtok reh Jesus pa riti̱j: «Hat Jesus, hat Lok' laj Ajabe̱s china̱ chi'nchel, c'ulu̱j ta nak cho wuxlabal awu̱c', nqui johtok reh.

Nok rik'orom chic re're', re' Te̱wan chi xuclic jok wach ac'al, cow xik'or johtok pa riti̱j chi je' wili: «K-Aja̱w Jesus, chacuy cho quimahc take winak wili ru̱c' i c'ahchi' ca'nam wi̱n, nqui xik'or johtok. Nok rik'orom aj chic re're', xquimic i Te̱wan.

Re' Sa̱wlo re're' xa suk chic rilmijic riban je nok c'ahchi' ricansjic i Te̱wan. Xa chiwach aj wo' cho k'i̱j re're' naxquimic i Te̱wan, xp'uhtic cho ti'c'axic chiqui̱j take moloj wach aj niminel wilque̱b ar Jerusalen. Ru'um aj re' chi'nchel take aj niminel c'ul p'uht quipuhcam qui̱b pan tak toco̱m chic tinamit wilque̱b pa riyuk'ul Jure̱ya je' wo' pa riyuk'ul Sama̱rya. Xa chic ti re' take cablaj chi nahsil c'amol be̱h ma' xquic'uyu'saj ta qui̱b chi elic je ar Jerusalen.
Je' re' ajic xa chiwach wo' cho k'i̱j re're' naxmuk'unjic je Te̱wan cu'um ju'jun winak je' ru̱c' nquiyohlej wach i Dios eh xok'jic wo' wach riquimic,

re' Sa̱wlo p'uht ribanam ti'c'axic queh take aj niminel chi winak chi ixok re' take xicahnic ar Jerusalen. Nanoquic pan tak pa̱t, nponic rijuquej take cho xa hab wach rirak take ar reh chi naquic'amaric je pan che̱'. Je' aj re' riban i Sa̱wlo reh chi ma'xta nak chic rik'ororic i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus,
xa re' la' c'uhbal re're' xa haj ye'a̱b xquipuhcaj wi̱' qui̱b take aj niminel xi'elic je Jerusalen ma' xmahyic ta rik'ormojic cu'um.
Je' ricab i ma' Peh, naxponic ar pan tinamit Sama̱rya ma' ximay ta k'oro̱j c'uhbal. Ar ajic pan tinamit Sama̱rya nok re' ma' Peh xik'or chi re' Jesus xpahbabjic chi K'atal K'oric,
q'uih take tinamit xquicoj quixiquin chi ribirmijic i c'uhbal riban ma' i Peh. Je' wo' xquilow take lok' laj nawa̱l xiban rehtalil chi til coric i c'uhbalanic riban

maj je' wo' re' xiban i ma' Peh eh ru'um re' yohbal wach take ma' tob laj uxlabal xi'esmejic lok cu̱c' take tinamit chi xa q'ueric chic quichi̱' eh yohbal wo' wach take si̱c ch'i̱l me̱c co̱k xicowsjic.
Je' aj re' k'e̱' rinimal sukquil c'uxlis xwih'ic cu̱c' take c'acharel ar pan tinamit Sama̱rya

re' wilic wo' wi̱' jenaj winak Simon ribihnal re' najtir chic rip'utum cho ribanaric take ma' coric ta wach nawa̱l. Re' winak re're' xa riban chic ri̱b chi je' jenaj ajabe̱s nim wach riwa'ric ru'um take ma' coric ta wach nawa̱l riban eh chi je' re' q'uih take c'acharel chipam i tinamit re're' xijot' take

cu rehtal chi cunchelal take tinamit re're' chi nimak chi cuc'tak quiwach je' wili nquik'or chiri̱j nanquicoj quixiquin chi ribirmijic: «Re' cok i winak wili re' i dios re' k'e̱' nimal rajawric, nqui take. Je' re' nquik'or chiri̱j
maj k'e̱' nsahchic quic'ux ru'um take ma' coric ta wach nawa̱l riban. Je' re' nok re' Simon re're' to̱b ta wo' najtir chic rip'utum cho quijot'oric take aj Sama̱rya,

naxilow chi wilic take winak ch'i̱l take ixok xquikahsaj quiha̱' naxquinimej i k'oric rik'or i ma' Peh chiri̱j i ma' birimaj ta laj k'oric chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh je' wo' chiri̱j i rajawric wilic i Dios chi K'atal K'oric,

re're' xinimej wo' i c'uhbal k'oro̱j re're' eh xikahsaj wo' riha̱'. Chiri̱j re're' xoquic chi ritahkaljic i ma' Peh chi k'e̱' xcahtzic wach chi riliric take lok' laj nawa̱l riban i ma' Peh rehtalil chi til coric i c'uhbalanic riban.

Chi je' aj re' c'ahchi' ric'uluric ar Sama̱rya, xponic i k'oric cu̱c' take cablaj chi nahsil chi c'amol be̱h wilque̱b ar Jerusalen chi re' take aj Sama̱rya xquicoj wach riC'uhbal i Dios eh ru'um re're' xquitak'a̱' je ma' Luch ch'i̱l i Wa̱n chi nacojic ar.
Naxiponic ar re' ma' Luch ch'i̱l i Wa̱n xca'n quiti̱j chi ripahkaljic i Lok' laj Uxlabal chi naroquic pan ca̱mna take nic' pa' q'uihal xicojbic wach riC'uhbal i Dios.
Re' riwi̱' chi je' re' xca'n ru'um chi ma' hab ta wach queh ric'ulum chic i Lok' laj Uxlabal xa re' la' ti kahsanic ha' ca'nam chi c'ahchi' quik'orom chi re' Jesus re're' Ajabe̱s chi quina̱.
Ru'um aj re', re' ma' Luch ch'i̱l i Wa̱n nok c'ahchi'que̱b chi ti̱j, xquicoj quik'ab chi quina̱ take aj niminel re're' eh ru̱c' re're' xchalic i Lok' laj Uxlabal chi naroquic pan ca̱mna.
Naxilow i Simon chi re' ma' Luch ch'i̱l i Wa̱n, chi xa ru̱c' ricojoric quik'ab chi quina̱ take aj niminel noquic i Lok' laj Uxlabal pan ca̱mna, xixutej tumi̱n queh

naxik'or queh chi je' wili: «Chacuy tak ajabe̱s, chayew wo' tak wi̱n awajawric nacoj tak reh chi re' hin nanicoj wo' nik'ab china̱ jeno' c'acharel ewo' ric'ul i Lok' laj Uxlabal. Chayew wo' tak so' wi̱n awajawric tak re're' eh re' hin eniyew aweh tak i tumi̱n wili, nqui xik'or queh.

Chalic i ma' Luch naxibiraj chi je' re' xik'or i Simon queh, je' wili xik'or reh: «Hat ok sihtimaj ch'i̱l atz'a̱k ru'um nok xacapaj chi ru̱c' atz'a̱k na̱lok'om nak awajawric reh chi re' hat enayew wo' chic i Lok' laj Uxlabal ru̱c' tumi̱n, to̱b ta nchel xa ye'o̱j cho ru'um i Dios chi je' ricab jenaj si̱.
Re' hat Simon, ru'um chi ma' coric ta wach acapew-bal chiwach i Dios ma'eta riban chi enawehchaj i ajawric ye'o̱j keh hoj.

Haj cok wilic nipahkaj reh Dios chi eriyew aweh: Re' chi ericuy amahc re' npok' cho pan awa̱mna wi la' re' hat enatok awi̱b chiwach chi ripahkaljic cuybal reh amahc re're'. Chacana̱' k'uru' ayi'bel laj capew-bal re're',

maj re' hin nwilow chi ru'um ayi'bel laj capew-bal re're', ma' na'n ta canar ricanabjic awaranic re' til k'e̱' ch'iclic ac'ux chiri̱j. Ru'um aj reh re', re' hat xa je' na acab jeno' tz'ahpel pan che̱' ma' riban ta canar elic ru'um chi ma' ja' nesmejic ta je re' tz'aplic wi̱', nqui ma' Luch.
Chalic Simon je' wo' chic wili xik'or: «Chacuy tak ha̱w, tipahkanok tak chiwi̱j pan ti̱j chiwach i kAja̱w Dios reh chi ma' eta quinsihtjic je' ricab xak'or tak chi narichalic chi nina̱, nqui queh.

Chiwach take k'i̱j re're' nok re' ma' Luch ch'i̱l wo' i Wa̱n xo̱j quik'o'rej i ma' Peh, xa xquitik wo' ju' rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios chiri̱j i Jesus chipam take rehreh wach tinamit quic'acharic wi̱' take aj Sama̱rya. Chiri̱j chic ru' nok quicohlam chic cho rik'ormojic re're', xisoljic wo' chic je ar Jerusalen.

Nok soljonak chic je ma' Peh ar Jerusalen, pan jenaj queh take k'i̱j re're' jenaj pe' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xchalic ar pan taxa̱j je' wili xik'or reh ma' Peh: «Ma' Peh, chatik'lom awi̱b. Hiy chipam najtir be̱h nkajic jok pa ritz'e̱t i Jerusalen re' nponic cu pan tinamit C'a̱sa ribihnal, nqui xik'or reh.

Naxibiraj chi je' re' i ma' Peh, xitik'lom wo' ti ri̱b eh xo̱j chipam i be̱h xk'ormojic reh. Ar aj ru' chipam i be̱h re're', jenaj winak aj Etiyopi̱ya nim wach ricamaj xponic cho aj lok'em reh Dios ar Jerusalen chipam i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios. Chi je' re' yu'na soljic chic riban je pan tinamit Etiyopi̱ya re' pahbamaj wi̱' chi raj to'o̱l ixok nk'atbic k'oric ar. Re' aj Etiyopi̱ya wili, re' wilic chi aj cha'jem reh chi'nchel i tumi̱n ribehsaj na̱ ixok aj k'atal k'oric re're',
chi tz'uklic je pa ribehsbal kirimaj ru'um bo̱yex, c'ahchi' rilom wach i hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj cho ru'um raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios re' Isayi̱yas ribihnal.
Nok je' re' c'ahchi' ribanam, re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios je' wili xik'or reh ma' Peh: «Chat'oc awi̱b. Charak je winak behic riban chipam i behsbal re're' eh tibehok je chi riche̱l, nqui xik'or reh.

Re' ma' Peh je' re' xiban eh nok behic chic riban je chi riche̱l, xibiraj chi re' po' i hu̱j ritz'ihmbam cho ma' Isayi̱yas re' aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios c'ahchi' rilom wach. Je' wili xik'or cok reh: «Ha̱w, re' hu̱j c'ahchi' awilom wach, c'ahchi' na arakam chiri̱j hab wach aj chiri̱j nk'oric? nqui cok reh.

Chalic aj Etiyopi̱ya re're' je' wili xik'or reh ma' Peh: «Chacuy tijohten cho wu̱c' pa nibehsbal eh titz'uhkok so' wu̱c' ru'um nok wi ma' hab wach ensakomonic wach wi̱n i c'ahchi' wilom chipam hu̱j wili, re' hin ma' nic' ta wo' wach nanirak chiri̱j chi je' re', nqui reh ma' Peh.
