Je' re' xik'or maj je' wili rik'or chiwach i Lok' laj hu̱j re' c'ahchi' rilom wach: “Je' ricab jeno' t'uch me̱' ma' nchalic ta rijosk'il nanc'amaric je pan cansbal, on nank'ataric lok i rismal ri̱j cu'um take winak, ma' riq'uer ta wo' chi̱', je' re' naribanam ru', xa naribuya̱b wo' ti ri̱b

nabanarok i ma' coric ta laj ch'ukuj k'oric china̱ cu'um take naquich'ukbic k'oric china̱. Chi je' re' riwi̱' quibano̱j, chaj chic bih narik'ormojic chiqui̱j take winak re're', re' naquic'acharic pa rik'ijil ru'? Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' naquich'ukum wach chi naresmejic ric'acharic china̱ ac'al, nqui k'oric c'ahchi' rilom wach.

Chi re' aj re' c'ahchi' rilom wach, re' aj Etiyopi̱ya je' wili xik'or reh ma' Peh: «Chacuy, chasakomej ti wach wi̱n i k'oric wili. Hab wach aj chiri̱j xk'oric cho i aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios re' ma' Isayi̱yas? Xa chiri̱j na ru' xk'oric on chiri̱j chic jeno' toco̱m? nqui reh.
Chalic ma' Peh p'uht wo' chic rik'oric je ru̱c' aj Etiyopi̱ya eh xip'ut wo' je risakomsjic wach reh ru̱c' i k'oric c'ahchi' rilom wach chiri̱j i Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic ru' nok behic nca'n je, xiponic chipam jenaj ye'a̱b wilic wi̱' ha'. Ar aj ru' re' aj Etiyopi̱ya je' wili xik'or reh ma' Peh: «Chawilow wulu' wilic jenaj ha'. Chaj aj bih enk'etbic pa nibe̱h chi enak nakahsaj niha̱' rehtalil chi xnicoj chic wach i k'oric xak'or wi̱n chiri̱j c'uhbal re're'? nqui reh.

—Wi re' hat nacoj wach ru̱c' chi'nchel awa̱mna chaj bih take xnik'or aweh, ma'xta bih enk'etbic pan abe̱h chi enikahsaj aha̱', nqui ma' Peh. —Re' hin nicoj wach chi re' kAja̱w Jesus re're' i rAc'u̱n i Dios, nqui xik'or aj Etiyopi̱ya.
Nok rik'orom chic chi je' re', xik'or chi pahbabjok i ribehsbal. Chi je' re' xikajic lok, xi'o̱j jok chi chi̱' i ha' eh xkahsjic riha̱' ru'um ma' Peh.

Chiri̱j i wili nok elenak chic cho chi chi̱' i ha' ch'i̱l aj Etiyopi̱ya, re' ma' Peh xi̱c' molorok ru'um Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios chiwach i aj Etiyopi̱ya cu rehtal xsahchic je pan nak' wach. Ar ajic re' aj Etiyopi̱ya xitik ju' ribe̱h chi xa suk chic pa ric'ux

eh re' chic i ma' Peh cu ar aj chic pan tinamit Aso̱to ribihnal xo̱j ric'raj ri̱b. Chipam i tinamit re're' ch'i̱l wo' take tinamit xiq'uic ponok wi̱' cu rehtal xponic chipam i tinamit Sesare̱ya ribihnal, re' ma' Peh xik'or i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus queh chi'nchel take c'acharel.

Chipam take k'i̱j re're', re' Sa̱wlo xchalic ric'a̱ eh xiyo'slom take quiniminic reh kAja̱w Jesus ru̱c' rik'ororic queh chi naricansam take. Pan jenaj queh take k'i̱j re're', xo̱j ru̱c' i nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios

eh xipahkaj reh chi naritz'ihmbam take hu̱j re' erik'or je wi̱' queh aj cha'jem tak pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses wilque̱b ponok pan tinamit Tama̱sco, chi re're' ye'o̱j je rajawric chi quichoporic take quicojbic wach i Jesus chi Aj C'amol Be̱h je ru̱c' i Dios. Re' take hu̱j re're' xye'bic wo' rajawric chi quic'amaric je pan che̱' ar Jerusalen i jarub pa' take rirak je ma' k'orel ta wi ixok on winak take.

Je' aj re' ru' nok k'ahsamaj chic reh take hu̱j re're', xichop je be̱h ar Tama̱sco. Nok q'uisi̱n aj chic ma' nponic pan tinamit Tama̱sco, cu re' pe' chic reh jenaj sakom yohbal wach sakomil xelic cho cu ar pan taxa̱j eh xisutej ri̱j i Sa̱wlo.

Chiri̱j re're' nok k'ehbenak chic wach ac'al i Sa̱wlo, xibiraj chi wilic xk'o'ronic cho reh chi je' wili: ‹Chabiraj i nanik'orom aweh wili i hat Sa̱wlo: Chacana̱' ribanaric i ti'c'axic na'n wi̱n ru̱c' ribanaric ti'c'axic queh waj tahkanel, nqui k'oric xibiraj.

Re' Sa̱wlo chi xa sahchanak chic ric'ux je' wili xik'or reh: «Ajabe̱s, hab wach i hat? nqui reh. Re' nk'o'ronic cho reh je' wili xik'or cho reh: «Re' hin, hin i Jesus, nqui cho reh. Chiri̱j re' xik'or wo' chic cho reh chi je' wili: «Sa̱wlo, je' ricab jeno' bo̱yex chi xa ri̱b riyew chi ti' nariyak' je i k'as ju' ch'ihch' je' wo' re' nc'uluric awu̱c' hat, xa awi̱b c'ahchi' ayeb chi ti' ru̱c' i ti'c'axic c'ahchi' abanam wi̱n, nqui reh.

Re' Sa̱wlo, chi xa nbarbatic chic ru'um yo'jic je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh: «Ajabe̱s, chaj bih nawa̱j chi nanibanam chi rijelow-bal xniban take lok? nqui reh. Re' Ajabe̱s re're' je' wo' chic wili xik'or cho reh: «Ar chipam i tinamit wulu' narik'ormojic aweh chaj bih na̱banam. Tucten johtok k'uru' hiy cok chipam i tinamit re're', nqui reh.

Naxiban k'oric re're' i Jesus chi quiwach take winak qui'ihch'ilinic reh i Sa̱wlo, xicahnic xa je' chic me̱m take winak re're' ru'um reh chi xiyo'jic eh to̱b ta xquibiraj i c'uta̱j xiban i Sa̱wlo ch'i̱l i Jesus, ma' xquilow ta wo' wach hab wach i xk'oric ru̱c' i Sa̱wlo.

Nok ricohlam chic c'uta̱j i Jesus, re' Sa̱wlo xuctic johtok wach ac'al chi tehlic nak' wach nanc'utunic xa re' la' ru' ma' xiban ta chic canar rilmijic take rich'i̱l ru'um chi xcahnic chi ma' sakom ta chic nilbic. Chi je' aj re' xa ch'ihlimaj chic chi k'ab xc'amaric cok pan tinamit Tama̱sco.
Ar ma' xiniq'uej ta chic riwa' riha̱' chiwach i xib k'i̱j xiban chi ma' nilbic ta chic.

Ar aj wo' Tama̱sco jenaj pe' aj niminel Anani̱yas ribihnal, xilow pa rila'wach chi re' kAja̱w Jesus xic'uhtaj ri̱b reh eh chi je' wili xk'ormojic reh pa rila'wach: «Anani̱yas, nqui xk'ormojic reh. Naxibiraj ribihnal i Anani̱yas je' wili xik'or: «Ayu' wilqui̱n chawach Ha̱w. Chak'or wi̱n chaj bih nawa̱j chi nanibanam, nqui xik'or.

Ar k'uru' je' wili xk'ormojic reh ru'um Jesus: «Chabiraj i wili: Jenaj winak aj Ta̱rso, Sa̱wlo ribihnal c'ahchi' ribanam riti̱j chi niwach. Chaloq'uej awi̱b, hiy chipam i be̱h re' til ribehbal i tinamit wili eh chasic' i winak re're' chipam ripa̱t i Ju̱ras
ru'um nok re' winak re're' c'ahchi' rilom pa riti̱j chi re' hat Anani̱yas c'ahchi' aponic ru̱c' eh c'ahchi' acojom ak'ab china̱ reh chi narisakombic wo' chic pa̱m i nak' wach, nqui xik'or reh.
Chalic i Anani̱yas je' wili xik'or reh: «K-Aja̱w Jesus, q'uih take c'acharel biram chi nquik'or chi re' winak re're' k'e̱' ti'c'axic riban queh take quiniminic aweh ar Jerusalen.

Je' wo' chic, ma' xa ta re' ar Jerusalen wilic rajawric ye'o̱j reh cu'um take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios, je' la' wo' chipam i tinamit wili ye'o̱j wo' rajawric chi quichoporic je take nic' pa' q'uihal aj niminel re' nquik'or abihnal pan quiti̱j, nqui Anani̱yas.

Re' kAja̱w Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh: «Anani̱yas to̱b ta la' je' re' rajawric ye'o̱j, hiy la' maj re' winak re're' xnichih chic wach chi naribanam chi waj camanom. Je' re' xniban reh chi re' c'uhbal chiwi̱j i hin naric'amam je rik'ormojic queh take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, queh take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh je' wo' queh take k'atal k'oric.

Ru'um aj re' ma' tiyo'jic chic chi ojic ru̱c' maj re' ti'c'axic riban i winak re're' aweh hat-tak waj tahkanel ma'xta chic ribanam, re' la' chic re' naric'ulbic reh ti'c'axic. Je' re' nik'or maj til re' wo' hin nanc'uhtunic reh pa riti̱j chi ru'um reh rik'ormojic niC'uhbal naribanam, tanlic chiri̱j chi naric'ulum take ti'c'axic, nqui xik'or reh.

Nok k'oro̱j chic reh re're', re' Anani̱yas xo̱j chipam i pa̱t xk'ormojic wi̱' reh chi wilic cho wi̱' i Sa̱wlo eh nok wilic chic cok ar, je' wili xik'or reh: «Wasbe̱s ma' Sa̱wlo, re' kAja̱w Jesus re' xk'o'ronic aweh pan be̱h naxatchalic chipam i tinamit wili, xiritak'a̱' cho awu̱c' reh chi narisakombic wo' chic pa̱m i nak' awach je' wo' reh chi nariye'eric ransil ak'orbal ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios, nqui reh. Chiri̱j chic ru' re' Anani̱yas xicoj i k'ab china̱ i Sa̱wlo.

Ar ajic xa chiwach wo' ti junc'am re're' xsakombic pa̱m nak' wach eh xik'ehbic wo' take lok pan nak' wach take xa je' take ri̱j car. Chiri̱j chic ru' xa re' wo' ti naxuctic johtok i Sa̱wlo, xo̱j wo' ti kahsjok riha̱'.
Chiri̱j chic re' xichop wo' chic riwa' riha̱' eh ru̱c' re're' xc'ulic wo' chic ransil. Chi je' re' cu xcahnic pe chic quib xib ok k'i̱j cu̱c' take aj niminel wilque̱b ar Tama̱sco.

Xa ma' q'uih ta wo' chic k'i̱j xiq'uic lok ru', re' Sa̱wlo xip'ut rik'ormojic ribiral chiri̱j i Jesus ar chipam take pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, chi c'ahchi' rik'orom queh take c'acharel chi re' Jesus re' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, til re're' rAc'u̱n i Dios.

Ru̱c' aj c'uhbalanic riban Sa̱wlo, re' nic' pa' q'uihal take quibirinic reh je' wili nquik'or chi quiwach chi xa nsahchic chic quic'ux: «Re' winak wili re' nak re' nbanic ti'c'axic ar Jerusalen queh take quik'oric ribihnal i Jesus pan quiti̱j, maje'? nqui nquik'or. Je' wo', wilic wo' nquik'or chi je' wili chiri̱j: «Re' winak re're' xc'ulic lok ayu' chi quichoporic take aj niminel chi naric'amam je take chi quiwach take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios, nqui nquik'or. Je' re' nok nanquibiraj chi re' Sa̱wlo c'ahchi' rik'orom ribiral i Jesus, wilic take c'acharel xquicapaj chi xa jot'o̱l queh take aj niminel reh Jesus no̱j c'olok pan tak pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses,

xa re' la' re' riman chic ricowsaj ric'ux chi quiwach chi rik'ormojic chi re' Jesus til re're' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Ru̱c' take k'oric re're' riyew wach ac'al i quicapew-bal take rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilque̱b ar Tama̱sco.

Chi je' aj re' nok q'uih chic k'i̱j riwih'ic i Sa̱wlo ar Tama̱sco, re' take c'amol quibe̱h take rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilque̱b ar xquimol qui̱b eh xquitik'a̱' wach quino'jbal chi naquicansam i Sa̱wlo ru'um reh c'uhbalanic riban.
Je' re' ajic chi k'i̱j chi ak'ab xquicha'jej take elbal reh tinamit chi richoporic nak i Sa̱wlo na elok je, xa re' la' i cha'janic c'ahchi' ca'nam take winak re're' xponic pan xiquin i Sa̱wlo,

je' wo' pan quixiquin take rich aj niminel quipatanic ar Tama̱sco. Je' re' nok pan jenaj chak'ab re' take aj niminel re're' xquicoj i Sa̱wlo chipam jenaj ma' laj chacach eh xquikahsaj jok chiwach i ma' laj tz'ak nsutunic ri̱j i tinamit re're'. Je' re' ritobjic i Sa̱wlo xca'n chi elic je chipam i tinamit re're' eh xo̱j ar Jerusalen.

Naxponic i Sa̱wlo ar Jerusalen, re' take aj niminel xquilow chi re' Sa̱wlo xa̱j nak ricojom ri̱b chi quiman, ma' xquic'ul ta chi quixilac yo'jic la' chic xchalic queh maj pan quic'ux ru', re' Sa̱wlo ma' re' ta til coric laj aj niminel chiri̱j i Jesus.

Chi quixilac take aj niminel wilque̱b ar, wilic i jenaj re' Wernaweh ribihnal, cu re're' xk'oric chiri̱j Sa̱wlo. Je' re' nok xic'am cho i Sa̱wlo chi quiwach take nahsil c'amol be̱h chi quina̱ take aj niminel eh chi xik'or queh nic' wach rik'o'rjic i Sa̱wlo xbanaric ru'um i kAja̱w Jesus naxic'uhtaj ri̱b reh chipam i be̱h no̱j pan tinamit Tama̱sco. Je' wo' xik'or queh chiri̱j riwih'ic i Sa̱wlo pan tinamit re're', nic' wach je' i c'uhbalanic xiban chiri̱j i Jesus chi ma'xta nech' ok riyo'jic.
Je' aj re' riwi̱' k'uru' naxoquic i Sa̱wlo chi quiman take aj niminel ar Jerusalen eh xwih'ic ar chi quihch'iljic chi ma' xquiyohbalej ta chic chi wilic chi quixilac.

Chiwach take k'i̱j reh riwih'ic ar pan tinamit Jerusalen, re' Sa̱wlo ma' nyo'jic ta wo' q'uisi̱n ok chi k'oric chiri̱j i Jesus eh je' re' xiban cu rehtal re' take rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' quik'oric pan criye̱co re' xquisolq'uij pa ri̱j rik'orbal, xquiyew quic'ux chi risiq'uiric ri̱j nic' wach ricansjic naca'nam ru'um reh c'uhbalanic riban.
Naxquibiraj take rich aj niminel chi je' re' nca'n take c'acharel re're', xquic'am je cu chipam i tinamit Sesare̱ya ribihnal eh chiri̱j chic re' xquitak'a̱' je chipam i tinamit Ta̱rso ribihnal.

Je' aj re' xc'uluric ru̱c' i Sa̱wlo chipam take k'i̱j re're' nok re' take moloj wach aj niminel wilque̱b pan tak tinamit pa riyuk'ul Jure̱ya, pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya ch'i̱l wo' pa riyuk'ul Sama̱rya, xiwih'ic chic pan sukquil c'uxlis. Je' wo', re' take aj niminel re're' til xquiyohbalej wach i Dios eh til xic'acharic wo' chi cowjonak quic'ux pan quiniminic. Je' wo' chic, re' take quicomonil eli̱c xq'uihic wach ru'um til to'bomaj wo' take cho ru'um Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios.
Junpech re' ma' Luch, nok c'ahchi' risutem pa̱m riyuk'ul i Jure̱ya, xo̱j wo' c'olok chi quik'o'rjic take rich aj niminel wilque̱b ar pan tinamit Li̱ra.
Ar xirak jenaj winak Ene̱yas ribihnal wahxaki̱b ha̱b riyohquic wach yoca̱b ru'um chi sicrinak riti'jolal chi junpech.

Je' aj wili xik'or i ma' Luch reh na xo̱j rirak: «Ma' Ene̱yas, re' hin nik'or aweh chi re' hat xatcowjic chic ru'um i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' re' nok tucten johtok yu'na, chamol wach apohp eh chac'ol, nqui reh. Ru̱c' k'oric re're', xa chiwach wo' ti junc'am re're' xuctic johtok i Ene̱yas chi elenak chic lok riya'bilal.
Ar ajic naxquilow chi je' re', q'uihal take c'acharel je' ricab aj Li̱ra ch'i̱l take aj Saron xquicana̱' quimahc eh xquinimej i kAja̱w Jesus.

Chiwach aj wo' take k'i̱j nok wilic ponok ma' Luch ar Li̱ra, ar chipam i tinamit Jo̱pe ribihnal wilic jenaj ixok aj niminel re' rito'bej wo' take niba̱' ru̱c' yohbal wach to'bonic riban queh. Re' ixok re're' Tawi̱ta ribihnal eh nanjalmajic i bihnal pan quik'orbal aj criye̱co, Lo̱rcas nelic wi̱'.

Re' Lo̱rcas re're', pan jenaj queh take k'i̱j nok re' ma' Luch cu wilic ponok ar Li̱ra, xchop pe' cho reh jenaj ya'bilal cu rehtal xquimic je. Je' ricab tijimaj take wi̱' tinamit chi cu nquitinej je riti'jolal jeno' c'acharel nquimic je, je' wo' re' xca'n reh Tawi̱ta eh chiri̱j chic ru', xquiyoc'a̱' pan jenaj ye'a̱b wilic ar pa rica'tik pa̱t.

Ar ajic naxquibiraj ribiral take aj niminel ar Jo̱pe chi re' ma' Luch ar wilic cho pan tinamit Li̱ra eh ru'um chi xa ma' naht ta wo' wilic je ar ru̱c' i tinamit Jo̱pe, xquitak'a̱' je take quib chi winak chi rik'ormojic reh chi je' wili: «Chacuy ma' Luch, ma' haj chic niq'uic acham cho awi̱b pan jeno' chic tinamit. Chaloq'uej ti cho awi̱b, tichalok ku̱c' chi katobjic maj jenaj kich aj niminel Lo̱rcas ribihnal xquimic je, nqui xquitak'a̱' je rik'ormojic chiqui̱j take quib re're'.

Naxibiraj i ma' Luch chaj bih xponic k'ormojok reh, xitik'lom ti ri̱b eh xo̱j chiqui̱j take c'amo̱l re're'. Naxiponic aj cu̱c' take aj niminel wilque̱b ar Jo̱pe, re' ma' Luch xc'amaric johtok pa rica'tik pa̱t re' wilic wi̱' riti'jolal i Lo̱rcas. Ar chic johtok, re' take cahnel ixok re' xitobjic ru'um i Lo̱rcas chi cu c'achlic pe nak, xquisutej ri̱j i ma' Luch eh chi xa suk chic qui'ok'ic chiri̱j ru', xquic'uhtaj cok reh i quiso' xtik'injic queh ru'um i Lo̱rcas.

Chipam wo' ti' junc'am re're', re' ma' Luch xitak'a̱' quesmejic take lok chi'nchel wilque̱b ar eh nok elenak chic take lok, xixuc'a̱' ri̱b chi ti̱j. Nok ribanam chic riti̱j, je' wili xik'or je reh camnak naxisolq'uij je rilbal chi rilmijic: «Tawi̱ta, tucten johtok, nqui reh. Xa chiwach wo' ti junc'am re're', re' Lo̱rcas xiteh cho nak' wach eh xitz'uka̱' johtok ri̱b chi xa cow chic rilow i ma' Luch.

Chiri̱j chic re', re' ma' Luch xichop johtok chi k'ab i Lo̱rcas, xucsaj johtok eh nok riyuk'em chic take je aj niminel ch'i̱l take cahnel ixok wilque̱b ar, xipahba̱' chi quiwach chi c'achlic wo' chic.
Re' ribiral chi xc'acharic wo' chic i Lo̱rcas, xelic lok chi junsut tinamit Jo̱pe eh ru̱c' re're' yohbal wach take c'acharel xquinimej i kAja̱w Jesus.
Ar pan tinamit Jo̱pe cu xcahnic pe chic so' q'uih k'i̱j i ma' Luch chi patanic ru̱c' jenaj winak aj jotzol wach tz'uhu̱m, Simon ribihnal.
Junpech aj cho, ar chipam i tinamit Sesare̱ya ribihnal c'acharic riban jenaj winak aj Ro̱ma Corne̱lyo ribihnal, aj c'amol quibe̱h take sol aj Ita̱lya ribihnal quicomonil.

Re' winak re're' k'e̱' riyohbalej wach i Dios eh nc'utunic wo' lok chi coric wach rino'jbal ch'i̱l take raj pan pa̱t. Je' wo' chic, xa eli̱c wo' riban riti̱j eh yohbal wo' wach tumi̱n riyew queh take ra̱' ri'sil cho i ma' Israhel chi quitobjic.

Pan jenaj k'i̱j ajic nok c'ahchi' ribanam riti̱j je' na xib o̱ra risoljic i k'i̱j, til xilow wach jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xchalic pan taxa̱j, xoquic cok ru̱c' eh xik'o'rej cok i Corne̱lyo ru̱c' ribihnal.

Naxibiraj ribihnal i Corne̱lyo, xa cow chic xitz'ehtaj i raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios eh je' wili xik'or reh chi xa yo'jic chic wilic: «Chaj nak bih Ha̱w? nqui reh. Re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios je' wili xik'or reh: «Je' ricab nok re' Dios ma' niq'uic ta pa ric'ux i sukquil c'uxlis nwih'ic ru̱c' ru'um risibil jeno' si̱ nc'ataric johtok chiwach, je' wo' re' risukquil ric'ux nwih'ic ru'um ati̱j ch'i̱l wo' take to'bonic nayew queh tinamit eh re' pahkanic xa'n reh, til wilic wo' pa ric'ux ric'u'ljic cho.
Ru'um chi naribanam cho i ric'u'ljic re're', chatak'a̱' je take quib xib ok awaj camanom ar chipam i tinamit Jo̱pe chi ric'amaric i jenaj winak Simon ribihnal re' ribihnej wo' chi Luch

maj re're' narik'oric aweh nic' wach namanlajok wach animinic chiwach i Dios. Re' ma' Luch nik'or aweh re're', ar wilic ponok chi patanic pa ripa̱t jenaj winak aj jotzol wach tz'uhu̱m Simon wo' ribihnal re' wilic ma' naht ta chi chi̱' ma' laj ha', nqui xik'or i raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios.
Nok ojonak chic i raj tz'e' wa̱ch Dios re' xc'ulic k'o'ronok reh, re' Corne̱lyo xiyuk'ej take je qui̱b raj camanom ch'i̱l i jenaj riso̱l ncamanic ru̱c' re' rilok'ej wo' wach i Dios
eh xik'or queh chaj bih xk'ormojic reh ru'um raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios. Chiri̱j chic ru' xitak'a̱' take je pan tinamit Jo̱pe chi ric'amaric ma' Luch.
Je' chic ikal je' na cablaj o̱ra reh k'i̱j nok ojic chic nca'n take c'acharel re're' pa ribehil i tinamit Jo̱pe, re' ma' Luch xjohtic johtok china̱ rica'tik pa̱t wilic wi̱' eh ar xoquic chi ti̱j.
Nok je' re' c'ahchi' ribanam, tz'eht pe' c'ahchi' ritik'injic cho c'uxbal. Ru'um aj re' xchalic ric'ahric pan yejal riti̱j eh chi je' re' xc'amaric ricapew-bal ru'um i Dios.
Ar ajic xilow chi re' pan taxa̱j xteh cok pa̱m eh xkajic cho wach ac'al i xa je' jenaj ma' laj tz'ih pixo̱j cho chi ju'jun reh ricajtz'u'c,
re' wilque̱b wi̱' q'uih ch'uk wach chicop quic'acharic wach ac'al. Ar wilic take je' ru̱c' wilic quejeb cok, ch'i̱l take xa nquijuquej qui̱b wach ac'al, ch'i̱l wo' take quirupunic wa taxa̱j.
Chi je' aj re' c'ahchi' rilom, re' ma' Luch xibiraj jenaj k'oric chi je' wili: «Luch, chacansaj aweh xa pa' jaric chicopquilal queh wili eh chac'ux aweh, nqui xibiraj.

Chalic i ma' Luch je' wili xik'or: «Ha̱w, re' take chicop re're' ma'eta riban chi enic'ux maj re' hin ma' janc'al ta nic'uxum take chicop k'oro̱j cho ru'um i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi ma' tare̱t ta chi c'uxuric, nqui xik'or ma' Luch.

Chiri̱j re', xibiraj wo' chic rica'pech k'oric chi je' wili: «Luch, eriban chi enac'ux take chicop re're' ru'um nok re' rik'or i Dios yu'na chi ta chic re̱t chi c'uxuric, ma' ric'ul ta chic chi enak'or i hat chi ma' tare̱t ta chi c'uxuric, nqui wo' chic xibiraj.
Nok oxpech chic ribiram i ma' Luch take k'oric re're', xkirmijic wo' chic johtok pan taxa̱j i xa je' ma' laj tz'ih re're'.

Ar ajic, xicohlaj riti̱j i ma' Luch eh chi xa nsahchic chic ric'ux chi ricapewjic ri̱j chaj bih ra̱j rik'orom re' xc'uhtjic reh, re' take winak xitak'abjic je ru'um i Corne̱lyo xiponic ar Jo̱pe. Re' take re' chi c'ahchi' quibiram haj wilic cok ripa̱t i Simon re' jotzol wach tz'uhu̱m nk'ormojic reh, xi'o̱j wo' c'olok ru̱c' pa̱t re're'
eh chi je' re' xquibiraj cok wi ar c'ahchi' chi patanic i Simon re' ribihnej wo' chi Luch.
Chi cu capewenic pe wo' riban i ma' Luch chiri̱j re' xc'uhtjic reh, je' wili xk'ormojic reh ru'um Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios: «Chabiraj i wili: Xib take winak c'ahchi'ca̱t quisiq'uim.
Je' re' k'uru' tucten, tikajen jok cu̱c' eh naquik'or aweh chi nawojic chiqui̱j ma' ak'ihtaj awi̱b chi quiwach maj nik'orbal i hin chi xtak'abjic cho ac'amaric, nqui Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios reh.
Chalic i ma' Luch xkajic cho cu̱c' take winak tak'amaj take je re're' eh je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' hin i winak re' c'ahchi'qui̱n asiq'uim tak. Pa' nak bih abe̱h tak wu̱c', nqui queh.

Chalic take winak re're' je' wili xquik'or reh: «Pan katinami̱t wilic jenaj ajabe̱s c'amol quibe̱h sol Corne̱lyo ribihnal re' riyohbalej wach i Dios eh nc'utunic wo' lok chi coric wach rino'jbal chi quiwach take tinamit. Re' ajabe̱s wili, ru'um reh to'bonic riban, holohic laj k'oric nbanaric chiri̱j cu'um chi'nchel take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilque̱b pan katinami̱t. Re're', xk'o'rjic ru'um jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re' xk'oric reh chi je' wili: ‹Chatak'a̱' je take quib xib ok awaj camanom ar chipam i tinamit Jo̱pe chi ric'amaric cho ayu' pan apa̱t i jenaj winak Simon ribihnal. Nok wilic chic ayu' chabiraj i narik'orom aweh nqui xik'or, nqui take reh.

Naxibiraj chi je' re' ma' Luch xicoj take cok pan pa̱t take winak re're' eh xiyew quiwarbal. Naxsak'ic lok je' ikal, re' ma' Luch ch'i̱l take ju'jun chic aj niminel ar Jo̱pe xi'o̱j chiqui̱j take winak re're' ar Sesare̱ya.
Je' chic ikal xiponic pa ripa̱t i Corne̱lyo re' chi ximol quiwach take ru̱c' take cho ch'i̱l take suk quik'oric ru̱c', uyunic chic riban quich'i̱l.
Ar ajic naxponic i ma' Luch chi chi̱' i ripa̱t, re' Corne̱lyo xelic cho chi ric'uluric eh rehtalil chi c'ahchi' riyeb rilok'il i ma' Luch, xixuc'a̱' ri̱b chiwach,
xa re' la' ma' Luch naxilow chi je' re', xich'ihlej johtok chi k'ab eh je' wili xik'or reh: «Tipa̱' johtok. Ma̱xuc'a̱' awi̱b chiniwach ru'um nok re' hin xa jenaj niwach awu̱c' i hat, nqui reh.
Chiri̱j re're', re' ma' Luch xoquic cok pan pa̱t chi c'uta̱j chic riban rich'i̱l i Corne̱lyo. Nok wilic chic pan pa̱t, re' ma' Luch xilow take riq'uihal tinamit quimolom qui̱b ar

eh je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' hat-tak was tak nicha̱k' aweht'alim tak chi re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ma' riwi̱' ta chiwach i katijbal chi ta nak etikihch'ilej tak, xa ta wo' nak chi ekoj-oquic pan apa̱t hat-tak ma' re' ta hat-tak kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. To̱b ta nak je' re' katijbal, re' hin ma' xnibiraj ta k'oric chiwach katijbal re're' ru'um nok re' Dios xic'uhtaj wi̱n pa niti̱j chi je' ricab nok re' take chicop xic'uhtaj chi niwach ma'eta riban chi enik'or chi ma' tare̱t ta chi c'uxuric, je' wo' re' hat-tak ma' riban ta chi enik'or aweh tak chi ma' tare̱t ta awihch'iljic tak.
Ru'um aj re' naxinponic c'amarok cho, re' hin ma' xnik'ihtaj ta cho wi̱b chi chalic ayu'. Chaj aj bih riwi̱' chi naxinayuk'ej cho ayu'? nqui ma' Luch.

Chalic Corne̱lyo je' wili tohk' rik'orom reh: «Ha̱w, quejeb cho k'i̱j yu'na je' wo' na ricab i o̱ra wili, re' hin cuyuj wi'c niban chi ti̱j ayu' pa nipa̱t. Nok c'ahchi'qui̱n chi ti̱j xib o̱ra chic risoljic i k'i̱j, xwilow chi jenaj winak xa nrepretic chic risakomil i riso' xpa'lajic chi niwach

eh je' wili xik'or wi̱n: ‹Corne̱lyo, re' pahkanic na'n johtok chiwach i Dios til wilic wo' cho pa ric'ux chi naca̱t ric'u'lem cho ru'um reh risukquil c'uxlis riyew take to'bonic na'n queh tinamit eh ru'um aj re' c'ahchi' ric'u'lem cho na̱ yu'na.

Re' aj wili cha'n k'uru': Chatak'a̱' je take quib xib ok awaj camanom chipam i tinamit Jo̱pe chi ric'amaric cho awu̱c' i jenaj winak Simon ribihnal re' ribihnej wo' chi Luch maj re're' narik'oric aweh chaj chic bih raj chi na̱banam na'ocok i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios pan awa̱mna. Re' ma' Luch re're', ar patanic riban ponok pa ripa̱t i jenaj winak aj jotzol wach tz'uhu̱m, Simon wo' ribihnal re' wilic ma' naht ta chi chi̱' ma' laj ha', nqui wi̱n.

«Ru'um aj chi je' re' xk'ormojic wi̱n, re' hin xnitak'a̱' je ac'amaric chi jumehk'il eh k'e̱' tare̱t chi re' hat xac'u'lej cho na̱ i chalic ayu'. Yu'na aj ru', ayu' wilco̱j chi'nchel hoj chiwach i Dios chi ribirmijic haj wilic narik'orom ru̱c' achi̱' i hat, nqui Corne̱lyo.

Naxibiraj i ma' Luch chi je' re', je' wili xik'or queh: «Yu'na aj ru' re' hin til xnirak chiri̱j chi re' Dios til ma' hab ta wach toco̱m riliric riban maj re' Dios ma' xa re' ta take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel
nponic chiwach quico'ljic, je' la' wo' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' nquiyohbalej wach eh nquic'uhtaj lok i coric laj no'jbal.

Ru'um aj re' to̱b ta ma' re' hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, nanik'orom wo' aweh tak riC'uhbal i Dios re' c'ahchi' wo' rik'ormojic queh take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel maj queh take ru' c'ahchi' nik'orom i holohic laj k'oric chiri̱j i Jesus chi re're' i Ajabe̱s Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi kana̱ chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel.

«Chiri̱j i holohic laj k'oric chiri̱j i Jesus, re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak i ribiral wili: Nok re' Wa̱n rip'utum chic cho rik'ormojic queh tinamit chi naquikahsam quiha̱', xa ar wo' pa riyuk'ul Calile̱ya xp'uhtic cho rik'ormojic ribiral i Jesus cu rehtal xo̱j lok rik'ormojic chi junsut riyuk'ul Jure̱ya. Re' ribiral re're' rik'or

chi re' Jesus re' ribihnej chi aj Nasaret re' xye'eric rajawric ru'um i Dios naxtak'abjic cho Lok' laj Uxlabal ru̱c', yohbal wach ato'bil xiban ru̱c' rito'bal i Dios je' ricab naxicowsaj take chi'nchel yowa'i̱b ch'i̱l take ti' wilque̱b pan k'ab aj Yahm.

«Re' hoj xkilow chi'nchel re' chaj bih xiban pan tinamit Jerusalen, je' wo' pan toco̱m chic tinamit reh riyuk'ul Jure̱ya eh ru'um re' nkayew kachi̱' chi je' re' xiban cho. Je' wo' nkayew kachi̱' chi re' Jesus re're', re' xquich'ila̱' wach curu̱s chi ricansjic,
re' Dios xucsaj cho pa ro̱x k'i̱j reh riquimic eh ru̱c' chi je' re' xiban i Dios, re' Jesus xic'uhtaj wo' chic ri̱b chi c'achlic.

Re' cok ru' ma' queh ta chic chi'nchel tinamit xic'uhtaj ri̱b, xa keh la' chic i hoj re' richihim cho kawach i Dios nok chi cu c'achlic pe cho Jesus reh chi re' hoj nakaye'bic kachi̱' chiri̱j ructic cho chi quixilac camnak. Je' aj re' ru', re' hoj re' xka'n cho kawa' kaha̱' ru̱c' Jesus nok uctunak chic cho chi quixilac camnak,

xojritak'a̱' i Jesus chi rik'ormojic queh chi'nchel i tinamit chi xuctic wo' chic chi c'acharic. Je' wo', xik'or wo' keh chi nakayeb kachi̱' chiri̱j i c'uhbal je' wili rik'or: ‹Re' Jesus re' xcojoric ru'um i Dios chi ch'ukul wach mahc queh take c'achalque̱b, je' wo' chi queh take camnak chic take,

re' aj re' xk'ormojic cahnok ribiral cu'um take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios najtir cho k'i̱j naxquik'or cho chi re' ye'o̱j cho rajawric chi K'atal K'oric, re're' naricuybic wo' rimahc i xa hab wach narich'ica̱b ric'ux chiri̱j, nqui rik'or i c'uhbal re're', nqui ma' Luch.
Cu k'oric pe wo' riban i ma' Luch, xchalic i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios chi wih'ic pan ca̱mna take nic' nimal c'ahchi'que̱b chi birinic.

Re' take aj niminel ra̱' ri'sil cho take ma' Israhel quihch'ilinic ponok reh ma' Luch, naxquilow chi re' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xye'eric wo' queh i Lok' laj Uxlabal chi je' ricab jeno' quisi̱, k'e̱' xsahchic quic'ux
ru'um xquibiraj chi re' take c'acharel re' cu re' ti junc'am quinimem i Dios, pan toco̱m chic k'oric c'ahchi' quiyeb johtok rilok'il ribihnal i Dios.

Ar aj ru' naxilow ma' Luch chi xchalic i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios cu̱c' chi'nchel take wilque̱b ar, je' wili xik'or queh take wilque̱b ponok chiri̱j: «Re' take kas kacha̱k' wili xquic'ul chic i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios je' ricab naxkac'ul i hoj aj niminel reh Jesus je' ru̱c' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Yu'na k'uru' ma' eta chic riban chi enpitjic queh chi enkahsjic quiha̱', nqui queh.

Chi je' re' xpahkaljic queh chi naquikahsam quiha̱' chi naca'nam chi raj tahkanel chic Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' aj re' ru' nok kajanak chic quiha̱', re' take ac' aj niminel re're' xquipahkaj reh ma' Luch chi naricahnic quib xib ok k'i̱j chi quixilac chi ula'anic ch'i̱l take rich'i̱l.

Naxponic ribiral cu̱c' take rich nahsil chi c'amol be̱h i ma' Luch, je' wo' cu̱c' take rich aj niminel wilque̱b pa riyuk'ul Jure̱ya chi juntuhm chi c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel take, xquicoj wo' wach riC'uhbal i Dios
wilic take aj niminel ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel p'uht quinakam i ma' Luch naxponic wo' chic cho ar Jerusalen.

Je' aj wili xquik'or reh: «Re' hat ma'xta nak bih aweh chi xatoquic pan quipa̱t take ma' re' ta kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, ma' wo' nak chi xa'n nak awa' aha̱' cu̱c'. Ma' riyew ta ri̱b xa'n chi junpech, nqui take reh.
Chalic ma' Luch naxibiraj chi je' re', p'uht rik'orom queh chi chaklic chi̱' nic' wach riwi̱' xc'uluric cho ar. Je' aj wili p'uht rik'orom queh:

«Re' hin nok c'ahchi'qui̱n ti̱j ar ponok pan tinamit Jo̱pe, xc'amaric nicapew-bal ru'um i Dios. Chi je' aj re' xwilow chi jenaj xa je' ma' laj tz'ih pixo̱j cho chi ju'jun reh ricajtz'u'c cu ar pan taxa̱j c'ahchi' rikajic cho chi niwach.

Naxwilow chi je' re' xnitz'ehtaj chi coric eh xwilow chipam i xa je' ricab ma' laj tz'ih re're' wilque̱b take q'uih ch'uk wach chicop quic'acharic wach ac'al je' ru̱c' take quejeb cok ch'i̱l take josk' laj chicop, ch'i̱l take chicop xa nquijuquej qui̱b wach ac'al, ch'i̱l wo' take quirupunic wa taxa̱j.
Ar nok c'ahchi' wilom re're' xnibiraj jenaj k'oric chi je' wili: ‹Ma' Luch, chacansaj aweh xa pa' jaric chicopal queh wili eh chac'ux aweh, nqui xnibiraj.

«Naxnibiraj re're', re' hin je' wili xnik'or: ‹Ha̱w, re' take chicop re're' ma' eta riban chi enic'ux maj re' hin ma' janc'al ta nic'uxum chicop k'oro̱j ru'um i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi ma' tare̱t ta chi c'uxuric, nqui xnik'or.

«Chiri̱j re' xnibiraj wo' chic rica'pech chi je' wili k'oric xiban cho cu ar pan taxa̱j: ‹Ma' Luch, eriban chi enac'ux take chicop re're' ru'um nok re' rik'or i Dios yu'na chi ta chic re̱t chi c'uxuric, ma' ric'ul ta chic chi enak'or i hat chi ma' tare̱t ta chi c'uxuric, nqui xnibiraj.
«Je' re' ajic nok nibiram chic oxpech i k'oric re're', re' xa je' ma' laj tz'ih re're' xkermejic wo' chic johtok pan taxa̱j ch'i̱l take chicop wilque̱b chipam.
Chiri̱j aj chic junc'am naxnicohlaj niti̱j, xib take winak cu ar tak'amaj take cho Sesare̱ya chi nic'amaric, xiponic chipam i pa̱t wilqui̱n wi̱'.

Ar ajic re' Lok' laj Uxlabal xik'or wi̱n chi ma'xta nik'ihtam wi̱b chi quiwach take winak re're' naxquipahkaj wi̱n chi nawojic chiqui̱j. Ru'um aj re', re' hin xino̱j chiqui̱j quich'i̱l take waki̱b chic chi aj niminel wili eh chi je' re' xojponic pa ripa̱t i jenaj winak Corne̱lyo ribihnal.

Re' Corne̱lyo re're' xik'or keh nic' wach nok jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xchalic pan taxa̱j xipahba̱' ri̱b chiwach ar pa ripa̱t eh je' wili xk'ormojic reh: ‹Yu'na chatak'a̱' je take quib xib ok awaj camanom ar chipam i tinamit Jo̱pe chi ric'amaric cho jenaj winak Simon ribihnal re' ribihnej wo' chi Luch
maj re're' naric'uhbalanic aweh. Wi xac'am na̱ haj wilic c'uhbal narik'orom, re' Dios naricuyum amahc i hat ch'i̱l take awaj pan pa̱t, nqui banol reh.

«Je' aj re' nok cu c'uhbalanic pe wo' niban chipam ripa̱t i winak re're', xchalic i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios chi wih'ic pan ca̱mna take wilque̱b ar je' ricab wo' naxchalic ku̱c' hoj nok re' Jesus xip'ut cho ritak'abjic i Lok' laj Uxlabal.

Nok quic'ulum ok chic i Lok' laj Uxlabal, xc'ulic cho pa nic'ux i rik'orom cho i kAja̱w Jesus naxik'or chi je' wili: ‹Je' ricab chi til coric chi re' Wa̱n xikahsaj aha̱' tak, til coric wo' chi re' Dios nariyeb cho aweh tak i Lok' laj rUxlabal, nqui rik'orom cho.

«Je' aj re' ru' ru'um nok re' wo' kAja̱w Dios xye'bic cho Lok' laj rUxlabal chi jenaj si̱ queh take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ricab naxiyew wo' cho keh i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel naxkach'ica̱' kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' hin ma' xiban ta chi xnipit queh ric'uluric re're' maj chaj bih wajawric i hin chiwach i Dios chi je' re' eniban? nqui ma' Luch queh.

Nok re' take rich aj niminel i ma' Luch quibiram chic re're', ma'xta chic bih xquik'or chiri̱j i xiban cho, rilok'onjic la' chic i Dios xca'n chi je' wili c'ahchi' quik'orom: «Ru̱c' xiban i Dios pa ripa̱t i Corne̱lyo epo' wo' riban chi re' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel enquirak i junelic c'acharic nok quijalam chic quino'jbal. Ru̱c' chi je' re' xiban i Dios, lok'omaj ok ribihnal, nqui take.

To̱b ta chiwach take k'i̱j re're', re' Lok' laj Uxlabal xchalic chi quina̱ juntuhm chi c'acharel je' ru̱c' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, re' take aj niminel reh Jesus wilque̱b ar Jerusalen re' xquipuhcaj qui̱b ru'um i ti'c'axic tohk'ic cho ru̱c' ricansjic i Te̱wan, ma'xta nquik'or c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus queh take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel naxiponic chipam take tinamit Peni̱sya, Chi̱pire ch'i̱l Antiyoqui̱ya. Xa queh la' ti take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xquik'or i c'uhbal re're'.

To̱b ta je' re' c'ahchi' ribanaric chipam take tinamit re're', ar pe' pan tinamit Antiyoqui̱ya wilic take aj Chi̱pire ch'i̱l take aj Sire̱ne je' ru̱c' xiponic ar chi quixilac take aj niminel quipuhcam qui̱b xquik'or i c'uhbal k'oro̱j chiri̱j kAja̱w Jesus ma' xa re' ta queh take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' la' wo' queh take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' quik'oric pan criye̱co.

Ru'um aj chi je' re' xca'n take aj niminel re're', re' wilic cu̱c' i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios chi quitobjic, q'uihal take c'acharel je' ru̱c' aj criye̱co xquicoj wach i c'uhbalanic xquibiraj eh naxquicana̱' ribanaric i quinajtir laj no'jbal, p'uht quinimem i kAja̱w Jesus.

Nok re' ribiral i c'ahchi' ric'ulmujic ar Antiyoqui̱ya xponic cu̱c' take moloj wach aj niminel wilque̱b ar Jerusalen, re' take re' xquitak'a̱' je i Wernaweh chi narojic rilom chaj bih c'ahchi' ribanaric ar Antiyoqui̱ya.

Re' Wernaweh naxponic ar Antiyoqui̱ya, k'e̱' xsukbic ric'ux chi riliric rato'bil i Dios wilic chi quina̱ take aj niminel quik'oric ribiral i Jesus. Je' wo' wili xik'or queh nic' q'uihal c'ahchi' quiniminic reh c'uhbal: «Ma̱poh'aj acapew-bal tak chi rinimjic i kAja̱w Jesus, chayew la' ac'ux tak chiri̱j chi manlic, nqui queh.

Re' Wernaweh re're' wilic riwi̱' chi rik'ororic chi je' re' maj til coric wach ric'ux, til behsemaj ru'um Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios eh til ch'iclic wo' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios. Je' re' nok ru̱c' i xik'or queh, q'uihal take aj Antiyoqui̱ya xquicoj qui̱b chi quixilac take quiniminic reh kAja̱w Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic riwih'ic ar Antiyoqui̱ya, re' Wernaweh nok xelic je chipam i tinamit re're' xo̱j chipam i tinamit Ta̱rso ribihnal chi risiq'uiric i Sa̱wlo. Naxirak, xic'am cho chiri̱j ar Antiyoqui̱ya chi ric'uhtjic queh take aj niminel wilque̱b ar.

Chipam aj i tinamit re're', xiwih'ic i Wernaweh ch'i̱l i Sa̱wlo chiwach jenaj ha̱b chi quic'uhbaljic take q'uihal tinamit xquitok'a̱' niminic. Chipam aj wo' i tinamit Antiyoqui̱ya re're' xp'uhtic cho rik'ormojic queh take quiniminic reh Jesus chi je' wili: “Re' take c'acharel quiniminic reh chi re' Jesus re're' i xipahba̱' i Dios chi k'atal k'oric”.
Chiwach aj take cho k'i̱j nok cu wilque̱b ar Antiyoqui̱ya i Wernaweh ch'i̱l Sa̱wlo, xi'o̱j c'olok ar juntuhm chi aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios xichalic ar Jerusalen.

Pan jenaj k'i̱j nok quimolom qui̱b take aj niminel, jenaj queh aj k'orol re're' Aca̱wo ribihnal, xpa'lajic johtok chi quiwach take wilque̱b ar eh je' wili take k'oric xik'or queh chi ye'o̱j reh ru'um Lok' laj Uxlabal: «Chi junsut riyuk'ul Jure̱ya narichalic jenaj rinimal wi'jalel, nqui xik'or queh. Re' wi'jalel c'ahchi' rik'oric chiri̱j, re' aj wo' re' xc'uluric pa rik'ijil rik'atoj k'oric ma' Cala̱wyo.

Je' re' nok naxquibiraj chi je' re' xik'or Aca̱wo, re' take aj niminel ar Antiyoqui̱ya xquitik'a̱' wach ritak'abjic je to'bal queh take aj niminel wilque̱b ar pa riyuk'ul Jure̱ya, re' k'orel nic' pa' nimal to'bonic nca'n canar riye'eric.
Chiri̱j aj chic ru' nok quimolom chic wach nic' pa' nimal i to'bal xquiyew, xquitak'a̱' je chiqui̱j i Wernaweh ch'i̱l i Sa̱wlo reh chi nariye'eric queh take quinahsil aj niminel wilque̱b ar Jure̱ya.

Chiwach aj wo' cho take k'i̱j nok c'ahchi' rimoloric quito'bal take aj niminel wilque̱b pa riyuk'ul Jure̱ya, xchalic jenaj ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take aj niminel ar Jerusalen nok re' raj to'o̱l i aj k'atal k'oric Ro̱ma re' Hero̱res xitak'a̱' ricojoric pan che̱' take ju'jun aj niminel.
Chipam aj take k'i̱j re're', re' Hero̱res xitak'a̱' ricansjic i Jaco̱wo re' richa̱k' i Wa̱n, chi c'ul k'as re̱ mache̱t.

Chiri̱j chi ribanam chic re're', re' Hero̱res naxilow chi re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xponic chi quiwach chi xicansaj i Jaco̱wo, re' aj chic i ma' Luch xitak'a̱' richoporic chiwach take k'i̱j re're' nok c'ahchi' i nink'i̱j Pa̱scuwa ribihnal re' nc'uxuric wi̱' caxlan wi'c ma' cojo̱j ta rik'omil chi sipsbal wach.

Je' re' ru' nok chopo̱j chic i ma' Luch xc'amaric je chiwach i Hero̱res. Chalic ru' xitak'a̱' chi xtz'aparic pan che̱' eh ar xcahnic chi cha'jamaj cu'um take cajch'uk chi sol cajcaj quiwi̱' cu rehtal xponic ri'orahil ricansjic maj re' Hero̱res ritik'a̱b chic wach pa ric'ux chi na'ic'ok i nink'i̱j Pa̱scuwa naritak'a̱b resmejic cho ma' Luch pan che̱' reh chi narich'ukum ri̱j riquimic chi quiwach i tinamit.
Xa re' la' nok je' re' ricapaj i Hero̱res, re' quicomonil take moloj wach aj niminel, chi k'i̱j chi ak'ab xca'n quiti̱j chiwach i Dios chiri̱j i ma' Luch.

Je' aj re' chipam i ak'ab nok re' Hero̱res naritak'a̱b nak resmejic cho ma' Luch na sak'ok lok je' ikal, re' ma' Luch til cha'jamaj chi coric cu'um take sol cha'janic nca'n lok chi chi̱' i tz'ahp eh til wo' quib chi sol xquipix qui̱b chi k'ab ma' Luch ru̱c' jenaj c'aham ch'ihch' naxiwiric cok chi riche̱l. Chi je' aj re' riwi̱' wih'ic i ma' Luch ar pe' pan che̱',

cu re' pe' chic ru' ruhmumaj cho jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xchalic pan taxa̱j eh xisakomej pa̱m i pa̱t tz'apalque̱b wi̱' aj tz'ahpel. Re' aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' je' wili xik'or reh ma' Luch naxitz'a'j cok nah teleb chi ric'a'chsjic wach: «Chat'ohcaj awi̱b, tucten ti yu'na, nqui xik'or reh. Chi je' re' xa chiwach wo' ti junc'am re're' xit'upubic wo' ti lok i c'aham ch'ihch' pixilque̱b wi̱' take k'ab.

Chiri̱j re're' je' wo' chic wili xk'ormojic reh ru'um aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're': «Chatik'a̱' awi̱b eh chacojlom axijab, nqui reh. Nok ribanam chic re're', je' wo' chic wili xk'ormojic reh: «Chacojlom chawi̱j ajuc ro̱k tz'ih roxlo̱c' lok aso', re' xayocobej eh quinatahkej je, nqui xk'ormojic reh.

Chi je' aj re', re' ma' Luch xelic cho chipam i ye'a̱b wilic nak wi̱' eh xitahkej lok i raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xa re' la' cu suk wira̱l wo' na maj chi reh ru', xa pan wiric la' c'ahchi' ric'uhtjic reh i c'ahchi' ribanam aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' nok c'ahchi' rilom eh ma' coric ta la' pa ric'ux.

Chi je' aj re', re' ma' Luch naxic'saj lok i pe̱t tz'ahp ch'i̱l wo' i ricab tz'ahp re' wilque̱b wi̱' toco̱m chic aj cha'janel, xponic lok chiwach i ch'ihch' laj tz'ahp re' wilic lok chi chi̱' be̱h eh re' tz'ahp re're' xiteh ri̱b chi rutquel. Chiri̱j re', re' ma' Luch ch'i̱l raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xi'elic lok eh naxibehic chic je junc'am ok pan jenaj chic be̱h, xcanabjic cahnok i ma' Luch chi rutquel.

Cu re' aj ar xna'lajic reh i ma' Luch eh je' wili xik'or: «Yu'na nwilow chi til coric chi re' Dios xitak'a̱' cho raj tz'e' wa̱ch chi nico'ljic chiwach Hero̱res maj naqui̱n nak riyeb pan ti'c'axic re' xa cuy'em chic take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi enchalic chi nina̱, nqui xik'or.
Chiri̱j chic ru', re' ma' Luch xicora̱' je pa ripa̱t i Mari̱ya re' ritu̱t i Wa̱n re' ribihnej wo' chi Cus. Chipam i pa̱t re're' q'uihal take aj niminel quimolom qui̱b ar chi ti̱j
eh nok re' ma' Luch xponic ar, p'uht rik'oric cok chi' tz'ahp re' wilic lok pan be̱h. Chi je' aj re', jenaj k'ahxok Ro̱wre ribihnal xelic cho chi riliric hab wach nk'oric cok

eh xina'bej pa̱m rik'orbal chi re' ma' Luch c'ahchi' rik'oric cok, xa re' la' ru'um risukquil pa ric'ux ma' xiteh'aj ta wo' ti cho tz'ahp reh, cu xsoljic wo' chic cok rajim chi rik'ororic queh take aj niminel wilque̱b ar chi re' ma' Luch pa'lic cho chi' tz'ahp.

Re' take aj niminel re're' naxquibiraj chi je' re', je' pe' wili xquik'or reh Ro̱wre: «Hat ixk'un, tz'a' pa̱m ana̱. Chaj bih nawilow wach? nqui take reh. To̱b ta wo' re' ixk'un re're' xa nch'uk chic ric'ux chi rik'ormojic queh chi til re' ma' Luch pa'lic cho chi' tz'ahp, re' take aj niminel re're' ma' nquicoj ta wach i c'ahchi' rik'ormojic queh, re' la' chic xquik'or chi xa ranxelex i ma' Luch wilic lok chi' tz'ahp.

Nok je' re' c'ahchi' quik'orom cok pan pa̱t, re' ma' Luch chayew k'o'ronic riban cok chi naquitehem reh i tz'ahp xa re' la' take aj niminel re're' cu k'u̱n xi'elic lok chi riteheric i tz'ahp. Cu re' aj chic ar xquilow chi til re' po' wo' ma' Luch c'ahchi' rik'o'ronic cok queh eh ru'um re' k'e̱' xsahchic quic'ux.

Ar aj ru' re' take aj niminel re're' xquitok'a̱' xa quichokonic chic cok ar ru'um reh risukquil quic'ux chi xquilow wach i ma' Luch, xa re' la' re' xiban k'ab queh chi ma'xta chic qui'ahnic. Chi je' re' xitok'a̱' rik'ormojic queh nic' wach naxesmejic cho pan che̱' eh xik'or wo' queh chi je' wili: «Re' xnik'or aweh tak wili, chak'or tak reh Jaco̱wo re' richa̱k' cahnok i kAja̱w Jesus je' wo' queh take kich niminel, nqui xik'or queh. Chiri̱j chic ru', re' ma' Luch xelic je pa ripa̱t i Mari̱ya eh xo̱j pan jenaj chic toco̱m ye'a̱b
maj nok sak'anak chic lok, re' take sol aj cha'janel xiban xa naho̱l chic quiwach chi ribirmijic chi quiwach chaj bih xc'uluric ru̱c' i ma' Luch.

Chi je' aj re' naxibiraj Hero̱res chaj bih xc'ulmujic, xitak'a̱' je take sol re're' chi risiq'uiric i ma' Luch xa re' la' nok ma' xquirak ta wo' cho, re' take sol re're' xitak'a̱' quicansjic ru'um chi ma' xic'u'lunic ta wo' naxbirmijic queh chaj bih xc'uluric. Chiri̱j chic ru' re' Hero̱res xelic je pa riyuk'ul i Jure̱ya eh ar chic xo̱j chipam i tinamit Sesare̱ya re' xcahnic wi̱' chi c'acharic xa re' la' ma' chi junpech ta.

Nok ar aj chic wilic ponok i Hero̱res, pa' bih riwi̱' naxchalic ric'a̱ cu̱c' take aj Ti̱ro ch'i̱l take aj Siron. Ru'um chi re' chi'nchel pa' bih queh nquic'ux, ar nelic je pa riyuk'ul Hero̱res, re' take c'acharel chipam i quib chi tinamit re're' xquituna̱' qui̱b eh xca'n jenaj wach quic'ux chi nacojic quik'o'rem i Hero̱res. Xa re' cok ru' reh chi xca'n canar oquic ru̱c', pe̱t quik'unej wach chi tumi̱n i jenaj queh ajabe̱s qui'ilbic reh pa̱m ripa̱t Hero̱res Wala̱sto ribihnal, reh chi re're' naric'ambic cok queh ar. Naxc'amaric cok quibe̱h ru'um i Wala̱sto, re' take c'acharel reh quib chi tinamit re're' xquipahkaj reh Hero̱res chi naquicahnic pan sukquil c'uxlis

eh ru̱c' re're', re' Hero̱res xipahba̱' jenaj k'i̱j reh chi narimolom ri̱b cu̱c' take tinamit re're'. Chipam aj i k'i̱j re're', re' Hero̱res xicoj riso' je' ru̱c' chak'wach laj tz'ih ncojoric cu'um take k'atal k'oric eh xoquic cho chi k'oric cu̱c' take tinamit re're' nok tz'uklic cho pa rik'atbal k'oric.
Naxquibiraj i c'ahchi' rik'orom i Hero̱res, re' take tinamit re're' p'uht quiq'uerem quichi̱' chi je' wili: «Re' cok i c'ahchi' rik'oric wili ma' re' ta winak, jenaj la' dios, nqui take.

Chiwach aj junc'am re're' nok je' re' c'ahchi' quik'orom take tinamit, jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xchalic ar pan taxa̱j xc'ulic ricoj jenaj ya'bilal pa riti'jolal i Hero̱res xa ru'um chi ma' xiyew ta rilok'il i Dios chi je' wili: “Re' Dios wilic cho pan taxa̱j, xa re' wo' re' i Dios, ma' nqui ta xik'or. Xa ru̱c' aj ya'bilal xcojoric pa riti'jolal, re' Hero̱res xa chi yu'na ti xquimic je eh chi je' re' xc'uxuric rak'sa̱' cu'um take sa'ha̱.

Je' aj re' ru' chiwach cho rik'ijil riquimic Hero̱res xq'uihbic wach take c'acharel quibirinic reh riC'uhbal i Dios eh ru̱c' re're', k'e̱' wo' naxq'uihbic wach i quicomonil take aj niminel ar Jerusalen.

Re' aj chic i Wernaweh ch'i̱l Sa̱wlo naxquicana̱' cho Jerusalen i to'bal xquimol cho chi quina̱ take niminel aj Antiyoqui̱ya, xisoljic wo' chic je ar Antiyoqui̱ya eh xquic'am je chiqui̱j i Wa̱n re' ribihnej wo' chi Cus.

Chiwach aj wo' take cho k'i̱j nok re' take aj niminel c'ahchi' riq'uihbic wach quicomonil, re' rik'orbal i Dios xa xk'ormojic wo' eh xa xc'uhtjic wo' queh take aj niminel nquimol qui̱b ar Antiyoqui̱ya. Re' take quik'oric reh riC'uhbal i Dios, re' take je' wili quibihnal: Re' ma' Wernaweh, re' ma' Simon re' K'ek Winak nquik'or reh ru'um k'ek rilbal, re' ma' Lu̱syo aj Sire̱ne, re' ma' Sa̱wlo ch'i̱l i ma' Manahen re' rich q'uihic cho i k'atal k'oric Hero̱res.

Junpech cho nok re' take aj c'uhbalanel re're' quimolom qui̱b chi cuyuj wi'c chi rilok'onjic i Dios, re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios je' wili xik'or ru̱c' chi̱' i jenaj queh aj c'uhbalanel re're': «Re' ma' Wernaweh ch'i̱l i Sa̱wlo xnichih quiwach chi nacojic chi aj c'uhbalanel. Je' re' nok chapahba̱' tak wi̱n chi nacojic ca'nam i camanic re're', nqui xik'or Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios.

Chi je' re', re' take rich'i̱l ma' Wernaweh ch'i̱l i Sa̱wlo, xquicoj quik'ab china̱ Wernaweh ch'i̱l i Sa̱wlo naxi'oquic chic chi ti̱j ru̱c' cuyuj wi'c chi quich'i̱l take aj niminel ar Antiyoqui̱ya. Chiri̱j aj chic re' xitak'abjic je ma' Wernaweh ch'i̱l i Sa̱wlo reh chi nacojic chi c'uhbalanic.

Nok pahbamaj chic take je ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios, re' ma' Wernaweh ch'i̱l i Sa̱wlo xi'o̱j chipam i tinamit Sele̱wsya ribihnal eh nok pononak chic take ar, xi'oquic je chipam jenaj ma' laj cano̱wa reh chi nacojic pa riyuk'ul i Chi̱pire

quich'i̱l i caj to'o̱l Wa̱n re' ribihnej wo' chi Cus. Je' aj re' ru' naxiponic chipam i tinamit Salami̱na ribihnal re' wilic lok chi chi̱' riyuk'ul i Chi̱pire, re' ma' Wernaweh ch'i̱l i Sa̱wlo ch'i̱l wo' i Wa̱n xquik'or riC'uhbal i Dios nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus queh take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel nquimol qui̱b pan tak pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses.

Chiri̱j wili nok wilque̱b chic take ponok chi chi̱' ric'ula't riyuk'ul i Chi̱pire re' wilic wi̱' i tinamit Pa̱pos ribihnal, ar xquirak jenaj winak aj war je' ru̱c' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel Warjesus ribihnal. Re' winak re're' xa je' chic jenaj aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios nariban ri̱b

pa ricamaj chiwach cok i k'atal k'oric Se̱rjiyo Pa̱wlo ribihnal re' jenaj winak k'e̱' t'ulic ru̱c' rino'jbal. Junpech ajic nok re' ma' Se̱rjiyo Pa̱wlo xiyuk'ej i ma' Wernaweh ch'i̱l ma' Sa̱wlo ru'um chi ra̱j ribiram riC'uhbal i Dios,

re' aj war re're', re' Eli̱mas wo' nelic wi̱' ribihnal pan criye̱co, xiyew ric'ux chi ripitiric i ma' Se̱rjiyo Pa̱wlo reh chi ma'xta nak ricojom wach ribiral i Jesus. Naxilow chi ma' xiban ta canar ripitiric, re' aj chic rik'orbal ma' Wernaweh ch'i̱l i Sa̱wlo xoquic risolc'jic pa ri̱j,
xa re' la' re' i Sa̱wlo re' ribihnej wo' chi Lu̱', naxye'eric ricowil rik'orbal ru'um Lok' laj Uxlabal xchalic ru̱c' chiwach i junc'am re're', cow xitz'ehtaj

eh je wili xik'or reh: «Re' hat nahsil banol reh c'ahbilal, je' acab aj Yahm chi rixowjic quiwach take nca'n i coric. Re' hat k'e̱' jot'o̱j na'n queh c'acharel maj to̱b ta nak re' Dios rik'or chi re' ribiral i Jesus, re're' naric'ambic cho queh c'acharel ru̱c', re' hat ma' namay ta rik'ormojic chi ma' je' ta re' eh ru̱c' re're', re' hat je' acab jeno' winak riyoj wach jeno' nt'oric laj be̱h.

Chi je' re', re' Dios xa chi yu'na ti nariyeb chana̱ i ti'c'axic narimoysonic pa̱m i nak' awach eh na̱cahnic chi je' re' cu rehtal chic na̱wilbic wo' chic, nqui ma' Lu̱' reh. Xa chiwach wo' ti junc'am re're' xmoyric ti pa̱m nak' wach i winak re' chi manlic. Je' re' nok p'uht rimajem hab wach take wilque̱b cok chi riche̱l chi risiq'uiric hab wach jeno' narich'ihlinic je reh chi k'ab.

Ar ajic re' k'atal k'oric re're' xich'ica̱' wo' ric'ux chiri̱j i Jesus naxilow chaj bih xc'uluric eh je' wo' ru'um chi xa xsahchic chic ric'ux chiri̱j nic' wach rik'ormojic ribiral kAja̱w Jesus xca'n take ma' Wernaweh ch'i̱l ma' Lu̱'.

Chiri̱j aj chic re' naxi'oquic chipam jenaj ma' laj cano̱wa, xi'elic je chipam tinamit Pa̱pos eh chi je' re', re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l take rich'i̱l xiponic pa riyuk'ul i Panpi̱lya ar pan tinamit Pe̱rque. Ar re' Wa̱n re' ribihnej wo' chi Cus, xich'ak take cahnok i ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh ru'um chi xsoljic wo' chic je pan tinamit Jerusalen.

Chi je' aj re', re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l ma' Wernaweh naxi'elic je pan tinamit Pe̱rque, xquitik ju' quibe̱h chi c'ahchi' quiq'uic je pa ric'ula't riyuk'ul i Pisi̱rya cu rehtal xiponic chipam jenaj chic tinamit Antiyoqui̱ya ribihnal. Ar ajic pan jenaj hi'lbal k'i̱j xi'o̱j chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eh xi'o̱j tz'uhkok ar chi ribirmijic i c'ahchi' rik'ormojic.

Nok cux'unak aj chic riliric wach i hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l quic'uhbal take aj k'orol riC'uhbal cho i Dios, re' take c'amol be̱h chipam i pa̱t re're' xquitak'a̱' rik'ormojic reh ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh chi je' wili: «Hat-tak kas kacha̱k', wi wilic jeno' ak'orbal na̱k'orom tak chi kac'uhbaljic eriban chi enak'or tak, nqui xquitak'a̱' je rik'ormojic.

Je' aj re', re' ma' Lu̱' xpa'lajic johtok eh naxiban k'ab queh wilque̱b ar chi ma'xta qui'ahnic je' wili xik'or queh chi cunchelal: «Hat-tak was tak nicha̱k' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ch'i̱l hat-tak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' tilok'onic wo' tak reh kaDios, chabiraj tak i nanik'orom wili:

Re' Dios nkalok'ej wach i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xa nok wo' richihim cho quiwach take kama̱m kati't chi quiwach toco̱m tinamit chi naquilok'em wach. Re' aj i Dios re're' k'e̱' nimal rajawric xic'uhtaj cho chiqui̱j take kama̱m kati't naxesaj take cho chi xa yohbalamaj chic quiwach chipam ponok i toco̱m tinamit Eji̱pto ribihnal. Chipam i tinamit re're', re' take kama̱m kati't xic'acharic cho chi xa iq'ue̱l take ar.

Chiri̱j chic ru' nok esemaj chic take cho ar, xquicora̱' je chipam ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel. Ar ma' xcanabjic ta quiliric ru'um i Dios chiwach i ca'winak (40) ha̱b xibehic chipam ye'a̱b re're', to̱b ta cow take chi ribirmijic k'oric chiwach i Dios.
«Re' aj wo' Dios re're' xisach quiwach i wuku̱b queh q'uih ch'uk wach tinamit wilque̱b pa riyuk'ul i Canahan eh re' take ye'a̱b re're' xik'ahsaj queh take kama̱m kati't reh chi naquehcham.

Je' re' ajic ar chipam i ye'a̱b Canahan re're', re' Dios xipahba̱' take ch'ukul k'oric chi quina̱ take kama̱m kati't chiwach junik'ob lajeb roxc'ahl (450) ha̱b cu rehtal nponic ru̱c' rik'ijil ric'acharic i Samwel re' aj k'orol riC'uhbal wo' i Dios.

Cu ru̱c' aj i Samwel xponic quicojoric take ch'ukul k'oric chi quina̱ take kama̱m kati't maj re' take re' p'uht quipahkam chi naroquic jeno' k'atal k'oric chi quina̱. Ru'um aj chi je' re' xquipahkaj, re' Dios xipahba̱' jenaj quik'atal k'oric, Sawul ribihnal rac'u̱n cho ma' Si̱s re' ra̱' ri'sil cho i Wenjamin. Re' Sawul re're' ca'winak (40) ha̱b xk'atbic k'oric chi quina̱ take kama̱m kati't

eh naxesmejic wo' chic lok pa ricamaj chi k'atal k'oric, re' chic i ma' Tawiy xcojoric chi rijelow-bal, maj chiri̱j i Tawiy je' wili rik'orom cho Dios: ‹Re' Tawiy wili re' rac'u̱n ma' Isayih k'e̱' nponic chi niwach rino'jbal. Re' cok i winak wili naribanam nic' pa' nimal nwa̱j i hin, nqui rik'orom cho.

«Ru'um aj re', re' Dios xik'or wo' cho reh ma' Tawiy chi re' i c'acharel re' narico'lonic queh take rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, ar chi quixilac take ra̱' ri'sil ru' narelic cho. «Je' ricab aj rik'orom cho Dios reh ma' Tawiy, re' Jesus xpahbabjic chi kajco'lonel.

Xa re' la' ru' nok chi cu ja' nc'ulic ta ayu' wach ac'al eh chi cu ja' richop ta wo' k'oro̱j c'uhbal, re' Wa̱n je' wili xik'or queh chi'nchel tinamit ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel: ‹Chacana̱' tak ribanaric i mahc eh cu re' aj ru' enikahsaj aha̱' tak, nqui xik'or queh.

«Je' re' xik'or queh, maj nok q'uisi̱n chic ma' ricohlaj wach ricamaj ye'o̱j cho reh ru'um i Dios, re' Wa̱n je' wo' wili xik'or cho: ‹Re' hat-tak nacapaj tak chi re' hin nawoquic cho chi k'atal k'oric pan tinamit, maje'? Til pan coric ma' je' ta re'. Re' la' naroquic chi kak'atal k'oric re' i winak c'ulic lok reh chiwi̱j hin. Re're' k'e̱' wo' chic xi̱c' na̱ rajawric chi xa ta nak re' t'uch wach camanic je' ricab richejeric riper xijab riban raj camanom jeno' ajabe̱s, ric'ul chi wi̱n chi eniban chiwach, nqui xik'or cho Wa̱n.

«Chiri̱j aj i Jesus re're', re' hoj c'ahchi' kak'orom i c'uhbal xojtak'abjic wi̱' chi nakak'orom aweh hat-tak was tak nicha̱k' wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Awraham je' wo' aweh hat-tak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Awraham. Re' c'uhbal re're' je' wili rik'or: ‹Re' Jesus, re' aj co'lonel queh chi'nchel c'acharel

eh to̱b ta wo' nak je' re', re' take tinamit aj Jerusalen ch'i̱l take nahsil chi quina̱, xa xquich'uk wo' k'oric china̱ i Jesus. Ru̱c' aj xca'n take tinamit re're', xo̱j manlajok wach i quik'orbal take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios re' quitz'ihmbam cho chiri̱j i Jesus chipam take hu̱j nilmijic wach pan tak hi'lbal k'i̱j, xa re' la' to̱b ta wo' nilmijic wach take hu̱j re're' pan tak hi'lbal k'i̱j, re' take tinamit xa ma' xquirak ta wo' chiri̱j i k'oric xca'n take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios eh xa ta wo' nak xquina'bej chi re' Jesus aj co'lonel queh c'acharel.
Chiri̱j chic ru' nok xich'uk chic k'oric china̱ i Jesus, re' take tinamit quipahkaj reh Po̱nsyo Pila̱to chi naritak'a̱b ricansjic to̱b ta nak ma'xta nech' ok rimahc chi nariquimic.
Je' re' quimic xiban i Jesus reh chi xmanlajic wach nic' nimal tz'ihmbimaj cho chiri̱j. Chiri̱j wili naxkahsjic cho Jesus wach curu̱s, xo̱j cojorok pan jenaj muk'unbal,
xa re' la' re' Dios xucsaj wo' cho chi quixilac camnak, nqui i c'uhbal re're'.

«Nok ucsumaj chic cho Jesus, q'uih k'i̱j xic'uhtaj ri̱b chi c'achlic queh take wich aj niminel re' xa re' wo' xiponic cu ar Jerusalen naxichalic ar Calile̱ya, xa c'ahchi' wo' quiyeb quichi̱' queh aj Jerusalen chiri̱j i holohic laj c'uhbal wili
re' c'ahchi' wo' kak'orom aweh tak yu'na chi je' wili: Re' rik'orom cho Dios queh take kama̱m kati't najtir k'i̱j,

xmanlajic wo' wach ru'um nok re're' xucsaj cho Jesus chi quixilac camnak. Je' re' k'uru', ma' xa ta queh take kama̱m kati't xmanlajic wach rik'orbal i Dios riyeb cho najtir k'i̱j, je' la' wo' xmanlajic wach ku̱c' i hoj ca̱' qui'sil c'achalco̱j yu'na. Je' re' nik'or maj chi c'ahchi' rik'oric i Dios chiri̱j ripahba̱bjic i Jesus chi k'atal k'oric, je' wili xik'or pa ricab moloj wach bi̱ch ritz'ihmbam ma' Tawiy: “Re' hat, hat wAc'u̱n eh chiwach i k'i̱j wili tinipahba̱' yu'na chi K'atal K'oric, nqui xik'or.

«Ma' xa re' ta re' xik'or, je' la' wo' xik'or chi je' wili: “Re' lok' laj k'oric xnik'or cho reh Tawiy chi narich'ica̱b wi̱' ric'ux awu̱c' hat-tak narimanlajic wach, nqui xik'or. «Ru̱c' xik'or i Dios chi je' re', xo̱j wo' manlajok wach i k'oric k'oro̱j cho ru'um wili chi ru̱c' rucsjic cho chi quixilac take camnak c'ahchi' ribanam chi re' riti'jolal i c'acharel xipahba̱' chi K'atal K'oric ma' jaruj ta narimikric ac'al.

Je' re' xiban, je' ricab tz'ihmbimaj wo' cho wili ru'um i ma' Tawiy ar chipam jenaj chic ribi̱ch: “Re' hat Dios ma'xta ayeb k'ab chi re' riti'jolal i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s narimikric ac'al, nqui xitz'ihmbaj cho ma' Tawiy.

«Yu'na k'uru' charak tak chiri̱j i wili: Re' k'oric xik'or ma' Tawiy re're' ma' re' ta chiri̱j chi ribil ri̱b xk'oric cho, chiri̱j la' Jesus xk'oric. Je' re' nok re' hin ma' re' ta chucuj k'oric niban aweh tak nanik'or i wili: Re' ma' Tawiy re' xiban ricamaj chi k'atal k'oric chi quina̱ take rich c'acharel je' ricab rik'atam cho ri̱j i Dios, re're' naxquimic je xmikric wo' ac'al chipam i muk'unbal xmuk'unjic wi̱' cu̱c' take rima̱m rati't
raj nchel Jesus re' xucsjic cho ru'um i Dios chi quixilac take camnak, ma' xmikric ta nchel ac'al.

«Je' aj re' ru' was tak nicha̱k' chana'bej tak chi xa ru'um i Jesus re' xc'a'chsjic cho ru'um i Dios chi quixilac camnak, re' hoj xkac'ul kajawric chi c'uhbalanic eh ru'um re' c'ahchi' kak'orom aweh tak yu'na chi wilic cuybal mahc pa ribihnal.
Je' wo' nkak'or aweh tak chi re' nic' pa' q'uihal take nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j ru' ewo' ncuyuric quimahc chiwach chi'nchel chaj bih ma' cuyu̱j ta nak chic ru'um i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses.

Je' re' k'uru' chana'bej tak chi coric i c'ahchi' kak'orom aweh tak eh ma̱yak'abej pan awo̱k tak. Chayohbalej awi̱b tak eh ma' ok nchel chana̱ hat-tak ncutbic i c'uhbal k'oro̱j cho chi je' wili cu'um take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios najtir k'i̱j:

“Hat-tak re' nayak'abej pan awo̱k tak nik'orbal, til wo' chic k'e̱' cowil awa̱mna tak chi ricojoric wach re' nik'or aweh tak. Je' re' nik'or maj to̱b ta nak re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi nanisacham awach tak chiwach take k'i̱j c'achalca̱t tak wi̱' wili, ma' nacoj ta wo' tak wach. Ma' xa re' ta wo' re', ticahnic la' wo' tak chi ma'xta bih nana'bej tak. Xa ta wo' nak riban naho̱l awach tak chi ripech'jic ri̱j i wili, nqui rik'or, nqui ma' Lu̱'. Ru̱c' aj re' xicohlaj i c'uhbalanic ar.

Chiri̱j re', nok re' ma' Lu̱' c'ahchi' relic je ch'i̱l i Wernaweh chipam i pa̱t re're', re' take c'amol quibe̱h take c'acharel nquimol qui̱b ar, xquipahkaj reh chi naritikim ju' rik'ormojic ribiral i Jesus chipam i jenaj chic ponok hi'lbal k'i̱j

xa re' la' naxquich'ak cahnok quib i ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i ma' Wernaweh cu̱c' take c'acharel wilque̱b ar, xa xitahkaljic wo' je cu'um q'uihal take quich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ch'i̱l wo' juntuhm chi ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' quicojom qui̱b chi rinimjic i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eh nquic'am wo' na̱ i c'uhbal re're'. Re' take c'acharel re're' je' wili xk'ormojic queh ru'um ma' Lu̱': «K'e̱' nchel ato̱b chi re' hat-tak xanimej tak i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j richak'lamil i Dios. Ma̱poh'aj chic ac'ux tak chiri̱j c'uhbal re're' k'uru', nqui xk'ormojic queh.

Chiri̱j chic ru' naxponic i jenaj chic hi'lbal k'i̱j reh xama̱na, re' take c'acharel chipam i tinamit re're' naxquibiraj ribiral chi re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh wilque̱b ar chipam i pa̱t re' ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, q'uihal take xquimol qui̱b ar chi ribirmijic riC'uhbal i Dios rik'or i ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh.

Nok juntuhm take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xquilow chi yohbal wach q'uihal tinamit xquimol quib chi ribirmijic i ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh, k'e̱' naxchalic quic'a̱ eh ru'um re' je' wili p'uht quik'orom chi risolc'jic pa ri̱j rik'orbal ma' Lu̱': «Re' nak'or i hat rik'ebil awach ma' Lu̱' ma' coric ta, nqui p'uht quik'orom.

Raj la' ma' Lu̱' naxpah'ic johtok ch'i̱l i Wernaweh je' wili xik'or queh chi ma' nyo'jic ta nech' ok: «Re' hoj riwi̱' chi keh, chi aweh hat-tak kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel nakak'orom chi pe̱t i riC'uhbal i Dios nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus. Xa re' la' ru'um chi c'ahchi' ak'ebem tak lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak i c'uhbal re're', nc'utunic lok chawach tak chi ma' ric'ul ta chaweh tak chi na̱wucsjic wo' tak chic chi quixilac camnak reh chi na̱c'acharic tak chi junelic. Yu'na k'uru' re' hoj cu̱c' chic take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilque̱b chipam i yuk'ul wili nakojic chi rik'ormojic i c'uhbal re're'

maj re' tak'anic xiban keh i kAja̱w Jesus jenaj wach ch'i̱l je' ricab k'oro̱j cho reh raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios Isayi̱yas ribihnal naxk'ormojic reh chi je' wili: “Je' ricab nok jenaj sakombal cojo̱j chi quisakom take xa hab pa' wach c'acharel, re' hin Dios c'ahchi' wo' ca̱t nipahba̱b chi waj tz'e' wa̱ch aj sakomonel pa̱m quino'jbal take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Je' re' apahbabjic niban reh chi xa haj pa' yu̱k' q'uixca̱b wilque̱b wi̱' take c'acharel ewo' quico'ljic, nqui rik'or, nqui ma' Lu̱' queh.

Naxquibiraj chi je' re' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel birinic nca'n cok ar, xa suk chic quic'ux p'uht quitioxem johtok reh Dios ru'um i C'uhbal chiri̱j i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus c'ahchi' rik'ormojic queh. Je' re' nok, chi quixilac take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re're', re' ch'uku̱j wo' cho qui̱j ru'um i Dios chi naquico'ljic, yohbal wach q'uihal take xiniminic reh c'uhbal chiri̱j Jesus re' xiban i ma' Lu̱'.
Je' re' ajic re' C'uhbal chiri̱j i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus q'uihal take c'acharel quiniminic reh eh ru'um re' c'ahchi' wo' rojic lok rik'ormojic cu'um ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh chipam i yuk'ul re're'.

Xa re' la' c'uhbal re're' ma' nponic ta chi quiwach take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, re' la' chic xca'n xi'oquic chi rihunuric quipa̱m take nahsil chipam i tinamit re're' ch'i̱l take ju'jun ixok yohbalamaj quiwach ch'i̱l wo' c'amol take na̱ i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Chi je' re' p'uht ca'nam ti'c'axic reh ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh cu rehtal xquesaj lok chiri̱j quitinami̱t.

Ar ajic re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh nok elic chic nca'n je chipam i tinamit re're', xquipuh lok i poklaj ch'ihlic pan co̱k rehtalil chi re' take c'acharel re're' xkajic mahc chi quina̱. Chi je' re', re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Wernaweh xi'o̱j chipam i tinamit Ico̱nyo ribihnal
naxquicana̱' cahnok take quich aj niminel ar Antiyoqui̱ya chi xa suk chic pan quic'ux ru'um xchoporic quina̱ ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios.

Nic' pa' wach xc'uluric ar Antiyoqui̱ya je' wo' chic re' xc'uluric ar pan tinamit Ico̱nyo. Q'uihal take tinamit ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ch'i̱l wo' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xquinimej ribiral i Jesus re' xik'or i ma' Lu̱' naxoquic cok ch'i̱l i Wernaweh ar chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses.

Ma' xa re' ta re' xc'uluric ar, je' la' wo' wilic take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' xjot'oric quicapew-bal cu'um take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' ma' nquinimej ta i c'uhbal rik'or ma' Lu̱', xquimin qui̱b chi aj ixowonel chic queh take aj niminel.

Je' aj re' chiwach q'uih k'i̱j xiwih'ic ar i ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Wernaweh, ma' xiyo'jic ta nech' ok chi rik'ormojic ribiral i kAja̱w Jesus maj re' wo' re' xc'uhtunic queh chi til coric i rik'orbal xiyew queh chi quitobjic naxik'or queh chi je' wili: «Re' hin naniyeb aweh tak ribanaric yohbal wach lok' laj nawa̱l rehtalil chi til coric ak'orbal tak, nqui rik'orom queh.

Ma' xa re' ta re' xc'uluric ar, je' la' wo' take c'acharel chipam i tinamit re're', xquich'ak qui̱b ru̱c' quino'jbal ru'um ma' jenaj ta chic wach quicapew-bal. Je' re' nok wilic xquichop quic'ux chiqui̱j take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' ma' quiniminic ta reh riC'uhbal i Dios eh wilic wo' xquichop quic'ux chiqui̱j ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Wernaweh re' pahbamaj take chi quinahsil aj niminel.

Chi je' aj re' wilque̱b wi̱' take c'acharel re're', re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ch'i̱l take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xquitik'a̱' wach quino'jbal ch'i̱l take quinahsil chi naquitz'ujum je' wo' chi naquicansam chi abaj ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh.

Xa re' la' naxponic pan quixiquin ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh i chaj bih xquitik'a̱' wach take caj ixowonel, xi'elic je chipam tinamit re're' eh xi'o̱j c'olok chipam i tinamit Li̱stra ribihnal re' wilic pa riyuk'ul i Licaho̱nya rich'i̱l ri̱b ch'i̱l i tinamit Te̱rwe ribihnal. Chipam aj take tinamit re're' je' wo' pan tak cuc' tinamit wilque̱b lok chiri̱j i yuk'ul re're'
xquitik ju' rik'ormojic ribiral i Jesus.
Ar chipam i tinamit Li̱stra wilic jenaj winak ma' riniq'uem ta behic chi junpech ru'um chi si̱c cho cu pa rasbal. Junpech nok re' winak re're' chi tz'uklic jok wach ac'al
c'ahchi' ribiram riC'uhbal i Dios, re' ma' Lu̱' xicoj rehtal chi re're' ch'iclic ric'ux chiri̱j i Jesus chi re're' encowsonic reh. Je' re' nok re' ma' Lu̱' xitz'ehtaj chi coric i winak re're'
eh je' wili xik'or reh chi cow: «Quicowjok take awo̱k. Tipa'lajok johtok chi coric, nqui reh. Xa re' wo' ti xk'ormojic reh chi je' re', xpurunic johtok i winak re're' eh xoquic chi behic.

Naxquilow take tinamit aj Li̱stra re' nic' wach xiban i ma' Lu̱' ru̱c' i si̱c nak re're', je' wili p'uht quik'orom pan quik'orbal Licaho̱nya ribihnal: «Re' take wili, dios take je' quiwi̱' winak xikajic cho ayu' ku̱c', nqui p'uht quik'orom take c'acharel re're'
chi c'ahchi' quibihnem i Wernaweh chi Ju̱piter eh re' ma' Lu̱' c'ahchi' quibihnem chi He̱rmes ru'um chi re're' nbanic i k'oric.

Chi je' aj re' c'ahchi'que̱b take tinamit, re' aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i tiyo̱x Ju̱piter ribihnal re' nlok'onjic wach chipam i ripatil wilic lok ma' naht ta chi' ocbal reh tinamit re're', xic'am cho quib xib chi wacax xoyomaj calak chi ihtz'ub eh xa̱j nak ricansam take wacax re're' ar lok chi chi̱' lok i ocbal reh tinamit, reh chi rich'i̱l take tinamit nariyeb nak rilok'il ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh.

Xa re' la' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh naxquirak chiri̱j chi naquicansjic nak take wacax chi ye'bal quilok'il, xquik'ihtaj qui̱b chiwach i aj k'ahsem si̱ re're' chi ma'xta ribanam chi je' re'. Chiri̱j re' nok quiwekem chic quiso' rehtalil chi ma' xic'ul ta quiwach chi je' re' naribanaric nak queh, xquiminej cok qui̱b chi quixilac take tinamit chi xa q'ueric chic quichi̱'

chi je' wili c'ahchi' quik'orom: «Hat-tak kas kacha̱k', ma̱ban tak keh je' re' maj re' hoj xa hoj wo' ti winak je' ricab hat-tak. Re' hoj xa xojc'ulic wo' ti lok ayu' chi rik'ormojic aweh tak chi na̱cana̱b tak i lok'onic wach tiyo̱x re' ma'xta bih ritik aweh tak. Re' aj re' xchalic kak'or aweh tak reh chi re' chic i c'achlic Dios re' aj tik'inel reh taxa̱j, aj tik'inel reh wach ac'al, aj tik'inel queh ha', aj tik'inel wo' queh nic' pa' nimal quic'acharic chipam take re', re' chic i Dios re're' enalok'ej tak wach.

«Til coric, xa haj atinami̱t wilca̱t hat-tak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, re' kaDios xicana̱' take cho ama̱m awati't tak chi cutquel ru'um reh lok'onic wach tiyo̱x xquichih lok wach ribanaric,

xa re' la' ru' to̱b ta je' re' xiban cu̱c', ma' xicana̱' ta wo' ric'uhtjic i rajawric chi re're' i Dios chi quina̱. Je' wo' ma' xicana̱' ta riye'eric cho rato'bil chi kana̱ i hoj chi'nchel c'acharel. Ru'um aj cho ric'axbal wilic chi kana̱, re' Dios riyew cho jab narirak cho rik'ijil chiwach, je' wo' ricoj cho rik'ijil chi re' take tic naquiwachanic eh xa ma' nech' ta ti wach take katic nkamol, til q'uih la' wo' chic riyew cho keh chi suksbal cho kac'ux, nqui ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh queh.

Naxquicohlaj rik'ormojic re're', re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh p'uht quik'oric cu̱c' take tinamit re're' ch'uksbal quic'ux chi ma'xta quicansam take wacax re're' chi ye'bal quilok'il. Xa re' la' c'axic naxca'n canar quipitjic take tinamit chi ma'xta ca'nam re're'.

Ar ajic nok je' re' xca'n i ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh, juntuhm chi ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' xichalic ar pan tinamit Antiyoqui̱ya ch'i̱l wo' ar Ico̱nyo xi'oquic chi k'oric cu̱c' take tinamit re're' chi naquicansam i ma' Lu̱' eh ma' c'axic ta wo' ti naxch'uk quic'ux chi ric'amaric na̱ xquik'or take ru'. Nok ch'ukunak chic quic'ux take aj Li̱stra, xquik'ojobej i ma' Lu̱' chi abaj eh naxquicapaj chi camnak chic, xquijuquej lok chiri̱j i tinamit

xa re' la' ma' Lu̱' cu c'achlic wo' cho. Je' re' k'uru' nok re' take aj niminel chipam i tinamit re're' xquimol qui̱b china̱ ma' Lu̱', xuctic cho eh xoquic wo' chic cok chiqui̱j chipam i tinamit re're' xa re' la' xa ic'sbal chic reh chak'ab maj naxsak'ic lok je' ikal, xo̱j ch'i̱l i Wernaweh ar pan tinamit Te̱rwe.

Ar chic xitik ju' rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios eh ar q'uihal take aj Te̱rwe xquinimej i Dios ru'um i k'oric xiban i ma' Lu̱'. Chiri̱j ru' re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh xisoljic wo' chic je chipam take tinamit xi'iq'uic je wi̱', je' ricab Li̱stra, Ico̱nyo ch'i̱l Antiyoqui̱ya.

Chipam take tinamit re're', re' take aj niminel xcowsjic quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus ru̱c' i c'uhbalanic xiban ma' Lu̱' chi je' wili: «Re' ti'c'axic ma' haj ta iq'ue̱l keh. Re' cok ru' ma̱cana̱' tak rinimjic i kAja̱w Dios maj reh chi nakoquic chi k'atoj k'oric rich'i̱l i Jesus curman chi nakac'ulum ti'c'axic, nqui c'uhbalanic xiban.

Ma' xa re' ta re' xiban i ma' Lu̱', je' la' wo' chi quixilac take ju'jun tuhm chi moloj wach aj niminel xipahba̱' take aj nahsil chi quixilac. Nok ca'nam chic re're', re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh xca'n quiti̱j ru̱c' cuyuj wi'c chiqui̱j take nahsil re're' reh chi naquitobjic ru'um i Dios. Chiri̱j chic ru' xi'okxa'njic pa rik'ab i kAja̱w Jesus re' ch'iclic wi̱' quic'ux take c'amol be̱h re're'.

Chiri̱j aj chic ru', re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh xi'elic je chipam take tinamit re're', xi'iq'uic chi pe̱t chipam i yuk'ul Pisi̱rya ribihnal eh chiri̱j chic ru' xi'o̱j c'olok pa riyuk'ul i Panpi̱lya.
Ar pa riyuk'ul Panpi̱lya, chipam i tinamit Pe̱rque ribihnal xquik'or ribiral i Jesus eh chiri̱j chic ribanaric re're', re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh xi'o̱j chipam i tinamit Ata̱lya ribihnal.

Ar ajic chipam i tinamit Ata̱lya, re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh xi'oquic je pan jenaj ma' laj cano̱wa eh xi'o̱j wo' chic ar Antiyoqui̱ya, re' tinamit elenak cho take wi̱' naxitak'abjic take cho cu'um take quich aj niminel re' xipahkanic reh rato'bil i Dios chi quina̱ naxo̱j ca'n i camanic cu re' xquicohlaj cho ribanaric.

Nok ar chic wilque̱b Antiyoqui̱ya, re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh xquimol wach take moloj wach aj niminel eh je' wili p'uht quik'orom: «Awilo̱j ta nak tak ti katobjic riban i Dios je' wo' nic' wach i rato'bil xiyew queh take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi xquich'ica̱' wo' quic'ux chiri̱j Jesus, nqui xik'or queh.
Je' re' ajic re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Wernaweh xicahnic cu̱c' take aj niminel ar Antiyoqui̱ya chiwach q'uih k'i̱j.

Chiwach aj wo' take k'i̱j nok re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh wilque̱b ar Antiyoqui̱ya, ju'jun take aj niminel xichalic ar pa riyuk'ul Jure̱ya xi'o̱j c'olok ar eh je' wili p'uht quik'orom queh take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' aj niminel chic take: «Re' hat-tak re' ma' re' ta hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, ma' eta tico'ljic tak ru'um i Dios to̱b ta nak ch'iclic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus wi ma' nak'at tak lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ac'achanbal tak je' ricab k'oro̱j cho chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, nqui p'uht quik'orom.

Ru'um reh k'oro̱j re're', re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh xca'n jenaj rinimal wolic quich'i̱l take aj niminel xiponic ar. Ru'um re', re' take aj niminel ar Antiyoqui̱ya xquipahba̱' i ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh ch'i̱l take ju'jun chic quich aj niminel chi nacojic ar Jerusalen reh chi naquimolom qui̱b cu̱c' take pahbamaj chi nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj niminel reh i Jesus quich'i̱l wo' take quinahsil aj niminel wilque̱b chipam i tinamit re're'. Chi je' re' naquisiq'uim ri̱j chaj bih naquicahnic wi̱' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ru̱c' quiniminic.

Je' re' nok re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh chiri̱j chic naxic'ulic canabjok nah be̱h cu'um take aj niminel wilque̱b ar Antiyoqui̱ya, xi'o̱j ar Jerusalen xa re' la' ru' pe̱t xi'iq'uic ponok chipam riyuk'ul i Peni̱sya je' wo' pa riyuk'ul i Sama̱rya, re' k'e̱' xsukbic wi̱' quic'ux take quich aj niminel naxk'ormojic queh nic' wach rijalaric wach quino'jbal c'ahchi' ca'nam take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilque̱b pan tak toco̱m chic tinamit.

Nok pononak chic take ar Jerusalen, re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh xic'uluric chi suk cu'um take aj niminel ch'i̱l take quinahsil, je' wo' cu'um take pahbamaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus. Chiri̱j chic ru' xi'oquic chi rik'ororic nic' wach quitobjic xiban cho Dios chi quic'uhbaljic take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel

xa re' la' ru' naxquibiraj chi je' re' take ju'jun aj niminel je' ru̱c' wilque̱b nak cho chipam quicomonil take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, xipa'lajic johtok eh je' wili xquik'or: «Re' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel quiniminic reh ac'uhbal tak, tak'abjok je rik'ormojic queh chi naquic'amam na̱ i k'oro̱j cho chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Je' re' ajic til k'ormojok je queh chi quik'at lok ritz'uhmal na̱ quic'achanbal, nqui take.

Chi je' re' k'uru' re' take quinahsil aj niminel ch'i̱l wo' take pahbamaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus xquimol wach nic' nimal take aj niminel chi ritik'injic wach i c'axquilal c'ahchi' ric'ulmujic re're'.

Ar aj ru' nok re' take mololque̱b ar p'uht quichopom qui̱b chiri̱j c'axquilal re're', re' ma' Luch xipahba̱' johtok ri̱b eh je' wili xik'or queh: «Was tak nicha̱k', najtir chic niyeb aweh tak reht'aljic chi re' Dios richihim cho niwach i hin chi rik'ormojic riC'uhbal queh take ju'jun c'acharel ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Re' take c'acharel re're' naxquibiraj i c'uhbal, xquich'ica̱' wo' quic'ux chiri̱j i kAja̱w Jesus.

Je' wo', xniyew wo' aweh tak chi eht'aljic chi re' Dios re' nilbic reh pa̱m i ka̱mna chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel, xik'or chiqui̱j take ju'jun c'acharel xiniminic re're' chi coric chic wach i ca̱mna eh xic'uhtaj wo' chi til je' re', naxitak'a̱' cho queh i Lok' laj rUxlabal tak'amaj chic cho keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' kojniminic reh Jesus.

Je' aj re' ru', re' Lok' laj Uxlabal ma' xilow ta ca̱mna take c'acharel re're' chi toco̱m ta nak chiwach i ka̱mna hoj, xisaksaj la' wach queh eh je' re' xiban ru'um chi re' take c'acharel re're' xquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus.

Chi k'oro̱j chic aweh tak re're', yu'na re' hin niban aweh tak i pahkanic wili: Nic' wach nok re' take c'uhbal hoj tijimaj wi̱' na̱tak'a̱b tak je ripahkaljic queh take kich aj niminel ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi naquic'amam na̱, wi xa ta nak re' hoj ch'i̱l kama̱m kati't xkac'am na̱ i c'uhbal re're' ru'um reh ric'ayew-bal? Ru̱c' re're' c'ahchi' abanam tak chi re' Dios encakric cho awu̱c' tak

ru'um chi cu nacoj tak wach chi xa ru'um rinimjic take c'uhbal re're' na̱co'ljic tak. Haj cok wilic riwi̱' chi keh hoj aj niminel chi nakacojom wach, re' chi re' kAja̱w Jesus narico'lonic keh hoj aj niminel ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ch'i̱l wo' take kich aj niminel ma' re' ta take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Je' re' naribanam chiki̱j ru'um chi k'e̱' ti' kojric'raj cho, nqui ma' Luch.

Naxquibiraj chi je' re', re' take tinamit mololque̱b ar, ma' cu ta chic xik'oric ru'um ricorquilal xk'ormojic queh, re' la' chic xca'n p'uht quibiram i ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh naxi'oquic chi rik'ormojic nic' wach nok re' Dios yohbal wach lok' laj nawa̱l xiban ru̱c' co̱k quik'ab ru' c'uhtbal reh chi til coric i c'uhbal xquik'or chi quixilac take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.
Nok k'oro̱j chic re're' ru'um ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Wernaweh, re' ma' Jaco̱wo je' wili xik'or: «Was tak nicha̱k', chacoj tak axiquin chi ribirmijic i nanik'orom wili:

Re' Luch re' ribihnej wo' chi Simon, rik'orom chic cho aweh tak ricorquil nic' wach nok re' Dios xc'ulic chi quitobjic take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' xicojbic cho wach ribiral i Jesus pan pe̱t eh nic' wach wo' nok re' Dios chi quixilac take chi'nchel c'acharel re're' xichih take chi naca'nam chi ritinami̱t reh chi naquilok'em wach.
Re' rik'orom cho ma' Luch, ric'u'lej ri̱b rich'i̱l quik'orbal take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios je' ricab xitz'ihmbaj cho jenaj queh aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios chi je' wili:

“Nok bokoj chic i pa̱t tik'imaj ru'um ma' Tawiy reh chi ar narilok'onjic niwach, re' hin naniwih'ic wo' chic awu̱c' tak. Nok wilqui̱n ok chic chaxilac tak, re' pa̱t re' xbokoric re're' naritik'injic wo' chic eh narijohsjic wo' chic take tz'ak xik'ehbic lok chiri̱j.

Je' re' k'uru' re' hin nanijohsam wo' chic i pa̱t re're' reh chi naricamanic chi jenaj ye'a̱b re' naqui̱nquisiq'uim wi̱' pan ti̱j take tinamit ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh ru̱c' chi je' re' enca'n, re' take quich quitinami̱t take cho tinamit re're' ewo' quinquisic' pan quiti̱j chi nilok'onjic.
Re' hin Dios re' xnik'or cho re're' najtir k'i̱j reh chi na̱weht'alim tak, re' wo' hin c'ahchi' nik'oric reh take k'oric wili, nqui xik'or i Dios.

«Ru'um aj chi je' re' xik'or cho i Dios, re' wili capewenic niban eh re' wo' re' nik'or aweh tak chi na̱banam tak: Re' nic' pa' nimal c'uhbal hoj tijimaj wi̱', ma' nkahamej chi quina̱ take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel,

re' la' ka'n tak katz'ihmbaj je jeno' hu̱j re' enkak'or je wi̱' queh chi je' wili: ‹Ma̱ban tak chic aweh take xa je' na ricab jeno' mahc chi quiwach take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ricab ribanaric take wili: Re' ruc'jic riquiq'ue̱l jeno' chicop, on re' ric'uxuric ritibquilal jeno' chicop k'ahsamaj chiwach tiyo̱x, on re' ric'uxuric jeno' chicop biyo̱j chi ralak. Je' wo' ma̱ban tak chic ribanaric i c'oyomal, nqui katz'ihmbaj je queh pan hu̱j.

«Re' aj re' til raj tz'ihmjic je queh pan hu̱j chi quitobjic reh chi wilque̱b pan sukquil c'uxlis quich'i̱l kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ar re' quic'acharic wi̱'. Je' re' nik'or maj c'olok pan ac'ux tak chi pan tak ju'jun tinamit wilque̱b wi̱' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, wilque̱b wo' take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' eli̱c hi'lbal k'i̱j nquilow wach take C'uhbal Ye'o̱j ru'um Moyses ar chipam take pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j c'uhbal re're', nqui Jaco̱wo.

Nic' pa' nimal xik'or ma' Jaco̱wo, xponic chi quiwach take rich pahbamaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus ch'i̱l take moloj wach aj niminel ch'i̱l wo' take quinahsil ru'. Ru'um aj re', re' take nahsil re're' xquipahba̱' chi caj tz'e' wa̱ch quib chi winak nimak quiwach chi quixilac take aj niminel, re' je' wili quibihnal: Re' Ju̱ras re' ribihnej wo' chi Warsawas ch'i̱l i Si̱las. Je' re' xca'n reh chi re' take re' naquitak'abjic je ar Antiyoqui̱ya chiri̱j ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh eh nok na quiponok ar, naquik'oric wo' cu̱c' take aj niminel je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.

Je' wo', xic'ul quic'ux chi naquitz'ihmbam jenaj hu̱j re' naquitak'a̱b je chiqui̱j quib aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're'. Je' wili xquik'or je chipam i hu̱j re're': «Re' hoj pahbamaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus wilco̱j ayu' Jerusalen ch'i̱l take quinahsil aj niminel, ch'i̱l wo' take aj niminel, nkatak'a̱' je risukquilal ac'ux hat-tak aj niminel ma' re' ta hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilca̱t tak ar Antiyoqui̱ya ch'i̱l take awich atinamital tak wilque̱b pa riyuk'ul i Si̱rya ch'i̱l wo' hat-tak wilca̱t tak ar pa riyuk'ul i Sili̱sya.

«Ru'um nok xkabiraj chi xyojoric acapew-bal tak cu'um ju'jun take kich niminel ra̱' ri'sil take cho ma' Israhel re' xiponic awu̱c' tak chi c'uhbalanic chi ma' re' ta katak'anic take je eh ru'um wo' chi xquiham chana̱ tak i nic' pa' nimal i c'uhbal hoj tijimaj nak wi̱',

re' hoj yu'na xkatik'a̱' wach kano'jbal chi kawach eh xkacapaj chiri̱j chi tare̱t chi xkapahba̱' take qui̱b kich'i̱l wili chi nacojic awu̱c' tak chiqui̱j take kasbe̱s re' til k'e̱' ti' nkic'raj take, re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh.
Re' take re' ma' nquiyohlej ta nech' ok quic'acharic chiwach i quimic naquik'oric chiri̱j rajawric Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.
Je' aj re', re' hoj c'ahchi' katak'a̱b je awu̱c' tak i Ju̱ras ch'i̱l i Si̱las re' naquisakomem wach aweh tak take i tik'inic xka'n i hoj

maj to̱b ta ma' chi'nchel ta chic take c'uhbal hoj tijimaj cho wi̱' enkahamej chana̱ tak, re' hoj ch'i̱l Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios xkacapaj ri̱j chi tare̱t chi enkapahkaj aweh i ajwal wach chi banaric wili:

Chi ma̱wuq'uej tak chic riquiq'ue̱l jeno' chicop on ma̱c'ux tak chic ritibquilal jeno' chicop k'ahsamaj chi si̱ chiwach tiyo̱x on jeno' chicop biyo̱j chi ralak eh ma̱ban wo' tak chic c'oyomal. Ru̱c' aj chi je' re' ena'n tak, re' hat-tak na̱wih'ic tak pan sukquil c'uxlis cu̱c' take kich aj niminel ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. «Chawic'raj tak ar k'uru', nqui xquitz'ihmbaj je pan hu̱j xquitak'a̱' je take nahsil aj c'amol be̱h.
Je' aj re' naxiponic Antiyoqui̱ya take xitak'abjic je, xquik'ahsaj i hu̱j queh take moloj wach aj niminel xquimol wach.
Chi je' re' k'e̱' naxsukbic quic'ux take aj niminel naxquilow wach i hu̱j re're'. Ru̱c' risukquil quic'ux xye'eric queh ru̱c' i hu̱j re're',

re' take aj niminel xquicowsaj riman quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus naxquibiraj xquik'or i Ju̱ras ch'i̱l i Si̱las. Je' re' nik'or chi xc'uluric cu̱c' maj re' take re' chiwach take k'i̱j naxiwih'ic ar ru'um chi aj k'orol wo' reh take k'oric nquic'ul ru̱c' i Dios, xquik'or wo' queh take aj niminel chi til quichop quic'ux chiri̱j Jesus.
Nok q'uih k'i̱j chic quiwih'ic ar i Si̱las ch'i̱l i Ju̱ras, re' take aj niminel ar Antiyoqui̱ya xquitak'a̱' wo' chic je take pan sukquil c'uxlis cu̱c' take hab wach xitak'anic cho queh ar Jerusalen
xa re' la' chic ru', re' Si̱las xicapaj ri̱j chi tare̱t chi naricahnic ar Antiyoqui̱ya chi quihch'iljic

ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Wernaweh, maj re' take re' chiwach take k'i̱j naxicahnic ar Antiyoqui̱ya xquitik ju' c'uhtunic chiri̱j i Jesus chi c'ahchi' quik'orom riC'uhbal i Dios quich'i̱l take riq'uihal aj niminel ar.

Chiri̱j chic nic' pa' nahtil wih'ic xca'n ar Antiyoqui̱ya, re' ma' Lu̱' je' wili xik'or reh Wernaweh: «Wernaweh, tak wo' chic chipam take tinamit xojponic cho wi̱' chi rik'ormojic i C'uhbal chiri̱j i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus. Chi je' re' enkilow take kich aj niminel nic' wach wilque̱b pan quiniminic, nqui xik'or reh.
Nok re' Wernaweh xa̱j nak chi re' Wa̱n re' ribihnej wo' chi Cus narojic wo' nak chic chiqui̱j chipam take behenic nacojic ca'nam,

re' ma' Lu̱' je' wili xik'or: «Re' Cus re're', ma' xojritahkej ta wo' je chipam take tinamit nakojic wo' chic wi̱' chi c'uhbalanic yu'na maj nok wilic nak ponok chiki̱j xojricana̱' cho ar Panpi̱lya. Ma' riban ta chi wi̱n k'uru' chi eno̱j chiki̱j yu'na, nqui xik'or reh Wernaweh.
Chi je' aj re' ricapew-bal i ma' Lu̱', re' Wernaweh xic'am chiri̱j i Cus eh xichop je ribe̱h pan ma' laj cano̱wa reh chi narojic pa riyuk'ul i Chi̱pire.

Re' chic ma' Lu̱' nok okxa'namaj chic pan k'ab i kAja̱w Dios cu'um take aj niminel ar Antiyoqui̱ya reh chi re're' narito'bonic reh, xelic je ar eh xo̱j ch'i̱l i Si̱las re' xichih wach chi narihch'ilem.
Chi je' aj re', re' ma' Lu̱' xiq'uic ponok chi pe̱t chipam riyuk'ul i Si̱rya ch'i̱l i Sili̱sya re' xicowsaj wi̱' quic'ux take moloj wach aj niminel ru̱c' quic'uhbaljic xiban.
