Chiri̱j chic ru' nok iq'uinak chic ponok chipam i tinamit Te̱rwe, re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l take c'ahchi' quihch'ilinic reh xiponic chipam i tinamit Li̱stra re' nc'acharic wi̱' jenaj aj niminel Timote̱yo ribihnal, rac'u̱n jenaj winak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ch'i̱l jenaj ixok aj niminel je' ru̱c' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.
Re' Timote̱yo wili, holohic laj k'oric nk'ormojic chiri̱j rino'jbal cu'um take aj niminel ar Li̱stra ch'i̱l wilque̱b ar Ico̱nyo

xa re' la' ma' ja' npahkaljic ta nak reh rik'ataric lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ric'achanbal. Ru'um aj chi re' ma' Lu̱' xponic chiwach chi re' Timote̱yo narojic chiri̱j chi c'uhbalanic, xipahkaj reh chi narik'atam lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ric'achanbal xa cu'um queh take rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilque̱b pan tak tinamit nariq'uic ponok wi̱' maj q'uihal take queht'alanic reh chi re' Timote̱yo wili to̱b ta rac'u̱n jenaj winak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, wilic wo' chi ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ru' ru'um i ritu̱t.

Chiri̱j aj chic nok re' Timote̱yo k'atoj chic lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ric'achanbal, re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las quich'i̱l chic Timote̱yo xquitik ju' quibe̱h chipam take tinamit wilque̱b chipam take ye'a̱b re're' eh chi je' re', re' ma' Lu̱' xiq'uic wo' rik'or ponok queh aj niminel ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, haj wilic take tak'anic xquiyew rik'ormojic take pahbamaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus ch'i̱l wo' take quinahsil aj niminel wilque̱b ar Jerusalen chi naric'amaric na̱ cu'um take aj niminel ma' re' ta take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.
Je' aj re' ru̱c' i c'uhbal xik'or ma' Lu̱', re' take ju'jun tuhm chi moloj wach aj niminel xcowjic quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus eh chi je' re' eli̱c i k'i̱j c'ahchi' riq'uihbic quiwach take aj niminel.

Nok elenak chic je ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Si̱las ch'i̱l Timote̱yo chipam riyuk'ul i Cala̱sya, re' aj wili xk'ormojic queh ru'um Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios naxi'oquic chic pa riyuk'ul i Pirji̱ya: «Ma̱ban tak c'uhbalanic chipam riyuk'ul i A̱sya, nqui xk'ormojic queh. Chi je' re' xca'n wo' je' ricab xk'ormojic queh ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal.
Nok wilque̱b chic pa ric'ula't i Mi̱sya, je' wo' chic re' xk'ormojic queh ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal naxquicapaj nak cok oquic chipam riyuk'ul i Witi̱nya.
Je' aj re' ru' nok iq'uinak chic je take chi riche̱l ric'ula't i Mi̱sya, xiponic chipam i tinamit Tro̱yas ribihnal re' xnirak take wi̱' hin ma' Cax chi nanip'utum je quihch'iljic.

Pan jenaj chak'ab chipam i tinamit re're', re' ma' Lu̱' xilow pan jenaj je' la'wa̱ch chi jenaj winak je' ru̱c' aj pa riyuk'ul Masero̱nya je' wili c'ahchi' ripahkam reh nok pa'lic chiwach: «Chacuy ha̱w, tichalok ku̱c' i hoj aj riyuk'ul Masero̱nya eh koj-ato'bej, nqui pahkanic c'ahchi' ribanaric reh pa riwiric.

Nok rilom chic re're' ma' Lu̱' chipam je' jenaj la'wa̱ch, je' wili xkak'or chi kawach: «Re' aj wili kojra̱j wi̱' i Dios chi nakojic chi c'uhbalanic ar Masero̱nya, nqui xkak'or chi kawach. Xa chiwach wo' ti junc'am re're' xkasic' jenaj ma' laj cano̱wa reh chi nakojic ar Masero̱nya.
Nok kachopom chic je ma' laj cano̱wa ar Tro̱yas, xchalic jenaj te̱w re' xojricora̱' je ar Samotra̱sya re' xka'n wi̱' junwar eh chiri̱j chic ru' xoj-o̱j ar Neya̱polis.

Naxoj-elic je Neya̱polis, xoj-o̱j pa riyuk'ul i Masero̱nya ar chipam jenaj tinamit re' k'e̱' nim wach tinamit chi quixilac take tinamit quic'acharic wi̱' aj Ro̱ma, Pili̱pos ribihnal. Nok quib xib chic k'i̱j kawih'ic ar,

xoj-elic lok chiri̱j i tinamit pan jenaj hi'lbal k'i̱j chi keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh xojponic ar chi chi̱' jenaj ha'. Ar wilic jenaj pa̱t re' xkacapaj i hoj chi wih'inak chi banbal ti̱j. Ar ajic naxquimol qui̱b take ju'jun ixok, re' hoj xkak'or ribiral i Jesus queh naxojtz'uhkic ar.

Ru̱c' ribiral xkak'or re're', jenaj ixok aj Tiyati̱ra Li̱rya ribihnal re' c'ahchi' wo' ribiram i c'ahchi' rik'orom ma' Lu̱' chiri̱j i kAja̱w Jesus, xteheric pa̱m ricapew-bal ru'um kAja̱w Dios reh chi narirakam chiri̱j chi coric eh je' wo' chi naroquic chi aj lok'em chic reh.

Je' re' k'uru' chiri̱j naxkahsjic riha̱' ixok re're' ch'i̱l take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n, je' wili pahkanic riban keh: «Yu'na re' hat-tak nacoj tak rehtal chi hin chic aj niminel reh kAja̱w Jesus. Chacuy tak k'uru', tak-tak chiwi̱j pa nipa̱t reh chi ena'n tak so' apatal ku̱c', nqui xik'or keh. Je' re' rik'or keh cu rehtal xch'uk kac'ux chi xojcahnic so' chipam ripa̱t ixok re're'.

Naxojcahnic wo' chic ar Pili̱pos, pan jenaj k'i̱j nok ojic nka'n chipam i ye'a̱b wilic nak wi̱' i pa̱t banbal ti̱j, xkarak jenaj k'ahxok ye'o̱j rik'orbal chi k'ijinic ru'um jenaj ma' tob laj uxlabal wilic ru̱c'. Re' k'ahxok wili ma' xa reh ta chi rutquel i tumi̱n riban canar nariban i k'ijinic, riyew la' wo' queh take rehreh chi ajabe̱s rirak wi̱' ricamaj. Til wo' k'e̱' q'uihal i tumi̱n nquic'ul take ajabe̱s re're' ru'um ricamaj i k'ahxok re're'!

Re' k'ahxok wili nok xa ritahkem chic ma' Lu̱' chi kich'i̱l i hoj, je' wili rik'or chi xa q'ueric chic chi̱' chiki̱j: «Re' take winak wili, aj tz'e' wa̱ch take reh i Dios re' k'e̱' rinimal rajawric eh re're' c'ahchi' quik'orom aweh tak chi re' Dios eriban chi etirico'lej tak, xa nqui chic rik'or chi cow.

Nok q'uih chic k'i̱j ritok'a̱b cho k'ahxok re're' chi je' re' rik'or, pan jenaj k'i̱j re' ma' Lu̱' ru'um chi xch'i'tjic ru'um riwi̱' rino'jbal i k'ahxok re're', xisolq'uij je rilbal chiri̱j eh je' wili xik'or reh ma' tob laj uxlabal nchoponic na̱ ric'acharic i k'ahxok re're': «Ma' ato̱b laj uxlabal, re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re're' nye'bic wajawric chi naca̱t nit'erem lok. Yu'na k'uru' telen lok ru̱c' i k'ahxok re're', nqui reh. Je' aj re', re' ma' ato̱b laj uxlabal xa chiwach wo' ti junc'am re're' xelic lok ru̱c' i k'ahxok re're' eh chi je' re' xcahnic chi suk chic riti'jolal,

xa re' la' take rehreh chi ajabe̱s rirakam wi̱' ricamaj chi k'ijinic naxquilow chi xesmejic chic lok i ma' tob laj uxlabal re' ch'iclic wi̱' quic'ux chi nca'n wi̱' canar quitz'a̱k, xquichop i ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Si̱las eh xquic'am je' take chipam i pa̱t nquimol wi̱' qui̱b i tinamit chiwach take nahsil.
Ar xik'ahsjic pan quik'ab take nahsil eh je' wili xquik'or cok: «Re' take winak wili ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel take c'ahchi' quijot'om kacapew-bal i hoj c'acharel chipam i katinami̱t wili

maj re' take re' c'ahchi' quik'orom keh toco̱m laj no'jbal re' ocronak take cho wi̱' ru'. Re' toco̱m laj no'jbal c'ahchi' quic'uhtam keh ma' riban ta chi keh hoj chi enkac'am na̱, ma' wo' chi eta nak nka'n ribanaric ru'um nok re' hoj, ma' re' ta hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel hoj la' aj Ro̱ma, nqui take

chi quiwach i tinamit re' xa junchalic chic take china̱ ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las chi quich'eyeric. Naxquibiraj chi je' re', re' quinahsil take nimak quiwach xitak'a̱' chi naresmejic lok quiso' i ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las reh chi naquitz'uhumjic.
Chiri̱j chic ru' nok yohbal wach quitz'uhumjic xbanaric, xicanabjic pan k'ab aj cha'janel tz'ahpel. Naxk'ormojic reh chi naricha'jem take chi coric,

re' aj cha'janel re're' cu chipam cok i cohlsbal wach tz'apbal xitz'ap take cok i ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las. Ma' xa ta re're' xiban, xilutz' la' wo' i co̱k ru̱c' jenaj che̱' hopo̱j pa̱m reh chi naquicahnic chi tz'ukulque̱b wach ac'al.
Chiri̱j aj ru' naxponic tic'lic ak'ab, nok re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las bi̱ch nca'n pan quiti̱j chi c'ahchi' quibirmijic cho cu'um toco̱m chic aj tz'ahpel,

cu re' pe' chic queh ru', xchalic jenaj cow laj hihc re' xic'uyu'saj pa̱m chi'nchel i pa̱t re're' cu rehtal xitehebic chi'nchel ritz'ahpil i tz'apbal re're' eh xit'upubic take c'aham ch'ihch' pixilque̱b wi̱' chi'nchel tz'ahpel.

Chi je' aj re' naxc'a'chic wach aj cha'jem tz'ahpel re're' eh naxilow chi tehlic chic take ritz'ahpil i pa̱t re're', xesaj cho rik'as laj ch'ihch' chi naricansam nak ri̱b maj xicapaj chi chi'nchel take tz'ahpel xi'elic je,
xa re' la' ma' Lu̱' xiq'uer je chi̱' chi je' wili: «Ma̱cansaj awi̱b, ayu' wilco̱j chi'nchel, nqui je reh.

Naxibiraj chi je' re' i cha'janel re're', xipahkaj jenaj risakombal, xoquic cok cu re' wilque̱b wi̱' take tz'ahpel eh chi xa cu nbarbatic wo' reh yo'jic ru'um reh ti'c'axic narichalic nak china̱ wi ta nak xi'elic je take tz'ahpel, xixuc'a̱' ri̱b chiwach ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las eh xitioxej queh chi cu wilque̱b ar chi'nchel take tz'ahpel.

Chiri̱j ru' nok c'ahchi' resam lok ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las chipam i tz'apbal re're' reh chi ar chic pa ripa̱t naricha'jem take ru', re' aj cha'jem tz'ahpel re're', je' wo' wili xik'or queh: «Hat-tak ajabe̱s, chaj bih raj chi nanibanam reh chi enirak nico'lbal? nqui xik'or.

Re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las je' wili xquik'or reh: «Re' hat chach'ica̱' ac'ux chiri̱j kAja̱w Jesus chi je' re' etico'ljic i hat ch'i̱l take awaj pan pa̱t wi xquich'ica̱' wo' quic'ux chiri̱j kAja̱w Jesus, nqui take reh.
Je' aj re' naxiponic pan pa̱t, re' aj cha'jem tz'ahpel re're' ch'i̱l take raj pan pa̱t xquinimej wo' i C'uhbal chiri̱j i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' xk'ormojic queh.

Chi je' re' xa chipam wo' ti chak'ab re're', ar chipam i ye'a̱b re' xic'am je take wi̱' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las chi ritz'ajaric wach quiti'quilal xbanaric ru'um i tz'uhu̱m, ar xkahsjic riha̱' aj cha'janel re're' ch'i̱l take raj pan pa̱t.

Nok ca'nam chic cho re're', re' aj cha'jem tz'ahpel xic'am wo' chic take je ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las ar pa ripa̱t eh xiban riwa' riha̱' quich'i̱l. Chi je' re' xiban xa suk chic pa ric'ux ch'i̱l take raj pan pa̱t ru'um chi xquinimej i Dios.

Chiri̱j ru' nok sak'anak chic, re' take nimak quiwach nahsil xquitak'a̱' je take ju'jun sol ru̱c' aj cha'jem tz'ahpel re're' chi rik'ormojic reh chi je' wili: «Chawok'taj take je qui̱b winak re're', nqui k'oric xquitak'a̱' cho take nimak quiwach aj nahsil.

Naxibiraj chi je' re' aj cha'jem tz'ahpel je' wili xo̱j rik'ohraj queh ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las: «Re' nimak quiwach aj nahsil xquitak'a̱' cho rik'ormojic cu̱c' take sol wili chi naca̱t tak wok'tam je. Je' re' k'uru', telen tak je eh chawic'raj tak je pan abe̱h tak, nqui xik'or queh.

Re' ma' Lu̱' naxibiraj k'oric re're', je' wili xik'or queh take sol xic'ambic cho reh k'oric: «To̱b ta hoj wo' nak aj Ro̱ma i hoj, re' take aj nahsil ma' xquich'uk ta wach kamahc xquitak'a̱' la' katz'uhumjic chi quiwach i tinamit eh xquitak'a̱' wo' kacojoric pan che̱'. Re' aj chic yu'na nca̱j kojquesam je pan c'olic xa re' la' hoj ma' eta koj-elic je chi je' re'. Kojc'olok pe quesaj take nahsil re're' cu re' aj ekoj-elic je, nqui ma' Lu̱' queh.

Je' re' nok re' take sol re're' xponic quic'u'tjaj queh take nimak quiwach nahsil re' chaj bih xquik'or je ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Si̱las eh ru̱c' re're', re' take nimak quiwach nahsil naxquibiraj chi aj Ro̱ma take, chi xa yo'jic chic wilque̱b

xi'o̱j re' wilque̱b wi̱' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las chi ripahkaljic cuybal quimahc queh. Je' aj re', re' take nahsil re're' xquesaj je ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las chipam i pa̱t c'ahchi' quicha'jaljic wi̱' ru'um aj cha'jem tz'ahpel re're' eh xquipahkaj wo' chi naquelic je chipam i tinamit re're'.

Je' aj re' ru' naxi'elic je chipam i pa̱t c'ahchi' quicha'jaljic wi̱', re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las pe̱t xiponic wo' chic cho pa ripa̱t i Li̱rya re' xquimol wi̱' qui̱b cu̱c' take aj niminel chi ricowsjic quic'ux chiri̱j Jesus eh cu re' aj ru' xi'elic je chipam i tinamit re're'.

Chi je' aj re', re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las xquitik ju' quibe̱h. Naxi'iq'uic ponok chipam i tinamit Anpi̱polis je' wo' pan jenaj chic tinamit Apolo̱nya ribihnal, xiponic chipam tinamit Tesalo̱nica ribihnal. Chipam i tinamit re're' wilic jenaj pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses re' nquimol wi̱' qui̱b take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilque̱b ponok ar.
Ar ajic re' ma' Lu̱' je' ricab rocsam wi̱' ri̱b, xo̱j chipam i pa̱t molbal i̱b re're' eh chiwach xib chi hi'lbal k'i̱j reh ju'jun xama̱na, xiban ric'uta̱j cu̱c' take nquimol qui̱b ar.

Je' aj wili rik'or queh: «Ar pan Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios rik'or chi re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric curman chi xquimic, je' wo' chi xuctic wo' cho chi quixilac take camnak. Re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric re're', re' wo' i Jesus re' c'ahchi' nik'orom aweh tak chi xcansjic eh xuctic cho chi quixilac take camnak, nqui rik'or queh.

Ru̱c' xik'or i ma' Lu̱', wilic take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel quich'i̱l wo' take yohbal quiwach winak ma' re' ta take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' aj c'amol take na̱ i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, ch'i̱l wo' take q'uihal ixok je' ru̱c' yohbalamaj quiwach, xquinimej i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus eh xi'oquic jenaj chi quixilac ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las chi aj niminel chic take.

Raj nchel take ju'jun chic ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ma'xta nquicoj wach i c'uhbal xik'or ma' Lu̱' re're'. Re' take re', ru'um chi k'e̱' quic'a̱ xchalic cu'um queh take xiniminic reh c'uhbal xk'ormojic re're', xquimol wach juntuhm chi siqui̱l laj winak ma' holohic ta quino'jbal eh xquituhbej cho qui̱b pa ripa̱t jenaj aj niminel Jason ribihnal re' patanic nca'n wi̱' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las. Naxiponic chipam i pa̱t re're', re' take juntuhm re're' xca̱j nak quic'amam je ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las chi riye'eric chi quiwach take toco̱m wo' tinamit johsomaj quic'a̱ cu'um juntuhm re're'

xa re' la' ru'um chi ma' xquirak ta ar ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las, re' chic i Jason ch'i̱l ju'jun take aj niminel xquirak ar xquic'am je reh chi xi'o̱j pahbabjok chi quiwach take nimak quiwach chipam i tinamit re're'. Nok wilque̱b chic ponok ar, je' wili xquik'or chi xa q'ueric chic quichi̱': «Qui̱b take winak je' ru̱c' aj jot'o̱l quicapew-bal take c'acharel xa haj tinamit qui'oquic wi̱', xic'ulic lok ayu' pan katinami̱t.

Re' take re' xye'eric quipatal ru'um i Jason wili eh re' take quib re're' nok wilque̱b chi quiwach take c'acharel, nquic'uhtaj i tijbal rik'or chi wilic jenaj chic k'atal k'oric Jesus ribihnal. Ru'um reh tijinic nca'n take quib winak re're', chi'nchel take c'acharel wili ma' c'ahchi' ta chic quinimem i tak'anic riban i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma, nqui take.
Naxquibiraj chi je' re', re' take nimak quiwach xjohtic cho quic'a̱ ch'i̱l take tinamit
xa re' la' take nimak quiwach re're' ma' xquicoj ta wo' pan che̱' i Jason ch'i̱l take rich'i̱l, xi'ok'tjic la' je take naxquitoj cahnok ri̱j quelbal je.

Chiwach aj wo' ak'ab re're', re' take aj niminel chipam i tinamit re're', xquitak'a̱' je ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las chipam i tinamit Were̱ya. Nok wilque̱b chic ponok ar xa re' wo' ti xisak'ic lok, re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las xi'o̱j pe' wo' chic chi quik'o'rjic take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses

xa re' la' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilque̱b ar k'ochlic wach quic'ux chiwach take quich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilque̱b pan tinamit Tesalo̱nica. Je' re' ajic re' take tinamit re're' xiban xa suk chic quic'ux naxquicoj wach i c'uhbal xik'or ma' Lu̱', xa re' la' ilbal reh ricorquilal nc'uhtjic queh, eli̱c i k'i̱j re' riban wi̱' c'uhtunic ma' Lu̱' xquitijej ri̱j riC'uhbal i Dios tz'ihmbimaj chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j canamaj cahnok ru'um i Dios.

Je' aj re' ru' ru̱c' i c'uhbalanic xiban ar i ma' Lu̱', k'e̱' q'uihal take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ch'i̱l wo' q'uihal take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi winak chi ixok je' ru̱c' nimak quiwach, xquicoj wach i ribiral chiri̱j i Jesus xik'or i ma' Lu̱'.

Naxquibiraj cho take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilque̱b ar Tesalo̱nica chi je' re' c'ahchi' ric'uluric ru'um reh rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus re' c'ahchi' ribanam ma' Lu̱' ar chipam i tinamit Were̱ya, xi'o̱j wo' chic c'olok ar eh xquijohsaj quic'a̱ take c'acharel wilque̱b ar

xa re' la' take aj niminel ar Were̱ya naxquina'bej ti re're', xa chi yu'na ti xquitak'a̱' je ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l take ju'jun aj niminel ar chi chi̱' i ma' laj ha' reh chi narichopom je jeno' cano̱wa. Je' aj re' ru', xa chic cutquel i Si̱las ch'i̱l Timote̱yo xicahnic ar Were̱ya chi quic'uhbaljic take aj niminel reh chi naquichopom quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus.

Ar aj chic ponok chi' ha', re' ma' Lu̱' xichop je jenaj ma' laj cano̱wa eh xo̱j pan tinamit Ate̱nas. Je' re' xka'n naxojc'amaric je cu'um take xitak'abjic je chiki̱j chi nakojic. Chiri̱j chic ru' nok quicana̱b chic cho ma' Lu̱' chipam i tinamit re're', re' take aj niminel tak'amaj je take chi cananic, xisoljic wo' chic je Were̱ya eh xponic quik'or i k'oric xtak'abjic je chiqui̱j ru'um ma' Lu̱', chi re' Si̱las ch'i̱l i Timote̱yo naquiloq'uem je qui̱b chi nacojic quirakam ar Ate̱nas.
Ar chic Ate̱nas nok c'ahchi' ruy'em i Si̱las ch'i̱l i Timote̱yo chi naquiponic ar, re' ma' Lu̱' xoquic cho jenaj riyot'quil ric'ux ru'um xilow chi xa haj reh tinamit re're' wilic take tz'akoj tiyo̱x.

Ru'um aj re' chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, re' ma' Lu̱' nok wilic chic ar, xichop ri̱b chiri̱j riC'uhbal i Dios cu̱c' take rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' wo' cu̱c' take ma' re' ta take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' aj c'amol take na̱ i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Je' wo' re' xiban kalakal cu̱c' take nic' pa' nimal nquimol qui̱b chipam i c'aybal re' ncamanic wo' chi molbal i̱b.

Junpech aj cho nok re' ma' Lu̱' c'ahchi' richopom ri̱b chiri̱j riC'uhbal i Dios cu̱c' ca'ch'uk chi winak aj sic'ol ri̱j no'jbal, Epicu̱ryos ch'i̱l Esto̱ycos quibihnal, wilic queh winak re're' xquik'or chi re' ma' Lu̱' xa je' nchel aj k'orol ribiral toco̱m chic wilic quibiral chi dios je' ru̱c' ma' queht'alim ta wach ru'. Je' aj re' nquik'or ru'um xquibiraj i holohic laj ribiral c'ahchi' rik'orom i ma' Lu̱' chiri̱j ructic i Jesus chi quixilac camnak eh wilic wo' take xquik'or chi ma' nquirak ta chiri̱j i c'uhbalanic riban ru'. Je' re' k'oric nca'n maj chi queh ru' re' k'oric riban i ma' Lu̱' xa je' na ricab nk'oric jeno' aj tijinel ma' suk ta pa̱m na̱.

Je' re' nok re' take ca'ch'uk chi winak re're' xquic'am je ma' Lu̱' ar chipam jenaj ye'a̱b molbal i̱b “Aryo̱paco” ribihnal eh je' wili xquik'or reh nok pononak chic ar: «Chacuy Ha̱w, chasakomej wach keh i c'uhbal c'ahchi' ak'orom reh chi re' hoj nakeht'alim chi manlic ribiral i nak'or.
Je' re' nkapahkaj aweh maj re' toco̱m chic c'uhbal nak'or re're' ma' kabiram ta so' i hoj chi junpech. Ru'um aj re' nka̱j chi enasakomej wach keh yu'na, nqui take reh.

Je' re' xquik'or reh ru'um chi chi'nchel take c'acharel je' chi asjanak take ar Ate̱nas, je' chi chalanak take chi c'acharic ar, ma' nquicham ta qui̱b chi birinic wi ma' toco̱m chic no'jbal nc'uhtjic queh on ma' toco̱m chic ribiral nquibiraj rik'ormojic.

Ar aj ru' re' ma' Lu̱' xipahba̱' johtok ri̱b chi quiwach take quimolom qui̱b chipam ma' laj pa̱t re're' eh je' wili xik'or queh: «Hat-tak c'acharel aj Ate̱nas, ru̱c' take tiyo̱x wilom wach xa haj reh atinami̱t tak nirak chiri̱j chi q'uih take dios nalok'ej tak wach.

Je' wo' nirak wo' chiri̱j chi nalok'ej wo' tak wach i jenaj Dios re' ma' ja' k'oro̱j ta aweh tak ribiral i rajawric. Je' re' nirak chiri̱j maj junpech nok c'ahchi' nibehem pan atinami̱t tak, re' hin xwilow take tiyo̱x nalok'ej tak wach eh xnirak wo' jenaj ye'a̱b lok'onbal re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' chi je' wili: ‹Re' wili ye'a̱b nlok'onjic wi̱' i Dios re' ma' ja' k'oro̱j ta ribiral keh i rajawric wilic, nqui tz'ihmbimaj chiwach. «Re' aj i Dios re're', re' nalok'ej tak wach chi ma' ja' k'oro̱j ta aweh tak ribiral rajawric, re're' nanip'utum rik'ormojic aweh tak yu'na:

Re' Dios wili re' aj re' xtik'inic reh wach ac'al ch'i̱l take nic' nimal wilic chiwach eh re' wo' re' nk'atbic k'oric china̱ nic' nimal quic'acharic chiwach i taxa̱j rich'i̱l ac'al. «Ru'um chi re' aj re' nk'atbic k'oric china̱ chi'nchel, re' riye'a̱b i Dios ma' ar ta wilic junpech chipam jeno' pa̱t tik'imaj cu'um take quilok'onic wach.

Je' wo' chic, re're' ma' cu re' ta nchel pa' bih i si̱ nye'eric chiwach chi je' wilic ta nak jeno' ric'axquilal, cu re' ta nak re're' c'achlic wi̱'. Re' la' Dios, re're' nbanic chi chi'nchel take c'acharel wilque̱b pan suk laj c'acharic eh suk wo' quiwa' quiha̱'.

Je' wo', re're' xitik'a̱' wach chi re' ju'jun ch'uk chi c'acharel tz'uhcrunak cho ru̱c' i xa jenaj chi winak, xquipuhcaj qui̱b pan tak tinamit chi junsut wach ac'al maj re' aj wo' re' xk'atbic ri̱j haj yuk'ul naquiwih'ic eh je' wo' nic' nahtil ro̱k c'acharic naca'nam.

«Re' aj i Dios re're', c'ahchi' nik'orom ribiral aweh tak reh chi enasic' tak je' ricab riban jeno' sot' chi c'ahchi' rimajem i pa' bih c'ahchi' risiq'uim. Til coric nik'or, wi eta nak nasic' tak i Dios, enak narak tak maj re're' ma' cu naht ta nchel wilic awu̱c' tak

ru'um nok xa pa' wilco̱j on xa pa' koj-o̱j, re're' xa wilic wo' ku̱c'. Je' re' riban i Dios ru'um nok re're' xtik'inic keh je' ricab xk'ormojic cho najtir k'i̱j ru'um jenaj awich atinami̱t tak re' xtz'ihminic reh i bi̱ch je' wili rik'or: ‹Re' hoj, hoj ritik'inic cho kAja̱w Dios, nqui rik'or.

«Je' re' k'uru' chi hoj ritik'inic i Dios ma' riban ta chi encapewjic chi re're' je' ricab take tiyo̱x chi xa holohic chic ritik'injic bano̱j cu'um take c'acharel ru̱c' nworwotic laj ch'ihch' on sak laj ch'ihch' on ru̱c' take holohic laj abaj, xa ru'um ncapewjic chi je' re' riwachbal i Dios.

«Ru'um aj chi ma' je' ta ricab take tiyo̱x, re' Dios chiwach i rik'ijil wilco̱j wi̱' wili, xiyew keh chi nakeht'alim chi xic'saj chic lok i najtir rik'ijil re' ma' xeht'aljic ta wi̱' chi chalic reh ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take quilok'onic tiyo̱x. Ru'um aj re' xa haj pa' ye'a̱b re' wilque̱b wi̱' take aj lok'onel tiyo̱x, riyew rik'ormojic queh chi naquicana̱b i lok'onic tiyo̱x nca'n

maj tiklic chic wach i k'i̱j chi re' c'acharel re' Pahbamaj ru'um i Dios chi Ch'ukul wach K'oric chi quina̱ chi'nchel c'acharel, til narich'ukum wach quimahc. Re' Pahbamaj re're' coric wach ch'ukuj k'oric naribanam maj til coric wach rino'jbal je' ricab xc'uhtunic chi quiwach chi'nchel c'acharel ar Jerusalen chiwach i rik'ijil ric'acharic. Ru'um chi je' re' riwi̱' rino'jbal, re' Dios xucsaj cho chi quixilac take camnak, nqui xik'or ma' Lu̱'.

Re' take quimolom qui̱b ar naxquibiraj i c'ahchi' rik'orom i ma' Lu̱' chi re' take camnak nacuctic wo' chic cho chi c'acharic, wilic queh p'uht quise'lam i ma' Lu̱' eh wilic wo' queh je' wili xquik'or reh: «Re' ribiral chiri̱j cuctic take camnak ca chak'or chic so' keh pan jeno' chic k'i̱j, nqui take reh.
Chi je' re', re' ma' Lu̱' xicana̱' take cho, xelic cho chi quixilac.

Je' aj re' to̱b ta ma' chi'nchel ta xicojbic wach i c'uhtunic xiban ma' Lu̱' chiri̱j i Jesus, wilic wo' take xicojbic wach je' ricab ixok Ta̱maris ribihnal ch'i̱l take toco̱m chic c'acharel, ch'i̱l wo' i winak ncamanic chipam i pa̱t Aryo̱paco, re' Liyoni̱syo ribihnal. Chi'nchel take re're' ch'i̱l toco̱m chic xicojbic wo' wach i c'uhtunic xiban i ma' Lu̱' chiri̱j i Jesus, xquimol qui̱b ru̱c' reh chi naquitikim ju' ribirmijic i c'uhbalanic riban ru'.
Chiri̱j chic riwih'ic pan tinamit Ate̱nas, re' ma' Lu̱' xelic je ar eh xo̱j pan jenaj chic tinamit Cori̱nto ribihnal

re' xirak wi̱' jenaj rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel asjanak ar pan tinamit Po̱nto, Aqui̱la ribihnal. Re' winak re're' ch'i̱l i rehq'ue̱n re' Pirsi̱la ribihnal, ma' ja' naht ta c'ulunak lok reh riyuk'ul Ita̱lya ru'um chi re' Cala̱wriyo re' k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma xitak'a̱' jenaj k'oric queh chi'nchel ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi naquelic chipam i tinamit Ro̱ma. Junpech ajic re' ma' Lu̱' naxo̱j rik'o'rej pan quipa̱t take quib chi aj niminel re're',

xa cahnic xo̱j riban cu̱c' chi patanic ru'um chi re' ricamaj ru' jenaj wach ch'i̱l ricamaj i Aqui̱la. Re' quicamaj take re', aj p'ojol pi̱m laj tz'ih je' ru̱c' nquicoj chi quipa̱t take aj behel. Je' re' ajic pan tak xilac k'i̱j reh xama̱na, re' ma' Lu̱' riban ricamaj ch'i̱l Aqui̱la

eh pan tak hi'lbal k'i̱j nanwih'ic chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, rik'or ribiral i Jesus. Chi je' re' nank'oric, riban c'ulwa̱ch je' chi cu̱c' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, je' chi cu̱c' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh je' wo' rich'uksaj quic'ux take re' chiri̱j ribiral i Jesus.

Je' aj re' riwi̱' c'acharic xiban ma' Lu̱' ar Cori̱nto, cu rehtal xiponic ar i ma' Si̱las ch'i̱l i Timote̱yo nok soljonak chic take cho reh Masero̱nya. Ar aj ru' ma' xa ta chic re' pan tak hi'lbal k'i̱j xiban c'uhbalanic i ma' Lu̱', eli̱c la' chic i k'i̱j p'uht risakomem wach riC'uhbal i Dios queh take rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel quiponic chipam i pa̱t nquimol wi̱' qui̱b chi ritijiljic ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Chi je' aj re' pan jenaj k'i̱j chipam i pa̱t re're', re' ma' Lu̱' p'uht rik'orom queh rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi re' Jesus re' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric,

xa re' la' take re', p'uht quik'ihtam qui̱b chiwach i c'uhbalanic riban ru' eh p'uht wo' quitz'ujlom. Ru'um aj re', re' ma' Lu̱' xituhp'aj cahnok wach risu't rijela̱' chi ralak rehtalil chi ma'xta chic ric'uhbalem take chipam i pa̱t re're' eh je' wili xik'or queh: «Yu'na nanijalam je niye'a̱b re' nanik'orom wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios. Queh chic take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel nanik'orom. Je' re' k'uru' chawihklej ano'jbal tak nakajok i ti'c'axic chana̱ tak maj re' hin ma'xta chic bih wi̱n ru̱c' ano'jbal na'n tak, nqui ma' Lu̱'.
Chi je' re' naxelic je ar, xo̱j pa ripa̱t i jenaj winak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel aj lok'em reh Dios, Ju̱sto ribihnal. Re're' ar wilic ma' naht ta je chi riche̱l i pa̱t molbal i̱b re're'

eh chi je' re', ar chic xiban c'uhbalanic pa ripa̱t i winak re're'. Ru̱c' i c'uhbalanic xiban i ma' Lu̱' ar, re' winak c'amol be̱h chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, re' Cri̱spo ribihnal, xinimej wo' riC'uhbal i Dios ch'i̱l chi'nchel take raj pan pa̱t. Ma' xa re' ta re' xniminic reh c'uhbal re're', q'uihal la' wo' take aj Cori̱nto je' re' xca'n naxquibiraj wo' i c'uhbal re're' eh chi je' re' xkahsjic wo' quiha̱'.
Chiri̱j aj re' pan jenaj chak'ab re' kAja̱w Jesus je' wili xik'or reh ma' Lu̱' pa riwiric: «Ma' timemric ma' Lu̱', chak'or la' niC'uhbal chi ma'xta ayo'jic so'.

Cu yohbal wach take tinamit je' ru̱c' naqui̱nquinimem wilque̱b chipam i tinamit wili. Je' re' nok, ma' tiyo'jic chi k'oric maj ma' hab ta wach eriban ti'c'axic aweh ru'um nok re' hin wilqui̱n awu̱c' chi aco'ljic, nqui reh pa riwiric.
Chi je' aj re', re' ma' Lu̱' cu xcahnic chi c'acharic ar Cori̱nto eh ar jenaj ha̱b ru̱c' waki̱b poh xiban i c'uhtunic chiri̱j riC'uhbal i Dios chi ma' hab ta wach ahnic ru̱c'.

Chiwach rik'ijil rik'atoj k'oric i Calyon re' nk'atbic k'oric pa riyuk'ul Aca̱ya, re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ma' xiniminic ta reh i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus xquimol qui̱b chi jenaj wach quic'ux chi rixowjic wach ma' Lu̱'. Ru'um aj re' xquic'am je chiwach i k'atal k'oric re're'

eh je' wili xquik'or cok reh: «Ha̱w k'atal k'oric, re' winak wili c'ahchi' rich'uksam quic'ux take tinamit chi naquilok'em wach i Dios ru̱c' jenaj chic no'jbal ma' riwi̱' ta chiwach i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, nqui take reh.

Ar aj ru' nok re' ma' Lu̱' narip'utum nak chic k'oric chi rico'ljic ri̱b, re' Calyon je' wili xik'or queh take winak re're': «Hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, wi ta nak re' rimahc i winak wili sakom wach chi niwach, ma' k'orel ta wi nim wach on t'uch wach, riwi̱' nak chi wi̱n chi enicham wi̱b chi abirmijic tak.

Raj nchel wili, re' hat-tak xac'am tak cho chi niwach i winak wili xa ru'um chi re' hat-tak ma' ric'ul ta awach tak i c'uhbal riban ch'i̱l take bihnal rik'or chiri̱j i Jesus on rik'or chiri̱j i c'uhbal hat-tak tijimaj wi̱'. Je' re' k'uru' chawilow pe tak chic hat-tak nic' pa' wach nachatik'a̱' tak wach a-ahnic tak maj re' hin ma' wilqui̱n ta chi rich'ukuric wach re're', nqui queh.
Chiri̱j re', re' Calyon xitak'a̱' take riso̱l chi naquesam lok take tinamit wilque̱b chiwach rik'atbal k'oric

xa re' la' xa ma'xta wo' bih xik'or naxilow chi re' take tinamit re' xquimol qui̱b chiwach i ye'a̱b rik'atbal k'oric, xa junchalic chic take chi richoporic je' wo' chi rich'eyeric i So̱stenes re' rijelow-bal i c'amol be̱h chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses.

Chiri̱j chic naxwih'ic quib xib chic k'i̱j ar Cori̱nto, re' ma' Lu̱' xich'ak cahnok take aj niminel ar eh xo̱j pan tinamit Sencre̱ya rich'i̱l Aqui̱la ch'i̱l Pirsi̱la. Ar Sencre̱ya re' ma' Lu̱' xibuja̱' lok wach na̱ rehtalil chi xinimej i rik'orbal ribanam chiwach Dios eh chiri̱j chic ru', xichop je jenaj ma' laj cano̱wa re' ojic riban ar pa riyuk'ul i Si̱rya.

Naxponic pan tinamit E̱peso, re' ma' Lu̱' xicana̱' quihch'iljic Aqui̱la ch'i̱l Pirsi̱la re' naquicahnic cahnok chipam i tinamit re're'. Ar aj chipam i tinamit re're', re' ma' Lu̱' xo̱j chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eh xisakomej wach riC'uhbal i Dios queh take rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel nquimol qui̱b ar.
Ar ajic nok re' take rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xquipahkaj reh ma' Lu̱' chi cu xcahnic nak chic so' q'uih k'i̱j chi quixilac, ma' xic'u'lej ta na̱ cahnic cu̱c'.

Je' re' nok naxich'ak take cahnok take tinamit re're', je' wili xik'or cahnok queh: «K'e̱' ajwal wach chi wi̱n chi ar Jerusalen nawic'sam i nink'i̱j oquic cho reh. Ru'um aj re' ma' eta riban chi equincahnic awu̱c' tak yu'na. Re' cok ru' pa' bih nqui Dios, equinsoljic wo' chic cho awu̱c' tak pan jeno' chic pech, nqui cahnok queh. Je' re' nok, re' ma' Lu̱' xelic je chipam i tinamit re're' eh xichop je ma' laj cano̱wa

re' naric'ambic je reh pan tinamit Sesare̱ya. Chiri̱j wili naxponic pan tinamit re're', re' ma' Lu̱' xichop je behic chi ro̱k ar Jerusalen chi quik'o'rjic take moloj wach aj niminel wilque̱b ar eh chiri̱j chic quik'o'rjic xsoljic wo' chic je ar pan tinamit Antiyoqui̱ya.

Je' aj re', nok sak naht chic riwih'ic ar Antiyoqui̱ya, re' ma' Lu̱' xelic je ar xo̱j chi ribehsjic pa̱m ju'jun tinamit reh riyuk'ul i Cala̱sya ch'i̱l pa riyuk'ul i Pirji̱ya. Chipam i tinamit re're', re' take aj niminel k'e̱' naxquichop quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus ru'um reh c'uhbalanic xiban ma' Lu̱' chi quixilac.

Chiwach aj wo' take k'i̱j nok re' ma' Lu̱' xelic je Antiyoqui̱ya, xponic ar pan tinamit E̱peso jenaj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel asjanak ar Alejantri̱ya Apo̱los ribihnal. Re're' ma' ahl ta nech' ok chi̱' chi rik'ormojic i k'oric wilic chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios re' reht'alim pa̱m chi coric.

Re' Apo̱los wili, to̱b ta xa cu re' pe ti kahsanic ha' je' ricab rik'orom i Wa̱n reht'alim, xa ji̱k' chic pa ric'ux chi c'uhtunic, p'uht ric'uhbalem chi coric i nic' pa' nimal c'uhtumaj reh chiri̱j Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Nc'ambic je Be̱h ru̱c' i Dios.

Chi je' re' c'ahchi' ribanam, junpech ajic nok re' Apo̱los xoquic cok ar chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, xoquic chi c'uhbalanic chi ma' nyo'jic ta nech' ok eh ar c'ahchi' wo' ribirmijic ru'um i Pirsi̱la ch'i̱l i Aqui̱la re' wilque̱b wo' cok ar. Nok quibiram chic i c'uhbalanic riban i Apo̱los re' ma' ja' rina'bem ta chi manlic ribiral i Ajabe̱s Jesus, re' Pirsi̱la ch'i̱l i Aqui̱la xquic'am je pan quipa̱t i Apo̱los eh chiwach take k'i̱j re're' xquik'or riman reh chi chaklic chi̱' i ricorquilal ribiral Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Nc'ambic je Be̱h ru̱c' i Dios.

Chiri̱j chic ru', nok rina'bem chic chi manlic ribiral Ajabe̱s Jesus, re' Apo̱los na xicapaj ojic chi c'uhbalanic pa riyuk'ul Aca̱ya xcowsjic je riman ric'ux cu'um take aj niminel ar E̱peso chi narojic ar. Ru'um aj re', re' take re' xquitz'ihmbaj je jenaj hu̱j queh aj niminel ar Aca̱ya reh chi naquic'ulum Apo̱los pan sukquil c'uxlis. Rich'i̱l i hu̱j re're' k'uru', re' Apo̱los xo̱j ar Aca̱ya eh nok wilic chic ponok ar, yohbal wach to'bonic xiban queh take rich aj niminel re' xitobjic ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios chi naxquinimej cho i Jesus.

Je' wo', chi quiwach take tinamit nquimol qui̱b chi birinic, re' Apo̱los ru̱c' ransil rik'orbal nye'eric reh ru'um Lok' laj Uxlabal xisolq'uij pa ri̱j quik'orbal take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' ma' nca̱j ta niminic. Ru̱c' i k'oric xiban queh ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, xic'uhtaj wo' queh chi re' Jesus re' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Nok re' Apo̱los wilic chic ponok ar Cori̱nto, re' ma' Lu̱' xo̱j pan tinamit E̱peso nok iq'uinak chic cho chipam take tinamit wilque̱b johtok chiwach naht na̱ yu̱k' wilic pa riyuk'ul Cala̱sya ch'i̱l Pirji̱ya. Ar ajic E̱peso naxirak take ju'jun aj niminel reh c'uhbal xiban i Wa̱n aj kahsem ha'

je' wili xik'or queh: «Naxanimej tak c'uhbal xik'or i Wa̱n, xtak'abjic na cho chana̱ tak i Lok' laj Uxlabal chi naroquic pan awa̱mna tak on ma'xta? nqui queh. Re' take re' je' wili xquik'or: «Ma'xta! Xa ta wo' nak kabiram chi wilic take c'acharel xtak'abjic chic cho i Lok' laj Uxlabal chi quina̱, nqui take.

Re' ma' Lu̱' je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh: «Haj wilic i c'uhbal xanimej tak k'uru' naxkahsjic aha̱' tak? nqui queh. Nok re' take aj niminel re're' xquik'or chi xa re' wo' i c'uhbal c'uhtumaj ru'um i Wa̱n naxiban cho kahsanic ha' xquinimej,

re' ma' Lu̱' je' wili xik'or queh: «Naxiban cho kahsanic ha' i Wa̱n, je' wili xik'or queh tinamit xquikahsaj quiha̱' naxquijal wach quino'jbal: ‹Chach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiri̱j i c'uhbalanel c'ulic lok reh chiwi̱j i hin, nqui queh. «Re' c'uhbalanel re're', re' aj wo' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Chiri̱j aj re' curman chi re' take c'acharel naquich'ica̱b quic'ux, nqui ma' Lu̱'.
Naxquibiraj i k'oric re're', re' take aj niminel re're' xquikahsaj wo' chic quiha̱' re' cok ru' chi c'ahchi' quik'orom chi re' Jesus Ajabe̱s chi quina̱.

Chi je' re' xchalic cu̱c' i Lok' laj Uxlabal nok re' ma' Lu̱' xicoj k'ab chi quina̱. Ru̱c' aj re' p'uht quik'orom i k'oric nk'ormojic queh ru'um Lok' laj Uxlabal eh p'uht wo' quik'oric pan toco̱m chic k'oric take aj niminel re're',
re' cablaj chi winak quiwi̱'.

Chiri̱j chic re', re' ma' Lu̱' xitik ju' c'uhbalanic ar chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eh je' re' xiban chiwach i xib poh chi cu wilic chipam i tinamit re're'. Chiwach aj xib poh xcahnic cu̱c' take nquimol qui̱b ar, re' ma' Lu̱' xk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus chi ma'xta nech' ok riyo'jic eh ru̱c' i c'uhbalanic riban chiri̱j rajawric i Dios chi k'atal k'oric, p'uht wo' rich'uksam quic'ux take c'ahchi' quibirinic reh.

Xa re' la' wilic take je' ru̱c' ma' xquichop ta quic'ux chiri̱j c'uhbal rik'or ma' Lu̱' xquicowsaj quic'ux eh chi quiwach take riq'uihal nquimol qui̱b ar xi'oquic chi ritz'ujuric i Jesus re' aj C'amol Be̱h ru̱c' i Dios. Xa re' aj wo' cho ru', re' ma' Lu̱' ma' cu ta chic xponic chipam i pa̱t re're', re' la' chic xiban, jarub pa' take c'acharel xiniminic reh Jesus xic'am je take chiri̱j ar chipam i ma' laj pa̱t re' riban wi̱' c'uhtunic i winak Tira̱no ribihnal eh ar chic xitik ju' quic'uhbaljic.

Je' aj re' ru' chiwach i quib chic ha̱b cu xcahnic i ma' Lu̱' ar pan tinamit E̱peso re' wilic pa riyuk'ul i A̱sya, je' chi ra̱' ri'sil eh je' chi ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel quipatanic chipam i yuk'ul re're', xquibiraj i c'uhbalanic riban ma' Lu̱' chiri̱j kAja̱w Jesus.
Chiwach aj quib ha̱b re' cu xcahnic wi̱' i ma' Lu̱' ar pan tinamit E̱peso, re' Dios yohbal wach lok' laj nawa̱l sachbal c'uxlis xic'uhtaj ru̱c' ro̱k k'ab ru'.

Til k'e̱' wo' chic rajawric i Dios wilic ru̱c' i ma' Lu̱' chi xa pa' jaric su'tal ricojom chi juc'bal riwach on chi juc'bal rik'ab, quicowjic take yowa'i̱b nanquitz'a'j i xa pa' jaric su'tal nc'amaric je queh. Je' wo' take c'acharel wilic ma' tob laj uxlabal cu̱c', quicahnic wo' chi suk nanquitz'a'j i xa pa' jaric su'tal re're'.

Raj nchel take ju'jun ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' aj t'erem take ma' tob laj uxlabal qui'o̱j xa pa' tinamit, naxquitijej nak ti queh je' ricab riban i ma' Lu̱' chi quit'ermejic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal, ma' xibirinic ta k'oric. Je' re' ajic, chi quesmejic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal cu̱c' take c'acharel p'uht quik'orom ribiral rajawric i Jesus chi je' wili: «Ma' tob laj uxlabal, ru̱c' rajawric i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' rik'or ribiral i ma' Lu̱', nkak'or aweh chi telen lok ru̱c' c'acharel wilca̱t wi̱', nqui nquik'or.

Je' re' xquitik ju' ribanaric xa re' la' junpech je' wilic xquic'ul take wuku̱b chi winak quipatanic ar E̱peso. Re' take re' rac'u̱n take i jenaj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, Ese̱wa ribihnal re' c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios. Re' take c'acharel re're' k'uru' naxquik'or nak ti reh ma' tob laj uxlabal chi narelic lok ru̱c' i c'acharel wilic wi̱',

je' pe wili xk'ormojic queh ru'um ma' tob laj uxlabal: «Re' hin weht'alim nic' wach rajawric i Jesus, je' wo' i rajawric ma' Lu̱', raj nchel hat-tak ma'xta nech' ok awajawric tak chi equinawesaj tak lok, nqui xk'ormojic queh.

Chiri̱j re', re' winak wilic wi̱' i ma' tob laj uxlabal naxye'eric reh ransil ru'um ma' tob laj uxlabal, xicut je ri̱b chi quina̱ take wuku̱b re're'. Chiri̱j ru' xichacabej take pan ac'al, xisec'lom take cu rehtal xicahnic chi xa ti' chic wilque̱b. Ar ajic xa wekwek chic xcahnic i quiso' chiqui̱j naxi'elic je chipam ripa̱t i winak re're'.

Nok quibiram chic ribiral chaj bih xquic'ul take wuku̱b chi rac'u̱n i Ese̱wa, re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ch'i̱l take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel quipatanic ar E̱peso, xoquic cho jenaj rinimal yo'jic cu̱c' eh ru̱c' re're' p'uht quik'orom chi re' Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus til wilic rajawric.

Chi quixilac take xquiyew rilok'il i Jesus, wilic take quichopom nak quic'ux chiri̱j banoj waranic i̱b. Re' take tinamit re're' naxquich'ahba̱' wach quimahc chiwach ma' Lu̱', xquipahkaj cuybal quimahc reh Dios

je' ricab xca'n wo' take wilic nak quicamaj chi aj war take. Re' take aj war re're' xquic'am cho quihu̱j ncamanic queh chi banoj war eh xquic'at. Chi'nchel take hu̱j re're' xponic wakc'ahl ik'ob ho'ik'ob (50,000) riq'uihal ritz'akil naxajlanjic ri̱j.

Ru̱c' aj rinimal rajawric i Ajabe̱s Jesus, re' quicomonil take quiniminic reh c'uhbal chiri̱j ru', xiq'uihbic wach eh ru̱c' wo' rinimal rajawric ru', k'e̱' chic take tinamit quibirinic reh c'uhbal re're'.

Chiri̱j aj chic ric'uluric chi'nchel re're', re' ma' Lu̱' xich'ica̱' ric'ux chi ojic ar Jerusalen chi je' wili c'ahchi' rik'orom pa ric'ux: «Nok wilqui̱n chic ar Jerusalen, curman chi wi̱n chi nawojic wo' ar Ro̱ma, nqui c'ahchi' rik'orom pa ric'ux. Nok rik'orom chic re're' pa ric'ux, xoquic wo' cho pa ricapew-bal i ma' Lu̱' chi naquiq'uic ponok chi pe̱t pa riyuk'ul Masero̱nya ch'i̱l ar pa riyuk'ul Aca̱ya.
Je' re' nok re' ma' Lu̱' xitak'a̱' je ar Masero̱nya take quib chi raj to'o̱l, re' Timote̱yo ch'i̱l Era̱sto quibihnal nok re're' cu xcahnic pe chic so' chi naht ar E̱peso re' wilic pa riyuk'ul A̱sya.
Chiwach wo' take k'i̱j re're' nok cu wilic ma' Lu̱' ar E̱peso, jenaj rinimal wolic xuctic chi quina̱ take xquinimej i Jesus re' C'amol Be̱h ru̱c' i Dios.

Re' wolic re're' xch'ihquic cho ru'um reh winak Reme̱triyo ribihnal aj ch'eyol wach sak laj ch'ihch' eh re're' ncamanic reh chi tik'inbal take cu̱c' rijalwachil ripatil tiyo̱x Riya̱na ribihnal. Re' Reme̱triyo wili ch'i̱l take toco̱m rich ehcham reh camanic re're', ru'um chi yohbal wach tumi̱n nquic'ul ru̱c' ritik'injic take rijalwachil ripatil tiyo̱x nca'n,

ximol quiwach take rich'i̱l ch'i̱l chi'nchel take caj camanom eh je' wili xik'or queh: «Hat-tak was nicha̱k', re' hat-tak aweht'alim chi ru̱c' i kacamaj wili q'uih tumi̱n nkac'ul maj re' take tinamit nquicoj chi re' take tiyo̱x nkatik'a̱' i hoj, re're' i quidios take ru'.

Raj la' yu'na nawilom tak eh nabiraj wo' tak chi yohbal wach take tinamit c'ahchi' quicana̱b ricojoric wach re're' ru'um c'ahchi' rich'uksjic quic'ux ru'um ma' Lu̱' chi naquik'ebem lok rij quic'ux re're', maj ma' xa re' ta ayu' E̱peso je' la' wo' chi junsut riyuk'ul A̱sya c'ahchi' rik'orom chi re' take tiyo̱x xa tik'imaj cu'um winak ma' re' ta dios take.

Ru̱c' c'ahchi' ribanam i winak re're', yohbal chi re' kacamaj nka'n i hoj eno̱j pa ri̱j, je' wo' chi re' pa̱t nlok'onjic wi̱' i lok' laj katiyo̱x nim riwa'ric, Riya̱na ribihnal, ma' eta chic no̱j ilmijok cu'um take tinamit. Wi je aj re' enc'uluric, yohbal wo' chi re' rilok'onjic i lok' laj katiyo̱x Riya̱na nbanaric cu'um i tinamit chi junsut E̱peso je' wo' pa riyuk'ul i A̱sya, ensahchic wach chi junpech, nqui xik'or i Reme̱triyo.

Ar ajic chi'nchel take xmoloric quiwach ru'um Reme̱triyo naxquibiraj chaj bih xk'ormojic queh, k'e̱' naxchalic quic'a̱ eh p'uht quiq'uerem quichi̱' chi je' wili: «Re' Riya̱na re' katiyo̱x hoj aj E̱peso k'e̱' rinimal rajawric. Ma' re' ta nchel i Dios c'ahchi' rik'orom ribiral ma' Lu̱', nqui take.

Je' aj re' k'uru' re' quic'a̱ take winak re're' xinih ri̱b cu̱c' take toco̱m chic quich quitinami̱t eh ru'um re' xquichop take qui̱b rich'i̱l ma' Lu̱' aj Masero̱nya take, re' Ca̱yo ch'i̱l Arista̱rco quibihnal eh xquic'am je take chipam jenaj ma' laj pa̱t nquimol wi̱' qui̱b reh chi ar rich'ukuric k'oric chi quina̱.
Naxibiraj re're' i ma' Lu̱', xa̱j nak ojic chipam i pa̱t re're' chi ric'uhtjic ri̱b chi quiwach take quimolom qui̱b ar, xa re' la' ma' xye'eric ta k'ab reh cu'um take aj niminel.

Je' wo' re' xca'n take ju'jun c'acharel wilic cajawric chipam riyuk'ul A̱sya eh ti' wo' nquic'raj i ma' Lu̱', maj re' take re' xquitak'a̱' cho rik'ormojic reh chi ma'xta rojic chipam i pa̱t molbal i̱b re're' ru'um nok yohbal chi reh chi eno̱j ric'uhtaj ri̱b.

Chiri̱j chic ru' naxiponic take tinamit chipam i pa̱t quimolom wi̱' qui̱b take c'acharel johtonak quic'ux re're', re' take tinamit p'uht quipahkam chi quiwach chi je' wili: «Chaj wo' bih nk'oric wi̱' i moloj i̱b wili? nqui take. Je' re' nquik'or ru'um chi ma' sakom ta wach chi queh chaj bih riwi̱' i moloj i̱b re're', maj chi'nchel take johtonak quic'ux, rehreh wach nquik'or chi xa q'ueric chic quichi̱'.

Je' re' nok wilic take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xquic'am cok i jenaj ma' winak Lej ribihnal eh nok cu chi quiwach chic pa'lic cho, quipahkaj reh chi narik'oric cho chi quina̱ take tinamit re're'. Je' re' nok re' ma' Lej xiban je k'ab chi naquimayam ahnic eh chi je' re' narip'utum nak je k'oric cu̱c' tinamit chi rico'ljic ri̱j quiniminic take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel,

xa re' la' take tinamit re're' naxquina'bej wach i ma' Lej chi ra̱' ri'sil wo' cho ma' Israhel, xa junk'oric chic take xquiq'uer quichi̱' chi je' wili: «Re' Riya̱na, re' katiyo̱x hoj aj E̱peso, k'e̱' rinimal rajawric, nqui take. Chi je' re' xquitik ju' chi q'ueric quichi̱' chiwach quib o̱ra

cu rehtal xipitiric ru'um aj tz'ihm chipam quitinamital. Re' aj tz'ihm re're' je' wili xik'or queh: «Hat-tak wich nitinami̱t aj E̱peso, re' hat-tak aweht'alim chi chi'nchel tinamit pa riyuk'ul i A̱sya queht'alim chi re' hoj, hoj aj camaj chipam ripa̱t i tiyo̱x nim rajawric Riya̱na ribihnal. Je' wo' queht'alim chi hoj aj lok'onel wach rijalwachil i tiyo̱x re're', re' xchalic ar pan taxa̱j.
Ru'um aj chi re' xnik'or wili ma' hab ta wach enk'oric chi ma' coric ta, chamay tak ahnic yu'na eh ma' chi bih pe aban tak chi cu ja' na'n ta pe tak ri̱j chi coric.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' hat-tak ma' xac'am ta tak cho take winak wili chi narich'ukuric k'oric chi quina̱ ru'um chi aj banol ta take c'ahbilal chipam ripatil i katiyo̱x, on chi aj tz'uju̱l ta nak take reh lok' laj katu̱t Riya̱na re' katiyo̱x,

re' la' hat-tak xac'am tak cho take winak wili xa ru'um reh Reme̱triyo ch'i̱l take rich'i̱l. Je' re' ajic wi re' Reme̱triyo ch'i̱l rich ehcham reh camanic chi tik'inic tak tiyo̱x wilic ta nak jeno' quiwolic, ar nak xi'o̱j cu̱c' take aj ch'ukul wach mahc maj re' take re' nanquimol qui̱b pan quicamaj, wilque̱b chi rich'ukuric wach jeno' mahc. Ru'um aj re' hiy tak cu̱c' take aj ch'ukul wach mahc eh ar chak'or tak cok amahc chi aju'junal tak,

on chapahkaj tak jeno' k'i̱j re' ench'ukuric wi̱' wach amahc tak. Je' re' k'uru' re' ok take aj ch'ukul wach mahc quich'ukbok wach amahc tak nok quimolom chic qui̱b awu̱c' tak je' ricab rik'or i c'uhbal nchoponic na̱ katinami̱t

maj je' ricab c'ahchi'co̱j yu'na chi ma' kich'i̱l ta take kaj ch'ukul wach mahc, wilco̱j pan yohbal chi ekojquitz'ak chi ma' nkabiraj ta k'oric chi quiwach ru'. Je' re' nik'or maj xa ta nak enkarak kak'orbal chiri̱j chaj bih riwi̱' i moloj i̱b wili ru'um nok xa ta wo' nak re' wolic xa'n tak wili, wilic jeno' riwi̱', nqui xik'or queh rich ritinami̱t.
Naxicohlaj rik'ororic re're', xich'ak je take tinamit mololque̱b chipam i pa̱t re're'.

Nok chuhpunak chic wach i wolic re're', re' ma' Lu̱' xitak'a̱' riyuk'unjic take aj niminel eh naxiponic ru̱c' je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' hin nawelic wo' chic je chaxilac tak, re' cok ru' re' hat-tak til chachop ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus, nqui queh. Chiri̱j chic ru' nok rik'ahchem chic take cahnok chi rich'akaric je ri̱b cu̱c', xichop je ribe̱h pa riyuk'ul i Masero̱nya

eh xibehej pa̱m chi'nchel ye'a̱b re're'. Chiri̱j chic ru' nok ric'uhbalem chic take aj niminel chipam i yuk'ul re're' chi naquichopom quic'ux chiri̱j Jesus ru̱c' nic' pa' nimal k'oric xik'or queh, re' ma' Lu̱' xelic je ar Masero̱nya cu rehtal xponic ar Cre̱sya

re' xwih'ic wi̱' xib poh. Ar aj ru' nok tiklic nak chic chi narojic richopom jenaj ma' laj cano̱wa reh chi narojic ar Jerusalen, ma' xo̱j ta chic richop i cano̱wa cu'um queh take rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' xquitik'a̱' wach chi quiwach chi naquicansam ma' Lu̱' na'ojok richop nak i ma' laj cano̱wa re' iq'uic ponok reh chi pe̱t ar pa riyuk'ul i Si̱rya. Ru'um aj re', re' ma' Lu̱' xichih wach chi narisoljic je chi ro̱k reh chi nariq'uic wo' chic ponok pa riyuk'ul Masero̱nya

chi rich'i̱l take winak je' wili quibihnal: Re' Timote̱yo, re' So̱pater aj Were̱ya, re' Arista̱rco ch'i̱l i Sewu̱nto re' aj Tesalo̱nica take, re' Ca̱yo re' aj Te̱rwe, ch'i̱l wo' take aj pa riyuk'ul i A̱sya, re' Ti̱quico ch'i̱l i Tro̱pimo.

Chi'nchel take re're' naxquicana̱' cahnok ma' Lu̱' chipam i tinamit Pili̱pos chi wich'i̱l hin ma' Cax, xquichop je jenaj ma' laj cano̱wa chi nacojic uyunel keh ar pan tinamit Tro̱yas re' ojic wi̱' wi̱n chiri̱j ma' Lu̱'

chiri̱j chi iq'uinak chic i nink'i̱j Pa̱scuwa ribihnal re' nc'uxuric wi̱' i caxlan wi'c ma' cojo̱j ta rik'omil. Je' aj re' nok iq'uinak ok chic i nink'i̱j re're', re' hoj xkachop je jenaj ma' laj cano̱wa ar pan tinamit Pili̱pos eh cu re' chic pa ro̱' k'i̱j xojponic ar Tro̱yas re' xkarak wi̱' ki̱b quich'i̱l take rich'i̱l ma' Lu̱' nok c'ahchi'co̱j cuy'em ponok ar. Chi je' aj re', xojcahnic wuku̱b k'i̱j cu̱c' take kich aj niminel quipatanic ar.

Chipam roquic i chak'ab reh hi'lbal k'i̱j naxquimol qui̱b take kich aj niminel aj Tro̱yas chi rinimjic quiwa' quiha̱' je' ricab ric'uhtam i Jesus, re' ma' Lu̱' xoquic chi c'uhbalanic eh to̱b ta nak xa je' chic ikal nelic je chipam i tinamit re're', ma' xipit ta i c'uhbalanic c'ahchi' ribanam xinimsaj la' ro̱k cu rehtal xponic tic'lic ak'ab.
Je' re' xiban maj xa sakom chic pa̱m i ye'a̱b re're' ru'um take riq'uihal sakombal kopolque̱b nah oxtik pa̱t kamolom wi̱' ki̱b.

Chi ribirmijic aj i nim ro̱k c'uhbal c'ahchi' ribanam i ma' Lu̱' wilic take xchalic quiwiric, je' ricab i jenaj q'uijol Ewti̱co ribihnal, tz'uklic johtok nah wenta̱na reh oxtik pa̱t re're'. Re' q'uijol re're' naxchalic xa suk chic riwiric, xk'ehbic jok wach ac'al eh chi je' re' xquimic ar. Ar aj re' ru' naxc'ulic ucsjok riti'jolal i ac'un re're' cu'um take wilque̱b ar,

re' ma' Lu̱' xkajic wo' cho nah oxtik pa̱t. Nok wilic chic re' wilic wi̱' i q'uijol a̱mna chic, re' ma' Lu̱' ximuc'a̱' jok ri̱b china̱ ac'un re're', xiyew johtok wach teleb eh je' wili xik'or queh aj niminel: «Ma' yo'slom awi̱b tak. Re' q'uijol wili ma' camnak ta, nqui queh. Je' re' xik'or ru'um nok ribanam nak chic chi xc'acharic wo' chic cho.

Chiri̱j chic re', xoj-johtic wo' chic johtok nah oxtik pa̱t eh xoj-oquic chi ribanaric kawa' kaha̱'. Naxkacohlaj kawa' kaha̱', re' ma' Lu̱' xichop wo' chic jenaj c'uhbalanic nim ro̱k cu rehtal xoquic cho sak'ic. Chiri̱j re', xicana̱' cahnok take aj niminel re're'
chi ye'o̱j chic cahnok riman ricowil quic'ux chiri̱j Jesus eh re' take re' xi'o̱j pan quipa̱t chi quich'i̱l i q'uijol re're' chi c'achlic wo' chic.

Chiri̱j chic ru' nok re' ma' Lu̱' elenak chic je pan tinamit Tro̱yas eh ru'um chi xa̱j ojic chi ro̱k chi rutquel cu ar pan tinamit Ason, xitik'a̱' wach ku̱c' i hoj re' koj-ihch'ilinic reh, chi ar nakarakam ki̱b rich'i̱l chipam i tinamit re're'. Je' re' nok re' hoj xkachop je jenaj ma' laj cano̱wa re' ojic riban ar Ason eh chi je' re' xoj-o̱j chi pe̱t reh chi nakuy'em ponok i ma' Lu̱' ar.
Naxponic i ma' Lu̱' ar Ason re' xkarak wi̱' ki̱b rich'i̱l, xoj-o̱j chipam i tinamit Mitile̱ne ribihnal.

Je' chic ikal nok ka'nam chic lok jenaj ak'ab ar, xoj-o̱j wo' chic pan jenaj ma' laj cano̱wa eh chi je' re' xoj-iq'uic ponok chiwach i t'uch tinamit Qui̱yo ribihnal. Jenaj chic k'i̱j chiri̱j re', xoj-iq'uic ponok chiwach i tinamit Sa̱mos cu rehtal xojponic pan tinamit Troji̱lyo ribihnal re' xkic'saj wi̱' i chak'ab. Nok xka'n cahnok junwar ar, xoj-o̱j wo' chic nah ha' cu rehtal xojponic pan tinamit Mile̱to

chi ma' xoj-iq'uic ta pan tinamit E̱peso ru'um chi re' ma' Lu̱' ritik'a̱b wach pa ric'ux chi ma'xta richamam ri̱b pa riyuk'ul i A̱sya. Je' aj re' xka'n ru'um chi re' ma' Lu̱' rajamem ri̱b reh ojic ar Jerusalen reh chi ar narojic ric'sam i nink'i̱j Pentecostes ribihnal, wila' cu manlic xponic.
Nok wilco̱j ar Mile̱to, re' ma' Lu̱' xitak'a̱' je jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch ar E̱peso chi quic'amaric take quinahsil moloj wach aj niminel ar.

Naxic'ulic lok take c'amol be̱h re're', re' ma' Lu̱' je' wili k'oric p'uht rik'orom queh: «Re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi xa re' wo' cho chiwach i pe̱t k'i̱j reh woquic chipam riyuk'ul i A̱sya cu chiwach i k'i̱j yu'na je' wili no'jbal xawilow tak wu̱c':

Naxincamanic chaxilac tak chiwach i kAja̱w Jesus, xincamanic ru̱c' ch'ublic laj c'uxlis, to̱b ta wilic wo' pech xnik'eb ri̱s nak' niwach eh xnic'ul wo' ti'c'axic xca'n wi̱n take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xca̱j nak quinquicansam.

To̱b ta wo' je' re' xnic'ul, re' hat-tak xawilow wo' tak chi ma'xta bih xpitbic wi̱n chi rik'ormojic i c'uhbal corsbal wach ac'acharic tak, xnik'or la' aweh tak i ricorquil ru̱c' take c'uhbalanic xniban pan apa̱t tak on xa haj namol wi̱' awi̱b tak.

Ma' xa ta aweh tak xniban i c'uhbalanic je' la' wo' xniban wo' queh take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi queh take ma' re' ta kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Re' hat-tak chi'nchel xnik'or wo' aweh tak chi na̱cana̱b tak ribanaric i mahc chiwach i Dios, je' wo' chi na̱chopom ac'ux tak chiri̱j i kAja̱w Jesus.

Yu'na k'uru' chi ojic wi̱n ar Jerusalen, re' hin nwa̱j chi na̱weht'alim tak chi c'ahchi' wojic chi hin c'amoj je ru'um Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios. Chi ma' weht'alim ta nak chaj bih narichalic chi nina̱ ar,
re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios xa haj tinamit quiniq'uic wi̱' c'ahchi' riyeb rehtalil wi̱n chi ar Jerusalen nanic'ulum wo' ti'c'axic, je' wo' chi nanicojoric wo' pan che̱'.

Je' re' k'uru' re' hin ma' eta nipoh'aj so' nic'ux ru'um take ti'c'axic chalic reh chi nina̱ maj ru'um chi to̱b ta nak k'e̱' lo̱k' chi wi̱n nic'acharic, k'e̱' wo' chic lo̱k' chi wi̱n chi chipam ta nak nicamaj riyeb wi̱n i kAja̱w Jesus chi aj k'orol reh lok' laj c'uhbal chiri̱j richak'lamil i Dios enponic ricux'ic wach nic'acharic.

«Je' re' k'uru' ru'um chi hin raj k'orol i Dios eh je' wo' ru'um weht'alim chi re' hat-tak re' xatiq'uic nic'uhbalej tak ponok chiri̱j rik'atoj k'oric i Dios ma' eta chic nawilow tak niwach china̱ ac'al wili,
re' wili nik'or cahnok aweh tak chiwach i k'i̱j wili: Wi hab wach jeno' aweh tak encojoric rimahc, ma' rik'or chi re' hin wilic nimahc chi je' re' ric'ul.
Je' re' nik'or maj nic' pa' nimal i no'jbal xiyew wi̱n i Dios chi ac'uhbaljic tak, re' hin ma' xnipoy ta wach aweh tak, xnisakomej la' wach chi coric.

Je' aj re' ru' coric ok wach acamaj cha'n tak chi quiliric take aj lok'em reh Dios rimolom quiwach ru̱c' riquimic i Jesus. Je' ok re' cha'n tak maj re' take re' xi'okxa'njic pan ak'ab tak ru'um Lok' laj Uxlabal chi je' na ricab juntuhm ok chi me̱' reh chi nawilom tak eh nac'axam wo' tak take chi coric. Je' wo', re' hat-tak chawil wo' awi̱b chi awibil awi̱b tak chi coric.

Je' re' nik'or maj chiri̱j i welic je hin chaxilac tak weht'alim chi wilic take winak nacoquic cho chaxilac tak chi aj tijinel re' ma' ti' ta naquic'ram take moloj wach aj niminel chiri̱j i Jesus, naca'nam la' je' ricab nca'n take josk' laj q'uiche̱' tz'i' chi ma' nquiquetelej ta wach take me̱'.

Je' wo' naquinelok je, wilic take chaxilac tak naquimiksam qui̱b chi jot'o̱l aj tijinel take maj re' take re' naca'nam c'uhbalanic xa reh chi re' chic take re' naquitahkaljic cu'um take quiniminic reh Jesus.

«Chi je' aj re' ru'um chi xacoj tak rehtal chi chiwach i xib ha̱b xniban chaxilac tak, re' hin chi k'i̱j chi ak'ab xatnic'uhbalej tak to̱b ta nchel k'e̱' ti'c'axic xnic'ul chiri̱j ac'uhbaljic tak. Chi je' re' k'uru' re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi chac'a'chmej awi̱b tak eh je' wo' chac'ax wo' acamaj tak.

Reh chi je' re' ena'n tak, yu'na was tak nicha̱k' naca̱t nik'ahsam tak johtok pan k'ab i Dios re' xiyew rik'orbal chi katobjic. Je' re' nanibanam maj re' cok re' wilic rajawric chi ricowsjic ac'ux tak, je' wo' chi riye'eric aweh tak ricuse'sbal ric'olom lok ri̱j chi queh take quik'ahsam qui̱b chi rilok'onjic.
Je' wo' chic, re' Dios riyew cho rito'bal chi kana̱ eh ru'um re', re' hin ma' xiban ta ji̱k' i nic'ux chiri̱j chak'wach laj riso' jeno' xa hab wach aweh tak, ma' wo' chiri̱j riq'uihal ritz'a̱k,

chi jelow-bal la' re're' ru̱c' ritz'awumal nicamaj, yohbal wach nitz'a̱k xnimol wach ma' xa ta reh pa' bih ajwal wach chi wi̱n hin je' la' wo' reh pa' bih queh take quibehic chiwi̱j je' ricab wo' aweht'alim hat-tak.

Yu'na nipahkaj aweh tak chi aju'junal tak chi chato'bej tak take c'axic ti nca'n, je' ricab xnic'uhtaj aweh tak chi ru̱c' kacamaj naka'nam nakato'bem wo' take kas kacha̱k'. Chi'nchel re're' xnik'or aweh tak chipam take c'uhbalanic xniban chaxilac tak re' xc'ulic wi̱' pa nic'ux riC'uhbal i Jesus re' rik'or chi je' wili: «K'e̱' wo' chic sukquil c'uxlis nchalic ru̱c' i c'acharel riban i to'bonic, chiwach i c'acharel re' nc'ulbic reh to'bonic, nqui rik'or i riC'uhbal i Jesus, nqui ma' Lu̱' queh c'amol be̱h re're'.
Nok ricohlam chic take k'oric re're', re' ma' Lu̱' xixuc'a̱' ri̱b, xiban riti̱j ch'i̱l take chi'nchel rich c'amol be̱h re're'
eh chi je' re' k'e̱' naxcok'ej wach i ma' Lu̱'. Nok quicohlam chic i ti̱j, chi quiju'junal take c'amol be̱h re're' xquik'ahchej ma' Lu̱' eh p'uht quitz'artz'am i ri̱j

chi xa ti' chic pan quic'ux ru'um i xik'or queh chi ma'xta chic quilow wach china̱ ac'al wili. Je' aj re' ru' naxquicohlaj re're', re' take c'amol be̱h re're' xquihch'ilej je ma' Lu̱' cu re' wilic wi̱' ma' laj cano̱wa re' narichopom je reh rojic ar Jerusalen.

Chiri̱j aj chic rich'akaric je ki̱b cu̱c' take c'amol be̱h re're', re' hoj xoj-oquic je pan jenaj ma' laj cano̱wa re' xojric'am je pan tinamit Cos ribihnal. Je' chic ikal re' ma' laj cano̱wa re're' xojric'am je pan jenaj chic tinamit Ro̱wras ribihnal eh chiri̱j chic ru' xojric'am je ar Pa̱tara.
Nok wilco̱j chic ar, xkarak jenaj ma' laj cano̱wa ojic reh chipam riyuk'ul i Peni̱sya eh xoj-johtic je chipam.

Chiri̱j re' naxoj-iq'uic ponok chiwach riyuk'ul Chi̱pire re' til xkilow je wach naxoj-iq'uic je chi riche̱l, re' ma' laj cano̱wa xojric'am je pan tinamit Ti̱ro ar pa riyuk'ul Si̱rya ru'um nok ar xkahsjic lok take rihk.

Ru'um aj re' wuku̱b k'i̱j xojcahnic cu̱c' take aj niminel xkarak take ar. Re' take re' p'uht quipitim i ma' Lu̱' chi ma'xta nak rojic ar Jerusalen ru'um chi c'ahchi' rik'ormojic queh ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal chi ar Jerusalen re' ma' Lu̱' narojic ric'ulum ti'c'axic.

Naxponic i riwu̱k k'i̱j reh kawih'ic ar Ti̱ro, re' hoj xoj-elic je pan tinamit re're' chi xojquihch'ilej je take aj niminel ch'i̱l quehq'ue̱n ch'i̱l wo' take cac'u̱n quixk'u̱n. Nok wilco̱j chic lok chiri̱j i tinamit, chi kunchelal xkaxuc'a̱' ki̱b chi chi̱' i ma' laj ha' eh xoj-oquic chi ti̱j.
Chiri̱j chic ru' nok kak'ahchem chic ki̱b chi kaju'junal chi rich'akaric ki̱b, re' hoj xoj-oquic cok chipam ma' laj cano̱wa eh re' take aj niminel xitahkanic cho keh xisoljic wo' chic je pan quipa̱t.

Nok hoj chic elenak cho ar Ti̱ro, xkachop wo' chic je kabe̱h nah ha' cu rehtal pan tinamit Tolema̱yra ponok kawach. Ar xojcahnic jenaj k'i̱j eh chiwach i jenaj k'i̱j re're' xponic kayew cho risukquil quic'ux take aj niminel wilque̱b ar.

Naxsak'ic lok je' ikal, re' hoj ch'i̱l i ma' Lu̱' xoj-elic je ar eh xoj-o̱j chipam jenaj ma' laj cano̱wa cu rehtal xojponic pan jenaj tinamit Sesare̱ya ribihnal re' xojcahnic wi̱' pa ripa̱t ma' Peh re' aj k'orol ribiral i Jesus eh re' wo' jenaj chi quixilac take wuku̱b chi winak chiho̱j lok take reh puhcunic to'bal chi quina̱ take cahnel ixok.
Re' ma' Peh re're' wilic quejeb rixk'u̱n cu k'ahxok take eh aj k'orol wo' take reh k'oric nye'eric queh ru'um Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios.

Chiwach aj take quib xib k'i̱j xojcahnic ar, xponic pan tinamit Sesare̱ya jenaj winak xchalic pa riyuk'ul Jure̱ya, Aca̱wo ribihnal re' aj k'orol wo' reh k'oric nye'eric reh ru'um Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios. Re' winak re're' naxponic chipam i tinamit re're',

xoj-o̱j rik'o'rej ar pa ripa̱t i ma' Peh. Ar ajic naxiquimlej i pa̱s bac'bal ripa̱m ma' Lu̱' p'uht ripixim take ro̱k ch'i̱l take k'ab chi ribil ri̱b eh je' wili xik'or keh: «Je' ricab naxnibac' take wo̱k ch'i̱l take nik'ab, je' re' nabac'arok take ro̱k ch'i̱l take k'ab i winak re' nehchenic reh pa̱s wili maj re' Lok' laj Uxlabal xik'or wi̱n chi re' aj ehcham reh pa̱s wili naribac'aric cu'um take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilque̱b ar Jerusalen eh naquik'ahsam wo' pan quik'ab take tinamit ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, nqui keh.
Naxkabiraj aj re're', re' hoj koj-ihch'ilinic reh ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l wo' take ju'jun chic aj niminel kihch'ilem take, chi xa nch'uk chic kac'ux xkak'or reh chi ma'xta nak rojic ar Jerusalen,

xa re' la' re' ma' Lu̱' je' wili xik'or keh: «Re' hin ma' ru'um ta so' chi equinquibac' on equinquicansaj ru'um rik'ormojic ribiral i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus enipoh'aj nic'ux chi ojic ar Jerusalen. Ma̱capaj tak k'uru' chi ru̱c' ok'ic na'n tak eh je' wo' chi ru̱c' riyot'quil i wa̱mna c'ahchi' acojom tak enipit i wojic ar Jerusalen, nqui xik'or keh.

Chi je' aj re' naxkilow i hoj chi ma' pitiric ta ra̱j chi ojic ar Jerusalen, re' wili xkak'or reh: «Wi re' aj wo' ojic ar Jerusalen, re're' ra̱j i Dios chi na̱banam, re' aj wo' re' chanimej, kojqui reh. Ru̱c' re're' xkacana̱' rik'ormojic reh chi ma'xta rojic ar.
Chiri̱j chic take k'i̱j reh kawih'ic ru̱c' ma' Peh, re' hoj xkatik'a̱' ki̱b chi nakelic je ar eh chi je' re' xkachop je kabe̱h chi ko̱k chi ojic ar Jerusalen

chi xojquihch'ilej je take ju'jun aj niminel aj Sesare̱ya. Re' take aj niminel re're' xic'ambic je kabe̱h chi nakojic chipam ripa̱t jenaj najtir aj niminel aj Chi̱pire Manason ribihnal re' nakiq'uic ponok wi̱' chi ula'anic.
Naxojponic ar Jerusalen re' take aj niminel xojquic'ul chi xa suk chic quic'ux.
Je' chic ikal re' ma' Lu̱' chi kich'i̱l wo' i hoj re' koj-ihch'ilinic reh, xo̱j rik'o'rej i ma' Jaco̱wo ar pa ripa̱t re' quimolom wi̱' qui̱b take quinahsil aj niminel.

Ar aj ru' re' ma' Lu̱' xic'alenej take eh p'uht rik'orom queh chi chaklic chi̱' i nic' pa' nimal xiban i Dios chi quixilac take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ru̱c' i c'uhbalanic xiban chi quixilac.

Nok quibiram chic i xik'or ma' Lu̱', re' take c'amol quibe̱h aj niminel quimolom qui̱b re're' je' wili xquik'or: «Kasbe̱s ma' Lu̱', re' hoj k'e̱' nkatioxej reh Dios ru̱c' i c'uhbalanic xa'n chi quixilac take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, xa re' la' chic re' hat aweht'alim chi re're' ricoj c'axic chi quixilac take q'uihal queh kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel quiniminic chic reh Jesus maj re' take re' xa cu re' wo' i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses cow c'ahchi' quik'orom chi narinimjic.

Queh take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, re're' xk'ormojic chic chi re' hat c'ahchi' ak'orom queh kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel quic'acharic pan quitinami̱t take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi naquimayam ric'amaric na̱ i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, je' wo' chi ma'xta chic quik'atam lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ric'achanbal quiha'lac'u̱n, on chi ma'xta chic quinimem take c'uhbal cocsam wi̱' qui̱b.
Chaj bih naka'nam k'uru' ru̱c' re're'? Je' re' nkabiraj maj re' take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re're' naquimolom qui̱b ku̱c' ru'um xquibiraj chic chi re' hat xatc'ulic lok ayu' Jerusalen.
Ru'um aj re', re' hat sakbih chi ena'n i nakak'orom aweh yu'na: Chi kaxilac i hoj wilque̱b quejeb chi kich aj niminel tanlic chiqui̱j chi naquinimem i quik'orbal quiyew chiwach i Dios.

Re' take re' chac'am take je chawi̱j ar cu̱c' aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios eh chawitinej awi̱b tak chi saksbal awach tak. Chi je' re' nok re' take aj k'ahsem si̱ enquik'or aweh tak chi ta chic re̱t chi enak'ahsaj asi̱ tak, re' hat titojbok reh ritz'akil i johybal lok wach quina̱ take quejeb chi aj niminel re're'. Nacha'n chi je' re', re' take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel enquicoj wach chi ma' coric ta i k'oro̱j queh chawi̱j eh je' wo' chi re' hat ma' c'ahchi' ta ayak'abem pan awo̱k i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, nqui take reh ma' Lu̱'.

Chiri̱j ru' je' wo' chic wili xquik'or reh ma' Lu̱': «Re' hat ma' ticapewenic chiqui̱j take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xiniminic reh Jesus maj re' hoj xkatz'ihmbaj chic je queh re' tik'inic wach no'jbal xka'n wili: ‹To̱b ta ma'xta animem tak chi'nchel i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, re' hoj nka̱j chi xa re' ti take wili chanimej tak: Ma̱wuq'uej tak chic riquiq'ue̱l jeno' chicop, on ma̱c'ux chic tak ritibquilal jeno' chicop k'ahsamaj chi si̱ chiwach tiyo̱x, on jeno' chicop xa biyo̱j chi ralak. Je' wo', ma̱ban tak chic c'oyomal, nqui xkatz'ihmbaj je, nqui take reh ma' Lu̱'.

Je' re' nok je' chic ikal re' ma' Lu̱' xo̱j ar chi chi̱' i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios eh xic'am je take chiri̱j i quejeb chi aj niminel xk'ormojic reh chi naric'amam je take. Chiri̱j chic ru' nok re' ma' Lu̱' ritinem chic ri̱b quich'i̱l take quejeb chi aj niminel re're' reh chi narik'ormojic queh cu'um take aj k'ahsem si̱ chi ta chic re̱t chi enquik'ahsaj quisi̱, re' ma' Lu̱' xoquic cok chi rik'ormojic chi xinimej chic i ritinjic ri̱b reh chi ta chic re̱t chi erik'ahsaj risi̱ eh je' wo' xik'or chi pa riwu̱k k'i̱j narik'ahsam wo' i si̱ chiqui̱j take quejeb aj niminel xic'am je take chiri̱j.

Chiri̱j re' nok q'uisi̱n chic ma' nponic i riwu̱k k'i̱j chi narik'ahsam i si̱ chiqui̱j take quejeb aj niminel ric'amam je take chiri̱j, wilic take ju'jun rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' aj pa riyuk'ul A̱sya take xquimol qui̱b chi rijohsjic quic'ux take riq'uihal tinamit. Ar ajic naxquilow wach ma' Lu̱' chi chi̱' i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios. Re' take re' xa nquiminlom chic qui̱b, xi'oquic cok chi richoporic ma' Lu̱'

eh je' wili xquik'or chi xa q'ueric chic quichi̱': «Hat-tak kas kacha̱k' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, re' winak wili xa pa' tinamit niq'uic ponok wi̱' ma' holohic ta c'uhtunic riban chiri̱j katinami̱t je' wo' chiri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eh je' wo' chiri̱j i lok' laj pa̱t ye'a̱b wili. Ma' xa re' ta re', je' la' wo' yu'na ru̱c' ricojoric take winak ma' re' ta kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel c'ahchi' riyak'abem pa ro̱k rilok'il i lok' laj ye'a̱b wili re' xa keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ye'o̱j chi kojwih'ic ayu', xa nqui chic take.

Re' riwi̱' chi je' re' xquik'or maj nok ja' noquic ta cok i ma' Lu̱' chi chi̱' i pa̱t re're' xquilow cho wach i winak aj E̱peso re' Tro̱pimo ribihnal chi rich'i̱l eh pan quic'ux ru', re' ma' Lu̱' xic'am la' cok i winak re're' chiri̱j.

Naxquibiraj take k'oric xca'n take aj A̱sya re're', q'uihal take tinamit xa johtonak chic quic'a̱ xquimol qui̱b chi richoporic ma' Lu̱'. Chiri̱j re're' xquijuquej lok chiri̱j i pa̱t re're' eh re' take aj cha'janel reh pa̱t xquitz'ap cho ritz'ahpil xa re' wo' ti xi'elic lok take tinamit.

Nok xa pan quimic nak chic wilic ma' Lu̱' cu'um take tinamit xichopbic reh, xponic k'ormojok reh nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take sol chi juntuhm chi tinamit aj Jerusalen wolic nca'n ru'um chi xjohsjic quic'a̱.

Re' nahsil i sol re're' naxibiraj chi je' re', ximol cho quiwach take riso̱l ch'i̱l take c'amol quibe̱h eh xichalic re' wilque̱b wi̱' tinamit re're', re' xa cu c'ahchi' wo' quik'ojobem i ma' Lu̱'. Naxquilow take tinamit chi xo̱j c'olok i quinahsil take sol chi rich'i̱l take riso̱l, xa nok wo' xquimay rik'ojoric ma' Lu̱'.

Chiri̱j ru', re' nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take sol xitak'a̱' take riso̱l chi naquichopom ma' Lu̱' je' wo' chi naquibac'am ru̱c' quib chi c'aham ch'ihch' maj pa ric'ux ru', re' la' ma' Lu̱' xjohsonic quic'a̱ take tinamit re're'. Xa re' la', nok re' nahsil sol xibiraj hab wach i winak re're' eh je' wo' xibiraj chaj bih mahc xiban chi xijohsaj quic'a̱ take tinamit

ma' hab ta wach queh xk'oric ricorquil ru'um nok chi quixilac take tinamit re're' rehreh wach k'oric xquik'or chi ricojoric rimahc ma' Lu̱'. Je' re' nok ru'um chi ma' rirak ta chiri̱j hab ta wo' wach queh tinamit re're' coric i c'ahchi' rik'orom, re' nahsil re're' xik'or queh take riso̱l chi naquic'amam je ma' Lu̱' ar chipam i pa̱t wilque̱b wi̱' take toco̱m chic quich sol.

Chiri̱j ru' naxiponic chi chi̱' i nim wach ka'a̱b tz'ak re' no̱j johtok chipam pa̱t quiwih'ic wi̱' take sol, re' take sol quichoponic reh ma' Lu̱' xquijehlej johtok chi teleb eh xquic'am johtok chipam i pa̱t re're' chi quisutem ri̱j ru'um xiyo'jic chi re' take tinamit enquicansaj
maj re' take tinamit re're' xa xam chic je take chiqui̱j take sol, xa je' chic wili nquik'or je: «Sahchok wach i winak re're', nqui take.

Chiri̱j wili nok c'ahchi' nak chic ricojoric cok chipam i pa̱t re're', re' ma' Lu̱' je' wili xik'or reh nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take sol: «Ajabe̱s chacuy, chayew k'ab wi̱n chi enipahkaj jeno' ato'bil aweh, nqui xik'or reh. Naxibiraj chi je' re' i nahsil c'amol quibe̱h sol, je' wili xik'or reh ma' Lu̱': «Ha̱', tichol po' nchel k'oric pan quik'orbal take aj criye̱co.

Re' po' nchel hat k'uru' re' aj Eji̱pto cu ja' naht ta rijohsam quic'a̱ take tinamit chiri̱j i kak'atal k'oric hoj aj Ro̱ma, naxic'am je take chiri̱j i lajeb ik'ob (4,000) chi k'ak'anel ar chipam ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel reh chi nacoquic nak cho chi k'ak'anic, nqui reh ma' Lu̱'.

Ar aj ru' re' ma' Lu̱' je' wili xik'or reh nahsil re're': «Ajabe̱s, re' hin, hin ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh ar hin asjanak chipam ma' laj tinamit Ta̱rso ribihnal re' wilic ar pa riyuk'ul i Sili̱sya. Je' re' nok nipahkaj aweh chi enayew k'ab wi̱n chi equink'oric junc'am ok chi quina̱ take tinamit wili, nqui reh.

Je' re' nok naxye'eric k'ab reh chi narik'oric chi quina̱ take tinamit, re' ma' Lu̱' xpa'lajic cho chi chi̱' nim wach ka'a̱b re're' eh naxiban cho k'ab queh tinamit chi naquimayam ahnic, je' wili xik'or cho queh pan k'oric hewre̱yo, re' quik'orbal take rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel:
«Was tak nicha̱k', chacuy chabiraj tak re' haj wilic nanik'orom chi co'lbal wi̱b chawach tak, nqui queh tinamit re're'.
Naxquibiraj chi c'ahchi' quik'o'rjic pan hewre̱yo re' quik'orbal ru', re' take tinamit re're' riman chic xquicoj rehtal i c'ahchi' rik'orom. Je' re' nok je' wili xitik ju' rik'ormojic ma' Lu̱':

«Re' hin to̱b ta coric chi ar pan tinamit Ta̱rso re' wilic chipam i riyuk'ul i Sili̱sya xinasjic cho, til hin wo' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh chipam aj wo' tinamit wili xinq'uihic. Je' wo' ayu' xnic'ul nitijbal ru̱c' i ma' Camalyel re' xc'uhtunic wi̱n ric'amaric na̱ chi coric i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses re' Dios c'amoj wo' cho na̱ cu'um take kama̱m kati't. Je' ricab na'n hat-tak yu'na, re' hin xnik'or wo' cho wi̱n chi curman chi narinimjic chi coric i C'uhbal re're'

eh ru'um aj re', chi quiye'eric pan quimic take quicojbic wach ric'uhbal i winak rik'orom cahnok chi re're' aj C'amol Be̱h je ru̱c' i Dios, xino̱j chi quisiq'uiric xa haj pa' tinamit. Je' aj re' nanichop take cho chi winak chi ixok, re' hin nik'ahsaj take pan quik'ab take nimak quiwach reh katinami̱t chi naquicojoric pan che̱'.

Je' re' junpech, nok re' take aj k'ahsem si̱ ch'i̱l take c'amol be̱h chipam tinamit wili xquiyew je take nihu̱j wocbal ponok cu̱c' take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilque̱b ponok pan tinamit Tama̱sco, xnichop je nibe̱h chi ojic ar chi quic'amaric cho ayu' Jerusalen take toco̱m chic aj niminel reh Jesus wilque̱b ponok, reh chi ayu' enbanaric ti'c'axic queh. Re' nik'or wili ma' chucuj k'oric ta maj re' nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ ch'i̱l take c'amol be̱h chipam tinamit wili xquilow eh queht'alim wo' chi je' re' xinbanic i hin.

«Chi je' aj re' quinbanic cho, re' hin xino̱j ar Tama̱sco eh nok xa chic q'uisi̱n ma' quinponic ar, cu re' chic wi̱n ru' je' na cablaj o̱ra reh k'i̱j xisutej wi̱j jenaj rinimal sakom xelic cho cu pan taxa̱j.

Chi je' re', re' hin xink'ehbic wach ac'al ru'um ransil i sakom re're' eh xnibiraj chi je' wili xik'or cho wi̱n i jenaj xk'oric cho cu pan taxa̱j: ‹Chabiraj i nanik'orom aweh wili hat Sa̱wlo: Chacana̱' ribanaric i ti'c'axic na'n wi̱n ru̱c' ribanaric ti'c'axic queh waj tahkanel, nqui xik'or cho wi̱n.

«Chalic i hin je' wili xnibiraj reh: ‹Ajabe̱s, hab wach i hat? quinqui reh. «Re' nk'o'ronic cho wi̱n re're' je' wili k'oric xiban cho: ‹Re' hin, hin i Jesus re' ribihnej chi aj Nasaret re' c'ahchi' abanam ti'c'axic wi̱n ru̱c' ribanaric ti'c'axic queh take waj tahkanel, nqui cho wi̱n.

«Re're' take k'oric re're' xquibiraj wo' take winak qui'ihch'ilinic wi̱n, xa re' la' ma' xquirak ta chiri̱j i k'oric xquibiraj maj k'e̱' na xoquic cho quiyo'jic ru'um rinimal wach rich'a̱b i sakom xquilow wach re're'.

Chi je' re' ajic re' hin xnik'or chi je' wili: ‹Ajabe̱s, chaj bih nawa̱j chi nanibanam chi rijelow-bal take xniban? quinqui reh. «Re' Ajabe̱s re're' je' wo' chic wili xik'or cho wi̱n: ‹Ar chipam i tinamit Tama̱sco narik'ormojic aweh chaj bih k'oro̱j chi na̱banam i hat. Je' re' nok tucten je, hiy cok chipam tinamit re're', nqui wi̱n.
«Re' hin k'uru' xinuctic je, xinoquic cok ar Tama̱sco chi hin chic ch'ihlimaj je cu'um take wich'i̱l ru'um chi ma' quinilbic ta chic.
Chipam i tinamit re're', ar c'acharic riban jenaj winak Anani̱yas ribihnal holohic ribiral k'oro̱j cu'um take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilque̱b ar. Re' winak aj lok'onel reh Dios re're',

xc'ulic lok wu̱c' eh je' wili xik'or wi̱n: ‹Wasbe̱s ma' Sa̱wlo, sakombok wo' chic pa̱m take nak' awach, nqui wi̱n. «Nok rik'orom chic re're', xa chiwach wo' ti junc'am re're' xisakombic wo' chic pa̱m take nak' niwach eh ar xwilow chic wach i ma' Anani̱yas.

Chiri̱j chic ru' je' wo' chic wili xik'or wi̱n: ‹Ma' Sa̱wlo, re' Dios lok'omaj cho wach cu'um take kama̱m kati't xichih awach chi xawilow wach i Lok' laj kAja̱w Jesus reh chi xabiraj rik'orbal. Je' wo', re're' xichih wo' awach chi naweht'alim riwi̱' i camanic tira̱j ricojom wi̱'.
Ru'um aj chi re' Dios xatripahba̱' chi raj k'orol, yu'na hat ma' Sa̱wlo chayew achi̱' chiri̱j i Jesus queh i tinamit eh chak'or wo' queh chaj bih xawilow ch'i̱l chaj bih xabiraj ru̱c' kAja̱w Jesus.
Je' re' nok ma' chi bih chic awuy'ej, chatik'a̱' la' awi̱b chi rikahsjic aha̱' reh chi re' Jesus ericuy amahc nachak'or reh chi re're' i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s china̱ ac'acharic, nqui wi̱n ma' Anani̱yas.
«Chiri̱j chic re' nok hin chic soljonak cho ayu' Jerusalen, junpech nok c'ahchi'qui̱n chi ti̱j chi chi̱' i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, xc'amaric nicapew-bal ru'um i Dios

eh ar xic'uhtaj wo' chic ri̱b wi̱n i Jesus chi je' wili c'ahchi' rik'orom wi̱n: ‹Chaloq'uej awi̱b chi elic chipam i tinamit wili ru'um re' c'uhbal na̱k'orom chiwi̱j wilic take tinamit ma'xta quicojbic wach, nqui wi̱n.

«Re' hin je' wili xnik'or reh: ‹Ha̱w, re' take tinamit equinquibiraj nanik'or queh i c'uhbal chawi̱j maj queht'alim chi nok ja' tininimej ta, re' hin quino̱j nak pan tak pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi quisiq'uiric take jarub pa' quiniminic aweh eh nanirak take cho, nik'ahsaj take pan che̱' reh chi naquitz'uhumjic.

Je' wo' queht'alim chi nok c'ahchi' ricansjic i Te̱wan re' xik'or i c'uhbal chawi̱j, xnicapaj chi tare̱t chi nariquimic nok hin wo' jenaj ponok chiqui̱j take cansanel reh. Naxnicapaj chi je' re', re' hin xnik'or cok wi̱b chi nanicha'jem i quijuc ro̱k tz'ih roxlo̱c' lok quiso' take xicansanic reh Te̱wan, quinqui reh Jesus.

«Raj la' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or cho wi̱n: ‹Ma'eta riban chi eticahnic ayu' Sa̱wlo, maj cu naht la' ponok yu̱k' q'uixca̱b pan quitinami̱t take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel naca̱t nitak'a̱b je chi aj k'orol reh niC'uhbal. Je' re' nok telen je ayu' eh hiy, nqui wi̱n, nqui ma' Lu̱' queh take tinamit re're'.

Naxquibiraj i xik'or ma' Lu̱' chi xtak'abjic je cu̱c' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, re' take tinamit p'uht quiq'uerem quichi̱' chi je' wili: «Chasach tak wach i winak re're' ru'um nok ma' riwi̱' ta chi c'achlic, nqui take.
Ar aj ru' nok re' take tinamit xa q'ueric chic quichi̱' p'uht quitup'lom wach i quiso' eh p'uht quipokem johtok poklaj pan te̱w rehtalil chi k'e̱' quic'a̱ xchalic,

re' nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take sol xitak'a̱' ricojoric cok ma' Lu̱' chipam i pa̱t re're'. Chiri̱j ru' xik'or wo' reh jenaj queh c'amol quibe̱h take sol chi naritak'a̱b ritz'uhumjic i ma' Lu̱' cu rehtal narik'orom chaj bih riwi̱' c'ahchi' quiwolem wi̱' qui̱b tinamit chiri̱j

xa re' la' nok pixlic chic ma' Lu̱' cu'um take sol re' naquiye'bic nak chic reh chi tz'uhu̱m, re' ma' Lu̱' je' wili xik'or reh c'amol quibe̱h sol: «Re' c'uhbal nchoponic na̱ i tinamit Ro̱ma ma' riyew ta k'ab aweh tak chi naqui̱natz'uhumem tak i hin maj re' hin, hin wo' ritinami̱t i Ro̱ma eh xa na̱ ru' cu ma' ja' nach'uk ta tak k'oric chi nina̱, nqui ma' Lu̱'.

Naxibiraj xik'or ma' Lu̱', re' c'amol quibe̱h sol re're' xo̱j rik'ohraj reh rinahsi̱l chi je' wili: «Ajabe̱s, chacapaj ri̱j wi tare̱t i xatak'a̱' keh chi naka'nam maj re' winak xkachop re' po' wo' ru̱c' ritinami̱t i Ro̱ma, nqui xik'or reh.

Je' re' ajic re' nahsil c'amol quibe̱h sol re're' xchalic ru̱c' ma' Lu̱' eh je' wili xik'or reh: «Chak'or wi̱n, coric na chi hat ritinami̱t i Ro̱ma? nqui xik'or reh. Nok re' ma' Lu̱' rik'orom ricorquilal chiri̱j re're',

re' nahsil je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh ma' Lu̱': «Re' hin naxinoquic chi hin ritinami̱t i Ro̱ma yohbal wach tumi̱n xnitojbej wi̱' ri̱j. Raj ti hat k'uru', nic' ti wach na xa'n canar ritojoric ri̱j re're'? nqui reh. Chalic i ma' Lu̱' je' wili xic'u'lej wi̱': «Re' hat cu ru̱c' na nchel atumi̱n ru' xatoquic chi ritinami̱t i Ro̱ma, raj hin xa wasba̱l wo' cho maj re' take nitu̱t waja̱w najtir k'i̱j quicojom qui̱b chi ritinami̱t i Ro̱ma, nqui reh nahsil re're'.

Naxibiraj i xik'or ma' Lu̱', re' nahsil sol re're' xoquic cho riyo'jic ru'um chi xitak'a̱' ripixiric i ma' Lu̱'. Je' re' nok, re' take sol re' nacoquic nak chi ritz'uhumjic i ma' Lu̱', ma' cu ta chic xca'n ritz'uhumjic.

Je' chic ikal re' nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take sol, ru'um chi raj reht'alim chaj bih riwi̱' quiwolic take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chiri̱j ma' Lu̱', xitak'a̱' quic'amaric take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ ch'i̱l nic' nimal take nimak quiwach pan tinamit reh chi naquimolom qui̱b ru̱c'. Nok wilque̱b chic ru̱c', re' quinahsil take sol xitak'a̱' je take riso̱l chi naquichejem cho c'aham ch'ihch' bac'lic wi̱' ma' Lu̱' eh chiri̱j chic ru', xc'ulic pahbabjok chi quiwach take c'amol be̱h xiyuk'unjic re're'.

Nok pahbamaj aj chic i ma' Lu̱' chi quiwach take c'amol be̱h re're', je' wili xik'or queh chi xa cow chic c'ahchi' ritz'ehtam take: «Was tak nicha̱k', cu ayu' chi k'i̱j reh nic'acharic re' hin xa coric wo' wach nicapew-bal chiwach i Dios, nqui xik'or queh.
Naxquibiraj re're', re' nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ Anani̱yas ribihnal xik'or queh take sol wilque̱b cok ru̱c' ma' Lu̱' chi xquiper je ware̱.

Re' ma' Lu̱' je' wo' chic wili xik'or: «Re' hat ajabe̱s re' cojo̱j chi rich'ukuric k'oric chi nina̱ ru̱c' i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, re' hat je' acab tz'ak reh jeno' pa̱t xa chu̱n chic npoybic wach chi xa q'uisi̱n ma' nk'ehbic je. Je' re' awi̱' chi niwach maj ru̱c' chi xatak'a̱' cho ripereric wach we̱ c'ahchi' apoyom wach chi re' hat ma' nanimej ta i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Je' ricab nantuhyjic cok i tz'ak reh jeno' pa̱t nesmejic lok wach sakom chi xa q'uisi̱n po' nak chic ma' nk'ehbic je, re' ok wo' i Dios esenok lok wach sakom chi re' hat ma' c'ahchi' ta animem i c'uhbal re're', nqui reh nahsil aj k'ahsem si̱.
Naxquibiraj re're' take mololque̱b ar, je' wili xquik'or: «Re' hat ma' c'ahchi' ta ayohbalem wach nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios, nqui take reh ma' Lu̱'.

Chalic ma' Lu̱' je' wo' chic wili xic'u'lej take wi̱': «Chacuy tak nimahc was tak nicha̱k'. Pan coric, re' hin ma' weht'alim ta chi re' po' nchel i winak re're' i nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios. Wi ta nak xk'ormojic wi̱n chi je' re', re' hin ma' xnik'or ta nak i k'oric re're' maj re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses je' wili rik'or: “Ma' ayak'abej pan awo̱k rilok'il i nahsil chipam atinami̱t, nqui rik'or, nqui xic'u'lej take wi̱'.

Chiri̱j chic ru' re' ma' Lu̱' xicoj rehtal chi quixilac take wilque̱b ar, yejal queh re' je' ru̱c' aj k'ahsem si̱ je' ru̱c' ca̱' qui'sil cho aj k'ahsem si̱ Saroc eh yejal je' ru̱c' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Chi je' aj re', je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh chi cow: «Was tak nicha̱k', re' hin ch'iclic nic'ux chi re' take camnak nacuctic wo' chic cho. Ru'um aj chi nicoj wach i tijbal re're', re' hat-tak xamol awi̱b tak chi rich'ukuric i k'oric chi nina̱ eh re' hin, je' wo' hin ru̱c' cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses je' ricab xca'n take cho nitu̱t waja̱w, nqui xik'or.

Nok rik'orom chic re're' i ma' Lu̱', re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xquesaj lok qui̱b chi quixilac take aj k'ahsem si̱ je' ru̱c' ca̱' qui'sil cho aj k'ahsem si̱ Saroc eh p'uht quichopom qui̱b chiri̱j re're'

maj re' take cow laj aj niminel reh c'uhbal re're' nquicoj wach cuctic take camnak eh je' wo' nquicoj wo' wach chi re' Dios wilic take raj tz'e' wa̱ch on chi wilic kanxelex i hoj. Tz'a̱b ru' take junch'uk, ma' nquicoj ta wach chi'nchel re're'.

Nok yohbal chic wach ahnic ca'nam lok chi quibil qui̱b, re' take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses je' ru̱c' quicomo̱n take cow laj aj niminel reh c'uhbal re're', xa cakranak chic take xquipahba̱' johtok qui̱b eh je' wili xquik'or: «Ru̱c' take chaj bih riban i Dios, re' hoj ma'xta bih enkak'ihtaj wi̱' ki̱b. Wi nchel jeno' raj tz'e' wa̱ch xitak'a̱' cho chi rik'o'rjic i ma' Lu̱', re' hoj ma'xta ta bih enkak'or chiri̱j. Je' re' nok re' hoj xkach'uk chic wach chi re' winak wili ma'xta bih c'ahbilal ribanam, nqui take.

Je' re' xquik'or chi quiwach chi'nchel take aj k'ahsem si̱ mololque̱b ar, re' xquisutej ri̱j ma' Lu̱' eh riman chic wolic p'uht ca'nam chi quiwach. Ar aj ru' re' nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take sol, ru'um riyo'jic xoquic cho chi enquicansaj i ma' Lu̱', xik'or queh riso̱l quicha'janic reh ma' Lu̱' chi naquesam je chi quixilac take tinamit quimolom qui̱b re're'. Nok je' re' xca'n, re' take aj cha'janel re're' xquic'am wo' chic je chipam i pa̱t quiwih'ic wi̱' take sol.

Ar aj chipam i pa̱t re're', re' kAja̱w Jesus xic'uhtaj ri̱b reh ma' Lu̱' pa riwiric eh je' wili xik'or reh chiwach ak'ab re're': «Ma' tiyo'jic ma' Lu̱' chacowej la' ac'ux. Nic' pa' wach naxak'or nik'orbal ayu' Jerusalen curman wo' chi je' re' na̱wojic ak'orom ar pan tinamit Ro̱ma, nqui xik'or reh.

Chiri̱j chic ru' nok sak'anak chic lok, juntuhm take winak je' ru̱c' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xquitik'a̱' wach quino'jbal chi naquicansam i ma' Lu̱' eh chi riye'eric quik'orbal chi ricansjic ru', je' wili xquik'or: «Re' hoj wi xka'n kawa' kaha̱' chi ja' nkacansaj ta ma' Lu̱', kojsihtjok ru'um i Dios, nqui take.
Re' take winak re're' ma' xa ta wilque̱b ca'winak ok chi winak naxquiyew quik'orbal chi cansanic.

Chiri̱j aj chic riye'eric quik'orbal, re' take winak re're' xichalic cu̱c' take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱, je' wo' cu̱c' take nahsil chipam tinamit eh je' wili xquik'or: «Re' hoj je' wili kak'orbal xkayew chikawach chi ricansjic i ma' Lu̱': ‹Re' hoj wi xka'n kawa' kaha̱' chi ja' nkacansaj ta ma' Lu̱', kojsihtjok ru'um i Dios, nqui xkak'or.

«Yu'na k'uru' re' hat-tak ch'i̱l take acomo̱n re' namol awi̱b tak quich'i̱l, cha'n awi̱b tak chiwach i nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take sol chi je' nawa̱j asakomem tak wach rimahc ma' Lu̱' eh chapahkaj tak reh chi ikal chic'am wo' chic cho chawach tak reh chi re' hoj nok katik'a̱b chic ki̱b, enkacansaj i ma' Lu̱' nok ja' ta nc'ulic lok chipam i pa̱t wili, nqui take.

Chi je' aj nak re' naca'nam take winak re're', re' ribiral chi nca̱j nak quicansam ma' Lu̱', xponic pe' pan xiquin i jenaj rac'u̱n rana̱b i ma' Lu̱'. Re' ac'un re're' naxibiraj ribiral re're' xo̱j chipam i pa̱t wilque̱b wi̱' take sol eh xponic rik'or reh ma' Lu̱' nic' wach i no'jbal xquitik'a̱' wach take winak re're'.
