Naxibiraj re're' ma' Lu̱', xiyuk'ej je jenaj queh take c'amol quibe̱h sol chi rik'ormojic reh chi je' wili: «Ajabe̱s, re' ac'un wili wilic k'oric xibiraj cho chiwi̱j eh yu'na ra̱j rik'orom reh nahsil chana̱ tak. Chacuy, chac'am je wi̱n chiwach anahsil tak, nqui reh.

Chalic i c'amol quibe̱h sol re're' xic'am je ac'un chiwach rinahsi̱l eh je' wili xponic rik'or reh: «Ajabe̱s, re' kaj tz'ahpel ma' Lu̱' xiriyuk'ej je ru̱c' eh xipahkaj ato'bil wi̱n chi xnic'am cho ac'un wili chawach ru'um nok ra̱j rik'orom aweh jenaj k'oric xibiraj cho chiri̱j kaj tz'ahpel re're', nqui reh rinahsi̱l.
Je' re' ajic re' nahsil re're' xichop chi k'ab ac'un re're', xic'am lok pa reh eh je' wili xibiraj reh: «Chaj bih na̱k'orom wi̱n? nqui reh.

Chalic ac'un je' wili xik'or reh: «Ajabe̱s, re' nahsil aj k'ahsem si̱ ch'i̱l take quinahsil i tinamit xquitik'a̱' wach quino'jbal chi naquik'orom aweh, chi ikal naquimolom wo' chic qui̱b chi risakomsjic wach aweh rimahc ma' Lu̱'. Ru'um aj re' naquipahkam aweh chi na̱c'amam wo' chic je ma' Lu̱' chi quiwach,

xa re' la' hat ma̱c'u'lej na̱ queh maj ma' xa ta wilque̱b ca'winak (40) chi ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel naquic'olom qui̱b chi ruyu'njic ma' Lu̱' reh chi naquicansam. Yu'na, xa chic re' ak'orbal hat c'ahchi' cuy'em chi naca'nam re' xquitik'a̱' wach, ru'um nok xquiyew chic quik'orbal chi naquisihtjic ru'um i Dios wi xca'n quiwa' quiha̱' chi cu ja' nquicansaj ta pe i ma' Lu̱', nqui xik'or reh nahsil re're'.

Chi je' re', re' nahsil sol naxitak'a̱' je i q'uijol laj ac'un re're', xik'or reh chi ma' hab ta wach eh narik'orom chi xc'ulic riyew rehtalil i chaj bih xquitik'a̱' wach take juntuhm chi ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.

Chiri̱j chic ru' xik'o'rej je take quib chi c'amol quibe̱h sol eh je' wili xik'or queh: «Chatak'a̱' tak k'oric chi beleje̱b o̱ra reh chak'ab nacojic ar Sesare̱ya lajc'ahl (200) chi sol je' ru̱c' ch'i̱l quimache̱t, lajc'ahl (200) je' ru̱c' ch'i̱l quik'as ju' ch'ihch' tz'ob-bal eh lajeb ricajwinak (70) je' ru̱c' ri̱j cawa̱y wilque̱b. Chak'or tak queh sol re're' k'uru' chi quitik'a̱' qui̱b reh ojic.

Reh aj chi ma' eta ncansjic i ma' Lu̱', c'amarok je ru̱c' ajabe̱s ma' Pe̱lix re' raj to'o̱l k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma ar Sesare̱ya eh chatik'a̱' tak jeno' ricawa̱y i ma' Lu̱' c'ambal je reh, nqui nahsil c'amol quibe̱h sol re're'.
Chiri̱j chic ru' xitz'ihmbaj je jenaj hu̱j reh ma' Pe̱lix re' rik'or chi je' wili:
«Ajabe̱s k'atal k'oric ma' Pe̱lix: Re' hin Cala̱wriyo Lisi̱yas nibihnal c'ahchi' nitak'a̱b je risukquil ac'ux. Je' wo' c'ahchi' nik'orom je aweh take k'oric wili chiri̱j

i winak wili re' ritinami̱t wo' i Ro̱ma je' ricab xnibiraj chi xik'or. Re' aj wili k'oric nik'or je aweh: Re' hin xnichop cho winak wili naxinponic ch'i̱l take niso̱l ar chipam i ye'a̱b naricansjic nak wi̱' cu'um take juntuhm chi ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xichopbic je reh. Chi je' aj re' c'ahchi' ca'nam reh, xnimak' cho pan quik'ab take juntuhm re're'
eh ru'um chi xwa̱j nibiram chaj bih riwi̱' chi c'ahchi' quitz'akam i mahc chiri̱j, re' hin xnipahba̱' chi quiwach take nahsil nquimol qui̱b chi ch'ukuj wach mahc

xa re' la' hin ma' xnirak ta jeno' mahc chiri̱j i winak wili chi eta nak ncahnic pan che̱' chi junpech on chi eta nak ncansjic je' ricab rik'or i tak'anic nchoponic kana̱ hoj aj Ro̱ma. Xa re' cok xwilow chi re' winak wili c'ahchi' rich'ukuric wach rimahc chiri̱j i c'uhbal tijimaj take wi̱' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.

«Je' re' k'uru' to̱b ta chiwach kac'uhbal hoj ma'xta jeno' rimahc, re' hin xa chiwach wo' ti junc'am naxc'ulic k'ormojok wi̱n chi juntuhm take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel nca̱j quicansam pan c'olic i winak wili, c'ahchi' nitak'a̱b je awu̱c' reh chi ar chic chawach ch'ukurok wach rimahc. Yu'na ti tikilqui̱n chic chi nanitak'a̱b je k'oric cu̱c' take aj tz'akol wach rimahc chi chawach ok chic i hat ojok quich'uk wach rimahc. Re' aj wili k'oric xnitz'ihmbaj je aweh ajabe̱s ma' Pe̱lix. Chawic'raj awi̱b ar k'uru', nqui rik'or hu̱j xitz'ihmbaj je ma' Cala̱wriyo Lisi̱yas.

Je' aj re' k'uru' naxponic beleje̱b o̱ra reh chak'ab, je' ricab nic' pa' wach xitak'a̱' rik'ormojic i nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take sol re're', re' ma' Lu̱' xesmejic wo' je cu'um take sol je' ru̱c' qui'o̱j chi cok eh cu ar pan tinamit Anti̱patris xponic quicana̱' cho chiwach chak'ab re're'.

Naxsak'ic, re' take sol re're' xisoljic wo' chic cho chipam i pa̱t wilque̱b wi̱', nok quicana̱b chic cho ma' Lu̱' pan quik'ab take sol quibehic ri̱j cawa̱y chi naquic'amam je ar Sesare̱ya. Re' take sol re're' xquic'am je ma' Lu̱'
ar Sesare̱ya eh naxiponic ar xquipahba̱' cok chiwach i rijelow-bal k'atal k'oric pahbamaj ar. Naxquik'ahsaj i hu̱j xitz'ihmbaj je ma' Cala̱wriyo Lisi̱yas,

re' pahbamaj chi rijelow-bal i k'atal k'oric ar Sesare̱ya, p'uht rilom wach i hu̱j re're' eh chiri̱j chic ru' xibiraj reh ma' Lu̱' haj wilic i yuk'ul asjanak wi̱'. Nok ribiram chic chi re' ma' Lu̱' ar pa riyuk'ul Sili̱sya asjanak,

je' wili xik'or reh: «Re' hin nanibiram i k'oric na̱banam chi rico'ljic awi̱b, xa re' la' nwuy'ej pe naquic'olok lok take aj tz'akol wach mahc chawi̱j, nqui reh. Chiri̱j ru', je' aj wili xik'or queh take riso̱l: «Re' winak wili ar chacha'jej tak chipam i pa̱t xitik'a̱' cahnok i k'atal k'oric Hero̱res, nqui queh.

Ho'o̱b chic k'i̱j riponic ma' Lu̱' ar Sesare̱ya, xo̱j c'olok i nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ re' Anani̱yas ribihnal ch'i̱l take ju'jun chic nahsil chipam tinamit eh ch'i̱l wo' jenaj winak ma' ahl ta chi̱' chi k'oric Te̱rtulo ribihnal. Re' take re' xiponic chi ritz'akaric wach rimahc ma' Lu̱' chiwach ma' Pe̱lix.

Nok c'amoj chic cho ma' Lu̱' chi quiwach chi'nchel re're', re' Te̱rtulo tohk' rik'oric cok chi ritz'akaric wach rimahc ma' Lu̱' xa re' la' pe̱t xic'alenej ma' Pe̱lix chi je' wili: «Ajabe̱s ma' Pe̱lix, re' hat k'e̱' wilic ano'jbal eh ru'um re're' pan katinami̱t holohic chic k'atoj k'oric c'ahchi' ribanaric. Je' wo', re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel k'e̱' chic sukquilal wilco̱j awu'um.
Ru'um aj re' lok' laj ajabe̱s ma' Pe̱lix, pan quibihnal take chi'nchel i wich nitinami̱t wilque̱b xa haj yu̱k' re' queht'alim wi̱' ac'axbal nayew keh, til k'e̱' nitioxej ac'axbal chi kana̱.
«Ajabe̱s ma' Pe̱lix, to̱b ta nchel nanicojom riman rilahtz'il awach yu'na, chacuy nipahkaj aweh chi ma' tich'i'tjic ku'um. Koj-abiraj ti junc'am ok ru̱c' i nakak'orom aweh chiri̱j i winak wili.

Re' winak wili re' nc'ambic quibe̱h junch'uk chi aj niminel reh Jesus re' ribihnej chi aj Nasaret, re're' jenaj aj yojol c'uxlis chi keh hoj, xa je' na nchel ricab jeno' ya'bilal nok wilic maj xa haj pa' yu̱k' c'ahchi' rijohsam quic'a̱ take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.

Ru'um aj chi je' re' riban, re' hoj xkachop cho maj junpech cu xiniq'uej wo' riye'eric pa ro̱k rilok'il i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios naxicoj take tinamit chipam je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel take. Ru'um chi je' re' xiban, re' hoj xkap'ut nak rich'ukuric k'oric china̱ je' ricab rik'or i kac'uhbal hoj tijimaj wi̱'

xa re' la' chic ru' re' nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take sol Lisi̱yas ribihnal xojripit chi nakacohlam wach rich'ukuric k'oric china̱ nok xitak'a̱' take riso̱l chi naquimak'am chikawach eh xa na̱ ru', xojquich'eylom take riso̱l.

Ru'um aj re' yu'na awu̱c' chic i hat xojritak'a̱' cho chi rich'ukuric wach rimahc i winak wili. Yu'na chi wilco̱j chic chawach i hat k'uru', nkapahkaj aweh chi ru̱c' i birinic na̱banam reh winak wili, re' ok hat ticojbok rehtal chi coric wach mahc nkak'or aweh chiri̱j, nqui reh.
Ru'um chi re' take k'oric re're' c'ahchi' wo' ribirmijic cu'um take rich'i̱l wilque̱b cok ar, je' wo' wili xquik'or cok: «Re' k'oric c'ahchi' rik'orom ma' Te̱rtulo til coric, xa nqui chic take cok.

Nok ribiram chic re're', re' k'atal k'oric ma' Pe̱lix xiban je rehtalil reh ma' Lu̱' chi narik'oric. Je' aj wili p'uht rik'orom ma' Lu̱': «Ajabe̱s ma' Pe̱lix, re' wili co'lbal wi̱b nanik'orom chawach chi til ch'iclic nic'ux ru'um nok weht'alim chi re' hat, ru'um q'uih chic ha̱b ap'utum ch'ukuj k'oric chi kana̱ i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, aweht'alim chic chaj bih nc'uluric chi kaxilac.

Re' hat eta nak nabiraj queh toco̱m chic c'acharel, enak narak chiri̱j chi til coric i nanik'orom wili: Naxinponic Jerusalen chi riye'eric nisi̱ chi lok'onbal wach i Dios ar chipam i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios cablaj cho k'i̱j yu'na,

re' hin xa ta nak chipam lok' laj pa̱t re're' on chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, on pan tak ribehil tinamit xinquirak ta take quitz'akbic wach nimahc wili chi c'ahchi' niwolem jeno' c'acharel, on chi c'ahchi' nimolom quiwach take tinamit chi rucsjic jeno' wolic.
«Chi je' re' i ricorquilal, re' mahc nquitz'ak chiwi̱j ma'xta bih jeno' rehtalil enquic'uhtaj wi̱' aweh chi til coric, maj ma'xta bih c'ahchi' nibanam.

Haj ti cok wilic enquik'or aweh chi til coric, re' chi re' hin nilok'ej wach i kAja̱w Dios re' xquilok'ej wo' cho wach take kama̱m kati't, xa re' la' ru' re' lok'onic niban yu'na re' chic je' ricab ric'uhtaj wi̱n i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus re' aj C'amol Be̱h je ru̱c' i Dios, to̱b ta nchel nquik'or take winak wili chi ma' coric ta wach i c'uhbal re're'. Je' re' niban maj re' hin xnich'ica̱' nic'ux chiri̱j take C'uhbal k'oro̱j cho chipam take hu̱j xitz'ihmbaj i Moyses ch'i̱l wo' take hu̱j xquitz'ihmbaj take cho aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios.
Je' wo', re' hin xnich'ica̱' nic'ux chiri̱j nquichop wo' wi̱' quic'ux take winak wili chi re' Dios xik'or chi re' take coric wach quic'ux ch'i̱l take ma' coric ta wach quic'ux nacuctic cho rica'pech.
«Chi je' aj re' nicamaj chiwach i Dios, re' hin xa nicowej wo' wi̱b reh chi ma' jaruj ta encojoric rimahquilal wo̱k nik'ab chiwach i Dios, on chi quiwach take wich c'acharel,

je' ricab wo' xniban naxinponic cho c'acharok pan toco̱m chic tinamit. Nok hin chic wih'inak cho quib xib ok ha̱b ar, re' hin xinsoljic wo' chic je pan tinamit Jerusalen re' quitinamital take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh ar re' tumi̱n moloj cho wach wu'um chi quito'bal take wich aj niminel quic'acharic pan tinamit re're', xo̱j nik'ahsaj chipam i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios eh ar, je' wo' nanik'ahsam jeno' nisi̱ chiwach i Dios chipam i lok' laj pa̱t re're'.

«Chi je' re' ajic nok witinem chic wi̱b chi chi̱' i lok' laj pa̱t re're' eh nok manlic oquic nak chic cok wi̱n ar chi rik'ahsjic nisi̱, xinponic rakmajok cu'um take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xichalic pa riyuk'ul i A̱sya. Re' take re' ma' xinquirak ta chi nituhbem ta nak take tinamit chi rijohsjic quic'a̱
maj wi ta nak chi quiwach take re' wilic jeno' nimahc je' ricab nquitz'ak chiwi̱j yu'na, ayu' nak wilque̱b take cho chi rik'ormojic chawach.

Je' wo', re' take winak wilque̱b chawach wili xa ta nak enquik'or wo' aweh chi xquirak jeno' mahc chiwi̱j naxinpahbabjic chi quiwach naxquimol qui̱b wich'i̱l ch'i̱l wo' take toco̱m chic quich nahsil china̱ katinami̱t.

Haj cok wilic enquik'or nak aweh take winak wili, re' hin naxinpahbabjic chi quiwach ru' xnik'or i k'oric wili ru̱c' cow laj k'oric: Re' hat-tak was tak nicha̱k' c'ahchi' ach'ukum tak k'oric chi nina̱ xa ru'um chi nicoj wach cuctic take cho camnak, quinqui queh, nqui ma' Lu̱' reh ma' Pe̱lix.

Nok ribiram chic quik'orbal take winak re're' ch'i̱l rik'orbal i ma' Lu̱', re' ma' Pe̱lix chi reht'alim chic chi manlic nic' wach riwi̱' ribiral chiri̱j i Jesus re' C'amol je Be̱h ru̱c' i Dios, xich'ak je take tinamit re're' chi je' wili c'ahchi' rik'orom je queh: «Cu c'olok pe chic lok i Lisi̱yas ayu' cu re' aj chic nanicohlam wach rich'ukuric i wili, nqui queh.

Chi je' re', xik'or wo' reh c'amol quibe̱h take sol chi naricha'jaljic wo' chic i ma' Lu̱' chipam i pa̱t xesmejic cho wi̱', xa re' la' je' wili wo' xk'ormojic je reh c'amol quibe̱h sol re're': «Re' ma' Lu̱' chayew tak k'ab reh chi naric'ulic k'o'rjok cu'um take ti' qui'ic'rinic reh. Je' wo', naquic'olok lok take rula̱' re're' chayew wo' tak k'ab queh chi naquic'amam cok pa' bih reh, reh chi enwih'ic chi suk, nqui xik'or.

Nok ribanam chic lok quib xib ok k'i̱j i ma' Lu̱' chipam i pa̱t canamaj wi̱', junpech re' ma' Pe̱lix xo̱j c'olok chipam i pa̱t re're' chi ihch'ilimaj ru'um rehq'ue̱n Trusi̱la ribihnal re' je' ru̱c' ra̱' ri'sil wo' cho ma' Israhel. Ar xitak'a̱' je ric'amaric ma' Lu̱' eh naxc'ulic lok ru̱c', re' ma' Pe̱lix xipahkaj reh chi narik'orom reh nic' wach riwi̱' ch'iquinic c'uxlis chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Naxoquic chi k'oric i ma' Lu̱', re' ma' Pe̱lix xoquic chi ribirmijic chaj bih c'ahchi' rik'orom.

Je' re' nok re' ma' Lu̱' p'uht rik'orom i c'uhbal re' rik'or chi re' take c'acharel tanlic chiqui̱j chi naca'nam i coric on chi naquik'ebem lok rij quic'ux i c'ahbilal. Je' wo', p'uht rik'orom i c'uhbal re' nk'oric chiri̱j chi chalic reh k'i̱j nok re' Dios narich'ukum k'oric chi quina̱ take c'acharel. Naxibiraj chi je' re', re' ma' Pe̱lix xich'ak je ma' Lu̱' ru'um chi k'e̱' naxyo'jic ru'um take k'oric re're'. Je' aj wili xk'ormojic reh i ma' Lu̱' naxelic je: «Re' hin naca̱t wo' chic niyuk'em je natehok chic junc'am ok niwach ru̱c' take nilahtz'il wilic. Yu'na k'uru' hiy wo' chic pan aye'a̱b, nqui reh.

Chiri̱j i moloj i̱b re're', re' ma' Lu̱' q'uih pech wo' xtak'abjic je ric'amaric ru'um i ma' Pe̱lix reh chi naribanam ric'uta̱j ru̱c' eh chi je' re' ru̱c' jarub pa' pech xc'ulic chiwach, xa ruy'ej nak chic chi re' ma' Lu̱' eribehsaj tumi̱n reh, chi tojbal ri̱j i relic je pan che̱'

xa re' la' ma'xta wo' bih xbehsjic reh. Je' re' nok re' ma' Pe̱lix ma' xesaj ta je ma' Lu̱' pan che̱', xa reh chi re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ensukbic nak quic'ux ru̱c'. Re' la' chic xiban, xicana̱' pan k'ab i Po̱rsyo Pele̱sto re' xijelow-bej chi k'atal k'oric.
Naxponic ma' Pele̱sto chipam i yuk'ul naroquic wi̱' chi k'atoj k'oric, pe̱t xo̱j chipam i tinamit Sesare̱ya re' naric'acharic wi̱' eh xib chic k'i̱j riponic ar, xo̱j ar Jerusalen.

Ar ajic Jerusalen re' take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios ch'i̱l nic' pa' nimal take c'amol quibe̱h ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xi'o̱j c'olok chiwach eh naxquitz'ak cok rimahc ma' Lu̱' chiwach i ma' Pele̱sto, je' wili xquipahkaj reh: «Ajabe̱s ma' Pele̱sto, chacuy,

koj-aban ato'bil. Chatak'a̱' je ric'amaric keh ma' Lu̱' reh chi enach'uk k'oric china̱ ayu' Jerusalen, nqui take reh. Je' re' xquik'or reh maj tik'imaj nak chic wach cu'um chi naquicansam nak i ma' Lu̱' nah be̱h nac'amarok cho,

xa re' la' ma' Pele̱sto je' wili xik'or queh: «Re' ma' Lu̱' ma' eta riban chi enchalic ayu' maj re' hin ojic wo' chic wi̱n chipam quib xib ok k'i̱j ar Sesare̱ya. Ru'um aj chi re' ma' Lu̱' cu ar tz'aplic ponok pan che̱'
sakbih chi re' hat-tak eto̱j tak chiwi̱j naquinelok je chipam i tinamit wili eh ar ojok ak'or tak rimahc i winak re're' wila' chawach hat-tak wilic jeno' rimahc, nqui queh.

Chiri̱j re' nok ribanam chic wahxaki̱b k'i̱j on lajeb k'i̱j ar Jerusalen, re' ma' Pele̱sto soljic wo' chic cho ar Sesare̱ya chi tahkamaj je cu'um take raj tz'akol wach rimahc ma' Lu̱'. Nok jenaj chic k'i̱j riponic ar, re're' xitz'uka̱' ri̱b pa rich'ukbal k'oric eh xitak'a̱' je ric'amaric i ma' Lu̱' chiwach.

Naxpahbabjic i ma' Lu̱' chiwach, re' take rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xichalic ar Jerusalen p'uht quisutem ri̱j eh p'uht quitz'akam nimak tak wach mahc chiri̱j, xa re' la' re' mahc nquitz'ak cok chiri̱j, ma' hab ta wo' wach xiyew richi̱' chi til coric.

Chi je' re', re' ma' Lu̱' je' wili rico'ljic ri̱b xiban: «Re' hin ma' janc'al ta niyak'abem pan wo̱k i c'uhbal hoj tijimaj wi̱' i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, ma' wo' re' rilok'il i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios. Ma' niyak'abem ta wo' pan wo̱k take ric'uhbal i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma, nqui xik'or.

Chiri̱j chic ru' to̱b ta ma' xirak ta jeno' mahc chiri̱j ma' Lu̱', re' ma' Pele̱sto ru'um chi xa̱j cahnic pan sukquil c'uxlis cu̱c' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, je' pe' nchel wili xik'or reh: «Ma' Lu̱', re' hin naniyeb k'ab chi re' take quinahsil aj Jerusalen naquisakomem wach chi niwach haj wilic amahc nquitz'ak wach chawi̱j. Chaj aj bih nak'or chiri̱j nicapew-bal chi etinic'am je ar Jerusalen? nqui reh.

Re' ma' Lu̱' je' wili xik'or reh: «Re' ye'a̱b wili canamaj cahnok ru'um k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma chi ch'ukbal k'oric. Ru'um aj re' curman chi ayu' chach'uk k'oric chi nina̱. Re' hin ma'xta jeno' nimahc chi quiwach take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh re' hat aweht'alim wo' chi je' re'.

Ru'um aj re', re' hin nipahkaj aweh chi ma' quinak'ahsaj pan quik'ab take nahsil re're' maj re' hin ma'xta jeno' mahc nibanam queh je' ricab nquik'or chawach chi xniban. Haj cok wilic ma' xta bih enik'or chiri̱j chi enbanaric wu̱c', re' chi re' k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma eritak'a̱' nicansjic wi la' erirak chi wilic jeno' mahc chiwi̱j je' ru̱c' quimic ri̱j. Je' re' k'uru' nipahkaj aweh chi quinac'am je chiwach i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma, nqui ma' Lu̱'.

Je' aj re' ru', re' ma' Pele̱sto nok ribanam chic ric'uta̱j cu̱c' take raj cojol no'jbal chiri̱j chaj bih pahkanic xiban ma' Lu̱', je' wili xik'or reh: «Chiwach k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma xapahkaj ojic, ar aj wo' na̱wojic pa'lajok, nqui reh.

Nok wilic chic so' k'i̱j ribanam cho pahkanic re're' i ma' Lu̱', re' Acri̱pa, re' pahbamaj wo' chi raj to'bonel i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma, xo̱j c'olok ar pan tinamit Sesare̱ya ch'i̱l i rana̱b re' Wereni̱se ribihnal chi rik'o'rjic i ma' Pele̱sto.

Nok q'uih chic k'i̱j ricahnic ar i ma' Acri̱pa, re' ma' Pele̱sto xik'or reh nic' wach riwi̱' nok cahnanak cho ma' Lu̱' pan che̱'. Je' aj wili p'uht rik'orom reh chiri̱j: «Jenaj winak Lu̱' ribihnal xcanabjic cahnok pan che̱' ru'um ma' Pe̱lix naxelic chi k'atal k'oric.

Re' winak re're' cow npahkaljic cu'um take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi narich'ukuric ri̱j riquimic. Chi je' aj re' junpech naxinponic ar Jerusalen, re' take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ ch'i̱l take quinahsil ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xquimol qui̱b wu̱c' chi ripahkaljic wi̱n chi nanich'ukum ri̱j riquimic.

Naxquipahkaj wi̱n chi je' re', re' hin xnik'or queh take c'amol be̱h re're' chi xichalic chiwi̱j ayu' Sesare̱ya maj ru'um reh tak'anic nchopbic kana̱ i hoj aj Ro̱ma, re' hoj ma' nkayew ta k'ab chi enk'ahsjic pan quimic jeno' c'acharel wi ma' ribanam c'ulwa̱ch ch'i̱l take aj tz'akol wach rimahc, on wi ja' riyew rik'orbal chi rico'ljic ri̱b chiwach i mahc nquitz'ak chiri̱j.

«Je' aj re' ru' nok re' take nahsil re're' xichalic chiwi̱j cu ayu' Sesare̱ya, re' hin ma' xnicham ta wi̱b chi ch'ukuj wach k'oric je' la' ikal xnitz'uka̱' ti wi̱b pa nich'ukbal k'oric eh xnitak'a̱' je ric'amaric i winak re're'
reh chi naripahbabjic chi quiwach take aj tz'akol wach rimahc. Nok wilic chic i ma' Lu̱' chi quiwach take nahsil re're', ma' xquik'or ta wo' jeno' mahc chiri̱j je' ru̱c' quimic ta nak ri̱j chi wi̱n.

Re' take nahsil re're', xa chiri̱j la' i niminic chiri̱j jenaj winak camnak chic Jesus ribihnal c'ahchi' quitz'akam wach rimahc maj re' ma' Lu̱' re're' til ch'iclic ric'ux eh cow rik'or chi re' Jesus til c'achlic wo' chic.

Je' aj re' ru'um chi ma' nirak ta chic chiri̱j chaj bih nanibanam chi risakomsjic wach rimahc, re' hin xnibiraj reh ma' Lu̱' wi tare̱t chi reh chi enic'am je ar Jerusalen reh chi ar entikiric ju' rich'ukuric wach rimahc.

Raj nchel ma' Lu̱' xipahkaj wi̱n chi naricahnic ayu' pan che̱' eh je' wo' xipahkaj wi̱n chi narich'ukuric wach rimahc ar ponok chiwach kajabe̱s k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma. Ru'um aj re', re' hin xnik'or queh take niso̱l chi naquitikim ju' richa'jaljic pan che̱' cu rehtal nitak'a̱' je ru̱c' ajabe̱s re're', nqui ma' Pele̱sto.

Naxibiraj chi je' re' i ma' Acri̱pa je' wili xik'or reh ma' Pele̱sto: «Re' hin k'e̱' nak nwa̱j nibiram rik'orbal i winak re're', nqui reh. Re' ma' Pele̱sto je' wili c'u'lunic xiban reh ma' Acri̱pa: «Ikal nipahba̱' chawach i winak re're'. Ar na̱biram rik'orbal, nqui reh.

Je' chic ikal, re' ma' Acri̱pa ch'i̱l Wereni̱se xi'oquic cok chipam ye'a̱b rik'atbal k'oric ma' Pele̱sto chi behsemaj cu'um take q'uihal nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take sol je' wo' cu'um take quinahsil i tinamit. Chi je' re' ajic re' ma' Pele̱sto xitak'a̱' je ric'amaric i ma' Lu̱'

eh nok xc'amaric chic cho chiwach, je' wili xik'or reh ma' Acri̱pa: «Ajabe̱s raj to'o̱l k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma ch'i̱l hat-tak nahsil wilca̱t tak ayu' chi kaxilac, chawach hat-tak c'ahchi' nipahba̱b i winak wili re' ma' xa re' ta ar Jerusalen je' la' wo' ayu' Sesare̱ya xa c'ahchi' chic quipahkam wi̱n take juntuhm chi ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi nanich'ukum ri̱j riquimic.

Re' winak wili xnich'uk chic wach ribano̱j xa re' la' hin xnirak chiri̱j chi ma'xta jeno' mahc ribanam je' ta nak ru̱c' quimic ri̱j. Ru'um aj re' xnitik'a̱' chic wach chi nanitak'a̱b je ru̱c' i kajabe̱s k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma, je' ricab xipahkaj wi̱n i winak wili,

xa re' la' ru' ru'um chi ma' nirak ta jeno' rimahc re' nanitz'ihmbam je reh kajabe̱s k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma, yu'na c'ahchi' nipahba̱b chawach hat ajabe̱s ma' Acri̱pa, je' wo' chawach hat-tak wilca̱t tak ayu' chi je' ta nak nchel enarak tak jeno' rimahc nacha'n tak i pahkanic reh eh chi je' re', re' nak i mahc re're' enitz'ihmbaj je reh wajabe̱s aj Ro̱ma.

Wi ma' xarak ta tak jeno' rimahc ma' eta wo' nak niban chi eno̱j ar Ro̱ma maj chi wi̱n hin ma' riwi̱' ta chi jeno' tz'ahpel entak'abjic je ru̱c' kajabe̱s aj Ro̱ma chi ma' sakomomaj ta je wach reh chaj bih i mahc narich'ukum wach, nqui xik'or ma' Pele̱sto.

Chi je' aj re' k'uru', re' ma' Acri̱pa je' wili xik'or reh ma' Lu̱': «Yu'na echic riban chi etik'oric chawi̱j chi co'lbal awi̱b, nqui reh. Naxibiraj chi je' re' i ma' Lu̱', xiban je k'ab chi ric'alenjic i ma' ajabe̱s re're' eh je' wili p'uht rik'orom chi rico'ljic ri̱b:
«Ajabe̱s k'atal k'oric ma' Acri̱pa, k'e̱' lo̱k' chi wi̱n chi chawach i hat nanik'oric yu'na chi rico'ljic wi̱b chiri̱j chi'nchel i mahc nquitz'ak wach chiwi̱j take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' cok hat ma' xa ta re' narak chiri̱j chi coric nic' wach riwi̱' kac'acharic hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, je' la' wo' aweht'alim take rehreh wach tijbal nkachop wi̱' ki̱b. Ru'um aj re' nipahkaj aweh chi chacuy ti so' ac'axquilal chi ribirmijic i nanik'orom wili:

«Re' riwi̱' nic'acharic cu pa niq'uihbal cho til queht'alim take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' queht'alanic wo' reh chi ar Jerusalen xnicohlaj wach niq'uijolal nip'utum cho chipam i tinamit hin q'uihinak cho wi̱'.

Wi ta nak enpahkaljic queh wi ricorquilal i c'ahchi' nik'orom wili, re' take re' k'i̱j wo' nak enquiyew quik'orbal chi coric c'ahchi' nik'orom eh je' re' nik'or maj queht'alim wo' chic chi coric chi cu pa niq'uihbal cho xp'uturic cho nitijiljic chi ric'amaric na̱ i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eh chi ru'um chi xniyew wi̱b chi ric'amaric na̱ chi manlic i c'uhbal re're' xniban wo' je' ricab nca'n take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi til cow nquik'or chi re' take qui'oquic chi rinimjic kaDios hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel curman chi naquic'amam na̱ i c'uhbal re're'.

«Je' aj re' riwi̱' ru' nic'acharic ajabe̱s ma' Acri̱pa, raj yu'na re' take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re're' xquipahkaj reh ajabe̱s ma' Pele̱sto chi narich'ukum k'oric chi nina̱ xa ru'um chi re' hin til ch'iclic nic'ux chiri̱j i Dios c'ahchi' wuy'em chi narimansam wach i rucsjic take cho camnak xik'or cho queh kama̱m kati't chi naribanam.

Chi re' aj i Dios xk'oric cho chi re' take camnak nacucsjic wo' chic cho, re' take kama̱m kati't xquich'ica̱' wo' cho quic'ux chi narimanlajic wach i k'oric re're' eh ru'um aj re' xa eli̱c wo' c'ahchi' quilok'em wach i kaDios. Je' re' k'uru' ajabe̱s ma' Acri̱pa, re' take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xa ru'um pe' chi re' hin ch'iclic wo' nic'ux chiri̱j take k'oric re're' c'ahchi' quitz'akam wach nimahc! nqui ma' Lu̱'.

Chiri̱j chic ru' re' ma' Lu̱' je' wili xik'or queh rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel: «Re' chic hat-tak wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilca̱t tak ayu', chaj bih riwi̱' chaweh tak k'uru' chi ma' nacoj ta tak wach chi re' Dios narucsam take cho camnak? nqui queh.

Chiri̱j chic rik'ormojic lok re're', re' ma' Lu̱' je' wili xik'or reh Acri̱pa: «Yu'na nanik'oric so' awu̱c' tak chiri̱j chic chaj bih take nibanam cho: Pan nic'ux i hin, riwi̱' la' nchel take xniban cho najtir chi ribanaric take nic' nimal ti'c'axic xniban cho queh take quiniminic reh Jesus re' ribihnej chi aj Nasaret.

Je' ricab ar Jerusalen je' wo' re' xniban. Nok ye'o̱j chic wajawric cu'um take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ ar reh chi nanichopom take nic' nimal quiniminic reh Jesus, re' hin xniban chi xicojoric take pan che̱' ar. Ma' xa re' ta la' wo' re' xniban, xniban la' wo' jenaj wach nic'ux cu̱c' take xich'ukbic ri̱j quiquimic take aj niminel.

Je' wo', q'uih pech xniban chi xbanjic ti'c'axic queh aj niminel quirakmajic take pan tak pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eh je' re' xniban maj re' nak nwa̱j chiqui̱j chi xquicana̱' ta nak rinimjic i Jesus. «Chi je' re' ajic nok xnip'ut chic ojic pan tak toco̱m chic tinamit chi quichoporic take aj niminel ru'um reh rinimal nic'a̱ xjohtic cho chiqui̱j,

junpech nok re' take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios xinquitak'a̱' je ar Tama̱sco ch'i̱l jenaj nihu̱j ye'o̱j wi̱' wajawric chi quichoporic take aj niminel reh Jesus, xino̱j chipam i tinamit re're'

xa re' la' ru' wach be̱h, je' pe' nchel wili xc'uluric je' na cablaj o̱ra reh k'i̱j, ajabe̱s ma' Acri̱pa: Re' hin xwilow jenaj sakom yohbal wach sakomil cu pan taxa̱j xelic cho. Chiri̱j ru', nok re' hin ch'i̱l take wich'i̱l chi sutumaj chic ki̱j ru'um i sakom re' xiq'uic wo' chic na̱ risakomal chiwach risakomil i k'i̱j,

xojk'ehbic wach ac'al eh ar xnibiraj chi jenaj xk'oric cho chi je' wili pan k'oric hewre̱yo re' kak'orbal hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel: ‹Chabiraj i nanik'orom aweh wili hat Sa̱wlo: Chacana̱' ribanaric i ti'c'axic na'n wi̱n ru̱c' ribanaric ti'c'axic queh waj tahkanel maj xa awi̱b c'ahchi' ayeb chi ti' ru̱c' i c'ahchi' abanam re're', xa je' na nchel nac'ul aweh je' ricab ric'ul jeno' bo̱yex chi xa ri̱b riyew chi ti' nariyak' je i k'as ju' ch'ihch' tok'bal reh, nqui xnibiraj.

«Chalic i hin je' wili xnik'or reh: ‹Ajabe̱s, hab wach i hat k'uru'? quinqui reh. «Re' nk'oric cho re're' je' wo' chic wili xik'or cho wi̱n: ‹Re' hin, hin i Jesus re' c'ahchi'qui̱n ayeb chi ti' ru̱c' i ti'c'axic na'n queh take waj tahkanel.

Tipa̱' johtok k'uru' chabiraj chaj bih i camanic na̱banam chi niwach: Re' riwi̱' chi yu'na xnic'uhtaj wi̱b aweh ru'um chi c'ahchi'ca̱t nipahba̱b chi waj tz'e' wa̱ch aj ye'ol ak'orbal chiri̱j i c'ahchi' awilom chiwach junc'am wili ru̱c' rilmijic niwach eh je' wo' chiri̱j take ric'uhtjic wi̱b aweh nanibanam johtok chi kawach.

«Chi je' aj re' i camanic na̱banam k'uru', re' hin naca̱t nico'lem chi quiwach take c'acharel naca̱t nitak'a̱b je wi̱'. Je' re' nanibanam nok wilca̱t chic cu̱c' take awich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel on cu̱c' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel

maj cu̱c' take chi'nchel re're' naca̱t nitak'a̱b je chi riteheric pa̱m quicapew-bal, je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak ritehic i nak' quiwach chi ilo̱j, je' wo' chi equi'elic ri'sil ro̱k k'ab aj Yahm je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak quelic cho pan jeno' k'ekom eh chi je' re' chi ri'sil chic i ro̱k k'ab i Dios equiwih'ic je' ricab chi pan sakom ta nak chic c'ahchi' quik'ahxic je. «Je' wo' chic, re' riwi̱' chi naca̱t nitak'a̱b je cu̱c' take c'acharel re're' chi re' nic' pa' nimal take naquichopom quic'ux chiwi̱j naricuyaric quimahc eh nariye'eric wo' queh nicuse'sbal c'olo̱j lok wu'um chi xa queh take quik'ahsam qui̱b chi nilok'onjic, nqui wi̱n.
«Je' aj re' ru' ajabe̱s ma' Acri̱pa, ru̱c' i k'oric xiban wi̱n i winak xic'uhtaj ri̱b wi̱n naxkajic cho pan taxa̱j, re' hin ma' xnik'ihtaj ta wi̱b chiwach

re' la' i k'oric xik'or wi̱n re're' p'uht nik'orom queh take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilque̱b ar Tama̱sco je' wo' queh take wilque̱b Jerusalen ch'i̱l wo' take wilque̱b pan tak toco̱m chic tinamit pa riyuk'ul Jure̱ya. Chi je' aj re', re' hin xnik'or wo' queh chi naquicana̱b ribanaric i mahc eh chi naquic'acharic chi jalo̱j chic wach quino'jbal c'uhtbal reh chi xquinimej chic i Dios.
Ru'um aj take k'oric niban re're', re' take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wili xinquichop nok wilqui̱n ar chipam i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios eh xca̱j nak quinquicansam

xa re' la' re' Dios xirico'lej pan quik'ab. Ru'um aj re' xa cu c'ahchi' wo' nitikim ju' rik'ormojic queh take nimak quiwach chi cuc'tak quiwach je' ricab riwi̱' rik'ormojic xniban aweh tak yu'na chi re' Jesus xic'uhtaj ri̱b wi̱n. «Til nik'or aweh, ajabe̱s ma' Acri̱pa chi re' rik'ormojic niban re're' ar wilic wo' ribiral chipam take hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj ru'um i Moyses eh je' wo' cu'um take aj najtir raj k'orol c'uhbal i Dios. Re' take re' naxquik'or chaj bih naric'uluric ru̱c' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xquik'or wo'

chi tanlic chi reh chi xquimic eh chi re're', i pe̱t uctel chi quixilac take camnak reh chi enk'ormojic queh take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ch'i̱l take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel i c'uhbal nbanic chi nsakomjic pa̱m quicapew-bal je' ricab riban jenaj sakombal chi quisakomjic take c'acharel, nqui ma' Lu̱'.
Nok rico'lem chic cok ri̱b ma' Lu̱' chi je' re', re' ma' Pele̱sto xiq'uer cho chi̱' chi je' wili: «Hat saban hat ma' Lu̱'! Re' yohbal wach tijinic abanam cho c'ahchi' rijot'bic pa̱m ana̱! nqui reh.
Ar aj ru' re' ma' Lu̱' je' wili xic'u'lej wi̱': «Ajabe̱s ma' Pele̱sto, re' hin coric laj k'oric c'ahchi' nik'orom aweh. Ma' re' ta nchel hin saban

maj re' k'oric nik'or chawach tak til eht'alamaj ru'um ajabe̱s ma' Acri̱pa. Je' re' ajic re' c'ahchi' nik'orom chiwach ajabe̱s ma' Acri̱pa til ch'iclic nic'ux chi reht'alim chi'nchel re're' ru'um nok ma' re' ta pan c'olic xbanaric cho take re're', nqui ma' Lu̱' reh ma' Pele̱sto.

Chiri̱j chic ru' re' ma' Lu̱' je' wili xik'or reh ma' Acri̱pa: «Ajabe̱s k'atal k'oric ma' Acri̱pa, re' hat nacoj wach quic'uhbal take raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios, ma' je'? Nibiraj chi je' re' maj weht'alim chi til nacoj wach, nqui reh.
Re' ma' Acri̱pa je' wili xik'or reh: «Ma' Lu̱', ma̱capaj i hat chi ma' c'axic ta ti chi ench'uk nic'ux chi equinoquic chi aj niminel reh Jesus, nqui xik'or reh chi balak'il.

Chalic ma' Lu̱' je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh: «To̱b ta la' c'axic on ma' c'axic chi etoquic chi niminic, je' ta la' nak re' hat ch'i̱l take nic' nimal c'ahchi' quibirinic wi̱n eta nak je na'n tak je' nicab i hin yu'na chi hin chic aj niminel reh Jesus, re' cok ru' ma' nwa̱j ta chi na̱c'ulum tak je' ricab nic'ul i hin chi wilqui̱n pan che̱', nqui ma' Lu̱' reh ma' Acri̱pa.
Nok rik'orom chic i ma' Lu̱' re're', re' k'atal k'oric ma' Acri̱pa ch'i̱l ma' Pele̱sto ch'i̱l wo' Wereni̱se xi'uctic lok pan quitz'uka̱b ch'i̱l take xitz'uhkic cok cu̱c'

eh nok xa cutquel chic lok, je' wili p'uht quik'orom chi quibil qui̱b: «Re' winak re're' ma'xta nech' ok rimahc chi eta nak ncahnic pan che̱' chi junpech, ma' wo' chi eta nak ncansjic, nqui p'uht quik'orom.
Ar aj ru' re' ma' Acri̱pa je' wili xik'or reh ma' Pele̱sto: «Re' winak re're' til nak eriban chi enawesaj je ma' ta nak xipahkaj chi narojic chiwach kajabe̱s k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma, nqui xik'or reh.

Nok wilic chic k'i̱j rik'oric cho ma' Lu̱' chi rico'ljic ri̱b, xtik'injic wach chi re' ma' Lu̱' re' nanwihch'ilem je hin Cax, naritak'abjic je ar Ro̱ma re' wilic pa riyuk'ul Ita̱lya. Chi je' re' xk'ahsjic pan k'ab jenaj winak Ju̱lyo ribihnal, re' c'amol quibe̱h juntuhm chi sol Awu̱sto ribihnal chi naricha'jaljic cu rehtal rojic ar Ro̱ma. Naxponic i k'i̱j chi nakojic ar Ro̱ma,

chi kich'i̱l je Arista̱rco aj Tesalo̱nica re' wilic pa riyuk'ul Masero̱nya, xoj-oquic je chipam jenaj ma' laj cano̱wa re' xchalic pan tinamit Atrami̱to ribihnal eh iq'uic nak ponok reh pan tak tinamit wilque̱b chi chi̱' ha' pa riyuk'ul i A̱sya eh chipam i cano̱wa re're' xoj-elic je chipam i tinamit re're', re' Sesare̱ya ribihnal.

Cu je' chic ikal xojponic chipam jenaj tinamit Siron ribihnal. Ar chipam i tinamit re're' k'e̱' wo' chic richak'lamil xic'uhtaj i ma' Ju̱lyo reh i ma' Lu̱' maj xiyew k'ab queh take rich aj niminel wilque̱b chipam tinamit re're' chi xc'amaric je pa' bih reh cu'um take xi'o̱j k'o'ronok reh.

Naxoj-elic je chipam tinamit re're', re' ma' laj cano̱wa re' xoj-o̱j wi̱' ma' xiban ta chic canar ritikiric ju' rojic ru'um ransil take te̱w quic'ulic lok chi kawach. Ru'um aj re' ar chic chiri̱j riyuk'ul i Chi̱pire re' wilic pan yejal ha', xicot je ribe̱h chi co'lbal keh.
Chi je' re' ajic xojric'saj ponok chiwach riyuk'ul i Sili̱sya ch'i̱l i Panpi̱lya cu rehtal xojponic pan jenaj tinamit wilic pa riyuk'ul i Li̱sya, Mi̱ra ribihnal.
Ar ajic re' c'amol quibe̱h take sol naxina'bej chi jenaj ma' laj cano̱wa nchalic ar Alejantri̱ya ojic wo' reh pa riyuk'ul Ita̱lya, xojrik'ahsaj je chipam

eh chi je' re' xkatik ju' kojic nah ha' chiwach q'uih k'i̱j, xa re' la' ru' k'u̱n ti nka'n je ru'um ransil take te̱w quisolc'onic cho keh chiki̱j. Chi je' aj re', re' hoj xoj-iq'uic je chiwach i tinamit Cu̱nilo ribihnal chi xa c'axic chic nka'n eh chi c'olbal ki̱b chiwach ransil i te̱w xkacora̱' je chiwach i tinamit Salmon ribihnal re' wilic chipam i yuk'ul wilic pan yejal ha' Cre̱ta ribihnal.

Xa c'axic aj chic nka'n naxkacot ri̱j kabe̱h chiri̱j i tinamit re're' eh chi je' re' xojponic chipam i ye'a̱b “Holohic laj Ye'a̱b Kahsbal Quihk Cano̱wa” ribihnal re' wilic ma' naht ta je ru̱c' tinamit Lase̱ya ribihnal.

Naxojponic chipam ye'a̱b re're', re' hoj xa re' wo' kelic cho cu ar Sesare̱ya q'uih chic k'i̱j ka'nam lok chi ojic nah ha' eh chi je' re', re' ma' Lu̱' xicoj rehtal chi k'e̱' rinimal ti'c'axic enkac'ul je wi re' hoj cu wilco̱j nah ha' na'ic'ok lok i nink'i̱j nquicuy wi̱' quiwa' take rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi ripahkaljic cuybal quimahc. Ru'um aj re' je' wili xik'or reh aj behsenel reh ma' laj cano̱wa re're' ch'i̱l i winak re' nahsil c'amol be̱h chipam i cano̱wa re're':

«Hat-tak wasbe̱s, yu'na nik'or aweh tak chi ma' nkatik pe chic ju' kojic nah ha' maj ru̱c' riyohbalil wach i te̱w c'ahchi' ribanam ch'i̱l wo' i rinimal jab narip'utum cok rik'ijil, nirak chiri̱j chi wi xkatik ju' kojic k'e̱' ti'quilal enkilow wach. Je' aj re' ru' yohbal chi reh ma' laj cano̱wa ch'i̱l i rihk chi ensahchic wach eh yohbal wo' chi keh hoj chi ekojquimic pan ha', nqui ma' Lu̱' queh.

Re' k'oric re're', to̱b ta nchel xibiraj wo' nak i c'amol quibe̱h take sol, ma' xinimej ta maj re're' xa re' chic quik'orbal take aj behsenel reh cano̱wa riyew rajawric, ma' re' ta la' chic i xik'or ma' Lu̱'.

Je' re' ajic chiwach take k'i̱j xojwih'ic wi̱' chipam ye'a̱b re' kahsbal quihk take cano̱wa, re' take aj behsenel reh cano̱wa xquitik'a̱' wach chi nakelic je chipam i ye'a̱b wilco̱j wi̱' re're' ru'um chi queh ru' re' ye'a̱b re' ma' holohic ta laj ye'a̱b co'lbal ki̱b chiwach i te̱w. Chi je' aj re' xca'n, xkatik ju' kojic nah ha' chi pan quic'ux take kich'i̱l xa ela' wo' nchel kojponic pan jenaj chic ye'a̱b kahsbal quihk i cano̱wa, Peni̱se ribihnal re' wilic wo' pa riyuk'ul i Cre̱ta. Ar aj nak ru' c'ahchi' quicapam take kich'i̱l chi nakojic kaco'lem ki̱b chiwach take te̱w quichalic chi kawach maj xa pan tak riche̱l i Peni̱se qui'iq'uic je take te̱w qui'elic cho pa nisec'a̱j nkajic wi̱' k'i̱j ch'i̱l i qui'elic cho pa ritz'e̱t nkajic wi̱' k'i̱j.

Je' re' k'uru' nok re' take kich'i̱l xquicapaj chi xca'n nak chic canar ojic chi coric je' ricab nca̱j ru' ru'um xquilow chi xip'ut cho jenaj te̱w xa suk ti wach re' xchalic pa risec'a̱j nkajic wi̱' i k'i̱j, xkatik ju' kojic nah ha' ma' naht ta chi chi̱' riyuk'ul i Cre̱ta

xa re' la' ru', nok junc'am chic kabehic je chi suk, xchalic pe' jenaj ma' laj te̱w Ewrocliron ribihnal re' yohbal wach naxucsaj take ribohl ha' cu rehtal xa rik'ojlom chic ri̱b chiwach ma' laj cano̱wa wilco̱j wi̱'.

Ru'um aj ransil i te̱w re're', re' ma' laj cano̱wa wilco̱j wi̱' xc'amaric cok cu pa richamil ha'. Je' aj re' k'uru' nok ma' xkacuy ta chic ransil i te̱w, ma' xkaniq'uej ta chic kak'i̱j chi xojsoljic wo' chic lok chi chi̱' ha', xkacana̱' la' ki̱b chi re' te̱w xojric'am je

cu rehtal xojponic chiwach jenaj chic t'uch ye'a̱b wilic pan yejal ha' Cala̱wra ribihnal re' xkaco'lej wi̱' ki̱b chiwach take te̱w. Ar aj chic ponok, re' take quicamanic chipam ma' laj cano̱wa re're' xa c'axic chic naxquikerej je t'uch cano̱wa kirimaj ru'um ma' laj cano̱wa

chi rijohsjic johtok chipam ma' laj cano̱wa re're' eh xa c'axic wo' chic naxquitumej pa̱m chi la̱sa i ma' laj cano̱wa re're'. Chiri̱j i wili ru'um reh quiyo'jic chi enkacora̱' chipam i ye'a̱b ma'xta wi̱' richamil i ha' Si̱rte ribihnal, re' tz'ih rik'oj wi̱' ri̱b i te̱w xquikahsaj cho reh chi re' ma' laj kacano̱wa naric'amaric je ru'um take ribohl i ha'

re' xa cuc' tak nak chic ma' nquisolq'uij i cano̱wa nanponic quik'oj qui̱b chiwach ru̱c' ansil. Chiri̱j re're' nok ka'nam chic lok jenaj k'i̱j chi je' re' ojic nka'n, re' take quicamanic chipam ma' laj cano̱wa p'uht quicutum take jok ju'jun ihk pan ha' maj pan yohbal nak chic wilco̱j chi ekojbut'lujic jok pan ha' ru'um rahlil rihk i ma' laj cano̱wa re're'.
Pa ro̱x chic k'i̱j, re' aj chic take camanbal ma' ajwal ta quiwach chipam ma' laj cano̱wa p'uht kacutum jok pan ha'.

Ar ajic ru', chipam i yohbal wilco̱j wi̱' re're' ru'um take ribohl i ha', re' hoj re' wilco̱j pan ma' laj cano̱wa ma' keht'alim ta chic haj c'ahchi' kojic lok ru'um chi ma' xkilow ta wach i k'i̱j, ma' wo' re' take ch'imi̱l chiwach q'uih k'i̱j. Chi je' aj re' i c'axquilal wilco̱j wi̱', xkacapaj chi ma'xta nak chic bih narico'lonic keh chiwach i quimic.

Ar ajic nok wilco̱j chipam i yohbal re're', re' ma' Lu̱' xipahba̱' johtok ri̱b chi kaxilac i hoj re' ma' hoj ta chic wa'anak eh je' wili xik'or keh: «Hat-tak wasbe̱s nicha̱k', xanimej ta nak tak nik'orbal chi ma' xkacana̱' ta nak cho i pe̱t ye'a̱b xkarak chi chi̱' riyuk'ul i Cre̱ta, suk nak wilco̱j cho ar yu'na chi ma' c'ahchi' ta nak kac'ulum i ti' wili eh ma' c'ahchi' ta wo' nak rojic chi k'e̱b take rihk ma' laj cano̱wa wili.
Raj yu'na to̱b ta nchel awu'um aweh tak c'ahchi' kac'ulum wili, chacowej ac'ux tak ru'um nok to̱b ta sahchok wach i ma' laj cano̱wa wili ma' hab ta wach keh nariquimic.
Je' re' nik'or maj chiwach ak'ab wili re' Dios re' nilok'ej wach, jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch xic'uhtaj ri̱b wi̱n i hin re' raj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios re're'

eh je' wili xik'or wi̱n: ‹Ma' Lu̱', re' hat curman chi na̱wojic pa'lajok chiwach k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma. Ru'um aj re' ma' tiyo'jic chiwach i ti'c'axic wili maj ma' eta tiquimic. Yu'na k'uru', chacoj rehtal i wili: Re' Dios xic'u'lej cho na̱ apahkanic chi re' take qui'ihch'ilinic aweh chi ojic ar Ro̱ma naquico'lem wo' qui̱b awich'i̱l chiwach i ti'c'axic c'ahchi' ac'ulum tak wili, nqui wi̱n.
«Je' re' k'uru' chacowej ac'ux hat-tak ru'um nok re' Dios re' nich'ica̱' wi̱' nic'ux chi naribanam je' ricab xk'ormojic wi̱n, re're' naco̱j rico'lem chiwach ti'c'axic wili.
Re' cok ru' curman chi nakarakam jeno' ye'a̱b wilic pan yejal ha' eh chi je' re' ekoj-elic lok cu chi chi̱' chi muhx reh chi enkaco'lej ki̱b, nqui ma' Lu̱'.

Ru̱c' take k'oric xik'or ma' Lu̱', chi'nchel i hoj xcowjic wo' chic kac'ux. Chiri̱j chic re' naxponic i tic'lic ak'ab reh ricajlaj k'i̱j kelic cho cu pa riyuk'ul Cre̱ta, re' take quicamanic chipam i ma' laj cano̱wa re' c'ahchi' rik'ahxic je chipam i ha' Atriya̱tico ribihnal xquicapaj chi je' wilco̱j chic lok ma' naht ta chi chi̱' jeno' ye'a̱b.

Chi je' re' ru', p'uht quipajam nic' chamil pa̱m i ha' ilbal reh nic' chic nahtil wilic lok chi̱' ac'al. Nok quilom chic chi cu juninak ja̱ chic richamil pa̱m i ha' wilco̱j wi̱', cu xojbehic wo' chic je so' naxkapaj wo' chi richamil pa̱m i ha' re're'. Ar aj ru' naxquilow chi xa chic ho'lajuj ja̱ richamil pa̱m,

re' take quicamanic chipam ma' laj cano̱wa k'e̱' naxoquic cho quiyo'jic chi eno̱j katuhyaj ki̱b chiwach jeno' ma' laj abaj maj re' take ribohl ha' xa ma' ximay ta wo' kac'amaric lok chi chi̱' ha', to̱b ta xicuturic nak chic jok pan ha' take quejeb chi nimak tak ahl laj ch'ihch' wilque̱b chiri̱j ma' laj cano̱wa re' quicamanic chi pah'ab-bal reh cano̱wa. Ar ajic re' take quicamanic chipam ma' laj cano̱wa xquicapaj chi ma'xta nak chic ripah'ic i ma' laj cano̱wa. Je' re' ajic chi xa yo'jic chic wilque̱b wi̱', xiban chi xa ji̱k' chic pan quic'ux chi nsak'ic ta nak ti lok ilbal nak reh haj enquic'am lok i ma' laj cano̱wa reh chi ma' eta rituhyaj ri̱b chiwach take abaj.

Ru'um aj reh xquicapaj, re' take aj camanom re're' xquitik'a̱' wach chi xa pan c'olic nak naquelic je chipam jenaj t'uch cano̱wa wilic chiri̱j i ma' laj cano̱wa. Chi je' aj re', re' riwi̱' nak i elic naca'nam je xa je' wo' nak ti chic re' take ahl laj ch'ihch' pixilque̱b chiri̱j ma' laj cano̱wa nacojic quilom chi queh. Ar ajic nok je' chic re' tiklic wach cu'um take aj camanom re're'

re' ma' Lu̱' je' wili xik'or reh c'amol quibe̱h take sol ch'i̱l take riso̱l: «Wi re' take quicamanic chipam i cano̱wa wili equi'elic je, til nakaquimic chi kunchelal i hoj re' ekojcahnic ayu', nqui xik'or queh.
Xa re' wo' xibiraj chi je' re' i c'amol quibe̱h take sol, xik'or queh riso̱l chi xquiyoc' je c'aham bac'lic wi̱' t'uch cano̱wa eh chi je' re' xc'amaric je ru'um ribohl ha'.

Chiri̱j chic ru' na xilow i ma' Lu̱' chi xoquic wo' chic cho quiyo'jic chi'nchel take c'acharel wilque̱b pan cano̱wa chi til narisahchic quiwach eh ru'um re're' ma' c'ahchi' ta chic ca'nam quiwa' quiha̱' chi suk, je' wili xik'or queh nok c'ahchi' chic roquic cho sak'ic: «Re' hat-tak cajlaj chic cho k'i̱j ap'utum tak cuyuj wiric eh ma' abanam ta wo' awa' aha̱' tak chi suk.

Ru'um aj re' til nipahkaj aweh tak yu'na chi cha'n awa' aha̱' tak chi suk ru'um nok curman chi nariwih'ic awansil tak chi muhx chi elic lok cu chi chi̱' jeno' ye'a̱b. Nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chi ma' tiyo'jic tak maj ma' hab ta wach keh nariquimic chipam i c'axic wilco̱j wi̱' wili, nqui queh.
Nok rik'orom chic re're', re' ma' Lu̱' xichop johtok riwa' riha̱' eh xitioxej johtok reh i Dios. Nok rich'akam chic yejal, p'uht ric'uxum chi quiwach chi'nchel take wilque̱b ar.
Xichalic take re', xquicowsaj wo' chic quic'ux ru'um k'oric xik'or ma' Lu̱' eh xi'oquic chi wi'c chi cunchelal. Re' take winak re're'
nponic waklaj ricajlaj c'ahl (276) q'uihal take chi wilco̱j wo' cok pa riman i hoj.
Nok chi kunchelal i hoj ka'nam chic kawa' kaha̱' chi suk, xoj-oquic chi ricuturic jok pan ha' take birin wilic wi̱' ixi̱m reh chi narich'akic so' wach rahlil rihk i ma' laj cano̱wa re're'.

Chiri̱j ru' naxsak'ic lok, xkilow je wach jenaj ye'a̱b ma' keht'alim ta ribihnal xa re' la' ru' xkilow je chi chi̱' i ye'a̱b re're' wilic lok nech' rocbal cok i ha'. Naxkilow chi je' re', xkatik'a̱' wach chi nakesam lok ar i ma' laj cano̱wa wi la' xka'n lok canar resmejic cu ar.

Je' re' ajic nok quiyoc'om chic jok ric'ahamil take i ahl laj ch'ihch' wilque̱b jok pan ha', re' take quicamanic chipam ma' laj cano̱wa xquichej i la̱sa pixlic wi̱' behsbal reh ma' laj cano̱wa. Chiri̱j chic ru' nok quijohsam chic i t'uch tz'ih ncojoric chiwach cano̱wa re' rik'oj wi̱' ri̱b i te̱w, xi'oquic je chi ribehsjic i ma' laj cano̱wa cu chi chi̱' lok i ye'a̱b re're'

xa re' la' ma' xojponic ta lok cu chi chi̱' maj re' ma' laj cano̱wa naxponic rik'oj pan ju' chiwach i juntuhy chi abaj wilic pan ha', ma' cu ta chic xc'uyu'jic so' p'uht la' ritokic cho pa riyejal ru'um ransil take ribohl ha' nc'ulic quik'oj qui̱b chiwach.
Nok je' re' xc'uluric, re' take sol xquitik'a̱' wach chi quiwach chi naquicansam nic' nimal take tz'ahpel reh chi ma' eta qui'elic je chi muhx

xa re' la' re' c'amol quibe̱h, ru'um chi raj rico'lem ri̱j ric'acharic i ma' Lu̱', ma' xiyew ta k'ab queh chi naca'nam chi je' re'. Je' re' ajic re' c'amol quibe̱h take sol xitak'a̱' rik'ormojic chi nic' pa' nimal take tz'ahpel quichol muhx quicut je qui̱b chi pe̱t pan ha' reh chi naquelic lok chi chi̱' ye'a̱b re're' chi co'lbal qui̱b.

Je' aj re' ru' ma' xa ta re' take nic' q'uihal quichol muhx xquico'lej ri̱j quic'acharic naxi'elic lok chi chi̱' ye'a̱b re're', je' la' wo' take xi'elic lok xa nah tak ritz'ilomil ma' laj cano̱wa, on china̱ xa pa' chic jaric ncamanic chipam.

Nok kaco'lem chic lok ki̱b chipam ye'a̱b re're', cu re' aj chic ru' keht'alij chi re' ye'a̱b wilic pan yejal ha' re're' Ma̱lta po' ribihnal. Re' take patanel xkarak take ar re're' xik'oric keh chi je' re' bihnal.
Re' take c'acharel re're' xojquic'ul wo' chi suk quic'ux je' wo' k'e̱' xojquic'ax maj xquic'ula̱' i k'a̱k' reh chi naka'nam kak'ixinic ru'um nok yohbal wach jab ch'i̱l c'uxic c'ahchi' ribanam.

Ar ajic nok re' ma' Lu̱' xo̱j rimol junk'ahl chi xiq'uey eh nok c'ahchi' riyeb cok pan k'a̱k', xelic cho jenaj a̱k' xilac tak si̱' ru'um ritz'a'quilal i k'a̱k' eh chi je' re' xichohpaj cho ri̱b chi k'ab ma' Lu̱'.

Naxquilow take aj Ma̱lta chi re' a̱k' t'uylic chic chi k'ab ma' Lu̱', je' wili p'uht quik'orom chi quiwach: «Re' winak wili til je' ru̱c' aj cansanel ras richa̱k', maj to̱b ta nak xico'lej cho ri̱b chi ma'xta nquimic pan ha', re' pe' chic i a̱k' naricansanic reh yu'na. Je' re' k'uru' re' rimahc i winak wili ma' iq'ue̱l ta wach na̱, nqui take chi quiwach.

Chi je' aj re' ru', re' take re' c'ahchi' cuy'em chi nariquimic nak i ma' Lu̱', chaj nawa̱j reh ru' ma' je' ta re' xc'uluric ru̱c', re' la' chic i xiban ru' xikerej lok i a̱k' chi k'ab eh xicut jok pan k'a̱k'!

Naxquilow chi ma'xta bih xic'ul i ma' Lu̱' chiwach i junc'am re're', re' take aj Ma̱lta xa cu c'ahchi' wo' cuy'em nic' o̱ra ensipjic cho rik'ab ma' Lu̱', on nic' o̱ra enoquic cho riquimic, xa re' la' naxquilow chi q'uih chic o̱ra xiq'uic lok eh ma'xta bih c'ahchi' ric'ulum i ma' Lu̱' je' chic wili p'uht quik'orom: «Re' c'acharel wili jenaj po' dios winak riwi̱', nqui p'uht quik'orom.

Nok xib chic k'i̱j hoj wih'inak ar Ma̱lta, re' c'amol be̱h chipam i ye'a̱b re're', re' Puwli̱yo ribihnal re' q'uih take rac'a̱l wilic ar, re're' xa suk chic xojric'ul chi xa xiyew chic kawarbal ch'i̱l kawa' kaha̱' chiwach take k'i̱j re're'.

Chiwach take k'i̱j nok wilco̱j ar, tz'eht re' raja̱w xriplijic wach yoca̱b ru'um jenaj tz'a' xchalic chiri̱j ch'i̱l wo' jenaj quic' pamis xchalic chi pa̱m. Naxibiraj i ma' Lu̱', xo̱j rik'o'rej eh nok wilic chic ponok ru̱c', xicoj rik'ab china̱ eh xo̱c chi ti̱j chiri̱j. Chiwach i junc'am re're', re' raja̱w ma' Puwli̱yo xiq'uic je riya'bilal.
Naxelic lok i ribiral re're', q'uihal take yowa'i̱b chipam i ye'a̱b re're' xic'amaric cho ru̱c' ma' Lu̱' eh xicahnic chi suk naxesaj lok quiya'bilal.

Ru'um xiban i ma' Lu̱', re' take aj Ma̱lta k'e̱' xojquic'ax chi xquisi̱j pa' bih keh chiwach take k'i̱j xojwih'ic ar. Je' wo', xquiyew je pa' bih ajwal wach keh reh nah kabe̱h nah ha' naxojcojoric je chipam jenaj chic ma' laj cano̱wa

cahnanak chipam i ye'a̱b re're' chi ric'sjic i k'elej naxc'ulic lok reh tinamit Alejantri̱ya ribihnal. Nok xib chic poh hoj wih'inak ar Ma̱lta, re' hoj xkatik ju' kojic nah ha' chipam ma' laj cano̱wa re' xkachop chi chi̱' i ye'a̱b re're'. Re' cano̱wa re're' wilic wo' chi rehtalil i quijalwachil qui̱b chi tiyo̱x Ca̱stor ch'i̱l Po̱lux quibihnal.
Nok hoj chic oconak je chipam i cano̱wa re're' xojponic chipam jenaj ye'a̱b quihi'lic wi̱' take cano̱wa Siracu̱sa ribihnal re' xojcahnic wo' wi̱' xib k'i̱j.

Chiri̱j chic ru', nok iq'uinak chic i xib k'i̱j re're', re' ma' laj cano̱wa xbehsjic je ma' naht ta chi chi̱' lok ac'al eh chi je' re' xojponic chipam jenaj toco̱m chic ye'a̱b kahsbal quihk take cano̱wa, Re̱jyo ribihnal. Ar chipam i ye'a̱b re're' xka'n jenaj ak'ab eh chiri̱j chic ru' xoj-elic wo' chic je naxchalic jenaj te̱w xchalic pa risec'a̱j nkajic wi̱' k'i̱j. Chiri̱j chic ru' nok ricab chic k'i̱j kelic cho ar Siracu̱sa xojponic pan tinamit Potyo̱li ribihnal.

Ar xojcahnic wuku̱b k'i̱j ru'um nok re' take aj niminel xkarak take ar xiban xa nch'uk chic quic'ux chi ripahkaljic keh chi xojcahnic ar. Ka'nam chic wuku̱b k'i̱j ar, chiri̱j ru' xkachop aj je behic chi ko̱k reh kojic pan tinamit Ro̱ma.

«Chipam je kabehic re're', re' take aj niminel quic'acharic ar Ro̱ma xojc'ulic quic'ul pan be̱h eh ru̱c' re're' xcowsjic ric'ux i ma' Lu̱' ru'um i Dios. Ru̱c' xca'n take aj niminel re're', re' ma' Lu̱' xitioxej johtok i Dios. Je' re' riban maj chi quixilac take aj niminel re' xibirinic reh chi nakaponic i hoj, wilic take xojc'ulic quic'ul cu chipam take tinamit je' wili quibihnal: “Re' C'aybal wilic pa ribe̱h A̱pyo” ch'i̱l i “Xib C'aybal”.

Nok ar chic wilco̱j ponok pan tinamit Ro̱ma, re' c'amol quibe̱h take sol xc'ambic cho queh take tz'ahpel xik'ahsaj take pan k'ab i nahsil aj cha'jem tz'ahpel wilic pan tinamit re're'. Chi k'ahsamaj chic ma' Lu̱' pan k'ab, re' nahsil re're' xiyew k'ab reh chi xwih'ic pan jenaj toco̱m pa̱t, xa re' la' ru' cu xicoj jenaj sol aj cha'jem reh.

Chi je' aj re', re' ma' Lu̱' nok xib chic k'i̱j riponic ar Ro̱ma xitak'a̱' je quic'amaric take nahsil ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh je' wili xik'or queh: «Was tak nicha̱k', re' hin to̱b ta nak ma'xta bih jeno' mahc xniban chi quiwach take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel on chiwach take c'uhbal hoj tijimaj wi̱' cu'um take cho kama̱m kati't, wilic take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xinquik'ahsaj ar Jerusalen pan quik'ab take sol aj Ro̱ma re' xicojbic wi̱n pan che̱'.

Re' cok ru' re' take nimak cajawric aj Ro̱ma wilque̱b ar Jerusalen nok ca'nam chic i pech'oj wi̱n chi coric, xca̱j nak quincok'tam je ru'um chi ma' xquirak ta jeno' mahc chiwi̱j je' ru̱c' quimic ta nak ri̱j

xa re' la' naxquik'ihtaj qui̱b take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re're' chi ma'xta wok'tjic je, ma' xincok'taj ta chic je xink'ahsjic la' wo' nak chic pan quik'ab chi naquich'ukum i k'oric chi nina̱. Ru'um aj reh re' til tok'lic xnipahkaj rich'ukuric k'oric chi nina̱ chiwach i k'atal k'oric ayu', ma' ru'um ta nchel chi nwa̱j ta nak nitz'akam jeno' mahc chiqui̱j take kich katinami̱t re're'.

Je' re' nok re' hin xa je' na nchel hin jeno' tz'ahpel naxinc'amaric cho chiwach i k'atal k'oric ayu' xa ru'um ti ru' chi nicoj wach chi coric i ch'iclic wi̱' kac'ux i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi re' take camnak naquic'acharic wo' chic cho. Je' aj re' ru', chi ma' tehlic ta wi̱j yu'na re' hin xnitak'a̱' je ayuk'unjic tak reh chi nanik'orom aweh tak i ch'iclic wi̱' kac'ux re're'. Xa re' cok ru' nanik'orom wo' aweh tak nic' wach rich'iquinjic quic'ux nca'n take quiniminic reh Jesus, nqui ma' Lu̱'.

Naxquibiraj re're' take quimolom qui̱b ru̱c' ma' Lu̱' je' wili xquik'or reh: «Re' hoj ma' kac'ulum ta jeno' hu̱j nk'oric chawi̱j je' ru̱c' quitak'a̱b ta nak cho keh kas kacha̱k' wilque̱b ar Jure̱ya. Je' wo', xa ta nak c'ulunak jeno' queh chi rik'ormojic keh chi re' hat c'ahbilal ta nak c'ahchi'ca̱t chi quixilac.

Chi je' aj re' ma' ru'um ta re're' xojc'ulic awu̱c' ru'um la' nka̱j kabiram ru̱c' achi̱' re' nacapaj chiri̱j i toco̱m chic niminic xak'or re're' maj re' take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilque̱b xa haj ye'a̱b xa re' wo' c'ahbil laj k'oric nkabiraj chi nca'n chiqui̱j take wilque̱b pan niminic re're', nqui take reh.

Junpech naxquipahba̱' jenaj k'i̱j chi naquimolom qui̱b take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ru̱c' ma' Lu̱', yohbal wach q'uihal xquimol qui̱b chipam i pa̱t wilic wi̱' ma' Lu̱'. Ar ajic re' ma' Lu̱' xa re' wo' xip'ut wahk'ek cu rehtal xoquic i k'i̱j, xik'or queh tijbal chiri̱j rajawric i Dios chi K'atal K'oric. Ma' xa ta re' risakomsjic wach i tijbal re're' xiban, xik'or la' wo' i k'oro̱j cho chipam take hu̱j wilic wi̱' i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, je' wo' chipam take hu̱j wilic wi̱' i c'uhbal xquik'or take raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios. Je' aj re' ru', re' ma' Lu̱' til xiyew ric'ux chi c'uhbalanic reh chi re' take c'ahchi' quibirinic reh ench'uk quic'ux eh enquicoj wach chi coric chi re' i Jesus re' i K'atal K'oric k'oro̱j cho ribiral najtir k'i̱j.
Ru̱c' aj c'uhbalanic xiban ma' Lu̱' re're', wilic take xquinimej i c'uhbal xik'or eh wilic wo' take ma'xta nca̱j niminic.

Nok re' take ma' xca̱j ta niminic naquich'akam nak chic je qui̱b cu̱c' take quich'i̱l re' jalic chic wach quino'jbal, re' ma' Lu̱' je' wili xik'or queh: «Naxk'oric i Lok' laj Uxlabal cu̱c' take kama̱m kati't ru̱c' chi̱' i raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios Isayi̱yas ribihnal, riwi̱' po' nchel chi reh naxik'or chi je' wili:

“Re' Dios rik'or chi je' wili: ‘Hiy cu̱c' nitinami̱t eh chak'or queh chi re' take niC'uhbal xa naquibiram wo' xa re' la' ma'xta chic quirakam chiri̱j; xa naric'uhtjic wo' take lok' laj nawa̱l chi quiwach, xa re' la' ma'xta chic quilom ricorquil

ru'um nok re' take re' xquicowsaj chic i ca̱mna. Je' wo' xquicupsaj qui̱b eh xquisot'saj wo' qui̱b chipam quino'jbal. Ru'um chi je' re' xca'n, re' hin ma'xta chic nito'bem take maj re' take re' ru'um chi ma' quinquisic' ta chic, naquicahnic chi cup nah chic take je' wo' chi sot' wach chic take chipam quino'jbal. Chi je' aj re' ma'xta chic quirakam chiri̱j nic'uhbal ru̱c' chi'nchel i ca̱mna, nqui Dios, nqui Lok' laj Uxlabal.

«Chi c'ahchi' aj rojic elok wach awu̱c' tak i xik'or cho Lok' laj Uxlabal, re' hat-tak k'uru' chaweht'alij tak chi cu̱c' chic take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel c'ahchi'qui̱n ritak'a̱b je Dios chi rik'ormojic i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i co'lbal i̱b riyew ru'. Cu̱c' nanibanam chi je' re' maj re' take re' til naquibiram i c'uhbal nanik'orom queh, nqui ma' Lu̱' queh.
Chi xquibiraj chic i xik'or i ma' Lu̱' queh re're', re' take rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xi'o̱j chi xa quiwolem chic qui̱b chiri̱j take k'oric xik'or ma' Lu̱'.

Je' aj re' ru', re' ma' Lu̱' cu xcahnic chic quib ha̱b ar Ro̱ma chipam jenaj quimel pa̱t re' ncha'jaljic wi̱' eh chi je' re' nic' pa' q'uihal take c'acharel qui'o̱j c'olok ru̱c' chi rik'o'rjic, xic'ul take pan sukquil c'uxlis.

Je' wo', ru'um chi xye'eric k'ab reh chi c'uhbalanic ar, re' ma' Lu̱' chi ma' nyo'jic ta nech' ok, xisakomej wo' wach queh i tijbal nk'oric chiri̱j rajawric i Dios chi K'atal K'oric eh je' wo' xik'or queh chi re' Jesus til re're' Ajabe̱s Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Re' hin ma' Lu̱' c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je i hu̱j wili. Re' hin nwa̱j nik'orom je aweh tak take k'oric wili chiwi̱j: Re' hin, hin pahbamaj chi aj k'oro̱l, banol reh camanic xiritak'a̱' wi̱' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' wo', nik'or wo' aweh tak chi re' Dios xchihbic wi̱n chi nanik'orom take holohic laj k'oric nchalic ru̱c' eh je' wo' chi re' wo' re' xk'oric wi̱n chi je' wili: «Quim hat Lu̱', re' hat naca̱t nipahba̱b chi hat waj k'oro̱l C'uhbal, nqui wi̱n.

Chiri̱j chi nik'orom chic lok re're', nanik'orom take holohic laj k'oric wili re' chalanak ru̱c' i Dios: Chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios rik'or chi re're' xiyew cho rik'ormojic queh take raj k'orol C'uhbal tak'amaj take cho ru'um chi wilic take holonquilal naribanam

eh chi je' re', re' hoj keht'alim chi re' take holohic laj k'oric re're' nk'oric chiri̱j i rAc'u̱n i Dios re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, Jesus ribihnal. Chiri̱j i Jesus re're' keht'alim i wili: Chi re're' naxc'acharic ayu' wach ac'al ar chalanak rija'quil ru̱c' i k'atal k'oric aj najtir k'i̱j ma' Tawiy.

Je' wo' keht'alim chi re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios je' wili rik'or chiri̱j i Jesus: «Re' rAc'u̱n i Dios wilic rajawric, nqui rik'or. Ru̱c' i rucsjic cho chi quixilac take camnak chi xc'acharic wo' chic, re're' nc'uhtunic keh hoj chi re' Jesus til wilic rajawric.

Ru'um aj chi re' Jesus wilic rajawric, re're' xiban chi xnic'ul ru̱c' i Dios i ato'bil wili: Chi re're' xiripahba̱' chi raj k'oro̱l eh chi ru̱c' nicamaj niban re' ok i Jesus chic'ul rilok'il. Nok nic'ulum aj chic i ato'bil re're', niban nicamaj re're' reh chi xa pa' tinamit wilque̱b wi̱' take c'acharel je' ru̱c' enquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus, ewo' nquinimej.

Re' hat-tak aj niminel je' ru̱c' tic'acharic tak ar Ro̱ma, wilca̱t wo' tak pa riman quich'i̱l take je' re' nca'n maj re' hat-tak k'oro̱j chic aweh tak chi je' wili ru'um i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric: «Quim tak wu̱c' eh re' hin etinicoj tak chi waj tahkanel, nqui k'oro̱j cho aweh tak.

Aweh hat-tak re' tic'acharic tak ar Ro̱ma nitz'ihmbaj je i hu̱j wili eh ayu' tinic'alenej tak je hat-tak re' k'e̱' ti' tiric'raj tak i Dios eh xatriyuk'ej tak chi ribanaric chi hat-tak chic lok' laj ritinami̱t. Je' aj wili ac'alenjic tak niban je k'uru': Re' ta nak rato'bil eh je' wo' i sukquil c'uxlis riyew cho kAja̱w Dios ch'i̱l i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' ta nak re' wih'ok pan ac'acharic tak.

Ru̱c' i pe̱t k'oric nwa̱j nitok'a̱b wi̱' nihu̱j wili, nwa̱j nik'orom chi awu'um aweh hat-tak wilic tioxonic pan wa̱mna naniban johtok niti̱j eh re' nbanic chi quintioxonic johtok chiwach i Dios re' nilok'ej wach, re' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' re' niban maj xa haj tinamit nelic lok abiral tak, nk'ormojic chiri̱j nic' wach rich'iquinjic ac'ux na'n tak chiri̱j i Jesus.

Chipam take ti̱j niban, re' hin xa quink'oric wo' chawi̱j hat-tak. Re' ok Dios k'orok aweh tak chi til je' re' niban maj re're' quirilow cho ru̱c' chi'nchel chaj bih niban ru'um nok wilic cho chi Ajabe̱s reh camanic niban ru̱c' chi'nchel i wa̱mna. Re' camanic niban re're', re' i rik'ormojic ribiral i Ac'unbe̱s ru̱c' take k'oric nye'bic sukquil c'uxlis queh c'acharel quic'ulbic reh.

Je' re' ajic ma' xa ta re' chawi̱j tak quink'oric naniban niti̱j je' la' wo' nipahkaj reh Dios wi la' je' re' ra̱j ru', chiyew ta nak k'ab wi̱n chi equino̱j awu̱c' tak pan jeno' k'i̱j chi nawojic tak ca̱t wic'ram cho.

Je' re' nipahkaj reh maj til nwa̱j wilom awach tak eh nok wilqui̱n ok chic chaxilac tak nwa̱j chi je' ricab nok nk'ahsjic jeno' si̱ reh jeno' hab wach je' wo' re' nye'eric aweh hat-tak take no'jbal to'bal aweh tak ru'um i Lok laj rUxlabal i Dios reh chi je' re' cow enatik tak ju' rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus.

Je' aj re' k'uru' wi re' Dios xiyew k'ab wi̱n chi nawojic awu̱c' ra̱j rik'orom ma' xa re' ta hat-tak riman chic enach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus je' la' wo' re' eniban i hin. Ru̱c' re're' ewo' nwih'ic sukquil c'uxlis pan ka̱mna.

Nwa̱j chi na̱na'bem hat-tak was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel chi re' hin k'e̱' nwa̱j cho ojic awu̱c' tak eh q'uih pech quincapewenic chiri̱j re're', xa re' la' cu yu'na chi k'i̱j ma' nibanam ta canar i ojic ru'um chi nk'eteric pa̱m nibe̱h chi ribanjic re're'. Re' hin k'e̱' nak nwa̱j ojic awu̱c' tak ru'um nok nwa̱j nito'bem take c'acharel chaxilac tak je' ru̱c' ma' ja' nquich'ica̱' ta quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus reh chi ewo' nquich'ica̱' ta quic'ux chiri̱j. Je' re' to'bonic nwa̱j nibanam je' ricab wo' niban nok wilqui̱n pan toco̱m chic tinamit re' quic'acharic wo' wi̱' take junleh chic ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil take cho ma' Israhel

ru'um nok re' hin cu̱c' chi'nchel c'acharel niban rik'ormojic ribiral i Jesus, ma' k'orel ta haj wilic i k'oric quik'oric wi̱' wi nchel pan k'oric criye̱co on pan toco̱m chic k'oric on to̱b ta wo' haj wilic riwi̱' i no'jbal nquic'am na̱ pan quic'acharic, wi nchel aj no'jbal take on ma' re' aj no'jbal take. Chi'nchel aj eh nik'or ribiral i Jesus ru'um nok je' ricab chi wilic ta nak jeno' nic'a̱s re' curman chi wi̱n chi nanitojom lok, je' wo' re' curman chi wi̱n chi nanik'orom i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus.
Ru'um aj re', re' hin k'e̱' nwa̱j ojic awu̱c' hat-tak re' tic'acharic tak ar Ro̱ma reh chi enik'or chaxilac tak take k'oric nye'bic sukquil c'uxlis queh c'acharel quic'ulbic reh.

Re' hin xa quink'oric wo' chiri̱j take k'oric re're' chi ma' quinq'uix'ic ta so' eh je' re' niban maj re' take k'oric re're', re' xquibiraj chi pe̱t be̱h take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh chiri̱j chic ru' xquibiraj wo' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' wo' re' nc'uhtunic wi̱' chi re' Dios wilic rajawric chi rico'ljic xa hab pa' wach ncojbic wach rik'orbal.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' take k'oric re're' nquiyew wo' chi eht'aljic i wili chiri̱j chaj bih riban i Dios: Chi re' take c'acharel nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus, quicahnic chi coric chic wach quic'ux. Re' xnik'or lok re're' no̱j elok wach chi til coric ru̱c' i tz'ihmbimaj cahnok ru'um jenaj raj k'oro̱l i Dios chi je' wili: «Re' c'acharel re' pahbamaj ru'um i Dios chi coric wach rino'jbal chi junelic k'i̱j sakom naric'acharic ru'um nok xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios, nqui xitz'ihmbaj cho.

Queh take c'acharel je' ru̱c' c'ahbilal nca'n eh ma' coric ta wach quino'jbal, re' Dios riyeb cho chi eht'aljic cu ar pan taxa̱j chi ma' suk ta rilow cho re're' eh ru'um re' riyew cho ti'c'axic chi quina̱. Re' take c'acharel je' re' quiwi̱' ma' nquicana̱' ta wo' chi toco̱m c'acharel nquicoj wach i coric laj tijinic chiri̱j i Dios

eh je' re' nca'n to̱b ta re' Dios xiyew chic queh chi xquina'bej wo' chi ma' suk ta rilow take c'acharel re' c'ahbilal nca'n. Ru'um aj re' nik'or chi re' take c'acharel re're' quina'bem chic i chaj bih eht'alamaj chiri̱j i Dios.

Je' re' nik'or maj nanquilow i nic' pa' nimal tik'imaj ru'um i Dios ayu' wach ac'al, to̱b ta ma' nquilow ta wo' wach i Dios take ru', nquilow i xitik'a̱' eh ru̱c' re're' nquirak chiri̱j chi manlic chi re' wo' Dios xtik'inic reh chi'nchel wilic ayu' wach ac'al. Ma' xa re' ta re', nquirak la' wo' chiri̱j chi re're' xa wilic wo' rajawric. Ru'um aj chi nquirak chiri̱j re're', ma' eta riban chi enquik'or chi re' Dios ma' xiyew ta queh chi nabjic i ribiral ru'.

To̱b ta quina'bem chiri̱j i til manlic Dios, ma' xquilok'ej ta wo' wach eh ma' xquitioxej ta wo' johtok nanquic'ul i ricuse'sbal. Chi jelow-bal la' re', re' chic i wili nca'n: Nquiyew quicapew-bal chi ritijiljic ri̱j take tijinic je' ru̱c' ma' ncamanic ta queh chi naquina'bem ribiral i Dios eh chi je' re' ma' nquirak ta chic chiri̱j re' xquina'bej nak ti chiri̱j i Dios. Je' re' k'uru' re' take c'acharel re're' ma' sakom ta chic pa̱m quino'jbal.
To̱b ta nak nca'n qui̱b chi xa wilic chic quino'jbal, xa ric'uhtjic la' wo' lok qui̱b nca'n chi ma'xta so' quino'jbal.

Ru'um aj re', re' take c'acharel re're' quimay i lok'onic nca'n nak reh i Dios re' c'achlic chi junelic eh re' chic take tiyo̱x nquilok'ej wach je' ricab quica'yic chicop quirupunic wa taxa̱j, on je' ricab quica'yic chicop quibehic, on je' ricab quica'yic chicop je' ru̱c' nquijuquej qui̱b wach ac'al na quibehic, on je' ricab wo' take je' kojca'yic i hoj c'acharel re' quimic ki̱j.

Je' re' nok ru'um chi xquimay rilok'onjic wach i Dios, re're' ma' ximin ta chic ri̱b ru̱c' quino'jbal nok xa ncotowej chic ribanaric i mahc ru̱c' chi'nchel i ca̱mna eh chi je' re' quicapew-bal, re' chic i nim laj q'uixbilal nca'n ribanaric chi quixilac.

Je' aj re' nca'n chi'nchel take c'acharel re're' ru'um nok nquilok'ej wach take quitiyo̱x re' nc'uhtunic lok reh haj wilic take ritik'inic i Dios. Tz'a̱b ru' i Dios re' nkak'or johtok pan kati̱j i hoj chi ye'o̱j rilok'il chi junelic k'i̱j sakom, ma' nquilok'ej ta chic wach to̱b ta nak re're' xtik'inic reh na̱ ac'al ch'i̱l take c'acharel, ch'i̱l wo' take chicop wilque̱b chiwach. Chi re' aj chic take tiyo̱x nquilok'ej take c'acharel re're', ma' re' ta chic i coric laj rilok'onjic i Dios nca'n, re' la' chic i ma' coric ta laj lok'onic ru̱c' take tiyo̱x.

Ru'um aj re', re' Dios ma' ximin ta chic ri̱b ru̱c' quino'jbal eh chi je' re' xquiyew wo' quic'ux chiri̱j i c'ahbilal re' nca'n ru̱c' chi'nchel i ca̱mna cu̱c' take toco̱m chic c'acharel to̱b ta nchel q'uixbilal ric'am cho chi quina̱. K'e̱' wo' chic nim wach i c'ahbilal nca'n take c'acharel re're' k'uru' maj chi quixilac take re' wilic take ixok je' ru̱c' ma' nca̱j ta chic tuhnic ru̱c' winak chi c'acharic je' ricab tik'imaj cho wach chi jenaj ixok eh jenaj winak narituna̱b ri̱b chi c'acharic. Je' re' ajic re' take ixok re're' nquisic' toco̱m chic quich ixok chi ritunabjic qui̱b chi c'acharic to̱b ta nak ma' riwi̱' ta chi je' re' nca'n.

Je' wo' re' nca'n take winak, wilic take ma' nca̱j ta chic tuhnic ru̱c' ixok chi c'acharic je' ricab tik'imaj cho wach chi jenaj winak eh jenaj ixok narituna̱b ri̱b chi c'acharic. Je' re' ajic re' take re' xa cu̱c' chic i quich winak k'e̱' nquitowej wih'ic eh chi je' re' nca'n i c'ahbil laj mahc re' q'uixbilal ric'am cho chi quina̱. Re' cok ru' nanca'n chi je' re', re' quiti'jolal quibakil take c'acharel re're' rijot' wo' ri̱b eh ru̱c' re're' enquic'ul i ti'c'axic re' ric'ul chi queh chi naquic'ulum ru'um reh c'ahbilal nca'n.

Nok re' Dios ma' ximin ta chic ri̱b cu̱c' take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' nca̱j ta chi re're' nwih'ic cu̱c' pan quic'acharic, re' take c'acharel re're' xa chiri̱j chic i c'ahbilal nwih'ic quicapew-bal eh ru'um re're' nca'n i ma' ric'ul ta chi banaric.

Chi je' aj re' quicapew-bal, yohbal wach take riman chic c'ahbilal nca'n je' ricab take wili: Re' ribanaric c'oyomal, re' ribanaric i balc'uxquilal, re' ric'axaric wach i bihomal, re' ma' suk ta rilmijic jeno' hab wach ric'ul ricuse'sbal i Dios. Nca'n wo' ribanaric i cansanic, ribanaric i wolic, ribanaric i chucuj k'oric eh re' pa' chic bih nca'n, nca'n ru̱c' ma' holohic ta laj capew-bal.

Ma' xa ta re're' take no'jbal nca'n, je' la' wo' nca'n take no'jbal wili: Aj molol c'uta̱j take, aj c'u'tjem cas quicha̱k' take, aj ixowonel reh Dios take, ma' hab ta so' wach nquiponbej, aj tz'uju̱l take, aj q'uihsinel wachi̱s take ru̱c' take k'oric nca'n chiri̱j quic'acharic, xa aj ticol c'ahbilal take eh xa k'etol wo' wach quik'orbal take quitu̱t caja̱w.

Je' wo' chic, re' take c'acharel re're' ma' nquirak ta chiri̱j chaj bih ra̱j chi enwih'ic holohic laj c'acharic. Xa eht laj winak take, ma' ti' ta nquic'raj take c'acharel xa re' la' riye'eric ti'c'axic chi quina̱ k'e̱' suk queh ribanaric maj ma' jaruj ta nquiquetelej wach take cas quicha̱k'.

Re' aj re' take no'jbal nca'n take c'acharel re're' to̱b ta queht'alim wo' nak chi re' Dios rik'orom chi re' take no'jbal re're' ma' tare̱t ta chi banaric. Je' wo' chic, re' Dios rik'orom wo' cho chi ric'ul chi queh chi naquiquimic chi'nchel take quibanic i c'ahbil laj no'jbal, xa re' la' ru' to̱b ta wo' rik'orom i Dios chi je' re', re' take c'acharel re're' ma' xa ta xquitik ju' ribanaric take no'jbal re're', je' la' wo' wi wilic chic jeno' c'acharel riban reh i no'jbal nca'n ru' nquik'or chi tare̱t i c'ahchi' ribanaric.

Chaxilac tak wilic take nquik'or chi je' wili: «A̱, re' take c'acharel re're' ric'ul chi queh chi re' Dios eriyew cho ti'c'axic chi quina̱ ru'um take c'ahbil laj no'jbal nca'n, nqui nquik'or. Aweh hat-tak je' ru̱c' tik'oric tak reh k'oric je' re', nik'or aweh tak i wili: Ru̱c' take k'oric re're' c'ahchi' wo' ak'orom tak chi ric'ul wo' chaweh tak chi re' Dios eriyew cho ti'c'axic chana̱ tak. Je' re' nik'or maj re' hat-tak re' tik'oric tak chi je' re' na'n wo' tak je' ricab nca'n take toco̱m chic c'acharel re're'. Ru'um aj re' ma' riban ta chi nak'or tak chi je' wili: «Re' hoj ma' nka'n ta keh c'ahbil laj no'jbal, ma' tiqui tak.
Je' wo' chic, wi keht'alim chi coric wach k'oric riban i Dios narik'or chi chi'nchel take quibanic i c'ahbil laj no'jbal ric'ul chi queh chi naquiquimic,

chaj wa'ric k'uru' chi re' hat-tak re' tik'oric tak chi ru'um reh c'ahbil laj no'jbal nca'n take c'acharel ric'ul chi queh chi re' Dios eriyew cho ti'c'axic chi quina̱, ma' nacapaj ta na tak chi re' Dios ewo' rik'or aweh tak chi je' re'? Je' re' i birinic niban maj to̱b ta nak aweht'alim wo' tak re're' xa cu c'ahchi' wo' abanam aweh tak i no'jbal je' ricab nca'n take c'acharel re're'.

Wi je' re' nacapaj tak ru'um reh rinimal richak'lamil i Dios, on ru'um reh riquetelbal wilic cho ku̱c' i hoj c'acharel, on ru'um reh ricuybal xa wilic wo' cho chi kana̱, nik'or aweh tak chi ma' c'ahchi' ta acapewenic tak chi manlic maj curman wo' chi na̱capam tak chi re' Dios ru'um reh rinimal wach richak'lamil, c'ahchi' wo' riyeb cho aweh tak chi na̱jalam wach ano'jbal tak.

Xa re' la' ru'um ricowil ac'ux tak, re' hat-tak ma' nacapaj ta tak re're' eh chi je' re' ma' ja' najal ta wo' wach ac'ahbil laj no'jbal tak. Ru'um chi je' re' na'n tak, yu'na c'ahchi' abanam tak chi re' Dios k'e̱' enjosk'bic cho awu̱c' tak chiwach take k'i̱j wili eh je' wo' re' chipam i k'i̱j nok re' Dios chi josk'onak chic cu̱c' chi'nchel take aj mahc, naribanam chi nariye'eric rinimal ti'c'axic chi quina̱. Chipam wo' i k'i̱j re're', chi'nchel take c'acharel naquilom wach chi manlic nic' wach i ch'ukuj k'oric naribanam i Dios chi quina̱.

Je' re' nik'or maj chipam i k'i̱j re're', re' k'orel nic' pa' wach xiban i ju'jun chi c'acharel chipam rik'ijil quic'acharic, je' wili narik'orom i Dios nachiban je' ricab riban jeno' ajabe̱s naritoj take raj camanom:

«Re' take wili quic'acharok chi junelic, nqui narik'orom. Je' aj re' narik'orom queh c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' xquicana̱' ta ribanaric i coric wach c'acharic. Re' take c'acharel re' je' re' xca'n, xa re' chic c'ahchi' quicapam chiri̱j i quiwih'ic ar chipam i ye'a̱b re' ma' jaruj ta chic nariwih'ic wi̱' quimic. Je' wo', xa c'ahchi' wo' quicapewenic chiri̱j i quiwih'ic ar re' wilic wi̱' i Dios chi sutumaj ri̱j ru̱c' risakomil rilok'il. Je' wo', quicapewenic nca'n chiri̱j ribirmijic take holohic laj k'oric rik'or cho i Dios queh take quic'acharic pan holonquilal.

Tz'a̱b ru' take c'acharel je' ru̱c' xquik'ihtaj qui̱b chiwach rik'or i Dios, chi xa k'e̱' chic ric'a̱ cu̱c' re' Dios naribanam chi enquic'ul i ti'c'axic. Je' re' naribanam maj re' take re' ma' xca'n ta i holohic laj c'acharic je' ricab rik'or i coric laj c'uhbal re' la' chic i c'ahbilal xca'n ribanaric.

Je' re' k'uru' k'e̱' ti'quilal naquic'ulum i nic' pa' q'uihal take c'acharel nca'n i balc'uxquilal. Wi je' re' nca'n take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel narichalic ti'quilal chi quina̱ ru'. Je' wo', wi re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel equibanic reh i balc'uxquilal, til k'e̱' wo' chic ti'quilal narichalic chi quina̱.

Tz'a̱b ru' wi re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel enca'n i coric, k'e̱' wo' chic ricuse'sbal i Dios enchalic chi quina̱ chi naquiwih'ic ar re' wilic wi̱' i Dios chi sutumaj ri̱j ru̱c' risakomil rilok'il. Je' wo', naquiwih'ic wo' pan sukquil c'uxlis eh naquibiram take holohic laj k'oric rik'orom cho i Dios queh take quic'acharic pan holonquil. Je' wo' re', re' cuse'sbal re're' nchalic wo' chi quina̱ take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wi enca'n i coric pan quic'acharic.
Je' re' nik'or maj re' Dios xa jenaj wach riliric i tinamit riban cho.

Je' ricab, chi quixilac take ma'xta i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses cu̱c', re' Dios ma' eta riyew queh take quimahcanic chi ar ru̱c' equic'acharic chi junelic. Je' wo' re' naribanam i Dios cu̱c' take wilic i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses cu̱c'. Raj take re', re' c'uhbal re're' narich'ukbic k'oric chi quina̱ take quimahcanic chi ma' eta wo' nye'eric queh chi equic'acharic chi junelic ar re' wilic wi̱' i Dios.

Je' re' naric'uluric cu̱c' maj ma' ru'um ta chi nquibiraj i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ra̱j ta nak rik'orom chi re' take c'acharel wilque̱b chi xa coric chic wach quic'ux chiwach i Dios ru'um la' chi nquinimej i c'uhbal re're'.

Nic' pa' wach nc'uluric cu̱c' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' wo' re' cu̱c' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Coric ru', re' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ma' wih'inak ta cu̱c' i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi naquic'amam na̱, xa re' la' chiwach i Dios re' take re' til wilic take tak'anic nchopbic quina̱ je' ricab nc'uhtunic lok nok nquinimej i holohic laj no'jbal nchopbic cho na̱ i ca̱mna eh ncamanic queh chi je' i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses.

Je' re' ajic re' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re're' nquic'uhtaj lok ru̱c' nca'n ribanaric chi xa pan ca̱mna wilic cho take tak'anic nchopbic quina̱ eh chi je' re' ru̱c' wo' i ca̱mna nqueht'alij nok holohic nca'n on nok c'ahbilal nca'n. Nok quicapam chic ri̱j chi naca'nam i c'ahbilal on chi naca'nam ribanaric i holonquilal, pan ca̱mna wo' nquibiraj wi̱' re' nk'oric queh wi c'ahchi' quimahcanic on ma' c'ahchi' ta quimahcanic ru̱c' i c'ahchi'que̱b.

Je' ricab i k'oric nquibiraj pan ca̱mna take c'acharel re're', je' wo' re' narik'orom i Dios queh chi'nchel c'acharel wi tare̱t on ma' tare̱t ta chiwach haj wilic take capewenic on bano̱j xca'n pan c'olic on chi sakom lok wach chi quiwach take toco̱m chic c'acharel. Re' hin k'uru' naquink'oric chiri̱j i suk laj k'oric nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus, nik'or wo' chi wilic jenaj i k'i̱j nok je' re' naribanam i Dios eh chi je' re', re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re're' narik'oric reh wi tare̱t on ma' tare̱t ta i quibano̱j take c'acharel.

Re' wili nwa̱j nik'orom chawi̱j tak je' ru̱c' nak'or chi hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel: Chaweh hat-tak re' k'e̱' wo' chic nanimsaj awach tak chi quiwach take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xa ru'um ti ru' chi nalok'ej tak wach i Dios eh je' wo' ru'um chi wilic awu̱c' tak i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses re' nach'ica̱' wi̱' ac'ux tak chi ru̱c' re're' nalok'ej tak wach chi coric i Dios.

Re' c'uhbal re're' til natijej tak ri̱j chi coric eh ru'um re' aweht'alim tak haj wilic take bano̱j nponic chiwach i Dios chi na̱banam tak eh wi toco̱m chic take c'acharel nca'n re're', re' hat-tak nak'or tak queh chi tare̱t nca'n. Ru'um aj chi wilic awu̱c' tak i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses

til cow na̱pahba̱b ac'ux tak chi ricapewjic chi je' ricab nok re' take sot' curman chi wilic jeno' nc'ambic je quibe̱h, re' hat-tak nacapaj wo' tak chi wilca̱t tak chi c'amol quibe̱h take ja' nquitijej ta qui̱b chiri̱j i Dios. Je' wo' chic, re' hat-tak nacapaj tak chi je' ricab nok re' sakom ncamanic reh chi naquibehic chi coric take wilque̱b pan k'ekom, re' hat-tak wilca̱t wo' tak chi sakomonel pa̱m quino'jbal take c'acharel ru̱c' i tijinic na'n tak.

Je' re' ajic ru'um chi wilic awu̱c' tak i c'uhbal re' til nc'uhtunic reh coric laj tijinic chiri̱j i Dios, re' hat-tak cow napahba̱' awi̱b tak chi ricapewjic chi wilca̱t tak chi caj tijinel take c'acharel je' quicab take ha'lac'un maj ma' ja' nquirak ta chiri̱j haj wilic take bano̱j nponic chiwach i Dios chi enca'n.

Ru'um aj chi je' re' nacapaj tak, re' hin niban aweh tak take pahkanic wili: Chaj wa'ric chi toco̱m chic take c'acharel natijej tak raj la' hat-tak ma' c'ahchi' ta atijem awi̱b chawibil awi̱b tak? Chaj wo' wa'ric re' hat-tak nak'or tak ricorquil chi ma' holohic ta banoj lek', xa re' la' ru' re' hat-tak na'n wo' tak i banoj lek'?

Chaj wo' wa'ric re' hat re' tik'oric chi re' caxa̱ra chic take ma' riban ta chi enca'n i c'oyomal, xa re' la' ru' re' hat na'n wo' tak i banoj c'oyomal? Je' wo' chic, chaj wa'ric chi ch'i'c nawilow take tiyo̱x xa re' la' ru' re' hat to̱j chi quelk'jic take tiyo̱x chipam take pa̱t wilque̱b take wi̱'?

Re' hat-tak re' nanimsaj awi̱b tak chi quiwach take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xa ru'um ti ru' chi wilic awu̱c' tak i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses nik'or aweh tak chi ru̱c' i no'jbal na'n tak chi ma' c'ahchi' ta abanam tak rik'or i c'uhbal re're' c'ahchi' abanam tak chi ma' nye'eric ta rilok'il i Dios chi quixilac take c'acharel re're'.

Je' re' ajic re' hat-tak na'n tak je' ricab rik'or chipam i hu̱j tz'ihmbaj cahnok ru'um raj k'orol i Dios re' Isayi̱yas ribihnal re' rik'or wi̱' chi je' wili: «Awu'um aweh hat-tak, re' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xa c'ahbil laj k'oric chic nquik'or chiri̱j i Dios nanquibiraj ribiral, nqui rik'or.

Re' riyoc'oric lok ritz'uhmal na̱ c'achanbal re' nka'n hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi rehtalil chi hoj ritinami̱t i Dios, re're' til ncamanic keh xa re' wi nkanimej chi coric i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Tz'a̱b ru' wi re' hat-tak wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ma' nanimej ta tak i c'uhbal re're', re' nak'or tak chiqui̱j take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' ma' nquiyoc' ta lok ritz'uhmal na̱ quic'achanbal chi ritinami̱t i Dios take re' wo' re' abiral tak narik'ormojic ru'um i Dios.

Coric ru', yu'na chi kawach hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' take c'acharel re're' wilic quibiral chi ma' re' ta ritinami̱t i Dios take raj la' wi re' take re' nca'n i holohic laj bano̱j re' rik'or i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, re' Dios eriban chi chiwach ru' jenaj chic wach quibiral ru̱c' i kabiral i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' nka'n riyoc'oric lok ritz'uhmal na̱ kac'achanbal.

Chi je' re' eriban chi nc'uluric cu̱c' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wi nca'n chi je' re', nik'or aweh tak chi re' take c'acharel re're', re' chic re' equik'orbic aweh tak chi hat-tak aj mahc. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' to̱b ta ma' quiyoc'om ta lok ritz'uhmal na̱ quic'achanbal rehtalil chi ritinami̱t i Dios take, nca'n haj wilic rik'or i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses raj i hat-tak to̱b ta na'n tak ribanaric riyoc'oric lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ac'achanbal tak eh natijej wo' tak ri̱j i c'uhbal re're', ma' na'n ta tak haj wilic i rik'or.

Nik'orom aj chic re're' yu'na re' chic i wili nanik'orom: Chiwach i Dios ma' ru'um ta chi ar ru̱c' i ma' Israhel nchalic kaja'quil re' ta nak ti re' nbanic chi re' hoj til hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Je' wo', re' ribanaric i yoc'o̱j lok ritz'uhmal na̱ c'achanbal ma' re' ta wo' ti re' til rehtalil chi re' hoj, hoj ritinami̱t i Dios.

Re' la' nbanic chi hoj ritinami̱t i Dios re' la' wili: Chi re' rUxlabal ru' xijal cho wach kano'jbal. Je' re' ajic chipam i ka̱mna wilic i rehtalil re' nc'uhtunic chi je' re' kawi̱'. Re' rehtalil re're' ma' ru'um ta nchel chi re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses rik'or keh chi cu nakayoc'om lok ritz'uhmal na̱ kac'achanbal nok wilic, re' la' rUxlabal i Dios nbanic re're'. Ru'um aj re', re' Dios suk laj k'oric rik'or chiki̱j to̱b ta nchel wilic take c'acharel ma' je' ta re' rik'ormojic nca'n.

Chiri̱j chi nik'orom chic lok re're', yu'na re' hat-tak enak'or tak wi̱n i wili: «Re' riwa'ric kac'acharic i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel k'e̱' wo' chic xiq'uic na̱ chiwach riwa'ric quic'acharic take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xa re' la', chaj camaj keh re're' eh chaj bih xitik keh chi xkayoc' ritz'uhmal na̱ i kac'achanbal? nqui enak'or tak.

Til pa ricorquil, re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi k'e̱' wo' chic ncamanic aweh tak re're'. Pe̱t k'oric, enik'or aweh tak chi re' take kama̱m kati't xic'ulbic cho reh take k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios chi narimahsam wach ku̱c'.

Re' cok ru' to̱b ta re' Dios xa rinimej wo' i haj wilic i rik'or, ma' chi'nchel ta keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xquinimej je' ricab xquik'or chi naca'nam. Ru'um chi je' re' wilic aweh tak je' wili naquik'orom: «A̱, wi wilic take je' re' xca'n chi kaxilac, ra̱j na rik'orom k'uru' chi ru̱c' re're', re' take c'acharel c'ahchi' ca'nam chi re' Dios ma' rinimej ta wo' chic take k'oric k'oro̱j cho ru'um? nqui naquik'orom.

«Re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi ma'xta. Re' Dios ma' jaruj ta eriban chi je' re'. Haj cok wilic riban i Dios, re' ric'uhtjic chi re're' xa coric wo' wach ric'ux to̱b ta re' hoj chi'nchel c'acharel kojkajic chipam i chucuj k'oric. Ru'um aj re', re' ma' Tawiy naxk'oric chiri̱j mahc xiban je' wili xik'or chipam i hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj ru'um: «Re' hat Dios til na'n wo' ribanaric re' nak'or chi na̱banam. Je' wo' chic nok hab wach ncojbic jeno' amahc, re' hat xatelic wo' coric ru̱c' ak'orbal chi rico'ljic awi̱b, nqui xik'or.

Yu'na je' na nak wili na̱k'orom tak: «Wi coric ru' chi re' ricuyuric kamahc nc'uhtunic lok wi̱' ricorquilal wach ric'ux i Dios nok re' hoj nka'n i c'ahbilal, chaj chic bih jeno' k'oric naka'nam chiri̱j i Dios k'uru'? Nakak'orom on nchel chi nok ma' ja' cuyu̱j ta kamahc re' Dios ma' coric ta wach ric'ux chi riyew cho ti'c'axic chi kana̱ ru'um reh kamahc? nqui na nak enak'or tak on ma'xta? Je' ta nak re' enak'or tak, re' hin til nik'or aweh tak chi xa memil laj c'u'lunic nak ena'n tak chawach ru̱c' i k'oric re're'.

Je' re' nik'or aweh tak maj ma' jaruj ta eriban chi re' Dios ma' ta nak coric wach ric'ux! Reh aj chi re' Dios erich'uk wach quimahc take c'acharel curman wo' chi coric wach ric'ux. Wi ta nak ma' coric wach ric'ux, ma' eta wo' nak riban chi eriban ch'ukuj wach mahc, maje'?

A̱, yu'na wilic wo' aweh tak je' wili birinic naca'nam: «Chaj bih riwi̱' k'uru' chi re' Dios naxich'uk k'oric chi kana̱ chi hoj aj mahc cu riyew wo' chic cho ti'c'axic chi kana̱? Re're' ma' ric'ul ta nak chi reh chi je' re' riban wi coric chi re' rich'ukuric wach kamahc riban re're' ric'uhtaj chi coric wach ric'ux eh ru'um re're' ric'ul wo' rinimal rilok'il, ma' je'? nqui naquik'orom.

Coric ru', wilic take quik'oric chi je' re' c'ahchi' nik'orom chipam take c'uhtunic niban, xa re' la' ru' re' take c'acharel re're' ric'ul chi queh chi re' Dios eriyew cho ti'c'axic chi quina̱ ru'um i chucuj k'oric nca'n chiwi̱j. Je' re' nik'or maj wi ta nak je' re' k'oric niban, ewo' nak nik'or take k'oric wili: «Ka'n tak i c'ahbilal maj wi je' re' nka'n nariye'eric rilok'il i Dios ru̱c' re're', nqui nak enik'or. Re' hin ma' je' ta re' nik'or chipam take c'uhtunic niban.

Re' cok ru' naniban i c'uhtunic, quink'oric chiki̱j i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh chaj bih k'oric niban chiki̱j i hoj?
