Nik'or na chi xa re' wach i hoj nka'n i holonquilal eh ru'um re' k'e̱' wo' chic coric wach kac'ux chi quiwach take ma' re' ta take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel? Ma'xta, ma' jaruj ta eriban chi je' re' enic'uhtaj maj nik'orom chic chi re' hoj chi'nchel ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel kojmahcanic eh je' wo' re' chi'nchel take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.

Re' rik'ormojic chi chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel hoj aj mahc, xa nok wo' k'oro̱j cho ribiral je' ricab k'oro̱j cho chipam i jenaj queh take hu̱j xitz'ihmbaj cho i kak'atal k'oric najtir k'i̱j re' ma' Tawiy. Chipam i hu̱j re're' je' wili rik'orom cho: “Ma' jeno' keh hoj c'acharel coric ta nak wach kac'ux. Til xa ta nak jeno' keh wilic.
Ma' jeno' wo' keh hoj wilic ta nak kano'jbal. Ma' jeno' wo' keh hoj nkasic' i no'jbal ru̱c' i Dios chi nakac'acharic chi coric kawach.
Chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel xkamay rinimjic i Dios. Chi'nchel hoj junojic chipam i ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal. Ma' wo' jeno' keh hoj ato̱b ta nak. Til xa ta nak je jeno' keh wilic.

Re' take k'oric qui'elic cho pan kachi̱' nakojk'oric, xa je' na ricab richuhquil nelic cho pan jeno' muk'unbal nanteheric cok na̱. Je' re' nik'or maj ru̱c' i k'oric nka'n re' take quibirinic keh quicahnic chi ma' suk ta quic'ux. Je' wo', re' hoj xa chucuj k'oric nka'n nakojk'oric. Je' ricab i riti'quilal ncojoric jeno' c'acharel ru'um i riqui̱ ti'o̱j riban jeno' a̱k', re' take k'oric qui'elic cho pan kachi̱' nquicoj riti'quil ca̱mna take quibirinic keh.
Je' wo' nakojk'oric, nc'utunic lok chi k'e̱' ixowonic wilic cho pan ka̱mna ru̱c' take tz'uju̱j nka'n.
Ma' xa re' ta re' i c'ahbilal nka'n je' la' wo' chi kaxilac wilic take c'acharel xa tikilque̱b wo' chi naca'nam i cansanic i̱b.
Ru'um chi xa pa' ye'a̱b wilque̱b take je' re' c'acharic nca'n, xa chasachlom quicapew-bal take toco̱m chic c'acharel nca'n on nquicojlom ti'quil c'uxlis pan ca̱mna take c'acharel.
Re' take c'acharel je' re' quibanic ma' quic'acharic ta chi suk quic'ux.
Re' take re' ma' xa re' ta ma' quicapewenic ta chiri̱j i Dios je' la' wo' ma' nquiyohlej ta wo' wach, nqui rik'orom cho.

Re' chi'nchel take k'oric k'oro̱j chipam i c'uhbal re're' keht'alim i hoj je' ru̱c' kojc'acharic chi choplic kana̱ ru'um i c'uhbal re're' chi c'ahchi' quik'oric chiki̱j. Ru'um aj re' nok re' Dios rik'or chi re' hoj, hoj aj mahc chiwach, chiki̱j wo' hoj chi'nchel c'acharel c'ahchi' rik'oric chi je' re'. Chiwach i k'oric re're' k'uru' ma' hab ta chic wach jeno' c'acharel eriban chi erirak rik'orbal chi rico'ljic ri̱b chiwach i Dios,

on ma' hab ta wach keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ncojoric ru'um i Dios chi coric wach ric'ux xa ru'um ta nak chi rinimej i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses maj to̱b ta nak nchel nkanimej chi'nchel rik'or i c'uhbal re're' ma'xta jeno' c'acharel cojo̱j ta nak ru'um i Dios chi coric wach ric'ux. Je' wo' chic, ru̱c' i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses keht'alim chi re' hoj raj niminel i Jesus hoj wo' aj mahc

xa re' la' ru' xkeht'alij wo' chi re' Dios xojricoj chi coric chic wach kac'ux. Chi re' Dios xiban chi coric chic wach kac'ux re' hoj ma' xkeht'alij ta ru̱c' i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, xkeht'alij la' ru̱c' i jenaj chic c'uhbal. Cu re' aj chic yu'na keht'alim i k'oro̱j cho chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses je' wo' i k'oro̱j cho najtir cu'um take raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios nok je' wili k'oro̱j cho:

«Xa re' wach wi re' take c'acharel nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' Dios riban chi coric chic wach quic'ux take ru'. Ma' xa ta ku̱c' i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel riban i Dios chi je' re', je' la' wo' cu̱c' take junleh chic c'acharel maj chiwach i Dios chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel xa jenaj wach kawi̱' ru̱c' i wili:
Chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel c'ahbil xojbanic eh ru'um re' ma' riban ta chi ekojwih'ic chiwach rinimal wach rilok'il sakom nsutunic ri̱j i Dios, nqui k'oro̱j.

Je' re' k'uru' re' Dios riban chi re' take c'acharel je' ru̱c' nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus no̱j riban chi coric chic wach quic'ux chiwach. Re' riban wili ma' ru'um ta nchel chi nka'n jeno' ritojoric reh, riban la' ru'um reh nim laj c'axbal keh eh ru'um re' riban wo' chi ru̱c' riquimic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric ncuyuric kamahc.

Je' re' nok ru̱c' i quimic xic'ul i Jesus re' xwachjic je' ricab nok re' take c'acharel najtir k'i̱j nquiwachej ric'atjic i me̱' ncansjic ru'um reh quimahc, re' Dios xic'uhtaj chi re' Jesus re' aj re' ncuybic reh quimahc take c'acharel nok nquicoj wach chi re're' xquimic chiqui̱j chi quico'ljic. Ru̱c' xiban i Dios re're', nc'uhtunic lok wach chi til riban i ch'ukuj k'oric china̱ i quimahc take c'acharel. Je' re' nik'or ru'um chi cu yu'na re' quimahc take aj najtir k'i̱j ma' ja' ch'uku̱j ta wo' wach ru'um i Dios ru'um nok chi cu c'ahchi' ruy'em rik'ijil naribanaric wi̱' re're'.

Raj la' i rik'ijil tik'imaj cho wach najtir chi naric'uhtunic wi̱' chi re' Dios til rich'uk wach quimahc take c'acharel, til chiwach kak'ijil yu'na xc'uluric. Chipam ru' ma' xa ta nc'uhtunic chi re' Dios xa coric wo' wach i ch'ukuj k'oric riban je' la' wo' chipam re're', re' Dios riban wo' chi re' take c'acharel je' ru̱c' nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus wilque̱b chi coric chic wach quic'ux.

Wi re' aj Dios nbanic chi re' take c'acharel re' nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus wilque̱b chi coric chic wach quic'ux, re' take k'oric nbanjic k'uru' chi re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel k'e̱' wo' chic coric wach kac'ux ru'um chi nkanimej take k'oric wilic chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ma' riban ta chic chi nkatik ju' rik'ormojic. Je' re' nik'or maj ma' ru'um ta reh kabano̱j riban i Dios chi wilco̱j chi coric chic wach kac'ux, ela' riban chi je' re' ru'um rich'iquinjic kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus.
Je' re' k'uru' nik'or chic chi ma' ru'um ta reh take quibano̱j take c'acharel equiwih'ic chiwach i Dios chi cuyu̱j chic quimahc ru'um la' reh rich'iquinjic quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus.

Ru̱c' wili c'ahchi' na nchel nik'orom chi re' Dios xa awu'um hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel lok'omaj wach? On je' wo' na cu'um take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel? Til nik'or aweh tak chi re' Dios lok'omaj wo' wach cu'um ru'!

Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab chi re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel nkak'or chi re' Dios re' nkalok'ej wach xa re' wach re' wilic chi narilok'onjic wach cu'um chi'nchel c'acharel, je' wo' re' ku̱c' chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel je' chi ra̱' ri'sil on ma' re' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, re' Dios xa jenaj wach i capew-bal wili naribanam: Xa re' wach wi xkach'ica̱' kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus, re're' erik'or keh chi wilco̱j chic chiwach chi ma'xta chic kamahc.

A̱, yu'na wilic take c'acharel naquik'orom chi je' wili: «Ru̱c' i nak'or chiri̱j rich'iquinjic quic'ux take c'acharel chiri̱j i Jesus, ra̱j na rik'orom chi re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ma' curman ta chic chi enkanimej i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses? nqui naquik'orom. Ma'xta, ma' je' ta re' ra̱j rik'orom. Ra̱j la' rik'orom chi nok ch'iclic chic kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus, re' c'uhbal re're' echic nkanimej i hoj chi coric.

Nibanam ok chic lok k'oric chiri̱j rich'iquinjic quic'ux take c'acharel chiri̱j i Jesus, yu'na ajic kojk'orok so' chiri̱j i ajabe̱s ma' Awraham, re' kara'il cho i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Chaj bih riwi̱' chi xc'acharic chiwach i Dios chi coric chic wach ric'ux?

Wi ta nak ru'um reh ribano̱j xc'acharic chi je' re', re' ma' Awraham wilic nak riwi̱' chi reh chi erinimsaj ri̱b chi quiwach take rich c'acharel. Raj la' ma' ru' ma' je' ta re' xiban maj chiwach i Dios ma' riwi̱' ta chi reh chi eriq'uihsaj ri̱b.

Je' re' k'uru' chaj bih riwi̱' i k'oro̱j chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios? Ar aj ru' rik'or chi re' ma' Awraham xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i k'oro̱j reh ru'um i Dios eh chi ru'um re' chi je' xiban, re' Dios xipahba̱' chi jenaj c'acharel coric wach ric'ux.

Kacapaj yu'na chiri̱j i wili re' nc'uluric ru̱c' jeno' aj camanom: Nok re're' ncamanic, ric'ul i ritojbal re' cok ru' ric'ul re're' ma' ru'um ta chi xa jeno' ato'bil c'ahchi' ribanaric reh, ric'ul la' ru'um chi xicamanej wach.

Tz'a̱b ru' wi re' aj camanom ma' ncamanic ta ma' eta wo' nye'eric ritojbal eh wi xic'ul nchel jeno' tumi̱n, xa jenaj ato'bil xbanaric reh. Re' nc'uluric ru̱c' aj camanom re' nc'ulbic reh jeno' ato'bil to̱b ta ma' ncamanic ta, je' wo' re' nc'uluric ru̱c' xa hab wach jeno' rich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios. Je' re' nik'or maj re' Dios riban reh chi ato'bil chi ripahba̱' chi coric chic wach ric'ux chiwach. Je' re' riban i Dios xa ru'um chi re' c'acharel re're' rich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j chi re' Dios til ripahba̱' chi coric wach quic'ux take aj mahc nok nquiyew quic'ux chiri̱j.

Re' najtir k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy xich'ica̱' wo' ric'ux chiri̱j i riban Dios re're'. Ru'um aj re' xk'oric chiri̱j i risukquilal ric'ux nwih'ic jeno' c'acharel re' pahbamaj chi coric wach ric'ux ru'um i Dios to̱b ta ma'xta bih jeno' bano̱j riban reh chi pahbamaj chi je' re'.
Je' aj wili xik'or i ma' Tawiy: “K'e̱' rinimal risukquil c'uxlis wilic pan ca̱mna take c'acharel re' xcuyuric eh xsacharic wach quimahc ru'um i Dios.
Je' wo', nok re' Dios rik'or chi re' take c'acharel re're' ma' re' ta chic aj mahc take, k'e̱' wo' rinimal risukquil c'uxlis nwih'ic pan ca̱mna, nqui xik'or.

Re' xik'or i ma' Tawiy re're' nakacojom na tak rehtal chi xa chiki̱j ta i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xk'ormojic cho? Ma'xta! Xk'ormojic la' wo' cho chiqui̱j take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ricab c'uhtunic riban keh wili chiri̱j i kama̱m ma' Awraham: Nakojk'oric chiri̱j i ma' Awraham, re' hoj nkak'or chi re're' xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i k'oro̱j reh ru'um i Dios eh chi ru'um chi je' re' xiban, re' Dios xipahba̱' chi jenaj c'acharel coric wach ric'ux.

Coric ru' nkak'or chi je' re', xa re' la' ru' niban aweh tak i pahkanic wili: Nok je' re' xiban i Dios ru̱c' ma' Awraham chi xicuy rimahc, re' ma' Awraham riyoc'om chic lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ric'achanbal on ma' ja' xta? Coric enak'or tak chi je' wili: «Ma'xta, re' ma' Awraham ma' pe̱t ta xiban riyoc'oric lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ric'achanbal, re' la' re' naxich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios ma' ja' riban ta nak ribanaric re're', nqui k'oric ena'n tak.

Je' aj re' cu chiri̱j chi rich'ica̱b chic ric'ux chiri̱j i k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios, re' ma' Awraham xbanjic reh jenaj tak'anic chi naricojom jenaj rehtalil reh riti'jolal c'uhtbal reh chi re' Dios xicoj chic jenaj chi quixilac take ritinami̱t. Ru̱c' riyoc'oric lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ric'achanbal xiban i ma' Awraham re' xcamanic wo' chi jenaj rehtalil, re' Dios c'ahchi' wo' rik'orom chi re' ribanam nak chic lok wili coric wo' wach: Cu chipam i rik'ijil nok re' ma' Awraham ma' ja' riyoc'om ta lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ric'achanbal, re' Dios xipahba̱' chic chi re're' jenaj c'acharel coric wach ric'ux xa ru'um chi xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j k'oro̱j cho reh ru'um. Ru̱c' aj xiban re're', re' Dios xiban wo' chi re' ma' Awraham xmikric chi aj c'amol quibe̱h take c'acharel nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i rik'or i Dios to̱b ta ma' nquiyoc' ta lok ritz'uhmal na̱ quic'achanbal. Nic' pa' wach ripahba̱bjic banaric i aj c'amol quibe̱h re're' je' wo' re' quipahbabjic xbanaric ru' xa ru'um rich'iquinjic quic'ux chiri̱j chaj bih rik'or i Dios.

Je' re' nok re' ma' Awraham xmikric chi c'amol kabe̱h i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' kojc'ambic na̱ i tak'anic bano̱j cho chi nakayoc'om lok ritz'uhmal na̱ kac'achanbal. Ma' xa ta wilic chi c'amol kabe̱h i hoj chi riyoc'oric lok ritz'uhmal na̱ kac'achanbal, wilic la' wo' chi c'amol kabe̱h chi nkatahkej ri̱j i no'jbal xiban cho nok cu ja' riyoc'om ta nak lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ric'achanbal. Re' no'jbal re', re' i wili: Chi re're' til xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios.

Re' ma' Awraham xk'ormojic reh chi re're' ch'i̱l take c'acharel ra̱' ri'sil naquic'ulum ricuse'sbal i Dios reh chi re' cuse'sbal re're' xchalic wo' chi quina̱ i chi'nchel take c'acharel chi junsut wach ac'al. Re' take k'oric re're' xk'ormojic reh ma' Awraham ma' ru'um ta chi re're' xic'am na̱ riC'uhbal i Dios Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, ru'um la' chi re' Dios xipahba̱' i ma' Awraham chi jenaj c'acharel coric chic wach ric'ux ru'um rich'ica̱b nak ric'ux chi re' Dios riban chi nmanlajic wach i chaj bih rik'or.

Ru̱c' i ma' Awraham k'uru' nc'uhtunic chi re' cuse'sbal k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios ma' nc'uluric ta ru'um chi re' take c'acharel nquic'am na̱ i riC'uhbal i Dios Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Wi ta nak ru'um re're' nc'uluric i cuse'sbal, ra̱j nak rik'orom chi ma' eta raj chi nkach'ica̱' kac'ux chiri̱j i xik'or i Dios eh wi ta nak je' re' enka'n ra̱j wo' nak rik'orom chi re' k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios ma'xta nak bih eritik keh eh je' wo' ma'xta nak bih eritik keh chi nkach'ica̱' kac'ux chiri̱j i Dios.

Haj nak cok wilic encamanic ne'el re' nak chi enkac'am na̱ i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, ra̱j wili xa ma'xta bih eritik keh chi enka'n chi je' re' eh je' re' nik'or ru'um i wili: Ma' ta nak wilic i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, ma' nk'ormojic ta wo' nak chi wilic take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' nquinimej ta i c'uhbal re're'. Raj wili ru'um reh chi wilic i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, nk'ormojic wo' chi wilic wo' take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' nquinimej ta i c'uhbal re're' eh ru'um reh quimahc re're', re' Dios eriyew cho ti'c'axic chi quina̱. Je' re' ajic nkilow chi ru'um reh chi wilic i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, re' wo' re' nbanic chi enwih'ic i ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' nquinimej ta i c'uhbal re're'.

Ru'um aj reh re', re' ric'amaric na̱ i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ma' ncamanic ta keh chi ric'uluric take cuse'sbal k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios. Xa re' wach haj wilic encamanic keh, re' rich'iquinjic kac'ux chiri̱j i Dios re' xa ru'um reh rinimal ric'axbal wilic chi quina̱ take c'acharel xik'or chi naricuse'sam take cho. Ru'um reh ric'axbal re're' k'uru', re' take cuse'sbal k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios til pa'lic rik'ormojic chi narichalic chi quina̱ take c'acharel re' wilic chi quiwach i ma' Awraham chi c'amol quibe̱h. Hab aj wach take c'acharel re're'? Re' chi'nchel take nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios je' ricab xiban i ma' Awraham. Je' re' ajic kich'i̱l i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' wilic chi kana̱ rinimjic i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, wilic wo' queh take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilic i ma' Awraham chi c'amol quibe̱h.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' ma' Awraham xk'ormojic cho reh take k'oric wili re' wilque̱b wo' chi tz'ihmbimaj cho chipam i Lok' laj riC'uhbal i Dios chi je' wili: “Je' ricab nok jenaj ajabe̱s wilic chi quina̱ take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n reh chi re' take re' enca'n haj pa' wilic riban i caja̱w, re' hin xniban chic chi re' hat ma' Awraham etiwih'ic chi c'amol quibe̱h i q'uihal chi c'acharel wilque̱b chi junsut tinamit wach ac'al, nqui xk'ormojic reh. Nic' pa' wach xik'or i Dios reh Awraham je' wo' re' xiban. Je' re' ajic re' Dios re' wilic rajawric chi ritik'injic i ma' ja' wilic ta eh chi wilic wo' rajawric chi ribanaric chi equic'acharic wo' chic take c'acharel je' ru̱c' xiquimic chic je, xiban chi re' ma' Awraham xwih'ic chi c'amol quibe̱h take i q'uihal c'acharel

ru'um chi xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j xk'ormojic reh ru'um. Naxiban chi je' re' i Awraham, ma'xta bih jeno' xto'bonic reh chi rilmijic nic' wach naric'uluric cu̱c' take riq'uihal c'acharel naric'amam quibe̱h, xa re' la' ti xich'ica̱' wi̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i k'oro̱j cho reh ru'um i Dios naxik'or chi je' wili: “Re' take awa̱' awi'sil nariwih'ic k'e̱' q'uihal take chi ma' jeno' enchol rajlajic chi'nchel je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' take ch'imi̱l, nqui xik'or reh.

Chiri̱j i wili nok wilic na reh ho'c'ahl (100) ha̱b, re' ma' Awraham ma' xipoh'aj ta ric'ux chiri̱j haj wilic i k'oro̱j reh ru'um i Dios to̱b ta nchel xicoj rehtal chi ma' eta chic nwih'ic riha'lac'u̱n ru̱c' rehq'ue̱n ru'um chi iq'uinak chic na̱ rihabil reh ac'ununic maj re' ransil xa je' na chic ricab ransil jeno' winak xa quimic chic reh. Je' wo' chic, ma' ru'um ta wo' chi re' rehq'ue̱n ma' Awraham re' Sa̱ra ribihnal, ma' re' ta ac'unom laj ixok

xiban ta nak chi re're' xipoh'aj ric'ux chiri̱j i k'oro̱j cho reh ru'um i Dios on chi xicana̱' ta nak rich'iquinjic ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios. Ma'xta! Re' la' ma' Awraham cow xitik ju' rich'iquinjic ric'ux chiri̱j rik'orom cho i Dios eh xa xitioxej wo' reh ru̱c' i chaj bih naribanam maj
til k'e̱' ch'iclic ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios chi wilic rajawric chi ribanaric chi'nchel haj wilic k'oro̱j cho ribiral ru'um.

Je' re' ajic ru'um chi re' ma' Awraham naxc'acharic cho xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i k'oro̱j reh ru'um i Dios, re' Dios re're' xipahba̱' wo' i ma' Awraham chi jenaj c'acharel coric wach ric'ux je' ricab rik'or chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios.
Re' ribiral re're' ma' xa chiri̱j ta Awraham tz'ihmbimaj cho,

je' la' wo' chiki̱j hoj aj niminel reh Jesus maj re' hoj, hoj wo' pahbamaj chi hoj c'acharel coric wach kac'ux ru'um reh rich'iquinjic kac'ux chiri̱j i Dios. Re' Dios re' nkach'ica̱' kac'ux chiri̱j re're' til xucsaj cho chi quixilac take camnak i kAja̱w Jesus
re' xicana̱' ri̱b chi xcansjic reh chi xcuyuric kamahc. Re' cok ru' nok camnak chic, re' Dios xucsaj wo' chic cho reh chi xojpahbabjic chi hoj c'acharel coric wach kac'ux.

Chi ribanam chic i Dios chi kojc'acharic chi cuyu̱j chic kamahc ru'um reh rich'iquinjic kac'ux chiri̱j i xik'or ru', re' Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric riban chi enwih'ic sukquilal pan ka̱mna chiwach i Dios.

Je' wo' chic ru'um reh rich'iquinjic kac'ux chiri̱j chaj bih rik'orom cho i Dios, re' Jesus xic'uhtaj keh nic' wach ric'uluric rato'bil i Dios naka'nam eh chi wilic chi kana̱ i rato'bil re' cow ch'iclic wi̱' kac'ux, re' hoj yu'na chi xa suk chic kac'ux c'ahchi' kuy'em i k'i̱j nakehtric wi̱' rinimal wach rilok'il i Dios.

Re' cok ru' ma' xa ru'um ta re're' nsukbic kac'ux, je' la' wo' nsukbic kac'ux nok wilic kati'quil kac'axquil ru'um nok keht'alim chi nok wilic kati'quil kac'axquil, nkacuy take re're' ru̱c' i to'bonic riban cho keh i Dios.

Je' wo' chic nok re' hoj nkacuy ransil take c'axquilal, re' Dios rik'or chi holohic laj no'jbal c'ahchi' ka'nam eh ru̱c' i k'oric re're' riman chic nkach'ica̱' kac'ux chi ruyu'njic i k'i̱j nok ekoj-ehtric ru̱c' i rinimal wach rilok'il i Dios.

Ru'um chi je' re' ruyu'njic nka'n i k'i̱j re're', re' hoj ma' nkajic ta kac'ux riman la' chic nkach'ica̱' kac'ux chiri̱j i Dios maj re're' k'e̱' ti' kojric'raj eh reh chi re' hoj ti' wo' nakic'ram ru' xiyew keh i Lok' laj rUxlabal.

Chi re' Dios k'e̱' ti' kojric'raj ar nc'utunic wach ru̱c' xc'uluric wili: Chipam rik'ijil chiho̱j cho ru'um i Dios nok ma'xta nak kajawric chi ribanaric take chaj bih no'jbal nponic chiwach i Dios, re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, xquimic chi kaco'ljic i hoj aj mahc.

Til coric nik'or aweh tak chi ku̱c' i hoj c'acharel ma' nc'uhtunic ta chi ti' nquic'raj ki̱b. To̱b ta nak wilic jeno' c'acharel re' coric wach ric'ux, k'e̱' nak c'axic chi reh chi eriyew ric'acharic pan quimic chi rico'ljic jeno' rich c'acharel re' k'e̱' ti' ric'raj, on k'e̱' wo' nak c'axic chi reh chi eripahba̱' ri̱b chi riye'eric ric'acharic pan quimic chiri̱j jeno' rich c'acharel re' k'e̱' ti' ric'raj to̱b ta nak holohic wo' rino'jbal.

Ra̱j nchel i Dios ma' je' ta re' nc'utunic ru̱c', re' la' re' xic'uhtaj chi til k'e̱' ti' kojric'raj ru̱c' ribanaric i wili: To̱b ta nak hoj rinimal aj mahc, xitak'a̱' cho i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi xquimic chiki̱j chi kaco'ljic.

Chi je' aj re' ric'uhtjic ric'axbal i Dios xiban cho chi kana̱, ma' c'axic ta chi keh rirakmajic chiri̱j chi re' Jesus naxichihcaj riquiq'ue̱l naxquimic je, xiban chi re' hoj echic kojc'acharic chi cuyu̱j chic kamahc eh ma' xa ta re're', ma' c'axic ta la' wo' chi keh rirakmajic chiri̱j chi naponok i k'i̱j narich'ukum wi̱' k'oric i Dios china̱ quimahc chi'nchel c'acharel, re' hoj ekojco'ljic chiwach rijosk'il naric'uhtam i Dios chi quina̱ take aj mahc.

Nik'or chi je' re' maj nok wilco̱j nak cho chi aj ixowonel wach i Dios, re're' xojricoj pan sukquil c'uxlis rich'i̱l ru'um reh riquimic i Jesus. Wi je' re' xiban cho ku̱c', re' ta na chic chiwach i junelic quimic ma' ekojco'ljic xa ru'um chi re' Jesus xichop wo' jenaj chic c'acharic naxuctic cho chi quixilac camnak?
Ma' xa ta re're' nik'or, je' la' wo' nik'or chi re' Dios xiyew cho risukquil kac'ux ru̱c' xiban i Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric maj re're' xojricoj pan sukquil c'uxlis ru̱c' i Dios.

Re' aj chic yu'na nwa̱j k'oric chiri̱j i wili: Naxp'uhtic cho banoj mahc ayu' wach ac'al xa ru̱c' jenaj chi c'acharel, re're' xcahnic wo' chi quimic chic ri̱j. Chiri̱j chic ru' nok mahcanak chic cho c'acharel re're', xojcahnic wo' chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel chi pan quimic chic ki̱j maj chi'nchel i hoj xojmahcanic wo'.

Re' cok ru', ru'um chi cu ja' ribiral ta wo' cho i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ma'xta nak bih nch'ukuric wi̱' k'oric chi quina̱ chi'nchel take c'acharel nok mahcanic nak chic nca'n cho. Je' re' nik'or ru'um chi re' c'uhbal re're' ma' ja'xta nak chi kawach hoj c'acharel chi rich'ukuric wach i kamahc.

To̱b ta nchel wilic ta nak chic cho i c'uhbal re're', re' nk'oric keh chi hoj aj mahc, chi'nchel c'acharel chiwach i rik'ijil cho ric'acharic i Aran cu rehtal rik'ijil cho ric'acharic i Moyses xa xiquimic wo' nak je. Coric, re' Aran xquimic je ru'um chi ma' xibiraj ta i tak'anic ye'o̱j ru'um i Dios eh je' wo' re' xca'n take nic' pa' q'uihal ma' ximahcanic ta ru̱c' ribirmijic k'oric chiwach i Dios je' ricab xiban i Aran. Ru̱c' i mahcanic xiban i Aran nkilow chi wilic xic'am cho chi quina̱ chi'nchel c'acharel ru̱c' ribano̱j. Je' wo' re' xc'uluric ru̱c' i Jesus re' uyumaj chi xc'ulic lok ayu' wach ac'al,

xa re' la' re' quibano̱j take qui̱b re're' rehreh wach. Je' ricab i Aran re' pe̱t winak naxmahcanic xiban chi re' rik'ijil kaquimic xchalic chi kana̱ chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel. Tz'a̱b ru' i jenaj chic winak re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi kaK'atal K'oric xic'uhtaj cho keh i rinimal wach richak'lamil eh ru̱c' re're' xiban wo' chi re' co̱ch riyew cho i Dios ru'um reh richak'lamil ewo' nquic'ul xa nic' pa' q'uihal tinamit nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j.

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um chi re' ribano̱j i Jesus xa je' jeno' co̱ch nok ye'o̱j ru'um i Dios, re' ribano̱j re're' ma' je ta ricab ribano̱j xiban i Aran naxmahcanic. Je' re' nik'or maj naxmahcanic cho i Aran chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel xwih'ic chi kana̱ i ch'ukuj wach mahc xiban i Dios chi re' hoj, hoj aj mahc kabiral ra̱j i ribano̱j i Jesus xiban chi re' Dios xiyew cho keh chi je' ricab jeno' co̱ch chi ma' eta chic nk'ormojic kabiral chi hoj aj mahc, to̱b ta nchel chi'nchel hoj c'acharel q'uihal wach mahc xka'n.

Je' aj re' ru̱c' xiban i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi kaK'atal K'oric, re' take c'acharel xye'eric chic queh i co̱ch chi xa ru'um rinimal richak'lamil i Dios equic'acharic chi coric chic wach quic'ux. Coric ru', ru'um reh rimahc i Aran xiban xojcahnic chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel chi quimic chic ki̱j, xa re' la' ru'um reh Jesus re' take c'acharel quic'ulbic reh i co̱ch ye'o̱j ru'um i Dios, echic quic'acharic chi junpech to̱b ta quiquimok je.

Je' re' k'uru' re' ribano̱j i Jesus rehreh wach chiwach ribano̱j i Aran eh re're' nkacoj rehtal ru̱c' i wili: Naxmahcanic i Aran xicoj chi kana̱ chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel i ch'ukuj wach mahc riban i Dios chi aj mahc kabiral. Tz'a̱b ru' i Jesus re' xa coric wo' wach rino'jbal xiban chi ma' eta chic nk'ormojic keh ru'um i Dios chi aj mahc kabiral eh re' chic yu'na xye'eric chic keh chi ekojc'acharic chi junelic to̱b ta kojquimok je.

Je' wo' chic, ru̱c' i wili nkilow wo' chi rehreh wach ribano̱j i Jesus: Re' Aran nok ma' xibiraj ta k'oric chiwach i Dios, xiban chi chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel xchalic chi kana̱ i ch'ukuj k'oric riban i Dios chi aj mahc kabiral. Ra̱j nchel i Jesus ru̱c' xiban re're' chi xa xibiraj wo' k'oric chiwach i Dios xiban wo' chi nye'eric keh chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel je' ru̱c' nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus chi re' Dios erik'or keh chi coric chic wach kac'ux.

Najtir cho k'i̱j nok re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilco̱j chi ma'xta nak cho i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi kaxilac, re' Dios xiban chi xye'eric keh i c'uhbal re're' eh chi je' re', re' take c'acharel xquirak chiri̱j chi ru'um reh mahc yohbal wach narijohtic wach i c'ahbilal. Coric ru', chi ru'um reh mahc k'e̱' naxjohtic wach i c'ahbilal xoquic cho xa re' la' ru'um reh richak'lamil i Dios k'e̱' wo' chic ato'bil xchalic chi kana̱.

Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab i ricorquilal k'oric chi ru'um reh banoj mahc xojcahnic chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel chi pan quimic chic ki̱j, coric wo' chi re' rato'bil i Dios xa eli̱c wo' nariwih'ic chi kana̱ chi'nchel i hoj ru'um nok re' kAjabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi kaK'atal K'oric xiban chic chi ekojc'acharic chi ma'xta chic kamahc chiwach i Dios eh ru̱c' re're' xiban wo' chi ekojc'acharic chi junelic to̱b ta wo' kojquimok je.

Ha̱', ru'um chi xnik'or lok chi k'e̱' wo' chic rato'bil i Dios wilic cho chi kana̱, wilic take equik'oric chi je' wili nik'or pa nic'uhbalanic: «Xa eli̱c ok wo' kojmahcanok tak eh chi je' re' k'e̱' wo' chic rato'bil i Dios narichalic chi kana̱, nqui enquik'or. Ma'xta, re' hin ma' je' ta re' nik'or maj re' c'uhtunic niban re' i wili:

Je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' i c'acharel re' ricana̱' c'acharic chi junpech china̱ ac'al wili nanquimic je, je' wo' re' i hoj naxkacana̱' chi junpech i c'acharic wilco̱j nak wi̱' najtir chi hoj nak aj mahc, ma' eta chic riban chi ewo' chic kojc'acharic chi je' re'. Ru'um chi je' re' rik'or i nic'uhtunic re're',

re' hat-tak aweht'alim wo' tak i c'uhtunic niban cho aweh tak wili: Re' rikajic kaha̱' re' nka'n i hoj chi c'uhtbal reh i jenaj chic c'acharic xkachop chi hoj raj tahkanel i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, je' wo' re' nka'n c'uhtbal reh chi nkacana̱' wo' chi junpech i c'acharic wilco̱j nak wi̱' najtir chi hoj nak aj mahc je' ricab xiban i Jesus chi chiri̱j chic riquimic xicana̱' i c'acharic china̱ ac'al wili.

Chi je' aj re' i c'uhtunic niban, nipahkaj aweh tak chi je' ricab ru̱c' i rikahsjic kaha̱' nkac'uhtaj chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, xquimic je eh xmuk'unjic je je' wo' re' hat-tak chac'uhtaj wo' tak chi xacana̱' tak chic i c'acharic re' wilic nak najtir chi hat-tak aj mahc eh je' ricab chi re're' xucsjic wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak ru'um rinimal rajawric i Dios chac'uhtaj wo' tak k'uru' chi toco̱m chic riwi̱' ac'acharic tak yu'na.

Ru'um chi xa jenaj chic kawi̱' ru̱c' i Jesus eh xkacana̱' chic i najtir laj c'acharic chi hoj nak aj mahc je' ricab xiban i Jesus chi xicana̱' wo' c'acharic china̱ ac'al wili naxquimic je, re' Dios xiban wo' chi xic'ul i Jesus chi toco̱m chic c'acharic xichop johtok chiri̱j chi ucsumaj chic cho chi quixilac take camnak, je' wo' re' c'uluric ru̱c' i kac'acharic i hoj toco̱m wo' chic xkachop johtok.

Je' re' nkeht'alij maj re' Jesus naxik'ahsaj ric'acharic pan quimic ar wach curu̱s xiban wo' chi re' najtir c'acharic ma'eta chic riban chi cu ewo' chic nka'n chi je' re'. Je' re' xiban reh chi je' ricab nok nsahchic wach riti'jolal ribakil jeno' c'acharel nanquimic je, je' wo' re' i nc'uluric ru̱c' i xa pa' jaric nbanic chi nkotowej ribanaric i mahc, nsahchic wo' wach eh chi je' re' ma' tanlic ta chic chi keh chi xa cu ewo' nka'n i bano̱j re' xkanimej wo' nak cho ribanaric najtir je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' jeno' aj camanom chi xa rinimej wo' k'oric chiwach i rajabe̱s.
Je' re' nok ru'um chi keht'alim chic re're', re' hoj je' ok kacab i c'acharel re' nok camnak chic ncahnic chi tehlic wo' chic ri̱j ric'acharic chiwach ajawric nchopbic nak na̱.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' hoj yu'na xa jenaj chic kawi̱' ru̱c' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh chi je' re' kawi̱' xye'eric wo' chic keh i kajawric chi xkacana̱' chic chi junpech i c'acharic wilco̱j nak wi̱' najtir chi hoj nak aj mahc je' ricab xc'uluric ru̱c' i Jesus chi chiri̱j chic riquimic xicana̱' wo' c'acharic china̱ ac'al wili. Ma' xa ta re're' xye'eric keh, je' la' wo' nye'eric wo' keh chi yu'na nkach'ica̱' chic kac'ux chiri̱j chi nakac'acharic chi junelic chiri̱j nakojquimok je je' ricab xiban i Jesus chi chiri̱j riquimic je xc'acharic wo' chic cho.

Je' re' nik'or maj keht'alim wo' chi re're' xucsjic cho chi quixilac take camnak eh yu'na re're' ma' jaruj ta chic enquimic ru'um nok ma' jaruj ta chic nariwih'ic china̱ ajawric re' nc'ambic cho reh quimic chi quina̱ chi'nchel.
Je' re' ajic je' ricab nok re' riwi̱' chi xquimic i Jesus reh chi ma' eta chic nwih'ic banoj mahc, je wo' re' riwi̱' chi c'achlic wo' chic reh chi til xa ewo' nlok'onjic wach i Dios,

je' wo' re' hat-tak chayew pan acapew-bal tak chi re' riwi̱' i ritahkaljic i kAja̱w Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric na'n tak til je' ricab riwi̱' i c'acharel re' ricana̱' wih'ic chi junpech china̱ ac'al wili nanquimic je, je' wo' re' hat-tak chacana̱' tak chi junpech mahcanic na'n pan ac'acharic tak eh yu'na tic'acharok tak chi re' chic i Dios na̱lok'em tak wach.

Ru'um chi re' riwi̱' i c'acharic naka'nam curman chi je' ok ricab riwi̱' ric'acharic i Jesus, re' hin til nipahkaj aweh tak chi ma' ok chic re' i mahc wilic rajawric chana̱ tak, je' ricab nok jeno' k'atal k'oric wilic rajawric chi quina̱ take c'acharel choplic quina̱ ru'um. Je' re' k'uru' ma' riban chic chi re' mahc enwih'ic rajawric chana̱ tak. Je' re' cha'n tak reh chi re' ati'jolal abakil tak ewo' ricana̱' ribanaric i ma' holohic ta laj bano̱j.

Je' wo' chic nipahkaj aweh tak chi je' ricab riban jenaj sol chi nchalic chiwach i rinahsi̱l eh ricoj ri̱b chi rehquen i pa' bih tak'anic bano̱j reh, je' wo' re' hat-tak chak'ahsaj awi̱b tak chiwach i Dios chi ribanaric i holohic laj bano̱j eh ma̱k'ahsaj tak chic awi̱b chi mahcanic on chi ribanaric i c'ahbilal. Je' re' nik'or maj re' hat-tak toco̱m chic riwi̱' ac'acharic tak je' chic ricab riwi̱' ric'acharic i c'acharel re' uctunak chic chi quixilac take camnak.

Je' wo', wi je' re' na'n tak ma' eta chic nwih'ic chana̱ tak i ajawric re' nbanic chi quimahcanic take c'acharel. Coric ru' chi nok cu c'ahchi' nak ac'acharic chi chopo̱j ana̱ tak cu'um take tak'anic ye'o̱j ru'um Moyses re' take re' ta bih xicamanej aweh chi atobjic tak chiwach ajawric re're' raj yu'na c'ahchi' chic ac'acharic chi chopo̱j ana̱ tak ru'um i Dios eh re're' til ato̱b chaweh tak.

Ha̱', ru'um chi xnik'or lok chi c'ahchi' nak kac'acharic chi chopo̱j kana̱ cu'um take tak'anic ye'o̱j ru'um Moyses raj yu'na re' chic Dios re' nchopbic kana̱ re' chic re' nto'bonic keh, wilic take equik'oric chi ru̱c' nic'uhbalanic c'ahchi' riye'eric k'ab keh hoj aj niminel chi eriban chi ekojmahcanic. Ma'xta, ma' je' ta re' i c'uhtunic c'ahchi'qui̱n

re' la' wili c'uhtunic niban: Je' ricab aweht'alim tak chi hab pa' wach u̱c' nak'ahsaj awi̱b tak chi birinic k'oric re' wo' re' nwih'ic rajawric chana̱ tak, je' wo' aweht'alim tak nic' wach nc'uluric nok chopo̱j ana̱ tak ru'um i ribanaric i mahc on ru'um i Dios. Je' re' nik'or maj re' c'acharel re' rik'ahsaj ri̱b chi mahcanic, re're' ma'xta ric'acharic chi junelic ru̱c' i Dios nok camnak chic je. Raj i c'acharel re' rik'ahsam chic ri̱b chi ribirmijic k'oric chiwach i Dios re' cok re' npahbabjic chi coric wach ric'ux.

Chiri̱j chi nik'orom chic lok re're', re' hin k'e̱' nitioxej reh Dios ru'um nok to̱b ta re' nak i mahc wilic rajawric chana̱ tak je' ricab nok china̱ jeno' aj camanom re' wo' ajabe̱s wilic rajawric china̱, yu'na ma' je' ta chic re' nc'uluric awu̱c' tak. Je' re' nik'or maj naxabiraj tak i lok' laj c'uhtunic k'oro̱j aweh tak chiri̱j i Jesus eh xac'ul wo' tak pan awa̱mna tak ru̱c' chi'nchel c'uxlis,

re' hat-tak xatcahnic tak chi tehlic chic awi̱j tak chiwach i mahc re' wilic nak rajawric chana̱ tak je' ricab nanteheric ri̱j jeno' aj camanom ma' re' ta chic i ajabe̱s re' nak wilic cok wi̱' wilic rajawric china̱. Je' re' k'uru' yu'na je' na wa'ric toco̱m chic ajabe̱s xak'ahsaj awi̱b tak chiwach chi camanic eh chi etic'acharic tak chiwach ru̱c' coric wach c'uxlis.

Chacuy tak nimahc chi nok c'ahchi' nik'oric je awu̱c' tak chiri̱j i k'oro̱j chic cho aweh tak, re' hin c'ahchi' nijalwachem wach ru̱c' i no'jbal nkilow chi nc'uluric chi kaxilac i hoj c'acharel xa re' la' i ricorquil wili, re' hin je' re' c'ahchi' nibanam ru'um nok nicapaj wi toco̱m chic rik'ormojic eniban je aweh tak ma' eta nak narak tak chiri̱j. Re' aj wili jalwach k'oric nik'or je aweh tak: Je' ricab rik'ahsjic ri̱b pa ricamaj riban jeno' aj camanom je' wo' re' xak'ahsaj awi̱b hat-tak najtir k'i̱j chi risiq'uiric ribanaric i c'ahbilal ch'i̱l wo' ribanaric xa pa' jaric mahquilal. Wi najtir k'i̱j je' re' rik'ahsjic awi̱b xa'n tak, yu'na chic chi xak'ahsaj awi̱b tak chi rinimjic i Dios til curman chi riman chic rik'ahsjic awi̱b na̱banam tak chi ribanaric i haj wilic i coric wach chi banaric.

Coric ru', awu̱c' hat-tak xc'uluric je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' aj camanom re' nok wilic chic chi rehquen rajawric i jenaj ajabe̱s, ric'raj chi ma' tanlic ta chic chiri̱j ribanaric i haj nak wilic ra̱j i jenaj chic ajabe̱s eh ru'um re' najtir cho k'i̱j ma'xta nak cho chana̱ tak ribanaric i haj wilic i coric wach no'jbal re' la' nak i mahc xwih'ic cho rajawric chana̱ tak.

To̱b ta nak chaweh cho hat-tak wilic nak ricorquilal awih'ic tak cho chipam i capew-bal re're', yu'na ma' je' ta chic re'. Yu'na k'e̱' la' chic tiq'uix'ic tak ru'um take c'ahbil laj bano̱j xa'n tak cho maj aweht'alim tak chi re' take bano̱j re're', re' ma'xta bih xicamanej aweh tak chi junpech, riban re' chi re' take je' re' quibanic ma' eta quic'acharic chi junelic ru̱c' i Dios chiri̱j nok camnak chic take je.

Je' re' ajic to̱b ta najtir cho k'i̱j ma'xta nak i ihk chana̱ tak chi ribanaric i haj nak wilic i coric wach c'uxlis, yu'na chic ma' je' ta chic re' nbanjic awu̱c' tak maj je' ricab nanteheric ri̱j jeno' aj camanom, ricana̱' wih'ic chi rehquen rajawric jeno' toco̱m chic ajabe̱s, je' wo' re' hat-tak xacana̱' wo' tak wih'ic chi ri'sil rajawric i mahc. Chi je' re' xa je' na ricab chi re' hat-tak xak'ahsaj awi̱b tak pan k'ab jeno' toco̱m chic ajabe̱s chi aj camanom, re' chic i Dios wilic chi Ajabe̱s chana̱ tak eh ru'um re', re' c'acharic ru̱c' coric wach c'uxlis re' chic re' i ihk wilic chana̱ tak chi ribanaric yu'na. Wi je' re' na'n tak re' aj i wili enye'eric aweh tak nacohlsjok wach ac'acharic china̱ ac'al wili: Cu etic'acharic tak chi junelic to̱b ta tiquimok tak je.

Je' aj re' enye'eric aweh tak maj ru'um reh ritahkaljic i Jesus na'n tak, re' Dios je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak riyeb jeno' asi̱ tak, xiyew chic aweh chi etic'acharic tak chi junelic to̱b ta tiquimok tak je. Raj take c'acharel re' nquik'ahsaj qui̱b chi mahcanic ma' je' ta re' nc'uluric cu̱c' maj je' ricab nok re' take aj camanom nquic'ul tojbal reh quicamaj nca'n, je' wo' re' i Dios naribanam wo' chi re' take re' naquiquimok je enquic'ul chi tojbal queh chi ma' eta quic'acharic ar re' wilic wi̱' i Dios.

Hat-tak wich aj niminel reh Jesus, re' nanik'orom lok wili re' hat-tak echic narak tak chiri̱j chi coric yu'na, ru'um nok ana'bem tak chic chi coric nic' wach ncamanic i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi richoporic kana̱ i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Ru'um chi ana'bem tak chic chi coric re're', xana'bej wo' tak chi coric chi re' c'uhbal re're' richop kana̱ xa re' nok cu c'achalco̱j, chiri̱j chic ru' ma'xta chic

je' ricab nkilow chi nc'uluric ru̱c' i c'uhbal nchopbic na̱ ric'acharic jeno' ixok ch'i̱l i ribahi̱l nanca'n caxa̱ra. Re' c'uhbal re're' ritik'a̱' chi nok caxa̱ra chic ru̱c' i ribahi̱l, re' ixok ma' ye'o̱j ta chic k'ab reh chi erisic' chic jeno' winak chi naribahilem chiwach rik'ijil ric'acharic ribahi̱l, ra̱j nchel wi xquimic je i ribahi̱l re' ixok re're' ncahnic chi tehlic wo' chic ri̱j chiwach i tak'anic re're' eh chi ribanaric wo' chic caxa̱ra.

Kak'or wi re' ixok re're' risic' chic jeno' winak nok cu c'achlic ribahi̱l, re're' enk'ormojic reh chi c'oyo̱m laj ixok, tz'a̱b ru' wi xquimic je ribahi̱l re' ixok re're' ncahnic chi tehlic chic ri̱j chiwach i tak'anic re're' eh wi xiban wo' chic caxa̱ra ma' eta nk'ormojic chi c'oyo̱m laj ixok.

Nic' pa' wach nk'ormojic chiri̱j ixok re're', je' aj wo' re' eriban chi enk'ormojic chawi̱j i wili i hat-tak wich aj niminel reh Jesus: Re' hat-tak ma' re' ta chic i rajawric i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses wilic chana̱ tak maj re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, xquimic reh chi toco̱m chic enwih'ic rajawric chana̱ tak. Yu'na ajic re' wilic rajawric chana̱ tak re' chic i Jesus re' xuctic wo' chi quixilac take camnak reh chi re' hoj raj tahkanel ewo' nka'n take bano̱j quibanic chi nye'eric rilok'il i kAja̱w Dios,

ra̱j najtir cho k'i̱j ma' je' ta re' xka'n cho. Nok cu hoj nak aj mahc re' hoj xa eli̱c wo' k'e̱' xkotowej ribanaric i mahc eh riman chic xiban i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi xkotowej ribanaric take bano̱j re' xa nca'n chi re' take c'acharel nca'n re're' ma' eta quic'acharic ru̱c' i Dios chiri̱j quiquimic.

Ra̱j yu'na ma' je' ta chic re' nc'uluric ku̱c' maj pan toco̱m chic rik'ijil wilco̱j wi̱' nok chi re' chic i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios n-nimjic eh ru'um re' riban chic chi enka'n ribanaric haj wilic ra̱j i Dios. Chi ma' wilco̱j ta chic chipam i najtir rik'ijil chi cu re' i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses n-nimjic, xatcahnic wo' tak chi tehlic chic awi̱j tak chiwach i c'uhbal nchopbic nak ana̱ tak re're' je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' ixok re' naxquimic je ribahi̱l re' wilic nak rajawric china̱ ric'acharic xcahnic chi tehlic chic ri̱j chiwach i tik'inic re' rik'or nak chi ma' riban ta chi ewo' chic riban caxa̱ra wi cu c'achlic ribahi̱l.

Ha̱', ru'um chi xnik'or chi tehlic chic awi̱j tak chiwach i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses wilic aweh tak equik'oric chi re' hin c'ahchi' wo' nik'orom chi re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses re're' nbanic chi re' hoj kojmahcanic. Ma'xta, re' hin ma' je' ta re' c'ahchi' nik'orom re' la' i wili i nic'uhtunic niban: Ma' ta nak ru'um i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ma' jaruj ta nak xkana'bej chi wilic po' nak take kabano̱j re' c'ahchi' ka'nam mahc po' nchel take. Reh chi enc'utunic wach ricorquilal i k'oro̱j lok, kilow re' nc'uluric nok re' hoj k'e̱' nkac'ax wach i pa' bih wilic reh jeno' c'acharel cu rehtal nkac'ax nak wach rimak'aric reh. Ma' ta nak k'oro̱j ribiral ru'um i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi ma'xta kac'axam wach i pa' bih wilic reh jeno' c'acharel cu rehtal nkac'ax nak wach rimak'aric reh ma' xkana'bej ta wo' nak wi nchel mahc wo' nak c'ahchi'co̱j nok je' re' nka'n.

Re' cok ru' je' ricab nok pan jeno' k'ak'anic wilic jenaj ye'a̱b re' np'uhtic je wi̱', je' aj wo' re' reht'aljic i kamahc nka'n, ar np'uhtic cho ru̱c' take tak'anic ye'o̱j cho ru'um i Dios najtir k'i̱j. Ru'um aj re' keht'alim chi re' ritutil i mahc wilic pan ka̱mna nbanic chi k'e̱' wo' chic nkotowej ribanaric chi'nchel wach c'ahbilal. Re're' nkana'bej ru'um chi wilic ku̱c' i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses maj je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' jeno' c'acharel nanquimic je chi ma' nkeht'alij ta chic i chaj bih c'ahchi' ribanam, je' wo' re' i hoj ma' nkana'bej ta wo' nak i k'oro̱j wili chiri̱j i ritutil i mahc ma' ta nak wilic ku̱c' i c'uhbal re're'.

Je' re' nik'or maj najtir cho k'i̱j xwih'ic cho jenaj rik'ijil nok re' c'uhbal re're' ma'xta nak ku̱c' i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh ru'um re' ma' xkeht'alij ta nak chi wilic po' nak take kabano̱j re' c'ahchi' ka'nam mahc po' nchel take, xa re' la' xponic rik'ijil chi xye'eric keh i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Ru̱c' re', nok re' chic i c'uhbal re're' ntak'anic chi kana̱ i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi ma'xta kamahcanic, xkana'bej chi wilic take kabano̱j c'ahchi' ka'nam, mahc po' nchel take eh je' wo' xkana'bej wo' chi ma' eta kojc'acharic ru̱c' i Dios chiri̱j kaquimic je.

Ar aj ru' naxkana'bej re're' xkarak wo' chiri̱j i wili: Chi re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses re' ntak'anic chi kana̱ chi ma'xta chic kamahcanic reh chi je' re' ekojc'acharic wo' ru̱c' i Dios chi junelic, xcamanic wo' keh chi rinabjic chi nakojquimok je ma' eta wo' riban chi ekojc'acharic ru̱c' chi je' re' kawi̱'

maj re' kamahc re' wo' re' nbanic chi je' re' nc'uluric ku̱c'. Re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses re' aj wo' re' xcamanic reh mahc reh chi xc'uluric ku̱c' chi je' re' maj pa risa̱l chic xojcapewenic ru'um kamahc, p'uht kacapam chi ru'um chi re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses nchopbic kana̱, ta k'oric chiri̱j chi kojmahcanic.

Je' re' k'uru' kabiram chic chi'nchel re're' chiri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses re' aj wili ra̱j k'ormojic chiri̱j: Re' c'uhbal re're' jenaj c'uhbal k'e̱' lo̱k' eh ju'junal queh take tak'anic wilque̱b chipam i c'uhbal re're' k'e̱' wo' lo̱k' take eh chi'nchel re're', xye'eric reh chi naribanam chi coric ok wach kac'ux eh holohic ok take kabano̱j.

Coric ru', wilic take tak'anic wilque̱b chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xiye'eric reh chi holohic ok take kabano̱j, nqui nk'ormojic xa re' la' wilic wo' take je' wili nquik'or chiwi̱j: «Chaweh hat ma' Lu̱', re' take tak'anic nbanic keh chi nakojquimic je ma' riban ta chi ekojwih'ic re' wilic wi̱' i Dios, nqui enquik'or. Ra̱j nitijinic i hin ma' jaruj ta eriban chi je' re' i rik'or, re' la' i wili rik'or nitijinic i hin: Ju'jun queh take tak'anic xye'eric keh re're' reh chi holohic ok kabano̱j naka'nam, xicamanic wo' keh i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi naxojmahcanic xkana'bej wo' haj wilic i mahc xka'n eh je' wo' xkana'bej chi ru'um reh kamahc ma' riban ta nak chic chi ekojwih'ic re' wilic wi̱' i Dios. Re' nitijinic k'uru' rik'or chi ru̱c' take tak'anic xye'eric keh re're' reh chi holohic ok kabano̱j naka'nam nc'uhtunic lok wach haj wilic c'ahbilal nc'uluric nakojmahcanic.

Je' re' k'uru' re' wili nkeht'alij chiri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses: Chi re' take k'oric wilic chipam re' take re' k'oro̱j ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios. Ra̱j chiwach i c'uhbal re're', re' hin xa hin jenaj c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma'xta ransil chi ric'amjic na̱ eh ru'um re're' nc'uluric wu̱c' je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' i c'acharel je' ru̱c' nanc'ayjic je, xa re' wo' i camanic tak'amaj ru'um ajabe̱s xlok'bic reh, xa re' wo' re' riban, maj re' hin xa re' wo' i mahcanic niban.

Nok je' re' niban, re' aj wili nc'uluric wu̱c': Re' hin ma' nirak ta chiri̱j chaj bih riwi̱' naniban i mahc eh je' re' nik'or maj ma' nirak ta chiri̱j chaj wa'ric chi re' hin nok nwa̱j nak nibanam i haj wilic i tare̱t, ma' re' ta wo' chic re' niban, re' la' chic i mahc re' ma' nwa̱j ta nak ribanaric re' chic re' niban.

Je' re' k'uru' nok re' hin niban i haj wilic ma' nwa̱j ta nak chi nanibanam, xa c'uhtunic riban lok reh re' xnik'or chic lok chiri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Re' aj wili ric'uhtaj lok: Re' c'uhbal re're' xye'eric cho reh chi enka'n i coric wach c'uxlis

xa re' la' hoj ma' je' ta wo' re' nka'n, je' la' chic wili nc'uluric ku̱c': Chi ma' re' ta chic i hoj wilic kajawric china̱ kac'acharic, re' la' chic i ritutil mahc re' chic re' til nchopbic na̱ kac'acharic.

Nok je' re' nc'uluric, je' wo' keht'alim chi je' wili nc'uluric ku̱c' i hoj: Re' hoj ma'xta chic kansil chi ribanaric i coric wach c'uxlis eh keht'alim chi je' re' nc'uluric maj pan kacapew-bal nka̱j nak ka'nam i coric wach c'uxlis xa re' la' ma' re' ta wo' chic re're' nka'n,
re' la' chic i mahc re' ma' nka̱j ta nak ka'nam, re' chic re' nka'n eh chi je' re', ma' re' ta chic i coric wach c'uxlis nka̱j ka'nam.

Je' re' k'uru' nok re' hoj nka'n i haj wilic re' ma' nka̱j ta nak ka'nam, ric'uhtaj lok i k'oro̱j chic lok wili: Chi ma' re' ta chic i hoj wilic kajawric china̱ kac'acharic, re' la' chic i ritutil mahc re' chic re' til nchopbic na̱ kac'acharic.

Chi je' aj re' nankacoj rehtal chi re' mahc re' ma' nka̱j ta nak ribanaric re' wo' ritutil i mahc re' nchopbic kana̱ nbanic cho eh chi je' re', re' hoj to̱b ta nak nka̱j ka'nam i coric wach c'uxlis ma' re' ta wo' chic re' nka'n
maj to̱b ta nak re' hoj xa suk chic pan ka̱mna nkacoj pan kacapew-bal chi tare̱t rik'or i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses,

ma' re' ta chic i c'uhbal re're' wilic rajawric chi kana̱, nkarak la' chiri̱j chi toco̱m chic wilic rajawric chi kana̱. Kak'or je' ricab jenaj aj camanom ma' ra̱j ta chic ribiram k'oric chiwach i wilic nak chi ajabe̱s china̱, je' wo' re' i hoj nok toco̱m chic wilic rajawric chi kana̱, ma' c'ahchi' ta chic kabiram k'oric chiwach i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses to̱b ta wo' nak keht'alim cho pan kacapew-bal chi tare̱t i k'oric riban. Re' nc'uluric ku̱c' i hoj yu'na je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' jeno' c'acharel nchoporic eh nc'amaric je reh chi toco̱m chic ajabe̱s enwih'ic rajawric china̱. Je' re' nik'or maj re' mahc re' til k'e̱' nka̱j ka'nam ribanaric, re' aj re' nwih'ic rajawric chi kana̱.

Ru'um nok chi je' re' riwi̱' kac'acharic, re' hin nicapaj chi riwi̱' nak chi enik'or chi k'e̱' quetal kawach ma' ta nak wilic jeno' aj co'lem keh chiwach i kaquimic re' c'ahchi' ricora̱b je wi̱' ri̱b kati'jolal kabakil wili.

Ra̱j wili wilic jenaj aj co'lem keh. Chi je' aj re' ku̱c' i hoj nc'uluric je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' i c'acharel re' ncamanic chiwach quib ok chi ajabe̱s re' wilic i cajawric china̱, maj chi kana̱ i hoj wilic rajawric C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses re' nkac'am na̱ ru'um chi pan kacapew-bal keht'alim cho chi tare̱t i k'oric riban eh je' wo' chi kana̱ i hoj wilic wo' rajawric ritutil i mahc re' nbanic chi k'e̱' nkitowej ribanaric i c'ahbilal. Ru̱c' i c'axquilal re're', re' hin k'e̱' nitioxej johtok i Dios ru̱c' i wili: Chi re' nco'lonic keh chiwach i c'axquilal re're', re' pe' Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi kana̱!

Ru'um chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi kaK'atal K'oric nco'lonic keh, re' wo' wili nik'or aweh tak yu'na chi nc'uluric ku̱c' i hoj raj tahkanel: Ru'um chi kojc'acharic chi ma' chopo̱j ta kana̱ ru'um i no'jbal re' wilic wi̱' i ritutil i mahc re' la' chic i Lok' laj Uxlabal re' chic re' nchopbic kana̱, re' hoj ma' wilic ta chic i ti'c'axic chi kana̱ re' narichalic nak chi kana̱ ru'um kamahc.

Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' jenaj aj camanom re' ncahnic chi tehlic chic ri̱j nok toco̱m chic ajabe̱s nesenic reh chi ri'sil rajawric ajabe̱s wilic nak wi̱', re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi kaK'atal K'oric xiban chi re' Lok' laj Uxlabal re' nye'bic keh i ac' kac'acharic nchopbic kana̱ eh ru̱c' re're', re' Jesus xojresaj chi rehquen rajawric i ritutil i mahc. Je' wo' xiban chi ma' eta kojcahnic chi ma' eta kojc'acharic ru̱c' i Dios nok hoj chic camnak je.

Re' xiban i Jesus re're' ma' jaruj ta xc'uluric nok cu wilco̱j chi chopo̱j kana̱ ru'um i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Je' re' nik'or maj to̱b ta re' c'uhbal re're' ritak'a̱' keh ribanaric i coric, re' hoj ma'xta ransil i kano'jbal chi ribanaric. Ru'um chi je' nak re' kawi̱', re' wili xiban i Dios chi to'bal keh: Re're' xitak'a̱' cho ayu' wach ac'al i Jesus re' rAc'u̱n reh chi re' chic re' xc'ulbic reh i ti'c'axic nariye'eric nak keh hoj chi'nchel c'acharel ru'um kamahc. Je' wo', re' Dios xiban wo' chi re' Jesus xasjic chi wilic riti'jolal ribakil je' ricab kati'jolal kabakil i hoj c'acharel aj mahc. Chi je' re' riwi̱' i Jesus, re' Dios xiban wo' chic i wili: Re're' xiyew reh chi re' ritutil i mahc re' wilic nak chi kana̱, xesmejic lok ru'um.

Chaj bih riwi̱' chi xiban i Dios chi'nchel re're'? Re' Dios xiban chi je' re' reh chi re' hoj re' ekojc'acharic chi ma' re' ta chic ritutil i mahc wilic rajawric chi kana̱ re' la' chic rajawric i Lok' laj Uxlabal wilic chi kana̱ eh ru̱c' re're' echic nka'n canar rinimjic take tak'anic bano̱j chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses.

Je' re' k'uru' ru̱c' i nik'orom chic lok, nkilow chi wilic ca'ch'uk wach c'acharel: Re' take c'acharel re' quic'acharic chi re' ritutil mahc nchopbic na̱ quino'jbal eh ru'um re' eli̱c wo' wilic pan quicapew-bal ribanaric i mahc re' rotowej i no'jbal re're'. Re' chic take junch'uk, re' chic i Lok' laj Uxlabal nchopbic quina̱ eh ru'um re', re' ric'amaric na̱ i haj pa' wilic no'jbal nye'eric queh ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal re' wo' re' nca'n ribanaric.

Chiqui̱j take quic'acharic chi c'ahchi' quic'amam na̱ take no'jbal nye'eric queh ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal, nik'or aweh tak chi re' take re' xa suk laj c'acharic wo' naca'nam chi junpech ar ru̱c' Dios ra̱j take quic'acharic chi c'ahchi' ca'nam i c'ahbilal rik'or cho i quicapew-bal, nik'or aweh tak chi re' take re' naquiquimok je ma' re' ta ru̱c' i Dios naquic'acharic chi junpech.

Je' re' nik'or chi nc'uluric ru'um nc'ulmujic wo' wili cu̱c' take c'acharel c'ahchi'que̱b chi c'ahbilal ru'um chi ma' riban ta chi queh chi nquiyew qui̱b pan k'ab i Dios: Re' take c'acharel re're' qui'o̱j mikrok chi ra̱j ixowonel chic i Dios take ru'um reh quicapew-bal re're'.
Chi je' re' nc'uluric re' take c'acharel re're', re' quic'acharic chi re' ritutil i mahc nchopbic na̱ quino'jbal, ma' jaruj ta nquisuksaj ric'ux i Dios ru̱c' c'ahchi'que̱b.

Ra̱j awu̱c' hat-tak ma' je' ta re' nc'uluric ru'um nok re' hat-tak ma' tic'acharic ta tak chic chi chopo̱j ana̱ tak ru'um ritutil i mahc. Re' chic hat-tak tic'acharic la' tak chi chopo̱j ana̱ tak ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal re' til wilic awu̱c' tak. Ru'um chi re' Lok' laj Uxlabal re' riyeb aweh tak i Dios ch'i̱l i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric wilic awu̱c' tak, re're' nc'uhtunic lok wi̱' chi re' hat-tak, hat-tak aj niminel reh Jesus. Je' re' nik'or maj re' c'acharel re' ma' wilic ta ru̱c' i Lok' laj Uxlabal keht'al chi ma' re' ta raj tahkanel.

Raj i hat-tak til wilic awu̱c' tak i Lok' laj Uxlabal eh chi je' re', re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, til xa wilic wo' awu̱c' tak. Ru'um aj re' xa cu re' wo' nok xiban i Dios chi coric chic wach ac'ux tak, re' Lok' laj Uxlabal xiban wo' chi junelic chic i c'acharic xac'ul tak ru̱c', to̱b ta wo' til pa ricorquilal hoj chi'nchel nakaquimic je.

Re' cok ru' to̱b ta wo' nariponic i k'i̱j chi re' kati'jolal re' quimic ri̱j yu'na narisahchic wach nakojquimok je, re' hoj xa ma'xta wo' kaquimic je chi junpech ru'um chi wilic ku̱c' i Lok' laj Uxlabal re' xucsunic cho reh chi quixilac take camnak i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Ma' xa re' ta re', je' la' wo' ru'um chi wilic ku̱c' ru' naribanam wo' chi re' kati'jolal naric'acharic wo' chic cho.

Je' aj re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k', je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' jeno' aj c'a̱s chi re' nwih'ic rajawric china̱ re' wo' i c'acharel re' nye'bic riquime̱l, je' wo' re' awu̱c' hat-tak. Je' re' nik'or maj re' Lok' laj Uxlabal wilic awu̱c' tak re' chic re' wilic rajawric chana̱ tak yu'na. Chi je' re' k'uru' chi ma' re' ta chic i ritutil i mahc wilic rajawric chana̱ tak, ma' riban ta chic chi etic'acharic tak chi cu c'ahchi'ca̱t tak chi mahcanic.

Je' re' nik'or maj wi cu je' re' c'acharic na'n tak, ma'xta ac'acharic tak ru̱c' i Dios chi junpech natiquimok tak je. Ra̱j nchel wi nayew tak k'ab reh Lok' laj Uxlabal chi eribehsaj ac'acharic tak eh chi je' re' ma'xta chic riwih'ic pan ac'acharic tak i c'ahbilal xa'n tak cho naxatc'acharic tak cho pan mahc, re' hat-tak na̱c'acharic tak ru̱c' i Dios chi junpech

ru'um nok re' hat-tak til hat-tak chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take c'acharel nanquiyew k'ab reh Lok' laj Uxlabal chi enbehsenic reh quic'acharic, nquic'uhtaj lok chi re' take re' til rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios chic take.

Je' re' ajic re' hat-tak chayew tak k'ab reh Lok' laj Uxlabal chi eribehsaj ac'acharic tak. Re' cok ru' wi je' re' na'n tak xa ru'um chi tiyo'jic tak, ma' tare̱t ta. Je' re' nik'or maj re' Dios ma' xiyew ta aweh tak i Lok' laj rUxlabal reh chi naric'uluric awu̱c' tak je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' i jeno' aj camanom re' riban i camanic pahkamaj reh xa ru'um chi k'e̱' nyo'jic chiwach ajabe̱s china̱. Awu̱c' tak i hat ma' je' ta re' ra̱j chi nc'uluric maj re' Dios ma' xiyew ta aweh tak i Lok' laj rUxlabal reh chi naricojom cho yo'jic chana̱ tak, xiyew la' aweh tak reh chi na̱weht'alim tak i xiban i Dios wili: Chi re' hat-tak, hat-tak chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n chiwach. Je' re' ajic ru'um chi re' Lok' laj Uxlabal ma' ricoj ta cho yo'jic chi kana̱, yu'na riban chic chi keh chi enkak'or “Pah” reh Ajabe̱s Dios nakojk'oric ru̱c'
eh je' re' nik'or maj ru'um k'oric riban i Lok' laj Uxlabal pan ka̱mna, re' hoj nkeht'alij chi hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios.

Ru'um chi re' hoj, hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios, wilic take cuse'sbal nariye'eric keh. Re' hin nik'or chi je' re' ru'um i wili: Re' Dios re' xbanic chi enkac'ul take ricuse'sbal xitik'a̱' chic wach chi nankac'ul take ti'c'axic ru'um reh kaniminic je' ricab xc'uluric ru̱c' i Jesus chi xic'ul wo' i ti'c'axic, re' hoj wo' enkac'ul take kacuse'sbal je' ricab xc'uluric ru̱c' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi xic'ul wo' take ricuse'sbal. Je' re' xitik'a̱' wach i Dios reh chi re' hoj enkac'ul i kalok'il je' ricab xc'uluric ru̱c' i Jesus chi xic'ul wo' rilok'il.

Ru'um aj re' chiwach take ti'c'axic nkac'ul ru'um reh kaniminic, re' wili nicapew-bal i hin chiri̱j re're': Re' hoj aj niminel ma'xta bih ericamanej keh chi enkacoj rehtal take ti'c'axic nkac'ul, re' la' til k'e̱' wo' chic encamanic keh re' ricojoric rehtal i kalok'il nariye'eric naponok rik'ijil ric'uluric re' narilmijic wo' cu'um toco̱m chic c'acharel.

Nik'or chi je' re' ru'um i wili: Nic' pa' chic nimal tik'imaj take ru'um i Dios xa nca̱j chic quilom wach chaj bih naric'uluric chipam i k'i̱j re' xa c'ahchi' chic cuy'em wi̱' chi nc'uhtjic chi re' hoj til hoj rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios

maj cu̱c' take nic' pa' chic nimal re're' xc'uluric chi re' nim laj holonquilal xa̱j nak riyeb i Dios queh chi manlic ma' ja' nmahnic ta chic wach cu̱c' eh je' re' xc'uluric cu̱c' ma' ru'um ta chi re' take re' xca̱j chi xc'uluric chi je' re', ru'um la' chi re' Dios xa̱j chi re' take re' encuy'ej i k'i̱j nok re' take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios enquic'ul quilok'il.

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um chi re' take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios naquic'ulum quilok'il, nic' pa' chic q'uihal take ritik'inic i Dios nc'ulmujic wo' cu̱c', je' na ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' jenaj c'acharel re' nteheric ri̱j chi camanic chiwach jeno' ajabe̱s reh chi narip'utum ric'acharic je' ricab quic'acharic take rich c'acharel tehlic qui̱j chi c'acharic. Je' re' nik'or chi naric'uluric maj je' ricab chi re' take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios nok quic'ulum chic quilok'il ma' jaruj ta chic narisahchic wach quiti'jolal quibakil, re' riholonquilal i nic' pa' chic q'uihal ritik'inic i Dios narimanlajic wach eh ma' jaruj ta chic narisahchic wach.

Raj yu'na ma' ja' nc'uluric ta re're'. Je' re' nik'or ru'um nok keht'alim chi je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' jeno' yowa̱b ixok ponic chic wach rik'ijil rasjic riha'lac'u̱n re're' ruy'ej chi rilow wach sakom i riha'lac'u̱n chi xa q'ueric chic chi̱' chi ok'ic ru'um riti'quilal nchalic chiri̱j, je' wo' re' nc'uluric cu̱c' nic' pa' chic nimal ritik'inic i Dios. Je' re' nik'or maj to̱b ta pan ti'c'axic wilque̱b, xa uyu'unic wo' nca'n cu rehtal nmanlajic wach quiholonquilal.

Ma' xa re' ta wo' re' uyunic nca'n, je' la' wo' i hoj rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios c'ahchi' wo' kuy'em chi nariye'eric i kalok'il. Je' ricab chi re' take tic mu'u̱n nanquip'ut cho wachanic, re' aj ehcham reh ric'am cho take pe̱t wach chiwach i Dios rehtalil chi cu wilic take wach ritic narimolom, je' wo' re' i Lok' laj Uxlabal wilic chic ku̱c' yu'na rehtalil chi chikawach johtok wilic i k'i̱j chi nariye'eric i kalok'il uyu'umaj ku'um. Ru'um aj chi je' re' naric'uluric, re' hoj yu'na to̱b ta pan ti'c'axic wilco̱j, nkatik ju' ruyu'njic i k'i̱j nok chi jelow-bal i kati'jolal wilic yu'na enye'eric keh jenaj toco̱m chic ac' laj ti'jolal. Nok c'ulu̱j chic chi je' re', enc'utunic wo' lok wach chi manlic chi re' hoj chiwach i Dios til hoj rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' hoj, chi hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios ma' ja' nc'utunic ta lok wach chi manlic xa re' la' ru' xa re' wo' kacojom cho wach i ribiral chi re' Dios xojrico'lej chiwach i ti'c'axic wilic nak chi kana̱, xa ar wo' kap'utum cho rich'iquinjic kac'ux chi ruyu'njic i k'i̱j naric'uhtunic lok wi̱' chi manlic chi hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios. Je' re' k'uru' ru'um chi ja' nponic ta wach rik'ijil re're', curman chi nakatikim ju' rich'iquinjic kac'ux chiri̱j. Wi ta nak xc'uhtunic chic lok wach chi manlic, ma'xta nak chic riwi̱' chi keh chi cu enkach'ica̱' kac'ux chiri̱j re're', maje'? Nik'or chi je' re' maj ma' hab ta jeno' wach re' c'ahchi' ruy'em jeno' pa' bih, cu eritik ju' ruyu'njic wi xilow chi xc'uluric chic.
Je' re' k'uru' xa cu c'ahchi' wo' kuy'em riponic i k'i̱j re're', to̱b ta nchel chi ru'um ruyu'njic nchalic ti'c'axic chi kana̱ re' nkacuy ransil

ru'um chi re' Lok' laj Uxlabal wilic ku̱c' chi katobjic, je' wo' ricab nakojrito'bej pan kati̱j nok re' hoj ma'xta kano'jbal chi pahkanic. Re' hin je' re' nik'or maj coric ru', nanka'n kati̱j q'uih pech ma' nkarak ta chiri̱j haj wilic take k'oric ra̱j k'ormojic chiwach i Dios eh ru'um re' ma' nkarak ta chic kak'orbal chiwach. Xa re' la' nankac'ul chi je' re', re' chic i Lok' laj Uxlabal nk'oric pan kajelow-bal ru̱c' take k'oric je' ru̱c' ma' eta wo' kojchol rik'ormojic i hoj.

Je' re' ajic nok re' hoj ma' keht'alim ta chaj bih take k'oric ra̱j k'ormojic pan kati̱j chiwach i Dios, re' Lok' laj rUxlabal ru' kojrito'bej chi k'oric ru̱c' eh re' Dios re're', re' reht'alim take capew-bal xa pan kac'ux wilic cho, til reht'alim wo' chi pa ricapew-bal i rUxlabal xa re' wo' katobjic i hoj wilic cho. Ru'um aj re' xa̱j chi re' rUxlabal enk'oric chiki̱j pan kati̱j.

Je' wo' chic, re' hoj keht'alim wo' i wili chiri̱j i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios: Chi nok wilco̱j pan ti'c'axic re' wo' re' nto'bonic keh hoj re' ti' nkic'raj i Dios. Ru'um reh to'bonic nkac'ul re're', chi'nchel nc'uluric ku̱c' ncamanic keh chi ye'bal sukquil c'uxlis pan kac'acharic. Re' aj i wih'ic pan sukquil laj c'uxlis nc'uluric ku̱c' i hoj ru'um chi re' Dios xojriyuk'ej chi enkac'ul i tik'inic xiban.

Je' re' nik'or maj chiki̱j i hoj re' hoj po' chic rina'bem cho Dios chi nakach'ica̱b kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus, re' Dios xiban i wili: Nok ja' kojritik'a̱' ta cho i hoj c'acharel, re' Dios xitik'a̱' chic cho wach chi re' Jesus re' rAc'u̱n, re're' nariwih'ic chi kasbe̱s reh chi je' re', re' kano'jbal i hoj naribanam je' ricab i rino'jbal ru'. Je' wo' chic, re' Dios xiban i tik'inic re're' reh chi re' Jesus nariwih'ic riq'uihal take richa̱k' re' equiye'bic rilok'il je' ricab ric'ul jeno' pe̱t ac'un ru̱c' take richa̱k'.

Reh chi enc'uluric ku̱c' i tik'inic bano̱j re're' chi re' Jesus re' enwih'ic chi kasbe̱s i hoj, re' Dios xojriyuk'ej eh xiban wo' chi ma'xta chic kamahc chiwach. Ma' xa re' ta re're' xiban, je' la' wo' xiban chi re' lok'il ric'ulum chic i Jesus ewo' nkac'ul i hoj.

Je' re' k'uru' nankacoj rehtal chi'nchel i ribanam chic cho i Dios chiki̱j, re' wili riyew ri̱b chi enkak'or: To̱b ta nak wilic jeno' nk'etbic pan kabe̱h, re' hoj ma' eta kojyo'jic ru'um maj re' Dios wilic ku̱c' chi riye'eric keh i pa' bih to'bonic nka̱j.

Chaj wa'ric nanik'or i re're'? Nik'or ru'um reh i wili: Reh chi re' hoj xojco'ljic, re' Dios ma' xipoh'aj ta ric'ux chi riye'eric cho pan quimic i Jesus re' rAc'u̱n, re' la' xiban xik'ahsaj i rAc'u̱n pan quimic chiki̱j i hoj c'acharel. Ru'um chi je' re' xiban i Dios til nkeht'alij chi re're' nariyeb wo' cho keh chi'nchel i to'bonic.

Je' re' ajic ru'um chi re' Dios xa wilic wo' ku̱c' eh ribanam chic chi ma'xta kamahc chiwach, re' hoj yu'na re' xojrichih i Dios chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n ma' hab ta chic wach enkayohlej chi ericoj kamahc chiwach i Dios.

Ma' kojyo'jic ta chic k'uru' chi hab wach jeno' encojbic kamahc maj re' chic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric enk'oric chiki̱j ru̱c' i Dios chi kaco'ljic. Re' Jesus wili xcansjic je xa re' la' xucsjic wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak eh yu'na ar wilic ru̱c' i Dios c'ahchi' ric'ulum rinimal rilok'il je' ricab ric'ul jenaj c'acharel nanye'eric riwa'ric chi tz'uhkic cok chi riche̱l jeno' k'atal k'oric.

Je' re' k'uru' re' hoj ma' kojyo'jic ta eh xa ta wo' nak ekojyo'jic chiwach i ti'c'axic bano̱j keh reh chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric ma' eta chic kojric'ax. Je' wo' chic to̱b ta nak wilic jeno' hab wach enbanic chi enchal ti'c'axic on c'axquilal chi kana̱, on to̱b ta wo' wilic jeno' enbanic chi enkacuy kawa' kaha̱', on to̱b ta nchel chi ma' eta chic nwih'ic kaso', on to̱b ta wo' wilic nak take c'acharel xa echic kojquitahkej chi kacansjic eh chi je' re' ekojquiyew pan yohbalil, chi'nchel i c'axquilal re're' ma' jaruj ta eriban chi re' Jesus ma' eta chic kojric'ax.

Je' re' nik'or maj nok wilco̱j pan ti'c'axic xa c'ahchi' kac'ulum je' ricab rik'or take k'oric xik'or cho ma' Tawiy reh Dios, naxitz'ihmbaj cho chi je' wili pan Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios: “Re' hoj, hoj atinami̱t Ha̱w eh ru'um re', re' take toco̱m chic c'acharel xa eli̱c nquisic' ri̱j kacansjic. Chi queh take c'acharel re're' tare̱t chi ekojquimic je' ricab naquicansjic take me̱' pan cansbal chicop, nqui rik'or.

Je' re' k'uru' to̱b ta coric chi wilic take ti'c'axic chi kana̱, re' hoj xa nkacuy wo' ransil eh ma' nkapoh'aj ta wo' kac'ux chiri̱j kaniminic maj re' Jesus re' xa kojric'ax wo', re' wo' re' ento'bonic keh.

Ru'um chi je' re', re' hin til weht'alim i wili: Coric ru' nok cu c'achalco̱j pe ayu' wach ac'al, wilic take ti'c'axic nakac'ulum eh xa cu wilco̱j wo' pan quimic. Je' wo', weht'alim wo' i wili: Chi re' take aj tz'e' wa̱ch je' ru̱c' ximikric chi raj to'o̱l chic take i aj Yahm, re' take ma' ato̱b laj uxlabal eh je' wo' re' take toco̱m chic quik'atbic k'oric pan te̱w c'uxic ru'um reh cajawric wilic, chi'nchel take re' nca̱j nak chi ma' ta nak chic ti' ekojric'ra̱j i Jesus xa re' la' ma' jaruj ta eriban chi je' re' eriban ru'. Je' re' k'uru' xa ta nak re' chaj bih nc'uluric lok yu'na, on re' naric'uluric lok chi kawach, xa ta nak re're' eriban chi re' Jesus ma' ta nak chic ti' ekojric'ra̱j.

Je' wo', re' take wilic cajawric ar pan te̱w c'uxic, on wilic cajawric ayu' wach ac'al, ma' hab ta wach queh re' xa ta nak wo' jeno' chic je' ru̱c' tik'imaj wo' cho ru'um i Dios, eriban chi ma' eta chic nwih'ic chi kana̱ i c'axbal re' ric'uhtaj keh i Dios ru'um chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric wilic chic chi Ajabe̱s chi kana̱.

Chi ninimem chic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, ma' riyew ta chic ri̱b chi wi̱n chi nichuc k'oric ru̱c' take k'oric niban. Ru'um aj re' nanik'orom aweh tak yu'na re' ricorquilal i chaj bih nwic'raj eh ru̱c' rito'bal i Lok' laj Uxlabal enik'or aweh tak i k'oric wili chi re' wo' re' rik'or cho nicapew-bal:
Re' hin til k'e̱' ntz'iric niwach eh xa nyot'ic wo' wa̱mna

chiqui̱j take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' ma' nquinimej ta i Jesus. To̱b ta ma' riyew ta ri̱b chi wi̱n chi eniban i wili: Re' hin k'e̱' nak nwa̱j chi ma' ta re' take re' quic'acharic chi ma' nquinimej ta i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' ta la' nak i hin equinc'acharic chi je' re' maj chi je' re', re' ta nak i hin enwih'ic chi nina̱ i ti'c'axic ric'ul chi queh chi naquic'ulum. Je' re' nik'or ru'um chi re' hin k'e̱' wo' chic ti' nwic'raj take.

Je' wo' chic, re' take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xye'eric rinimal wach quilok'il ru̱c' i wili: Re' Dios xik'or queh chi xicoj chic chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n take. Je' wo' naxibehic cho ar pan ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel Sinayih ribihnal, re' Dios xic'ol take ru̱c' rilok'il xic'uhtaj chi quina̱ ru̱c' jenaj su̱tz'. Ma' xa re' ta re', ma' xa junpech ta la' wo' xik'or queh chi cu̱c' narimanlajic wach i k'oric rik'orom chic cho ribiral. Je' wo' chic, reh chi naquinimem i Dios re're' xiyew queh i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Ma' xa re' ta re', je' la' wo' wilic take k'oric xiyew i Dios chi to'bal queh chi naca'nam i coric wach lok'onic eh wilic wo' take k'oric xiyew queh reh chi narimanlajic wach ru̱c' richalic i Jesus.

Re' chi'nchel xye'eric re're' queh take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' wo' Dios xbanic eh ma' xa ta re're', re' la' Dios xchihbic wo' cho queh take kama̱m kati't reh chi re' take re' naquiwih'ic chi kara'il i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Chiri̱j wili xiban wo' chi xye'eric keh i nim kalok'il wili: Chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric naxchalic asjok ayu' wach ac'al ku̱c' i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xchalic rira'il. Re' cok ru' to̱b ta wo' je' re' asjic xiban i Jesus, til re're' i Dios re' wilic rajawric china̱ chi'nchel eh ru'um re', re' hin nik'or chi tare̱t chi enye'eric rilok'il chi junelic k'i̱j sakom.

Je' re' ajic re' Dios xiban chi'nchel re're' eh to̱b ta cu wilic take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' ma' xiwih'ic ta cho chi ritinami̱t i Dios ma' ra̱j ta rik'orom chi ja' nmanlajic ta wach re' k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios reh ma' Awraham.

Coric ru' chi re' hoj, hoj wo' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Awraham xa re' la' to̱b ta wo' je' re' ma' ra̱j ta rik'orom chi, chi kunchelal i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Awraham hoj ta nak chic ricojom i Dios chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n. Nisakomej wach aweh tak i ricorquilal re're' ru̱c' i xik'or i Dios reh ma' Awraham chi je' wili: “Chi quixilac take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ra̱' ri'sil cho take awac'u̱n, xa re' wach take je' ru̱c' ra̱' ri'sil cho awac'u̱n Isahac narimanlajic wi̱' wach i k'oro̱j aweh wu'um, nqui Dios reh.

Re' aj rik'ormojic re're' risakomej wach keh i ricorquil nik'orom chic aweh tak chi je' wili: Chi'nchel take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ca̱' qui'sil cho take toco̱m chic rac'u̱n i ma' Awraham ma' wilque̱b ta take chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios, re' la' hoj c'acharel je' ru̱c' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho i rac'u̱n i ma' Awraham re' Isahac ribihnal wilque̱b take chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios, ru'um nok ru̱c' Isahac xmanlajic wach chi'nchel i k'oro̱j cho reh ma' Awraham ru'um i Dios.
Re' k'oric k'oro̱j cho reh ma' Awraham ru'um i Dios re' i wili: Je' yu' chipam jenaj ha̱b nanibanam chi re' awehq'ue̱n re' Sa̱ra nariwih'ic jenaj riha'lac'u̱n, nqui Dios reh.

Je' re' ajic ma' xa ta re' ru̱c' rasjic Isahac nc'uhtunic chi ma' chi'nchel ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Awraham quicojoric ru'um i Dios chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n take, je' la' wo' nc'uhtunic ru̱c' xc'uluric ru̱c' i Rewe̱ca naxcahnic chi yowa̱b ixok chic. Re're' xilow wach quib riha'lac'u̱n ch'i̱l i ribahi̱l re' najtir kama̱m ma' Isahac.

Ru̱c' xc'uluric re're', re' hat-tak enarak tak chiri̱j chi re' Dios cow pa'lic ric'ux chiri̱j i ricojom chic pa ricapew-bal chi ma' re' ta i quibano̱j take c'acharel rilow chi richihiric quiwach take ritinami̱t, re' la' i Dios xiban jenaj yuk'unic queh, reh chi re' take re' enca'n chi ritinami̱t chic take. Yu'na ajic re' wili nik'or aweh tak chi xc'uluric cho ru̱c' i Rewe̱ca: Nok ja' qui'asjic ta take rilach i Rewe̱ca, re' take rac'u̱n re're' to̱b ta nak ma' ja'xta bih jeno' c'ahbilal on jeno' holonquilal ca'nam chic,

je' pe' je wili xk'ormojic reh ru'um i Dios: “Re' chak'be̱s ac'un naritak'anic china̱ i asbe̱s ac'un, nqui xk'ormojic reh. Je' re' xk'ormojic reh to̱b ta ocronak chic take rich ritinami̱t i Rewe̱ca chi nanwih'ic quiha'lac'u̱n, re' take asbe̱s ac'un quitak'anic china̱ i chak'be̱s.

Re' ribiral i Rewe̱ca k'uru' ric'uhtaj keh ricorquilal i nik'orom chic aweh tak. Je' wo' re' i c'uhtunic riban keh i tz'ihmbimaj chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios. Ar tz'ihmbimaj i k'oro̱j chi je' wili ru'um i Dios: “Re' Esawuh ma' riyew ta risukquil nic'ux ra̱j nchel i Jacow k'e̱' riyew risukquil nic'ux, nqui rik'or.

Ha̱', ru'um xnik'or chi ma' chi kunchelal ta hoj ra̱' ri'sil wo' cho i ma' Awraham wilco̱j chi hoj rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios, wilic take equik'oric chi ru̱c' i c'uhbalanic re're', re' hin xa je' na nchel c'ahchi' nik'orom chi re' Dios ma' coric ta wach ric'ux. Ma'xta, ma' jaruj eriban chi je' re' enik'or.

Haj cok wilic i tijinic niban i hin re' i wili: Chi re' Dios til riquetelej quiwach take c'acharel eh ru'um chi je' re', je' wili xik'or reh Moyses: “Re' hin til niquetelej quiwach take c'acharel eh ru'um re', xa hab wach nwa̱j niquetelem wach ewo' niquetelej wach. Je' wo', re' hin til ti' nwic'raj take c'acharel eh ru'um aj re' xa hab wach nwa̱j chi ti' enwic'raj, ti' wo' enwic'raj, nqui xik'or.

Je' re' k'uru' re' wili tijinic niban: Re' riqueteljic quiwach take c'acharel chi equiwih'ic chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios ma' re' ta jeno' c'acharel nbanic to̱b ta la' nak xa cow chic ra̱j chi nariqueteljic wach jeno' chic rich c'acharel, re' la' i quetelenic wachi̱s xa re' wach Dios nbanic maj re' cok re' til manlic quetelenel wachi̱s.

Ru'um re're' chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' i riC'uhbal i Dios nkilow wach take k'oric rik'orom i Dios chi re're' naxa̱j chi re' quetelenic wachi̱s riban ru' narelic lok ribiral chi junsut wach ac'al, je' wili xik'or reh i k'atal k'oric aj Eji̱pto: “Re' riwi̱' chi xniban chi wilca̱t chi k'atal k'oric china̱ atinami̱t, reh chi ru̱c' rilmijic i ripahba̱bjic wi̱b nanibanam chawach enc'utunic lok chi re' hin til wilic wajawric eh reh chi re' nibiral i hin enk'ormojic junsut wach ac'al nqui xik'or i Dios.

Je' re' ajic re' c'uhbalanic niban re' i wili: Til aj wo' re' Dios nquetelenic quiwach take c'acharel eh ru'um aj re' xa hab wach i ra̱j riquetelem wach, re' wo' re' riquetelej wach. Re're' riban wo' chi ericowsaj quic'ux take c'acharel ru̱c' quino'jbal eh ru'um aj re' xa hab wach i ra̱j ricowsam ric'ux ru̱c' i rino'jbal, ewo' riban chi ericowsaj ric'ux.

Ha̱', ru̱c' nik'or lok re're', wilic aweh tak equik'oric wi̱n chi je' wili: «Wi coric xak'or, chaj wa'ric k'uru' chi re' Dios rik'at k'oric chi kana̱ i hoj c'acharel nakojmahcanic? Je' re' nkabiraj aweh maj wi coric chi re' Dios ncowsonic quic'ux take c'acharel, ma' hab ta wach k'uru' enbanic chi erik'et wach i Dios ru̱c' ribanaric i haj wilic i ra̱j, maje'? nqui enak'or tak.

Hab pa' wach take je' re' quik'oric, je' wo' wili enik'or queh: Re' hat-tak nawolej tak i Dios xa ru'um chi wilic rajawric chi ribanaric i haj wilic ra̱j ribanam. Wi re' Dios xtik'inic keh hoj c'acharel ma' nacapaj ta na tak chi re' hat-tak xa memil nbanic aweh tak nana'n tak i birinic chi je' re'? Re' memil laj no'jbal na'n tak re're', je' ricab i memil laj no'jbal erik'or nak jeno' tz'ak ac'al icom wi eta nak nchol cho k'oric chi rik'ormojic chi je' wili reh i c'acharel re' xtik'inic reh: «Hat aj tik'inel wi̱n, chaj bih awajawric chi je' wili nitik'injic xa'n? nqui ta nak erik'or reh.

Til pan coric re' aj tik'inel tz'ak ac'al icom wilic rajawric chi ritik'injic take icom je' ricab nic' pa' wach ra̱j ru'. Ma' xa re' ta re', je' la' wo' wi re' aj tik'inel re're' ra̱j ritik'a̱b ca'ch'uk ok wach chi culc ru̱c' ch'uwa', junyuk'uric wo' eriban. Kak'or wi ra̱j ritik'a̱b take culc je' ricab xa holohak chic take reh chi nim wach naquicamanic wi̱', on je' ricab take culc ma' holohak ta ti take rixoyjic bano̱j re' xa ma' nim ta wo' wach camanic quicojoric wi̱', re're' eritik'a̱' take chi je' re' maj wilic rajawric chi ritik'injic, maje'?

Je' ricab riban aj tik'em tz'ak ac'al icom k'uru', je' wo' re' i Dios wilic wo' rajawric chi ribanaric haj wilic i ra̱j ribanam ku̱c'. On nacapaj na hat-tak chi ma'xta rajawric? Wi je' re' nacapaj tak, chaj bih nak'or tak k'uru' chiri̱j i wili re' riban i Dios chiqui̱j take aj mahc? Ru'um reh quimahc take c'acharel je' wo' ru'um chi k'e̱' cakranak cu̱c', re' Dios xitik'a̱' wach risacharic quiwach xa re' la' ru' nok je' re' xa̱j ribanam chi c'uhtbal reh rijosk'il chi quina̱ eh je' wo' chi narilmijic chi wilic rajawric chi ribanaric haj wilic i ra̱j, re' pe' chic i wili xiban: Re're' xuy'ej chi re' take aj mahc naquijalam wach quino'jbal chi naricuyum quimahc

eh je' re' xiban reh chi narilmijic wach i rinimal richak'lamil c'uhtumaj wo' cho chi quina̱ take toco̱m chic c'acharel, re' take tik'imaj chic cho wach chiqui̱j ru'um i Dios chi naquic'ulum riqueteljic quiwach, naquiwih'ic wo' ru̱c' i Dios re' wilic wi̱' chi sutumaj ri̱j ru̱c' rinimal wach risakomil.

Je' re' ajic chi'nchel i hoj je' ru̱c' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh je' wo' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, xc'uhtjic keh i richak'lamil i Dios eh ma' xa ta re're' c'uhtumaj keh, je' la' wo', re' Dios xojriyuk'ej hoj chi'nchel reh chi xiban chi hoj ritinami̱t.

Re' k'oric re're' nkilow wo' chipam i hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj cho ru'um i raj k'orol i Dios re' Ose̱yas ribihnal naxik'or cho chi je' wili k'oric xiban i Dios: “Nariponic i k'i̱j re' hin nanik'orom i wili chiqui̱j take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta take nitinami̱t yu'na: ‘Re' take c'acharel re're' nitinami̱t chic take, nqui nanik'orom. Eh chiqui̱j take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' ja' quic'ulum ta nic'axbal nanik'orom wo' chi je' wili: ‘Re' take c'acharel re're', yu'na naquic'ulum chic i nic'axbal, nqui nanik'orom, nqui k'oric xik'or.

Je' wo' chic, chipam i hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj ru'um i Ose̱yas wilic wo' take k'oric xik'or i Dios chi je' wili: “Coric ru', to̱b ta re' hin xnik'or chi re' take c'acharel re're' ma' re' ta nitinami̱t take, chipam i ye'a̱b xnik'or wi̱' chi je' re', re' chic i wili narik'ormojic chiqui̱j: ‘Re' Dios re' nye'bic kac'acharic c'ahchi' chic rik'orom chi re' take c'acharel re're' rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n chic i Dios take, nqui narik'ormojic, nqui k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios.

Je' aj re' chipam i hu̱j xitz'ihmbaj i Ose̱yas nkilow i k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios chiri̱j i k'oric xitak'a̱' rik'ormojic keh hoj chi'nchel c'acharel. Ma' xa re' ta re' rik'orom cho i Dios, chipam la' wo' i hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj cho ru'um i ma' Isayi̱yas nkilow i k'oro̱j wili chiki̱j i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel: “Coric ru', je' ricab riq'uihal i sani̱b wilic lok chi chi̱' rinimal cho̱, je' wo' re' q'uihal take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xa re' la' xa ma' q'uih ta wo' ti take naquico'ljic chiwach i ti'c'axic chalic reh.

Nik'or chi chalic reh i ti'c'axic maj re' kAja̱w Dios rik'orom chic cho chi re' ti'c'axic narichalic chi junc'am chi quina̱ chi'nchel c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al eh re' nic' pa' wach xik'or chi naribanam, ewo' nc'uluric ru'um nok re're' xa coric wo' nk'oric, nqui k'oro̱j cho ru'um i ma' Isayi̱yas.

Je' re' ajic re' richak'lamil i Dios nkilow chi wilic wo' chi kana̱ i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ricab xik'or i ma' Isayi̱yas nok xik'or i wili: “Je' ricab xc'uluric cu̱c' take c'acharel reh tinamit Soro̱ma ch'i̱l i Como̱ra chi xsacharic quiwach, je' wo' nak re' xkac'ul i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wi ta nak re' Dios re' k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal rajawric ma' ta xiban chi cu wilic take ju'jun queh kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xicana̱' chi c'achalque̱b, nqui xik'or i ma' Isayi̱yas.

Re' chic i rik'ormojic xniban lok chi re' Dios riyew reh c'acharel re' rich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j chi enc'acharic chi coric chic wach ric'ux, chaj bih enik'or k'uru' chi xc'uluric cu̱c' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh je' wo' ku̱c' i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel? Re' wili nik'or: To̱b ta nak ma' queht'alim ta chi re' Dios naribanam cu̱c' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi equic'acharic chi coric chic wach quic'ux, re' take re' je' re' xbanaric ru̱c' quic'acharic,

ra̱j i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ma' ja' nkilow ta wach i c'acharic chi coric chic wach kac'ux to̱b ta wo' nak keht'alim chic i ritik'a̱b cho wach i Dios chi ribanaric chi re' take c'acharel equic'acharic chi coric chic wach quic'ux.

Chaj wa'ric je' re' c'ahchi' ric'uluric ku̱c' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel? C'ahchi' ric'uluric chi je' re' ru'um nok ma' xkach'ica̱' ta kac'ux chiri̱j ritik'inic i Dios chi nye'eric keh chi ekojc'acharic chi coric chic wach kac'ux, re' la' chic xkach'ica̱' wi̱' kac'ux chiri̱j rinimjic take bano̱j re' k'oro̱j chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eh ru'um chi je' re' xka'n, re' hoj je' ricab nok jenaj c'acharel ritohxaj nah ro̱k china̱ jeno' abaj, xojk'ehbic pan mahc chi ma' xkac'ul ta i Jesus pan ka̱mna. Chi je' aj re' xka'n je' ricab nok wilic i abaj ritohxaj wi̱' nah ro̱k i c'acharel, re' Jesus re' wo' re' til wilic chi kawach hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi k'etbal reh kaniminic

je' ricab rik'or chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios. Ar je' wili rik'or: “Chacoj tak rehtal i wili: Je' ricab nok jeno' c'acharel ricoj jeno' abaj k'etbal pa̱m quibe̱h take c'acharel chi enquitohxaj nah co̱k china̱, re' hin nanibanam wo' chi ar Siyon enwih'ic jeno' naribanam chi k'etbal reh quiniminic take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, nqui rik'or. Raj la' chiri̱j kaniminic i hoj re' kanimem chic i Jesus, je' wili tz'ihmbimaj cho: “Xa hab wach narich'ica̱b ric'ux chiri̱j ru' ma' jaruj ta narojic chi k'e̱b i riniminic, nqui tz'ihmbimaj cho.

Hat-tak was nicha̱k' aj niminel reh Jesus, ru'um reh ti'c'axic chalic reh chi quina̱ take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ru'um reh quimahc, re' hin k'e̱' nwa̱j chi re' take ja' qui'oquic ta chi rinimjic i Jesus eta nak quico'ljic chiwach i ti'c'axic re're' eh reh chi enc'uluric chi je' re', re' hin k'e̱' suk wi̱n i pahkanic chiqui̱j naniban niti̱j chiwach i Dios ru̱c' i capew-bal re' nik'or wi̱' reh chi re' take richiho̱j cho chi ritinami̱t chico'lej wo' take.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' wili nina'bej chiqui̱j take c'acharel re're': Chi re' take re' til nca̱j quinimem i Dios xa re' la' to̱b ta chiwach i Dios riwi̱' nak chi queh chi naquiniminic chiwach, ma' nquirak ta wo' chiri̱j re're'.

Nik'or chi je' re' maj re' take re' ma' quicojom ta rehtal chi coric chaj bih camanic xiban i Dios chiqui̱j reh chi naquicahnic chi coric chic wach quic'ux. Chi queh ru' re' nbanic chi quicahnic chi coric wach quic'ux re' la' rinimjic take c'uhbal nquic'uhtaj eh ru'um re' ma' nca̱j ta quic'ulum i chaj bih xiban i Dios chi ricorsjic wach quic'ux.

Ru̱c' aj nca'n take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' ja' qui'oquic ta chi rinimjic i Jesus, ja' nquirak ta chiri̱j chaj bih riwi̱' naxye'eric queh i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Je' re' nik'or maj re' riwi̱' chi xye'eric i c'uhbal re're' reh chi naquich'ica̱b nak quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Chi je' aj re' riwi̱' nok ye'o̱j cho i c'uhbal re're', xa hab wach c'acharel re' erich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Jesus nye'eric reh chi eriban chi coric chic wach ric'ux.

Chi re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses riban chi enwih'ic chi coric wach ric'ux jeno' c'acharel ric'am na̱ i nic' pa' nimal rik'or chipam, re're' xa nok wo' xik'or cho Moyses naxitz'ihmbaj cho chi je' wili: “Re' c'acharel nc'ambic na̱ i nic' pa' nimal rik'or chipam i c'uhbal wili, nariye'eric reh chi enc'acharic chi junelic, nqui xitz'ihmbaj cho Moyses.

Re' cok ru' to̱b ta re're' xitz'ihmbaj chi je' re', ma' jaruj ta riban chi coric chic wach ric'ux i c'acharel nc'ambic na̱ nic' pa' nimal rik'or chipam i c'uhbal re're' ru'um nok chi ma' jeno' nchol ric'amaric na̱ chi manlic i c'uhbal re're'. Haj cok wilic i til rik'or i c'uhbal re're', re' chi xa re' wach i c'acharel re' rich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Jesus ncahnic chi coric chic wach ric'ux. Je' aj wili rik'or i c'uhbal re're': “Ma̱k'or tak chic pan acapew-bal tak, hab wach narojic johtok pan taxa̱j, nqui rik'or. Je' aj re' rik'or cu'um queh nquicapaj chi xa re' wach wi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric enchalic wo' chic c'acharok ayu' wach ac'al, cu re' aj nak ru' enquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j.

Je' wo' chic, re' c'uhbal re're' je' wili rik'or: “Ma̱k'or tak chic pan acapew-bal tak, hab wach narojic jok chipam richamil jul quiye'a̱b camnak, nqui rik'or. Je' aj re' rik'or cu'um queh nquicapaj chi xa re' wach wi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric enucsjic wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak, cu re' aj nak ru' enquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j.

Je' aj re' ma' re' ta quicapew-bal take c'acharel re're' ra̱j banaric, re' la' ra̱j banaric re' wo' rik'or i c'uhbal k'oro̱j chiri̱j ru' ru'um i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses nok rik'or chi je' wili: “Re' hat-tak wilic chic awu̱c' tak i k'oric k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios reh chi ru̱c' chi'nchel awa̱mna enacoj tak wach eh je' wo' chi enayew ak'orbal tak chiri̱j, nqui rik'or. Re' c'uhbal re're', re' aj re' nkak'or i hoj reh chi re' take c'acharel enquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus. Re' c'uhbal nkak'or re're' je' wili rik'or:

“Reh chi etico'ljic tak, cha'n tak i wili: Chacoj tak wach ru̱c' chi'nchel awa̱mna tak chi re' Jesus xuctic wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak. Chiri̱j chic wili chak'or tak queh chi'nchel c'acharel chi re' Jesus re're' i pahbamaj chi pe̱t Ajabe̱s chi quina̱ chi'nchel, nqui rik'or.

Je' re' nkak'or maj reh chi eriban chi coric ok chic wach ric'ux jeno' c'acharel eh reh chi ewo' nco'ljic, curman chi naricojom wach ru̱c' chi'nchel ra̱mna i c'uhbal chiri̱j i ructic cho i Jesus re're' eh je' wo' chi eriyew rik'orbal chiri̱j i Jesus.
Chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios rik'or chi je' wili: “Xa hab wach narich'ica̱b ric'ux chiri̱j ru' ma' jaruj ta narojic chi k'e̱b i riniminic, nqui rik'or.

Ru'um chi je' re' rik'or, re' hin nik'or i c'uhbal ma' xa ta queh take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' la' wo' queh take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.
