Je' re' niban maj chiwach i Dios re' take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xa jenaj kawach quich'i̱l take junch'uk chic tinamit eh chi je' re', re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ch'i̱l take junch'uk chic re're' xa jenaj wo' Ajabe̱s wilic chi kana̱. Re' Ajabe̱s re're' til yohbal wach ricuse'sbal riyew cho chi kana̱ eh til rito'bej wo' take nic' pa' q'uihal c'acharel nca'n johtok quiti̱j chiwach.

Ru'um aj wo' re' je' wili rik'or chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios: “Xa hab wach jeno' queh aj niminel reh i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s eripahkaj reh pan ti̱j chi enco'ljic, xa re' wo' re' narirakam rico'lbal, nqui rik'or.

Re' cok ru' to̱b ta je' re' rik'or i C'uhbal re're', re' c'acharel wi ma' rich'ica̱' ta ric'ux chiri̱j i Jesus ma' eta wo' riban ripahkaljic rato'bil i Dios. Je' wo' re', wi ma' ribiram ta ribiral i Jesus ma' eta wo' riban chi erich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j, maj hab aj wo' wach enbirinic reh ribiral re're' wi ma' hab wach c'ahchi' rik'orbic queh?

On ma' eta wo' riban chi enk'ormojic ribiral i Jesus wi ma'xta jeno' tak'amaj cho ru'um i Dios chi rik'ormojic i ribiral re're'. Je' aj re' cu'um queh take tak'amaj take cho chi aj k'oro̱l c'uhbal nchalic i sukquil c'uxlis chi quina̱ take c'acharel. Re' Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios je' wili rik'or chiri̱j re're': “K'e̱' sukquil c'uxlis ric'am cho quic'ulic take lok aj k'oro̱l re' quik'oric reh take holohic laj k'oric nye'bic sukquil quic'ux take c'acharel, nqui rik'or.

Re' cok ru' to̱b ta je' re' rik'or i Lok' laj Hu̱j, ma' chi'nchel ta take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xquic'ul chi suk i ma' birimaj ta laj k'oric chiri̱j i Jesus. Ru̱c' i no'jbal xca'n re're', til coric i xitz'ihmbaj cho ma' Isayi̱yas naxik'or cho chi je' wili: “K-Aja̱w Dios, ma' nic' ta ti q'uihal quiniminic reh c'uhbal nkak'or, nqui xik'or.

Je' re' ajic nok ma' chi'nchel ta take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel quicojbic wach i c'uhbalanic nka'n, re're' nc'uhtunic lok chi re' ribirmijic i k'oro̱j chic cho ru'um i Dios chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' aj re' riwi̱' chi enca'n take c'acharel reh chi enquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus.

Nok nik'orom chic lok chi je' re', wilic enquibiraj wi̱n chi je' wili: «Ru̱c' i xak'or lok ra̱j na rik'orom chi re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ja' quibiram ta i k'oro̱j chiri̱j i Jesus? nqui enk'ormojic wi̱n. Re' hin quinc'u'lunic ru̱c' take k'oric k'oro̱j cho wili chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh i Moyses: “Sut chic cu̱c' chi'nchel take c'acharel pononak chic ribiral i c'uhbal nk'ormojic eh xa haj pa' tinamit wilque̱b take ru' til nquibiraj wo' i c'uhbal re're', nqui i k'oro̱j cho.

Naniban i c'u'lunic re're', re' wo' chic wili i birinic enbanjic wi̱n: «Coric ta wo' chi re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ma' xquirak ta chiri̱j i k'oro̱j cho queh? nqui enk'ormojic wi̱n. Chi ric'u'ljic i birinic re're', pe̱t nwa̱j nik'orom chi re' take re' quirakam chic chiri̱j i k'oro̱j queh xa re' la' ma' nca̱j ta quic'amam na̱. Ru'um aj chi je' re' nca'n, re' Moyses xitz'ihmbaj wo' cho i k'oric xiban i Dios chi je' wili: “Re' hin Dios nanibanam chi naribanam k'a̱b ac'ux tak chiwi̱j cu'um queh c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta nak nitinami̱t take. Re' take c'acharel re're', coric nak'or tak chiqui̱j chi ma' nquirak ta chiri̱j i k'oro̱j wu'um, raj yu'na nanijohsam ac'a̱ tak ru̱c' rirakmajic chiri̱j naca'nam take re're', nqui xitz'ihmbaj i Moyses.

Je' wo', re' raj k'orol i Dios re' ma' Isayi̱yas ribihnal xk'oric wo' chiri̱j chaj bih nc'uluric nok re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ma' nquic'ul ta haj wilic k'oro̱j queh ru'um i Dios. Re' aj k'orol re're' til riteh wach chi coric i k'oric re're' chi je' wili: “Re' hin Dios xquicoj niwach take c'acharel re' ma' ncapewjic ta nak chi naquicojom niwach. Re' take re', to̱b ta nak ma' c'ahchi' ta quibiram wi̱n hab wach i hin, xniyew wo' chi eht'aljic queh hab wach i hin, nqui xik'or.

Re' xik'or re're' chiqui̱j take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xk'ormojic, raj naxk'oric cho chiqui̱j take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho Israhel, re' wili k'oric xik'or cho: “Re' take c'acharel wili xa eli̱c wo' nipahkaj queh chi enquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiwi̱j xa re' la' take re', k'e̱' chic xquicowsaj i ca̱mna chi ma'eta nquibiraj i niC'uhbal eh je' wo' ma'eta nquinimej i nic' pa' nimal i k'oro̱j queh, nqui ma' Isayi̱yas.

Ha̱', ru'um chi xnik'or chi wilic take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ma' nquic'u'lej ta na i k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios, wilic take equik'oric chi re' hin xa je' na nak nchel c'ahchi' nik'orom yu'na chi cu'um queh take re', chi'nchel i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ma' hoj ta chic c'ulu̱j ru'um i Dios chi hoj ritinami̱t? Ma'xta! Ma' je' ta re' i c'ahchi' nik'orom. Je' wo' chic, ma' eta riban chi enik'or chi je' re' chiqui̱j chi'nchel take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel maj re' hin, hin wo' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Je' ricab chi re' take re' til manlic rija'quil cho ma' Awraham take, til hin je' wo' re' i hin. Ma' xa re' ta re', re' take nitu̱t waja̱w wilque̱b la' wo' chi quixilac take je' ru̱c' ra̱' ri'sil take cho i chopol na̱ tinamit ma' Wenjamin ribihnal.

Je' re' nok ru'um chi re' Dios xa nok wo' cho pan pe̱t xojrichih cho hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi xojwih'ic chi ritinami̱t, ma' riban ta chi nk'ormojic chi re' hin c'ahchi' nik'orom chi chi'nchel ta nak take chiho̱j cho chi ritinami̱t i Dios ma' c'ulu̱j ta chic take chi ritinami̱t yu'na. Wi wilic jeno' ricapaj chi je' re' i c'ahchi' nik'orom, xa re' c'olok cho pa ric'ux i ribiral i Eli̱yas wilic chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' i k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios. Chipam i Hu̱j re're' rik'or chi re' Eli̱yas junpech je' wili xik'or reh Dios pa riti̱j naxiyew chiwach quimahc take rich ra̱' ri'sil cho i ma' Israhel:

“Ajabe̱s Dios, re' wili bano̱j ca'nam take c'acharel re're': Xquibok take i lok' laj ye'a̱b c'atbal si̱ re' ncamanic keh chi lok'onbal wi̱' awach. Je' wo' chic, re' take re' xquicansaj chic take chi'nchel i wich'i̱l je' ru̱c' tak'amaj take cho awu'um chi aj k'orol reh ac'uhbal. Ru'um re' xa chic re' hin xincahnic chi wutquel chi awaj k'oro̱l xa re' la' ru', re' take re' nca̱j wo' quinquicansam i hin, nqui Eli̱yas.

Raj i Dios, chaj bih c'u'lunic xiban reh Eli̱yas? Re're' je' wili xik'or reh: “Reh chi cu naquiwih'ic take c'acharel je' ru̱c' naquik'orbic reh niC'uhbal, re' hin xniban chi cu xicahnic wuklaj ik'ob lajc'ahl (7,000) chi winak re' ma' xquixuc'a̱' ta qui̱b chiwach i tiyo̱x Wahal ribihnal, nqui i Dios.

Je' re' k'uru' je' ricab xc'uluric pa rik'ijil cho Eli̱yas cu̱c' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' ma' xquixuc'a̱' ta qui̱b chiwach i tiyo̱x Wahal, yu'na chi kaxilac i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, re' Dios xiban wo' chi xcahnic juntuhm chic keh hoj c'acharel je' ru̱c' nkac'ul i k'oro̱j ru'um. Je' re' xiban ru'um reh ric'axbal re' xic'uhtaj wo' cho chi kana̱ naxojrichih cho chi hoj ritinami̱t.

Je' re' nik'or maj til coric chi ma' ru'um ta reh kaholohic laj bano̱j nka'n i hoj c'acharel xojrichih i Dios chi hoj ritinami̱t. Wi ta nak ru'um reh kaholohic laj bano̱j chi je' re' xiban i Dios ku̱c', ma' riban ta nak chi enik'or chi ru'um reh ric'axbal naxiban i Dios chi je' re'. Je' re' nok junpech wo' chic enik'or aweh tak, wi ta nak ru'um reh holohic laj bano̱j nka'n re' Dios xojrichih chi hoj ritinami̱t, re' k'oric nk'ormojic chi xa ru'um reh ric'axbal i Dios kojchihiric, ma' eta nak riban chi coric wach. Je' re' nik'or ru'um wi nk'ormojic chi je' re', ra̱j rik'orom chi ma' ru'um ta reh kabano̱j kojchihiric ru'um i Dios.

Re' riwi̱' kachihiric riban i Dios, re' aj re' nbanic chi nanik'orom wo' i wili: To̱b ta re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xkak'ahsaj ki̱b chi risiq'uiric nic' wach nakojc'acharok chi coric wach kac'ux, ma' xkarak ta c'acharic je' re' riwi̱'. Re' cok ru' ma' chiki̱j ta chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel c'ahchi' nik'orom chi je' re' xkac'ul maj re' juntuhm keh hoj c'acharel je' ru̱c' nkac'ul i k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios, til xkarak riwi̱' nic' wach nakojc'acharok chi coric wach kac'ux. Re' c'ahchi' nik'orom chiqui̱j take toco̱m chic wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' ma' nquic'u'lej ta na̱ i k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios, c'ahchi' nik'orom maj cu̱c' take re', re' Dios xiban chi xcowjic quicapew-bal reh chi ma' xquirak ta chiri̱j i k'oro̱j ru'um.

Chiqui̱j aj take c'acharel re're' jenaj aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios xitz'ihmbaj cho i wili ar chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios: “Je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' jeno' xohc'rel wiric riban ma' ribiraj ta on ma' rilow ta i chaj bih c'ahchi' ric'uluric cok chi riche̱l, je' wo' re' xiban i Dios chi xc'uluric cu̱c' take c'acharel wili. Ru'um re're' cu yu'na chi k'i̱j, re' nquilow on re' nquibiraj ma' nquirak ta chiri̱j, nqui xitz'ihmbaj cho.

Je' wo' re', chipam i hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj ru'um i aj najtir k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy wilic i ti̱j bano̱j wili chiqui̱j take c'acharel re're': “Ajabe̱s Dios, nipahkaj johtok aweh chi je' ricab i ti'c'axic nchalic china̱ i chicop re' nariyahk'aj pa̱m ric'ahamil i ya'l re' cojo̱j chi rixirab ncahnic chipam, k'e̱' ok wo' nimal i ti'c'axic kajok chi quina̱ take c'acharel re' cu yu'na chi k'i̱j c'ahchi' quisuksam qui̱b ru̱c' acuse'sbal.

Je' wo', nipahkaj wo' johtok aweh chi cahnok chi moylic wach quicapew-bal take c'acharel re're' reh chi ma' eta chic nquirak chiri̱j i ricorquilal ak'orbal. Ma' xa re' ta re' nipahkaj aweh, je' la' wo' xa pan ti'quilal ok wo' quic'acharok, nqui ma' Tawiy.

Chi nik'orom chic lok chi pan mahc xik'ehbic take c'acharel re're', yu'na re' wili i birinic ripahba̱' ri̱b chi niwach: Coric na chi re' take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' je' re' quibanic, quicahnic ta wo' ti chi junpech chi ma' nquic'u'lej ta chic na̱ i k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios? Ma'xta, re' take re' ma' eta quicahnic chi je' re' chi junpech. Re' cok ru' wilic riwi̱' naxik'ehbic pan mahc eh re' wili riwi̱': Re' take re' xik'ehbic reh chi re' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ewo' quico'ljic. Je' wo' chic, wilic wo' riwi̱' chi co'lomaj take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh re' wili riwi̱': Chi re' take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' ma' nquic'u'lej ta na̱ i k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios, naquilow chi re' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel quico'ljic wo', re' aj wo' re' encamanic queh chi ewo' nca̱j quibiram haj wilic xiban i Dios chiqui̱j take ma' re' ta take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.

Je' re' k'uru' re' c'ahchi' nik'orom i hin re' i wili: Cu wilic toco̱m chic kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' naquich'ica̱b quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus. K'e̱' rinimal wach cuse'sbal naribanjic nok je' re' enc'uluric cu̱c'! Nik'or chi je' re' ru'um i wili: Ku'um aj keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xchalic jenaj ato'bil chi quina̱ take c'acharel ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel maj naxojk'ehbic pan mahc i hoj, re're' xcamanic chi q'uihal take c'acharel xquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus. Wi je' re' xc'uluric cu̱c' take c'acharel naxojmahcanic, ticapewenok wo' tak chiri̱j nic' nak q'uihal take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel enquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus, wi chi'nchel i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eta nak nkach'ica̱' kac'ux chiri̱j ru'? Til pan coric, k'e̱' wo' nak chic q'uihal take, maje'?

Yu'na hat-tak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chabiraj tak chi coric take k'oric nwa̱j nik'orom wili: Re' Dios xiripahba̱' chi raj k'oro̱l eh xiritak'a̱' cho awu̱c' tak. Chi re' Dios xye'bic chi nina̱ i ihk re're', re' hin cow niyew nic'ux chi rinimjic re're'

eh nok niban chi je' re', re' wili nich'ica̱' wi̱' nic'ux i hin: Chi naquilow take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' ma' nquic'u'lej ta na̱ i k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios chi re're' rico'lej wo' take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel take, re' ok re' camanok queh wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re're' chi ench'uk i ca̱mna chi enca̱j wo' riye'eric quic'ux chi rinimjic i Jesus reh chi ru̱c' chi je' re' ewo' quico'ljic ru'um i Dios.

Chiri̱j aj re' nich'ica̱' nic'ux i hin eh ru'um re' til niyew nic'ux chi rinimjic ihk wilic chi nina̱ maj re' hin quincapewenic wo' chiri̱j i wili: Wi re' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xc'ulmujic ru'um i Dios chi ritinami̱t eh chi je' re', re' take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' ma' nquic'u'lej ta na̱ i k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios xicahnic chi ma' re' ta chic ritinami̱t take, ra̱j rik'orom chi k'e̱' wo' chic holonquilal i naric'uluric wi re' take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel equi'oquic wo' chic chi ritinami̱t i Dios. Re' naric'uluric re're' je' na ricab nok re' take camnak qui'uctic cho chi naquic'acharic wo' chic, maje'?

Chiri̱j chi nik'orom chic aweh tak chi wilic take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' ma' nquic'u'lej ta na̱ i k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios, yu'na re' chic i wili nwa̱j wo' nik'orom chiqui̱j ru': Re' take c'acharel re're' xa cu ilo̱j wo' take cho ru'um i Dios chi lo̱k' take xa ku'um keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' kanimem chic i Jesus. Re' quilmijic cho chi je' re' ru'um i Dios jenaj wach nc'utunic ru̱c' je' ricab nk'ormojic chiri̱j jeno' caxlan wi'c: Wi tare̱t cho rik'oril tik'imaj wi̱' chi pe̱t, chi'nchel wo' i caxlan wi'c re're' ta wo' re̱t. Je' ricab i k'oric re're', je' wo' re' nk'ormojic chiri̱j jeno' che̱': Wi holohic cho rira'il, je' wo' re' take k'ab i che̱' re're' holohic wo' take.

Ru'um chi je' re' quilmijic nbanaric cho take c'acharel re're', re' hin nik'or wo' chic i wili: Re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' ma' nquic'u'lej ta na̱ i k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios nc'uluric cu̱c' je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' take k'ab jeno' che̱' xa tico̱j Oli̱wo ribihnal chi re' aj ticol reh riyoc' lok take k'ab eh pan quijelow-bal take k'ab re're', re' chic take k'ab jeno' che̱' Oli̱wo re' xa ma' tico̱j ta, rik'olej cok chiwach. Je' wo' re' i Dios xesaj lok take chiwach chi ma' re' ta chic ritinami̱t take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' ma' nquic'u'lej ta na̱ i k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios eh pan quijelow-bal re' chic hat-tak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' xanimej tak chic i Jesus xatricoj tak chi ritinami̱t. Ru'um re're' yu'na, re' hat-tak c'ahchi' chic ac'ulum tak ricuse'sbal i Dios je' ricab nok re' take k'ab i che̱' Oli̱wo re' ma' xa tico̱j ta, naquik'oljic cok chiwach i che̱' Oli̱wo re' xa tico̱j, ar chic ru̱c' rira'il i che̱' re're' ric'am cok rija'quil re' nye'bic ric'acharic.

Chi coric aj chi'nchel i c'ulu̱j lok re're', chayohbalej awi̱b tak chi ma' eta enwih'ic awu̱c' tak i no'jbal chi q'uihsinic i̱b chi quiwach take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' ma' nquic'u'lej ta na̱ i k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios. Wi wilic ok nchel awu̱c' tak i no'jbal re're', til c'olok pan ac'ux tak i wili: Je' ricab chi ma' ru'um ta take k'ab i che̱' pa'lic chi coric i riche'lal ru'um la' reh ra̱' i che̱' re're' cow pa'lic wach ac'al, je' wo' re' nc'uluric awu̱c' tak chi ma' awu'um ta hat-tak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilco̱j i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi ritinami̱t i Dios, ku'um la' keh hoj xatcojoric tak chi hat-tak chic ritinami̱t i Dios.

Ru̱c' xnik'or lok re're' k'i̱j wo' wilic jeno' aweh hat-tak erik'or chi je' wili: «Re' riwi̱' chi re' aj tico̱l reh che̱' Oli̱wo riyoc' lok take k'ab reh chi pan quijelow-bal take k'ab re're' toco̱m chic take k'ab erik'olej cok chiwach reh chi je' re' k'e̱' chic holohic wachanic naribanam i che̱' re're'. Nic' pa' wach nc'uluric ru̱c' take k'ab i che̱' Oli̱wo re' xa ma' tico̱j ta, je' wo' re' riwi̱' xiban i Dios chi xojric'ul chi hoj chic ritinami̱t, nqui ok erik'or.

Wi je' ta nak re' erik'or jeno' hab wach, ricorquilal wo' c'ahchi' rik'orom maj je' ricab chi re' jeno' aj ehcham che̱' riwi̱' chi reh chi eriyoc' lok take k'ab i riche̱', je' wo' re' i Dios riwi̱' wo' chi reh chi re' hat-tak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xatricoj tak yu'na chi ritinami̱t chic xa ru'um reh rich'iquinjic ac'ux xa'n tak chiri̱j i Jesus. Je' wo' chic, riwi̱' wo' chi reh Dios chi xiban chi wilic take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xicahnic lok chi ma' re' ta chic ritinami̱t take xa ru'um chi ma' xquich'ica̱' ta quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus. Wi riwi̱' chi reh i Dios chi je' re' xiban cu̱c' take re', sakbih chaweh tak chi chayohbalej awi̱b tak chi ma̱nimsaj awi̱b tak ru'um reh xiban i Dios awu̱c' tak.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' Dios ma' eta ricuy awu̱c' tak wi re' hat-tak nanimsaj awi̱b tak, je' ricab nok re' aj ehcham che̱' Oli̱wo ma' ricuy ta chi xa chac'a̱c' cho wach riche'lal take k'ab ma' quicamanic ta chic.

Je' re' ajic reh aj chi ma' eta nac'ul aweh tak re're', nipahkaj aweh tak chi ma' niq'uic pan ac'ux tak i nik'orom lok wili: Coric ru' chi re' Dios k'e̱' wo' chic chak'lam cho chi kana̱ xa re' la' nok re're' riyew wo' cho jeno' ti'c'axic china̱ jeno' c'acharel til wo' cow wach nariyew cho. Je' re' nc'uhtunic lok ru̱c' ricorquilal wili: Cu̱c' take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' quik'ehbic pan mahc, re' Dios ribanam chi k'e̱' cow i ti'c'axic nchalic chi quina̱, raj la' awu̱c' hat-tak xiban chi k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal richak'lamil xiyew cho. Re' richak'lamil i Dios re're', nik'or aweh tak chi xa ewo' nwih'ic chana̱ tak xa re' la' wi re' hat-tak enatik tak ju' rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus. Eta nak nc'uluric chi ma' eta chic nach'ica̱' ac'ux tak, re' Dios eriban chi ma' re' ta chic hat-tak ritinami̱t, je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' take k'ab che̱' naquiyoc'oric lok chiwach riche'lal.

Re' c'ahchi' nik'orom aweh tak wili til wo' coric maj re' Dios til wilic rajawric chi naribanam chi je' re'. Ru'um aj chi re' Dios wilic rajawric, re're' xa cu riyew wo' cho queh take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' ma' nquich'ica̱' ta quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus chi naca'nam wo' chic chi ritinami̱t take. Je' re' nok wi xquicana̱' i quino'jbal chi ma' nquich'ica̱' ta quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus, re' take re' til naquic'ulmujic wo' chic chi ritinami̱t i Dios je' ricab nok re' take k'ab i tico̱j laj che̱' Oli̱wo re' esemaj lok chiwach riche'lal nk'oljic wo' chic cok.

Chi reh Dios ma' c'axic ta ribanaric re're' eh re' wili nc'utunic wi̱' chi je' re': Wi ma' c'axic ta chi reh chi re' take k'ab i ma' tico̱j ta laj che̱' Oli̱wo xiyoc' take lok eh xik'olej cok chiwach riche'lal i tico̱j laj che̱' Oli̱wo, ma' c'axic ta wo' chi reh chi re' take k'ab i tico̱j laj che̱' Oli̱wo re' yoc'o̱j nak chic take lok ewo' chic quik'oljic cok chiwach riche'lal. Je' re' ajic wi ma' c'axic ta chi reh Dios ribanaric re're' eh wi ma' c'axic ta wo' chi reh i xiban chawi̱j hat-tak chi xatricoj tak chi hat-tak chic ritinami̱t, to̱b ta re' take cho ama̱m awati't tak ma' c'ulu̱j ta take cho chi pe̱t ru'um i Dios chi ritinami̱t, ma' c'axic ta chi reh chi ewo' chic ric'ul chi ritinami̱t take c'acharel re' xa pan pe̱t wo' ricojom take cho quima̱m cati't chi ritinami̱t.

Hat-tak c'acharel ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' wilca̱t tak chic yu'na chi wich aj niminel reh Jesus, yu'na nanik'oric chiri̱j i no'jbal je' ru̱c' ma' ye'o̱j ta nak cho aweh tak reht'aljic cho pa̱m najtir k'i̱j. Je' re' nanibanam reh chi echic narak tak chiri̱j ma' riwi̱' ta chaweh tak chi enanimsaj awi̱b tak chi quiwach take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Re' aj wili i no'jbal re're': Coric ru', cu rehtal nmanlajic wach aq'uihal hat-tak juntuhm chi c'acharel ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' c'ahchi' chic animem tak i Jesus, xa wilic wo' juntuhm keh hoj c'acharel ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' naquicowsam i ca̱mna chi ma' eta nquinimej i Jesus, xa re' la' to̱b ta wo' je' re' naric'uluric,

chi kawach johtok cu wilic rik'ijil nok re' co'lbal i̱b riyew i Dios narichalic chi kana̱ chi'nchel i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Re' ric'uluric i wili xa nok wo' tz'ihmbimaj cho chipam i lok laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios. Chipam aj i hu̱j re're' je' wili k'oro̱j cho: “Naribanam chi naructic cho jenaj aj co'lonel eh ar narichalic rira'il chi quixilac take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Re' aj co'lonel re're' naribanam chi ma'xta chic ca'nam i c'ahbilal nca'n take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Jacow re' ribihnej wo' chi Israhel.
Nok bano̱j chic re're', ar aj ru' narimanlajic wach i nik'orbal hin Dios re' niyeb cho najtir k'i̱j chi nanicuyum quimahc take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, nqui k'oro̱j cho.

Je' re' ajic ma' riwi̱' ta chi re' hat-tak enanimsaj awi̱b tak chi quiwach take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' ma' nquinimej ta kAja̱w Jesus. Coric ru', yu'na re' chic hat-tak c'ahchi' ac'ulu̱j tak reh rato'bil i Dios maj re' take re' ma' nquic'ul ta i C'uhbal nye'bic sukquil c'uxlis queh take quic'ulbic reh c'uhbal re're'. Ru̱c' re're' xca'n chi re' rijosk'il i Dios xchalic chi quina̱, xa re' la' ru' re' Dios xiban wo' cho jenaj tik'inic najtir k'i̱j cu̱c' take kama̱m kati't eh ru'um chi xichih take cho chi pe̱t c'acharel chi naca'nam chi ritinami̱t, re' take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' ma' nquinimej i Jesus xa cu wilic wo' ric'axbal i Dios chi quina̱.

Ru'um nok re' Dios xichih quiwach take kama̱m kati't, re're' xik'or wo' queh chi xa naquiwih'ic wo' chi ritinami̱t take eh chi re' ric'axbal xa nariwih'ic wo' chi kana̱ chi'nchel i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Re' xik'or re're' ma' jaruj ta rijalam i Dios.

Je' re' k'uru' chaweh hat-tak ma' re' ta ra'ril cho ma' Israhel eh je' wo' chi keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ma'xta jeno' riwi̱' chi enkanimsaj ki̱b ru'um nok xa jenaj wach c'ulu̱j ku̱c' chi'nchel i hoj. Je' re' nik'or maj chana̱ hat-tak xwih'ic jenaj rik'ijil chi xatc'acharic tak chi ma' c'ahchi' ta animem tak i Dios. Chipam rik'ijil re're', re' ric'axbal i Dios ma' xwih'ic ta nak chana̱ tak ra̱j yu'na cu'um queh riq'uihal c'acharel wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' ma' nquinimej ta i Dios, re' hat-tak xchalic chana̱ tak ric'axbal i Dios.

Je' ricab nak riwi̱' i c'acharic xa'n tak cho, yu'na wilic wo' take c'acharel je' ru̱c' wich ra̱' ri'sil take cho ma' Israhel c'ahchi' quic'acharic chi ma' nquinimej ta i Dios. Ru'um reh ric'axbal i Dios xic'uhtaj cho chana̱ hat-tak, narichalic wo' i rik'ijil nok re' c'axbal re're' nariwih'ic wo' chi quina̱ take c'acharel re're'.

Je' re' k'uru' ru̱c' nc'uluric nak ku̱c' chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel, nkarak chiri̱j i ribanam i Dios wili: Re're' xiyew k'ab chi ric'uhtjic chi re' hoj chi'nchel c'acharel je' hoj quicab take c'acharel tz'apalque̱b take pan che̱'. Je' re' nik'or maj chi kunchelal i hoj ric'ul nak chi keh chi nariye'eric ti'c'axic chi kana̱ ru'um chi ma' nkabiraj ta nak k'oric chiwach i Dios. Xa re' la' ru' re' Dios ma' je' ta re' xiban keh eh je' re' xiban reh chi ewo' nc'uhtunic wach chi chi'nchel hoj c'acharel riquetelej aj wo' kawach.

Ru'um aj reh xiban lok re're', re' hin je' wili nik'or chiri̱j i Dios chi lok'onbal wach: Re' Dios, k'e̱' nimal wach richak'lamil ric'uhtaj cho. Je' wo', re're' k'e̱' rinimal wach rino'jbal wilic. Ru̱c' rino'jbal re're' rina'bej pa̱m chi'nchel xa re' cok ru' re' no'jbal wilic cho pa ricapew-bal i Dios chi naribanam ma' hab ta chic jeno' wach neht'alanic reh eh ma' hab ta wo' wach ensakomonic wach.
Chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios je' wo' wili rik'or: “Re' Dios ma' hab ta wach nye'bic rino'jbal eh re' wilic pa ricapew-bal ma' hab ta wo' wach neht'alanic reh.
Re' Dios ma'xta ric'a̱s ru̱c' jeno' hab wach. Ma' jaruj ta enc'ulmujic chi hab ta nak wach u̱c' eriban riquemel, nqui rik'or.

Je' re' ajic re' Dios nye'bic reh chi'nchel eh re' wo' re' xtik'inic reh chi'nchel. Je' wo' chic, re're' tanlic chiri̱j chi narilok'onjic wach cu'um take chi'nchel ritik'inic. Ru'um aj re' je' wili nik'or chi lok'onbal wach: Lok'omaj ok wach i Dios chi junelic k'i̱j sakom cu'um take chi'nchel c'acharel. Je' ta nak re' banarok, nqui nik'or.

Je' re' k'uru' hat-tak was nicha̱k' aj niminel reh Jesus, ru'um reh rinimal wach ric'axbal i Dios ric'uhtaj cho chi kana̱ chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel, til nipahkaj aweh tak ru̱c' chi'nchel i wa̱mna chi nic' pa' wach je' na'n tak ru̱c' jeno' chicop re' nak'ahsaj tak johtok chi asi̱ tak chiwach i Dios, je' wo' re' cha'n ru̱c' ac'acharic tak, chayew tak chi je' ok ricab jenaj asi̱ tak chiwach i Dios. Je' ricab chi til k'e̱' nponic chiwach i Dios nok jeno' chicop manlic wach chi coric nk'ahsjic chi si̱ chiwach, je' wo' re' rilow cho Dios nok lo̱k' i c'acharic na'n tak chiwach. Wi je' re' riwi̱' i c'acharic na'n tak, re' alok'onic na'n tak chiwach til je' ricab riwi̱' i lok'onic re' coric chiwach ru'.

Nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chi chipam ac'acharic tak chatik tak ju' rijalaric wach ano'jbal tak, re' cok ru' cha'n tak re're' xa re' la' ma' ta chi c'ahchi' ac'acharic tak je' ricab nca'n take quixowonic wach i Dios, chacana̱' la' tak chi re' ok re' enjalbic wach ano'jbal tak maj chi je' re' na̱rakam tak chiri̱j chi coric i ra̱j i Dios wili: Chi re' ano'jbal tak holohic ok, coric ok wach eh je' wo' nt'oric ok wach chi manlic.

Re' chak'lamil ric'uhtam wi̱n i Dios re' aj re' nbanic chi yu'na eniyew chawach tak chawunchelal i jenaj chic no'jbal wili: Naticapewenic tak chiri̱j i pa' bih tichol tak ribanaric, ma' nanimsaj awi̱b tak ru'um re're'. Tare̱t ru' chi nacapaj tak chiri̱j i pa' bih tichol tak ribanaric, xa re' la' ru' cha'n tak re're' chi xa ch'ublic wach ac'ux tak ru'um nok re' Dios k'orel china̱ pa' bih tichol tak ribanaric. Je' re' nik'or maj re' Dios re' xye'bic aweh tak chi xach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus re' aj wo' xbanic chi xac'ul tak awajawric re' na'n tak wi̱' pa' bih tichol tak ribanaric chi xa je' na nchel jenaj asi̱ tak.

Chi je' aj re' chacoj tak rehtal i nanik'orom wili chi c'ahchi' nicojom chi rehtalil i kati'jolal: Re' kati'jolal yohbal wach take richopom wi̱' ri̱b xa re' la' chi'nchel take ric'u'lej wi̱' ri̱b ma' xa ta jenaj wach nquicamanej chi cunchelal.

Nic' pa' wach nc'uluric ru̱c' i kati'jolal je' aj wo' re' ku̱c' i hoj aj niminel reh Jesus. Je' re' nik'or ru'um chi k'e̱' hoj q'uihal chipam rinimjic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, q'uihleh wo' wach i camanic nka'n chi'nchel i hoj. Re' cok ru' to̱b ta q'uihleh wach take camanic nka'n, xa jenaj wo' kawi̱' pan suk laj c'uxlis chi rinimjic i Jesus, je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' take ric'u'lej wi̱' ri̱b kati'jolal chi xa jenaj wo' quiwi̱' nok wilque̱b.

Je' re' ajic ru̱c' i xik'or re're' nkilow chi re' Dios rehreh wach camanic xiyew keh hoj aj niminel reh Jesus eh re're' xiban chi ju'jun keh i hoj wilic chic kajawric chi narimanlajic wach xa pa' wilic camanic ye'o̱j keh. Ru'um aj re', re' aj niminel nc'ulbic reh c'uhbal k'oro̱j reh ru'um i Dios, tanlic wo' china̱ chi narik'orom lok i k'oro̱j reh re're', re' cok ru' curman chi re' ok i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j re' ch'iclic wi̱' kac'ux chik'or ribiral i aj niminel re're'.
Je' wo' chic, re' aj niminel re' nye'eric reh ru'um i Dios chi nchol quitobjic take ras richa̱k' tanlic china̱ chi re' aj re' naribanam.

Je' wo', re' i aj niminel re' nye'eric reh ru'um i Dios chi nchol cojoj no'jbal tanlic wo' china̱ chi re' aj re' naribanam. Re' aj niminel re' nye'eric reh ru'um i Dios chi nchol ripuhcjic pa' bih wilic reh, tanlic wo' china̱ chi naric'uhtam richak'lamil cu̱c' take ras richa̱k' nariban re're'. Re' chic aj niminel cojo̱j chi c'amol quibe̱h take c'acharel ru'um i Dios, tanlic wo' china̱ chi re' aj re' naribanam ru̱c' coric c'uxlis. Je' wo', re' aj niminel re' nye'eric reh ru'um i Dios chi nchol quilmijic take wilque̱b pan ti'c'axic tanlic wo' china̱ chi ru̱c' wo' sukquil c'uxlis naribanam re're'.

Wilic wo' junch'uk chic take no'jbal nwa̱j niyeb tak chawach wili: Coric ok aweh tak i c'axoj i̱b na'n tak. Chi je' re' ma' riban chi c'ahbil ano'jbal tak re' la' chayew ac'ux tak chi ribanaric i holohic laj no'jbal.

Je' re' ajic nanac'ax awi̱b tak cha'n tak je' ricab nquic'ax qui̱b chi quibil qui̱b take xa cas quicha̱k' qui̱b chiwach quitu̱t caja̱w. Re' chic k'oric chiri̱j alok'il tak, re' wili no'jbal niyew chawach tak: Ma̱sic' tak riye'jic alok'il hat-tak re' la' chasic' tak riye'eric quilok'il take awas acha̱k' aj niminel.

Chiri̱j take camanic ye'o̱j chana̱ tak, re' wili i nino'jbal niyew aweh tak chiri̱j: Ma̱siquilej wach acamaj tak cha'n la' tak ru̱c' chi'nchel awa̱mna tak ru'um nok wi nanimej tak, chiwach wo' i Jesus c'ahchi' animem tak.

Nok nchalic ti'c'axic chana̱ tak, niyew tak ano'jbal chi ticuyunok tak chipam eh xa suk ok wo' ac'ux tak chi ritikiric ju' ruyu'njic i holonquilal bano̱j naribanam i Dios awu̱c' tak. Xa eli̱c ok wo' c'ahchi'ca̱t tak chi ti̱j.

Chiqui̱j take awich aj niminel reh Jesus je' ru̱c' ma'xta bih wilic queh, niyew chawach tak i no'jbal wili chi chato'bej tak take eh wi jeno' queh re' xirak ric'axquil chi ma'xta ripatal haj narihi'lic wi̱', on haj naribanam wi̱' riwa' riha̱', chac'ul tak pan apa̱t tak chi ritobjic.

Re' chic take quibanic ti'c'axic aweh tak niyew aweh tak i no'jbal chi ma̱pahkaj tak reh Dios chi equisihtjic cho ru'um, chapahkaj la' tak pan ati̱j tak chi xa wilic ok wo' cho ricuse'sbal chi quina̱. Til re're' pahkanic cha'n tak chiqui̱j.

Je' wo' nicoj wo' ano'jbal tak chi sukbok ac'ux tak cu̱c' take c'acharel nsukbic quic'ux ru'um chi wilic jeno' riwi̱' chi quiwach. Ra̱j nchel wi wilic jeno' riwi̱' chi wilic ti' c'uxlis pan ca̱mna, ti'bok wo' ac'ux tak cu̱c'.

Jenaj chic no'jbal niyew chawach tak eh re' no'jbal re're' chi tic'acharok tak pan jenaj wach c'uxlis chawibil awi̱b tak. Ma' hab wach aweh tak ncapewenic chi k'e̱' wo' chic rino'jbal chi quiwach take toco̱m ras richa̱k' eh ma̱ban wo' tak chi xa hat-tak k'itk'it. Je' re' ajic wi wilic jeno' je' ru̱c' xa ma'xta ti riwa'ric chaxilac tak ma̱ban tak chi ma' eta chic natuna̱' awi̱b tak ru̱c', tiwih'ok la' ch'i̱l pan junwachil chi xa ch'ublic ti ac'ux tak.

Cu̱c' chic take quibanic ti'c'axic aweh tak, re' wili jenaj chic no'jbal niyew aweh tak: Ma̱ban tak chic jelow-bal haj wilic i ti'c'axic nbanaric aweh tak re' la' hat-tak chatik tak ju' ribanaric i bano̱j re' nacoj tak rehtal chi holohic nquilow take c'acharel.

Je' re' k'uru' re' hat-tak chayew ac'ux tak chiri̱j ribanaric chi'nchel i pa' bih holohic laj no'jbal re' nbanic chi etiwih'ic tak pan sukquil c'uxlis cu̱c' take chi'nchel c'acharel. Til ru̱c' wo' chi'nchel awansil cha'n tak re're' chi xa je' na nchel ricab hat-tak k'orel china̱ risukquilal quic'acharic take ru'.

Je' re' ajic wich aj niminel reh Jesus re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak xa pa' bih ti'c'axic nbanjic aweh tak, ma̱ban tak jelow-bal queh c'acharel quibanic aweh tak, chacana̱' la' tak chi re' Dios eric'uhtaj rijosk'il chi quina̱ maj re're' rik'orom chi je' re' naribanam. Chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios rik'or chi je' wili: “Je' wili rik'orom i Dios: ‘Xa re' wo' hin wilic wajawric chi riye'eric rijelow-bal i pa' bih ti'c'axic nbanjic. Ru'um aj re', re' hin quinye'bic reh ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take c'acharel chi tojbal wach i quimahc, nqui rik'orom i Dios, nqui rik'or riC'uhbal.

Je' re' ajic cu̱c' take quixowonic awach tak, cha'n tak cu̱c' je' ricab i no'jbal ye'o̱j chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' i riC'uhbal i Dios, re' rik'or chi je' wili: «Wi re' nxowonic wach ric'ahric, chayew riwa' eh wila' chiki̱j chi̱' chayew wo' riha̱'. Ru̱c' ribanaric chi je' re', re' awaj ixowonel re're' enchalic jenaj rinimal riq'uix'ic, nqui rik'or.

Chi je' re' i no'jbal riyew i Dios, re' hin niyew wo' aweh tak i no'jbal wili: Ma̱yew tak k'ab chi re' rajawric i aj banol reh c'ahbilal eriyew pan ac'al i holohic laj no'jbal wilic awu̱c' tak, re' la' cha'n tak chayew tak pan ac'al i rajawric i banol reh c'ahbilal ru̱c' ribanaric i holohic laj no'jbal.

Yu'na chiqui̱j chic take quik'atbic k'oric chana̱ tak nanik'oric. Re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi tiniminok tak chi quiwach. Je' re' nik'or aweh tak maj wo' Dios xtik'inic wach chi wilque̱b take k'atal k'oric chi quina̱ take c'acharel. Chi je' re' ritik'a̱b wach i Dios, ma' jeno' k'atal k'oric ma' ta nak re' Dios xye'bic rajawric.

Ru'um aj re' nok jeno' c'acharel ma' rinimej ta take wilic cajawric ayu' wach ac'al, re' wo' no'jbal re're' enbanic chi enchalic ti'c'axic china̱ ru'um nok ma' c'ahchi' ta rinimem haj wilic ricana̱b i Dios china̱ ac'al wili.

Tz'a̱b ru' i c'acharel re' rinimej take wilic cajawric ru'um chi holohic nbanic, ma'xta bih enyo'jic wi̱' chi enchalic ti'c'axic china̱ cu'um take wilic cajawric china̱. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' ma' cojo̱j ta take ru'um i Dios chi riye'eric ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take nca'n i holonquilal, cojo̱j la' take chi riye'eric ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take nca'n i c'ahbilal. Chi je' re' quicamaj take quik'atbic k'oric chana̱ tak, ma' riwi̱' ta chi etiyo'jic tak chi quiwach wi la' c'ahchi'ca̱t chi c'acharic ru̱c' holohic laj no'jbal. Wi je' re' na'n tak k'uru', na̱c'ulum tak alok'il reh chi enatik tak ju' ribanaric i holohic laj no'jbal.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' aj camanom take chiwach i Dios chi atobjic tak chi ribanaric i holohic laj no'jbal. Tz'a̱b ru' wi ma' holohic tibanic tak, tiyo'jok tak chi quiwach take wilic cajawric. Je' re' nik'or maj til pa ricorquilal, re' take re' wilic cajawric chi riye'eric ti'c'axic chana̱ tak ru'um nok canamaj take ru'um i Dios chi aj camanom take reh chi enquich'uk k'oric china̱ quibano̱j take c'acharel eh je' wo' chi enquiyew ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take nquirak quimahc.

Je' re' ajic chiqui̱j take quik'atbic k'oric chana̱ tak, nicoj ano'jbal tak chi tiniminok tak chi quiwach. Re' cok ru' ma' ok xa ru'um reh riyohljic wach i ti'c'axic enquiyew chana̱ tak ru'um reh cajawric wilic, ru'um la' ok chi pan awa̱mna tak aweht'alim tak chi tare̱t ribanaric i coric.

Je' ricab chi tare̱t i birinic k'oric na'n tak chi quiwach take quik'atbic k'oric chana̱ tak, ta wo' re̱t i na'n tak nanayew tak i to̱j re' nquipahkaj take k'atal k'oric. Je' re' nik'or chi ena'n tak maj re' wo' Dios xye'bic queh quicamaj re' c'ahchi' ca'nam ru̱c' quic'ux.

Je' re' ajic ru'um nok re' Dios xye'bic reh quicamaj take k'atal k'oric, curman chi ena'n tak take to̱j nquipahkaj, curman chi na̱birinic tak k'oric chi quiwach eh curman wo' chi na̱yeb tak quilok'il.

Re' chic i k'oric chiri̱j ac'a̱s tak, nwa̱j niyeb aweh tak i no'jbal wili: Ma̱ban tak chi eno̱j lok chi nahtil ritojoric ac'a̱s tak, chatoj la' tak lok chi nok reh chi ma' eta nwih'ic i ihk chana̱ tak chi quiwach take c'acharel. Haj cok wilic ac'a̱s tak re' til eriban chi enwih'ic chawach tak chi jenaj ihk chana̱ tak, re' quic'axaric take chi'nchel awas acha̱k' tak. Chaj wa'ric nanik'or chi je' re'? Nik'or chi je' re' ru'um i wili: Ru̱c' rinimjic i ihk re're', re' hat-tak c'ahchi' wo' animem tak take tak'anic wilic chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses.

Re' take tak'anic c'ahchi' nik'oric chiri̱j re're', re' take wili: Ma̱ban i c'oyomal, ma̱ban i cansanic, ma̱ban ilek', ma̱tz'ak k'oric chiri̱j awas acha̱k'. Je' wo' ma̱ban chi xa ji̱k' chic ac'ux chi relk'jic pa' bih nac'ax wach reh jeno' chic c'acharel. Chi'nchel take tak'anic re're' ch'i̱l wo' take toco̱m chic tak'anic no̱j riban chi n-nimjic wo' wi nc'amaric na̱ i tak'anic rik'or chi je' wili: “Chac'ax awas acha̱k' je' ricab ric'axaric awi̱b na'n i hat”.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' riban c'axoj i̱b ma' riban ta jeno' c'ahbilal queh take rich c'acharel. Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi re' nbanic i c'axoj i̱b rinimej take tak'anic k'oro̱j cahnok ru'um i Moyses ar chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios.

Nok nibanam chic lok k'oric chiri̱j i tak'anic chiri̱j quic'axaric take kich c'acharel, nik'or wo' aweh tak chi chanimej wo' tak chi coric take tak'anic re're' chiwach i rik'ijil wilco̱j wi̱' wili. Re' aj wili chana'bej tak chiwach i rik'ijil wili: Je' ricab nok re' hoj nkatik'a̱' ki̱b chi nakuctic lok wahk'ek nok iq'uinak chic lok ri'orahil kawarbal, curman wo' chi je' re' ritik'injic ki̱b naka'nam chiwach rik'ijil wili maj re' kAja̱w Jesus chalic chic reh chi kaco'ljic chi junpech. Nik'or aweh tak chi je' re' maj xa re' wo' cho naxkach'ica̱' kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus cu yu'na chi k'i̱j c'ahchi' chic rit'uchbic ro̱k rik'ijil richalic i Jesus.

Je' re' ajic ru'um chi nkana'bej chi re' ric'ulic lok i kAja̱w Jesus xa ma' naht ta chic wilic chi kawach je' ricab nc'uluric nok iq'uinak chic lok i chak'ab xa nic' yu' chic enelic cho i k'i̱j, kajal wo' tak wach i nic' pa' nimal i ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal nka'n reh chi nakatik'a̱b ki̱b je' ricab riban i sol naritik'a̱' ri̱b ru̱c' ripuhmbal ch'i̱l i ch'ihch' laj tz'ih ricoj chiri̱j chi co'lbal ri̱b, re' ok wo' rino'jbal i Jesus c'uhtunok lok ku̱c' i hoj.

Je' re' k'uru' je' ricab chi xa je' ta nak c'ulic chic lok i rik'ijil nok re' kAja̱w Jesus nchalic chi kaco'ljic, re' hoj kojc'acharok ru̱c' coric wach no'jbal ma' ok re' no'jbal nca'n take c'acharel je' ru̱c' nquicoj nink'i̱j reh chi naquisukem qui̱b chi xohc'ric, enc'utunic lok ku̱c'. Je' wo' chic, re' kano'jbal ma' ok je' ricab i no'jbal nquic'uhtaj take c'acharel je' ru̱c' nca'n i c'oyomal, on je' ricab quino'jbal take banol c'ahbilal. Ma' ok wo' je' ricab quino'jbal take nquiwolej qui̱b, on take nquixowej qui̱b.

Re' la' cha'n tak je' ricab nanajal lok aso' tak eh toco̱m chic sak wach nacoj tak chawi̱j, je' ok wo' re' rijalaric wach ano'jbal cha'n tak chi re' chic i rino'jbal i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' chic re' enac'uhtaj tak reh chi ma' eta na'n aweh tak take c'ahbil laj no'jbal nca'n take suk queh ribanaric i mahc.

Je' re' k'uru', wi wilic jeno' awich aj niminel tak rehreh wach ricapew-bal chiri̱j i kaniminic ru'um chi cu ja' cow ta ric'ux chiri̱j i Jesus, nipahkaj aweh tak chi chac'ul chaxilac tak, ma' toquic tak chi wolic ru̱c' chiri̱j i ricapew-bal.

Je' re' nik'or maj wilic queh take aj niminel je' ru̱c' cow chic ricapew-bal ricapaj chi eriban chi chi'nchel wach c'uxbal eric'ux xa re' la' chic chi quixilac take aj niminel je' ru̱c' cu ja' cow ta quic'ux, wilic ricapaj chi re' take toco̱m chic aj niminel nanquic'ux i tiwic c'ahchi' quimahcanic, ru'um nok chi reh ru' xa re' wach i cha̱j tare̱t chi c'uxuric.

Je' re' k'uru' ma' riban ta chi xa hab wach erinimsaj ri̱b xa ru'um chi riban on ma' riban ta ric'uxuric re're'. Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab i c'acharel re' ric'ux i tiwic ru'um ric'raj chi tare̱t chi c'uxuric, ma' riban ta chi rich'uk k'oric china̱ i rich aj niminel chi ma' riwi̱' ta c'ahchi' ribanam nok ma' ric'ux ta i tiwic. Je' wo' re' i c'acharel re' ma' ric'ux ta tiwic ma' riban ta wo' chi rik'or chi mahc i c'uxuj tiwic maj re' Dios xa ric'ul wo' i c'acharel to̱b ta ric'ux on ma' ric'ux i tiwic.

Je' re' k'uru' je' ricab nok ma' riwi̱' ta chi jeno' c'acharel ma'xta rajawric china̱ jeno' aj camanom chi erich'uk k'oric china̱ chi re' ricamaj ma' holohic ta, ma' riwi̱' ta wo' chi jeno' aweh hat-tak erich'uk k'oric chiri̱j ribano̱j jeno' awich aj niminel tak. Til c'olok pan ac'ux tak chi xa re' wo' i kAja̱w Jesus wilic rajawric chi ch'ukuj k'oric chi quina̱ chi'nchel aj niminel eh chi je' re' i rajawric, wilic wo' rajawric chi naribanam chi re' aj niminel re're' enpah'ic chi cow ric'ux chipam riniminic to̱b ta ok nchel chi re' aj niminel re're' ric'ux on ma' ric'ux ta i tiwic.

Je' wo' chic, chiri̱j ribiral quilok'il take k'i̱j rehreh wach capew-bal wilic. Wilic take quicapewenic reh chi re' rilok'il jeno' k'i̱j k'e̱' wo' chic lo̱k' chiwach jeno' chic k'i̱j eh wilic wo' take quicapewenic reh chi chi'nchel take k'i̱j xa jenaj wach quilok'il. Nipahkaj aweh tak k'uru' chi aju'junal hat-tak cha'n tak re' haj wilic i nacapaj tak chi tare̱t chi banaric.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' ncapewenic chi k'e̱' lo̱k' jeno' k'i̱j chiwach take toco̱m chic k'i̱j, pa ricapew-bal wilic cho riye'eric rilok'il i Dios chipam i k'i̱j re're'. Tz'a̱b ru' re' ncapewenic reh chi chi'nchel i k'i̱j jenaj wach quilok'il, chi'nchel wo' k'i̱j riyew rilok'il i Dios. Je' wo' re' nc'uluric ru̱c' i c'acharel re' ricapaj chi ma' nmahcanic ta ru̱c' i xa pa' jaric c'uxbal nye'eric reh, re're' riye'eric wo' rilok'il i Dios wilic cho pa ricapew-bal on ru̱c' i c'acharel re' ricapaj chi wilic take c'uxbal ma' tare̱t ta chi c'uxuric, re're' ritioxej wo' johtok i Dios nok ma' ric'ux ta i c'uxbal ma' tare̱t ta chi c'uxuric chi reh.

Je' re' k'uru' chi re' Dios xa ric'ul wo' rilok'il ru̱c' take pa' wilic nbanaric, re're' ric'uhtaj keh chi re' kac'acharic wilic yu'na i hoj aj niminel reh Jesus, on re' wilic chiri̱j chic nakojquimic je, ma' re' ta ye'bal kalok'il i hoj

re' la' kac'acharic nye'eric keh reh chi nakalok'em wach i kAja̱w Jesus. Wi xojquimic wo' je, xa cu nakatikim wo' ju' rilok'onjic wach. Je' re' k'uru' to̱b ta c'achalco̱j on to̱b ta hoj chic camnak je, xa cu nakalok'em wo' wach i Jesus.

Je' re' nik'or ru'um nok naxquimic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, xye'eric wo' chic ric'acharic reh chi je' re' xcahnic chi Ajabe̱s re' narilok'onjic wach cu'um chi'nchel take c'acharel je' chi cu c'achalque̱b je' wo' chi camnak chic take je.

Je' re' k'uru' hat-tak wich aj niminel, ru'um chi re' Jesus pahbamaj chi nariwih'ic chi Ajabe̱s chi quina̱ chi'nchel c'acharel eh ru'um wo' chi je' re', wilic jenaj i k'i̱j nok chi kunchelal nakapah'ic chiwach reh chi erich'uk k'oric china̱ i kabano̱j, re' hin niyew ano'jbal tak chi ma̱ban tak ch'ukuj wach k'oric china̱ jeno' chic awas acha̱k' tak aj niminel on ma̱coj tak rimahc ru'um reh ricapew-bal, chacana̱' tak chi re' ok Dios ch'ukbok wach k'oric china̱ on k'orok reh wi wilic rimahc jeno' hab wach.

Je' re' nik'or maj xa re' wach re' wilic rajawric chi ribanaric chi je' re'. Ru'um aj re' ar chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios je' wili k'oro̱j: “Re' hin Ajabe̱s Dios nik'or aweh tak je' ricab chi til coric chi re' hin xa c'achalqui̱n wo' chi junelic, til coric wo' chi chi niwach i hin chi'nchel take c'acharel enquixuc'a̱' qui̱b chi rehtalil rik'ormojic chi re' hin Dios til wilic wajawric chi quina̱ chi'nchel c'acharel, nqui k'oro̱j cho.

Je' re' ajic re' ok Dios ch'ukbok k'oric chi kana̱ on cojbok reh kamahc maj xa chiwach wo' ru' nakapah'ic chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel chi rik'ormojic reh chi'nchel i kabano̱j reh chi re're' narich'ukum k'oric chi kana̱.

Je' re' k'uru' was nicha̱k' aj niminel, ru'um chi je' re' naribanam i Dios ma' koj-oquic chi rich'ukuric wach kacapew-bal nok rehreh wach capewenic nka'n chiri̱j i kaniminic. Haj cok wilic til k'e̱' ajwal wach chi ka'n, re' i wili: Cow kapahba̱' tak kacapew-bal eh ma' nka'n chi ru'um reh kano'jbal enk'ehbic pan mahc i kich aj niminel.

Coric wo', yu'na chi hin chic raj tahkanel i Jesus re' hin weht'alim chi ma'xta jeno' c'uxbal equirik'eb pan mahc chiwach i kAja̱w Dios, xa re' la' wilic take wich aj niminel nquicapaj chi til wilic take c'uxbal re' riban chi nanquic'ux quicahnic chi aj mahc chic take chiwach i Dios.

Chi je' aj re' quicapew-bal take wich aj niminel re're', wi re' hat xayuk'ej jeno' awich aj niminel chi naric'uxum i c'uxbal je' ru̱c' ma' ric'ux ta, ma' suk ta encahnic awu'um. Wi nawilow chi je' re', re' hat xa cow wo' naxutej reh chi naric'uxum i c'uxbal re're' c'ahchi' ac'uhtam chi ma' nac'ax ta awich aj niminel re're'. Je' re' nik'or maj ru̱c' rixutjic reh ac'uxbal, c'ahchi' abanam chi re're' eric'raj chi narisacharic wach ru'um i Dios eh ma' tare̱t ta chi je' re' eric'raj, ru'um nok ma' re' ta re' i riwi̱' chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xquimic, re' la' i riwi̱' chi xquimic reh chi rico'ljic i aj niminel re're'.

Wi wilic nchel jeno' no'jbal je' ru̱c' nawic'raj tak chi tare̱t chi ribanaric xa re' la' i toco̱m chic awich aj niminel ric'raj chi ma' tare̱t ta chi banaric, sakbih chaweh tak chi ma' eta na'n tak ribanaric reh chi ma' eta nk'ormojic chi c'ahchi' amahcanic tak.

Je' re' nik'or aweh tak ru'um reh wili: Nok wilco̱j chic chi rehquen rajawric i Dios chi k'atal k'oric, re' til k'e̱' curman chi naka'nam ma' re' ta chic ribanaric take tak'anic bano̱j chiri̱j take kawa' kaha̱', re' la' i wili til k'e̱' wo' chic curman chi banaric: Re' wih'ic pan coric wach no'jbal, re' c'acharic pan sukquil laj c'uxlis chi kibil ki̱b eh je' wo' chi re' ok i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios enbanic chi enwih'ic sukquil c'uxlis pan awa̱mna tak.

Wi chi'nchel re're' nbanjic nanka'n i kacamaj ye'o̱j keh ru'um i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, ma' xa re' ta take kich c'acharel ensukbic quic'ux ku'um, je' la' wo' i Dios til ensukbic ric'ux ku'um.

Je' re' ajic reh chi enc'ulmujic chi je' re', kasic' tak ru̱c' chi'nchel i ka̱mna i sukquil c'uxlis. Ru̱c' re're' enkato'bej ki̱b chi chi'nchel i hoj aj niminel chi ekojc'acharic pan sukquil c'uxlis chi kibil ki̱b eh je' wo' chi ekojwih'ic pan cow laj c'uxlis pan kaniminic.

Chi nik'orom chic re're', re' chic yu'na nipahkaj aweh tak chi ma̱jot' tak i holohic laj no'jbal wilic ru̱c' awich aj niminel tak. Nik'or chi je' re' ru'um chi re' wo' Dios c'ahchi' ribanic i camanic pa ric'acharic. Til coric ru', re' Dios riyeb k'ab keh chi nakac'uxum chi'nchel wach c'uxbal xa re' la' wi nkac'ux jeno' c'uxbal re' pa ricapew-bal cho jeno' kich aj niminel ma' ye'o̱j ta k'ab chi c'uxuric ru'um nok ru̱c' re're' ric'raj chi enmahcanic, re' aj re' nbanic chi ma' riwi̱' ta chi c'uxuric i c'uxbal re're' xa ru'um reh ricapew-bal i kich aj niminel re're'.

Ru'um aj re' nok wi'c na'n tak rich'i̱l i awich aj niminel, re' wili no'jbal nicoj chawach tak: Re' xa pa' bih jeno' no'jbal re' eriban chi re' awich aj niminel tak eric'raj chi c'ahchi' rimahcanic ru'um reh xa pa' bih na̱banam tak chiwach, ma̱ban wo' tak ribanaric. Wi ru'um reh c'uxuj tiwic on ru'um reh uc'unic ha' nxohc'sonic re' awich aj niminel tak ric'raj chi c'ahchi' rimahcanic, re' hin niyew tak ano'jbal chi ma̱c'ux tak i tiwic on ma̱wuq'uej tak i ha' re're'.

Nik'or re're' ru'um i wili: Je' ricab rik'or i k'oro̱j wili chi xa wilic wo' sukquil c'uxlis ru̱c' i c'acharel re' ricapaj chi tare̱t xiban eh ma' ric'raj ta chi xmahcanic, re' hat-tak til ch'iclic wo' ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Dios chi ma' timahcanic ta tak chiwach nanach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiri̱j chi re' na'n tak ta wo' re̱t.

Ra̱j la' i aj niminel re' xa qui̱b wach ric'ux chi ricapewjic wi mahc on ma' mahc riban ru̱c' ric'uxuric i xa pa' jaric chi c'uxbal ma' je' ta re' nc'uluric ru̱c'. Re' chic re' ma' ch'iclic ta ric'ux chi ricorquilal i c'ahchi' ribanam eh ru'um re' til ric'raj chi mahc riban. Til coric chi mahc riban maj haj wilic take nbanjic chi c'ahchi' ricapewjic chi ma' ato̱b ta, re're' mahc chiwach i Dios.

Re' hoj re' cow chic kac'ux chipam i rinimjic i kAja̱w Jesus, curman chi nakato'bem take kich aj niminel je' ru̱c' ma' ja' cow ta ti ric'ux chiri̱j pa riniminic. Ru'um aj re' niyew tak chawach i no'jbal wili chi kacuy tak ransil i chaj bih nkic'raj pa̱m ka̱mna chi naka'nam re' enbanic chi re' kich aj niminel eric'raj chi enmahcanic. Kic'raj tak ki̱b k'uru' chi quiwach take kas kacha̱k' maj chi enka'n re' haj wilic nka̱j ribanaric, ma' k'e̱' ta wo' chic curman chi keh.

Re' la' til k'e̱' wo' chic curman chi keh re' risiq'uiric riye'eric rilok'il i Dios cu'um take kich aj niminel naquilom kaholohic laj bano̱j reh chi je' re' riman chic enquicowsaj quic'ux chi rinimjic i Jesus.

Je' re' nik'or aweh tak maj re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric ma' xisic' ta wo' ribanaric i no'jbal haj wilic xponic chiwach, re' la' xisic' ribanaric i haj wilic xponic chiwach i Dios eh ru'um re're' ru̱c' Jesus xc'uluric je' ricab i tz'ihmbimaj cho wili chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios: “Je' ricab xc'uluric awu̱c' hat Dios chi xatquitz'ujlom je' wo' re' xnic'ul hin xinquitz'ujlom wo', nqui rik'or.

Je' re' ajic ru'um chi re' take k'oric tz'ihmbimaj cho najtir k'i̱j chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re're' xicanabjic cahnok chi tijbal keh, ru̱c' aj wo' take k'oric re're' kacowej tak kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus reh chi ma' eta kojch'i'tjic chi ruyu'njic rimanlajic wach i nic' pa' nimal k'oro̱j cahnok ru'um i Dios.

Re' ok Dios ye'bok ricowil kac'ux chi ma' eta kojch'i'tjic. Re' ok re' ye'bok ano'jbal tak chi atobjic tak chi wih'ic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis chawibil awi̱b tak chipam rinimjic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.
Wi pan jenaj wach c'uxlis wilca̱t tak, xa pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ch'i̱l capew-bal wo' enalok'ej tak wach i Dios re' rAja̱w i Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Ru'um chi re' nawa̱j nak tak ribanaric ma' k'e̱' ta wo' chic curman chiwach chi enquicowsaj quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus take awas acha̱k' tak aj niminel, nipahkaj ato'bil aweh tak chi chac'ul tak pan sukquil c'uxlis take awich aj niminel tak je' ricab ac'uluric tak xiban i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' re' nik'or maj re're' xojric'ul ru̱c' reh chi chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel enkayew rilok'il i Dios.

Ma' xa ta re're' xiban i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric je' la' wo' re're' naxwih'ic ayu' wach ac'al xinimej i camanic re' xye'jic ru'um i Dios chi quitobjic take rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Ru̱c' i xiban re're' xc'uhtjic queh ricorquilal chi re' Dios c'ahchi' rimana̱b wach rik'orbal riyeb cho queh take kama̱m kati't.

Ru̱c' xiban i Dios re're', xye'eric wo' aweh hat-tak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi xqueteljic awach tak ru'um. Ru'um re're', re' hat-tak yu'na nayew tak chic rilok'il je' ricab xiban i ma' Tawiy. Nik'or chi je' re' ru'um re' wo' re' xtz'ihminic cho reh chi je' wili chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios: “Nok quimolom chic qui̱b take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi alok'onjic, re' hin naniwih'ic wo' ar chi alok'onjic, je' wo' chi ribichjic awach quich'i̱l, nqui i xitz'ihmbaj.

Chiri̱j riye'eric rilok'il i Dios cu'um take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilic wo' chic jenaj ribiral k'oro̱j cho pan Lok' laj Hu̱j chi je' wili: “Re' hat-tak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chasuksaj ac'ux tak chi rilok'onjic i Dios je' ricab nca'n take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, nqui rik'or.

Je' wo', ar chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re're' rik'or chi je' wili: “Hat-tak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, hat-tak chi'nchel c'acharel wilca̱t tak xa haj pa' yu̱k' q'uixca̱b china̱ ac'al wili, chayew tak rilok'il i kAja̱w Dios, nqui rik'or.

Je' wo' chic, chipam i hu̱j re're' je' wo' wili xitz'ihmbaj i ma' Isayi̱yas: “Chawach johtok hat-tak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilic jenaj k'i̱j nok jenaj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Isayih naructic chi c'amol be̱h. Re're' narik'atam k'oric chana̱ tak eh chiri̱j aj re' ru' na̱ch'ica̱b ac'ux hat-tak, nqui xitz'ihmbaj.

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um chi ch'iclic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i k'oro̱j ru'um i ma' Isayi̱yas, re' hin nipahkaj johtok pa niti̱j chiwach i Dios re' xbanic chi wilic awuyu'nbal chi ch'iclic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus, chi re' ok wo' re' ye'bok aweh tak jenaj tuklic laj c'uxlis ch'i̱l wo' rinimal sukquil laj c'uxlis eh chi wilic ok wo' awu̱c' tak i rajawric re' ye'o̱j ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal reh chi ru̱c' re're' riman chic enwih'ic awuyu'nbal tak chi ch'iclic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, re' hin weht'alim chi coric chi re' ano'jbal hat-tak holohic chic chiwach i Dios eh re' hat-tak narak wo' tak chiri̱j chi coric i tijinic ac'ulum tak. Ru'um aj re' tichol tak ricojoric ano'jbal chi awibil awi̱b tak.

To̱b ta wo' weht'alim chi je' re' chawi̱j tak wich aj niminel, re' hin ma' xinyo'jic ta chawach tak chi ritz'ihmjic nic' nimal xnik'or lok maj nwa̱j chi naricahnic pan ac'ux tak. Je' wo' chic, re' hin wilic wajawric chi rik'ormojic aweh tak chi'nchel re're' ru'um nok re' Dios xiyew wi̱n wajawric re're'

reh chi re' camanic re' xitak'a̱' ribanaric wi̱n i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eniban chaxilac hat-tak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Haj wilic i camanic re're'? Re' rik'ormojic aweh tak take k'oric quiye'bic sukquil c'uxlis ru'um chi ar chalanak rik'ormojic ru̱c' i Dios, re' aj re' i camanic wilic chi nina̱ i hin chi nanibanam eh re' camanic re're' xa je' na ricab i camanic riban i aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios. Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab chi re' aj k'ahsem si̱ riban chi re' Dios ric'ul cho take si̱ re' nye'bic risukquil ric'ux, je' wo' re' nsukbic ric'ux i Dios nok ru'um reh c'uhbalanic niban, re' hat-tak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xatc'uluric tak ru'um i Dios chi ritinami̱t xa ru'um reh ricamaj ribanam i Lok' laj Uxlabal pan awa̱mna tak.
Je' re' ajic ru'um chi ritak'anic cho i kaK'atal K'oric Jesus i camanic c'ahchi'qui̱n, re' hin suk nwilow i nicamaj niban chi raj k'orol i Dios.

Chi je' re' nicamaj k'uru' re' c'uhbal xiyew wi̱n i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric reh chi re' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xquinimej i k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios xa re' wo' wach re' niban rik'ormojic chi ma'xta so' niyo'jic. Ma' xa ru̱c' ta c'uhbalanic niban re're' nc'uhtunic lok chi re're' xiyew wi̱n, je' la' wo' ru̱c' take bano̱j niban.

Je' wo' re' nc'uhtunic ru̱c' take lok' laj nawa̱l niban re' nsahchic wi̱' quic'ux take c'acharel. Re' wo' take re' nc'uhtunic lok wi̱' chi coric wach take k'oric nik'or eh chi naquink'oric, quink'oric ru̱c' wajawric riyew wi̱n i Lok' laj Uxlabal. Je' re' k'uru' re' hin ma' quinyo'jic ta so' chi rik'ormojic ribiral nye'bic sukquil c'uxlis queh take c'acharel quiniminic reh re' nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Chi rik'ormojic wili ma' wilic ta chic jeno' ye'a̱b ma' ta nak quink'oric wi̱' cu rehtal welic cho pan tinamit Jerusalen cu pan tinamit Ili̱rico.

Ma' xa re' ta ar niban i c'uhbalanic, je' la' wo' pan tak tinamit cu̱c' take c'acharel re' ja' quibiram ta ribiral k'oric re're' xoquic pan wa̱mna ojic cu̱c' reh nok chi je' ricab nok pan jeno' ye'a̱b ja' tik'imaj ta wi̱' jeno' pa̱t ar ntohk'ic cho rich'iquinjic nic' wach riwi̱' jeno' pa̱t ra̱j tik'injic, je' wo' re' i hin chipam wo' take ye'a̱b re' ma' hab ta wach k'o'ronak reh ribiral i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, ar c'ahchi' nik'orom ribiral re're' queh take c'acharel.

Ru̱c' i wojic cu̱c' take c'acharel re're', xc'uluric cu̱c' je' ricab i tz'ihmbimaj cahnok wili chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios: “Re' take c'acharel re' ma' hab ta wach k'oronak queh i ribiral, naquina'bem chic chiri̱j ribiral eh re' take ma' quibiram ta wo' ribiral re're', naquirakam chic chiri̱j chi coric, nqui tz'ihmbimaj cahnok.
Coric ru' chi re' wojic chipam take ye'a̱b re' xniban wi̱' take c'uhbalanic chiri̱j i Jesus, re're' xpitbic wi̱n chi ojic awu̱c' tak.
Raj la' yu'na chi ma'xta chic nicamaj reh c'uhbalanic chipam take ye'a̱b re're', ma'xta chic bih npitbic wi̱n reh wojic awu̱c' tak. Re' hin xa ta wo' jarub ha̱b nicapam chi nawojic chi awiliric tak.

Ru'um re' c'ahchi' nicapam chi naquinojok ar pan tinamit Espa̱nya, pe̱t nawiq'uic ponok awu̱c' tak, ru'um nok nwa̱j wilom awach tak naquinic'ok ponok chaxilac tak. Chiri̱j re' nok nibanam chic risukquil niwih'ic awu̱c' tak eh naponok wo' chic rik'ijil chi curman chi wi̱n chi nanitikim ju' nibe̱h, nwa̱j wo' chi naqui̱nato'bem tak nech' ok ru̱c' xa pa' bih nwa̱j chi nanitikim ju' nibe̱h ar Espa̱nya.

Je' re' ajic re' hin xnicapaj chic ri̱j i wiq'uic ponok awu̱c' tak xa re' la' yu'na cu nanichahmic wo' na so' ru'um chi cu nawojic ar pan tinamit Jerusalen chi ricanabjic jenaj to'bal pahkamaj wi̱n chi nanic'amam je queh take was nicha̱k' aj niminel wilque̱b pan tinamit re're'.

Re' to'bal c'ahchi' nik'orom ribiral re're', re' take wich aj niminel wilque̱b ar pa riyuk'ul i Masero̱nya ch'i̱l wilque̱b ar pa riyuk'ul Aca̱ya xicapewenic chi tare̱t chi nariye'eric queh take niba̱' wilque̱b chi quixilac take wich aj niminel ar Jerusalen.

Re' take aj Masero̱nya ch'i̱l take aj Aca̱ya xquicapaj chi riye'eric i to'bal re're' maj je' ricab chi wilic ta nak jeno' quic'a̱s curman chi queh chi naquitojom, re' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re're' nquic'raj chi wilic jenaj to'bal ra̱j risolc'jic queh take kas kacha̱k' aj niminel ar Jerusalen chi jelow-bal rik'ormojic i suk laj k'oric chiri̱j i Jesus xbanjic queh ru̱c' rito'bal i rUxlabal i Dios. Ru'um aj re' chi je' ricab risolc'jic jeno' quic'a̱s, c'ahchi' quiyeb je quitz'a̱k chi quitobjic take kas kacha̱k' aj niminel ar Jerusalen.
Je' re' ajic nok nicohlam chic cho nicamaj wili chi rik'ahsjic i moloj wach tumi̱n queh take kas kacha̱k' aj niminel ar Jerusalen, nawiq'uic ponok awu̱c' tak chipam i wojic ar pan tinamit Espa̱nya.

Nok wilqui̱n chic ponok chaxilac tak re' hin til weht'alim chi yohbal wach ricuse'sbal i Dios na̱c'ulum tak ru'um reh ribirmijic i ribiral nye'bic sukquil c'uxlis queh take c'acharel quiniminic reh re' nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Hat-tak wich aj niminel, ru'um chi ar chic chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric ch'iclic ac'ux tak eh chi re' Lok' laj Uxlabal nbanic chi wilic c'axoj i̱b awu̱c' tak, re' hin nipahkaj aweh tak i to'bonic wili chi tipahkanok tak pan ati̱j chi re' Dios equirito'bej cho.

Je' wo', tipahkanok tak reh chi equirico'lej chi quiwach take tinamit quic'acharic pa riyuk'ul Jure̱ya je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta aj niminel reh Dios take. Chapahkaj wo' tak reh chi re' take wich aj niminel quic'acharic ar Jerusalen enquic'ul ru̱c' sukquil c'uxlis i moloj wach tumi̱n c'ahchi' nic'amam je ar cu̱c'.

Nipahkaj aj aweh tak i ato'bil re're' reh chi je' re' suksuk nic'ux equino̱j c'olok chi ak'o'rjic tak wi la' re' Dios xa̱j riyeb k'ab wi̱n chi je' re' eniban. Je' wo' nipahkaj chi je' re' ena'n tak reh chi nakamol ki̱b chi kunchelal, ma' xa re' ta enwih'ic jenaj rinimal sukquil c'uxlis ela' wo' nirak so' hi'lbal wi̱n.

Chi je' re' pahkanic na'n hat-tak re' hin je' wo' wili i ti̱j niban chawi̱j hat-tak: Re' Dios re' aj ye'ol reh risukquil laj c'uxlis, xa wilic ok wo' awu̱c' tak chi junelic pan ac'acharic tak. Je' ta nak re' c'ulurok.

Re' chic yu'na was tak nicha̱k' nwa̱j nik'oric awu̱c' tak chiri̱j i kana̱b pan niminic re' Pe̱we ribihnal, re' k'e̱' holohic rino'jbal eh wilic wo' ricamaj chi aj to'o̱l queh take aj niminel ar pan tinamit re' Sencre̱ya ribihnal. Re're' ponic reh ar awu̱c' tak eh ru'um aj re' nipahkaj aweh tak

chi je' ricab nok curman chi queh take aj niminel reh Jesus chi nquic'ul qui̱b pan sukquil c'uxlis, je' wo' re' ric'uluric cha'n tak wich aj niminel re're' ru'um nok ch'iclic ric'ux chiri̱j i Ajabe̱s Jesus. Re' hat-tak ajic chato'bej tak ru̱c' pa' bih ra̱j tobjic wi̱'. Je' re' nipahkaj aweh tak chi na̱banam tak maj re' Pe̱we re're' q'uih rito'bem take eh hin wo' rito'bem hin.

Chiri̱j chic ripahkaljic aweh tak re're', nipahkaj wo' chi chayew tak risukquil ric'ux i wich aj niminel Pirsi̱la rich'i̱l i ribahi̱l re' Aqui̱la ribihnal. Re' take re' quicamanic chi waj to'o̱l take chi rik'ormojic ribiral i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Ma' xa re' ta re', je' la' wo' xquiyew pan yohbalil i quic'acharic chi rico'ljic ri̱j nic'acharic i hin. Ru'um aj re', re' hin k'e̱' nitioxej chi xca'n chi je' re' eh ma' xa ta hin niban i tiyoxonic, je' la' wo' re' nca'n take wich aj niminel je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel take re' nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios ar pan tak ye'a̱b nlok'onjic wi̱' wach.

Nachayew tak risukquil quic'ux i Pirsi̱la ch'i̱l i Aqui̱la, chayew wo' tak risukquil quic'ux take aj niminel nquimol qui̱b chipam pa̱t ye'o̱j chi molbal i̱b cu'um take quib chi c'acharel re're'. Je' wo' chayew tak risukquil ric'ux i ma' Epe̱neto re' til k'e̱' ti' nwic'raj. Re' Epe̱neto re're', re' aj re' i pe̱t be̱h ar pa riyuk'ul i A̱sya chi rinimjic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.
Jenaj chic aj niminel nwa̱j chi na̱yeb tak risukquil ric'ux, re' i Mari̱ya re' jenaj ixok k'e̱' cow ncamanic chi atobjic tak.

Je' wo' nwa̱j chi enayew tak risukquil quic'ux i Antro̱nico ch'i̱l i Ju̱nyas. Re' wich nitinami̱t take re' junpech xicojoric wo' pan che̱' wich'i̱l ru'um reh kaniminic. Chiqui̱j take qui̱b re're' nik'or wo' aweh tak chi re' quicamaj lo̱k' riwa'ric chi quiwach take nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take raj tahkanel i Jesus. Je' wo' chic nik'or aweh tak chi re' take re' pe̱t xquinimej i kAja̱w Jesus chi niwach i hin.
Chayew wo' risukquil ric'ux i ma' A̱mpilyas, re' k'e̱' ti' nwic'raj ru'um reh rich'iquinjic ric'ux riban chiri̱j i Ajabe̱s Jesus.

Je' wo' re' i ma' Urwa̱no re' waj to'o̱l chipam i camanic chi rik'ormojic ribiral Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, chayew wo' tak risukquil ric'ux. Chayew wo' tak risukquil ric'ux i ma' Esta̱quis re' k'e̱' ti' nwic'raj.

Je' wo' nwa̱j chi chayew tak risukquil ric'ux i ma' Ape̱les re' ru'um reh take pajaric iq'uinak lok wi̱' nc'utunic chi re're' til ch'iclic ric'ux chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Chayew wo' tak risukquil ric'ux ma' Aristo̱wulo ch'i̱l take raj pan pa̱t.
Je' wo' re' cha'n tak ru̱c' wich nitinami̱t ma' Heroryon, je' wo' re' cu̱c' take je' ru̱c' quich'ica̱b chic quic'ux chiri̱j i Ajabe̱s Jesus re' ma' Narsi̱so ch'i̱l take raj pan pa̱t.

Nwa̱j wo' chi chayew tak risukquil ric'ux i ti' Tripe̱na ch'i̱l i ti' Tripo̱sa. Re' take quib ixok re're' cow quicamanic chi rik'ormojic ribiral i Ajabe̱s Jesus. Jenaj chic ti' ixok nwa̱j wo' chi na̱yeb tak risukquil ric'ux, re' i ti' ixok Pe̱rsira ribihnal re' k'e̱' ti' nwic'raj. Re' ixok re're' jenaj aj niminel cow wo' ncamanic chi rik'ormojic ribiral i Ajabe̱s Jesus.

Je' wo' nwa̱j chi enayew tak risukquil ric'ux i ma' Ru̱po re' jenaj aj niminel lo̱k' riwa'ric chi quiwach take c'acharel. Je' wo', chayew risukquil ric'ux ritu̱t i ma' Ru̱po re're', re' je' hin rac'u̱n nok wilqui̱n chiwach.

Wilic wo' toco̱m chic take aj niminel nwa̱j chi na̱yeb tak risukquil quic'ux eh re' take re' je' wili quibihnal: Re' ma' Asi̱ncrito, re' ma' Peleco̱nte, re' ma' He̱rmas, re' ma' Patoro̱was, ch'i̱l i ma' He̱rmes. Nachayew tak risukquil quic'ux take re', chayew wo' tak risukquil quic'ux take aj niminel nquimol qui̱b quich'i̱l chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios.

Je' wo' chayew tak risukquil quic'ux take aj niminel je' wili quibihnal: Re' ma' Pilo̱lco, re' ti' Ju̱lya, re' ma' Nere̱yo ch'i̱l i rana̱b eh je' wo' re' i ma' Oli̱npas. Je' wo' chayew tak risukquil quic'ux take quich aj niminel nquimol qui̱b quich'i̱l chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios.

Yu'na hat-tak aj niminel wilca̱t tak ar Ro̱ma, nok awilom tak chic wach i hu̱j wili nwa̱j chi chayew wo' tak risukquil ac'ux tak chawibil awi̱b tak ru̱c' i chak'lamil nelic cho cu pan awa̱mna tak. Je' wo' nwa̱j nik'orom je aweh tak yu'na chi re' take aj niminel reh Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric re' nquimol qui̱b ayu' chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios, nquiyew wo' je risukquil ac'ux tak.

Je' wo' chic, til nwa̱j nipahkam aweh hat-tak was nicha̱k' aj niminel i wili: Chayohbalej awi̱b tak chi quiwach take c'acharel quicojbic ch'akoj i̱b chi quixilac take aj niminel eh ru̱c' re're' nquipit chi re' take aj niminel cow enquipahba̱' quic'ux chiri̱j take tijinic tijimaj take wi̱'. Chi je' re' k'uru' nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chi ma' junehtej awi̱b tak cu̱c'

eh nipahkaj chi je' re' maj re' take re' ma' re' ta chiri̱j i camanic chi rik'ormojic ribiral i Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric nquiyew quic'ux, chiri̱j la' chic rik'ormojic chaj bih ra̱j on ma' ra̱j c'uxuric nquiyew quic'ux. Chi je' re' quino'jbal, xa je' na nchel holohic chic eh xa ch'ublic chic wach i k'oric nca'n chi rijot'oric quicapew-bal take quibirinic queh.

Was tak nicha̱k', to̱b ta coric ru' chi til k'e̱' sukquil pan wa̱mna awu'um aweh tak maj xa haj ta chic ma' xo̱j lok ribiral chi re' hat-tak nanimej tak i Jesus chi manlic, re' hin xa cu nwa̱j wo' niyeb aweh tak jenaj chic no'jbal chi je' wili: Wilic ok ano'jbal tak chi reht'aljic haj wilic take holohic laj bano̱j ra̱j banaric eh ma' ok c'ahbil ena'n tak.

Chiri̱j chic rik'ormojic aweh tak re're', nik'or wo' aweh tak chi xa nic' yu' chi kawach narichalic rik'ijil nok re' Dios re' aj ye'ol reh sukquil c'uxlis narisacham wach chi junpech i rajawric i aj Yahm re' Satanas wo' ribihnal eh ru̱c' re're' nakayak'abem pan ko̱k chi junpech i rajawric wilic. Je re' k'uru' re' hin niban johtok niti̱j chi re' Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chiyew cho rinimal wach rato'bil chana̱ hat-tak wich aj niminel.

Re' chic yu'na nwa̱j wo' nik'orom je aweh tak chi re' take wich aj niminel wilque̱b ayu' tiquic'alenej tak je. Re' take re' je' wili quibihnal: Re' Timote̱yo re' aj to'o̱l wi̱n, ch'i̱l take wich nitinami̱t re' ma' Lu̱syo, re' ma' Jason ch'i̱l i ma' Sosi̱pater.
Je' wo' re' i ma' Te̱rsiyo re' xnipahkaj reh chi xitz'ihmbaj i hu̱j wili, c'ahchi' wo' riyeb risukquil ac'ux tak.

Je' wo' re' riban je i ma' Ca̱yo, c'ahchi' wo' riyeb je risukquil ac'ux tak. Re' aj niminel wili, re' i c'ahchi' riye'bic nipatal yu'na, ar pa ripa̱t riyew k'ab queh take kich aj niminel aj ayu' chi nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios. Je' wo' chic, re' Era̱sto re' aj ilol ribehsjic tumi̱n reh tinamit ayu' eh ch'i̱l wo' i wich aj niminel Cuwa̱rto ribihnal c'ahchi' quiyeb je risukquil ac'ux tak.

Til pan coric re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi na niban johtok niti̱j chiwach i Dios chawi̱j tak nipahkaj reh chi re' kAja̱w Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric til xa wilic ok wo' awu̱c' tak chi atobjic tak.

Pa niti̱j nik'or wo' johtok reh chi chatik ta nak tak ju' chi pa'alca̱t tak chi cow chiri̱j animinic tak. Je' ta nak re' c'ulurok awu̱c' tak ru̱c' take k'oric nye'bic risukquil ac'ux tak ru̱c' i c'uhbal nik'or chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Coric, re' c'uhbalanic wili xwih'ic chi poyo̱j cho wach chi quiwach take c'acharel xic'acharic najtir k'i̱j, raj yu'na ma' je' ta chic re' wilic re' la' i Dios riyeb chic chi nbirmijic.

Je' re' k'uru' re' c'uhbalanic chiri̱j ribiral i Jesus re're' ma' poyo̱j ta chic wach re' la' Dios xiban chic chi nbirmijic re' k'orel tz'ihmbimaj wo' cho cu'um take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios najtir ar chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios. Chi je' aj re' ribanam chic cho i Dios re' xa c'achlic wo' chi junpech, re're' xtak'anic keh rik'ormojic i c'uhbal re're' reh chi chi'nchel take c'acharel enquina'bej wach eh ru̱c' re're' nok quic'ulum chic i rik'orbal enye'eric wo' queh chi ench'ihquic quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus.

Hat-tak was nicha̱k' aj niminel, re' ta nak i kAja̱w Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, camanok awu̱c' tak reh chi re' hat-tak enayew tak rilok'il chi junelic k'i̱j sakom i xa jenaj wo' chi Dios nok wilic eh nahsil aj no'jbal wo' nok wilic. Je' ta nak re' c'ulurok.

Re' hin ma' Lu̱', re' Dios xyuk'unic wi̱n chi xiripahba̱' chi aj k'orol reh lok' laj ribiral i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, ru'um nok je' re' camanic xa̱j chi nanibanam chiwach. Chi je' re' k'uru' re' hin wich'i̱l i wasbe̱s ma' So̱stenes,

c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je i hu̱j wili aweh hat-tak was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel wilca̱t tak ar pan tinamit Cori̱nto re' namol awi̱b tak chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios. Re' hat-tak xatrichih tak chic lok chi hat-tak raj tahkanel i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh xisaksaj wo' wach ac'acharic tak chi na̱woquic tak jenaj chi rinimjic ru' quich'i̱l take toco̱m chic aj niminel wilque̱b chi junsut wach ac'al. Chi kunchelal i hoj re're' enkak'or chi re' kAja̱w Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, til re're' i Ajabe̱s chi quina̱ chi'nchel take c'acharel.

Chi je' aj wili tinic'alenej tak je ru̱c' take k'oric wili: Re' ta nak rato'bil ch'i̱l wo' i sukquil c'uxlis riyew cho kAja̱w Dios ch'i̱l i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' ta nak re' wih'ok pan ac'acharic tak.

Hat-tak wich aj niminel, re' hin xa eli̱c wo' nitioxej johtok i Dios pa niti̱j niban chawi̱j tak chiwach. Je' re' niban maj ru'um chi re' hat-tak xach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, k'e̱' wo' chic ric'axbal xiyew cho i Dios chana̱ tak.

Coric nik'or, ru'um chi xach'ica̱' ac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus, re' kAja̱w Dios xa je' na riyew aweh tak jenaj abihomal, xiyew chic aweh tak riq'uihal acuse'sbal tak je' ricab naxiyew wo' aweh tak chi wilic ano'jbal tak chi rirakmajic chiri̱j riC'uhbal, on chi wilic awajawric tak chi rik'ormojic i riC'uhbal.

Chi je' re' k'uru', re' ribiral i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, k'oro̱j chic aweh tak ku'um i hoj aj k'orol reh riC'uhbal. Re're' xarak tak chic chiri̱j chi coric eh je' wo' xiyew riman ricowil ac'ux chipam animinic tak.

Je' wo', re' Dios xiban chi re' take bano̱j riban i Lok' laj Uxlabal, ma'xta chic jeno' queh ma' ta nak xye'eric wo' aweh tak chi ribanaric. Chi aweht'alim tak chic chi'nchel re're', re' hat-tak yu'na wilca̱t tak chi ic'lic ana̱ tak chi ruyu'njic nachic'uhtaj wo' chic cho ri̱b i kAja̱w Jesus, re' Ajabe̱s Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi kana̱.

Je' re' chatik tak ju' awih'ic tak cu rehtal ricux'ic wach ac'acharic tak maj re' riwi̱' chi re' Dios c'ahchi'ca̱t rito'bem chi na̱tikim tak ju' rich'iquinjic ac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric reh chi nac'olok wo' chic lok ma'xta ok jeno' k'ilo̱j enbanjic chawi̱j tak ru'um chi wilic ta nak jeno' c'ahbilal c'ahchi'ca̱t tak.

Je' re' k'uru' chatik ju' richoporic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Dios re' xyuk'unic cho aweh tak reh chi na̱wih'ic tak pan jenaj wach c'acharic ch'i̱l i rAc'u̱n, re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh manlic Ajabe̱s chi kana̱. Je' re' cha'n tak k'uru' maj re're' til riban chi nmanlajic wach i nic' nimal rik'or chi naribanam.

Hat-tak wich aj niminel reh Jesus, ru'um nibiraj chi chaxilac hat-tak wilic c'axquilal, re' hin ru̱c' i wajawric ye'o̱j wi̱n ru'um i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric til nwa̱j nibanam aweh tak i tak'anic wili: Cha'n tak chi xa jenaj ok chic wach ak'orbal tak ru̱c' chaj bih nawa̱j ak'orom chawach tak. Ma' ok re' i ch'akoj i̱b ru̱c' take rehreh wach no'jbal eriyew rajawric chaxilac tak, re' la' hat-tak cha'n tak chi xa jenaj ok wach ano'jbal tak ru̱c' chaj bih nacapaj tak on chaj bih nak'or chawach tak. Ru̱c' chi je' re' c'acharic ena'n tak, etiwih'ic tak pan jenaj manlic wach c'uxlis chawunchelal tak.

Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, re' riwi̱' chi c'ahchi' nik'orom aweh tak i wili ru'um nok re' take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i ma' Coloheh xc'ulic quisakomej wach wi̱n chi wilic jenaj nim wach ch'akoj i̱b ru̱c' no'jbal chaxilac tak.

Haj wilic take ch'akoj i̱b c'ahchi' nik'oric wi̱' chiri̱j? Re' take wili quink'oric wi̱' chiri̱j awu̱c' tak: Wilic take quik'oric chaxilac tak chi je' wili: «Re' hin, til coric wach niminic niban maj hin aj tahkem ri̱j i c'uhbal rik'or ma' Lu̱', nqui take. Wilic wo' take je' wili nquik'or: «Ha̱', re' hin til coric niban maj re' ric'uhbal i ma' Apo̱los nitahkej ri̱j, nqui nquik'or. Wilic wo' take nquik'or: «Ta, re' hin til coric niban maj hin aj tahkem ri̱j i c'uhbal rik'or ma' Se̱pas re' ribihnej wo' chi Luch, nqui nquik'or. Ma' xa re' ta re'. Wilic jenaj chic ch'uk je' wili nquik'or: «Ha̱', re' cok hin til manlic wach niminic niban maj re' hin re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric til re're' c'ahchi' nitahkem ri̱j ric'uhbal, nqui nquik'or.

Ru̱c' take no'jbal na'n tak re're', ra̱j na rik'orom chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, ch'akch'ak riwi̱' ricamaj xiban chi kaco'ljic i hoj? Ma'xta, ma' je' ta re'. On ra̱j wo' na nchel rik'orom chi re' hin ma' Lu̱' xinquimic chawi̱j tak? On chi ru̱c' i wajawric i hin xkajic aha̱' tak eh ru'um re're', re' hin c'ahchi'qui̱n atahkem tak? Ma' je' ta wo' re'.

Ru̱c' i c'ahchi' ric'uluric chaxilac tak re' hin til k'e̱' nitiyoxej reh Dios yu'na chi ma' xniban ta nicamaj chi aj kahsanel ha' chaxilac tak. Je' re' nik'or maj je' ta nak re' xniban, riman nak chic nach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiwi̱j. Coric ru', re' hin xnikahsaj riha̱' i ma' Cri̱spo ch'i̱l i ma' Ca̱yo eh chiri̱j chic ru' ma' hab ta chic wach nikahsam riha̱'.

Je' re' ajic til nitioxej reh Dios chi ma' xniban ta nicamaj chi aj kahsanel aha̱' tak maj wi je' ta nak re' xniban q'uihal nak aweh hat-tak etik'oric tak chi ru̱c' wajawric i hin xkajic aha̱' tak eh chi je' re' xatoquic tak chi aj tahkem wi̱n.

A̱h! Wilic jenaj junch'uk chic chi c'acharel xnikahsaj riha̱' ar Cori̱nto, re' Este̱panas ch'i̱l take raj pan pa̱t. Chiri̱j chic ru', ma' jeno' chic wilic pa nic'ux chi xiban rikahsjic riha̱' ar pan atinami̱t tak.

Ru̱c' take xnik'or lok wili re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi re' hin ma' xinpahbabjic ta ru'um i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric reh ta nak chi nanicamanic chi aj kahsanel ha', xinpahbabjic la' reh chi nanik'orom i holohic laj c'uhbal nye'bic sukquil c'uxlis queh take quic'ulbic reh. Ru'um aj re' nanik'or i c'uhbal re're', ma' quink'oric ta ru̱c' chiho̱j wach k'oric je' ricab nca'n take winak aj no'jbal re' take chi ch'ukbal quic'ux take tinamit quik'oric ru̱c' k'oric no'jbalamaj ri̱j. Raj i hin ma' je' ta re' niban maj wi ta nak chi je' re', re' rajawric wilic chipam rik'ormojic ribiral riquimic i Jesus ar wach curu̱s, enak no̱j wach ac'al.

Coric nik'or, chi queh take c'acharel c'ahchi' quicora̱b chipam i ti'c'axic ye'o̱j cho ru'um i Dios re' c'uhbal niban chiri̱j riquimic i Jesus wach curu̱s xa memil laj c'uhbal chi quiwach. Tz'a̱b ru' chi keh hoj re' xojco'ljic chic ru'um i Dios ma' je' ta re', re' la' c'uhbal re're' ncamanic keh chi nkacoj rehtal chi re' Dios til wilic rajawric

je' ricab rik'or chipam i Lo̱k' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios. Ar xik'or cho i Dios chi je' wili: “Re' hin nanijot'om wach quino'jbal take wilic quino'jbal eh ru̱c' re're', re' rik'asil quic'ux nak wilic i k'as quic'ux, ma'xta chic bih naritikim queh, nqui rik'or.

Chaj bih ricapaj i Dios chiri̱j quino'jbal take wilic quibiral chi aj no'jbal take, je' ricab take aj tijem ri̱j C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses on take quik'oric ru̱c' k'oric no'jbalamaj ri̱j? Til coric nik'or, re' quino'jbal take c'acharel re're' ma'xta quiwa'ric chiwach i rino'jbal i Dios. Je re' nik'or maj re're' xic'uhtaj chic lok chi xa memil laj no'jbal wilic cu̱c', to̱b ta nchel chi queh k'e̱' quiwa'ric wilic.

Chaj wa'ric nanik'or chi je' re'? Nik'or chi je' re' maj re' Dios ru̱c' i rinimal wach rino'jbal wilic, xiban chi re' take c'acharel ma' re' ta aj niminel take ma' eta nquina'bej pa̱m ricapew-bal xa ru̱c' ta nak ti quino'jbal qui̱b. Tz'a̱b ru' re're' xponic chiwach eh xitik'a̱' wach pa ric'ux chi re' hoj re' kojniminic reh c'uhbal nk'ormojic chiri̱j i Jesus nakaco'ljic ru̱c' i c'uhbal re' nk'ormojic cu'um take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta aj niminel take chi xa memil laj no'jbal wilic chipam.

Ru'um chi je' re' ncapewjic cu'um take chi'nchel c'acharel re're', k'e̱' c'axic rik'ormojic queh i c'uhbal re're'. Je' ricab, chi queh take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta aj niminel take, c'axic rik'ormojic re're' cu̱c' maj chi queh ru' curman chi naquilom jeno' lok' laj nawa̱l re' enc'utunic wi̱' chi coric wach i c'uhbalanic c'ahchi' ka'nam. Je' wo' re' nc'ulmujic cu̱c' take ma' re' ta take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' ma' nquicoj ta wo' wach i c'uhbal re're', c'axic wo' rik'ormojic ru'um nok chi queh ru' xa memil laj no'jbal wilic chipam eh re' nquisic' ru' re' la' i c'uhbal re' riyew quit'ult'util ru̱c' quino'jbal.

To̱b ta wo' ncapewjic chi je' re', re' hoj aj k'orol c'uhbal xa c'ahchi' wo' katikim ju' rik'ormojic i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j riquimic i Jesus wach curu̱s eh chi xa re' wo' Jesus nco'lonic reh c'acharel. Re' cok ru' to̱b ta nchel je' re' nka'n, re' c'uhbal wili nanbirmijic, q'uihal queh take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ma' nquicoj ta wach ru'um nok chi queh ru' ma' re' ta so' riwi̱' chi re' Jesus xquimic wi re're' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' wo' re' nc'uluric cu̱c' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, q'uihal queh ru' ma' nquicoj ta wo' wach chi ru'um reh riquimic i jenaj chi c'acharel nariwih'ic i co'lbal i̱b. Chi queh ru' xa memil laj no'jbal re're'.

Je' re' ru' nk'ormojic chiri̱j i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j ribiral i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, xa re' la' ma' je' ta re' chi keh hoj aj niminel reh Jesus je' ru̱c' wilic wo' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel take eh wilic wo' ma' re' ta kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel take. Chi keh i hoj re' hoj yuk'umaj ru'um i Dios chi na kawih'ic pan jenaj wach c'acharic ch'i̱l i rAc'u̱n, ru̱c' i c'uhbal re're' nc'uhtunic lok i rinimal rajawric ch'i̱l wo' i rinimal wach rino'jbal wilic i Dios chi xitak'a̱' cho i Jesus chi kaco'ljic i hoj c'acharel.

Coric ru', wilic take c'acharel quik'oric chi re' Dios naxitak'a̱' cho Jesus ayu' wach ac'al chi nariquimic, xa memil laj no'jbal xiban wi̱' nanquik'or. Til pa ricorquilal, re' rino'jbal i Dios til k'e̱' wo' chic nim wach chi wach i kano'jbal hoj c'acharel. Je' wo', wilic take nquicapaj chi re' Dios naxiyew wo' chi quimic i Jesus wach curu̱s, xa xic'uhtaj lok chi ma'xta rajawric, xa re' la' ricorquilal, re' Dios til k'e̱' wo' chic niq'uic na̱ rajawric chi kawach i hoj c'acharel.

Je' aj re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, chacapaj tak chiri̱j eh til chacoj tak rehtal nic' wach cho awi̱' tak ru̱c' ac'acharic naxatyuk'unjic tak ru'um i Dios reh chi na̱banam tak chi hat-tak chic aj tahkanel reh kAja̱w Jesus. Q'uih aweh hat-tak k'oro̱j cho abiral tak cu'um take tinamit chi ma'xta nak so' ano'jbal tak. Je' wo', xa ju'jun ti aweh tak xiwih'ic chi c'amol be̱h chi quina̱ take tinamit eh xa ju'jun wo' ti aweh tak k'oro̱j chi nimak awach tak ru'um chi hat-tak ca̱' qui'sil cho jeno' k'atal k'oric on jeno' c'amol be̱h.

To̱b ta wo' je' nak re' awi̱' tak, chaweht'alij tak chi re' Dios xatrichih chawunchelal hat-tak re' k'oro̱j abiral tak chi ma'xta so' ano'jbal tak chi quiwach take wilic quino'jbal re' ma' quina'bem ta wach i Dios. Je' re' xiban i Dios awu̱c' hat-tak reh chi re' take c'acharel nca'n qui̱b chi wilic quino'jbal enoquic cho quiq'uix'ic ru'um chi ma' re' ta take re' xchihiric quiwach ru̱c' i quino'jbal wilic. Je' wo' chic, re' Dios xichih awach hat-tak re' ma'xta jeno' rinimal wach camanic chana̱ tak, reh chi je' re', re' take c'acharel re' wilic jeno' nim wach camanic chi quina̱ enoquic wo' cho quiq'uix'ic naquicoj rehtal chi ma' re' ta take re' xichihiric ru'um i Dios to̱b ta nak nim quiwach china̱ ac'al wili.

Je' re' k'uru' re' Dios xichih awach hat-tak re' ma' ajamaj ta ti awach tak ru'um chi ma'xta ti awa'ric tak reh chi je' re', re' nilmijic cu'um i tinamit chi ma' nim ta ti wach panak' quiwach ru', eno̱j riban chi re're' enye'eric rilok'il sachbal reh no'jbal wilic chi xa re' take nimak quiwach ric'ul chi queh chi enye'eric quiwa'ric.
Je' aj re' xiban i Dios k'uru' reh chi ma' hab ta wach jeno' c'acharel enk'oric chi re're' xchihiric wach ru'um i Dios xa ru'um chi wilic rino'jbal.

Ru̱c' aj wili nwa̱j nik'orom aweh hat-tak aj Cori̱nto chi re' hat-tak xa'n tak chi xa jenaj chic awi̱' tak ch'i̱l i Jesus xa ru'um reh camanic xiban i Dios chawi̱j tak, ma' ru'um ta nchel chi re' hat-tak xa camanej ta nak tak wach i jenaj wach wih'ic ru̱c' i Jesus re' xc'uhtunic wi̱' rinimal wach rino'jbal i Dios chi kaco'ljic i hoj c'acharel. Je' re' k'uru' ru̱c' xiban i Jesus chiki̱j, re' hoj yu'na xojcahnic chi coric chic wach kac'acharic je' wo' chi sak chic wach kano'jbal chiwach i Dios eh xojresaj cho chipam i nic' nimal i c'ahbilal nchopbic nak kana̱.

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um yu'na chi toco̱m chic riwi̱' ac'acharic tak, ma' hab wach riq'uihsaj ri̱b chi k'oric chi xa ru'um ransil ru' yu'na co'lomaj chic. Wi til wo' hab wach ra̱j ribanam chi je' re', sakbih chik'or chi re' Dios xco'lonic reh ru'um i Jesus, reh chi ru̱c' re're' enbanjic je' ricab i tz'ihmbimaj cho chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios narik'or chi je' wili: “Hab wach i c'acharel ra̱j riq'uihsam ri̱b, re' ok ricamaj ribanam ru̱c' i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s re' ok re' chi q'uihsaj wach, nqui rik'or.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel reh Jesus, naxinponic awu̱c' tak chi rik'ormojic aweh tak rik'orbal i Dios, ma' xink'oric ta awu̱c' tak ru̱c' nimak tak chiho̱j wach k'oric, on chi c'ahchi' ta nak nibanam wi̱b chi hin rinimal winak aj no'jbal.

Re' la' hin naxinwih'ic cho chaxilac tak, xnitik'a̱' wach pa nic'ux chi ma'xta chic bih jeno' toco̱m laj no'jbal nanik'orom aweh tak, xa re' wo' i no'jbal chiri̱j i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' xquimic wach curu̱s chi kaco'ljic.

Je' wo' chic, naxinwih'ic cho chi ma' suk ta wilic niti'jolal nibakil xinbarbatic so' ru'um niyo'jic chi rik'ormojic ribiral i Jesus maj xwic'raj chi re' camanic wilic chi nina̱ nim wach chiwach i wansil i hin.

Je' re' k'uru' naxinwih'ic cho chaxilac tak ma' xink'oric ta awu̱c' tak ru̱c' chiho̱j wach k'oric no'jbalamaj ri̱j eh je' re' xniban reh chi xacohjaj nak tak ti wach i c'uhbal xnik'or. Re' la' hat-tak xacoj tak wach ribiral i c'uhbal xnik'or ru'um xarak tak chiri̱j chi re' Lok' laj Uxlabal xye'bic nik'orbal chi ric'uhtjic aweh tak i holohic laj k'oric re're'.

Je' aj re' k'uru' ru̱c' rik'ororic i c'uhbal xniban aweh tak, re' hin ma' janc'al ta xnik'or aweh tak chi na̱nimem tak i c'uhbal re're' xa ru'um chi xacoj ta nak tak rehtal chi re' hin xink'oric je' ricab nk'oric jeno' winak aj no'jbal, ma'xta! Re' la' hin xwa̱j chi xanimej tak i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus ru'um chi re' kAja̱w Dios xic'uhtaj rinimal rajawric naxink'oric awu̱c' tak.
