Nok wilqui̱n chi quixilac take toco̱m chic was nicha̱k' aj niminel quirakam chic rijebquilal quino'jbal ru̱c' riC'uhbal i Dios, re' hin quink'oric wo' ru̱c' no'jbal je' ricab quino'jbal ru'. Re' no'jbal re're' ma' je' ta ricab i quino'jbal take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' quiniminic ta reh Dios, xa ta wo' nak je' ricab quino'jbal take nahsil je' ru̱c' ma' quiniminic ta reh i Dios. Re' quino'jbal take re' xa nariq'uic wo' ti wach.

Raj i hin quink'oric ru̱c' no'jbal re' xa pa ric'ux nak i Dios wilic cho maj cu yu'na chi k'i̱j ma' hab ta nak wach jeno' c'acharel reht'alim re're' ru'um nok re' Dios ja' riyeb ta nak lok wach sakom i no'jbal c'olic nak cho pa ric'ux. Ru̱c' i no'jbal re're', re' hoj aj niminel reh Jesus nkarak chiri̱j yu'na chi xa nok wo' cho chi ja' nch'ihquic ta cho wach ac'al wili, re' Dios xitik'a̱' chic cho wach pa ric'ux chi re' hoj nakehtric rilok'il rajawric i Jesus.

Raj la' take nahsil je' ru̱c' ma' quiniminic ta reh i Dios re' xibanic chi xjap'aric wach curu̱s i Ajabe̱s Jesus re' xiq'uic wo' chic na̱ rinimal wach rilok'il, re' take re' ma' xquirak ta chiri̱j re're'. Je' re' nik'or maj xquirak ta nak chiri̱j ru' til ma'xta nak nca'n chi je' re'.

Je' re' k'uru' chiri̱j i tik'inic xiban i Dios re're', xa nok wo' ye'o̱j cho rehtalil chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios. Ar je' wili rik'or: “Ma' jeno' c'acharel je' ru̱c' aj no'jbal rilom ta nak wach on ribiram ta nak on iq'uinak ta nak pa ricapew-bal i holonquilal re' xitik'a̱' wach i Dios chi nariyeb queh take c'acharel ti' nquic'raj i Dios, nqui rik'or.

Je' re' ajic re' Dios xiyew keh hoj aj niminel reh Jesus chi nakana'bem nic' nimal re're' eh re' Lok' laj Uxlabal nto'bonic keh chi je' re' enka'n. Je' re' nik'or maj to̱b ta wilic take rino'jbal i Dios k'e̱' c'axic chi keh rirakmajic chiri̱j, re' Lok' laj Uxlabal xa ewo' risakomej wach keh ru'um chi reht'alim chi'nchel i nic' nimal wilic pa ricapew-bal i Dios

je' ricab nc'uluric ku̱c' hoj c'acharel chi nkana'bej chi coric nic' nimal i capew-bal wilic cho pan ka̱mna, maje'? Je' re' nok nic' pa' wach nc'uluric ku̱c' je' wo' re' ru̱c' i Lok' laj Uxlabal xa re' wo' re' til neht'alanic reh ricapew-bal i Dios.

Ru'um aj re're', re' Dios xiban chi ma' re' ta quino'jbal take ma' quiniminic reh Jesus wilic ku̱c', wilic la' ku̱c' i Lok' laj rUxlabal eh je' re' xiban reh chi nakeht'alim wo' haj wilic take cuse'sbal xiyew keh ru'um reh ric'axbal.

Je' aj re' nakojk'oric awu̱c' tak chiri̱j ribiral i Dios, ma' kojk'oric ta ru̱c' i no'jbal quic'uhtunic wi̱' take ma' re' ta aj niminel reh Jesus, kojk'oric la' ru̱c' no'jbal nc'uhtunic wi̱' i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios. Chi je' aj re' riwi̱' i no'jbal kojk'oric wi̱' i hoj, riwi̱' chi re' take quibirinic keh wilic ta nak cu̱c' i rino'jbal i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' take c'acharel re're' ma'xta cu̱c' i no'jbal ye'o̱j ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios ma' nquirak ta chiri̱j eh ma' eta wo' nquicoj wach take k'oric k'oro̱j ru'um. Chi queh la' ru' xa memil laj k'oric nquibiraj. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take k'oric k'oro̱j ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal enrakmajic chiri̱j xa re' wach wi wilic wo' ku̱c' i no'jbal ye'o̱j ru'um.

Ru'um aj re', re' hoj re' wilic ku̱c' i no'jbal ye'o̱j ru'um i rUxlabal i Dios kojchol rirakmajic chiri̱j haj wilic take ricorquilal riyew chi eht'aljic. Raj nchel take c'acharel re' ma' wilic ta cu̱c' i no'jbal ye'o̱j ru'um i rUxlabal i Dios ma' eta quichol rich'ukuric k'oric chiki̱j i hoj.

Re' c'ahchi' nik'orom aweh tak wili til coric maj ric'u'lej ri̱b ch'i̱l i tz'ihmbimaj cho najtir k'i̱j chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios. Ar je' wili tz'ihmbimaj cho: “Ma' hab ta wach jeno' c'acharel neht'alanic pa̱m ricapew-bal i Ajabe̱s Dios. Ma' hab ta wach jeno' c'acharel riban chi aj tijinel reh, nqui rik'or. Je' re' nok coric ru' ma' hab ta nak wach neht'alanic reh rino'jbal i Dios chi ma' wilic ta ru̱c' i no'jbal ye'o̱j ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal, raj i hoj aj niminel til wilic ku̱c' i no'jbal ye'o̱j keh ru'um i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh ru'um re' keht'alim wo' chaj bih ricapaj i Dios chiki̱j.

Yu'na was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel reh Jesus, nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi naxinwih'ic cho chaxilac tak chi c'uhbalanic ma' xniban ta canar k'oric awu̱c' tak je' ricab k'oric niban cu̱c' take chopo̱j nah quino'jbal ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal, xink'oric la' cho ru̱c' xa suk wach k'oric je' ricab nbanjic queh take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ja' quiniminic ta reh i kAja̱w Dios. Xa je' re' riwi̱' k'oric xniban awu̱c' tak ru'um nok re' hat-tak xa je' acab tak take c'acharel ma' chopo̱j ta nah chi manlic ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal. Chi je' aj re' riwi̱' ano'jbal tak, ja' narak ta nak tak chiri̱j haj wilic i coric on haj wilic i ma' coric ta chi c'amaric na̱ pa rinimjic i Jesus je' ricab nok jeno' t'uch ha'lac'un ja' reht'alim ta haj wilic i coric on haj wilic i ma' coric ta.

Ru'um aj re' je' ricab nok jeno' ha'lac'un cu ch'u̱ch' nc'acharic wi̱' ru'um nok ja' riban ta chi ric'ux reh i je' ricab riwa'bej jeno' nim laj c'acharel, je' wo' re' awu̱c' hat-tak xa re' ti take c'uhbal ch'iquinbal reh rinimjic i Dios xnik'or aweh tak eh ma' ja' re' ta take c'uhbal re' nk'ormojic queh take aj niminel je' ru̱c' chopo̱j na̱ chi manlic quino'jbal ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal. Je' re' xniban maj re' hat-tak ja' tikilca̱t ta nak tak chi ric'ulmujic take cow wach c'uhbal je' ricab ric'ul chi queh take chopo̱j nah quino'jbal chi manlic ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal eh til pan coric cu yu'na chi k'i̱j xa cu je' wo' re' riwi̱' ano'jbal tak.

Je' re' nik'or maj cu ja' cowjonak ta wo' acapew-bal tak pan niminic ru'um nok cu wilic wo' take capew-bal reh najtir k'i̱j awu̱c' tak eh cu re' wo' re' cow nayew tak chawach. Ru'um aj re' cu nc'utunic take no'jbal wili chaxilac tak: Nawixowej tak wach take toco̱m chic awas acha̱k' aj niminel eh k'e̱' nachoplom awi̱b tak ru̱c' k'oric ru'um chi ma' riban ta jenaj wach ano'jbal tak ru̱c' chaj bih nacapaj tak. Nana'n tak chi je' re', ma' nc'utunic ta na chi re' ano'jbal tak ma' ja' chopo̱j ta nah ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal eh chi xa je' chic ricab i quino'jbal take ma' quiniminic ta reh i Dios?

Je' re' nik'or maj ru̱c' i no'jbal na'n tak re're' til nc'utunic lok chi ma' chopo̱j ta na̱ ano'jbal tak ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal. Je' re' nik'or maj wilic aweh tak nquichop qui̱b chi je' wili nquik'or chi quiwach: «Re' k'orok i hin maj re' ma' Lu̱' nitahkej ru̱c' ric'uhbalanic, nqui nquik'or. Wilic wo' take je' wili nquik'or: «Ha̱', re' cok k'orok i hin maj re' ma' Apo̱los nitahkej ru̱c' i c'uhbalanic riban, nqui nquik'or.

Ru̱c' i k'oric nbanjic re're', re' hin nwa̱j nibiram aweh tak, chaj bih riwi̱' chi nacapaj tak chi re' Apo̱los ch'i̱l i hin ma' Lu̱' nim kawa'ric? Til pa ricorquil re' hoj xa xojcamanic chi raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios to'bal aweh tak chi rinimjic i kAja̱w Jesus naxojponic awu̱c' tak xa re' la' ru' chi kaju'junal i hoj, xojtak'abjic cho ru'um i kAja̱w reh chi naka'nam haj wilic i camanic xa̱j ru' chi naka'nam chaxilac tak.

Chi je' aj re' xa̱j, pan pe̱t cho re' hin re' xinp'utbic cho reh c'uhbalanic chaxilac tak, xniban je' na ricab riban jeno' aj tico̱l naritic jok i rabi̱x. Chiri̱j chic ru', re' chic Apo̱los ru̱c' ricamaj xiban chaxilac tak chi ritikmijic ju' rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios, re're' xiban je' na ricab jenaj winak xa chic re' ritikmijic ju' riq'uihsjic i tic riban ru̱c' rit'aksjic. Je' aj re' ru' camanic xka'n i hoj xa re' la' re' riye'eric ricowil ac'ux tak ma' re' ta hoj xojbanic, til la' re' i Dios c'ahchi' ribanic je' ricab wo' nc'uluric ru̱c' i tic chi re' wo' re' nbanic chi re' take re' quic'acharic.

Je' aj re' nik'or maj re' c'acharel np'utbic reh c'uhbal ch'i̱l re' ntikbic ju' rik'ormojic c'uhbal ma'xta cajawric chi equiniminic take c'acharel, re' la' nbanic chi re' take c'acharel quiniminic, re' i kAja̱w Dios ru'um nok re' wilic rajawric chi ribanaric re're'.

Je' re' k'uru' je' ricab nok jeno' c'acharel re' nbanic i tic eh ch'i̱l wo' jeno' c'acharel re' xa re' chic rit'aksjic riban, xa jenaj wach i rehtalil nca̱j quilom wach ru̱c' quicamaj, je' wo' re' hin ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Apo̱los xa jenaj wo' nka̱j kilom wach chiri̱j kacamaj xka'n chaxilac hat-tak eh re' nka̱j kilom wach i hoj, re' chi naricowjic ac'ux tak ru̱c' i c'uhbalanic xka'n chaxilac tak. Ru̱c' i kacamaj xka'n chaxilac tak, re' hoj nakac'ulum wo' jeno' kaco̱ch ru̱c' i Dios je' ricab nok jeno' ajabe̱s riyew quitojbal take raj camanom re' k'orel nic' pa' wach i camanic xca'n chiwach.

Ru̱c' kacamaj i hoj k'uru' re' xojwih'ic cho chaxilac tak chi c'uhbalanic, re' hoj xka'n chi xa hoj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios aj banol reh haj wilic rik'or keh chi naka'nam eh awu̱c' hat-tak aj Cori̱nto re' Dios c'ahchi' ricamanic pan awa̱mna tak ru̱c' kacamaj i hoj aj c'uhbalanel je' ricab nok jeno' ajabe̱s c'ahchi' ricamanem pan riye'a̱b ru̱c' cansil take raj camanom c'ahchi'que̱b chi camanic ru̱c'. Je' wo' chic ru̱c' ritik'injic wach ac'acharic tak c'ahchi' ribanam i Dios, re' hat-tak je' na wa'ric c'ahchi' abanam je' ricab jenaj pa̱t c'ahchi' rijohsjic ru'um jeno' ajabe̱s.

Re' hin ru̱c' nic'axmajic xiban cho Dios chi riye'eric wi̱n jenaj t'ulic laj no'jbal chi nanicamanic chiwach chi hin aj k'orol reh riC'uhbal, re' hin pe̱t be̱h xintz'ukunic reh acapew-bal tak chiri̱j rinimjic i Dios ru̱c' atijiljic tak je' ricab nok jeno' aj tz'ako̱l nahsil aj tik'em pa̱t, re're' ncojbic reh i tz'ak ch'iquinbal cho reh rira'il jeno' pa̱t. Je' wo' chic, je' ricab chi toco̱m chic jeno' aj tz'ako̱l ntikbic ju' i camanic ch'iquimaj cho ru'um aj nahsil tik'em pa̱t, je' wo' re' xbanjic ru̱c' i nicamaj i hin toco̱m chic xtikbic ju' atijiljic tak chiri̱j riC'uhbal i Dios. Xa re' la' nwa̱j wo' nik'orom chi hab wach take c'ahchi' quitikbic ju' ricamaj i Dios quilow ta nak ricorquil nic' wach i camanic c'ahchi' ca'nam je' ricab nok jeno' aj tz'ako̱l, curman chi narilom ricorquil nic' wach ritikmijic ju' i tik'inic pa̱t c'ahchi' ribanam china̱ i tz'ak ch'iquimaj cho wi̱'.

Re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak je' ricab jeno' pa̱t xa jenaj chi tz'ak wilic chi ch'iquinbal reh eh xa china̱ wo' ru' ntik'mijic i pa̱t re're', je' wo' re' ru̱c' i kaniminic ma' hab ta wo' chic wach jeno' eriban chi erik'or jeno' c'uhbal keh chiri̱j nic' wach riwi̱' nakojco'ljok ru'um i Dios maj xa jenaj wo' riwi̱' i co'lbal wilic eh re're', xa re' wo' re' xnik'or aweh tak chi xa ru'um i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric ekojco'ljic ru'um i Dios.

Je' wo' chic, re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi wilic take c'acharel nanquitik ju' rijohsjic jeno' pa̱t china̱ jeno' tz'ak ch'iquimaj chic cho wi̱' jeno' pa̱t, wilic take aj tik'inel reh nquicoj take holohic laj camanbal je' ru̱c' ma' quic'ahtic ta je' ricab take k'anworic laj ch'ihch', sak laj ch'ihch' ch'i̱l wo' take chak'wach laj abaj on wilic wo' take nquicoj camanbal c'ahtel take je' ricab take tz'ilom, take a̱k on xak aji̱j.

Nic' pa' wach nc'uluric ru̱c' jeno' pa̱t chi re' k'orel nic' pa' wach i camanbal ncojoric reh je' wo' re' cowil ncahnic jeno' pa̱t, je' wo' re' naric'uluric ru̱c' quicamaj take raj camanom i Dios. Je' re' nik'or maj nariponic wo' i k'i̱j chi naric'utunic lok nic' wach riwi̱' richak'wachquilal i quicamaj xca'n, wi nchel xca'n chi coric on ma'xta. Je' aj re' naric'uluric ru'um nok nasoljok wo' chic cho i Jesus naresam lok wach sakom nic' wach quicamaj take aj camanom wi holohic on ma' holohic ta. Je' re' nik'or maj re're' narich'ukum k'oric chi quina̱ ju'jun chi c'acharel ilbal reh wi holohic xibanic je' ricab naqui'ic'sjic pan k'a̱k' take quiworwotic laj ch'ihch' ilbal reh wi til re' ru̱c' take chak'wach laj ch'ihch'.

Je' aj re' ru', re' ricamaj jeno' aj camanom narelic lok wach sakom nachich'uk k'oric i Jesus china̱. Nok ch'uku̱j chic ri̱j chi holohic ricamaj, nariye'eric jeno' rico̱ch je' ricab nok jeno' aj tz'ako̱l nye'eric wo' jeno' risi̱ nok ilo̱j chic chi holohic i camanic xiban ru̱c' ritikiric ju' ritik'injic jeno' pa̱t.

Raj wi re' ricamaj xiban jeno' aj camanom narich'ukuric wach ru'um i Jesus chi ma' holohic ta, re' aj camanom re're' ma'xta ric'ulum jeno' rico̱ch ru'um chi naritz'ajric ac'al i ricamaj xiban je' ricab nok jeno' aj tz'ako̱l ntz'ajric ac'al ricamaj nanha'ric ru'um k'a̱k' ru'um chi ma' chiho̱j ta wach camanbal ricoj chi johsonic pa̱t. Wi jeno' aj camanom je' re' ric'ul ru̱c' ricamaj, cu ewo' nco'ljic ru'um i Dios chiwach i k'a̱k' naritojoric wi̱' wach i mahc je' ricab nok jeno' c'acharel rico'lej ri̱b chiwach i k'a̱k' nkop wi̱' i ripa̱t to̱b ta wo' ma' rico'lej ta chic ri̱j take pa' bih reh.

Yu'na re' chic wili nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak: Re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi re' Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios xwih'ic ar Jerusalen, til ar wih'ic i Dios naxwih'ic cho cu̱c' take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh nic' pa' wach i wih'ic xiban ar, yu'na je' wo' re' i wih'ic riban awu̱c' i hat-tak aj niminel. Je' re' nik'or maj re' Lok' laj rUxlabal til wilic wo' pan awa̱mna tak.

Ru'um aj re' til nik'or aweh tak chi xa hab wach aweh tak eriyoj quicapew-bal take ritinami̱t i Dios ru̱c' take no'jbal riban je' ricab riyojoric jeno' pa̱t riban jeno' c'acharel, re' nbanic re're' til rinimal ti'c'axic nariye'eric china̱ ru'um reh ribano̱j. Je' re' naribanaric reh maj je' ricab chi re' Lok' laj Pa̱t tik'imaj chi nariwih'ic wi̱' i Dios, til k'e̱' lo̱k' riwi̱', je' wo' re' yu'na re' ye'a̱b wilic wi̱' ru' til k'e̱' wo' lo̱k' riwa'ric eh re' ye'a̱b re're', re' hat-tak yu'na.

Chawic'raj awi̱b tak k'uru' ma' hab wach ajot' tak ricapew-bal on ma̱jot' wo' awi̱b chawibil awi̱b tak ru̱c' i nacapaj chawi̱j tak. Je' re' nik'or maj wilic aweh tak ricapaj chi re're' til k'e̱' t'ulic chi reh xa ru'um ti ru' chi je' nak re' nk'ormojic reh nok ja' re' ta nak aj niminel. Re' c'acharel je' re' ricapaj til nik'or reh chicana̱' ricapewjic re're', re' la' chiban chicana̱' chi re' ok chic i Dios capewenok chiri̱j chi til re're' k'e̱' t'ulic chi rinimjic i Jesus to̱b ta nchel re' take ma' re' ta aj niminel ma' je' ta chic re' nquicapaj chiri̱j.

Je' re' nik'or maj to̱b ta wilic take ma' re' ta aj niminel k'e̱' t'ulic take ru̱c' no'jbal reh na̱ ac'al wili xa re' la' chiwach i Dios xa hamoj memil laj no'jbal wilic cu̱c'. Til coric rik'or i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' i riC'uhbal i Dios, re' rik'or chi je' wili: “Nok re' take tinamit til xa nca'n chic qui̱b chi til k'e̱' wilic quino'jbal, re' Dios ric'uhtaj queh chi ma' je' ta so' re' narisolq'uij pa ri̱j i quino'jbal maj re' nak nquitik'a̱' wach ribanaric ma' nelic ta chi coric chi quiwach, nqui rik'or.

Ma' xa re' ta re' rik'or je' la' wo' rik'or chi je' wili: “Wilic take c'acharel nquik'or chi til k'e̱' quiwa'ric ru̱c' quino'jbal xa re' la' chiwach i kAja̱w Dios ma' re' ta so' no'jbal re're', nqui rik'or.

Je' aj re' k'uru' re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi ma' hab wach aweh tak rinimsaj ri̱b xa ru'um chi c'ahchi' ritahkem rino'jbal jeno' aj tijinel eh ru̱c' re're', re' chic aj tijinel re're' c'ahchi' riyeb rilok'il. Je' re' nik'or maj re' riwi̱' chi re' Dios xiyew chic aweh tak chi'nchel take aj tijinel re're' reh chi naca̱t quito'bem tak.

Je' ricab i hin ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i ma' Apo̱los eh ch'i̱l wo' i ma' Luch re' ribihnej wo' chi Se̱pas, wilco̱j chi aj to'bonel aweh hat-tak ritinami̱t i Dios. Je' aj wo' re' riwi̱' i nic' nimal xye'eric keh hoj aj niminel china̱ ac'al wili. Re' Dios xiyew jenaj ac' chic kac'acharic chi junelic eh ru'um re' to̱b ta kojquimok je xa naco̱j wo' chic ric'a'chsam reh chi nakac'acharic ru̱c' chi junelic. Ch'i̱l xnik'or lok wili nik'or wo' chi xa pa' bih jaric nkac'ul chiwach rik'ijil kac'acharic yu'na eh je' wo' ch'i̱l take chaj bih nakac'ulum johtok chi kawach pan junk'at chic c'acharic, chi'nchel take re' camanel take keh.
Je' aj re' k'uru' re' hat-tak, hat-tak chic reh i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh je' ricab chi re're' wilic rajawric chana̱ tak, china̱ ru' re' wo' Dios wilic cho rajawric.

Yu'na was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak je' ricab naticapewenok tak chiki̱j i hoj aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios, re' wili capewenic cha'n tak: «Re' take wili raj camanom take i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Re' take re' pahbamaj wo' take ru'um i Dios chi re' take re' naquibehsenic reh rik'ormojic riC'uhbal chi risakomsjic wach take rino'jbal ru' re' ma' sakomomaj ta nak cho wach najtir k'i̱j, nqui capewenic cha'n tak chiki̱j.

Je' re' k'uru' chi aweht'alim tak chic chi je' re' kawi̱' chawach tak, re' hoj aj tijinel nakacojom rehtal i wili: Je' ricab nok jeno' ajabe̱s rich'ica̱b ric'ux chiri̱j jeno' aj ilol reh ricamaj nuyu'njic wo' chi re' aj camanom re're' naribanam ricamaj chi coric re' k'orel nic' pa' wach k'oro̱j reh ru'um ajabe̱s, je' wo' re' ku̱c' i hoj pahbamaj chi aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios, curman wo' chi naka'nam kacamaj ru̱c' coric wach c'uxlis.

Ru'um chi je' re' riwi̱' nicamaj niban, nik'or aweh tak i wili: K'i̱j wo', re' hat-tak on re' take toco̱m chic c'acharel nach'uk tak k'oric china̱ nicamaj xa re' la' i ch'ukuj k'oric na'n tak re're' xa ma'xta nech' ok riwa'ric chi niwach, nqui nik'or aweh tak. Xa ta nak wo' re' hin chi wibil wi̱b enik'or chi re' nicamaj i hin holohic on ma' holohic ta ribanaric c'ahchi'qui̱n.

Re' hin til pa ricorquilal, nwic'raj wi̱b chi ma'xta nech' ok nimahc pan wa̱mna xa re' la' ru' ma' ru'um ta re' enicapaj chi xa coric ta nak chic niwach chi ribanaric ricamaj i Dios chi raj k'orol. Je' re' nicapew-bal maj re' til nch'ukbic k'oric china̱ i camanic niban wi coric on ma' coric wach, til re' i kAja̱w Jesus.

Ru'um aj re', re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi ma̱banlom pe tak ti rich'ukjic k'oric china̱ ricamaj jeno' c'acharel chi cu ja' nponic ta rik'ijil ribanjic i ch'ukuj k'oric china̱ ru'um i kAja̱w Jesus. C'olok pe lok chi re're' enbanic maj cu re' aj wo' ru' nareht'aljic hab wach i aj camanom xiban chi coric ricamaj eh hab wach i ma'xta. Je' re' nik'or maj nok pononak chic ric'uluric re're', nariyeb lok wach sakom haj wilic i capew-bal xa pan k'ekom nak wilic cho ru'um jeno' c'acharel. Je' wo' chic, nic' pa' q'uihal take no'jbal wilic cho pa ra̱mna jeno' c'acharel nariyeb wo' lok chi eht'aljic eh chi je' aj re', re' k'orel nic' pa' wach rich'ukuric wach ricamaj i c'acharel naribanjic ru'um i Jesus, narik'ormojic wo' reh chi k'e̱' tare̱t on chi ma' tare̱t ta i ricamaj xiban.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel ru̱c' take k'oric c'ahchi' nibanam lok re' hin c'ahchi' nicojom wi̱b ch'i̱l i Apo̱los chi rehtalil nic' wach i capewenic na̱banam tak chiqui̱j take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios. Je' re' niban reh chi je' re' etinito'bej tak chi etic'acharic tak je' ricab riwi̱' rik'or ricorquilal i k'oric wili: “Tic'acharok tak chi coric chi re' ac'acharic tak ma'eta rik'ihtaj ri̱b chiwach i tz'ihmbimaj chipam i Lok' laj C'uhbal, nqui rik'or. Wi je' aj re' na'n tak, re' hat-tak ma' eta naq'uihsaj awi̱b tak ru̱c' rik'ormojic chi re' aj tijinel c'ahchi' atahkem tak til k'e̱' wo' chic nchol chiwach jeno' chic aj tijinel.

Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi ma̱nimsaj awi̱b tak chiqui̱j take awaj tijinel tak maj re' Dios ma' hab ta wach xiyew rilok'il chi nariq'uic ta nak na̱ chi quiwach take chi'nchel aj niminel. C'olok wo' pan ac'ux tak chi wi jeno' aweh tak wilic rino'jbal chi ribanaric ricamaj i Dios, re' wo' Dios xye'bic reh. Je' re' nok wi re' hat-tak na'n tak jenaj wach capew-bal wu̱c' chi re' Dios xye'bic aweh tak i no'jbal re're', ma' riban ta chi enaq'uihsaj awi̱b tak chi xa je' nchel awu̱c' hat-tak nchalic ano'jbal tak.

Je' re' k'uru', chi niwach i hin ma' holohic ta na'n tak nok nacapaj tak chi chi'nchel chic xarak tak chiri̱j chipam rinimjic i Dios. Ru̱c' i no'jbal re're', til na'n awi̱b tak chi je' chic hat-tak biho̱m je' ru̱c' ricapaj chi wilic chic chi'nchel reh, on chi nim awach tak pan niminic eh chi wilic wo' awajawric tak je' ricab nok jeno' k'atal k'oric ric'raj ri̱b chi nim wach eh chi wilic wo' rajawric. Ru'um aj re' nacapaj tak chi re' hoj aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios ma' nim ta kawach eh chi ma'xta wo' chic hoj camaj aweh tak. Je' ta nak chic re' awi̱' pan animinic tak eh chi je' ta nak chic ricab riwa'ric jeno' aj k'atal k'oric awa'ric tak, re' hoj re' xojritak'a̱' i Dios chi aj k'orol reh riC'uhbal, raj rik'orom chi re' hoj xojcahnic chi hoj aj to'o̱l chawach tak k'uru'!

Raj chawach hat-tak ma' je' ta re' kawi̱'. Re' riwi̱' chi je' re' c'ahchi' nik'orom, re' i wili: Chawach tak, re' Dios ru̱c' ribanaric chi re' hoj re' xojripahba̱' chi aj k'orol riC'uhbal ma' hab ta wach enye'bic kawa'ric on kalok'il, xiban chi je' na hoj quicab take c'acharel je' ru̱c' quic'amaric je chi quiwach take c'acharel reh chi quise'ljic on reh chi qui'ilmijic naquicansjic cu'um take josk' laj chicop. Til coric nik'or, chawach tak re' hoj ma'xta so' kawa'ric on kalok'il chi quiwach take c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al, ma' wo' chi quiwach take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios wilque̱b ar pan taxa̱j.

Je' re' ajic, til je' re' kawi̱' chawach tak maj q'uihal aweh tak quik'oric chi re' hoj ma'xta so' kano'jbal ru'um nok re' ricamaj i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric c'ahchi' ka'nam. Tz'a̱b ru' chawi̱j tak ma' je' ta re' nak'or tak nok nak'or chi nanimej tak i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, til la' napahba̱' awi̱b tak chi wilic ano'jbal tak ru'um. Je' wo' chic, wilic wo' aweh tak quik'oric chi re' hoj ma'xta so' kajawric chi ribanaric ricamaj i Jesus eh tz'a̱b ru' chawi̱j hat-tak ma' je' ta re' nak'or tak, til naq'uihsaj la' awi̱b tak chi til wilic awu̱c' tak i rajawric i Dios. Je' wo' chic, til nacapaj chi k'e̱' alok'il tak, xa re' la' chic nok wilic take je' re' nquicapaj chiki̱j, chaweh hat-tak tare̱t chi ma' eta nquiyew kalok'il.

Ma' xa re' ta re're' nkac'ul, je' la' wo' cu yu'na chi k'i̱j wilic pech nkacuy kawa' kaha̱' chi rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios. On wilic pech, re' hoj ma' q'uih ta wo' ti kaso' chi xa q'uih jal ta chic nka'n. On re' take tinamit kojquiyew chi ti' na kojquisec'lom ru'um reh rik'orbal i Dios. On nok re' hoj koj-o̱j chi rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios ma'xta jeno' kaye'a̱b haj ekoj-o̱j hi'lok so' wi̱' chi coric chiri̱j chi kacohlam chic cho kacamaj reh rik'ormojic i riC'uhbal i Dios.

Je' wo' chic, re' hoj ma' hab ta wach enk'oric chiki̱j chi xojto'bjic, xojcamanic la' chi cow chi molbal wach katz'a̱k reh take pa' bih ncamanic keh chipam i kacamaj chi rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios. Chipam i kacamaj re're' chi'nchel wach nkac'ul. Wilic pech nkac'ul katz'ujuric cu'um take tinamit, xa re' la' hoj ma' nkac'u'lej ta take, chi jelow-bal la' re're' nka'n johtok kati̱j chiwach i Dios reh chi nariqueteljic cho quiwach ru̱c' quicuse'sjic. Ma' xa ta re're' nka'n, nakojsiq'uiric la' wo' chi ribanaric ti'c'axic keh, re' hoj xa nkacuy wo' ransil eh xa nwih'ic wo' kak'unil ru̱c' take pa' bih nbanjic keh.

Je' wo', nanca'n wo' ma' holohic ta laj k'oric chiki̱j jot'bal reh kacamaj, re' hoj nkac'u'lej take ru̱c' holohic laj k'oric ma' re' ta nchel ru̱c' wolinic i̱b. Coric nik'or, cu yu'na chi k'i̱j wilic take c'acharel kojquicoj chi ma'xta bih hoj camaj wi̱' chi quiwach xa je' na nchel hoj mok'al pan nak' quiwach on xa je' na ricab hoj ch'uwa' njotzoric lok chiwach jeno' pa' bih ch'uwa' wach on mu'k riban.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, chi'nchel c'ahchi' nik'orom aweh tak wili ma' re' ta reh esbal aq'uixbilal tak ru'um reh no'jbal na'n tak. Ma' je' ta re', c'ahchi' la' nik'orom to'bal aweh tak reh chi encorjic wach ano'jbal tak. Je' re' niban ru'um chi k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak chi xa je' chic hat-tak cu̱c' wac'u̱n wixk'u̱n chi niwach.

C'olok pan ac'ux tak i wili: Chi re' hin, hin tak'amaj ru'um i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi rik'ormojic aweh tak i ma' birimaj ta laj ribiral chiri̱j, re' hin ma' xa ta xniban wi̱b chi pe̱t xink'oric aweh tak i ribiral re're', je' la' wo' xincahnic chi je' na hin awaja̱w tak pan animinic maj to̱b ta q'uihal take xquitik ju' c'uhtunic chiri̱j i Jesus awu̱c' tak, re' c'uhbalanic xniban i hin re' aj re' xbanic reh chi xac'ul tak i ac' c'acharic re' ye'o̱j aweh tak ru'um i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.
Je' re' ajic chi wilqui̱n aj chi je' hin awaja̱w tak chipam rinimjic i Jesus, til nipahkaj aweh tak i ato'bil chi chac'am tak tz'eht reh nino'jbal niban chi rinimjic i Jesus

eh chi atobjic tak chi ena'n tak chi je' re', c'ahchi' wo' nitak'a̱b je awu̱c' tak i Timote̱yo re' ti' nwic'raj eh til je' wac'u̱n nok wilic chi niwach. Re're' til ch'iquem c'uxlis wo' chi ribanaric haj wilic i camanic nik'or reh chi nariban chipam ricamaj i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Naponok awu̱c' tak i Timote̱yo, re're' ru̱c' narik'orom aweh tak naribanam chi enc'ulic wo' chic pan ac'ux tak nic' wach i c'acharic xniban cho chawach tak re' xawilow tak wi̱' chi re' hin til hin tak'amaj ru'um i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Re' riwi̱' nic'acharic re're' ma' xa ta awu̱c' tak xnic'uhtaj chi na̱c'amam tak tz'eht reh je' la' wo' cu̱c' take toco̱m chic kas kacha̱k' kich aj niminel re' wilque̱b xa pa' tinamit quinpon wi̱' chi c'uhbalanic.
Yu'na chi ma' nawilow ta tak chic niwach, wilic aweh tak je' ru̱c' xa nquinimsaj chic qui̱b ru̱c' quino'jbal c'ahchi' quicapam chi re' hin ma'xta chic nisoljic je chi awiliric tak

eh chi xnitak'a̱' je Timote̱yo awu̱c' tak ru'um chi quinyo'jic chawach tak, xa re' la' hin nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi ma' je' ta re' nicapew-bal. Re' hin xa loq'uil wilqui̱n ponok chaxilac tak wi la' re' Dios xiyew k'ab wi̱n chi je' re' eniban. Naquinponok chaxilac tak cu re' aj ru' nanicojom rehtal wi re' take c'acharel quik'oric chi nimak quiwach chiwach i Dios til na wo' weht'alim wi til coric chi je' re' quiwi̱' eh wi til coric chi ye'o̱j rajawric quik'orbal ru'um i rUxlabal i Dios.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' nanirakam wi̱' chiri̱j wi til coric chi je' re', re' i wili: Re' take c'acharel quik'oric chi wilic cu̱c' i rajawric i Dios xa re' la' ma' nca'n ta wo' haj wilic i rik'or, re' take re' ma' re' ta wo' i Dios wilic chi quina̱ chi k'atal k'oric.

Je' re' ajic nwa̱j niponic awu̱c' tak eh naquinponok ar, xa qui̱b wo' wach i camanic nicapaj ribanaric awu̱c' tak. Jenaj queh camanic re're' nanibanam chaxilac tak, re' k'orel nic' wach wilca̱t tak. Wi ma' c'ahchi' ta ajalam tak wach ano'jbal tak, re' hin nawojic ca̱t tak nik'ilim chi cow je' ricab tanlic chiwi̱j chi nanibanam chi hin raj k'orol i Dios. Tz'a̱b ru' wi re' hat-tak xajal tak chic wach ano'jbal, re' hin nanik'oric awu̱c' tak ru̱c' ch'ublic wach k'oric eh nawilom wo' tak chi re' hin k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak chipam rinimjic i kAja̱w Jesus.

Yu'na nwa̱j k'oric chiri̱j i wili: Wilic take c'ahchi' quic'ulic k'orok wi̱n chi chaxilac hat-tak aj niminel ar Cori̱nto wilic jenaj balc'uxquilal c'ahchi' ric'uluric re' xa ta nak chi quixilac take c'acharel ma' quilok'onic ta wach i kAja̱w Dios nbirmijic ribiral chi nbanaric. Je' re' ajic chaxilac hat-tak wilic jenaj i c'ahchi' rehq'uenem cok i ricab ritu̱t

eh re' hat-tak re' tik'oric tak chi til wilic ano'jbal tak, ma'xta bih c'ahchi' ak'orom tak reh. Re' hat-tak naxawilow nak tak i c'ahbilal re're', til xti'bic nak ac'ux tak ru'um i c'ahchi' ribanaric re're' eh xak'or nak tak reh c'acharel chi ja' eta pe chic riban chi erituna̱' ri̱b awu̱c' tak chi niminic wi ma' xik'or chi ma'xta chic ribanam ribanaric i mahc re're'.

Je' aj nak re' xa'n tak reh c'acharel re're', raj la' ru'um chi ma' xa'n ta tak chi je' re', yu'na tob ta ma' wilqui̱n ta chaxilac tak chi na'lic wi̱n re' nicapew-bal til wilic awu̱c' tak eh re' wili nik'or je aweh tak reh chi na̱weht'alim tak chaj bih ra̱j banaric ru̱c' i c'acharel re' c'ahchi' ribanic i c'ahbilal re're':
Re' hat-tak re' wilic awu̱c' tak i rajawric i kAja̱w Jesus ru'um chi hat-tak aj niminel reh, chamol awi̱b tak eh je' ricab chi wilqui̱n ta nak awu̱c' tak chi na'lic wi̱n, re' wili cha'n tak:

Chawesaj tak je c'acharel re're' chaxilac tak reh chi enesmejic lok i mahc xoquic cho chaxilac tak re're' eh chi je' re' chacana̱' tak chi re' ric'acharic i c'acharel re're' encahnic chi rehquen rajawric aj Yahm. Ru̱c' aj chaj bih enbanaric reh ru'um aj Yahm, re' c'acharel re're' wi xicapaj ri̱j chi ma' holohic ta c'ahchi' ribanam, ericana̱' i ribanaric i mahc re're' eh je' re' nasoljok cho i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus enco'ljic chiwach i ti'c'axic nariye'eric chi quina̱ take aj mahc.

Re' hat-tak ma' riban ta chi enanimsaj awi̱b tak chi c'ahchi' ak'orom chi wilic ano'jbal tak eh chi c'ahchi' wo' ayeb tak k'ab chi jeno' c'acharel eritik ju' i c'ahbilal c'ahchi' ribanam chaxilac tak. K'e̱' wo' chic memil aweh tak chi ma' narak ta tak nech' ok chiri̱j chi junpech i sakombal wach k'oric rik'or chi je' wili: “Re' nech' chi ik'o̱m ncojoric chi xilac rik'oril caxlan wi'c, risipsaj wach chi'nchel i k'o̱r re're', nqui rik'or. Je' re' nik'or maj wi re' hat-tak c'ahchi' acana̱b tak chi wilic c'ahbilal chi xilac acomonil tak, chi'nchel acomonil hat-tak ewo' nquinih qui̱b chi ribanaric c'ahbilal re're'.

Reh chi ma'eta nc'uluric chi je' re' chaxilac tak, cha'n tak je' ricab na'n tak chipam i nink'i̱j Pa̱scuwa ribihnal nanatik'a̱' tak i caxlan wi'c ma' sipsimaj ta wach. Pe̱t, nawesaj tak lok chi'nchel ik'o̱m re're', rehtalil chi ma' wilic ta jeno' aj mahc chaxilac tak. Chiri̱j re're', toco̱m chic caxlan wi'c natik'a̱' tak re' ma' cojo̱j ta chipam ik'o̱m sipsbal wach. Je' wo' re' cha'n i hat-tak, chawesaj tak lok chaxilac i c'ahbil laj no'jbal noquic cho eh sak ok wach ano'jbal tak maj re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xquimic chiki̱j chi cuybal reh kamahc. Re' aj i quimic xic'ul i Jesus no̱j riban jenaj wach ch'i̱l je' ricab xc'uluric cho najtir k'i̱j ar Eji̱pto nok re' take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xquiyew chi cansjic i me̱' pan quijelow-bal chi cuybal reh quimahc.

Je' aj re' k'uru' je' ricab nok re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel nankanimej wach i nink'i̱j Pa̱scuwa, riwi̱' chi keh chi ar ma' nkac'ux ta i caxlan wi'c je' ru̱c' tik'imaj ru̱c' sipsbal wach, je' wo' riwi̱' chi keh hoj aj niminel chi nakac'acharic ru̱c' sakil wach no'jbal eh je' wo' ru̱c' coric wach c'uxlis. Je' wo', riwi̱' chi keh chi nakac'acharic chi ma' re' ta c'ahbilal ch'i̱l i no'jbal pok'bal xa'aw wilic cho pan ka̱mna.

Najtir chic cho so', re' hin xnitz'ihmbaj je aweh tak jenaj chic hu̱j re' xnik'or je wi̱' aweh tak chi re' hat-tak ma' eta riban chi enatuna̱' awi̱b tak cu̱c' take c'acharel je' ru̱c' suk queh ribanaric i c'oyomal.

Naxnitz'ihmbaj je aweh tak re're', ma' xink'oric ta chiri̱j chi re' hat-tak ma' eta chic riban chi enak'o'rej tak chi'nchel c'acharel ma' re' ta take aj niminel. Coric, chi quixilac take ru' wilic wo' nca'n ribanaric i c'oyomal. Wilic wo' take c'acharel re' ji̱k' quic'ux chiri̱j rirakmajic quibihomal. Wilic wo' take c'acharel re' k'e̱' suk queh relk'jic i cas quicha̱k' eh wilic wo' take c'acharel k'e̱' suk queh rilok'onjic wach take tiyo̱x. Raj la' hin ma' xink'oric ta chiqui̱j take c'acharel re're' maj wi til ta nak coric chi ma' eta chic nak'o'rej tak on enawilow tak quiwach take c'acharel aj mahc take, ra̱j nak rik'orom chi re' hat-tak curman nak chi na̱welic tak je china̱ ac'al.

Ma'xta, ma' je' ta re'. Re' hin xnitz'ihmbaj aweh tak chi ma'xta atuna̱b awi̱b tak cu̱c' take c'acharel toco̱m quino'jbal xa re' la' ma' xink'oric ta chiqui̱j take ma' re' ta take aj niminel, chiqui̱j la' take c'acharel re' nquitz'ak qui̱b chi aj niminel take xa re' la' ru' xa cu suk wo' queh ribanaric take mahc wili: Re' ribanaric c'oyomal ru̱c' xa hab wach u̱c', re' ribanaric ji̱k' c'uxlis chiri̱j rirakmajic bihomal, re' riye'eric quilok'il take tiyo̱x, re' sihtinic tak i̱b, re' banoj tak xohc'sonic i̱b ch'i̱l wo' banoj tak lek'. Cu̱c' take nquitz'ak qui̱b chi aj niminel take eh cu je' re' no'jbal nca'n, re' hat-tak xa ta nak pan jeno' ni̱m enatuna̱' awi̱b tak cu̱c' chi ribanaric awa' aha̱' tak quich'i̱l.

Je' aj re' k'uru' naxnik'or aweh tak chi ma' hab ta wach aj u̱c' na̱tuna̱b awi̱b tak, ma' xink'oric ta chiqui̱j take c'acharel ma' re' ta take aj niminel. Je' re' nik'or maj chaj bih rajawric nik'orbal wilic i hin chi quina̱ take re' chi enik'or je aweh tak chi ma̱tuna̱' awi̱b tak cu̱c'? Haj cok wilic til wilic kak'orbal chi quina̱ chi nakak'ilim take, re' take kich aj niminel wilque̱b chi kaxilac re' quibanic take c'ahbilal je' ricab xnik'or chic lok aweh tak.

Je' re' k'uru' re' hoj ma'xta jeno' kak'orbal chi quina̱ take c'acharel ma' re' ta take aj niminel xa re' c'olok pan kac'ux chi re' Dios reht'alim chaj bih ch'ukuj k'oric naribanam chi quina̱ ru̱c' ribanaric i mahc nca'n chiwach. Re' cok aj niminel re' riban i c'ahbilal laj no'jbal chaxilac tak, cha'n tak ru̱c' je' ricab i tz'ihmbimaj chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j narik'or chi je' wili: “Chawesaj tak je chaxilac tak i c'acharel re' ma' holohic ta nbanic, nqui rik'or. Je' aj re' nik'or je aweh tak chiri̱j jeno' aj niminel maj curman chi je' re' naribanaric reh, reh chi ma' eta rinih take toco̱m chic c'acharel ru̱c' i mahc c'ahchi' ribanam.

Ma' nponic ta chi niwach nok wilic jeno' c'axquilal chaxilac hat-tak aj niminel ru̱c' jeno' chic awich aj niminel tak eh chi ma' na'n ta tak canar ritik'injic wach chawibil awi̱b tak, re' chic na'n tak napahkaj tak chi toco̱m chic c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta aj niminel entik'inic wach aweh tak ac'axquilal tak re're'. Chaweh hat-tak ma' riban ta chi re' ac'axquilal tak enac'am tak je chiwach jeno' aj ch'ukul wach mahc china̱ ac'al wili. Je' re' nik'or aweh tak maj wi re' aj ch'ukul wach mahc ma' re' ta aj niminel, re're' ma' riyohbalej ta wach i Dios.

Je' wo' chic, ma' niq'uic pan ac'ux tak chi re' hoj ritinami̱t i Dios pan jenaj k'i̱j nakak'atbic k'oric chi quina̱ take tinamit wilque̱b china̱ ac'al wili. Wi je' re' naka'nam ma' riyew ta ri̱b chi re' hat-tak no̱j ayew tak chaj bih t'uch ac'axquilal tak chi quiwach take aj ch'ukul wach mahc re' ma' nquiyohbalej ta wach i Dios. Je' re' nok re' hat-tak ru̱c' ano'jbal tak xiyew i Dios curman chi na̱tik'a̱b tak wach chaj bih jeno' t'uch ac'axquilal noquic cho ru̱c' awas acha̱k' tak aj niminel, ma' curman ta chi na̱siq'uim tak i quito'bal take aj ch'ukul wach mahc ma' re' ta aj niminel.

Til pa ricorquilal, re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chic chi re' hoj ritinami̱t i Dios ma' xa re' ta take tinamit nakach'ukum wach quimahc je' la' wo' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios eh wi aweht'alim tak chi je' re', chaj wa'ric k'uru' chi re' hat-tak ma' c'ahchi' ta acojom tak awajawric re're' ru̱c' ritik'injic wach take pa' bih cuc' tak wach c'axquilal nwih'ic chipam ac'acharic tak yu'na?

Je' aj re' k'uru' nok re' hat-tak wilic ac'axquilal tak on awolic tak ru̱c' jeno' awas acha̱k' tak aj niminel ma' curman ta chi na̱wojic tak cu̱c' take aj ch'ukul wach mahc ma' re' ta aj niminel take, xa hab la' wach chaxilac tak eriban chi erich'uk wach ac'axquilal tak re're', to̱b ta la' je' ru̱c' take awas acha̱k' tak re' nawilow tak chi ma'xta ti quiwa'ric chaxilac tak. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' holohic i ch'ukuj wach k'oric enca'n chi quiwach take aj ch'ukul wach mahc ma' re' ta aj niminel take.

Re' hin c'ahchi' nik'orom je aweh tak i ricorquil wili reh chi re' hat-tak nacharak tak chiri̱j i ricorquil, enoquic cho aq'uix'ic tak ru'um chi ma' re' ta riwi̱' i no'jbal c'ahchi'ca̱t tak chi cu re' cu̱c' take aj ch'ukul wach mahc ma' re' ta aj niminel take to̱j tak chi ritik'injic wach pa' bih ac'axquilal tak. Ru̱c' no'jbal re're' nac'uhtaj tak lok chi xa je' nchel chaxilac hat-tak ma'xta jeno' aj niminel wilic rino'jbal chi ritik'injic wach jeno' c'axquilal nwuctic chaxilac tak. Ma̱ban tak re're'. Re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi chaxilac hat-tak wilic take aj niminel wilic quino'jbal eh etiquito'bej tak ru̱c' pa' bih ac'axquilal tak enwih'ic.

Je' re' k'uru' nibiraj aweh tak i wili: Haj nchalic aweh tak i no'jbal na'n tak nok wi hab wach jeno' aweh tak riwolej ri̱b ru̱c' jeno' ras richa̱k' aj niminel, ar chic no̱j ru̱c' i aj ch'ukul wach mahc je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta aj niminel, ilbal reh hab wach i coric rik'or? Re' no'jbal na'n tak re're' ma' holohic ta so' maj c'ahchi' acana̱b tak chi re' jeno' aj ch'ukul wach mahc ma' re' ta aj niminel reh Dios c'ahchi' rich'ukbic wach aweh i c'axquilal nac'ul tak pan animinic tak.

Je' wo', yu'na nik'or aweh tak chi nok wilic jeno' awolic tak ru̱c' jeno' awas acha̱k' tak aj niminel, re' no'jbal re're' xa ric'uhtaj aq'uixbilal tak. Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak wi jeno' awas acha̱k' tak riban ti'c'axic aweh tak on xatriwolej tak, ma̱c'am tak je ru̱c' aj ch'ukul wach mahc, re' la' k'e̱' tare̱t chi ena'n tak, chacuy tak rimahc. Je' wo' re' cha'n tak wi jeno' awas acha̱k' tak aj niminel xelk'aj ok jeno' pa' bih aweh tak.

Je' re' nik'or maj k'e̱' q'uixbilal na'n tak nok c'ahchi' abanam tak ti' queh take c'acharel eh je' wo' nok c'ahchi' wo' awelk'am tak take. Xa na̱ ru' queh take awas acha̱k' tak aj niminel c'ahchi' abanam tak ti' c'axic re're'. Til k'e̱' je q'uixbilal c'ahchi' abanam tak!

Haj xayew aweh tak i k'oric k'oro̱j cho aweh tak chi re' take ma' coric ta wach quino'jbal ma'xta coquic chi rehquen rajawric i Dios chi k'atal k'oric? Xiq'uic na ti pan ac'ux tak? Til c'olok pan ac'ux tak k'uru' i k'oro̱j chic cho aweh tak re're' eh ma̱coj tak wach chaj bih chic jeno' toco̱m laj c'uhbal chiwach i c'uhtumaj aweh tak. Je' re' nik'or je aweh tak maj aweht'alim tak chic chi coric chi ma'xta coquic chi rehquen rajawric i Dios chi k'atal k'oric re' take c'acharel re' je' wili quiwi̱': Re' c'oyomal riban ru'um chi xa tunlic chi c'acharic, re' aj ye'ol quilok'il take tiyo̱x, re' rich'uwa'rsaj wach ricaxa̱ra ru̱c' banoj c'oyomal, re' take nca'n i c'oyomal chi quich winak qui̱b on chi quich ixok qui̱b.

Je' wo', re' take aj lek' ma'xta coquic chi rehquen rajawric i Dios chi k'atal k'oric ch'i̱l take ji̱k' quic'ux chiri̱j rirakmajic bihomal, ch'i̱l take aj xohc'rel, ch'i̱l wo' take sihtinel tak i̱b eh ma' holohic ta quik'oric chiqui̱j take cas quicha̱k' eh ch'i̱l wo' take mak'ol pa' bih wilic queh cas quicha̱k'.

Najtir cho k'i̱j nok cu ja' nanimej ta tak i kAja̱w Jesus, wilic aweh tak re' nak re' no'jbal na'n tak cho ribanaric xa re' la' yu'na ma' je' ta chic re' c'acharic na'n tak ru'um nok re' kAja̱w Dios xitz'aj chic wach awa̱mna tak je' ricab nok jeno' c'acharel re' xiban chic riti̱n sak chic riban. Je' wo' chic, re' Dios xatricoj tak jenaj chi quixilac take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n re' sak chic wach quic'acharic eh re' tojbal wach mahc wilic nak chana̱ tak ru'um i mahc na'n tak xesaj chic chana̱ tak. Chi'nchel re're' xiban i kaDios ru'um chi hat-tak chic aj niminel reh Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Ma' xa re' ta re' xiban je' la' wo' xitak'a̱' cho i Lok' laj rUxlabal ku̱c' reh chi narisaksam wach i kacapew-bal eh chi je' re' enponic chiwach i c'acharic enka'n.

Wilic aweh hat-tak je' wili nak'or tak: «Re' hoj enka'n xa pa' bih nka̱j ka'nam maj xa re' wo' nok re' Dios xicuy kamahc xesaj chic chi kana̱ i ti'c'axic wilic nak ru'um reh kamahc, nqui nak'or tak. Coric aweh tak ru̱c' i k'oric re're' xa re' la' hin nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi re're' ma' ra̱j ta rik'orom chi'nchel ta nak tare̱t chi banaric. Je' wo' re', wi re' hin enik'or chi ma'xta bih enpitbic wi̱n chi ribanaric i xa pa' bih nwa̱j nibanam, ewo' nak riban chi je' re' eniban xa re' la' ma' jaruj ta enicana̱' chi re' i pa' nak bih no'jbal npok' cho pa nic'ux, enchopbic na̱ nic'acharic.

Je' wo' chic, wilic wo' aweh tak c'ahchi' quik'oric chi je' wili: «Je' ricab nok re' kawa' kaha̱' wilic reh chi nakayeb chi suk i kati'jolal eh re' kati'jolal tiklic wo' reh chi naric'ulum cho chaj bih nkayew jok reh, je' wo' re' i hoj ru̱c' kati'jolal kabakil wi raj chi naribanam lok c'oyomal, ewo' riban chi enka'n lok ru'um chi re' wo' Dios xtik'inic reh kati'jolal, nqui k'oric na'n tak. Re' k'oric nak'or tak chi re' Dios xtik'inic reh kati'jolal eh chi re' wo' xtik'inic reh kawa' kaha̱' nkac'ux, coric aweh tak xa re' la' nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi pan jenaj k'i̱j nok jalo̱j chic wach i kati'jolal kabakil, ma'xta chic riwih'ic kawa' kaha̱' ru'um nok ma' curman ta chic chi reh kati'jolal chi'nchel re're'. Je' re' ru' naric'uluric ru̱c' kawa' kaha̱' xa re' la' re' hin nik'orom chic aweh tak chi ma' je' ta re' ru̱c' kati'jolal kabakil chi ribanaric lok i c'oyomal maj re' Dios ma' xojritik'a̱' ta chi enka'n lok re're' ru̱c' xa hab wach u̱c' nka̱j, re' hoj nakac'acharic la' chi coric ru̱c' hab wach i ric'u'lil ko̱k kak'ab ye'o̱j keh ru'um i Dios eh je' wo' nakac'acharic je' ricab ra̱j i kAja̱w ru'um chi re' wo' re' nehchenic reh kac'acharic.

Je' re' k'uru' wi re' kAja̱w Dios nehchenic reh kac'acharic re' wo' re' naribanic chi chiri̱j chi hoj chic camnak je, nariyeb wo' chic kac'acharic je' ricab nok xiyew wo' chic ric'acharic i Jesus naxcansjic je. Je' aj re' naribanam i Dios ku̱c' ru'um reh rinimal wach rajawric wilic.

Yu'na chacoj tak rehtal eh ma' niq'uic pan ac'ux tak i wili: Nok re' hat-tak xanimej tak i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric re' hoj aj niminel reh xka'n juneht chic wach ch'i̱l ru'. Wi je' chic re' kawi̱' rich'i̱l i Jesus, ma' riban ta k'uru' chi jeno' aj niminel enoquic ru̱c' jeno' toco̱m chic ixok on ru̱c' jeno' c'oyo̱m laj ixok, ru'um nok wi je' re' riban, ra̱j rik'orom chi c'ahchi' rijunehtem wach ixok re're' ru̱c' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi wi jeno' winak noquic ru̱c' jeno' c'oyo̱m laj ixok, quicabchelal no̱j riban chi xa jenaj chic quiwi̱', je' ricab rik'or chipam i riC'uhbal i Dios nank'oric chiri̱j i caxarahil. Ar je' wili rik'or: “Re' jeno' winak ch'i̱l i jeno' ixok nok quic'amam chic qui̱b pan caxarahil, re' take quib chi c'acharel re're' no̱j riban chi xa jenaj chic quiwi̱', nqui rik'or.

Ru̱c' aj wo' wili nwa̱j nik'orom i riban i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios wili: Re're' nok jeno' c'acharel rinimej i kAja̱w Jesus, riban chi re' aj niminel re're' no̱j wo' riban chi xa jenaj chic riwi̱' rich'i̱l i Ajabe̱s Jesus.

Ru'um aj re' nipahkaj je aweh tak i wili: Ma' hab wach aweh tak noquic ru̱c' jeno' toco̱m chic ixok wi ma' re' rehq'ue̱n on toco̱m chic winak wi ma' re' ribahi̱l maj re' banoj c'oyomal k'e̱' wo' chic rijot' i kati'jolal kabakil chiwach take toco̱m chic mahc nbanaric.

C'olok pan ac'ux tak chi re' ati'jolal abakil tak wilic chi je' ricab jenaj pa̱t lok'onbal wi̱' wach i Dios re' nc'acharic wi̱' i Lok' laj Uxlabal xiyew aweh tak eh ru'um re're' yu'na hat-tak chic reh i Dios.

Je' re' nik'or maj naxitak'a̱' cho Jesus chi nariquimic chawi̱j tak, re' Dios xiban ri̱b chi awaj ehchenel tak xa je' na chi xitoj chic awach tak. Chi je' aj re' ru' xiban i Dios chac'uhtaj wo' tak lok ru̱c' abano̱j tak chi re're' wilic rilok'il chipam ac'acharic tak.

Re' chic yu'na nwa̱j k'oric awu̱c' tak chiri̱j take pahkanic xayew tak cho chi tz'ihmjic wi̱n pan jenaj hu̱j chiri̱j jeno' c'acharel wi tare̱t chi nariban caxa̱ra on tare̱t chi naricahnic xa chi rutquel ri̱b. Chi ric'u'ljic je apahkanic tak re're', nik'or aweh tak chi k'e̱' nak tare̱t chi re' c'acharel ma' eta riban caxa̱ra,

xa re' la' ru' ru'um reh yohbalil chi wilic take equik'ehbic pan c'oyomal, re' hin til nik'or aweh tak chi curman chi re' take winak nariwih'ic quehq'ue̱n eh re' take ixok curman wo' chi nariwih'ic quibahi̱l reh chi ma' hab ta wach queh enk'ehbic pan mahc.

Reh aj chi ma'xta bih enoquic cho wi̱' jeno' c'axquilal, re' hin til nik'or aweh tak chi re' bahilbe̱s tanlic chiri̱j chi naritikim ju' ritunabjic ri̱b ru̱c' rehq'ue̱n ru'um nok xa chi je' re' naquic'acharic pan suk laj c'uxlis eh je' wo' re' chiban i ehq'uenbe̱s ru̱c' ribahi̱l.

Je' re' k'uru' ma' eta riban chi re' ehq'uenbe̱s eripit ribahi̱l chi rik'ahsjic ri̱b reh nanyohquic ru̱c', ma' wo' re' bahilbe̱s eriban chi eripit rik'ahsjic ri̱b nanyohquic ru̱c' rehq'ue̱n ru'um chi xa quiti'jolal quibakil chic qui̱b chi quiwach.

Je' re' nok hat-tak ehq'uenbe̱s bahilbe̱s, ma̱pit tak awi̱b ru̱c' rik'ahsjic awi̱b tak chawach natiyohquic tak, c'ul la' chayew tak risukquil ac'ux tak chawach. Wi nic' ok nchel xacapaj tak ch'i̱l ric'u'lil awo̱k ak'ab tak eh xatik'a̱' tak wach chi na̱cana̱b junc'am ok awi̱b tak chi wiric ru'um nok nawa̱j acojom awi̱b tak chi ti̱j chiwach i Dios, tare̱t chi ena'n tak chi je' re', xa re' la' nacux'ok wo' chic i junc'am re're' chatuna̱' wo' chic awi̱b tak chi wiric. Je' re' nik'or aweh tak reh chi re' aj Yahm ma' eta riban chi nachilow chi ma' natuna̱' ta chic awi̱b tak chi wiric ericoj cho pan nak' awach tak jeno' chic ixok on jeno' chic winak eh ru̱c' re're' etik'ehbic tak pan c'oyomal ru'um nok ma' eta chic nacuy awi̱b tak.

Re' xnik'or lok wili chiri̱j ricanabjic junc'am ok awi̱b tak chi wiric, xnik'or chi eriban chi enbanjic xa re' la' wi je' re' xquitik'a̱' wach chi quibil qui̱b take junc'uhl ok chi c'acharel eh re' c'ahchi' nik'orom wili ma' re' ta jenaj c'uhbal til curman chi je' re' ra̱j banaric.

Re' hin wilic jenaj nicapew-bal nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chiri̱j i wih'ic chi utquel i̱b on chiri̱j i c'amoj i̱b. Til pa ricorquil re' hin til k'e̱' nak nwa̱j chi chi'nchel take winak equicahnic chi ma' eta nquisic' quehq'ue̱n je' ricab nok wilqui̱n i hin chi xawutquel wi̱b c'ahchi' nic'acharic, xa re' la' chic nbanic reh chi ju'junal chi c'acharel chi winak chi ixok ye'o̱j cho reh ru'um i Dios i riwi̱' ric'acharic haj wilic tare̱t chi reh nic' wach nac'acharok pan suk laj capew-bal. Ru'um re', nok jeno' winak on jeno' ixok ra̱j ribanam caxa̱ra re' wo' Dios ncojbic pa ra̱mna chi je' re' naribanam eh re' ma' ra̱j ta risiq'uim rehq'ue̱n re' wo' Dios ncojbic pa ra̱mna chi je' re' naribanam.

Yu'na nwa̱j wo' k'oric chiri̱j i jenaj wo' chic pahkanic xa'n tak cho wi̱n chiqui̱j take aj niminel chi winak chi ixok je' ru̱c' xa cu cutquel pe wilque̱b chi ma' ja' caxa̱ra ta pe take eh chiqui̱j wo' take camnak chic je quehq'ue̱n on quibahi̱l. Re' hat-tak xabiraj tak cho wi re' take re' tare̱t chi naquicahnic chi xa cutquel qui̱b on wi curman chi naquisiq'uim ric'u'lil co̱k quik'ab. Re' wili capew-bal niyew je rik'ormojic aweh tak chiri̱j re're': K'e̱' tare̱t chaweh tak chi ma' eta chic na'n tak caxa̱ra eh chi eticahnic tak chawutquel tak chi c'acharic je' ricab nok wilqui̱n i hin chi ma' xnisic' ta wehq'ue̱n.

Je' aj re' ru' nik'or xa re' la' wi re' take c'acharel ma' nquicuy ta qui̱b chi equiwih'ic chi ma'xta quehq'ue̱n on quibahi̱l, k'e̱' tare̱t chi enquisic' quehq'ue̱n on quibahi̱l maj k'e̱' wo' chic tare̱t chi enca'n caxa̱ra rakbal sukquil quic'ux pan quic'acharic chiwach chi xa hab wach aj u̱c' enquic'atlom co̱k quik'ab chi mahcanic ru'um chi ma' nquicuy ta qui̱b chi c'acharic chi cutquel qui̱b.

Yu'na chiqui̱j chic caxa̱ra take nwa̱j k'oric. Queh take re' nwa̱j nik'orom i tak'anic re' ma' xa wu̱c' ta hin xchalic rik'ormojic, re' la' wo' i kAja̱w Jesus xye'bic reh rik'ormojic. Re' aj wili i tak'anic re're': Re' hat-tak ehq'uenbe̱s ma̱ch'ak awi̱b ru̱c' abahi̱l tak.

Wi ru'um nchel jeno' c'axquilal cow wach enach'ak awi̱b tak ru̱c' abahi̱l tak, til ma̱ban tak chic caxa̱ra rica'pech, ticahnok la' tak chi c'acharic chawutquel tak. Tz'a̱b ru' wi xawa̱j wo' tak chic abanam caxa̱ra, haj cok wilic sakbih chi ena'n tak: Tisoljen wo' chic je ru̱c' abahi̱l tak chi ripahkaljic ricuyuric amahc tak eh nok apahkam tak chic wih'ic pan sukquil c'uxlis, chac'am wo' chic awi̱b tak pan ato'bil ru̱c' abahi̱l tak eh re' chic hat-tak bahilbe̱s, til ma̱cana̱' wo' awi̱b ch'i̱l awehq'ue̱n tak.

Yu'na jenaj wo' chic k'oric nwa̱j wic'sam je rik'ormojic aweh tak chiqui̱j take aj niminel caxa̱ra take ru̱c' jeno' c'acharel ma' re' ta aj niminel. Ru'um nok ma'xta bih jeno' k'oric canamaj ru'um i kAja̱w Jesus chiri̱j, wi tare̱t on ma' tare̱t chi jeno' aj niminel ric'ul chi reh chi eriban caxa̱ra ru̱c' jeno' ma' re' ta aj niminel, re' hin nwa̱j niyeb je aweh tak take k'oric wili re' nicapaj i hin chi re're' ricorquilal chi banaric. Re' aj wili nwa̱j nik'orom je aweh tak: Wi wilic jeno' aweh hat-tak winak aj niminel caxa̱ra ru̱c' jeno' ixok ma' re' ta aj niminel eh re' ixok re're' til ra̱j c'acharic awu̱c' tak to̱b ta hat-tak chic aj niminel, til chacuy tic'acharok tak ru̱c', ma̱ch'ak tak je.

Je' wo' re' wi wilic jeno' ixok aj niminel caxa̱ra ru̱c' jeno' winak ma' re' ta aj niminel eh re' winak re're' til ra̱j c'acharic ru̱c' i rehq'ue̱n to̱b ta aj niminel chic, til c'acharok ru̱c' ribahi̱l ma' rich'ak je.

Chaj wa'ric nanik'or chi ma' eta riban chi ericana̱' i ribahi̱l jeno' ixok on re' rehq'ue̱n jeno' winak wi jeno' queh ma' re' ta aj niminel? Nik'or chi je' re' ru'um nok re' Dios k'e̱' lo̱k' rilow cho quic'acharic take c'acharel tunlic quiwach pan caxarahil. Ru'um aj re' wi re' bahilbe̱s ja' re' ta aj niminel, re' Dios ma' rilow ta cho chi ch'uwa' wach i c'acharic riban pan caxarahil ixok re're' ch'i̱l i ribahi̱l. Je' wo' re' i ehq'uenbe̱s wi ja' re' ta aj niminel, re' Dios ma' rilow ta cho chi ch'uwa' wach i c'acharic riban pan caxarahil i winak re're' ch'i̱l i rehq'ue̱n. Wi ta nak re' Dios rilow cho chi ch'uwa' wach i c'acharic nca'n take c'acharel re're', ra̱j rik'orom chi re' take quiha'lac'u̱n ch'uwa' wo' nak quiwach eh ma' eta nak riban chi equi'oquic wo' chi ritinami̱t i Dios take.

Je' re' k'uru' ma' hab wach rich'ak ri̱b ru'um ta nak chi re' jenaj queh quib c'acharel aj niminel on ma' re' ta aj niminel, re' cok ru' wi jeno' ric'u'lil ro̱k k'ab jeno' c'acharel re' ma' re' ta aj niminel ra̱j rich'akam ri̱b ru'um chi re' ric'u'lil ro̱k k'ab aj niminel chic, chacana̱' tak chi chiban pe chi je' re'. Je' re' nik'or ru'um nok re' jeno' ixok on winak ma' re' ta aj niminel ra̱j rich'akam i ribahi̱l on rehq'ue̱n je' ru̱c' aj niminel, re' aj niminel re're' ma' tanlic ta chiri̱j chi til curman chi naric'acharic ru̱c' jeno' c'acharel ma' re' ta aj niminel. Re' cok ru' wi re' ma' re' ta aj niminel ma' ch'i'c tak rilow i niminic, quiwih'ok wo' chi suk chi quibil qui̱b je' ricab ra̱j i Dios chi na̱c'acharic tak pan suk laj c'uxlis xa re' wo' cho naxatriyuk'ej tak cho chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n.

Je' aj re' ru' re' hat-tak ehq'uenbe̱s aj niminel ma̱cana̱' abahi̱l tak, to̱b ta ma' re' aj niminel maj chaj bih na̱na'bem tak wi re' abahi̱l tak ewo' rinimej i kAja̱w Jesus ru'um rinimjic i kAja̱w na'n i hat. Je' wo' re' hat-tak bahilbe̱s aj niminel ma̱cana̱' wo' awehq'ue̱n tak, to̱b ta ma' re' aj niminel. Je' re' nik'or maj k'i̱j wo' nchel ru'um reh niminic na'n i hat-tak ewo' noquic chi niminic awehq'ue̱n tak.

Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel ar Cori̱nto, re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi aju'junal tak chatik tak ju' riwi̱' ac'acharic tak je' ricab naxatrirak tak cho i kAja̱w Jesus. Wi hat wo' tak caxa̱ra, chatik tak ju' wih'ic chi je' re'. Wi xa cu awutquel pe wilca̱t tak chi ma' re' ta caxarahil nacapaj tak, tic'acharok wo' tak chi xa chawutquel awi̱b tak. Je' re' cha'n tak ru'um nok re' Dios ritik'a̱b wo' wach nic' wach i c'acharic naribanam i ju'jun chi c'acharel. Re' no'jbal nik'or je aweh tak wili, re' wo' re' nik'or queh take chi'nchel moloj wach aj niminel wilque̱b xa haj yu̱k' q'uixca̱b quiniq'uic wi̱' chi quik'o'rjic.

Jenaj chic no'jbal nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak. Wi jeno' winak ric'amam chic na̱ i tak'anic nkac'am na̱ i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi rik'ataric lok ritz'uhmal na̱ kac'achanbal, ma' ripoy na̱ chi ribanam chic rinimjic i tak'anic re're'. On wi jeno' winak ja' riyoc' ta lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ric'achanbal naxinimej i kAja̱w Jesus, ma' curman ta chic chi cu naric'amam na̱ i tak'anic re're'.

Je' re' nik'or aweh tak chi na̱banam tak maj re' til wilic rilok'il ma' re' ta nchel wi re' hat-tak k'ato̱j on ma' k'ato̱j ta lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ac'achanbal tak, re' la' til wilic riwa'ric rilok'il re' chi re' hat-tak na̱biram tak k'oric chiwach i Dios ru̱c' chaj bih rik'or chi na̱banam tak.

Chi je' aj re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel nik'or je aweh tak chi chatik tak ju' ac'acharic tak re' k'orel nic' pa' wach ac'acharic tak re' xap'ut tak ribanaric naxatrimol tak cho i Dios chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n, wi re' nchel c'acharic na'n tak ru̱c' i no'jbal nka'n i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel on ru̱c' i no'jbal nca'n take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.

Je' wo' chic, wi jeno' aweh hat-tak aj niminel chopo̱j cho ana̱ tak chi aj camanom naxanimej i kAja̱w Jesus, ma' ticapewenic chiri̱j re're'. Re' cok ru' wi xatesmejic ok nchel chipam i wih'ic chi chopo̱j ana̱ chi camanic, chaniq'uej wo' ak'i̱j chi na̱cahnic chi ma' choplic ta chic ana̱ ru'um aj ehcham camanic.

Je' re' nik'or chi ena'n tak maj hab wach jeno' c'acharel cu choplic na̱ ru̱c' cow laj camanic naxmoloric cho ru'um i Dios chi naribanam chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n, re' c'acharel re're' tehlic chic ri̱j chi lok'onic on chi camanic chiwach i Dios. Je' wo' re', hab wach i c'acharel tehlic ri̱j naxmoloric cho ru'um i Dios chi naribanam chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n re're' no̱j riban chi je' na chic choplic quina̱ chi camanic xa re' la' ru' ru̱c' chic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric maj re' chic re' aj ehchenel reh ric'acharic.

Chaj wa'ric nanik'or aweh tak chi re' chic i Dios nehchenic aweh tak? Re' hin nik'or re're' ru'um nok naxitak'a̱' cho Jesus chi nariquimic chawi̱j tak, re're' xa je' na nchel xitoj chic awach tak chi xiban chi awaj ehchenel tak chic. Ru'um aj re' ma̱min chic awi̱b tak chi ri'sil cajawric take aj c'amol be̱h re' nquik'or aweh tak chi cu wilic take toco̱m chic no'jbal raj banaric reh chi re' ano'jbal hat-tak enponic chiwach i Dios.

Je' aj re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' chi kaju'junal i hoj aj niminel re' k'orel nic' pa' wach kawi̱' naxojrimol cho i kAja̱w Dios chi xojniminic, wi nchel hoj caxa̱ra on xa kutquel pe' ki̱b, wi nchel hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel on ma'xta. On wi nchel wilic keh chopo̱j quina̱ chi aj camanom take on wi nchel wilic ma' chopo̱j ta quina̱ chi aj camanom take, kojwih'ok tak chi je' ricab nic' pa' wach kawi̱' naxkanimej i Dios.

Yu'na chiri̱j chic apahkanic tak chiri̱j quic'acharic take ixk'un re' ma' ja'xta quibahi̱l on take ac'un ma' ja'xta quehq'ue̱n nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak i wili: Nok re' kAja̱w Jesus xwih'ic china̱ ac'al wili ma' xicana̱' ta jeno' c'uhbal keh re' rik'or wi̱' nic' wach riwi̱' c'acharic naca'nam take k'ahxokak ch'i̱l take q'uijolak. Re' c'ahchi' nik'orom aweh tak wili til coric wach eh til ric'ul chi enach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiri̱j.

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um reh take c'axquilal naric'uluric johtok chiwach take k'i̱j wili, re' wili no'jbal nik'or aweh tak: K'e̱' tare̱t chi re' take k'ahxokak ch'i̱l take q'uijolak re' xa cu cutquel pe equicahnic chi ma' eta nquisic' quibahi̱l on chi ma' eta nquisic' quehq'ue̱n.

Tz'a̱b ru' hab wach ribac'am chic ri̱b pan caxarahil chi c'acharic ru̱c' jeno' ixok, ma' ricapaj chic rich'akaric ri̱b ru̱c' rehq'ue̱n. Je' wo', hab wach jeno' c'acharel xa cu rutquel pe ti ma' ricapaj risiq'uiric rehq'ue̱n, cahnok chi xa rutquel wo' chi c'acharic.

Raj nchel wi jeno' q'uijol ma' raj ta ric'amam na̱ re' xnik'or chi ma'xta risiq'uim rehq'ue̱n xa ma' mahc ta wo' chi reh eh je' wo', wi re' jeno' k'ahxok ra̱j risiq'uim ribahi̱l xa ma' mahc ta wo' chi reh. Haj cok wilic nwa̱j nik'orom chi nok: Wi jeno' k'ahxok on q'uijol naribanam caxarahil, chi kawach johtok wilic queh yohbalil ru'um take ti'c'axic narichalic. Ru'um aj re' chi pitbal nak reh chi re' take re' ma' eta nquic'ul re're', re' hin xnik'or chi jeno' c'acharel xa cu rutquel pe ri̱b, k'e̱' nak tare̱t chi encahnic chi ma' eta risic' ric'u'lil ro̱k k'ab.

Yu'na was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel jenaj wo' chic k'oric nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak: Re' kac'acharic i hoj china̱ ac'al wili chi camanic chiwach i Dios c'ahchi' rit'uchbic ro̱k. Ru'um aj re' nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi re' hab wach wilic rehq'ue̱n on ribahi̱l ma' riban chi re're' enpitbic reh chi naricamanic chiwach i kAja̱w Jesus, chiban la' chi camanok chiwach i Dios je' ricab nok cu ja' riban ta nak cho caxa̱ra.

Je' wo' chic nic' pa' q'uihal hat-tak suk tok'ic tak ru'um chi pa' bih jeno' ti' xca'n aweh tak ma' no̱j acapew-bal tak china̱ i ti' re're', chacapaj la' tak chi xa t'uch chic ro̱k kac'acharic wilic chi camanic chiwach i Dios. On wi wilic aweh tak xa suk chic pa ric'ux ru̱c' jeno' pa' bih holonquil xac'ul pan ac'acharic tak re' wo' re' chacapaj tak. Je' wo', hab wach aweh tak c'ahchi' rilok'om take pa' bih reh chiban chi xa je' ma' re' ta ok reh take pa' bih wilic, reh chi ma' xa ar ta chic eno̱j ricapew-bal china̱ eh chiban wo' chi je' ma'xta ru̱c' take pa' bih wilic reh.

Je' re' nik'or maj ru'um chi re' na̱ ac'al wili ch'i̱l take nic' pa' nimal ncojoric on ncamanic xa nic' wo' ti yu' narisahchic wach ma' riwi̱' ta chi keh hoj aj niminel chi xa ar chic eno̱j kacapew-bal china̱.

Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, til nwa̱j chi re' hat-tak ma' chi bih no̱j wi̱' acapew-bal tak chi capewenic. Je' re' nik'or maj chi wi̱n hin re' winak re' ja' risic' ta ric'u'lil ro̱k k'ab, re're' ma'xta bih narojic wi̱' ricapew-bal xa re' la' ricapewjic ri̱j chi camanic chiwach i kAja̱w Jesus eh je' wo' chi risic'mijic ri̱j haj wilic i no'jbal nponic chiwach i Jesus chi naribanam.

Tz'a̱b ru' re' take winak caxa̱ra chic take ma' xa jenaj ta chic nquiyew wi̱' quicapew-bal ru'um nok re' chic take pa' bih jaric ncamanic reh china̱ ac'al wili no̱j wi̱' ricapew-bal eh je' wo' chi riyew ric'ux chi riye'eric risukquil ric'ux i rehq'ue̱n ru̱c' ribanaric holohic laj no'jbal chiwach.

Je' wo' re' nca'n take ixok ma'xta chic quibahi̱l ch'i̱l take ja' nquisic' ta quibahi̱l, re' take re' ma'xta bih narojic wi̱' ricapew-bal xa chiri̱j la' nic' wach i camanic naca'nam chiwach i kAja̱w Jesus no̱j wi̱' quicapew-bal eh je' wo' chi ribanaric haj wilic i no'jbal nponic chiwach i Jesus. Je' re' nca'n ru'um nca̱j quik'ahsam qui̱b ru̱c' quicapew-bal ch'i̱l quic'acharic chiwach wo' i Jesus. Raj nchel take ixok caxa̱ra chic take ma' xa jenaj ta chic nquiyew wi̱' quicapew-bal ru'um nok re' chic take pa' bih jaric ncamanic reh china̱ ac'al wili no̱j wi̱' ricapew-bal eh je' wo' chi riyew ric'ux chi riye'eric risukquil ric'ux i ribahi̱l ru̱c' ribanaric holohic laj no'jbal chiwach.

Chi'nchel take k'oric xnik'or lok wili, xnik'or lok chi to'bal aweh tak chi ma'xta bih enk'etbic aweh tak chi camanic chiwach i Dios eh chi camanok wo' aweh tak chihbal wach haj wilic i c'acharic on no'jbal k'e̱' tare̱t chaweh tak chi ma' eta rik'et pan abe̱h tak chi camanic chiwach i Dios.

Yu'na awu̱c' tak chic hat-tak ajabe̱s re' xa'n tak cho birinic chiqui̱j take awixk'u̱n tak re' ma' ja'xta quibahi̱l nwa̱j nik'orom i wili: Wi jeno' ajabe̱s ric'raj chi c'ahchi' rimahcanic ru̱c' ripitiric i rixk'u̱n chi narisiq'uim ribahi̱l, chiyew wo' k'ab reh rixk'u̱n chi eriban caxa̱ra wi c'ahchi' rik'ororic reh chi narisiq'uim ribahi̱l. Ru̱c' re're', re' hat-tak ajabe̱s ma' c'ahchi' ta amahcanic tak.

Raj nchel wi jeno' ajabe̱s ric'raj chi suk wilic ru̱c' ricapew-bal chi naricahnic i rixk'u̱n chi xa rutquel ri̱b eh chi ric'raj wo' chi ma' mino̱j ta chipam chi til la' pa ric'ux nchalic chi je' re' naribanam ru̱c' i rixk'u̱n, re're' jenaj holonquilal c'ahchi' ribanam ru̱c' i rixk'u̱n chi ma' c'ahchi' ta riyeb k'ab chi narisiq'uim ribahi̱l.

Je' aj re' xa hab wach aweh hat-tak ajabe̱s, xa haj pa' wilic i no'jbal tare̱t chaweh tak chi banaric ru̱c' awixk'u̱n tak re' wo' re' cha'n tak. Je' re' nok wi jeno' aweh tak ric'ux nk'oric cho chi nariyeb k'ab chi re' rixk'u̱n narisiq'uim ribahi̱l, tare̱t wo' chi je' re' eriban. Tz'a̱b ru' wi ric'ux wo' nk'oric cho chi ma'xta riyeb k'ab chi re' rixk'u̱n narisiq'uim ribahi̱l, k'e̱' wo' chic tare̱t eriban chi je' re'. Je' re' nik'or maj ru̱c' re' re're' c'ahchi' riyeb i rixk'u̱n chi suk i camanic eriban chiwach i kAja̱w.

Yu'na nwa̱j k'oric chiqui̱j take ixok camnak chic je quibahi̱l. Re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi jeno' ehq'uenbe̱s choplic na̱ ru'um ricaxarahil nok cu c'achlic ribahi̱l, xa re' la' nanquimic je ribahi̱l ncahnic chi tehlic wo' chic ri̱j ru̱c' ric'acharic wi ra̱j wo' chic ribanam caxa̱ra ru̱c' jeno' chic winak. Re' cok ru' wi je' re' naribanam, re' wili i tak'anic niyew reh chi naribanam: Aj niminel ok wo' reh kAja̱w Jesus i ribahi̱l chisic'.

Chi wi̱n i hin k'e̱' nak tare̱t chi re' ixok camnak chic ribahi̱l ma' eta chic risic' ribahi̱l ru'um nok suk camanic eriban chiwach i kAja̱w eh ewo' nwih'ic chi suk ric'ux. Re' c'ahchi' nik'orom wili, til nwic'raj chi re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios c'ahchi' ricojbic pan wa̱mna.

Yu'na nwa̱j je k'oric awu̱c' tak chiri̱j i pahkanic xa'n tak cho wi̱n wi re' hoj aj niminel eriban chi enkac'ux i tiwic k'ahsamaj chiwach jeno' tiyo̱x. Pe̱t k'oric nwa̱j nik'orom chi re' hin weht'alim chi wilic aweh tak je' wili c'ahchi' quik'orom: «Re' Dios xiyew chic kano'jbal chi reht'aljic chiri̱j chaj bih ra̱j banaric cu̱c' take tiyo̱x, nqui nquik'or. Re' take re' coric nquik'or, xa re' la' nwa̱j wo' nik'orom queh chi ru̱c' i quino'jbal wilic re're', xa k'e̱' chic nquiq'uihsaj qui̱b eh ma' je' ta nak re' raj banaric. Je' re' nik'or maj chi jelow-bal nak riq'uihsjic ki̱b, re' nak chic quic'axmajic take kas kacha̱k' naka'nam reh chi ru̱c' ribanaric re're' equik'asamric chipam i niminic.
Je' wo' chic, queh take nquicapaj chi til wilic chic quino'jbal chi rirakmajic chiri̱j chi'nchel, re' hin nik'or chi ja' chi'nchel ta wo' reht'alim
maj re' Dios ru' neht'alanic reh chi'nchel chi manlic. Ru'um aj re' rehtalil wo' chi re' hoj aj nimimel til ti' wo' nkic'raj ru'.

Je' re' nok chiri̱j i pahkanic xa'n tak cho wi̱n k'uru' wi jeno' aj niminel eriban chi eric'ux i tiwic k'ahsamaj cho chiwach jeno' tiyo̱x, re' hin nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi ma' riban naho̱l acapew-bal tak chiri̱j re're', ru'um nok keht'alim chi re' take tiyo̱x ma'xta jeno' cajawric chi kana̱ hoj aj niminel. Haj cok wilic til wilic rajawric xa re' wo' i jenaj manlic Dios re' ntak'anic cho chi kana̱.

Coric ru', wilic take quik'oric chi q'uihleh wach take dios wilic. Wilic quik'oric chi wilic take dios quic'acharic ar pan taxa̱j eh chi wilic wo' wilque̱b ayu' wach ac'al. Til ricorquilal chi quiwach take tinamit q'uihal wo' take dios wilic eh re' take re' nquik'or chi re' take dios re're', ajabe̱s take chi quina̱.

Je' re' ru' nquik'or take tinamit ma' re' ta take aj niminel, xa re' la' i hoj aj niminel til keht'alim chi xa jenaj wo' Dios wilic eh re're' Ajabe̱s cho chi kana̱. Re' Dios re're', re' aj tik'inel reh chi'nchel nic' pa' q'uihal nkilow wach china̱ ac'al wili chi wilco̱j wo' i hoj pa riman, re're' xiyew kac'acharic reh chi nakalok'em wach. Je' wo' chic xa jenaj wo' i Ajabe̱s Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi kana̱, re' Jesus. Xa ru'um wo' reh ru' tikilque̱b take chi'nchel nic' pa' q'uihal nkilow wach china̱ ac'al wili chi wilco̱j wo' cok pa riman i hoj.

Coric ru' chi wilic take ju'jun kich aj niminel ma' til ta nquicoj wach chi re' take tiyo̱x ma'xta cajawric chi quina̱ take c'acharel eh ru'um re're' c'axic chi queh chi enquicana̱' take no'jbal wilic cu̱c' chiri̱j take tiyo̱x. Je' ricab wi re' take re' nquic'ux tiwic k'ahsamaj cho chiwach tiyo̱x, pan quicapew-bal nquik'or chi re' take re' c'ahchi' wo' chic ca'nam juneht take ru̱c' i lok'onic tiyo̱x nbanjic. Ru'um aj re' nanquic'ux take tiwic je' ru̱c' k'ahsamaj chiwach take tiyo̱x, re' quicapew-bal ncahnic chi ma' suk tak chic ru'um nok nquicapaj chi quimahcanic xa ru'um chi xquic'ux tiwic je' ru̱c' k'ahsamaj chiwach jeno' tiyo̱x, to̱b ta wo' nak re're' ma' re' ta mahc.

Til pan coric re' kac'acharic, ma' cu ru'um ta wi enkac'ux on ma' enkac'ux i c'uxbal k'ahsamaj chiwach i tiyo̱x enponic chiwach i Dios i c'acharic enka'n. Je' re' nik'or maj wi re' hoj enkac'ux i tiwic je' ru̱c' k'ahsamaj chiwach take tiyo̱x, ma' eta kojresaj lok ru̱c' i Dios. Je' wo', wi ma' xkac'ux i tiwic re're' ma' k'e̱' ta wo' chic ekojricoj cok chiwach i Dios.

Re' cok ru' to̱b ta wo' tehlic nak ki̱j chi ric'uxuric take tiwic je' ru̱c' k'ahsamaj chiwach tiyo̱x, chayohbalej tak awi̱b chi ma̱jot' tak ricapew-bal jeno' aj niminel ja' cow ta ti ricapew-bal ru̱c' i Dios nok re' hat-tak nac'ux tak i tiwic re're'.

Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab wi hab wach jeno' awas acha̱k' tak aj niminel je' ru̱c' ja' cow ta ti ricapew-bal enilbic aweh tak chi tz'ukulca̱t tak cok nah me̱xa chi wi'c chipam jeno' ye'a̱b re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i tiyo̱x, re' aj niminel re're' ma' eta na ric'ax wo' wach haj wilic i c'ahchi'ca̱t hat-tak re' aweht'alim tak chaj bih riwi̱' nok wilca̱t tak cok ar? Til la' je' re' eriban, re're' ewo' ritijej reh xa re' la' ru' to̱b ta wo' chi reh ru' mahc i c'ahchi' ribanam ru'um nok ma' reht'alim ta ricorquil, xa ewo' ric'ux reh i tiwic ye'o̱j chi c'uxbal.

Ru̱c' i ric'uxuric i tiwic k'ahsamaj chiwach take tiyo̱x, re' hat-tak re' aweht'alim tak chic chi c'ahchi' ac'uxum tak i tiwic re're' chi ma' re' ta ye'bal rilok'il i tiyo̱x, til na̱banam tak chi re' awas acha̱k' tak aj niminel re' ja' cow ta ti ricapew-bal chi niminic, eriyoj ricapew-bal chiwach i Dios. Chacoj tak rehtal k'uru' wi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xquimic wo' chiri̱j awas acha̱k' tak re're', curman wo' chi re' hat-tak na̱wic'ram awi̱b tak chi ma' eta nayoj quicapew-bal.

Je' re' nik'or maj wi re' jeno' awas acha̱k' aj niminel re' ja' cow ta ricapew-bal chiri̱j i Dios ric'raj ri̱b chi xmahcanic ru'um i xiban awu'um tak xa ru'um xatrilow tak chaj bih c'ahchi'ca̱t tak, re' hat-tak xatmahcanic tak chiwach awas acha̱k' tak aj niminel re're' eh je' wo' xatmahcanic wo' tak chiwach i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak nicapew-bal wili: Wi ru'um chi c'ahchi' nic'uxum i tiwic k'ahsamaj chiwach i tiyo̱x, re' was nicha̱k' aj niminel ric'raj chi encahnic pan mahc wi re're' xitijej wo' reh ric'uxuric i tiwic wilic pan c'uxbal re're', sakbih chi ma' eta chic nic'ux i tiwic re're' chi riqueteljic wach i was nicha̱k' aj niminel re're', chi ma' eta niban chi enmahcanic.

Yu'na chiwi̱j chic i hin nwa̱j nik'orom je aweh take wili: Re' hin tehlic wi̱j chi ribanaric i nic' pa' nimal i holohic laj bano̱j riyew k'ab wi̱n i Dios chi nanibanam. Je' wo' re' Ajabe̱s Jesus xpahbanic wi̱n chi hin raj k'oro̱l i Dios eh re' wo' re' xic'uhtaj ri̱b wi̱n pan jenaj be̱h. Je' wo' chic ru'um reh c'uhbalanic xniban chaxilac tak yu'na c'ahchi' animem tak i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus.

Coric ru' wilic take toco̱m chic c'acharel nquicapaj chi ma' hin ta pahbamaj chi raj k'oro̱l i Dios xa re' la' chawach hat-tak, re' hin til je' wo' re' niwi̱'. Haj wilic nc'utunic wi̱' re're'? Ru̱c' i niminic xa'n hat-tak naxnik'or aweh tak i c'uhbal chiri̱j ribiral i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus.
Yu'na ajic queh take quik'oric chi ma' ta re' hin raj k'oro̱l i Dios, je' wili nik'or queh chi co'lbal wi̱b chi quiwach:

Re' hoj re' hoj pahbamaj chi raj k'oro̱l riC'uhbal i kAja̱w Jesus, ma' ric'ul ta nak chi keh chi re' take nic' pa' q'uihal aj niminel nkac'uhbalej take, re' take re' equiye'bic kawa' kaha̱'? Ric'ul chi keh chi je' nak re' katobjic ena'n tak xa re' la' chi wi̱n hin ma' riban ta chi je' re' eniban reh chi re' rinimjic i Jesus ma' eta nk'ehtic wach.

Re' ricorquilal, til ric'ul nak chi keh chi nakatobjic awu'um tak je' ricab xitobjic cho take toco̱m chic wich aj niminel pahbamaj take chi aj k'oro̱l ch'i̱l wo' take aj k'oro̱l pahbamaj take ru'um i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus. Chacoj tak rehtal re' take pahbamaj re're', xa pa' qui'o̱j chi rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios nquic'am je i quehq'ue̱n chiqui̱j je' ricab riban i ma' Se̱pas re' ribihnej wo' chi Luch eh chi je' re' ma' xa re' ta take re' quitobjic cu'um take nquic'uhbalej je' la' wo' to'bomaj wo' take ehq'uenbe̱s. Wi je' re' nbanaric cu̱c' take wich aj k'orol re're', ma' eta na riban chi je' wo' nak re' enbanaric ku̱c' i hoj chi ekojtobjic?

Raj on rik'orom chi xa re' ti hin ch'i̱l i Wernaweh ma' ric'ul ta chi keh chi ekojquetmejic cu'um take nkac'uhbalej take eh ru'um re' xa re' ti hoj quib wili curman chi keh chi nakacamanic chi risiq'uiric ritz'akil kawa' kaha̱'?

Chacoj tak rehtal i nanik'orom wili: Ma' jeno' c'acharel no̱j pan banoj sol chi ta nak re're' naritojbic reh chi'nchel i pa' bih curman chi reh chi naric'acharic wi̱'. Je' wo' ma' hab ta wach c'acharel re' wilic jeno' rac'a̱l tico̱j wach chi u̱wa ru'um, ma' ta nak eriban risukquil i wach ritic re're'. Xa ta wo' nak jeno' c'acharel je' ru̱c' aj ilol reh juntuhm ok chi me̱' ma' ta nak eriniq'uej reh i ri̱s rich'u̱ch' rime̱' riyitz'.
C'olok pan ac'ux tak chi re' c'ahchi' nik'orom wili ma' xa nicapew-bal ta i hin, til la' tz'ihmbimaj wo' cho chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh i Moyses.

Je' re' k'uru' ar chipam i c'uhbal re're' je' wili rik'or: “Nok c'ahchi' chi camanic aboyex ma' riban ta chi enabac' pan ju' pitbal riwa', nqui rik'or. Re' wili ra̱j na rik'orom chi re' Dios xa chiqui̱j take bo̱yex c'ahchi' ricapewenic?

On chiki̱j wo' nchel c'ahchi' rik'oric chi manlic? Til pa ricorquilal, re' wili chiki̱j wo' i hoj tz'ihmbimaj cahnok. Kilow aj tak ricorquilal wili: Re' c'acharel nc'otbic pa̱m ac'al ch'i̱l wo' re' nbanic i tic til nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chi na elok cho wach i tic, quicabchel naquehtric ru̱c' i wach i tic re're' maj je' re' ric'ul chi queh ru'um reh quicamaj xca'n.

Ru'um aj re' nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak, wi re' hoj re' kojk'oric reh riC'uhbal i Dios xkapuhcaj chana̱ tak i lok' laj ribiral i kAja̱w Jesus je' ricab nok jeno' c'acharel riban jok i tic pa rac'a̱l, ric'ul wo' chi keh hoj yu'na chi enkac'ul awu̱c' hat-tak i pa' bih curman chi keh chi nakiq'uic wi̱' k'i̱j je' ricab wo' nok ric'ul chi reh i c'acharel re're' chi na'elok cho wach ritic, ewo' riban risukquilal ricamaj.

Je' re' nca'n take toco̱m chic aj c'uhbalanel chi nquic'ul quito'bal awu̱c' tak ru'um quicamaj nca'n chaxilac tak eh wi je' re' nca'n take re', re' ta na chic i hin ch'i̱l take quito'bonic wi̱n chi c'uhbalanic ma' riwi̱' ta chi keh chi enkac'ul kato'bal awu̱c' tak? Raj la' i hin ch'i̱l take wich'i̱l chi c'uhbalanic to̱b ta til riwi̱' wo' nak chi keh chi je' re' enka'n, ma' janc'al ta xkabiraj kato'bal aweh tak. Re' hoj xkac'axquilej la' ritz'akil chi'nchel pa' bih keh reh chi ma' xwih'ic ta jeno' c'axquilal chi keh chi rik'ormojic i holohic laj c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Yu'na k'uru' ma̱k'or tak wi̱n chi ma' aweht'alim ta tak i ribiral chi re' hab wach i c'acharel nto'bonic chi camanic chipam i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios xa ye'o̱j wo' quiwa' quiha̱' on chi re' take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios ru̱c' wo' take pa' bih nponic ye'erok chiwach i lok' laj ye'a̱b c'atbal si̱ chiwach i Dios, ru̱c' wo' re' quiwi'c.

Ma' xa ta ar rik'or chi je' re', je' la' wo' re' k'oric xitak'a̱' rinimjic i kAja̱w Jesus queh nic' pa' q'uihal naquiniminic reh riC'uhbal. Re're' xik'or cho chi hab wach take narik'ormojic queh riC'uhbal, re' wo' take re' naquilbic reh take quik'oric reh c'uhbal ru̱c' pa' bih nca̱j pan quic'acharic.

Raj la' i hin to̱b ta wo' je' re' rik'orom i kAja̱w Jesus, ma' janc'al ta xnipahkaj ritz'akil nicamaj aweh tak ru'um nok ma' xwa̱j ta ca̱t nich'eyem tak ru̱c' nito'bal re're'. Xa ta nak chic yu'na nok chi c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam take k'oric wili, ma' je' ta re' niban ru'um chi ma' nwa̱j ta chi re' hat-tak naqui̱nato'bem tak cho ru̱c' rirakmajic ritz'akil pa' bih curman chi wi̱n. Je' re' nik'or ru'um nok chi wi̱n i hin k'e̱' tare̱t chi ma' eta quintobjic maj wi hin ta nak to'bomaj, sakbih nak chi wi̱n chi enicapaj niquimic ru'um nok enak nmak'aric wi̱n i risukquil nic'ux wilic wu̱c' chi rik'ormojic chi re' hat-tak xatniminic tak ru'um reh nicamaj i hin chaxilac tak.

Je' re' ajic nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi re' hin ma' eta niq'uihsaj wi̱b xa ru'um rik'ormojic i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus. Je' re' nik'or maj re're' til riwi̱' chi wi̱n eh til nicamaj chi nanibanam chiwach i kAja̱w Jesus eh wi ma' eniban i camanic re're' ma' nyuk'ej nchel ti'c'axic chi nina̱.

Je' wo' chic wi ta nak xa wu̱c' i hin xchalic rik'ormojic i c'uhbal c'ahchi' nik'orom, ta nak re̱t chi wi̱n chi enwuy'ej chi enye'eric wi̱n nisi̱ ru'um i Dios. Ra̱j wili til pa ricorquil, re' hin niban nicamaj ru'um nok weht'alim chi ma' re' ta wi̱n i camanic c'ahchi'qui̱n, reh la' i kAja̱w Dios re' xye'bic wo' wi̱n chi nanibanam i camanic xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiwi̱j chi nanibanam.

Raj wi ru̱c' rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios eriban chi nanic'ulum nisi̱, chaj bih jeno' nitojbal nwuy'ej? Re' risukquilal nic'ux chi re' hin niban canar rik'ormojic ric'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus queh take c'acharel chi ma' c'ahchi' ta nipahkam jeno' nito'bal queh to̱b ta nak ric'ul chi wi̱n chi je' re' eniban ru'um chi hin aj k'orol c'uhbal.

Til pa ricorquil, re' hin ma' hab ta wach nchopbic nina̱ chi je' ta nak hin cok raj camanom chiwach, xa re' la' nok wilqui̱n cu̱c' take ju'jun ch'uk chi rehreh wach quitinamital, re' hin xniban chi je' hin caj camanom chi ribanaric haj wilic nca̱j ru' je' ricab riban jeno' chopo̱j chi camanic ribiraj k'oric chiwach i ajabe̱s wilic cok wi̱'. Je' re' xniban i hin reh chi q'uihal take c'acharel enquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i kAja̱w Jesus.

Ru'um aj re' nok re' hin quinwih'ic cu̱c' take wich c'acharel ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' til nquiyew rilok'il i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, re' hin niban wo' wi̱n i no'jbal re're' chi riye'eric rilok'il i c'uhbal re're', to̱b ta nchel ma' nich'ica̱' ta nic'ux chiri̱j chi re're' enco'lonic keh. Je' aj re' no'jbal niban chi niyew wo' rilok'il i c'uhbal re're' reh chi re' wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel nanquilow i no'jbal niban ewo' nquinimej i kAja̱w Jesus.

Re' chic cu̱c' take c'acharel ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' ma' nquiyew ta rilok'il i c'uhbal re're', re' hin quinc'acharic wo' je' ricab c'acharic nca'n ru' chi ma' re' ta c'uhbal nchoponic kana̱ i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilic rajawric chi quina̱. Je' aj re' no'jbal niban reh chi re' take c'acharel ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel q'uihal wo' queh enquinimej i Jesus. Til pa ricorquil, re' wili ma' ra̱j ta rik'orom chi ta nak re' hin wilqui̱n lok chiri̱j i c'uhbal nchoponic nina̱. Ma'xta, re' la' hin wilqui̱n chi rehquen rajawric ric'uhbal i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi kana̱.

Je' wo' chic je' ricab nok wilic take aj niminel ma' ja' cow ta quicapew-bal ru̱c' quiniminic chiri̱j i Jesus, re' hin nikahsaj wo' wach nino'jbal eh ma' nimin ta queh chi cow haj wilic nwa̱j i hin. Je' re' niban reh chi k'i̱j wo' encowjic quicapew-bal. Je' re' k'uru' re' k'orel nic' pa' wach ricowil quicapew-bal take c'acharel, je' wo' re' risiq'uiric wach k'oric niban chi rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios queh chi'nchel tinamit reh chi je' re' equico'ljic jarub pa' take enquinimej i kAja̱w Jesus.

Je' aj re' no'jbal niban i hin ru'um nok nwa̱j chi riman chic take c'acharel enquinimej i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus eh chi quich'i̱l toco̱m chic aj niminel ewo' nic'ul ricuse'sbal i Dios rik'orom cho ribiral chi nariyeb.

Je' re' k'uru' chacoj tak rehtal i rehtalil nanik'orom wili chiqui̱j take c'acharel re' nquipaj qui̱b chi ajamanic chipam i jenaj ye'a̱b pajbal i̱b reh ajamanic. Re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi q'uihal take qui'oquic chi pajoj i̱b xa re' la' xa jenaj wo' ti nehchenic reh i si̱ nariban canar i pajoj i̱b. Je' wo' re' cha'n hat-tak, reh chi enac'ul tak i co̱ch ra̱j wo' riyeb aweh tak i Dios chayew ac'ux tak chi ribanaric haj wilic take no'jbal ra̱j ru' chi na̱banam tak.

Je' wo' chic, re' aj ajamanel re're' ma' xa ta nponic chipam i pajoj i̱b chi ma' ritik'a̱b ta ri̱b. Re're' til wo' naht ritijej wi̱' ri̱b eh chiwach take k'i̱j re're' resaj lok ri̱j ric'ux chi'nchel i nic' pa' nimal enpitbic reh pa ric'acharic chi ma' eta riban canar i pajoj i̱b. Je' aj re' riban aj ajamanel chi til naht ritijej wi̱' ri̱b xa reh ti chi narehcham jenaj si̱ re' xa nic' yu' niq'uic wach riholonquil, raj i hoj aj niminel cow kayew tak kac'ux chi rinimjic i kAja̱w Dios reh chi nakehcham i jenaj si̱ re' ma' jaruj ta eniq'uic wach rilok'il.

Je' re' k'uru' re' hin cow niyew nic'ux chi ribanaric take no'jbal re' nsukbic wi̱' ric'ux i Dios je' ricab jeno' aj ajamanel riyew ric'ux chi nariponic chipam i ye'a̱b k'oro̱j chi nariponic wi̱'. Je' wo' chic je' ricab riban jeno' aj pajol i̱b chi k'abisinic chi til reht'alim aj naricutum i k'abis reh rich pajol i̱b eh chi ma' xa pan te̱w ta ricut take k'abis riban, je' wo' re' niban i hin til niyew nic'ux chiri̱j take pa' bih holohic laj no'jbal ra̱j i Dios chi nanirakam.

Je' re' ajic re' hin til nic'ul i ti' ru̱c' niti'jolal nibakil chi ribanaric haj wilic ra̱j i Dios eh til wo' nik'ahsaj wi̱b chi ribanaric re're', je' ricab nok jeno' aj camanom ribiraj k'oric chiwach i ripatro̱n. Ru̱c' re're', re' nwa̱j chiri̱j chi re' nicamaj chi rik'ormojic i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus ma' eta no̱j chi k'e̱b eh chi je' re' ma' eta riban chi ma' ta enic'ul jeno' nico̱ch ru̱c' i Dios.

Yu'na was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel nwa̱j k'oric awu̱c' tak chiri̱j xc'uluric cho najtir k'i̱j cu̱c' take kama̱m kati't nok re' take re' xibehsjic cho ru'um i Dios chi c'olo̱j take chi ri'sil i jenaj sute̱n su̱tz' naxi'elic cho ar pan tinamit Eji̱pto chi c'amoj quibe̱h ru'um i Moyses. Chi'nchel take kama̱m kati't re're' xquilow i rinimal wach rajawric i Dios naxi-ic'sjic chipam jenaj rinimal ha', “Ma' laj Cak Wach Ha'” ribihnal, re' xteheric wi̱' jenaj be̱h ru'um i Dios chi ic'sbal.

Re' Dios xiban chi re' take kama̱m kati't xquip'ut wih'ic chi ri'sil rajawric i Moyses nok re' take re' xibehic cho chi ri'sil i sute̱n laj su̱tz' xwih'ic cho chi quina̱ eh naxi'iq'uic wo' pan yejal ha “Ma' laj Cak Wach Ha'” ribihnal.
Je' wo' chic nok re' take re' wilque̱b chipam i chik yu̱k', re' wo' Dios xquetbic queh chi cunchelal take kama̱m kati't ru̱c' i wi'c pan taxa̱j nchalic.

Je' wo', chi cunchelal wo' xcuq'uej queh i ha' xye'eric queh ru'um i Dios naxesmejic cho wach jenaj sakrehp. Re' sakrehp xelic cho wi̱' i ha' re're' rijalwachej i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric re' xihch'ilej take cho eh ru'um aj re', re' hoj nkak'or chi re' Dios q'uih ch'uk wach to'bonic xiban cho queh take kama̱m kati't.

Xa re' la' ru' to̱b ta je' re' xiban, ma' chi'nchel ta wo' queh take kama̱m kati't re're' xponic chiwach i Dios i no'jbal xca'n eh ru'um re're' xiban chi xiquimic je eh xa ar wo' pan chik yu̱k' xcahnic quiti'jolal.

Nic' pa' nimal xc'uluric cho cu̱c' take kama̱m kati't, chi'nchel re're' xc'uluric cho chi c'uhtbal keh hoj chi ma' riban ta chi enkac'ax wach ribanaric i ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal je' ricab xca'n ru' chi xa re' chic ribanaric i c'ahbilal xcotowej ribanaric eh ru'um re' xquic'ul i ti'c'axic.

Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak yu'na chi re' hat-tak ma̱ban aweh tak i no'jbal je' ricab xca'n cho ru' chi re' chic take xa pa' bih jaric wilic china̱ ac'al wili xquiyew rilok'il chi rijelow-bal i Dios je' ricab rik'or wo' chipam Lok' laj Hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios. Ar je' wili rik'or: “Re' take c'acharel re're' xi'oquic chi nink'ijinic, xquitz'uka̱' qui̱b chi wi'c chi ha'anic chiwach i quitiyo̱x tik'imaj cu'um eh chi je' re' xca'n wo' quiso̱n chi xa suk chic quic'ux eh chi xa ma' hab ta chic wach xpitbic queh, nqui rik'or.

Chi je' aj re', re' hoj aj niminel reh i Dios ma' riban ta chi enka'n keh i no'jbal je' ricab xca'n kama̱m kati't chi xca'n cho ribanaric i c'oyomal xa hab wach aj u̱c' eh ru'um reh i mahc re're', re' Dios xiyew cho ti'c'axic chi quina̱ cu rehtal ca'winak ik'ob wuklaj ik'ob lajc'ahl (23,000) chi c'acharel xiquimic je chiwach i jenaj k'i̱j.

Je' wo' chic, ma̱yew tak chi pajaric i Lok' Laj Ajabe̱s chi ribanaric i mahc je' ricab xca'n take cho kama̱m kati't maj wi je' re' nka'n i hoj, ewo' nkac'ul kac'axquilal je' ricab xquic'ul cho ru' chi xiti'iric cu'um take a̱k' eh chi je' re' xiquimic je.

Ru̱c' wili nwa̱j wo' nik'orom aweh tak chi ma̱ban tak c'uta̱j chiri̱j take chaj bih riban i kAja̱w Dios je' ricab nok wilic take cho kama̱m kati't je' re' xca'n eh ru'um re' xsacharic quiwach ru'um jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios tak'amaj cho chi quicansjic.

Nic' pa' nimal c'ulu̱j cho cu̱c' take kama̱m kati't, xc'uluric cho chi ye'bal rehtalil keh chi ma' eta nkatijej keh i no'jbal re're' eh je' wo' xtz'ihmjic cho take k'oric wili reh chi ru̱c' re're' nakak'ilim ki̱b i hoj re' c'acharic nka'n chiwach take cohlsbal wach take k'i̱j wili.

Ru'um aj wo' re' nik'or aweh tak wi hab wach jeno' aj niminel ricapaj eh rik'or chi cow ch'iclic ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios, chic'raj wo' ri̱b eh chiban chi k'u̱n ru'um nok ma' chi bih nchel ncalajic wi̱' pa̱m jeno' mahc.

Til c'olok pan ac'ux tak i wili: Re' hat-tak ja' c'ulunak ta lok chana̱ tak jeno' pajaric je' ru̱c' ma' ta nak xquicuy ransil toco̱m chic c'acharel. Xa re' la' nik'or wo' aweh tak i wili: Wi xc'ulic ok wo' nchel lok jeno' pajaric cow wach re' etiric'am tak je pan mahc, chach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chi re' Dios ma' eta wo' riyew k'ab chi re' hat-tak enac'ul tak jeno' pajaric je' ru̱c' ma' eta nacuy tak ransil. Ru'um aj re' wi xchalic jeno' pajaric chana̱ tak, re' Dios ewo' riyew awajawric tak chi enacuy tak ransil i elic chipam xa pa' bih pajaric ncutbic je pan mahc.
