Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak, til nipahkaj aweh tak chi chak'eb lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak take riye'eric quiwa'ric take xa pa' bih jaric nye'eric quilok'il chi jelow-bal i manlic Dios.

Re' hin weht'alim chi re' hat-tak wilic ano'jbal tak eh ru'um re' nok c'ahchi' nik'oric awu̱c' tak chiri̱j take capew-bal wili, nicapaj chi re' hat-tak etichol tak ribanaric ri̱j wi coric on ma' coric i c'ahchi' nik'orom.

Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak i wili: Nok re' hoj nkuq'uej i ri̱s u̱wa chipam i culc re' nkatioxej wi̱' i Dios, je' na wa'ric re' wo' riquiq'ue̱l i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric c'ahchi' kapuhcam chi kana̱. Je' wo' re' nankaxer i caxlan wi'c chi kawach reh chi naka'nam kawa', je' wo' na wa'ric re' riti'jolal i Jesus c'ahchi' kaxerem chi kana̱.

Chi'nchel re're', re' hoj nka'n chi xa jenaj kawi̱' xa je' na hoj ricab jeno' c'acharel manlic wach ro̱k k'ab, ma' je'? Je' re' nik'or maj to̱b ta wo' hoj q'uih i kojniminic reh kAja̱w Jesus, re' hoj ru'um chi xa jenaj wo' kawi̱' chi rinimjic i kAja̱w Dios xa jenaj wo' chi caxlan wi'c nkac'ux ma' rehreh ta wach

je' ricab nca'n take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' quik'ahsanic si̱ chiwach i Dios chi qui'ehtric wo' ru̱c' ritibquilal i chicop nk'ahsjic chi si̱ ar chiwach i lok' laj ye'a̱b c'atbal si̱. Je' re' nik'or maj re' haj wilic ncahnic reh si̱ nk'ahsjic, re' wo' take aj k'ahsem si̱ quic'uxbic reh.

Ru̱c' take k'oric c'ahchi' nik'orom re' hin nwa̱j nik'orom chi re' take tiwic k'ahsamaj chi si̱ chiwach take tz'akoj tiyo̱x, ma' k'e̱' ta wo' chic rilok'il chiwach take tiwic ma' k'ahsamaj ta chiwach take tiyo̱x. Je' wo' chic, re' take tiyo̱x ma'xta wo' jeno' cajawric chi quicuse'sjic take tinamit nquik'ahsaj quisi̱ chiwach.

Chi je' aj re' nwa̱j wo' nik'orom ricorquil aweh tak wili: Nank'ahsjic jeno' si̱ chiwach jeno' tiyo̱x cu'um take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, ma' xa re' ta take tiyo̱x nlok'onjic quiwach ar je' la' wo' take ma' tob laj uxlabal eh ma' re' ta nchel i manlic Dios. Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi ma̱ban juneht awi̱b tak cu̱c' take ma' tob laj uxlabal re' nye'eric quilok'il nanlok'onjic quiwach take tiyo̱x.

Re' hin enik'or aweh tak chi ma' eta riban chi etoquic tak jenaj chipam rinimjic kawa' kaha̱' nka'n chi c'ahchi' ric'ulic cho pan kac'ux i riquimic i kAja̱w Jesus eh ewo' chic toquic tak jenaj chipam take nink'i̱j nbanjic chi riye'eric quilok'il take ma' tob laj uxlabal. Je' re' k'uru' ma' eta riban chi je' ta nak ena'n awa' aha̱' tak nah rime̱xa i kAja̱w Jesus eh ewo' chic na'n awa' aha̱' tak chipam jeno' nink'i̱j re' c'ahchi' rilok'onjic wi̱' quiwach take ma' tob laj uxlabal ru̱c' quilok'onjic take tiyo̱x.

Wi re' hat-tak ena'n tak i no'jbal re're' xa ric'a̱ wo' i kAja̱w Dios enajohsaj tak xa re' la' nwa̱j nik'orom i wili: Til wo' na chic k'e̱' kawa'ric i hoj chi enkajohsaj ric'a̱ i kAja̱w eh chi ma' eta riyew cho jeno' ti'c'axic chi kana̱? Ma'xta, re' hoj ma'xta jeno' kajawric chi ripitiric rijosk'il i kAja̱w.

Coric ru' wilic aweh hat-tak je' wili nak'or tak: «Re' hoj tehlic ki̱j chi enka'n xa pa' bih nka̱j ka'nam, nqui nak'or tak. Til coric i nak'or tak xa re' la' nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi re're' ma' ra̱j ta rik'orom chi chi'nchel ta nak tare̱t chi banaric. Je' wo' chic, ma' ru'um ta chi tehlic chic awi̱j tak, ena'n tak ribanaric i xa pa' bih nawa̱j abanam tak eh je' re' nik'or ru'um nok ma' chi'nchel ta i chaj bih nbanaric ato̱b chi keh chi enkanimej i Jesus.
Ru'um aj re', re' hoj aj niminel riwi̱' chi keh chi nakac'acharic chi c'ahchi' kacapam ri̱j haj wilic i tare̱t chi banaric, ma' xa ta keh i hoj je' la' wo' chi tare̱t wo' chi queh i kas kacha̱k'.

Ch'i̱l re're' nwa̱j wo' nik'orom jenaj chic k'oric wili: Nok re' hat-tak no̱j alok' tak tiwic pan c'aybal, ma̱biraj tak cok wi nchel k'ahsamaj chiwach jeno' tiyo̱x on ma'xta. Je' re' cha'n tak reh chi je' re' ma' eta nwih'ic jeno' ch'i'c pan awa̱mna tak nachac'ux tak i tiwic re're'.

Pa ricorquilal ma'xta jeno' chaj bih ra̱j c'uxmujic ma' ta nak re' Dios xtik'inic reh eh ma' ta nak riyeb k'ab keh chi nakac'uxum. Je' re' nik'or maj pa riC'uhbal i Dios je' wili tz'ihmbimaj: “Chi'nchel i wach ac'al ch'i̱l take nic' pa' nimal wilque̱b china̱, re' Dios nehchenic reh chi'nchel, nqui tz'ihmbimaj.

Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak wi jeno' ok c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta aj niminel enyuk'unic aweh tak chi wi'c eh re' hat-tak nawa̱j tak ojic, hiy tak eh chac'ux tak i nic' pa' nimal enye'eric chawach tak. Xa re' la' ru' ma' chi bih nabiraj tak, reh chi je' re' ena'n awa' aha̱' tak chi ma'xta jeno' ch'i'c pan awa̱mna tak.

Re' cok ru' wi wilic jeno' c'acharel enk'oric cok aweh tak ar chi re' wi'c re're' xk'ahsjic cho chiwach tiyo̱x, re' hat-tak ma̱c'ux tak chic i wi'c re're' ru'um reh xk'ormojic aweh tak. Je' re' nik'or maj wi re' hat-tak enac'ux chiwach i c'acharel re're', k'i̱j wo' enajot' ricapew-bal ru̱c' ricapewjic chi re' hat-tak c'ahchi' amahcanic tak ru̱c' ric'uxuric i wi'c re're'.

Je' re' ajic nok c'ahchi' nik'oric chiri̱j i capew-bal wili, ma' xa c'ahchi' ta nik'oric chiri̱j acapew-bal hat-tak, til c'ahchi' la' wo' nik'oric chiri̱j ricapew-bal awas acha̱k' tak aj niminel chi ma' eta nayoj tak ric'ux. Til pa ricorquil, ma' ric'ul ta nak chi enipit ribanaric jeno' pa' bih nicapaj ribanaric xa ru'um chi re' jenaj wich aj niminel ericapaj chi ma' holohic ta c'ahchi'qui̱n xa re' la' ru' curman chi je' re' naribanaric.

K'i̱j wo' wilic jeno' aweh tak ericapaj chi je' wili: «Wi re' hin c'ahchi' nitioxem reh Dios ru̱c' i pa' bih c'ahchi' riye'eric wi̱n chi c'uxmujic, chaj wa'ric k'uru' chi re' hin enbanjic k'oric chiwi̱j cu'um take wich aj niminel chi c'ahchi' nimahcanic ru̱c' ric'uxuric i haj wilic xnitioxej chic reh Dios? nqui ricapaj. Coric nak nchel ru' i capew-bal re're', xa re' la' hin nik'or chi ma' je' ta re' ru'um nok re' hat-tak nawilom wo' tak ricorquilal nic' wach nachacowsaj ric'ux awas acha̱k' aj niminel.

Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak yu'na, wi re' hat-tak na̱banam awa' aha̱' tak on xa pa' bih jeno' bano̱j nawa̱j abanam tak, cha'n tak chi'nchel reh ok chi nariye'eric rilok'il i Dios ru̱c' quik'orbal take qui'ilbic aweh tak.

Je' re' k'uru' re' xa pa' bih na'n tak, ma' ncamanic chi jot'bal ricapew-bal jeno' awas acha̱k' tak je' ru̱c' awich ra̱' ri'sil cho on ma' re' ta awich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, on to̱b ta jeno' queh awas acha̱k' pan acomonil re' rimolom chic quiwach i Dios chi ritinami̱t.

Chac'am tak tz'eht reh nino'jbal i hin maj re' hin xa c'ahchi' wo' niyeb nic'ux chi risiq'uiric nic' wach nok chi'nchel take qui'ilbic reh chaj bih niban equitobjic ru̱c' quicapew-bal. Re' hin ma' xa re' ta haj wilic nponic chi niwach i nisic' ribanaric je' la' wo' re' haj wilic ncorsonic wach quic'acharic take was nicha̱k' maj ru̱c' re're' nwa̱j chi re' take toco̱m chic c'acharel ewo' nquinimej i kAja̱w Dios eh chi je' re' equico'ljic chiwach i ti'c'axic chalic reh.
Je' aj re' k'uru' chac'am tak tz'eht reh nino'jbal i hin je' ricab nok re' hin nic'am wo' tz'eht reh i no'jbal xiban i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, re' hin til nik'or chi k'e̱' tare̱t c'ahchi'ca̱t tak chi ma' niq'uic ta pan ac'ux tak take no'jbal xatnitijej tak wi̱' naxinwih'ic cho chaxilac tak eh xa c'ahchi' wo' ca̱t tak chi ribanaric take no'jbal re're'.

Yu'na wilic jenaj chic capew-bal nwa̱j chi na̱rakam tak chiri̱j eh re' capew-bal re're', re' chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re're' nchopbic quina̱ chi'nchel take winak eh re' take winak quichopbic na̱ take ehq'uenbe̱s eh re' Jesus re' wo' i Dios nchopbic cho na̱ ru'.

Chi aweht'alim aj tak chic re're', nik'or aweh tak i wili: Nanamol awi̱b tak chipam acomonil tak, wi jeno' winak aj niminel c'ahchi' ribanam riti̱j on c'ahchi' rik'orom jeno' k'oric xcojoric pa ra̱mna ru'um i Dios, re're' curman chi naresam lok i ripune̱t maj wi ma' je' re' riban, til c'ahchi' ric'uhtam lok chi ma' c'ahchi' ta riyeb rajawric i kAja̱w Jesus re' wilic chi rinahsi̱l.

Tz'a̱b ru' nok jeno' ixok aj niminel riban riti̱j on nok rik'or jeno' k'oric ye'o̱j reh ru'um i Dios, ma' riban ta chi re're' eriban i k'oric chi ma' ripoyom ta wach na̱ ru̱c' jeno' tz'ih je' ricab ocronak take wi̱' ixok aj niminel. Je' re' nik'or maj re' ixok aj niminel ma' ripoy ta wach na̱, ma' riyew ta wo' rilok'il i ribahi̱l re' wilic chi nahsil china̱, xa je' wo' na jenaj wach ch'i̱l jeno' ixok rik'at lok i rismal wach na̱.

Je' re' k'uru' wi re' jeno' ixok ma' ra̱j ta ripoyom wach na̱ chi tz'ih nariban riti̱j on narik'or jeno' k'oric ric'ul ru̱c' i Dios, sakbih chi reh chi enesmejic lok i rismal wach na̱ reh chi enoquic riq'uix'ic. Ru'um aj re' nik'or chi wi q'uixbilal chi reh chi ma'xta chic rismal na̱, cu re' aj ru' eripoy i wach na̱ nachiban riti̱j on nachik'or jeno' k'oric ric'ul ru̱c' i Dios.

Tz'a̱b ru' i winak aj niminel ma' ric'ul ta chi eripoy wach na̱ chi tz'ih on chi ericoj ripune̱t nachiban riti̱j on nachik'or jeno' k'oric ric'ul ru̱c' i Dios eh nik'or chi je' re' maj re're' rijalwachil i Dios eh re're' nc'utunic wi̱' rilok'il i Dios. Ra̱j nchel ixok curman chi re're' naripoyom i wach na̱ chi tz'ih ru'um chi re' rilok'il i winak ar nc'utunic ru̱c' ixok

eh re're' wilic rajawric china̱ je' ricab nc'uhtunic lok ru̱c' i ribiral xc'uluric pan ch'iquinbal cho reh chi'nchel nok re' Dios xitik'a̱' cho i winak ch'i̱l ixok, chi re're' ma' re' ta ru̱c' ribakil rijojol ixok xesaj cho i winak, re' la' ixok xtik'injic ru̱c' ribakil rijojol i winak.
Je' wo' chic, re' Dios ma' xitik'a̱' ta i winak chi ric'u'lil ro̱k k'ab ixok, re' la' ricorquil chi re' ixok xtik'injic reh chi nariwih'ic chi ric'u'lil ro̱k k'ab i winak.

Je' re' ajic ru'um chi re' winak wilic rajawric china̱ ixok, curman chi chipam take moloj i̱b na'n tak chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios, re' ixok naripoyom i wach na̱ ru̱c' tz'ih re' nc'utunic lok wi̱' chi re're' c'ahchi' riyeb riwa'ric i ribahi̱l re' wilic chi rinahsi̱l eh chi je' re', re' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios ewo' nsukbic quic'ux naquilow chi re' ixok c'ahchi' ribirinic k'oric chiwach i ribahi̱l.

Coric, xnik'or aweh tak chi re' ixok xtik'injic ru̱c' ribakil rijojol i winak xa re' la' yu'na chi wilco̱j chipam rinimjic i Dios nkeht'alij chi coric chi re' ixok curman chi reh riwih'ic i winak je' wo' ricab curman chi reh i winak riwih'ic ixok.

Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab chi pan pe̱t, re' ixok ar xchalic ritik'injic ru̱c' ribakil rijojol i pe̱t winak yu'na chi k'i̱j re' winak ru̱c' chic ixok nasjic, re' cok ru' re' ritik'injic ixok ch'i̱l i asjic riban i winak til ar wo' ru̱c' i Dios nchalic.
Chi je' re' k'uru', cha'n tak ri̱j chi coric wi tare̱t on ma' tare̱t ta chi jeno' ixok eriban riti̱j chiwach i Dios chi ma' poylic ta wach na̱ nok re' hat-tak namol awi̱b tak chi lok'onic.
Coric ru', chi kaxilac i hoj, hoj ocronak chi q'uixbilal chi reh i winak wi xichamsaj i rismal na̱ je' ricab nok wilic i rismal na̱ jeno' ixok.
Raj ixok ma' je' ta re' ru̱c', ma' q'uixbilal ta chi reh chi eriq'uihsaj i rismal na̱ maj re're' rilok'il nok canamaj eh re' rismal na̱, re're' wilic chi je' jeno' tz'ih poybal i wach na̱.

Re' aj wili nik'or chiqui̱j take ixok eh wi wilic jeno' hab wach aweh tak ma' raj ta ric'amam na̱ i no'jbal c'ahchi' nik'orom je aweh tak, re' wili jenaj chic k'oric nik'or reh ru': Re' hoj re' pa'alco̱j ru'um i Jesus chi aj k'orol riC'uhbal ma' kak'orom ta aweh tak jeno' toco̱m chic no'jbal chiri̱j i wili eh ru'um aj wo' re', re' take ixok aj niminel chi quixilac take comonil aj niminel wilque̱b chi junsut tinamit nca'n wo' ribanaric i poyo̱j nahis nok nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic i kAja̱w Dios.

Chiri̱j chic take k'oric xnik'or lok, wilic wo' jenaj chic k'oric nwa̱j nik'orom je aweh tak. Ru̱c' re're', re' hin ma' eta nik'or je aweh tak chi holohic c'ahchi'ca̱t tak maj nibiraj chi nanamol awi̱b tak yojoj c'uxlis chic riban aweh i pa' bih na'n tak, ma' re' ta chic cowsonic c'uxlis riban.

Pe̱t k'oric nibiraj re' chi wilic take c'acharel c'ahchi' quik'oric wi̱n chi re' hat-tak nanamol awi̱b tak chi wi'c chipam acomonil tak, wilic i ch'i'o̱j i̱b chaxilac tak eh rehreh wach rilmijic awi̱b na'n tak. Re' k'oric nbiraj re're', nicoj wo' so' wach chi je' re'.

Chi wi̱n hin ta wo' na re̱t chi c'ahchi' ric'uluric awu̱c' tak re're' maj ar eneht'aljic ano'jbal tak chi xa nasic' wo' tak ric'uhtjic haj wilic take acomonil tak je' ru̱c' wilque̱b wi̱' take c'acharel re' til erich'ica̱' ric'ux i Dios chiqui̱j!

Ricab k'oric nibiraj re' chi re' hat-tak nanamol awi̱b tak chi wi'c re' nac'ux wo' tak wi̱' i caxlan wi'c re' nc'ulic cho wi̱' pan ac'ux tak i riquimic i kAja̱w Jesus, ma' re' ta chic riwi̱' i rinimjic na'n tak.

Nik'or chi je' re' ru'um chi nanac'am tak cho awa' aha̱' tak, pe̱t ti toquic tak chi ric'uxuric chi xa ma' nawuy'ej ta chic awi̱b tak, xa ta nak napuhcaj so' queh take awas acha̱k' tak i wi'c nac'am tak cho eh re' riha'quil i ri̱s u̱wa xa re' wo' hat-tak ti'uc'unic tak reh, ma' nayew ta tak so' queh take ma'xta bih wilic queh. Ru'um aj re' wilic take awas acha̱k' tak aj niminel quisoljic je chi ma' nca'n tak chic je quiwa' quiha̱' chi suk xa ru'um chi xa re' hat-tak nawa̱j ayeb awi̱b tak chi suk ru̱c' i pa' bih c'amoj je awu'um tak reh chi naric'uxuric nak pan junwachil.

Chaj wa'ric nana'n tak chi je' re'? Ma'xta na cho apa̱t tak chi ar enayew awi̱b tak chi suk ru̱c' awa' aha̱' tak? Re' na'n tak re're', xa esbal quiq'uixbilal take awich aj niminel tak re' xa niba̱' ti take eh ru̱c' re're' ma' c'ahchi' ta ayeb tak quilok'il. Ru̱c' aj i no'jbal re're', chaj bih nawuy'ej tak chi enik'or aweh tak? Nacapaj na tak chi re' hin xa echic nitioxej i Dios ru̱c' re're'? Ma'xta, til pa ricorquil ma' nponic ta chi niwach i no'jbal c'ahchi'ca̱t tak re're' eh xa ta wo' nak enitioxej i Dios ru̱c' re're'.

Ru̱c' i c'ahchi' ric'uluric re're', re' hin nwa̱j wo' chic nica'pechem aweh tak i tijbal xic'uhtaj i kAja̱w Jesus je' ricab xnic'uhtaj wo' cho aweh tak naxinwih'ic cho chaxilac tak. Re' aj wili tijbal re're': Re' kAja̱w Jesus chipam i chak'ab naxk'ahsjic pan quik'ab take raj ixowonel ru'um i Ju̱ras, re're' xichop i jenaj caxlan wi'c chi naribanam riwa' ch'i̱l take raj tahkanel

eh naxitioxej johtok reh Dios i caxlan wi'c re're', xich'ak yejal eh naxipuhcaj je chi quina̱ take raj tahkanel je' wili xik'or queh: «Chach'uy aweh tak i caxlan wi'c wili eh chac'ux tak re're' rijalwachej i niti'jolal nibakil re' naniyeb pan quimic chawi̱j hat-tak c'acharel. Re' ric'uxuric i caxlan wi'c je' ricab i wili, xa eli̱c wo' cha'n tak ribanaric reh chi naric'ulic cho pan ac'ux tak re' nanibanam chawi̱j tak, nqui i tijbal re're'.

Je' wo' chic, re' tijbal re're' rik'or wo' keh chi re' kAja̱w Jesus nok ricohlam chic riwa' riha̱', re' chic i jenaj ch'ihch' culc wilic i ri̱s i u̱wa chipam xichop johtok eh je' wili xik'or queh naxiyew wo' chic queh chi nacuq'uem: «Re' ha' tik'imaj ru̱c' ri̱s u̱wa wilic pan ch'ihch' culc wili, rijalwachej i niquiq'ue̱l re' narichihquic naquincansjok eh re're' naricamanic chi tik'inbal wach i jenaj chic ac' tik'inic riban i Dios. Je' re' ajic jarpech pa' na̱wuq'uem tak i ri̱s u̱wa je' ricab i wili, chawuq'uej tak reh chi ru̱c' re're' naric'ulic pan ac'ux tak chi xinquimic chi aco'ljic tak, nqui queh.

Ru̱c' take k'oric wilic k'uru' re' hin nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi jarpech pa' na̱c'uxum tak i caxlan wi'c eh na̱wuq'uem tak i ri̱s u̱wa chi lok'onbal wach i Dios, ru̱c' re're' c'ahchi' rik'ormojic awu'um tak queh take c'acharel ribiral riquimic i kAja̱w Jesus eh je' re' riwi̱' chaweh tak chi na̱banam tak cu rehtal nasoljok wo' chic cho rica'pech.

Je' re' ajic xa hab wach nc'uxbic reh caxlan wi'c on ruq'uej reh i ri̱s u̱wa chi ma' c'ahchi' ta ricapewenic chiri̱j chi coric chaj bih nelic wi̱' ric'uxuric re're' ch'i̱l ruc'jic re're', c'ahchi' rimahcanic chiwach i kAja̱w Jesus ru'um nok ma' c'ahchi' ta riyeb rilok'il riti'jolal ch'i̱l i riquiq'ue̱l xichihcaj chiki̱j re' rijalwachej i caxlan wi'c ch'i̱l i ri̱s u̱wa re're'.

Ru'um aj re' nik'or je aweh tak chi xa hab wach ra̱j ric'uxum i caxlan wi'c eh ra̱j ruq'uem reh i ri̱s u̱wa pe̱t k'oric til wo' chic'raj ri̱b chi re' ricapew-bal chiri̱j ok riquimic i kAja̱w Jesus wilic je eh cu re' aj wo' ru' chic'ux reh i caxlan wi'c eh chuq'uej wo' reh i ri̱s u̱wa re're'.

Je' re' chiban maj wi hab wach jeno' ric'ux i caxlan wi'c re're' eh ruq'uej i ri̱s u̱wa re' rijalwachej riti'jolal ch'i̱l i riquiq'ue̱l i kAja̱w Jesus, xa re' la' riban re're' chi wilic i ch'i'o̱j i̱b ru̱c' take rich aj niminel, re're' wilic pan yohbalil chi re' Dios riyew cho i riti'c'axic china̱.
Til pa ricorquil, ru'um chi re' Dios je' re' c'ahchi' chic ribanam, yohbal wach take yowa'i̱b wilic awu̱c' tak eh yohbal wo' wach queh ma'xta chic ransil co̱k quik'ab eh c'ahchi' quiquimibic je.
Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, wi re' hoj ekojcapewenic chiri̱j rinimjic wach riquimic i Jesus re' Dios ma' eta riyew cho ti'c'axic chi kana̱,

re' cok ru' xa nic' ok nchel re' kAja̱w Jesus eriyew cho jeno' ti'c'axic chi kana̱ hoj aj niminel ru'um i kamahc re're' je' re' eriban reh chi eritik'a̱' wach kano'jbal eh reh chi je' re' nachich'uk wo' k'oric chi quina̱ take ma' re' ta aj niminel reh chi ma' eta wo' kojriyew pan ti'c'axic quich'i̱l.

Je' aj re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel je' ricab nachamol awi̱b tak chi wi'c re' na'n tak wi̱' rinimjic wach ric'ulic pan ac'ux tak i riquimic i kAja̱w Jesus, chapuhcaj tak chawach take wi'c namol tak wach eh chawuy'ej wo' awi̱b tak chi je' re' hat-tak junwa'ic.

Je' ricab wi wilic jeno' aweh tak til k'e̱' ric'ahric, sakbih chi chiban cho riwa' riha̱' pa ripa̱t reh chi re' kAja̱w Dios ma' eta riyew cho ti'c'axic chana̱ tak ru'um i re' nanamol awi̱b tak chi ric'ulic pan ac'ux tak riquimic i kAja̱w Jesus. Chiri̱j xnik'or je aweh tak re're' cu wilic nak ru' toco̱m chic k'oric nwa̱j nik'orom je aweh tak xa re' la' cu re' chic nanik'orom aweh tak naquinponok wo' chic awu̱c' tak.

Yu'na was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, nwa̱j k'oric awu̱c' tak chiri̱j take bano̱j re' xa je' na chic jeno' si̱ riyew i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios chi enka'n. Je' re' niban ru'um nok nwa̱j chi re' hat-tak na̱weht'alim tak ricorquilal chiri̱j take banoj re're'.

Re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi coric chi nok ja' re' ta nak hat-tak aj niminel reh kAja̱w Jesus, timahcanic nak tak ru̱c' lok'onic tak tz'akoj tiyo̱x re' ma'xta bih jeno' c'uhbal nchalic ru̱c' i Dios nquik'or maj ma' quichol ta wo' k'oric.

Je' re' k'uru' re' pe̱t be̱h k'oric nwa̱j chi charak tak chiri̱j chi ma' hab ta wach jeno' c'acharel behsemaj ricapew-bal ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios erik'or chi re' Jesus sihtimaj laj c'acharel xa re' la' wach take quik'oric chi behsemaj quicapew-bal ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios til nquiyew quik'orbal chi re' Jesus, re're' i K'atal K'oric chi kana̱ chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel.

Yu'na chiri̱j chic take bano̱j nye'eric keh hoj aj niminel chi naka'nam nanik'oric chi je' wili: Coric ru' chi re' take bano̱j rehreh take quiwach xa re' la' xa ru̱c' wo' i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios nchalic riye'eric i ju'jun queh re're'.
Je' wo', wilic wo' rehreh wach camanic chi naka'nam pan kaniminic xa re' la' xa chiwach wo' i jenaj chi Lok' laj Ajabe̱s c'ahchi' kacamanic.

Je' wo', q'uihleh wach ric'uhtjic rajawric i Dios riban chipam ric'acharic i ju'jun chi c'acharel xa re' la' xa re' wo' i jenaj chi Dios riyew cho rajawric chi kana̱ hoj chi'nchel aj niminel chi ribanaric.

Jenaj chic k'oric nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak, re' k'oric re're', re' i wili: Re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios riyew keh i rajawric chi ribanaric ju'jun queh i holohic laj bano̱j reh chi re' hoj nakacowsam quic'ux take kich aj niminel.

Je' re' nok wilic take aj niminel xye'eric queh ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios chi ru̱c' t'ulic laj no'jbal enquik'or i c'uhbal ar nchalic rik'ormojic ru̱c' i Dios. Wilic wo' take xye'eric queh ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal chi naquisakomem wach i k'oric ye'o̱j queh ru'um i Dios.

Ru'um wo' i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios, wilic wo' take nye'eric queh chi til naquich'ica̱b quic'ux chi re' Dios naribanam jeno' lok' laj nawa̱l cu̱c' eh wilic wo' take aj niminel nye'eric cajawric chi quicowsjic take yowa'i̱b.

Ma' xa re' ta re' riyew i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios, je' la' wo' wilic take riyew queh chi naca'nam take rinimal wach lok' laj nawa̱l. Wilic wo' riyew queh risakomsjic wach take k'oric riyew cho Dios chi naqueht'alim take c'acharel. Wilic wo' take ye'o̱j queh chi naquirakam chiri̱j chajaric chi uxlabal wilic ru̱c' jeno' c'acharel wi nchel Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios on jeno' ma' tob laj uxlabal. Wilic wo' chic take riyew queh chi quik'oric pan tak toco̱m chic k'oric je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta quik'orbal eh wilic wo' take ye'o̱j queh chi naquisakomem wach i chaj pa' bih nquik'or take c'acharel quik'oric pan toco̱m chic k'oric.

Je' aj re' ru' yohbal wach take bano̱j wilic xa re' la' xa ru̱c' wo' i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios nchalic ribanaric chi'nchel re're' to̱b ta rehreh wach maj re're' nye'bic reh ju'jun chi c'acharel re' k'orel nic' pa' wach ra̱j riyeb ru'.

Nic' pa' wach nc'uluric ru̱c' kati'jolal kabakil hoj c'acharel chi to̱b ta q'uihleh wach tiklic wi̱' xa jenaj wo' nchoponic cho reh, je' wo' re' nc'uluric ku̱c' i hoj aj niminel chi to̱b ta nchel hoj q'uih xa re' la' xa jenaj wo' kawi̱' ru̱c' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Ma' k'orel ta chic wi hoj on ma' re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, wi nchel chopo̱j on ma' chopo̱j kana̱ pan cow laj camanic, naxkanimej la' i kAja̱w Jesus eh xkajic kaha̱' re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios xchalic wih'ok pan ka̱mna eh xiban chi xa jenaj chic kawi̱' i hoj juntuhm chi aj niminel.
Chi je' re' kawi̱' i hoj juntuhm chi aj niminel til je wo' ricab i kati'jolal kabakil re' q'uihleh wach ritikal tiklic wi̱',

kak'or ti chic chi re' okis eta nak nk'oric cho eh erik'or chi je wili: «A̱h! Re' hin ma' re' hin pa riman riti'jojal ribakil i c'acharel maj ma' re' ta hin k'abis, nqui ta nak erik'or. Xa ma'xta wo' nak camaj erik'or chi je' re', ma' je'? Je' re' nik'or ru'um nok til cu pa riman wo' wilic cho reh riti'jolal ribakil i c'acharel.

On wi ta nak re' xiquin erik'or chi je' wili: «Re' hin ma' re' hin nak' wachi̱s, ru'um re' ma' re' ta hin pa riman riti'jolal ribakil i c'acharel, nqui ta nak. Xa ma'xta wo' nak camaj erik'or chi je' re', ma' je'? Je' re' nik'or ru'um nok til pa riman wilic cho.

Je' wo' chic, wi ta nak xa re' ti nak' wachi̱s tiklic wi̱' chi'nchel riti'jolal ribakil i c'acharel, haj nak enchalic i rixiquin re' enbirinic wi̱'? On re' ta nak i xiquin tiklic wi̱' chi'nchel, haj nak enchalic i ju' re' enuhtz'unic wi̱'?
Raj wili chi'nchel xitik'a̱' i Dios chi coric, chi ju'junal take quicamanic reh kati'jolal kabakil xicana̱' take pa riye'a̱b re' k'orel pa' xilow chi tare̱t chi xicahnic wi̱'.

K'e̱' holonquil xiban maj wi ta nak chi'nchel tik'imaj take chi xa nak' wachi̱s on chi xa ru̱c' i xiquin, nic' nak wach nak'ormojok chi re're' jenaj riti'jolal ribakil jeno' c'acharel? Ma' nic' ta wach.
Je' re' ajic to̱b ta rehreh wach tiklic wi̱' riti'jolal ribakil jeno' c'acharel, xa jenaj wo' riwi̱' nok wilic ma' q'uih ta.

Ru'um aj re' ma' eta riban chi re' nak' wachi̱s erik'or reh nah k'abis chi je' wili: «Re' hat ma'xta bih hat camanel wi̱n, ma' nqui ta reh. On ma' wo' re' nahis eta wo' nak rik'or reh okis chi je' wili: «Re' hat xa ma'xta bih hat camanel wi̱n, ma' nqui ta wo' erik'or reh.

Je' re' k'uru' ma'xta bih jeno' chajaric je' ru̱c' tiklic wi̱' kati'jolal kabakil ma' ta nak chi bih camaj nok wilic maj re' ricorquilal re' pa' bih tiklic wi̱' kati'jolal to̱b ta xa ma' cow ta ti take nanc'uhtunic, re' take re' til camanel take chi keh.

Ru'um aj re', re' take pa' bih tiklic wi̱' kati'jolal kabakil re' nkacapaj chi ma' til ta ti curman take, re' take re' til nkaso'ej take chi coric. Je' wo' re' nka'n queh take kati'jolal re' nkacapaj chi ma' riban ta chi enkac'uhtaj lok wach sakom, til nkilow take chi coric,

raj take kati'jolal kabakil re' take wach sakom wilque̱b lok, ma' til ta ti ilo̱j chi coric ku'um. Je' re' nok re' take kati'jolal kabakil re' take xa pan c'olic wilque̱b cho, curman chi til wo' nkilow chi coric

reh chi je' re' ma' jeno' queh take tiklic wi̱' kati'jolal enquilow qui̱b chi ma' suk ta. Je' re' ajic, re' Dios xitik'a̱' take ju'jun tik reh kati'jolal kabakil reh nok chi xa jenaj quiwi̱' nok wilque̱b chi ekojquito'bej chi nakac'acharic chi suk.

Je' re' k'uru' chi xa jenaj quiwi̱' nok tikilque̱b take kati'jolal kabakil, wi wilic jeno' tik reh kati'jolal xcahnic chi ti', chi'nchel wo' kati'jolal wilic chi ti'. Wi re' hoj nkayew chi suk jeno' tik reh kati'jolal, chi'nchel wo' i kati'jolal wilic chi suk.

Yu'na ajic chi abiram tak chic chiri̱j nic' wach ncamanic kati'jolal, charak tak chiri̱j chi je' wo' re' chi'nchel i hoj aj niminel xa je' wo' na hoj ricab riti'jolal ribakil i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh chi kaju'junal i hoj wilco̱j re' k'orel nic' pa' wach kawi̱' no̱j ka'n chi je' hoj ricab i ju'jun tik reh riti'jolal ribakil ru'.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' Dios chi kaju'junal i hoj xiyew cho keh rehreh wach camanic chi naka'nam. Je' re' nok re' pe̱t xiban i Dios, xichih take c'acharel re' xca'n chi nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take raj tahkanel i Jesus. Chiri̱j chic ru' re' ricab, xichih take c'acharel re' xca'n chi raj k'orol c'uhbal re' k'orel haj pa' wilic ricoj pan ca̱mna rik'ormojic eh pa ro̱x re' Dios xichih take c'acharel re' xca'n chi aj c'uhtunel take k'oric wilic chipam riC'uhbal i Dios. Ma' xa re' ta re' xiban i Dios je' la' wo' wilic take c'acharel xiyew queh rajawric chi naca'nam take lok' laj nawa̱l. Wilic wo' xiyew cajawric chi quicowsjic take yowa'i̱b. Wilic wo' take xiyew queh i lok'il chi quitobjic take cas quicha̱k'. Wilic wo' xiyew queh i lok'il chi aj ilol take camanic chipam ricamaj i Dios. Je' wo', wilic wo' xiyew queh i lok'il chi naquik'oric pan toco̱m chic k'oric je' ru̱c' ma' quitijem ta ri̱j.

Ru̱c' rehreh wach camanic ye'o̱j ru'um i Dios, ma' eta riban k'uru' chi chi'nchel take aj niminel eta nak nca'n chi nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj tahkanel reh i Jesus, on chi aj k'orol ta nak reh k'oric nchalic ru̱c' i Dios on chi aj c'uhtunel ta nak reh take k'oric wilic chipam riC'uhbal i Dios. Xa ta nak wo' eriban chi chi kunchelal i hoj enwih'ic kajawric chi ribanjic take lok' laj nawa̱l.

Je' wo', ma' eta riban chi ta nak chi kunchelal i hoj aj niminel enwih'ic kajawric chi quicowsjic take yowa'i̱b. Ma' wo' chi ta nak chi kunchelal enwih'ic ku̱c' i lok'il chi k'oric pan toco̱m chic k'oric je' ru̱c' ma' katijem ta ri̱j. Xa ta wo' nak chi kunchelal i hoj enkarak chiri̱j i k'oric nbanjic pan toco̱m chic k'oric reh chi nakak'orom queh take toco̱m chic kas kacha̱k'.

Til pan coric til rehreh quiwach take bano̱j nye'eric keh hoj aj niminel chi naka'nam eh chi je' re' quiwi̱', til cow chayew ac'ux tak chiri̱j i ribanaric i ju'jun queh take bano̱j re' nacapaj tak re're', chi til naricamanic aweh hat eh je' wo' chi encamanic to'bal queh take awas acha̱k' tak aj niminel. Chi'nchel take re're' k'e̱' tare̱t take chi banaric xa re' la' nwa̱j wo' nik'orom aweh tak chi wilic jenaj chic no'jbal re' til k'e̱' wo' chic tare̱t chiwach chi'nchel eh re're' nwa̱j nic'uhtam aweh tak yu'na.

Chi je' aj re', yu'na chiri̱j chic wili nanik'oric: Kak'or ti chic, wi ta nak re' hin quinchol ta nak k'oric chipam i jarch'uk pa' chi k'oric quik'oric wi̱' take c'acharel china̱ ac'al wili on quinchol ta wo' nak k'oric chipam quik'orbal take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios pan taxa̱j xa re' la' ma'xta ok c'axoj i̱b pan wa̱mna, xa ma'xta bih ritik wi̱n chi quinchol take rehreh wach k'oric re're' maj re' nik'orbal riban xa je' na ricab i ahnic riban jeno' ch'ihch' nank'ojoric, on je' ricab jeno' coten laj ch'ihch' nquicoj take aj k'ojonel wi nquik'oj chi ma'xta ricorquilal.

Je' wo', wi re' hin ye'o̱j ta nak wi̱n ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal chi risakomsjic wach take k'oric riyew cho i Dios chi naqueht'alim take c'acharel on ye'o̱j ta wo' nak wi̱n chi rirakmajic chiri̱j take no'jbal poyo̱j wach ru'um i Dios on re' ma' nquirak ta chiri̱j take toco̱m chic c'acharel, xa ma'xta bih eritik wi̱n mi ma'xta c'axoj i̱b pan wa̱mna. Je' wo' re' wi ye'o̱j ta wo' nak wi̱n chi til k'e̱' wo' chic nim wach nicapew-bal chi rich'iquinjic nic'ux chiri̱j i Dios chi nanik'or reh jeno' yu̱k' chi narelic je pa riye'a̱b chi junc'am wo' ti enelic je, xa ma'xta wo' bih eritik wi̱n. Chi je' re' k'uru' xa ma'xta so' ritz'akil take nic' pa' nimal eniban.

Je' wo' chic, kak'or wi re' hin enpuhcaj chi'nchel pa' bih wilic wi̱n chi quina̱ c'acharel c'axic ti nca'n eh ewo' nak nicana̱' wi̱b chi enca'n ti'c'axic wi̱n ru'um chi re' hin nitahkej i Jesus, xa re' la' ru' ma'xta ok c'axoj i̱b pa̱m wa̱mna, xa ma'xta wo' bih eritik wi̱n ribanaric re're'.

Ru'um aj re', re' wilic c'axoj i̱b pa ra̱mna ra̱j rik'orom chi re're' ma' xa mahnic' ta ti chi c'a̱ ru̱c' ras richa̱k', wilic la' ruyu'nbal chi ricuyuric mahc ru'um wilic cho quetelenic wachi̱s pa ra̱mna. Je' wo', re're' ma'xta wo' cho ixowonic i̱b pa ra̱mna, ma' k'itk'it ta eh ma' k'e̱' ta wo' riq'uihsaj ri̱b.

Re' wilic i c'axoj i̱b pa ra̱mna ma' eta riban i ra̱j ma' ra̱j banaric ru̱c' i ras richa̱k'. Ma' eta wo' risic' ribanaric take no'jbal ma' nponic ta chi quiwach take ras richa̱k', re' la' haj wilic nponic wo' chi quiwach ru' riban ribanaric. Je' wo', ma' ncakcatic ta cu̱c' take ras richa̱k' eh ma' ric'ol ta c'a̱ pa ra̱mna.
Je' wo', re're' ma' wo' nsukbic ta ric'ux nok jeno' ras richa̱k' riban i c'ahbilal, re' la' ribanaric i coric wach no'jbal nsukbic wi̱' ric'ux.

Je' re' k'uru' re' wilic i c'axoj i̱b pa ra̱mna ricuy ransil take pa' bih ti' nbanaric reh, ricoj wach i k'oric riban i Dios, xa ch'iclic wo' ric'ux chiri̱j i ras richa̱k' chi naribanam i coric eh xa wilic wo' rik'uni̱l chi ricuyuric take c'axquilal.

Ru̱c' aj take k'oric re're' nik'or aweh tak chi re' c'axoj i̱b ma' c'uhlel ma' sahchel ta wach, ra̱j nchel take bano̱j re' ye'o̱j cho keh hoj aj niminel ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal chi naka'nam re' take re' nariponic i rik'ijil chi ma'eta chic quicamanic keh je' ricab take i lok'il chi rik'ormojic take k'oric ra̱j i Dios chi naqueht'alim take c'acharel, on re' lok'il chi k'oric pan tak toco̱m chic k'oric on re' lok'il chi rinabjic pa̱m take no'jbal cha̱m pa̱m rinabjic qui̱j.
Yu'na re' take re're' quicamanic keh maj ma' chi'nchel ta wo' i no'jbal riyew cho keh i Dios chi nabjic eh je' wo' chic re' hoj ma' nkarak ta wo' chiri̱j chi'nchel i no'jbal reht'alim i Dios,
raj ru' namanlajok wach ricamaj i Dios pan kac'acharic narirakmajic chic chiri̱j re're'. Ar aj ru' ma'xta chic quicamanic keh take no'jbal re' ma' nrakmajic ta nak chiri̱j chi manlic.

Re' k'oro̱j cho re're' nsakomjic wach nok re' hoj kojwinakbic. Je' re' nik'or maj nok cu pan ka-uxal nak wilco̱j cho re' k'oric nka'n ch'i̱l i capewenic nka'n eh ch'i̱l wo' i no'jbal nka'n chi rich'ukuric wach i xa pa' bih nkac'ul, nka'n je' ricab riwi̱' rino'jbal jeno' aj ux, xa re' la' naxojwinakbic xo̱j kacana̱' lok chi'nchel i no'jbal re're'.

Nic' pa' wach nc'uluric ru̱c' ka-uxal je' wo' re' nkac'ul ru̱c' kaniminic. Je' wo' chic, re' keht'alim chiri̱j kaniminic yu'na xa je' na ricab i rina̱ch jeno' c'acharel c'ahchi' kilom je pan jeno' lemuh. Re' cok ru' nakojponok ar pan taxa̱j, cu re' aj ru' nakarakam chiri̱j chi'nchel. Ar naric'uluric xa je' na ricab chi c'ahchi' kac'u'lem ki̱b chi c'uta̱j ru̱c' jeno' c'acharel. Je' re' nik'or maj cu yu'na, re' hoj ma' chi'nchel ta pe nkarak chic chiri̱j re' haj wilic ra̱j i Dios chi nakeht'alim, xa re' la' nakana'bej nic' wach reht'aljic kana̱ riban i Dios til nakeht'alim wo' chi'nchel i no'jbal wilic ru̱c' i Dios.

Je' re' k'uru', re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi wilic xib wach no'jbal re' curman chi nakatikim ju' ribanaric: Re' rich'iquinjic c'uxlis chiri̱j rinimjic i Dios, re' ripahba̱bjic kac'ux chi ruyu'njic take pa' bih k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios chi nariyeb eh je' wo' re' ric'axaric ki̱b chi kibil ki̱b pan junwachil. Chi quixilac aj i oxchel wili, re' til k'e̱' nim wach riwa'ric eh re' til k'e̱' curman chi keh chi nakac'amam na̱, re' i c'axoj i̱b chi kibil ki̱b pan junwachil.

Til k'e̱' curman chaweh tak k'uru' chi ma̱cana̱' tak ribanaric i c'axoj i̱b. Je' wo', til wo' chic chiban ji̱k' ac'ux tak chiri̱j ribanaric take bano̱j re' riyew i Lok' laj Uxlabal keh hoj aj niminel chi naka'nam. Je' wo', til k'e̱' wo' chic nwa̱j chi chiban ji̱k' ac'ux tak chiri̱j i rik'ormojic take k'oric riyew i Dios chi nareht'aljic cu'um take c'acharel.

Je' re' nik'or maj aweht'alim tak chi xa hab wach aj niminel ye'o̱j reh chi narik'oric pan toco̱m chic k'oric je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta rik'orbal, re're' ma' xa ta ru̱c' jeno' rich c'acharel nchol k'oric, je' la' wo' nchol k'oric ru̱c' i Dios. Til pa ricorquilal nok k'oric riban ru̱c' i Dios, wi re' take k'oric riban ma' ja' sakomomaj ta wo' wach queh take birinel ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal, ma' hab ta wach queh quibirinic reh enrakbic chiri̱j i rik'or i aj niminel re're'.

Tz'a̱b ru' wi re' take k'oric ye'o̱j ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios nsakomjic wach queh take aj birinel nok nquibiraj, re' aj niminel re're' ru̱c' k'oric riban narito'bem take rich aj niminel quibirinic reh chi ricowsjic quic'ux. Ma' xa ta re're' naribanam, je' la' wo' narik'ilim take eh nariyeb wo' ricowil quicapew-bal chi ricuyuric ransil take ti'c'axic.

Je' re' ajic wi re' ye'o̱j reh chi narik'oric pan tak toco̱m chic k'oric xa re' wach reh ru' nsakomjic wach take k'oric ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal, re' aj niminel re're' xa chi ribil wo' ri̱b c'ahchi' ricowsam ric'ux, tz'a̱b ru' re' nrakbic chiri̱j haj wilic take k'oric ra̱j riyeb i Dios eh risakomej lok wach queh take quibirinic reh re' aj niminel re're', re' wo' take i rich aj niminel ricowsaj quic'ux ru̱c' take k'oric riban.

Chi wi̱n hin k'e̱' nak holonquil eh k'e̱' nak nponic chi niwach chi chawunchelal hat-tak etik'oric tak pan tak toco̱m chic k'oric, xa re' la' til k'e̱' wo' chic tare̱t wi re' hat-tak tichol wo' tak risakomsjic wach take k'oric ra̱j riyeb i Dios chi nareht'aljic cu'um take c'acharel. Je' re' nik'or maj re' risakomsjic lok wach i k'oric ra̱j riyeb chi eht'aljic i kAja̱w Dios k'e̱' wo' chic lok' chiwach chi na̱cholic k'oric pan tak toco̱m chic k'oric. Ru̱c' wili ma' nwa̱j ta nik'orom chi re' k'oric pan tak toco̱m chic k'oric ma' ta nak chi rilok'il. Ma' je' ta re', wilic la' wo' rilok'il xa re' la' ru' curman chi re' c'acharel nk'oric pan toco̱m k'oric ewo' risakomej wach i k'oric ric'ul chi queh take rich aj niminel eh chi je' re' ewo' ncowjic quic'ux ru̱c' take k'oric enquibiraj.

Yu'na was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel chacoj tak rehtal i jenaj rehtalil nanicojom wili. Kak'or ti chic chi re' hin equino̱j c'olok awu̱c' tak eh equinoquic chi k'oric pan toco̱m chic k'oric chaxilac tak. Wi ma' nsakomjic wach aweh tak take k'oric re're', chaj bih etirito'bej tak wi̱' i chaj bih enik'or re're'? Ma'xta bih, maje'? Re' k'e̱' wo' chic tare̱t k'uru' chi re' hin enisakomej wach aweh tak i chaj bih jeno' no'jbal eriyew wi̱n i Dios chi eht'aljic, on chi enik'or aweh tak jeno' k'oric ra̱j i Dios chi na̱weht'alim tak, on chi enik'or aweh tak jeno' c'uhbal hin tijimaj wi̱', maje'? Je' re' nik'or maj ru̱c' niban re're', re' hat-tak til encowjic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Dios.

Je' re' k'uru' wi re' hin equink'oric pan toco̱m chic k'oric xa re' la' ru' ma' nisakomej wach take k'oric re're', xa ma'xta bih camaj eniban maj enak nc'uluric wu̱c' je' ricab nc'uluric cu̱c' take tz'a'bal reh esbal bi̱ch je' ricab i caxlan a̱j su̱b ch'i̱l i a̱rpa. Nansubjic pa̱m i caxlan a̱j on nank'ojmojic wach i a̱rpa, wi re' c'acharel ma' nchol ritz'a'jic i xa pa' wilic queh tz'a'bal re're', nic' ta wo' wach na'eht'aljok haj wilic i bi̱ch c'ahchi' resmejic cho.

Je' wo' re' nc'ulmujic ru̱c' jeno' sol re' c'ahchi' risubem pa̱m jeno' ch'ihch' laj su̱b chi riye'eric je rehtalil queh take rich'i̱l chi naquitik'a̱b qui̱b chi k'ak'anic. Re' take rich'i̱l i sol re're' ma' eta wo' nquirak chiri̱j chaj bih rehtalil c'ahchi' riye'eric je queh wi re' su̱b re're' ma' c'ahchi' ta risubjic pa̱m chi coric.

Nic' pa' wach nc'uluric cu̱c' take k'o̱j re're', je' wo' re' nc'uluric awu̱c' hat-tak natik'oric tak pan toco̱m chic k'oric. Wi ma' nasakomej ta tak wach take k'oric re're', nic' aj wo' wach narakmajok chiri̱j i chaj bih c'ahchi' ak'orom tak? Re' hat-tak xa je' na nchel xa pan te̱w c'ahchi' ak'oric tak wi ma' nsakomjic ta wach i k'oro̱j awu'um tak, maje'?

Yu'na jenaj chic rehtalil enicoj ru̱c' take rehreh wach k'oric wilic china̱ ac'al. Re're' rehtalil nicoj maj chi'nchel i hoj keht'alim chi ju'junal queh take k'oric re're', wilic ju'jun tuhm chi c'acharel quirakbic chiri̱j ru'um chi quik'orbal.

Kak'or k'uru' chi jeno' c'acharel c'ahchi' rik'oric cho wu̱c' parik'orbal eh re' hin ma' nirak ta chiri̱j i k'oric c'ahchi' rik'orom wi̱n, re' hin enik'or chi re' c'acharel re're' ma' re' ta wich nitinami̱t eh je' wo' re' erik'or wi̱n ru' wi ma' rirak chiri̱j i k'oric enik'or reh, maje'?

Je' aj re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' til k'e̱' nawotowej tak richolic ribanaric take bano̱j re' riyew i Lok' laj Uxlabal keh hoj aj niminel chi naka'nam, til nipahkaj aweh tak chi chiban ji̱k' ac'ux tak chiri̱j take bano̱j re' til encamanic chi riye'eric ricowil quic'ux take nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios.

Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak i wili: Wi jeno' hab wach nk'oric pan toco̱m chic k'oric re' ma' nrakmajic ta wo' chiri̱j cu'um take quibirinic reh, chipahkaj reh kAja̱w Dios chi ye'erok ta nak wo' reh chi nchol risakomsjic wach ru' queh take ras richa̱k' c'ahchi' quibirinic reh.

Kacoj jeno' rehtalil chiri̱j ribanaric i ti̱j. Kak'or ti chic chi naniban niti̱j, re' Dios eriyew wi̱n chi nanik'oric pan toco̱m chic k'oric. Re' ti̱j eniban re're' ma' eta wo' nirak chiri̱j maj ma' re' ta wo' nik'orbal c'ahchi' nik'oric wi̱'.

Wi je' re' nc'uluric, chaj bih ra̱j banaric k'uru'? Cu nanibanam na niti̱j on cu nanibichinic na pan toco̱m chic k'oric? Na̱c, eriban xa re' la' curman wo' chi nanibanam niti̱j on nanibanam nibi̱ch chi c'ahchi' wo' nirakam chiri̱j chi coric haj wilic i c'ahchi' nik'orom.

Kacoj chic jeno' rehtalil. Kak'or ti chic chi re' hat-tak na̱banam tak jeno' tioxonic chi rilok'onjic i Dios pan toco̱m chic k'oric. Re' tioxonic ena'n tak re're' ma' eta wo' narak tak chiri̱j ru'um chi ma' re' ta wo' pan ak'orbal tak c'ahchi' ak'oric tak wi̱'. Nok je' re' c'ahchi'ca̱t tak wilic ok jeno' awich aj niminel c'ahchi'ca̱t tak ribiram, re're' ma' eta wo' rirak chiri̱j re' chaj bih enak'or tak. Wi je' c'ahchi'ca̱t tak re' awich aj niminel tak ma' nic' ta wo' wach nachituna̱' ri̱b chi tioxonic awu̱c' tak, ma' wo' eta nak rik'or chi ricorquilal i tioxonic c'ahchi'ca̱t tak wi ma' sakom wach chi reh i c'ahchi' ak'orom tak maje'?

Ru'um aj reh ricorquilal re're', re' hin enik'or aweh tak chi nanatioxej johtok i Dios pan toco̱m chic k'oric, k'e̱' nak ru' tare̱t i tioxonic ena'n tak xa re' la' wi ma' rirak chiri̱j i c'acharel re' c'ahchi'ca̱t ribiram xa ma'xta bih encamanic reh chi cowsbal ric'ux.
Re' hin k'e̱' nitioxej reh Dios chi re're' xiyew wi̱n chi q'uihleh wach k'oric quinchol wi̱' k'oric chiwach i tichol tak wi̱' hat-tak,

xa re' la' re' hin nok wilqui̱n chi quixilac take aj niminel nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios ma' quink'oric ta pan jeno' toco̱m chic k'oric re' ma' nquirak ta chiri̱j ru', re' la' k'orel pa' wilic i quik'orbal quik'oric wi̱', re' wo' re' quink'oric wi̱' cu̱c'. Chi je' aj re' ru', re' hin k'e̱' nponic chi niwach chi enquirak chiri̱j chajaric c'uhtunic nwa̱j nibanam queh re' nichihim rik'ormojic queh chipam quik'orbal, to̱b ta xa quib xib ok ti chi k'oric quinchol rik'ormojic chiwach rik'ormojic yohbal wach pan toco̱m chic k'oric re' ma' nquirak ta chiri̱j.

Chi je' aj wili k'uru' wich aj niminel, re' hat-tak ma' riban ta chi re' ano'jbal tak ma' ja' manlic ta wach je' ricab rino'jbal jeno' t'uch ha'lac'un, curman la' chi naribanam chi til manlic chic wach je' ricab rino'jbal jeno' rijeb laj winak chi ncapewenic chic chi coric. Haj ti cok wilic til eriban chi enac'am tak tz'eht reh rino'jbal i ha'lac'un, re' nok chi re're' ma' no̱j ta ricapew-bal china̱ ribanaric i c'ahbil laj no'jbal.

Jenaj chic ribiral nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak reh chi enarak tak chiri̱j take k'oric xnik'or lok chiri̱j i k'oric pan tak toco̱m chic k'oric. Najtir cho k'i̱j nok re' take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ma' xca̱j ta quibiram k'oric chiwach i Dios, re're' xiyew rehtalil queh chiri̱j i ti'c'axic naquic'ulum cu̱c' take caj ixowonel. Ru'um aj re' chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios je' wili rik'or: “Re' hin Dios nanitak'a̱b je take c'acharel toco̱m quik'orbal chi ribanaric ti'c'axic queh nitinami̱t. Re' take c'acharel re're' naquik'oric pan toco̱m chic k'oric re' ma' queht'alim ta nitinami̱t. Naquik'orom nak ricorquil queh take nitinami̱t xa re' la' xa ta nak chi je' re' naquibirinic k'oric chi niwach, nqui Ajabe̱s Dios.

Je' aj re' ru' charak tak chiri̱j chi re' k'oric pan jeno' toco̱m chic k'oric, re're' wilic chi jenaj rehtalil queh take ma' quicojbic ta wach i kAja̱w Jesus reh chi ru̱c' re're' enquirak chiri̱j chi ma' wilic ta chi quina̱ ricuse'sbal i Dios. Re' k'oric re're' ma' re' ta nchel jenaj rehtalil chi queh take quinimanic reh i kAja̱w Jesus. Tz'a̱b ru' re' risakomsjic wach take k'oric ra̱j riyeb i Dios chi nareht'aljic cu'um take c'acharel, re're' til wilic chi jenaj rehtalil chi keh hoj jarub kojniminic chic reh Jesus eh chi ru̱c' re're' nquirak chiri̱j chi wilic chi quina̱ ricuse'sbal i Dios. Chi je' aj re' ricamaj, re' rehtalil re're' ma' re' ta nchel queh take ja' re' ta aj niminel take.

Je' re' k'uru' chacoj wo' tak rehtal i nanik'orom wili: Kak'or chi re' hat-tak nanamol awi̱b tak chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios, chawunchelal ok nchel toquic tak chi k'oric pan toco̱m chic k'oric re' ma' re' ta ak'orbal tak. Nok je' re' k'oric na'n tak noquic cok jeno' ma' re' ta aj niminel on jeno' c'acharel ma' rirak ta chiri̱j chi wilic take k'oric riyew i Lok' laj Uxlabal keh hoj aj niminel. Re' c'acharel re're' erik'or chi ma' suk ta pa̱m ana̱ tak ru'um chi ma' rirak ta chiri̱j chaj bih nak'or tak.

Re' cok ru' kak'or chi nanoquic cok i c'acharel re're', xa chaklic chic chi̱' riye'eric cho rik'ormojic take c'uhbal riban aweh tak i kAja̱w Dios chi na̱c'ulum tak chi queh ritinami̱t, chaj nak bih enc'uluric? Til pa ricorquil, re're' til enak nch'uk ric'ux ru̱c' take k'oric ena'n tak maj ru'um reh ak'orbal tak re' nayew chawunchelal hat-tak, naric'uhtjic reh ru'um i Dios chi pan mahc wilic eh chi ru'um re' nariye'eric cho ti'c'axic chi quina̱ wi ma' xipahkaj ta ricuybal chiwach ru'.

Chiri̱j chic re' nok re' i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios resam chic lok wach sakom haj wilic i mahc c'olic cho pan ca̱mna, re're' til narixuc'a̱b ri̱b chi riye'eric rilok'il i kAja̱w Dios chi c'ahchi' rik'orom chi til coric, re're' til wilic chaxilac tak.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, yu'na nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi nachamol awi̱b tak chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios re' take wili curman chi na̱banam tak: Wilic ok aweh tak aj c'amol na̱ bi̱ch lok'onbal wach i Dios. Wilic ok aj c'uhtunel reh riC'uhbal i Dios. Wilic ok aj sakomonel wach jeno' k'oric riyew cho Dios queh ritinami̱t. Wilic ok take quik'orok riC'uhbal i Dios pan toco̱m chic k'oric. Wilic ok wo' quijalbok reh take c'uhbal k'oro̱j pan toco̱m chic k'oric. Nic' pa' nimal naribanaric chi lok'onbal wach i Dios til camanok chi cowsbal quic'ux take awich aj niminel tak.

Je' wo' chic, wi chaxilac ok nchel hat-tak wilque̱b ok take aj niminel quik'oric pan toco̱m chic k'oric, tare̱t chi quik'orok, re' cok ru' xa quib on xa xib ok ti queh quik'orok eh til ok ca'n chi chaklic chi̱' chi quiju'junal. Wi xicohlaj i jenaj, re' chic i jenaj erip'ut k'oric xa re' la' ru' curman chi wilic jenaj chic aj niminel erijal i k'oric haj wilic c'ahchi' ribanaric queh take aj birinel.

Tz'a̱b ru' wi ma' chi jeno' hab wach c'ahchi' rijalbic i quik'orbal take quik'oric pan toco̱m chic k'oric, sakbih chi re' take aj niminel re're' ma' eta quik'oric pan comonil, quilok'ej la' wach i Dios xa pan quicapew-bal on nok xa cutquel wilque̱b chi lok'onic chiwach i Dios.

Je' wo' nwa̱j wo' nik'orom i wili: Wi wilic take aj k'orol reh take k'oric riyew cho i Dios chi queh ritinami̱t, xa quib on xib ok ti chi aj niminel quik'orok re' cok ru' ca'n chi chaklic chi̱' chi quiju'junal eh re' take toco̱m chic aj niminel ca'n ri̱j chi manlic haj wilic take k'oric c'ahchi' rik'ormojic.

Je' ricab wi wilic jeno' aj niminel tz'uklic cok ar eh enye'eric cho rik'orbal ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal chi rik'ormojic jeno' c'uhbal ra̱j riyeb i Dios chi eht'aljic, re' jenaj chic re' c'ahchi' rik'oric chi pe̱t, chicana̱' chi re' jenaj chic re're' enk'oric chi quina̱ take aj niminel chi rik'ormojic i k'oric c'ahchi' riye'eric reh.

Ru̱c' wili ma' nwa̱j ta nik'orom chi ma' ta nak eriban chi equik'oric chi'nchel take nic' pa' q'uihal quik'oric reh k'oric riyew cho i Dios chi queh take ritinami̱t. Eriban chi chi'nchel equik'oric xa re' la' ru' curman chi quiju'junal naquik'oric reh chi je' re', re' take quich aj niminel enquitijej i c'uhbal riyew cho i Dios eh ewo' ncowjic quic'ux ru'um reh take k'oric re're'.
Je' aj re' ru', re' take aj k'orol reh k'oric riyew i Dios, re' take re' equichol ribanaric ri̱j chi coric haj til ric'ul chi equik'oric eh haj ma' eta riban chi equik'oric.

C'olok pan ac'ux tak i wili: Re' Dios ma' ra̱j ta chi xa cha'n aweh i lok'onic naka'nam chi ma' chaklic ta chi̱'. Re' la' ra̱j ru' chi chi'nchel naribanaric chi chaklic chi̱' eh pan sukquil c'uxlis. Ru'um aj chi curman chi chaklic chi̱' i lok'onic naribanjic pan tak ju'jun comonil nquimol wi̱' qui̱b take aj niminel xa haj ye'a̱b,

nik'or chi re' take ixok quiwih'ic pan acomonil tak je' ru̱c' nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic i Dios, ma' riban ta chi etiquipit tak ru̱c' ribanaric jeno' pahkanic enca'n cok chiri̱j i c'uhtunic c'ahchi' ribanaric. Re' take re' xa quijutzic la' naquiwih'ic chaxilac tak eh naquibirinic wo' k'oric chiwach i quibahi̱l je' ricab wo' i k'oro̱j chipam i c'uhbal nchopbic kana̱ i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi re' take ixok naquibirinic k'oric ru̱c' chaj bih quitak'majic take wi̱'.

Je' ricab wi chipam jeno' moloj i̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios wilic ok jeno' ixok wilic jeno' pahkanic ra̱j ribanam, ma' eta riban chi eriban cok i pahkanic chipam i moloj i̱b re're', curman la' chi nasoljok je pa ripa̱t ch'i̱l i ribahi̱l, ar eribiraj reh haj nak wilic i pahkanic xa̱j ribanam chipam i moloj i̱b. Je' re' nik'or chi chiban maj ma' holohic ta nc'utunic nok jeno' ixok nk'oric chi quina̱ take winak chipam i comonil re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios.

Je' re' ru' nik'or aweh tak xa re' la' wi re' hat-tak ma' nawa̱j ta ac'amam tak na̱ i c'ahchi' nik'orom xa ma'xta bih xa̱j rik'orom. Re' cok ru' c'olok pan ac'ux tak chi ma' re' ta hat-tak xatmiksinic tak cho reh riC'uhbal i Dios eh ma' wo' xa re' ta nak ti hat-tak xatc'ulbic tak reh.

Je' aj re' k'uru' wi hab wach jeno' chaxilac tak ricapaj chi re're' jenaj aj k'orol reh k'oric riyew cho i Dios chi queh ritinami̱t, on chi re're' ye'o̱j rik'orbal ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal reh chi narik'oric chi quina̱ take ritinami̱t i Dios, ewo' ricoj rehtal chi re' nic' pa' nimal take k'oric c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak, ru̱c' wo' i kAja̱w Jesus xchalic rik'ormojic.
Tz'a̱b ru' wi ma' ricoj wach chi je' re' eh ma' ra̱j ric'amam na̱ i nic' nimal i k'oro̱j lok wu'um, ma' nbirmijic wo' ru̱c' i haj wilic nak k'oric ra̱j rik'orom.

Je' aj re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, chachop ac'ux tak chiri̱j i rik'ormojic take k'oric riyew cho Dios chi queh i ritinami̱t eh ma̱pit tak take re' nca'n k'oric pan toco̱m chic k'oric nok namol awi̱b tak chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios.
Re' cok ru' chi'nchel i pa' bih naribanjic chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios pan acomonil tak, cha'n tak chi coric eh je' wo' chic chi chaklic chi̱'.

Re' chic yu'na was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel nwa̱j chi c'olok cho pan ac'ux tak ribiral i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus re' nik'orom cho aweh tak. Re' ribiral re're', re' xac'ul tak pan awa̱mna tak chi coric eh cu yu'na chi k'i̱j xa cu pa'lic wo' ac'ux tak chiri̱j,

re' wo' re' nto'bonic aweh tak chi na̱co'ljic tak chiwach i ti'c'axic naquic'ulum take aj mahc. Je' re' eriban re' cok ru' wi xatik tak ju' richopjic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i nic' pa' nimal nik'orom aweh tak. Tz'a̱b ru' ma' xachop tak ac'ux, re' niminic c'ahchi'ca̱t tak naricahnic chi xa ma'xta bih ritik aweh tak.

Re' take pe̱t k'oric xnik'or aweh tak chiri̱j i ribiral xnic'ul re're' ru̱c' i kAja̱w Jesus, re' take wili: Re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, xquimic reh chi xcuyuric kamahc. Je' wo', chi re're' xquimic re' k'orel nic' pa' wo' wach je' tz'ihmbimaj cho chiri̱j chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios.

Ch'i̱l re're', nik'or wo' chi to̱b ta re' Ajabe̱s k'atal k'oric Jesus xmuk'unjic naxquimic je, re're' xucsjic wo' chic cho pa ro̱x k'i̱j riquimic nimbal wo' take reh k'oric tz'ihmbimaj cho chiri̱j chipam i lok' laj hu̱j re're'.

Je' wo' chic xnik'or aweh tak chi naxucsjic cho chi quixilac camnak, re' Jesus xic'uhtaj ri̱b reh ma' Se̱pas re' ribihnej wo' chi Luch eh chiri̱j chic ru' xic'uhtaj wo' ri̱b queh take pa reh chic pahbamaj chi c'amol quibe̱h raj tahkanel.

Je' wo', nok ric'uhtam chic ri̱b chi quiwach take pahbamaj chi aj c'amol be̱h raj tahkanel, re' Jesus xic'uhtaj wo' ri̱b queh take riq'uihal chi aj niminel re' ma' xa ta wilque̱b junik'ob ho'c'ahl (500) ok chi cunchelal. Chi quixilac take juntuhm re're', wilic take camnak chic take je eh wilic wo' cu c'achalque̱b.
Je' wo' xic'uhtaj wo' ri̱b chiwach i ma' Jaco̱wo eh chiri̱j ru' xic'uhtaj wo' ri̱b chi quiwach take chi'nchel pahbamaj chi nahsil c'amol quibe̱h raj tahkanel.

Ma' xa ta wo' queh take chi'nchel re're' xic'uhtaj ri̱b i kAja̱w Jesus maj cu xam be̱h chic xic'uhtaj wo' ri̱b wi̱n i hin, xa re' la' wu̱c' i hin xc'uluric je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' jeno' t'uch ha'lac'un re' c'axic naxc'ulic wach k'i̱j sakom ru'um chi ma' pa rik'ijil ta rasbal xasjic. Je' re' nik'or ru'um nok pan pe̱t be̱h cho, re' hin ma' xwa̱j ta nak ninimem i kAja̱w Jesus

re' la' chic i ti'c'axic xniban queh jarub pa' chi comonil moloj wach aj niminel reh Dios. Je' aj re' xinbanic cho i hin re' ma' nim ta ti niwach chi quiwach take pahbamaj chi nahsil c'amol quibe̱h raj tahkanel i kAja̱w Jesus eh ru'um reh take nic' nimal xniban cho re're', til ma' ric'ul ta nak chi wi̱n chi narik'ormojic nibihnal chi hin wo' pahbamaj chi c'amol quibe̱h take aj niminel reh Jesus.

To̱b ta wo' nak ma' ric'ul ta chi wi̱n i nicamaj ye'o̱j, re' Dios xic'uhtaj cho richak'lamil chi nina̱ eh xiquetelej cho wach nic'acharic chi naricamanic reh chipam ricamaj. Ru'um aj wo' reh rito'bal riyew cho chi nina̱, re' hin k'e̱' nim wach i camanic c'ahchi' nibanam chiwach xca'n take wich pahbamaj chi aj c'amol be̱h aj niminel reh Jesus, xa re' la' i camanic re're' ma' c'ahchi' ta nibanam ru̱c' xa wansil wi̱b, re' la' rato'bil i kAja̱w Dios nto'bonic wi̱n chi ribanaric.

Je' aj re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k', re' ricorquilal i c'uhbal chiri̱j ructic cho i Jesus chi quixilac take camnak ma' k'orel ta hab wach narik'oric reh, wi re' nchel i hin on re' take cho pahbamaj take chi aj c'amol quibe̱h aj niminel reh Jesus xik'oric cho reh. Haj cok wilic til wilic riwa'ric, re' chi, chi kunchelal i hoj raj k'orol i Jesus nkak'or ribiral i c'uhbal re're' eh re' wo' xacoj tak wach hat-tak.

Yu'na jenaj chic k'oric nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak: Re' c'uhbal nkapuhcaj rik'ormojic i hoj, re' wo' chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xucsjic cho chi quixilac take camnak. Wi til coric chi re' Jesus xuctic wo' cho chi quixilac camnak, chaj wa'ric k'uru' nok nbirmijic i c'uhbal re're' wilic take aj niminel chaxilac hat-tak quik'oric chi re' take camnak ma'xta chic cuctic cho chi c'acharic?

Chacapaj tak chiri̱j take wili: Wi til ta nak coric chi re' take camnak ma'xta chic cuctic cho chi c'acharic, ra̱j rik'orom chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric ma'xta wo' nak chic nuctic cho?

Wi je' ta nak re', ra̱j wo' nak rik'orom chi re' c'uhbal nkapuhcaj rik'ormojic i hoj chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh ch'i̱l wo' i niminic na'n hat-tak ru'um reh kac'uhbal, xa ma'xta nak bih eritik keh.

Je' wo', wi til coric chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, ma' ta xuctic cho chi quixilac take camnak, raj rik'orom chi re' hoj re' pahbamaj chi aj k'orol c'uhbal til hoj aj chucul aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios. Je' re' nik'or maj re' hoj c'ahchi' nak kak'orom chi re' Dios xucsaj cho i Jesus chi quixilac take camnak eh chi ma' je' ta wo' re' nk'oric wi̱'. Je' wo' chic, wi til coric chi re' take camnak ma' cuctic ta chic cho, ra̱j rik'orom chi re' Dios ma' xucsaj ta wo' nak cho i Jesus chi quixilac take camnak.
Je' re' nik'or maj pa ricorquilal wi re' take camnak ma'xta chic cuctic cho, til wo' nak coric chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric ma' xuctic ta wo' nak cho chi quixilac take camnak.

Je' aj re' k'uru' je' ricab xnik'or chic lok aweh tak, wi ta nak re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric ma' xuctic ta cho chi quixilac take camnak, xa ma'xta nak bih ritik aweh tak chi c'ahchi' animem tak i Jesus. Je' re' nik'or ru'um nok xa cu re' wo' nak i mahc wilic rajawric chana̱ tak ncahnic wi̱'.

Ma' xa ta re're', je' la' wo' wi ta nak ma' xuctic wo' chic cho i Jesus chi quixilac camnak, ra̱j rik'orom chi re' nic' pa' q'uihal take c'acharel xquinimej i Jesus nok ja' quiquimic ta je, xa ma'xta bih nqui chi xquich'ica̱' je quic'ux chiri̱j reh chi nacuctic cho ru'um chi quixilac take camnak.

Je' wo' chic, re' aj chic i hoj re' nkanimej i Jesus chiwach take k'i̱j c'achalco̱j wi̱' wili, ma' coric ta na chi re' hoj c'ahchi'co̱j chi niminic ru'um c'ahchi' kuy'em chi nakojquimok je nakac'acharic wo' chic cho ru'um i Jesus? Je' re' i kacapew-bal xa re' la' wi ma' je' ta wo' re' enc'uluric ku̱c', ra̱j rik'orom chi til wo' chic k'e̱' ti' keh ru̱c' kano'jbal chi quiwach take chi'nchel c'acharel. Je' re' nik'or maj ma' coric ta laj tijbal nak c'ahchi' kacojom wach ncahnic wi̱'.

Raj i wili ma' re' ta nchel chucuj laj k'oric c'ahchi' kacojom wach. Je' re' nik'or maj til pa ricorquil, re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xuctic cho chi quixilac take camnak eh ru'um chi re're' i rija'quil i pe̱t uctel chi quixilac take camnak je' ricab naricut cho pe̱t wach jeno' tic narirak cho rik'ijil i wachanic, re' wo' re' narucsunic cho keh hoj raj niminel chi quixilac camnak. Ru'um aj re' wilic i kuyu'nbal chi to̱b ta kojquimok je xa nakuctic wo' cho chi quixilac take camnak.

Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab nok chi ru'um reh ribano̱j i jenaj chi winak re' Aran xoj-ehtric quimic ru̱c' riquimic ru' je' wo' re' ru'um reh ribano̱j i jenaj chic winak re' Jesus xoj-ehtric wo' uctic chi quixilac take camnak ru̱c' i ructic cho ru'.

Ma' xa ta re're', je' la' wo' je' ricab nok chi ru'um reh ribano̱j i xa jenaj chi winak re' kaj najtir k'i̱j Aran xoquic cho i quimic chi kana̱ wo' i hoj, je' wo' re', ru'um wo' reh ribano̱j i xa jenaj chic chi winak re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xoj-ehtric wo' i hoj aj niminel chi nakac'acharic wo' chic to̱b ta nchel kojquimok je.

Chi je' re' k'uru', re' wili ma' ra̱j ta rik'orom chi hoj ta nak junuctic cho chi quixilac camnak. Ma'xta. Je' re' nik'or maj re' Dios chaklic chi̱' ucsunic naribanam cho. Je' re' ajic je' ricab nok chipam junseht ok chi abi̱x nmoloric cho i pe̱t rihk nelic cho, je' wo' re' ru̱c' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' re' nik'or maj re' wo' re' i pe̱t ucsumaj cho ru'um i Dios chi quixilac take camnak. Chiri̱j chic re' nasoljok wo' chic cho i Jesus chi kac'amaric, re' hoj aj niminel je' ru̱c' hoj chic camnak je nakuctic wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak je' ricab nanmoloric cho chi'nchel i jal nanbanaric cho i jach.

Je' wo' chic re' kAja̱w Jesus naribanam wo' chi re' take aj nahsil ma'eta chic nwih'ic cajawric chi quina̱ take c'acharel, je' wo' re' naribanam cu̱c' take nahsil chi quina̱ take ma' tob laj uxlabal. Ar aj ru' chi'nchel naricohlsjic wach. Je' re' nik'or maj chiri̱j re're', re' Jesus narik'ahsam pan k'ab i rAja̱w Dios reh chi xa re' wach re' enwih'ic chi aj nahsil chi quina̱ chi'nchel.
Je' aj re' naric'uluric xa re' la' pe̱t chiwach i re're', curman chi re' kAja̱w Jesus narichopom quina̱ chi'nchel cu rehtal riyew pa ro̱k take chi'nchel raj ixowonel.
Re' raj ixowonel i Jesus re' xam be̱h nariyeb pa ro̱k, re' i quimic.

Je' re' nik'or ru'um nok chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios rik'or chi re're' naribanam chi re' kAja̱w Jesus nariyeb pa ro̱k chi'nchel. Xa re' la' nok nk'ormojic chi chi'nchel re're' ma' ra̱j ta rik'orom chi re' Dios xcahnic ta wo' nak chi ri'sil rajawric i Jesus. Ma' je' ta re' maj re' wo' i Dios xye'bic reh chi'nchel chi ri'sil rajawric i kAja̱w Jesus.

Je' re' ajic chi'nchel nariye'eric chi ri'sil rajawric i Ac'unbe̱s Jesus eh chiri̱j chic ru' re're' naricojom wo' ri̱b chi ri'sil rajawric i Ajabe̱s Dios re' xcojbic wo' reh chi'nchel chi ri'sil rajawric ru'. Chi je' aj re' xa re' wo' i kAja̱w Dios naricahnic chi nahsil chi quina̱ chi'nchel eh ma' jeno' chic naricahnic chi ma' ta nak enwih'ic chi ri'sil rajawric ru' ch'i̱l i Jesus.

Yu'na ticapewenok tak chiri̱j i wili: Wilic na jeno' aweh tak erikahsaj riha̱' pa rijelow-bal jeno' c'acharel re' ma' xinimej ta i Jesus naxquimic je? Ma'xta, maje'? Kak'or wi wilic ta nak jeno' je' re' eriban, re' c'acharel re're' xa ma'xta nak bih naricamanic reh wi re' Dios ma' eta riyew wo' chic ric'acharic jeno' camnak chic je.
Je' wo' chic, wi re' take camnak ma'xta chic cuctic cho, chaj aj camaj nok re' hoj eli̱c i k'i̱j nkayew ki̱b pan yohbalil chi c'uhbalanic?

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, je' re' nibiraj aweh tak maj je' ricab nok quincapewenic chawi̱j tak ru̱c' richoporic ac'ux na'n tak chiri̱j i kaK'atal K'oric Jesus re' Ajabe̱s wo' chi kana̱, k'e̱' nsukbic nic'ux awu'um tak, coric wo' chi re' hin xa eli̱c wo' i k'i̱j niyew wi̱b pan yohbalil chi c'uhbalanic chi xa cuc'tak nak chic ma' quino̱j pan quimic.

Je' re' k'uru' je' ricab chi re' hin ayu' pan tinamit E̱peso c'ahchi' nic'ulum ti'c'axic cu̱c' take tinamit xa josk'onak chic take, je' ricab chi jeno' winak ripaj ri̱b chi peletenic ru̱c' jeno' josk' laj chicop. Chaj bih ritik wi̱n k'uru' chi je' re' c'ahchi'qui̱n wi pan jenaj k'i̱j ma'xta chic wuctic cho chi quixilac take camnak? Ma'xta nak bih, maje'? Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak wi til coric nchel chi re' take camnak ma'xta chic cuctic cho, sakbih nak chi wi̱n chi eniban risukquil nic'acharic china̱ ac'al wili je' ricab rik'or i jenaj k'oric nk'ormojic chi je' wili: “Kasuksaj tak kac'ux yu'na, ka'n tak kawa' kaha̱' ru'um nok chi kawach johtok ma' keht'alim ta chic wi c'achalco̱j eh chi je' re' ma'xta chic bih enka'n ribanaric, nqui i rik'or i k'oric re're'.

Je' re' k'uru' ma̱cana̱' tak chi re' take quicapewenic chi je' re' enquijot' acapew-bal tak, chacoj aj tak rehtal i jenaj chic k'oric k'oro̱j cho ru'um jenaj winak aj no'jbal naxik'or cho chi je' wili: “Xa hab wach jeno' c'acharel xa k'unk'un chic ch'i̱l jeno' chic c'acharel ma' holohic ta rino'jbal, eno̱j sahchok wach i holohic laj capew-bal nak wilic ru̱c' ru'um nok re' chic rino'jbal i c'ahbil rino'jbal winak eric'am tz'eht reh, nqui xik'or cho.

Je' re' nok ma̱cana̱' tak chi jeno' ma' holohic laj capewenic chiri̱j i cuctic cho take camnak eriban chi etimahcanic tak, re' la' hat-tak na'lajok aweh tak ru̱c' ricorquilal riC'uhbal i Dios. Je' re' nik'or maj chaxilac tak wilic take ma' ja' cu nquirak ta chiri̱j chi manlic haj wilic rik'or i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Dios re're'. Je' re' nik'or reh chi enoquic cho aq'uixbilal tak.

K'i̱j wo' nchel wilic jeno' aweh tak eriban take birinic wili chiri̱j cuctic take camnak: «Nic' chic wach nok re' take camnak naquic'acharic wo' chic cho? Wi til naquic'acharic wo' chic cho, nic' chic wach riwi̱' quiti'jolal nariwih'ic? Maj re' quiti'jolal nak wilic naxiquimic je k'ahanak chic, nqui ok nchel rik'or.

Til coric, re' nk'oric re're' til hamlic i memil laj no'jbal ru̱c'. Reh chi re' c'acharel re' je' re' nk'oric erirak chiri̱j chi coric i re're', chicoj rehtal nic' wach nc'uluric ru̱c' i tic. Je' re' nik'or maj keht'alim chi nok jeno' ija' ntiquiric jok, ma' re' ta wo' chic ija' re're' nelic cho wach sakom nantz'uhcric cho, xa re' la' chic rala̱s npok' cho na nk'ahic i ri̱j ija' re're'. Nic' pa' wach nc'uluric ru̱c' ija' je' wo' re' nc'uluric ru̱c' jeno' c'acharel nanquimic je. Je' re' nik'or maj ma' re' ta chic i riti'jolal wilic nak naxquimic je, ma' re' ta wo' chic re' wilic reh na'uctok wo' chic cho chi c'acharic.
Je' wo' chic, je' ricab nanbanjic i tic abi̱x on jeno' chic i ja', ma' re' ta nchel chi mu'u̱n chic nanatic tak jok til re' la' i manlic wach ija'
je' wo' re' nc'uluric chi xa re' wo' i Dios xtik'inic cho wach nic' wach riwi̱' i riti'jolal chi'nchel je' ricab riban cu̱c' take ju'jun chi tic mu'u̱n.

Je' re' nok ru'um chi chi'nchel xa pa' bih jaric tik'imaj ru'um i Dios rehreh wach ritik'injic bano̱j ru'um, re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi ma' xa jenaj ta wach i kati̱k hoj tik'imaj wi̱'. Je' ricab i hoj c'acharel rehreh wach kati'jolal quich'i̱l take chicop quejeb co̱k, pa reh wo' quiti'jolal take tz'iquin quirupunic pan te̱w eh pa reh wo' quiti'jolal take car.

Je' re' k'uru' re' Dios xtik'inic reh chi'nchel nic' nimal nkilow wach ayu' wach ac'al ch'i̱l wo' nic' nimal nkilow wach pan taxa̱j. Re' quiholonquilal take pa' bih tik'imaj ar pan taxa̱j toco̱m wo' chiwach take pa' bih tik'imaj chi reh ayu' wach ac'al.

Ru'um aj re', re' riholonquilal risakomil i k'i̱j ma' jenaj ta wach ch'i̱l riholonquil risakomil i poh eh ma' jenaj ta wo' wach ch'i̱l quisakomil take ch'imi̱l. Re' quisakomil take ch'imi̱l rehreh wo' wach chi quibil qui̱b ru'.

Nic' pa' wach nkilow ru̱c' take rehtalil xnik'or lok aweh tak je' wo' re' nc'uluric ku̱c' i hoj c'acharel nakojquimic je. Je' re' nik'or maj to̱b ta nchel re' kati'jolal wilic keh nakojquimic je xa narojic wo' sahchok wach, wilic jenaj chic ac' laj kati'jolal nariwih'ic keh nakojc'a'chok wo' chic cho.

Je' re' k'uru' nakojmuhkic je nkamuk'a̱' je jenaj ti'jolal ma'xta chic riwa'ric ma'xta wo' chic ransil, xa re' la' nakojuctok wo' chic cho nariwih'ic wo' chic keh jenaj chic ti'jolal lo̱k' chic riwa'ric eh ye'o̱j chic ransil chi naric'acharic chi junpech.

Je' re' ajic to̱b ta kojmuhkok je ru̱c' jenaj ti'jolal sahchel wach china̱ ac'al wili, ma' ticapewenic tak chiri̱j re're' ru'um nok nakojuctok wo' chic cho chi c'acharic nariwih'ic jenaj chic kati'jolal rUxlabal chic i Dios naric'acharic wi̱'. Ru̱c' aj wili til nik'or aweh tak wi ayu' wach ac'al wilic jenaj kati'jolal sahchel wach, til nariwih'ic wo' jenaj chic kati'jolal ma'xta risahchic wach ru'um chi rUxlabal chic i Dios naric'acharic wi̱'.

Pa riC'uhbal i Dios nkarak chi je' wili tz'ihmbimaj: “Re' pe̱t winak xtik'injic cho, re' Aran ribihnal, xc'acharic wo' naxye'eric cho ruxla̱b, nqui c'uhbal re're'. Ru̱c' re're' nkacoj rehtal chi re' jenaj chic, re' chic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi kana̱, xc'ulic c'acharok china̱ ac'al wili eh re're' toco̱m wo' chic riwi̱' chiwach i Aran. Je' re' nik'or maj re' Jesus xcahnic chi aj ye'ol reh junelic kac'acharic ru̱c' i rUxlabal ru'.

Je' re' ajic re' hoj ru̱c' chic i rUxlabal ru' nakac'acharic chi junelic xa re' la' charak tak chiri̱j chi re' c'acharic chi junelic ar pan taxa̱j ma' pe̱t ta nchel nariwih'ic chiwach i kac'acharic china̱ ac'al wili. Ma'xta, pe̱t la' nakac'acharic china̱ ac'al wili eh cu re' aj chic ru' nakac'acharic chi junelic ar pan taxa̱j.
Til c'olok pan ac'ux tak k'uru' chi re' pe̱t winak Aran xtik'injic china̱ ac'al wili xa ru̱c' wo' ac'al xtik'injic cho, raj i jenaj chic winak re' Ajabe̱s Jesus, re're' til aj pan taxa̱j.

Je' re' k'uru' chi'nchel i hoj c'achalco̱j china̱ ac'al wili, chi kunchelal wilic jenaj kati'jolal kabakil je' ricab xwih'ic reh Aran re' pe̱t c'acharel, xa re' la' nakojwih'ok ar pan taxa̱j, re' kati'jolal kabakil naribanam chi je' chic ricab riti'jolal ribakil i K'atal K'oric Jesus re' aj pan taxa̱j.

Je' re' ajic je' ricab nok re' Dios xiyew jenaj kati'jolal kabakil je' ricab riti'jolal ribakil i Aran re' pe̱t winak china̱ ac'al wili, je' wo' re' naric'uluric ku̱c' i hoj aj niminel re' Dios nariyeb wo' keh jenaj ti'jolal bakil je' ricab riti'jolal ribakil i kaK'atal K'oric Jesus re' aj pan taxa̱j.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, til nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi re' hoj nok chi cu wilco̱j pe chi c'acharic ru̱c' i kati'jolal chi cu quimic pe ri̱j, ma' jaruj ta enka'n canar oquic chipam i lok' laj ye'a̱b wilic wi̱' i Dios chi K'atal K'oric. Je' re' nik'or aweh tak maj re' ti'jolal re' sahchel wach eh k'ahic ri̱j ma' eta riban chi ericuy c'acharic chi junelic k'i̱j sakom ar ru̱c' i Dios.

Ru'um aj re' ajwal wach chi chacoj tak rehtal i jenaj tijbal c'olo̱j nak cho ri̱j ru'um i Dios xa re' la' yu'na xiteh wach wi̱n reh chi nanik'orom wo' aweh tak. Re' tijbal re're', re' i wili: Coric ru', wilic keh hoj aj niminel ma' ja' hoj ta camnak nachirak cho risoljic i kAja̱w Jesus, xa re' la' hoj chi'nchel aj niminel je' ru̱c' chi je c'achalco̱j chi je hoj chic camnak narijalmajic ti wach i kati'jolal

chi junc'am xa je' na ricab junmu̱tz ok i nak' wachi̱s naribanjic wi̱' re're'. Nok tiklic chic i Dios chi naribanam re're' je' wili naric'uluric chiri̱j nok re' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios ma' ja' quisubem ta pe pa̱m i quisu̱b ucsbal cho queh camnak: Pe̱t, je' ricab nok re' winak aj k'o'ronel queh tinamit risubej pa̱m i risu̱b ye'bal jeno' pa' bih rehtalil queh, re' take aj tz'e' wach re're' naquisubem cho pa̱m quisu̱b. Ricab, re' take camnak chic take je nacutic wo' chic cho chi naquic'acharic chi junpech. Chiri̱j chic re', xa hab pa' wach keh hoj cu c'achlic cu re' aj ru' narijahlam ti ri̱b riti'jolal.

Je' re' naric'uluric ru̱c' i kati'jolal i hoj aj niminel maj re' kati'jolal wilic yu'na re' cu sahchel pe wach eh cu quimic pe ri̱j, curman chi narijahlic wach ru̱c' i jenaj chic kati'jolal je' ru̱c' ma' sahchel ta chic wach eh ma' wo' quimic ta chic ri̱j.

Je' re' ajic nok re' riwi̱' kati'jolal kabakil re' sahchel wach eh quimic ri̱j yu'na, narijalmajic wach ru̱c' jenaj chic kati'jolal ma' sahchel ta chic wach eh ma' quimic ta chic ri̱j, narimanlajic wach ru̱c' i k'oric tz'ihmbimaj cho chipam riC'uhbal i Dios re' rik'or wi̱' chi je' wili: “Yu'na re' quimic ma'xta chic rajawric chi quina̱ take c'acharel ru'um nok re' rajawric nak wilic i quimic xye'eric chi pan ac'al ru'um i kAja̱w, nqui rik'or.

Je' wo' chic, narojic wo' elok wach i jenaj chic k'oric wili: “Yu'na re' quimic ma'xta chic rajawric chi kacansjic je chi junpech i hoj c'acharel. Je' wo', re' quimic ma'xta chic rajawric chi ribanaric ti'c'axic keh je' ricab i ti'c'axic ricoj i tzina'j nariban i ti'o̱j, re' la' rajawric re're' xye'eric chic pan ac'al, nqui wo' rik'or i jenaj chic k'oric wili.

Re' riwi̱' chi je' re' rik'or take k'oric re're', re' chi naquiquimic je, take c'acharel riwi̱' chi queh chi quiye'eric pan ti'c'axic eh re' chic i riC'uhbal i Dios ye'o̱j cahnok ru'um i Moyses xc'uhtunic chi je' re' nc'uluric ru'um chi hoj chi'nchel kojmahcanic.

To̱b ta wo' wilic nak chi kana̱ i quimic chi tojbal wach kamahc, til wo' chic k'e̱' rinimal nkatioxej reh kAja̱w Dios chi re're' xesaj chi kana̱ i quimic chi tojbal wach i kamahc xa ru'um reh ricamaj xiban i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' wich aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak, ru̱c' i chaj bih xnik'or lok aweh tak wili ma' riban chic ntuquic acapew-bal tak, chapahba̱' la' ac'ux tak eh ticowonok tak chipam rinimjic i kAja̱w. Je' wo' xa eli̱c ok wo' c'ahchi'ca̱t tak chi ribanaric haj wilic i camanic riyew tak chana̱ i kAja̱w xa re' la' c'olok pan ac'ux tak chi re' pa' bih camanic na̱banam tak chiwach i kAja̱w ma' k'ehbel ta, til wilic la' ritz'akil ru̱c'.

Re' chic yu'na was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, nwa̱j k'oric awu̱c' tak chiri̱j i tumi̱n re' c'ahchi' amolom tak wach chi quito'bal take kich aj niminel wilque̱b ar Jerusalen re' c'ahchi' quiq'uic pan jenaj niba'il. Nic' pa' wach tak'amaj rik'ormojic queh take moloj wach aj niminel wilque̱b ar pan tinamit Cala̱sya re' wo' re' tak'anic niban aweh hat-tak.

Eli̱c Tomincu' k'i̱j pan apa̱t tak, chi aju'junal hat-tak aj niminel chawesaj tak lok pa reh jeno' to'bal re' k'orel pa' bih xatricuse'saj tak wi̱' i Dios ru̱c' tumi̱n chiwach i xama̱na. Je' re' nwa̱j chi na̱banam tak reh chi naquinponok awu̱c' tak ma' cu re' ta chic chipam i junc'am re're' eriban naho̱l awach tak chi riye'eric jeno' to'bal pan comonil.

Je' re' cha'n tak k'uru' eh nok wilqui̱n chic ponok awu̱c' tak, xa hab pa' wach take pahbamaj awu'um tak chi nacojic cananel ato'bal tak moloj wach pan comonil, re' wo' nacojic chi c'ahchi' niyeb je nik'orbal chiqui̱j pan jeno' hu̱j chi re' take re' tak'amaj take je ar Jerusalen.
Wi til curman chi re' hin nawojic wo' ar Jerusalen, re' hin enwihch'ilej je take i jarub pa' take pahbamaj awu'um tak.
Re' hin til nawojic awu̱c' tak xa re' la' pe̱t nawiq'uic wic'ram take ponok take aj niminel wilque̱b pa riyuk'ul i Masero̱nya eh je' re' nanibanam ru'um chi riwi̱' chi wi̱n ribanaric re're'.

Re' cok ru', re' hin ma' weht'alim ta nic' nahtil nanicahnic awu̱c' tak, wi nchel cu rehtal niq'uic lok rik'ijil i c'uxic ch'i̱l k'elej jab. Nok hin ok chic wih'inak chaxilac tak ewo' na nchel ru' ncahnic chana̱ tak i nitobjic je ru̱c' pa' bih wi̱n reh wach nibe̱h naquinojok pan jeno' chic tinamit.

Chiwach chic i wojic yu'na ma' nwa̱j ta chi xa naca̱t chic wiq'uic wic'ram tak ponok, til nwa̱j la' chi nanicahnic so' chi naht chaxilac tak wi la' re' kAja̱w Dios eriyew k'ab wi̱n chi je' re' eniban.
Cu yu'na nanicahnic pe ayu' pan tinamit E̱peso cu rehtal niq'uic lok i nink'i̱j Pentecostes ribihnal.

Je' re' nanibanam ru'um nok re' Dios cu c'ahchi' riyeb cho k'ab chi q'uihal take c'acharel c'ahchi' nic'uhbalem take to̱b ta wo' q'uihal wo' take c'acharel nquik'ihtaj qui̱b chiwach i c'uhbalanic niban.

Wi chiwach take k'i̱j nok ja' quinponic ta awu̱c' tak i hin, xponic ok nchel chaxilac tak i kich aj niminel Timote̱yo, cha'n tak chi enwih'ic chi suk chaxilac tak. Je' re' nik'or aweh tak ru'um nok re're' ricamaj wo' i Dios c'ahchi' ribanam je' ricab niban i hin.

Ma̱ban tak chi xa ri̱j wach ac'ux i rilmijic ena'n tak je' ricab wilic aweh tak je' re' nca'n wi̱n, chato'bej la' tak ru̱c' pa' bih reh, reh chi nachitik cho ju' richalic ayu' enchalic chi suk ric'ux. Je' re' nik'or maj re' hin c'ahchi' wuy'em chi naric'ulic lok ch'i̱l take ju'jun chic kich aj niminel c'ahchi' quibehic chiri̱j.

Re' chic i pahkanic c'ahchi' abanam tak cho chiri̱j i kich aj niminel Apo̱los, re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi til xnipahkaj reh chi narojic chiqui̱j take kich aj niminel xichalic ar Cori̱nto xa re' la' ja' xic'u'lej ta pe na̱ wi̱n ojic awu̱c' tak. Xa nic' wo' na yu' nariponic awu̱c' tak re' k'orel jaruj pa' riyew je ri̱b chiwach ru'.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, xa ic'lic ok ana̱ tak chiwach take xa pa' bih erijot' animinic tak eh ru̱c' cowil c'uxlis chatik tak ju' rinimjic i coric laj c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus. Je' wo', ma' chi bih nayohlej tak eh chapahba̱' wo' awi̱b tak chi coric ru̱c' animinic tak.
Ma' xa ta re're', chac'ax la' wo' awas acha̱k' tak ru̱c' xa pa' bih na̱banam tak.

Jenaj chic k'oric nwa̱j nik'orom. Re' hat-tak aweht'alim wo' ta chiri̱j ric'acharic i kich aj niminel Este̱panas ribihnal, chi re're' ch'i̱l wo' take raj pan pa̱t, re' take re' i pe̱t aj niminel chipam i yuk'ul Aca̱ya ribihnal eh je' wo' chi til nquiyew quic'ux chi quitobjic take kich aj niminel.

Re' hin nipahkaj aweh tak chi re' take nca'n je' ricab i no'jbal riban i ma' Este̱panas ch'i̱l take raj pan pa̱t, til tibirinok wo' tak k'oric chi quiwach eh je' wo' re' cha'n tak chi quiwach take toco̱m chic aj niminel nca'n wo' ritobjic take kich aj niminel on take raj camanom i Dios.

Re' hin k'e̱' nsukbic nic'ux ru̱c' quitak'majic xa'n tak cho i kasbe̱s ma' Este̱panas, ma' Portuna̱to ch'i̱l i ma' Aca̱yco maj re' take re' xc'ulic ca'n ajelow-bal tak chi nitobjic ru'um chi ma' chawunchelal ta xa'n tak canar c'ulic wu̱c'.
Til aj k'e̱' risukquil nic'ux nquiyew eh nicapaj i hin chi ru̱c' i wili ewo' riyew sukquilal ac'ux tak. Ru'um aj re' nipahkaj aweh tak chi til chayew tak quilok'il take kich aj niminel re're'.

Ayu' c'ahchi' niyeb tak je chawach i sukquil c'uxlis nquiyew je aweh tak take c'acharel wili: Re' take rehreh wach comonil aj niminel wilque̱b ayu' pa riyuk'ul i A̱sya, re' kasbe̱s ma' Aqui̱la ch'i̱l i rehq'ue̱n re' Pirsi̱la ribihnal eh ch'i̱l wo' take nic' pa' q'uihal chi kich aj niminel nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic i Dios chipam i rimujbal ru'. Chi'nchel aj take re', c'ahchi' quiyeb je risukquil ac'ux tak ru̱c' richak'lamil i kAja̱w ricoj pan ca̱mna.

Ma' xa re' ta take re' quiye'bic je risukquil ac'ux tak, je' la' wo' take kich aj niminel wilque̱b chipam i tinamit wili nquiyew wo' je risukquil ac'ux tak eh re' chic chaxilac hat-tak ar, chayew wo' tak risukquil ac'ux chawibil awi̱b tak ru̱c' i chak'lamil nelic cho cu pan awa̱mna tak.
Yu'na was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, re' sukquil c'uxlis nitak'a̱' je aweh tak wili til re' hin ma' Lu̱' c'ahchi' nitz'ihminic je reh.

Chiri̱j chic i wili re' hin niban niti̱j chiwach i Dios chi je' wili: «Xa hab wach jeno' ma' ti' ta ric'raj i Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, chakahsaj cho china̱ i sihtbal laj ti'c'axic tiklic cho wach awu'um chi queh take ma' quibirinic ta k'oric chawach, nqui nik'or. Je' wo' nik'or i k'oric “Marana̱ta” chi ripahkaljic chi re' kAja̱w Jesus chalok ti chi yu'na.
Ma' xa ta re're', je' la' wo' niban niti̱j chi re' Ajabe̱s K'atal K'oric Jesus chiyew cho rinimal wach rato'bil chana̱ hat-tak was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel.
Je' aj re' ru' chawunchelal hat-tak was nicha̱k' re' xa jenaj chic awi̱' tak ch'i̱l i kAja̱w Jesus, til k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak. Re' wili nik'orbal awu̱c' tak.

Re' hin ma' Lu̱', re' Dios xiripahba̱' chi aj k'orol riC'uhbal chiri̱j i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh je' re' xiban ru'um nok je' re' i camanic xa̱j chiwi̱j chi nanibanam chiwach. Re' hin wich'i̱l i kacha̱k' pan niminic re' Timote̱yo ribihnal, re' hoj c'ahchi' katz'ihbanic reh hu̱j wili aweh hat-tak moloj wach ritinami̱t i Dios wilca̱t tak ar pan tinamit Cori̱nto eh je' wo' aweh hat-tak kich aj niminel wilca̱t tak ar chi junsut riyuk'ul i Aca̱ya.

Chipam i hu̱j wili je' aj wili c'alenenic niban je aweh tak: Re' ta nak rato'bil eh je' wo' i sukquil c'uxlis riyew cho kAja̱w Dios ch'i̱l i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' ta nak re' wih'ok pan ac'acharic tak.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel reh Jesus, kayew tak rinimal wach rilok'il i Ajabe̱s Dios re' rAja̱w i Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Ka'n tak chi je' re' maj re' Dios, til wo' chic aj quetelenel wachi̱s eh til wo' aj ye'ol ricowil kac'ux nok re' hoj wilic ti'quil pan kac'ux.

Je' wo' chic nok re're' xa c'ahchi' wo' riyeb cho ricowil kac'ux chipam chi'nchel kac'axquilal kati'quilal koj-iq'uic wi̱', re' hoj ewo' nkayew ricowil quic'ux take kas kacha̱k' aj niminel reh Jesus wilque̱b pan ti'c'axic on pan ti'quil c'uxlis, je' ricab c'ahchi' nic'ulum i hin chipam rinimjic i Dios chi ru̱c' i ricowil nic'ux riyew cho ru', re' wo' chic re' nye'bic nicowil i hin chi riye'eric ricowil quic'ux take wilque̱b pan c'axquilal pan ti'quilal.

Ru'um aj re' to̱b ta re' hoj c'ahchi' kac'ulum kac'axquilal ru'um reh chi xa jenaj chic kawi̱' ru̱c' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, ma'xta bih nka̱j reh eh je' re' nik'or maj nic' pa' wach nok nkac'ul ti'c'axic je' wo' chic re' nkac'ul rinimal wach rito'bal i Dios nchalic chi kana̱ ru'um chi xa jenaj chic kawi̱' ru̱c' i Jesus.

Ma' xa ta re're', je' la' wo' nok re' hoj nkac'ul take ti'c'axic ru'um reh rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i kAja̱w Jesus, re' Dios riyew k'ab keh chi je' re' nkac'ul reh chi ru̱c' i kacamaj re' hat-tak enarak tak ricowil ac'ux tak eh enco'ljic wo' ri̱j i ch'iquinic c'uxlis na'n tak chiri̱j i Jesus. Je' re' nok reh chi enarak tak ricowil ac'ux tak nanchal i ti'c'axic chana̱ tak, re're' ncamanic aweh tak chi cowsbal ac'ux hat-tak eh ncamanic wo' chi co'lbal ri̱j animinic tak chiri̱j i Jesus.

Re' aj re' riwi̱' chi nok re' hat-tak nacuy tak ransil i ti'c'axic je' ricab wo' cuyuj ti'c'axic nka'n i hoj, re' hoj til ch'iclic kac'ux chiri̱j i Dios chi re're' nariyeb cho ricowil ac'ux tak je' ricab wo' riye'eric ricowil kac'ux riban cho ru'.

Yu'na was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel reh Jesus, ye'bal jeno' rehtalil aweh tak nka̱j kasakomem wach aweh tak i ti'c'axic xkac'ul chipam riyuk'ul i A̱sya. Til nik'or aweh tak chi k'e̱' wo' rinimal wach ti'c'axic xkac'ul ar. Pan kac'ux i hoj ma' eta ta nak chic nkacuy ransil eh xa ta wo' nak chic c'ahchi' kuy'em chi cu nakac'acharic maj pan quimic nak chic wilco̱j.

Pa ricorquilal, nic' pa' wach ric'raj jeno' c'acharel nank'ormojic reh ru'um jeno' aj ch'ukul mahc chi naricansjic ru'um reh rimahc je' wo' re' xkic'raj i hoj nok xa pan quimic nak chic wilco̱j. K'e̱' tare̱t chi xa cu je' wo' re' c'ahchi' kic'ram yu'na eh je' re' nik'or reh chi ma' chiri̱j ta kano'jbal i hoj chi kibil ki̱b enkach'ica̱' kac'ux, chiri̱j la' i Dios re' til manlic aj ucsunel queh camnak.

Ma' xa ta xojrico'lej chiwach rinimal wach c'axic laj quimic re're' je' la' wo' xa nacoj wo' rico'lem johtok chi kawach. Ru'um aj re' ch'iclic kac'ux chiri̱j eh re're' til nacoj wo' rico'lem chiwach rinimal wach c'axic laj quimic

re' cok ru' wi re' hat-tak enachop ac'ux tak chi katobjic pan ti̱j. Ru̱c' chi je' re' enbanjic q'uih wo' take equitioxonic johtok chiwach i Dios naqueht'alij nic' wach kaco'ljic riban ru' chiwach i quimic.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel reh Jesus, nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi wilic jenaj i til nye'bic sukquil kac'ux i hoj eh re' ricorquilal, re' i wili: Re' ka̱mna ricapaj cho eh rik'or keh chi re' Dios xiban chi re' hoj c'ahchi' kac'acharic chi quixilac take tinamit ayu' wach ac'al ru̱c' jenaj sak wach capew-bal, ru̱c' jenaj ch'ublic wach no'jbal eh je' wo' pa ricorquil laj c'acharic wilco̱j. Re' nik'or re're' til coric maj til awu̱c' hat-tak xc'utunic wach chi je' re' kano'jbal eh chi re' hoj ma' re' ta nchel ru̱c' xa tik'imaj wach no'jbal xojc'acharic ru̱c' sakil wach no'jbal. Ma'xta! Je' la' re' c'acharic xka'n ru'um reh rinimal wach rato'bil i Dios riyew cho chi kana̱.

Je' re' nik'or aweh tak maj re' riwi̱' chi re' hoj c'ahchi' katz'ihmbam je aweh tak i hu̱j wili reh chi re' hat-tak nachawilow tak wach chi coric, ewo' narak tak chiri̱j chi manlic chaj bih nka̱j kak'orom je aweh tak. Ru'um aj re' nitz'ihmbaj i hu̱j wili chi holohic riwi̱' nic'acharic maj re' hin til nwa̱j chi na̱rakam tak chiri̱j chi manlic

i riwi̱' i nino'jbal re' pa ricorquil, cu yu'na chi k'i̱j ja' narak ta tak chiri̱j xa re' la' weht'al chi nariponic wo' ri'orahil chi re' hat-tak na̱rakam tak chiri̱j chi manlic. Re' riwi̱' chi je' re' c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak re̱ chi nwa̱j chi na̱rakam tak chiri̱j chi coric chi manlic i riwi̱' i nino'jbal wili: Chi chipam i k'i̱j nok re' Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus naric'ulic wo' chic lok rica'pech, ewo' nayew tak kalok'il i hoj je' ricab nok re' hoj nkayew alok'il hat-tak.

Nik'orom aj chic lok re're', yu'na nwa̱j wo' nik'orom aweh tak chi re' hin xnich'ica̱' nic'ux chawi̱j tak chi wilca̱t tak chic pan sukquil wu̱c' eh xnitik'a̱' wach chi ca'pech nak nawojic awu̱c' tak reh chi je' re' xniyew nak risukquil ac'ux tak ru̱c' wiq'uic ponok chaxilac tak.

Jenaj nak pech xniyew risukquil ac'ux tak naxino̱j nak ar pa riyuk'ul i Masero̱nya eh jenaj wo' nak chic pech naxinsoljic cho chipam yuk'ul re're'. Je' nak re' xnitik'a̱' wach reh chi ru̱c' niwih'ic chaxilac tak pa rica'pech xinato'bej nak tak je ru̱c' pa' bih wi̱n reh wojic ar pa riyuk'ul i Jure̱ya

xa re' la' ma' xiyew ta chic ri̱b chi xiniq'uic wo' chic ponok awu̱c' tak. Yu'na k'uru' ru̱c' rijalaric wach nicapew-bal xniban, k'i̱j wo' re' hat-tak xacapaj tak chi re' hin xa no̱j nchalic i nik'orbal maj pe̱t xnik'or chi nawojic eh chiri̱j chic ru' ma'xta wo' chic. On xacapaj wo' tak chi re' take pa' bih take nitik'a̱' wach xa pa nic'ux ti hin nchalic

xa re' la' ma' je' ta re' maj til je' ricab chi re' Dios ma' janc'al ta richucum k'oric ru̱c' rik'orbal je' wo' re' i hin ma' janc'al ta nibanam chi nik'or i coric chi pe̱t eh chiri̱j chic ru' nik'or wo' chic chi ma'xta.

Til pa ricorquil re' hin ma' janc'al ta nibanam chi je' re' maj re' Dios re' elenak cho wi̱' i c'uhbal nkak'or chiri̱j i rAc'u̱n re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, ma' no̱j nchalic ta rik'orbal.
