Ru'um aj re', re' c'uhbal xnik'or i hin ch'i̱l i ma' Si̱las ch'i̱l i Timote̱yo ma' no̱j nchalic ta ru'um nok re' Jesus wili xa coric wo' cho wach ma' no̱j nchalic ta rik'orbal.

Ru'um aj wo' chi ma' no̱j nchalic ta rik'orbal i Jesus, ru'um wo' re' ru' c'ahchi' rimanlajic wach i nic' pa' nimal rik'orbal riyeb cho i Dios eh ru'um aj wo' re' chi hoj chic aj niminel reh Jesus, nkayew wo' chic rik'ormojic chi til je' re' eh nkatioxej johtok i Dios chi ye'bal rilok'il.

Je' aj re' ru' re' kak'orbal nkak'or aweh tak i hoj til coric wach maj re' ncojbic keh hoj ch'i̱l hat-tak pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ru̱c' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh re' xpahbanic wo' keh chi hoj aj k'orol ric'uhbal, re' wo' i Dios.

Je' wo' chic, re' wo' Dios xcojbic reh jenaj kehtalil c'uhtbal reh chi hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n eh re' ehtalil re're', re' i Lok' laj rUxlabal xicoj pan ka̱mna re' ncamanic wo' keh chi chopbal na̱ i nariyeb keh i Dios.

Je' re' k'uru' wi ma' coric take k'oric c'ahchi' nik'orom je aweh tak nicoj jenaj i Dios wu̱c' chi re're' eriyew richi̱' chiwi̱j wi coric on ma' coric i nanik'orom wili: Re' hin ja' quino̱j ta awu̱c' tak ar Cori̱nto chi ak'o'rjic tak je' ricab nak tik'imaj wach wu'um, ru'um nok re' hin xnicapaj chi ma' riban ta chi eniyew tak riman riti'quil ac'ux tak ru̱c' jeno' k'ilo̱j eniban aweh tak.

Ru̱c' re're' ma' nwa̱j ta chi enacapaj tak chi re' hoj kojchopbic na̱ animinic tak maj re' hat-tak pa'lic chic chi coric acapew-bal tak chiri̱j i Jesus. Haj cok wilic nka̱j chi nawic'ram tak, re' chi re' hoj wilco̱j chi awaj to'o̱l tak chi rirakmajic risukquil ac'ux tak chipam rinimjic i Jesus.
Ru'um aj chi ma' nwa̱j ta niyeb riti'quil ac'ux tak ru̱c' jeno' k'ilo̱j eniban nak aweh tak, re' hin xnich'uk wach pa nic'ux chi ma'xta chic quiniq'uic ponok awu̱c' tak.

Je' re' xniban maj chi wi̱n hin, wi ta nak re' hin xiniq'uic wo' chic ponok awu̱c' tak xa hin nak cojol riti'quil ac'ux tak eh chi je' re' chaj nak chic bih enye'bic risukquil nic'ux? Je' re' nik'or maj re' hin suk nic'ux nok re' hat-tak suk wo' ac'ux tak wu̱c' eh nok ma' suk ta ac'ux tak wu̱c' re' hin ti' wo' wilic i pan wa̱mna.

Je' re' nok ru'um chi ma' xwa̱j ta niti'sam ac'ux tak, xnicapaj ri̱j chi sakbih chi xa pan jenaj chic hu̱j xnitz'ihmbaj je aweh tak chi ma'xta chic niponic awu̱c' tak eh je' re' xniban maj ma' nwa̱j ta chi pa rijelow-bal i sukquil c'uxlis raj nak chi enic'ul awu̱c' tak xa riti'quil nic'ux eno̱j nic'ul awu̱c' hat-tak. Til nik'or aweh tak chi naxnitz'ihmbaj je aweh tak nihu̱j, re' hin ch'iclic nic'ux chawi̱j tak chi na̱banam nak tak je' ricab xnipahkaj chipam i hu̱j re're' eh chi naxa'n nak tak chi je' re', re' hin ch'i̱l hat-tak narisukbic nak kac'ux ru'um.

Je' wo', naxnitz'ihmbaj je aweh tak i nihu̱j re' hin xa ti' nak chic pa nic'ux chi xa cu̱c' tak nak chic ma' nelic quib i wa̱mna nanwic'raj cu rehtal xniyot' ha'. Til coric re' hu̱j re're' ma' xnitz'ihmbaj ta reh ta nak cojbal je riti'quil ac'ux tak, reh la' chi re' hat-tak enarak tak chiri̱j chi re' hin k'e̱' ti'quilal tiwic'raj tak.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, chaxilac hat-tak wilic jenaj c'acharel re' xbanic ti'c'axic keh. Coric, re' ti'c'axic re're' til wo' xiyew riti'quil kac'ux chi kunchelal, ma' xa re' ta chic i hin xiyew riti'quil nic'ux, xa re' la' weht'al wo' chi chaxilac hat-tak ma' chi'nchel ta xi'ic'rinic reh jenaj wach ti'quil c'uxlis eh ru'um re' ma' xa nimsaj ta tak wach i rik'ormojic chiri̱j i ti'quil c'uxlis xbanaric ru'um i c'acharel re're'.
Chi je' aj re' niban, nicapaj wo' chic ru' chi re' k'ilo̱j re' xamol awi̱b tak chi ricojoric ti'quil c'uxlis china̱, re're' manlic chic chi reh ribanaric.

Re' chic i ra̱j banaric yu'na ru̱c' i c'acharel re're', na̱cuyum tak rimahc eh je' wo' na̱yeb tak ricowil ric'ux chipam riniminic reh chi re' ti'quil c'uxlis wilic ru̱c' ma' eta nq'uihic wach cu rehtal eriyew pan ac'al riniminic.
Ru'um aj re' chamol wo' tak chic awi̱b tak chi ric'uluric wo' chic pan chak'lamil eh chac'uhtaj tak chi til ti' wo' chic c'ahchi' awic'ram tak.

Ru̱c' nipahkanic niban re're' nwa̱j wo' chic wilom wi til coric chi re' hat-tak tibirinic tak k'oric chi niwach. Je' re' nik'or maj pa ricorquil nok pan pe̱t xnitz'ihmbaj je aweh tak i jenaj chic hu̱j, re' riwi̱' chi xnitz'ihmbaj je aweh tak reh wo' chi naweht'alim i hin nic' pa' wach etibirinic tak k'oric chi niwach ru̱c' nic' pa' nimal xnipahkaj je aweh tak chipam i hu̱j re're'.

Je' re' ajic til chac'uhtaj aj wo' tak wi̱n chi tibirinic tak k'oric chi niwach eh chacuy wo' tak rimahc awas acha̱k' tak re're'. Nok acuyum tak chic rimahc, ra̱j rik'orom cuyu̱j wo' chic rimahc wu'um hin. Je' re' nik'or maj to̱b ta ti' wo' so' xiban wi̱n i mahc xiban, re' hin xnicuy i nic' pa' nimal rimahc xiban je' ricab til reht'alim wo' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi je' re' xniban. Je' aj re' xniban chi atobjic tak reh chi re' hat-tak wich'i̱l i hin ekojwih'ic pan sukquil c'uxlis chi kibil ki̱b.

Chiri̱j lok re're', wilic na jeno' chic riwi̱' chi re' hoj riwi̱' chi keh chi enkacuy rimahc i kas kacha̱k' aj niminel re're'? Til wilic eh re' wili riwi̱': Reh chi re' aj Yahm ma' eta rijot' kacapew-bal ru̱c' take xa pa' jaric no'jbal ricoj cho chi kaxilac. Je' re' nik'or maj chi kunchelal i hoj til keht'alim chi pa ricapew-bal i aj Yahm xa kajot'oric wilic cho.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, nwa̱j k'oric awu̱c' tak chiri̱j niwih'ic ar pan tinamit Tro̱yas. Naxinponic ar re' kAja̱w Dios xitik'a̱' wach chi coric chi'nchel reh chi re' hin eniteh wach rik'ormojic ribiral i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. To̱b ta wo' je' re' xiban i kAja̱w,

re' hin xniban naho̱l wach nicapew-bal ru'um i kacha̱k' aj niminel Ti̱to, ru'um chi ja' nponic ta ar je' ricab kak'orom cho chi kawach rich'i̱l. Ru'um aj re' xa ma' naht ta wo' xniban ar chi quixilac take kich aj niminel eh naxink'oric cahnok cu̱c' chiri̱j i welic je chi quixilac, xino̱j pa riyuk'ul i Masero̱nya.

Chiri̱j chic wili to̱b ta wo' ja' biram ta nak chic ribiral i Ti̱to, xponic wo' ribiral wu̱c'. Ru̱c' re're' til k'e̱' wo' chic tioxonic raj ye'eric reh Dios ru̱c' take pa' bih riban. Re' Dios wili re' wo' re' nbanic chi koj-elic chi coric chipam kacamaj ru'um chi hoj aj niminel reh Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Re' riban i Dios wili je' ricab riban jeno' c'amol quibe̱h take juntuhm ok chi sol re' nchol ribanaric chi re' take riso̱l nca'n cho canar i k'ak'anic. Re' wo' re' nbanic chi re' kac'uhbal i hoj raj camanom re' c'ahchi' kak'orom chiri̱j rinabjic i Jesus c'ahchi' rojic lok chi junsut tinamit je' ricab riquihej je ri̱b jeno' nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m.

Je' re' nik'or maj ru̱c' rik'ormojic i c'uhbal c'ahchi' ka'nam chi quixilac take c'ahchi' quiniminic reh c'uhbal re're' je' wo' chi quixilac take c'ahchi' quicojom qui̱b pan ti'c'axic ru'um chi ma' nca̱j ta quinimem i c'uhbal re're', k'e̱' kojponic chiwach i Dios xa je' na kacab jeno' nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m chiwach. Je' wo' re' i camanic xiban i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric til xponic wo' chiwach i Dios.

Je' re' k'uru' chi queh take i c'ahchi' quicojom qui̱b pan ti'c'axic ru'um chi ma' nca̱j ta quinimem i c'uhbal re're', re' ric'ohonquil kac'uhbalanic no̱j riban xa je' na ricab jeno' chuh laj ik'o̱m re' chi queh ru' aj k'orol ribiral quiquimic, ra̱j chi queh take aj niminel reh c'uhbal nkak'or, re' take re' nquicoj rehtal chi re're' je' na ricab re' nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m re' k'orol ribiral junelic laj c'acharic chi queh. Nok c'ahchi' nik'orom i wili nwa̱j wo' nik'orom i wili: Hab wo' wach til nchol ribanaric chi re' c'uhbal re're' quib wach i camanic riban?

Niban aweh tak i pahkanic re're' maj til q'uihal ru' take toco̱m chic nca'n quitz'a̱k ru̱c' rijalaric ribehil riC'uhbal i Dios. Je' re' ru' nca'n take re' raj i hoj xa coric wo' wach rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios c'ahchi'co̱j eh re're' c'ahchi'co̱j rilom cho chi xa re' wo' pa' wilic ritak'a̱b rik'ormojic keh xa re' wo' re' c'ahchi' kak'orom ru̱c' i rajawric riyeb wo' keh i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Ru̱c' take k'oric xnik'or lok aweh tak re're' k'i̱j wo' re' hat-tak enacapaj tak chi re' hin ch'i̱l take wich'i̱l c'ahchi' wo' chic kaq'uihsam ki̱b reh chi je' re' enka'n canar oquic awu̱c' tak. Ma'xta! Re' hoj ma' je' ta kacab take ju'jun chic c'acharel re' curman chi queh chi naquic'amam je jeno' hu̱j re' rik'or wi̱' chi tare̱t quino'jbal xa reh cocbal ponok chawach tak maj wi ma' ta nak ma' je' re' ma' eta nak nac'ul tak take. Tz'a̱b ru' i hoj ma' curman ta chi keh chi na̱tz'ihmbam tak jeno' kahu̱j kocbal ponok pan tak toco̱m chic tinamit je' ricab nquipahkaj aweh tak take toco̱m chic c'acharel re're'.

Nik'or chi ma' curman ta chi keh maj re' hat-tak wilca̱t tak chi je' na ricab jeno' kahu̱j reh kocbal xa haj pa' tinamit. Re're' til coric maj re' hat-tak ma' jaruj ta etiq'uic tak pan kac'ux xa wilca̱t la' wo' tak pan ka̱mna. Til ilo̱j chic eh eht'alamaj wo' chic cu'um take xa nic' pa' q'uihal c'acharel queht'alanic awach tak chi re' hat-tak toco̱m chic ano'jbal tak re' nc'uhtunic wo' lok reh chi re' kacamaj i hoj chaxilac tak k'e̱' holohic.

Je' re' riwi̱' chi re' hoj ma' curman ta chi keh jeno' kahu̱j maj re' hat-tak wilca̱t tak chi je' ricab jenaj kahu̱j re' nk'oric chiri̱j i camanic xiban i Dios pan ac'acharic tak ru̱c' kacamaj. Je' re' nik'or maj til coric, re' hoj xojc'uhbalanic aweh tak xa re' la' ma' re' ta kajawric xbanic i camanic chipam ac'acharic tak re' la' rajawric i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xbanic reh je' ricab nok wilic pech nantz'ihmjic jeno' hu̱j, wilic jenaj re' aj k'orol reh ntz'ihmjic eh wilic jenaj tz'ihminel reh k'oric re're'.
Je' re' nkak'or aweh tak maj chi wilco̱j pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ch'i̱l i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, til ch'iclic kac'ux chiwach i Dios chi til coric take k'oric nkak'or re're'.

Ru̱c' take k'oric wili ma' nwa̱j ta nik'orom chi xa chi kibil ta nak ki̱b kojchol ribanaric jeno' camanic chiwach i Dios. Ma'xta! Re' la' hoj til keht'alim chi re' pa' bih nka'n ribanaric ar wo' ru̱c' i Dios nchalic i no'jbal chi ribanaric i camanic re're'.

Je' re' k'uru' re' kacamaj i hoj chi aj puhcunel c'uhbal chiri̱j i jenaj Ac' laj Tik'inic xiban i Dios cu̱c' take c'acharel ma' xa kano'jbal ta i hoj nakojk'oric, re' la' Dios nye'bic cho reh kano'jbal chi ribanaric take k'oric re're'. Re' tik'inic wili ma' jenaj ta wach i tik'inic tz'ihmbimaj cho wach perepic laj abaj re' la' i tik'inic wili re' Lok' laj Uxlabal nbanic chi ncamanic pan ka̱mna. Re' c'uhbal xtz'ihmjic cho najtir k'i̱j nc'amaric na̱ xa re' la' ru' pan quimic nc'ambic je, raj nchel i junelic c'acharic re' Lok' laj Uxlabal nye'bic reh.

Naxc'ulmajic cho najtir k'i̱j i c'uhbal tz'ihmbimaj wach perepic laj abaj eh riyew pan quimic take ma' quibirinic ta reh, xc'ulmujic ru̱c' rinimal wach lok'il maj xc'ulmujic chi re' rilbal i Moyses naxk'oric ru̱c' i Dios chi ric'uluric take c'uhbal re're', xiban chi xa nrepretic chic je' ricab risakomil i Dios. Ru'um aj re', re' take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ma' naht ta ti nquicuy rilmijic rilbal i Moyses. Je' re' ajic re' c'uhbal re're' xc'ulmujic ru̱c' rinimal lok'il je' ricab xc'uhtunic ru̱c' rilbal i Moyses to̱b ta re' rich'abquilal rilbal ru' xa xo̱j wo' sahchok wach.
Wi je' re' xc'ulmujic wi̱' i c'uhbal re're', re' ta na chic riholonquil ricamaj i Lok' laj Uxlabal pan awa̱mna tak ma' til k'e̱' nimal wach riwa'ric nariwih'ic?

Til pan coric wi re' c'uhbal xc'ulmujic cho najtir k'i̱j pan rinimal lok'il til wo' wilic rajawric chi ric'amaric je pan quimic i ma' nc'ambic ta na̱, re' ta wo' na ti chic i Ac' laj Tik'inic xiban i Dios, ma' yohbal wach rilok'il enwih'ic wi re're' nbanic chi re' take c'acharel equic'ulmujic wo' chic ru'um i Dios chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n chic take?

Je' re' k'uru' re' najtir c'uhbal re' wilic rajawric chi ric'amaric je pan quimic i ma' nbirinic ta reh, til wilic wo' nak cho rinimal wach rilok'il xa re' la' yu'na xa je' riban chi ma'xta chic rilok'il nankajunehtej wach ch'i̱l i Ac' laj Tik'inic re' til k'e̱' wo' chic rilok'il wilic chi ric'amaric cho junelic c'acharic chi kana̱.

Chacoj aj tak rehtal i wili: Wi re' Dios xiyew rilok'il riwa'ric i najtir C'uhbal Ye'o̱j cho reh Moyses re' xa c'ahchi' wo' richuhpic wach ransil rajawric, re' ta na chic i Ac' laj Tik'inic xiban i Dios ma' eniq'uic na̱ rilok'il riwa'ric wi re're' ma' iq'ue̱l ta wach rajawric?
Ru'um aj chi ch'iclic kac'ux ru̱c' i Ac' laj Tik'inic xiban i Dios re're', re' hoj ma' kojyo'jic ta chi k'oric awu̱c' tak

maj re' hoj ma'xta bih nakac'olom wi̱' ri̱j i kac'uhbal ma' je' ta ricab xc'uluric ru̱c' i Moyses chi re're' xipoy i rilbal ru̱c' jenaj tz'ih. Je' re' xiban ru' reh chi re' take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ma' eta nquilow risahchic wach i rich'abquilal i Dios wilic chiwach i rilbal rehtalil chi re' c'uhbal ye'o̱j cho re're' xa narojic wo' chuhpok wach ransil rajawric.

Re' rehtalil ma' xye'eric ta k'ab queh take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi naquirakam chiri̱j xa re' la', re' ric'uluric chi je' re' ma' re' ta ru'um reh chi re' Moyses xipoy i rilbal. Cu yu'na wo' chi k'i̱j re' take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, nanilmijic wach chi quina̱ i c'uhbal c'ulu̱j cho re're' ma' nquirak ta wo' chiri̱j. Ru̱c' re're' je' ricab nok poylic wach rilbal jeno' c'acharel chi tz'ih je' wo' na poylic wach quicapew-bal take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho re're' eh re' ripoyoric wach quicapew-bal re're' enelic lok xa ru̱c' kawih'ic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ch'i̱l i kaK'atal K'oric Jesus.

Til nik'or chi je' re' maj re' c'uhbal re're' cu yu'na wo' chi k'i̱j poyo̱j na̱ pan ca̱mna take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel nanilmijic wach chi quina̱. Ru̱c' re're' xa je' na poylic wach quicapew-bal je' ricab nok jeno' c'acharel poylic wach rilbal ru̱c' jenaj tz'ih.

Ra̱j la' nok jeno' queh kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel erik'ahsaj ric'acharic pan k'ab i kAja̱w, ewo' riban chi re' chaj bih npoybic wach ricapew-bal enesmejic lok reh je' ricab nok re' Moyses nanoquic chi k'oric ru̱c' i kAja̱w Dios resaj lok i tz'ih ripoybej wi̱' wach.

Je' aj re' ru' re' enesenic lok reh i pa' bih npoybic wach quino'jbal take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, xa re' wo' i kAja̱w eh re' kAja̱w c'ahchi' nik'oric chiri̱j re're', re' i Lok' laj Uxlabal re' manlic aj tehol wach chi'nchel maj hab wach behsemaj chic ricapew-bal ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios, re're' ncahnic chi tehlic chic ri̱j.

Je' re' k'uru' xa re' wo' cho tehenak ki̱j chi'nchel i hoj aj niminel, ma'xta chic bih npoybic wach pan nak' kawach rilok'il i Dios. Yu'na til nc'utunic chic lok chi kawach i rilok'il re're' je' ricab jeno' lemuh ric'uhtaj chi coric i rilbal jeno' c'acharel. Je' re' ajic nok re' hoj c'ahchi' rijalmajic wach kano'jbal rehreh c'ahchi' koquic cok chipam i rinimal wach i rilok'il ru' eh re' nbanic i camanic re're', re' i kAja̱w re' Lok' laj Uxlabal wo' riwi̱'.
Re' chic yu'na nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi re' Dios xiquetelej cho kawach i hoj eh xojripahba̱' chi hoj aj k'orol riC'uhbal. Ru'um aj re', re' hoj ma' nkapoh'aj ta kac'ux

re' la' chic nka'n nkak'eb lok ri̱j-kac'ux take c'ahbil laj no'jbal nbanaric pan c'olic re' nye'bic pan q'uixbilal. Je' re' nok re' hoj ma' kojk'oric ta ru̱c' chucuj k'oric reh chi ma' eta nwih'ic keh i pa' bih wilic queh take i quibirinic keh. Je' wo' ma' c'ahchi' ta kajalam wach ricorquilal riC'uhbal i Dios reh chi enponic chi quiwach i tinamit. Til la' nkak'or ricorquilal chi sakom wach reh chi je' re' enrakmajic chiri̱j chi re' kacapew-bal i hoj til coric wach chiwach i Dios.

Je' re' ajic wi re' c'uhbal chiri̱j ribiral i kAja̱w Jesus wilic take tinamit ma' nquirak ta chiri̱j nankak'or ribiral, re' take c'acharel re're', re' ma' nca̱j ta quinimem, c'ahchi' quicora̱b je pan junelic ti'c'axic.

Re' take c'acharel re're' ma' nca̱j ta quinimem i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i kAja̱w Jesus ru'um nok re' aj Yahm re' ajabe̱s nchoponic na̱ i c'ahbilal wach no'jbal china̱ ac'al ximoysaj wach quino'jbal chi rirakmajic chiri̱j risakomal wach i holohic laj c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j rilok'il wilic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh re're' manlic aj c'uhtunel reh nic' wach riminjilal i Dios.
Je' re' k'uru' re' hoj wilco̱j chi aj camanom chawi̱j xa ru'um chi k'e̱' ti' nkic'raj i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Je' re' ajic re' hoj c'ahchi' kak'orom aweh tak i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, ru'um nok re' Dios re' xk'oric cho chi nariwih'ic i sakom re' narisakomonic wo' pan k'ekom, re' wo' re' xsakomsjic pan kacapew-bal i hoj. Je' aj re' k'uru' re' hoj xsakomsjic pa̱m kacapew-bal reh chi re' hoj enkasakomej lok wach i rinimal wach rilok'il i Dios re' xc'uhtunic wo' ru̱c' i Jesus.

Re' aj chic risakomsjic pa̱m kacapew-bal xiban i Dios i hoj re' xa je' ti ricab jeno' tz'ak ac'al xun, re're' xbanjic reh chi re' rinimal wach ajawric chi ribanaric i camanic xiyew keh i Dios, enc'utunic lok chi ar ru̱c' nchalic eh chi ma' re' ta nchel ku̱c' i hoj.

Re' hin nik'or aweh tak i wili maj to̱b ta xa sutumaj chic ki̱j ru̱c' c'axquilal nchalic chi kana̱, re' rajawric i Dios ma' janc'al ta hoj ricana̱b chi ma' ta nak chic enkarak kelbal chipam take c'axquilal re're', on to̱b ta wo' wilic pech ma' nkarak ta nak chic chiri̱j chaj bih naka'nam chipam jeno' c'axquilal, re' rajawric i Dios xiban chi ma' xkak'eb ta kac'ux chi nakesmejic chipam i c'axquilal re're'.

Wilic wo' pech nkac'ul chi re' take tinamit kojquitahkej chi ribanaric ti'c'axic keh xa re' la' re' rajawric i Dios xiban chi ma' xkic'raj tak ki̱b chi xakutquel ti ki̱b chipam i ti'c'axic. Wilic wo' pech xojquich'eylom take kaj ixowonel cu rehtal xa cuc'tak nak chic ma' kojquicansaj xa re' la' rajawric i Dios xojrito'bej wo' chi ma' xojquicansaj ta.

Je' re' k'uru' xa pa' yu̱k' koj-o̱j wi̱', re' hoj nkac'ul i ti'c'axic ru̱c' kati'jolal kabakil chi xa pan quimic chic wilco̱j je je' ricab wo' cho nok cu wilic nak i Jesus china̱ ac'al wili xic'ul wo' take ti'c'axic. To̱b ta wo' je' re' nkac'ul re' hoj nkacuy ransil i ti'c'axic nbanaric keh reh chi re' ric'acharic i Jesus enc'utunic lok ku̱c' i hoj.

Je' re' ajic re' hoj raj k'orol i Jesus chi cu c'achalco̱j, cu sutumaj pe ki̱j ru̱c' take c'axquilal re' ric'am cho quimic chi kana̱ ru'um chi hoj chic reh Jesus. Re' hoj xa nkacuy wo' ransil re're' ru'um nok nka̱j chi re' take c'acharel enquina'bej chi re' Jesus xa c'achlic wo' naquilow chi xa cu c'achalco̱j wo' pan kati'jolal kabakil re' quimic ri̱j.

Til je' re' k'uru' re' hoj xa wilco̱j wo' pan ti'c'axic re' ric'am cho quimic chi kana̱ xa re' la' to̱b ta wo' je' re' nkac'ul re' hoj keht'alim chi re' take c'axquilal re're' ncamanic aweh tak chi enac'ul tak i junelic c'acharic.

Je' re' k'uru' to̱b ta wilic ti'c'axic chi kana̱, re' hoj xa nkatik wo' ju' rich'iquinjic kac'ux chiri̱j i Dios eh ru'um re' ma' nkacana̱' ta rik'ormojic ric'uhbal. Re' kacapew-bal wili riban jenaj wach ch'i̱l i tz'ihmbimaj chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios chi je' wili: “Re' hin til niyew nic'ux chi rinimjic i Dios eh ru'um chi je' re' niban re' hin ma' nicana̱' ta rik'ormojic ribiral, nqui tz'ihmbimaj cho.

Je' aj ricab i tz'ihmbimaj cho re're', re' hoj ma' nkacana̱' ta rik'ormojic ribiral i kAja̱w Jesus ru'um nok keht'alim chi re' kAja̱w Dios re' wo' re' xucsunic cho reh i Jesus eh je' ricab naxucsaj cho ru' je' wo' re' nakojrucsam wo' chic cho i hoj chi nakac'acharic chi junelic. Ma' xa re' ta re', nacoj la' wo' ripahba̱b chiwach nakojric'am johtok ru̱c'.

Je' re' k'uru' to̱b ta wilic ti'c'axic chi kana̱ ru'um reh rik'ormojic ribiral i Jesus, re' hoj nkacuy chi'nchel re're' ru'um chi ti' tikic'raj tak. Je' re' nka'n reh chi equiq'uihbic take c'acharel enquirak chiri̱j i rinimal wach ric'axbal i Dios. Ru̱c' re're' ewo' quiq'uihbic take c'acharel equiye'bic ritioxjic i Dios eh chi je' re' ewo' ric'ul rilok'il.

Ru'um aj re', re' hoj ma' nkapoh'aj ta kac'ux eh to̱b ta wo' nchel c'ahchi' roquic cho rirejbic i kati'jolal ru̱c' i camanic c'ahchi'co̱j, wilic jenaj chic ac' c'acharic pan ka̱mna eh re' c'acharic re're' eli̱c i k'i̱j c'ahchi' ri'acsjic wach.

Je' re' k'uru' ma' nkapoh'aj ta kac'ux maj re' nic' pa' ti nimal ti'c'axic nkac'ul chipam kac'acharic re' xa c'uhlel wo' ti take, xa rehreh c'ahchi' rijohsam wach i rinimal wach kalok'il nariyeb keh i Dios eh eli̱c johtic riban wach.

Nik'or re're' maj re' take chaj bih nkilow china̱ ac'al wili je' ricab take ti'c'axic, ma' nkacoj ta kacapew-bal ru̱c' ru'um chi'nchel take xa chaj bih jaric nilmijic wach yu'na xa narisahchic wo' quiwach, ra̱j nchel chiri̱j take ma' nilmijic ta wach je' ricab i lok'il nariye'eric, til ar nkach'ica̱' kacapew-bal ru'um nok re' cok re' ma' jaruj ta sahchel wach.

Wi re' kati'jolal re' nc'olbic reh ka̱mna ensahchic wach, keht'alim chi re' Dios nariyeb jenaj chic kati'jolal re' ma' re' ta jeno' winak xtik'inic reh. Re' cok re' ma' sahchel ta wach eh ar pan taxa̱j wilic cho.

Ru'um aj re' xa re' wo' kap'utum cho ric'uluric i ti'c'axic ru̱c' kati'jolal kabakil, re' hoj xa ji̱k' chic kac'ux ru̱c' i kAja̱w Dios chi eta nak ti riyeh'aj keh chi erisoc i ka̱mna ru̱c' jenaj chic ac' laj kati'jolal nchalic ar pan taxa̱j.

Chi je' re' to̱b ta nchel kojquimok je eh ensahchic wach i kati'jolal wili re' Dios nariyeb keh i jenaj chic ac' kati'jolal re' narisocbic reh i ka̱mna reh chi ma' eta nrakmajic je' ricab jeno' c'acharel ma'xta riso' chiri̱j.

Je' aj re' chi cu c'acharic pe nka'n ru̱c' i kati'jolal wili re' je' na ricab jeno' pahpa'x pa̱t nok wilic chi xa reh ti junc'am, xa eli̱c wo' wilic ti'quil kac'ux ru'um nok ma' nka̱j ta nak chi ekojcahnic chi ma'xta chic kati'jolal socbal reh i ka̱mna, nka̱j la' nak chi wilic ta nak chic ku̱c' i ac' ti'jolal re' nc'acharic chi junelic eh chi je' re' enjahlic wach i kati'jolal xa sahchel wach.

Til ta wo' naric'uluric je' ricab c'ahchi' nik'orom chi re' kati'jolal narijalaric wach? Na̱c, maj re' i Dios re' aj re' xitik'a̱' chic cho wach chi re' hoj narijahlic wach kati'jolal pan jenaj k'i̱j eh keht'alim chi til je' re' naric'uluric ru'um nok re' Dios xiyew keh i Lok' laj rUxlabal re' ncamanic keh chi rehtalil chi nakac'ulum take pa' bih k'oro̱j cho ru'um.

Je' aj re' ru'um chi re' Dios xiyew keh i Lok' laj rUxlabal, re' hoj til cow ch'iclic kac'ux ru̱c' i Dios chi re're' narijalam wach i kati'jolal eh nok chi cu wilco̱j pe ayu' wach ac'al ru̱c' i kati'jolal wili re' hoj keht'alim chi cu ja' wilco̱j ta pe johtok ru̱c' i kAja̱w Jesus ar pan taxa̱j.
Ru'um aj wo' re', re' hin nik'or chi re' hoj c'ahchi' kac'acharic ru̱c' rich'iquinjic kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus eh ma' re' ta nchel ru̱c' i chaj bih nkilow wach ru̱c' i nak' kawach.
Je' re' k'uru' til wo' chic ch'iclic kac'ux ru̱c' i Dios eh re' hoj xa nka̱j nak chic kacana̱b i kati'jolal wili reh chi ar nak chic ekoj-o̱j c'acharok ru̱c' i kAja̱w Jesus.

Je' re' k'uru' to̱b ta re' hoj cu wilco̱j chi c'acharic china̱ ac'al wili on ru̱c' chic i kAja̱w Jesus wilco̱j, re' hoj nakacowem kac'ux chi c'acharic chi ribanaric re' haj wilic nye'bic risukquil ric'ux.

Til aj nik'or aweh tak, chiri̱j chic kaquimic curman chi kunchelal i hoj c'acharel nakawih'ic chiwach i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric nachiban i ch'ukuj wach k'oric chi kana̱ natz'uhkok cho pa ritz'uk'a̱b reh k'atbal k'oric eh ar aj ru' nakeht'alim haj wilic i kasi̱ nariyeb keh re' k'orel nic' pa' wach i no'jbal xka'n nok cu c'achalco̱j, wi re' nchel i coric wach on ma' coric wach no'jbal xka'n chiwach i Dios.

Ru'um aj reh chi xkeht'alij chi re' kAja̱w Jesus narich'ukum k'oric chi quina̱ chi'nchel c'acharel, re' hoj c'ahchi' kachopom kac'ux chi rich'ukjic i ca̱mna take c'acharel chi naquiniminic eh re' Dios reht'alim chi re' hoj c'ahchi' ka'nam ru̱c' coric wach c'uxlis eh nwuy'ej wo' chi re' hat-tak aweht'alim wo' tak chi je' re'.

Chaj wa'ric nok c'ahchi' kak'orom aweh tak i wili? Nacapaj na tak chi c'ahchi' kak'orom i wili xa reh q'uihsbal ki̱b chi coric wach kano'jbal? Ma'xta! Je' la' re' k'oric nka'n je aweh tak reh chi wilic ok riwi̱' chi re' hat-tak ensukbic ac'ux tak chiki̱j eh chi je' re' ena'n tak canar quic'u'ljic take k'e̱' suk queh ricojoric rehtal i xa re' rilbal lok i c'acharel eh ma' re' ta i no'jbal wilic cho pan ra̱mna.

Chacoj tak rehtalil i k'oric nca'n keh take toco̱m chic c'acharel nquik'or keh chi re' hoj, hoj saban ru̱c' take chaj bih nka'n ribanaric, xa re' la' ma'xta bih nka̱j reh chi je' re' nquik'or maj keht'alim chi reh i Dios c'ahchi' ka'nam eh wila' wilic c'ahchi' quik'oric chi na'lic keh c'ahchi'co̱j ra̱j rik'orom chi to'bal wo' tak aweh c'ahchi'co̱j.

Chaj wa'ric nok re' hoj cow nkayew kac'ux chiri̱j i Dios eh je' wo' chi atobjic hat-tak? Nkayew kac'ux ru'um reh richak'lamil ricoj pan ka̱mna i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' re' nka'n maj keht'alim i wili: Chi re' Jesus xiyew ri̱b chi quimic pan kajelow-bal chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel eh ru̱c' i quimic xic'ul re're' eriban chi enkak'or chi kunchelal i hoj c'acharel xojquimic rich'i̱l.

Nok re' kAja̱w Jesus xquimic pan kajelow-bal chi'nchel i hoj, xquimic reh nok chi kunchelal c'achalco̱j china̱ ac'al wili ma' eta chic nka'n pan kac'acharic i haj wilic nka̱j ka'nam xa chi kibil ki̱b, re' la' chic naka'nam haj wilic ra̱j i Jesus re' xquimic wach curu̱s eh xucsjic wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak.

Ru'um aj re', re' hoj yu'na ma' nkak'or ta chic chi jeno' c'acharel coric wach on ma' coric wach xa ru̱c' i kano'jbal reh ayu' wach ac'al. Til pa ricorquil xkak'or wo' nak cho chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, ma' coric ta wach xa ru̱c' i kano'jbal reh ayu' wach ac'al, xa re' la' yu'na ma' je' ta chic re' c'ahchi' kak'orom chiri̱j.

Je' re' nik'or maj xa hab wach riban chi xa jenaj chic riwi̱' ch'i̱l i Jesus nmikric chi jenaj ac' c'acharel chic je' ricab nok ru̱c' ric'ulic wach k'i̱j sakom jeno' ha'lac'un np'uhtic johtok ric'acharic chi jenaj chic ac' c'acharel. Je' re' nok re' c'acharel re're' njahlic chic wach rino'jbal riban cho najtir eh til chacoj tak rehtal chi re' chic i no'jbal nchalic ru̱c' Jesus nwih'ic pa ra̱mna.

Nic' wach nanc'uluric i wili? Nc'uluric ru'um reh ricamaj xiban i Dios naxojricoj wo' chic ru̱c' chi nakacahnic pan jenaj wo' chic suk laj c'uxlis xa ru'um reh chi xquimic chiki̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Chi aj je' re', re' wo' Dios xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiki̱j i hoj aj k'orol riC'uhbal chi nakak'orom queh toco̱m chic c'acharel chi naquic'u'lem na̱ i quiyuk'unjic riban i Dios chi naquicahnic wo' pan sukquil c'uxlis ru̱c'.

Re're' ra̱j rik'orom chi re' Dios ru̱c' ric'acharic i Jesus china̱ ac'al wili xiteh ribehil chi re' take c'acharel naquicahnic wo' chic pan sukquil c'uxlis ru̱c'. Je' re' nok ma' c'ahchi' ta chic ricojom pa riman chi'nchel quimahc ca'nam cho take c'acharel eh re' chic i hoj xojripahba̱' chi nakak'orom i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j riteheric ribehil i quiwih'ic take c'acharel pan jenaj sukquil c'uxlis ru̱c' i Dios.

Ru'um aj re' chi hoj ritak'anic cho i Dios, re' hoj c'ahchi' kak'oric awu̱c' tak chi ru̱c' kajawric xiyew i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh nakojk'oric awu̱c' tak xa je' na nchel re' wo' i Dios c'ahchi' rik'oric awu̱c' tak. Je' re' nok ru̱c' kajawric xiyew i Jesus, xa nch'uk chic kac'ux, cow nkapahkaj aweh tak chi tiwih'ok tak ru̱c' i Dios pan jenaj suk laj c'uxlis.

Chaj wa'ric nok re' kAja̱w Dios c'ahchi' ripahkam chi re' take c'acharel naquiwih'ic pan sukquil c'uxlis ru̱c'? Ripahkaj chi je' re' ru'um chi re' Dios xiban chi re' Jesus xiban juneht ru̱c' kamahc to̱b ta wo' ma'xta nak nech' ok rimahc. Je' re' xiban i Dios ru̱c' i Jesus chi ritojoric wach i kamahc reh nok chi xa jenaj chic kawi̱' ch'i̱l i Jesus, re' hoj yu'na k'oro̱j chic kabiral ru'um i Dios chi coric chic wach kac'ux.

Je' aj re' k'uru' ru'um reh i quimic xic'ul i kAja̱w Jesus chi tojbal reh kamahc re' hoj, chi hoj jenaj ru̱c' i Dios chi ribanaric ricamaj chaxilac tak, til cow nkapahkaj aweh tak chi re' rato'bil i Dios xiyew cho chana̱ tak ma̱yew tak chi xa eno̱j chi xa c'o'nal awu'um tak

maj chacoj tak rehtal rik'orom cho i kAja̱w Dios chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j naxik'or cho chi je' wili: “Naxirak cho rik'ijil tik'imaj wach wu'um chi nanic'uhtam cho nic'axbal, re' hin Dios xatnibiraj wo' tak cho ru̱c' apahkanic tak. Naxirak wo' cho rik'ijil chi wi̱n chi naca̱t tak nico'lem tak, re' hin xatnito'bej wo' tak chi rirakmajic co'lbal aweh tak, nqui xik'or cho. Ru̱c' i k'oric ribanam cho i Dios re' hin nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi yu'na i rik'ijil chi re' Dios c'ahchi' ric'uhtam cho ric'axbal chana̱ tak eh je' wo' yu'na wo' rik'ijil chi re' Dios c'ahchi' rico'lem take c'acharel.
Nok nka'n i kacamaj wilic chi hoj aj k'orol reh ribiral i Jesus xa k'unk'u̱n ric'amaric nka'n ru'um nok nka̱j chi ma' eta no̱j chi c'u'tjbal xa ru'um jeno' ma' holohic ta laj bano̱j enka'n ribanaric.

Je' aj re' riwi̱' i camanic c'ahchi'co̱j reh chi je' re' enc'utunic lok chi kawach chi til coric chi hoj raj camanom i Ajabe̱s Dios eh til wo' c'ahchi' kacuyum ransil chi'nchel i nic' pa' nimal nkac'ul je' ricab take wili: Re' take ti'c'axic, re' take c'axquilal chi ma'xta chic bih wilic keh, re' c'axquilal chi ma' nkarak ta nak chic kelbal pan jeno' c'axic,

re' katz'uhumjic, re' kacojoric pan che̱', on je' ricab wo' nok re' take kaj ixowonel xquimol qui̱b chi kana̱ reh chi nacoj nak quicansam. Ma' xa re' ta re', re' hoj xa nkacuy wo' ransil i cow laj camanic xka'n reh chi nariwih'ic pa' bih keh chipam ricamaj i Dios, xkacuy wo' kawiric, xkacuy wo' kawa' kaha̱' nok til ajwal wach ricamaj i Dios.

Je' wo' ewo' nc'uhtunic lok chi raj camanom i Dios ru̱c' take no'jbal wili nanka'n kacamaj: Re' risakil wach no'jbal kojc'acharic wi̱', re' no'jbal xiyew keh i Dios chi rirakmajic chiri̱j i coric, re' k'uni̱l chi ricuyuric chi'nchel nic' pa' nimal take ti'c'axic nbanaric keh, re' ric'uhtjic i chak'lamil eh je' wo' i coric laj c'axoj i̱b cu̱c' take kich c'acharel. Chi'nchel re're', re' hoj nka'n ribanaric xa ru̱c' i to'bonic riban keh i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios.

Je' wo' nc'utunic lok chi hoj raj camanom i Dios nankak'or i coric wach c'uhbal ru̱c' kajawric ye'o̱j wo' ru'um. Je' wo', nc'utunic wo' lok chi je' re' nanka'n ricojoric i xiyew keh i Dios chi co'lbal ki̱b chiwach take pa' bih quichalic chi kana̱ je' ricab nok jeno' sol ricoj i rik'as nah re̱ ch'ihch' nye'eric pan risec'a̱j k'ab eh ricoj wo' i coten laj ch'ihch' nye'eric pa ritz'e̱t k'ab chi co'lbal ri̱b chiwach i yohbalil.

Je' wo' chic, wilic pech wilic take tinamit nponic chi quiwach i no'jbal nka'n eh wilic wo' take ma'xta. Wilic wo' take tinamit holohic i k'oric nca'n chiki̱j eh wilic wo' take xa hoj quic'u'tjbal. Je' wo' chacoj tak rehtal, wilic wo' take quik'oric chi xa hoj aj jot'o̱l ru̱c' take c'uhtunic nka'n chi queh xa re' la' i hoj ricorquilal wo' nkak'or.

Je' wo' wilic take kojquicoj chi je' ma'xta so' kajawric chi rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios xa re' la' re' hoj eht'alamaj kana̱ ru'um i Dios chi hoj raj k'oro̱l. Je' wo' xa pan quimic wo' wilco̱j xa re' la' chawilow tak, xa cu c'achalco̱j wo'. Wilic wo' pech re' Dios riyew cho k'ab chi nchalic i ti'c'axic chi kana̱ xa re' la' ru' ma' riyew ta wo' k'ab chi kojquicansaj.

Xa chi'nchel wo' wach nkac'ul chipam i kacamaj re' quicojbic cho wi̱' ritz'irquilal kac'ux xa re' la' re' sukquil c'uxlis xa wilic wo' ku̱c'. Coric ru', xa hoj ti niba̱' xa re' la' i hoj q'uihal take c'acharel c'ahchi' kabihomsam take ru̱c' i c'uhtunic nka'n eh to̱b ta chi quiwach take kich c'acharel china̱ ac'al wili ma'xta bih wilic keh, re' hoj kehchaj chic chi'nchel i nic' pa' nimal i cuse'sbal riyew cho i Dios.

Yu'na was nicha̱k' re' tic'acharic tak ar Cori̱nto til pa ricorquil re' hoj ma'xta bih no'jbal xkamuk'a̱' ta nak na̱ chawach hat-tak, chi'nchel la' xkasakomej wach aweh tak ru'um chi re' hat-tak k'e̱' ti' tikic'raj tak.
Til pan coric, re' hoj ma'xta bih nk'etbic keh chi til k'e̱' ti' tikic'raj tak re' ru' hat-tak ma' til ta ti' koj-awic'raj tak ru̱c' chi'nchel awa̱mna tak.

Je' ricab riban jeno' ajabe̱s ru̱c' take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n chi pan ato'bil rik'o'rej take, re' hin pan ato'bil nipahkaj je aweh tak chi ti' ok quinawic'raj tak ru̱c' chi'nchel awa̱mna tak je' ricab nok ti' wo' tiwic'raj tak i hin.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel reh Jesus, je' ricab nok ma' eta riban chi enatuna̱' wach jenaj bo̱yex ch'i̱l jeno' cawa̱y chi camanic ru'um chi ma' jenaj ta wach quino'jbal je' wo' re' til nik'or aweh tak i hin chi re' hat-tak ma̱k'inej tak awi̱b ru̱c' quino'jbal take ma' quiniminic ta reh Jesus. Ma̱ban tak chi je' re' ru'um nok jeno' c'acharel re' coric wach nbanic chiwach i Dios ma' jaruj ta eriban chi erijunehtej ri̱b rino'jbal ch'i̱l jeno' c'acharel ma' riban ta i coric chiwach i Dios. Je' wo' re' nc'uluric ru̱c' i sakom, ma' jaruj ta wo' erituna̱' ri̱b ch'i̱l i k'ekom.

Je' wo' re' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re're' ma' rijunehtej ta nech' ok ri̱b ch'i̱l i aj Yahm re' ribihnej wo' chi Welyal eh je' wo' re' i aj niminel reh Jesus ma' jenaj ta wach rico̱ch naric'ulum ch'i̱l take c'acharel re' ma' nca̱j ta quinimem i Jesus.

Je' wo' chic, chipam i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios ma' eta riban chi ewo' qui'o̱j cojorok ar take tiyo̱x eh ar enlok'onjic quiwach. Je' wo' i Dios ma' riyew ta k'ab chi re' hoj aj niminel enkatuna̱' wach i kano'jbal ch'i̱l take aj lok'onel wach tiyo̱x maj pa ricorquilal re' hoj wilco̱j chi je' ricab i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios re' c'achlic chi junelic sakom, je' ricab rik'orom cho chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal. Ar je' wili rik'or i Dios: “Re' hin Dios naniwih'ic chi quixilac take quiniminic wi̱n eh nawilom take reh chi naquiwih'ic chi suk. Chi je' re', re' take re' xa re' wo' i hin naqui̱nquicojom chi hin quiDios eh re' take re' naca'nam wo' chi nitinami̱t take, nqui rik'or.

Ru'um aj wo' re', re' Dios je' wo' wili rik'orom cho pan Lok' laj Hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal: “Hat-tak nitinami̱t, telen tak chi quixilac take c'acharel re' aj lok'onel tiyo̱x take, ma̱ban jenaj wach ano'jbal tak quich'i̱l. Je' wo' ma̱ban chic aweh tak i c'ahbilal laj no'jbal eh chi je' re', re' hin etinic'ul tak wu̱c' chi nitinami̱t, nqui rik'orom.

Ar wo' chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re're', re' kAja̱w Dios re' k'e̱' rinimal wach rajawric je' wili rik'orom cho: “Re' hin nanibanam chi hin awAja̱w tak eh chi je' re', re' hat-tak na̱cahnic tak chi hat-tak wac'u̱n wixk'u̱n, nqui rik'orom.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak, ru'um aj chi re' Dios rik'orom cho chi re' take k'oric k'oro̱j cho ru'um ku̱c' wo' hoj narimanlajic wach, re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi kacana̱' tak ribanaric chi'nchel i c'ahbilal re' nch'uwa'rsanic wach i kati'jolal kabakil ch'i̱l i kacapew-bal. Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi kacowej tak ki̱b chi risakmajic wach kac'acharic chi c'ahchi' kayohbalem wach i Dios.

Wilic take c'ahchi' quik'oric chi re' hoj tikacoj tak pan c'aye̱w, chi nkayoj ricapew-bal jeno' aj niminel on chi hoj aj sacanel atz'a̱k tak, xa re' la' hin nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi ma' hab ta jeno' wach ka'nam reh chi je' re'. Ru'um aj re' til nipahkaj aweh tak chi ti' ok koj-awic'raj tak ru̱c' chi'nchel awa̱mna tak.

Re' hin ma' c'ahchi' ta nik'orom i wili ru'um chi nwa̱j ta nak chi na̱wihklem tak take k'oric nbanjic. Ma'xta! Ma' je' ta re' maj re' hin nik'orom chic cho aweh tak chi re' hin k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak eh chi re' nichak'lamil chawi̱j tak ma' jaruj ta nariq'uic wach to̱b ta kojquimok je on to̱b ta cu c'achalco̱j wo'.

Je' re' k'uru' re' hin re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak ma'xta bih no'jbal xnimuk'a̱' na̱ chawach tak naquink'oric awu̱c' tak eh je' wo' re' hin niyew alok'il tak naquink'oric cu̱c' take toco̱m. Re' aj re' nye'bic ricowil nic'ux eh to̱b ta nak wilic ti'c'axic chi nina̱ on ntz'iric, chipam chi'nchel re're' k'e̱' wo' chic niq'uic na̱ i sukquil c'uxlis nkic'raj chawi̱j tak.

Je' re' k'uru' re' ti'c'axic xa hoj wo' ritahkem maj naxojwih'ic cho ar pa riyuk'ul i Masero̱nya ma' xkarak ta nech' ok hi'lbal keh yohbal la' wach take kac'axquilal xwih'ic chi kana̱ ru'um chi xa haj reh yuk'ul re're' xkac'ul quik'orbal take xquik'ihtaj qui̱b chiwach kak'orbal eh pan ka̱mna xoquic wo' cho kayo'jic ru'um chi ma' keht'alim ta nak nic' wach wilca̱t hat-tak,
xa re' la' Dios re' aj ye'ol ricowil quic'ux take kajanak quic'ux, xiyew ricowil kac'ux naxitak'a̱' cho i Ti̱to ayu' ku̱c'.

Je' re' ajic ma' xa re' ta ric'ulic lok ayu' ku̱c' i Ti̱to xcowjic wi̱' kac'ux, k'e̱' la' wo' xcowjic kac'ux ru'um reh ricowil ric'ux xayew tak cho i Ti̱to naxwih'ic ponok awu̱c' tak. Je' re' nik'or maj xc'ulic rik'or chi re' hat-tak til k'e̱' nak nawa̱j awilom tak niwach. Je' wo' chi re' hat-tak k'e̱' xti'bic ac'ux tak chiri̱j re' chaj bih c'ulu̱j cho chaxilac tak eh yu'na nawa̱j tak chi nakawih'ic chi xa jenaj wach kac'ux chi ribanaric haj wilic ra̱j i kAja̱w Dios. Je' re' k'uru' re' hin til k'e̱' wo' chic xnimbic wach risukquil nic'ux ru̱c' chi'nchel xnibiraj re're'.

To̱b ta re' hat-tak xatcahnic tak ch'i'c ru̱c' take k'oric xnitz'ihmbaj je aweh tak chipam jenaj i hu̱j, re' hin ma' nti'bic ta chic nic'ux chiri̱j re're', to̱b ta nchel pan pe̱t xti'bic nak cho nic'ux ru'um xnicoj rehtal chi re' hat-tak xatcahnic tak chi ch'i'c xa re' la' ma' naht ta wo' xa'n tak chi je' re'.

Ru̱c' ritz'ihmjic je i hu̱j re're', re' hin k'e̱' nsukbic nic'ux yu'na ma' ru'um ta chi xiyew riti'quil ac'ux tak, ru'um la' chi ru̱c' riti'quil ac'ux tak xoquic cho re're' xcamanic aweh tak chi xajal tak wach ano'jbal chiwach i Dios. Til pa ricorquil re' hat-tak xti'bic ac'ux tak je' ricab nponic chiwach i Dios eh ru'um aj re', re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi ma' re' ta jeno' c'ahbilal xniban naxnitz'ihmbaj je aweh tak i hu̱j re're'.

Je' re' k'uru' re' ti'quil c'uxlis re' nchalic je' ricab nponic chiwach i Dios, re're' ncamanic chi re' ricapew-bal jeno' c'acharel enjahlic wach eh ru̱c' re're' erirak rico'lbal chiwach i ti'c'axic narichalic nak china̱. Nok je' re' nc'uluric ma'xta jeno' riwi̱' chi re' hoj enkati'saj kac'ux xa ru'um re're'. Haj cok wilic til ti' chi queh nanquic'ul i ti'quil c'uxlis, re' take tinamit ja' nquina'bej ta wach i Dios maj re' riti'quil quic'ux ma' eta ncamanic queh chi rijalaric wach quino'jbal eh ru'um re're' ma' eta wo' nquirak i junelic c'acharic.

Yu'na aj ru' chacoj tak rehtal i holonquilal xiban i Dios ru̱c' i riti'quil ac'ux tak xwih'ic junc'am. Je' re' nik'or maj xa chi je' re', re' hat-tak xatik'a̱' tak ti wach i c'axquilal xarak tak, ma' xa xacana̱' ta tak awi̱b xasic' la' tak ri̱j chi ma'xta awoquic tak jenaj ru̱c' i c'ahbilal xwih'ic chaxilac tak. Ma' xa re' ta re', ma' xponic ta la' wo' chawach tak chi wilic i c'ahchi' rimahcanic chaxilac tak. Je' re' ajic re' hat-tak xatyo'jic wo' tak ru'um chi xarak tak chiri̱j chaj bih ric'am cho i c'ahbilal c'ahchi' ribanaric re're'. Xiban wo' xa ji̱k' chic ac'ux tak chi awu̱c' ta nak chic wilco̱j ponok je' wo' xiban xa ji̱k' chic ac'ux tak chi narich'ukjic wach i c'axquilal re're' eh chi xayew wo' tak ric'axquil i hab wach c'ahchi' rimahcanic chaxilac tak. Ru̱c' aj no'jbal xa'n tak re're', ma'xta jeno' k'oric eniban chawi̱j tak chi ma' coric ta xatbanic tak maj xac'uhtaj tak lok chi xa'n tak ritik'injic i c'axquilal re're' chi coric.

Til pa ricorquil re' hin naxnitz'ihmbaj je i hu̱j xnitak'a̱' je aweh tak, ma' xnitz'ihmbaj ta je xa ru'um ta nak reh i c'acharel c'ahchi' ribanic i c'axquilal on ru'um ta nak reh i c'acharel xc'ulbic reh i ti'c'axic, xniban la' chi je' re' reh chi re' hat-tak enacoj tak rehtal chi re' hoj c'ahchi' kacapewenic je chawi̱j tak chiwach i Dios.

Ru'um aj re', re' hoj ayu' k'e̱' nkarak ricowil kac'ux ru̱c' take nkabiraj. Ma' xa re' ta re' ncowjic wi̱' kac'ux, til la' wo' chic k'e̱' xkarak risukquil kac'ux ru̱c' i sukquil c'uxlis xkilow ru̱c' i Ti̱to ru'um chi re' hat-tak je' na nchel xajot'saj tak wach i ra̱mna ru̱c' xa'n tak.

Nok re' Ti̱to ja' no̱j ta nak awu̱c' tak, chi ch'iclic nic'ux chawi̱j tak re' hin xnik'or reh chi holohic ano'jbal tak. Ru̱c' i k'oric xniban chawi̱j tak ma' xawesaj ta tak niq'uixbilal maj re' chi'nchel pa' bih xnik'or til coric wi̱n eh je' wo' re' xc'utunic ru̱c' i nik'orbal chawi̱j tak ru̱c' i Ti̱to, xelic wo' chi coric wach.

Yu'na re' Ti̱to nanc'ulic pa ric'ux riwih'ic cho chaxilac tak, til k'e̱' wo' chic ti' tiric'raj tak chiwach chi nok ja' nponic ta nak cho chaxilac tak maj re' hat-tak xatbirinic tak k'oric chiwach eh xac'ul tak pan sukquilal chi c'ahchi' ac'uhtam tak lok rilok'il i tijinic xiban aweh tak.

Je' aj re' ru' ru̱c' i no'jbal xac'uhtaj tak chiwach i kacha̱k' aj niminel Ti̱to, re' hin yu'na k'e̱' nsukbic nic'ux ru'um chi re' hin til enich'ica̱' nic'ux chawi̱j tak chi etiniminic tak k'oric chi ribanaric chi'nchel haj wilic i coric chiwach i Dios.

Re' chic yu'na was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, nwa̱j k'oric awu̱c' tak chiri̱j rinimal wach ric'axbal i Dios xicoj pan ca̱mna take ju'jun tuhm chi moloj wach aj niminel wilque̱b chipam riyuk'ul i Masero̱nya.

Je' re' nik'or maj chipam i rinimal wach ti'c'axic xquic'ul lok pan quic'acharic, xa c'acharic wo' nca'n ru̱c' rinimal wach sukquil c'uxlis eh je' wo' chi c'acharic nca'n pa rinimal niba'il. Ru'um reh i rinimal wach sukquil c'uxlis ch'i̱l i rinimal wach quiniba'il wilque̱b wi̱', re' take re' chi xa ye'lic chic quik'ab chi to'bonic, xca'n rinimal wach to'bonic queh take toco̱m chic kich aj niminel c'axic ti nca'n.

Re' hin ma' Lu̱' til niyew nichi̱' chi re' to'bonic xca'n re're' til wo' xa pan quic'ux xasjic cho eh weht'al wo' chi je' re' maj ma' xa ta re' haj wilic xca'n canar riye'eric xquiyew je' la' wo' til xquic'saj na̱ i haj nak ti wilic enquicuy ransil riye'eric chi to'bal.
Ma' xa ta re're', re' la' take re' til wo' cow xquipahkaj keh i ato'bil chi nakayeb k'ab queh chi nacoquic jenaj chi quitobjic take aj niminel reh Jesus.

Je' wo' chic, re' take re' til wo' chic k'e̱' to'bonic xca'n chi xa ta nak re' hoj c'ahchi' kuy'em so' chi je' re' naca'nam maj re' take re' til pe̱t xquik'ahsaj quicapew-bal pan k'ab i Ajabe̱s Jesus eh chiri̱j chic ru' xquiyew wo' quic'ux chi rimoloric wach kato'bal i hoj re' k'orel nic' pa' wach xa̱j ricojom i Dios pan ca̱mna.

Ru'um aj wo' chi je' re' xca'n take kich aj niminel re're', re' hoj xkacapaj chi k'e̱' tare̱t chi re' take toco̱m chic aj niminel je' ricab hat-tak, ewo' nca'n queh i to'bonic xca'n re're'. Ru'um aj re' xkapahkaj reh i kich aj niminel Ti̱to chi naricohlam wach rimoloric i ato̱b laj to'bonic chaxilac tak re' xip'ut wo' nak rimoloric cho wach chi to'bal queh take kas kacha̱k' aj niminel.

Re' aj chic awu̱c' hat-tak nc'utunic lok chi k'e̱' wo' chic tichol tak ricamanjic wach chi'nchel c'axbal riyew cho i Dios. Kak'or je' ricab til tichol tak richoporic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus, je' ricab til tichol tak rik'ormojic lok ribiral i Jesus je' wo' re' til tichol tak ricojoric ano'jbal tak xarak tak chipam i niminic eh je' wo' chi til nacowej awi̱b tak chi ribanaric haj wilic ra̱j i Dios. Ma' xa re' ta re', re' hat-tak tichol la' wo' tak ric'uhtjic i c'axoj i̱b je' ricab xatijej tak ku̱c'. Chi'nchel na'n tak ribanaric re're' nc'utunic lok chi re' hat-tak k'e̱' wo' chic tichol tak ribanaric chi'nchel. Yu'na aj ru' nka̱j chi k'e̱' wo' ticholok tak riye'eric i to'bal queh take kich aj niminel.

Re' c'ahchi' nik'orom wili ma' re' ta jenaj tak'anic chana̱ tak xa nwa̱j la' niyeb chawach tak chi wilic take toco̱m chic aj niminel xa nquitowej chic ribanaric i to'bonic i̱b eh re' wo' nak re' nwa̱j wilom chi na̱banam hat-tak chi quitobjic take awich aj niminel tak.

C'olok pan ac'ux tak chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xiyew cho chana̱ tak i rinimal wach rato'bil chi atobjic tak. Ru'um reh ric'axbal chana̱ tak to̱b ta yohbal wo' cho wach rilok'il ar pan taxa̱j, xchalic china̱ ac'al wili je' ricab jeno' c'acharel ma'xta ti ribihomal eh ma' nim ta wo' ti wach. Je' re' xiban i Jesus reh chi re' hoj re' kojniminic reh, ekoj-ehtric ru̱c' rinimal wach ribihomal.

Chiri̱j ribanjic i to'bonic queh take kich aj niminel reh Jesus xa jenaj no'jbal c'ahchi' niyeb je aweh tak ru'um nok til je' re' ric'ul chi nanibanam je awu̱c' tak. Nik'or chi je' re' maj re' hat-tak xatp'utbic tak cho reh chi pe̱t riye'eric i to'bal queh take kich aj niminel reh Jesus chiwach i ha̱b xelic lok, ru'um chi je' re' xchalic pan ac'ux tak ribanaric.

Ru'um aj re' chacohlaj tak wach riye'eric i to'bal xap'ut tak rimoloric wach chi queh take kas kacha̱k' aj niminel reh Jesus ar pa riyuk'ul i Jure̱ya reh chi je' ricab re' xasjic cho pan ac'ux tak eh xawa̱j tak ribanaric enacohlaj wo' tak wach chi suk ac'ux tak, re' k'orel haj pa' nponic awansil tak chi to'bonic.

Je' re' nipahkaj aweh tak chi na̱banam tak maj til pan coric hab pa' wach nasjic cho pa ra̱mna riye'eric jeno' to'bonic, re' no'jbal re're' k'e̱' nponic chiwach i Dios nok c'ahchi' riyew jenaj to'bonic re' k'orel haj pa' wo' ti wilic ricuy ransil riye'eric. Je' re' nik'or ru'um nok re' Dios ma' ripahkaj ta keh chi nakayeb i haj wilic ma'xta wo' ti ku̱c'.

Ru̱c' ribanjic i to'bonic i̱b ma' nwa̱j ta nik'orom chi wilic take toco̱m chic kich aj niminel equibihomric ru̱c' ato'bal tak eh re' hat-tak eticahnic tak pan c'axquilal laj c'acharic, c'ahchi' la' nik'orom i wili re' nwa̱j chiri̱j chi enwih'ic jenaj suk laj c'acharic pan junwachil chi aj niminel.

Je' re' k'uru' re' nwa̱j chiri̱j i k'oric niban je aweh tak re' chi chi'nchel etiwih'ic tak pan jenaj wach wih'ic ru̱c' pa' bih wilic aweh tak. Yu'na re' hat-tak til wilic chi manlic i pa' bih aweh tak eh eriban chi enato'bej tak take kich aj niminel re' wilque̱b pan niba'il. Pan jeno' ok k'i̱j nok re' ok chic hat-tak wilca̱t tak pan ric'axquil niba'il eh re' take kich aj niminel wilic chic pa' bih queh, ewo' tiquito'bej tak cho hat-tak.

Je' aj re' ru' nik'or chi naribanaric reh chi jenaj wach wih'ic enbanaric je' ricab wo' rik'or chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios. Ar je' wili rik'or: “Naxkajic cho i wi'c pan taxa̱j, hab pa' wach i c'acharel q'uih riwa' ximol ma' yohbal ta wo' chic xtikinic chiwach. Je' wo' re' xa nech' ti riwa' ximol, xa manlic wo' ti xtikinic chiwach, nqui rik'or.

Re' hin k'e̱' nitioxej johtok i kAja̱w Dios ru'um chi re're' xicoj pa ra̱mna i kich aj niminel Ti̱to chi ncapewenic chawi̱j tak eh chi ti' wo' naca̱t tak ric'ram je' ricab nok ti' wo' tikic'raj tak i hoj eh chi til kojcapewenic wo' chawi̱j tak.

Je' re' ajic ru̱c' i ricapew-bal i Ti̱to chawi̱j tak naxkapahkaj reh chi narojic nak awu̱c' tak ar Cori̱nto, xic'u'lej wo' na̱ keh chi je' re' naribanam. Je' re' xiban maj wilic nak chic cho pa ra̱mna chi narojic ca̱t tak rik'o'rem cho, xo̱j wo' ru'um chi k'e̱' ti' tiric'raj tak.

Chiri̱j i Ti̱to wili c'ahchi' katak'a̱b je jenaj kich aj niminel re' holohic laj k'oric bano̱j chiri̱j chi quixilac take moloj wach aj niminel wilque̱b xa haj ye'a̱b eh je' re' bano̱j ru'um reh ricamaj ribanam chi rik'ormojic i holohic laj c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus.

Ma' xa re' ta re' nkak'or chiri̱j i kich aj niminel re're' je' la' wo' chi re' take ju'jun tuhm chi moloj wach aj niminel xquipahba̱' ru' chi naribanam chi kich'i̱l chi ojic k'ahsanel reh i to'bal moloj wach awu'um hat-tak chi queh take kas kacha̱k' c'axic ti nca'n ar Jerusalen, chiri̱j chi rimolom chic cho wach i chi'nchel to'bal. Ru̱c' rilmijic ri̱j i to'bal queh take kas kacha̱k' c'ahchi' ka'nam, nka̱j chi re' kAja̱w Dios enye'eric rilok'il eh je' wo' nka̱j chi nareht'aljic chi re' hoj til nka̱j quitobjic take kas kacha̱k'.
Je' re' riwi̱' rilmijic ri̱j i rinimal wach to'bal c'ahchi' ka'nam, re' nka̱j chiri̱j chi ma' hab ta wach enk'oric chiki̱j chi ma' holohic ta rilmijic ri̱j c'ahchi'co̱j.
Je' re' ajic re' hoj xa nok wo' cho tiklic wach pan kac'ux rilmijic i to'bal re're' ru̱c' coric wach c'uxlis, ma' xa re' ta chiwach i Dios je' la' wo' re' chi quiwach take tinamit.

Je' wo' chic xkatak'a̱' je jenaj chic kas kacha̱k' aj niminel chiqui̱j take tak'amaj je re're'. Re' hoj q'uih chic pech xkilow rino'jbal i kich aj niminel re're' chi til riyew ric'ux ru̱c' rehreh wach camanic chipam ricamaj i Dios eh yu'na til wo' chic xa ji̱k' chic ric'ux chi ojic awu̱c' tak ru'um nok til wo' chic ch'iclic ric'ux chawi̱j tak.

Re' aj chic chiri̱j i Ti̱to, re' hin nwa̱j nik'orom chi re're' jenaj wich camanom pa ricamaj i Dios eh waj to'o̱l wo' chi ribanaric chi re' hat-tak na̱cowjic tak chipam animinic tak. Re' chic chiqui̱j take quib kas kacha̱k' aj niminel c'ahchi' cojic chiri̱j i Ti̱to, re' take re' xipahbabjic cu'um take ju'jun tuhm chi moloj wach aj niminel chi caj tz'e' wa̱ch eh ru'um wo' reh c'acharic nca'n ru' nye'eric rilok'il Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Til aj nipahkaj aweh tak chi chac'uhtaj wo' tak achak'lamil tak cu̱c' take tak'amaj je re're' eh je' re' nipahkaj aweh tak reh chi re' take re' ch'i̱l wo' take kich aj niminel reh ju'jun tuhm chi moloj wach aj niminel enquicoj rehtal chi wilic riwi̱' chi keh chi k'e̱' ti' tikic'raj tak.
Re' chic chiri̱j i tumi̱n to'bal c'ahchi' amolom tak wach chi queh take kich aj niminel wilque̱b ar pan tinamit Jerusalen, ma' curman ta wo' chic chi nanitz'ihmbam je.

Je' re' nik'or ru'um nok weht'alim chi re' hat-tak til rik'or ac'ux tak quitobjic take kich aj niminel c'axic ti nca'n. Ru'um re're' naquink'oric chiri̱j i holohic laj ano'jbal tak re're' cu̱c' take kich aj niminel aj ayu' Masero̱nya, quink'oric chiri̱j chi xa suk chic nic'ux chawi̱j tak. Nok niban chi je' re' cu̱c', ma' nicana̱' ta rik'ormojic queh chi re' hat-tak jinabir chic ap'utum tak cho rimoloric wach tumi̱n to'bal queh take kich aj niminel aj Jerusalen eh ru̱c' i k'oric nik'or queh re're', q'uihal queh take aj niminel aj ayu' xquichop quic'ux chi rimoloric wo' wach tumi̱n to'bal queh take kas kacha̱k' c'axic ti nca'n.

Ru'um chi re' nik'orbal niyeb chawi̱j tak chiri̱j i holohic laj ano'jbal tak re're' ma' nwa̱j ta chi xa eno̱j cahnok chi xa k'oric, re' hin xnitak'a̱' je awu̱c' tak take kich aj niminel re' xi'o̱j chiri̱j i Ti̱to eh je' re' xniban reh chi etiquito'bej tak chi ribehsjic chi coric i rimoloric wach i rituminal i to'bal re're', je' ricab nik'orom cho chawi̱j tak chi xa tikilca̱t ok wo' na̱wih'ic tak chi rik'ahsjic i tumi̱n re're'.

Je' re' nik'or maj wi wilic ok take kich aj niminel aj Masero̱nya equitahkanic je wi̱n naquinojok awu̱c' tak, ma' nwa̱j ta chi re' take re' etiquirak tak chi ma' tiklic ta wach i tumi̱n c'ahchi' amolom tak wach eh ru̱c' re're' ekojcahnic pan q'uixbilal chi ma' coric ta enelic wi̱' i pa' bih nik'orom cho chawi̱j tak chi pa'lic nic'ux chi je' re'. Wi je' ta nak re' enc'uluric ma' xa re' ta wo' i hoj ekojcahnic pan q'uixbilal je' la' wo' hat-tak.

Je' aj re' ru' re' hin xwilow chi curman xnipahkaj queh take xib chi kich aj niminel re're' chi nacojic chi pe̱t be̱h take ponok chi niwach awu̱c' tak reh chi naca̱t tak quito'bem chi rimoloric wach i to'bal ak'orom tak chic cho wi̱n chi na̱to'bonic tak wi̱'. Je' re' c'ahchi' nibanam reh nok naquinponok awu̱c' tak, molo̱j ok chic wach eh tiklic ok chic i to'bal re're' reh chi je' re' ewo' nc'utunic lok chi re' hat-tak til wo' ru̱c' ac'ux tak c'ahchi' abanam tak i to'bonic ma' re' ta nchel xa ru'um ta nak chi re' hin c'ahchi' nipahkanic aweh tak.

Chacoj tak rehtal i jenaj k'oric re' rik'or chi je' wili: “Re' jeno' tico̱l wi mahnic' ti riye'a̱b ritic wach xa mahnic' wo' ti wach ritic erimol raj nchel i nim riye'a̱b ritic wach yohbal wo' wach i wach ritic narimolom, nqui rik'or. Nic' pa' wach nc'ulmujic ru̱c' i aj tico̱l re're' je' wo' re' nc'ulmujic chipam rinimjic i Jesus ru̱c' riye'eric take pa' bih to'bal queh take kich aj niminel.

Ru'um aj re' chi kaju'junal i hoj aj niminel nik'or aweh tak i wili: Pa' aj wo' wilic i to'bal xik'or ka̱mna chi nakayeb, re' wo' re' kayew tak. Ma' nkayew re' ma' nka̱j ta wo' riye'eric eh ma' nkayew pa' bih xa ru'um chi hoj ta nak mino̱j chipam. Je' re' nik'or maj re're' nponic chiwach i Dios, re' nok jeno' aj niminel riyew jeno' pa' bih chi xa suk chic pa ric'ux.

Je' re' k'uru' wi re' hat-tak til nayew tak pa' bih chi suk ac'ux tak, re' Dios c'axic na chi reh chi eriyew cho rinimal rito'bal chana̱ tak? Ma'xta! Re' la' re' eriyew cho riq'uihal wach ricuse'sbal chana̱ tak cu rehtal eniq'uic na̱ reh chi je' re' xa wilic ok wo' chana̱ tak chi'nchel wach ricuse'sbal i Dios eh chi je' re' ena'n tak ribanaric take rehreh yohbal wach holohic laj bano̱j.

Re' k'oro̱j lok wili ric'u'lej ri̱b ch'i̱l i k'oro̱j cho chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios narik'or chi je' wili: “Re' c'acharel riyew eh ripuhcaj queh take niba̱' i pa' bih wilic reh, ma' nsahchic ta chic wach i richak'lamil chi quiwach take tinamit. Je' wo' re' riban i Dios, til riyew wo' cho ricuse'sbal chi quina̱ take nca'n i to'bonic eh re' richak'lamil re're' ma' jaruj ensahchic wach chi quina̱, nqui rik'or.

Je' re' k'uru' je' ricab nok re' Dios riyew cho ija' reh aj tico̱l eh re' wo' re' nye'bic chi naribanam riwa' riha̱', re' wo' re' nye'bic reh i rinimal wach cuse'sbal chana̱ tak re' haj wilic nato'bej tak wi̱' take i c'axic ti nca'n. Ru̱c' i quitobjic take c'axic ti nca'n re're' k'e̱' tare̱t chi banaric, re' Dios nariq'uihsam wach ricuse'sbal chana̱ tak eh je' wo' chi quina̱ ru'.

Pa ricorquil, re' Dios nariyeb cho chi'nchel wach ricuse'sbal chana̱ tak eh je' re' naribanam reh chi re' hat-tak k'e̱' wo' chic etito'bonic tak cu̱c' take awas acha̱k' tak. Ru̱c' re're', ewo' nye'eric rilok'il i Dios chiri̱j ac'acharic hat-tak ru'um reh i kacamaj enka'n chi rilmijic ri̱j i to'bal c'ahchi' rimoloric wach.

Je' re' nok ru̱c' quitobjic ena'n tak take kich aj niminel wilque̱b ar Jerusalen, ma' xa re' ta encamanic chi ye'bal queh kich aj niminel ar re' haj wilic i curman chi queh pa̱m quic'axquil til la' wo' k'e̱' encamanic chi ye'bal johtok riminal wach ritioxjic i Dios.

Je' re' nik'or maj nok re' take kich aj niminel ar Jerusalen enquicoj rehtal nic' wach holonquilal ano'jbal tak chi to'bonic, re' take re' enquiyew rilok'il i kAja̱w Dios ru'um reh birinic k'oric na'n tak chiwach i Dios. Je' re' nik'or maj re' hat-tak xak'ahsaj wo' awi̱b tak chi rinimjic i lok' laj c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' wo', re' take re' naquiyeb rilok'il i Dios ru'um reh i rinimal wach to'bonic c'ahchi' abanam tak ma' xa re' ta cu̱c' ru' je' la' wo' cu̱c' take toco̱m chic aj niminel.

Ma' xa ta re're' naca'nam take kich aj niminel re're', re' la' take re' naquipahkam wo' ric'axbal i Dios chana̱ tak ru'um chi k'e̱' wo' chic ti' tiquic'raj tak xa ru'um reh rinimal wach ric'axbal i Dios nwih'ic chana̱ tak ru̱c' ribanjic take to'bonic i̱b.
Chi je' aj re' ru', re' hoj k'e̱' nkatioxej reh Dios chi xa je' na nchel jeno' si̱ xiyew keh rinimal wach ric'axbal re' ma' nkarak ta wo' chic kak'orbal chiwach i Dios chi ritioxjic johtok reh.

Yu'na was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, re' hin ma' Lu̱' nwa̱j k'oric awu̱c' tak chiri̱j i no'jbal c'ahchi' rik'ormojic cu'um take ju'jun c'acharel chi re' hin quinyo'jic chi ricojoric wajawric chi k'oric nok wilqui̱n chawach tak, xa re' la' nok xa chiwach chic jeno' hu̱j nitz'ihmbaj je pa' bih nicapaj, cow quink'oric je awu̱c' tak nanquik'or. Re' hin ru̱c' k'ochlic ch'i̱l ch'ublic wach no'jbal je' ricab xic'uhtaj i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric nwa̱j nipahkam aweh tak i ato'bil wili:

Naquinponok awu̱c' tak ma̱ban tak chi equink'oric ru̱c' i wajawric wilic chi k'oric je' ricab nicapam chic chiri̱j chi nanik'o'rem take wi̱' i quicapewenic reh chi re' hoj c'ahchi'co̱j chi camanic xa ru̱c' i no'jbal reh ayu' wach ac'al.

Re' nquik'or re're' ma' coric ta maj to̱b ta cu ayu' pe wach ac'al c'acharic nka'n ma' ra̱j ta rik'orom chi xa ru'um ta nak ru' re' hoj ru̱c' i no'jbal xa reh ayu' wach ac'al nka'n chi no̱j lok wach ricamaj i Dios. Ma'xta, re' la' hoj ru̱c' i no'jbal nchalic ru̱c' i Dios nka'n ricamaj ru'.

Je' re' nik'or ru'um chi re' take katz'abal re' ncamanic keh hoj chi narojic lok wach ricamaj i Dios ma' re' ta ayu' wach ac'al xmikric cho, re' la' take tz'a'bal re're' ru̱c' i Dios xmikric eh ru'um re' wilic rajawric chi ribanaric haj wilic nponic chiwach ru'. Ru'um aj chi je' re' riwi̱' take katz'abal, ru̱c' re're' enkayew pan ac'al chi'nchel wach ajawric i nuctic cho chi raj ixowonel i Dios.

Je' wo' nkayew wo' pan ac'al take nic' pa' nimal ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal ch'i̱l i nic' pa' nimal i k'etbal ncojoric reh chi ma' eta ncojoric wach i c'uhbal re' nbanic chi re' take c'acharel enquina'bej wach Dios. Je' wo' chic, ru̱c' katz'abal re're' nkacoj chi rehquen ro̱k k'ab i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi'nchel i xa pa' jaric capew-bal on no'jbal re' nbanic chi re' take c'acharel ma' nquicoj ta wach i Dios.

Ma' xa re' ta re're' katobjic riban, je' la' wo' riban chi re' hoj aj c'uhbalanel ekojk'asamric chi quik'ilmijic chi'nchel take ma' quibirinic ta k'oric chi ric'amaric na̱ ric'uhbal i Jesus eh til je' re' nka'n re' cok ru' til cu rehtal nkilow chi re' hat-tak nac'am tak chic na̱ i c'uhbal re're' chi coric.

Til nipahkaj aweh tak chi re' hat-tak cha'n tak ri̱j chi'nchel pa ricorquilal. Wi hab wach ricapaj pa ric'ux chi ye'o̱j rajawric ru'um i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, chiban wo' ri̱j chi til re' hoj ye'o̱j wo' kajawric ru'um i Jesus je' ricab ye'o̱j reh ru'.

Coric ru', k'e̱' na so' niban wi̱b ru̱c' i wajawric xiyew i kAja̱w xa re' la' i wajawric re're' ncamanic chi cowsbal reh acapew-bal tak eh ma' re' ta chi yojbal reh acapew-bal tak. Ru̱c' rinimsjic niwach niban, ma' jaruj ta equincahnic pan q'uixbilal ru'um chi ma' eta no̱j elok wach chi coric i ninimsaj wi̱' niwach.
Je' re' nik'or je aweh tak reh chi ma' eta nacapaj tak chi re' hin nanitz'ihmbaj je take hu̱j aweh tak, niban xa reh yo'sbal aweh tak.

Je' re' nik'or maj wilic take quik'oric chaxilac tak chi je' wili: «Re' ma' Lu̱' nok pan hu̱j riban cho k'ilo̱j, ru̱c' cow laj k'oric ntz'ihminic cho. Tz'a̱b ru' nok chi kaxilac chic wilic ma' nc'utunic ta wo' so' chi wilic rajawric rik'orbal eh ma' xa c'axbal ta wo' chic wach nk'oric, nqui take.
Re' take je' re' quik'oric curman chi naquirakam chiri̱j chi re' nkatz'ihmbaj je pan hu̱j chi cu naht wilco̱j je awu̱c' tak, til re' wo' re' nakojic ka'nam nakojponok awu̱c' tak.

Til coric, re' hoj ma' eta nkajunehtej ki̱b ma' wo' enkapaj ki̱b cu̱c' take xa holohic chic quik'oric chiqui̱j chiquibil qui̱b. Re' take re' xa junehtenic tak i̱b je' wo' xa pajoj tak i̱b nca'n chiquibil qui̱b eh re' nca'n re're' xa jenaj memil laj no'jbal.

Re' cok i hoj ma' eta nkanimsaj ki̱b chiri̱j jeno' camanic ma' ye'o̱j ta wo' keh ribanaric je' ricab nca'n take toco̱m chic chucul aj c'uhbalanel. Haj cok wilic k'e̱' nsukbic wi̱' kac'ux, chiri̱j i camanic xitak'a̱' ribanaric keh i Dios, re' cu xo̱j lok wach rik'ormojic awu̱c' hat-tak aj Cori̱nto.

Ru'um aj re' nok re' hoj nakojk'oric je awu̱c' tak, ma' xa c'ahchi' ta kojic kaminim ki̱b awu̱c' tak je' ricab nok jeno' winak xa eno̱j rimin ri̱b chipam ricamaj chic jeno' c'acharel je' ricab nak enka'n i hoj wi ta nak ma' ye'o̱j chiki̱j chi nakacamanic chaxilac tak. Nik'or chi je' re' maj pa ricorquil, re' hoj xojponic chi pe̱t cu ar ponok awu̱c' tak chi rik'ormojic i holohic laj c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Je' re' nok re' hoj ma' c'ahchi' ta kanimsam ki̱b chiri̱j lok i camanic ye'o̱j keh ru'um i Dios je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak kanimsam ki̱b ru̱c' quicamaj take toco̱m chic aj c'uhbalanel. Re' la' hoj til nkuy'ej chi rehreh c'ahchi' ricowjic ac'ux tak chipam animinic tak, re' kacamaj i hoj eno̱j lok wach xa haj nahtil ponok tinamit ru̱c' ato'bal tak.

Je' re' ajic re' kacamaj i hoj narojic lok wach cu junk'at je atinamital hat-tak, re' cok ru' nakic'ram ki̱b chi ma' eta nkaq'uihsaj ki̱b chi rik'ormojic lok chi re' hoj xojbanic reh jeno' camanic ribanam chic lok jeno' hab wach ye'o̱j chiri̱j chi naribanaric i camanic re're'.

Ru̱c' i wili k'uru' nwa̱j nik'orom je' ricab rik'or ar chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' i k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios. Ar je' wili rik'or: “Hab wach i c'acharel ra̱j riq'uihsam ri̱b, re' ok ricamaj ribanam i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s ru̱c', re' ok re' chiq'uihsaj wach rilok'il, nqui rik'or.

Ru̱c' take k'oric re're' nkarak chiri̱j chi re' c'acharel re' suk ilo̱j cho ru'um i kAja̱w, re' wo' i hab wach k'oro̱j ru'um ru' chi coric wach ric'ux eh ma' re' ta i c'acharel rinimsaj ri̱b chi ribil ri̱b.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel yu'na nwa̱j nipahkam aweh tak chi quinacuy tak so' maj wilic take k'oric nanik'orom re' chawach hat-tak je' na ricab rik'orbal jeno' saban laj winak. Nipahkaj aweh tak chi quinabiraj tak so' k'uru'

maj pa ricorquil re' hin til xa ic'lic chic nina̱ chi acha'jaljic tak je' wo' ricab riban i Dios chi ic'lic wo' na̱ chawi̱j hat-tak. Je' re' nik'or maj re' hin wilqui̱n chi awiliric tak chipam animinic tak cu rehtal tinik'ahsaj tak cok chiwach i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi sak wach acapew-bal ano'jbal tak je' ricab richa'jaljic ri̱j ric'acharic i rixk'u̱n riban jeno' ajabe̱s re' ra̱j chiri̱j chi ma' jopo̱j ta wach ric'acharic i rixk'u̱n nachik'ahsaj reh jeno' ac'un re' enpahkanic reh chi naric'amam chi rehq'ue̱n.

Je' re' ajic ru'um chi wilqui̱n chi awiliric tak k'e̱' wo' capewenic niban chawi̱j tak. Je' re' nik'or maj pa ricorquil re' hin quinyo'jic chi etijot'oric tak je' ricab jot'o̱j xiban i aj Yahm reh i E̱wa na xic'uhtaj ri̱b chiwach chi je' riwi̱' jenaj a̱k' je' wo' re' hat-tak wilca̱t wo' tak pan yohbalil chi re' acapew-bal tak enjot'oric chi enacana̱' tak richoporic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh chi ma' eta chic nanimej tak ru̱c' jenaj tz'iro̱j wach c'uxlis.

Re' rik'ormojic aweh tak chi je' re' wilic riwi̱' maj nicoj rehtal chi re' hat-tak xa hab wach take quiponic awu̱c' tak chi rik'ormojic toco̱m chic ribiral i Jesus, toco̱m chic ribiral i Lok' laj Uxlabal eh toco̱m wo' chic ribiral c'uhbal chiri̱j i co'lbal i̱b riyew i Dios re' hat-tak xa suk wo' nac'ul awu̱c' tak take k'oric nca'n to̱b ta wo' toco̱m chic chiwach i je' ricab kak'orom aweh tak i hoj.

Til quinacuy tak chic so' k'uru' ru̱c' take memil laj k'oric nik'or aweh tak, xa re' la' hin naquink'oric chi je' re' wilic riwi̱' chi wi̱n maj re' take quiponic awu̱c' tak chi c'ahchi' quik'orom chi re' hin ma'xta ti niwa'ric chiwach quiwa'ric take nquitz'ak qui̱b chi pahbamaj take chi nahsil c'amol quibe̱h raj tahkanel i Jesus eh chi til k'e̱' wo' chic lo̱k' take. Til pa ricorquil, re' hin nirak chiri̱j chi chaweh tak re' hin ma' je' ta wo' ti re' niwa'ric

on chi re' hin ma' xa holohic ta chic k'oric niban naquink'oric chi quiwach take tinamit xa re' la' re're' ma' re' ta jenaj pitbal chi rinabjic i ricorquil weht'alim chiri̱j i Dios. Ma' xa re' ta re're', je' la' wo' wilic riwi̱' chi re' hat-tak til aweht'alim wo' tak re're' chi coric eh je' re' nik'or maj q'uih pech xnic'uhtaj lok ru̱c' nino'jbal chi je' re' eh je' wo' re' xc'utunic lok ru̱c' take pa' bih niban chawach tak.

Je' re' k'uru' nok re' hin xatnic'uhbalej tak chiri̱j i holohic laj c'uhbal nchalic ru̱c' i Dios, ma' xnipahkaj ta ritz'akil nicamaj aweh tak, maje'? Re' cok xniban xnit'uchsaj wi̱b chawach tak chi je' hin jeno' awaj camanom tak eh xniban chi je' re' reh chi yu'na re' hat-tak ye'o̱j ok alok'il tak. Chaj bih nacapaj tak chiri̱j i xniban? Holohic on mahc on nchel xniban chawach tak ru̱c' re're'?

Til ricorquilal, wilic take nquik'or chi mahc xniban maj nok xinwih'ic awu̱c' tak chi ac'uhbaljic tak xnicana̱' chi re' take aj niminel reh Jesus pan tak toco̱m chic ye'a̱b xito'bonic wi̱n ru̱c' quitz'a̱k. Chi queh take je' ru̱c' je' re' nquik'or xa je' na nchel xnimak' cho quitz'a̱k take aj niminel re're' reh chi xinwih'ic awu̱c' tak.

Je' wo' nok xinwih'ic cho chaxilac tak, re' hin naxponic wo' rik'ijil chi ma'xta nak chic bih wilic wi̱n ma' hab ta wach aweh tak xnich'i'taj ru̱c' pa' bih wi̱n maj re' take kich aj niminel ar pa riyuk'ul i Masero̱nya xic'ulic lok chi ricanabjic pa' bih ajwal wach chi wi̱n. Xa xwilow aj wo' ti ricorquil chi'nchel re're' reh chi ma' xniyew ta jeno' ihk chana̱ tak. Je' wo' chic re' nanibanam johtok chi kawach.

Ru̱c' i coric ricoj pan wa̱mna i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi xa re' cok wi re' Dios ma' toco̱m chic no'jbal ericoj pa nicapew-bal, re' hin ar chipam take riyuk'ul i Aca̱ya ma'xta bih enpitbic wi̱n chi riq'uihsjic so' wi̱b re' ma' janc'al ta niyeb k'ab chi ric'uluric so' nito'bal awu̱c'.

Chaj wa'ric nanik'or chi je' re'? C'ahchi' na nik'orom ru'um chi re' hin ma' ti' ta tiwic'raj tak? Ma'xta! Til pan coric re' hin til ti' tiwic'raj tak eh re're' reht'alim wo' i Dios chi coric i c'ahchi' nik'orom.

Pa ricorquil re' hin nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi re' hin xa nanitikim wo' ju' ribanaric i no'jbal c'ahchi'qui̱n chi ma' nic'ul ta aweh tak ritz'akil nicamaj chi k'oro̱j c'uhbal chaxilac tak. Je' re' nik'or maj wi ta nak xniyew k'ab chi re' hat-tak xinato'bej tak, re' take toco̱m chic c'acharel re' nquitz'ak qui̱b chi aj c'uhbalanel take enak nquik'or chi ma'xta bih jeno' jalbal wach nc'utunic chi kaxilac i hoj quich'i̱l take ru'. Je' nak re' nquik'or ru'um nok chi kunchelal nak nkac'ul kato'bal awu̱c' tak eh ru̱c' re're' riman nak chic enquinimsaj qui̱b chi aj k'orol wo' take reh riC'uhbal i Dios.

Re' take aj c'uhbalanel re're' xa banol quiwach take chi pahbamaj take chi aj k'orol c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh xa aj jot'o̱l aj niminel take. Je' wo' xa nca'n ti qui̱b chi pahbamaj take chi aj k'orol c'uhbal take chiri̱j i Jesus.

Re' no'jbal re're' chi xa nquimiksaj qui̱b chi raj k'orol take i Jesus ma' re' ta sachbal c'uxlis maj je' wo' re' nbanic i aj Yahm re' wilic chi cajawil, riban wo' ri̱b chi je' jenaj aj tz'e' wa̱ch aj c'uhtunel reh sakom.

Ru'um aj re' ma' re' ta sachbal c'uxlis chi re' take raj camanom aj Yahm nquimiksaj wo' qui̱b chi coric laj aj camanom take reh i coric wach c'acharic xa re' la' naponok rik'ijil, re' wo' k'orel nic' pa' wo' wach ripahkaj cho i quibano̱j re' wo' re' naribanic chi narisacharic quiwach.

Yu'na nwa̱j wo' chic nica'pechem rik'ormojic aweh tak chi ma' hab wach ncapewenic reh chi re' hin, hin saban ru̱c' take nanik'orom aweh tak. Wi hab wach nchel ricapaj chi hin saban, chicuy quiribiraj wo' ti so' ru̱c' take nik'orbal nik'or je' ricab nak eriban ru̱c' jeno' c'acharel pan risabanil so' nk'oric. Je' re' nipahkaj reh chi naribanam reh chi ewo' nwih'ic so' nilok'il chi eninimsaj so' wi̱b.
Re' cok ru', yu'na re' take nanik'orom lok wili chi nimsbal wi̱b ma' re' ta ru̱c' i Dios nchalic rik'ormojic xa je' la' na so' pan sabanil enik'or take.
On ma' riwi̱' ta chi je' re' eniban, nanacapaj tak? Wi yohbal wach take nquinimsaj qui̱b je' ricab nquinimsaj qui̱b take ma' re' ta take aj niminel ma' riwi̱' ta na chi je' wo' re' nanibanam hin?
Til weht'al chi cu naqui̱nacuyum tak so' eh nik'or chi je' re' maj ru̱c' rinimal wach ano'jbal tak wilic je' ricab nak'or tak, xa suk chic quibirmijic na'n tak take xa aj chucul aj c'uhbalanel take!

Ma' xa re' ta re' na'n tak, xa nacuy la' wo' tak i tak'anic nca'n chana̱ tak nok tiquicoj tak chi je' ricab jeno' caj tz'e' wa̱ch, on naquic'acharic ru̱c' atz'a̱k tak, on nanquiyew qui̱b chi suk awu̱c' tak ru̱c' jot'o̱j, on natiquiyew tak chi ti'c'axic je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak quimolom panak' awach tak chi k'abis.

Chi wi̱n i hin je' na so' q'uixbilal rik'ormojic chawach tak chi ma' xka'n ta keh je' ricab nca'n take aj chucul laj aj c'uhbalanel re're', xa re' la' ru'um chi re' take re' xa nquinimsaj qui̱b chi quibil qui̱b, re' hin naninimsam wo' so' wi̱b ru̱c' rik'ormojic take k'oric nanibanam xa je' pan sabanil.

Re' take aj c'uhbalanel re're' nquik'or chi re' take re' wilic cajawric chana̱ hat-tak ru'um chi ar xi'asjic take chi quixilac take chiho̱j chi ritinami̱t i Dios. Je' wo' chic ru'um chi c'ahchi' quitahkem ri̱j i lok'onic tak'amaj cho ribanaric cu'um take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh ru'um chi ra̱' ri'sil wo' cho ma' Awraham take xa nquinimsaj chic qui̱b. Xa re' la' re' hin nwa̱j wo' nik'orom chi re' hin til ar wo' chi quixilac take c'acharel chiho̱j cho ru'um i Dios chi ritinami̱t xinasjic cho. Til nic'am wo' na̱ i lok'onic tak'amaj chi naribanaric eh til hin wo' ra̱' ri'sil cho i ma' Awraham. Ru̱c' chi'nchel wili ma'xta so' bih enquinimsaj wi̱' quiwach chi re' take re' k'e̱' ta wo' chic quiwa'ric chiwach niwa'ric i hin.

Wi re' take aj c'uhbalanel re're' nquik'abej qui̱b chi raj camanom take i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, je' wo' re' i hin nik'or chi til wo' hin manlic raj camanom i Jesus to̱b ta nchel re' k'oric wili c'ahchi' nik'orom xa je' pan sabanil. Re' hin til k'e̱' wo' chic camanic nibanam chaxilac tak chi quiwach ru'. Q'uih pech xincojoric pan che̱' chi quiwach ru'. Q'uih pech xintz'uhumjic chi quiwach ru' chi xa cuc' tak chic ma' quinquirip'a̱' je q'uih pech.
Ho'o̱b pech xintz'uhumjic cu'um queh take nahsil c'amol kabe̱h hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, xa chic jenaj ma'xta ca'winak chi tz'uhu̱m nquiyew wi̱n reh ju'jun pech.

Je' wo' chic oxpech wo' xintz'uhumjic chi xiq'uey. Jenaj pech xa chic q'uisi̱n ma' xincansjic chi abaj cu'um take waj ixowonel. Oxpech chic xa q'uisi̱n chic ma' xinjihk'ic pa rinimal ha' ru'um chi hitlijic i ma' laj cano̱wa c'ahchi' wojic wi̱' eh jenaj chic pech, jenaj k'i̱j ru̱c' jenaj ak'ab xniban pan ha'.

Je' wo' chic, chipam take be̱h quino̱j quinchalic wi̱' chi rik'ormojic i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus, q'uih pech quiniq'uic pan tak yohbalil. Wilic pech quiniq'uic chipam riyohbalil ransil nimak tak ro̱k ha'. Wilic pech pan yohbalil cu'um take aj lek' qui'elic cho pa nibe̱h. Ma' xa re' ta re' nic'ul, je' la' wo' quiniq'uic pan yohbal cu'um take wich nitinami̱t ch'i̱l wo' take ma' re' ta wich nitinami̱t ar pan tak nimak chi cuc'tak tinamit. Je' wo' chic, re' yohbalil hin ritahkem xa pa' quiniq'uic wi̱' je' ricab pan tak rinimal wach ha' eh je' wo' re' cu̱c' take xa chucul aj niminel take.

Nwa̱j wo' nik'orom chi re' hin ma' hab ta wach xnich'i'taj ru̱c' pa' bih curman chi wi̱n, xincamanic la' chi cow eh ru'um re' weht'alim wi̱n i k'uhtic riyew i cow wach camanic. Eli̱c wo' pech quinsak'ic china̱ nicamaj. Wilic pech quiniq'uic pan cuyuj wi'c pan cuyuj ha', pan cuyuj wi'c chi lok'onic wach i Dios, pan cuyuj c'uxic eh je' wo' quincahnic wo' chi ma'xta chic niso' socbal wi̱b chi coric.

Xa chi'nchel aj wach rimol ri̱b chi nina̱, xa re' la' chiri̱j lok i wili, wilic jenaj chic rinimal wach capewenic noquic cho wu̱c' chi je' wili: Eli̱c i k'i̱j quincapewenic chiri̱j nic' ta wo' wach wilque̱b take ju'jun ch'uk chi aj niminel wilque̱b xa haj ye'a̱b.

Nok jeno' aj niminel wilic pan ti' ru'um chi ma' cow ta ti ric'ux chiri̱j i Jesus, re' hin nwic'raj wo' wi̱n i riti'quilal ru'um til quincapewenic chiri̱j ru'. Je' wo' re' wi hab wach riyoj ric'ux jeno' ras richa̱k' cu rehtal ricut wo' chic je pan mahc, china̱ i hab wach re're' k'e̱' nanjohtic cho nijosk'il ru'um reh no'jbal riban.

Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, ru'um nok curman chi re' hin enitik ju' i nimsbal wi̱b chawach tak, naninimsam wi̱b ru̱c' take pa' bih nic'ulum lok re' nc'utunic wi̱' chi cu ja' nponic ta nicowil chi ricuyuric ti' c'axic chi wibil wi̱b.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' Dios re' ye'o̱j rilok'il chi junelic k'i̱j sakom, re' rAja̱w i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus, re're' til reht'alim chi re' c'ahchi' nik'orom je aweh tak chiri̱j take nic'axquilal til coric.

Je' ricab junpech ar pan tinamit Tama̱sco, re' pahbamaj chi aj chopol na̱ i tinamit re're' ru'um Are̱ta re' jenaj wo' queh take raj to'o̱l i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma, re're' xicoj take sol aj cha'janel reh elbal reh tinamit re're', je' re' xiban reh nak chi naqui̱nquichopom je wi xinelic nak cho ar.

Xa re' la' chipam i tinamit re're', wilic wo' take wich aj nimanel xquisic' ri̱j nic' wach nok re' hin nawiq'uic nak chipam i c'axquilal re're'. Je' aj wili xca'n wi̱n reh chi nawelic je' chipam i tinamit re're': Re' take re' xinquicoj pan jenaj ma' laj chacach eh xinquikahsaj cho pan jenaj tehlic wilic wach ma' laj tz'ak nsutunic ri̱j i tinamit re're'.

Yu'na nwa̱j wo' chic ninimsam so' wi̱b chawach tak re' cok ru' to̱b ta wo' re' nimsinic i̱b ma'xta bih jeno' holonquil ric'am cho, nwa̱j nik'oric awu̱c' tak chiri̱j take ilo̱j xc'uhtjic wi̱n ru'um i Dios eh je' wo' chiri̱j take xisakomej wach wi̱n.

Re' aj wili nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chiwi̱j xa re' la' nanibanam chi xa je' na chiri̱j jeno' toco̱m c'acharel nanik'oric chi je' wili: Weht'alim wach jenaj winak aj tahkanel reh Jesus. Re're' cajlaj na cho ha̱b yu'na xc'amaric johtok cu pa ro̱x tik taxa̱j. Ma' weht'alim ta wi nchel chi manlic wach riti'jolal ribakil xc'amaric johtok, on xa re' ricapew-bal xc'amaric johtok ma' weht'alim ta, xa re' wach i Dios til neht'alanic reh nic' wach naxc'uluric re're'.

Je' re' k'uru' re' hin weht'alim chi xc'amaric johtok pan taxa̱j, wi re' nchel chi manlic wach riti'jolal ribakil on wi nchel xa re' ricapew-bal xc'amaric johtok ma' weht'alim ta, til xa re' wach i Dios neht'alanic reh nic' wach naxc'uluric re're'.

Re' cok ru' re' weht'alim chi til xc'amaric johtok cu chipam i ye'a̱b “Parayi̱so” ribihnal. Ar chipam i ye'a̱b re're' xibiraj take cho k'oric re' ma' eta wo' kojchol rik'ormojic ru̱c' take k'oric xa reh ayu' wach ac'al. Xa ta wo' nak ye'o̱j k'ab ru'um i Dios chi narik'ormojic lok cu'um take c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al.

Chiri̱j i winak re're', re' hin eriban chi eninimsaj wi̱b re' cok ru' chi re' hin eninimsaj wi̱b chi wibil wi̱b ma'xta. Haj cok wilic eriban chi eninimsaj wi̱' wi̱b ru̱c' take pa' bih nic'ulum lok re' quic'uhtunic wi̱' chi ja' hin ta cow chi rinimjic i kAja̱w.

Je' re' k'uru' wi ta nak nwa̱j chi eniyew nilok'il, ma' eta nak nc'uhtunic lok chi xa je' hin saban laj winak maj re' take k'oric enik'or chiwi̱j, xa coric nak chic wach take. Xa re' la' hin ma' je' ta re' niban ru'um nok ma' nwa̱j ta chi hab wach jeno' ericapaj chi re' hin k'e̱' wo' chic nwic'saj na̱ rinimsjic niwach niban chiwach i no'jbal rilom wu̱c', on chi k'e̱' ta wo' chic nim niwach chiwach take pa' bih k'oric niban lok re're', on chi ru̱c' take nik'orbal nik'or lok ma' nc'utunic ta wo' chi xiq'uic wo' chic na̱ nilok'il.

Reh aj wo' chi re' hin ma' eta ninimsaj wi̱b ru̱c' take nic' pa' nimal wach c'uhtunic xiban wi̱n i Dios, re're' xiyew k'ab chi jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i aj Yahm xicoj jenaj ti'c'axic chi nina̱ re' xa je' chic ricab jenaj q'ui̱x lamlic pa niti'jolal nibakil nanwic'raj. Re' ti' c'axic cojo̱j wi̱n re're' camanic wi̱n reh chi ma' k'e̱' ta wo' chic eniq'uihsaj wi̱b.
Re' hin oxpech xnipahkaj reh kAja̱w Jesus chi naresam lok wi̱n i ti'c'axic re're' pa niti'jolal nibakil

xa re' la' i Jesus je' wili nic'u'ljic riban: “Ru'um chi wilic chana̱ i nic'axbal, re're' manlic chaweh chi atobjic maj nok re' c'acharel ma' ricuy ta chic ransil iq'uic chipam jeno' c'axquilal ar nc'utunic wach rinimal wach wajawric i hin, nqui xik'or. Ru'um aj re' haj cok wilic til k'e̱' ninimsaj wi̱' wi̱b i hin, ar ru̱c' take pa' bih nic'ulum lok re' nc'utunic wi̱' chi re' hin ma'xta chic wansil eh je' re' niban reh nok chi je' re' enwih'ic wu̱c' i cowil ansil nchalic ru̱c' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Ru'um aj re', re' hin k'e̱' nsukbic nic'ux ru̱c' take pa' bih ti'c'axic nic'ul re' quic'utunic lok wi̱' chi ma'xta chic wansil je' ricab nok ma'xta chic bih wilic so' wi̱n, on nok wilic take c'acharel ma' holohic ta k'oric nca'n chiwi̱j chi ti'sbal nic'ux, on nok xa hin chic quitahkem chi ribanaric ti'c'axic wi̱n, on nan-alhbic i wihk chi rik'ormojic ribiral i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Chipam aj take c'axquilal je' ricab take re're' nc'utunic lok chi chi wutquel i hin ma'xta wansil raj la' i rajawric i Dios re' aj wo' re' nto'bonic wi̱n chipam take c'axquilal nchalic chi nina̱.

Til pa ricorquil re' take k'oric wili re' take nitz'ihmbaj je aweh tak ric'uhtaj lok chi re' hin xa je' na nicab jeno' saban laj c'acharel xa re' la' re' hat-tak xatbanic tak wi̱n chi je' re' xniban ru'um nok ma' holohic ta c'ahchi' ak'oric tak chiwi̱j je' ricab nak til ric'ul chaweh tak chi na̱k'orom tak. Je' re' nik'or maj to̱b ta nchel ma' nim ta ti niwach nc'utunic, ma' ra̱j ta rik'orom chi ma'xta so' nilok'il nok njunehtjic wach nic'acharic quich'i̱l take nquitz'ak qui̱b chi pahbamaj take chi aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios, re' quik'oric chi re' take nimak wach quilok'il.

Ma' xa ta re're', je' la' wo' chaxilac hat-tak xc'utunic chic lok wach nicamaj chi hin pahbamaj chi aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios je' ricab xawilow tak chi xniban take lok' laj nawa̱l ch'i̱l take sachbal c'uxlis ru̱c' rajawric i Dios, chi c'ahchi' nicuyunic chipam take k'etoj wach nik'orbal xiniq'uic wi̱'.

Ru'um chi re' hat-tak xawilow tak chi'nchel re're', chaj wa'ric k'uru' chi wilic aweh tak c'ahchi' quik'oric chi ma' xatwilow ta tak chi coric je' ricab xniban cu̱c' take ju'jun tuhm chi moloj wach aj niminel? Haj ti wilic njalbic so' awu̱c' tak chi quiwach take toco̱m chic aj niminel, re' chi re' hin ma' xatnich'i'taj ta tak so' chi wilmijic ru̱c' pa' bih wi̱n. Wi re' nchel re' i nimahc chawach tak chi ma' xnipahkaj ta jeno' nito'bal aweh tak je' ricab nca'n take toco̱m chic aj c'uhbalanel, chacuy tak nimahc ru̱c' xniban re're'!

Chacoj tak rehtal, yu'na tikilqui̱n chic reh roxpech wojic awu̱c' tak eh chi je' re', re' hin xa nanitikim wo' ju' nino'jbal chi ma'xta nipahkam aweh tak jeno' nito'bal maj pa ricorquil re' til k'e̱' nwa̱j wach i hin, re' ac'acharic hat-tak ma' re' ta nchel re' pa' bih wilic aweh tak. Re' hin je' re' nik'or ru'um nok ma' re' ta take ac'unbe̱s nquic'ol quitz'a̱k chi naricamanic chiqui̱j take tutbe̱s ajabe̱s re' la' take ajabe̱s nquic'ol quitz'a̱k chi naricamanic chiqui̱j take quiha'lac'u̱n.

Ru'um aj re' ru̱c' rinimal sukquil nic'ux re' hin ma' xa re' ta nitumin nanisacham chawi̱j tak je' la' wo' i wansil ch'i̱l nic'acharic ru'um nok til nwa̱j atobjic tak chipam animinic tak. Chaj bih riwi̱' k'uru' nok re' hin til k'e̱' niyew nic'ux chi ac'axmajic tak, re' hat-tak kajic chic riban ac'axbal tak wu̱c'?

Xa nic' pa' wach i c'u'lunic ena'n tak wi̱n ru̱c' re're', re' hat-tak til aweht'alim tak chi ma' xwa̱j ta ricojoric jeno' ihk chana̱ tak chi ripahkaljic aweh tak jeno' nito'bal. Xa re' la' wilic take c'ahchi' quik'oric chi re' hin ru̱c' balc'ux laj no'jbal xwesaj atz'a̱k tak ru̱c' chucuj laj k'oric.
Re' nquik'or take re' ma' coric ta. Je' re' nik'or maj hab aj wach aweh hat-tak xwesaj ritz'a̱k ru̱c' quik'orbal take xnitak'a̱' take je awu̱c' tak?

Chacapaj tak k'uru' naxnipahkaj ato'bil reh Ti̱to ch'i̱l i jenaj chic kich aj niminel chi xi'o̱j awu̱c' tak chi awiliric tak, re' take re' ma' xi'oquic ta chi ajot'oric tak chi resmejic atz'a̱k tak. Ma'xta, re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi coric chi re' pa' bih no'jbal wilic pa ra̱mna i Ti̱to re' wo' re' wilic pan wa̱mna i hin eh je' wo' aweht'alim wo' tak chi xa jenaj wach kacapew-bal nanka'n kacamaj.

Ru̱c' i hu̱j c'ahchi' nitak'a̱b je aweh tak wili, k'i̱j wo' re' hat-tak enacapaj tak chi c'ahchi' ka'nam i wili xa reh chi ekojcahnic suk chawach tak. Ma'xta, re' hoj nka̱j chi hoj ok suk ilo̱j ru'um i Dios ru̱c' nic' wach c'acharic nka'n chipam rinimjic i Jesus. Chi'nchel i nic' pa' nimal i k'oro̱j lok wili, nkak'or reh cowsbal ac'ux tak chipam rinimjic i Jesus.

Re' hoj nkilow chi curman chi nakacowsam ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus maj quinyo'jic so' chi naquinponok awu̱c' tak etinirak tak chi c'ahchi' abanam tak take pa' jaric ma' ra̱j ta banaric re' take ma' nwa̱j ta nak wilom chi c'ahchi' abanam tak. Ru̱c' jeno' k'ilo̱j eniban aweh tak equinawilow tak chi xa hin ok cojol riti'quil ac'ux tak naniban i k'ilo̱j re' ma' nawa̱j ta nak tak chi eno̱j niban aweh tak. Re' hin k'uru' quinyo'jic so' chi ma' to̱j nchel nirak tak chi wilic wolonic i̱b ch'i̱l ixowonic i̱b chaxilac tak, on chi xa tiq'uer tak chic ru'um ac'a̱ tak, on chi wilic ch'akoj i̱b pan niminic chawach tak, on chi wilic tz'uju̱j i̱b chaxilac tak. Quinyo'jic wo' chi enwih'ic chaxilac tak i no'jbal re' moloj tak c'uta̱j, on chi wilic ok nchel i q'uihsinic i̱b chawach tak, on chi wilic k'itk'it wachi̱s chaxilac tak.

Je' re' k'uru' re' hin quinyo'jic so' chi naquinponok chaxilac tak ma' riban nchel chi re' Dios equiriyew pan q'uixbilal chawach tak eh chi equinok'ic wo' chiri̱j quic'acharic take q'uihal aweh tak re' ximahcanic eh ma' jaruj ta xquijal wach quino'jbal chi naquicana̱b nak ribanaric i mahc, xa cu c'acharic wo' nca'n chi je' re' chipam i ch'uwa' wach no'jbal, chipam i c'oyomal je' wo' chipam i xa pa' chic jaric ma' holohic laj bano̱j ric'ax wach i quiti'jolal.

Ru̱c' i wojic awu̱c' tak tiklic wach wu'um, roxpech chic wojic chi ak'o'rjic tak.
