Re' cok ru' chipam i wojic re're' pa' bih jeno' mahc wilic, re' hin nanitik'a̱b wach re're' chi c'ahchi' nibanam je' ricab rik'or i C'uhbal ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi cu ru̱c' quik'orbal quib on xib ok chic chi c'acharel naribirmijic wi coric on ma' coric i mahc nk'ormojic chiri̱j jeno' c'acharel.

Chipam ricab wojic awu̱c' tak xniyew i pe̱t k'oric chi k'ilbal aweh tak naxinwih'ic cho chaxilac tak eh yu'na chi ma' wilqui̱n ta chic chaxilac tak c'ahchi' niyeb je i ricab k'ilo̱j chi queh take ma' nquicana̱' ta ribanaric i mahc. Pa ricorquil, naquinponok awu̱c' tak ma'xta bih naniquetelem wach wi̱' jeno' c'ahchi' ribanam i mahc.

Je' wo' chic ru'um nok re' hat-tak cow c'ahchi' apahkam tak chi naniyeb jeno' rehtalil aweh tak c'uhtbal reh chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xye'bic wajawric chi k'oric, re're' nawilom wo' tak wach nok chi ma'xta chic so' quetelenic wachi̱s wu̱c', pan cowil nanik'oric awu̱c' tak pa rijelow-bal i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric maj re're' ma'xta riquetelem awach tak nachiyew ricowil wach ti'c'axic chana̱ tak.

Nik'or aweh tak i wili maj til coric ru' chi re' Jesus xye'eric wach curu̱s maj xc'acharic chi je' kacab i hoj c'acharel ma'xta jeno' kacowil chiwach i rajawric i quimic, xa re' la' yu'na re're' c'achlic wo' chic ru'um reh rinimal rajawric wilic i Dios. Je' wo' re' i hoj yu'na re' c'acharic chic nka'n pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ch'i̱l i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric ma' k'e̱' ta ti kansil wilic, xa re' la' natikak'il tak pan cowil chic naka'nam chi xa je' na chic ricab hoj uctunak cho ch'i̱l i Jesus chi quixilac camnak ru'um rajawric i Dios.

Ru'um aj re' nkak'or aweh tak chi re' aj hat-tak ru' chawic'saj awi̱b tak pan jeno' pajoj no'jbal ilbal reh wi til wo' chi ch'iclic acapew-bal tak chiri̱j i Jesus on ma' ch'iclic ta. Re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric wilic chic pan ac'acharic tak re' cok ru' ma' xelic chawach tak chi coric i pajbal ano'jbal na̱banam tak ra̱j rik'orom chi ma' je' ta wo' re'.

Je' re' k'uru' wi re' hat-tak xa'n tak ri̱j chi coric chi re' Jesus wilic chic pan ac'acharic tak ra̱j rik'orom chi re' hin ch'i̱l take nwihch'ilej chi c'uhbalanic ewo' koj-acoj tak chi wilic kawa'ric maj ku'um keh hoj re' hat-tak xak'ahsaj ac'acharic tak reh i Jesus.

Re' hoj nka'n kati̱j chiwach i Dios chi ma' chi bih jeno' bano̱j ena'n tak chi ma' ta coric wach chiwach ru'. Ma' c'ahchi' ta ka'nam i wili reh chi xa c'uhtbal reh chi re' hoj koj-acoj tak chi aj k'orol reh c'uhbal, reh la' chi re' hat-tak ena'n tak haj wilic i coric chi banaric to̱b ta wo' chawach hat-tak ma' ye'o̱j ta kawa'ric chi aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Jesus.

Je' re' k'uru' wi re' hat-tak c'ahchi' abanam tak i coric, re' hin ma' eta tinik'il tak ru'um nok ma' riwi̱' ta chi wi̱n chi etinik'il tak wi c'ahchi' wo' ac'acharic tak chi coric wach je' ricab rik'or i coric laj c'uhbal xanimej tak. Til haj wilic ripahkaj wi̱n i Dios chi nanibanam, re' chi re' hin nanito'bem take c'acharel chi naquirakam chiri̱j i coric laj c'uhbal eh chi naquic'amam wo' na̱.

Ru'um aj re' nik'or chi nakojponok awu̱c' tak, wi ma' curman ta chi keh ricojoric i kajawric ye'o̱j keh ru'um i Dios eh wi etikarak tak chi holohic chic c'ahchi'ca̱t tak, re' hoj narisukbic kac'ux. Ma' xa re' ta re', c'ahchi' la' wo' ka'nam kati̱j chawi̱j tak reh chi re' acapew-bal tak encorjic wo' chic wach chi coric.

Je' aj re' nka̱j chawi̱j tak eh re' riwi̱' chi je' re' c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak chi cu naht wilqui̱n je, re' chi wi cu wilic so' no'jbal ra̱j tik'injic aweh tak cu manlic enatik'a̱' tak wach chi cu ja' quinponic ta awu̱c' tak. Chi je' re' naquinponok awu̱c' tak ma' curman ta chic enic'uhtaj chana̱ tak i ricowil i wajawric ye'o̱j ru'um i kAja̱w chi cowsbal aweh tak pan niminic eh ma' re' ta nchel chi yojbal reh acapew-bal tak.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel pan cohlsbal wach nik'orbal awu̱c' tak, nik'or je aweh tak chi tic'acharok tak pan sukquil c'uxlis eh chacorsaj wo' tak wach i pa' bih ma' coric ta wach pan ac'acharic tak. Je' wo' chayew ricowil ac'ux tak chawibil awi̱b tak eh chasic' tak i wih'ic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis. Je' wo' tic'acharok tak pan tuklic laj c'uxlis eh chi je' re', re' kAja̱w Dios re' aj c'axo̱l eh aj ye'ol wo' tuklic wach c'uxlis enwih'ic chipam ac'acharic tak chi junelic.
Je' ricab nachac'alenej awi̱b tak chac'uhtaj wo' tak chawach tak chi k'e̱' ti' nawic'raj awi̱b tak chi awibil awi̱b tak.
Je' wo' chic, c'ahchi' nitak'a̱b je aweh tak i sukquil c'uxlis c'ahchi' quiyeb je aweh tak take chi'nchel kich aj niminel.

Yu'na ajic was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, re' ta nak i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eriyew cho rinimal wach rato'bil chana̱ tak. Je' wo', re' ta wo' nak Ajabe̱s Dios ericoj rinimal c'axoj i̱b pan awa̱mna tak eh re' ta wo' nak i Lok' laj rUxlabal enbanic chi etic'acharic tak pan jenaj wach c'uxlis chawach tak. Je' ta nak re' c'ulurok awu̱c' tak.

Re' hin ma' Lu̱', hin pahbamaj chi aj k'orol c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Re' nicamaj ye'o̱j ma' re' ta jeno' winak xye'bic wi̱n, ma' wo' ritak'anic ta cho jeno' winak chi xye'eric wi̱n i camanic re're', til re' la' i Jesus xpahbanic wi̱n chi aj k'orol reh riC'uhbal chi je' wo' re' cho pa ricapew-bal i Ajabe̱s Dios re' xucsunic cho reh Jesus chi quixilac take camnak.

Re' hin ma' Lu̱' wich'i̱l take chi'nchel kas kacha̱k' wilque̱b ayu' c'ahchi' kayeb tak je risukquil ac'ux tak chipam i hu̱j c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je wili aweh hat-tak jarch'uk pa' chi moloj wach aj niminel wilca̱t tak ar Cala̱sya eh ru̱c' ritz'ihmjic je hu̱j wili, re' wili i ti̱j nka'n johtok chiwach i Dios chawi̱j hat-tak:
Re' ta nak rato'bil eh je' wo' i sukquil c'uxlis riyew cho kAja̱w Dios ch'i̱l i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' ta nak re' wih'ok pan ac'acharic tak.

Re're' nipahkaj chana̱ tak pa ribihnal i kAja̱w Jesus re' xik'ahsaj ri̱b pan quimic chi kesmejic chipam i kamahc eh je' wo' chi kaco'ljic ru̱c' resmejic chi kana̱ i tojbal wach mahc chalic reh chi quina̱ take c'acharel re' c'ahchi' quibanic c'ahbilal laj no'jbal chiwach take k'i̱j wilco̱j wi̱' wili. Re' kAja̱w Jesus, re' aj wo' re' xik'ahsaj ri̱b pan quimic je' ricab til nic' pa' je' tik'imaj cho ru'um Ajabe̱s Dios chi je' re' naric'ulum.
Ru'um aj re' kayew tak rinimal rilok'il ribihnal chi junelic k'i̱j sakom! Je' ta nak re' banarok, ye'erok ta nak rilok'il i kAja̱w Dios.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, re' hin k'e̱' wo' chic nsahchic nic'ux awu'um tak ru'um chi cu ja' naht ta wo' ti animem tak i Jesus eh yu'na xacana̱' wo' chic awi̱b tak chi rinimjic i Dios re' xyuk'unic aweh tak reh chi re' chic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eriyew cho rito'bal chana̱ tak. Ma' xa re' ta re' xa'n tak, xacana̱' la' wo' tak rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus maj xatoquic tak chi ritahkaljic toco̱m chic c'uhbal re' nk'ormojic chi je' nchel til re' chic re' i holohic laj ribiral chiri̱j i Jesus,

xa re' la' re' nk'ormojic re're' ma' je' ta wo' re'. Je' re' nik'or maj ma'xta chic jeno' c'uhbal eta nak nk'ormojic chi til re're' i holohic laj ribiral chiri̱j i Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, xa re' la' chic nbanic chi wilic take toco̱m chic aj c'uhbalanel c'ahchi' quijalam wach i c'uhbal chiri̱j ru' xa reh chi re' hat-tak ma' eta chic narak tak chiri̱j haj wilic i c'uhbal ra̱j cojoric wach.

Chi je' re' k'uru' wi hab wach jeno' enc'ulic lok awu̱c' tak eh erik'or aweh tak chi re' c'uhbal c'ahchi' rik'orom ru' rik'or chi toco̱m chic chiwach i c'uhbal kak'orom aweh tak i hoj, re' hin nipahkaj reh Dios chi kajok ta nak rinimal ti'c'axic china̱, ma' k'orel ta wi jeno' keh hoj aj c'uhbalanel ayu' wach ac'al enk'oric chi je' re' on jeno' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios kajanak cho pan taxa̱j.

Til chacoj tak rehtal k'uru' ru'um nok nic' pa' wach take k'oric nik'orom cho aweh tak najtir nok cu wilqui̱n cho chaxilac tak, re' wo' chic re' nica'pechej je rik'ormojic aweh tak yu'na: Xa hab wach jeno' enk'oric aweh tak jeno' c'uhbal toco̱m chic chiwach i c'uhbal kak'orom aweh tak, re're' kajok ta nak i ti'c'axic china̱ ru'um i c'ahchi' ribanam.

Ru̱c' xnik'or lok wili ma' ra̱j ta rik'orom chi re' hin c'ahchi' ta nak nisiq'uim chi re' take wich c'acharel enquiyew nilok'il ru̱c' take c'ahchi' nik'orom, re' la' nwa̱j nisiq'uim i hin re' chi re' Dios eriyew nilok'il ru̱c' rik'ormojic chi tare̱t i c'uhbalanic c'ahchi' nibanam. Je' re' nok wi ta nak re' hin nwa̱j cahnic pan sukquil cu̱c' take c'acharel ru̱c' ribanaric jenaj wach nino'jbal quich'i̱l, ra̱j rik'orom k'uru' chi re' hin ma' re' ta chic hin til manlic raj camanom i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi charak tak chiri̱j chi coric i wili: Re' c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus re' xponic nik'or aweh tak, re're' ma' re' ta jeno' c'acharel xtik'inic cho wach

maj re' hin ma' re' ta ru̱c' jeno' c'acharel xnic'ul rik'ormojic. Xa ta wo' nak jeno' c'acharel xc'uhtunic wi̱n i c'uhbalanic, re' la' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xc'uhtunic wi̱n rinabjic pa̱m i c'uhbal re're'.

Re' ricorquil i nik'or nc'uhtunic cho ru̱c' riwi̱' nic'acharic najtir. Re' hat-tak aweht'alim wo' tak nic' wach i no'jbal xniban cho nok cu wilqui̱n cho nak chipam i cow laj niminic nka'n i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chiri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, ma' je'? Re' nino'jbal k'e̱' wo' chic c'ahbil chi re' take aj niminel reh Jesus re' nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i kAja̱w Dios yohbal wo' chic wach i ti'c'axic xniban queh eh til wo' xnicowej wi̱b chi risacharic quiwach.

Je' wo' aweht'alim wo' tak riwi̱' nino'jbal naxinwih'ic cho chipam i niminic nka'n i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chiri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, ma' je'? Re' hin k'e̱' wo' chic hin cow aj niminel xniban wi̱b chi quiwach take wich c'acharel re' jenaj wach kahabil quich'i̱l chi re' hin cow xnik'or chi naric'amaric na̱ take no'jbal hoj tijimaj cahnok wi̱' cu'um take kama̱m kati't.

Xa re' la' to̱b ta nchel je' re' riwi̱' cho nic'acharic najtir, re' kAja̱w Dios til wo' k'e̱' wo' chic riquetelbal cho chi nina̱ maj re're' xirichih cho nok cu ja' ta wo' quiriyew wach sakom i nitu̱t eh re' wo' re' xbanic chi re' hin xinoquic chi rinimjic i Jesus. Ru̱c' re're' naxponic wo' chiwach i Dios,

xiyew wi̱n chi eht'aljic hab wach i Jesus re' rAc'u̱n, reh chi je' re', re' hin enik'or ribiral i Jesus chi quixilac take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Naxinoquic chi rik'ormojic ribiral i Jesus, ma' xino̱j ta ru̱c' jeno' wich ti'jolal chi ripahkaljic nino'jbal reh ru̱c' take chaj bih k'oric nanibanam.

Xa ta wo' nak xino̱j ar Jerusalen chi ripahkaljic nino'jbal cu̱c' take nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take raj tahkanel i Jesus re' take pe̱t cho aj k'orol c'uhbal chiri̱j ru', re' la' xniban i hin xino̱j ti chi pe̱t ar pa riyuk'ul i Ara̱wya eh cu chiri̱j aj chic ru' xinsoljic wo' chic je ar pan tinamit Tama̱sco.
Xib chic ha̱b chiri̱j ru', xino̱j ar Jerusalen chi reht'aljic wach i ma' Luch eh ar xincahnic ru̱c' chiwach ho'lajuj k'i̱j.
Chiwach niwih'ic ar Jerusalen ma' hab ta chic jeno' queh nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take raj tahkanel i Jesus xwilow wach, xa re' la' ti i Jaco̱wo re' richa̱k' i kAja̱w Jesus.

Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, re' xnitz'ihmbaj chic je aweh tak chi re' c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus ma' re' ta jeno' c'acharel xc'uhtunic wi̱n, til la' coric chiwach i Dios ma' re' ta nchel xa chucuj laj k'oric.
Chi je' re' k'uru' nik'or aweh tak chi cu chiri̱j chic niwih'ic ar Jerusalen xino̱j chipam riyuk'ul i Si̱rya je' wo' pa riyuk'ul i Sili̱sya.
Chipam take rik'ijil wojic ar, re' take moloj wach kich aj niminel reh Jesus wilque̱b pa riyuk'ul i Jure̱ya, ma' quina'bem ta nak niwach.

Haj ti cok wilic i queht'alim take kas kacha̱k' re're', xa re' ti chi je' wili k'oric nquibiraj chiwi̱j: «Re' winak nbanic nak cho ti'c'axic queh take aj niminel reh Jesus, yu'na re' chic re' c'ahchi' rik'oric reh i holohic laj c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus re' rixowem nak cho wach naxiban cho, nqui k'oric nquibiraj.
Ru̱c' aj nibiral re're', k'e̱' nanquiyew johtok rilok'il i kAja̱w Dios take tinamit re're' chiwi̱j i hin.
Nok cajlaj chic ha̱b nip'utum cho c'uhbalanic, re' hin xino̱j wo' chic ar Jerusalen chi wich'i̱l i ma' Wernaweh eh je' wo' xnic'am je chiki̱j i Ti̱to.

Naxino̱j ar ma' xa ta nwa̱j chi je' re' xniban, xino̱j la' ru'um chi re' kAja̱w Dios xic'uhtaj wi̱n chi curman chi xino̱j ar. Nok wilqui̱n chic ponok ar Jerusalen, xa cu̱c' ti take nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take raj tahkanel i Jesus re' k'oro̱j quibiral chi nimak quiwach xnimol wi̱b chi risakomsjic wach queh chaj bih c'uhbalanic c'ahchi' nibanam cu̱c' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chiri̱j ribiral i Jesus.

Ru̱c' ribirmijic nik'orbal xca'n take c'amol be̱h re're', ma'xta bih xquik'or reh i Ti̱to re' wich'i̱l ponok ar maj ma' xpahkaljic ta reh chi nariyoc'om lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ric'achanbal je' ricab rik'or i c'uhbal nkac'am na̱ i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Ma' xca'n ta chi je' re' ru'um nok re' Ti̱to ma' re' ta re' c'uhbal ric'am na̱ ru'um chi ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, aj criye̱co la'.

Re' cok ru' to̱b ta wo' ma'xta nak bih xk'ormojic reh Ti̱to cu'um take aj nahsil re're', wilic take ju'jun xa aj chucul aj niminel take, xa pan elk'a̱l laj oquic xca'n cok chi kaxilac i hoj aj niminel, xquip'ut wolic ru'um re're'. Re' take re' je' re' xca'n maj xca̱j nak quipitim i suk laj niminic c'ahchi' ka'nam chiri̱j i Jesus eh ru'um re' xa cow chic nquik'or chi nakac'amam wo' nak chic na̱ i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eh ru̱c' re're' xojquimin wo' nak chic chi rehquen i cow laj c'uhbal re're'.

Re' cok ru' to̱b ta wo' xojquitolej chi ric'amaric na̱ i c'uhbal re're', re' hoj je' wili xkak'or queh: «Ma'xta, re' hoj ma' jaruj ta eriban wo' chic chi enkac'am na̱ i c'uhbal re' cow nak'or tak keh chi rinimjic, kojqui queh. Je' aj re' xkak'or queh ru'um nok xka̱j chi re' holohic laj c'uhbal re' nk'oric keh ricorquilal nic' wach nakarak kaco'lbal, ma' eta nacana̱' tak rinimjic hat-tak.

Je' re' nok re' take nahsil c'amol quibe̱h aj niminel re' k'oro̱j quibiral chi nimak quiwach xquimol qui̱b wich'i̱l ma'xta chic jeno' toco̱m no'jbal xquik'or wi̱n chi wach i nik'or ribiral. Wi til nchel je' re' on ma' je' re' cajawric wilic, ma' re' ta hin quineht'alanic reh chi manlic xa re' wach Dios neht'alanic reh. Je' wo' chic, re're' ma' re' ta rinimal wach riwa'ric jeno' c'acharel rilow cho, re' la' i ra̱mna ricapew-bal rilow cho.

Chi je' aj re', re' take c'amol be̱h re're' ma'xta bih jeno' c'uhbal xquiyew chi nina̱ chi nanik'orom aweh tak maj xquirak chiri̱j chi re' Dios re' xpahbanic reh ma' Luch chi aj k'orol c'uhbal chiri̱j Jesus queh take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' nquic'am na̱ i c'uhbal chi rik'ataric lok ritz'uhmal na̱ quic'achanbal, re' wo' re' xpahbanic wi̱n i hin chi aj k'orol c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus queh take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' ma' tanlic ta chi quina̱ ric'amaric na̱ i c'uhbal re're'.

Je' aj re' xca'n take nahsil re're' ru'um nok xquirak chiri̱j chi re' Dios re' xpahbanic reh ma' Luch chi aj k'orol riC'uhbal queh take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' quic'ambic na̱ i c'uhbal chi rik'ataric lok ritz'uhmal na̱ quic'achanbal, re' wo' Dios re're' xpahbanic wi̱n i hin chi aj k'orol riC'uhbal queh take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.

Je' wo', re' take wilque̱b chi nahsil c'amol be̱h chipam i k'ijil re're', re' take xib wili: Re' ma' Jaco̱wo, re' ma' Se̱pas ch'i̱l wo' ma' Wa̱n, naxquicoj rehtal chi re' Dios xiyew wi̱n jenaj camanic chi rik'ormojic i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus, xojquic'ul pan sukquil c'uxlis chi hoj chic quich aj k'orol c'uhbal chi wich'i̱l i Wernaweh. Chiri̱j chic ru' kachi'nchelal xkatik'a̱' wach chi re' hin ch'i̱l i Wernaweh nakak'orom i c'uhbal queh take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh re' take re' naquitikim ju' rik'ormojic i c'uhbal queh take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' nquic'am na̱ i c'uhbal chi rik'ataric lok ritz'uhmal na̱ quic'achanbal.

Re' cok ru' naxk'atik'a̱' wach chi je' re' naka'nam, wilic jenaj no'jbal til xquipahkaj keh ribanjic: Re' chi re' hoj ma'xta riq'uic pan kac'ux quitobjic take kich aj niminel je' ru̱c' niba̱' take. Re' wo' re' i no'jbal til wilic pa nic'ux ribanaric.

Chiri̱j chic ru' nok hoj chic soljonak je ar Antiyoqui̱ya, pan jenaj k'i̱j re' ma' Luch xponic ar chi pa̱m tinamit re're'. Naxwih'ic ar, re' hin xnik'il chi cow i ma' Luch ru̱c' i no'jbal c'ahchi' ribanam ru'um nok tanlic chi k'ilmijic ri̱j i no'jbal c'ahchi' ribanam.

Je' re' xniban maj nok cu ja' quiponic ta ar Antiyoqui̱ya take quib xib chi aj niminel xitak'abjic cho ru'um ma' Jaco̱wo, re' ma' Luch riban nak riwa' riha̱' cu̱c' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil take cho ma' Israhel c'uhtbal reh chi cojo̱j take pa riman chi aj niminel take xa re' la' chic naxiponic take tak'amaj take cho re're', ma' cu ta chic xiban riwa' riha̱' cu̱c' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil take cho ma' Israhel, k'u̱nk'u̱n la' p'uht resam lok ri̱b chi quixilac ru'um reh riyo'jic chi quiwach take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re're', re' nquic'am na̱ c'uhbal chi rik'ataric lok ritz'uhmal na̱ quic'achanbal.

Ru̱c' i no'jbal c'ahchi' ribanam i ma' Luch, wilic wo' take ju'jun kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xquitijej queh no'jbal re're' chi xa je' wo' ti chic coric wach no'jbal c'ahchi' ca'nam ru̱c' niminic nok xca'n qui̱b. Til k'e̱' wo' chic xtahkaljic i rino'jbal i ma' Luch chi re' ma' Wernaweh re' wich aj to'o̱l nak, xkajic wo' chipam i no'jbal re're'.

Ru'um aj re' naxwilow chi ma' c'ahchi' ta ric'acharic chi coric je' ricab rik'or i lok' laj c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus, re' hin je' wili xnik'or reh ma' Luch chi quiwach take riq'uihal aj niminel: «Wi re' hat, hat aj niminel je' ru̱c' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ma' c'ahchi' ta ac'amam na̱ i c'acharic je' ricab ripahkaj i c'uhbal nchopbic kana̱ i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, chaj chic wa'ric k'uru' nok cow c'ahchi' aminim queh take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi naquic'amam na̱ i c'uhbal nchopbic kana̱ i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel? quinqui reh.

Chacoj rehtal k'uru' chi kaxilac hoj raj niminel i Jesus wilic keh xa kasba̱l wo' cho chi hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Coric wo' chi chi kaxilac hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilic take nquik'or chi ma' re' ta aj mahc take ru'um nok ma' nca'n ta i no'jbal nca'n take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.

Raj la' hin nik'or chi ma' k'orel ta chic wi hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho on ma' re' ta hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel maj ma' jeno' c'acharel ncojoric ru'um i Dios chi coric wach ric'ux xa ru'um ta nak chi rinimej i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, ela' ncojoric ru'um i Dios chi coric wach ric'ux xa re' wach wi xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Re' aj re' riwi̱' nok chi kaxilac hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, wilic keh xka'n chic chi hoj chic aj niminel reh Jesus maj xkeht'alij chic chi xa re' wach wi xkach'ica̱' kac'ux chiri̱j ru', re' Dios ekojricoj chi coric chic wach kac'ux chiwach. Je' re' nik'or maj ma' jeno' c'acharel ncojoric ta nak ru'um i Dios chi coric wach ric'ux xa ru'um ric'amaric na̱ i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses.

Je' re' k'uru' re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' xojricoj chic i Dios chi ma'xta chic kamahc, yu'na re' hoj chic aj niminel curman chi xkach'ica̱' kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Coric, ru̱c' ribanaric re're' wilic nak take equibirinic keh chi je' wili: «Wi ru̱c' na'n tak re're', til coric xarak tak chiri̱j chi hat nak tak aj mahc je' ricab nok wilque̱b chawach tak take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel raj na rik'orom k'uru' chi re' Jesus xbanic chi wilco̱j wo' chic chi hoj aj mahc? nqui na enquik'or. Ma'xta, ma' je' ta re' nelic wi̱', quinqui nak queh.

Re' la' chic wili nelic wi̱' wi re' hin ewo' nak chic quinsoljic chi rinimjic i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses: Je' ricab chi jeno' c'acharel ma' holohic ta riban chi ritik'a̱b chic ripa̱t eh chiri̱j ru' riyoj wo' chic chi junpech, je' wo' nak re' enc'uluric wu̱c' i hin wi ewo' nak chic quinsoljic chi rinimjic i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eh wi enak nik'or chi cu re' wo' chic enich'ica̱' wi̱' nic'ux chi naric'ulmujic ru'um i Dios chi ma'xta chic nimahc maj ru̱c' re're' xa c'ahchi' nic'uhtam lok chi re' hin, til hin aj mahc chiwach i Dios ru'um nok xnik'ihtaj wi̱b chiwach i c'uhbal re're'.

Nok wilqui̱n nak cho chipam rich'iquinjic nic'ux chiri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, re' hin xnicana̱' rinimjic take c'uhbal re're' nok re' chic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xninimej. Yu'na chi ma' c'ahchi' ta chic nich'ica̱b nic'ux chiri̱j i c'uhbal re're' xa je' na hin chic camnak chiwach nok wilqui̱n reh chi re' chic Dios k'orel china̱ nic'acharic.

Je' re' ajic je' ricab naxquimic wach curu̱s i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, je' wo' je' na wa'ric xnicansaj wach i no'jbal re're' maj xnik'eb lok rij nic'ux take capew-bal niban cho najtir eh ru'um re' yu'na ma' re' ta chic chi wibil wi̱b c'acharic niban hin, re' la' chic i Jesus c'ahchi' ric'uhtunic wi̱n nic' wach i c'acharic nanibanam. Je' re' nok reh chi xa cu ewo' nitik ju' c'acharic china̱ ac'al wili til c'ahchi' nich'ica̱b nic'ux chiri̱j rAc'u̱n i Dios re' xik'ahsaj ri̱b pan quimic chiwi̱j i hin ru'um chi k'e̱' cho ric'axbal chi nina̱.

Til pa ricorquilal re' hin ma' eta nik'eb lok rij nic'ux i rinimal wach richak'lamil i Dios xic'uhtaj cho chi kana̱ i hoj c'acharel ru̱c' riye'eric cho i rAc'u̱n chi quimic chiki̱j maj wi ta nak cu ru'um chi nkac'am na̱ i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses nrakmajic i co'lbal i̱b chi keh hoj c'acharel, ra̱j rik'orom chi xa ma'xta nak camaj naxquimic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Hat-tak aj niminel aj Cala̱sya til wo' chic k'e̱' nsahchic nic'ux awu'um tak ru'um amemil laj no'jbal tak. Nic' ti wach naxatsuhbic tak je' ricab chi xa bano̱j ta nak chic cho awi̱j tak chi re' hat-tak xac'uhlaj tak ti awu̱c' tak take toco̱m chic tijbal chiri̱j ribiral i Jesus? Ma' riban ta chi je' re' na'n tak! Je' re' nik'or maj re' hat-tak xawachej ru̱c' nak' awach tak nok re' hin xnisakomej wach aweh tak haj wilic riwi̱' naxcansjic ar wach curu̱s i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Ru̱c' no'jbal nac'uhtaj tak re're', re' hin xa jenaj wo' chi no'jbal nwa̱j nina'bem awu̱c' tak, re' no'jbal re're', re' i wili: Re' hat-tak naxac'ul tak i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios, cu ru'um na reh ric'amaric na̱ take C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xac'ul tak on xa ru'um chi re' hat-tak xach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiri̱j i c'uhbal xabiraj tak chiri̱j i Jesus? Til pa ricorquilal, xa ru'um wo' i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus, ma' je'?

Wi je' re' chaj chic wa'ric k'uru' chi re' hat-tak ma' nawa̱j ta arakam tak chiri̱j i ricorquilal re're'? Je' re' nik'or maj re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi xa re' wo' atok'a̱b tak cho i jenaj chic holohic laj c'acharic, re' chic i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios nto'bonic aweh tak. Wi je' re' riban ru', chaj chic wa'ric yu'na chi nawa̱j atikim tak ju' i holohic laj c'acharic re're' chi xa ru̱c' chic awansil tak?

Til chacuy chacana̱' tak ribanaric re're'. Re' la' c'olok pan ac'ux tak atobjic xac'ul tak ru̱c' i Lok' laj Uxlabal naxac'ul tak i yohbal wach ti'c'axic ru'um rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak chiri̱j ric'uhbal i Jesus. Yu'na xa narojic na nchel chi k'e̱b i ti'c'axic xac'ul tak re're' k'uru'? Nanik'or i hin chi re' hat-tak ma' xac'ul ta tak i ti'c'axic re're' chi xa risukquil aweh tak.

Ru'um re're' c'olok pan ac'ux tak chi nok re' kAja̱w Dios xiyew aweh tak i Lok' laj rUxlabal eh nok tohk' riban take sachbal c'uxlis chaxilac tak, ma' xiban ta chi je' re' ru'um ta nak chi re' hat-tak c'ahchi' animem tak i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, xac'ul la' tak i Lok' laj rUxlabal ru'um chi xach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiri̱j i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus, re' xabiraj tak ku̱c' i hoj.

Yu'na was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel nwa̱j k'oric chiri̱j i kaj najtir k'i̱j re' ma' Awraham. Re're' xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i k'oro̱j reh ru'um i Dios eh ru'um chi je' re' xiban, re' Dios xipahba̱' chi jenaj c'acharel coric wach ric'ux.

Ru'um aj chi je' re' xiban cho i kaj najtir k'i̱j re're', yu'na riwi̱' wo' chaweh tak chi na̱weht'alim tak chi re' take til manlic ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Awraham, re' wo' take til nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Dios.

Chiqui̱j aj take c'acharel je' re' nca'n, re' Dios xa najtir wo' cho k'i̱j ritik'a̱b cho wach chi nariye'eric wo' quiwa'ric chi re' take re' naquiwih'ic chi coric wach quic'ux chiwach. Ru'um aj re' xa nok wo' sakomomaj cho wach chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios re' ribiral re're' eh je' wo' i ribiral nok junpech re' Dios je' wili xik'or reh ma' Awraham: “Ru̱c' acuse'sjic i hat, chi'nchel take tinamit wach ac'al naquehtric wo' nicuse'sbal i hin, nqui cho reh.
Je' re' ajic, re' take nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus, re' take re' cuse'semaj wo' take je' ricab naxcuse'sjic cho i ma' Awraham naxich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios.

Tz'a̱b ru' re' take nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j ribanaric take xa pa' bih rik'or i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, re' take re' wilic jenaj rinimal ti'c'axic chi quina̱. Je' re' nik'or maj chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios je' wo' wili rik'or: “Hab wach ma' ric'am ta na̱ chi coric i nic' pa' nimal take c'uhbal tz'ihmbimaj chipam Lok' laj Hu̱j, re're' wilic chic rinimal ti'c'axic china̱, nqui rik'or.

Ru̱c' take k'oric nkilow wach re're', til nkarak chiri̱j chi ma' hab ta wach jeno' c'acharel npahbabjic ru'um i Dios chi coric wach rino'jbal ru'um chi ric'am na̱ take C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Je' re' nik'or maj pan Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios je' wo' wili tz'ihmbimaj cahnok ru'um jenaj raj k'orol i Dios: “Re' c'acharel re' pahbamaj ru'um i Dios chi coric wach rino'jbal chi junelic k'i̱j sakom naric'acharic ru'um nok xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios, nqui tz'ihmbimaj cahnok.

Raj la' i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ma' je' ta re' rik'or maj re're' ma' ripahkaj ta queh take c'acharel chi enquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Dios reh chi naquic'acharic chi junelic. Re're' je' wili rik'or: “Re' c'acharel nc'ambic na̱ i nic' pa' nimal rik'or chipam i c'uhbal wili, nariye'eric reh chi enc'acharic chi junelic, nqui rik'or.

Ru̱c' re're' nkarak chiri̱j k'uru' chi re' c'acharel re' ma' ric'am ta na̱ i rik'or chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, ma' eta wo' nco'ljic chiwach i sihtbal nchalic china̱ ru'um reh rino'jbal chi ma' nbirinic ta k'oric. Xa re' la' chiwach i rinimal ti'c'axic re're' xa jenaj wo' nco'lonic keh chiwach. Re' jenaj re're', re' wo' i Jesus. Re' aj re' xiyew ri̱b chi ric'uluric i sihtbal wilic nak chi kana̱ eh ru̱c' xic'ul chi je' re' xponic wach i tz'ihmbimaj cho chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' i riC'uhbal i Dios chi je' wili: “Hab wach nt'uyu'njic wach che̱' chi cansbal reh, re're' jenaj rinimal ti'c'axic c'ahchi' ric'ulum, nqui tz'ihmbimaj cho.

Ru̱c' i k'oro̱j re're' ajic nkarak chiri̱j chi re' Dios xicana̱' chi xchalic i ti'c'axic china̱ i Jesus reh chi re' cuse'sbal riyeb cho Dios china̱ i ma' Awraham naquehtric wo' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xa ru'um reh rich'iquinjic quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus. Je' re' k'uru' ru̱c' rich'iquinjic kac'ux nka'n chiri̱j i Jesus re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ch'i̱l wo' hat-tak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel enkac'ul i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios re' k'oro̱j cho ribiral chi naritak'abjic cho chi kana̱ hoj aj niminel reh i kAja̱w Jesus.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, nanik'oric wo' chic awu̱c' tak chiri̱j jenaj jalwach k'oric je' ru̱c' nbanaric ayu' wach ac'al. Kak'or, nok jeno' c'acharel ric'u'lem chic ri̱b rik'orbal ru̱c' jeno' rich c'acharel chiri̱j jeno' pa' bih tik'inic riban eh ritik'a̱' jeno' rihujil i tik'inic re're', ma' hab ta chic wach jeno' enyojbic reh on eritik na̱ i pa' bih tik'inic tz'ihmbimaj chiwach i hu̱j re're', til la' narinimjic i tik'inic re're' je' ricab nic' pa' wach tz'ihmbimaj chiwach i hu̱j re're', maje'?

Wi je' aj re' ru' nbanaric chi kaxilac i hoj, ra̱j wo' ti chic ru̱c' i Dios k'uru', ma' je ta wo' na re' naribanam? Je' re' nik'or ru'um i wili: Re' kAja̱w Dios xiyew take rik'orbal reh ma' Awraham chi naricuse'sam cho eh je' wo' take i ra̱' ri'sil. Naxik'or reh ma' Awraham chi naricuse'sjic ch'i̱l wo' take ra̱' ri'sil, re' i Dios c'ahchi' rik'oric chiri̱j i xa jenaj chi ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Awraham, je' ricab rik'or cho chipam i Lok' laj hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios wili: “Re' nik'orbal xniyew aweh, xa aweh i hat ch'i̱l wo' i awa̱' awi'sil, nqui rik'or. Ru̱c' aj xik'or i Dios re're', nkarak chiri̱j chi naxiban i tik'inic re're', re' Dios c'ahchi' rik'oric chiri̱j i xa jenaj ti chi ra̱' ri'sil i Awraham eh re' ra̱' ri'sil re're', re' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Chi je' aj re' riwi̱' i tik'inic xiban i Dios, re' wo' i ricorquil riban chi enik'or aweh tak wili: Re' tik'inic ribanam cho i kAja̱w Dios ru̱c' ma' Awraham naxik'or reh chi naricuse'sjic ru' ch'i̱l ra̱' ri'sil, re're' junik'ob lajeb rica'winak ha̱b (430) chic bano̱j cho. Wi je' chic re' ha̱b bano̱j cho naxc'uluric i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, ma' eta riban chi re' C'uhbal re're' eriyoj wach i tik'inic ribanam cho Dios ma' wo' erimak' riwa'ric.

Je' aj re' nik'or maj re' cuse'sbal re' ritik'a̱b cho wach i Dios chi nariyeb reh ma' Awraham, wi ta nak re're' nc'ulmujic xa ru'um rinimjic i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, ra̱j rik'orom chi re' rik'orbal riyeb cho Dios reh Awraham ma' c'ahchi' ta nak rojic elok wach.

Ru̱c' i k'oric xnik'or lok re're', k'i̱j wo' re' hat-tak c'ahchi' abanam i birinic wili pan ac'ux tak: «Chaj wo' camaj nok wilic i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ncahnic wi̱'? tiqui na tak. Re' ricorquilal, re' c'uhbal re're' xye'eric cho ru'um i Dios chi c'uhtbal keh hoj c'acharel chi wilic i ti'c'axic chi kana̱ ru'um reh mahc nka'n. Je' aj re' cho riwi̱' naxcanabjic i c'uhbal re're' ru'um i Dios eh chi naricamanic chi je' re' cu rehtal xc'ulic lok i ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Awraham re' xc'ambic cho ricuse'sbal i Dios. Je' wo' chic re' c'uhbal re're', re' xic'ul i Moyses chi wilque̱b wo' ru̱c' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch Dios, xye'eric wo' reh chi re' wo' re' narik'ahsanic queh take c'acharel haj wilic take k'oric wilic chipam i c'uhbal re're'.
Re' cok ru' re' Dios naxiyew rik'orbal reh ma' Awraham, ma' hab ta wach xitz'e'wachej chi jalol rik'orbal, til la' re' Dios chi rutquel ri̱b xiyew rik'orbal reh ma' Awraham.

Ru̱c' i xnik'or re're', k'i̱j wo' enabiraj tak wi̱n i wili: «Ra̱j na rik'orom chi re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ma' ric'ul ta ri̱b ch'i̱l rik'orbal i Dios riyeb cho reh ma' Awraham, nqui enabiraj tak wi̱n. Ma'xta! Ma' je' ta re' c'ahchi' nik'orom xa re' la' rehreh wach riwi̱' nok ye'o̱j cho. Wi ta nak re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses nye'bic i junelic laj c'acharic, re' hoj enak riban chi coric chic kawach chiwach i Dios xa ru'um reh rinimjic c'uhbal re're'

xa re' la' ma' je' ta re' riban keh maj chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' i riC'uhbal i Dios rik'or wo' chi hoj chi'nchel c'acharel choplic na̱ kac'acharic ru'um i mahc. Ru'um aj re' nik'or chi xa ru̱c' wo' rich'iquinjic kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, enkarak i junelic c'acharic je' ricab wo' rik'orom cho i Dios chi xa ru̱c' wo' ch'iquinic c'uxlis chiri̱j ru' wilic kac'acharic chi junelic i hoj c'acharel.

Najtir cho k'i̱j nok ja' nelic ta nak cho wach sakom i capew-bal chiri̱j i ch'iquinic c'uxlis chiri̱j i Dios, chopolco̱j nak chipam take no'jbal wilic chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eh je' re' xojc'acharic cu rehtal xsakomsjic wach keh i ch'iquinic c'uxlis chiri̱j i Jesus.

Je' re' ajic nok cu richopom cho kana̱ i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, xiban cho keh je' ricab riban jeno' c'acharel cojo̱j chi aj ilol reh jeno' t'uch ac'un chi aj cojol rino'jbal ru̱c' ribehil ric'acharic maj re' c'uhbal re're' xcamanic chi c'ambal je keh chi rinimjic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric reh nok chi ru̱c' rich'iquinjic kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus, re' Dios xojric'ul ru̱c' chi coric wach kac'ux chiwach.

Chi je' aj re' k'uru' yu'na chi ch'iclic chic kac'ux chiri̱j i kAja̱w Jesus ma' re' ta chic chi rehquen rajawric i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses wilco̱j, je' ricab nok jeno' t'uch ac'un nanponic wach rino'jbal ma' re' ta chic i raj ilol ntak'anic china̱.
Ru'um aj re' chawunchelal i hat-tak re' hat-tak chic aj niminel reh Jesus, hat-tak chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i kAja̱w Dios. Je' chic re' awi̱' tak xa ru'um chi ch'iclic chic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus.

Chi hat-tak chic manlic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios, re' hat-tak xkajic aha̱' tak chi c'ahchi' ak'orom tak chi re' Jesus Ajabe̱s chana̱ tak. Je' wo' chic, je' ricab nok jeno' c'acharel ricoj jenaj chic ac' laj tz'ih chiri̱j, je' wo' re' hat-tak xacoj awi̱b tak pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ch'i̱l i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Ru'um aj chi je' re' xa'n tak, yu'na chi rinimjic i Jesus ma' k'orel ta chic awi̱' tak wi nchel hat-tak on ma' hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, wi nchel minilcat tak on ma' minilcat tak pan cow laj camanic, wi nchel winak on wi nchel ixok; chi'nchel re're' ma' k'orel ta chic ru'um nok ch'iclic chic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus eh chi je' re', re' hat-tak xa jenaj chic awi̱' tak chiwach i Dios.

Je' aj re' k'uru' ru'um chi re' hat-tak re' chic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric nehchenic aweh tak, ra̱j rik'orom chi hat wo' tak re' ru̱c' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Awraham. Chi je' aj chic re' awi̱' tak, re' hat-tak na̱wehtric wo' tak nic' nimal rik'orbal i Dios riyeb cho reh ma' Awraham.

Nanisakomem wo' chic wach i nik'or ru̱c' i jalwach k'oric wili: Kak'or, jeno' ajabe̱s wilic jeno' t'uch rac'u̱n eh rik'or reh chi re're' narehchenic cahnok reh i pa' bih wilic reh naquimok je. To̱b ta nak k'oro̱j chic reh chi re're' aj ehchenel reh chi'nchel, re' t'uch ac'un re're' wi ja' nponic ta rihabil chi nariwih'ic rajawric china̱ i pa' bih wilic reh i raja̱w, xa jenaj wo' wach riwa'ric ncahnic ch'i̱l jeno' t'uch ac'un xa aj camanom cok pa ripa̱t.

Je' wo' chic, nok cu t'uch pe i ac'un re're' cu ncahnic chi rehquen rajawric jeno' aj q'uihsem reh eh nwih'ic wo' jeno' aj ilol reh i pa' bih canamaj cahnok reh ru'um i raja̱w cu rehtal nponic rik'ijil k'oro̱j ru'um i ajabe̱s chi narik'ahsjic pan k'ab chi'nchel i ye'o̱j cahnok reh.

Nic' pa' wach nc'uluric ru̱c' i t'uch ac'un re're', je' wo' re' xc'uluric ku̱c' i hoj maj naxojwih'ic chipam rinimjic take no'jbal nchalic cu̱c' take ma' tob laj uxlabal re' wilic cajawric chi quina̱ take c'acharel ma' quiniminic ta reh i Dios, xa je' na nchel pan uxal xojwih'ic cho ru'um nok re' take no'jbal re're', re' nak re' quitak'anic chi kana̱.

Raj la' nchel nok je' re' riwi̱' i kac'acharic, xponic rik'ijil tik'imaj cho wach ru'um i kAja̱w Dios re' xitak'a̱' cho wi̱' i rAc'u̱n. Re're' xc'ulic asjok ayu' wach ac'al je' ricab wo' naxo̱j ye'eric wach sakom i hoj ru'um katu̱t. Je' wo', re're' xq'uihic johtok ro̱k k'ab chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses.

Re' riwi̱' chi re' Dios xitak'a̱' cho chi xchalic asjok i rAc'u̱n ayu' reh chi xojc'ulic resaj chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel chi ri'sil rajawric i c'uhbal re're' eh chi ri'sil aj chic rajawric i Dios xojricoj reh chi je' re' xoj-oquic jenaj chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios chi ric'uluric chi'nchel i pa' bih k'oro̱j ru'um chi nariyeb keh hoj rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n.

Je' wo', re' hoj aj niminel reh Jesus rehtalil chi hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios, re're' xitak'a̱' wo' cho pan ka̱mna i Lok' laj rUxlabal re' xiyew wo' reh Jesus chi rehtalil chi re're' til rAc'u̱n eh chi je' re' chi hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios, yu'na echic riban chi nkak'or reh Dios chi re're' “kaPah” nankaq'uer johtok kachi̱' ru̱c'.

Je' aj re' k'uru' hat-tak aj Cala̱sya, ru'um chi'nchel ribanam i Dios reh chi xiban chi hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n, nipahkaj aweh tak chi ma' riban ta chi cu ti c'acharic tak chi rehquen rajawric i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses je' ricab nok jeno' aj camanom choplic na̱ ric'acharic ru'um ajabe̱s aj ehcham camanic. Je' re' nipahkaj aweh tak maj re' hat-tak yu'na hat-tak chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios chi manlic eh ru'um re', nic' pa' nimal rik'orbal riyeb cho Dios queh take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n na̱wehtric wo' tak ru̱c' re're'.

Je' chic re' ru' riwi̱' ac'acharic tak yu'na xa re' la' til pa ricorquil, pan jenaj cho k'i̱j nok ja' nana'bej ta nak tak wach i Dios, re' hat-tak je' nak acab tak jeno' aj camanom cow chopo̱j na̱ chi camanic, cow nak chopolca̱t tak cho ru̱c' acapew-bal tak chi rinimjic wach take tz'akoj tiyo̱x eh chi ma' re' ta wo' coric dios take.

Raj yu'na aweht'alim tak chic wach i til manlic Dios on til re' ricorquil chi re' Dios xeht'alij chic ana̱ tak, chaj chic wa'ric k'uru' chi nawa̱j wo' tak chic aca'pechem tak ribanaric i najtir laj no'jbal nchoponic nak cho na̱ ac'acharic tak re' xa ma'xta bih xitik cho aweh tak, on ma'xta bih jeno' holonquilal xic'am cho aweh tak?

Chawilow tak k'uru' nanacoj tak pa riman chi lok'onbal wach i Dios i no'jbal chi rinimjic wach take hi'lbal k'i̱j, on chi rinimjic wach i rac'u̱n poh, on chi rinimjic wach toco̱m chic nink'i̱j, on rinimjic wach i ju'jun chi ha̱b rijal ri̱b, xa cu c'ahchi' wo' chic aca'pechem tak i najtir laj no'jbal.
Ru̱c' i no'jbal na'n tak re're', k'e̱' quincapewenic awu'um tak ru'um chi re' camanic xniban chaxilac tak xa je' nchel ma'xta bih xicamanej chi corsbal wach ano'jbal tak.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, chacuy chac'am tak tz'eht reh nino'jbal i hin chi naxnich'ica̱' nic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus xiban chi ma' re' ta chic C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses wilic rajawric chi nina̱ eh ru'um re', naxinwih'ic cho chaxilac tak xniban wi̱b chi je' acab hat-tak chi ma' re' ta i c'uhbal re're' wilic rajawric chana̱ tak. Re' hin c'ahchi' nipahkam aweh tak chi na̱banam tak je' ricab xnik'or aweh tak, ma' ru'um ta chi re' hat-tak abanam ta nak tak cho jeno' ti'c'axic wi̱n. Ma'xta, re' la' xa'n tak wi̱n xinato'bej tak ru̱c' pa' bih wi̱n je' ricab xa'n tak wi̱n pan pe̱t cho niponic pan atinami̱t tak.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' hat-tak til aweht'alim tak chi pan pe̱t niponic awu̱c' tak wilic jenaj c'axquilal pa niti'jolal nibakil eh ru'um reh re're', xincahnic awu̱c' tak chi rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios chaxilac tak.

Nok je' re' xniban, re' hat-tak ma' xinak'eb ta lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak, xa ta wo' nak ma' suk ta xinawilow tak ru'um nic'axquilal wilic pa niti'jolal re' xcamanic chi xa je' na jenaj pajbal reh achak'lamil tak wu̱c'. Je' re' k'uru' to̱b je' re' niya'bilal wilic, re' hat-tak xacuy tak wilmijic eh xinac'ul wo' tak chi suk je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak ac'ulum tak chaxilac jeno' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios nchalic ar pan taxa̱j, on til je' ricab chi re' ta wo' nak i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric c'ahchi' ac'ulum awu̱c' tak.

Haj wo' xo̱j risukquilal ac'ux tak re're' k'uru'? Je' re' nik'or maj til pa ricorquil laj k'oric chawi̱j tak, re' hat-tak til k'e̱' wo' chic ti' xinawic'raj tak chi til nak xa'n tak chiwi̱j re' ma' hab ta wo' chic wach enbanic, kak'or ti chic chi curman ta nak chi enawesaj lok jeno' nak' awach tak chi riye'eric wi̱n.
Ru̱c' rik'ormojic aweh tak i ricorquilal re're', k'i̱j wo' re' hat-tak enawixowej tak niwach ru'um.

Je' re' ru' wilca̱t tak wu̱c' yu'na raj cu̱c' take chucul laj aj tijinel re' toco̱m laj c'uhbal c'ahchi' quik'orom aweh tak ma' je' ta re' na'n tak to̱b ta nchel ma' coric ta wach quino'jbal awu̱c' tak. Re' take re', ti' tiquic'raj tak nanquik'or xa re' la' xa ma' je' ta wo' re' maj re' take re' nca̱j ca̱t tak quik'unem ru̱c' quic'uhbal reh chi chiqui̱j chic take re' enach'ica̱' ac'ux tak xa cojbal cho ch'akbal i̱b chi kaxilac chipam coric laj rinimjic i Jesus.

Tare̱t chi re' take toco̱m chic aj c'uhbalanel re're' k'a̱b quic'ux chawi̱j tak, re' cok ru' ru̱c' ok holonquilal laj no'jbal ch'i̱l xa jenaj wach c'uxlis, ma' ok xa jot'bal reh acapew-bal tak. Chi junelic ta nak ca'n i holohic laj no'jbal awu̱c' tak, ma' ok xa re' nok wilqui̱n awu̱c' tak.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak chi je' ricab hat-tak wac'u̱n wixk'u̱n ru̱c' i no'jbal wilca̱t tak wi̱' yu'na, re' hin k'e̱' wo' chic ti'quilal i wa̱mna na'n tak xa je' na ricab riti'quilal jeno' ixok nok c'ahchi' riyeb wach sakom i riha'lac'u̱n eh xa cu nariwih'ic wo' i ti' re're' pan wa̱mna cu rehtal naric'uhtunic wo' chic lok pan ac'acharic tak chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' chic re' c'acharic riban awu̱c' tak.

Ru̱c' c'ahchi' ric'uluric awu̱c' tak, re' hin til k'e̱' nak nwa̱j chi wilqui̱n ta nak chic ponok awu̱c' tak chi ricorsjic wach ano'jbal tak ru̱c' toco̱m chic xa suk wach k'oric maj yu'na ma' nirak ta chic chiri̱j chaj bih c'ahchi' ric'uluric ru̱c' ano'jbal tak re' k'e̱' nsahchic nic'ux chiri̱j.

Chiri̱j aj wo' i no'jbal c'ahchi'ca̱t tak re're' nwa̱j nibiram aweh tak i wili: Nanabiraj tak i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, ma' nacoj ta na tak rehtal chaj bih k'oric riban ar chiri̱j ribiral i ma' Awraham?

Je' re' nibiraj aweh tak maj chipam i c'uhbal re're' rik'or chi re' ma' Awraham xwih'ic qui̱b rac'u̱n re' je' wili quibiral: Re' jenaj rac'u̱n xwih'ic ru̱c' i Aca̱r re' xa aj chipohonel cok ru̱c'. Re' jenaj chic rac'u̱n xwih'ic ru̱c' i Sa̱ra re' til rehq'ue̱n i ma' Awraham eh ma' xa aj chipohonel ta cok.

Chi je' aj re', re' asjic xca'n take rac'u̱n i ma' Awraham rehreh wach riwi̱' i no'jbal capewemaj chiqui̱j. Je' re' nik'or maj re' jenaj ac'un xye'eric wach sakom ru'um i xa aj chipohonel cok cu̱c', re're' xasjic chi xa xitik'a̱' wach rasjic ru̱c' i caj chipoh, ra̱j la' i rac'u̱n xye'eric wach sakom ru'um i til rehq'ue̱n re' ma' xa ta aj chipohonel cok, re're' xasjic reh chi nariponic wach i k'oro̱j cho ribiral reh ma' Awraham ru'um kAja̱w Dios chi nariye'eric jenaj quiha'lac'u̱n ch'i̱l i Sa̱ra re' til rehq'ue̱n.

Re' ribiral chiri̱j take qui̱b rac'u̱n i Awraham re're' ncamanic wo' chi risakomsjic wach i nik'or wili: Re' Dios naxiyew cho i c'uhbal reh Moyses ar china̱ i yu̱k' Sinayih ribihnal, jenaj tik'inic xiban cho ru̱c'. Nic' pa' q'uihal quiniminic reh til xa chi ri'sil wo' rajawric i c'uhbal re're' quicahnic je' ricab nok re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho Aca̱r re' xa aj chipohonel cok ru̱c' ma' Awraham, xa xicahnic wo' ri'sil i cow laj camanic.

Ru'um aj re' nik'or chi re' Aca̱r ma' xa ta re' rijalwachej i yu̱k' Sinayih re' wilic pa riyuk'ul i Ara̱wya, je' la' wo' rijalwachej i tinamit Jerusalen wilic yu'na maj re' take c'acharel wilque̱b chipam i nim laj tinamit re're' xa cu re' wo' i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'iclic wi̱' quic'ux je' ricab chi wilque̱b wo' chipam jeno' cow laj camanic.

Tz'a̱b ru' re' Sa̱ra re're' rijalwachej i jenaj chic c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j ritinami̱t i Dios re' ribihnej wo' chi Jerusalen ar pan taxa̱j. Re' Sa̱ra re're' ma' mino̱j ta chipam i cow laj camanic je' ricab jeno' aj chipohonel. Ru'um aj re' nik'or chi nic' pa' q'uihal xojniminic reh i c'uhbal re're' je' na wilic chi katu̱t i Sa̱ra eh ru'um chi re're' katu̱t, re' hoj yu'na nic' pa' q'uihal hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ru' ma' minilcoj ta chic chipam rinimjic i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses.

Je' aj re' ru' to̱b ta nak re' Sa̱ra ma' ta nak aj ac'unom laj ixok cho, xiban chi je' na katu̱t cho maj pan Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios je' wili tz'ihmbimaj cho chiri̱j: “Re' hat ixok re' ma' re' ta nak hat ac'unom, sukbok ac'ux yu'na eh chaq'uer achi̱' ru'um risukquil ac'ux to̱b ta nchel ma' ja' awic'ram ta aweh ti'quil ac'ununic. Xa re' la' yu'na re' hat re' je' na acab ixok canamaj ru'um ribahi̱l, yohbal chic wach awa̱' awi'sil nariwih'ic chiwach jeno' ixok wilic ribahi̱l, nqui tz'ihmbimaj cho.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, ru̱c' take k'oric xnik'or lok re're' nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak wili: Je' ricab nok re' Sa̱ra xiyew cho wach sakom i Isahac ru'um chi je' re' rik'orom cho i Dios, re' hoj yu'na xo̱j wo' ka'n chi hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios ru'um wo' reh i k'oric k'oro̱j cho reh ma' Awraham.

Je' wo', je' ricab nok re' Ismahel re' xasjic chi xa tik'imaj wach rasjic ru̱c' i caj chipoh, re're' ma' xa̱j ta cho wach Isahac re' ac'unbe̱s xasjic ru'um reh Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios, je' wo' re' yu'na re' take cow qui̱b chipam rinimjic i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ma' nca̱j ta wo' kawach i hoj re' xoj-oquic chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios ru'um rich'iquinjic kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus.

Xa re' la' chaj bih rik'or i tz'ihmbimaj chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios chiri̱j je' ricab xc'uluric cho chi quixilac take quib chi ac'un re're'? Ar rik'or chi re' Sa̱ra je' wili xik'or reh ma' Awraham: “Chat'erej je kaj chipoh ch'i̱l i rac'u̱n maj ma' riwi̱' ta chi re' rac'u̱n ixok re're' enehtric ru̱c' ac'axbal na̱yeb reh i wac'u̱n i hin re' til hin awehq'ue̱n, nqui Sa̱ra, nqui rik'or i c'uhbal re're'.

Ru̱c' take k'oric re're' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k', enkarak chiri̱j chi riwi̱' chi keh hoj aj niminel reh Jesus chi je' wo' re' nka'n cu̱c' take nquik'or chi riwi̱' chi keh chi nkanimej chi'nchel take tak'anic wilic chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses maj re' hoj yu'na re' xkach'ica̱' chic kac'ux chiri̱j i kAja̱w Jesus, ma' re' ta hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho Aca̱r re' xc'acharic cho chi xa aj chipohonel cok ru̱c' ma' Awraham, til la' hoj la' ra̱' ri'sil cho i Sa̱ra re' ma' xa ta aj chipoh cok.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, yu'na nwa̱j nitikim ju' k'oric chiri̱j rich'iquinjic kac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Nok re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' aj niminel reh Jesus xkach'ica̱' kac'ux chiri̱j, re're' xesaj chi kana̱ rinimjic i cow laj tak'anic riban i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Ru'um aj re' chapahba̱' ac'ux tak chipam i niminic re're' eh ma̱coj wo' chic awi̱b tak rica'pech chi ri'sil take najtir laj no'jbal queh take ama̱m awati't tak je' ricab chi chopo̱j ta nak ana̱ tak pan jeno' cow laj camanic.

Chi k'oro̱j chic chi je' re', yu'na quinabiraj tak ru̱c' i ricorquilal laj k'oric nanik'orom wili: Re' hin ma' Lu̱' til nik'or aweh tak wi re' hat-tak c'ahchi' wo' chic ac'amam tak na̱ i c'uhbal chiri̱j rik'ataric lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ac'achanbal tak c'uhtbal reh chi coric chic wach ac'acharic tak chiwach i Dios, xa ma'xta bih nqui chi xach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Ru'um aj i no'jbal c'ahchi'ca̱t tak, re' hin nwa̱j wo' chic nica'pechem aweh tak i k'oric wili: Wi ta nak nchel jeno' winak rik'at lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ric'achanbal, ma' xa re' ta chic i c'uhbal re're' riwi̱' chi reh chi narinimem, curman la' chi naric'amam na̱ chi'nchel i nic' pa' nimal tz'ihmbimaj chipam i c'uhbal re're'.

Je' wo', wi re' hat-tak nacapaj tak chi xa ru̱c' ribanaric haj wilic rik'or i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eticahnic tak chi coric wach ac'ux tak chiwach i Dios, ra̱j rik'orom chi re' hat-tak c'ahchi' ak'ebem lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak rinimjic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh xa na̱ ru' c'ahchi' wo' awesam lok awi̱b tak chi ri'sil rato'bil i Dios chi quico'ljic take c'acharel.

Til pa ricorquil re' hoj re' xkanimej chic i Jesus, re' chic i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios nto'bonic keh chi ruyu'njic i k'i̱j nok re' Dios narik'orom keh chi coric chic wach kac'ux chiwach eh yu'na chi ch'iclic chic kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus, re' hoj c'ahchi' kuy'em riponic i k'i̱j re're'.

Je' re' k'uru' wi ch'iclic chic kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus ma' k'orel ta chic wi k'ato̱j on ma' k'ato̱j lok ritz'uhmal na̱ c'achanbal enbanic chi re' Dios ekojric'ul ru̱c' chi coric chic wach kac'ux, re' la' i ch'iquinic c'uxlis chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric nbanic re're' chi c'ahchi' wo' kac'uhtam lok pan kac'acharic chi wilic i c'axoj i̱b chi kawach.

Re' hat-tak, ta nak re̱t behic c'ahchi'ca̱t tak chipam coric laj rinimjic i Jesus xa re' la' yu'na, nibiraj aweh tak i wili: Hab wach xk'etbic pan abe̱h tak chi xacana̱' tak ric'amaric na̱ i coric laj c'uhbal xnik'or aweh tak?

Re' c'uhbal c'ahchi' ac'amam tak na̱ yu'na ru'um xquich'uksaj ac'ux tak chi rinimjic, ma' re' ta Dios xch'uksunic ac'ux tak maj re're' yuk'unic xiban aweh tak chi na̱wih'ic tak chipam i coric laj niminic.

Wi re' hat-tak enatik tak ju' ric'amaric na̱ i toco̱m chic c'uhbal re're' narijot'om ri̱b acapew-bal tak, je' ricab nelic wi̱' i sakombal wach k'oric wili: “Re' nech' chi ik'o̱m ncojoric chi xilac rik'oril caxlan wi'c, risipsaj wach chi'nchel i k'o̱r re're', nqui nelic wi̱'.

Tob ta wo' yu'na je' re' no'jbal c'ahchi'ca̱t tak, re' hin til ch'iclic nic'ux ru̱c' Ajabe̱s Jesus chi re' hat-tak enajal wach ano'jbal tak chi ritahkaljic i coric wach c'uhbal xnik'or aweh tak, xa re' la' til k'e̱' ti' reh i xa hab wach c'ahchi' rijot'bic aweh tak ru'um nok re' Dios til nariyeb cho ti'c'axic china̱.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak wi re' hat-tak c'ahchi' abiram tak chi re' hin cu c'ahchi' nic'uhbalem chi curman chi narik'ataric lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ric'achanbal jeno' c'acharel, ma̱coj tak wach maj wi ta nak je' re' c'ahchi'qui̱n chaj aj wa'ric chi re' take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel nca̱j qui̱nquiyeb chi ti'c'axic? Wi ta nak cu nik'or ribiral i c'uhbal re're', ma' ixowomaj ta wo' nak niwach yu'na, ma' je'?

K'e̱' nak nwa̱j chi re' take aj chucul laj aj c'uhbalanel re' quik'oric aweh tak chi re' take aj niminel reh Jesus curman chi queh rik'ataric lok na̱ quic'achanbal ma' xa re' ta chic rik'ataric lok na̱ quic'achanbal enca'n, quicahnok aj wo' chi capu̱n laj winak chic take!

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' hat-tak, hat-tak chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios yu'na maj re' Dios xatriyuk'ej wo' tak cho reh chi na̱c'acharic tak chi ma' re' ta chic i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses wilic rajawric chana̱ tak. Re' cok ru', ru̱c' i xik'or re're' ma̱capaj tak chi yu'na chi xa ye'o̱j chic k'ab aweh tak chi ribanaric i pa' bih ma' holohic ta rotowej cho ati'jolal tak. Ma'xta, re' la' cha'n tak tic'acharok tak ru̱c' jenaj c'axoj i̱b chi awibil awi̱b tak.

Je' re' nitak'a̱' chi na̱banam tak maj re' rinimjic chi manlic i riC'uhbal i Dios ye'o̱j reh Moyses xa jenaj wo' chi c'uhbal rimol wi̱' ri̱b chi'nchel je' ricab rik'or i wili: “Chac'ax awas acha̱k' je' ricab ric'axaric awi̱b na'n i hat, nqui xik'or.

Je' re' k'uru' chac'ax awi̱b chawach tak. Je' re' nitak'a̱' chi cha'n tak maj wi re' hat-tak enamiksaj tak wach c'axquilal chawibil awi̱b tak on ewo' nap'ut tak wolonic i̱b je' ricab nca'n i tz'i' ch'i̱l i me̱s chi xa nquiti'lom chic qui̱b, til c'ul enayojlom ac'ux tak ru̱c' animinic tak cu rehtal enasach wach animinic tak.

Yu'na chic, nwa̱j wo' nik'orom aweh tak i tak'anic niban chana̱ tak wili: Til tic'acharok tak pan jenaj holonquilal wach c'uxlis chi behsemaj ac'acharic tak ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal. Je' wo', nik'or wo' aweh tak chi ma̱yew tak chic k'ab chi ena'n tak ribanaric i xa pa' jaric c'ahbil laj no'jbal ric'ax wach ati'jolal.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' xa pa' jaric c'ahbil laj no'jbal ric'ax wach kati'jolal ma' ric'u'lej ta ri̱b ch'i̱l i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios. Je' wo', re' rik'or keh i Lok' laj Uxlabal chi naka'nam, ma' ric'u'lej ta wo' ri̱b ch'i̱l i c'ahbilal laj no'jbal nkac'ax wach ribanaric. Je' re' ajic pa' nak jaric c'ahbilal laj no'jbal nkac'ax wach ribanaric ma' ric'u'lej ta ri̱b ch'i̱l i ra̱j i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios. Ru'um aj re' ma' jaruj ta eriban chi enka'n canar ribanaric re' haj nak wilic c'ahbilal laj no'jbal nkac'ax wach ribanaric maj re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios ma' eta riyew k'ab keh chi je' re' enka'n.

Je' re' k'uru' tic'acharok chi behsemaj ac'acharic tak ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal maj wi behsemaj chic ac'acharic tak ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios ra̱j rik'orom chi ma' cu re' ta chic i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses entak'anic chana̱ tak.

Re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chic chi re' take wili quic'uhtunic lok wi̱' chi chopo̱j kana̱ ru'um i mahc: Re' ch'uwa'rsanic wach caxarahil ru̱c' c'oyomal, re' tununic i̱b chi ma' re' ta pan caxarahil, re' tununic i̱b chi quich winak qui̱b, on chi quich ixok qui̱b, re' yibel wach no'jbal chi itowonic tak ixok on itowonic tak winak.

Je' wo', re' riye'eric quiwa'ric take tiyo̱x ru̱c' rilok'onjic quiwach, re' waranic i̱b, re' ixowonic i̱b, re' peletenic i̱b, re' k'abanic i̱b, re' c'ahanic i̱b, re' wolonic i̱b, re' tico̱j tak peletenic ru'um reh q'uihsinic i̱b, re' ch'i'tsinic i̱b noquic cho ru'um rik'ormojic i ma' coric ta laj c'uhbal.

Je' aj re' take no'jbal nc'uhtunic lok chi cu chopo̱j kana̱ ru'um i mahc eh je' wo' take pa reh chic no'jbal wili: Re' ti'quil c'uxlis chiri̱j pa' bih wilic reh jenaj chic c'acharel, re' cansanic tak i̱b, re' xohc'sonic tak i̱b, re' banoj tak nink'ijinic re' nquiham wi̱' qui̱b chi ha' nxohc'sonic cu rehtal quikajic pan tak c'ahbilal laj no'jbal. Chiri̱j aj take chi'nchel no'jbal re're' ch'i̱l wo' take toco̱m no'jbal ma' xnik'or ta je aweh tak ayu', tinik'il tak chi ma̱ban chic aweh tak re're'. Je' ricab wo' nik'orom chic cho aweh tak pan pe̱t yu' na̱ nik'or wo' chic aweh tak chi ma̱ban tak chic take no'jbal re're' maj hab wach take je' re' quibanic ma'xta quehtric wih'ic chi rehquen rajawric i Dios chi k'atal k'oric.

Je' aj re' ru' ric'am cho i c'acharic chi chopo̱j kana̱ ru'um i mahc, raj la' i c'acharic chopo̱j na̱ ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios re' take wili nc'uhtunic lok wi̱': Re' quic'axaric take kas kacha̱k', re' wih'ic pan sukquil c'uxlis, re' wih'ic pan tuklic laj c'uxlis cu̱c' take kich c'acharel. Je' wo', re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios riyew kak'unil eh re're' riyew wo' chak'lamil pan ka̱mna ch'i̱l riqueteljic quiwach take kas kacha̱k', on riyew wo' kacapew-bal chi rich'iquinjic kac'ux chiri̱j i Dios.

Ma' xa re' ta re' je' la' wo' riyew keh i ch'ublic wach c'uxlis pan ka̱mna, riyew wo' kano'jbal chi ripitjic ki̱b ru̱c' pa' bih ma' holohic ta nkac'ax nak wach ribanjic. Wi c'acharic aj na'n tak ru̱c' take no'jbal re're', ma'xta chic jeno' toco̱m c'uhbal eta nak ntak'anic chana̱ tak.

Ru̱c' aj re're' nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak i wili nic' pa' q'uihal hat-tak chic aj niminel reh Jesus: Je' ricab nok re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xcansjic ar wach curu̱s, je' wo' na re' xa'n hat-tak ru̱c' take pa' bih no'jbal no̱j wi̱' ac'ux tak ch'i̱l wo' i na'n tak ru'um chi chopo̱j ana̱ tak ru'um i mahc chi je' na wa'ric xacansaj wo' tak wach ar wach curu̱s ru̱c' riquimic i Jesus.
Je' wo', wi re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios nbehsenic reh ac'acharic tak, chac'uhtaj wo' lok ru̱c' ano'jbal tak chi je' wo' re'.

Je' wo' chic, ma' animslom awach tak ru̱c' take pa' bih wilic aweh tak. Je' wo', ma' nchalic wo' riti'quilal ac'ux tak ru̱c' pa' bih i wilic reh awas acha̱k' tak ru'um nok wi je' re' na'n tak enuctic cho ixowonic i̱b chaxilac tak eh chi je' re' enayojlom ac'ux chi awibil awi̱b tak chipam rinimjic i Dios.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, yu'na re' chic i wili nwa̱j nik'orom je aweh tak: Wi hab wach nchel chaxilac tak xawilow tak chi xmahcanic chiwach i Dios, re' hat-tak re' behsemaj chic acapew-bal tak ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios, tanlic chana̱ tak chi enak'il tak pa ricorquil je' wo' pan chak'lamil je' ricab nak enawa̱j tak chi enca'n awu̱c' tak wi ta nak etiquik'il tak. Je' re' nipahkaj chi ena'n tak maj chaj ta wo' chana'bej wi re' hat-tak na̱wiq'uic ok wo' tak chipam jeno' k'ilo̱j ru'um pa' bih jeno' xatmahcanic tak wi̱'.

Je' wo', nik'or aweh tak chi c'ul chato'bej awi̱b chawach tak ru̱c' xa chajaric c'axquilal nchalic china̱ jeno' xa hab wach aweh tak maj xa chi je' re' enamimej tak i c'uhbal k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi naric'amaric na̱.

Ru̱c' i k'ilo̱j na̱banam tak, pe̱t chawic'raj awi̱b tak chi aju'junal, ma̱nimsaj nchel awi̱b tak ru̱c' rik'ormojic chi re' hat-tak je' ma'xta so' amahc tak. Je' re' nik'or maj wi je' re' na'n tak xa awi̱b c'ahchi' ajot'om tak.

Je' re' nok hab pa' wach narik'ilim i ras richa̱k', chic'raj pe ri̱b chi pe̱t nic' wach wilic ric'acharic on ricapew-bal. Wi la' ric'raj ri̱b chi ma'xta so' rimahc, ric'ul chi reh chi sukbok ric'ux chiwach i Dios xa re' cok ru' wi ric'raj ri̱b chi je' re' ma' riq'uihsaj ri̱b chiwach i ras richa̱k'.
Je' re' ajic kic'raj tak ki̱b ru̱c' kano'jbal maj chi kaju'junal i hoj wilic chi kana̱ i rahlil pa' bih kabano̱j chiwach i Dios.
Re' hat-tak re' c'ahchi' ac'uhbaljic tak ru'um jeno' aj c'uhbalanel, tanlic chana̱ tak chi na̱to'bem tak awaj c'uhbalanel tak ru̱c' xa pa' bih suk ato̱b riyew cho aweh tak i kAja̱w Dios.

Je' wo', ma̱jot' awi̱b tak chi ena'n tak i jot'o̱j maj re' Dios ma' xa ta ricana̱' chi je' re' i hab wach nse'lenic pan nak' wach. Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak je' ricab chi jeno' winak pa' bih ja'quil ritic jok pa rac'a̱l re' wo' re' wach i ritic narilom, je' wo' re' hat-tak re' pa' bih holonquil na̱banam ru̱c' awas acha̱k' tak, re' wo' holonquilal na̱banam tak risukquil pan jenaj k'i̱j.

Je' re' k'uru' xa hab pa' wach aweh tak riban take no'jbal pa ric'acharic chi chopo̱j na̱ ru'um i mahc, ma' re' ta junelic laj c'acharic naruy'em naquimok je. Tz'a̱b ru' hab wach riban ribanaric take holonquilal laj no'jbal ncojoric pa ra̱mna ru'um Lok' laj Uxlabal, junelic laj c'acharic wo' naruy'em ru̱c' i Dios naquimok je.

Ru'um aj chi je' re', re' hoj ma' riban ta chi ekojch'i'tjic chi ribanaric i holohic laj bano̱j maj wi ma' xkamay ribanaric i holohic, til nakilom wo' wach jeno' kaco̱ch ru̱c' i Dios naponok rik'ijil.

Je' re' k'uru' xa nic' pa' yu' nka'n canar quitobjic take kas kacha̱k', kato'bej wo' take eh haj wilic take til curman chi k'e̱' wo' chic nakato'bem take, re' take kich aj niminel re' xa kas kacha̱k' chic ki̱b pa rinimjic i Jesus.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, pan cohlsbal wach nihu̱j wili enawilow tak eh enacoj tak rehtal chi til re' chic i hin c'ahchi' nitz'ihminic je reh take k'oric nwa̱j nik'orom je aweh tak. Enacoj tak rehtal chi je' re' maj xa nimak chic nak' wach take tz'ihm c'ahchi' nibanam je chiwach i hu̱j wili.

Yu'na k'uru' tinik'il tak chiri̱j i k'oric nca'n aweh tak take aj c'uhbalanel cow c'ahchi' quicojom chana̱ tak rinimjic i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j cho reh Moyses chi rik'ataric lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ac'achanbal tak. Re' aj take c'acharel re're' cow nquik'or rinimjic i c'uhbal re're' xa reh chi xa suk chic equi'ilmijic cu'um take tinamit eh je' wo', reh chi ma' eta nquic'ul ti'c'axic re' nak naquic'ulum pan quik'ab take quich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wi enca'n rik'ormojic i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j ricorquil i nelic wi̱' riquimic wach curu̱s i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Re' take aj c'uhbalanel re're', re' quik'atam chic lok ritz'uhmal na̱ quic'achanbal, xa ta nak re' take re' nquic'am na̱ chi coric chi'nchel i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, xa re' la' ru' nca̱j quik'unem awach tak chi na̱k'atam tak lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ac'achanbal tak reh chi nanabjok chi re' hat-tak abanam tak chic re're', en-nimsjic quiwach cu'um take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.

Je' aj re' ru' quino'jbal take aj c'uhbalanel re're' chi riq'uihsjic quiwach, raj nchel i hin ma' re' ta so' rinimsjic wi̱b nicapaj. Haj cok wilic niyew wi̱' nic'ux yu'na, re' chic rik'ormojic ricorquilal chaj bih nelic wi̱' i ti' laj quimic xic'ul i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Ru'um reh ti' laj quimic xic'ul i Jesus ma' chopolqui̱n ta chic ru'um take c'ahbil laj no'jbal nbanaric china̱ ac'al wili eh re' chi'nchel re're' ma'xta wo' chic rajawric chi nina̱ i hin.

Je' re' nik'or maj yu'na ru̱c' rinimjic i Jesus ma' k'orel ta chic wi k'atoj on ma' k'atoj lok ritz'uhmal na̱ kac'achanbal chi ekojco'ljic, re' la' chic k'orel chi re' hoj xojmikric chic chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios ru̱c' rinimjic i Jesus ru'um chi re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios xojri'ac'saj chic.

Je' re' k'uru' re' hat-tak re' c'acharic chic na'n tak je' ricab rik'or i k'oric xnik'or lok wili, re' ok i sukquil c'uxlis ch'i̱l i riquetelbal i Dios wih'ok chana̱ hat-tak, re' hat-tak chic yuk'umaj chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios je' ricab nok wilque̱b wo' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.

Ru̱c' cohlsbal wach nik'orbal awu̱c' tak nwa̱j nik'orom je aweh tak chi yu'na johtok chi kawach ma' nwa̱j ta chic biram take k'oric chawi̱j tak maj ru̱c' re're' k'e̱' nacoj tak cho riti'quilal nic'ux. Je' re' nik'or maj re' hin wilic chic take rehtalil pa niti'jolal chaj bih take ti'c'axic nic'ulum lok ru'um chi hin aj k'orol reh c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus.
Je' aj re' ru' wich aj niminel, niban johtok niti̱j chawi̱j tak chi re' ta nak rato'bil i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, wih'ok chana̱ tak chawunchelal. Je' ta nak re' banarok awu̱c' tak.

Re' hin ma' Lu̱', re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xpahbanic wi̱n chi aj k'orol riC'uhbal ru'um chi je' re' camanic xa̱j i Dios chi nanibanam. Re' hin c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je hu̱j wili aweh hat-tak aj niminel wilca̱t tak pan tinamit E̱peso re' ma' nacana̱' ta rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus. Re' aj wili sukquil c'uxlis niyew je aweh tak:
Re' ta nak rato'bil eh je' wo' i sukquil c'uxlis riyew cho kAja̱w Dios ch'i̱l i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' ta nak re' wih'ok pan ac'acharic tak.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, til kayew tak johtok rilok'il i Ajabe̱s Dios re' rAja̱w i Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric maj ru'um chi wilco̱j chic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis rich'i̱l i Jesus, re' Dios xiyew cho chi kana̱ chi'nchel wach cuse'sbal nchalic ru̱c' ar pan taxa̱j, re' nkac'ul xa ru'um reh Lok' laj rUxlabal.

Je' re' nik'or aweh tak maj nok ja' tiklic ta cho taxa̱j ac'al, re' Dios richihim chic cho kawach chi naka'nam chi hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n ru'um chi wilco̱j chic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis rich'i̱l i Jesus. Je' re' xiban reh chi ekojc'acharic ru̱c' jenaj sak wach c'acharic je' wo' chi ma'xta jeno' kamahc chiwach.

Je' re' k'uru' xa ru'um reh rinimal ric'axbal i Dios xa najtir wo' cho k'i̱j xichih cho kawach chi naka'nam chi hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n. Je' re' wilco̱j wi̱' xa ru'um reh camanic xc'ulic riban chiki̱j i hoj c'acharel i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' wo' re' wilco̱j xa ru'um chi re' Dios xitik'a̱' wach re're' pa ric'ux eh xponic chiwach ribanaric re're'.

Je' wo' chic, re' Dios xiban chi je' re' reh chi narilok'onjic wach rinimal wach ato'bil xiban ku̱c' chi xojric'ul chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n xa ru'um chi wilco̱j pan jenaj wach c'uxlis rich'i̱l i Jesus re' ti' ic'rimaj ru'um i Dios.

Chi je' aj re' yu'na wilco̱j chic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis rich'i̱l i Jesus. Je' re' wilco̱j wi̱' ru'um nok re' Dios xojrehchaj wo' chic nok re' kAja̱w Jesus xichihcaj riquiq'ue̱l naxcansjic. Ru̱c' riquiq'ue̱l xichihcaj i Jesus re're', re' Dios xicuy xisach chi'nchel i kamahc eh xiban re're' xa ru'um reh richak'lamil wilic cho chi kana̱.
Til k'e̱' wo' chic xi̱c' na̱ richak'lamil re're' chi xiyew wo' cho keh rinimal kano'jbal reh chi nakeht'alim i ricapew-bal ru' eh reh wo' chi nakeht'alim nic' wach i c'acharic ra̱j chi naka'nam.

Je' wo', re' kAja̱w Dios ru'um chi je' re' xponic chiwach chi naribanam, xiyew keh chi eht'aljic chaj bih take no'jbal xa c'olic nak cho pa ric'ux. Re' take no'jbal re're' xa najtir wo' cho k'i̱j tiklic cho wach ru'um chi narimanlajic wach ru'um i kAja̱w Jesus.

Chi re' Dios xtik'inic reh chi'nchel re're', re' ritik'a̱b cho wach pa ric'ux ru' naric'uluric chipam i rik'ijil pahbamaj ru'um chi narimanlajic wi̱' wach. Naponok i rik'ijil re're' chi'nchel i nic' nimal quic'acharic ayu' wach ac'al ch'i̱l wo' take wilque̱b ar pan taxa̱j, re' kAja̱w Dios nariyeb chi rehquen ro̱k k'ab i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' re' naribanam i Dios reh chi re' chic Jesus naritak'anic china̱ chi'nchel.

Ru'um aj chi je' re' naribanam i Dios, re' hoj re' wilco̱j chic chi aj niminel reh Jesus xojponic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis rich'i̱l eh nok je' re' xka'n re' Dios xichih cho kawach chi naka'nam chi hoj chic ritinami̱t. Re' no'jbal re're' xa najtir wo' cho k'i̱j tiklic cho wach ru'um eh naxchalic rik'ijil xmanlajic wo' wach ru'um maj re' Dios haj pa' wilic ricapaj ribanaric re' aj wo' re' riban ribanaric.

Je' re' nik'or maj je' re' xiban ku̱c' i hoj aj niminel reh Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, reh chi re' hoj re' pe̱t xkach'ica̱' kac'ux chiri̱j ru' enka'n chi re' toco̱m chic take c'acharel enquiyew wo' rilok'il i Dios ru'um rinimal wach rilok'il.

Chi je' aj wo' re' riwi̱' xiban i Dios, re' hat-tak naxabiraj tak ricorquil riC'uhbal i Dios re' nk'oric chiri̱j i co'lbal i̱b chaweh tak, xanimej wo' tak i c'uhbal re're' eh ru'um re' xatcahnic wo' tak pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ch'i̱l i Jesus. Naxatniminic tak k'uru', re' Dios je' na wa'ric xicoj jenaj awehtalil tak chi hat-tak chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n eh re' ehtalil re're', re' i Lok' laj rUxlabal re' rik'orom wo' cho ribiral chi nariyeb.

Re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios re' xye'eric keh, re're' jenaj rehtalil chi pan jenaj k'i̱j nakehcham chi'nchel i nic' pa' nimal rik'orom cho i Dios chi nariyeb queh ritinami̱t. Re' aj re' nbanic chi re' hoj ritinami̱t i Dios til ch'iclic kac'ux chi pan jenaj k'i̱j nakaco'ljic chi manlic reh chi je' re' ewo' nkayew rilok'il riwa'ric ru'.
Yu'na nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi xnibiraj ribiral nic' wach i ch'iquinic c'uxlis na'n tak chiri̱j i kAja̱w Jesus eh je' wo' nic' wach achak'lamil nac'uhtaj tak cu̱c' chi'nchel aj niminel.
Ru'um aj re', re' hin nik'or je aweh tak chi nanc'ulic lok pa nic'ux abihnal tak pa niti̱j, re' hin xa eli̱c wo' niyew johtok ritioxjic reh kAja̱w Dios

re' ye'o̱j rilok'il ru'um i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Chiwach aj i manlic Ajabe̱s Dios re're', re' k'e̱' wo' chic nimal wach rilok'il wilic, nipahkaj johtok chi re' ta nak i Lok' laj rUxlabal encamanic awu̱c' tak chi narisakomem pa̱m ano'jbal tak chi rinabjic chi coric nic' wach rino'jbal i Dios.

Je' wo', re' hin nipahkaj wo' johtok reh Dios chi erisakomej pa̱m acapew-bal tak reh chi enaweht'alij tak chi'nchel i pa' bih holonquilal xatriyuk'ej tak wi̱' chi ruyu'njic chi na̱c'ulum tak pan jenaj k'i̱j. Je' wo' chic, nipahkaj reh i Dios pa niti̱j chi re' hat-tak na̱rakam tak chiri̱j chi re' chi'nchel na̱c'ulum hat-tak rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n, k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal wach rilok'il.

Chiri̱j lok i wili, til nipahkaj wo' reh Dios chi eriyew cho aweh tak chi enana'bej tak chi re' rinimal rajawric wilic chi katobjic i hoj aj niminel, ma' pajoj ta wo' chic nimal wach chi xa sahchok chic ac'ux ru'um. Ru̱c' aj rinimal rajawric re're',

xucsaj cho chi quixilac camnak i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh xiyew cok riye'a̱b chipam i ye'a̱b k'e̱' wo' chic nimal wach rilok'il ar pan taxa̱j je' ricab rilok'il nye'eric jeno' c'acharel nancojoric cok pa risec'a̱j jeno' k'atal k'oric.

Je' wo', re' Dios xiyew wo' reh rajawric chi naritak'anic chi quina̱ chi'nchel take uxlabal re' rehreh wach cajawric wilic. Je' re' k'uru' xa re' wo' Jesus xye'eric rajawric chi naritak'anic chi quina̱ chi'nchel xa hab wach jeno' wilic rajawric chiwach i k'i̱j sakom, je' chi wilque̱b chipam take rik'ijil kac'acharic yu'na je' chi chipam i junk'at chic c'acharic wilic johtok chi kawach.

Je' re' k'uru' re' kAja̱w Dios xiyew rehquen ro̱k k'ab i Jesus chi'nchel nic' pa' nimal wilic. Je' wo' chic, je' ricab nok re' c'acharel re' wo' i na̱ ntak'anic china̱ chi'nchel riti'jolal ribakil je' wo' re' i Jesus xpahbabjic wo' ru'um i Dios chi tak'anel chi kana̱ i hoj moloj wach aj niminel.

Chi je' aj re' riwi̱' i Jesus ku̱c' i hoj aj niminel, no̱j ka'n chi xa jenaj chic kawi̱' rich'i̱l ru'. Chi je' re' kawi̱', re' hoj aj niminel nka'n chi nmanlajic wach re' riwi̱' i Jesus re' nbanic chi xa haj yu̱k' q'uixca̱b chi'nchel nmanlajic wach. Re' aj wili niti̱j niban johtok chawi̱j tak.

Najtir cho k'i̱j nok xa re' nak i mahc na'n tak cho ribanaric, re' hat-tak je' nak acab tak cho camnak ru̱c' ano'jbal tak. Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab nok jeno' c'acharel camnak ma' nbirinic ta chic, je' wo' re' hat-tak ma' tibirinic ta wo' nak tak k'oric chiwach i Dios.

Je' wo', najtir cho re' hat-tak xa'n tak cho i c'ahbilal je' ricab nca'n take c'acharel c'ahbil quino'jbal ayu' wach ac'al eh re' nak nponic chiwach i quinahsil take ma' tob laj uxlabal re' wilic cajawric pan te̱w c'uxic, re' nak re' na'n tak ribanaric. Re' nahsil ma' to̱b laj uxlabal re're', cu yu'na chi k'i̱j xa cu re' wo' re' nbehsenic reh quicapew-bal take ma' quibirinic ta k'oric chiwach i Dios.

Je' nak re' cho kac'acharic chi'nchel i hoj najtir k'i̱j, tz'akalco̱j nak cho chipam i mahc nkotowej ribanaric ru̱c' kati'jolal kabakil, xa re' nak haj wilic rotowej cho i kati'jolal ch'i̱l kacapew-bal nka'n ribanaric. Je' re' ajic ru'um chi xa jenaj wo' nak kawach quich'i̱l take c'ahbil quino'jbal, re' rijosk'il i Dios wilic chi quina̱ ru', re' wo' nak re' wilic chi kana̱ i hoj.
To̱b ta wo' je' nak re' cho kac'acharic, re' kAja̱w Dios ru'um chi k'e̱' wo' chic ti'quilal kojric'raj til wo' chic xiquetelej cho kawach i hoj c'acharel

chi ru̱c' i rucsjic cho chi quixilac camnak i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, xiban wo' chi hoj chic ac' laj c'acharel. Je' re' xiban i Dios nok wilco̱j nak cho chipam kamahc chi je' hoj camnak eh je' re' nik'or maj ma' nka'n ta nak canar birinic k'oric chiwach ru'. Ra̱j la' yu'na xa ru'um reh rinimal rato'bil xiyew cho chi kana̱, hoj chic co'lomaj.

Je' re' ajic je' ricab xic'ul i kAja̱w Jesus chi ru̱c' rucsjic cho chi quixilac take camnak xic'ul jenaj ac' la' c'acharic, je' wo' chic re' xc'uluric ku̱c' i hoj naxiquetelej cho kawach i Dios. Ma' xa ta re're' xiban je' la' wo' re' i Dios xiban je' ricab nbanaric reh jeno' c'acharel chi nye'eric rilok'il nancojoric cok pa risec'a̱j jeno' k'atal k'oric eh je' re' nik'or maj je' wo' re' xiban ku̱c' i hoj naxiyew wo' cok riye'a̱b i Jesus chipam i ye'a̱b k'e̱' wo' chic nimal wach rilok'il ar pan taxa̱j.

Je' aj re' xiban ku̱c' i Dios reh chi naric'uhtam johtok chi kawach chi k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal wach rato'bil wilic cho chi kana̱ re' nc'utunic ru̱c' riholonquilal wach richak'lamil wilic cho chi kana̱ i hoj re' wilco̱j chic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis rich'i̱l i kAja̱w Jesus.

Chi je' re' k'uru' chacoj tak rehtal i nik'or wili: Re' hat-tak xatco'ljic tak xa ru'um reh rinimal wach rato'bil i kAja̱w Dios xiban aweh tak naxach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiri̱j i kAja̱w Jesus eh ma' ru'um ta nchel xa awansil awi̱b tak xatco'ljic tak. Je' re' nik'or maj re' co'lbal i̱b riyew i Dios c'ahchi' riyeb xa chi si̱.

Re're' ra̱j rik'orom chi re' co'lbal i̱b riyew ru', ma' ru'um ta ribanaric jeno' holohic laj bano̱j nka'n, reh chi je' re' ma' hab ta wach jeno' c'acharel erinimsaj ri̱b chi rik'ormojic chi xirak rico'lbal xa ru'um jeno' bano̱j xiban.

Nik'or chi je' re' maj til re' Dios ac'sanic reh kac'acharic eh yu'na chi wilco̱j chic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis rich'i̱l i kAja̱w Jesus, re' Dios xiyew keh jenaj ac' laj c'acharic reh chi naka'nam take holohic laj bano̱j nponic chiwach ru' je' ricab ritik'a̱b wo' cho wach pa ric'ux najtir k'i̱j chi naka'nam i hoj c'acharel.

Coric ru', re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' quik'oric chi ritinami̱t i Dios take ru'um chi k'ato̱j lok ritz'uhmal na̱ quic'achanbal nquik'or chi re' hat-tak re' ma' re' ta hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, ma' re' ta hat-tak ritinami̱t i Dios ru'um chi re' hat-tak ma' k'ato̱j ta lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ac'achanbal tak. Raj nchel i hin nik'or aweh tak chi re' nca'n ribanaric re're' xa jenaj rehtalil chi quiwach chi ritinami̱t i Dios take. Re' nca'n ribanaric re're', xa reh tiwic nbanjic eh xa c'acharel wo' ti nbanic lok rik'ataric.

Chi je' aj re' ricorquilal, til c'olok pan ac'ux tak k'uru' chi najtir cho k'i̱j c'acharic nak na'n tak chi ma'xta nak awu̱c' tak i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh ma' hat ta wo' nak tak pa riman chi quixilac take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi ritinami̱t i Dios. Xa ta wo' nak pa riman wilca̱t tak chi ric'uluric take co̱ch rik'orom cho ribiral chipam take tik'inic xiban i kAja̱w Dios cu̱c' take aj najtir k'i̱j. Je' wo', re' hat-tak ma'xta nak bih c'ahchi' awuy'em tak chi na̱c'ulum tak ru̱c' i Dios eh ma'xta nak awocal tak chi k'oric chiwach.

Raj yu'na ru̱c' riquiq'ue̱l xichihcaj naxcansjic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' Dios xatric'am tak ru̱c' pan sukquil c'uxlis ru'um chi re' hat-tak wilca̱t tak chic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis rich'i̱l i Jesus to̱b ta nak najtir cho k'i̱j ma' wilca̱t ta nak tak pan sukquil ru̱c' i Dios.

Je' re' nok ru̱c' riquimic i Jesus, re're' xojriyew pan sukquil i hoj ca'ch'uk kawi̱' chi tinamit. Ru'um aj re' chi kaxilac i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ch'i̱l hat-tak ma' re' ta hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, xesaj lok i ixowonic i̱b ch'i̱l i ch'akoj i̱b re' wilic nak chi kawach eh ru̱c' xiban re're', xojcahnic chi xa hoj chic jenaj chi tinamit.

Je' wo' chic, re're' xesaj chi kana̱ i rahlil rinimjic take tak'anic wilic chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, reh chi re' quib chi tinamit xiban chi xa jenaj chic riwi̱' xa ru'um chi pan kacabchelal wilco̱j chic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ru̱c'. Ru̱c' re're' xojricoj pan jenaj suk laj c'uxlis chi kawach.

Ru̱c' aj riquimic wach curu̱s, re' Jesus xojricoj pan jenaj suk laj wih'ic ru̱c' i Dios i hoj ca'ch'uk chi tinamit eh xiban chi xa jenaj chic kawi̱' naxisach wach i ixowonic i̱b wilic nak chi kaxilac najtir k'i̱j.

Re' wili i ribiral nic' wach xiban ru': Naxc'ulic i Jesus china̱ ac'al wili, xc'ulic chi rik'ormojic ribiral i sukquil c'uxlis ra̱j riyeb i Dios. Re' c'uhbal chiri̱j i suk laj c'uxlis ra̱j riyeb i Dios re're' xk'ormojic aweh hat-tak ma' re' ta hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' ma' wilca̱t ta tak pan suk laj wih'ic ru̱c' i Dios. Re' wo' re' xk'ormojic keh i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' nkak'or chi wilco̱j nak chic pan suk laj wih'ic ru̱c' i Dios.

Re' rehtalil chi re' Jesus xiban chi xa jenaj chic kawi̱', re' i wili: Re' hoj ca'ch'uk nak chi tinamit kawi̱', yu'na echic riban chi ekojk'oric ru̱c' Ajabe̱s Dios pan jenaj wach c'uxlis chi kawach xa ru'um reh i Lok' laj rUxlabal.

Ru'um aj i jenaj wach c'uxlis re're', re' hat-tak yu'na ma' hat ta tak chic toco̱m eh ma'xta chic abiral tak chi ma' re' ta hat-tak ritinami̱t i Dios. Je' re' nik'or maj chi xa jenaj chic awi̱' tak quich'i̱l take aj niminel wilque̱b chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios, xatoquic wo' tak chi ritinami̱t ru'.

Je' re' k'uru' je' ricab nok jeno' pa̱t ar nch'ihquic cho ritik'injic china̱ take abaj cojo̱j chi ricowil ra̱', je' wo' re' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re're' wilic chi rira'il animinic tak. Je' wo', je' ricab nok china̱ take abaj re're' ntikiric ju' ricojoric johtok jenaj tz'ak yutbal pa̱m rira'il i pa̱t je' wo' re' i kaniminic nkatik ju' riq'uihsjic wach ru̱c' i c'uhbal xquik'or take cho nahsil c'amol quibe̱h raj tahkanel i Jesus ch'i̱l wo' i c'uhbal xquik'or take aj k'orol reh k'oric nquic'ul ru̱c' i Dios.

Je' wo' chic, je' ricab nok re' aj tz'ako̱l rimol wach take rehreh wach pa' bih camanbal ncamanic chi johsbal reh jeno' pa̱t re' naricamanic chi lok'onbal wach i Dios, je' wo' re' i Jesus c'ahchi' ribanam chi re' hat-tak eli̱c c'ahchi' abanam tak chi xa jenaj chic awi̱b tak rich'i̱l reh chi je' re' na̱banam tak chi jenaj comonil lo̱k' riwa'ric chiwach i Dios.

Ru'um chi xa jenaj chic awi̱' tak rich'i̱l i Jesus, re' Dios c'ahchi' rituna̱b awach hat-tak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel quich'i̱l take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel aj niminel take, reh chi na̱banam tak chi je' ricab jenaj pa̱t re' nariwih'ic wi̱' i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, re' hin ma' Lu̱' tz'apalqui̱n pan che̱' ru'um chi xnik'or aweh i hat-tak re' ma' re' ta hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel i ribiral i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Nanik'or i wili, re' hin weht'alim wo' chi re' hat-tak abiram tak chic chi re' Dios ru̱c' rinimal wach rato'bil xiripahba̱' chi nanibanam i camanic re' ric'am cho holonquilal chaweh hat-tak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho i ma' Israhel.
Je' wo', re' Dios xiyew wi̱n chi eht'aljic chi coric take no'jbal re' xa c'olic nak cho pa ric'ux je' ricab wo' xnitz'ihmbaj chic je so' ribiral aweh tak.

Wi enaca'pechej tak rilmijic wach tz'ihmbimaj re're', enarak tak chiri̱j chi til coric chi weht'alim take no'jbal re' ja' teho̱j ta nak nech' ok wach najtir k'i̱j, re' nk'oric chiri̱j ribiral i camanic xc'ulic riban i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Coric ru', re' no'jbal re're' ma' ja' teho̱j ta nak cho so' wach rik'ormojic ribiral queh take jarub pa' ch'uk chi c'acharel iq'uinak take lok chi c'acharic china̱ ac'al wili xa re' la' chic yu'na ma' je' ta chic re' nc'uluric, ru̱c' la' rito'bal i Lok' laj Uxlabal re' Dios xisakomej wach i no'jbal re're' queh take pahbamaj chi aj k'orol riC'uhbal eh je' wo' keh hoj re' k'e̱' lok kawa'ric chiwach ru'um chi xojripahba̱' chi caj nahsil take xitak'a̱' chi rik'ormojic ribiral i Jesus.

Re' aj wili i xisakomej wach keh i Dios chiri̱j i no'jbal re're': Chi re' hat-tak aj niminel reh Jesus je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel jenaj wach i co̱ch na̱c'ulum tak kich'i̱l i hoj aj niminel reh Jesus je' ru̱c' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Je' wo', chi ka'nam chic chi xa jenaj chic kawi̱' chi ritinami̱t i Dios, re' hat-tak na̱wehtric tak kich'i̱l ru̱c' i co̱ch re' rik'orom cho ribiral i Dios chi nariyeb wo' aweh tak ru'um chi xa jenaj chic awi̱' tak ch'i̱l i Jesus. Chi'nchel re're' nkarak chiri̱j ru̱c' ribirmijic i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus.

Re' hin k'uru' xiban chi hin chic aj k'orol reh c'uhbal re're' maj re' Dios xye'bic wi̱n i lok' laj camanic re're' eh niban ribanaric xa ru'um reh rinimal wach rato'bil xnic'ul ru̱c' xa je' na nchel jenaj si̱ eh xa ru'um wo' reh lok' laj camanic xiban i rinimal wach rajawric pan wa̱mna.

Je' re' nok tob ta ma'xta ti so' niwa'ric chiwach i til t'uch wo' chic wach riwa'ric chi quixilac take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios, re' hin xnicochej i lok' laj camanic wili chi rik'ormojic aweh hat-tak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel i c'uhbal chiri̱j i co'lbal i̱b xiyew i Dios xa ru'um reh i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Re' c'uhbal re're' xa je' na jenaj rinimal wach bihomal nkarak ru̱c' i Jesus chi ma' hab ta wo' chic wach enponic ru̱c' ricapewjic ri̱j jarub ritz'akil.

Je' wo' chic re' Dios re' xtik'inic reh chi'nchel, xiyew wi̱n i camanic chi risakomsjic lok wach queh c'acharel chaj bih xiban ru' reh chi re' no'jbal re' xa nok wo' tik'imaj cho wach pa ric'ux eh xa pa ricapew-bal wo' nak c'olic cho ribanaric, c'ahchi' rojic elok wach yu'na.

Re' camanic re're', re' wo' re' nbanic chi re' take jarleh pa' wach chi uxlabal wilic cajawric chi tak'anic pan te̱w c'uxic enquilow yu'na cu̱c' take aj niminel chi re' Dios xiq'uic wo' chic na̱ riholonquilal rino'jbal ru̱c' rehreh wach take holonquilal riban.

Re' camanic re're' k'uru' c'ahchi' nibanam je' ricab nic' pa' wach xitik'a̱' cho wach i Dios najtir cho k'i̱j chi ru̱c' i pa' bih xiban i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, xo̱j manlajok wach i no'jbal re' xa nok wo' tik'imaj cho wach ru'um Dios pa ricapew-bal chi naribanam.

Je' re' ajic chi ch'iclic chic kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus je' wo' chi wilco̱j chic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis rich'i̱l ru', re' hoj yu'na riban chi ekoj-oquic cok chiwach i kAja̱w Dios chi ma'xta nech' ok kayo'jic chi k'oric ru̱c'.

Chi je' aj re' nipahkaj aweh tak yu'na chi ma̱yoj ac'ux tak ru'um take ti'c'axic c'ahchi' nic'ulum ru'um reh rik'ormojic i c'uhbal aweh tak maj re' take ti'c'axic re're' nicuy ransil reh chi nariwih'ic rinimal sukquil ac'ux tak.
Naquincapewenic chiri̱j nic' pa' nimal holonquilal ribanam cho i Ajabe̱s Dios chiki̱j i hoj, re' hin til nixuc'a̱' wi̱b chi ti̱j chiwach i Dios
re' rira'il chi'nchel c'acharic je' chi wilque̱b ar pan taxa̱j, je' chi wilque̱b ayu' wach ac'al.
Pan niti̱j nipahkaj reh chi ru̱c' riye'eric cho rinimal ricuse'sbal chana̱ tak cu pan taxa̱j, chiyew ta nak aweh tak i cowil c'uxlis re' riyew i Lok' laj rUxlabal.

Je' wo' chic, chi enatik tak ju' richoporic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric reh chi je' re', re' Lok' laj Uxlabal eritik ju' wih'ic awu̱c' tak chi patanic pan awa̱mna tak. Je' aj re' niti̱j niban reh chi ewo' tiwih'ic tak chi pa'lic chic ac'ux tak chi quic'axaric take awas acha̱k' tak ch'i̱l wo' i Dios je' ricab nok jeno' che̱' cha̱m ojonak jok rira'il pan ac'al pa'lic chi coric, on je' wo' ricab nok jeno' nim laj pa̱t til ch'iquimaj cho chi coric nah abaj cu pan ac'al jok.

Je' wo', nipahkaj wo' chipam i niti̱j chi re' hat-tak ch'i̱l take awich aj niminel enarak tak chiri̱j chi coric nic' wach i c'axoj i̱b xiban cho i kAja̱w Jesus maj re' kac'axmajic xiban ma' pajoj ta wo' chic rinimal wach rilok'il.

Je' re' ajic nipahkaj wo' johtok reh Dios chi chiban ta nak chi re' hat-tak eli̱c ena'n tak risukquil i rinimal wach ric'axbal i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh chi je' re' chana'bej ta wo' nak tak chi k'e̱' ti' kojric'raj to̱b ta wo' ma' eta kojponic ru̱c' rirakmajic pa̱m i rinimal wach c'axo̱j riban cho keh. Ma' xa re' ta re' i pahkanic niban johtok reh i Dios chawi̱j tak je' la' wo' nipahkaj chi chiyew cho aweh tak i chi'nchel wach take no'jbal wilic ru̱c'.
