Je' aj re' nipahkanic chiwach i kAja̱w Dios maj re're' til k'e̱' wo' chic rajawric wilic chi re' hoj ma' eta so' nponic i kacapew-bal ru̱c' take bano̱j eriban chi katobjic eh chi re' pa' bih nkapahkaj reh pan kati̱j eriyew cho keh ru'um reh rajawric wilic.

Ru'um aj re' ayu' johtok chi kawach chi'nchel i hoj aj niminel re' wilco̱j chic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ch'i̱l i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, til kayew tak rilok'il i kAja̱w Dios chi junelic k'i̱j sakom. Je' ta nak re' banarok.

Chi k'oro̱j chic lok re're', yu'na re' hin ma' Lu̱' re' tz'apalqui̱n pan che̱' ru'um reh rik'ormojic ribiral i kAja̱w Jesus til nipahkaj je aweh tak chi tic'acharok tak chi coric chiwach i Dios je' ricab i xa̱j chawi̱j tak naxatriyuk'ej tak cho chi na̱banam tak chi hat-tak rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n.

Chi je' aj re' xa̱j i Dios, tic'acharok tak k'uru' chi xa ch'ublic ok wach ac'ux tak, xa hat ok wo' tak chak'lam, wilic ok awuyu'nbal tak eh xa wilic ok wo' cuybal amahc chawach tak ru'um chi nac'ax awi̱b tak.

Je' wo' chic, chatik tak ju' richoporic ac'ux tak chi wih'ic pan jenaj wach sukquil c'uxlis re' rituna̱' wi̱' wach ac'ux tak i Lok' laj Uxlabal. Re're' enarak tak wi re' hat-tak na̱c'acharic tak pan sukquilal laj c'uxlis chaxilac tak.

Je' re' cha'n tak maj yu'na xa jenaj chic kawi̱' chi ritinami̱t i Dios. Je' wo', xa re' wo' i jenaj chi Lok' laj Uxlabal nbanic chi xa jenaj chic kawi̱'. Ma' xa re' ta re', je' la' wo' re' Dios xichih cho kawach reh chi nakuy'em xa jenaj wach co̱ch re' ch'iclic kac'ux chiri̱j chi nakac'ulum.
Je' wo', jenaj wo' chi Ajabe̱s ye'o̱j chi kana̱, xa jenaj wo' riwi̱' chi niminic wilco̱j wi̱' eh xa jenaj wo' wach i kahsanic ha' xkac'ul.

Je' wo' chic, xa jenaj wo' chi Dios nkalok'ej wach eh re're' wilic cho chi kAja̱w chi'nchel i hoj aj niminel. Re're' aj tak'anel chi kana̱, re're' ncamanic ru̱c' kac'acharic eh re' wo' re' wilic pan kac'acharic.

Til Coric ru' chi xa jenaj chic kawi̱' chi ritinami̱t i Dios xa re' la' ru' coric wo' chi kaju'junal i hoj rehreh wach c'axbal xiyew keh i Dios re' k'orel pa' bih camanic xa̱j riyeb keh i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi naka'nam

je' ricab k'oro̱j cho pan Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios re' nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus chi je' wili: “Nok re' kAja̱w johtonak chic johtok chi nahtil ye'a̱b eh nok ric'amam chic je take raj ixowonel chiri̱j chi pixi̱x take, xiyew wo' cho quico̱ch take c'acharel, nqui rik'or.
Chaj bih ra̱j rik'orom chi re' kAja̱w xjohtic johtok chi nahtil ye'a̱b? Re're' ra̱j rik'orom chi nok ja' njohtic ta wo' nak chic johtok ar, pe̱t xponic cho wih'ok cu chi rehquen jok ac'al.
Je' re' k'uru' re' kAja̱w re' xkajic cho cu ar pan taxa̱j til re' wo' chic re' xjohtic johtok juntar taxa̱j reh chi ma'xta chic bih ma' ta nak encahnic chi rehquen rajawric.

Je' re' nok ru̱c' rajawric i Jesus wilic china̱ chi'nchel, re're' xipahba̱' take raj camanom china̱ ac'al wili. Wilic take xipahba̱' chi nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take chi'nchel aj niminel, wilic take xipahba̱' chi aj k'orol reh pa' bih k'oric nquic'ul ru̱c' i Dios, wilic wo' take xipahba̱' chi xa c'ul ye'a̱b nacojic chi rik'ormojic i holohic laj c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus. Wilic wo' take xipahba̱' chi aj tijinel take eh chi aj c'amol be̱h wo' queh ju'jun chi comonil aj niminel.

Chi je' re' k'uru' re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xipahba̱' take rehreh wach aj camanom reh chi re' hoj aj niminel re' wilco̱j chi je' ro̱k k'ab ru', enkarak kano'jbal ru̱c' eh ru̱c' re're' ekojcamanic wo' chi aj tijinel queh toco̱m chic kich aj niminel chi enq'uihic wach quiniminic.

Re' hoj riwi̱' chi keh chi je' re' enka'n cu rehtal xa jenaj chic wach ch'iquinic c'uxlis naka'nam eh je' wo' chi rehreh nakarakam kano'jbal chi rirakmajic chiri̱j rino'jbal i Jesus re' rAc'u̱n i Dios. Ru̱c' re're', re' kac'acharic naribanam chi manlic wach je' ricab chi re' rajawric i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric til manlic wach.

Je' aj re' ritik'a̱b cho wach i Dios reh chi re' hoj aj niminel ma'eta chic koj-jot'oric ru̱c' toco̱m chic chucuj laj tijbal je' ricab nbanaric cu̱c' take ha'lac'un chi xa suk ti naquijot'oric, on reh chi ma' xa ta e̱ enkak'or ru̱c' ric'uluric take chucuj laj c'uhbal nquik'or take chucul aj c'uhbalanel re' xa ch'u̱b chic wach i k'oric nca'n chi jot'oj tak capew-bal.

Chi je' aj re' ma' nkacana̱' tak ki̱b chi nakajot'oric, re' la' ka'n tak til kojk'orok tak ru̱c' i ricorquilal nchalic ru̱c' i Dios. Je' re' ka'n tak chi c'ahchi' wo' kac'uhtam i chak'lamil chi kibil ki̱b reh chi re' kano'jbal re' nc'utunic lok wi̱' nic' wach riwi̱' kac'acharic, enq'uihic wach eh eriban jenaj wach ru̱c' rino'jbal kanahsil i hoj aj niminel re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Ma' xa ta re're', re' la' re' nchopbic keh eh rituna̱' kawach chi coric i hoj re' wilco̱j chi jilow ro̱k rik'ab je' ricab nok re' ko̱k kak'ab i hoj c'acharel tiko̱j take chi coric ru̱c' i kati'jolal kabakil. Re' aj i Jesus nchoponic kana̱ reh chi nariwih'ic kansil eh chi nakacamanic chi coric chiwach. Chi je' aj re' riwi̱' i Jesus chi nahanel na̱ kac'acharic, chi ju'junal keh hoj aj niminel kojcamanic wo' re' k'orel nic' pa' wach kacamaj ye'o̱j ru'um. Ma' xa ta re're' nka'n, nkac'ax la' wo' ki̱b eh nanka'n chi je' re', re' hoj ritinami̱t i Dios nq'uihbic wach pan kaniminic.

Was tak nicha̱k' yu'na nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak i wili: Ru'um chi re' Dios xpahbanic wi̱n chi raj k'oro̱l, re' hin cow nipahkaj aweh tak i wili: Ma̱ban tak chic aweh c'acharic je' ricab c'acharic nca'n chipam quimemil laj no'jbal take awich c'acharel tak re' ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel take re' ja' ma' nquinimej ta wo' i Dios.

Re' take re' ma' nquirak ta chiri̱j chaj bih ra̱j Dios chiqui̱j ru'um chi pan k'ekom wilic quicapew-bal. Ru'um chi nquik'ihtaj qui̱b chiwach i Dios, ma' c'ahchi' ta wo' ca'nam risukquil i c'acharic riyew ru'.

Chi je' re' chi ma'xta chic so' quiq'uix'ic, xquik'ahsaj qui̱b chi ribanaric chi'nchel wach yibel laj no'jbal eh chi xa quiracratic chic cho chi ribanaric i c'ahbilal, riman chic xquicut qui̱b chipam.
Raj nchel i hat-tak ma' re' ta re' i no'jbal xatijej tak naxatijiljic tak chiri̱j ribiral i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric,
re' la' hat-tak xabiraj tak i coric laj c'uhbal xik'or i Jesus eh chi wilca̱t tak chic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ru̱c', re' wo' re' i c'uhbal til xat-tijiljic tak wi̱'.

Je' re' nok re' hat-tak xat-tijiljic wo' tak chiri̱j i rik'eb-eric lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak i najtir laj no'jbal re' xa'n tak cho ribanaric pan ac'acharic tak najtir. Re' no'jbal re're' xo̱j riban chi xa ma'xta chic so' ricorquil ru'um reh take c'ahbilal nawotowej cho pan ac'ux tak re' xjot'bic reh ac'acharic tak.
Ma' xa re' ta re', xat-tijiljic la' wo' tak chiri̱j chi re' hat-tak na̱yeb tak k'ab chi re' Dios nari-ac'sam ano'jbal tak ch'i̱l acapew-bal tak.

Je' re' k'uru' re' ano'jbal tak re' ac'samaj chic wach, je' ok ricab rino'jbal i Dios re' xtik'inic wach chi je' re' ano'jbal tak reh chi etiwih'ic tak pan jenaj coric laj c'acharic nt'oric wach eh je' wo' pan jenaj sak wach c'acharic.

Chi je' chic re' ano'jbal tak, nik'or wo' aweh tak chi chawesaj tak lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak i chucuj laj k'oric eh xa coric ok wo' tik'orok tak cu̱c' take awich aj niminel tak. Je' re' cha'n tak ru'um chi xa jenaj chic wach kac'ux wilco̱j wi̱'.

Ru'um aj wo' re' nik'or wi hab wach jeno' aweh tak xchalic ric'a̱, ma' ricana̱' chi re' ric'a̱ enminbic reh pan mahc, chic'raj la' ri̱b chi ma' ric'saj i k'i̱j chi xa cu wilic wo' cho i c'a̱ pa ra̱mna,
reh chi re' aj Yahm ma' eta rirak jeno' pa' bih ericut je wi̱' pan mahc

Je' wo' chic, wi wilic nchel jeno' hab wach chaxilac tak cu ricoj i k'ab chi lek' ma' riban chic ribanjic, chisic' la' ricamaj reh chi ru̱c' wo' ransil ritz'awumal enwih'ic pa' bih reh chi quitobjic take ras richa̱k' c'axic ti nca'n.

Je' wo', ma' nelic chic cho k'oric yojbal c'uxlis xak achi̱' tak, tik'orok la' tak ru̱c' i k'oric re' eriyew ricowil quic'ux take awich aj niminel tak reh chi naquibiraj i k'oric ena'n tak, enquirak wo' to'bal reh quicapew-bal.

Je' wo' chic, ma̱ban chi ru̱c' ak'orbal tak enati'saj tak ric'ux i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios re' xye'eric aweh tak chi cojbal awehtalil tak chi hat-tak chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios re' na̱co'ljic tak chi manlic naponok i k'i̱j naricohlam wi̱' wach i Dios re' camanic rip'utum cho awu̱c' tak chi aco'ljic.

Je' wo' chic, til nik'or aweh tak chi chawesaj tak lok pan awa̱mna tak chi'nchel i c'ahbilal je' ricab take wili: Re' cakcatil, re' c'ahanic i̱b, re' josk'il, re' wolonic i̱b, re' tz'akoj tak wach c'uta̱j chiri̱j awas acha̱k' tak ch'i̱l chi'nchel nic' pa' nimal take toco̱m chic yibel wach no'jbal.

Chi jelow-bal la' re're', hat ok tak ato̱b cu̱c' chi'nchel awich aj niminel tak eh c'ul chaquetelej awach tak. Je' wo', c'ul chacuy amahc chawach tak je' ricab nok re' Dios xicuy cho amahc tak ru'um chi wilca̱t tak chic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ch'i̱l i Jesus.
Yu'na hat-tak rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios re' k'e̱' ti' tiric'raj tak, til nipahkaj aweh tak chi chac'am wo' tak tz'eht reh rino'jbal ru'.

Je' re' nok ma̱cana̱' tak ric'axaric awas acha̱k' tak je' ricab kac'axmajic xiban i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, naxik'ahsaj ri̱b pan quimic chiki̱j i hoj c'acharel chi je' ricab jeno' si̱ nk'ahsjic johtok chiwach i Dios on je' ricab quik'ahsjic take chicop re' naquic'ataric cho chiwach i Dios, xa nbukunic chic ric'ohonquil nponic johtok chiwach.

Je' wo', ru'um chi re' hat-tak, hat-tak chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios, ma'xta bih aweh tak chi enelic cho abiral tak chi c'ahchi'ca̱t tak chi ribanaric take wili: Re' take ribanaric xa chi'nchel wach c'oyomal ch'i̱l ribanaric take yibel wach no'jbal eh ch'i̱l wo' c'axo̱j tak wach bihomal.

Je' wo', ma' ric'ul ta chaweh tak chi cu ena'n tak ribanaric take wili: Re' take q'uixbilal laj k'oric, re' horhor laj k'oric ch'i̱l take ma' to̱b ta laj balak'il. Re' chi'nchel re're' ma' riwi̱' ta chaweh tak chi cu ena'n tak maj chi hat-tak chic aj niminel, ma' ric'ul ta chaweh tak chi cu je' re' ak'orbal tak, re' la' achi̱' tak camanok aweh tak chi tioxbal johtok i Dios.

Re' riwi̱' chi xnik'or je aweh tak chi ma̱ban tak i c'oyomal, on yibel wach no'jbal ru'um chi re' hat-tak aweht'alim wo' tak chi xa hab wach c'acharel re' riban xa chi'nchel wach c'oyomal ch'i̱l wo' ribanaric take yibel wach laj no'jbal, ma'xta rehtric wih'ic chi ri'sil rajawric i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' til Dios wo' nok wilic. Re' aj c'axol wach bihomal je' wo' re' naric'ulum ru'um nok re' pa' bih ric'ax wach, ricoj chiwach chi je' na chic ritiyo̱x maj re' chic re' rich'ica̱' wi̱' ric'ux.

Xa hab wach jeno' c'acharel k'uru' ra̱j ca̱t-tak rijot'om ru̱c' rik'ormojic aweh tak chi re' ribanaric take no'jbal re're' ma'xta bih jeno' c'axquilal eric'am cho chana̱ tak, til ma̱cana̱' awi̱b tak chi jot'oric. Je' re' nik'or je aweh tak maj riwi̱' chaweh tak chi na̱weht'alim tak chi re' rijosk'il i Dios nchalic chi quina̱ take c'acharel ma' quibirinic ta k'oric chi rinabjic ribanaric take no'jbal re're'.
Je' wo', ma' riban juneht wach ano'jbal tak cu̱c' take c'acharel je' re' quino'jbal

maj najtir cho k'i̱j nok wilca̱t nak tak cho chipam i c'acharic chi ma' aweht'alim ta tak nic' wach rino'jbal i Dios, xa je' na pan k'ekom wilca̱t tak cho, ra̱j la' yu'na chi aweht'alim tak chic nic' wach rino'jbal ru'um chi wilca̱t tak chic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ru̱c' i Jesus, xa je' na ricab pan sakom chic wilca̱t tak eh chi je' chic re' awi̱' tak chac'uhtaj wo' tak lok chi je' re'.

Je' re' nik'or aweh tak maj wi jeno' c'acharel reht'alim chic nic' wach rino'jbal i Dios, re' wo' take no'jbal wili quic'utunic lok ru̱c': Re're' nwih'ic quetelenic wachi̱s ru̱c', nc'acharic chi ma'xta jot'o̱j pa ra̱mna eh xa coric wo' wach ric'ux ru̱c' chi'nchel.
Ma' xa ta re're', risic' la' wo' ribanaric haj wilic no'jbal nponic chiwach i kAja̱w.

Tz'a̱b ru' i quibano̱j take c'acharel re' ma' ja' queht'alim ta nic' wach rino'jbal i Dios, xa ma'xta camaj. Je' re' nok ma' riban juneht wach abano̱j tak cu̱c', re' la' cha'n tak chasakomej tak wach queh chi re' quibano̱j c'ahchi' que̱b ma' holohic ta.
Je' re' cha'n tak maj til wo' chic k'e̱' q'uixbilal i c'ahbilal nca'n xa pan c'olic chi xa ta nak ric'ul chi enk'ormojic lok ribiral i c'ahbilal nca'n.

Ru'um aj re', re' hat-tak til chasakomej tak wach queh chi ma' holohic ta c'acharic nca'n maj re' risakomsjic wach queh re're', xa je' na jenaj sakom re' risakomej wach chi'nchel nic' wach riwi̱' i c'acharic nca'n. Je' wo' chic, nok sakomomaj chic wach re're' queh chi'nchel take c'acharel, re' chic take re' equisakomonic lok wach quibano̱j take toco̱m chic c'acharel.

Ru'um aj wo' re', wilic jenaj k'oric je' wili rik'or: “Re' hat re' wilca̱t chi je' na hat suk wira̱l on wilca̱t chi je' na hat camnak ru'um chi ma' nacoj ta rehtal i mahc wilca̱t wi̱' na'lajok aweh. Chi je' re', re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric erisakomej pa̱m ac'acharic, nqui rik'or.
Je' re' k'uru' til wo' chawic'raj awi̱b tak chi ma' ok c'acharic na'n tak ru̱c' memil laj no'jbal, wilic la' ok ano'jbal tak chi c'acharic.

Chi je' re' k'uru' ma̱sublom tak i k'i̱j chi xa ma'xta ricorquil, camanok la' aweh tak chi risakomsjic wach i c'acharic ra̱j i Dios ru'um nok chipam take k'i̱j wili yohbal wach yibel wach no'jbal wilic.
Je' wo', re' hat-tak ma' chi bih aban tak chi ma' bano̱j ta ri̱j chi coric awu'um tak, re' la' chatijej tak ribanaric haj wilic ra̱j i kAja̱w Jesus chi na̱banam tak.

Je' wo' chic, ma̱xohc'saj awi̱b tak ru'um nok re're' etiric'am tak je pan rehreh wach c'ahbilal, re' la' hat-tak chayew awi̱b tak chirehquen rajawric i Lok' laj Uxlabal reh chi re're' enbehsenic reh ac'acharic tak.

Chi hat aj tak chic behsemaj ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios, chayew tak ricowil ac'ux tak ru̱c' rik'ormojic on ribichjic take bi̱ch tz'ihmbimaj take chipam i hu̱j moloj wach wi̱' take bi̱ch xibichej wach i k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy. Je' wo' re' cha'n tak ru̱c' take toco̱m chic bi̱ch tz'ihmbimaj take reh lok'onbal wach i Dios eh je' wo' re' ru̱c' take bi̱ch riyew aweh tak i Lok' laj Uxlabal. Ru̱c' aj take bi̱ch re're' chabichej tak wach i Dios eh chalok'ej wo' tak wach pan awa̱mna tak.
Je' wo' chic xa eli̱c wo' chatioxej tak johtok Ajabe̱s Dios ru'um chi re' Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, xiyew chic awajawric tak chi ritioxjic take pa' bih nac'ul tak ru̱c'.
Je' re' nok chi hat-tak chic behsemaj ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal, chabiraj wo' tak k'oric chawach tak maj nana'n tak chi je' re' nayew wo' tak rilok'il i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.
Re' hat-tak ehq'uenbe̱s ma' tiq'uic tak k'e̱' chiwach rajawric abahi̱l tak je' ricab na'n tak chi ma' tiq'uic ta tak k'e̱' chiwach rajawric i kAja̱w Jesus.

Je' re' nik'or aweh tak maj re' bahilbe̱s wilic chi nahsil china̱ i ehq'uenbe̱s je' ricab wo' nok re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, wilic chi nahsil chi kana̱ i hoj chi'nchel aj niminel eh re' wo' re' nco'lonic keh hoj re' wilco̱j chi jilow ro̱k rik'ab ru'.

Je' aj ricab nok re' hoj aj niminel ma' koj-iq'uic ta k'e̱' chiwach rajawric i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, je' wo' re' hat-tak ehq'uenbe̱s ma' chi bih tiq'uic tak wi̱' k'e̱' china̱ rajawric abahi̱l tak.

Yu'na re' chic hat-tak bahilbe̱s, til nik'or aweh tak chi chac'ax wo' tak awehq'ue̱n chi coric je' ricab riwi̱' riban i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric ku̱c' i hoj aj niminel reh. Je' re' nik'or maj re're' k'e̱' xojric'ax chi xik'ahsaj ri̱b pan quimic chiki̱j i hoj nok ja' nkanimej ta nak.
Ru̱c' i xiban re're' xojricoj chi hoj chic ritinami̱t aj c'amol na̱ i ric'uhbal eh ru'um re' xisaksaj wach kac'acharic je' ricab nok re' pa' bih ntz'ajaric wach ru̱c' ha' ncahnic chi sak chic wach.

Re're' xiban wo' chi je' re' reh chi re' hoj aj niminel enka'n chi hoj jenaj comonil chi tinamit lo̱k' kawi̱' eh chi naco̱j rehcham chi je' hoj jenaj ehq'uenbe̱s cok chiwach. Ma' xa re' ta re're', naribanam la' chi pan jenaj k'i̱j nakawih'ic wo' chiwach chi jenaj comonil ma'xta nech' ok ch'uwa' laj no'jbal ku̱c'. Naponok rik'ijil re're' nakojric'am cok chiwach ru', nakawih'ic chi til tz'iro̱j chic wach kac'acharic chi coric.

Je' aj re' ru' re' hat-tak bahilbe̱s, tanlic chaweh chi chac'ax awehq'ue̱n tak eh cha'n tak je' ricab ric'axaric awi̱b na'n tak maj re' bahilbe̱s re' ric'ax i rehq'ue̱n til chi ribil wo' ri̱b c'ahchi' ric'axam ri̱b.

Je' re' nik'or maj ma' hab ta wach c'acharel ma' ta nak ric'ax riti'jolal ribakil, riyew la' chi suk ru̱c' riwa' riha̱'. Je' re' nok nic' pa' wach nkac'ax ki̱b chi kibil ki̱b i hoj c'acharel je' wo' re' kac'axmajic i hoj aj niminel riban i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric
maj wilco̱j chic chi jilow ro̱k rik'ab ru'.

Re' no'jbal wili riban jenaj wach ch'i̱l i k'oric tz'ihmbimaj cho chipam riC'uhbal i Dios re' rik'or chi je' wili: “Ru'um aj re', re' winak nok rirakam chic ric'u'lil ro̱k k'ab, naricana̱b wih'ic chi rehquen rajawric ritu̱t raja̱w eh re' chic ric'u'lil naric'u'lem pa ric'acharic. Je' re' k'uru' nok quic'amam chic qui̱b pan caxarahil, re' take quib chi c'acharel re're' no̱j riban chi xa jenaj chic quiwi̱', nqui tz'ihmbimaj cho.

Chipam take k'oric re're' wilic jenaj nim laj ricorquilal laj no'jbal c'olic cho, xa re' la' nchel, ru̱c' take k'oric wili c'ahchi' nik'oric chiri̱j re' xc'uluric ku̱c' i hoj ch'i̱l i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, chi xa jenaj chic kawi̱' rich'i̱l.

Je' wo' chic, ru̱c' take k'oric wili nwa̱j nik'orom chi aju'junal hat-tak bahilbe̱s chac'ax awehq'ue̱n tak je' ricab ric'axaric awi̱b tak na'n hat-tak eh re' hat-tak ehq'uenbe̱s chayohlej wo' wach i abahi̱l tak.

Yu'na awu̱c' chic hat-tak ac'unbe̱s ch'i̱l hat-tak ixk'unbe̱s nanik'oric je chi je' wili: Til tiniminok tak chiwach i rik'orbal atu̱t awaja̱w tak je' ricab ric'ul chi queh take quiniminic chic reh kAja̱w. Je' re' nik'or maj til ric'ul chi je' re' na̱banam tak

eh ru'um nok chipam Hu̱j wilic wi̱' i Lok' laj riC'uhbal i Dios tz'ihmbimaj jenaj tak'anic k'e̱' riwa'ric ru'um chi re' Dios riyeb rik'orbal chi wilic nariyeb wi xc'amaric na̱. Je' aj wili rik'or i tak'anic re're': “Chalok'mej atu̱t awaja̱w tak
reh chi re' hat nim ro̱k rik'ijil ac'acharic nariwih'ic eh je' wo' na̱banam wo' risukquil i c'acharic china̱ ac'al wili, nqui rik'or.

Je' wo' re' hat-tak tutbe̱s ajabe̱s, ma̱johsaj tak quic'a̱ awac'u̱n awixk'u̱n tak, re' la' cha'n tak chac'am tak quibe̱h ru̱c' i c'acharic nponic chiwach i kAja̱w eh chak'il wo' tak take pa ricorquil ru̱c' i no'jbal riyew aweh tak i Jesus.

Je' wo' chic, re' hat-tak re' wilca̱t tak cok chipam mino̱j wach camanic ru̱c' jeno' ajabe̱s ayu' wach ac'al, tibirinok tak k'oric chiwach ru̱c' chi'nchel ac'ux tak eh chayew wo' tak rilok'il je' ricab chi re' ta nak i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, c'ahchi' ayeb tak rilok'il.

Je' re' cha'n tak k'uru' re' cok ru' ma' ok xa re' nok c'ahchi' awiliric tak cok ru'um aj ehcham camanic na̱banam tak acamaj je' ricab nca'n take re' xa banol quiwach c'uhtbal lok chi xa je' chic holohic laj aj camanom take. Ma'xta, re' la' hat-tak cha'n acamaj tak chi coric ru̱c' chi'nchel awa̱mna tak je' ricab chiwach ta nak i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, c'ahchi' acamanic tak. Je' re' cha'n tak maj re're' xa̱j i Dios chi na̱banam tak.

Junpech wo' chic nik'or aweh tak k'uru' nacha'n acamaj tak, cha'n ru̱c' ac'ux tak je' ricab chi reh ta nak i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus i camanic c'ahchi'ca̱t tak eh ma' ok xa reh jeno' c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al.

Je' re' cha'n tak maj re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi coric chi re' kAja̱w Jesus nariyeb jeno' aco̱ch tak ru̱c' ribanaric take pa' bih holohic laj bano̱j na̱banam chi aju'junal tak to̱b ta chopo̱j on ma' chopo̱j ana̱ tak chi camanic ru'um jeno' ajabe̱s.

Je' wo' chic, re' hat-tak aj ehcham camanic holohic ok no'jbal chac'uhtaj tak cu̱c' awaj camanom tak. Ma̱yo'slom wo' tak take chi rik'ormojic queh chi na̱yeb tak ti'c'axic chi quina̱. C'olok pan ac'ux tak chi re' hat-tak aj ehcham camanic ch'i̱l wo' take awaj camanom tak, xa jenaj wo' chi Ajabe̱s wilic chana̱ tak ar pan taxa̱j eh re're' xa jenaj awach tak chiwach.

Chi cohlsbal wach nik'orbal awu̱c' tak nik'or aweh tak wili: Chi wilca̱t tak chic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ru̱c' i kAja̱w Jesus, ma̱cana̱' tak risiq'uiric chi re're' nariyeb cho ricowil ac'ux tak ru̱c' rinimal wach i rajawric

maj je' ricab nok jeno' sol xa tiklic wo' ru̱c' take chi'nchel ritz'a'bal ncamanic reh chi k'ak'anic je' wo' re' i rito'bal i Dios, re're' camanok aweh tak chi peletenic ru̱c' aj Yahm nok re're' xa tok'-tok' cho chi ajot'oric tak.

Je' re' nik'or aweh tak ru'um chi re' hoj ma' re' ta cu̱c' kich ti'jolal c'ahchi'co̱j wi̱' chi peletenic, cu̱c' la' take q'uih tuhm wach chi ma' tob laj uxlabal wilque̱b pan te̱w c'uxic. Re' take re' wilic rehreh wach cajawric, nahsil take eh aj banol wo' take reh balc'uxquilal. Chi'nchel take ma' tob laj uxlabal wili, re' take re' quichopbic quina̱ take tinamit wilque̱b pa rik'ekomil i mahc.

Ru'um aj re' je' ricab nok jeno' sol xa tiklic wo' ru̱c' take chi'nchel ritz'a'bal ncamanic reh chi k'ak'anic, je' wo' re' hat-tak camanok aweh tak i rito'bal i Dios chi peletenic ru̱c' aj Yahm chipam i k'i̱j nok re' take ma' tob laj uxlabal qui'oquic cho chi ajot'oric tak chi ribanaric i c'ahbilal eh chi nok ayeb tak chic pan ac'al i cajawric, xa tikilca̱t ok wo' tak chi na̱tikim tak ju' peletenic.

Reh aj chi xa tikilca̱t ok wo' tak chi peletenic, curman chi coric ok wach i c'acharic cha'n tak maj re're' naribanic chi ena'n tak ricamaj i Dios chi coric chi ma'xta bih enk'etbic aweh tak je' ricab jeno' sol naribac' ripa̱m chi coric, ma'xta bih enk'etbic reh chi peletenic. Je' wo', xa re' wo' i coric cha'n tak maj re' ribanaric i wili, re're' nco'lonic aweh tak chi quiwach take ma' tob laj uxlabal je' ricab nok re' tz'ih laj ch'ihch' ncamanic chi co'lbal reh i riti'jolal ribakil i sol.

Je' wo' chic je' ricab nok re' sol wilic chic chiro̱k i xijab re' nc'utunic wi̱' chi tiklic chic chi ojic je' wo' re' hat-tak xa tikilca̱t ok wo' tak reh chi xa nic' yu' enak'or tak ribiral i holohic laj c'uhbal nye'bic sukquil c'uxlis pan ca̱mna take c'acharel.

Chiri̱j lok chi'nchel wili, nipahkaj aweh tak chi riman chic chach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiri̱j i kAja̱w Jesus reh chi na̱co'lem awi̱b tak chiwach take xa pa' bih ricoj cho aj Yahm chi ajot'oric tak. Nok re' hat-tak nach'ica̱' ac'ux tak, je' na wa'ric jenaj acamanbal tak je' ricab i coten laj ch'ihch' ricoj i sol chi co'lbal ri̱b chiwach take tz'ob-bal koplic cho rik'ak'il ncuturic cho chiri̱j chi cansbal reh.

Je' wo' chic, re' rinabjic chi coric i co'lbal i̱b xiyew aweh tak i Jesus, re're' camanok aweh tak chi co'lbal awi̱b tak chi quiwach take ma' tob laj uxlabal je' ricab riban i sol chi ricoj i ripune̱t ch'ihch' chi co'lbal rina̱. Je' wo', re' riC'uhbal i Dios re' riyew cho aweh tak i Lok' laj rUxlabal camanok aweh tak chi peletenic je' ricab nok re' sol nc'u'lunic ru̱c' k'as nah re̱ ch'ihch'.

Je' wo' ati̱j tak camanok aweh tak chi peletenic eh chi behsemaj acapew-bal tak ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal, xa c'ahchi' ok wo' ca̱t-tak chi ti̱j chiwach i Dios eh chipam ati̱j tak re're' chapahkaj tak reh chi etirito'bej tak cho. Xa ic'lic ok wo' ana̱ tak chi ti̱j chiwach i Dios k'uru' eh ma̱cana̱' wo' tak ti̱j chiqui̱j take chi'nchel kich aj niminel.

Je' wo' nipahkaj aweh tak chi cha'n ati̱j tak chiwi̱j reh chi re' Dios nariyeb wi̱n take k'oric nanik'orom pan c'uhbalanic eh chi je' re' ma'xta bih eniyohlej chi riteheric wach i lok' laj c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i co'lbal i̱b re' ma' teho̱j ta cho wach najtir k'i̱j.

Re' hin xinpahbabjic chi aj k'orol reh lok' laj c'uhbal re're' eh ru'um re', re' hin wilqui̱n pan che̱' chi pixi̱x take wo̱k nik'ab chi c'aham ch'ihch'. Ru'um aj re' nipahkaj aweh tak chi cha'n ati̱j tak chiwi̱j reh chi re' hin eniteh wach i c'uhbal re're' chi ma'xta nech' ok niyo'jic je' ricab ric'ul chi wi̱n chi nanibanam.

Yu'na nwa̱j nik'orom je aweh tak chi c'ahchi' nitak'a̱b je aweh tak i hu̱j wilic chiri̱j i kacha̱k' aj niminel, Ti̱quico ribihnal re' k'e̱' ti' nwic'raj. Re' Ti̱quico wili re' ma'xta bih npoh'ic wi̱' ric'ux chi nitobjic pa ricamaj i kAja̱w Jesus, re're' narisakomem wach aweh tak nic' wach wilqui̱n ayu' eh chaj bih c'ahchi'qui̱n.

Je' re' k'uru' je' aj re' riwi̱' chi c'ahchi' nitak'a̱b je awu̱c' tak i kacha̱k' wili reh chi naponok awu̱c' tak erik'or aweh tak nic' wach wilqui̱n ayu' ch'i̱l take c'ahchi'qui̱n quihch'ilem eh je' wo' nwa̱j chi re're' eriyew ricowil ac'ux awa̱mna tak.

Chi je' aj wili was tak nicha̱k', re' ta wo' nak i Ajabe̱s Dios ch'i̱l i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi kana̱ ca'n ta wo' nak cho chi xa wilic ok wo' i c'axoj i̱b pan awa̱mna tak eh chi xa pan sukquil laj c'uxlis ta wo' nak wilca̱t tak.

Re' ta nak i kAja̱w Dios eriyew cho rinimal wach rato'bil chana̱ chi'nchel hat-tak re' ti' nawic'raj tak i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh ma' nacana̱' ta tak ribanaric chi ti' nawic'raj tak. Re' ta nak Dios k'uru' chiyew cho rato'bil chana̱ tak.

Re' hin ma' Lu̱', hin raj camanom i kAja̱w Jesus je' wo' re' i Timote̱yo re' c'ahchi'qui̱n rihch'ilem. Re' hin c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je i hu̱j wili aweh hat-tak aj Pili̱pos re' nic' nimal sak chic wach ac'acharic tak ru'um reh rinimjic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' wo', c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je hu̱j wili reh chi narilmijic wach cu'um take c'amol abe̱h tak chipam niminic eh je' wo' cu'um take aj to'bonel queh take c'amol be̱h.

Je' aj wili c'alenenic niban je aweh tak: Re' ta nak rato'bil eh je' wo' i sukquil c'uxlis riyew cho kAja̱w Dios ch'i̱l i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' ta nak re' wih'ok pan ac'acharic tak.
Re' hat-tak xa eli̱c wo' tic'ulic tak cho pa nic'ux naniban johtok niti̱j chiwach i kAja̱w Dios eh nitioxej johtok reh ru̱c' i c'acharic na'n tak chiwach.
Je' wo', nanipahkaj johtok rato'bil i Dios chana̱ tak, xa nsukbic wo' pan wa̱mna chi ti̱j chawi̱j tak

ru'um nok xa re' wo' ap'utum tak cho niminic cu yu'na chi k'i̱j, re' hat-tak xa c'ahchi' wo' ak'orom tak i ato̱b laj k'oric chiri̱j i Jesus. Ru̱c' na'n tak re're', hat wo' tak jenaj chipam i camanic wilqui̱n wi̱' i hin.

Re' holohic laj camanic c'ahchi'ca̱t tak re're', re' hin til ch'iclic nic'ux chi re' Dios re' xye'bic ano'jbal tak chi rip'uturic i camanic c'ahchi'ca̱t tak, re' wo' re' narito'bonic aweh tak chi ritikiric ju' re're' cu rehtal cho i k'i̱j nac'olok cho rica'pech i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Chi je' re' rich'iquinjic nic'ux niban chiri̱j i Dios, tare̱t chi wi̱n chi naniban johtok niti̱j wilic sukquil c'uxlis pan wa̱mna awu'um tak eh je' wo' re', ru'um chi k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak ru'um chi hat wo' tak wich c'ulul reh rato'bil i Dios. Je' ricab i hin yu'na wilqui̱n pan che̱' je' ricab wo' xnic'ul cho naxnisakomej wach ric'uhbal i Jesus chi quiwach take c'acharel nquik'ihtaj qui̱b.

Je' re' k'uru' re' hin k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak eh re' kAja̱w Dios til reht'alim chi ma' chucuj k'oric ta niban nanik'or re're', ru'um nok rilow wo' cho pan i wa̱mna chi til ti' tiwic'raj tak ru̱c' i rinimal ric'axbal ricoj pan wa̱mna i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Ru'um aj reh c'axo̱j re're', re' hin niban niti̱j chawi̱j tak chi ripahkaljic chi enq'uihic wach awu̱c' tak i c'axoj i̱b c'ahchi'ca̱t tak. Je' wo' niban niti̱j chi enwih'ic riman ano'jbal tak reh chi na̱rakam tak chiri̱j chi coric chaj bih take tare̱t chi banaric

eh chi je' re', re' hat-tak etichol tak richihiric wach haj wilic take tare̱t chi banaric. Ru̱c' re're' etic'acharic tak chi sak wach ac'acharic tak chiwach i Dios reh chi je' re' chipam i k'i̱j nac'olok cho rica'pech i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, ma'xta bih etik'ilmijic tak wi̱',

ru̱c' ta la' nak i to'bonic riyew aweh tak, eta nak tirirak tak chi xa c'ahchi' wo' abanam tak ribanaric i holohic laj no'jbal nc'uhtunic lok wi̱' chi coric wach ac'ux tak. Chi je' aj re' ti̱j niban chawi̱j tak, niban wo' niti̱j chi ru̱c' ano'jbal na̱c'uhtam tak lok chi quiwach take tinamit naribanam chi re' take re' enquik'or chi re' Dios k'e̱' lo̱k' eh chi nim wo' wach i to'bonic riban cho.

Re' chic yu'na was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, re' hin nwa̱j nik'orom je aweh tak take k'oric wili reh chi na̱na'bem tak chi re' nic' pa' nimal take ti'c'axic xnic'ul lok, re're' xcamanic reh chi toco̱m chic take c'acharel nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i holohic laj c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus.

Ru'um aj ti'c'axic re're', re' nic' pa' q'uihal take quicha'janic reh pa̱t nwih'ic wi̱' ajabe̱s k'atal k'oric, ch'i̱l take toco̱m chic aj cha'janel queht'alim chi re' riwi̱' chi wilqui̱n pan che̱', re' chi re' hin niban i c'uhbalanic chiri̱j Jesus.

Je' wo' chic, ru̱c' richoporic nic'ux niban chiri̱j i Jesus to̱b ta pan che̱' wilqui̱n, yohbal wach take kas kacha̱k' kich aj niminel wilque̱b ayu' pan tinamit Ro̱ma c'ahchi' wo' quich'ica̱b quic'ux chiri̱j i to'bonic riban i Jesus. Re' take re're', ma' quiyo'jic ta chic chi quiwach take aj ixowonel wach kaniminic, til c'ahchi' la' chic quik'orom riC'uhbal i Dios chi ma'xta so' quiyo'jic.

Re' cok ru' til pa ricorquil wilic take aj niminel re' ru'um chi til nca̱j nitobjic c'ahchi' quik'orom ric'uhbal i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, xa re' la' wilic wo' take toco̱m chic aj niminel re' to̱b ta nak ma' quiyo'jic ta chi rik'ormojic c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus, xa c'ahchi' quik'orom i c'uhbal re're' ru'um chi ti' quic'ux chiri̱j nic' wach camanic riban wu̱c' i Dios, on ru'um nca̱j chi ru̱c' i c'uhbalanic nca'n, eta nak nwih'ic wolic chi quixilac take aj niminel.

Re' take c'ahchi' quik'oric ric'uhbal i Jesus xa reh chi wolic nca̱j, re' take re' xa c'ahbilal wilic cho pan ca̱mna eh ru'um re' c'ahchi' quik'orom i c'uhbal reh nak chi enwih'ic i wolic chi quixilac take quich aj niminel. Ru̱c' nak enc'uluric chi je' re', chi queh ru' riman nak chic enoquic cho riti'quilal nic'ux ayu' pan che̱' re' tz'apalqui̱n wi̱'.

Raj la' take aj niminel je' ru̱c' c'ahchi' quik'orom ric'uhbal i Jesus ru'um chi nca̱j nitobjic, re' take re' til wilic c'axoj i̱b pan ca̱mna eh ru'um re' c'ahchi' quik'orom ric'uhbal i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric to̱b ta chi ma' c'ahchi' ta chic qui̱n chi rik'ormojic i c'uhbal. Je' aj re' nca'n maj nquirak chiri̱j chi re' riwi̱' chi re' hin wilqui̱n pan che̱' ru'um chi hin pahbamaj cho chi rico'ljic ri̱j i holohic laj c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus.

Je' re' k'uru' to̱b ta wilic take xa ti'quilal c'uxlis nca̱j quicojom pan wa̱mna, xa ma'xta wo' bih ra̱j rik'orom maj to̱b ta coric queh c'uhbalanic nca'n on to̱b ta xa banbal wi̱n nca'n, re' c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric c'ahchi' rik'ormojic lok eh ru'um re' jenaj rinimal risukquil nic'ux nchalic. Ma' xa re' ta yu'na nsukbic nic'ux, xa narisukbic la' wo' nic'ux

ru'um weht'alim chi ru'um reh ati̱j na'n tak johtok chiwi̱j, re' Lok' laj Uxlabal tak'amaj cho wi̱n ru'um i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, naquirito'bem. Chi je' re' k'uru' re' nic'axquilal ncojoric cho naricamanic wi̱n chi nanitobjic ru'um i Dios.

Je' wo' chic, je' ricab til weht'alim chi re' ti'c'axic ncamanic wi̱n chi quintobjic ru'um i Dios, til ch'iclic wo' nic'ux i hin chi ma' ta nak chaj bih enic'uhtaj wi̱' niq'uixbilal chi ribanaric i ra̱j ma' ra̱j banaric. Ru'um aj re' yu'na to̱b ta wilqui̱n pan che̱', chi ma'xta so' niyo'jic xa nanik'orom wo' ric'uhbal i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric maj ru̱c' rik'ormojic re're', til nwa̱j wo' chi nk'ormojic chi k'e̱' nim i rilok'il i Jesus yu'na chi cu c'achalqui̱n on to̱b ta chi hin chic camnak je.

Ru'um aj chi ma' weht'alim ta wi ayu' pan che̱' wilqui̱n naquinquimok je, re' wili nik'or aweh tak: Chi wi̱n hin, re' nye'bic reh nic'acharic re' wo' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' re' nok wi xinquimic je, k'e̱' wo' chic tare̱t chi wi̱n maj naniwih'ic ru̱c' i Jesus chi junpech.

Til coric, je' re' capewenic niban eh je' wo' quincapewenic wo' chic chiri̱j i wili: Wi cu equinc'acharic ayu' ra̱j rik'orom chi cu equincamanic chaxilac tak chi rik'ormojic ric'uhbal i Jesus. Je' wo', raj rik'orom chi cu wilic take je' ru̱c' equiniminic reh Jesus. Ru'um aj re' ma' nirak ta chiri̱j haj wilic i capew-bal tare̱t chi wi̱n, wi re' nchel chi c'achalqui̱n on re' chi equinquimic je.

Je' re' nik'or maj c'ul nak ru' nwa̱j i hin xa re' la' c'axic chi wi̱n rirakmajic chiri̱j haj wilic curman chi nanibanam. Nwa̱j nak chi naniquimic reh chi equino̱j wih'ok ru̱c' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric ru'um nok re' wih'ic ru̱c' ru', k'e̱' nponic chi niwach chiwach chi nanic'acharic ayu' wach ac'al.

Tz'a̱b ru' to̱b ta nak je' re' nwa̱j i hin, curman wo' chi cu nanic'acharic ayu' wach ac'al. Re' aj re' ru' til wo' ajwal wach chiwach chi equino̱j c'acharok ar pan taxa̱j. Je' aj nak re' ru' nwa̱j chi enc'uluric wu̱c' reh chi cu equincamanic chaxilac tak ru'um nok cu wilic ra̱j chi naca̱t nito'bem tak wi̱' chipam animinic tak.

Je' re' nok re' hin til cow ch'iclic nic'ux chi cu wilic nic'acharic ayu' wach ac'al. Je' re' niban maj weht'alim chi manlic chi re' riwi̱' nicahnic ch'i̱l niwih'ic chaxilac tak, re' chi naca̱t tak nito'bem reh chi re' hat-tak re' wilca̱t tak chipam i niminic xkac'uhtaj aweh tak cu enatik tak ju' i wih'ic eh chi je' re' cu enarak tak risukquil ac'ux tak nchalic ru'um i niminic wilca̱t tak wi̱'.

Je' wo' wilic wo' chic jenaj riwi̱' chi nanicahnic ayu' wach ac'al, re' aj i wili riwi̱': Chi re' hin eta nak quinelic je pan che̱', enak ti tiyoxonic tak johtok ru̱c' i Dios nachawilow tak chi wilqui̱n wo' chic chaxilac tak.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, chalok pe chi nina̱ pa' bih narichalic, xa ma'xta bih nwa̱j reh, re' la' curman chi re' hat-tak na̱c'acharic tak pa ricorquilal je' ricab ric'ul chi queh take aj niminel reh lok' laj holohic laj c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Wi je' re' na'n tak to̱b ta equino̱j on ma' equino̱j c'olok chi awiliric tak, re' hin xa nanibiram wo' abiral tak chi re' hat-tak xa c'ahchi' wo' ayeb ac'ux tak chi wih'ic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis chi rik'ormojic i holohic laj tijinic hoj tijimaj wi̱'. Je' wo', xa nanibiram ok wo' chi re' hat-tak c'ahchi' wo' ato'bem awi̱b tak chipam i cow laj camanic wilco̱j wi̱' je' ricab nca'n take sol chi nquito'bej qui̱b naqui'oquic chi k'ak'anic.

Re' hat-tak k'uru' c'ul chato'bej awi̱b tak eh ma̱yohbalej tak take quik'etbic pa̱m abe̱h tak maj re' ti'c'axic ncojoric cho chana̱ tak ncamanic xa c'uhtbal reh chi re' Dios narisacham quiwach take c'acharel re're' wi ma' nquijal wach quino'jbal. Ma' xa re' ta re', re' la' wo' ti'c'axic ncojoric chana̱ tak ncamanic chi c'uhtbal reh chi re' hat-tak na̱co'ljic tak eh re' aco'lbal tak re're' til wo' re' Dios nariye'bic aweh tak.

Je' re' k'uru' to̱b ta nak etiquicoj tak pan ti'c'axic take qui'oquic chi rik'eteric pan abe̱h tak, ma' tiyo'jic tak chi quiwach. C'olok pan ac'ux tak chi ru'um reh rito'bal xiyew aweh tak i Dios chi na̱camanic tak chiwach i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, curman chi na̱ch'ica̱b ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus chi junelic, je' wo' chi na̱c'ulum tak i ti'c'axic ru'um reh ritahkaljic ru'
je' ricab xc'uluric wu̱c' ru̱c' i ti'c'axic xawilow tak cho chi xnic'ul najtir on je' ricab ru̱c' i ti'c'axic nabiraj tak chi wilqui̱n wi̱' hin yu'na.

Re' hin weht'alim chi re' Jesus ncowsonic ac'ux tak chi xa wilca̱t wo' tak chipam i niminic. Weht'alim wo' chi k'e̱' sukquilal pan awa̱mna tak ru'um aweht'alim tak chic chi re' Jesus k'e̱' ti' tiric'raj tak. Je' wo' chic, weht'alim wo' chi re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios c'ahchi' ricamanic chaxilac tak eh ru'um re' xa wilca̱t wo' tak pan jenaj wach c'uxlis chawibil awi̱b tak. Ma' xa ta re're' weht'alim je' la' wo' weht'alim chi wilic rinimal i c'axoj i̱b pan awa̱mna tak eh ru'um re' k'e̱' naquetelej tak quiwach take nca̱j tobjic.

Ru'um aj chi'nchel re're', re' hin k'e̱' nansukbic nic'ux awu̱c' tak, xa re' la' reh chi enmanlajic wach risukquil nic'ux nipahkaj aweh tak chi ticapewenok tak chiri̱j animinic chi xa jenaj wach riwi̱' acapew-bal tak. Je' wo', nipahkaj aweh tak chi chac'ax awi̱b tak chi xa jenaj c'axoj i̱b wilic cho pan awa̱mna tak. Reh aj chi na̱banam tak i pahkanic niban je aweh tak curman chi na̱wih'ic tak chi xa jenaj wach riwi̱' acapew-bal tak eh chi xa jenaj wach ac'ux tak.

Je' wo' chic nipahkaj chi naticapewenok tak chiri̱j ano'jbal tak, ma̱nimsaj awi̱b tak eh ma̱k'or wo' pan ac'ux tak chi re' hat-tak k'e̱' wo' chic awa'ric tak chi quiwach take toco̱m c'acharel. Re' la' hat-tak naticapewenok chiri̱j ano'jbal tak, chach'ubsaj wach ac'ux tak. Re' wili ra̱j rik'orom chi chiban chawach tak chi re' lok'il nquic'ul take toco̱m chic c'acharel nim ok wo' chic wach chiwach take lok'il nac'ul i hat-tak.
Chiri̱j take wili nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chi ma' hab wach aweh tak riyew ri̱b chi suk xa chi ribil ri̱b, chilow la' wo' nic' wach nachito'bej i ras richa̱k' reh chi re're' nariwih'ic wo' chi suk.
Ru'um aj wo' re' nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi re' ano'jbal tak je' ok ricab i no'jbal xic'uhtaj i kAja̱w Jesus, chiri̱j ru' wilic jenaj bi̱ch nk'oric chiri̱j rino'jbal chi je' wili:

“Naxponic i k'i̱j chi xkajic cho wach ac'al, re're' to̱b ta nak jenaj wach rilok'il ch'i̱l Dios ar pan taxa̱j, ma' janc'al ta xik'ihtaj ri̱b chi re' rilok'il ye'o̱j nak reh ar pan taxa̱j ch'i̱l i Dios, ma'xta chic riye'eric reh.

Re' la' re' xicana̱' chi je' re' xc'uluric ru̱c' eh ru̱c' re're' xic'u'lej na̱ chi ma' nim ta ti wach i rilok'il xye'eric je' ricab rilok'il nye'eric reh jeno' aj camanom re' ma' nim ta ti wach ricamaj. Ma' xa re' ta ti re' xiban, xc'ulic la' wo' asjok ayu' wach ac'al chi xa je' ti ricab asjic riban jeno' xa hab wach c'acharel.

Nok c'acharic chic riban ayu' wach ac'al chi til je' ricab riwi̱' jeno' c'acharel, re're' chi xa ch'ublic wach ric'ux xa xibiraj wo' k'oric chiwach i Dios. Kacoj rehtal i xiban ru̱c' riquimic. Re're' xa xbirinic wo' k'oric to̱b ta nchel nariquimic wach curu̱s eh xa xic'u'lej wo' na̱ re' xk'ormojic reh ru'um i Dios.

Ru'um aj rino'jbal re're', re' Dios xiyew reh jenaj lok'il re' k'e̱' wo' chic nimal wach eh ma' hab ta chic jeno' wach wilic reh. Re' aj wili i lok'il re're': Nak'ormojok ribihnal, narik'ormojic wo' chi re're' Ajabe̱s maj re' i bihnal re're' nc'uhtunic lok wi̱' chi xa re' wo' re' wilic rajawric chi quina̱ chi'nchel tinamit, nqui rik'or i bi̱ch re're'.

Je' aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi re' Jesus xye'eric reh jenaj lok'il k'e̱' wo' nimal wach eh re' riwi̱' chi xye'eric reh i lok'il re're', reh chi nabirmijok ribihnal i Jesus chi Ajabe̱s, chi'nchel take wilque̱b pan taxa̱j ch'i̱l take c'acharel wilque̱b ayu' wach ac'al, ch'i̱l wo' take camnak re' mukulque̱b rehquen ac'al, enquixuc'a̱' qui̱b chiwach c'uhtbal rajawric wilic chi quina̱.

Je' wo' chic, re' riwi̱' chi xye'eric reh i lok'il re're' reh wo' chi nak'ormojok cu'um chi'nchel chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re're' Ajabe̱s chi quina̱, til narik'ormojic wo' chi re' Dios k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal wach rajawric.

Hat-tak wich aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak, chiri̱j chic ripahkaljic aweh tak chi re' ano'jbal tak naribanam chi je' ok ricab rino'jbal i kAja̱w Jesus, yu'na chi ma' wilqui̱n ta chic chaxilac tak nipahkaj aweh tak chi tibirinok tak k'oric je' ricab wo' xa'n tak cho nok cu wilqui̱n cho chaxilac tak. Cha'n wo' tak ribanaric i nanik'orom wili: Chi c'ahchi' achopom ac'ux tak chiri̱j i camanic xip'ut i Dios pan awa̱mna tak naxatrico'lej tak, chatik tak ju' riye'eric rilok'il i Dios pan ac'acharic tak.

Je' re' nik'or aweh chi na̱banam tak maj xa re' wo' cho naxatco'ljic tak re' Dios c'ahchi' ricamanic pan awa̱mna tak reh chi ru̱c' i rito'bal riyew cho chana̱ tak ena'n tak eh enawa̱j tak ribanaric i nic' pa' nimal ra̱j i Dios chi na̱banam tak.
Nok nik'orom chic lok re're', yu'na nwa̱j wo' nipahkam aweh tak i wili: Ma̱ban aweh tak i no'jbal chi xa tibech'ic tak je' wo' chi xa tiwolic tak cu̱c' take awich aj niminel tak.

Wi xa'n tak je' ricab xnik'or aweh tak, na̱c'acharic tak chi ma'xta jeno' mahc chana̱ tak eh chi je' re' ma'xta riwih'ic k'ilo̱j chana̱ tak, je' la' wo' naric'uhtunic chi re' hat-tak, hat-tak rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios. Re're' riwi̱' chi c'ahchi' ac'acharic tak chi ma' ch'uwa'rsamaj ta nech' ok wach ano'jbal tak chi quixilac take c'acharel quic'acharic chiwach take k'i̱j yu'na. Chi quixilac take c'acharel re're', wilic take ma' holohic ta quino'jbal nquic'uhtaj lok eh ar nc'utunic chi ma' holohic ta quibanic. Chi quiwach aj take c'acharel re're' k'uru' na̱c'uhtam wo' tak lok riholonquilal ano'jbal tak chi manlic je' ricab nok nc'uhtunic cho quisakomil take ch'imi̱l pa rik'ekomil ak'ab.

Yu'na je' wo' nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chi xa eli̱c wo' chak'or tak i lok' laj c'uhbal re're', re' nanquic'ul take c'acharel riban chi ac' chic c'acharic. Je' re' nipahkaj je chi na̱banam tak reh chi nasoljok wo' chic cho i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' hin equinwih'ic chi xa suk chic nic'ux nanwilow chi awu̱c' tak xc'uluric je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' jeno' aj ajamanel. Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab ru̱c' aj ajamanel re' cow laj camanic riban chi ajamanic ma' no̱j ta chi k'e̱b naricohlaj wach i ajamanic re're', je' wo' re' awu̱c' tak re' cow laj camanic xniban chi ac'uhbaljic tak ma' xo̱j ta wo' chi k'e̱b, til xatrito'bej la' chipam ac'acharic tak.

Chi je' aj re', yu'na enik'or wo' aweh tak i wili: Re' hin k'e̱' nsukbic nic'ux awu'um tak maj to̱b ta c'ahchi' ac'ulum tak ti'c'axic je' ricab wo' c'ahchi' nic'ulum i hin, xa c'ahchi' wo' ach'ica̱b ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus eh xa camanic wo' na'n tak chiwach.
Je' ricab hin chi k'e̱' sukquil nic'ux til je' ok wo' re' i hat-tak sukbok wo' ac'ux tak.

Hat-tak wich aj niminel, wi re' kAja̱w Jesus ra̱j chi re' Timote̱yo narojic awu̱c' tak, re' hin ch'iclic nic'ux chi re're' naribanam chi xa loq'uil ti enitak'a̱' je awu̱c' tak reh chi eto̱j ric'raj tak cho nic' wach wilca̱t pan animinic tak eh chi je' re' ewo' nsukbic nic'ux i hin ru̱c' pa' bih naric'ulic rik'orom wi̱n chawi̱j tak.

Re' hin xnichih wach i Timote̱yo chi narojic awu̱c' tak ru'um chi ma' hab ta chic wach ncapewenic chawi̱j tak je' ricab riban ru'. Ru'um chi re' Timote̱yo riban jenaj wach rino'jbal wu̱c' chi capewenic chawi̱j tak pan animinic,

re're' ma' je' ta ricab take toco̱m chic waj to'o̱l re' xquitik'a̱' wach pan quic'ux chi ma'xta cojic ar Pili̱po. Chi'nchel take re're' xa re' wach risiq'uiric haj wilic nponic chi quiwach nca̱j ca'nam, ma' re' ta nchel i haj wilic ra̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Re' hat-tak enarak tak chiri̱j chaj bih c'ahchi' nik'orom je maj aweht'alim wo' tak chic rino'jbal i Timote̱yo chi re're' je' ricab nok jeno' ac'unbe̱s rito'bej i raja̱w chipam take rilahtz'il, je' wo' re' nitobjic c'ahchi' ribanam chipam ricamaj i Dios chi rik'ormojic i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus.

Je' aj re' ru' re' hin ch'iclic nic'ux chi nanitak'a̱b je i Timote̱yo awu̱c' tak chi awiliric tak. Re' cok ru' ma' ja' xta pe nitak'a̱b je cu rehtal nina'bej pe chaj bih nanicahnic wi̱' ayu' pan che̱'.
Wi xponic wo' k'i̱j chi naqui̱nquesam je til nawojic ca̱t tak wilom cho maj re' hin ma' nik'eb ta nicapew-bal ru̱c' i kAja̱w Dios chi re're' nariyeb k'ab wi̱n chi xa nic' yu' nanibanam chi je' re'.

Chi je' aj re' ru'um chi ma' ja' nina'bej ta pe chaj bih nanicahnic wi̱', re' hin xnicapaj ri̱j chi curman chi nanisolq'uim wo' chic je awu̱c' tak chi pe̱t i Epapori̱to re' wich aj niminel eh waj to'o̱l wo' chipam ricamaj i Dios chi aj k'orol riC'uhbal. Re're' aj ye'ol wo' ric'ux chi rico'ljic ri̱j kaniminic je' ricab riban jeno' sol chi rico'ljic ri̱j ritinami̱t. Re' kich aj niminel re're', re' xatak'a̱' tak cho wu̱c' chi naquirilom ru̱c' take pa' bih nwa̱j chipam nic'acharic ayu',
til k'e̱' wo' chic ra̱j rilom awach tak chawunchelal ru'um nok k'e̱' naxti'bic pa ric'ux chawi̱j tak ru'um wo' reh capewenic xoquic cho awu̱c' tak naxabiraj tak ribiral chi re're' xyowabjic.

Til coric wo' chi je' re' chi xyowabjic eh ru'um i riya'bilal q'uisi̱n nak ma' xquimic je xa re' la' re' kAja̱w Dios xiquetelej cho wach chi ma' xicana̱' ta chi xquimic je. Ma' xa re' ta wo' re' xqueteljic wach ru'um i Dios, xqueteljic la' wo' cho niwach i hin reh chi re' riti'quil nic'ux wilic ma' xmahsjic ta wach ru̱c' riquimic.

Chi xa wajwam aj chic wach chi narojic awu̱c' tak, re' hin xa chi yu'na ti c'ahchi' wo' chic nitak'a̱b je i Epapori̱to chi awiliric tak. Nachawilow wo' tak chic wach, nipahkaj aweh tak chi sukbok ac'ux tak ru̱c', chi je' re' ewo' nkajic so' wach ritz'irquil pa nic'ux re' nchalic chi capewenic chawi̱j tak ru'um reh capewenic na'n tak cho chiri̱j i Epapori̱to.

Chi je' wili k'uru' chacuy chac'ul tak i wich aj niminel re're' je' ricab ric'ul chi keh chi enka'n i hoj aj niminel reh kAja̱w Jesus chi ric'uluric jeno' kich aj niminel ru̱c' sukquil c'uxlis. Je' wo' nok wilic chic chaxilac tak chalok'mej tak i kich aj niminel wili je' wo' ricab na'n tak cu̱c' take c'acharel quitak'abjic je awu̱c' tak.

Je' re' nipahkaj chi na̱banam tak maj re're' q'uisi̱n nak ma' xquimic ru'um i camanic xtak'abjic rik'ormojic reh ru'um i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' wo' chic, re're' xicoj pan yohbalil ric'acharic naxchalic pan ajelow-bal hat-tak chi nitobjic chipam take pa' bih nwa̱j ayu' ru'um chi chawunchelal hat-tak ma' xa'n ta tak canar chalic chi nitobjic pa nic'axquilal.

Hat-tak wich aj niminel, re' hin nik'orom chic aweh tak take k'oric chi ma' nti'bic pan ac'ux tak. To̱b ta c'olok lok pa' bih ti'c'axic chana̱ tak, re' la' hat-tak xa suk ok wo' ac'ux tak ru'um chi re' kAja̱w Dios wilic awu̱c' tak. Yu'na chi c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak take k'oric wili, nwa̱j wo' chic nik'orom je aweh tak jenaj chic k'oric. To̱b ta oxpech nanibanam rik'ormojic aweh tak ma' eta quinch'i'tjic chi ribanaric ru'um nok weht'alim chi til camanel aweh pan animinic tak.

Re' aj take k'oric wili oxpech rik'ormojic nanibanam je aweh tak: Chaco'lej awi̱b tak! Til chaco'lej awi̱b tak! Eh til wo' chic chaco'lej awi̱b tak chi quiwach take c'ahbil laj c'uhbalanel re' nquicapaj chi re' take quiniminic reh Dios riwi̱' chi queh chi narik'ataric lok ritz'uhmal na̱ quic'achanbal. Re' take c'uhbalanel re're', xa je' quicab take josk' laj tz'i' chi xa ti'c'axic nquicoj wi̱' take c'acharel nquitiw.

Je' wo' chic, re' take re' nquik'or chi ritinami̱t Dios take xa ru'um chi nquicoj quibihnal chi aj nimem take reh rik'ataric lok ritz'uhmal na̱ quic'achanbal. Coric chi wilic quibiral chi je' re', xa re' la' ru' re' ricorquilal ma' je' ta re' maj re' hoj re' kojlok'onic reh Dios ru̱c' rito'bal i Lok' laj Uxlabal re' aj hoj wilco̱j chi manlic ritinami̱t. Ru'um aj re' ma' re' ta chic china̱ i pa' bih nbanaric china̱ ac'al wili nkach'ica̱' kac'ux, chiri̱j la' Jesus ch'iclic kac'ux chi suk kac'ux.

Chi je' aj re' rich'iquinjic kac'ux nka'n, xa ta nak re' hin ch'iclic nic'ux china̱ i pa' bih nibanam chipam nic'acharic, to̱b ta nak wilic riwi̱' chi enich'ica̱' nic'ux china̱ re're'. Je' re' nik'or maj wi ta nak wilic jeno' c'acharel xich'ica̱' ric'ux china̱ take pa' bih ribanam chipam ric'acharic, re' nak hin enicoj wi̱b chi pe̱t be̱h.

Re' riwi̱' chi je' re' nik'or, re' i wili: Re' hin nok wilic wi̱n wahxaki̱b k'i̱j re' take nitu̱t waja̱w xquik'at lok ritz'uhmal na̱ nic'achanbal ru'um chi je' re' rik'or i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Je' re' k'uru' pa niti'jolal wilic i rehtalil chi hin ca̱' qui'sil take cho aj hewre̱yo eh chi ar xchalic nija'quil cu̱c' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Wenjamin re' jenaj queh rac'u̱n i ma' Israhel. Je' re' k'uru' re' hin til wo' hin manlic aj hewre̱yo chi coric eh xinwih'ic wo' pan quicomonil take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Chi je' re' cow nak nik'or chi narinimjic take k'oric tz'ihmbimaj chipam i c'uhbal re're'.

Re' wo' re' riwi̱' chi re' hin k'e̱' wo' chic xwa̱j chi re' take toco̱m chic c'acharel xquinimej ta nak i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eh ru'um re' xwixowej cho quiwach eh xniban cho ti'c'axic queh take moloj wach aj niminel chiri̱j i Jesus ru'um nok xnicapaj chi re' take re' c'ahchi' quik'ihtam qui̱b chiwach i c'uhbal re're'. Je' re' ajic re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses re' xiyew cho Dios keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil ma' Israhel reh chi coric kawach chiwach, re' hin xninimej chi manlic eh ma' hab ta wach jeno' enk'oric wi̱n chi wilic ta nak xnik'ihtaj wi̱' wi̱b chiwach i c'uhbal re're'.

Coric, til je' nak re' cho riwi̱' nic'acharic raj yu'na chi'nchel take re', re' wilic nak cho riwa'ric chi wi̱n, ma'xta chic nech' ok riwa'ric chi niwach ru'um chi niyew nic'ux chi ric'axmajic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Chi je' aj re', re' chic rinabjic wach chi manlic i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' nchopbic cho nina̱ i hin, re' chic re' wilic riwa'ric chi niwach eh ru'um re' xnik'eb lok ri̱j nic'ux chi'nchel no'jbal niq'uihsaj nak cho wi̱' wi̱b najtir k'i̱j. Re' no'jbal re're' xiban xa je' na ricab jeno' mok'al chi wi̱n ru'um chi re' chic nwa̱j yu'na, re' chic ritahkaljic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Yu'na k'uru' re' hin nwa̱j wih'ic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ru̱c' i Jesus maj wi wilqui̱n chic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ru̱c', ra̱j rik'orom chi c'ahchi' nic'amam na̱ i no'jbal nchalic ru̱c' i Dios eh ma' re' ta chic i no'jbal nic'am nak cho na̱ i hin. Re' no'jbal nic'am nak cho na̱, rik'or chi riwi̱' chi wi̱n chi naric'amaric na̱ i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Ra̱j i no'jbal nchalic ru̱c' i Dios re' xnirak i hin ru̱c' rich'iquinjic nic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, rik'or chi riwi̱' chi wi̱n chi nanich'ica̱b nic'ux chiri̱j ru'.

Je' re' ajic re' hin nich'ica̱' nic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus maj nwa̱j chi pa nic'acharic enwih'ic je' wo' chi enwih'ic pa nic'acharic i rinimal wach rajawric i Dios re' xucsunic reh Jesus chi quixilac take camnak. Chiri̱j lok re're' nwa̱j chi wi eta nak nc'ulic lok i ti'c'axic chi nina̱ ru'um ritahkaljic i Jesus niban, tikilqui̱n chi ric'uluric je' ricab xiban i Jesus naxc'ulic lok ti'c'axic china̱. Je' wo' chic je' ricab xiban naxquimic wach curu̱s re're' til tiklic chi ric'uluric re're', re' hin tikilqui̱n wo' chi naniquimic wi ru'um reh ritahkaljic i Jesus riwi̱' chi wi̱n chi je' re' enc'uluric wu̱c'.
Wi je' re' xc'uluric wu̱c', weht'al wo' chi re' Jesus naribanam chi nawuctic wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak.

Ru̱c' xnik'or lok re're' ma' nwa̱j ta nik'orom chi wilic ta nak chic nino'jbal je' ricab i Jesus. Je' wo' ma' c'ahchi' ta nik'orom chi xa coric ta nak chic niwach chi manlic je' ricab ru'. Re' c'ahchi' nik'orom was tak nicha̱k', re' chi re' hin c'ahchi' nicowem nic'ux chi re' nino'jbal naribanam je' ricab rino'jbal i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, ru'um nok re're' ra̱j chi re' nino'jbal naribanam je' ricab i rino'jbal ru' eh ru'um re' xirico'lej.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, je' ricab wilqui̱n hin yu'na ma' nicapaj ta chi xnirak ta nak chic pa̱m i no'jbal je' ricab ra̱j i Jesus chi nanibanam xa re' la' haj wilic niban yu'na re' chi c'ahchi' wic'sam lok ri̱j nic'ux haj wilic take no'jbal xniban cho najtir k'i̱j eh china̱ chic i no'jbal wilic je chi niwach ru'um i Jesus, re' chic re' c'ahchi' nitahkem ri̱j yu'na.

Je' re' ajic je' ricab riban jeno' aj ajamanel nanoquic je chi ajamanic xa re' chic i ye'a̱b haj nariponic wi̱' wilic pa ric'ux ru'um ra̱j ribanam canar jeno' risi̱, je' wo' re' niban i hin. Yu'na xa re' chic risiq'uiric i no'jbal je' ricab ra̱j i Jesus xa re' chic re' wilic pa nic'ux maj re' riwi̱' chi xinyuk'unjic cho ru'um i Dios je' wo' chi xinco'ljic ru'um i Jesus, re' chi nanic'ulum i no'jbal re're' je' ricab jeno' si̱.

Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k', chi kunchelal i hoj nic' q'uihal rijeb chic i kano'jbal chipam i kaniminic, curman chi naka'nam keh i no'jbal ra̱j i Jesus chi naribanaric je' ricab i nik'orom aweh tak chiri̱j i no'jbal re're'. Tz'a̱b ru' wi wilic jeno' aweh tak ma' je' ta ricab nicapew-bal i ricapew-bal ru', ta wo' re̱t chi wi̱n ru'um nok re' Dios ru̱c' i Lok' laj rUxlabal naric'uhtam aweh tak haj wilic i coric laj no'jbal ra̱j banaric.

Re' cok ru' wi je' aj re' xiban i Dios, chac'am tak na̱ i pa' bih ric'uhtaj aweh tak. Je' re' nik'or chi na̱banam tak maj re' ra̱j i Dios re' chi nic' pa' wach i niminic c'ahchi'co̱j chiwach ru̱c' ric'amaric na̱ ric'uhbal, re' wo' re' ra̱j chi enkatik ju' ribanaric.

Je' re' ajic hat-tak wich aj niminel, chac'am tak tz'eht reh i no'jbal xniban cho chaxilac tak eh chatijej wo' aweh tak i quino'jbal take awich aj niminel tak c'ahchi'que̱b chi c'acharic je' ricab c'acharic xniban cho chaxilac tak. Je' re' nok nipahkam aweh tak chi ma' riban acapew-bal tak je' ricab quino'jbal take chucul laj aj niminel.

Re' riwi̱' chi je' re' nik'or aweh tak ru'um chi chaxilac hat-tak k'e̱' chic take chucul aj niminel wilque̱b. Je' ricab q'uih chic pech nik'orom cho aweh tak chi chayohbalej awi̱b tak chiwach quino'jbal, yu'na c'ahchi' nica'pechem je rik'ormojic aweh tak chi njik'jitic i wa̱mna ru'um nok re' take aj niminel re're' nquik'or chi c'ahchi' quitahkem rik'orbal i Dios, xa re' la' ru' ru̱c' i quino'jbal nquic'uhtaj lok chi aj k'etol take wach i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xquimic wach curu̱s chi kaco'ljic i hoj.

Chi je' aj re' quino'jbal i take c'acharel re're', pan junelic ti'c'axic c'ahchi' quicora̱b je. Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab chi wilic take nquicoj quitiyo̱x chi quiwach eh nquiyew quic'ux chi rilok'onjic wach, re' take chucul laj niminel re' nquiyew wo' quic'ux chiri̱j i xa pa' jaric i mahc ripahkaj cho i co̱k quik'ab. Ru̱c' i c'ahbilal nca'n, q'uix'ic la' nak chic naroquic cho queh xa re' la' chi rijelow-bal re're', riq'uihsjic chic qui̱b nca'n ru̱c' i ma' holohic ta laj quibano̱j. Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi re' take chucul laj niminel re're', xa re' i no'jbal nca'n ribanaric take c'acharel china̱ ac'al wili, xa re' wach re' nca'n ribanaric

ra̱j la' hoj re' kanimem i Jesus ma' re' ta chic hoj reh na̱ ac'al wili, xojricoj la' i Dios chi hoj ritinami̱t chi nakawih'ic ar pan taxa̱j. Ru'um aj chi hoj chic ritinami̱t i Dios, yu'na c'ahchi' kuy'em risoljic cho pan taxa̱j i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s eh kajco'lonel Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Ru̱c' rinimal rajawric xye'eric ru'um Ajabe̱s Dios chi narich'ukum k'oric chi quina̱ chi'nchel wilque̱b pan taxa̱j ch'i̱l wo' nic' nimal wilque̱b china̱ ac'al wili, re' Jesus narijalam wach i kati'jolal wilco̱j wi̱' yu'na chi cu pan quimic ki̱j eh chi je' re' nariyeb keh jenaj toco̱m chic kati'jolal je' ricab riti'jolal ru' chi ma'xta chic rojic pan quimic.

Chi je' aj wili hat-tak lok' laj wich aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak, yu'na til tinik'il tak je chi na̱tikim tak ju' rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus. Wi je' re' na'n tak, xa eli̱c wo' narisukbic pa nic'ux awu'um tak eh je' wo' ru'um reh nisi̱ nanic'ulum ru̱c' i Dios ru'um nicamaj xniban awu̱c' tak je' ricab nok jeno' aj ajamanel ncojoric jenaj chiho̱j wach cotomaj ri̱j k'ab che̱' xoybal wach na̱ rehtalil chi re're' xponic chi pe̱t be̱h reh pajoj i̱b chi ajamanic. Hat-tak wich aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak, re' hin k'e̱' nak nwa̱j chi nawojic ca̱t nik'o'rem tak cho

xa re' la' ru' ru'um chi ma' niban ta canar ojic, yu'na jenaj ato'bil nwa̱j nipahkam je queh take wich aj niminel re' ti Ewo̱rya ch'i̱l i ti' Si̱ntique. Re' ato'bil wili, re' chi naca'nam wo' chic chi xa jenaj wach quic'ux chipam rinimjic i Jesus maj yu'na ma' nquic'am ta qui̱b chipam i quino'jbal chi niminic.

Ru'um aj wo' re're' nipahkaj aweh hat wich aj niminel ma' Si̱sico re' til manlic hat waj to'o̱l chi rik'ormojic ribiral i Jesus, chi chato'bej take wi̱n i quib chi wich aj niminel re're' chi naca'nam wo' chic chi xa jenaj wach quic'ux maj nok ja' quincojoric ta nak pan che̱', re' take quib aj niminel re're' xa cow chic xquiyew quic'ux chi camanic chi rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios chi wich'i̱l take. Ma' xa wich'i̱l ta i hin xca'n chi je' re', je' la' wo' re' xca'n quich'i̱l take kich aj niminel wilic chic quibihnal chipam rihu̱j i Dios re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' quibihnal take nic' pa' nimal take c'acharel ye'o̱j chiqui̱j chi naquic'acharic chi junelic. Je' re' ajic re' take quib kana̱b re're' cow xicamanic chi rik'ormojic ric'uhbal i Dios ch'i̱l i kasbe̱s ma' Quelme̱nte eh ch'i̱l wo' take toco̱m chic wich aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios. Ru'um aj chi je' re' ca'nam cho, re' hin nipahkaj aweh chi chato'bej take quib kana̱b re're'.

Nok nipahkam chic re're', re' chic take wili toco̱m pahkanic niban je aweh tak: Xa suk ok wo' ac'ux tak chi junelic ru'um chi re' kAja̱w Dios wilic awu̱c' tak eh re' hin ma' eta quinch'i'tjic chi rica'pechjic rik'ororic wo' chic je aweh tak chi narisukbic ac'ux tak.
Je' wo', til c'uhtunok wo' lok ru̱c' ano'jbal tak chi hat-tak chak'lam cu̱c' chi'nchel, ru'um chi re' Jesus xa wilic wo' ku̱c' i hoj aj niminel.

Je' wo', nipahkaj aweh tak chi ma' chi bih no̱j wi̱' acapew-bal tak chiri̱j xa pa' bih jaric china̱ wach ac'al wili, re' la' cha'n tak chak'or tak johtok reh Dios haj wilic ac'axquilal tak eh nacha'n tak johtok apahkanic tak xa wilic ok wo' tioxonic pan awa̱mna tak ru̱c' i Dios.

Chapahkaj aj tak reh Dios atobjic tak eh re're' nariyeb cho aweh tak. Je' wo', ru'um chi re' hat-tak ch'iclic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus, re' Dios nariyeb wo' cho aweh tak i sukquil c'uxlis re' nariwih'ic pan awa̱mna tak nok wilic ac'axquilal tak to̱b ta nchel ma' narak ta tak chiri̱j chaj bih riwi̱' nok re' Dios xiyew cho chana̱ tak re're'. Je' re' cha'n tak k'uru' reh chi re' sukquil c'uxlis na̱c'ulum tak re're' narito'bonic aweh tak chi ench'ihquic awa̱mna tak eh chi ma' eta nyoj acapew-bal tak.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, tic'acharok tak ru̱c' holonquilal laj no'jbal reh chi ru'um reh no'jbal na'n tak enye'eric rilok'il i kAja̱w Jesus. Je' ok wili c'acharic cha'n tak: Pa ricorquil laj no'jbal, pan tz'iro̱j wach capew-bal. Je' wo', pan sak wach c'acharic tiwih'ok tak eh c'ul wach ok lok achak'lamil tak. Til la' ok pa̱m pe̱t k'oric wilic abiral tak chi holohic ano'jbal tak eh chi'nchel nic' pa' nimal na̱banam tak re' naric'uhtunic lok chi quiwach i tinamit chi coric wach acapew-bal tak, re' ok re' chacapaj tak lok ribanaric.

Je' re' k'uru' re' hat-tak chatik tak ju' ribanaric je' ricab rik'or i tijinic c'uhtumaj aweh tak wu'um, re' ma' xa re' ta xnic'uhtaj aweh tak ru̱c' k'oric je' la' wo' xawilow tak ru̱c' nino'jbal naxinwih'ic chaxilac tak. Ru̱c' chi je' re' ena'n tak, re' Dios re' nye'bic cho sukquil c'uxlis nariwih'ic awu̱c' tak chi junelic.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel yu'na re' chic i k'oric chiri̱j asi̱ xayew tak wi̱n re' chic re' nanik'oric chiri̱j. Re' hin k'e̱' nitioxej johtok i kAja̱w Dios ru'um re're'. Ru̱c' asi̱ xatak'a̱' tak cho wi̱n, jenaj wo' chic pech xarak tak nic' wach nitobjic na̱banam tak cho maj re' hin weht'alim chi til wilic nak pan awa̱mna tak chi naqui̱nato'bem tak xa re' la' ja' narak ta nak tak nic' wach riwi̱' na̱banam tak cho.

Ru̱c' xnik'or lok wili ma' ra̱j ta rik'orom chi nok xinwih'ic chi ma'xta bih wilic wi̱n, xinwih'ic ta nak chi xa ntz'iric chic pa nic'ux. Ma'xta! Re' hin ma' xniban ta chi ntz'iric pa nic'ux maj xnitijej i c'acharic chi suk nic'ux to̱b ta suk wilqui̱n on c'axic niban.

Je' re' ajic weht'alim nic' wach c'acharic chipam niba'il je' wo' i c'acharic nok chi'nchel wilic cho wi̱n maj re' Dios xic'uhtaj wi̱n nic' wach naquinc'acharok chi suk nic'ux pan niba'il on nok chi'nchel wilic cho wi̱n. Je' re' k'uru' xa haj ye'a̱b quinwih'ic wi̱' je' ricab nok cuyuj wi'c niban on nok ma' nc'uhlic ta chic i pa' bih wilic cho wi̱n, re' hin xnitijej nic' wach naquinc'acharok chi suk nic'ux.

Chi je' aj re' riwi̱' nic'axaric niban, xa pa' bih npahkaljic wi̱n chi ribanaric ricamaj i Dios, chi'nchel niban canar ribanaric ru'um nok re' kAja̱w Jesus riyew wansil chi ribanaric haj wilic ra̱j i Dios.

Hat-tak wich aj niminel, nok re' hin nik'or chi weht'alim wi̱n i c'acharic pan niba'il je' wo' nok nik'or chi chi'nchel wilic wi̱n, ma' ra̱j ta rik'orom chi ma' ta nak nicoj pa riman i to'bonic xa'n tak cho wi̱n. Ma'xta! Re' hat-tak jenaj la' rinimal c'axo̱j xa'n tak cho wi̱n naxinato'bej tak cho chipam take nic'axquilal c'ahchi' nak wiq'uic wi̱'. Ru'um aj re' nik'or chi k'e̱' holonquilal xa'n tak wi̱n.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel aj Pili̱po, re' xa'n tak cho wi̱n re're' cu wilic pan ac'ux tak, ma' je'? Re' hin til cu wilic pa nic'ux take k'i̱j re're' naxnip'ut rik'ormojic i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus chaxilac tak, nic' wach naxinato'bej tak nok tikilqui̱n nak chic chi nawelic cho chipam i yuk'ul Masero̱nya re' wilic wi̱' atinami̱t hat-tak aj Pili̱po. Chiwach take k'i̱j re're' ma' hab ta chic jeno' moloj wach aj niminel xto'bonic wi̱n, xa re' la' ti acomonil hat-tak xamol wach atumi̱n tak chi nitobjic chipam ricamaj i Dios.
Ma' xa junpech ta xinato'bej tak, ca'pech la' xinato'bej tak ar pan tinamit Tesalo̱nica naxatak'a̱' tak je tumi̱n re' xamol tak wach lok'bal pa' bih wi̱n.

Je' re' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, re' hin k'e̱' nsukbic i wa̱mna ru̱c' take asi̱ xayew tak cho wi̱n re' cok ru' re' hin ma' c'ahchi' ta nik'orom re're' ru'um chi nwa̱j ta nak chi re' hat-tak xa eli̱c wo' na̱yeb tak cho nisi̱. Ma'xta! Haj cok wilic til nwa̱j chawi̱j hat-tak, re' chi re' Dios eriyew cho rinimal ricuse'sbal chana̱ tak eh chi wilic ok toco̱m chic c'axoj chaxilac hat-tak je' ricab abanam tak cho wi̱n.

Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, yu'na c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam i hu̱j wili chi je' na jenaj rehtalil chi xnic'ul i to'bonic xa'n tak cho wi̱n, re' xic'am cho wi̱n i Epapori̱to. Ru̱c' i to'bonic re're' yu'na chi'nchel wilic wi̱n, xa niq'uic la' wo' chic na̱ eh ru'um aj re' yu'na ma'xta bih ma' ta nak wilic wi̱n. Junpech wo' chic was tak nicha̱k', nik'or aweh tak chi til k'e̱' nitioxej aweh tak i to'bonic re're', re' je' na ricab jenaj si̱ nim wach xayew tak chiwach i Dios eh re're' xic'ul cho aweh tak chi je' ricab jenaj si̱ k'e̱' nc'ohnic chiwach.

Je' wo' nik'or aweh tak chi je' ricab nok re' hat-tak xayew tak nito'bal, je' wo' re' i kaDios re' aj ehchenel reh rinimal wach bihomal ar pan taxa̱j, nariyeb cho riman ric'axbal chana̱ tak nok chi'nchel ok wilic cho aweh tak on nok ma'xta bih wilic aweh tak, ru'um chi re' hat-tak xach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus.
Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel ru̱c' chi'nchel wili, re' hoj til kayew wo' tak rilok'il i Dios chipam kac'acharic chi junelic i k'i̱j. Je' ta nak re'.

Chipam i hu̱j wili c'ahchi' wo' nitak'a̱b je risukquilal ac'ux chi'nchel hat-tak wich aj niminel reh Jesus wilca̱t tak ar Pili̱po. Re' take kas kacha̱k' aj niminel wilque̱b wu̱c' chi to'bonic, nquitak'a̱' wo' je risukquil ac'ux tak.

Je' wo' take c'acharel quipatanic ayu' re' aj niminel chic take, c'ahchi' wo' quitak'a̱b je risukquil ac'ux tak eh re' til cow nquipahkaj chi je' re' naribanaric je aweh tak, re' take aj camanom pa ripa̱t i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma re' take xquinimej wo' i kAja̱w Jesus.
Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' ta nak rato'bil i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric wih'ok awu̱c' tak chipam animinic tak.

Re' hin ma' Lu̱', re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re're' xiripahba̱' chi aj k'orol riC'uhbal ru'um nok je' re' camanic xa̱j i Dios chi nanibanam chiwach. Chi je' aj re', re' hin ch'i̱l i kich aj niminel Timote̱yo ribihnal, c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je i hu̱j wili

aweh hat-tak lok' laj kich aj niminel wilca̱t tak ar Colo̱sa, re' nach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus. Re' aj wili c'alenenic niban je: Re' ta nak rato'bil eh je' wo' i sukquil c'uxlis riyew cho kAja̱w Dios ch'i̱l i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' ta nak re' wih'ok pan ac'acharic tak.
Re' hin naniban niti̱j chawi̱j tak, xa eli̱c wo' nitioxej johtok i Dios re' rAja̱w i kAja̱w Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric

ru̱c' take nibiraj chiri̱j acapew-bal tak. Je' re' nik'or maj nibiraj chi re' hat-tak cow choplic ac'ux tak chiri̱j kAja̱w Jesus eh je' wo' nic' wach nachak'lamej awi̱b tak cu̱c' chi'nchel take aj niminel.

Re' riwi̱' chi je' re' na'n tak ru'um chi xa cow chic nach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiri̱j ric'u'ljic i cuse'sbal re' xitik'a̱' cho wach i Dios chi na̱c'ulum nok wilca̱t tak chic ar pan taxa̱j. Nic' wach nachaweht'alij tak chi na̱c'ulum tak i cuse'sbal re're'? Ru'um chi xa re' wo' naxk'ormojic aweh tak ribiral i Jesus re' hat-tak xabiraj wo' tak cho ribiral ru' re' xk'ormojic aweh tak ru̱c' i coric laj c'uhbal nye'bic sukquil c'uxlis queh take quic'ulbic reh.

Chiri̱j i c'uhbal re're', re' xponic rik'ormojic awu̱c' tak je' wo' cu̱c' take toco̱m chic c'acharel chi junsut wach ac'al, nwa̱j nik'orom chi ru'um reh rik'ormojic ru', re' Dios c'ahchi' ribanam chi q'uihal take c'acharel nquijal wach quino'jbal. Je' aj re' c'ahchi' ric'uluric je' ricab wo' xc'uluric awu̱c' hat-tak naxabiraj tak i c'uhbal eh ru̱c' re're' xarak wo' tak chiri̱j chi coric chi re' Dios k'e̱' wo' chic richak'lamil cho chana̱ tak.

Je' aj re' xarak tak chiri̱j ru̱c' i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' xik'or ribiral aweh tak i kich aj niminel ma' Epa̱wras ribihnal. Re' kich aj camanom Epa̱wras re' k'e̱' ti' nkic'raj chipam ricamaj i Dios ru'um chi til ch'iclic ric'ux chiri̱j i Jesus chipam ricamaj c'ahchi' ribanam chaxilac tak
re' aj re' xc'ulic k'orok keh hoj nic' wach i c'axoj i̱b na'n chawach tak re' k'orel nic' pa' wach ricoj pan awa̱mna tak i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios.

Ru'um aj re', xa re' wo' cho pan pe̱t ribirmijic abiral tak k'oro̱j keh ru'um ma' Epa̱wras, re' hoj ayu' ma' kamayam ta ribanaric kati̱j chawi̱j tak chiwach i Dios chi ripahkaljic reh chi ru̱c' ta nak i manlic wach no'jbal ch'i̱l manlic wach capew-bal riyew aweh tak i Lok' laj Uxlabal, charak ta nak tak chiri̱j chi manlic haj wilic i raj i Dios chi na̱banam pan ac'acharic tak.

Je' re' pahkanic nka'n pan kati̱j reh chi etic'acharic tak chiwach i Dios je' ricab riwi̱' chaweh tak chi etic'acharic tak chi ana'bem tak chic wach i Dios. Je' wo' pan kati̱j, kojpahkanic wo' reh chi xa ewo' nponic chiwach i Dios ano'jbal ena'n tak chiwach. Je' wo' chic, naniban niti̱j chawi̱j tak nipahkaj wo' johtok chi re' ribanaric holohic laj camanic chiwach i Dios q'uihok ta nak wach awu̱c' tak je' ricab nca'n take che̱' chi quiq'uihic johtok cu rehtal quiwachanic. Je' wo', nipahkaj wo' chi nimbok ta nak wach awu̱c' tak i no'jbal chi reht'aljic wach i Dios chi coric.

Je' aj re' naniban niti̱j re' hin nipahkaj wo' chi riman chic cowsjok ac'ux pan animinic tak ru̱c' rinimal rajawric i Dios. Je' re' riwi̱' pahkanic niban reh chi xa ru̱c' wo' k'uni̱l enachop ac'ux tak chi ricuyuric ransil chi'nchel xa pa' jaric ti'c'axic enchalic chana̱ tak.

Je' wo' chic, re' niti̱j chawi̱j tak reh chi re' hat-tak xa ru̱c' chic risukquil ac'ux tak enatioxej tak johtok i Dios ru̱c' i rajawric maj ru'um reh ru', re' hoj chi'nchel aj niminel wilic wo' kajawric reh chi yu'na nakehtric cok cuse'sbal k'oro̱j cahnok chi re' hoj re' wilco̱j chi ritinami̱t chic i Dios na kawih'ic ar re' wilic wi̱' i Dios chi sutumaj ri̱j chi rinimal risakomil ar pan taxa̱j.

Ru'um aj re' katioxej johtok reh Dios maj re're' xojrico'lej chiwach aj Yahm naximak' i rajawric wilic nak chi kana̱ i hoj chi c'achalco̱j nak pa rik'ekomil i c'ahbilal. Je' wo' chic, chi kunchelal i hoj aj niminel xojriyew i Dios chi ri'sil rajawric i rAc'u̱n re' k'e̱' ti' ric'raj.

Re' chic rAc'u̱n i Dios, re' Jesus ribihnal, re' wo' re' xiyew ri̱b chi quimic chiki̱j hoj chi'nchel c'acharel. Ru'um reh riquimic ru', re' hoj aj niminel reh xojco'ljic chic eh ma' xa re' ta re', chi'nchel la' wo' kamahc cuyuj chic take yu'na ru'um i Dios.

Chiri̱j i rAc'u̱n i Dios nik'or wo' aweh tak take k'oric wili: Re're' nc'uhtunic lok wi̱' re' nic' wach riwi̱' i kAja̱w Dios re' ma' janc'al ta ilo̱j wach. Re' chic chiri̱j rajawric i Dios, xa re' wo' Ac'unbe̱s nc'uhtunic lok reh chi manlic ru'um nok re' aj wo' re' wilic rajawric china̱ nic' pa' nimal tik'imaj cho.

Je' wo', nic' pa' nimal take tik'imaj re' wo' rAc'u̱n i Dios xtik'inic reh. Je' re' ajic chi'nchel pa' bih wilque̱b wach ac'al re' nilmijic quiwach ch'i̱l wo' take wilque̱b pan taxa̱j re' ma' nilmijic ta quiwach, je' ricab nic' pa' nimal take uxlabal re' wilic cajawric, on wilic quiwa'ric, on wilic quilok'il chi queh take tinamit, on take quichopbic na̱ chi'nchel take pa' bih nilmijic wach, on ma' nilmijic ta wach, re' wo' rAc'u̱n i Dios xtik'inic reh eh wilque̱b wo' chi riyohbaljic wach ru'.
Je' re' k'uru' re' rAc'u̱n i Dios xa wilic wo' nak chic cho nok ja' quitik'injic ta nic' nimal take tik'imaj eh xa ru'um wo' reh rajawric chi'nchel quichopom qui̱b chi tuslic quiwach.

Je' wo' nik'or wo' aweh tak i wili chiri̱j i rAc'u̱n i Dios: Re' wo' re' nchoponic kana̱ hoj aj niminel je' ricab nok chi re' rina̱ jeno' c'acharel re're' nchoponic je reh riti'jolal. Je' wo' chic, ru'um chi re' rAc'u̱n i Dios re' wo' re' i pe̱t be̱h chi uctic chi quixilac take nacuctic cho chi quixilac camnak, re' wo' re' wilic rajawric chi riye'eric wo' chic c'acharic. Ru̱c' re're', re' Dios xiban chi re' rAc'u̱n xa re' wo' re' i pe̱t be̱h wilic rajawric china̱ chi'nchel.
Re' riwi̱' chi je' re' xiban ru'um chi re' Ajabe̱s Dios xa̱j eh xponic chiwach chi re' riminjilal i rAc'un wilic manlic wach.

Ma' xa ta re're', re' Dios xa̱j la' wo' chi re' rAc'u̱n, re're' xcojbic queh pan jenaj suk laj wih'ic ru̱c' i Dios chi'nchel take ma' wilque̱b ta nak pan jenaj suk laj wih'ic ru̱c' i Dios, je' chi wilque̱b ar pan taxa̱j eh je' chi wilque̱b wo' ayu' wach ac'al. Nic' wach riwi̱' naxiban i rAc'u̱n i Dios chi je' re'? Ru̱c' riquimic wach curu̱s re' xichihcaj wi̱' riquiq'ue̱l. Je' aj re' riwi̱' ajic re're' xicoj chi'nchel take naquiniminic reh pan jenaj suk laj wih'ic ru̱c' i Dios,

je' ricab xiban cho awu̱c' hat-tak. Je' re' nik'or maj najtir cho re' hat-tak ma' wilca̱t ta nak tak pan suk laj wih'ic ru̱c' i Dios eh nawixowej nak tak wach ru' ru'um reh ano'jbal tak chi ribanaric i c'ahbilal. Raj yu'na ma' je' ta chic re' awi̱' tak, xatye'eric la' tak pan jenaj sukquil ch'i̱l i Dios

ru'um reh quimic xic'ul i rAc'u̱n i Dios naxc'acharic ayu' wach ac'al. Je' re' ajic re' hat-tak yu'na wilca̱t tak chic pan suk laj wih'ic ru̱c' i Dios. Chaj camaj nok wilca̱t tak chi je' re'? Reh chi re' hat-tak etiwih'ic tak chiwach i Dios chi sak wach acapew-bal tak, chi ma'xta jeno' ch'uwa' laj no'jbal awu̱c' tak eh je' wo' chi ma'xta jeno' k'ilo̱j naribanaric chawi̱j tak.

Re' cok ru' reh chi naribanam chi je' re' curman chi til nimjok wo' take c'uhtunic chiri̱j i Jesus. Ma' xa ta re're', je' la' wo' curman chi re' take lok' laj c'uhtunic abiram tak re're' eh ach'ica̱b wo' tak ac'ux chiri̱j ru̱c' chi'nchel awa̱mna tak, ma̱k'eb lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak re' la' cha'n tak riman la' chic chayew ac'ux tak chiri̱j. Re' take k'oric chiri̱j take lok' laj c'uhtunic abiram tak re're', re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi re' wo' re' c'ahchi' quibiram q'uihal take c'acharel chi junsut wach ac'al choplic quina̱ ru'um i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma. Je' wo', nik'or aweh tak chi re' Lok' laj Ajabe̱s xpahbanic wi̱n chi aj c'uhbalanel reh riC'uhbal.

Re' aj re' riwi̱' nok c'ahchi' nic'ulum i ti'c'axic ayu' pan che̱'. Raj i hin to̱b ta nchel je' re' c'ahchi' nic'ulum k'e̱' nsukbic nic'ux ru'um i wili: Chi re' take ti'c'axic xik'or i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi nanic'ulum, re' aj wo' re' c'ahchi' nic'ulum yu'na. Je' re' niban ru'um reh ac'uhbaljic hat-tak aj niminel re' najalwachej tak riti'jolal i Jesus. Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab chi re' riti'jolal i Jesus tik'imaj ru'um q'uihal chi bakil, je' wo' re' nok re' ritinami̱t i Dios tik'imaj wach ru̱c' riq'uihal aj niminel.

Re' aj nipahbabjic chi ac'uhbaljic hat-tak ritinami̱t i Dios, re' wo' Dios xtik'inic wach. Je' re' nik'or maj re' aj re' xye'bic wo' nicamaj chi aj ilo̱l reh ac'acharic hat-tak aj niminel. Je' re' ajic re' hin, hin pahbamaj ru'um i Dios reh chi ru̱c' lok' laj riC'uhbal enisakomej wach aweh tak chi manlic i no'jbal wili:

Chi wilic jenaj nim wach no'jbal re' najtir k'i̱j sakom xa re' wo' cho pan ch'iquinbal cho jarub pa' tahn ro̱k quic'acharic take cho kama̱m kati't xa cu ar wo' cho c'olo̱j cho ri̱j, xa re' la' yu'na re' Dios ritehem wach keh hoj nic' nimal ritinami̱t.

Re' riwi̱' chi je' re' xiban reh chi re' hoj nic' nimal ritinami̱t enkana'bej chi re' no'jbal re're', re' k'oro̱j wo' queh take aj niminel je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel riyew keh hoj chi'nchel aj niminel jenaj rinimal sakom chiri̱j ribiral hab wach i Jesus. Je' wo' chic, re're' xa̱j chi nkeht'alij wili: Re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric wilic wo' pan ka̱mna hoj aj niminel. Chi je' aj re' nok riwi̱' chaweh tak chi na̱ch'ica̱b ac'ux tak chiri̱j reh chi je' re', re' nim laj sakom sutumaj wi̱' ri̱j i kAja̱w Dios narisutem wo' awi̱j tak natiquimok tak je.

Je' re' nok chi keht'alim chic i no'jbal ritehem wach i Dios chiri̱j i Jesus, re' hoj aj niminel reh nkak'or queh chi'nchel quibirinic keh chi re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric re' wo' i Jesus eh ru'um chi karakam chiri̱j chi manlic i ribiral re're', re' hoj naka'n wo' c'uhtunic, nkak'or queh c'acharel chi ca'n i coric wach no'jbal. Re' nka̱j chiri̱j ru̱c' rik'ormojic re're', re' chi naquipah'ok chiwach i Dios, coric ok wach i no'jbal tijimaj wi̱' ru̱c' rinimjic i Ajabe̱s K'atal K'oric Jesus.

Ru'um aj chi je' re' nka̱j, re' hin til c'ahchi' niyeb nic'ux chipam nicamaj ru̱c' rinimal rajawric i Jesus eh ru'um reh rajawric ru', re' hin wilic wo' rinimal wajawric chi ribanaric take pa' bih niban chipam ricamaj.

Til coric ru' chi chipam nicamaj wilic rinimal wajawric eh je' wo' nwa̱j wo' chi na̱weht'alim tak chi wilic wo' take quik'etbic pa̱m nibe̱h chi atobjic hat-tak aj niminel aj Colo̱sa je' wo' chi quitobjic take aj niminel wilque̱b ar pan tinamit Lahorise̱ya eh je' wo' take nic' q'uihal take was nicha̱k' ma' xqueht'alij ta niwach naxiniq'uic cho chaxilac tak.

Re' cok ru' to̱b ta wo' wilic take quik'etbic pa̱m nibe̱h, re' hin nicuy chi'nchel re're' reh chi re' hat-tak na̱cowsam ac'ux tak. Je' wo', reh chi enatik tak ju' wih'ic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis chawibil awi̱b tak ru'um reh ric'axbal i Dios wilic pan awa̱mna tak chi je' ricab nc'uluric nok nrakmajic jeno' bihomal, enarak tak chiri̱j chi manlic i tijinic re' hat-tak tijimaj wi̱'. Ru̱c' re're', re' hat-tak ewo' naweht'alij tak i nim wach no'jbal wili re' xiteh cho wach i Dios chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric:
Chi je' ricab nok wilic take bihomal c'olo̱j pan jeno' c'ola̱b, je' wo' re' i Dios xic'ol wo' ri̱j rino'jbal ch'i̱l ricapew-bal reh chi xa re' wo' i Jesus narisakomonic lok wach.
Re' no'jbal re're', re' aj wo' re' nik'or je aweh tak reh chi je' re' ma' hab ta wach enjot'bic aweh tak ru̱c' take ma' coric ta wach c'uhbalanic nca'n to̱b ta la' xa suk chic rik'ormojic nca'n.

Ru'um aj re' chacoj tak rehtal i nik'or je aweh tak maj re' hin nik'or je re're' ru'um reh capewenic niban chawi̱j tak. Coric, re' hin ma' wilqui̱n ta chaxilac tak xa re' la' xa c'ahchi' wo' qui̱n chi capewenic chawi̱j tak chi suk nic'ux ru'um wilic pa nicapew-bal nic' wach naxatwilow tak cho chi xa jenaj chic wach acapew-bal tak chi richoporic ac'ux tak chiri̱j rinimjic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' wo' re' yu'na chi xa cu choplic wo' ac'ux tak chipam i niminic to̱b ta nchel ma' wilqui̱n ta ponok awu̱c' tak.

Ru'um aj re' til ch'iclic nic'ux chawi̱j tak, eriban chi enipahkaj aweh tak chi je' ricab i niminic xa'n tak naxac'ul tak i kac'uhbalanic re' rik'or chi re' Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, je' ok wo' re' niminic cha'n tak chi c'ahchi'ca̱t tak chi ritahkaljic i Jesus.

Chiri̱j aj wo' Jesus c'ahchi' achopom ac'ux tak chi cow je' ricab nok jeno' che̱' rirak ricowil nano̱j jok take ritz'i̱' ra̱' pan ac'al, on je' wo' ricab jeno' pa̱t ch'iclic chi cow nok cu pan ac'al ch'iquimaj cho rira'il. Je' ok re' animinic tak k'uru' eh chi je' re' chi choplic chic ac'ux tak chi manlic chiri̱j take c'uhtunic hat-tak tijimaj wi̱', ma' q'uisi̱n ta tioxonic ru̱c' Dios enwih'ic pan awa̱mna tak chi junelic.

Hat-tak wich aj niminel, ma̱cana̱' awi̱b tak chi hab wach etirijot' tak ru̱c' take tijinic chiri̱j i Dios je' ru̱c' xa pan quicapew-bal take c'acharel nchalic eh ma'xta bih jeno' to'bonic ric'am cho aweh tak ru'um nok ma' ricorquilal ta nk'oric chiri̱j i Dios. Re' take tijinic re're' ma' re' ta ru̱c' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xchalic rik'ormojic xa cu̱c' la' take c'acharel xchalic chi naca'nam ric'uhtjic on xa cu̱c' take ma' tob laj uxlabal re' wilic cajawric chi quina̱ take c'acharel ma' quiniminic ta reh i Dios.

Je' re' k'uru' ma̱yew awi̱b tak chi jot'oric ru'um nok re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chic i wili: Xa re' wo' cho ric'ulic i Jesus ayu' wach ac'al nok wilic chic riti'jolal ribakil, re' hoj nkilow chi xa re' wach i Jesus i manlic wach riminjilal Dios.

Ru'um aj re' manlic chic wach ano'jbal hat-tak, ma'xta chic bih ra̱j mahsjic reh ru'um nok wilca̱t tak chic chi ri'sil ro̱k k'ab i Jesus re' til wilic wo' rajawric chi quina̱ chi'nchel nic' nimal take uxlabal wilic quiwa'ric quilok'il.

Je' wo' chic, c'olok pan ac'ux tak chi xac'ul tak i rehtalil re' c'uhtumaj ru'um i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi hoj ritinami̱t. Re' cok ru' re' rehtalil re're' ma' je' ta ricab i cojo̱j ru'um jeno' c'acharel nk'atbic lok reh ritz'uhmal na̱ ac'achanbal tak, re' la' rehtalil re're' nc'uhtunic lok ru̱c' i camanic xiban i Dios naxesaj lok pan awa̱mna tak i c'ahbilal nbanic nak chi timahcanic tak.

Je' re' k'uru' naxac'ul tak i rehtalil re're' je' wo' xa'n wo' tak i kahsanic ha' re' rijalwachej rimuhkic i Jesus. Ma' xa ta re're' xa'n tak je' la' wo' ru̱c' rikahsjic aha̱' tak xc'uluric wo' awu̱c' tak je' ricab xc'uluric ru̱c' i Jesus naxuctic wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak ru'um reh rinimal rajawric i Dios. Je' re' nik'or maj re're' xuctic wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak reh chi naric'acharic wo' chi junpech. Je' wo', re' hat-tak naxatuctic tak cho ri'sil ha' xachop tak jenaj ac' chic c'acharic ru'um chi xacoj tak wach chi re' Dios xucsaj cho i Jesus chi quixilac camnak.

Coric aj ru', najtir c'achalca̱t nak tak pan mahc eh ma' aweht'alim ta nak tak chi hat-tak ritinami̱t i Dios, xa re' la' Dios xiyew aweh tak jenaj ac' laj c'acharic je' ricab xiban ru̱c' rucsjic cho Jesus eh je' wo' xicuy xisach rinimal amahc tak.

Ma' xa re' ta re' xiban je' la' wo' ru'um reh riquimic i Jesus naxjap'aric ar wach curu̱s, re' hu̱j nch'ukbic nak wach kamahc chiwach i Dios re' rik'or wi̱' chi re' hoj, hoj aj mahc xicoj lok pa reh i Dios eh ru̱c' xiban re're', re' hu̱j re're' xicana̱' chi ma'xta chic rajawric chi kana̱.

Je' la' wo' ru̱c' riquimic i kAja̱w Jesus, xye'eric pan ac'al i cajawric nic' nimal take uxlabal re' wilic cajawric quilok'il. Ma' xa ta re're' je' la' wo' naxquimic wach curu̱s xic'uhtaj lok chi quiwach take c'acharel chi xiyew pa ro̱k i cajawric take chi'nchel uxlabal re're' chi re're' k'e̱' nimal wach rajawric wilic chi quiwach chi'nchel ru'.

Je' aj re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k', ru'um chi xa re' wach i Jesus wilic rajawric chi quina̱ chi'nchel, ma̱cana̱' tak chi hab wach erich'uk k'oric chana̱ tak chi rik'ormojic aweh tak haj wilic eriban on ma' eriban chi enac'ux on enawuq'uej tak. Je' wo', ma̱cana̱' tak chi hab wach erich'uk k'oric chana̱ tak chi rik'ormojic aweh tak chi curman chi ena'n tak take ni̱m nka'n hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ricab take nka'n eli̱c ju'jun ha̱b, on eli̱c ju'jun poh nok riban xa coten chic i poh, on re' nka'n chiwach i hi'lbal k'i̱j reh ju'jun xama̱na.

Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab chi re' jeno' nachbal xa ric'uhtaj keh chi wilic jeno' hab wach rijil cho ri̱b, je' wo' re' ru̱c' i wi'c ch'i̱l i ha' ch'i̱l wo' take ni̱m nka'n reh chi ma'xta nak chic riwih'ic kamahc, re' take re' xa xquic'uhtaj keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi wilic jenaj naric'ulic lok chi risacharic wach kamahc eh re' til xkilow chi xc'ulic lok re're', re' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Je' aj re' ru' ma' hab ta wach eriban chi erik'or aweh tak chi re' hat-tak ma' re' ta riwi̱' niminic na'n tak je' ricab nca'n take xa eli̱c wo' c'ahchi' quik'oric aweh tak chi re' hat-tak ma' ch'ublic ta wach ac'ux tak, on nanquik'or wo' aweh tak chi curman chi na̱lok'em tak quiwach take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios. Je' aj re' k'oric nca'n take re' reh chi xa nca'n chic lok qui̱b chi quilom wach take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios je' ricab nquik'or, xa re' la' nquik'or re're', xa ma' coric ta wo'. Haj cok wilic i coric, re' chi re' take c'acharel re're' ma' ch'ublic ta wach quic'ux eh re' pa' bih nquik'or xa pan quic'ux nchalic rik'ormojic i k'oric nca'n.

Je' wo' chic, re' take c'acharel re're', ma' wilque̱b ta chi ri'sil i rajawric i Jesus je' ricab xitik'a̱' wach i Dios reh chi re' ritinami̱t nariq'uihic wach, je' wo' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' kati'jolal kabakil.
