Je' re' nik'or maj re' kati'jolal i hoj wilic wo' jenaj rina̱ nchopbic reh eh re' kati'jolal re're' riwi̱' wo' chi reh chi naribanam riwa' riha̱' reh chi nariq'uihic johtok eh chi wilic wo' ricowil take tikbal reh kabakil nchopbic reh kati'jolal.

Re' hat-tak yu'na wilca̱t tak chic ri'sil rajawric i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Ru'um aj re' nc'uluric awu̱c' tak je' ricab xic'ul i Jesus eh je' ricab chi re're' xicana̱' c'acharic china̱ ac'al wili naxquimic je, je' wo' re' hat-tak xacana̱' wo' tak c'acharic chi ri'sil rajawric take c'uhbal re' nquik'or i tinamit chi nchoponic quina̱. Wi til coric chi re' hat-tak xacana̱' tak chic i c'acharic chi je' re', chayohbalej awi̱b tak k'uru' chi ma' eta wo' chic namin awi̱b tak chi ri'sil rajawric take tak'anic nca'n take c'acharel re're'.
Re' take re' je' wili tak'anic nca'n: Ma̱tz'a'j tak re're', ma̱c'ux tak i wulu', ma̱yew tak pan ak'ab tak take pa' bih wulu'.

Ma̱coj chic awi̱b tak chi c'acharic chi ri'sil rajawric take c'uhbal re're' k'uru' maj chi'nchel take tak'anic re're' xa winak wo' ti xtak'anic wach chi rino'jbal ri̱b je' ricab take tak'anic rik'or chi wilic take pa' bih ma' eta nc'uxuric to̱b ta wo' nak re' Dios xik'or chi tare̱t chi c'uxuric.

Coric ru' chi ru'um reh take tak'anic re're', wilic take wilic quibiral chi k'e̱' wo' chic quino'jbal xa ru'um ti ru' chi til nquiyew quic'ux chiri̱j i pa' bih nquilok'ej wach on ru'um chi k'e̱' wo' chic nquiyew chi ti' i quiti'jolal, xa re' la' ru' to̱b ta je' re' quibiral, re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi re' take tak'anic re're' ma'xta bih camanel aweh tak wi ta nak ru̱c' take re' nawa̱j ayeb pan awo̱k tak i ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal ric'ax wach ati'jolal tak.

Ru'um chi re' hat-tak ac' laj c'acharic chic wilic aweh tak je' ricab chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xic'ul jenaj ac' laj c'acharic naxuctic cho chi quixilac take camnak, re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi chayew ac'ux tak chiri̱j rirakmajic chiri̱j take tijinic nchalic rik'ormojic ar pan taxa̱j, re' ye'o̱j wi̱' rilok'il i Jesus chi rich k'atal k'oric cok Dios je' ricab nanye'eric rilok'il jeno' c'acharel nantz'ukunjic cok chi riche̱l jeno' k'atal k'oric.
Chiri̱j ok take tijinic nchalic rik'ormojic ar pan taxa̱j chayew acapew-bal tak eh ma' ok chiri̱j take tijinic npok' cho pan quic'ux take c'acharel wilque̱b ayu' wach ac'al.

Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab nok re' ric'acharic i Jesus xcux'ic wach nah ac'al wili naxquimic je, je' wo' re' hat-tak xcux'ic wo' wach i c'acharic na'n tak chi rehquen take rajawric tijinic re're'. Coric ru' je' ricab chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric ma' nilmijic ta wach chi wilic cok ru̱c' i Dios, re' lok'il ye'o̱j aweh tak chi c'acharic chi ri'sil rajawric i Dios ma' nilmijic ta wo' wach yu'na

xa re' la' ru' na'ilmijok wo' chic wach ayu' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric re' til xye'bic wo' reh ac'acharic tak, narilmijic wo' wach i lok'il ye'o̱j aweh tak je' ricab narilmijic wach i rinimal wach i lok'il ye'o̱j reh Jesus.

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um nok chi ri'sil chic rajawric i Jesus c'acharic na'n tak, til nik'or je aweh chi chawesaj tak lok chiri̱j ac'ux c'ahbil laj no'jbal je' ricab take wili: Re' c'oyomal, re' ch'uwa'rsanic i̱b ru̱c' c'ahbil laj capew-bal, re' suksunic i̱b ru̱c' ribanaric on ric'axaric wach take ra̱j ma' ra̱j banaric, re' ribanaric i chaj bih ric'ax wach kati'jolal, ch'i̱l wo' i ric'axaric wach bihomal re' no̱j cahnok chi je' na ricab i mahc chi lok'onic tiyo̱x maj ma' re' ta chic chiri̱j i Dios wilic ca̱mna.
Chawesaj tak lok rij ac'ux tak take no'jbal re're' maj re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chic chi re' rijosk'il i Dios nchalic chi quina̱ take c'acharel ma' quibirinic ta k'oric chiwach ru'.
Coric ru', najtir k'i̱j xatc'acharic tak cho chipam take no'jbal re're'

xa re' la' yu'na ma' je' ta chic re' c'acharic na'n tak. Ru'um aj re' ma' eta wo' chic riban chi enbanjic take wili: Re' c'ahanic i̱b, re' josk'il, re' ma' tob laj capew-bal chi ribanaric c'ahbilal, re' tz'uju̱j i̱b ch'i̱l i c'ahbil laj k'oric nelic xak achi̱' tak.

Je' wo', ma̱ban tak chic chucuj k'oric chawach tak maj je' ricab nok re' hat-tak nawesaj tak lok i tz'akic laj tz'ih chawi̱j tak nok abanam tak chic i kahsanic ha', je' wo' re' hat-tak xawesaj tak chic lok rij ac'ux tak i no'jbal na'n nak tak cho najtir k'i̱j re' xbanic nak cho chi xa'n tak cho i ma' holohic ta laj bano̱j.

Ru'um aj re' yu'na re' hat-tak toco̱m chic riwi̱' ac'acharic tak je' ricab nok toco̱m chic tz'ih nacoj tak chawi̱j natelic tak cho reh kahsanic ha'. Chi toco̱m chic riwi̱' ac'acharic tak je' ricab tik'imaj wach ru'um i Dios chi hat-tak na̱c'uhtunic tak lok reh rino'jbal, curman wo' chi eli̱c ok c'ahchi' ricorjic wach ano'jbal tak maj xa chi je' re' na̱rakam tak chiri̱j chi manlic i toco̱m laj c'acharic wilca̱t wi̱'.

Chipam i toco̱m chic c'acharic wili, ma' hab ta wach nim ta nak riwa'ric. Haj cok wilic til wilic riwa'ric, re' chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric wilic chic pan kac'acharic. Re' wili ra̱j rik'orom chi re' take c'acharel xa jenaj wach quiwa'ric. Je' ricab take aj criye̱co xa jenaj quiwach ch'i̱l take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. On re' take quik'atam lok ritz'uhmal na̱ quic'achanbal rehtalil chi aj niminel take chiwach i Dios xa jenaj wo' quiwach quich'i̱l take aj niminel je' ru̱c' ma' quik'atam ta lok ritz'uhmal na̱ quic'achanbal. Je' wo', chipam i toco̱m chic c'acharic wili ma'xta c'acharel nim on t'uch ta nak wach. Je' ricab take wilic on ma'xta quitijinic, on re' take ehcham reh jeno' camanic ch'i̱l take xa aj camanom take, xa jenaj wo' wach quiwa'ric.

Chi je' aj re' i toco̱m chic c'acharic wilca̱t tak wi̱', re' hat-tak xatrichih tak i Dios chi xa'n tak chi ritinami̱t xisakbej wach ac'acharic tak eh ti' wo' tiric'raj tak cho. Ru'um aj re' je' ricab nok re' hat-tak toco̱m chic tz'ih nacoj tak chi rijalaric awi̱b tak, curman wo' chi toco̱m chic no'jbal wih'ok awu̱c' tak chi c'acharic chi coric. Re're' ra̱j rik'orom jenaj c'acharic ru̱c' quetelenic wachi̱s, ru̱c' chak'lamquil eh ru̱c' ch'ublic wach c'uxlis.
Wi hab wach aj jeno' xcalajic chawach tak, ma' njohtic pe ti ac'a̱ tak. Wi wilic jeno' mahc ra̱j cuyuric reh, chacuy tak je' ricab xiban i kAja̱w Jesus maj re're' xicuy eh xisach wo' amahc tak.

Ru̱c' aj i no'jbal ena'n tak re're' curman wo' chi nariwih'ic c'axoj i̱b chaxilac tak maj ru̱c' re're' na̱banam tak chi xa jenaj wach awi̱' etiwih'ic tak pan niminic tak eh chi na̱wih'ic tak pan manlic jenaj wach c'uxlis chawibil awi̱b tak.

Ma' xa re' ta aj re' ra̱j banaric, ra̱j la' wo' chi re' sukquil c'uxlis ra̱j i Dios chi na̱c'acharic tak wi̱' wih'ok pan awa̱mna tak reh chi re're' behsenok aweh tak chi rich'ukuric wach pan chak'lamil i xa pa' jaric jeno' wolic enwih'ic chaxilac tak. Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab naxatriyuk'ej tak cho i Dios chi na̱banam tak chi ritinami̱t chi xa jenaj wach ac'ux tak chiwach, je' wo' re' xatriyuk'ej tak cho chi na̱wih'ic tak pan suk laj c'uxlis chawibil awi̱b tak. Ru̱c' ano'jbal tak chi je' re', re' hin nipahkaj aweh tak chi xa wilic ta nak wo' atioxbal tak johtok ru̱c' i Dios ru'um reh yuk'unic xiban cho aweh tak.

Je' wo', nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chi re' lok' laj ric'uhbal i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, xa wilic ta wo' nak pan awa̱mna tak reh chi ma' pajoj ta enwih'ic ano'jbal tak maj curman chi ru̱c' t'ulic laj no'jbal na̱c'uhbalem on na̱k'ilim awi̱b tak chaxilac hat-tak. Je' wo' chic nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chi wilic ta nak tioxonic pan awa̱mna tak chi etibichinic tak johtok chiwach i Dios ru̱c' take bi̱ch tik'imaj ru̱c' take k'oric wilic chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios, on ru̱c' take bi̱ch ye'o̱j ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal, on ru̱c' take bi̱ch tz'ihmbimaj chi riye'eric rilok'il i kAja̱w Jesus.

Ru̱c' take nipahkaj je aweh tak re're', nwa̱j wo' nipahkam aweh tak chi xa pa' jaric ra̱j k'ormojic on xa pa' jaric camanic ra̱j banaric, chi'nchel re're' chak'or tak eh cha'n tak chi c'ahchi' ac'uhtam tak lok chi hat-tak chic aj niminel reh Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus eh ru̱c' re're' nacha'n tak johtok ritioxjic i Jesus ru'um reh rajawric, nariye'eric wo' ritioxjic i Dios re' rAja̱w i Jesus.
Hat-tak ehq'uenbe̱s nipahkaj aweh tak chi tiwih'ok chi ri'sil rajawric abahi̱l tak ru'um nok je' re' riwi̱' ac'acharic tak ra̱j banjic yu'na chi wilca̱t tak chic chi ri'sil rajawric i kAja̱w Jesus.
Hat-tak bahilbe̱s, re' wili nipahkaj aweh tak chi na̱banam tak: Chac'ax awehq'ue̱n tak eh ma̱banlom tak cow laj k'oric chi quina̱.

Re' hat-tak ac'unbe̱s ixk'unbe̱s, til tiniminok tak chiwach rik'orbal atu̱t awaja̱w tak ru̱c' chi'nchel je' ricab ric'ul chi queh take quiniminic chic reh kAja̱w ru'um nok je' re' ra̱j i Dios chi na̱banam tak yu'na chi wilca̱t tak chic chi ri'sil rajawric i kAja̱w Jesus.
Je' wo' hat-tak tutbe̱s ajabe̱s, ma̱johsaj quic'ux take awac'u̱n awixk'u̱n tak reh chi ma' eta riban qui̱b quic'ux awu̱c' tak.

Re' hat-tak c'acharel, re' hat-tak ehchemaj chi camanic chanimej wo' tak take qui'ehchenic aweh tak chi camanic ayu' wach ac'al ru̱c' chi'nchel pa' bih tiquitak'a̱' tak wi̱', ma' ok xa re' tiniminic tak nok nawilow tak quiwach chi wilque̱b cok awu̱c' tak je' ricab nca'n take xa nca'n chic quiwach chiwach i aj ehcham camanic xa re' la' nok ma' hab ta chic wilic cu̱c' ma'xta chic bih nca'n. Re' hat-tak k'uru' ticamanok tak chi coric ru̱c' ac'ux tak ru'um reh riyohbaljic i Dios wilic awu̱c' tak eh ma̱ban tak chi xa hat-tak k'itk'it,

tiniminok la' tak chi coric ru'um nok re' nic' pa' nimal camanic nquipahkaj aweh tak curman chi na̱banam tak ru̱c' chi'nchel ac'ux tak chi lok'onbal wach i Dios, ma' ok xa reh rakbal alok'il tak chiwach jeno' c'acharel.

C'olok tak pan ac'ux i wili: Wi je' re' xa'n tak re' k'oro̱j cahnok ribiral chi na̱c'ulum tak pan taxa̱j nariye'eric cho aweh tak ru'um i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric ru'um nok chiwach aj re' ru' c'ahchi' acamanic tak.

Tz'a̱b ru' wi re' hat-tak ma' xa'n tak i coric, ra̱j rik'orom chi re' ritz'akil i pa' bih c'ahbilal xa'n tak, re' wo' re' na̱c'ulum tak ru'um nok chiwach i Dios ma'xta jeno' c'acharel nim ta nak wach on t'uch ta nak wach, xa jenaj la' wach i ch'ukuj k'oric nariban china̱ aj ehcham camanic ch'i̱l i xa aj ehchemaj laj aj camanom ti.

Ru'um aj re', re' hat-tak aj ehcham reh i camanic cha'n wo' tak haj wilic tare̱t chi banaric cu̱c' take awaj camanom tak eh je' wo', xa coric ok wach ac'ux tak cu̱c'. C'olok pan ac'ux tak chi ar pan taxa̱j wilic wo' jenaj ntak'anic chana̱ tak.

Yu'na, re' aj chic chiri̱j i banoj ti̱j chiwach i Dios, nipahkaj aweh chi chayew ac'ux tak chi junelic eh ma̱poh'aj ac'ux tak chi ti̱j, xa c'ahchi' la' ok wo' ca̱t tak chi tioxonic chiwach i Dios ru̱c' take pa' bih riban chawi̱j tak.

Je' re' k'uru' nacha'n ati̱j tak, koj-awic'saj wo' pan ati̱j tak i hoj aj c'uhbalanel. Je' wo' re' cha'n tak chiwi̱j i hin re' tz'apalqui̱n pan che̱' ru'um reh rik'ormojic i rinimal no'jbal ma' sakomomaj ta cho wach chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Chi je' aj re' wilqui̱n wi̱', cha'n tak ati̱j chiwi̱j reh chi re' kAja̱w Dios eriteh kocbal cu̱c' take tinamit eh chi je' re' nak'ormojok i lok' laj riC'uhbal i Dios queh, re' take re' enquirak chiri̱j i no'jbal c'olo̱j nak ri̱j re're'.

Ma' xa ta chiri̱j take re' na̱banam ati̱j tak, cha'n la' wo' ati̱j tak chiwi̱j hin reh chi re' rik'ormojic i no'jbal ma' sakomomaj ta cho wach re're', enisakomej lok wach chi coric je' ricab tanlic chi nina̱ chi nanibanam.

Chi je' re' pahkanic niban chawach tak, nipahkaj wo' chic aweh tak i wili: Wi xirak achi̱' tak rik'ormojic i Lok' laj riC'uhbal i Dios queh take ja' queht'alim ta wach i Dios, chak'or tak queh, ma̱k'eb tak i junc'am re're' chi k'oric chiri̱j. Re' cok ru' ma' ok xa re' ti re' na'n tak, til la' ok c'uhtunok lok ano'jbal tak chi toco̱m chic riwi̱' c'acharic na'n tak.

Ru̱c' ano'jbal tak wilic na̱weht'alim tak nic' wach quic'u'ljic na̱banam tak take c'acharel re're' nanca'n jeno' pahkanic aweh tak chiri̱j animinic na'n tak. Ru'um aj re', re' hin nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chi je' ricab i nansukbic i c'uxbal nancojoric ratz'amil, je' ta wo' nak re' chiban ak'orbal tak natik'orok tak pan ato'bil chi rik'ormojic i ribiral i Jesus reh chi je' re' xa suk wo' quic'ux i tinamit naquibiraj i c'uhbalanic na'n tak.

Re' aj take wili nik'or je aweh tak wich aj niminel. Re' chic take ribiral chiri̱j nic'acharic re' chic i kich aj niminel Ti̱quico re' k'e̱' ti' nwic'raj narisakomem wach aweh tak. Re' Ti̱quico re're' wich aj camanom wo' chipam ricamaj i kAja̱w Dios eh ma'xta bih npoh'ic wi̱' ric'ux chi nitobjic pa ricamaj i kAja̱w Jesus.

Ru'um aj re' c'ahchi' nitak'a̱b je awu̱c' tak reh chi nachiban i camanic c'ahchi' niyeb china̱, re're' eriyew wo' ricowil ac'ux tak je' wo' enc'ulic rik'or wi̱n nic' wach i niminic c'ahchi'ca̱t tak chiwach i Dios.

Rich'i̱l i Ti̱quico c'ahchi' wo' nitak'a̱b je awu̱c' tak i kich aj niminel One̱simo ribihnal re' jenaj awich atinami̱t tak re' k'e̱' wo' ti' nwic'raj eh riban wo' ricamaj chi manlic. Re' take quib re're' naquik'orom aweh tak ricorquil chaj bih c'acharic c'ahchi' nibanam i hin ayu'.

Chipam nihu̱j wili, wilic take nquitak'a̱' je risukquil ac'ux tak, je' ricab i kich aj niminel ma' Arista̱rco re' wich tz'ahpel pan che̱' eh ch'i̱l wo' i kich aj niminel re' Cus ribihnal re' rica̱n cho Wernaweh. Re' hat-tak abiram tak chic ribiral i pahkanic nibanam je chiri̱j i Arista̱rco eh ru'um aj re' nik'or je aweh tak yu'na i wili: Wi re're' xo̱j c'olok awu̱c' tak na'elok je pan che̱', chac'ul tak pa ricorquil je' wo' pan sukquil laj c'uxlis.

Je' wo' i wich aj niminel ma' Chus re' ribihnej wo' chi Ju̱sto ritak'a̱' je risukquil ac'ux tak. Chi quixilac take wich aj niminel je' ru̱c' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, xa re' ti take kich aj niminel wili c'ahchi'qui̱n quito'bem ayu' pan che̱' chipam nicamaj niban reh chi toco̱m chic take c'acharel equehtric wo' wih'ic chi rehquen rajawric i Dios chi k'atal k'oric eh ru̱c' i to'bonic nca'n wi̱n, re' hin nirak risukquil nic'ux.

Je' wo', re' kich aj niminel ma' Epa̱wras re' awich tinamit tak cho eh raj camanom wo' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, c'ahchi' ritak'a̱b je risukquil ac'ux tak. Re' ma' Epa̱wras re're', nik'or aweh tak chi xa c'ahchi' wo' riyeb ric'ux chi ti̱j chawi̱j tak eli̱c k'i̱j chi ripahkaljic johtok reh Dios chi ru̱c' rajawric, re' hat-tak cow enapahba̱' ac'ux tak chipam i c'uhbal xatijej tak chiri̱j ribiral i Jesus. Je' wo', c'ahchi' ribanam riti̱j chawi̱j tak chi ma' ta nak chaj chic bih jeno' no'jbal curman chaweh tak, chi'nchel ta la' nak take no'jbal xarak ta nak tak chipam rinimjic i Jesus reh chi na̱banam tak haj wilic ra̱j i kAja̱w Dios.

Re' ti̱j riban i ma' Epa̱wras re' wo' re' riban chiqui̱j take toco̱m chic aj niminel. Je' re' nik'or maj re' hin wilom eh til niyew nichi̱' chi coric chi re're' eli̱c tiricapa̱j tak pan ti̱j, je' ricab wo' riban chiqui̱j take aj niminel wilque̱b pan tinamit Lahorise̱ya ch'i̱l wo' take wilque̱b pan tinamit Yera̱polis.

Chiri̱j chic rik'ormojic aweh tak ribiral i ma' Epa̱wras, nik'or wo' aweh tak chi re' ma' Te̱mas ch'i̱l i ma' Cax re' aj ik'omonel re' k'e̱' ti' nwic'raj, c'ahchi' wo' quitak'a̱b je risukquil ac'ux hat-tak nic' q'uihal aj niminel wilca̱t tak ar.

Chipam wo' i hu̱j wili nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chayew tak risukquil quic'ux take i kich aj niminel wilque̱b ar pan tinamit Lahorise̱ya. Je' wo', chayew wo' tak risukquil ric'ux i ma' Ni̱npa ch'i̱l take nic' nimal aj niminel nquimol qui̱b pa ripa̱t.

Je' re' k'uru' re' hat-tak aj Colo̱sa nok awilom tak chic wach i hu̱j wili chi quixilac take aj niminel ar, nwa̱j wo' chi chak'ahsaj tak je queh aj niminel aj Lahorise̱ya reh chi naquilom wo' wach ru'. Re' jenaj chic hu̱j tak'amaj wo' je queh ru' chak'or tak queh chi naquiyeb wo' aweh tak reh chi na̱wilom wo' tak wach i hat-tak.

Je' wo', nipahkaj aweh tak jenaj chic ato'bil wili: Chak'or tak reh wi̱n i Arqui̱po chi chiyew ric'ux chiri̱j i camanic xye'eric reh ru'um i kAja̱w Jesus eh chiban wo' chi coric i camanic ye'o̱j reh re're'.

Re' aj chic take k'oric na̱wilom tak jok wach wili, til re' hin ma' Lu̱' c'ahchi' nitz'ihminic reh: Sukquil c'uxlis chaweh tak. Ch'i̱l i wili nik'or wo' aweh tak: Chacuy cha'n wo' ti ati̱j tak chiwi̱j nac'olok cho pan ac'ux tak chi tz'apalqui̱n pan che̱'. Re' ta nak rato'bil i Dios k'uru' wih'ok awu̱c' tak chi junelic. Je' ta nak re' banarok.

Re' hin ma' Lu̱' chi c'ahchi'qui̱n quihch'ilem i ma' Si̱las ch'i̱l i Timote̱yo, c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je hu̱j wili aweh hat-tak comonil aj niminel aj Tesalo̱nica re' choplic ac'ux tak ru̱c' Ajabe̱s Dios je' wo' chiri̱j i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Nok c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je hu̱j wili, nipahkaj johtok pa niti̱j chi re' ta wo' nak kAja̱w Dios ch'i̱l i Jesus to'bonok cho aweh tak eh chiyew ta wo' nak cho rinimal suk laj c'uxlis pan awa̱mna tak.
Hat-tak wich aj niminel nwa̱j nik'orom je aweh tak chi re' hoj nanka'n kati̱j chiwach i Dios, xa eli̱c wo' kojtioxonic johtok chiwach chawi̱j hat-tak re' xa wilca̱t wo' tak pan kac'ux.

Til pan coric nanka'n kati̱j ma'xta jeno' k'i̱j chi niq'uic ta nak pan kac'ux i to'bonic na'n tak ru'um reh acapew-bal nacoj tak ru̱c' i Dios, ch'i̱l wo' i c'axoj i̱b na'n tak queh take awich aj niminel tak ru'um reh ric'axaric i Dios wilic pan awa̱mna tak. Je' wo' re' nka'n ru'um ricowsjic ac'ux na'n tak chi ruyu'njic i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, ru'um nok ch'iclic ac'ux tak chiri̱j chi narisoljic wo' chic cho rica'pech.

Je' re' k'uru' hat-tak wich aj niminel re' k'e̱' tiric'ax tak i Dios, re' hoj k'e̱' nkatioxej johtok reh i Dios chawi̱j tak eh nka'n wo' kati̱j chawi̱j tak maj keht'alim chi re' kAja̱w Dios xchihbic cho awach tak chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n.

Nic' wo' wach nakeht'alij re're'? Re' hoj keht'alim re're' ru'um i rehtalil wili: Naxojwih'ic cho awu̱c' tak chi rik'ormojic i holohic laj c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus, re' Lok' laj Uxlabal xiban chi ma' xa ta kak'orbal ki̱b xojk'oric cho awu̱c' tak til la' ru̱c' ransil i kak'orbal xiyew ru'. Je' re' ajic re' wo' re' xbanic chi re' kano'jbal i hoj xcamanic aweh tak chi rinabjic chi re' wo' rino'jbal i Jesus nkac'am tz'eht naxojwih'ic cho chaxilac tak. Je' re' nik'or maj re' c'axoj i̱b xkac'uhtaj chawach tak, re're' nc'uhtunic lok wi̱' chi je' re'.

Naxac'am tak tz'eht reh kano'jbal re' wo' rino'jbal i Jesus xac'am tak tz'eht reh. Naxa'n aj tak chi je' re', xchalic i ti'c'axic chana̱ tak ru'um wo' reh ric'uluric i c'uhbal k'oro̱j aweh tak. To̱b ta wo' je' re' xac'ul tak xa xatik wo' tak ju' ric'amaric na̱ i c'uhbal re're' ru̱c' i sukquil c'uxlis riyew aweh tak i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios.
Yu'na ajic re' chic ano'jbal tak re're' c'ahchi' ric'amaric tz'eht reh cu'um take toco̱m chic aj niminel je' ricab take wilque̱b pan tak tinamit pa riyuk'ul Masero̱nya ch'i̱l pa riyuk'ul Aca̱ya.

Je' re' xc'uluric ru'um nok re' hat-tak xap'ut tak je rik'ormojic i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus cu rehtal xo̱j lok rik'ormojic chi junsut riyuk'ul Masero̱nya je' wo' chi junsut riyuk'ul Aca̱ya. Je' re' ajic re' ribiral ricowil ac'ux tak chi rinimjic i kAja̱w Jesus xo̱j wo' lok chi junsut take toco̱m chic yuk'ul. Ru'um aj re', re' hoj ma'xta jeno' kak'orbal chiri̱j i holohic laj no'jbal na'n tak

maj re' take aj niminel wilque̱b pan tak yuk'ul nponic wi̱' ribiral ano'jbal tak re're' quik'oric chiri̱j riholonquil wach ano'jbal tak. Jenaj rehtalil quik'orbal take aj niminel re're', re' chi naquik'oric chiri̱j i kaponic awu̱c' tak nquik'or nic' wach riholonquil wach no'jbal xoj-ac'ul tak wi̱'. Re' take re' nquik'or wo' ribiral chi ru̱c' kaponic awu̱c' tak, re' hat-tak xacana̱' tak i lok'onic tiyo̱x xatoquic tak chipam rinimjic i Dios eh cu yu'na chi k'i̱j c'ahchi' chic ca̱t tak chi c'acharic chiwach i c'achlic eh coric wach Dios je' ricab c'acharic riban jeno' aj camanom chi niminic chiwach i ajabe̱s.

Je' wo' chic, re' take re' nquik'or abiral tak chi re' hat-tak c'ahchi' ayeb ac'ux tak chi ruyu'njic richalic i Jesus re' rAc'u̱n i Dios. Re' aj i Jesus wili re' c'ahchi' awuy'em tak, re' wo' re' xucsjic cho chi quixilac take camnak eh chi kojrico'lej wo' i hoj aj niminel chiwach i ti'c'axic chalic reh ru'um rijosk'il i Dios chi quina̱ take aj mahc.

Hat-tak wich aj niminel, re' no'jbal xniban naxinc'uhbalanic cho chaxilac tak, til coric wach je' ricab aweht'alim wo' tak hat-tak. Je' re' nik'or maj re' c'uhbalanic xka'n naxojponic cho chaxilac tak ma' xcahnic ta chi k'e̱b, til la' xiban ricamaj chipam ac'acharic tak.

Coric ru', ru'um reh c'uhbalanic nka'n, re' hoj xkac'ul i ti'c'axic ch'i̱l i tz'ujuric je' ricab xabiraj wo' tak chi xkac'ul ar pan tinamit Pili̱po. To̱b ta wo' je' re' xkac'ul ar re' hoj ma' xojyo'jic ta nech' ok, xkatik la' ju' rik'ormojic i riC'uhbal i Dios ru'um i ricowil kac'ux riyew. Ru̱c' i ricowil kac'ux re're', re' hoj xkak'or wo' aweh tak take k'oric xiyew keh i Dios chi nakak'orom eh je' re' xka'n to̱b ta wo' yohbal wach kac'axquilal xkarak chipam atinami̱t tak.

Re' c'uhbal xkak'or aweh tak naxojwih'ic awu̱c' tak, re're' til coric wach, ma' xa ta tik'imaj wach ru̱c' ma' re' ta ricorquil laj no'jbal, xa ta nak wo' ru̱c' c'ahbil laj no'jbal. Je' wo', naxojponic cho c'uhbalanel chaxilac tak xkak'or i c'uhbal re're' chi ma' no̱c ta jot'o̱j ru̱c'.

Re' la' hoj xponic kak'or i c'uhbal re're' chi hoj ripahba̱b je i Dios re' nok rilom chic chi tare̱t kano'jbal, xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiki̱j chi nakak'orom i c'uhbal re're'. Ru'um aj re', re' rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios nka'n, ma' c'ahchi' ta co̱j lok reh ta nak chi enkarak kalok'il chi enkarak kalok'il chi quiwach take c'acharel china̱ ac'al wili, nka'n la' reh chi nakarakam kalok'il chiwach i Dios re' nilbic cho reh chaj bih wilic pan ka̱mna.

Naxojponic awu̱c' tak, re' hat-tak aweht'alim wo' tak chi ma' janc'al ta xkak'unej awach tak ru̱c' take tijimaj ri̱j k'oric. Je' wo' chic, re' Dios reht'alim wo' chi ma' xka'n ta chi xa suk kojk'oric awu̱c' tak xa ru'um ta nak ric'axaric wach atz'a̱k tak.

Ma' xkasic' ta wo' kalok'il chi quiwach toco̱m chic c'acharel on chawach ta nak hat-tak. Je' wo' xa ta nak xkapahkaj aweh tak chi na̱yeb tak kalok'il to̱b ta nak ric'ul chi keh chi xka'n chi je' re' ru'um i kajawric wilic chi hoj aj k'orol reh riC'uhbal i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.
Ma' re' ta re' xka'n k'uru', xojc'acharic la' chaxilac tak pan ch'ublic wach c'uxlis je' ricab nok jeno' tutbe̱s ch'ublic wach ric'ux chi riliric je' wo' chi riqueteric take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n.

Je' aj re' ru' ru'um reh chi k'e̱' ti'quil tikic'raj tak, ma' xa re' ta xkach'ica̱' kac'ux chawi̱j tak chi nakak'orom aweh tak i holohic laj k'oric chiri̱j i Jesus re' tak'amaj cho rik'ormojic keh ru'um i Dios, je' la' wo' til xkacoj pan kacapew-bal chi enkayew kac'acharic pan ti'c'axic chawi̱j tak wi la' curman chi je' re' enc'uluric ku̱c' ru'um chi k'e̱' ti'quil tikic'raj tak.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj ninimel, re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi coric nic' wach naxkaniq'uej kak'i̱j chi camanic naxojwih'ic cho chaxilac tak. Wilic wo' na pech xoj-johtic ak'ab, on chi cu wahk'ek wo' ti xoj-uctic chi camanic sic'bal ritz'akil pa' bih keh. Je' aj re' ru' no'jbal xka'n, reh chi ma' xkacoj ta jeno' ihk chana̱ tak chi kilmijic nok wilco̱j chaxilac tak chi rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i kAja̱w Jesus.

Je' re' ajic was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, re' ta hat-tak ch'i̱l wo' i Dios til aweht'alim tak chi coric chi re' hoj naxojwih'ic cho chaxilac hat-tak aj niminel, xojc'acharic cho ru̱c' risakil wach kacapew-bal, ru̱c' ricorquilal wach kac'ux, je' wo' chi ma'xta jeno' k'oric chiki̱j ru̱c' i camanic xiyew keh i kAja̱w Dios.

Je' wo', re' hat-tak aweht'alim wo' tak naxojwih'ic cho chaxilac tak, re' hoj xka'n je' ricab riban jeno' ajabe̱s chi narik'il take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n, riyew wo' risukquil quic'ux eh je' re' xka'n i hoj chaxilac tak, xatkak'il tak eh xkayew wo' risukquil ac'ux tak chi aju'junal chipam animinic tak.

Je' wo', nok wilco̱j ponok awu̱c' tak, xkak'or wo' aweh tak chi re' Dios xatriyuk'ej tak chi nariwih'ic chi k'atal k'oric chana̱ tak eh je' wo' chi na̱c'acharic tak chi ri'sil rinimal rajawric. Je' re' k'uru' chacuy, til tic'acharok tak je' ricab ric'ul chi queh take yuk'umaj take ru'um i Dios.

Chi je' aj re' c'uhbalanic xka'n chaxilac tak naxojwih'ic cho awu̱c' tak, re' hoj ma' nkacana̱' ta wo' johtok ritioxjic i kAja̱w Dios chawi̱j tak maj nok abiram tak chic take k'oric xik'or i Dios aweh tak ru̱c' kachi̱' i hoj, re' hat-tak xac'ul pan awa̱mna tak take k'oric re're'. Re' cok ru' re' take k'oric re're' xac'ul tak chi ma' je' ta xa rik'orbal jeno' c'acharel china̱ ac'al wili, xac'ul la' tak chi coric chi til re' Dios xtak'anic cho rik'ormojic. Cu aj yu'na chi k'i̱j re' Dios c'ahchi' ribanam chi ru̱c' riC'uhbal, re' hat-tak aj niminel wilca̱t tak ar Tesalo̱nica, eriban chi eli̱c enjahlic wach ano'jbal tak.

Ma' xa ta re're' xiban i Dios, xiban la' wo' chi xac'u'lej tak na̱ pan awa̱mna ric'uluric i ti'c'axic pan quik'ab take awich atinami̱t tak je' ricab xquic'ul wo' quicomonil take awich aj niminel reh Dios wilque̱b ar pa riyuk'ul i Jure̱ya re' nquimol wo' qui̱b pa ribihnal i kAja̱w Jesus. Ru̱c' i xa'n tak re're', c'ahchi' ac'amam tak tz'eht reh no'jbal xca'n take awich aj niminel tak re're' naxchalic i ti'c'axic chi quina̱ cu'um take quich quitinami̱t ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel

je' ru̱c' ma' nca'n ta ribanaric re' haj wili nponic chiwach i kAja̱w Dios. Re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho i ma' Israhel re're', junch'uk queh xicansanic cho queh take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios. Junch'uk chic take xicansanic cho reh kAja̱w Jesus re' Ajabe̱s cho chi kana̱ yu'na. Junch'uk wo' xi'esenic cho keh chipam atinamital tak.

Coric ru', je' re' xca'n ku̱c' reh chi ma'xta nak kak'orom i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus aweh hat-tak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ru'um nok ma' nca̱j ta chi enarak tak i co'lbal ri̱j ac'acharic tak. Ru̱c' i nic' pa' nimal nca'n re're', re' take c'acharel re're' xa c'ahchi' quimolsam wach riq'uihal quimahc chiwach i Dios. Ru'um re're', yu'na re' rinimal wach rijosk'il i Dios narichalic chi quina̱ chi naquic'ulum ti'c'axic ru'um i nic' pa' nimal nca'n ribanaric.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, ru'um chi re' take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xojquesaj cho chipam atinami̱t tak, re' hoj yu'na cu ja' riban ta chic chi nakawih'ic awu̱c' tak. Re' cok ru' to̱b ta nchel ma' nkilow ta chic awach tak, ma' kacana̱b ta acapewjic tak xa eli̱c la' wo' wilca̱t tak pan kac'ux. Til coric, xa re' wo' cho naxoj-esmejic cho chaxilac tak, re' hoj xa nka̱j nak chic chi nkilow ta wo' nak chic awach tak

eh ru'um re' xa nkitowej nak chic ojic awu̱c' tak. Re' hin ma' Lu̱' q'uih pech wo' nak xniniq'uej nik'i̱j chi ojic awu̱c' tak chi ak'o'rjic tak, xa re' la' aj Yahm xik'et pa nibe̱h chi ma'xta chic quino̱j.

Chaj bih riwi̱' chi q'uih pech xniniq'uej nik'i̱j chi ojic awu̱c' tak? Xwa̱j nak ojic ru' ru'um chi re' hat-tak k'e̱' hat-tak lo̱k' chi kawach eh je' wo' chic k'e̱' nsukbic kac'ux i hoj ru'um reh i holohic laj c'acharic na'n tak. Ru'um chi je' re' riwi̱' ac'acharic tak k'uru', re' hoj ch'iclic kac'ux chi nac'olok wo' chic lok i Jesus, ekojpah'ic chiwach eh je' wili enkak'or reh chi suk kac'ux: «Je' ricab chi jeno' co̱ch ric'ul jeno' aj ajamanel re're' nc'uhtunic lok wi̱' chi xiq'uic chipam jeno' pajbal i̱b cojo̱j chiwach, je' wo' re' take aj niminel wili re're' quic'uhtunic lok wi̱' chi re' hoj xka'n chi coric i kacamaj chi aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios, nqui enkak'or reh.
Pa ricorquil, re' hoj xa suk wo' chic kac'ux awu'um tak eh je' wo' ru'um reh riholonquil ac'acharic na'n tak re're', eriban chi enkak'or chi xka'n i kacamaj chi coric.

Ru'um aj chi ma' xkacuy ta chic ruyu'njic ribiral nic' wach i behic c'ahchi' ca̱t-tak chi rinimjic i Jesus, re' hin ch'i̱l i Si̱las ch'i̱l wo' i Timote̱yo xkatik'a̱' cho wach chi kawach chi jenaj kich'i̱l i narojic awu̱c' tak. Je' re' xkatik'a̱' wach to̱b ta re' wili xa̱j rik'orom chi qui̱b keh hoj xojcahnic ar chipam tinamit Ate̱nas.

Ru̱c' aj i tik'inic xka'n re're', xkak'or chi re' narojic awu̱c' tak, re' i kich aj niminel Timote̱yo re' raj camanom wo' i kAja̱w Dios eh aj to'o̱l wo' keh chipam kacamaj chi rik'ormojic i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i kAja̱w Jesus. Je' re' ajic nok wilic chic awu̱c' tak i Timote̱yo, xatrik'il tak eh ru̱c' i k'ilo̱j xiban aweh tak, xiban wo' chi xachop tak riman ricowil ac'ux tak chipam rinimjic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Ru̱c' richoporic ac'ux c'ahchi'ca̱t tak, ma' hab ta wach aweh tak enkajic ricapew-bal ru'um take ti'c'axic c'ahchi' awiq'uic tak wi̱'. Je' wo' naxponic awu̱c' tak i Timote̱yo, re're' xk'oric wo' awu̱c' tak chiri̱j i no'jbal aweht'alim tak chic hat-tak chiri̱j ric'uluric i ti'c'axic maj re' hat-tak aweht'alim wo' tak chi chi'nchel i hoj aj niminel reh Jesus tanlic chi kana̱ chi nakac'ulum i ti'c'axic ru'um reh rinimjic i Dios.

Nic' wach nok aweht'alim tak re're'? Aweht'alim tak maj nok cu wilco̱j cho chaxilac tak xkak'or aweh tak chi re' ti'c'axic xa wilic wo' chi kana̱ ma' haj ta iq'ue̱l keh eh aweht'alim wo' tak chi je' re' ru'um nok re' wo' hat-tak c'ahchi' ac'ulbic tak reh ti'c'axic k'oro̱j cho re're'.

Ru'um aj i ti'c'axic re're', re' hin xnitak'a̱' je awu̱c' tak i kacha̱k' Timote̱yo reh chi naric'ulic wo' rik'orom wi̱n i chaj bih narilom cho chiri̱j nic' wach i c'acharic na'n tak chiwach i Dios ru'um nok ma'xta chic nicuy ruyu'njic abiral tak. Til pan coric, re' hin xa quincapewenic wo' je chawi̱j tak maj chaj bih nakeht'alim wi re' aj Yahm xiyoj ok nchel acapew-bal tak eh ru̱c' re're', re' camanic xka'n chaxilac tak naxanimej tak i kAja̱w Jesus, eno̱j ok nchel chi k'e̱b.

Naxsoljic aj wo' chic cho ku̱c' i Timote̱yo, re're' xc'ulic rik'or keh i holohic laj ribiral chiri̱j nic' wach ricowil ac'ux tak chipam rinimjic i kAja̱w Jesus, je' wo' chiri̱j i c'axoj i̱b c'ul na'n tak chawibil awi̱b tak. Je' wo' chic, re're' xik'or wo' keh chi re' hat-tak xa eli̱c wo' kojc'ulic cho pan ac'ux tak ru'um chi k'e̱' ti' koj-awic'raj tak cho eh ru'um re're', re' hat-tak xa nawa̱j wo' nak chic awilom tak kawach je' ricab wo' nka'n je hoj chawi̱j hat-tak.

Je' re' ajic was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, ru̱c' chi'nchel xik'or keh i kacha̱k' Timote̱yo chiri̱j animinic tak chi c'ahchi' achopom ac'ux tak chi manlic chiri̱j i kAja̱w Jesus, re' hoj to̱b ta wilic kac'axquilal pan kac'acharic, on wilic ti'c'axic chiki̱j ayu', k'e̱' naxsukbic kac'ux naxkabiraj chi'nchel re're'.

Ma' xa ta re're' xsukbic wi̱' kac'ux, nsukbic la' wo' kac'ux ru'um chi re' hat-tak xa cu choplic wo' ac'ux tak chiri̱j i kAja̱w Jesus eh ru'um re', re' hoj yu'na c'ahchi' kac'acharic chi ma'xta bih capewenic c'ahchi' ka'nam je chawi̱j tak.

Je' re' k'uru' wich niminel aj Tesalo̱nica, re' hoj k'e̱' nsukbic kac'ux awu'um aweh tak eh awu'um wo' aweh hat-tak ma' nkacana̱' ta johtok ritioxjic reh Dios chawi̱j hat-tak to̱b ta nchel ma' nic' ta ti nimal katioxonic chiwach ru'.

Je' re' nok chi k'i̱j chi ak'ab re' hoj ma' nkamay ta ripahkaljic johtok reh kAja̱w Dios chi nariyeb k'ab keh chi nakilom wo' chic awach tak reh chi je' re' nic' pa' chic nimal i no'jbal curman chaweh tak chi na̱cowjic tak wi̱' chipam animinic tak, re' hoj eno̱j kak'or aweh tak ar.

Je' wo' chic, chipam kati̱j nka'n johtok nkapahkaj chi re' ta wo' nak Ajabe̱s Dios ch'i̱l i kAja̱w Jesus re' wilque̱b chi kana̱ chi Ajabe̱s take, re' ta wo' nak take re' enquiyew k'ab keh eh equic'uhtunic keh ricorquil jaruj nponic chi quiwach chi nakojic awu̱c' tak.

Re' hoj nkapahkaj wo' chi re' ta nak i kAja̱w Dios to'bonok aweh tak chi nariwih'ic riman c'axoj i̱b chaxilac hat-tak aj niminel, je' wo' cu̱c' take toco̱m chic tinamit je' ricab nok re' hoj ti' tikic'raj tak je.

Je' wo', nkapahkaj johtok reh Dios chiyew ta nak ricowil awa̱mna tak chi coric chiri̱j i Jesus. Je' wo' nkapahkaj wo' johtok reh i Dios, chi sakbej ta wo' nak wach awa̱mna tak chi manlic. Re're' i pahkanic nka'n johtok reh Dios maj nka̱j chi nasoljok wo' chic cho i kAja̱w Jesus ch'i̱l take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios, re're' ma'xta bih jeno' mahc erirak chi wilca̱t tak wi̱' nachiban i ch'uk k'oric chana̱ tak.

Wich aj niminel, naxojwih'ic cho chaxilac tak re' hat-tak xatijej tak ku̱c' i hoj nic' wach i c'acharic ra̱j banaric reh chi ensukbic ric'ux i Dios. Ru'um aj wo' chi re' hoj c'amol abe̱h tak hoj pahbamaj ru'um i kAja̱w Jesus, yu'na nkapahkaj je ricuyuric aweh tak chi chatik tak ju' i c'acharic je' ricab xatijej tak ku̱c'. Re' tak'anic c'ahchi' ka'nam je aweh tak wili,
aweht'alim tak chic nic' wach rinimjic ra̱j. Je' re' nik'or maj nic' pa' wach take tijinic xiyew keh kAja̱w Jesus chi to'bal aweh tak, xkak'or aweh tak naxojwih'ic cho chaxilac tak.
Jenaj queh take c'uhtunic re're' rik'or chi re' Dios k'e̱' ra̱j chi xa sak ok chic wach ac'acharic tak eh ru'um re're', re' Dios ra̱j chi ma̱min awi̱b tak chi c'acharic pan c'oyomal.

Je' wo', re' Dios raj chi re' hat-tak re' wilic chic awehq'ue̱n tak, chac'ax awi̱b tak chi xa ru̱c' wo' awehq'ue̱n na̱c'acharic tak maj je' re' riwi̱' i c'acharic tz'iro̱j wach rilow i Dios eh k'e̱' wo' holonquilal nc'uhtunic lok chi quiwach c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al.

Chi nik'orom chic re're', je' wo' nik'or aweh tak chi ma' tic'acharic tak chic je' ricab riwi̱' c'acharic nca'n take awich ti'jolal tak re' ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' ma' quibirinic ta k'oric chiwach i Dios. Re' take re' xa hab pa' wach ixok no̱j quimin wi̱' qui̱b ru'um i c'ahbilal wilic cho pan ca̱mna.

Raj la' chaxilac hat-tak ma' ok je' re' no'jbal ena'n tak maj xkak'or chic aweh tak chi re' Dios nariyeb cho ti'c'axic tojbal wach rimahc i hab wach riban i c'oyomal. Ru'um aj re' nkak'or aweh tak i wili: Ma' hab wach aweh tak rimak' rehq'ue̱n jeno' chic c'acharel maj ru̱c' re're', ma' xa re' ta c'ahchi' relk'am i ras richa̱k' je' la' wo' c'ahchi' rimahcanic chiwach i ras richa̱k' re're'.

Chaj wa'ric nankak'or je aweh tak re're'? Nkak'or aweh tak ru'um chi re' kAja̱w Dios ma' xojriyuk'ej ta ru̱c' chi nakac'acharic chipam i yibel wach no'jbal, xojriyuk'ej la' cho chi nakac'acharic pan jenaj tz'iro̱j wach c'acharic.

Til aj tic'acharok tak k'uru' je' ricab ra̱j i Dios eh ma̱k'eb lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak i k'oro̱j chic aweh tak maj hab wach re' ma' ra̱j ta ric'amam na̱ i k'oro̱j, ma' xa ta chiwach i winak c'ahchi' rik'ehtam ri̱b til la' wo' c'ahchi' rik'ehtam ri̱b chiwach i Dios re' xye'bic cho reh Lok' laj rUxlabal chi naricholic c'acharic pan holonquilal.

Re' tijinic chiri̱j i c'axoj i̱b cu̱c' take awas acha̱k' tak, re're' jenaj chic k'oric xka'n naxojwih'ic cho chaxilac tak xa re' la' yu'na re' k'oric re're' ma' curman ta chi cu ewo' chic nitz'ihmbaj je aweh tak maj re' hat-tak xa c'ahchi' wo' abanam tak i no'jbal re're' ru'um chi xarak tak chic chiri̱j chi manlic haj wilic rik'or i Dios.

Re' no'jbal c'ahchi'ca̱t tak re're', re' wo' re' c'ahchi' abanam tak cu̱c' take chi'nchel c'acharel wilque̱b chi junsut riyuk'ul i Masero̱nya. Haj ti cok wilic i pahkanic nanibanam aweh tak yu'na chipam i hu̱j wili, re' chi ma̱cana̱' tak ric'axaric awi̱b tak, riman la' ok chic chacowej ac'ux tak chi ribanaric re're' cu̱c' take awich aj niminel tak.

Je' wo', nipahkaj je aweh tak chipam take k'i̱j wili re' c'ahchi' awuy'em tak wi̱' risoljic cho i kAja̱w Jesus, chacowej ac'ux tak chi c'acharic pan sukquil c'uxlis. Re' cok ru' ru'um chi til c'ahchi' awuy'em tak risoljic cho i Jesus ma' ru'um ta re' enamay tak pa' bih alahtz'il tak wilic eli̱c i k'i̱j, cha'n la' tak je' ricab xkak'or cho aweh tak naxojwih'ic cho chaxilac tak. Je' re' nik'or maj re' hoj xkak'or cho aweh tak chi na̱camanic tak eh na̱cholic wo' tak risiq'uiric ri̱j nic' wach ribehsjic ac'a̱y na̱banam tak.

Je' re' cha'n tak k'uru' maj ru̱c' re' nariwih'ic ribiral chi quixilac take c'acharel ja' quiniminic ta reh i Dios chi tichol tak c'acharic chi coric. Je' wo' chic, ru̱c' acamaj na̱banam tak ena'n tak canar atz'a̱k eh chi je' re' enwih'ic pa' bih aweh tak.

Chi k'oro̱j chic lok aweh tak take no'jbal re're', yu'na k'uru' wich aj niminel nanik'oric je awu̱c' tak chiri̱j risoljic wo' chic cho i kAja̱w Jesus. Je' re' nanibanam ru'um nok til nwa̱j chi na̱rakam tak chiri̱j chaj bih naric'uluric cu̱c' take kich aj niminel camnak chic take. Re' nwa̱j chawi̱j tak ru̱c' take k'oric re're', re' chi ma̱cansaj awi̱b tak ru'um ti'quil c'uxlis chiri̱j jeno' queh aj niminel nquimic je je' ricab nca'n take ma'xta jeno' cuyu'nbal chi narucsjic wo' chic cho i hab wach queh nquimic je.

Je' re' k'uru' je' wo' wili nik'or je aweh tak chiri̱j risoljic cho i Jesus: Re' hoj aj niminel til nkacoj wach chi je' ricab naxuctic wo' cho Jesus chi quixilac take camnak naxquimic je, je' wo' re' nachucsaj cho Dios take kich aj niminel camnak chic je take. Re're' naric'uluric nac'olok wo' chic lok i Jesus chiri̱j chi re' Dios ribanam chic cho tak'anic chi naric'amam johtok pan taxa̱j take aj niminel.

Ru'um aj re', re' hoj nkak'or wo' aweh tak i k'oric wili re' k'oro̱j wo' cho ru'um i kAja̱w Jesus: Re' hoj aj niminel, re' cu c'achalco̱j nac'olok lok i Jesus rica'pech, ma'xta pe ti kojic chiri̱j i kAja̱w Jesus chi re' take kich aj niminel camnak take je, c'ahchi' ta nak quicahnic pan muk'unbal. Re' la' take re' pe̱t nacuctic cho reh chi jenaj wach ojic naka'nam johtok chiri̱j i kAja̱w Jesus.

Nic' wach nac'ulurok re're'? Je' wili riwi̱' nac'ulurok ru': Re' kAja̱w Jesus til re' wo' re' naric'ulic cho pan taxa̱j. Chiri̱j aj re', re' Dios nariyeb i tak'anic reh c'amol quibe̱h take raj tz'e' wa̱ch ar pan taxa̱j chi naquisubem pa̱m quisu̱b k'o'rbal queh take aj niminel camnak chic take, reh chi nacuctic cho chi junpech.

Chiri̱j chic cuctic cho take aj niminel camnak chic je take, re' take re're' kich'i̱l hoj aj niminel re' cu c'achalco̱j pe chipam take k'i̱j re're' nakac'amaric johtok juntar su̱tz' reh chi ar pan te̱w nakojic kac'ulum ki̱b ru̱c' i kAja̱w Jesus. Ru'um aj chi re' hoj chi'nchel aj niminel nakojic c'acharok ar pan taxa̱j ru̱c' kAja̱w Jesus chi junelic,

til nik'or aweh tak chi ma' nti'bic ac'ux tak chiqui̱j take aj niminel camnak chic je take. Re' aj take k'oric nik'or je wili, camanok aweh tak chi ricowsjic ac'ux tak na'ilmijok wach i hu̱j wili chaxilac tak.

Je' re' k'uru' hat-tak wich aj niminel, re' hin nik'orom chic cho aweh tak naxinwih'ic cho chaxilac tak chi nac'olok wo' chic lok i kAja̱w Jesus, nariwih'ic jenaj nimal c'axquilal. Ru'um aj re' ma' curman ta chic chi enitz'ihmbaj je aweh tak chaj bih take naric'uluric nachirak cho rik'ijil ric'ulic i kAja̱w Jesus.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chic chi coric chi re' k'i̱j nok re' Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus nachiyew cho ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take ma' re' ta aj niminel, ma' eht'alamaj ta nac'olok lok. Chi je' aj re' riwi̱' ric'ulic cho k'i̱j re're', re' take tinamit ma' re' ta aj niminel take naquic'ulum queh je' ricab nc'uluric chipam jeno' pa̱t chi ma' hab ta wach neht'alanic reh ric'ulic lok jeno' aj lek' pan chak'ab.

Je' re' k'uru' nok re' take tinamit ma' re' ta aj niminel take nacoquic chi rik'ormojic chi xa pan sukquil c'uxlis chic wilque̱b wi̱', cu re' chic queh ru' narichalic chi quina̱ i rinimal ti'c'axic eh ma' hab ta wach jeno' queh eniq'uic i ti'c'axic re're' china̱ je' ricab jeno' yowa̱b ixok ma' iq'ue̱l ta china̱ i ric'axquilal nanchalic riti'quil nanc'ulic ric'ux.

Je' aj re' ru' naric'uluric cu̱c' take tinamit re're', ru'um chi re' quicapew-bal pan k'ekom wilic eh je' wo' ru'um chi xa ta nak xquirak chiri̱j chi chalic reh jenaj k'i̱j re' nariye'eric cho wi̱' ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take ma' re' ta aj niminel take. Raj i hat-tak wich aj niminel ma' re' ta chic pan k'ekom wilic acapew-bal tak eh ru'um re' ma' eta ticahnic tak pan sachbal c'uxlis nac'olok lok i k'i̱j re're' je' ricab nquic'ul take aj ehcham pa̱t chi nansahchic quic'ux noquic aj lek' pan quipa̱t.

Chaj bih riwi̱' nanik'or chi je' re're'? Je' re' nik'or je aweh tak maj re' hat-tak sakomomaj chic pa̱m ano'jbal tak chiri̱j ric'ulic lok i k'i̱j re're'. Ru'um aj chi re' ano'jbal hat-tak ma' re' ta chic pan k'ekom wilic, sakom chic wach tibanic tak eh ma' c'ahbil ta chic tibanic tak je' ricab nca'n take nquisic' i k'ekom chi ribanaric i c'ahbilal.

Je' re' k'uru' wich aj niminel, ru'um chi sakomomaj chic wach aweh tak chi chalic reh i k'i̱j re' nariye'eric wi̱' ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take ma' re' ta aj niminel, ma' nsahchic acapew-bal tak chi ruyu'njic ric'ulic lok i k'i̱j re're'. Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi ka'n tak je' ricab nca'n take ma' quiwiric ta chi richa'jaljic quipa̱t eh ma' nka'n tak je' ricab nca'n take nkajic quiwiric nok c'ahchi'que̱b chi cha'janic.
Je' wo', ma' nka'n je' ricab nca'n take re' ncamanic queh chak'ab xa reh wiric, on xa reh xohc'sonic i̱b maj re' take re' xa je' re' nquic'saj wi̱' chak'ab.

Re' hoj k'uru' re' sakom wach kojbanic, ma' nka'n je' ricab nca'n take nkajic quiwiric nok c'ahchi' que̱b chi cha'janic, xa uyunic la' ok wo' riban kacapew-bal chiri̱j i k'i̱j k'oro̱j lok re're' maj xa chi je' re' nakawih'ic chi tikilco̱j ru̱c' ric'ulic lok i k'i̱j re're' je' ricab ritik'a̱' ri̱b jeno' sol naricoj i ch'ihch' laj tz'ih chi' ric'ux co'lbal reh riti'jolal, on je' ricab naricoj ripune̱t ch'ihch' chi co'lbal reh rina̱. Je' re' k'uru' wi ch'iclic chic kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus, je' wo' re' katik tak ju' ric'axaric take kas kacha̱k' eh chi katik wo' ju' ruyu'njic chi ch'iclic kac'ux i kaco'lbal nariyeb keh Jesus maj wi je' re' nka'n ra̱j rik'orom chi re' hoj tikilco̱j chic ru̱c' ric'ulic lok i k'i̱j re're'.

Ma' xa re' ta re', je' la' wo' ma' eta chic kojyo'jic chiwach i k'i̱j re're' maj keht'alim chic chi re' Dios xitik'a̱' wach chi ma' re' ta hoj nakac'ulbic reh i ti'c'axic naritak'a̱b cho ru'um reh rijosk'il china̱ quimahc take aj mahc. Chiri̱j chic lok re're', re' hoj keht'alim chic chi re' Dios xitik'a̱' wach chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, xco'lonic keh chiwach i ti'c'axic re're'.

Re' Jesus re're', re' wo' re' xquimic chi katobjic i hoj reh chi enwih'ic junelic kac'acharic ru̱c'. Ru'um aj reh katobjic re're', re' hoj ma'xta bih enkojcapewenic wi̱' chiri̱j risoljic cho kAja̱w Jesus to̱b ta ekojc'ulic rirak chi hoj chic camnak on chi cu c'achalco̱j. Je' re' nik'or maj keht'alim chic chi xa pa' narojic wih'ok i Jesus ar wo' nakawih'ic i hoj chi junelic.
Je' re' k'uru' ru'um chi keht'alim re're', nkak'or aweh tak chi chayew tak ricowil ac'ux chawibil awi̱b tak eh c'ul ok wo' chato'bej awi̱b tak je' ricab c'ahchi'ca̱t tak cu yu'na chi k'i̱j.

Je' wo' chic yu'na was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, til nka̱j kapahkam aweh tak jenaj ato'bil chiqui̱j take raj camanom i kAja̱w Jesus wilque̱b chaxilac tak re' xipahbabjic wo' ru'um i Jesus chi ric'amaric abe̱h tak, je' wo' chi ricojoric ano'jbal tak. Til aj nkapahkaj ato'bil aweh tak chi chalok'mej tak quiwach take aj camanom re're'.

Ma' xa re' ta na̱lok'mem tak quiwach, je' la' wo' nac'axam tak take ru̱c' sukquil ac'ux tak. Je' re' nipahkaj je aweh tak ru'um nok re' take aj camanom re're' nquiyew quic'ux chi atobjic tak. Chi k'oro̱j aj chic lok re're', nka̱j wo' kapahkam aweh tak chi tiwih'ok tak pan sukquil c'uxlis chawibil awi̱b tak.

Je' wo' chic, nkapahkaj wo' je aweh tak chi chak'il tak take xa k'eboj k'i̱j nca'n, chayew tak quino'jbal chi coric eh re' take nyoj quic'ux chi niminic chayew wo' tak ricowil quic'ux. Je' wo', chato'bej tak take ma' cow ta quic'ux pan niminic, re' cok ru' wilic ok ak'unil tak chi ribanaric take k'ilo̱j na̱banam tak cu̱c' take awich aj niminel tak re're'.

Je' wo', chacoj tak rehtal ribanaric i capew-bal wili: Wi hab wach jeno' aweh tak xbanjic ti'c'axic reh ru'um jeno' chic c'acharel, ma' riban chic jelow-bal i ti'c'axic xbanaric reh. Ma' xa re' ta re' cha'n tak, je' la' wo' cow chayew ac'ux tak chi ritobjic awi̱b tak je' ricab wo' ena'n tak cu̱c' take ma' re' ta aj niminel.
Je' wo' chic, nkapahkaj aweh tak chi xa tiwi̱' wo' tak chi suk ac'ux tak,
xa c'ahchi' ok wo' ca̱t tak johtok chi ti̱j chiwach i Dios

eh xa c'ahchi' ok wo' atioxem tak johtok reh i Dios chi'nchel nic' pa' nimal riban cho awu̱c' tak. Je' re' cha'n tak maj re're' til ra̱j i Dios chi naka'nam i hoj aj niminel nakojpahkanic johtok ru̱c'. Je' wo' chic, nkapahkaj chi na̱banam tak chi je' re' ru'um nok je' wo' re' xkabiraj chi xiban i kAja̱w Jesus.

Re' chic yu'na nipahkaj aweh tak chi ma̱ban tak ru̱c' i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios je' ricab na'n ru̱c' i k'a̱k' nanachup tak. Je' re' nik'or maj wi re' hat-tak xa eli̱c wo' nak'ihtaj awi̱b tak chiwach, ta chic riwih'ic awajawric tak re' ye'o̱j aweh tak ru'um.

Ru'um aj re' nok jeno' c'acharel rik'or chi re' take c'uhbal c'ahchi' rik'orom ar ru̱c' i Dios nchalic, nkapahkaj aweh tak chi ma̱k'ohraj pe tak ti chi ma' je' ta re' xa ru'um ti ru' chi je' re' nchalic pan acapew-bal tak.

Re' la' cha'n tak, chasic' tak ri̱j chi coric take c'uhbal erik'or aweh tak, ilbal reh wi til coric chi ar ru̱c' i Dios nchalic take k'oric re're'. Wi til coric aj i c'ahchi' rik'orom, chac'ul tak eh chac'am wo' tak na̱.
Tz'a̱b ru' wi ma' coric i rik'or, chak'eb tak lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak chi junpech i pa' jaric ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal wilic chipam take c'uhbalanic riban i c'acharel re're'.

Chiri̱j chic take pahkanic xniban je aweh tak, re' wili niti̱j niban je chawi̱j tak: Re' ta nak i Dios re' ye'ol sukquil kac'ux i hoj aj niminel, chic'ol ta nak ac'acharic tak chiwach i mahc cu rehtal riban chi chi'nchel ac'acharic, re' acapew-bal, re' awa̱mna ch'i̱l ati'jolal abakil tak, xa tz'iro̱j ta nak chic wach chiwach. Je' re' ti̱j niban reh nok chi nac'olok wo' chic lok i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, ma'xta ok bih etik'ilmijic tak wi̱'.

Re' nipahkanic niban je chawi̱j tak re're', til ch'iclic nic'ux chi naribanaric awu̱c' tak ru'um nok re' Dios xsic'bic cho awach tak, coric wach rik'orbal chi ribanaric pa' bih take rik'orom je' wo' chi rimahsjic wach i camanic rip'utum cho awu̱c' tak.
Yu'na hat-tak was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, nka̱j kapahkam wo' jenaj ato'bil aweh tak chi eli̱c na̱banam ati̱j tak chiki̱j, je' ricab wo' chi re' hoj nka'n je kati̱j chawi̱j tak.

Je' wo', nka̱j kapahkam je aweh tak chi chayew tak risukquil quic'ux take toco̱m chic kich aj niminel nquimol wo' qui̱b awu̱c' tak ar. Ru̱c' ric'alenjic awi̱b ena'n tak chawibil awi̱b tak, chac'uhtaj wo' tak i c'axoj i̱b wilic chawibil awi̱b tak.

Je' aj re' nipahkaj je aweh tak eh til wo' chic nipahkaj aweh tak chi re' hu̱j c'ahchi' nitak'a̱b je aweh tak wili chawilow tak wach chi quiwach chi'nchel i kich aj niminel nquimol qui̱b chi niminic ar Tesalo̱nica. Ru̱c' i pahkanic niban je aweh tak wili, chana̱ chic hat-tak wilic i ihk chiwach i kAja̱w Jesus chi ribanaric re're'.
K'oro̱j chic chi'nchel re're', yu'na niban niti̱j chi re' ta Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chiyew cho rato'bil chana̱ tak. Je' re' nwa̱j chi chiban cho awu̱c' tak.

Re' hin ma' Lu̱' chi c'ahchi'qui̱n quihch'ilem i ma' Si̱las ch'i̱l i Timote̱yo, c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je hu̱j wili aweh hat-tak comonil aj niminel aj Tesalo̱nica re' choplic ac'ux tak ru̱c' Ajabe̱s Dios je' wo' chiri̱j i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Nok c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je hu̱j wili, je' wili c'alenenic niban je aweh tak: Re' ta nak ato'bil ch'i̱l wo' i sukquil c'uxlis riyew cho kAja̱w Dios ch'i̱l i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' ta nak re' wih'ok pan ac'acharic tak.

Hat-tak wich aj niminel, chi wi̱n hin ch'i̱l take wich'i̱l xa tanlic wo' chi keh chi xa nakatioxonic wo' johtok chiwach i Dios pan kati̱j. Ru'um aj re' kojtioxonic chawi̱j tak maj xa eli̱c wo' c'ahchi' ricowjic ac'ux tak chipam i lok' laj niminic eh xa eli̱c wo' c'ahchi' ac'axam awi̱b hat-tak aj niminel je' ricab wo' na'n tak cu̱c' take toco̱m chic.

Ru'um aj take nic' wach ric'uluric i ti'c'axic na'n tak ch'i̱l wo' i nic' wach nxowjic awach tak ru'um reh niminic c'ahchi'ca̱t tak, re' hoj nakojk'oric cu̱c' take ju'jun ch'uk chi moloj wach aj niminel reh Dios, nkak'or queh chi re' hoj keht'alim chi tare̱t i kacamaj xka'n chaxilac tak ru'um nok re' hat-tak cow c'ahchi' ach'ica̱b ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus.

Ru̱c' ano'jbal tak re're', enac'uhtaj tak lok chi re' ricapew-bal i Dios xa coric wo' wach chaweh tak nachik'or chawi̱j tak chi je' wili: «Re' take aj niminel wili, til ric'ul chi queh chi re' hin Dios wilqui̱n chi k'atal k'oric chi quina̱. Re' take re' xquicoj qui̱b chi ri'sil wo̱k nik'ab chi nanik'atbic k'oric chi quina̱ eh ru'um re' xbanjic ti'c'axic queh, nqui narik'orom i Dios.
Je' re' ajic re' ricapew-bal i Dios xa coric wo' wach eh ru'um aj re' ric'ul wo' chi reh chi nariyeb wo' ti'c'axic tojbal wach quimahc take nic' pa' nimal quibanic ti'c'axic aweh tak.

Je' wo', riwi̱' wo' chi reh chi naribanam chi re' hat-tak re' ixowomaj awach tak eh bano̱j wo' ti'c'axic aweh tak, ma' eta chic nbanjic ti'c'axic aweh tak ru'um animinic tak. Re're' naribanam i Dios chiki̱j chi'nchel i hoj aj niminel chipam i k'i̱j nac'olok lok i kAja̱w Jesus pan taxa̱j chi ihch'ilimaj cho cu'um take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios wilque̱b wo' ar pan taxa̱j. Chipam i k'i̱j re're', re' narilmijic wi̱' rinimal rajawric i kAja̱w Jesus

eh re' naric'uhtunic wo' wi̱' rinimal rilok'il re' naribanam chi xa je' chic ricab i xak k'a̱k' xa ntenic chic, re' Jesus nariyeb rik'ormojic chi nariye'eric cho ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take ma' xquinimej ta Dios eh ma' wo' xquicoj ta wach i lok' laj c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j ru'.

Chi je' aj re', chi'nchel take c'acharel re're' naquic'ulum rinimal ti'c'axic nariye'eric cho chi quina̱ chi junelic chi tojbal wach quimahc. Ma' xa re' ta re', re' take re' ma'xta la' wo' quiwih'ic cok chiwach i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus naquiwih'ok chiwach take naquilok'onic wach i Dios ru'um reh rinimal i rajawric wilic.

Chipam i k'i̱j re're', re' naric'ulic wo' lok wi̱' i Jesus, re' take xca'n chic chi ritinami̱t ru̱c' rinimjic i k'oro̱j queh chiri̱j ru', naquiyeb rilok'il chi xa sahchanak chic quic'ux ru'um reh rinimal rajawric naquilom eh chi quixilac take re', na̱wih'ic wo' hat-tak maj xanimej tak chaj bih xkak'or aweh tak chiri̱j i Jesus.

Ru'um chi je' re' naric'uluric chipam i k'i̱j re're', re' hoj xa eli̱c wo' c'ahchi' ka'nam johtok kati̱j chawi̱j tak chi ripahkaljic johtok reh Dios chi je' ta nak wili chik'or chawi̱j tak: «Re' take aj niminel re're', ric'ul chi queh chi xniyuk'ej take chi naquiwih'ic chi quixilac take c'ahchi'qui̱n quilok'em, nqui ta nak erik'or chawi̱j tak. Je' wo' chic, nkapahkaj reh Dios chi ru̱c' i rajawric riyew cho aweh tak, ena'n tak i c'axo̱j nawa̱j tak ribanaric yu'na chi c'ahchi' ach'ica̱b ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus.

Re' riwi̱' chi je' re' pahkanic nka'n pan kati̱j, re' chi ru̱c' i c'axoj i̱b na̱banam tak, eta nak nye'eric rilok'il i kAja̱w Jesus. Ru'um chi hat-tak chic aj niminel reh Jesus, re're' nariyeb wo' alok'il tak eh je' re' naric'uluric awu̱c' tak ru'um nok wilic chana̱ tak richak'lamil i kAja̱w Dios ch'i̱l wo' richak'lamil i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Yu'na hat-tak wich aj niminel, re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chic chi re' Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, naric'ulic lok eh je' wo' chi re' Dios naribanam chi nakamolom wo' chic ki̱b rich'i̱l i Jesus. Ru'um aj re' til nkak'or aweh tak

chi ma' chi bih najot' wi̱' acapew-bal tak eh wi xponic nchel pan axiquin tak chi re' k'i̱j nok re' Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus naric'ulic lok xponic chic wach, ma̱yo'saj wo' awi̱b tak. To̱b ta nchel wilic ta nak jeno' hab wach c'ahchi' rik'orom chi re' Lok' laj Uxlabal xik'or reh chi re' ric'ulic lok i kAja̱w Jesus xponic chic rik'ijil, on chi re' hoj xkak'or re're' naxojwih'ic cho chaxilac tak, on chi je' re' k'oric tz'ihmbimaj ku'um pan jeno' hu̱j,

ma̱cana̱' awi̱b tak chi etijot'oric tak ru̱c' xa pa' jaric take k'oric c'ahchi' rik'orom aweh tak. Je' re' nik'or maj chi cu ja' nc'ulic ta lok i kAja̱w Jesus, curman chi naric'uluric take wili: Pe̱t nariwih'ic jenaj rik'ijil chi yohbal wach take c'acharel ma'xta chic cajwam birinic k'oric chiwach i Dios eh chi je' re' naquik'ihtam wo' qui̱b chiwach riC'uhbal. Re' aj re' naric'uluric chipam take k'i̱j na'uctok wo' cho jenaj c'acharel nahsil banol reh c'ahbilal re' narik'etbic wach i k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios. Ru'um chi je' re' riban, re' c'acharel re're' ye'o̱j chic cho chiri̱j ru'um i Dios chi naric'ulum i rinimal ti'c'axic

maj re' c'acharel re're' naructic chi rik'ormojic chi k'e̱' wo' rinimal rilok'il chiwach rilok'il i Dios, on chiwach rilok'il take tz'akoj tiyo̱x lok'omaj wach cu'um toco̱m chic c'acharel. Ma' xa re' ta re' riwi̱' chi naric'ulum ti'c'axic, je' la' wo' ru'um chi nok tz'uklic chic chipam i ye'a̱b wilic chipam i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, re' c'acharel re're' ma' xa re' ta naricojom ri̱b chi quijelow-bal take pa reh chic tiyo̱x nquilok'ej wach take c'acharel je' la' wo' naritz'akam wo' ri̱b chi re're' til Dios. Ar aj ru', re're' ma' xa ta naritak'a̱b rik'ormojic chi ma'xta chic riye'eric quilok'il take tiyo̱x lok'omaj cu'um take c'acharel, je' la' wo' naritak'a̱b wo' rik'ormojic chi ma'xta chic riye'eric rilok'il Dios.
Re' chi'nchel xnik'or lok re're', re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chic maj xnik'or chic cho aweh tak naxinwih'ic cho chaxilac tak.

Ru'um aj re' nicapaj i hin chi re' hat-tak yu'na aweht'alim wo' tak hab wach i c'ahchi' ripitbic cho reh c'acharel nahsil banol reh c'ahbilal re're' chi naric'uhtam lok ri̱b ru̱c' rino'jbal. Je' wo', aweht'alim tak chi re' c'acharel re're' naric'uhtam lok ri̱b cu rehtal nachik'or cho Dios chi xponic chic rik'ijil chi je' re' naric'uluric.

Yu'na re' c'ahbilal xa pan c'olic c'ahchi' ribanam i c'acharel re're' eh je' re' c'ahchi' ribanam ru'um chi yu'na wilic jenaj c'ahchi' ripitbic reh ric'uhtjic cho ri̱b. Je' re' naritikim ju' cu rehtal nesmejic lok pa ribe̱h re' nk'etbic reh

maj na'esmejok lok i haj wilic nk'etbic pa ribe̱h i c'acharel nahsil banol reh c'ahbilal re're', cu re' aj ru' naric'uhtam lok ri̱b chi coric, xa re' la' ru' re' kAja̱w Jesus nac'olok wo' chic lok eh nachic'uhtaj rinimal wach risakomil rilok'il, naric'ulic risacham wach nic' pa' nimal ricamaj i winak re're'. Ma' xa re' ta re' naribanam, je' la' wo' je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak ricojom jeno' mache̱t chi cansbal, re' Jesus ru̱c' richi̱' narik'orom chi naricansjic i c'acharel nahsil banol reh c'ahbilal re're'.

Re' c'acharel re're', ru'um chi ritak'anic cho aj Yahm k'e̱' rinimal wach rajawric nariwih'ic chi k'e̱' wo' chic q'uihal take tinamit naquijot'oric ru̱c' take chucuj laj nawa̱l ch'i̱l take chucuj laj rehtalil naric'uhtam.

Je' wo' chic, re' c'acharel re're' ru̱c' take jot'o̱j naribanam, naribanam wo' chi yohbal wach c'ahbilal naca'nam take q'uihal tinamit naquicojbic wach. Ru'um aj re', re' take c'acharel narisacharic quiwach. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' ma' xca̱j ta wo' quic'ulum ru̱c' chi'nchel i ca̱mna i coric laj k'oric rik'or i Jesus eh ma' xquic'ul ta wo' i c'axbal riyew chi quico'ljic chiwach i ti'c'axic.

Je' re' nok ru'um reh quino'jbal take tinamit re're', re' Dios nariyeb k'ab chi jenaj chic ma' tob laj uxlabal k'e̱' nimal rajawric narichalic chi jot'o̱l quicapew-bal take c'acharel re' naribanam chi q'uihal take tinamit re're' nacoquic chi ricojoric wach take chucuj laj c'uhbal nquibiraj.

Je' wo' chic, re' Dios narich'ukum k'oric chi quina̱ take tinamit re're'. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' ma' xquicoj ta wach i coric laj k'oric rik'or i Jesus re' la' chic k'e̱' suk xquilow ribanaric i mahc.

Je' re' k'uru' hat-tak wich tak aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiric'raj tak i kAja̱w Jesus, re' hin ch'i̱l take wich aj niminel re' quinquihch'ilej xa eli̱c wo' kojtioxonic johtok ru̱c' i Dios nanka'n kati̱j chawi̱j tak maj nok ja' np'uhtic ta cho c'acharic ayu' wach ac'al, re' Dios xatrichih tak chic cho chi na̱co'ljic tak chiwach i ti'c'axic nariye'eric chi quina̱ take aj mahc. Re' aj re' riwi̱' chi re're' xiban wo' chi pe̱t xisakbej wach awa̱mna tak ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal nok ach'ica̱b chic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus re' aj k'orol reh coric laj c'uhbal.

Je' re' ajic naxatrichih tak cho i Dios ma' xa re' ta chi xatriyuk'ej tak chi na̱co'ljic tak chiwach i ti'c'axic je' la' wo' reh chi ar pan taxa̱j nariwih'ic rinimal alok'il tak je' ricab rilok'il i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Re' yuk'unic re're' xac'ul tak xa re' nok re' hoj raj k'orol i Dios xkak'or aweh tak ribiral i Jesus.

Ru'um aj re' hat-tak wich aj niminel, ru'um nok xatyuk'unjic tak reh chi xatco'ljic tak, re' aj re' riban chi nipahkaj aweh tak yu'na chi chatik tak ju' richoporic ac'ux tak chi cow chiri̱j take c'uhtunic re' xabiraj tak ku̱c' on xatijej tak ru̱c' riliric wach i pe̱t hu̱j xkatak'a̱' je aweh tak.

Nok k'oro̱j chic lok re're', yu'na nanibanam johtok niti̱j chawi̱j tak chiwach kAja̱w Dios ch'i̱l i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, chi weht'alim chi quicabchelal take re' xa eli̱c wo' kojquic'ax cho eh xa eli̱c wo' nquic'uhtaj cho quichak'lamil keh. Ru'um aj re're' hoj ma' xa re' ta ncowjic kac'ux chi ric'amaric na̱ i niminic wilco̱j wi̱' je' la' wo' eli̱c nkatik ju' rich'iquinjic kac'ux chiqui̱j take re'.

Chiwach aj kAja̱w Jesus je' wo' chiwach Ajabe̱s Dios niban niti̱j. Je' wo' nipahkaj queh chi quicowsaj ac'ux tak reh chi na̱tikim tak ju' ribanaric i holohic laj c'acharic eh je' wo' chi na̱tikim tak ju' rik'ormojic holohic laj k'oric.

Chiri̱j chic ribanaric niti̱j re're', yu'na hat-tak wich aj niminel nwa̱j nipahkam aweh tak chi nana'n ati̱j tak chiri̱j kacamaj chi aj k'orol reh rik'orbal i Dios, chapahkaj tak johtok reh Dios chi re' rik'orbal eno̱j lok rik'ormojic chi ma' hab ta wach enk'etbic wach. Chi je' re', re' take c'acharel equibirinic reh eta nak nquic'ul chi lo̱k' eh ewo' nquinimej je' ricab xa'n hat-tak.

Je' wo' chic nacha'n ati̱j tak chiki̱j, chapahkaj wo' tak johtok reh Dios chi ekojco'ljic chi quiwach take winak yibel quiwach eh ma' holohic ta quino'jbal. Je' re' chapahkaj tak johtok reh maj china̱ ac'al wili wilic take c'acharel c'ahbil quino'jbal. Je' re' nik'or ru'um nok ma' chi'nchel ta suk nquibiraj chi naquich'ica̱b quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus.

Re' cok ru', chiwach i yibel wach no'jbal nchalic cu̱c' take c'acharel re're', ma' tiyo'jic tak maj re' rik'orom cho Dios chi naca̱t tak rico'lem chiwach i no'jbal re're' eh je' wo' chi nariyeb awansil tak reh chi encowjic ac'ux tak chipam i niminic, re're' til naribanam wo' chi narimanlajic wach.

Ru'um aj re', re' hoj til ch'iclic wo' kac'ux chi re' kak'orom aweh tak, re' na̱c'amam wo' tak na̱ cu yu'na chi k'i̱j re' hat-tak na̱tikim wo' tak ju' ric'amaric na̱ maj re' kAja̱w Dios nto'bonic aweh tak.

Je' re' k'uru' re' hin nipahkaj chi re' ta nak i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, eric'uyu'saj awa̱mna tak chi enatik tak ju' i no'jbal chi ti' enawic'raj tak i Dios eh je' wo', chiyew ta nak cho awansil tak chi ricuyuric take ti'c'axic nac'ul tak je' ricab nok re' Jesus xicuy ransil nic' nimal take ti'c'axic xic'ul.

Chi je' aj re' k'uru' wich aj niminel, chi ye'o̱j kajawric chi tak'anic chana̱ tak ru'um Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' hin nipahkaj aweh tak rinimjic i k'oric wili: Re' hat-tak ma̱junehtej awi̱b tak cu̱c' take aj niminel c'ahchi' que̱b chi c'acharic pan siquilal eh ma' c'ahchi' ta quic'amam na̱ i c'uhbal kak'orom cho aweh tak chiri̱j camanic.

Re' riwi̱' chi c'ahchi' nipahkam je aweh tak rinimjic re're', re' chi re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chic chi curman chi nakacamanic tak. Chaj aj bih no'jbal xawilow tak ku̱c' hoj k'uru'? Re' hat-tak xawilow tak chi naxojwih'ic awu̱c' tak, til kat'ul kawach chi camanic eh ma'xta bih xkasiquilej wach.

Je' wo', xawilow tak chi ma' hab ta wach aweh tak xkach'i'taj ru̱c' kawa' kaha̱' re' la' hoj xoj-johtic ak'ab on cu wahk'ek wo' ti xoj-uctic chi camanic sic'bal ritz'akil pa' bih keh reh chi je' re' ma' xcahnic ta jeno' ihk chana̱ tak chi kilmijic i hoj.

Re' nak til ric'ul chi keh chi xka'n, re' chi xkapahkaj nak kato'bal aweh tak ru'um chi c'ahchi' kacamanic chaxilac tak xa re' la' ma' je' ta re' xka'n ru'um nok ru̱c' kano'jbal chi camanic xka̱j kac'uhtam aweh tak chi je' wo' re' na̱banam hat-tak.

Ma' xa re' ta re' xka'n, xkak'or la' aweh tak chi na̱nimem tak i no'jbal wili naxojwih'ic wo' cho chaxilac tak: «Ma' hab ta wach jeno' c'acharel tanlic chiri̱j chi eriyew riwa' riha̱' jeno' c'acharel ma' raj ta camanic, nqui xkak'or cho aweh tak.

Yu'na c'ahchi' wo' chic kaca'pechem je rik'ormojic aweh tak maj xc'ulic lok ribiral ku̱c' chi wilic take aj niminel chaxilac tak c'acharic nca'n pan siquilal eh xa chamo̱l toco̱m chic camanom nok wilque̱b.

Queh take jarub pa' take chi aj niminel je' re' nca'n chaxilac tak, nkapahkaj je queh wili je' ricab chi re' ta nak i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric c'ahchi' ripahkanic je queh: «Chacuy, ma' tiwih'ic tak chic pan siquilal ticamanok la' tak rakbal ritz'akil awa' aha̱' tak, nqui nkak'or je queh.

Re' hat-tak kich aj niminel re' c'ahchi' abanam tak i haj wilic tare̱t chi banaric, nkapahkaj wo' je aweh tak chi ma' nkajic ac'ux tak chi ribanaric i holohic laj no'jbal chi camanic xa ru'um nawilow tak chi wilic take c'acharel ma' nca̱j ta camanic.

Chi k'oro̱j chic lok re're', yu'na nik'or wo' chic aweh tak i wili: Wi wilic ok nchel jeno' hab wach ma' ra̱j ta rinimem take k'oric xkatak'a̱' rik'ormojic je aweh tak chipam i hu̱j wili, chak'or tak lok ribiral queh take toco̱m chic awich aj niminel tak reh chi naquina'bem wo' nic' wach rino'jbal aj niminel re're'. Ru̱c' rino'jbal aj niminel re're', nkapahkaj wo' je' aweh tak chi ma̱tuna̱' chic awi̱b tak ru̱c' cu rehtal rijal wach rino'jbal, reh chi je' re' nachic'raj ri̱b chi ma' holohic ta c'ahchi' ribanam, enoquic cho riq'uix'ic chawach tak.

Ru̱c' ripahkaljic aweh tak chi ma'xta chic atuna̱b awi̱b tak ru̱c' aj niminel re're', nkapahkaj wo' aweh tak ma̱ban tak chi ma' nawa̱j ta tak chic wach, chacoj la' tak rino'jbal chi coric je' ricab na'n tak queh awich aj niminel tak re' take sukquil awu̱c' tak.

Yu'na hat-tak wich aj niminel nkapahkaj johtok reh Dios chi re' ta nak i kAja̱w Jesus re' aj ye'ol reh sukquil c'uxlis xa chi chiyew ta wo' nak cho rinimal sukquil c'uxlis chana̱ tak reh chi ma'xta ok c'axquilal chana̱ tak. Je' wo', nkapahkaj johtok reh chi re' ta wo' i Jesus wih'ok pan ac'acharic chawunchelal tak.

Chiri̱j chic i kapahkanic re're', yu'na nik'or je aweh tak chi re' take k'oric re' nik'orom jok aweh tak wili chi riye'eric risukquil ac'ux tak, til re' hin ma' Lu̱' c'ahchi' nitz'ihminic reh. Re' riwi̱' chi re' take cohlsbal wach nik'orbal pan tak ju'jun chi nihu̱j nitak'a̱' je, til hin quintz'ihminic je reh ru̱c' nah nik'ab, re' chi re' take aj niminel naquic'ul nihu̱j enquirak chiri̱j chi til hin wo' c'ahchi' nitak'anic je reh.

Je' aj re' k'uru', nicohlaj wach i hu̱j wili ru̱c' take k'oric wili: Re' ta nak i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chiyew cho rato'bil chana̱ tak. Je' re' nwa̱j chi chiban cho awu̱c' tak.

Re' c'ahchi' ritz'ihminic je reh hu̱j wili, re' hin ma' Lu̱'. Re' hin naxinpahbabjic chi aj k'orol ribiral i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, ar xchalic rik'ormojic ru̱c' i Dios re' aj co'lonel keh eh je' wo' ar xchalic rik'ormojic ru̱c' i Ajabe̱s Jesus re' nkarak wi̱' ch'iquinbal kac'ux.

Re' hin c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je hu̱j wili aweh hat Timote̱yo re' xa'n chi til je' hat wac'u̱n naxap'ut johtok jenaj chic ac' c'acharic ru̱c' rinimjic i c'uhbal xnik'or aweh chiri̱j i Jesus. Je' re' k'uru' Timote̱yo tinic'alenej je eh niban je niti̱j chawi̱j chiwach i kAja̱w Dios ch'i̱l i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi kana̱. Je' re' niban reh chi re' ta nak take re' enquiyew cho cato'bil chana̱, equic'axbic aweh eh equiye'bic wo' sukquil c'uxlis pan ac'acharic.

Nok q'uisi̱n nak chic ma' quino̱j ar Masero̱nya, re' hin xnik'or aweh chi na̱cahnic ar E̱peso. Je' wo', xnipahkaj wo' aweh chi na̱k'orom queh take aj chucul aj c'uhbalanel c'ahchi' quic'uhtunic reh take c'uhbal ma' c'uhtumaj ta ku'um hoj aj niminel reh Jesus chi naquimayam i c'uhtunic c'ahchi' ca'nam.

Je' wo' chiqui̱j take c'ahchi' quibirinic reh c'uhbal re're', xnipahkaj wo' aweh chi na̱k'orom queh chi quimay wo' ribirmijic take xa tik'imaj wach ribiral ch'i̱l take tusuj wach bihnal sic'bal ri̱j cu haj ntz'uhcric cho quija'quil take ma̱m ti't. Re' riwi̱' chi je' re' xnipahkaj aweh chi na̱banam re' chi ru'um take c'uhtunic c'ahchi' quibiram re're' nbanic chi nchalic wolonic i̱b chi quixilac take c'acharel quic'ulbic reh. Chi wi̱n hin, sak bih nak chi queh chi re' take c'acharel re're' ricowsjic ta nak quic'ux xca'n chiri̱j i Dios, ra̱j wili re' take c'uhtunic nca'n ma' riyew ta k'ab queh chi enca'n chi je' re'. Je' re' nik'or maj xa re' wo' wach wi xquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus encowjic quic'ux.

Je' wo', re' nwa̱j chiri̱j chi je' re' na̱banam reh chi re' take aj niminel enquic'ax qui̱b ru̱c' i c'axoj i̱b nwih'ic nok ma'xta nech' ok c'ahbilal pan ca̱mna, on nok suk wilic quicapew-bal ru'um nquic'raj chi ma'xta jeno' mahc ncojoric chiqui̱j ru'um i Dios, on nok ch'iclic quic'ux chi manlic chiri̱j ru'.

Re' take chucul laj aj c'uhbalanel re're' ma' je' ta chic re' riwi̱' i c'axoj i̱b nca'n. Ru'um chi sahchanak chic quino'jbal xa c'ahchi' wo' que̱b chi c'uhbalanic re' ma'xta bih to'bonic riban queh c'acharel.
Je' wo' chic, xa k'e̱' chic nca'n qui̱b ru̱c' ric'uhtjic i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xa re' la' ma' nquirak ta wo' chiri̱j i c'uhbal re're' nanca'n ric'uhtjic.

Tz'a̱b i hoj aj niminel reh Jesus til nkarak chiri̱j chi coric i c'uhbal re're' eh ru'um re' nkak'or chi re' take tijbal wilque̱b chipam til tare̱t take xa re' la' curman chi enc'amaric na̱ chi coric.

Reh chi je' re' enbanjic, curman chi nareht'aljic i wili: Re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ma' xcanabjic ta cahnok cu'um ta nak queh i coric wach quibanic, xcanabjic la' cahnok chi ch'ukbal k'oric chi quina̱ take nquik'ihtaj qui̱b ch'i̱l take ma' nquibiraj ta k'oric chiwach i c'uhbal re're'. Je' wo' chic chi quixilac take re' wilque̱b wo' take je' wili quino'jbal: Re' take re' ma' coric ta quiwach ru'um i mahc nca'n, re' take ma' nquiyohlej ta wach i Dios ru'um chi ncahnic chi se'lbal pan nak'quiwach, re' take cansanel quitu̱t caja̱w eh ch'i̱l wo' take cansem cas quicha̱k'.

Je' wo' chic re' c'uhbal re're' xcanabjic wo' cahnok chi ch'ukbal k'oric chi quina̱ take quibanic c'oyomal, chi quina̱ take nquituna̱' qui̱b chi c'acharic chi quich winak qui̱b on quich ixok qui̱b, chi quina̱ wo' take aj sacanel tumi̱n ru̱c' relk'jic jeno' c'acharel eh chi quina̱ wo' take aj chucul k'oric je' ricab take ma' nquik'or ta coric nanquiyew quik'orbal. Reh aj chi ch'ukbal k'oric chi quina̱ take re', xcanabjic i c'uhbal re're' je' wo' chi ch'ukbal k'oric chi quina̱ take jarub pa' nquik'ihtaj qui̱b chiwach i xa pa' bih tijbal nc'uhtunic reh ricorquil ribiral i Dios

je' ricab i holohic laj tijbal nkac'uhtaj i hoj re' nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus. Re' tijbal re're', re' nk'oric wo' chiri̱j rinimal wach rilok'il i Dios i Lok' laj Dios nkalok'ej wach i hoj aj niminel, re' aj re' nic'uhtaj i hin ru'um chi re' Dios xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiwi̱j nanik'orom re're'.

Re' Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi kana̱ re' wo' re' nye'bic wansil chi nanicamanic chiwach chi coric. Re' hin k'e̱' nitioxej johtok reh ru'um nok xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiwi̱j chi nanicamanic chiwach chi aj k'orol riC'uhbal eh re' aj wo' re' i camanic c'ahchi' nibanam.

Coric ru', najtir cho k'i̱j hin nak cho aj tz'uju̱l reh i Dios, hin nak cho banol ti'c'axic queh take raj tahkanel i Jesus eh je' wo' hin nak cho aj tz'akol wach k'oric chiqui̱j. To̱b ta wo' je' nak re' quinbanic cho, re' Dios xiquetelej cho niwach ru'um chi ma' nirak ta nak chiri̱j chaj bih c'ahchi' nibanam ru'um ricowil nino'jbal chi ma' nwa̱j ta nak rinimjic i Jesus.

Ru'um aj xiban i Dios wu̱c', re' hin nik'or re' Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi k'e̱' wo' chic cho richak'lamil wu̱c' i hin eh ru'um re' yu'na chi re' nic'acharic pan k'ab chic i Jesus wilic, re' hin nichop riman nic'ux chiri̱j i Dios eh riman chic nic'ax take was nicha̱k'.

Je' re' k'uru', ru'um chi re' Dios xiricoj chi hin raj tz'e' wa̱ch chi rik'ormojic rik'orbal, nik'or aweh i coric laj k'oric wili re' nk'oric chiri̱j chaj bih xiban i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh til k'e̱' wo' tare̱t chi enquic'ul ru̱c' i ca̱mna take chi'nchel c'acharel. Re' aj wili i k'oric re're': Re' riwi̱' chi re' kAja̱w Jesus xc'ulic ayu' wach ac'al, reh chi quico'ljic take aj mahc je' ricab xiban wu̱c' i hin re' k'e̱' wo' chic xi̱c' na̱ rinimal nimahc chi quiwach take aj mahc.

Re' cok ru' to̱b ta k'e̱' wo' chic xi̱c' na̱ rinimal nimahc, re' Dios xic'uhtaj cho riquetelbal chi nina̱. Je' re' nik'or maj naxnipahkaj cuybal nimahc reh, re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xiquetelej wo' cho niwach. Chi je' aj re' chi c'uhtbal reh quichak'lamil wilic, re' hin xincahnic chi rehtalil re're' chi quiwach take nca̱j niminic ru'um chi nca̱j wo' ehtric ru̱c' i junelic c'acharic.

Ru'um aj re' chi til wo' coric take k'oric nik'or, je' wili ti̱j niban: Xa jenaj wo' Dios wilic re' nkalok'ej wach eh xa re' wach re' til manlic aj no'jbal. Re' kaDios re're' til manlic K'atal K'oric chi junelic i k'i̱j sakom, ma' hab ta wach jeno' c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al rilom wach eh ma' quimic ta wo' ri̱j. Til k'ormojok chi junelic k'i̱j sakom chi re're' k'e̱' rinimal rilok'il wilic eh k'e̱' wo' nimal wach rajawric, nqui ti̱j niban.

Re' hat Timote̱yo re' xa'n chi til je' hat wac'u̱n ru̱c' rinimjic i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus, nik'or aweh chi chanimej take k'oric wili re' ric'u'lej ri̱b ch'i̱l i k'oro̱j cho najtir k'i̱j ru'um i rUxlabal i Dios chawi̱j i hat. Re' aj wili take k'oric na̱nimem: Je' ricab nca'n take sol nquiyew quic'ux chi manlic chi k'ak'anic je' wo' re' hat chayew ac'ux chi manlic chi rik'eteric quiwach take aj c'uhbalanel re' ma' coric ta quic'uhtunic nca'n.

Timote̱yo, je' wo' chic ma' ntz'ahpic na̱ acapew-bal chi ma' eta chic narak chiri̱j haj wilic ricorquilal i ra̱j banaric maj til nik'or aweh chi wilic take ma'xta chic quicapew-bal chi rirakmajic chiri̱j haj wilic i ricorquilal ra̱j banaric eh ru'um re' ma' ntuhkic ta quicapew-bal chipam rinimjic i Jesus

je' ricab xic'ul ma' Himene̱yo ch'i̱l ma' Lej. Re' take re' xnit'erej chic take lok chi quixilac take aj niminel eh chi je' re' xicahnic pan k'ab i aj Yahm. Je' re' xniban queh ru'um chi k'e̱' xquik'ihtaj qui̱b chiwach i Dios xa re' la' re' xniban i hin, camanok ta nak queh chi ritijiljic qui̱b chi ma' riban ta chi nquik'ihtaj qui̱b chiwach i Dios.

Yu'na re' chic i wili tak'anic til curman wo' chi nanik'orom je aweh: Til cha'n ati̱j chiwach i Dios. Re' cok ru' chiqui̱j ok chi'nchel take c'acharel cha'n ati̱j. Chipam ati̱j na̱banam, chapahkaj rito'bal i Dios chi quina̱ chi'nchel eh chatioxej reh Dios ru̱c' quitobjic enbanaric.

Je' wo', cha'n ati̱j tak chiqui̱j take k'atal k'oric eh je' wo' chiqui̱j take wilic cajawric chaxilac tak. Je' re' cha'n tak reh chi enye'eric quino'jbal ru'um i Dios reh chi ekojwih'ic pan sukquil c'uxlis. Ru̱c' re're' ekojc'acharic chi suk chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios je' wo' chi quitobjic take kas kacha̱k' eh je' wo' chi riye'eric quiwa'ric ru'.
Cha'n ati̱j tak k'uru' chiqui̱j chi'nchel ru'um nok chiwach i kAja̱w Dios re' aj Co'lonel keh, k'e̱' tare̱t chi je' re' enbanaric eh k'e̱' wo' nponic chiwach.

Til je' re' nipahkaj maj re' kaDios k'e̱' ra̱j chi chi'nchel take c'acharel naquirakam chiri̱j i tijinic nc'uhtjic wi̱' ricorquil ribiral i Jesus reh chi je' re' naquico'ljic wo' chiwach i ti'c'axic chalic reh.

Re' tijinic re're' ric'uhtaj wo' keh chi xa jenaj wo' Dios wilic re' nkalok'ej wach i hoj. Je' wo', ric'uhtaj wo' chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xc'ulic asjok ayu' wach ac'al je' ricab asjic nka'n i hoj c'acharel eh xa re' wo' re' ma' hab ta chic jeno' wach nto'bonic queh c'acharel chi wih'ic pan sukquil c'uxlis ru̱c' i Dios.

Je' re' nik'or maj ru̱c' riye'eric ri̱b pan quimic chiki̱j i hoj c'acharel, chi kunchelal i hoj aj niminel reh Jesus ye'o̱j chic keh chi ma' eta chic nkac'ul i ti'c'axic chiri̱j i kamahc. Ru̱c' aj rik'ormojic i tijinic re're', chipam i rik'ijil tik'imaj cho wach ru'um i Dios, xic'uhtaj chi til ra̱j chi chi'nchel take c'acharel naquico'ljic

eh reh chi naribirmijic i haj wilic ra̱j i Dios, re' Jesus xiripahba̱' chi aj k'orol ribiral ric'acharic. Re' c'ahchi' nik'orom wili ma' chucuj k'oric ta, til la' coric chiwach Jesus. Ma' xa re' ta re' xiban wu̱c' i Jesus, xiripahba̱' la' wo' chi hin aj tijinel je' wo' chi aj c'uhbalanel queh take tinamit ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel reh chi nanik'orom queh ricorquilal i c'uhbal re're', re' ch'iclic wi̱' kac'ux i hoj aj niminel reh Jesus.

Re' hin nwa̱j wo' chi xa pa' ye'a̱b nquimol wi̱' qui̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios, re' take aj niminel reh Jesus ca'n johtok quiti̱j chi ma'xta nech' ok mahc pan quic'acharic, chi ma'xta nech' ok ch'i'c pan ka̱mna eh chi ma'xta wo' so' c'ahanic i̱b cu̱c'.

Je' wo' chic, nwa̱j chi re' take kana̱b pan niminic xa coric ok wo' ti wach ritik'injic qui̱b ca'n ru̱c' quiso' ma' ok nquitik'a̱' qui̱b xa ru'um quiyusquil. Re' wili ra̱j rik'orom chi ma' curman ta chi naquitik'a̱b qui̱b ru̱c' q'uih tz'a̱k laj tz'ih, on chi naquixoyem wach quina̱ ru̱c' take nworwotic laj ch'ihch', on nworwotic laj abaj. Til nipahkaj je k'uru' chi quic'uhtaj lok coric wach no'jbal
re' nc'utunic lok wi̱' i holohic laj bano̱j je' ricab nca'n take kana̱b pan niminic re' nquiyohbalej wach i Dios chi coric.

Ch'i̱l i k'oro̱j lok re're', nwa̱j wo' nik'orom aweh i wili chiqui̱j take kana̱b pan niminic: Nanquimol qui̱b i comonil aj niminel chi ritijiljic ri̱j rik'orbal i Dios, tare̱t chi re' take ixok equiwih'ic chi quixilac take winak xa re' la' quiwih'ok ar chi xa aj birinel ok take eh quibiraj wo' k'oric ru̱c' chaj bih nk'ormojic chi quina̱.

Je' ok re' ca'n maj re' hin ma' niyew ta k'ab chi re' take ixok equi'oquic chi c'uhtunic china̱ i winak on chi enwih'ic rajawric china̱ chi ribanjic jeno' c'uhtunic. Junpech wo' chic nik'or aweh tak i wili: Tare̱t chi re' take ixok quiwih'ok chi quixilac take winak chi tijinic xa re' la' xa birinel ok take.

Re' ribiral i Aran ch'i̱l i E̱wa ncamanic keh chi enkarak chiri̱j i c'ahchi' nik'orom. C'olok pan ac'ux tak chi pan p'utbal cho reh c'acharic ma' re' ta E̱wa xtik'injic chi pe̱t, re' la' Aran eh cu chiri̱j ru' xtik'injic i E̱wa.
Je' wo' c'olok pan ac'ux tak chi ma' re' ta Aran xjot'oric ru'um aj Yahm, re' la' i E̱wa. Ru'um chi je' re' xc'uluric, re' E̱wa xmahcanic chiwach i Dios.

Re' cok ru' to̱b ta wo' je' re' xiban, xa xehtric wo' co'lbal ru'um reh Ac'unbe̱s xasjic. Je' wo' re' nc'uluric cu̱c' take ixok yu'na chi qui'ehtric wo' co'lbal, re' cok ru' wi re' take re' xa c'ahchi' chic quich'ubsam qui̱b enquik'ahsaj quicapew-bal chi naquich'ica̱b quic'ux chiri̱j Jesus, chi equic'acharic pan c'axoj i̱b eh je' wo' chi equiwih'ic pan tz'iro̱j wach c'acharic.

Wilic jenaj chic k'oric re' til ricorquilal nk'oric chiri̱j jeno' hab wach ra̱j ribanam chi aj ilol reh ritinami̱t i Dios. Je' wili rik'or i k'oric re're': «Hab wach ra̱j ribanam chi aj ilo̱l reh ritinami̱t i Dios, lo̱k' riwa'ric i camanic ric'ax wach ribanaric, nqui rik'or i k'oric re're'.

Ru'um aj re', re' hin nik'or i wili: Tare̱t chi xa hab wach eric'ax wach i camanic re' lo̱k' riwa'ric re're', re' cok ru' re' nc'axbic wach re're' til ok coric wach ric'acharic chi ma' haj ta k'ilmajic ra̱j so' ru̱c' jeno' ma' holohic ta laj bano̱j eh til xa jenaj ok wo' rehq'ue̱n wilic chiwach. Je' wo' chic, re' winak re're' curman chi ye'o̱j ok wo' riwa'ric rik'orbal, ma' ok xa mahnic' chi mahcanic nchol la' ok ribehsjic ricapew-bal. Je' wo', xa tehlic ok wo' k'ab chi quic'ulmujic take xa hab wach equiponic chi aj pahkem patal ru̱c', c'uhtunok wo' lok chi wilic rino'jbal eh t'ulic ok chi c'uhtunic.

Ru'um chi je' re' no'jbal ra̱j uyu'njic reh i c'acharel re' ra̱j ribanam chi aj ilol reh ritinami̱t i Dios, ma' riban ta wo' chi aj xohc'rel laj winak, ma' wo' aj cojol wolic, xa ta wo' nak chi aj c'axol wach tumi̱n. Je' re' k'uru', re' c'acharel re' ra̱j ribanam chi aj ilo̱j queh ritinami̱t i Dios c'uhtunok lok chi wilic chak'lamil ru̱c' eh chi wilic wo' k'ochlic wach c'uxlis ru̱c'.
Je' wo' chic, re' c'acharel re're' curman chi naricholic rilmijic take raj pan pa̱t maj xa chi je' re' enye'jic rilok'il cu'um take riha'lac'u̱n eh ewo' quibirinic k'oric chiwach.

Ma' xa re' ta re're' je' la' wo', curman chi ewo' nc'uhtunic lok chi enchol quibehsjic take aj niminel maj hab wach nchol ric'amaric quibe̱h take raj pan pa̱t, ewo' nchol ric'amaric quibe̱h take ritinami̱t i Dios.

Je' wo', curman chi ma' re' ta cu ac'nel chipam i niminic maj wi cu ac'nel enchopbic reh camanic re're', ma' rinimslom nchel ri̱b eh chi je' re' narich'ukuric wach rimahc ru'um i Dios ru'um reh rino'jbal je' ricab xc'uluric ru̱c' aj Yahm naxinimsaj ri̱b chiwach i Dios.

Je' wo' chic, curman wo' chi holohic ok ribiral ric'acharic wilic lok chi quiwach take ma' ja' re' ta aj niminel take maj wi ma' holohic ribiral ric'acharic, ma' riban nchel chi re' aj Yahm ericoj cho take ch'i'c, on wolic re' enpitbic reh ricamaj chi c'amol be̱h.

Xa hab pa' wach take nca̱j ca'nam chi aj to'o̱l queh take c'amol be̱h ritinami̱t i Dios, curman wo' chi coric ok wach quino'jbal. Re' wili ra̱j rik'orom chi xa ma' ok no̱j nchalic quik'orbal. Je' wo' chic, ma' ok aj xohc'rel take eh ma' wo' chi aj c'axol wach tumi̱n take.

Je' wo', curman chi re' take re' chi sak pa̱m quicapew-bal ru'um chi ma'xta chic quimahc chiwach i Dios, naquic'amam na̱ chi coric haj wilic i c'uhbal ma' keht'alim ta nak ru'um chi ma' ja' nquich'ica̱' ta nak quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus.

Ru'um chi je' re' ra̱j banaric, xa hab pa' wach ra̱j richopom na̱ camanic chi aj to'o̱l, curman wo' chic chi pe̱t naquiliric wi c'ahchi' quic'amam na̱ i c'uhbal re're' eh cu chiri̱j aj chic ru', wi xiliric chi ma'xta chic bih ncalajic wi̱' ru̱c' ric'amaric na̱ i c'uhbal re're', erichop i camanic chi aj to'o̱l.

Je' wo' chic, chipam i camanic re're' curman wo' chi re' quehq'ue̱n take aj to'o̱l coric ok wo' wach quino'jbal, ma' ok xa aj molol c'uta̱j take, ma' ok xa mahnic' take chi mahcanic quichol la' ok ribehsjic quicapew-bal eh chi xa naquiniminic chi manlic ru̱c' pa' bih ra̱j banjic.
Je' wo' chic, je' ricab xnik'or chiqui̱j take aj c'amol quibe̱h ritinami̱t i Dios, re' take aj to'o̱l queh curman chi xa jenaj ok quehq'ue̱n eh quichol ok wo' ric'amaric quibe̱h take caj pan pa̱t.

Je' re' k'uru' xa hab wach naroquic chi camanic chi caj to'o̱l queh take c'amol be̱h chiban chi coric i ricamaj maj xa hab wach riban ricamaj chi coric chi caj to'o̱l take c'amol be̱h no̱j wih'ok ribiral chi tare̱t laj aj camanom chiwach i Dios eh ru̱c' re're', re' take aj niminel enquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j ru'um chi rich'ica̱' wo' ric'ux ru' chi manlic chiri̱j i kAja̱w Jesus.

Je' aj re' riwi̱' k'uru' i c'acharic ra̱j i Dios chi naca'nam take raj camanom. Re' k'oric re're' xiban nak chi cu re' nanik'orom aweh naquiponok awu̱c' eh je' re' nik'or maj ch'iclic je nic'ux chi xa nic' yu' naniponic awu̱c' Timote̱yo. Xa re' la' tob la' je' re' nicapaj ribanaric, re' hin c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh wili yu'na

reh chi wi xinchahmic chic je so' chi ojic, re' hat aweht'alim chic nic' wach riwi̱' ra̱j i Dios chi na̱banam acamaj chi aj ilol queh take aj niminel chopo̱j cho quina̱ ru'um i Dios je' ricab nok pan jeno' pa̱t re' wo' ajabe̱s nchopbic quina̱ take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n. C'olok pan ac'ux chi nic' pa' q'uihal hat-tak aj niminel wilca̱t tak ar ch'i̱l wo' chi'nchel i hoj wilco̱j pan tak toco̱m chic ye'a̱b, no̱j ka'n xa hoj chic jenaj comonil re' wilic wi̱' i c'achlic Dios chi kAjabe̱s. Chi je' re' kawi̱' kunchelal i hoj aj niminel, kojwih'ic chipam i comonil wili chi aj ilol reh chi ma' eta nyoj wach i Lok' laj C'uhbal nc'uhtunic reh ricorquilal ribiral i Dios je' ricab riban i tz'ak ch'iquimaj cho wi̱' jeno' pa̱t on re' take ro̱k pa̱t, re' wo' take re' cojo̱j take chi chopbal reh pa̱t reh chi ma' eta nyoj je.

Chipam aj i c'uhbal re're', nkarak jenaj tijbal c'axic nak cho rirakmajic chiri̱j cu rehtal xsakomsjic wach ru'um i Dios. Re' tijbal re're', til pan coric nik'or aweh chi k'e̱' wo' chic curman chi birmajic maj re're' je' wili rik'or: «Naxilmijic chi xc'acharic ayu' wach ac'al je' ricab nc'acharic jenaj c'acharel, re' i Lok' laj Uxlabal xc'uhtunic lok reh chi nt'oric wach rino'jbal. Re' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xquilow naxuctic wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak. Ru̱c' re're' xk'ormojic wo' ribiral queh take tinamit ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh chi je' re' xa haj tinamit wilque̱b wi̱' take re', wilic queh xiniminic reh ribiral re're'.
