Chiri̱j chic riwih'ic ayu' wach ac'al, xc'ulmujic wo' chic johtok ar pan taxa̱j, nqui tijbal re're'.

To̱b ta wo' je' re' rik'or keh tijbal re're', wilic take aj niminel c'ahchi' quicana̱b rich'iquinjic quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus je' ricab wo' k'oro̱j chic cho ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal chi je' re' naric'uluric chipam take k'i̱j c'ahchi' koquic cok wi̱' chi kawach ru'um chi re' chic take jot'o̱l laj c'uhbalanel re' quic'uhtunic reh i k'oric nye'eric queh cu'um ma' tob laj uxlabal, re' chic re' c'ahchi' quibiram.

Re' take aj c'uhbalanel re're' xa jenaj c'o̱j laj capew-bal c'ahchi' quicojom, xa re' la' je' ricab nok jeno' chicop nancojoric rehtalil ru̱c' jeno' tz'a' laj ch'ihch' nc'uhtunic lok chi ehchemaj chic i chicop re're', je' wo' re' take aj c'uhbalanel re're' nok ma' nquirak ta chic chiri̱j ribanaric i coric, nquiyew lok chi c'uhtjic chi re' aj Yahm nehchenic queh. Chi je' re' nanca'n i c'uhtunic, ma' nquik'or ta i coric

je' ricab nca'n nanca'n i c'uhtunic chi ma' to̱b ta chi re' take ac'un ixk'un naquisiq'uim quehq'ue̱n on quibahi̱l pan quic'acharic. Je' wo' chic, re' take re' cow nquik'or chi wilic take chicop ma' tare̱t ta chi c'uxuric to̱b ta chiwach i Dios re' xtik'inic reh chi'nchel take chicop, ma' c'ahchi' ta kamahcanic i hoj aj niminel nankac'ux take chicop re're'. Re' cok ru', re're' ritak'a̱' wo' keh hoj re' keht'alim chic wach i coric laj c'uhbal chi nanka'n kawa' kaha̱', xa wilic ok wo' johtok katioxbal chiwach i Dios.

Je' re' k'uru' xa pa' bih c'uxbal nye'eric aweh tak, chac'ul tak eh ma̱k'or tak chi chiwach i Dios ma' tare̱t ta chi c'uxuric. Je' re' nik'or ru'um nok nic' pa' nimal take ritik'inic i Dios, tare̱t take chi'nchel xa re' cok ru' nacha'n awa' aha̱' tak til chatioxej tak johtok reh Dios
maj chi'nchel i pa' bih nye'eric chi c'uxuric, re' Dios rik'orom cho chi lo̱k' eh chi cuse'semaj wo' cho ru'um nok re' hat-tak na'n ati̱j tak china̱.

Hat Timote̱yo, reh chi na̱banam chi hat manlic raj camanom i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, curman chi re' nic' pa' nimal c'ahchi' nik'orom je aweh na̱k'orom wo' pan ac'uhtunic cu̱c' take aj niminel ar. Je' wo' chic je' ricab nok jeno' t'uch ac'un riban riwa' riha̱' chi manlic reh chi nariq'uihic johtok chi suk, je' wo' re' i hat curman wo' chi xa wilic ok wo' pan awa̱mna take k'oric k'oro̱j reh chi re' take c'acharel enquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus. Je' wo' re' cha'n chiri̱j take tijinic c'ahchi' atahkem ri̱j re' quic'uhtunic reh coric chiri̱j i Dios.

Chiri̱j lok wili ma̱coj ru̱c' acapew-bal take xa pa' bih take c'uhtunic chiri̱j i xa tik'imaj wach ribiral on xa memil laj no'jbal, re' la' hat xa chiri̱j ok wo' no'jbal nye'bic rilok'il i Dios chayew ac'ux reh chi je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak ayeb ac'ux chi rik'ochjic wach ati'jolal, enatik ju' awih'ic chi cow ac'ux pan niminic.

Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab chi wilic take c'acharel je' ru̱c' k'e̱' nquiyew quic'ux chiri̱j rik'ochjic wach quiti'jolal ru'um nok nquic'raj chi ru̱c' re're' suk wilque̱b chi c'acharic ayu' wach ac'al, je' wo' re' til k'e̱' wo' chic tare̱t chi enachop ac'ux chi c'acharic chipam i no'jbal xnik'or aweh. Je' re' nik'or maj k'oro̱j cahnok chi hab pa' wach je' re' c'acharic eriban, ma' xa re' ta ayu' wach ac'al naric'acharic chi suk je' la' wo' re' nachalok i k'i̱j nabanjok i c'acharic ar pan taxa̱j.
Ru'um chi re' k'oro̱j cahnok re're' til wo' coric laj k'oric, k'e̱' wo' tare̱t chi enc'uluric cu'um chi'nchel c'acharel ru̱c' i ca̱mna.

Ru'um aj re', re' hat ch'i̱l i hin c'ahchi' kacamanic chi cow chiwach i Dios chi rik'ormojic i k'oro̱j cahnok re're' to̱b ta nkac'ul take ti' ru'um reh kacamaj. Re' kacamaj re're' c'ahchi' ka'nam chi ch'iclic kac'ux chiri̱j i c'achlic Dios re' kajCo'lonel i hoj nic' nimal kojniminic chic reh. Re' Dios ra̱j wo' rico'lem take chi'nchel c'acharel.
Je' aj re' ru' Timote̱yo nic' pa' nimal xnik'or je aweh chachop wo' ac'ux chi ric'uhtjic queh take aj niminel. Re' hat chak'or chaj bih take tak'amaj aweh chi na̱c'uhtam

eh ma̱cana̱' chi hab wach enpitbic aweh ru̱c' acamaj chi c'amol be̱h xa ru'um chi cu hat q'uijol, re' la' ok i c'acharic na'n chipam aq'uijolal camanok chi quiwach take awich aj niminel chi c'uhtbal queh nic' wach i holohic laj c'acharic raj chi enca'n. Je' wo' chic, re' ano'jbal camanok wo' chi quiwach ru' c'uhtbal queh i holohic laj no'jbal ra̱j chi naca'nam. Nic' pa' wo' nimal take ak'orbal na'n chi quiwach, camanok wo' chi c'uhtbal queh nic' wach take holohic laj k'oric ra̱j chi narelic pan quichi̱'. Re' c'axoj i̱b nac'uhtaj chi quiwach take awich aj niminel re're', camanok wo' queh chi c'uhtbal queh nic' wach riwi̱' i c'axoj i̱b ra̱j chi naca'nam chi quibil qui̱b. Je' wo' chac'am quibe̱h chi rich'iquinjic quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus ru̱c' jenaj c'acharic tz'iro̱j wach chiwach i Dios.

Chiri̱j chic lok chi'nchel re're', yu'na chi cu ja' quinponic ta pe awu̱c' nwa̱j wo' chi re' hat chachop ac'ux chi ribanaric take wili chipam take moloj i̱b reh lok'onbal wach i Dios: Pe̱t, chawilow pa̱m Lok' laj riC'uhbal i Dios chi quiwach take awich aj niminel. Je' wo' chic, chac'uhbalej take aj niminel ru̱c' pa' bih narak chiri̱j chipam Lok' laj C'uhbal eh chatijej take chi naquic'amam na̱ riC'uhbal i Dios.

Je' wo', nwa̱j nik'orom aweh i wili: Re' c'uhtunic ye'o̱j aweh ru'um i rUxlabal i Dios re' tichol lok ric'uhtjic, ma̱cana̱' lok ribanaric. C'olok pan ac'ux chi naxye'eric aweh i ribanaric re're', pe̱t xk'ormojic cho ribiral ru'um i rUxlabal i Dios eh ru'um re', re' take aj c'amol be̱h aj niminel xquicoj quik'ab chana̱ rehtalil chi xatpahbabjic chi hat aj c'uhtunel.

Je' re' k'uru' chachop ac'ux chi ribanaric chi'nchel xnik'or aweh re're' eh ticuyunok wo' reh chi chi'nchel take tinamit naquilbic reh nic' wach i c'acharic na'n naquilow chi c'ahchi' aq'uihic chipam i niminic.

Ma' xa re' ta re're', ticuyunok la' wo' chipam chi'nchel xnik'or aweh reh chi re' hat ch'i̱l wo' take nic' pa' nimal naquibirinic aweh etico'ljic tak chiwach i ti'c'axic riyew i Dios ru'um reh mahc. Ru'um aj re' nik'or wo' aweh chi chacoj rehtal i wili: Re' pa' bih c'uhtunic na'n je' ok wo' re' c'acharic c'ahchi'ca̱t.

Timote̱yo, re' wili no'jbal niyew je aweh chiri̱j nic' wach i k'ilo̱j na̱banam: Nachak'il jeno' rijeb laj winak ma̱k'il pan eht laj k'oric xa pa ricorquil la' wo' ti chak'il je' ricab chi re' ta nak awaja̱w c'ahchi' ak'ilim. Nachak'il wo' take q'uijolak chak'il take chi je' ricab re' ta nak take awas on acha̱k' c'ahchi' ak'ilim.

Je' wo' cu̱c' take rijeb tak ixok, chak'il wo' take je' ricab re' ta nak atu̱t c'ahchi' ak'ilim. Re' take k'ahxokak, chak'il take je' ricab chi re' ta nak take awana̱b c'ahchi' ak'ilim. Re' cok ru' chak'o'rej take pa ricorquil ma' ok ru̱c' xa ntuquic laj capew-bal ena'n.

Timote̱yo, je' wo' niyew je aweh no'jbal wili chiqui̱j take rijeb tak ixok: Nic' pa' q'uihal take ixok camnak chic quibahi̱l re' take til pan coric ma' hab ta chic wach ta̱j queh chachop tak quina̱ reh chi eli̱c na̱to'bem tak ru̱c' i to'bal enamol tak wach chaxilac hat-tak aj niminel.

Raj wi wilic jeno' ixok camnak chic ribahi̱l cu wilic take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n, on rihrima̱m, re' take ac'unbe̱s ixk'unbe̱s on ihmambe̱s re're' tanlic chiqui̱j chi enca'n chi coric haj wilic i ra̱j banaric je' ricab rik'or i kaniminic. Re' chic i no'jbal k'e̱' tare̱t eh k'e̱' nponic chiwach i Dios, re' chi re' take ac'un ixk'un enquic'ax quitu̱t caja̱w on quiq'ue̱n on re' enquilow hab wach queh pan quipa̱t reh chi ru̱c' re're' enca'n so' jelow-bal i quiq'uihsjic xbanaric cho.

Je' aj re' ru' ra̱j banaric cu̱c' take ixok camnak chic quibahi̱l re' cok ru', je' re' na̱banam xa cu̱c' take til coric chi xacutquelem chic qui̱b eh xicahnic pan niba'il. Je' wo' re' na̱banam cu̱c' take ixok camnak chic quibahi̱l nquichop quic'ux chi ti̱j chi k'i̱j chi ak'ab chi ripahkaljic quito'bal reh Dios.

Je' re' nik'or maj wilic take ixok quicahnic chi cutquel chic chi c'acharic nanquimic je quibahi̱l xa re' la' ma' riban ta chi equitobjic ru'um nok re' take ixok re're', re' chic risiq'uiric i chopoj c'uxlis chiri̱j pa' bih nye'bic sukquil quic'ux nquiyew wi̱' quicapew-bal eh ru̱c' no'jbal re're' nca'n je' ricab take camnak chi ma' re' ta chic ribirmijic k'oric chiwach i Dios nquicapaj.

Je' re' k'uru' Timote̱yo nic' pa' q'uihal take aj niminel wilic quicahnel ixok re' raj ilmijic queh, chak'or ricorquil queh i chaj bih c'ahchi' nik'orom je aweh wili reh chi ma'xta bih equik'iliric take wi̱' ru̱c' quino'jbal.

Je' re' nik'or maj jeno' aj niminel ma' ric'ul ta chi reh chi enk'ormojic reh chi aj niminel wi ma' ricapaj riliric take pa' take cho reh eh xa ta wo' nak ricapaj take raj pan pa̱t re' c'axic wo' nca'n. Ru'um reh riban re're', nariwih'ic k'ilo̱j china̱ maj re' rimahc k'e̱' wo' chic c'ahbil chiwach i pa' bih mahc riban jeno' ma' re' ta aj niminel.

Je' re' ajic re' hat cu na̱wilom ricorquil haj wilic take ixok camnak quibahi̱l na̱cojom take chi quixilac naquic'ulum quito'bal chipam acomonil. Re' take ixok na̱chihim take, re' je' wili quiwi̱': Re' manlic oxc'ahl (60) ha̱b wilic queh eh nok chi cu c'achlic cho ribahi̱l ma' janc'al ta xich'ak ri̱b chi narituhnic ru̱c' toco̱m chic winak.

Je' wo', holohic ok ribiral quic'acharic wilic, ribanam ok to'bonic, riq'uihsam ok wo' take cho riha'lac'u̱n chi coric eh ric'ulum ok wo' take toco̱m chic aj niminel chi riye'eric ripatal pa ripa̱t. Je' wo', ricamanem ok wo' quiwach take toco̱m chic aj niminel ru̱c' ch'ublic c'uxlis, kak'or je' ricab ru̱c' ritz'ajaric i co̱k take rich aj niminel naqui'o̱j c'olok chi aj patal take ru̱c'. Ch'i̱l i no'jbal re're', rito'bem ok take cho c'axic ti nca'n eh xa ye'lic ok wo' k'ab chi to'bonic naxiban cho.

Re' chic take cahnel ixok ma' ja'xta queh oxc'ahl ha̱b naxquimic je quibahi̱l ma̱coj take pa riman. Je' re' nik'or maj chaj bih aweht'alim wi xquic'ax ok wo' chic wach chi nariwih'ic wo' chic ribahi̱l eh ewo' chic nca'n caxarahil? Ru̱c' ribanaric re're', enquik'eb lok ri̱j quic'ux i quik'orbal xquiyew nak chiwach i Dios chi ma'xta chic quisiq'uim quibahi̱l re' la' chic naca'nam, naquicamanic nak ru̱c' chi'nchel quic'ux chiwach i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Wi xca'n aj wo' chic caxa̱ra, re' wili erik'or i Dios chiqui̱j: «Re' take wili wilic chic mahc chiqui̱j ru'um xquicana̱' rinimjic quik'orbal xquiyew chi niwach chi naquinimem nak chi coric, nqui erik'or i Dios.

Ru'um aj re', ma' riban ta chi enacoj take ixok re're' chi quixilac take nquic'ul quito'bal maj wi je' re' xa'n, re' take re' enquip'ut c'acharic pan siquilal, enca'n xa qui'o̱j quichalic chi' tak pa̱t chi moloj tak wach c'uta̱j eh encocsaj qui̱b chi je' re'. Je' wo', enca'n xa haj chic minmin take chi rik'ormojic take xa pa' bih k'oric re' ru̱c' ma' queh ta chic rik'ormojic.

Ru'um aj reh chi'nchel re're', re' hin yu'na nik'or je aweh chi re' take ixok camnak quibahi̱l eh cu ja'xta queh oxc'ahl (60) ha̱b, sakbih nak chi ewo' chic nca'n caxarahil. Chiri̱j chic ru', jarub pa' chic quiha'lac'u̱n nariwih'ic, quiq'uihsaj lok pa ricorquil eh quicamanej pa̱m quipa̱t chi coric reh chi je' re' ma' hab ta wach queh take quik'etbic wach kac'uhtunic enk'oric chiri̱j chi ma' holohic ta i niminic wilco̱j wi̱'.

Je' re' k'uru' tare̱t chi queh take ixok re're' chi naca'nam wo' chic caxa̱ra reh chi ma' hab ta wach queh take erik'eb ri̱b pan c'ahbilal. Je' re' nik'or maj wilic ixok je' ru̱c' camnak chic je quibahi̱l xquicana̱' rinimjic i Jesus ru'um chi re' chic i pa' bih no'jbal ricoj cho aj Yahm pan quicapew-bal, re' chic re' nquic'am na̱.

Chiri̱j chic rik'ormojic lok wili nik'or wo' chic aweh, wi chi quixilac take raj pan pa̱t jeno' aj niminel wilic jeno' ixok camnak chic je ribahi̱l je' ru̱c' ja'xta reh oxc'ahl (60) ha̱b, curman chi narito'bem reh chi re' ritobjic ixok re're' ma' eta ncahnic pan quik'ab take moloj wach aj niminel eh chi je' re', re' to'bal moloj wach ma' eta nmak'aric queh take ixok camnak chic je quibahi̱l re' til ma' hab ta chic wach ta̱j queh.

Yu'na nwa̱j k'oric awu̱c' chiqui̱j take quinahsil aj niminel chipam i comonil wilca̱t wi̱'. Wi nca'n chi coric quicamaj chi aj c'amol be̱h take eh til pa ricorquil, til wo' nquiyew quic'ux chi rik'ormojic je' wo' chi ric'uhtjic riC'uhbal i Dios, curman chi lo̱k' ok quiwa'ric chawach tak eh til ric'ul wo' chi queh chi enayew tak jeno' quitojbal

je' ricab rik'or chipam Lok' laj Hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' c'uhbal re' je' wili rik'or: “Nok c'ahchi' chi camanic aboyex chi ribehljic cho wach atic, ma' riban ta chi enabac' pan ju' pitbal riwa', nqui rik'or. Je' wo' pan jenaj chic ribiral je' wili rik'or: “Re' aj camanom c'ahchi' chi camanic ric'ul chi reh chi naric'ulum ritojbal, nqui rik'or.

Re' wili jenaj chic no'jbal niyew je aweh chiqui̱j take nahsil chipam acomonil hat-tak aj niminel: Wi hab wach jeno' c'ahchi' ricojom jeno' mahc chiri̱j jeno' c'amol be̱h pan acomonil, ma̱cohjaj pe ti wach chaj bih c'ahchi' rik'ormojic aweh. Cu chabiraj la' pe pan quichi̱' quib xib ok chi c'acharel wi til coric chi wilic jeno' rimahc i c'amol be̱h re're'. Wi xabiraj cu̱c' take c'acharel chi til coric chi wilic rimahc, cu re' aj ru' chacoj wach eh chak'il wo' ti pa ricorquilal.

Tz'a̱b ru' wi xa xitik wo' ju' wih'ic chipam rino'jbal re're' chiri̱j chi ak'ilim chic i hat, chi quiwach aj chic chi'nchel i comonil chak'il reh chi re' quich c'amol be̱h naquilow chi je' re', enquiyohbalej qui̱b reh chi ma' eta nca'n jeno' c'ahbilal.

Timote̱yo, re' chi'nchel nic' nimal xnik'or je aweh wili til nipahkaj je aweh chi chac'am na̱ chi manlic. Re' hin til wilic wajawric chi ripahkaljic je aweh re're' maj re' kAja̱w Dios ch'i̱l i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, ch'i̱l wo' take lok' laj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios wilque̱b johtok pan taxa̱j c'ahchi' wo' quiyeb rajawric i k'oric c'ahchi' nibanam je aweh yu'na. Chi je' re' ajic nipahkaj wo' je aweh chi nacha'n acamaj chi quiwach take c'acharel, cha'n ru̱c' chi'nchel ac'ux, ma' xa ta reh chi re' take c'acharel naquicahnic chi suk quic'ux awu̱c'.

Je' wo' chic, nachachih wach take aj camanom chi naquicamanic chipam quicomonil take aj niminel ma̱cojlom pe ti ak'ab china̱ i hab wach nacapaj ricojoric chi camanic maj chaj bih aweht'alim wi re' nacapaj ricojoric chi camanic wilic ok cho jeno' rimahc? Nachacoj ak'ab china̱ jeno' c'acharel wilic cho rimahc, enanih awi̱b i hat ru̱c' rimahc ru'. Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh chi coric ok wach ano'jbal reh chi ma'xta nech' ok mahc pan ac'acharic.

Ru̱c' wili ma' nwa̱j ta nik'orom chi ma' ta nak chic enawuq'uej so' aweh i c'ah laj ha' tik'imaj chi ik'o̱m. Re' hat ma̱wuq'uej xa ha' chi rutquel, chaxilaquej la' aha̱' ru̱c' ik'o̱m re're' reh chi ma' eta chic tirijot' riya'bilal apa̱m natirichop cho chi xa cuc'lam xilac.

Je' re' k'uru' Timote̱yo, ilmijok chi c'ahchi' abanam acamaj chi coric maj je' ricab chi sakom chic wach rimahc jeno' c'acharel nanponic chiwach aj ch'ukul wach mahc, on nok cu re' chic nelic lok wach sakom i rimahc nanch'ukuric k'oric china̱,

je' wo' re' narelic cho wach sakom take coric laj camanic na'n i hat naquilow take tinamit. To̱b ta ma' nilmijic ta ti wach yu'na, nariponic i k'i̱j chi narelic wo' lok wach sakom chi holohic laj camanic c'ahchi' abanam.

Chi'nchel take aj niminel wilque̱b ri'sil ro̱k k'ab jeno' aj ehcham camanic eh nca'n quicamaj chi ma' tojo̱j ta take til ric'ul chi queh chi naquiyeb riwa'ric i ajabe̱s nchopbic quina̱ eh naquibirinic wo' k'oric chiwach reh chi ma' hab ta wach erik'or c'ahbilal chiri̱j i Dios on chiri̱j i c'uhtunic nka'n.

Je' ricab jeno' c'acharel xa quich aj niminel ok qui̱b ch'i̱l aj ehcham camanic, ma' ra̱j ta rik'orom chi xa ru'um chi aj niminel re' ncamanic cok wi̱', eta nak riban chi ma' eta riyew riwa'ric. Ma'xta, naricamanic la' cok chiwach chi coric ru'um i c'axo̱j wilic pa ra̱mna chiri̱j re' ncamanic cok wi̱' eh til wo' chic k'e̱' naric'uhtunic rino'jbal chi coric ru'um nok re' ncamanic cok wi̱' xa cas quicha̱k' qui̱b pan niminic. Re' aj no'jbal wili chac'uhtaj eh chak'or queh take aj niminel reh chi naquirakam chiri̱j nic' wach i camanic naca'nam chi quiwach take quicamanic cok wi̱'.

Timote̱yo, wi xa hab wach c'ahchi' rik'orom jeno' toco̱m chic c'uhtunic je' ru̱c' ma' jenaj ta wach ru̱c' i nik'orom cho aweh eh chi re're' ma' riban ta wo' jenaj wach ru̱c' i coric laj tijinic nchalic ru̱c' i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, on ru̱c' take c'uhtunic je' ru̱c' rik'or keh nic' wach nakac'acharic chi holohic chiwach i Dios,

re' c'acharel re're' moysomaj pa̱m ricapew-bal eh ma'xta bih reht'al chiri̱j i c'uhtunic riban. Ma' xa re' ta re', re' la' wo' ricapew-bal ma' suk ta wilic ru̱c' i Dios eh chi je' re' nanoquic chi k'oric cu̱c' take toco̱m c'acharel k'e̱' richoplom ri̱b chiri̱j take k'oric riban. Ru'um chi je' re' ricapew-bal chipam take k'oric riban cu̱c' toco̱m chic c'acharel, xa wilic wo' i cakwachanic, ixowonic i̱b, tz'uju̱j ch'i̱l i yojoj c'uxlis ru̱c'.

Re' c'acharel re're' ch'i̱l toco̱m chic c'acharel nquichop qui̱b chiri̱j take k'oric nca'n, nquic'uhtaj lok chi jot'o̱j chic quicapew-bal eh ru'um re' ma' nquirak ta chic chiri̱j ricorquil ribiral i Jesus, xa re' la' chic ribihomsjic qui̱b nquicapaj naxi'oquic chi rinimjic i Jesus. Ru'um reh no'jbal re're', til nipahkaj aweh chi re' take winak je' re' quino'jbal ma' riban jenaj wach ano'jbal tak cu̱c'.

Chiri̱j nok nik'orom chic lok re're' chiri̱j take bihomal, yu'na nik'or wo' aweh i wili: Wi la' re' hat wilca̱t chi suk ac'ux pan rinimjic i Jesus to̱b ta xa nic' pa' ti nimal wilic aweh, k'e̱' wo' chic ricuse'sbal i Dios wilic cho chana̱.

Ru'um aj re' ma̱yew ac'ux chi ribihomsjic awi̱b maj je' ricab naxojc'ulic wach k'i̱j sakom ma'xta wo' bih wilic keh, je' wo' chic re' nachirak cho rik'ijil kaquimic ma'xta wo' bih enkac'am je chiki̱j.
Je' aj re' ru' Timote̱yo, to̱b ta ma' chi bih wilic aweh, xa re' wach wi wilic awa' aha̱', ch'i̱l aso' socbal aweh, sukbok ac'ux ru̱c' chi'nchel re're'.

Ma̱ban aweh je' ricab enca'n take c'acharel re' xa re' wach ric'axaric wach bihomal nca'n. Je' re' nik'or aweh maj re' take je' re' quino'jbal quikajic chipam i c'ahbilal laj no'jbal je' ricab ric'ul jeno' chicop nok nkajic pan jeno' xirab. Chi je' aj re' quino'jbal ma' nquicapaj ta chic ri̱j chi ru̱c' ribihomsjic qui̱b nca̱j ca'nam, xa naricamanic chi jot'bal reh quic'acharic. Re' take c'acharel re're' ru̱c' ribihomsjic qui̱b nca̱j ca'nam, enquisach wach i quic'acharic chi junpech je' ricab nansahchic wach jeno' ma' laj cano̱wa nanbut'lujic jok ri'sil ha'.

Chaj wa'ric naxnik'or re're'? Nik'or chi je' re' maj riwi̱' chaweh chi naweht'alim chi re' c'acharel nc'axbic wach bihomal ma' xa ta jenaj i ti'quilal ric'ul, yohbal la' wach nchalic china̱. Til coric wilic take aj niminel je' re' xquic'ul ru'um chi xquicana̱' rich'iquinjic quic'ux chiri̱j i Dios eh chiri̱j chic ric'axmajic wach bihomal xquiyew quicapew-bal.

Je' re' ajic Timote̱yo raj camanom i Dios, re' hat reh chi ma' eta nac'ul aweh chi je' re', til nipahkaj aweh chi ma̱ban aweh i ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal re're', re' la' cha'n chak'eb lok rij ac'ux. Je' wo' chic chachop ac'ux chi c'acharic ru̱c' coric wach c'uxlis eh c'ahchi' ok ac'amam na̱ take c'uhbal reh kaniminic. Je' wo' chic chatik ju' rich'iquinjic ac'ux chiri̱j i Dios ch'i̱l ric'axaric take awas acha̱k'. Ma' xa re' ta re're', je' la' wo' wilic ok wo' awuyu'nbal ru̱c' i Dios chi ricuyuric take ti'c'axic nc'ulic lok ru'um reh kaniminic eh xa hat ok wo' chak'lam ru̱c' ano'jbal cu̱c' chi'nchel take c'acharel.

Re' niminic wilco̱j wi̱' to̱b ta ric'am cho c'axquilal je' ricab ric'am cho jeno' k'ak'anic nca'n take sol, k'e̱' tare̱t chi keh ritahkaljic. Chayew ac'ux chiri̱j i niminic re're' k'uru' je' ricab riye'eric quic'ux nca'n take sol naqui'oquic chi k'ak'anic. C'olok pan ac'ux chi re' hat chi pa'lic ac'ux chi coric, xayew achi̱' chi quiwach take q'uihal c'acharel chi re' hat na̱tahkem chi manlic i kaniminic. Naxa'n re're', re' Dios xatriyuk'ej wo' chi na̱wehcham i junelic c'acharic. Chi je' re' xiban awu̱c' i Dios, chachop wo' ac'ux chi nawehcham chi manlic i junelic c'acharic.

Yu'na k'uru' reh chi wilic take enquiyew quichi̱' chi re' hin coric wach i c'uhtunic c'ahchi' nibanam je aweh, nicoj jenaj i kAja̱w Dios wu̱c' re' nye'bic quic'acharic take chi'nchel pa' bih wilic china̱ ac'al wili. Je' wo' nicoj wo' jenaj wu̱c' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh re' ma' xyo'jic ta wo' chi riye'eric richi̱' chiri̱j riniminic naxpahbabjic chiwach i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to. Chi quiwach take re', til nipahkaj aweh chi

chac'am na̱ chi coric take tak'anic bano̱j aweh reh chi je' re' sak ok wach ano'jbal eh chi ma' eta nwih'ic jeno' k'ilo̱j chawi̱j. Je' aj re' cha'n cu rehtal enkilow risoljic wo' chic cho i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Re' aj chic risoljic cho Jesus, til re' wo' i Lok' laj Dios naritik'enic cho wach rik'ijil chi narilmijic wach. Ru'um aj re' kayew tak rilok'il i Dios pan ti̱j chi je' wili: Xa re' wach i Dios, xa re' wach re' wilic rajawric chi quina̱ take wilic cajawric chi tak'anic. Re're' wilic chi pe̱t k'atal k'oric chi quixilac take k'atal k'oric . Re're' wilic chi pe̱t k'atal k'oric chi quixilac take k'atal k'oric. Re're' wilic chi pe̱t ajabe̱s chi quixilac take ajabe̱s china̱ ac'al wili.

Je' wo', xa re' wach i Dios c'achlic chi junelic. Re're' ar nc'acharic chipam jenaj rinimal sakom re' ma' riyew ta k'ab chi narilmijic wach i Dios eh ru'um re' ma' jeno' c'acharel til ta nak rilom wach i Dios, on til ta narilom cok wach yu'na chipam rilok'il wilic wi̱'. Til k'ormojok k'uru' chi re' Dios til k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal rilok'il eh chi re' wo' re' nk'atbic k'oric chi junelic k'i̱j sakom. Til je' ta nak re' k'ormojok chiri̱j i Dios.

Ar chipam comonil wilca̱t wi̱', wilic take aj niminel k'e̱' biho̱m take ru'um reh rinimal wach quibihomal quimolom wach ayu' wach ac'al. Chiqui̱j take re' nipahkaj aweh chi chapahkaj queh chi ma' nquinimsaj qui̱b ru̱c' pa' bih wilic queh je' wo' ma' nquichop quic'ux chiri̱j i quibihomal, re' la' ca'n quichop quic'ux chiri̱j i c'achlic Dios re' xa ye'lic wo' cho k'ab chi kana̱ chi riye'eric pa' bih keh nakiq'uic wi̱' k'i̱j chi suk kac'ux.

Je' wo', chak'or queh take niminel wilic quibihomal re're' chi ca'n i coric eh nic' pa' wach nok chi wilic quibihomal je' ok wo' re' take chi ribanaric i holohic laj to'bonic. Chak'or wo' queh chi chak'lam ok take cu̱c' cas quicha̱k' eh xa ye'lic ok quik'ab ru̱c' i pa' bih wilic queh
reh chi je' re' je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak quimolom wach quibihomal, yohbal chic wach quico̱ch naquik'atam lok ri̱j pan quic'acharic je chi quiwach re' naquic'acharic wi̱' chi junelic.

Timote̱yo, re' ye'o̱j aweh ru'um i Dios chi na̱co'lem ri̱j, chaco'lej wo' ri̱j chi coric. Nipahkaj wo' aweh chi re' take k'oric ma' ye'bal ta rilok'il i Dios eh ma' to'bonel ta wo' queh take quibirinic reh, chawic'saj lok ri̱j axiquin take k'oric re're'. Je' wo' re' cha'n ru̱c' quik'orbal take xa nquik'ihtaj wo' qui̱b ru̱c' take xa tik'imaj wach k'oric. Re' take c'acharel re', to̱b ta wo' ma' coric ta take k'oric nquik'or, xa c'ahchi' wo' quik'orom chi ru̱c' take k'oric re're' nquirak quino'jbal.

Chayohbalej awi̱b k'uru' chiwach take no'jbal re're'. Je' re' nik'or aweh maj wilic take aj niminel xquicana̱' rich'iquinjic quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus xa ru'um ritahkaljic take k'oric re're'. Je' aj re' ru' Timote̱yo, re' ta nak rato'bil i Dios wih'ok awu̱c' chi junelic ac'acharic. Je' ta nak re' banarok awu̱c'.

Re' hin ma' Lu̱', re' hin quintz'ihminic je reh hu̱j wili. Ru'um chi re' kAja̱w Dios je' re' xa̱j chiwi̱j, re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xiripahba̱' chi aj k'orol reh junelic c'acharic rik'orom cho ribiral i Dios najtir k'i̱j chi nariyeb cho. Re' riye'eric cho c'acharic re're' xo̱j wo' manlajok wach ku̱c' i hoj re' nkach'ica̱' kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus.

Re' aj hu̱j wili c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh hat Timote̱yo re' wilca̱t chi je' na acab hat wac'u̱n ru'um nok k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj. Tinic'alenej je k'uru' ru̱c' take k'oric wili: Re' ta nak kAja̱w Dios ch'i̱l i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric ru'um i Dios, quiye'bok cho cato'bil chana̱, tiquic'ax eh quiye'bok wo' cho risukquil ac'ux.

Re' Dios xquilok'ej cho wach take kama̱m kati't re' wo' re' i nilok'ej wach i hin chi ma'xta bih jeno' encojbic nimahc pa nicapew-bal. Chiwach aj i Dios re're', re' hin xa eli̱c wo' k'i̱j ak'ab niban johtok niti̱j eh xa c'ahchi' wo' nitioxonic johtok chiwach chawi̱j i hat re' xa wilca̱t wo' pa nic'ux naniban niti̱j.

Wilic jenaj ma' niq'uic ta pa nic'ux, je' ricab take ri̱s nak' awach xak'e'b cho chiki̱j naxkach'ak cho ki̱b. Re're' til riban wi̱' chi xa ji̱k' chic i wa̱mna chi rilmijic wo' chic awach. Til ta nak ewo' chic nwilow awach, k'e̱' nak ensukbic nic'ux.

Re' hin ma' jaruj ta eniq'uic pa nic'ux i ricorquilal wach ac'ux naxanimej cho i kAja̱w Jesus. Re' ricorquilal ac'ux re're' je' ricab ricorquilal ric'ux atu̱t re' ti' Ewni̱se ch'i̱l aq'ue̱n ti' Lo̱yra eh nicapaj i hin chi cu yu'na chi k'i̱j xa cu je' wo' re' acapew-bal chiri̱j i Jesus.

Re' k'oro̱j chiri̱j acapew-bal re're', re' ok re' camanok aweh chi naric'ulic cho pan ac'ux i wili: Naxatnipahba̱' cho chi na̱banam chi hat raj camanom i Dios ru̱c' ricojoric take nik'ab chana̱, re' Dios xiyew aweh awajawric re' ye'o̱j ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal chi je' ricab jeno' si̱. Yu'na k'uru' chi ye'o̱j chic aweh i ajawric re're', chacana̱' chi nimsjok wach i camanic riban awu̱c' je' ricab riban i k'a̱k' chi xa ntenic chic i xak riban nanwahljic cok.

Je' re' ajic ru'um chi wilic chic ku̱c' rUxlabal i Dios ma' riban ta chi enwih'ic yo'jic pan ka̱mna. Re' riwi̱' chi je' re' nik'or reh chi re' kAja̱w Dios xiyew cho keh rUxlabal reh chi re' hoj ma'xta bih nakayo'jic wi̱'. Je' wo', re' rUxlabal i Dios xye'eric wo' cho keh reh chi nariwih'ic kajawric, reh chi nakac'axam wo' ki̱b cu̱c' take kich aj niminel eh chi nariwih'ic kano'jbal reh chi je' re' nkarak chiri̱j nic' wach c'acharic naka'nam.

Je' re' nok ru'um chi wilic awu̱c' rUxlabal i Dios ma' tiq'uix'ic chi rik'ormojic ribiral ric'uhbal i Jesus. Je' wo', ma' tiq'uix'ic chi k'oric chiwi̱j i hin chi wilqui̱n pan che̱' ru'um reh rik'ormojic rik'orbal i Jesus. Wi xc'ulic wo' nchel lok i ti'c'axic chana̱, ma' tiyo'jic wo' chiwach, ticholok la' ricuyuric je' wo' ricab ricuyuric ti'c'axic c'ahchi' nibanam i hin ru'um reh rik'ormojic ribiral i Jesus. Re' Dios wilic rajawric eh ru̱c' rajawric re're' riban chi re' hat enacuy ransil i ti'c'axic.

Wih'ok wo' pan ac'ux chi ru̱c' i rajawric wilic xojrico'lej reh chi ma' eta nkac'ul i ti'c'axic ru'um reh kamahc eh re' kayuk'unjic xiban i Dios reh chi nakac'acharic chi saksamaj wach kano'jbal, re' wo' re' nc'uhtunic reh rinimal rajawric wilic. Je' aj re', re' kaco'ljic ch'i̱l i kayuk'unjic xbanjic, re' wo' Dios xbanic, re' cok ru' ma' ru'um ta nchel chi holohic ta nak kojbanic xiban chi je' re' ru'um la' chi pa ra̱mna i Dios xasjic cho ribanaric xa ru'um reh ric'axbal wilic chi kana̱. Je' re' nik'or maj nok cu ja' nch'ihquic ta nak cho i c'acharic ayu' wach ac'al, re' c'axbal re're' wilic chic cho pa ra̱mna i Dios chi naric'uhtam lok ru̱c' ric'ulic lok i kaK'atal K'oric Jesus.

Yu'na aj ru' wilco̱j chic chipam take k'i̱j re' c'ahchi' ric'uhtunic wi̱' ric'axbal i Dios. Je' re' nik'or maj re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, xc'ulic chic c'acharok ayu' wach ac'al. Re' Jesus, re' wo' re' xco'lonic keh hoj aj niminel reh chi ma' eta chic nkac'ul i ti'c'axic ru'um reh kamahc eh til re' wo' re' xuctic wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak. Ru̱c' aj ructic re're', xiban chi ma'xta chic ransil i quimic chi kana̱. Ma' xa re' ta re' xiban, xiban la' wo' chi ru̱c' ribirmijic i lok' laj c'uhbal chiri̱j ribiral ructic, xsakomsjic pa̱m kacapew-bal i hoj aj niminel reh chi enkarak chiri̱j chi nakojquimok je ekojc'acharic chi junelic.

Je' aj re' ru'um chi re' ribiral ructic i Jesus nsakomonic pan kacapew-bal, re' Dios xiripahba̱' chi aj k'orol riC'uhbal chi nawojic cu̱c' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh chi quixilac take re', re' hin niban nicamaj chi aj k'oro̱l je' wo' chi aj c'uhtunel reh ribiral ructic i Jesus.

Ru'um aj re' yu'na re' hin c'ahchi' nic'ulum take xa chi'nchel wach ti'c'axic. Je' ricab yu'na re' hin wilqui̱n pan che̱', xa re' la' ma' quinq'uix'ic ta so' chi rik'ormojic chaj wa'ric nok wilqui̱n ayu' ru'um nok weht'alim hab wach aj u̱c' choplic nic'ux eh chi re' choplic wi̱' nic'ux re're' til wilic rajawric chi manlic. Ru̱c' re're', til weht'alim wo' chi cu rehtal rirak cho rik'ijil ric'ulic lok i kAja̱w Jesus, re're' naricholic wo' ric'oloric ri̱j i pa' bih xwokxo'nej pan k'ab.

Chi'nchel i hoj re' xkanimej chic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric npahkaljic keh chi kach'ica̱' tak kac'ux chiri̱j i Dios chi manlic eh kac'ax wo' tak ru' eh je' wo' take kas kacha̱k'. Ru̱c' i pahkanic re're', wilic wo' jenaj chic pahkanic nwa̱j nibanam je aweh chi je' wili: Re' c'uhtunic na'n i hat cha'n je' ok wo' ricab i coric laj tijinic xawilow chi xnic'uhtaj aweh.

Re' lok' laj tijinic re're', okxa'njic pan ak'ab reh chi na̱banam i c'uhtunic chi manlic. Je' re' nok til nipahkaj aweh chi chac'ol ri̱j reh chi ma' eta no̱j yojok wach. Re' ok i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios wilic pan awa̱mna to'bonok aweh chi ribanaric re're'.
Re' hat xaweht'alij wo' chi q'uihal take aj niminel re' wilque̱b pa riyuk'ul i A̱sya xquicana̱' nitobjic yu'na nok chi wilqui̱n pan che̱' je' ricab xiban i ma' Pije̱lo ch'i̱l i ma' Moj.

Re' ti cok i ma' Onesi̱poro ma' xiricana̱' ta chi wutquel. Ru'um aj re' niban niti̱j chiri̱j chi re' kAja̱w Jesus chic'uhtaj ta nak cho ric'axbal china̱ ch'i̱l take raj pan pa̱t maj xa re' wo' naxincojoric ayu' pan che̱', re're' q'uih pech xiyew risukquil nic'ux eh ma' xq'uix'ic ta nech' ok wu'um.
Xa re' wo' ric'ulic lok ayu' i kasbe̱s re're' ayu' pan tinamit Ro̱ma, xiyew ric'ux chi nisiq'uiric cu rehtal xirirak ayu' pan che̱'.

Ru'um aj re' til niban niti̱j chiri̱j i Onesi̱poro chi re' kAja̱w Jesus chic'uhtaj ric'axbal china̱ chipam i k'i̱j nawih'ok cok i Onesi̱poro chiwach. Je' re' ajic til re' Dios to'bonok reh maj k'e̱' wo' chic nitobjic xiban je' ricab aweht'alim wo' i hat chi xiban keh nok wilco̱j nak cho pan tinamit E̱peso.

Hat Timote̱yo re' xa je' na hat wac'u̱n nok wilca̱t chipam i niminic, re' hat aweht'alim chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric riyew cho rinimal rajawric chi katobjic. Ru'um aj re' til nipahkaj aweh chi chayew k'ab reh Jesus chi ericowsaj ac'ux.

Je' wo', nipahkaj aweh chi re' take tijbal abiram cho wu̱c' chiwach q'uihal aj niminel xi'ilbic aweh naxatpahbabjic chi aj k'orol reh riC'uhbal i Dios, re' wo' take c'uhtunic re're' chac'uhtaj queh take winak aj niminel je' ru̱c' aj ch'iquem c'uxlis take reh chi re' take re', ewo' chic nca'n i c'uhtunic queh take toco̱m chic aj niminel.

Re' chic chiri̱j i ti'c'axic nchalic chana̱ xa ru'um chi xanimej i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, nipahkaj wo' chi chacuy take ransil je' ricab nok jeno' sol ricuy ransil take pa' bih ti'c'axic niq'uic take wi̱' ru'um ricamaj wilic wi̱'.

Re' ano'jbal k'uru' je' ok ricab i rino'jbal i sol. Re're' ma' rimin ta ri̱b chipam toco̱m chic jeno' camanic pa reh lok maj reht'alim chi re' nahsil sol xcojbic reh chi je' re' ricamaj, k'e̱' ensukbic ric'ux wi xa chiwach c'ahchi' cok chi camanic.

Je' wo' chic, re' ano'jbal je' ok ricab rino'jbal i aj ajamanel. Re're' naripaj ri̱b ch'i̱l take toco̱m chic aj ajamanel, ric'am na̱ chi'nchel take pa' bih take no'jbal nchopbic na̱ i pajoj i̱b chi ajamanic maj xa chi je' re' naric'ulum rico̱ch wi xiban canar ajamanic.

Je' wo' chic, re' ano'jbal je' ok ricab rino'jbal i aj abixo̱m laj winak. Re're' pe̱t riban ric'axquilal ricamanjic wach i ac'al xa re' la' nanponic rik'ijil chi narimolom wach take tic, re' aj abixo̱m re're' riban risukquil wach i ricamaj.
Je' aj re' k'uru' Timote̱yo, ticapewenok ru̱c' take xnik'or aweh re're' eh re' ta nak i kAja̱w Dios chiyew riman ano'jbal chi rirakmajic chiri̱j take no'jbal re're'.

Je' wo' wilic toco̱m chic take k'oric nwa̱j chi na̱capewenic chiri̱j. Je' ricab nwa̱j chi na̱capam chiri̱j i ribiral wili chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric: Re' Jesus re' ra̱' ri'sil wo' cho i k'atal k'oric aj najtir k'i̱j ma' Tawiy, xuctic wo' chic chi quixilac take camnak. Re' take holohic laj k'oric wili, re' wo' re' nik'or ribiral i hin queh c'acharel

eh ru'um reh rik'ormojic re're', re' hin c'ahchi' wo' nic'ulum take ti'c'axic ayu' pan che̱' chi je' na nicab jeno' aj cansanel nok wilqui̱n. Xa re' la' ru' ma' nik'or ta bihnal chi wilqui̱n ayu' pan che̱' ru'um nok ma' ra̱j ta rik'orom chi re' rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios tz'aplic ta nak wo' ayu' pan che̱'.

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um reh rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios re' hin c'ahchi' wo' nic'ulum ti'c'axic, xa re' la' ru' cu ewo' nicuy ransil take ti'c'axic reh chi re' take aj niminel re' chiho̱j take ru'um i Dios chi ritinami̱t enquich'ica̱' quic'ux chi manlic chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Ru'um chi je' re' enca'n, re' take re' equic'acharic wo' chi junelic ar re' wilic wi̱' i Dios chi sutumaj ri̱j ru̱c' rinimal wach sakom.

Ch'i̱l take k'oric re're', wilic wo' take k'oric til ch'iclic wo' wi̱' nic'ux. Re' wili take k'oric re're': “Je' ricab xic'ul i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi xquimic je, chi xuctic wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak eh chi yu'na c'achlic wo' chic, je' wo' re' naric'uluric ku̱c' hoj raj niminel chi nakojquimok je, nakucsjic wo' chic cho eh nakac'acharic wo' chi junpech.

Je' wo', je' ricab xc'uluric ru̱c' i Jesus chi re're' xpahbabjic chi K'atal K'oric, je' wo' re' i hoj nakehtric wo' ru̱c' i rilok'il re're'. Je' re' nakac'ulum xa re' wach wi re' hoj enkayew k'ab chi enkac'ul i ti' c'axic nchalic chi kana̱ ru'um reh i kaniminic. Ra̱j nchel wi chipam i ti'c'axic re're', re' hoj enkak'or chi re' Jesus ma' re' ta Ajabe̱s chi kana̱, re're' narik'orom wo' keh chi ma' re' ta hoj raj tahkanel.

Re' kAja̱w Jesus manlic wach i rik'or. To̱b ta nchel re' hoj ma' manlic ta kawach ru̱c' nkak'or chi naka'nam, re're' xa naribanam wo' i haj wilic rik'orom chi naribanam maj re' rik'or i Jesus chi naribanam, ma' eta ricana̱' ribanaric, nqui rik'or take k'oric re're'.

Re' hat wilic awajawric re' ye'o̱j aweh ru'um i Dios. Je' re' k'uru' re' take k'oric cu re' xnicohlaj lok rik'ormojic aweh chatik ju' rik'ormojic queh take aj niminel reh chi ma' eta niq'uic pan quic'ux. Je' wo', chak'or queh chi ma' nquibanlom take k'oric chi xa ma'xta bih riwi̱' maj re're' xa ma'xta bih eritik queh, re' la' enca'n ru̱c' re're' xa riyojoric quic'ux take c'acharel re' equibirinic reh take k'oric re're'.

Tz'a̱b ru' re' riC'uhbal i Dios rik'or keh i ricorquilal eh ru'um re' curman chi cha'n ric'uhtjic chi coric. Ma' xa re' ta re' ra̱j banaric ra̱j la' wo' chi ru̱c' chi'nchel awa̱mna cha'n acamaj reh chi re' Dios erik'or chipam i k'i̱j re' natiwih'ok wi̱' chiwach chi re' hat k'e̱' tare̱t i camanic xa'n eh je' wo' reh chi etiwih'ic chiwach i Dios je' ricab i jenaj aj camanom re' naxwih'ic chiwach rajabe̱s ma' xq'uix'ic ta chi rik'ormojic reh nic' wach i camanic xiban.

Je' wo', chipam i camanic wilca̱t wi̱' ma̱min awi̱b ru̱c' take k'oric wi ma' re' ye'bal rilok'il i Dios eh ma' to'bonel ta wo' queh take quibirinic reh. Je' re' nik'or aweh maj re' take nquimin qui̱b ru̱c' take k'oric je' re' riman chic nquimin qui̱b chipam i no'jbal je' ru̱c' ma' riyew ta rilok'il Dios.

Chi je' re' ru̱c' i c'uhtunic nca'n, nquijot' ricapew-bal take toco̱m chic c'acharel je' ricab jot'o̱j riban i rex k'a̱ nok xa eli̱c chic c'ahchi' ric'uxum je ri̱b. Wilic quib take c'acharel je' re' c'ahchi' ca'nam, re' Himene̱yo ch'i̱l i ma' Pile̱to.

Re' take qui̱b c'acharel re're' xquicana̱' ric'uhbaljic i coric c'uhtumaj keh hoj eh yu'na c'ahchi' chic quik'orom chi re' cuctic cho take camnak xc'uluric chic cho eh ru̱c' take k'oric nca'n re're', wilic take c'acharel c'ahchi' riyojic quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus.

Je' re' ajic wilic take k'oric riban chi re' take c'acharel ma' cow ta nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus. Tz'a̱b ru' take k'oric nchalic ru̱c' i Dios, re' take re' xa je' na nchel cow laj ch'iquinbal cho reh jeno' ma' laj pa̱t. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take k'oric re're' riban chi re' take c'acharel cow enquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus. Je' wo' chic, je' ricab ritz'ihmjic jeno' bihnal nbanjic chiwach i ch'iquinbal cho reh jeno' pa̱t reh chi nareht'aljic hab wach aj eh i pa̱t re're', re' take k'oric nchalic ru̱c' i Dios to'bonel wo' take chi reht'aljic i nic' pa' nimal reht'alim i Dios. Je' re' nik'or maj re' kAja̱w Dios reht'alim wo' hab wach take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n eh rik'orom wo' chi hab wach nk'oric chi aj niminel reh Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, curman chi naricana̱b wo' ribanaric chi'nchel i c'ahbil laj no'jbal.

Yu'na nwa̱j nik'orom wo' aweh tak i wili: Chipam jeno' ma' laj pa̱t re' nc'acharic wi̱' jeno' biho̱m, xa chi'nchel wach take camanbal wilic chipam. Wilic take tik'imaj ru̱c' take k'an woric laj ch'ihch'. Wilic take tik'imaj ru̱c' nworwotic laj sak ch'ihch'. Wilic wo' take tik'imaj ru̱c' che̱' eh wilic wo' take tik'imaj xa ru̱c' k'antz'a'p. Ma' xa ta re' ta re' nik'or aweh tak, nik'or la' wo' chi quiju'junal take camanbal re're' rehreh wach nquicamanej. Wilic take lo̱k' wach quicamanic wi̱' eh wilic wo' take xa pa' ti bih quicamanic wi̱'.

Je' wo' re' nc'uluric ku̱c' i hoj aj niminel. Je' re' nik'or maj hab wach jeno' aj niminel ric'ol ri̱j ric'acharic chi ma'xta rimahcanic chiwach i Dios, re're' lo̱k' chiwach i Ajabe̱s Jesus eh lo̱k' wo' i camanic riban chiwach, je' ricab nok jeno' holohic laj camanbal, lo̱k' wo' i camanic ncojoric wi̱'.

Re' aj re' riwi̱' k'uru' Timote̱yo, chi nik'orom chic aweh chi chak'eb lok chiri̱j ac'ux chi'nchel c'ahbilal no̱j wi̱' quicapew-bal take q'uijolak. Re' la' cha'n chayew ac'ux chi c'acharic chi coric wach ano'jbal. Coric ok wo' wach ak'orbal, chac'am wo' na̱ pa' bih nk'ormojic aweh. Je' wo', chac'ax i Dios eh tiwih'ok tak pan sukquil c'uxlis, je' ricab nca'n take xsaksjic chic wach i ca̱mna ru'um i Dios eh chi je' re' nquilok'ej wach.

Chiri̱j take memil laj no'jbal, re' hat aweht'alim wo' chi re're' xa wolinic i̱b rucsaj cho. Ru'um aj re' nipahkaj aweh chi naqui'oquic chi k'oric chiri̱j take no'jbal ma' nrakmajic ta wo' chiri̱j, ma̱ban hat jenaj chi quixilac take c'acharel je' re' nca'n

maj aweht'alim wo' i hat chi re' hoj raj camanom i Dios ma' ric'ul ta chi keh i sic'oj wolic re' la' curman chi keh chi nakac'uhtam i kachak'lamil cu̱c' chi'nchel take c'acharel. Ru'um chi wilic i ihk chi kana̱ i hoj chi aj c'uhtunel reh riC'uhbal i Dios, curman wo' chi tikilco̱j ok chi ric'uhtjic chi coric. Wi ru'um reh kac'uhtunic re're' xchalic i ti'c'axic chi kana̱, ma' nka'n jelow-bal i ti'c'axic nbanjic keh.

Je' re' ajic, re' hoj raj camanom i Dios til curman chi ma' re' ta ru̱c' wolic naka'nam i cojoj no'jbal, ru̱c' la' chak'lamil enkak'il take sahchel take chipam quino'jbal wilque̱b wi̱' re' rik'ehtjic quib nca'n chiwach i Dios. Je' re' nik'or chi naka'nam reh chi je' re', k'i̱j ta nak re' Dios eriquetelej cho quiwach chi equi'oquic chipam reht'alij i coric laj ric'uhbal ru'. Je' re' naribanam wi la' re' take re' enquiyot' quic'ux chiri̱j i quimahc.
Wi je' re' xca'n k'uru' re' Dios naribanam chi naquesam take cho pa rixo'rbal aj Yahm re' nchukunic queh chi naca'nam haj wilic nponic chiwach ru' ru'um nok pan k'ab wilic quic'acharic.

Hat Timote̱yo, curman wo' chi na̱weht'alim take wili: Chipam take k'i̱j wilco̱j wi̱' wili cu rehtal cho risoljic i kAja̱w Jesus, naric'ulic lok take k'i̱j c'axic chic wach chi keh hoj aj niminel reh Jesus.

Je' re' nik'or aweh maj chiwach take k'i̱j k'oro̱j re're', wilic take c'acharel xa re' chic i queh naquiyeb qui̱b chi suk ru̱c' pa' bih nquic'ax wach. Wilic wo' take xa nacotowem chic chi nariwih'ic quitz'a̱k reh chi naquibihomric. Je' wo', wilic take naquinimsam qui̱b eh naca'nam qui̱b chi xa nim chic quiwa'ric. Ma' xa re' ta re' no'jbal naribanjic, wilic la' wo' take c'acharel til re' chic ritz'ujuric i cas quicha̱k' naca'nam. Wilic wo' take ma'xta chic quibirinic k'oric chiwach quitu̱t caja̱w. Wilic wo' take ma'xta chic riwi̱' quitioxbal eh wilic wo' take ma'xta chic quiyohlem wach i Dios.

Je' re' ajic ru'um chi re're' i no'jbal nariwih'ic, nakilom chi re' take c'acharel re're' ma'xta riwih'ic c'axoj i̱b cu̱c'. Ma' wo' nariwih'ic so' cuybal cu̱c'. Xa na̱ ru', naquitz'akam wach c'uta̱j chiqui̱j take cas quicha̱k'. Je' wo', naquic'acharic chi xa cha'n chic aweh c'acharic naca'nam. K'e̱' wo' naquic'uhtam quijosk'il eh naquixowem wach take haj wilic coric quibanic.

Ma' xa re' ta re' naca'nam take c'acharel re're', naquik'ahsam la' wo' take cas quicha̱k' pan quik'ab take aj ixowonel. Naricowjic wo' quicapew-bal chi xa re' chic ribanaric i c'ahbilal naca'nam. Je' wo', nariq'uic na̱ quik'itk'itil chiwach i Dios eh ma'xta chic quic'axam i Dios, re' la' chic ric'axaric wach i sic'oj sukquil quic'ux china̱ ac'al wili nacotowem ribanaric chiwach risiq'uiric i Dios.

Chi je' re' riwi̱' quino'jbal naca'nam, re' take c'acharel re're' na wo' ca'nam qui̱b chi je' wo' ti chic aj niminel take xa re' la' pan ca̱mna ma' nquiyew ta k'ab reh Dios reh chi ru̱c' rajawric erijal i quino'jbal. Ru'um aj chi'nchel re're' nik'or aweh chi cu̱c' aj take c'acharel re're' ma̱min awi̱b.

Je' re' cha'n maj ma' xa re' ta re' c'ahbil laj no'jbal nca'n, je' la' wo' nca'n ribanaric take wili: Naqui'oquic chi c'uhtunic xa suk chic wach k'oric nca'n reh chi naca'nam canar oquic pan quipa̱t take aj niminel. Ru'um chi chipam take pa̱t re're' wilic pech wilic take ixok ma'xta so' quino'jbal chi rirakmajic chiri̱j i c'ahbil laj c'uhtunic nca'n take c'acharel re're', re' take ixok je' ricab re're' quikajic chipam i quic'uhtunic take c'acharel re're'. Re' wili nc'uluric pan tak pa̱t re' wilque̱b wi̱' take ixok re' behsemaj quicapew-bal chi ribanaric i mahc eh xa quimahcanic wo', to̱b ta quicahnic chi ma' suk ta pa̱m i ca̱mna.

Re' take ixok ma'xta so' quino'jbal re're' quibiram chic i kac'uhtunic i hoj xa re' la' ru'um chi nca̱j quitijem qui̱b ru̱c' toco̱m chic c'uhtunic, ma' nquic'u'lej ta chic na̱ i kac'uhtunic i hoj chi re're' i coric.

Re' la' chic nquic'u'lej na̱ i quic'uhtunic take c'acharel re're', re' ma' c'ulu̱j ta chic take ru'um i Dios chi ritinami̱t take eh moysomaj chic pa̱m i quino'jbal chi rirakmajic chiri̱j i riC'uhbal i Dios. Til nik'or aweh chi re' take c'acharel re're' ru'um chi nquik'ihtaj qui̱b chiwach i kac'uhbal, nca'n queh je' ricab xca'n take quib chi winak aj war je' wili quibihnal: Re' Ja̱nes ch'i̱l i Ja̱mres. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re're' xquik'ihtaj qui̱b chiwach i Moyses najtir k'i̱j naxik'oric ru̱c' i quik'atal k'oric aj Eji̱pto chi ma' ric'u'lej na̱ rino'jbal i Moyses.

Je' re' nok, ru'um chi re' quino'jbal take jot'o̱l laj c'acharel re're' je' ricab quino'jbal i Ja̱nes ch'i̱l i Ja̱mres, nik'or wo' aweh chi xa ma' naht ta wo' naca'nam chi je' re'. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take c'acharel naquicojom rehtal chi xa sahchel wach i quino'jbal je' ricab xc'uluric cho cu̱c' take quib chi aj war re're'.

Timote̱yo, re' ano'jbal i hat ma' je' ta ricab i quino'jbal take jot'o̱l laj c'acharel re're'. Cu yu'na chi k'i̱j, re' hat c'ahchi' ac'amam na̱ i c'uhbal xabiraj wu̱c' eh xacoj pan acapew-bal chi na̱c'acharic je' ricab i c'acharic xnicoj pa nicapew-bal i hin chi nanibanam. Re' hin c'ahchi' nich'ica̱b nic'ux chi manlic chiri̱j i Jesus eh je' wo' re' na'n i hat. Je' wo', re' hat c'ahchi' ac'axam take tinamit je' ricab riwi̱' xawilow chi xniban i hin. Re' hin wilic wo' wuyunbal chi ricuyuric take ti'c'axic nchalic chi nina̱ eh je' wo' re' hat wilic wo' awuyu'nbal.

Ma' xa re' ta re', re' hat ac'ulum la' wo' take ti'c'axic je' ricab nic'ulum cho hin. Re' hin xnic'ul cho ti'c'axic ar Antiyoqui̱ya, ar Ico̱nyo ch'i̱l wo' ar Li̱stra xa re' la' ru' re' kAja̱w Jesus xirito'bej chi xiniq'uic chipam take ti'c'axic xchalic chi nina̱ chipam take tinamit re're'.

Je' re' k'uru' Timote̱yo, re' hat ch'i̱l i hin kac'ulum chic take ti'c'axic, xa re' la' ru' ma' nsahchic kac'ux chi je' re' nkac'ul maj keht'alim chi nic' pa' q'uihal take quiniminic reh Jesus re' nca̱j c'acharic ru̱c' coric wach c'uxlis chiwach i Dios narixowjic quiwach.

Je' aj re' ru' nkac'ul ru'um rinimjic i Jesus xa re' la' take c'acharel aj jot'o̱l re're' ru̱c' i jot'o̱j nca'n, xa rehreh nacojic sahchok chipam i ma' holohic ta laj quino'jbal. Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab chi re' take caj tijinel xjot'oric quino'jbal ru̱c' i c'uhtunic xbanaric queh, re' take c'acharel re're' naquitikim wo' ju' rijot'oric quino'jbal take toco̱m chic c'acharel ru̱c' wo' c'uhtunic nca'n.

Je' re' nok ru'um reh c'uhtunic nca'n take c'acharel aj jot'o̱l re're', til nipahkaj aweh chi re' hat chatik ju' ric'uhtjic i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus, re' atijem chic i hat chi coric. Re' c'uhbal re're' til aweht'alim i hat chi til coric. Nic' wach nanaweht'alij? Ru'um chi aweht'alim wo' nic' wach i kano'jbal i hoj awaj tijinel.

Je' wo' chic re' hat c'olok pan ac'ux chi cu pan at'uchal aweht'alim cho take c'uhbal tz'ihmbimaj chipam Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios. Re' lok' laj hu̱j re're', re' wo' re' nye'bic ano'jbal chi enarak chiri̱j chi xa hab wach ra̱j chi enco'ljic ru'um i Dios chiwach i ti'c'axic riyew cho ru'um i mahc, curman chi reh chi erich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Je' re' k'uru' nic' pa' nimal take k'oric tz'ihmbimaj chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re're', re' wo' rUxlabal i Dios xye'bic reh. Ru'um aj re' camanel take reh bano̱j c'uhtunic, reh banoj k'ilo̱j, reh ye'o̱j no'jbal eh je' wo' chi tijbal queh take c'acharel ru̱c' ricorquilal i holohic laj no'jbal ripahkaj i Dios.
Chi'nchel re're' nka'n reh chi je' re' nic' pa' q'uihal take quiniminic reh Dios xa tikilque̱b ok wo' chi manlic chi ribanaric chi'nchel wach holohic laj camanic chiwach ru'.

Yu'na reh chi wilic take enquiyew quichi̱' chi re' hin coric wach i c'uhtunic c'ahchi' nibanam je aweh, nicoj jenaj i kAja̱w Dios ch'i̱l wo' i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Re're' wilic rajawric chi rik'ataric k'oric chi quina̱ take cu c'acharic nca'n nac'olok wo' chic lok eh je' wo' re' chi quina̱ take camnak chic take je. Chi quiwach aj take re', til nipahkaj aweh chi

xa tikilca̱t ok wo' chi rik'ormojic ricorquilal riC'uhbal i Dios. Chaniq'uej ak'i̱j k'uru' chi rik'ormojic nok xa riyew ri̱b chi k'ormojic eh je' wo' nok chi c'axic chic rik'ormojic. Ru̱c' i c'uhbal re're' chak'il take c'acharel, chacoj wo' quino'jbal chi naca'nam i coric, chach'ubsaj quic'ux ru̱c' i c'uhbal eh ticuyunok wo' chi quitijiljic ru̱c' i coric laj c'uhbal re're'.

Je' re' ajic nipahkaj aweh chi na̱banam je' ricab xnik'or aweh chi na̱banam maj c'ulic lok reh take k'i̱j chi kawach nok re' take tinamit ma'xta ric'ulum quic'ux ribirmijic tijbal nc'uhtunic reh ricorquil ribiral i Dios, re' la' chic naca'nam, nacoquic chi ribanaric haj wilic ncotowej ribanaric. Chi je' re' naquitahkem take toco̱m chic aj tijinel re' naquik'oric reh xa pa' jaric tz'akoj wach ribiral je' ru̱c' xa ric'ul chic quixiquin ribirmijic.
Ru̱c' re're' ajic ma'xta chic cajwam ribirmijic i coric laj c'uhbal, re' chic take xa tz'akoj wach ribiral suk naquibiram.

Ru'um aj re' nik'or je aweh chi re' ano'jbal i hat ma' ok je' ricab quino'jbal take re', xa na'lic la' ok wo' aweh chi ricojoric rehtal chaj bih take c'ahchi' ric'uluric. Je' ricab wi xc'ulic lok ti'c'axic chana̱ ru'um i camanic na'n chacuy ransil eh chatik ju' rik'ormojic i ribiral i Jesus reh chi je' re' na̱banam acamaj chi manlic wach

maj xa nic' yu' ma' eta chic tinito'bej chipam acamaj ru'um nok re' hin xa ma' naht ta chic wilqui̱n china̱ ac'al wili. Je' ricab nanponic ri'orahil riquimic jeno' me̱' nc'ataric chi si̱ chiwach i Dios, re' ha' tik'imaj ru̱c' ri̱s u̱wa nchihcjic china̱ i me̱xa re' nc'ataric wi̱' i me̱', je' wo' re' i hin yu'na, xc'ulic wo' lok i k'i̱j chi nanicansjic je.

Wi je' re' xc'uluric, ta wo' re̱t chi wi̱n maj weht'alim chi je' ricab nok jeno' aj ajamanel xa cow chic riyew ric'ux nanoquic chipam jeno' pajoj ajamanic, cow wo' xniyew nic'ux i hin chi ribanaric nicamaj chiwach i Jesus. Weht'alim wo' chi xninimej chi manlic i camanic ye'o̱j wi̱n chi nanibanam eh re' take k'oric tak'amaj rik'ormojic wi̱n ru'um i Dios xnik'or chic chi manlic.

Yu'na k'uru' xa re' chic nwuy'ej chi nachirak cho rik'ijil rich'ukbal k'oric china̱ chi'nchel c'acharel, re' kAja̱w Jesus, re' manlic aj ch'ukul wach mahc, nariyeb i nico̱ch c'olo̱j lok wi̱n ru'um je' wo' nariyeb queh take nic' nimal ti' nquic'raj i Jesus eh ru'um re' c'ahchi' cuy'em chi naric'ulic wo' chic lok.
Re' chic yu'na nipahkaj je aweh chi chaloq'uej ti cho awi̱b chi etichalic chi wiliric,

maj wilic take wich'i̱l ma' wilque̱b ta chic wu̱c' je' ricab i ma' Te̱mas. Re're' ru'um reh ric'axaric wach xa suk laj wih'ic ric'am cho i na̱ ac'al wili, xo̱j pan tinamit Tesalo̱nica. Re' chic i ma' Crese̱nte xo̱j rilow take aj niminel wilque̱b pa riyuk'ul i Cala̱sya eh re' Ti̱to xo̱j chipam i riyuk'ul i Talma̱sya chi quilmijic wo' take aj niminel wilque̱b ar.

Yu'na xa chic ti re' ma' Cax wilic wu̱c' eh ru'um re' nipahkaj je ato'bil aweh chi natichalok wu̱c', chac'am cho ma' Cus chawi̱j ru'um nok re're' k'e̱' encamanic wi̱n ayu' chi waj to'o̱l chipam ricamaj i kAja̱w Dios.
Wilic jenaj chic waj to'o̱l ma' wilic ta wo' chic wu̱c' re' Ti̱quico ribihnal. Re're' xnitak'a̱' je ar pan tinamit E̱peso.

Natichalok ayu', chacuy chac'am cho wi̱n take pa' bih wi̱n xnicana̱' cho pa ripa̱t i kasbe̱s ma' Ca̱rpo ar Tro̱yas, je' ricab i ma' laj nijuc ro̱k tz'ih nicoj reh nic'uxic, ch'i̱l take nihu̱j quicamanic wi̱n eh re' til k'e̱' nwa̱j chi na̱c'amam cho wi̱n re' take nihu̱j tik'imaj ru̱c' que'emaj wach tz'uhu̱m.

Je' wo' chic Timote̱yo nwa̱j nik'orom je aweh, chi re' ma' Lej re' aj ch'eyol wach ch'ihch', yohbal wach ti' xiban wi̱n, xa re' la' hin xnicana̱' pan k'ab i kAja̱w Dios chi re're' tik'inok wach reh ru̱c' nic' pa' nimal i c'ahbilal xiban wi̱n.

Ru'um aj wo' reh jot'o̱j riban, re' hin nik'or je aweh chi re' hat chayohbalej awi̱b ru̱c' i winak re're' ru'um nok ma' nech' ric'ul wach i c'uhbalanic nka'n, c'ahchi' la' rik'ehtam ri̱b chiwach riC'uhbal i Dios.

Chiwach take cho k'i̱j re're' nok cu re' pe̱t nik'orbal chi rico'ljic wi̱b chiri̱j riC'uhbal i Dios, xa wutquel ti xinwih'ic maj ma' hab ta wach queh take wich'i̱l xiwih'ic wu̱c'. Ru'um aj reh xc'uluric lok re're', re' hin nipahkaj reh Dios chi nic' pa' nimal take xicananic wi̱n chi wutquel, ma' ta encojoric mahc chi quina̱ ru̱c' xca'n wi̱n re're'.

Je' re' k'uru' to̱b ta wo' xincahnic chi ma' jeno' chic waj to'o̱l wilic wu̱c', re' kAja̱w Dios xa xwih'ic wo' wu̱c' eh xa xiyew wo' wansil ch'i̱l ricowil nic'ux chi rik'ormojic ric'uhbal queh take tinamit xiwih'ic chipam i pe̱t nik'orbal xniban chi rico'ljic wi̱b. Chi je' re', re' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xiwih'ic ar xquibiraj wo' take k'oric xniban chi quiwach. Ru'um chi ar xwih'ic wu̱c' i kAja̱w Dios, re' hin xinco'ljic wo' chi quiwach take waj ixowonel je' ricab nanesmejic jeno' chak'lam laj chicop chiwach jeno' cakcoj re' naric'uxbic nak reh.

Yu'na k'uru' ru'um reh nico'ljic ribanam cho Dios riman chic nich'ica̱' nic'ux chiri̱j i wili: Re're' naquirico'lem chiwach take ma' holohic ta laj bano̱j nca̱j ca'nam johtok wi̱n chi niwach eh je' wo' chic, re're' til naquiricha'jem reh chi re' hin equinwih'ic chi quixilac take narik'ataric k'oric chi quina̱ ar pan taxa̱j. Lok'omaj ta nak i kAja̱w Jesus chi junelic k'i̱j sakom. Je' ta nak re' banarok.
Timote̱yo, nipahkaj je aweh chi chayew risukquilal ric'ux i ti' Pirsi̱la ch'i̱l Aqui̱la re' ribahi̱l. Je' wo' chayew risukquil ric'ux i ma' Onesi̱poro ch'i̱l chi'nchel take i raj pan pa̱t.
Nik'or wo' je aweh chi re' Era̱sto xcahnic cho ar Cori̱nto eh re' Tro̱pimo xnicana̱' cho ar Mile̱to ru'um chi xchop cho reh jenaj yowabjic.

Je' re' k'uru' Timote̱yo til chaloq'uej ti cho awi̱b chi chalic wu̱c' chi cu ja' nponic ta rik'ijil i k'elej. Re' take aj niminel ayu' c'ahchi' wo' quitak'a̱b je risukquil ac'ux je' ricab ma' E̱wulo, re' ma' Pure̱nte, re' ma' Li̱no, re' ti' Cala̱wya ch'i̱l wo' take chi'nchel aj niminel wilque̱b ayu'.

Ru̱c' ricohlsjic wach i hu̱j wili, re' wili i ti̱j niban i hin yu'na: Re' ta nak kAja̱w Jesus enwih'ic awu̱c' chi ricowsjic ac'ux eh re' ta wo' nak ric'axbal i Dios wih'ok chana̱ i hat ch'i̱l take nic' q'uihal aj niminel wilque̱b ar. Je' ta nak re' banarok awu̱c' tak. Re' wili niti̱j niban chiwach i kAja̱w Dios.

Re' hin ma' Lu̱', hin c'ahchi' nitz'ihminic reh hu̱j wili. Re' hin, hin raj camanom i Dios eh re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re're' xpahbanic wi̱n chi aj k'orol ribiral queh take chiho̱j chi ritinami̱t i Dios reh chi ru̱c' i k'oric enik'or queh enquich'ica̱' riman quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus. Chi je' re' ma' xa re' ta enquirak chiri̱j nic' nimal take c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j ricorquilal rino'jbal i Dios, je' la' wo' enquirak chiri̱j i c'acharic nka'n i hoj chi riye'eric rilok'il i Dios.

Je' wo', re' hin c'ahchi' nibanam nicamaj reh chi re' take chiho̱j chi ritinami̱t i Dios xa ch'iclic ok wo' quic'ux chi ruyu'njic i junelic c'acharic nariye'eric queh. Je' re' nik'or maj re' Dios nok cu ja' ntz'uhcric ta cho c'acharic wach ac'al, riyeb chic cho rik'orbal chi nariyeb i junelic c'acharic eh re' wili til coric, maj re' Dios ma' re' ta aj chucul k'oric, til wo' no̱j elok wach take pa' bih rik'or.

Ru'um aj re' yu'na naxirak cho rik'ijil re' sic'o̱j cho wach ru'um i Dios, re' take c'acharel ru̱c' i c'uhbalanic niban queht'alim chic rik'orbal i Dios chi nariyeb i junelic c'acharic eh re' hin c'ahchi' nik'orom i c'uhbal re're' maj re' Dios re' kajco'lonel xiritak'a̱' chi c'uhbalanic, je' wo' xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiwi̱j til chi nanik'orom haj wilic i rik'orom wi̱n.

Je' aj re', re' hin ma' Lu̱' c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je hu̱j wili aweh hat Ti̱to re' til manlic hat wac'u̱n chipam rinimjic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric re' ninimej wo' i hin. Nok c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam i hu̱j wili, re' hin c'ahchi' wo' nibanam niti̱j chawi̱j reh chi re' rato'bil i Ajabe̱s Dios ch'i̱l i kAja̱w Jesus re' kajco'lonel, wih'ok ta nak chana̱ eh re' ok wo' chak'lamil ch'i̱l sukquil c'uxlis nquiyew ru' wih'ok wo' awu̱c' i hat.

Je' ricab nc'ulic pan ac'ux, re' hin xatnicana̱' cho chipam ye'a̱b Cre̱ta ribihnal re' sutumaj ri̱j chi ha'. Je' re' xniban reh chi re' camanic xnip'ut ribanaric chi quixilac take aj niminel ar, re' chic i hat eticohlsonic wach. Je' wo', xnik'or cho ricorquilal aweh nic' wach riwi̱' nachapahba̱' take quinahsil aj niminel pan tak ju'jun chi tinamit reh ye'a̱b re're'.

Je' aj wili xnik'or cho aweh: Xa hab wach na̱cojom chi c'amol be̱h re' wili no'jbal chawilow reh: Ma'xta ok k'oric chiri̱j ru'um ricorquilal wach ric'acharic. Wi wilic chic rehq'ue̱n, xa jenaj ok chiwach ma' ok xa c'ul aj u̱c'. Je' wo', wi wilic chic take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n, til ok coric chi aj niminel take ru', ma'xta ok bih raj kilmijic queh ru'um chi c'ahbilal ta nak c'ahchi'que̱b, on chi ma' quibirinic ta chic k'oric chiwach quitu̱t caja̱w.

Je' wo' chic, ru'um chi nariwih'ic chi aj ilol reh ritinami̱t i Dios, re' c'amol be̱h na̱cojom curman chi ma'xta ok bih kilmijic raj reh. Ru'um aj re', re' wo' chic wili i no'jbal chawilow reh: Ma' ok xa k'itk'it ru̱c' rino'jbal. Ma' ok wo' xa mahnic' reh josk'il. Je' wo', ma' ok nchel aj xohc'rel, ma' ok xa aj sic'ol wolic eh ma' ok wo' xa aj sahc' tumi̱n ru̱c' rijot'oric take ras richa̱k'.

Re' la' no'jbal naric'uhtunic ru̱c' i c'amol be̱h re're', re' chi aj ye'ol ok quipatal take ras richa̱k' qui'o̱j c'olok ru̱c' chi pahkanic patal. Je' wo', xa chak'lam ok, ma' ok xa cha'n aweh no'jbal riban, coric ok wach ric'ux cu̱c' take ras richa̱k', tz'iro̱j ok wach ricapew-bal chi rinimjic take riC'uhbal i Dios eh nchol ok ripitjic ri̱b chi ribanaric i c'ahbilal.

Je' wo' chic, curman wo' chi re' c'amol be̱h ma' ok xa no̱j nchalic ricapew-bal chiri̱j i c'uhbal nkach'ica̱' wi̱' kac'ux maj re' c'uhbal re're', re' wo' re' xojtijiljic wi̱' chi'nchel i hoj aj niminel. Je' aj re' k'uru' riwi̱' i no'jbal na̱wilom reh i hab wach na̱pahba̱b chi c'amol be̱h, reh chi je' re' nachic'uhbalej take aj niminel ru̱c' nic' wach naca'n i holonquilal, ewo' nchol ripahkaljic queh chi naquic'amam na̱ i coric laj k'oric nc'uhtjic queh eh ewo' rich'uksaj quic'ux take quisolc'onic pa ri̱j i k'oric chiri̱j i c'uhbal re're'.

Je' re' nik'or maj ar pan tinamit Cre̱ta yohbal wach take aj chucul laj c'uhbalanel je' ru̱c' ma' nca̱j ta chic quinimem i coric laj c'uhbal, xi'uctubic cho chaxilac tak chi jot'o̱j eh xa chabanlom aweh c'uta̱j nca'n chi xa ma'xta ricorquil. Til je' re' nca'n take aj c'uhbalanel je' ru̱c' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' nquik'or queh take caj tahkanel chi wi nacoquic chipam rinimjic i Jesus, curman chi queh chi naquik'atam lok ritz'uhmal na̱ quic'achanbal.

Re' aj take aj c'uhbalanel re're', curman chi naquipitiric reh chi ma' eta chic nca'n jot'o̱j queh take aj niminel. Je' re' nik'or maj nanhamaric pan quina̱ take toco̱m chic c'uhtunic re' ma' tare̱t ta chi tijiljic, ar pan tak pa̱t re' wilque̱b wi̱' take aj niminel q'uihal take ma' nquic'ul ta chic i c'uhtunic chiri̱j i Jesus xa ru'um reh quik'orbal take aj c'uhbalanel re're'.

Ru̱c' nca'n ribanaric take aj c'uhbalanel re're', ntihkic wach rik'ormojic i ma' holohic ta laj ribiral chiqui̱j take aj Cre̱ta, re' xk'ormojic cho ru'um jenaj queh quich quitinami̱t xwih'ic cho najtir k'i̱j chi jenaj nim wach aj no'jbal chi quiwach. Je' aj wili rik'orom cho chiqui̱j aj Cre̱ta re're': “Re' take wich aj Cre̱ta, xa aj chucul k'oric take. C'ahbil wo' quino'jbal eh ma' hab ta wach nquiponbej. Xa je' quicab take josk' laj chicop, hamsa' take eh k'e̱' wo' chic siqui̱l take, nqui rik'orom cho.

Je' re' k'uru' Ti̱to re' take k'oric nanik'orom wili til coric take eh ru'um aj re' nik'or je aweh chi chapahba̱' ac'ux chi quik'ilmijic take aj niminel ar Cre̱ta chi ma' re' ta coric laj c'uhbal c'ahchi' quitahkem ru̱c' rinimjic quic'uhbal take aj c'uhbalanel re're'. Wi xak'il aj take aj niminel, re' take re' naricorjic wo' chic wach quino'jbal chipam rinimjic i Jesus.

Je' wo', naquicana̱b lok wulu' ribirmijic take k'oric nca'n take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chiri̱j xa tz'akoj wach rik'ormojic jeno' ribiral eh ma'xta wo' chic quic'amam na̱ chaj bih rik'or take c'uhbal xa tik'imaj wach cu'um take c'acharel nquesaj lok qui̱b chipam i coric laj c'uhbal.

Je' re' k'uru' Ti̱to, re' k'oric wili chac'uhtaj queh take aj niminel: Chi queh take quisakbem chic wach i ca̱mna ru̱c' rinimjic i Jesus, re' ric'uxuric take nic' pa' q'uihal c'uxbal rik'or chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j cho reh i Moyses chi ma' tare̱t ta chi c'uxuric, ma' ricoj ta kamahc chiwach i Dios. Pa ricorquilal, wilic take aj c'uhbalanel nujunak pan ca̱mna reh c'ahbilal eh quicowsam chic i ca̱mna chi ma'xta quicojom wach ribiral i Jesus. Re' take re', to̱b ta re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j cho reh Moyses rik'or chi wilic take c'uxbal tare̱t chi c'uxuric, nquik'or chi re' ric'uxuric take c'uxbal re're' ricoj quimahc take c'acharel chiwach i Dios. Til coric, re' take aj c'uhbalanel re're' xa chiri̱j chic ribanaric i c'ahbilal no̱j i quicapew-bal eh wi xca'n jeno' c'ahbilal ma' nquic'raj ta qui̱b chi wilic ta nak quimahc.

Je' wo', re' take aj c'uhbalanel re're' to̱b ta nquik'or chi nquinimej i Dios, xa aj chucul k'oric quicahnic take wi̱'. Je' re' nik'or maj ru̱c' quibano̱j nc'uhtunic lok chi ma' nquinimej ta i Dios. Je' wo', xa pok'bal xa'aw wach i no'jbal nca'n chiwach i Dios eh xa na ru' ma' nquibiraj ta chic k'oric chiwach, ma' wo' nca'n jeno' ato̱b laj bano̱j cu̱c' cas quicha̱k'.

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um chi wilque̱b chic take aj c'uhbalanel je' ru̱c' ma' holohic ta quino'jbal, chatijej take aj niminel ru̱c' nic' wach je' i no'jbal nkarak chipam i coric laj c'uhbal re' hoj tijimaj wi̱'.

Je' re' nok, re' take rijeb tak winak chi quixilac take aj niminel pan ac'uhtunic chak'or tak queh chi ma' ok xa cha'n aweh no'jbal nca'n. Je' wo', chi holohic ok quino'jbal reh chi yohbalamaj ok quiwach. Ch'i̱l i re', chak'or wo' queh chi nquisic' ok ri̱j quino'jbal eh chi cow ok quic'ux chi rinimjic i coric laj c'uhbal. Je' wo' chic, chak'or wo' queh chi xa ye'lic ok quik'ab chi ric'axaric cas quicha̱k' eh chi xa cuyu̱l ok wo' take nanc'ulic lok ti'c'axic chi quina̱.

Je' wo', re' take rijeb tak ixok pan ac'uhtunic chak'or queh chi wilic ok rilok'il quic'acharic je' ricab ric'ul chi queh take ixok quik'ahsam quic'acharic pan k'ab i Dios chi naquicamanic chiwach. Je' wo', chi ma' nca'n chi xa aj tz'akol wach c'uta̱j take. Chak'or wo' queh chi ma' ok aj xohc'rel take, re' la' ca'n chi til aj c'uhtunel ok reh ribanaric holohic laj no'jbal chiwach i Dios.
Ru̱c' aj ric'uhtjic i holohic laj quino'jbal nca'n, re' take re' eriban chi enquic'uhbalej take k'ahxokak caxa̱ra chic take chi naquic'axam i quibahi̱l ch'i̱l take cac'u̱n quixk'u̱n.

Je' wo', chak'or queh chi ma'xta ca'nam queh i no'jbal je' ru̱c' xa cha'n aweh. Ma' xa re' ta re're', chak'or wo' queh chi quiwih'ok chi tz'iro̱j ok wach quic'acharic eh quicholok wo' riliric pa̱m i quipa̱t. Je' aj re' ru̱c' i no'jbal encojoric queh take k'ahxokak, re' caxa̱ra chic take ca'n chi banol ok take ato̱b laj no'jbal eh chi birinel ok take k'oric chiwach quibahi̱l reh chi je' re', re' riC'uhbal i Dios ma' eta no̱j chi c'u'tjbal xa ru'um pa' bih c'ahchi' ribanam jeno' aj niminel.
Ti̱to, je' wo' chic nik'or aweh chi chak'il wo' take q'uijolak ch'i̱l take k'ahxokak chi ma' nca'n queh i no'jbal je' ru̱c' xa cha'n aweh, quisic' la' ri̱j ricorquilal quic'acharic.

Re' cok ru', re' ok hat tic'uhtunok reh holohic laj no'jbal chi ric'amaric quibe̱h chipam ribanaric take ato̱b laj camanic. Je' ricab nacha'n i c'uhbalanic, tik'orok ru̱c' coric wach c'uxlis. Je' wo', ma' ok xa chachoplom cok i c'uhbal na'n chi ma' atijem ta rij,

tik'orok la' ru̱c' take no'jbal na̱rakam chiri̱j. Chi je' re' xa coric laj k'oric wo' na̱k'orom reh chi ma' eta nk'ormojic chi ma' coric ta wach i c'uhbal c'ahchi' ak'orom. Ru̱c' aj i no'jbal ena'n, re' take nquik'ihtaj qui̱b chiwach i c'uhbalanic na'n, enoquic cho quiq'uix'ic ru'um chi ma'xta jeno' k'oric enbanjic chawi̱j i hat ch'i̱l take nac'uhbalej take ru'um nok pa ricorquilal etic'uhbalanic.

Je' ricab i cojo̱j no'jbal na̱banam queh take toco̱m chic aj niminel ar Cre̱ta, je' wo' re' cojo̱j no'jbal na̱banam queh take aj niminel wilque̱b chi camanic ru̱c' jeno' aj ehcham reh camanic. Je' re' nwa̱j chi na̱banam reh chi re' take aj camanom re're' equiniminic eh enca'n haj wilic nponic chi quiwach take aj ehcham camanic, je' wo' chi ma' ok xa quichi̱' qui̱b chi c'u'lunic ru̱c' haj wilic quitak'abjic wi̱'.

Je' wo' chic, chak'il take chi ma' chi bih nquelk'aj reh i pa' bih wilic reh aj ehcham camanic, quic'uhtaj la' ru̱c' quino'jbal pan quicamaj chi camanom aj ch'iquem c'uxlis take reh chi je' re', re' take naquilbic reh no'jbal nca'n take ru' enquiyew rilok'il i c'uhbal c'ahchi' kac'uhtam chiri̱j i kAja̱w i Dios re' xye'bic cho kaco'lbal i hoj ch'i̱l chi'nchel take c'acharel wi nquich'ica̱' wo' quic'ux chiri̱j ru'.

Je' re' k'uru' Ti̱to re' c'uhbal re' hat tijimaj wi̱' curman chi na̱c'uhtam queh take aj niminel wilque̱b ar Cre̱ta maj re' c'uhbal re're' rik'or chi re' Dios k'e̱' rinimal wach rato'bil xic'uhtaj cho chi kana̱ chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel chi xisic' cho jenaj riwi̱' nic' wach nakaco'lej ki̱b chiwach i ti'c'axic wilic nak chi kana̱ ru'um kamahc.

Wi re' i c'uhbal re're' je' re' ric'uhtaj keh ra̱j rik'orom chi re' hoj curman wo' chi nakak'ebem lok chiri̱j kac'ux ribanaric i ma' to̱b ta laj no'jbal ch'i̱l ric'axaric wach i raj ma' ra̱j banaric eh chi nakac'acharic chiwach take k'i̱j wilco̱j wi̱' china̱ ac'al wili chi ma' xa cha'n ta aweh no'jbal, je' wo' chi c'ahchi' kanimem i Dios eh chi coric wach kac'ux chiwach.

Je' wo' chic, nakuy'em wo' tak chi ch'iclic kac'ux nachic'uhtaj ri̱b i Jesus re' ye'ol reh risukquilal kac'ux, je' wo' re' kacojom wi̱' kacapew-bal chi naric'uhtam ri̱b. Re' Jesus wili re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' wo' re' ye'o̱j chiki̱j chi kajco'lonel eh lok'omaj wo' wach chi kaDios chi k'e̱' rinimal rajawric.

Chiri̱j aj i Jesus re're', re' hin nik'or wo' aweh tak chi xa pa ric'ux xchalic naxiyew ri̱b pan quimic re' nak tanlic chi kana̱ chi nakac'ulum i hoj chi ja' hoj ta nak aj niminel. Chaj camaj naxiban i Jesus chi je' re'? Reh chi ekoj-esmejic cho chi ri'sil rajawric aj Yahm eh chi je' re' ma' eta chic nkaca'pechej i c'ahbil laj no'jbal ka'nam cho. Je' wo' chic, re're' xiban chi je' re' reh wo' chi re're' naricuyuj eh narisachoj reh kamahc chi'nchel i hoj xojniminic reh. Ru̱c' aj re', xojricoj chi hoj rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n reh chi naka'nam chi xa ic'lic chic kana̱ chi ribanaric i holohic laj camanic chiwach.

Chiri̱j chic take xnik'or lok aweh re're', yu'na k'uru' nic' pa' nimal xnitz'ihmbaj je aweh chac'uhtaj wo' queh take aj niminel ar Cre̱ta. Chak'or wo' queh chi curman chi re' nic' pa' nimal xquitijej, ca'n wo' ribanaric pan quic'acharic. Hab pa' wach take aj niminel ma' tica̱j ta quibiram, chak'or wo' queh chi curman chi naquijalam wach quino'jbal. Re' hat Ti̱to wilic awajawric chi c'amol quibe̱h take aj niminel ar eh ru'um aj re' nik'or wo' aweh chi cha'n acamaj chi coric reh chi ma' hab ta wach erirak jeno' k'etbal pan abe̱h reh acamaj.

Je' wo', chawic'saj wo' chic rik'ormojic chi quixiquin take aj niminel chi quiniminok chiwach take k'atal k'oric je' wo' chi quiwach take wilic cajawric chi c'amoj be̱h. Chak'or wo' queh chi ma' chi bih nquik'ihtaj wi̱' qui̱b chi quiwach take re', xa ic'lic la' ok quina̱ chi ribanaric chi coric haj wilic jeno' camanic npahkaljic queh.

Chak'il wo' take chi ma' ncucsaj take chucuj tak k'oric chiqui̱j take cas quicha̱k' eh chi ma' nquisic' wolonic i̱b, ca'n la' chi ch'ublic wach quic'ux eh quic'uhtaj quichak'lamil cu̱c' chi'nchel c'acharel.

Je' wo', chak'or wo' queh chi ma' niq'uic pan quic'ux chi je' ricab nok wilque̱b take c'acharel yu'na chi ma' nquibiraj ta k'oric chiwach i Dios, re' hoj chi'nchel aj niminel je' wo' nak cho re' riwi̱' kac'acharic najtir cho k'i̱j. Je' re' nik'or maj ma'xta nak cho kano'jbal chi risiq'uiric ri̱j i coric, nkak'ihtaj nak cho ki̱b chiwach i Dios, hoj nak cho sahchel chipam ric'ahbilal kano'jbal eh chukulco̱j nak cho chi ribanaric xa rehreh wach yibel wach no'jbal nkac'ax wach ribanaric. Til coric, re' hoj xojc'acharic cho chi xa chiri̱j nak chic i c'ahbilal wilic kacapew-bal, je' wo' xa ti' chic kac'ux chiqui̱j take suk wilque̱b chi kawach eh xa na̱ ru', ru'um nok nkixowej quiwach take toco̱m je' wo' chic re' nca'n keh ru'.
Xa re' la' ru' naxponic rik'ijil chi xc'ulic wach ac'al i kAja̱w Jesus, xc'uhtjic keh hoj chi'nchel c'acharel nic' wach cho ric'axbal eh nic' ti'quilal kojric'raj cho Dios re' kajco'lonel.

Chaj bih riwi̱' naxnik'or chi je' re'? Ru'um la' chi re' Dios xiban chi re' Jesus xojrico'lej i hoj aj niminel chiwach i ti'c'axic chalic nak reh chi kana̱. Re' cok ru', xiban i re're' ma' ru'um ta nchel chi holohic ta nak take kabano̱j c'ahchi' ka'nam, xa ru'um la' rinimal riquetelbal wilic cho chi kana̱. Je' re' k'uru', ru'um reh ric'axbal i Dios re' hoj xojco'ljic. Ma' xa re' ta re' xiban, je' la' wo' xiban wo' chi xojcahnic wo' chi sak chic wach i ka̱mna, je' ricab nok re' kati'jolal ncahnic chi sak chic wach ru'um i ha' nankitinej ki̱b. Je' aj re' xiban naxkap'ut wo' jenaj chic ac' c'acharic ru̱c' riye'eric i Lok' laj Uxlabal

xitak'a̱' cho chi kana̱ ru'um chi xkach'ica̱' kac'ux chiri̱j i kajco'lonel Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Re' riwi̱' chi re' Dios xitak'a̱' cho chi kana̱ i Lok' laj Uxlabal reh chi re' hoj nakap'utum johtok i jenaj ac' laj c'acharic k'e̱' wo' chic holonquilal.

Ru'um reh rito'bal i Lok' laj Uxlabal k'uru', riban chi coric chic wach i kano'jbal eh je' wo', chi hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios nakehtric rehchmejic i pa' bih wilic reh. Ru'um aj re', re' hoj yu'na chi ch'iclic chic kac'ux c'ahchi' kuy'em rik'ijil nakojc'acharok chi junelic ar pan taxa̱j.

Je' re' k'uru' Ti̱to, nic' pa' nimal take k'oric nitz'ihmbam je aweh, chac'ul take maj til coric laj k'oric take. Ru'um aj chi re' take coric laj k'oric re're', re' wo' re' nto'bonic queh pan quic'acharic take nic' pa' nimal quic'ulbic reh pan ca̱mna eh chi re' wo' re' nrakmajic wi̱' chiri̱j nic' wach nakato'bej take kas kacha̱k', til nipahkaj aweh chi re' wo' take k'oric re're' chachop wi̱' ac'ux chi rik'ormojic queh niminel aj Cre̱ta. Je' re' cha'n reh chi re' take re' ar chic eno̱j quicapew-bal chi risiq'uiric ri̱j nic' wach ritobjic cas quicha̱k' naca'nam.

Haj cok wilic ma' nwa̱j ta chi na̱c'ulum awu̱c' i hat Ti̱to, re' chi re' take ma' re' ta coric laj aj c'uhbalanel take equi'oquic chi c'uhtunic queh take aj niminel. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take aj c'uhbalanel re're' naqui'oquic chi k'oric chiri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, xa memil laj no'jbal nquik'or. Je' re' nca'n nansiq'uiric ri̱j rik'ijil quic'acharic take cho ma̱m ti't quik'oric chiri̱j, on naqui'oquic chi c'uhbalanic nquichop qui̱b chi wolic chi quibil qui̱b. Je' re' k'uru', chapit take aj c'uhbalanel re're' reh chi ma' eta qui'oquic chaxilac tak ru'um nok re' take k'oric nquik'or xa ma'xta camaj take chi quitobjic take aj niminel chipam quic'acharic.

Je' wo' re' cha'n ru̱c' xa hab wach jeno' c'acharel aj niminel chic re' ricoj cho ch'akoj i̱b chaxilac hat-tak aj niminel, chak'il eh chacoj wo' rino'jbal re' cok ru' chiri̱j chi ak'ilim chic junpech on ca'pech ok, wi ma' xatrinimej ma̱coj aj chic pa riman chi quixilac take aj niminel.

Je' re' cha'n maj re' c'acharel re're' xa ru̱c' i no'jbal riban eht'alamaj chic chi xiyoj chic ric'ux chi niminic, xa re' chic ribanaric i mahc wilic chiwach eh chi je' re' tanlic chic china̱ chi eric'ul i ti'c'axic ru'um i Dios.

Ti̱to, nwa̱j nik'orom je aweh chi c'ahchi' nicapam ritak'abjic je awu̱c' i ma' Arte̱mas on re' ma' Ti̱quico. Wi xponic nchel awu̱c' xa hab pa' wach queh quib wili, nipahkaj aweh chi til chaloq'uej ti cho awi̱b chi equinc'ul arak ar pan tinamit Nico̱polis ribihnal re' xnicapaj chi ar nawic'sam wi̱' i rik'ijil i k'elej jab oquic cho reh.

Je' wo', jenaj chic pahkanic nwa̱j nibanam je aweh wili: Nok chi xa elic chic je aweh chipam i tinamit Cre̱ta, chacuy chamol chi quina̱ take kich aj niminel aj Cre̱ta jeno' rito'bal i ma' Se̱nas re' aj no'jbal chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ch'i̱l wo' i ma' Apo̱los. Je' re' cha'n reh chi re' take quib chi kich aj niminel re're' ma' eta quicahnic chi ma'xta bih wilic queh reh quibehbal.

Ru̱c' i pahkanic niban je aweh re're', re' nwa̱j chiri̱j i hin reh chi re' take kich aj niminel ar Cre̱ta ma' ok nchel eno̱j corjok wach i k'oric nbanaric chiri̱j chi xa siqui̱l laj c'acharel take. Je' wo' nwa̱j chi enquiniq'uej quik'i̱j chi ritijiljic qui̱b chi ritobjic take cas quicha̱k' wilic quic'axquilal chipam quic'acharic.

Chiri̱j chic rik'ormojic je aweh wili, je' wo' nik'or je aweh take k'oric wili: Re' take wich'i̱l re' wilque̱b wu̱c' yu'na chipam ricamaj i Dios, c'ahchi' quitak'a̱b je risukquil ac'ux tak. Je' re' nok chayew risukquil quic'ux i nic' pa' q'uihal take kich aj niminel wilque̱b ar Cre̱ta re' ti' kojquic'raj chipam ricamaj i Dios. Re' ta nak rato'bil i kAja̱w Dios wih'ok awu̱c' tak chawunchelal.

Re' hin ma' Lu̱' pan che̱' wilqui̱n wich'i̱l i nicha̱k' pan niminic re' Timote̱yo ribihnal. Chi je' re' wilco̱j ru'um reh rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je i hu̱j wili aweh hat wasbe̱s ma' Pilemon re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj eh je' wo' re' nca'n take kich'i̱l pa ricamaj i kAja̱w Dios.

Je' wo' c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je i hu̱j wili aweh hat-tak je' wili abihnal tak: Re' ti' A̱pya re' k'e̱' ti' nkic'raj ru'um chi kana̱b chic pan niminic, re' ma' Arqui̱po re' kich aj cuyul ti'c'axic chipam ricamaj i Dios je' ricab i cuyuj ti'c'axic nca'n take sol eh je' wo' re' hat-tak comonil moloj wach aj niminel re' namol awi̱b tak pa ripa̱t i Pilemon. Chawunchelal hat-tak je' wili c'alenenic niban je aweh tak:
Re' ta nak ato'bil rich'i̱l i sukquil c'uxlis nquiyew cho kAja̱w Dios rich'i̱l i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' ta nak re' wih'ok pan ac'acharic tak.
Wasbe̱s wich aj niminel ma' Pilemon, nik'or je aweh chi nanc'ulic lok pa nic'ux abihnal naniban niti̱j, re' hin niyew johtok ritioxjic i kAja̱w Dios re' nilok'ej wach.

Je' re' niban maj til xa eli̱c wo' nibiraj ribiral chi k'e̱' wo' chic achak'lamil nac'uhtaj cu̱c' take kas kacha̱k' quiniminic chic reh i Dios eh nibiraj wo' nic' wach chopoj c'uxlis na'n chiri̱j i kAja̱w Jesus.

Naquintioxonic johtok ru̱c' i Dios, re' hin nipahkaj wo' johtok reh pa niti̱j chi nic' pa' wach nok re' hat ch'iclic ac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi re're' ncuse'senic cho aweh, je' wo' re' chato'bej take awich aj niminel chi naquirakam chiri̱j chi xa re' wo' Jesus c'ahchi' ricuse'senic cho queh.

Chaj wa'ric naquintioxonic chawi̱j? Je' re' niban ru'um chi re' take aj niminel ncowjic quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus awu'um i hat wasbe̱s ma' Pilemon. Ru̱c' re're', k'e̱' wo' nicowsaj nic'ux awu'um eh k'e̱' wo' nsukbic nic'ux chawi̱j ru'um nok xa wilic wo' rik'ormojic ribiral i c'axo̱j na'n cu̱c' take aj niminel re're'.

Je' re' k'uru', ru̱c' i c'axo̱j nibiraj chi nac'uhtaj cu̱c' take awich aj niminel, re' hin wilic nak ru' wajawric chana̱ chi rik'ormojic aweh chaj bih curman chi na̱banam. Wilic nak ru' wajawric chana̱ ru'um chi re' kAja̱w Jesus xiripahba̱' chi hin raj k'oro̱l,

xa re' la' ru' ma' eta wo' quiniq'uic k'e̱' chana̱. Je' re' k'uru' ma' ru'um ta chi wilic wajawric chana̱, ru'um la' reh c'axoj i̱b nibiraj chi na'n, re' hin nipahkaj je aweh chi equinanimej ru̱c' i nanik'orom aweh i hin ma' Lu̱' re' ana'bem wo' chi hin chic rijeb laj winak eh chi yu'na ayu' wilqui̱n pan che̱' ru'um reh rik'ormojic rik'orbal i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Re' aj wili nwa̱j nik'orom aweh: Chacuy, chato'bej wi̱n i One̱simo re' nicoj i hin chi wac'u̱n chipam rinimjic i Jesus. Je' re' nik'or maj chiwach take k'i̱j nok wilqui̱n ayu' pan che̱', xo̱j corjok chi je' na wac'u̱n naxichop rinimjic i Jesus ru̱c' i c'uhbalanic xniban reh.

Re' One̱simo wili naxwih'ic cho awu̱c' najtir k'i̱j, ma' camanel ta nak cho chawach xa re' la' yu'na xo̱j riban chi k'e̱' chic camanel chi niwach eh nicapaj hin chi je' wo' re' encamanic chawach i hat.
Ru'um aj re' yu'na chi c'ahchi' wo' chic nisolq'uim je awu̱c' chi riye'eric aweh i hu̱j wili, nipahkaj je aweh chi til chac'ul wi̱n i One̱simo re' til k'e̱' ti' nwic'raj.

Til pan coric, re' hin xwa̱j nak chi xcahnic ta nak ayu' eh chi je' re' jenaj nak ato'bil ena'n wi̱n ru̱c' riye'eric k'ab reh chi encahnic ayu' chi nitobjic ru̱c' pa' bih wi̱n nwa̱j ayu' pan che̱' re' tz'apalqui̱n wi̱' ru'um rik'ormojic i lok' laj ribiral i Jesus chiri̱j i co'lbal i̱b.

To̱b ta wo' xnicapaj chi je' re' nanibanam, ma' xniban ta wo' maj ma' riwi̱' ta chi je' re' eniban wi ma' re' hat etik'oric cho chi encahnic wu̱c'. K'e̱' nak holonquilal chi re' One̱simo xc'ulic ta nak lok wu̱c' chi atak'anic cho hat chi nitobjic eh ma' ta nak ru'um reh i mahc ribanam cho chi cu tok'lic xinc'ulic rirak ayu' pan che̱'.

Coric, re' nak til k'e̱' ric'ul chi re' ta nak i hat xat-tak'anic cho wi̱n i One̱simo, xa re' la' ma' je' ta re' xc'uluric maj re' na wili xa̱j wi̱' i Dios chi xiyew k'ab chi xelic cho awu̱c' junpech, reh nok chi rik'ahsam chic ri̱b pan k'ab i Jesus, ewo' chic nac'ul awu̱c' reh chi naricamanic chawach chi junpech.

Je' re' k'uru' chac'ul wo' chic awu̱c' i One̱simo re' cok ru' c'olok pan ac'ux chi ma' xa je' ta chic ricab jeno' xa hab wach queh awaj camanom i ric'uluric na̱banam maj yu'na acha̱k' chic pan niminic. Re' kacha̱k' wili k'uru' re' k'e̱' ti' nwic'raj i hin, til k'e̱' wo' chic ti' chawic'raj chiwach ric'rinjic niban i hin maj yu'na narisoljic je awu̱c' chi rinimem chic i kAja̱w Jesus eh chi narojic wo' chic camanok awu̱c'.
Je' re' ajic wi re' hat quinacoj chi hin awich niminel reh kAja̱w Jesus, chac'ul wi̱n i One̱simo chi je' ta nak chi re' hin c'ahchi'qui̱n ac'ulum awu̱c'
eh wi pa' bih mahc xiban cho chawach on wi wilic on nchel pa' bih aweh xelk'aj cho, chacoj pa nibihnal chi re' chic hin nanitojbic aweh chi'nchel re're'.

Rehtalil chi til enitoj aweh ribano̱j i One̱simo, re' hin ma' Lu̱' c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam wach hu̱j wili ru̱c' nah nik'ab chi je' re' eniban xa re' la' nik'or hin chi ma' curman ta chi je' re' nanibanam maj nicapaj chi ma' curman ta chi enik'or wo' je aweh chi re' hat wilic wo' jenaj ac'a̱s wu̱c' re' til k'e̱' wo' chic xiq'uic na̱ chiwach ribano̱j ac'un wili. Re' ac'a̱s re're', re' chi re' hin xinc'uhbalanic aweh chi xanimej i kAja̱w Jesus.

Je' re' k'uru' wasbe̱s ru'um chi re' hat, hat wo' aj c'a̱s wu̱c' til nipahkaj aweh i hat wich aj niminel reh kAja̱w Jesus, chi pa rijelow-bal ac'a̱s re're' cha'n wi̱n i ato'bil wili: Chacuy, chac'ul wo' chic wi̱n i One̱simo eh chi je' re', re' hat wich'i̱l pa rinimjic i kAja̱w Jesus, k'e̱' wo' chic enasuksaj nic'ux.

Re' aj wili nitz'ihmbaj je aweh chi ch'iclic nic'ux chawi̱j chi enanimej take k'oric wili eh weht'alim wo' chi ma' xa re' ta chic i c'ahchi' nipahkam aweh ena'n ribanaric, nariq'uic la' wo' chic na̱ i ato'bil na̱banam i hat.

Chi cu c'ahchi' pe qui̱n chi ritz'ihmjic je aweh i hu̱j wili, nwa̱j wo' nipahkam je aweh jenaj chic ato'bil chi na̱tik'a̱b wi̱n jeno' niye'a̱b pan apa̱t re' equinwih'ic wi̱'. Je' re' ato'bil nipahkaj je aweh maj nwuy'ej ru̱c' i Dios chi ru̱c' ati̱j na'n tak johtok chiwach, re' hin equinesmejic je pan che̱' eh chi je' re' equino̱j awu̱c' tak chi ak'o'rjic tak ponok ar.
Re' aj wili nitz'ihmbaj je aweh chipam i hu̱j wili eh ayu' riyew wo' je risukquil ac'ux i kich aj niminel ma' Epa̱wras, re' wich tz'ahpel pan che̱' ru'um reh rik'ormojic ribiral kAja̱w Jesus.
Je' wo' nquitak'a̱' je risukquilal ac'ux tak take waj to'o̱l pa ricamaj i Dios wilque̱b pan tinamit ayu', re' je' wili quibihnal: Re' ma' Cus, re' ma' Arista̱rco, re' ma' Te̱mas ch'i̱l i ma' Cax.

Ru̱c' aj wili nicohlaj ritz'ihmjic i hu̱j wili chi c'ahchi' nibanam je niti̱j chawi̱j, reh chi re' ta nak i rato'bil i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric wih'ok chana̱ i hat ch'i̱l take chi'nchel aj niminel nquimol qui̱b ar. Je' aj re' ru' ma' Pilemon, nic' pa' nimal take k'oric xtz'ihmjic chipam hu̱j wili, til re' hin ma' Lu̱' xink'oric je reh.

Chiwach take cho k'i̱j naxic'acharic take cho kama̱m kati't, re' Dios q'uih wo' take raj k'orol ric'uhbal xitak'a̱' take cho cu̱c'. Ma' xa ta junpech xk'ormojic queh c'uhbal, q'uih la' pech eh ru̱c' ju'jun pech xk'ormojic cho queh, rehreh wach rik'ormojic xbanaric cho queh.

Raj yu'na chipam take ricux'ic wach take k'i̱j wilco̱j wi̱' wili, re' Dios xitak'a̱' cho i rAc'u̱n ku̱c' i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel reh chi re' chic re' narik'oric keh riC'uhbal. Nok ma' ja'xta nak bih wilic wach ac'al on ar pan taxa̱j, re' Ac'unbe̱s re're', re' aj wo' re' xipahba̱' i Dios chi aj tik'inel reh chi'nchel wilic ayu' wach ac'al ch'i̱l wilic ar pan taxa̱j. Je' wo' xipahba̱' chi Ajabe̱s china̱ chi'nchel nic' pa' nimal tik'imaj cho ru'um.

Je' wo' chic, re' Ac'unbe̱s re're' sutumaj wo' ri̱j ru̱c' riholonquilal wach sakom sutumaj wi̱' ri̱j i Dios eh ru̱c' re're' nc'utunic wo' chi manlic nic' wach riwi̱' i Dios. Re're' k'e̱' wo' rajawric rik'orbal wilic chi quina̱ take nic' pa' nimal wilic ayu' wach ac'al ch'i̱l wo' take wilque̱b ar pan taxa̱j. Je' re' riwi̱' maj narik'or queh chi naquitikim ju' wih'ic je' ricab quitik'injic bano̱j, quicahnic wo' chi je' re' quiwi̱' eh je' wo' ma' niq'uic ta wach chaj bih nquicamanej. Jenaj chic k'oric enik'or chiri̱j rAc'u̱n i Dios. Re're' nok ric'ulum chic ti'c'axic chiki̱j i hoj chi ricuyuric kamahc, xc'amaric johtok pan taxa̱j eh ar xye'eric wo' reh jenaj wach lok'il ch'i̱l i Dios je' ricab nanye'eric rilok'il jeno' c'acharel nantz'uhkic cok chi riche̱l jeno' k'atal k'oric.

Re' rilok'il xic'ul re're', k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal wach chiwach i ye'o̱j queh take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios. Je' re' nik'or ru'um chi re' lok' laj k'oric k'oro̱j chiri̱j rAc'u̱n i Dios, k'e̱' wo' chic lo̱k' chiwach i k'oric k'oro̱j chiqui̱j take raj tz'e' wa̱ch ar pan taxa̱j.

Chipam i lok' laj hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios nkilow chi re' Dios je' wili xik'or reh rAc'u̱n: “Re' hat, hat wac'u̱n. Chiwach i k'i̱j wili tinipahba̱' yu'na chi k'atal k'oric, nqui reh. Pan junk'at chic reh Lok' laj Hu̱j re're', re' Dios je' wili rik'orom cho: “Re' hin xa wilqui̱n wo' cho chi hin awaja̱w eh re' hat xa wilca̱t wo' cho chi wac'u̱n, nqui reh. Re' take k'oric wili ma' janc'al ta k'i̱j rik'orom cho Dios chiri̱j jeno' raj tz'e' wa̱ch.
