Je' wo' chic, ar chipam i lok' laj hu̱j re're' nkilow i k'oric xik'or cho i Dios chiri̱j i xa jenaj chi rAc'u̱n re' wilic rajawric chi quina̱ chi'nchel. Je' wili xik'or nok q'uisi̱n ma' chic ritak'a̱' cho ayu' wach ac'al: “Re' chi'nchel take waj tz'e' wa̱ch quiyew rilok'il ru', nqui xik'or.

Ar wo' chipam i lok' laj hu̱j re're' nok xk'oric i Dios chiqui̱j take raj tz'e' wa̱ch je' wili rik'orom cho: “Re' take waj tz'e' wa̱ch re' wilque̱b chi ribanaric nicamaj, xnitik'a̱' take chi xa nic' yu' enijal quiwi̱' je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' i te̱w chi xa haj pa' eriban chi ricora̱' je, on je' ricab i k'a̱k' chi xa rupuj ri̱b i xak, nqui xik'or cahnok.

Ra̱j la' naxk'oric cho ru̱c' rAc'u̱n, je' wili tz'ihmbimaj chi xik'or reh: “Re' hat re' wilca̱t wo' chi hat Dios chi junelic k'i̱j sakom, wilic awajawric chi k'atoj k'oric eh ma' haj ta ticalajic nech' ok ru̱c' i k'atoj k'oric na'n.

Je' wo', k'e̱' nponic chawach chi naribanaric i coric wach no'jbal, raj i c'ahbil laj no'jbal ch'i'c nawilow. Je' wo' chic, je' ricab nanchihiric wach i c'acharel noquic chi k'atal k'oric cu nbuch'uric i wach na̱ ru̱c' nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m, je' wo' re' xniban aweh i hin Dios, xatnichih wo' chi quixilac take awich k'atal k'oric eh xniyew aweh jenaj nim laj sukquil c'uxlis ma' jaruj ta c'uhlel wach, nqui xik'or.

Je' wo' chic chipam i lok' laj hu̱j re're', tz'ihmbimaj wo' cho chi re' Dios je' wili xik'or reh rAc'u̱n: Re' hat Ajabe̱s, re' hat xat-tik'inic reh wach ac'al je' wo' i taxa̱j. Hat xat-tik'inic cho queh re're' nok ja' np'uhtic ta cho i c'acharic ayu' wach ac'al.

Re' hat xa wilca̱t wo' cho eh xa na̱wih'ic wo' chi junelic k'i̱j sakom. Raj i wach ac'al ch'i̱l i taxa̱j, re' take re' xa narisahchic wo' quiwach. Je' ricab nsahchic wach take tz'ih quik'echerbic, je' wo' re' narisahchic quiwach take re'.

Je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' i c'acharel chi narijal riso' chi pa reh chic ricoj chiri̱j naresaj lok i jenaj chic, je' wo' re' naric'uluric ru̱c' taxa̱j ac'al chi narijahlic wo' wach. Raj i hat xa awi̱' wo' na̱cahnic eh re' rik'ijil ac'acharic ma' jaruj ta c'uhlel wach, nqui Dios.

Je' wo' chic, ma' janc'al ta k'i̱j rik'orom cho Dios chiqui̱j take raj tz'e' wa̱ch re' rik'orom cho chiri̱j i rAc'u̱n chi je' wili: “Je' ricab naric'ul rilok'il jeno' c'acharel chi ntz'ukunjic cok chi riche̱l jeno' k'atal k'oric, je' aj wo' re' nachac'ul alok'il wili i hat: Re' hat na̱wih'ic chiniche̱l cu rehtal nawilow chi re' take awaj ixowonel naquiwih'ic ri'sil awo̱k, nqui rik'orom cho chiri̱j.

Re' Dios ma' janc'al ta k'i̱j xik'or cho chi je' re' queh raj tz'e' wa̱ch maj re' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch xa uxlabal take, xa wilque̱b wo' chi ribanaric i camanic ye'o̱j queh ru'um i Dios eh re' quicamaj ye'o̱j cho re're', reh chi naquito'bem take aj niminel re' naquehtric chi naquico'ljic chiwach i ti'c'axic nariye'eric chi tojbal wach quimahc take aj mahc.

Ru'um aj chi xkabiraj chic chi re' rAc'u̱n i Dios k'e̱' wo' chic nimal rilok'il wilic, curman wo' chi keh chi riman chic nakatikim ju' riye'eric kac'ux chi rinimjic take c'uhbal k'oro̱j keh. Je' re' ka'n tak reh chi ma' eta nkacana̱' rich'iquinjic kac'ux chiri̱j take c'uhbal re're'.

Je' re' nik'or maj wi ma' je' re' nka'n nakac'ulum keh je' ricab xquic'ul cho take kama̱m kati't najtir k'i̱j. Re' take re' ximahcanic nok ma' xquinimej ta take tak'anic wilic riwa'ric chi quina̱, re' xitak'a̱' cho rik'ormojic i Dios cu̱c' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch eh ru'um re' xchalic chi quina̱ i ti'c'axic re' til ric'ul chi queh.

Je' ricab xquic'ul ru', re' ta wo' na chic i hoj ekojco'ljic chiwach ti'c'axic re're', wi ma' xkayew rilok'il rinimal wach camanic xiban i rAc'u̱n i Dios chiki̱j i hoj chi kaco'ljic chiwach i ti'c'axic narichalic nak chi kana̱ ru'um reh kamahc? Re' camanic re're', pe̱t xik'or ribiral i Ajabe̱s Jesus naxc'ulic ayu' wach ac'al. Chiri̱j chic ru', re' chic take kich aj niminel re' xibirinic reh xik'or i Jesus, re' chic take re' xquiyew quichi̱' chi rik'ormojic keh ricorquilal.

Reh chi nakacojom wach chi coric nquik'or take kich aj niminel re' c'ahchi' quiyeb quichi̱', re' Dios xiban q'uihleh wach take sachbal c'uxlis chi quiwach take tinamit rehtalil chi ricorquil i c'ahchi' quik'orom. Ma' xa ru̱c' ta re' xc'utunic chi coric nquik'or, xc'utunic la' wo' ru̱c' ribanaric haj wilic xa̱j i Dios chi je' wili: Chi re' take kich aj niminel xye'eric queh i Lok' laj Uxlabal reh chi q'uihleh wach take ricamaj i Dios naca'nam.

Xink'oric chic chiri̱j chi re' lok'il ye'o̱j queh take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios ma' nponic ta ru̱c' je' ricab lok'il ye'o̱j reh i rAc'u̱n i Dios. Yu'na toco̱m chic riwi̱' k'atoj k'oric chalic reh ayu' wach ac'al eh ma' re' ta take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios ye'o̱j cajawric chi ribanaric i k'atoj k'oric re're',

re' la' i hoj xiyew kajawric chi naka'nam k'atoj k'oric re're'. Chipam Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios tz'ihmbimaj chi je' wili: “Re' hat Dios, xa chiri̱j wo' katobjic i hoj tinamit ticapewenic eh chi katobjic i hoj c'acharel xatchalic i hat, to̱b ta ma'xta ti kawa'ric.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' hat xa'n chi re' quiwa'ric take awaj tz'e' wa̱ch xi̱c' wo' chic na̱ chiwach kawa'ric hoj c'acharel. Xa re' la' to̱b ta wo' je' re', re' hat xayew kalok'il, xayew wo' kajawric je' ricab jeno' aj k'atal k'oric. Chi je' re' ajic, chi kana̱ i hoj xacana̱' rilmijic chi'nchel i nic' pa' nimal atik'a̱b take cho.

Chi quina̱ chi'nchel re're' xoj-acoj chi hoj k'atal k'oric, nqui tz'ihmbimaj cho. Ru̱c' k'oro̱j cho re're' nrakmajic chiri̱j chi re' Dios xiyew keh hoj c'acharel chi xwih'ic kajawric chi quina̱ chi'nchel ritik'inic cho ru', to̱b ta yu'na ja' nilmijic ta wach chi'nchel chaj bih oconak chic chi rehquen kajawric i hoj.

Re' cok ru' nkarak chiri̱j i no'jbal re're' ru̱c' xkilow wili chi xc'uluric ru̱c' i kAja̱w Jesus: Nok re' Dios xiban chi xkajic wach junc'am ok riwa'ric chi quiwach take raj tz'e' wa̱ch, xiban wo' chi xcansjic i Jesus pan kajelow-bal i hoj c'acharel. Je' re' xiban ru'um reh rinimal wach richak'lamil chi kana̱, reh chi je' re' ma'xta kacahnic chi hoj camnak chi junpech. Re' cok ru' chiri̱j chi camnak chic i Jesus, xiban wo' chi xic'ul rinimal wach rilok'il eh je' wo' rinimal wach rajawric naxsoljic wo' chic johtok ar pan taxa̱j.

Ru̱c' wili nkilow chi re' Dios re' aj re' xtik'inic reh chi'nchel eh chi re' chi'nchel i nic' pa' nimal tik'imaj cho ru'um, wilque̱b wo' ru'um reh riwa'ric wilic. Ma' xa ta re're', xitik'a̱' la' wo' cho wach chi re' Jesus xic'ul i ti'c'axic reh chi je' re' xcahnic chi re're' i c'amol be̱h re' naric'uhtunic queh c'acharel nic' wach naquico'ljok chiwach i ti'c'axic nchalic ru'um i mahc. Je' re' xiban ru'um ra̱j chi q'uih take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n naquehtric wih'ic chipam ye'a̱b re' wilic wi̱' i Dios chi sutumaj ri̱j pan holohic laj sakom.

Re' xiban i Dios k'e̱' wo' chic tare̱t maj ma' xa re' ta Jesus re' nc'ambic quibe̱h take aj niminel wilic chi rac'u̱n, je' la' wo' re' take aj niminel c'amoj quibe̱h ru'um i Jesus wilque̱b wo' chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n eh ru'um aj re', re' Jesus ma' nq'uix'ic ta chi kacojoric chi hoj ras richa̱k'.

Re' wili nc'utunic chipam Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilque̱b wi̱' i moloj wach bi̱ch lok'onbal reh Dios narik'or chi je' wili: “K-Aja̱w Dios re' hin nanik'orom ribiral abihnal queh take was nicha̱k' eh nok kamolom ki̱b chi rilok'onjic awach, re' hin ch'i̱l take was nicha̱k' naca̱t wo' kalok'em ru̱c' take kabi̱ch, nqui rik'or.

Chipam wo' Lok' laj Hu̱j, re' Jesus rik'or wo' chic chi je' wili: “Re' hin nanich'ica̱b nic'ux chiri̱j i Dios, nqui rik'or. Je' wo' rik'or wo' chic chi je' wili: “Ayu' wilqui̱n ch'i̱l take xicoj i Dios chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n. Re're' xiban wo' chi wilque̱b chi aj nimem take wi̱n chi ribanaric haj wilic i ra̱j ru'. Chi quina̱ take re' k'uru' xiban chi wilqui̱n chi k'atal k'oric, nqui xik'or.

Je' aj re' ru' chi cojo̱j chic chi Ajabe̱s chi kana̱ chi'nchel i hoj aj niminel, re' Jesus xasjic wo' je' ricab kawi̱' i hoj, chi xa quic' tiwic wo' ti nye'bic ric'acharic kati'jolal kabakil. Chi je' re' naxiyew ri̱b chi quimic, xik'et wach riwa'ric aj Yahm maj xisach wach rajawric wilic nak chi kacansjic.

Je' ricab nok jeno' ajabe̱s wilic rajawric chi junpech china̱ jeno' raj camanom, je' wo' nak re' wilic rajawric aj Yahm chi kana̱ hoj chi junpech nakojyo'jic chiwach i quimic xa re' la' re' Jesus xisach wach ajawric re're'. Ru̱c' xiban re're' xelic i yo'jic wilic nak pan ka̱mna je' ricab nanteh ri̱j jeno' camanom pan k'ab jeno' ajabe̱s re' wilic nak rajawric china̱ chi junpech.
Re' chi'nchel xiban i Jesus nkilow chi ma' re' ta chiqui̱j take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xiban chi to'bal queh, chiki̱j la' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Awraham xiban re're' chi katobjic.

Ru'um chi curman chi keh i katobjic i hoj, curman wo' chi re' Jesus xasjic eh xc'acharic je' ricab i hoj c'acharel. Je' re' nik'or maj xa chi je' re' xirak pa̱m i no'jbal re' curman chi nariwih'ic ru̱c' chi nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios. Ru̱c' rino'jbal re're' xinimej chi manlic i ricamaj chiwach i Dios, xiquetelej quiwach take aj mahc eh xik'ahsaj wo' ri̱b pan quimic chi cuybal kamahc i hoj.

Je' re' k'uru' re' Jesus xasjic eh xc'acharic je' ricab kawi̱' i hoj. Xic'raj reh ti'c'axic eh xpajaric wo' ru'um aj Yahm. Ru'um chi reht'alim reh chi'nchel ti'c'axic nkac'ul, eriban chi ru̱c' rinimal rajawric erito'bej wo' take aj niminel nchalic pajaric chi quina̱ ru'um aj Yahm eh je' wo' re' riban cu̱c' take nquic'ul ti'c'axic pan quic'acharic.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, re' richihim cho awach tak i Dios chi hat-tak ritinami̱t eh chi hat wo' tak yuk'umaj chi pan jenaj k'i̱j etiwih'ic tak ru̱c' ar pan taxa̱j, nipahkaj aweh tak chi chayew acapew-bal tak chi rirakmajic chiri̱j chi manlic i k'oro̱j aweh tak wili chiri̱j i Jesus chi re're' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh chi re're' xtak'abjic cho ru'um i Dios chi banol reh camanic chi Nahsil C'amol quiBe̱h take aj K'ahsem Si̱ chiwach.

Je' re' ru' rilok'il ricamaj i Jesus ru'um chi re're' riyew ric'ux chi rinimjic i Dios je' ricab naxiban cho Moyses naxcamanic chi manlic chiqui̱j take tinamit re' xic'am quibe̱h. Je' wo', re' Jesus xinimej wo' chi manlic i camanic ye'o̱j reh ru'um i Dios chi c'amol be̱h.

To̱b ta jenaj wach rinimjic quicamaj xca'n, re' Jesus k'e̱' wo' chic nim rilok'il chiwach i lok'il ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Re' no'jbal wili nsakombic wach ru̱c' i tik'inic pa̱t nbanaric. Nantik'injic jeno' pa̱t, ma' re' ta nchel i pa̱t wilic rilok'il re' la' aj tik'inel reh.
Je' ricab chi chi'nchel take pa̱t cu tik'imaj take ru'um i winak, je' wo' re' take chi'nchel nic' pa' nimal wilic, re' wo' Dios xtik'inic take reh.

Je' aj re' ru' re' rilok'il quic'acharic i Moyses ch'i̱l i Jesus riban jenaj wach. Nik'or chi je' re' maj re' Moyses til coric xcamanic cho chi manlic chiqui̱j take tinamit xic'am quibe̱h eh re' ribiral ricamaj xiban xcahnic chi jenaj tijbal. Ru'um aj re' yu'na xa cu kojk'oric wo' chiri̱j i Moyses eh je' re' nbanaric maj xwih'ic cho chi je' ricab jenaj holohic laj aj camanom pan jeno' pa̱t.

Je' aj wo' re' xiban i Jesus re' chiho̱j wach chi K'atal K'oric, til manlic laj aj camanom wo' nok wilic. Re' cok ru' ma' xa je' ta ricab jeno' aj camanom pan jeno' pa̱t nok wilic, til wilic la' rajawric chi quina̱ ritinami̱t i Dios ru'um nok re're' til rAc'u̱n i Dios nok wilic. Je' re' k'uru' wih'ok ta nak rajawric i Jesus chi kana̱ chi'nchel i hoj aj niminel eh je' re' nik'or maj re' hoj, hoj ritinami̱t i Dios nok wilco̱j. Re' naric'utunic wi̱' chi hoj ritinami̱t i Dios, re' chi cu yu'na chi k'i̱j wilco̱j chi cow kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus eh nakatikim ju' chi je' re' cu rehtal cohlsbal wach kac'acharic ayu' wach ac'al. Je' wo' chic, c'ahchi' ok kuy'em richalic i Jesus chi ch'iclic kac'ux chiri̱j ric'ulic lok eh chi ma'xta kayo'jic chi riye'eric kachi̱' chiri̱j.

Ru'um chi hoj chic ritinami̱t i Dios, kanimej tak rik'orom i Lok' laj Uxlabal chipam Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios, re' rik'or chi je' wili: “Re' Dios je' wili rik'or aweh hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel: ‘Wi re' hat-tak c'ahchi' abiram tak yu'na re' k'oro̱j cho wu'um,

ma' nwa̱j ta chi enacowsaj awa̱mna tak chi niwach je' ricab xca'n cho ama̱m awati't tak najtir cho k'i̱j naxibehic cho pan ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel. Re' take re' xa xca̱j nak chic quilom wi til coric wo' chi naniyeb i ti'c'axic nik'orom cho ribiral chi narichalic chi quina̱ take ma' quiniminic ta wi̱n eh ru'um re' xquik'ihtaj qui̱b chiwach i k'oro̱j queh wu'um.

Ma' xa ta junpech xca'n chi je' re'. To̱b ta nak nchel chiwach ca'winak (40) ha̱b xquilow ru̱c' nak' quiwach take sachbal c'uxlis xniban chi quitobjic, re' take ama̱m awati't tak xa eli̱c wo' xca̱j quilom wi til coric chi naniyeb ti'c'axic re' nik'orom cho ribiral chi naniyeb chi quina̱ take nquik'ihtaj qui̱b chiwach i k'oro̱j wu'um.

Ru'um aj re' ru' xchalic nic'a̱ chi quina̱ ama̱m awati't tak nok je' wili xnik'or pa nic'ux: Re' take tinamit wili ma' ch'iclic ta quic'ux chiwi̱j, ru'um re' xa ma' nquinimej ta wo' haj wilic i nik'or queh, quinqui pa nic'ux.
Nok chalanak chic nic'a̱ chi coric, xnipahba̱' nik'orbal chi je' wili: Til coric nik'or chi re' take tinamit wili ma' jaruj naquirakam quihi'lbal wu̱c', quinqui, nqui Dios, nqui Lok' laj Uxlabal.

Was tak nicha̱k' wich aj niminel, xabiraj tak chic i k'oro̱j cho re're' ru'um Lok' laj Uxlabal. Yu'na k'uru' chayohbalej wo' awi̱b tak, ma' nchel nwih'ic jeno' chaxilac tak je' ru̱c' ma' holohic ta wach rino'jbal eh ru'um chi je' re' rino'jbal ma' ritik ta ju' rich'iquinjic ric'ux chi coric chiri̱j i Dios. Re' jeno' aj niminel je' re' nbanic, jenaj aj chi re' nachicana̱' wo' chi junpech rilok'onjic wach i Dios re' aj ye'ol c'acharic.

Reh chi ma' eta nwih'ic jeno' chaxilac tak je' ru̱c' ma' holohic ta wach rino'jbal, ma̱cana̱' tak rik'ormojic take k'oric re' quito'bonic chi ribanaric i holohic laj no'jbal. Eli̱c ok cha'n tak chi je' re' chawach tak cu rehtal ricux'ic wach ac'acharic tak. Chi je' re' ma' hab ta wach aweh tak eriyoj ricapew-bal chi ewo' chic nsoljic je chi ribanaric i mahc eh ma' eta chic ricoj wach i coric laj tijinic chi junpech.

Ru'um aj re' ma̱cana̱' tak rik'ormojic take k'oric re' quito'bonic chi ribanaric i holohic laj no'jbal. Je' re' nik'or maj wi cu rehtal ricux'ic wach kac'acharic xa eli̱c wo' c'ahchi' kach'ica̱b kac'ux chiri̱j take k'oric kacojom cho wach cu pan p'utbal cho reh kaniminic, re' Jesus naco̱j ricojom chi hoj rich aj c'ulul reh nic' pa' nimal ric'ulum chi Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Je' re' k'uru' kacoj tak rehtal i k'oro̱j cho wili ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios: “Re' Dios je' wili rik'or aweh hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel: ‘Wi re' hat-tak c'ahchi' abiram tak yu'na re' c'ahchi' nik'orom wili, ma̱cowsaj awa̱mna tak chi ribirmijic je' ricab xca'n cho ama̱m awati't tak najtir k'i̱j pan ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel nok re' take re' xquik'ihtaj qui̱b chiwach i k'oro̱j cho wu'um, nqui Dios, nqui k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal.

Hab wach aj chiri̱j nk'oric i Lok' laj Uxlabal naxik'or chi to̱b ta nak quibiram cho k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios xa xquik'ihtaj wo' qui̱b chiwach? Xk'oric cho chiqui̱j take kama̱m kati't je' ru̱c' xc'amaric cho quibe̱h ru'um i Moyses naxi'elic cho pan tinamit Eji̱pto.

Hab wach aj china̱ xwih'ic ric'a̱ i Dios chiwach ca'winak (40) ha̱b ar pan chik yu̱k'? Chi quina̱ wo' take kama̱m kati't je' ru̱c' ximahcanic cho chiwach i Dios eh ru'um chi je' re' xca'n, xiquimibic ar pan chik yu̱k', xha'bic quiti'jolal chipam yu̱k' q'uixca̱b re're'.

Je' wo', hab wach aj chiri̱j xik'or i Dios chi wilic jenaj juntuhm reh c'acharel re' ma' jaruj ta naquirakam quihi'lbal ru̱c'? Re' take k'oric re're' xk'ormojic chiqui̱j take kama̱m kati't je' ru̱c' ma' xquic'am ta na̱ i k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios.

Ru'um chi ma' xquich'ica̱' ta wo' quic'ux chiri̱j i k'oro̱j cho ribiral queh ru'um i Dios, nkilow chi re' take re' ma' xca'n ta wo' canar oquic chipam ye'a̱b re' k'oro̱j cho ribiral queh ru'um i Dios chi nariyeb nak queh.

Chi je' aj re' k'uru', chi xkabiraj chic chi re' take kama̱m kati't ma' xi'oquic ta wo' chipam i ye'a̱b k'oro̱j cho ribiral queh ru'um i Dios, yu'na re' wo' chic re' rik'or ribiral keh chi ar ru̱c' nakarakam kahi'lbal chi junpech eh ru'um aj re' curman wo' chi kayohbalej tak ki̱b, ma' ok nchel riban chi jeno' keh ma' eta riban canar oquic chipam i hi'lbal rik'or ribiral keh i Dios.

Chacoj tak rehtal i nanik'orom wili: Re' take kama̱m kati't k'ormojic wo' ribiral queh ru'um i Dios chi nariye'eric nak queh i ye'a̱b re' naquihi'lic nak wi̱', xa re' la' ru' xa ma'xta wo' bih xicamanej queh maj ma' xquich'ica̱' ta quic'ux chiri̱j chaj bih xk'ormojic queh. Je' wo' re' hoj yu'na, c'ahchi' wo' rik'ormojic ribiral keh chi ru̱c' i Dios enkarak kahi'lbal chi junpech,

xa re' la' keh hoj re' cow nkayew kac'ux chi rinimjic i Dios til ch'iclic kac'ux chiri̱j i ricorquilal re're' chi nakarakam kahi'lbal ar ru̱c'. Raj take cho kama̱m kati't ma' xquirak ta quihi'lbal eh ru'um re', re' Dios je' wili rik'orom cho: “Nok hin chic josk'onak chi coric, xnipahba̱' nik'orbal chi je' wili nanik'orom: Til coric, re' take tinamit wili ma' jaruj naquirakam quihi'lbal wu̱c', nqui rik'orom cho. Je' re' ajic re' take kama̱m kati't ma' xi'oquic ta chipam quihi'lbal xk'ormojic cho ribiral queh je' ricab naxhi'lic i Dios naxicohlaj wach ritik'injic taxa̱j ac'al ch'i̱l i nic' nimal wilic chiwach.

Re' hi'lic xiban i Dios chipam riwu̱k k'i̱j je' wili tz'ihmbimaj chiri̱j chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal: “Pa riwu̱k k'i̱j naxicohlaj ricamaj i Dios reh ritik'injic chi'nchel xitik'a̱', re're' xhi'lic wo', nqui i tz'ihmbimaj.
Chipam wo' i lok' laj hu̱j re're' nkilow wo' ar chi re' Dios je' wili xik'or chiqui̱j take ma' xiniminic ta reh: “Re' take tinamit wili ma' jaruj ta naquirakam quihi'lbal wu̱c', nqui xik'or.

Ru'um chi je' re' k'oro̱j cho eriban chi enkak'or chi nic' pa' wach naxiwih'ic cho c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' xquirak ta quihi'lbal ru̱c' i Dios ru'um chi ma' xquich'ica̱' ta quic'ux chiri̱j, wilic wo' take c'acharel yu'na je' ru̱c' ma' ja' quirakam ta quihi'lbal ru̱c' eh ru'um chi je' re',

re' Dios xipahba̱' wo' cho jenaj chic rik'ijil reh chi cu ewo' nquirak quihi'lbal take ma' ja' quirakam ta. Chiri̱j riwih'ic jenaj chic rik'ijil i hi'lbal i̱b nariwih'ic chiwach take k'i̱j wilco̱j wi̱' yu'na, re' k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy xk'oric wo' cho chiri̱j re're' nok jarub ta wo' ha̱b k'oro̱j chic cho queh take kama̱m kati't ru'um i Dios, xa re' la' xquicowsaj i ca̱mna. Ru'um aj re', re' ma' Tawiy xitz'ihmbaj cho i xik'or i Dios chi je' wili: “Wi re' hat-tak c'ahchi' abiram tak yu'na re' c'ahchi' nik'orom wili, ma̱cowsaj awa̱mna tak chi ribirmijic, nqui xik'or.

Ru̱c' chi je' re' xik'or ma' Tawiy nkarak chiri̱j chi re' take kama̱m kati't ma' xquirak ta wo' quihi'lbal ru̱c' i Dios naxiwih'ic cho chipam yuk'ul wili re' Canahan ribihnal re' xc'amaric wi̱' quibe̱h ru'um ma' Joswe. Wi ta nak xquirak quihi'lbal sic'o̱j cho wach chi queh ru'um i Dios, ma' xk'ormojic ta wo' nak chic ribiral ru'um ma' Tawiy chi cu wilic jenaj chic rik'ijil reh oquic chipam i hi'lbal re're'.
Je' re' ajic re' Dios xipahba̱' chic cho jenaj rik'ijil re' narirakmajic wi̱' i hi'lbal re' xa wilic wo' cho chi quina̱ take c'acharel wilque̱b chi ritinami̱t.

Je' re' ajic je' ricab xiban i Dios chi xhi'lic wo' reh ricamaj naxicohlaj ritik'injic wach chi'nchel ru'um chi ma'xta nak chic bih raj tik'injic je' wo' re' take ritinami̱t ru' ma' curman ta chic naquikajic quijohtic chi risiq'uiric i hi'lbal maj xa ru̱c' wo' chic re're' eriban chi ewo' chi nrakmajic yu'na.

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um chi kana̱ i hoj ritinami̱t i Dios xa cu wilic wo' cho jenaj rik'ijil re' nakarakam wi̱' kahi'lbal ar ru̱c' i Dios, kayew wo' tak kac'ux chi cow chi oquic chipam i kahi'lbal re're'. Raj re' c'acharel ma' riyew ta ric'ux, no̱j riban je' ricab xca'n cho take kama̱m kati't najtir k'i̱j chi wilic queh ma' xquich'ica̱' ta quic'ux chiri̱j i k'oro̱j cho queh ru'um i Dios eh ru'um re' xchalic i ti'c'axic chi quina̱.

Je' aj re' chiyohbalej ri̱b i c'acharel re' ma' rinimej ta i k'oric rik'orom cho Dios maj re' wo' k'oric re're' naribanic chi nariye'eric ti'c'axic china̱. Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab chi re' Dios nye'bic quic'acharic take tinamit ru̱c' rik'orbal, re' aj wo' re' nc'uhtunic lok reh chaj bih capew-bal ch'i̱l no'jbal wilic cho pan ca̱mna take c'acharel je' ricab nok wi xojyoc'oric ru̱c' jeno' ch'ihch' c'ultar k'as nah re̱, eric'uhtaj lok nic' wach je' cho pan kati'jolal kabakil.

Ru'um aj wo' re' nik'or aweh tak chi ma' jeno' reh nic' pa' nimal tik'imaj take cho ru'um i Dios eriban chi ta nak eric'ol ri̱b chiwach, chi ta nak ma' erirak chiri̱j i ribano̱j on chi ma' ta nak erilow cho ru'. Je' re' nok chi'nchel pa' bih nka'n on nkak'or, chi'nchel re're' reht'alim cho i Dios eh chiwach wo' re' nakojic kak'ahsam i kabano̱j naponok rik'ijil.

Re' hin nik'orom wo' chic aweh tak chi re' Jesus re' rAc'u̱n i Dios xoquic chic chipam ricamaj chi Pe̱t Nahsil C'amol quiBe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ eh chiki̱j i hoj c'ahchi' ribanam i camanic re're'. Je' re' nik'or maj xa re' wo' riponic i Jesus ru̱c' i Dios, re' nim wach i camanic re're' c'ahchi' ribanam chiki̱j. Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi cow kach'ica̱' tak kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus.

Coric ru', re' Jesus wilic chic yu'na chipam ricamaj chi Nahsil C'amol quiBe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱, xa re' la' to̱b ta wo' je' re' camanic c'ahchi' ribanam, ma' ra̱j ta rik'orom chi ru'um chi k'e̱' lo̱k' ricamaj ma' ta nak chic eriquetelej cho kawach i hoj re' ma'xta kansil chi ricuyuric i pajaric nchalic chi kana̱. Ma'xta, re' Jesus rirak chiri̱j nic' wach nkic'raj i hoj nanchalic i pajaric chi kana̱ maj re're' naxwih'ic ayu' wach ac'al xiq'uic chipam chi'nchel i pajaric je' ricab nkac'ul i hoj yu'na. Re' cok ru' re're' ma' jaruj ta xk'ehbic chipam i mahc.

Je' re' nok ru'um chi re' Jesus rirak chiri̱j nic' wach nkic'raj i hoj ru̱c' take pajaric nkac'ul, chiwach i Jesus wili re' wilic rajawric chi K'atal K'oric kojc'uhtunok wo' tak chi ch'iclic kac'ux chiri̱j reh chi enkarak i quetelbal keh ch'i̱l wo' i rato'bil chi katobjic chiwach take pajaric nchalic chi kana̱.

Xa hab wach c'acharel chiho̱j wach chi Nahsil C'amol quiBe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios canamaj chi quitobjic take c'acharel chi rik'ahsjic i quisi̱ chiwach i Dios eh je' wo' chi naquicansam take chicop quic'amaric cok cu'um take c'acharel chi pahkbal cuybal quimahc. Re' c'acharel re' nbanic camanic chi Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱, re' aj wo' Dios xchihbic cho wach chi quixilac take rich c'acharel.

Ru'um chi re' Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱ xa tiwic xa ba̱k wo' ti je' ricab wo' take rich c'acharel chi xa ma' cow ta wo' ti quicapew-bal chiwach ransil i mahc, riquetelej wo' quiwach take c'acharel re' quimahcanic chi ma' c'ahchi' ta quirakam chiri̱j chi mahc c'ahchi'que̱b.

Je' wo', re' c'acharel re' riban ricamaj chi Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱ nmahcanic wo' eh ru'um aj wo' chi nmahcanic, curman wo' chi reh chi rik'ahsaj johtok risi̱ chiwach i Dios je' ricab wo' riban ru̱c' quisi̱ take tinamit nanquik'ahsaj reh chi pahkbal cuybal quimahc chiwach i Dios.

Je' wo' chic re', k'e̱' wo' chic lo̱k' rilok'il i c'acharel re' wilic ricamaj chi Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱ chiwach i Dios, xa re' la' ma' hab ta wach jeno' c'acharel eta nak riban chi enoquic chipam i camanic re're' chi xa ta nak chi rutquel ri̱b, re' la' Dios nyuk'unic reh i c'acharel chi nariwih'ic rilok'il ru̱c' i camanic re're' je' ricab xbanjic cho ru̱c' i ma' A̱ron najtir k'i̱j naxyuk'unjic cho ru'um i Dios.

Nic' pa' wach xc'uluric ru̱c' ma' A̱ron je' wo' re' xc'uluric ru̱c' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Re' cok ru', re' rilok'il wilic i Jesus ru̱c' ricamaj chi Nahsil C'amol quiBe̱h take aj K'ahsem Si̱ ma' xa ta ximin ta ri̱b chipam, re' la' kAja̱w Dios xcojbic reh chi xic'ul i rilok'il ru̱c' ricamaj re're'. Re' Jesus k'uru' ma' xa ta xicoj cho ri̱b chipam i camanic chi Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱, re' la' Dios xye'bic cho reh i rinimal wach rilok'il naxik'or reh take k'oric re' ma' hab ta wach aj eh k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios. Re' take k'oric re're', re' tz'ihmbimaj cho chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' i riC'uhbal, je' wili rik'or: “Re' hin xa wilqui̱n wo' cho chi hin raja̱w eh re're' xa wilic wo' cho chi wac'u̱n, nqui.

Je' wo' chic, ar chipam i lok' laj hu̱j re're' je' wili rik'or: “Re' hat na̱cahnic chi Nahsil Aj K'ahsem Si̱ chi junelic k'i̱j sakom eh re' awa'ric nariwih'ic chi Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱ naribanam jenaj wach ch'i̱l riwa'ric xwih'ic cho i Pe̱t Aj K'ahsem Si̱ najtir k'i̱j re' Melquiserec, nqui rik'or.

Re' aj re' i k'oro̱j cho chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric pa rik'ijil cho ric'acharic ayu' wach ac'al. Naxwih'ic ayu' wach ac'al, re're' q'uih pech wo' xok'ic pa riti̱j naxiq'uer johtok chi̱' ru̱c' ricowil rik'orbal chi ripahkaljic johtok reh Dios i rato'bil. Je' re' xiban maj reht'alim chi re' Dios wilic rajawric chi rico'ljic chi ma' eta nquimic chi junpech. Re' aj take riti̱j xiban i Jesus, xibiraj wo' cho i Dios eh je' re' xiban ru'um chi re' Jesus xa nbirinic wo' k'oric chiwach.

Je' wo' chic re' Jesus naxwih'ic ayu' wach ac'al, re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xic'ul ti'quilal to̱b ta wo' nchel rAc'u̱n i Dios. Ru̱c' re're' nkilow chi xitijej wo' i no'jbal chiri̱j i birinic k'oric re' nponic chiwach i Dios.

Ru'um nok re' Jesus xitijej birinic k'oric, xye'eric reh chi re' wo' re' enbanic chi re' take c'acharel aj birinel k'oric take, equico'ljic chiwach i junelic quimic eh je' wo' chi enye'eric quic'acharic chi junelic k'i̱j sakom.

Je' re' ajic chi junelic k'i̱j sakom re' Dios xicana̱' i Jesus chi manlic chi Nahsil C'amol quiBe̱h take aj K'ahsem Si̱ eh re' riwa'ric wilic chi aj K'ahsem Si̱ xiban jenaj wach ch'i̱l riwa'ric xwih'ic cho i Pe̱t aj K'ahsem Si̱ najtir k'i̱j re' Melquiserec.

Cu wilic wo' nak take k'oric ra̱j rik'ormojic aweh tak chiri̱j ricamaj i kAja̱w Jesus chi Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱ chiwach i Dios, xa re' la' c'axic so' risakomsjic wach aweh tak ru'um nok cu k'u̱n na'n tak chi rirakmajic chiri̱j take k'oro̱j lok wili.

Til pa ricorquil, re' hat-tak najtir chic nap'ut tak cho niminic eh xa cu ja' nponic ta wo' wach ano'jbal tak chi hat nak tak chic aj c'uhtunel reh riC'uhbal i Dios yu'na. Re' hat-tak xa cu nawa̱j wo' nak tak chic chi cu naric'uhtjic wo' chic rica'pech aweh tak take c'uhbal re' xa ma' c'axic ta ti rirakmajic chiri̱j chipam i riC'uhbal i Dios. Ru̱c' re're', re' hat-tak na'n tak je' ricab i ha'lac'un re' cu ch'u̱ch' riwa'bej ru'um chi ja' cow ta cho pa̱m.

Wi cu je' re' na'n tak, ra̱j rik'orom chi re' hat-tak cu ja' hat ta wo' tak manlic ru̱c' rirakmajic chiri̱j haj wilic i holohic eh haj wilic i ma' holohic ta, je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' i t'uch ha'lac'un re' cu ch'u̱ch' riwa'bej.

Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab chi re' wi'c re' chic take cuc' sak nimak ac'un ixk'un quic'uxbic reh, je' wo' re' nc'uluric cu̱c' take aj niminel re' xa eli̱c wo' nquiyew quic'ux chi narimanlajic wach quino'jbal, xa re' wo' take re' quichol rirakmajic chiri̱j haj wilic i holohic eh haj wilic i ma' holohic ta chi banaric.

Ru'um aj re' katik tak ju' ritijiljic ri̱j ribiral i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric cu rehtal no̱j manlajok wach i kano'jbal chi rirakmajic chiri̱j hab wach ru'. Je' re' ka'n tak re' cok ru' ma' kojcahnic tak xa ru̱c' take c'uhbal re' c'uhtumaj cho keh pan ch'iquinbal cho reh kaniminic on ru̱c' take pe̱t tijinic xkac'ul naxkapahba̱' cho kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus je' ricab take tijinic wili: Re' tijinic nc'uhtunic wi̱' chi nkajal wach i ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal nka'n, re' tijinic nc'uhtunic wi̱' chi nkacana̱' ribanaric take bano̱j re' quibanic chi ma' eta kojc'acharic ru̱c' i Dios chiri̱j chi kojquimic je eh je wo' i tijinic chiri̱j i ch'iquinic c'uxlis chiri̱j i Dios.

Ma' xa ta re're', je' la' wo' take toco̱m chic tijinic wili: Re' tijinic chiri̱j take rehreh wach kahsanic ha', re' tijinic nc'uhtunic reh chi curman i cojo̱j k'abis chi quina̱ take aj niminel chi c'uhtbal queh chi re' Lok' laj Uxlabal wilic cu̱c', on re' tijinic re' nk'oric chiri̱j quic'a'chic wo' chic take camnak take je, on re' tijinic nc'uhtunic reh nic' wach i ch'ukuj k'oric naribanam i Dios pan cohlsbal wach chi'nchel eh nic' wach nok re' ti'c'axic nariye'eric ru̱c' i ch'ukuj k'oric nariwih'ic chi junelic chi quina̱ take aj mahc.
Re' ta nak Dios k'uru' til chiyew wi̱n chi enitik ju' ritijiljic ri̱j ribiral i Jesus je' ricab cu re' xnik'or je aweh tak.

Re' riwi̱' chi je' re' raj ribanaric ru'um reh i wili: Re' aj niminel reh Jesus, re're' jenaj c'acharel sakomomaj chic wach i rino'jbal ru̱c' riC'uhbal i Dios. Je' wo', re' aj niminel suk chic ric'ux chi wilic chic china̱ take cuse'sbal nchalic ru̱c' i Dios eh ye'o̱j wo' reh chi enwih'ic i Lok' laj Uxlabal china̱.

Ma' xa ta re're', re' la' aj niminel til wo' xitijej chic chi re' take nic' pa' nimal take k'oric riban i Dios, til wo' manlic wach. Je' wo' chic, re' rinimal wach rajawric i Dios xcamanic chic pa ric'acharic eh re' rajawric i Dios re're', naric'uhtunic wo' wach chi manlic chipam i rik'ijil nachiban wi̱' i ch'ukuj wach k'oric i Dios.

Re' aj niminel reh Jesus k'uru' xye'eric reh chi xiwachej chi'nchel re're', xa re' la' wi xk'ehbic wo' chic pan mahc ru̱c' rik'ormojic chi ma' re' ta chic aj niminel reh kAja̱w Jesus, c'axic chic chi enwih'ic ru̱c' i no'jbal re' nc'uhtunic lok wi̱' chi ac' nak chic rino'jbal. Je' re' nik'or maj wi re' aj niminel ma'xta chic ricoj wach i Jesus, re're' je' na nchel c'ahchi' wo' chic ricojom wach curu̱s i rAc'u̱n i Dios eh c'ahchi' wo' chic ribanam chi encahnic pan q'uixbilal i Jesus je' ricab xbanjic reh cu'um i tinamit nok wilic ar wach curu̱s.

Raj nchel wi re' aj niminel ric'ul take ricuse'sbal i Dios eh re' chic haj wilic ra̱j i Dios riban ribanaric, re're' eriban chi enkajalwachej ru̱c' jeno' ac'al. Je' re' nik'or maj re' ac'al nok wilic ricuse'sbal i Dios china̱ ma' xa ta ritz'ubej i jab re' eli̱c nkajic chiwach je' la' wo' riyew cho take tic mu'u̱n queh take aj tico̱l re' nsukbic quic'ux ru'um i tic nelic cho chiwach i cac'a̱l nanquicamanej wach.

Tz'a̱b ru' wi re' aj niminel ric'ul ricuse'sbal i Dios xa re' la' ma' riban ta ribanaric haj wilic ra̱j i Dios, re're' eriban chi enkajalwachej ru̱c' i ac'al re' ma'xta ricuse'sbal i Dios china̱. Je' re' nik'or maj re' ac'al re're' xa q'ui̱x qui'elic cho chiwach eh cu c'ataric chic ra̱j wach ru'um chi ma'xta chic bih ricamanej.

Hat-tak wich aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak, to̱b ta xnik'or lok ribiral aweh tak chiri̱j i yohbal rirak i aj niminel nok ma' riban ta haj wilic i ra̱j i Dios, re' hin til ch'iclic nic'ux chi re' hat-tak na̱tikim tak ju' ribanaric i holohic laj bano̱j je' ricab curman chi enka'n chi'nchel i hoj re' xojco'ljic chic ru'um i Jesus.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' Dios xa coric wo' wach ric'ux eh chi je' re' rino'jbal, re're' nariyeb aweh tak asi̱ ru'um nok ma' jaruj ta iq'ue̱l pa ric'ux acamaj abanam tak cho on re' c'axoj i̱b abanam tak cho ru̱c' quitobjic take lok' laj awich aj niminel tak eh cu yu'na chi k'i̱j xa cu je' wo' re' c'ahchi'ca̱t tak.

Ru'um aj re' to̱b ta ch'iclic nic'ux chi wilic cho ricuse'sbal chana̱ tak, re' hin cu nwa̱j chi je' ricab cu yu'na chi k'i̱j nayew tak ac'ux chi quitobjic take awich aj niminel tak, xa je' ok wo' re' cha'n tak eli̱c k'i̱j cu rehtal nponic rik'ijil re' na̱c'ulum tak wi̱' chi manlic i nic' pa' nimal c'ahchi' awuy'em tak.

Je' re' nik'or reh chi ma' eta tisiquilbic tak ru̱c' quitobjic take awich aj niminel tak, chatik la' tak ju' ribanaric re're' je' ricab curman chi naka'nam chi'nchel i hoj aj niminel re' nkayew kac'ux chi niminic eh nkacuy ransil take ti'c'axic. Cha'n tak re're' k'uru' ru'um nok re' hoj aj niminel reh Jesus nariye'eric keh chi enkehchaj i nic' pa' nimal rik'orom cho i Dios chi nakac'ulum.

Re' chic yu'na chacoj tak rehtal i ribiral wili: Chipam cho k'i̱j nok re' Dios xik'or cho ribiral chi naricuse'sam i ma' Awraham, re're' naxiyew rik'orbal chi ribil ri̱b, xiban chi je' re' ru'um nok chiri̱j lok ru' ma'xta chic jeno' bihnal k'e̱' ta nak nim wach riwa'ric chi eripahba̱' rik'orbal chiwach ru'.

Chi je' aj re', re' Dios je' wili xik'or cho reh ma' Awraham: “Til coric, re' hin naca̱t nicuse'sam cu rehtal nariq'uic wo' chic na̱ acuse'sjic nanibanam eh re' aj re' nanibanam reh chi nariwih'ic je riq'uihal awa̱' awi'sil, nqui Dios reh.

Chiri̱j wili ru̱c' rinimal wach rik'uni̱l i ma' Awraham chi ruyu'njic i riponic wach i k'i̱j re' naric'ulum wi̱' take k'oro̱j cho reh ru'um i Dios, xmanlajic wo' wach ru̱c' i rasjic i rac'u̱n re' Isahac ribihnal.

Je' aj re' k'uru' re' Dios naxiyew rik'orbal ru̱c' i Awraham chi naricuse'sam ru̱c' rasjic i rac'u̱n re' Isahac, je' na wa'ric xiban je' ricab nca'n take c'acharel re' take reh chi narinabjic chi til naca'nam wo' ribanaric i chaj bih quik'orbal nquiyew, cu nquiyew quik'orbal chiwach jeno' c'acharel nim wach riwa'ric chi quiwach ru' eh nok quiyeb chic quik'orbal ma'xta chic jeno' c'uta̱j wilic cu chi eta nak nk'ormojic chi ma' eta chic nbanaric.

Je' aj re' xiban i Dios, xiyew rik'orbal chi ribil ri̱b ru'um chi ma'xta chic jeno' nim wach riwa'ric chiwach ru'. Je' re' xiban c'uhtbal reh chi ma' eta chic rijal wach ricapew-bal chiri̱j rik'orbal riyeb cho queh take naquehchenic reh co̱ch k'oro̱j cho ribiral ru'um.

Je' re' ajic re' rik'orbal xiyew i Dios ru̱c' i ma' Awraham til wo' xcahnic chi til pa'lic rik'ormojic ru'um take quib wili: Pe̱t k'oric, re're' xiyew rik'orbal chi til naribanam i haj wilic xik'or chi naribanam eh ricab k'oric, re're' til xipahba̱' wo' rik'orbal chi ribil ri̱b chi til je' re' naribanam. Re' aj re' riwi̱' k'uru' chi re' take k'oric re're' ma' jaruj ta eriban chi equijalmajic wach. Je' re' nik'or maj re' Dios ma' jaruj ta erichuc k'oric chikana̱ eh ru'um chi ma' richuc ta k'oric, re're' nbanic chi wilic ransil ka̱mna i hoj re' c'ahchi' kasiq'uim i kaco'ljic ru̱c' i Dios. Ru̱c' re're' enkatik ju' rich'iquinjic kac'ux chiri̱j i nic' pa' nimal k'oro̱j cahnok ru'um i Dios chi nakac'ulum johtok chi kawach.

Re' aj rich'iquinjic kac'ux wili, xa je' na ricab cowil pixlic jeno' ma' laj cano̱wa. Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab nok re' cano̱wa ma' eta chic nc'uyu'jic je pa riye'a̱b ru'um nok chi cu pa richamil jok i ha' cutu̱j jok i ahl laj ch'ihch' npahbanic reh, je' wo' re' i rich'iquinjic kac'ux i hoj ma'xta bih enc'uyu'sunic keh ru'um chi cow ch'iclic chiri̱j i Jesus. Re're' xk'ahxic wo' chic johtok ar pan taxa̱j chipam ye'a̱b re' til nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios je' ricab nok wilic ju'jun queh Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱ jenaj pech pa riha̱b qui'oquic cok chipam i ye'a̱b k'oro̱j chi “K'e̱' wo' chic Nim riLok'il” re' poyo̱j wach ru̱c' nim laj tz'ih.

Je' wo' re' xiban i Jesus eh ru̱c' re're' xcahnic chi re' aj re' i pe̱t oconak ar pan taxa̱j nok ja' hab ta wach jeno' aj niminel oconak ar eh je' ricab riwa'ric xye'eric i Melquiserec ru'um i Dios chi xcahnic chi Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱ chiwach, je' wo' re' riwa'ric xye'eric i Jesus chi naribanam i camanic chi Pe̱t Nahsil C'amol quiBe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chi junelic k'i̱j sakom.

Yu'na nanik'orom take wili chiri̱j ma' Melquiserec: Pe̱t, re' ma' Melquiserec, re' wo' re' xwih'ic chi k'atal k'oric china̱ tinamit Salem ribihnal eh je' wo' chi Pe̱t Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱ chiwach i Dios re' nim wach rajawric china̱ chi'nchel. Chi narirakmajic chiri̱j rinimal wach riwa'ric i Melquiserec ru'um reh take ricamaj re're' ayu' nk'ormojic aweh tak i ribiral wili: Junpech nok re' ma' Awraham soljic riban cho ch'i̱l take riso̱l chi k'ak'anic naxponic quisach cho wach take toco̱m chic k'atal k'oric ch'i̱l wo' take quiso̱l, re' Melquiserec xelic cho chi ric'uluric ma' Awraham eh xicuse'saj!

Ma' xa ta ar nilmijic rinimal wach riwa'ric je' la' wo' ru̱c' i wili: Re' ma' Awraham china̱ lok i nic' pa' q'uihal xiban canar pan k'ak'anic xesaj lok pa reh i rilaje̱b re' k'oro̱j chi tojbal ri̱j pa' bih chiwach i Dios eh xik'ahsaj reh! Ricab, re' chic i ribihnal Melquiserec, je' wili nelic wi̱': “Re' nk'atbic k'oric ru̱c' coric wach c'uxlis”. Wi nkatuna̱' wach rik'ormojic i k'oric re're' ch'i̱l i nelic wi̱' ribihnal i tinamit Salem, re' ra̱j rik'orom “sukquil c'uxlis”, ra̱j wo' rik'orom chi re' Melquiserec re're' xiyew wo' risukquil quic'ux take tinamit aj Salem ru̱c' ricamaj xiban chi quik'atal k'oric.

Wilic wo' jenaj chic k'oric chiri̱j ribiral i Melquiserec. Chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios, ma' xtz'ihmjic ta ribiral hab wach ritu̱t raja̱w on hab wach take rima̱m rati't eh ma' xnabjic ta wo' janc'al xasjic on janc'al xquimic. Ru̱c' re're' nkilow chi re' ribiral chi aj k'ahsem si̱ ma' xsahchic ta wach je' ricab wo' nok re' rAc'u̱n i Dios c'ahchi' chi camanic chi Pe̱t Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱ chi junelic k'i̱j sakom.

Je' re' k'uru', ru̱c' chi'nchel i kilom re're' chacoj tak rehtal chi coric nic' nimal riwa'ric wilic i Melquiserec. Je' re' nik'or maj xquilow chic chi re' kama̱m ma' Awraham re' k'e̱' wo' chic riwa'ric ye'o̱j chi quiwach take kama̱m kati't, xiban chi re' nic' pa' q'uihal xic'am cho pan k'ak'anic, xesaj lok pa reh i rilaje̱b re' k'oro̱j cho chi tojbal ri̱j pa' bih chiwach i Dios eh xik'ahsaj reh aj k'ahsem si̱ re're'.

Til coric, re' ma' Awraham xiban je' ricab rik'or i tak'anic xye'eric rik'ormojic chipam Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios chiqui̱j take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios je' ru̱c' ra̱' ri'sil take cho rihrima̱m Awraham re' ma' Lewih ribihnal. Chaj aj bih rik'or i tak'anic re're'? Rik'or chi to̱b ta re' take ritinami̱t i Dios ch'i̱l take aj k'ahsem si̱ re're' ra̱' ri'sil wo' take cho ma' Awraham, curman chi queh chi re' jenaj reh rilaje̱b reh pa' bih nca'n canar naquik'ahsam queh take quich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, re' pahbamaj take chi aj k'ahsem si̱.

Til c'olok pan ac'ux tak chi re' Melquiserec, re're' jenaj aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Lewih! To̱b ta je' re' riwi̱', re're' xic'ul ru̱c' ma' Awraham i jenaj reh rilaje̱b reh pa' bih nbanjic canar. Ru̱c' aj re're' nc'utunic chi nim wach riwa'ric i Melquiserec eh nc'utunic wo' lok chi je' re' riwi̱' ru̱c' i wili: Re' Melquiserec xicuse'saj wo' ma' Awraham re' k'oro̱j cho reh ru'um i Dios chi naricuse'sjic.

Ru̱c' re're' nc'utunic chi re' Melquiserec nim riwa'ric wilic ru̱c' i cuse'senic xiban maj chi'nchel neht'alanic reh chi re' nbanic banoj cuse'senic, k'e̱' nim wach riwa'ric chiwach nc'ulbic reh cuse'sbal!

Pan ricaj k'oric nik'or i wili: Re' Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios, rik'or chi re' Melquiserec re' xa je' na cu c'achlic wo' yu'na chi k'i̱j ru'um nok ma' xsahchic ta wach ribiral chi aj k'ahsem si̱, raj take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Lewih re' xic'ulbic reh jenaj reh rilaje̱b reh pa' bih nbanjic canar, ma' je ta re' xc'uluric cu̱c', xa xiquimic la' wo' take je je' ricab nkac'ul chi kunchelal i hoj c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al.

Jenaj chic k'oric chiri̱j i Melquiserec. Re're' k'e̱' wo' chic nim riwa'ric chiwach ma' Lewih eh nik'or chi je' re' maj re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Lewih re' wilque̱b wo' chi aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios naxye'eric cho queh i jenaj reh rilaje̱b reh pa' bih nbanjic canar, je' na wa'ric xquik'ahsaj wo' cho reh ma' Melquiserec i to̱j re're' nok re' kama̱m ma' Awraham xiban wo' cho k'ahsanic re're' ru̱c' chi'nchel pa' bih xiban cho canar pan k'ak'anic.

Re' wo' re' eriban chi enk'ormojic maj to̱b ta nak naxelic cho ma' Melquiserec chi ric'uluric ma' Awraham ja' nasjic ta nak i ma' Lewih, xa wilic wo' nak chic cho rija'quil ma' Lewih ch'i̱l take ra̱' ri'sil pa riquiq'ue̱l i ma' Awraham.

Yu'na chi xkilow chic lok chi re' Melquiserec nim wach riwa'ric chiwach i ma' Lewih, curman k'uru' chi re' naroquic chi Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱ chiwach i Dios je' ricab ok riwa'ric cho ma' Melquiserec maj yu'na ma' re' ta chic jeno' queh rija'quil cho ma' A̱ron nariwih'ic chi Nahsil. Coric ru' nok re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xquic'ul cho C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xk'ormojic cho queh ra̱' ri'sil ma' Israhel chi xa re' wach take ra̱' ri'sil i ma' A̱ron ch'i̱l take ra̱' ri'sil wo' cho ma' Lewih nacoquic chi aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios xa re' la' ru' ru'um chi ma' xca'n ta chi coric i camanic ye'o̱j chi quina̱, ma' xtikiric ta chic ju' quipahbabjic take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Lewih chi aj k'ahsem si̱ take.

Ru'um re're', naxjalmajic wach i no'jbal chi ma' re' ta chic ru̱c' i ma' Lewih narichalic quija'quil take aj k'ahsem si̱ nye'eric chiwach i Dios, je' wo' xjalmajic i tak'anic wilic chi xa chi ru̱c' nak ma' Lewih nariwih'ic quija'quil take aj kahsanel take si̱.

Je' re' ajic chi xink'oric chic lok chiri̱j i Jesus chi xa wilic wo' cho chi Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱ chiwach i Dios, re' aj wili nc'uluric wo' ru̱c' i Jesus: Re're' ma' re' ta ru̱c' i ma' Lewih elenak cho rija'quil chi aj k'ahsem si̱, ru̱c' la' i junch'uk chic chi c'acharel re' ma' janc'al ta elenak cho jeno' aj k'ahsem si̱ chi quixilac.

Nik'or chi je' re' nc'uluric maj til wo' eht'alamaj chi re' Jesus ar ru̱c' ma' Jurah xchalic rija'quil, to̱b ta nchel chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ma' haj ta rik'or chi re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Jurah naquicamanic chi aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios.

Re' chic i tak'anic bano̱j cho chi xa ru̱c' i ma' Lewih nariwih'ic quija'quil take aj k'ahsem si̱, xjalaric chic wach eh nc'utunic lok wach chi manlic ru̱c' i wili: Wilic jenaj chic Pe̱t Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱ chiwach i Dios eh re're', re' aj i Jesus. Re're' ma' je' ta ricab take aj k'ahsem si̱ chalanak quija'quil ru̱c' ma' Lewih, je' la' ricab i ma' Melquiserec.

Chi je' re' riwi̱', re're' ma' pahbamaj ta je' ricab rik'or i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi xa ca̱' qui'sil qui̱b nacoquic chi aj k'ahsem si̱ re' la' re're' xpahbabjic ru'um i Dios chi wilic ru̱c' rajawric, je' ricab i rajawric xc'a'chsanic wo' chic cho reh naxquimic je.

Nik'or chi xpahbabjic ru'um i Dios maj chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios je' wili k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios chiri̱j i Jesus: “Re' hat tinipahba̱' chi Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱ chi junelic k'i̱j sakom eh re' awa'ric naribanam jenaj wach ch'i̱l riwa'ric xwih'ic cho i Pe̱t aj K'ahsem Si̱ najtir k'i̱j re' Melquiserec, nqui k'oro̱j.

Chiri̱j chic i tak'anic canamaj cho najtir k'i̱j chi xa re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Lewih naquiwih'ic chi aj k'ahsem si̱, k'oro̱j chic cho chi ma'xta chic ric'amaric na̱ ru'um nok ma'xta wo' chic bih naricamanic wi̱'. Chi je' re' k'uru' ma'xta wo' chic rajawric chi quina̱ take c'acharel.

Je' re' nik'or maj ru̱c' i tak'anic re're' ma' xquinimej ta chi manlic i quicamaj take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios. Ru'um aj re', re' Dios xiban chi chiri̱j chic i Jesus enkach'ica̱' kac'ux. K'e̱' wo' chic tare̱t chi nka'n chi je' re' maj re' wo' kAja̱w Jesus xbanic chi xoj-oquic chi aj lok'em chic wach i Dios.
Re' camanic riban i Jesus chi Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱, til re' Dios xtak'anic reh rik'ormojic naxiyew cho rik'orbal chi til coric chi je' re' naribanam i Jesus.

Ru'um chi je' re' xiban i Dios, re' Jesus ma' je' ta ricab take toco̱m chic take aj k'ahsem si̱. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' naxipahbabjic pan quicamaj ma' xbanaric ta cu̱c' je' ricab xbanaric ru̱c' i kAja̱w Jesus chi xye'eric jenaj k'oric chiri̱j. Je' re' xiban i Dios naxpahbabjic i Jesus pa ricamaj. Re're' xiyew rik'orbal chi je' wili: “Re' hin Ajabe̱s Dios niyew nik'orbal chawi̱j eh ma' eta riban chi enijal wach i nik'orbal wili: Re' hat chi junelic k'i̱j sakom na̱cahnic chi Pe̱t Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱, eh re' awa'ric naribanam jenaj wach ch'i̱l riwa'ric xwih'ic cho i Pe̱t aj K'ahsem Si̱ najtir k'i̱j re' Melquiserec, nqui xik'or i Dios.

Chi riyeb rik'orbal i Dios chiri̱j i Jesus, re' aj wo' re' i pahbamaj chi xo̱j elok wach i jenaj chic tik'inic re' k'e̱' wo' chic tare̱t chiwach i tik'inic bano̱j cho cu̱c' take kama̱m kati't ru'um i Dios.

Je' re' ajic k'e̱' wo' chic tare̱t chi re' Jesus wilic yu'na chi Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱ chiwach i Dios. Nik'or chi je' re' maj ju'jun queh take q'uihal Pe̱t aj K'ahsem Si̱ wih'inak take cho xa xponic wo' wach rik'ijil chi xiquimic je. Ru'um chi je' re' xquic'ul cho, re' camanic re're' xa xitik cho ri̱b richoporic na̱ chi quiwach.

Raj nchel i Jesus ma' je' ta re' nc'uluric ru̱c', ma' hab ta wach jeno' enoquic chi rijelow-bal pa ricamaj chi Pe̱t Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱ chiwach i Dios ru'um nok re're' ma' jaruj ta chic nariquimic je xa c'achlic la' wo' chi junelic k'i̱j sakom.

Ru'um chi junelic k'i̱j sakom c'ahchi' chi camanic chiwach i Dios chi aj pahkanel quito'bal take c'acharel, re're' rinimej chi manlic i ricamaj chi aj ye'ol quico'lbal take tinamit yu'na eh je' wo' re' johtok chi junelic k'i̱j sakom cu̱c' take nic' pa' q'uihal quichalic chiwach i Jesus chi c'ahchi' quich'ica̱b quic'ux chiri̱j ru'.

Je' re' nok til curman chi keh hoj chi re' kAja̱w Jesus xwih'ic chi Pe̱t Nahsil C'amol quiBe̱h take aj K'ahsem Si̱ chiwach i Dios. Je' re' nik'or maj xa ru̱c' re're' nc'uhtunic take no'jbal wili: Re're' ma' janc'al ta mahcanak cho, ma' janc'al ta rich'uwa'rsam wach ricapew-bal ru̱c' take ma' to̱b ta laj capew-bal eh ma' xiban ta jenaj wach rino'jbal ku̱c' hoj aj mahc. Je' re' ajic ru'um rino'jbal re're', re' kAja̱w Jesus til ric'ul chi xwih'ic chi Pe̱t Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱ chiwach i Dios eh je' wo' ru'um chi re're' k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal wach rilok'il wilic ar pan taxa̱j.

Je' re' ajic re' Jesus ma' je' ta ricab take toco̱m chic nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱. Nik'or wo' chic chi je' re' maj re' take re' curman chi kalakal xquicansaj cho take chicop chi pahkbal cuybal quimahc chiwach i Dios eh cu re' aj chic ru' chiri̱j chic quimahc i tinamit quicansaj cho take chicop chi si̱ chiwach i Dios. Raj chic yu'na chi jelow-bal take chicop quicansjic eli̱c ha̱b, re' Jesus xiyew ri̱b pan quimic wach curu̱s eh yu'na johtok chi junelic, ru̱c' i riquimic re' xa junpech wo' xic'ul, re' wo' re' ncamanic chi cuybal quimahc take tinamit chiwach i Dios.

Je' wo' chic, re' Jesus ma' je' ta ricab take nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios, maj re' take re' ma' xa ta re' chi aj mahc take je' la' wo' reh chi xi'oquic chipam quicamaj chi aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios, cu re' nchel i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xcamanic chi chihbal quiwach. Ra̱j nchel Ac'unbe̱s Jesus, til re' Dios xpahbanic reh eh re' rik'orbal i Dios chi ripahba̱bjic i Jesus xiyew cho nok re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel kac'ulum nak chic cho i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Je' re' ajic chi pahbamaj chic i Jesus, re're' c'ahchi' ribanam ricamaj chi manlic yu'na eh je' wo' chi junelic k'i̱j sakom.

Re' wili til nwa̱j chi narirakmajic chiri̱j ru̱c' take k'oric c'ahchi' nik'orom lok aweh tak: Re' hoj aj niminel, re' chic i Jesus wilic chi Pe̱t kaNahsil C'amol quiBe̱h take aj K'ahsem Si̱ chiwach i Dios. Re're' ma' xa ta wilic cok chi je' re' ar pan taxa̱j re' wilic wi̱' i Dios, re' la' re', je' ricab nok nye'eric reh jeno' c'acharel chi ntz'uhkic cok pa risec'a̱j jeno' k'atal k'oric, xye'eric wo' reh chi xoquic chi aj k'atal k'oric rich'i̱l i Dios.

Chi je' re' riwi̱' take ricamaj, nwa̱j wo' chi naweht'alim tak chi re' ricamaj chi Pe̱t Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱ chiwach i Dios re' Jesus ma' re' ta chipam i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios c'ahchi' ribanam re' xtik'injic cho najtir k'i̱j chi xa poyo̱j ri̱j ru̱c' nimak tak tz'ih, ar la' c'ahchi' ribanam johtok pan taxa̱j re' ye'a̱b tik'imaj ru'um i Dios chi ar enye'eric rilok'il chi coric eh chi ar nrakmajic cu'um take quilok'onic reh.

Je' wo' chic, nwa̱j chi naweht'alij tak i wili: Je' ricab nok re' take Nahsil C'amol quiBe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ quipahbabjic chi rik'ahsjic take si̱ chiwach i Dios chi pahkbal cuybal mahc, je' wo' re' xc'uluric ru̱c' i kAja̱w Jesus chi xwih'ic wo' risi̱ eh ar wo' chiwach i Dios xik'ahsaj johtok.

Wi ta nak re' Jesus xa ayu' wach ac'al wilic, re're' ma' wo' nak chi aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios encamanic. Je' re' nik'or ru'um nok re' camanic re're' xa queh take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Lewih ye'o̱j. Je' wo' chic, re' risi̱ i Jesus ma' jenaj ta wach ch'i̱l i quisi̱ take aj k'ahsem si̱. Je' re' nik'or maj cu yu'na chi k'i̱j re' take re' xa cu c'ahchi' wo' quik'ahsam chiki̱j hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel haj wilic take si̱ k'oro̱j chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi nariye'eric chiwach i Dios.

Coric aj ru', re' take c'acharel re're' je' ru̱c' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Lewih nquinimej i k'oro̱j chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chiri̱j i camanic xca'n, xa re' la' i camanic xca'n ru' xa rehtalil i camanic riban i Jesus ar pan taxa̱j. Je' re' nik'or maj nok oquic chic reh Moyses chi ritik'injic i ye'a̱b lok'onbal reh Dios re' xitik'a̱' cho chi xa poyo̱j ri̱j ru̱c' nimak tak tz'ih, re' Dios xik'or reh Moyses chi naritik'a̱b i pa̱t re're' til jenaj wach ch'i̱l re' xc'uhtjic reh naxwih'ic ar nah yu̱k' Sinayih Ribihnal.

Je' re' nok, re' ricamaj i Jesus ar pan taxa̱j chi nahsil aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios, k'e̱' wo' chic riwa'ric chiwach i camanic xca'n take aj k'ahsem si̱ ayu' wach ac'al. Je' re' nik'or maj re're' i pahbamaj chi eno̱j elok wach i tik'inic re' k'e̱' wo' chic tare̱t chiwach i tik'inic bano̱j cho cu̱c' take kama̱m kati't eh nik'or chi je' re' ru'um nok naxiban i ac' laj tik'inic ku̱c' i hoj aj niminel, re' take k'oric xik'or cahnok ribiral i Dios chi naribanam ku̱c' hoj k'e̱' wo' chic holonquil chiwach take k'oric rik'orom cho ribiral queh take kama̱m kati't.

Pan pe̱t tik'inic xiban i Dios cu̱c' take kama̱m kati't, xwih'ic cho c'axquilal cu̱c' take tinamit chi rinimjic i tik'inic re're'. Wi ta nak ma' xwih'ic cho c'axquilal, ma' curman ta nak chi re' Dios xiban jenaj chic ricab tik'inic.

Ru'um aj chi re' take tinamit wih'ic quic'axquilal chi ma' xquinimej ta i tik'inic re're', re' Dios xinak take chi je' wili: “Chi kawach johtok nariponic rik'ijil chi nanibanam jenaj chic tik'inic cu̱c' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Jurah je' wo' awu̱c' hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.

Re' tik'inic wili, ma' je' ta ricab i tik'inic xniban cho cu̱c' take ama̱m awati't tak naxwesaj take cho chipam tinamit Eji̱pto chi c'amoj cho quibe̱h je' ricab riban jenaj ajabe̱s chi rich'ihlej chi k'ab i riha'lac'u̱n. Re' hin nik'or chi re' jenaj chic tik'inic ma' je' ta ricab i najtir tik'inic maj re' tik'inic bano̱j cho re're' ma' xnimjic ta wo' cu'um ama̱m awati't tak eh ru'um chi je' re' xca'n, re' hin ma' xniyew ta chic nic'ux chi quilmijic.

Re' aj wili nik'or chiri̱j i jenaj chic tik'inic re' nanibanam awu̱c' hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel nok iq'uinak chic lok take k'i̱j re' ma' xniyew ta chic wi̱' nic'ux chi awiliric tak: ‘Je' ricab nantz'ihmjic chiwach jeno' hu̱j take k'oric nbanjic, re' hin nanibanam chi ar pan awa̱mna tak eh je' wo' pan acapew-bal tak nariwih'ic take nik'orbal. Nok nibanam chic chi je' re', cu re' aj ru', re' hat-tak til etiwih'ic tak chi niwach chi hat-tak nitinami̱t eh re' hin Dios equinwih'ic chi k'atal k'oric chana̱ tak, nqui nik'or.

Nok wilic chic nic'uhbal pan awa̱mna ch'i̱l wo' pan acapew-bal tak, ma' curman ta chic chi cu hab wach narik'oric aweh tak chi cu na̱tijem tak ri̱j rinabjic niwach, maj chi'nchel take wilic chic nic'uhbal pan ca̱mna, je' chi nimak wach, je' chi cuc'tak wach quiwa'ric naqueht'alim chic niwach.

Je' re' nik'or ru'um i wili: Re' hin nanibanam chi nanicuyum quimahc take c'acharel eh nok nicuyum chic i nic' pa' nimal quimahc ca'nam, ma' jaruj ta chic naric'ulic cho pa nic'ux chi ximahcanic, nqui Dios.

Je' re' ajic ru̱c' xik'or i Dios chi naribanam jenaj chic tik'inic, nkarak chiri̱j chi chiwach ru', re' rik'ijil i tik'inic ribanam cho najtir k'i̱j xiq'uic chic lok. Ru'um aj re' je' ricab nka'n ru̱c' i kaso' chi ma' nkacoj ta chic chiki̱j nank'echerbic, je' wo' re' naric'ulum i tik'inic re're' xa loq'uil chic ma'xta chic ricamanic keh.

Chipam i pe̱t tik'inic xiban cho Dios cu̱c' take kama̱m kati't, xitak'a̱' rik'ormojic chi nariwih'ic jenaj Lok' laj Pa̱t re' narilok'onjic wi̱' wach ayu' wach ac'al eh xitak'a̱' wo' rik'ormojic nic' wach ritik'injic qui̱b naca'nam take c'acharel ru̱c' rehreh wach lok'onic naribanjic chipam i pa̱t re're'.

Re' pa̱t wili re' poyo̱j ri̱j ru̱c' nimak tak tz'ih, xcojoric take cho tasbal pa̱m. Re' pe̱t tasbal wilic i ye'a̱b re' “Lo̱k' Riwi̱'” ribihnal. Ar wilic ye'a̱b pah'ab-bal take cante̱la, rich'i̱l i me̱xa re' ncojmojic wi̱' caxlan wi'c je' ru̱c' k'ahsamaj chi si̱ chiwach i Dios.
Chipam ricab tasbal, ar wilic i ye'a̱b re' k'oro̱j chi “K'e̱' Wo' Chic Nim Rilok'il”.

Chipam ye'a̱b re're', wilic jenaj lok' laj ye'a̱b c'atbal se̱nsa ca'loc'omaj i pa̱m ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' je' ru̱c' q'uih tz'a̱k. Je' wo' chic, ar wilic jenaj ca̱xa ca'loc'omaj ru̱c' i k'an woric laj ch'ihch' re' rehtalil i tik'inic ribanam cho i Dios najtir k'i̱j. Chipam i ca̱xa re' ca'loc'omaj pa̱m re're' wilic wo' jenaj chic t'uch xa̱ra ca'loc'omaj wo' pa̱m chi k'an woric laj ch'ihch' re' nc'olmojic wi̱' i wi'c “Manah” ribihnal re' xye'eric cho queh kama̱m kati't najtir k'i̱j naxiwih'ic cho pan chik yu̱k'. Je' wo' wilic wo' ar i ch'imim che̱' xicoj cho ma' A̱ron chi ribehbal najtir k'i̱j eh rehtalil chi ye'o̱j rajawric ru'um i Dios xtoxlonic wo' chic cho i rich'imim re're'. Ma' xa ta re're', ar la' wo' wilic i tz'ilom abaj re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' take lajeb chi tak'anic xiyew i Dios reh Moyses.

China̱ i ca̱xa re' ca'loc'omaj pa̱m chi k'an woric laj ch'ihch', ar tik'imaj take quib riwachbal raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios, “Queruwin” quibihnal, re' nc'utunic wi̱' chi re' Dios wilic cu̱c' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Re' take quib chi riwachbal aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' nquipoy na̱ ru̱c' quixi̱c' re' ca̱xa nquihrjic wi̱' quiquiq'ue̱l take chicop re' ye'o̱j take chi si̱ chiwach i Dios. Chiri̱j i k'oric wili k'e̱' nak nwa̱j nitikim ju' i k'oric, xa re' la' yu'na ma' curman ta chi nanixerem wach chi'nchel.

Je' re' nok re' pe̱t Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios wilic take cho tasbal pa̱m. Ar aj chipam i pe̱t tasbal re're' qui'oquic cok take aj k'ahsem si̱ chi'nchel k'i̱j chi ribanaric quicamaj chi k'ahsanic si̱ chiwach i Dios.

Re' chic pa ricab tasbal, ar xa re' wach i nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ noquic cok eh xa junpech wo' ti chiwach i ha̱b riban chi je' re' narik'ahsaj i quiquiq'ue̱l take chicop chiwach Dios chi pahkbal cuybal rimahc ru' ch'i̱l wo' i quimahc take rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Chi quixilac take mahc xbanjic re're', wilic wo' take xbanjic chi ma' eht'alamaj ta chi mahc c'ahchi' ribanjic.

Ru̱c' i k'oro̱j lok wili chiri̱j i pe̱t Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, re' hoj je' wili nkarak chiri̱j ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios: Chi nok cu wilic cho i pe̱t pa̱t re're', re' take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta nahsil aj k'ahsem si̱ take chiwach i Dios, ma' ja' ye'o̱j ta nak k'ab queh chi oquic eh chi quiwih'ic cok ar re' til nwih'ic wi̱' i Lok' laj Dios.

Je' wo' chic, re' k'oro̱j chiri̱j i pe̱t Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, ncamanic chi c'uhtbal reh chi enkarak chiri̱j re' xc'uluric cho najtir cu yu'na chi k'i̱j. Re' take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho i ma' Israhel naxquiyew chiwach i Dios take chicop xquicansaj chi si̱ on naxquiyew take toco̱m chic si̱ chi lok'onbal wach i Dios, re' wili c'uhtunic riban lok: To̱b ta re' take re' nquicoj wach chi ru̱c' i k'ahsanic si̱ nca'n chi pahkbal cuybal quimahc nquik'or chi ma' re' ta chic aj mahc take, xa re' la' re' riye'eric i si̱ re're' ma' xiban ta wo' chi suk xiwih'ic pan ca̱mna.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel naxquiyew cho i quisi̱ ma' xca'n ta nchel chi nimbal reh tak'anic re' rik'or nic' wach nasakbok wach ka̱mna i hoj c'acharel, xquiyew la' cho quisi̱ xa reh nimbal reh take tak'anic xiyew i Dios chiri̱j ric'axaric quiti'jolal je' ricab wo' naxicana̱' cahnok rik'ormojic keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil i ma' Israhel haj wilic take wi'c ch'i̱l i ha' nakanimem, on nic' wach ritz'ajmajic ki̱b naka'nam. Coric, chi'nchel re're' xtak'abjic cho chi nakanimem i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' cok ru' cu rehtal xponic rik'ijil i ac' tik'inic re' k'e̱' wo' chic tare̱t chiwach i tik'inic xiban cu̱c' take kama̱m kati't.

Re' take tak'anic bano̱j cho xjalaric wach nok re' Jesus xichop ricamaj chi Pe̱t Nahsil C'amol quiBe̱h take aj K'ahsem Si̱ chiwach i Dios. Re' cok ru' re' ricamaj re're' xkabiraj chi ar chic chiwach i Dios c'ahchi' ribanam, ar ru̱c' pan taxa̱j re' nbanjic wi̱' til manlic wach lok'onic eh ma' re' ta nchel ayu' wach ac'al chipam jeno' pa̱t re' tik'imaj cu'um take c'acharel. Ru̱c' wo' ricamaj re're', riban wo' cho chi re' take cuse'sbal re' k'oro̱j cho ribiral chi nariye'eric cho keh hoj aj niminel, wilic chic chi kana̱ yu'na.

Nok re' Jesus xoquic chi Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱ ar re' wilic wi̱' i Lok' laj Dios, re're' xa junpech wo' xpah'ic chiwach je' ricab xiban cho Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱ chi xa junpech pa riha̱b xoquic cok chiwach i Dios chi ripahkaljic cuybal mahc. Naxiban cho chi je' re' xic'am cok riquiq'ue̱l chi̱wa on riquiq'ue̱l rac'u̱n wacax eh xik'ahsaj chiwach. Nic' pa' wach xiban cho aj k'ahsem si̱ re're', je' wo' re' xiban i Jesus xa junpech wo' chi junelic k'i̱j sakom, xiban i ricamaj chi xojrico'lej chi junpech chiwach i ti'c'axic nariye'eric chi quina̱ take aj mahc. Naxiban cho chi je' re', je' aj wili xiban cho: Re're' xiyew ri̱b chiwach i Dios chi je' ricab jenaj si̱ naxquimic ar wach curu̱s chi xa quic' chic riban riti'jolal!

Til coric re' take xquic'am cho quisi̱ chiwach i Dios reh chi equicahnic chi ma' re' ta chic aj mahc take, re' take Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱ re' riquiq'ue̱l rac'u̱n i wacax xquicoj on re' riquiq'ue̱l chi̱wa chi puk'u̱j wach pan ha' ch'i̱l wo' richajil k'ahxok wacax c'ato̱j chi si̱ chiwach i Dios eh xiquihraj i quic' re're' chi quina̱ take c'acharel re're' chi c'ahchi' ribanam je' ricab rik'or i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Wi je' aj re' xcamanic queh take c'acharel i riquiq'ue̱l i chicop nc'ataric chi si̱,

re' ta na chic riquiq'ue̱l i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric ma' eriban chi ma' eta chic nwih'ic pan kacapew-bal ribanaric jeno' bano̱j re' enbanic chi enk'ehtic pa̱m kabe̱h chi nakac'acharic chi junelic? On ma' eriban chi ma' ta nak eriyew kajawric chi ribanaric i xa pa' bih camanic ye'o̱j ru'um i Dios re' aj ye'ol reh c'acharic? Re' riquiq'ue̱l i kAja̱w Jesus til je' re' eriban. Je' re' nik'or maj reh chi je' re' nc'uluric ku̱c' i hoj aj niminel, re' Jesus chi to'bomaj ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal xc'acharic chi ma'xta nech' ok rimahc chiwach i Dios eh chi je' re' riwi̱' ric'acharic, xik'ahsaj wo' ri̱b pan quimic.

Ru'um reh quimic xic'ul cho i Jesus chi ricuyuric kamahc ka'nam cho nok re' pe̱t tik'inic cu wilic nak cho rajawric chi kana̱ hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, xcojoric i Jesus nahanel reh i ac' laj tik'inic ribanam cho Dios chiki̱j i hoj c'acharel. Re' riwi̱' chi re' Dios xiyew reh Jesus i camanic re're', re' ra̱j chiri̱j chi re' take quic'ulbic reh yuk'unic riban chi naca'nam chi ritinami̱t narimanlajic wach cu̱c' i k'oric k'oro̱j cho najtir k'i̱j chi naquic'acharic chi junelic k'i̱j sakom.

Je' re' riwi̱' k'uru' chi re' Jesus xquimic reh chi xc'uluric je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' jeno' c'acharel nok ritz'ihmbam chic jeno' hu̱j re' rik'or wi̱' chi re' nic' pa' nimal pa' bih wilic reh, pa ribihnal chic jeno' c'acharel narik'ahxic naquimok je. Reh aj chi en-nimjic i rik'orbal riyeb, re' c'acharel re're' curman chi nariquimic je eh til cu naric'utunic wo' chi coric chi je' re' xc'uluric, ma' je'?

Je' re' nik'or maj re' hu̱j re' rik'or wi̱' haj wilic take nariye'eric pa ribihnal chic toco̱m, ma'xta riwa'ric wi cu c'achlic i c'acharel re' xtik'inic reh hu̱j, cu re' la' wilic riwa'ric naquimok je c'acharel re're'.

Je' aj wo' re' xc'uluric ru̱c' i pe̱t tik'inic bano̱j cho ru'um i Dios nok re' quiquiq'ue̱l take cuc' chicop xcojoric chi rehtalil i chopbal cho na̱ riwa'ric i tik'inic re're'. Re' aj wili ribiral k'uru':

Pan pe̱t k'oric, re' Moyses xich'ob cho ribehil chi'nchel take tak'anic ye'o̱j cho ru'um i Dios chi chopbal quina̱ take tinamit. Chiri̱j chic wili xic'am cho jenaj t'uch k'ab che̱' iso̱po ribihnal, xibalej cak mi̱x chiri̱j, ximuh pa riquiq'ue̱l chi̱wa ch'i̱l riquiq'ue̱l rac'u̱n wacax xilacamaj ru̱c' ha' eh xiquihraj chi quina̱ take tinamit, je' wo' china̱ i botomaj wach hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' take tak'anic ye'o̱j ru'um i Dios.
Chiri̱j chic ru' re' Moyses je' wili xik'or queh: «Ru̱c' i quic' wili xichop riwa'ric i tik'inic ribanam chic i Dios awu̱c' tak eh ritak'a̱b chic wach awu̱c' tak chi na̱nimem tak, nqui xik'or queh.

Je' wo' chic nok narip'uhtic nak chic i camanic chipam i pa̱t poyo̱j ri̱j ru̱c' nimak tak tz'ih, re' quiquiq'ue̱l take chicop quicansjic xquirhjic wo' chiwach i lok' laj pa̱t re're' eh je' wo' re' chi quina̱ take chi'nchel camanbal xcojoric chipam i lok' laj pa̱t lok'onbal re're'.

Je' re' xbanaric nimbal reh i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eh nik'or chi je' re' maj re' c'uhbal re're' rik'or chi xa re' wach wi ncojoric i quic', chi'nchel wilic cuybal mahc reh. Coric rik'or ru', xa re' la' til coric wo' chi wilic take ju'jun chic mahc ma' xcuyuric ta ru̱c' ribanaric re're'.

Ru'um chi re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses rik'or chi cu ru̱c' quic' nbanaric i cuyuj mahc wi xbanaric jeno' mahc, curman aj chi re' quiquiq'ue̱l take chicop nquihrjic chi quiwach take camanbal xicamanic chi k'ahsbal si̱ eh wilque̱b wo' chi rehtalil take xa pa' bih wilic ar pan taxa̱j. Re' cok ru', re' quic' re're' ma'xta riban chi re' take c'acharel xiwih'ic pan taxa̱j, reh la' chi xc'uluric chi je' re' curman chi xcojoric i quic' re' til k'e̱' wo' chic i riwa'ric.

Je' re' nik'or ru'um reh rinimal rilok'il i ye'a̱b xoquic wi̱' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Re' ye'a̱b wili re' wilic wo' wi̱' i Jesus yu'na chi aj pahkem katobjic chiwach i Dios ar pan taxa̱j wilic. Re' ye'a̱b wili ma' je' ta ricab i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios tik'imaj cho cu'um take kama̱m kati't, re' la' wo' re' xc'uhtjic cho reh i Moyses najtir cho k'i̱j nic' wach ritik'injic i lok' laj pa̱t re're' naribanam.

Chi je' aj re' riwi̱' i ye'a̱b re're', re' oquic xiban i Jesus, ma' je' ta ricab i oquic xiban cho i Pe̱t Nahsil C'amol quiBe̱h take aj K'ahsem Si̱ ar cok chipam i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios ayu' wach ac'al. Je' re' nik'or maj re' pe̱t nahsil re're' eli̱c i ha̱b xoquic cho chipam i ye'a̱b re're' chi rik'ahsjic chiwach i Dios i riquiq'ue̱l take chicop quik'ahsjic chi si̱, raj nchel i Jesus xa junpech wo' ti curman chi xoquic cok chiwach i Dios chi ric'uhtjic ri̱b nok iq'uinak chic pan quimic.

Wi curman ta nak chi re' i Jesus chi q'uih pech xoquic ar, raj nak rik'orom chi xa re' wo' nak rip'uhtic cho c'acharic ayu' wach ac'al cu rehtal rik'ijil yu'na, curman nak chi re' Jesus q'uih pech nak c'ahchi' ricansjic. Ra̱j i wili keht'alim chi xa re' wo' p'uhtunak riq'uic lok rik'ijil ricux'ic wi̱' i c'acharic ayu' wach ac'al, re' Jesus xa junpech wo' xc'ulic ayu' wach ac'al eh ru̱c' riquimic xic'ul naxc'ulic ayu', re're' xiban chi q'uihal keh hoj c'acharel xcuyuric kamahc.
Je' re' ajic je' wo' ricab nok ye'o̱j cho chi kana̱ i hoj c'acharel chi xa junpech wo' nakaquimic je chi kaju'junal eh chiri̱j chic ru', re' chic i ch'ukuj k'oric narichalic chi kana̱,

je' wo' re' chi xa junpech wo' xik'ahsaj ri̱b i Jesus pan quimic eh je' re' xiban reh chi eriban chi encuyuric kamahc chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel. Je' re' k'uru' re' riwi̱' wo' chic richalic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, ma' re' ta chic chi ric'uluric i quimic chiri̱j ricuyuric kamahc narichalic, naric'ulic la' lok chi ribanaric chi narimanlajic wach i kaco'ljic chi'nchel i hoj re' c'ahchi' kuy'em richalic.

Je' ricab jenaj na̱ch xa ncamanic chi c'uhtbal reh, chi ar wilic cho jenaj c'acharel xa re' la' i na̱ch re're' ma' re' ta wo' i c'acharel maje'? Nic' pa' wach nc'uluric ru̱c' i na̱ch je' wo' re' nc'uluric ru̱c' i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Je' re' nik'or maj re' c'uhbal re're' nariyew rik'ormojic chi naquicansjic take chicop chi cuybal quimahc take c'acharel re' eli̱c nquisic' cuybal quimahc, xa c'ahchi' ric'uhtam chi re' take cuse'sbal re' uyumaj nak cho najtir k'i̱j chi narichalic chi kana̱, wilic chic take chi kana̱ yu'na. Je' re' k'uru' ru'um chi re' take tak'anic riban i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ma' re' ta wo' re' take cuse'sbal naquiwih'ic chi kana̱, ma' riban ta chi jeno' c'acharel je' ru̱c' ric'am na̱ i tak'anic wilic chipam i c'uhbal re're' erirak cuybal rimahc chi manlic.

Wi ta nak xa ru'um ric'amaric na̱ chi coric haj wilic i tak'amaj chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses nrakmajic i cuybal mahc chi coric, re' take c'acharel re' nquisic' i cuybal quimahc ru̱c' riye'eric take chicop chi si̱ chiwach i Dios chi lok'onbal wach, nquicana̱' nak ribanaric re're' ru'um chi cuyu̱j nak chic quimahc chi manlic eh ma'xta nak chic ti' pan ca̱mna chiri̱j i quimahc ca'nam.

Raj wili ma' je' ta re' nc'uluric, re' la' ricorquilal nc'uluric eli̱c i ha̱b quic'amaric take cho chicop chi naquicansjic chipam i lok' laj nink'i̱j re' nk'ormojic wi̱' chi cuyu̱j chic quimahc take c'acharel, je' wili riwi̱' nc'uluric: Re' cansanic tak chicop chi ye'bal chi si̱, xa ncamanic queh c'acharel chi naric'ulic cho pan quic'ux chi aj mahc take eh chi ric'ul wo' nak chi queh chi naquiquimic ru'um quimahc.
Je' re' nik'or chi nc'uluric maj re' quiquiq'ue̱l take rac'u̱n wacax on take chi̱wa ma'xta cajawric chi ricuyuric i mahc.

Re' Jesus nok cu pan taxa̱j pe wilic cho chi naric'ulic asjok ayu' wach ac'al, wilic k'oric xik'or reh rAja̱w chiri̱j i rik'ahsjic ri̱b pan quimic naribanam ru'. Re' aj take k'oric wili xik'or reh rAja̱w je' ricab tz'ihmbimaj ru'um i ma' Tawiy: “Re' hat Lok' laj wAja̱w Dios na̱tik'a̱b wo' niti'jolal je' ricab quiti'jolal take c'acharel ru'um chi ma' nye'eric ta risukquil ac'ux nok re' take re' chi pahkbal cuybal quimahc nquik'ahsaj take chicop quicansjic chawach on nquiyew take toco̱m chic si̱.
Je' re' ajic ru'um chi ma' xponic ta chic chawach chi re' take c'acharel naquic'amam cho take chicop chi naquicansjic chawach chi pahkbal cuybal quimahc,

re' hin nipahba̱' wi̱b chawach chi je' wili c'ahchi' nik'orom: ‘Re' hin ayu' wilqui̱n chawach chi ribanaric i haj wilic nawa̱j i hat chi nanibanam je' ricab wo' i tz'ihmbimaj cho chiwi̱j chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' ak'orbal, nqui Jesus.

Ru̱c' take k'oric xiban i Jesus chi je' re', nkilow chi re' wili i xa̱j rik'orom: Pe̱t k'oric, naxik'or chi ma' nponic ta chiwach i Dios chi re' take c'acharel nquicansaj take chicop chi pahkbal cuybal quimahc, re' Jesus xa̱j rik'orom chi re' Dios ma' nponic ta chic chiwach rik'ahsjic take chicop chi si̱ chiwach je' ricab i k'oro̱j chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh i Moyses.

Je' wo', naxipahba̱' ri̱b i Jesus chiwach i Dios eh chi xik'or reh ar wilic chiwach chi ribanaric i haj pa' wilic i ra̱j ru', re're' ru̱c' take k'oric xiban c'ahchi' rik'orom chi ma' c'ahchi' ta chic ric'uluric je' ricab xc'uluric cho pan pe̱t chi cu re' quicansjic take chicop curman chi xbanaric cho chi pahkbal cuybal quimahc take c'acharel, re' la' i Dios chi rijelow-bal chic i quicansjic take chicop, re' chic i Jesus xitik'a̱' wach chi xcansjic je.

Je' re' k'uru' ru̱c' i xiban i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi xic'am na̱ haj wilic xa̱j i Dios, re're' xa junpech wo' xiyew ri̱b chi quimic eh xojricoj cok chiwach i Dios chi ritinami̱t lo̱k' chiwach.

Til coric chi kalakal re' aj k'ahsem si̱ noquic chiwach i Dios chi ribanaric ricamaj chi k'ahsanic si̱ eh xa jenaj wach wo' take chicop rik'ahsaj johtok eli̱c i k'i̱j. To̱b ta je' re' riban, re're' ma' jaruj ta xiban chi xcuyuric quimahc take c'acharel chi junpech,

raj ru̱c' i Jesus ma' je' ta re' xc'uluric, chi cuybal la' reh kamahc xa junpech wo' xiyew ri̱b pan quimic. Chiri̱j chic ructic chi quixilac camnak, xye'eric wo' rilok'il chi k'atal k'oric rich'i̱l i Dios je' ricab nok jeno' c'acharel nye'eric rilok'il chi tz'uklic cok chi riche̱l jeno' k'atal k'oric.
Ma' xa ta re're' xbanaric ru̱c', ar la' johtok ru̱c' i Dios yu'na, xa chic re' c'ahchi' ruy'em chi nariponic rik'ijil chi nariyeb pa ro̱k take chi'nchel raj ixowonel.
Je' re' ajic re' Jesus xa junpech wo' xiyew ri̱b pan quimic eh ru̱c' re're' xye'eric keh chi junpech chi re' hoj re' wilco̱j chic chiwach i Dios chi ritinami̱t xcuyuric chi'nchel kamahc chi manlic.
Re' k'oric chiri̱j ricuyuric kamahc, xa nok wo' ye'o̱j cho rehtalil ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios nok je' wili xtz'ihmjic cho ru'um jenaj raj k'oro̱l i Dios:

“Hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, je' wili rik'or i Ajabe̱s Dios: ‘Chawach tak johtok wilic jenaj k'i̱j nok re' hin nanibanam awu̱c' tak jenaj ac' laj tik'inic. Re' tik'inic re're', re' i wili: Je' ricab nok re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xtz'ihmjic chiwach jenaj hu̱j, je' wo' re' i hin ar chic pan awa̱mna acapew-bal tak nanibanam chi nariwih'ic take tak'anic niban reh chi enrakmajic chiri̱j eh reh wo' chi en-nimjic, nqui i Dios, nqui xitz'ihmbaj.
Chi rik'orom chic lok re're', re' Dios xik'or wo' i wili: “Re' hin ma' jaruj ta chic naric'ulic cho pa nic'ux chi hat-tak aj mahc, nqui xik'or.
Je' re' ajic wi xa ru'um i Jesus til nkac'ul cuybal kamahc, ra̱j rik'orom chi ma' curman ta chic chi equicansjic take chicop chi si̱ chiwach i Dios chi pahkbal cuybal mahc.

Was tak nicha̱k', cu ayu' lok yu'na, re' wili k'oro̱j lok chiri̱j i Jesus: Pe̱t k'oric, je' ricab nok Pe̱t aj K'ahsem Si̱ nok ye'o̱j chic k'ab reh chi oquic cok chipam i ye'a̱b re' ribihnej “K'e̱' wo' chic nim rilok'il”, je' wo' re' i Jesus, ru̱c' i riquiq'ue̱l xichihcaj naxquimic je, xiban wo' chi re' hoj ekoj-oquic ar chipam i ye'a̱b re' til wilic wi̱' i Lok' laj Dios.

Re' cok ru' re' tz'ih re' wilic chi tasbal pa̱m ye'a̱b re' ribihnej “K'e̱' wo' chic nim rilok'il” ma' re' ta chic i tz'ih re' wilic ar pan ocbal re' wilic wi̱' i Lok' laj Dios. Yu'na re' Jesus xiban chi rehreh chic wach riwi̱' i oquic ar eh re' til riwi̱' je' chic wili: Xa re' wo' nok xik'ahsaj ri̱b pan quimic i Jesus re' c'achlic chi junelic, re' chic re' xoquic chi katobjic chi wilic cocbal ru̱c'.
Ricab k'oric, re' Jesus k'e̱' wo' chic rajawric chi quiwach take Pe̱t rich aj K'ahsem Si̱ eh je' wo' wilic rajawric chi kana̱ i hoj rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios.

Chi keht'alim aj chic i wili chiri̱j i Jesus nipahkaj aweh tak chi kojwih'ok tak chiwach i Dios chi coric wach kac'ux eh je' wo' chi ch'iclic ok kac'ux chi manlic chiri̱j i Dios. Je' wo', je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' i aj k'ahsem si̱ nanoquic cok chiwach i Dios, pe̱t risakbej ri̱b nariban riti̱n ru̱c' sak wach ha', on je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' c'acharel nchalic chiwach i Dios chi pahkbal cuybal rimahc, ric'raj ri̱b chi cuyu̱j chic rimahc nanquihrjic i riquiq'ue̱l take chicop cansamaj pa ribihnal, je' wo' re' c'ulurok ku̱c' i hoj ru̱c' kawih'ic chiwach i Dios chi ma'xta chic kamahc, kojwih'ok chiwach ru̱c' sakil wach i ka̱mna.

Jenaj chic k'oric nwa̱j nik'orom. Chiri̱j i rik'ormojic chi c'ahchi' kuy'em chi re' Jesus naco̱j rico'lem chi junelic, re' hin nwa̱j nipahkam aweh tak chi re' take k'oric re're' ma̱cana̱' tak ricojoric wach, til la' chacowsaj ac'ux tak chiri̱j maj keht'alim chi re' Dios wi rik'orom chi re' Jesus je' re' naribanam, til naribanam chi narimanlajic wach i k'oro̱j cho re're'.

Chiri̱j wili, cu wilic wo' chic take pahkanic nwa̱j nibanam aweh tak. Pe̱t, kasic' tak ri̱j nic' wach ritobjic ki̱b naka'nam chi kibil ki̱b reh chi je' re' enkatijej ric'axaric ki̱b, je' wo' chi ribanaric i holohic laj bano̱j.

Je' wo', re' take kamoloj i̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios ma' nacana̱' tak ribanaric. Je' re' nik'or maj wilic chic take c'ahchi' quicana̱b qui̱b, raj i hoj ma' nka'n tak keh je' ricab nca'n ru', kayew la' tak ricowil kac'ux chi kibil ki̱b chi ritikiric ju' kaniminic. Til je' re' ra̱j banaric maj yu'na xa ma' naht ta chic wilic rik'ijil ric'ulic lok i kAja̱w.

Re' hoj keht'alim chic eh kac'ulum wo' chic i coric laj tijinic re' c'uhtumaj keh chiri̱j i Jesus. Wi re' hoj kojmahcanic ru̱c' kano'jbal chi ma' nka̱j ta chic katikim ju' kawih'ic chipam i tijinic re're', ma' wo' re' chic rik'ahsjic ri̱b i Jesus pan quimic chi je' ricab jeno' si̱ enbanic chi encuyuric kamahc.

Wi ma'xta chic jeno' uyu'nbal chi keh hoj chi encuyuric kamahc, ra̱j rik'orom chi re' chic i wili c'ahchi' kuy'em ru̱c' yo'jic: Chi re' Dios narich'ukum k'oric china̱ kamahc eh je' ricab nok re' k'a̱k' yohbal wach nanjohtic ritz'a'quil, je' wo' rijosk'il i Dios yohbal wo' wach najohtok chi kana̱ chi riye'eric i ti'c'axic re' nariwih'ic wo' chi quina̱ take quixowonic wach.

Reh chi nakarakam chiri̱j i nik'orom chic lok wili, kacoj rehtal nc'uluric ru̱c' jeno' c'acharel resaj lok ri̱b chi junpech chi rehquen rajawric i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses. Re' c'uhbal re're' rik'or wi wilic quib on xib ok chi c'acharel nquiyew quichi̱' chi jeno' c'acharel xmahcanic ru̱c' resmejic lok ri̱b rehquen i c'uhbal re're', til curman chi naricansjic je chi ma'xta so' quetelbal china̱.

Je' re' k'uru' wi jeno' c'acharel naricansjic je, chacapaj wo' tak chiri̱j i naric'uluric wili: K'e̱' wo' chic rinimal i ti'c'axic naric'ulum i c'acharel wi re're' riyak'abej pa ro̱k i tijinic chiri̱j rAc'u̱n i Dios ch'i̱l i Lok' laj Uxlabal ye'o̱j cho xa ru'um reh ric'axbal i Dios. Je' wo' re' enbanjic ru̱c' wi re're' ma' riyew ta chic rilok'il re' chaj bih xiban i Jesus chi xojricoj jenaj chi hoj chic ritinami̱t i Dios eh je' wo' re' wi ma' riyew chic rilok'il riquiq'ue̱l i Jesus re' chopbal na̱ riwa'ric i ac' laj tik'inic xiban i Dios ku̱c' i hoj c'acharel.

Nik'or chi k'e̱' wo' chic nimal wach i ti'c'axic naric'ulum i c'acharel re're' maj keht'alim wo' chi re' kAja̱w Dios je' wili rik'orom cho: “Wi xa hab wach jeno' xmahcanic, xa re' wach hin til equinye'bic i ti'c'axic china̱ je' ricab til ric'ul queh take aj mahc chi tojbal wach i c'ahbilal nca'n, nqui rik'orom cho. Je' wo', rik'orom wo' chi je' wili: “Re' hin kAja̱w Dios quinch'ukbic k'oric chi quina̱ take nitinami̱t, nqui rik'orom cho.

Ru'um aj chi re' Dios k'e̱' wo' chic rajawric wilic, re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi chiyohbalej ri̱b jeno' c'acharel wi ja' cuyu̱j rimahc ru̱c' take ribano̱j. Je' re' nik'or maj nawih'ok chiwach i Dios re' c'achlic chi junelic k'i̱j sakom, til narich'ukuric k'oric china̱.

Wilic wo' take suk laj k'oric raj k'ormojic xa re' la' nwa̱j chi pe̱t ticapewenok tak chiri̱j ricuyuric ransil take rinimal i ti'c'axic nchalic chana̱ tak nok hat-tak chic oconak pan niminic. Chipam take k'i̱j re're',

ru'um chi wilca̱t tak chic pan niminic, wilic aweh tak xac'ul tak cho tz'ujuric cu'um take awaj ixowonel tak, on xac'ul tak jeno' toco̱m chic ti'c'axic. Nok wilic toco̱m chic awich'i̱l tak c'ahchi' quic'ulum i ti'c'axic je' ricab ac'ulum tak chic cho hat-tak, wilic aweh tak xawichnimej take pan quic'axquilal.

Nik'or chi je' re' maj nok re' take toco̱m chic awich'i̱l tak xiponic tz'ahpok cho pan che̱', wilic aweh tak xatponic tak cho chi quitobjic ru'um chi xaquetelej tak quiwach. Ma' xa ta re're' no'jbal xac'uhtaj tak, je' la' wo' naxmak'aric pa' bih wilic aweh tak, re' xbanaric aweh tak re're' xacuy ransil chi suk ac'ux tak. Je' re' xa'n tak ru'um nok aweht'alim tak chi ar pan taxa̱j nariye'eric aweh tak jenaj bihomal re' yohbal wach rilok'il chiwach take xmak'aric aweh tak ayu' eh re're' ma' jaruj ta c'uhlel wach.

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um chi wilic jenaj abihomal re' nariye'eric aweh tak ru'um reh abano̱j tak, yu'na nipahkaj aweh tak chi ma̱cana̱' tak chi re' c'axquilal eriban chi nkajic acapew-bal tak on chi enyoj ac'ux tak chipam i niminic,

re' la' curman chi ena'n tak chi enatik tak ju' ricuyuric take ti'c'axic chi cow ac'ux tak reh chi na̱banam tak haj wilic ra̱j i kAja̱w Dios eh chi je' re' na wo' ac'ulum tak haj wilic i k'oro̱j cahnok chi nariye'eric aweh tak.

Je' re' cha'n tak k'uru' maj chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh i Moyses, je' wili tz'ihmbimaj cho chiri̱j i Jesus: “Xa nic' yu' enc'ulic lok re' c'ulic lok reh, ma'xta chic richahmic cho, nqui tz'ihmbimaj chipam.

Je' wo' chiqui̱j take nquicana̱' chi junpech niminic, je' wili tz'ihmbimaj cahnok: “Re' take c'acharel wilque̱b chi nitinami̱t re' xiban chi coric chic wach quic'ux chi niwach, naquic'acharic chi ch'iclic quic'ux chiwi̱j. Wi nquicana̱' wo' chic ninimjic, re' hin ma' eta nsukbic nic'ux chiqui̱j, nqui tz'ihmbimaj cahnok.

Je' aj re' tz'ihmbimaj chiqui̱j take nquicana̱' quiniminic, ra̱j i hoj ma' je' ta kacab take ma' nquitik ta ju' quiniminic. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' xa risacharic quiwach ru'um i Dios c'ahchi' quipahkam chi quina̱ ru̱c' i quino'jbal re're'. Ra̱j nchel i hoj xa ch'iclic wo' kac'ux chiri̱j i kAja̱w reh chi re're' ekojrico'lej chiwach i ti'c'axic narichalic chi quina̱ take aj mahc.

Re' rich'iquinjic kac'ux chiri̱j i Dios, ra̱j rik'orom chi re' hoj til keht'alim chi naric'uluric i k'oro̱j cho ru'um eh to̱b ta wo' yu'na ma' nkilow ta wach i rimahsjic wach i rik'orom cho re're', re' hoj xa ch'iclic wo' kac'ux chi naric'uluric.
Re' take cho kama̱m kati't xquich'ica̱' wo' cho quic'ux chiri̱j i Dios chi narimanlajic wach ru'um re' chaj bih rik'orom cho eh ru'um re', re' Dios xk'oric cho chiqui̱j ru̱c' holohic laj k'oric.

Re' Dios xk'oric wo' cho reh chi naritik'injic i taxa̱j rich'i̱l wach ac'al rich'i̱l wo' chi'nchel wilic chiwach. Re' hoj nkacoj wach chi'nchel re're' chi re' Dios xbanic chi xitihkic. Re' xiban re're', re' wo' re' ncamanic keh chi enkarak chiri̱j chi re' chi'nchel nkilow wach yu'na, xtik'injic cho to̱b ta nak ma'xta bih wilic chi naritik'injic cho.

Re' Awel jenaj queh take aj najtir k'i̱j xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios. Ru'um chi je' re' xiban re' Dios xik'or cho chi re're' coric wach ric'ux eh xic'ul cho i risi̱ chi c'ahchi' rik'orom chi k'e̱' wo' chic tare̱t i si̱ re're' chiwach i si̱ xikahsaj i ras, re' Cayin ribihnal. Ru'um rich'iquinjic ric'ux xiban i Awel, cu yu'na chi k'i̱j to̱b ta camnak chic, xa cu c'ahchi' wo' katikim ju' ribirmijic chiri̱j i holohic laj rino'jbal xiban ru'.

Re' ma' Henoc jenaj chic c'acharel aj najtir k'i̱j re' xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios. Chiri̱j ma' Henoc xk'ormojic ru'um i Dios chi k'e̱' nponic chiwach i c'acharic xiban. Je' re' xk'ormojic chiri̱j maj re' ma' Henoc til xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios eh ru'um re' ma' xquimic ta maj chi c'achlic xc'amaric johtok ru'um i Dios ar pan taxa̱j. Ru̱c' xiban i Dios chi je' re' xc'uluric chi naxsiq'uiric cho ma' Henoc ma' hab ta chic wach xrakbic cho reh.

Ru̱c' aj xc'uluric cu̱c' quib aj najtir k'i̱j re're' risakomej wach keh chi re' Dios ma' nwih'ic ta chi suk ric'ux ru̱c' i c'acharel ma' rich'ica̱' ta ric'ux chiri̱j. Je' re' nik'or maj reh chi enwih'ic chi suk ric'ux i Dios ru̱c' i c'acharel nchalic chiwach chi aj lok'em reh, curman chi re' c'acharel re're' ch'iclic ok ric'ux chiri̱j take eht'alamaj chiri̱j i Dios chi je' wili: Chi til re're' til xa wilic wo' eh chi xa riyew wo' quico̱ch take quisic'bic reh.

Re' ma' Noheh til xich'ica̱' wo' cho ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios chi re're' riban chi nmanlajic wach i pa' bih k'oro̱j cho ru'um. Je' re' nok naxk'ormojic reh ru'um i Dios chi wilic take ti'c'axic naric'ulmujic, re're' to̱b ta ma' ja' nponic ta nak rik'ijil chi narilmijic wach i ti'c'axic xinimej re' xk'ormojic reh eh xiyew ric'ux chi ritik'injic jenaj ma' laj cano̱wa pa̱t re' xcamanic chi co'lbal wi̱' ri̱b ch'i̱l take raj pan pa̱t. Re' rich'iquinjic ric'ux i ma' Noheh chiri̱j i Dios re' aj re' xbanic chi re' Dios xicana̱' chi xiquimic take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' xquich'ica̱' ta quic'ux chiri̱j. Ma' xa re' ta re', ru'um la' chi je' re' xiban i ma' Noheh xye'eric reh chi co̱ch chi re' Dios rik'or chi re're' til coric cho wach ric'ux chiwach.

Je' wo' chic, re' ma' Awraham til wo' xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios. Ru'um aj re' naxk'ormojic reh ru'um i Dios chi narojic c'acharok chipam jenaj ye'a̱b re' nariye'eric reh chi rico̱ch, re're' xic'u'lej na̱ ojic eh xelic je chipam ritinami̱t to̱b ta ma' reht'alim ta haj c'ahchi' rojic.

Je' wo' ar naxwih'ic chipam i ye'a̱b k'oro̱j reh chi nariye'eric reh chi rico̱ch, re' ma' Awraham til xich'ica̱' wo' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios eh ru'um re' xc'acharic ar chi xa iq'ue̱l ti chipam ye'a̱b re're'. Je' re' nik'or maj ma' xitik'a̱' ta jenaj pa̱t re' naricahnic wi̱' chi junpech, xc'acharic la' chipam i perpat re' tik'imaj chi xa tz'ih ri̱j je' ricab wo' c'acharic xitik ju' ribanaric i rac'u̱n re' Isahac ribihnal. Je' wo' chic, re' ma' Isahac ch'i̱l wo' i ma' Jacow, aj c'ulul wo' take reh i k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios chi re' ye'a̱b nariponic wi̱' chi c'acharic i ma' Awraham, re' wo' re' nariye'eric queh chi quico̱ch.
