Je' re' nok re' ma' Awraham xa pan perpat ti xc'acharic cho eh je' re' xiban maj c'ahchi' ruy'em cho chi ch'iclic ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios chi nok ricohlam chic c'acharic ayu' wach ac'al, narojic c'acharok chipam i ye'a̱b re' wilque̱b wo' wi̱' riq'uihal toco̱m chic c'acharel ar pan taxa̱j re' jenaj ye'a̱b tik'imaj chi coric ru'um i Dios re' aj capewenel reh chi coric nic' wach ritik'injic i xiban.

Je' wo' chic, ru'um rich'iquinjic ric'ux i ma' Awraham chiri̱j i Dios re' rehq'ue̱n re' ti' Sa̱ra ribihnal, to̱b ta nak ojonak chic rihabil chi enwih'ic riha'lac'u̱n, xa cu xwih'ic wo' jenaj rac'u̱n. Je' re' ajic, re' ti' Sa̱ra xye'eric wo' ricowil chi xasjic riha'lac'u̱n ru'um chi re' ma' Awraham xich'ica̱' wo' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios chi re're' eriban chi enmanlajic wach i xik'or reh chi naribanam.

Chi je' aj re', xa ru̱c' jenaj chi winak re' ma' Awraham ch'i̱l i rehq'ue̱n, xp'uhtic cho re' xc'uluric wili: Xa re' wo' chawil take riq'uihal ch'imi̱l ar pan taxa̱j on xa re' wo' chawil riq'uihal i sani̱b chi chi̱' rinimal ha', re' take riq'uihal rihrima̱m i ma' Awraham ma' hab ta wach eriban canar cajlajic ru'um chi k'e̱' q'uihal take. Ma' xa ta wo' xc'uluric re're', til pe' wo' xq'uihbic wach take ra̱' ri'sil cho i ma' Awraham xa ru̱c' ti i jenaj chi rac'u̱n re' xasjic nok johtonak chic rihabil eh xa q'uisi̱n nak chic ma' nponic rik'ijil riquimic.

Chi'nchel take xnik'or lok quibiral wili xic'acharic cho chi ch'iclic quic'ux chiri̱j k'oro̱j cho ribiral queh ru'um i Dios eh cu rehtal quiquimic je, xa xquich'ica̱' wo' quic'ux chiri̱j i Dios. Coric ru' chi re' take c'acharel re're' ma' xquic'ul ta take cuse'sbal re're' xa pan quicapew-bal la' xquilow je rimanlajic wach, xa re' la' ru' to̱b ta xa pan quicapew-bal wo' xquilow, quisuksaj wo' je quic'ux chiri̱j rimanlajic wach eh chi je' re' xquiyew wo' quic'ux chi rik'ormojic riwi̱' i quiwih'ic ayu' wach ac'al chi xa iq'ue̱l take.
Re' take chi'nchel wili k'uru' re' xquiyew quic'ux chi rik'ormojic chi je' re' til xquirak chiri̱j chi manlic chi cu wilic jenaj chic ye'a̱b re' c'ahchi' cuy'em chi naquic'acharic wi̱' chi junpech.
Nik'or aweh tak chi re' ye'a̱b re're' ma' re' ta ye'a̱b xi'elic cho wi̱'. Wi ta nak chiri̱j ye'a̱b re're' c'ahchi' quiyeb quicapew-bal, xiban nak chi xisoljic wo' chic je ar.

Xa re' la' ye'a̱b re're', re' k'e̱' nak xca̱j wi̱' wih'ic k'e̱' wo' chic holonquilal chiwach xa pa' tinamit wilic ayu' wach ac'al. Til je' re' riwi̱' maj til ar wilic ru̱c' i Dios ar pan taxa̱j. Je' re' nok re' take c'acharel re're' wilic quiye'a̱b ar chipam i xitik'a̱' i Dios ar pan taxa̱j chi naquic'acharic ru̱c'. Je' re' xiban ru'um chi k'e̱' suk ric'ux nok wilic cu̱c' ru'um nok re' take re' ma' xquicana̱' ta rik'ormojic chi re' aj re' i Dios nquilok'ej wach.

Je' re' ajic re' ma' Awraham xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios eh nok ilbal reh wi til coric niminic riban chiwach, re' Dios xipahkaj reh chi re' rac'u̱n re' Isahac ribihnal erik'ahsaj pan quimic chi si̱ chiwach, je' ricab nok jenaj chicop nye'eric chi si̱ chiwach i Dios nk'ahsjic chi naric'ataric. Chiri̱j chic re're', ru'um reh rich'iquinjic ric'ux xiban chiri̱j i Dios, re' ma' Awraham xik'ahsaj i rac'u̱n chi nariquimic. Je' re' xiban to̱b ta xa jenaj wo' ti chiwach eh to̱b ta wo' chiri̱j rac'u̱n re're',
re' Dios rik'orom chic cho chi je' wili: “Chi quixilac ca̱' qui'sil cho take awac'u̱n, xa cu̱c' take ra̱' ri'sil cho awac'u̱n Isahac, narimanlajic wach i k'oro̱j aweh wu'um, nqui rik'orom cho.

Je' re' k'uru' re' ma' Awraham til xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios naxik'ahsaj rac'u̱n pan quimic. Re're' til xeht'alij pa ricapew-bal chi to̱b ta nariquimic i rac'u̱n, re' Dios wilic rajawric chi narucsam wo' chic cho chi quixilac camnak. Pa ricorquil, pa ricapew-bal i ma' Awraham re' rac'u̱n re're' ucsumaj nak chic cho chi quixilac take camnak chi cu ma' ja' ta wo' rik'ahsaj chiwach i Dios chi nariquimic eh je' re' nik'or maj pa ricapew-bal i ma' Awraham xa re' wo' naxipahkaj i Dios reh re' rac'u̱n quimic nak chic.

Re' jenaj chic c'acharel xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios re' i ma' Isahac. Re're' xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j chi narichalic i k'i̱j nok re' toco̱m chic cuse'sbal narimanlajic wach ru̱c' ru'um i Dios eh ru'um re' nok q'uisi̱n nak chic ma' nquimic, xipahkaj johtok reh Dios pa riti̱j chi re' take rac'u̱n, re' Jacow ch'i̱l i Esawuh, quic'ulbok reh take cuse'sbal re're'.

Je' wo' re' Jacow xich'ica̱' wo' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios. Re're' nok xa quimic nak chic reh eh to̱b ta wo' chi xa ma'xta nak chic ransil riti'jolal ribakil, cu xito'bej chic ri̱b china̱ rich'imim chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios eh xipahkaj wo' johtok reh pa riti̱j chi re' ok wo' take rihrima̱m re' take rac'u̱n Chep quic'ulbok reh take ricuse'sbal i Dios.

Je' wo' re' i Chep til wo' xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios. Nok quimic nak chic reh, xik'or ribiral queh rac'u̱n chi nariponic rik'ijil chi re' take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n ma' Israhel naquelic cho chipam tinamit Eji̱pto. Ru'um chi ch'iclic ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios chi naric'uluric chi je' re', xic'uhbalej wo' take cahnok chi naqui'elok je chipam i tinamit re're' quic'am wo' je riti'jolal ribakil chiqui̱j reh chi naquimuk'a̱b chipam i ye'a̱b re' nacojic c'acharok wi̱'.

Je' wo', chipam take k'i̱j naxasjic cho i Moyses, re' take ritu̱t raja̱w xquich'ica̱' wo' quic'ux ru̱c' i Dios chi narico'lem i cac'u̱n. Ru'um aj re' nok re' k'atal k'oric reh tinamit Eji̱pto xitak'a̱' quicansjic take chi'nchel cuc' ac'un, re' take re' ma' xquiyohlej ta tak'anic re're', ru'um xquirak chiri̱j chi re' ha'lac'un re're' wilic cho rito'bal i Dios china̱. Ru'um aj re' naxasjic i cac'u̱n, xib poh xquic'ol chi co'lbal reh.

Chiri̱j i wili naxwinakbic i Moyses, xich'ica̱' wo' ric'ux ru̱c' i Dios chi narimanlajic wach pa' bih k'oro̱j cho reh. Ru'um aj re' naxponic i k'i̱j chi naquelic je take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chipam i tinamit Eji̱pto, re' Moyses ma' xa̱j ta chic ric'ulum take rilok'il nye'eric nak reh cu'um take c'acharel ru'um chi queht'alim nak chi rihrima̱m i k'atal k'oric aj Eji̱pto.

Re' la' xponic chiwach, re' i c'acharic re' naric'ulum wi̱' i ti'c'axic chi rich'i̱l take chiho̱j chi ritinami̱t i Dios. Je' re' xiban maj chiwach i Moyses re' c'acharic naribanam quich'i̱l take c'acharel re're', k'e̱' wo' chic cho lo̱k' chiwach i c'acharic re' xa junc'am wo' ti riyew risukquil ric'ux i c'acharel ru̱c' ribanaric i mahc.

Je' wo', xiban chi je' re' ru'um chi re' ricapew-bal xa ar wo' xwih'ic ru̱c' i rico̱ch naric'ulum ru̱c' i Dios ru'um reh ric'acharic re' xic'ul wi̱' i ti'quilal c'axquilal chiri̱j ritinami̱t i Dios, je' ricab i c'acharic ye'o̱j chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Re' c'acharic re're' xicapaj i Moyses chi k'e̱' wo' chic cho nim rilok'il chiwach i suk laj c'acharic ru̱c' bihomal xwih'ic nak reh xa ru'um chi rihrima̱m i k'atal k'oric reh tinamit Eji̱pto.

Je' re' ajic re' Moyses xelic je chipam i tinamit Eji̱pto eh ru'um chi c'ahchi' rich'ica̱b ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios ma' xiyohlej ta chi re' k'atal k'oric reh tinamit Eji̱pto yohbal wach naxchalic rijosk'il ru'um relic je chipam ritinami̱t re're'. Je' wo' chic, wilic jenaj chic riwi̱' chi re' Moyses xipahba̱' ric'ux chi ma' xsoljic ta chic chiri̱j eh re' wili riwi̱' re're': Chi re're' til c'ahchi' rilom wach i Dios re' ma' nquilow ta wach take junleh chic c'acharel.

Je' wo' chic, re' Moyses xich'ica̱' wo' chic ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios naxiban i pe̱t pech rinimjic wach i nink'i̱j Pa̱scuwa ribihnal. Re're' chi ch'iclic ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios chi naric'uluric i k'oro̱j reh, xitak'a̱' ricansjic i jenaj me̱' eh chiri̱j chic ru' xitak'a̱' riquihrjic riquiq'ue̱l me̱' re're' chiwach i ju'jun ritz'ahpil quipa̱t take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Je' re' xiban reh chi re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios tak'amaj cho ru'um chi quicansjic take pe̱t cac'u̱n aj Eji̱pto ma' eta ricansaj jeno' queh take quiha'lac'u̱n ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' wilic china̱ ritz'ahpil quipa̱t i riquiq'ue̱l take cansamaj me̱'.

Je' wo', re' take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xquich'ica̱' cho quic'ux chiri̱j i Dios naxi'iq'uic chipam rinimal ha' re' “Ma' laj Cak Wach Ha'” ribihnal. Ru'um re're', xa ma' c'axic ta iq'uic xca'n je chipam, xa je' na nchel pan chiki̱j laj be̱h xi'iq'uic je wi̱'. Raj take aj Eji̱pto re' xi'o̱j chi quichoporic take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, ma' xi'iq'uic ta je chi juntar, jihk'ic la' chic xquic'ul naxok'taj wo' chic cho ri̱b ma' laj ha' re're'.

Je' wo' chic, re' take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel quich'ica̱' wo' chic quic'ux chiri̱j i Dios naxibehic chiri̱j i tinamit Jericoh ribihnal chiwach wuku̱b k'i̱j. Ru'um aj chi ch'iclic quic'ux chiri̱j i Dios, xc'uluric chi re' tz'ak nsutunic ri̱j i tinamit re're' xtublujic wach ac'al.

Re' chic ar Jericoh xwih'ic wo' jenaj chic c'acharel re' xich'ica̱' wo' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios, Rahaw ribihnal re' c'oyo̱m laj ixok. Ru'um aj chi xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios, re're' xic'ul pan sukquil c'uxlis take aj ju'jun kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' xiponic cho sutunel ye'a̱b Jericoh xa pan c'olic.

Je' re' k'uru' xa cu q'uih wo' nak take toco̱m chic c'acharel wilic quik'ormojic chi xquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Dios, xa re' la' ma' eta nak quinmahnic chi rik'ormojic quibiral take ru'. Ayu' aj wilic quibihnal take c'acharel re're': Re' ma' Jeryon, re' ma' Warac, re' ma' Sanson, re' ma' Jepteh, re' ma' Tawiy, re' ma' Samwel ch'i̱l wo' take rich aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios.

Re' take xnik'or lok quibihnal wili ch'i̱l wo' take toco̱m chic c'acharel, xca'n wo' rehreh wach bano̱j ru'um chi xquich'ica̱' wo' quic'ux chiri̱j i Dios. Re' aj wili quibiral chiri̱j chaj bih xca'n: Wilic take ma' xquik'eb ta k'ak'anic cu̱c' take nimak tak tinamit. Wilic wo' take xik'atbic cho k'oric chi coric. Wilic wo' take xi'ehtric ric'ulmujic chaj bih k'oro̱j cho ribiral queh ru'um i Dios eh wilic wo' take xquitz'ap richi̱' take cakcoj chi ma' xic'uxuric ta.

Je' wo' chic, wilic wo' take ma' xic'ahtic ta naxicojoric chipam i k'a̱k' re' ma' hab ta wach noquic ru̱c' ritz'a'quilal. Wilic wo' take xico'ljic chiwach i quimic ru̱c' k'as laj ch'ihch'. Wilic wo' take xquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Dios naxquic'raj chi ma' cow ta chic quic'ux. Ru'um reh rich'iquinjic quic'ux xca'n, re' take re' xquic'ul wo' quicowil eh ru̱c' quicowil re're', xiponic wo' nimak tak aj k'ak'anel re' ma'xta bih xquiyohlej, xca'n la' resmejic je toco̱m chic tinamit quichalic chi k'ak'anic pan quitinami̱t.

Je' wo' chic, wilic take ixok xquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Dios eh ru'um re' xquilow wach pan quic'acharic chi re' take quiha'lac'u̱n camnak nak chic take je, xic'acharic wo' chic rica'pech. To̱b ta wo' wilic take je' re' xquic'ul cho, wilic wo' take c'acharel xiquimic je chi c'ahchi' quic'ulum ti'c'axic. To̱b ta xye'eric wo' nak queh chi enquico'lej qui̱b chiwach i ti'c'axic wi xquimay quiniminic, re' take c'acharel re're' ma' xca̱j ta chi hab wach xco'lonic queh. Chi je' re' k'uru' xquik'ahsaj qui̱b pan quimic eh re' wili riwi̱' chi je' re' xca'n: Chi re' take re' queht'alim chi to̱b ta quiquimok je nariye'eric queh chi nacuctic wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak eh nariye'eric wo' queh chi re' quic'acharic k'e̱' wo' chic holonquilal naribanam nacuctok wo' chic cho.
Je' wo' chic quich'i̱l take c'acharel xicansjic re're', wilic wo' take xquic'ul nimak tak tz'ujuric, xitz'uhumjic wo'. Wilic wo' take xitz'aparic pan che̱' eh ar xibac'aric chi c'aham ch'ihch'.

Chi quixilac take xicansjic re're', wilic wo' chic take xicansjic chi abaj. Wilic take xicansjic ru̱c' k'as laj ch'ihch' naxyoc'oric wo' quiyejal. Wilic wo' take xicansjic ru̱c' c'ul k'as ju' ch'ihch'. Tz'a̱b ru' chi quixilac take ma' xicansjic ta, wilic take xicahnic chi ma'xta quipa̱t ru'um reh quiniminic eh chi je' re' xca'n xa qui'o̱j quichalic chic chi ma' xa jenaj ta chic quiye'a̱b. Je' wo', wilic take xicahnic chi ma'xta chic nech' ok quiso' eh xa ri̱j me̱' chic ch'i̱l i ri̱j chi̱wa nquicoj chiqui̱j chi jelow-bal quiso'. Ru'um aj reh quiniminic, re' take re' til wo' xca'n chi xa niba̱' chic take chi junpech, xa ti' chic quic'ux eh xa ixowomaj wo' chic quiwach.

Je' wo' chic ru'um chi xicahnic chi ma'xta chic quipa̱t, q'uihal queh ar chic pan tak chik yu̱k' xiwih'ic chi xa behic nca'n, chi xa ar wo' xiwiric pan tak q'uiche̱' on pan tak pa̱t abaj on rehquen tak uhl. Re' riwi̱' quic'acharic take c'acharel wili k'e̱' wo' chic nim wach rilok'il eh chi je' re' riwi̱' quic'acharic, ma' xic'ul ta chi queh take aj ixowonel chi re' take aj niminel re're' naquic'acharic wo' chic cok chi quixilac.

Je' re' ajic, re' chic chi'nchel take aj najtir k'i̱j xnik'or lok ribiral aweh tak k'e̱' holonquil quibiral rik'or i Dios chiqui̱j ru'um reh rich'iquinjic quic'ux xca'n chiri̱j. Re' cok ru' to̱b ta je' re' riban, cu ma' jeno' queh quic'ulum take cuse'sbal re' k'oro̱j cahnok ru'um chi nariyeb cho.

Re' riwi̱' chi ma' ja' nc'uluric ta re're', re' wili: Chi re' Dios xojricapaj i hoj aj niminel reh Jesus naxitik'a̱' cho wach chi cu wilic take k'e̱' wo' chic ato̱b laj cuse'sbal wilic cho chi riye'eric eh ru'um re' namanlajok wach quiye'eric, re' take cuse'sbal re're' ma' xa re' ta chic take aj najtir k'i̱j naquic'uluj reh je' la' wo' i hoj nakac'ulum wo' keh quich'i̱l take ru'.

Ar pan taxa̱j yohbal wach q'uihal take aj niminel je' ru̱c' xquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Dios c'ahchi' quisutem cho ki̱j chi kilmijic chiri̱j nic' wach rich'iquinjic kac'ux nka'n. Ru'um chi je' re', ka'n tak keh je' ricab riban jeno' aj ajamanel reh chi suk ajamanic naribanam, resaj lok riso' re' n-ahlsanic reh chi ajamanic eh ritik ju' rojic cu rehtal ponok riwach re' nariponic wi̱'. Je' wo' re' i hoj katik tak ju' kaniminic chi ma'xta cho pan ka̱mna xa pa' jaric nbanic keh chi kojmahcanic eh kojripit chi nakatikim ju' kaniminic.

Je' wo' chic, je' ricab i aj ajamanel nok xa ar chic wilic je rilbal re' nariponic wi̱' chi ajamanic, je' wo' re' hoj katik tak ju' ricojoric rehtal chaj bih xiban i Jesus. Re're' xich'ica̱' ric'ux chi manlic chiri̱j i Dios eh je' re' xiban reh chi re' hoj nakac'amam tz'eht reh rino'jbal ru'. Je' wo', to̱b ta re' Jesus xiq'uic pan q'uixbilal laj quimic je' ricab quimic nquic'ul take c'acharel nim wach quimahc, re're' ma' xyo'jic ta chiwach i q'uixbilal re're', xiyew la' ri̱b chi quimic chi reht'alim chi cu chiwach johtok wilic je jenaj rinimal sukquil c'uxlis nariye'eric reh. Je' wo' chic je' ricab nanye'eric rilok'il jeno' c'acharel chi nantz'uhkic cok pa risec'a̱j jeno' k'atal k'oric, re' Jesus xye'eric wo' rilok'il chi narik'atam k'oric rich'i̱l i Dios.

Je' aj re' k'uru' reh chi ma' eta nyoj ac'ux tak eh chi ma' eta wo' nacana̱' tak rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Dios ru'um i ti'c'axic wilca̱t tak wi̱', nipahkaj aweh tak chi chayew ac'ux tak chi ricapewjic ri̱j i xiban i Jesus chi je' wili: Re're' xicuy ransil i k'etoj wachi̱s xca'n take c'acharel c'ahbil quino'jbal.

Re' aj wili nipahkaj aweh tak chi chak'ihtaj awi̱b tak chiwach i mahc nca'n take c'acharel. Coric, ru'um reh ribanaric i no'jbal re're', re' hat-tak ticahnic tak pan yohbalil chi eticansjic tak cu'um take awich c'acharel, xa re' la' ru' cu yu'na chi k'i̱j ja' jeno' aweh tak ric'ulum chic quimic re're'.

Chi wilca̱t tak chipam i ti'c'axic re're' nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chi ma' niq'uic pan ac'ux tak i xik'or cho queh rac'u̱n najtir k'i̱j i k'atal k'oric ma' Salomon. Re' k'oric re're', re' tz'ihmbimaj cahnok pan Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' i riC'uhbal i Dios re' wo' re' nk'ormojic aweh tak yu'na ru'um i Dios ru'um nok wilca̱t tak chic chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n. Je' aj wili rik'or i tz'ihmbimaj cahnok re're': “Hat-tak wac'u̱n wixk'u̱n, ma' riban ta chi ma' enayew tak rilok'il i k'ilo̱j riyew aweh tak i Ajabe̱s Dios. Ma' riban wo' quib ac'ux wi tirik'il chi cow,
maj re're' rik'il wo' take hab wach ti' ric'raj take eh riyew wo' quiti'c'axic chi cojbal quino'jbal take ric'ul chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n, nqui rik'or i tz'ihmbimaj re're'.

Je' re' nok re' ti'c'axic nchalic chana̱ tak, chacuy tak ru'um nok ak'ilbal tak nok ye'o̱j ru'um i Dios. Nok re' Dios riyew k'ab chi nac'ul tak i ti'c'axic, re're' xa c'uhtbal chi reh hat-tak chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n. Nik'or chi je' re' maj ma' jeno' ac'un ixk'un ma' ta nak ric'ul ti'c'axic chi rik'ilbal ru'um i raja̱w.

Raj wi ma' ta nak riyew k'ab i Dios chi nac'ul tak ti'c'axic chi k'ilbal aweh tak, xa c'ahchi' wo' nak ric'uhtam lok chi re' hat-tak ma' re' ta hat-tak manlic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n. Je' re' nik'or maj chi'nchel take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios ricana̱' chi nchalic quiti'c'axic chi quik'ilbal.

Ayu' wach ac'al je' wo' re' xkac'ul i hoj nok cu hoj pe nak cuc'tak, nkac'ul nak katz'uhumjic cu̱c' katu̱t kaja̱w, maje'? Nok re' take re' kojquitz'uhumej, re' hoj kojbirinic wo' k'oric chi quiwach. Wi je' re' xka'n chi quiwach ru', re' ta na chic chiwach i Dios re' wilic johtok pan taxa̱j ma' ekojbirinic k'oric chiwach nariyew k'ab chi nchalic i ti'c'axic chi kana̱? Wi xka'n chi je' re' nakac'acharic wo' chi holohic.

Je' re' nik'or maj ru̱c' i Dios nc'uluric je' ricab nc'uluric cu̱c' take tutbe̱s ajabe̱s chi nok ja' quiwinakbic ta take quiha'lac'u̱n cu nquiyew pe chi tz'uhu̱m nanquilow chi curman quitz'uhumjic chi corsbal wach quino'jbal. Je' wo' re' riban i Dios ku̱c', re're' riyeb cho k'ab chi nchalic ti'c'axic chi kana̱ chi to'bal keh pan kaniminic reh chi re' hoj enka'n je' ricab riwi̱' ru' chi xa re' i rajmajic wach i holonquilal i ra̱j.

Coric wo' chi chipam i junc'am nok c'ahchi' kac'ulum i ti'c'axic riban ma' suk ta keh, nti'bic kac'ux xa re' la' nok iq'uinak chic lok i ti'c'axic, re' Dios riban chi kojwih'ic wo' chic pan suk laj c'acharic wi la' xkacana̱' chi encorsjic wach i kano'jbal.

Re' hin nipahkaj aweh tak chi je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' i c'acharel chi naric'raj chi ma'xta chic ransil riti'jolal ribakil ru'um i k'uhtic re're' ricowsaj riman ric'ux, je' aj wo' re' cha'n hat-tak pan animinic tak.

Nipahkaj wo' aweh tak, chi coric ok wo' wach ano'jbal tak reh chi re' take awich aj niminel tak re' ma' cow ta chic quic'ux chi niminic ma' eta nquicana̱' quiniminic riman la' chic nquicowej quic'ux chi niminic.

Chiri̱j i wili nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chi chayew ac'ux tak chi cow chi na̱c'acharic tak pan sukquil c'uxlis cu̱c' take chi'nchel awich c'acharel tak. Re' hin nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chi ma' nwih'ic jeno' mahc pan ac'acharic tak maj wi ma' je' re' ac'acharic tak, ma'xta wo' awih'ic tak chiwach i Dios chi na̱wilom tak wach.

Je' wo' nipahkaj aweh tak chi ma' jeno' ok aweh tak encahnic chi ma' eta ric'ul i rato'bil i Dios. Je' wo' ma' nuctic chaxilac tak jeno' c'acharel c'ahbil rino'jbal re' eriyoj quicapew-bal take awich aj niminel tak je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' i amche' nok q'uihinak chic i ra̱' riban chi nk'ahic quiti'jolal take c'acharel ru'um i ya'bilal ricoj.

Je' wo' chic ma' nwih'ic jeno' aweh tak ericut ri̱b pan yibel wach no'jbal, on ma' ta jeno' aweh tak eriyew pa ro̱k i lok'il riyew reh Dios je' ricab xc'uluric cho najtir k'i̱j ru̱c' i Esawuh re' xa ru̱c' ti junwa̱' chi c'uxbal xijal wach ru̱c' richa̱k' i rilok'il wilic chi pe̱t nak ac'unbe̱s chiwach i raja̱w.

Re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chic chaj bih xic'ul i Esawuh naxiban chi je' re', maje'? Re're' xa̱j nak chi re' take cuse'sbal k'oro̱j cho ru'um i ajabe̱s chi naripahkaljic china̱ ru'um chi pe̱t ac'unbe̱s xa re' la' ru' re' raja̱w ma'xta chic bih xiban chi ripahkaljic reh Dios chi eriyew cho take cuse'sbal china̱, to̱b ta re' Esawuh xa ok'ic nak chic riban chiwach chi pahkanic. Re' riwi̱' chi je' re' xiban i raja̱w i Esawuh re' chi ma'xta chic bih xa̱j chi enjahlic wo' chic wach i pahkanic bano̱j chic lok china̱ i jenaj chic ac'unbe̱s.

Re' riwi̱' kawih'ic chiwach i Dios ma' je' ta ricab riwi̱' quiwih'ic cho take kama̱m kati't ar nah yu̱k' Sinayih ribihnal nok re' Dios xic'uhtaj ri̱b queh. Ar re' Dios xipahkaj queh chi ma' eta qui'oquic cok cu chiwach i yu̱k' re're', xa cu naht la' so' xicahnic lok ru̱c'. Chaj bih xquilow naxiwih'ic cho ar? Re' take re' xquilow chi xa ntenic chic i xak k'a̱k' china̱ i yu̱k' re're'. Xquilow wo' chi re' yu̱k' re're' sutumaj ri̱j ru̱c' rinimal k'ekom eh je' wo' chi xa ntelenenic chic i jenaj cow laj te̱w china̱ i yu̱k' re're'.
Je' wo' chic, re' take re' xquibiraj rik'orbal i su̱b je' wo' xquibiraj rik'orbal i Dios xa re' la' ru' naxquibiraj rik'orbal i Dios, cow xquipahkaj quicuyuric chi narimayam k'oric cu̱c'.

Je' re' xca'n ru'um chi ma' nquicuy ta nak chic i yo'jic naxquibiraj take k'oric xiban i Dios chi je' wili: “Wi hab wach jeno' aweh tak npah'ic chiwach i yu̱k' chi ma' k'oro̱j ta reh, naricansjic chi abaj on chi tz'ob-bal. Je' wo' re' enc'uluric ru̱c' jeno' chicop wi xc'ulic wo' pah'ok ayu', nqui xik'or i Dios.
Ma' xa re' ta take kama̱m kati't yohbal wach naxiyo'jic ru̱c' chaj bih xquilow cho, je' la' wo' i Moyses xa nquirquitic chic xik'or chi rinimal laj yo'jic wo' xoquic ru̱c' ru'.

Je' aj re' xc'uluric cho cu̱c' take aj najtir k'i̱j re're', ra̱j la' awu̱c' hat-tak yu'na re' chic i wili xc'uluric: Chipam i katinami̱t Jerusalen re' wilic chiwach i yu̱k' Siyon ribihnal, xye'eric keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi nakalok'em wach i Dios c'achlic chi junelic. Je' ricab naxye'eric keh re're', je' wo' re' hat-tak aj niminel xye'eric wo' aweh tak chi na̱lok'em tak wach i Dios wilic cho ar pan taxa̱j, chi hat-tak ihch'ilimaj cu'um take riq'uihal raj tz'e' wa̱ch.

Ma' xa cu'um ta take re' na̱wihch'iljic tak, je' la' wo' cu'um take awich aj niminel tak re' xye'eric chic quilok'il ar pan taxa̱j je' ricab i lok'il ye'o̱j reh pe̱t ac'unbe̱s. Re' take aj niminel re're' xye'eric wo' queh chi ar pan taxa̱j wilic chic i quibihnal je' ricab ntz'ihmjic ribihnal jeno' c'acharel chiwach jenaj hu̱j. Je' wo' re' hat-tak na'n tak i lok'onic chi hat-tak ihch'ilimaj cu'um take aj niminel xic'acharic cho chi coric wach quino'jbal eh chiri̱j chi camnak chic je take, ar ru̱c' i Dios xmanlajic wach chi re' take re' ma' jaruj ta chic naquiquimic. Chiwach aj i Dios re' nk'atbic k'oric chi quina̱ chi'nchel c'acharel ar wilca̱t hat-tak.

Je' wo' wilca̱t tak chiwach i Jesus re' nbanic chi xo̱j elok wach i ac' tik'inic xiban i Dios chiki̱j chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel. Je' re' xiban i Jesus ru̱c' riquimic re' ma' je' ta ricab i quimic xic'ul i Awel. Je' re' nik'or maj nk'ormojic chi naxcansjic cho i Awel, re' Dios xa̱j chi xchalic ti'c'axic china̱ i hab wach xcansanic reh xa re' la' yu'na ru̱c' riquimic i Jesus re' Dios xa̱j chi k'e̱' wo' chic chak'wachquil laj cuse'sbal xchalic chi kana̱ chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel.

Je' re' nok ru'um chi re' Dios k'e̱' wo' chic chak'wachquil ricuse'sbal xiyew cho chi kana̱, chacoj tak rehtal i wili: Ma̱cana̱' tak ribirmijic rik'orbal. Je' re' nik'or maj wi re' take kama̱m kati't ma'xta quico'ljic chiwach i ti'c'axic xye'eric chi quina̱ ru'um chi ma'xta chic nquinimej i xik'or i Dios nah yu̱k' Sinayih, ra̱j rik'orom chi k'e̱' wo' chic yohbalil wilco̱j wi̱' wi re' hoj enkacana̱' rinimjic rik'orbal i Jesus re' wilic chic tok ar pan taxa̱j.

Nik'or wo' chi je' re' ru'um i wili: Naxk'oric wo' cho i Dios ar china̱ i yu̱k' Sinayih, xiban chi re' ricowil rik'orbal xic'uyu'saj pa̱m i yu̱k' re're', ra̱j yu'na nabanjok wo' i c'uyu'sunic toco̱m chic riwi̱' naric'uluric. Je' re' nik'or maj re' Dios xik'or wo' cahnok i wili: “Junpech chic nanibanam chi re' ac'al naric'uyu'jic wo' chic, re' cok ru' ma' xa re' ta chic i wach ac'al naric'uyu'jic ch'i̱l la' chic i taxa̱j naric'uyu'jic, nqui xik'or cahnok.

Re' k'oric wili: “Junpech chic”, ra̱j rik'orom chi re' Dios c'ahchi' riyeb rehtal chi nachiban re're', xa chic re' take tik'imaj chi ma' eta quic'uyu'sjic naquicahnic, raj tik'imaj chi naquic'uyu'sjic ma'xta chic ric'uhtunic quiwach.

Ru'um aj re' katioxej johtok reh kAja̱w Dios chi re're' xiban chi wilic chi kak'atal k'oric i jenaj re' ma' jaruj ta c'uhlel wach ricamaj. Je' wo' ka'n tak ribanaric take bano̱j re' nponic chiwach i Dios, kalok'ej tak wach eh kayohbalej wo' tak wach.
Wilic ok wo' pan ac'ux tak chi re' Dios re' nkalok'ej wach, til riyew ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take aj mahc je' ricab i ti'c'axic ric'am cho i k'a̱k' re' ric'at chi'nchel xa pa' bih ncojoric cok chipam.
Chatik tak ju' ric'uhtjic i c'axoj i̱b queh take toco̱m awich aj niminel tak.

Je' wo' til ma̱cana̱' tak ribanaric ato'bil queh take c'acharel re' quichalic chi naht eh nca̱j quiye'a̱b reh quiwarbal. Til nik'or aweh tak chi je' re' maj najtir k'i̱j wilic take c'acharel naxquiyew quiwarbal take c'acharel ma' xquicoj ta rehtal chi raj tz'e' wa̱ch po' i Dios take xquic'ul pan quipa̱t.

Je' wo' c'olok pan ac'ux tak quitobjic take c'acharel re' tz'apalque̱b take pan che̱' ru'um reh rik'ormojic ribiral riC'uhbal i kAja̱w Jesus. Nic' pa' wach nawa̱j tak chi ti' etic'rinjic tak je' ricab wi ta nak tz'apalca̱t tak pan che̱' quich'i̱l, je' wo' re' ti'quilal chawic'raj tak take ru'. Je' wo' re' cha'n tak chi quitobjic take toco̱m chic c'acharel re' nquic'ul ti'c'axic maj nic' ok pa' chic, re' chic hat-tak etiq'uic tak pan jeno' c'axquilal re' enye'eric wo' wi̱' chi ti' ati'jolal abakil tak.

Je' wo' chic niban aweh tak i tak'anic wili: Chi'nchel hat-tak re' abanam tak chic caxa̱ra, chayew wo' tak rilok'il acaxarahil tak. Ma̱ch'uwa'rsaj wach acaxa̱ra tak ru̱c' ribanaric c'oyomal. Je' re' tak'anic niban maj nachich'uk k'oric i Dios, naribanam chi narichalic i ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take c'acharel re' nquich'uwa'rej wach i quicaxarahil eh je' wo' chi quina̱ take nca'n i c'oyomal.

Re' chic chiri̱j take bihomal, niban i tak'anic wili chi ma' riban njik'jitic awa̱mna tak chi ric'axaric wach ru', ch'ihcok la' ac'ux tak ru̱c' nic' nimal wilic aweh tak re' riyeb wo' cho aweh tak i Dios. Je' re' pahkanic niban aweh tak maj re' Dios je' wo' wili rik'orom cho: “Ma' jaruj eriban chi re' hin naca̱t nicana̱b chi ma' eta chic tinito'bej tak, ma' wo' chi naca̱t nicana̱b chawutquel, nqui rik'orom cho.

Ru̱c' re're' ewo' riban chi ch'iclic kac'ux enkak'or je' ricab i k'oro̱j cho ru'um i k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy naxik'or cho chi je' wili: “Re' Ajabe̱s Dios re're' aj to'bonel wi̱n eh ru'um aj wo' re' xa ma'xta so' bih quinyo'jic wi̱' ru'um nok ma' eta riban chi jeno' c'acharel npitbic wi̱n chi enic'ul ricuse'sbal i Dios, nqui xik'or cho.

Chiri̱j re're', re' chic i wili i tak'anic nwa̱j niyeb aweh tak chiqui̱j take aj c'amol abe̱h tak chipam i niminic, re' xicamanic chaxilac tak chi aj c'uhtunel reh riC'uhbal i Dios nok chi cu c'achalque̱b nak cho: Naquic'olok cho pan ac'ux tak, chacoj tak rehtal nic' wach i no'jbal xca'n cho ru' eh chatijej wo' tak aweh cu̱c' chiri̱j nic' wach i niminic xca'n chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Re' take re' je' re' xca'n maj re' riwi̱' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric ma' jaruj ta njahlic wach. Re're' xa riwi̱' wo' cho najtir k'i̱j, je' wo' re' riwi̱' chiwach i rik'ijil wilco̱j wi̱' yu'na eh xa je' wo' re' narojic tok wi̱' chi junelic k'i̱j sakom.

Je' re' nok ru'um chi je' re' riwi̱' i Jesus, ma̱cana̱' tak chi enjot'oric acapew-bal tak ru̱c' take toco̱m chic tijbal re' ma' xkayew ta aweh chi nabjic. Re' la' hat-tak chayew ac'ux tak chi ricowsjic acapew-bal tak re' cok ru' wilic ok pan awa̱mna tak i c'axoj i̱b ye'o̱j ru'um i Dios. Je' re' nik'or maj ma' ru̱c' ta nchel i tak'anic chiri̱j take c'uxbal ra̱j c'uxuric, on ma' ra̱j ta ric'uxuric naricowjic acapew-bal tak, to̱b ta wilic take je' re' nquik'or. Raj nchel i hin nik'or aweh tak chi re' take tak'anic re're' xa ma'xta wo' bih ricamanej queh take quic'ambic na̱.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' take cuse'sbal ye'o̱j ru'um i Dios ru'um reh riquimic i Jesus, xa re' wach i hoj aj niminel reh Jesus kojc'ulbic reh eh ma' ye'o̱j ta queh take ma' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' cu chiwach kak'ijil yu'na nquik'ahsaj jeno' chicop chi si̱ ar chipam i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios.

Cu̱c' take re' nc'uluric je' ricab xc'uluric ru̱c' i Nahsil C'amol quiBe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios chi ma' xye'eric ta k'ab reh chi xic'ux i ritibquilal i chicop c'amoj cho chiwach i Dios chi si̱. Re're' xa re' wach riquiq'ue̱l i chicop xye'eric k'ab reh chi ric'amaric cok cu chipam ricab k'at reh Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios ra̱j la' riti'jolal i chicop resaj lok cu chiri̱j i lok' laj pa̱t re're' chi ric'ataric lok ar.

Je' re' nok je' ricab chi cu ar lok chiri̱j i lok' laj pa̱t re're' nesmejic lok i riti'jolal i chicop ye'o̱j chi si̱, curman wo' cho chi re' Jesus ar lok chiri̱j i tinamit Jerusalen xichihcaj i riquiq'ue̱l naxquimic chi ribanaric chi hoj chic ritinami̱t i Dios.

Re' hoj k'uru', xa je' ta nak c'ahchi' kelic lok ch'i̱l i Jesus je' ricab naxelic lok chipam i tinamit Jerusalen chi nariquimic lok ar, kihch'ilej ta wo' nak chi tikilco̱j chi ricuyuric i ti'c'axic je' ricab xc'uluric ru̱c' ru' naxic'ul rinimal i ti'c'axic.

Je' re' nik'or chi naka'nam maj re' hoj keht'alim chi ma' re' ta ayu' wach ac'al wilic i kaye'a̱b re' nakawih'ic wi̱' chi junpech, ar la' pan taxa̱j i wilic kaye'a̱b re're' eh ru'um nok chi kawach wilic je rik'ijil chi nakawih'ic tak ar, re' hoj kacoj chic je kacapew-bal chiri̱j i ye'a̱b re're'.

Jenaj chic k'oric enik'or aweh tak wili: Ru̱c' rito'bal i Jesus chi xa je' ta nak chiwach aj k'ahsem si̱ c'ahchi' kak'ahsam cok i kasi̱ chiwach i Dios, eli̱c kayew tak rinimal rilok'il i Dios. Ru̱c' take k'oric qui'elic cho pan kachi̱', kak'or tak ribiral chi re're' i Ajabe̱s china̱ chi'nchel.

Je' wo' chic, xa je' ta nak ricab jenaj si̱ c'ahchi' kak'ahsam chiwach i Dios, ka'n tak re' nponic chiwach wili: Xa wilic ok wo' pan kac'ux quitobjic take junleh chic c'acharel re' c'axic ti nca'n pan quic'acharic, on re' nca̱j awato'bil tak.

Chiri̱j chic lok i k'oric re're', re' wili jenaj chic tak'anic nwa̱j wo' nibanam aweh tak: Tibirinok tak k'oric chi quiwach take aj c'amol be̱h chipam animinic tak eh tiniminok wo' tak chi quiwach. Je' re' cha'n tak maj pan jenaj k'i̱j re' take re' naquiwih'ic chiwach i Dios re' narilmijic wi̱' wi xquinimej on ma' xquinimej ta i camanic ye'o̱j queh. Ru'um aj re' til chac'am tak na̱ i tak'anic niban je aweh tak reh chi je' re' naquicamanic wo' chi suk quic'ux eh ma' re' ta nchel ru̱c' i riti'quil quic'ux naquicamanic chaxilac tak ru'um nok re' no'jbal chi xa ch'i'c awi̱j tak xa ma'xta bih ericamanej aweh tak.

Chi je' re' k'uru' ru̱c' i tak'anic re're', nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chi chacuy cha'n ati̱j tak chiwi̱j. Re' wili riwi̱' chi niban je aweh tak i pahkanic re're': Wilic take c'acharel c'ahchi' quicojom nimahc chiwach i Dios ru'um reh c'uhtunic niban, xa re' la' hin ch'iclic nic'ux chi chiwach i Dios xa coric wo' wach c'ahchi'qui̱n eh xa je' wo' re' nwa̱j nitikim ju' ribanaric.

Nacha'n ati̱j tak chiki̱j i hoj, til nipahkaj wo' chic aweh tak i ato'bil chi til cow tipahkanok tak chiwi̱j i hin chi c'ahchi' abanam ati̱j tak chi re' Dios chiyew ta nak cho wi̱n chi xa chi jumehk'il equinsoljic wo' chic je' awu̱c' tak.

Re' chic nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi re' wili i ti̱j niban chawi̱j tak: «K-Aja̱w Dios, re' hat, hat tiye'bic reh sukquil kac'ux. Re' wo' hat xatbanic chi re' kAja̱w Jesus re' je' na ricab jeno' aj cha'jem me̱' nok wilic, xuctic wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak. Ru̱c' re're' xa'n wo' chi ru'um reh riquiq'ue̱l xichihcaj i Jesus naxquimic, re' ac' laj tik'inic xa'n chiki̱j i hoj xcahnic chi pa'lic wach chi junelic k'i̱j sakom, nqui i ti̱j niban. Je' wo' chic naniban i ti̱j re're', nipahkaj wo' reh Dios chawi̱j tak

chi re' ta nak i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric to'bonok aweh tak chi ribanaric take bano̱j quiponic chiwach i Dios eh chi re're' banok chi tikilca̱t ok tak chi ribanaric take bano̱j re're'. Chi cohlsbal wach i niti̱j wili k'uru', nipahkaj chi re' Jesus ye'erok ta nak rinimal rilok'il chi junelic k'i̱j sakom. Til nipahkaj chi je' ta nak re' c'ulurok.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj nimimel, xa ma' q'uih ta wo' ti chi k'oric xnitz'ihmbaj je chipam i hu̱j wili. Ru'um aj re' nipahkaj ato'bil aweh tak chi chacuy wo' tak ti ribirmijic take k'oric k'oro̱j je chipam.

Nwa̱j wo' chi na̱na'bem tak chi re' kacha̱k' Timote̱yo xelic chic cho pan che̱' re' tz'aplic nak wi̱' ru'um reh riniminic. Wi ta nak xa loq'uil ti wilic cho ayu', til wich'i̱l nak ti equino̱j awu̱c' tak chi awiliric tak.

Jenaj chic k'oric. Chayew tak risukquil quic'ux take c'amol abe̱h tak ar ch'i̱l wo' take toco̱m chic aj niminel. Re' take aj niminel xichalic chipam i riyuk'ul Ita̱lya nquitak'a̱' je risukquil ac'ux tak.
Pan cohlsbal aj wach nik'orbal nipahkaj reh Dios chi re' ta nak re' to'bonok aweh tak chi junelic. Re' aj take wili nik'orbal je awu̱c' tak.

Re' hin ma' San re' nibihnej wo' chi Jaco̱wo, re' hin c'ahchi' nitz'ihminic je reh hu̱j wili. Re' hin, hin raj camanom i Dios eh je' wo' hin raj camanom i Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Ru̱c' i hu̱j wili re' hin c'ahchi' ca̱t tak nic'alenem je i hat-tak cablaj ch'uk chi tinamit je' ru̱c' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' apuhcam awi̱b tak xa haj ye'a̱b wilca̱t tak ponok wi̱'.
Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, sukbok ac'ux tak nanac'ul tak rehreh wach ti'c'axic re' riyew k'ab i Dios chi enchalic chana̱ tak ilbal reh nic' wach wilic animinic tak chiwach.

Je' re' cha'n tak maj re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi re' richalic i ti'c'axic chana̱ tak ncamanic xa ilbal reh nic' wach wilic animinic tak eh re're' riban wo' chi encowjic acapew-bal tak reh chi je' re' enatik tak ju' rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak chi manlic.

Ru'um aj re' wi xchalic i ti'c'axic chana̱ tak chacuy tak ransil eh chacana̱' tak chi camanel ok aweh tak chi enmanlajic wach rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak chi manlic reh chi je' re' nok manlic chic wach ricowil acapew-bal tak chac'uhtaj wo' tak lok chi re' wo' take no'jbal ra̱j i Dios c'ahchi'ca̱t tak ribanaric. Ru̱c' re're' k'uru' ewo' nc'utunic lok awu̱c' tak chi manlic chic awach tak ru̱c' i c'acharic ra̱j i Dios chi na̱banam tak.

Je' re' cha'n tak nanchalic i ti'c'axic chana̱ tak ra̱j la' wi wilic jeno' aweh tak re' ma' rirak ta chiri̱j chaj bih elic naribanam chipam jeno' c'axquilal, chipahkaj la' rino'jbal reh i Dios maj re're' til wo' nariyeb cho ru̱c' chi'nchel ric'ux eh ma' eta ripit cho chaj bih pahkanic c'ahchi' ribanjic chiwach.

Re' cok ru' re' c'acharel re' naribanam i pahkanic til curman chi ch'iclic ok ric'ux chi coric chiri̱j i Dios chi ma' ok xa qui̱b wach ric'ux. Je' re' nik'or maj re' c'acharel re' qui̱b wach ricapew-bal no̱j riban chi re' ricapew-bal xa je' na ricab ribohl i ha' xa haj ye'a̱b nc'amaric je ru'um i te̱w.
Je' re' k'uru' xa hab wach qui̱b wach ricapew-bal chi pahkanic, ma' ricapaj chi naric'ulum haj wilic i pahkanic c'ahchi' ribanam johtok reh i Dios.
Je' re' nik'or maj re' c'acharel re' qui̱b wach ricapew-bal, re're' ma' ch'iclic ta ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios eh ma' ch'iclic ta wo' ric'ux chiri̱j take pa' bih jaric riban.
Re' kich aj niminel re' c'axic ti riban pan niba'il china̱ ac'al wili, til sukbok ric'ux to̱b ta je' ti re' riwi̱' maj chiwach i Dios re're' k'e̱' wo' chic rilok'il.

Je' wo' re' kich aj niminel re' wilic ribihomal, sukbok wo' ric'ux chi ma' ru'um ta ribihomal nilmijic ru'um i Dios chi wilic riwa'ric chiwach maj re' bihomal xa narisahchic wo' wach. Pa ricorquil, re' bihomal xa je' na ricab jeno' ihtz'ub chi xa ru̱c' ti junc'am nsahchic wach riholonquil.

Je' re' k'uru', je' ricab nok re' k'i̱j xa nkopkotic chic cho ritz'a'quil chi quina̱ take q'uiche̱' ricansaj take eh risach wach riholonquil quihtz'ubal, je' wo' re' riwi̱' i sahchic wach naribanam i biho̱m ch'i̱l i ribihomal rirak ru̱c' ricamaj wilic.

K'e̱' je ato̱b reh c'acharel wi xa cu ch'iclic wo' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios na'ic'ok chipam jeno' ti'c'axic. Je' re' nik'or maj wi je' re' xiban re're' naric'ulum chi rico̱ch re' xik'or i Dios chi nariyeb. Re' aj wili xik'or i Dios chi nariyeb: “Hab wach take k'e̱' ti' quinquic'raj, re' hin naniyeb queh chi naquic'acharic chi junelic, nqui xik'or.

Nok re' ti'c'axic nchalic china̱ jeno' aj niminel ilbal reh nic' wach wilic riniminic chiwach i Dios, ma' rik'or chi re' Dios c'ahchi' riyeb cho ti'c'axic re're' reh chi nkajic pan mahc. Ma' nk'ormojic chi je' re' maj re' capewenic re're' c'ahbil eh re' Dios ma'xta so' c'ahbilal pa ricapew-bal. Je' wo' chic, ma̱k'or tak chi je' re' maj re' Dios ma' eta tiripaj tak ru̱c' ti'c'axic reh chi etik'ehbic tak pan c'ahbilal.

Je' re' nik'or maj nok jeno' c'acharel riban i c'ahbilal je' wili nc'uluric ru̱c': Pe̱t, xa pa ric'ux nchalic chi ra̱j ribanam jeno' c'ahbilal. Chiri̱j wili nok ritik'a̱b chic wach pa ricapew-bal chi naribanam i c'ahbilal, cu re' aj chic ru' re're' riyew ric'ux chi ribanaric i c'ahbilal re're'.

Ru̱c' k'oro̱j re're' nkarak chiri̱j chi nic' pa' wach nc'uluric ru̱c' i rasjic ch'i̱l riq'uihic jeno' ha'lac'un je' wo' re' nc'uluric ru̱c' ribanaric i mahc. Je' re' nik'or ru'um i wili: Re' mahc xa pa ric'ux i c'acharel nasjic cho chi pe̱t nok ricoj chic ricapew-bal chi ra̱j ribanaric. Chiri̱j chic ru' nq'uihic wach rotowjic ribanaric i mahc re're' cu rehtal riban ribanaric. Chiri̱j chic re' ru'um reh ribanaric i mahc re're', nchalic i junelic quimic china̱ i c'acharel re're'.
Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak, ma̱cana̱' tak chi enjot'oric acapew-bal tak chiri̱j ricorquilal i wili:

Chi'nchel i ye'o̱j chi si̱ ru'um i kAja̱w Dios ma' re' ta ti'quil c'uxlis ric'am cho, holonquilal la' ric'am cho eh til wo' manlic wach maj ar nchalic ru̱c' i kAja̱w Dios re' xtik'inic reh chi'nchel i nic' pa' nimal quisakomonic cho ar pan taxa̱j. Je' wo' re're' ma' jaruj ta iq'ue̱l wach riwi̱' eh ma'xta bih narijalbic wach.

Je' wo' chic, re're' xa pa ric'ux xa̱j eh xiban chi ru'um reh i Lok' laj Uxlabal xojc'acharic chi hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios ru'um nok re' hoj xkac'ul take ricorquilal k'oric re' xik'or keh. Ru̱c' i xiban re're', re' Dios xiban wo' chi re' kalok'il i hoj re' xojricoj chi hoj pe̱t be̱h chi ritinami̱t, k'e̱' nim wach chi quiwach take chi'nchel i nic' pa' nimal xitik'a̱' ru'.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' ti' tiwic'raj tak, yu'na chacoj tak rehtal i nanik'orom wili: Curman chi hoj ok tak t'ulic chi ribirmijic rik'orbal i Dios eh je' wo' chi naka'nam ri̱j chi pe̱t chaj bih nakak'orom. Je' wo', curman chi re' hoj ma' xa hoj ta ok ti mahnic' chi enchalic kajosk'il.
Je' re' nik'or maj re' josk' laj c'acharel ma' riban ta chic i coric wach no'jbal ra̱j i Dios chi naribanaric.

Je' aj re' k'uru' chak'eb lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak chi'nchel i c'ahbilal ch'i̱l i ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal nca'n ribanaric q'uihal take c'acharel eh ru̱c' ok wo' ch'ublic laj no'jbal cha'n tak ribanaric haj wilic k'oro̱j chipam riC'uhbal i Dios re' k'orel nic' pa' wach xicoj pan awa̱mna tak maj re' ricojoric wach i c'uhbal re're' enbanic chi etico'ljic tak.

Je' re' ajic cha'n tak i k'oro̱j ru'um i c'uhbal re're' eh ma' ok xa re' ribirmijic ena'n tak. Wi xa re' ribirmijic na'n tak eh ma' na'n ta tak ribanaric haj wili rik'or, xa rijot'oric awi̱b i na'n tak.

Ru'um aj re' xa hab wach c'acharel re' ribiraj i c'uhbal eh ma' riban ta wo' ribanaric i k'oro̱j ru'um i c'uhbal re're' nc'uluric ru̱c' je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' jeno' c'acharel re' rilow i rilbal pan lemuh. Je' re' nik'or maj re're' to̱b ta rilow chi xa ch'uwa' chic riban i rilbal,
xa rilmijic wo' ti riban eh narisolq'uij ri̱b chi nelic je wach lemuh chi junc'am wo' ti niq'uic pa ric'ux chi xa ch'uwa' chic i wach.

Raj nchel xa hab wach c'acharel re' ma' niq'uic ta pa ric'ux i tak'amaj ru'um i Dios chipam riC'uhbal eh riban ribanaric, re' aj wili nc'uluric ru̱c' ru': Re' c'acharel re're' ma' xa ta re' ricoj rehtal chi coric i k'oro̱j ru'um riC'uhbal i Dios til la' wo' ritik ju' ric'amaric na̱ i c'uhbal re're', re' riban wi̱' tijinic i Dios chi manlic chiri̱j i c'acharic ra̱j chi naribanaric. Ru'um aj chi riban ribanaric re're', re' c'acharel re' ric'am na̱ riC'uhbal i Dios re' nbanic chi enc'acharic chi tehlic ri̱j, nic' q'uihal take bano̱j riban xa cuse'semaj wo' cho ru'um i Dios.

Je' wo' chic, xa hab wach c'acharel re' ricapaj chi manlic aj niminel chiwach i Dios xa re' la' wi ma' riyohbalej ta ju' ra̱k' chi k'oric, xa rijot'oric wo' ri̱b riban. Wi je' re' riban i c'acharel re're', xa ma'xta bih ritik reh i niminic c'ahchi' ribanam chiwach i Dios

maj re' ribano̱j ma' coric ta wach. Re' aj wili take bano̱j nponic chiwach i Dios chi nariban i aj niminel: Tz'iro̱j ok wach rino'jbal chi manlic, ma' ricana̱' chi re' rino'jbal eriban jenaj wach ch'i̱l quino'jbal take aj mahc china̱ eh chito'bej wo' take wilque̱b pan ti'c'axic je' ricab take ha'lac'un ma'xta quitu̱t caja̱w on re' take cahnel ixok chic take.
Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel chic reh lok'omaj wach Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' hin nipahkaj aweh tak chi chi'nchel take c'acharel xa jenaj ok wach quilok'il chayew tak.

Nipahkaj aweh tak re're' maj pan jeno' moloj i̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios, rehreh wach c'acharel quiponic chaxilac tak. Ar enawilow tak chi enoquic cok chaxilac tak jeno' biho̱m laj c'acharel je' ru̱c' xa nworwotic chic rimutk'a̱b ju' k'ab eh xa ac' chic riso' wilic chiri̱j. Je' wo' chipam i junc'am re're' enawilow wo' tak chi enponic chaxilac tak jeno' niba̱' laj c'acharel xa p'ojp'oj ti wach riso' wilic chiri̱j.

Nanawilow take re're', re' hat-tak xa suk chic enawilow tak i c'acharel re' xa holohic chic ritik'injic ri̱b riban eh je' wili enak'or tak reh: «Titz'u̱k ayu' chipam i holohic laj tz'uka̱b wili, nqui nak enak'or tak reh. Tz'a̱b ru' i niba̱' je' wili enak'or tak reh: «Re' hat tipa̱' pe so' ar on titz'u̱k so' ar wach ac'al, nqui nak enak'or tak reh.

Ma'xta na re̱t i no'jbal na'n tak chi je' re' nanacapaj tak? Ma'xta! Ru̱c' re're', re' hat-tak c'ahchi'ca̱t tak chi ribanaric i ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal wili chi re' jenaj suk nawilow tak eh re' jenaj chic xa ri̱j wach ac'ux nawilow tak. Xa ru̱c' aj i c'ahchi'ca̱t tak re're', c'ahchi' ayeb tak lok chi eht'aljic wi ric'ul chi reh on ma' ric'ul chi reh chi enye'eric riwa'ric jeno' c'acharel eh re're' ma' tare̱t ta chi je' re' na'n tak.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak, chabiraj tak i wili: Re' Dios xichih cho chi re' take niba̱' nariye'eric queh i bihomal ye'o̱j ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal queh take nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus. Je' wo', ye'o̱j wo' queh chi re' Jesus nariwih'ic chi K'atal K'oric chi quina̱ je' ricab xk'ormojic cahnok ru'um i Dios chi je' re' naric'uluric cu̱c' take c'acharel je' ru̱c' quic'axbic reh.

Xa re' la' re' hat-tak to̱b ta wo' je' re' xiban i Dios cu̱c' take niba̱' ma' re' ta wo' take re' nayew tak quilok'il re' la' chic take bihomak nayew tak quilok'il. Xa je' wo' nchel re' na'n tak eh ma' nacoj ta na tak rehtal chi je' wo' ru̱c' take re' quibanic chi nwih'ic ti'c'axic chana̱ tak eh pan ehtil tiquic'am tak je chi quiwach take aj ch'ukul k'oric?
On ma' nacoj ta wo' na tak rehtal chi re' wo' ru̱c' queh take bihomak re're' xitz'ujbic reh lok' laj ribihnal i Ajabe̱s Jesus re' xk'ormojic ribiral chana̱ tak?

Je' re' nok re' hin nik'or aweh tak wi re' hat-tak c'ahchi' ayeb tak quilok'il take niba̱', ra̱j rik'orom chi re' hat-tak ricorquil c'ahchi'ca̱t ru̱c' ric'amaric na̱ i tak'anic xiban i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Re' tak'anic wili re' wo' re' tz'ihmbimaj cho chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios chi je' wili: «Chac'ax awas acha̱k' je' ricab ric'axaric awi̱b na'n i hat, nqui rik'or.

Tz'a̱b ru' wi xa suk chic nawilow tak take bihomak eh re' take niba̱' xa ri̱j ti wach ac'ux nawil tak, ru̱c' re're' c'ahchi' ac'uhtam tak chi ma' holohic ta c'ahchi'ca̱t tak, c'ahchi' la' amahcanic tak ra̱j rik'orom eh re' Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' i Lok' laj riC'uhbal i Dios rik'or chi tanlic chi enye'eric ti'c'axic chana̱ tak ru'um nok xatiq'uic tak k'e̱' china̱ chaj bih rik'or.

To̱b ta nak nac'am tak na̱ chi'nchel take tak'anic wilic chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios eh wi xa jenaj ok ti ticalajic tak wi̱' chi ma' nac'am ta tak na̱, ra̱j rik'orom chi re' hat-tak xa ma' nac'am ta wo' tak na̱ chi'nchel take tak'anic.

Je' re' nik'or ru'um nok xa jenaj wach rilok'il i chi'nchel take tak'anic wilic chipam i lok' laj hu̱j re're' maj ar re' Dios je' wili rik'or: “Ma̱ban i c'oyomal, nqui rik'or. Je' wo', rik'or wo' chic chi je' wili: “Ma̱ban tak i cansanic, nqui rik'or. Ru'um aj re' to̱b ta wo' ma' na'n ta tak i c'oyomal xa re' ok ti cansanic na'n tak, ra̱j rik'orom chi xatiq'uic tak chic k'e̱' china̱ chaj bih rik'or i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios.

Chi'nchel i pa' bih k'oro̱j chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios, re're' nbanic chi re' take c'acharel equic'acharic chi tehlic qui̱j chi ma' eta nch'ukuric k'oric chi quina̱ eh re' wo' re' naricamanic reh Dios chi narik'orom wi re' hoj, hoj aj mahc on ma'xta. Ru'um aj re' nipahkaj aweh tak chi coric ok wach ak'orbal eh holohic ok wo' wach abano̱j tak cu̱c' chi'nchel take c'acharel.

Re' hin nik'or chi je' re' maj re' take c'acharel re' ma'xta quetelenic wachi̱s chi quiwach cu̱c' quich c'acharel, ma'xta wo' riqueteljic nech' ok quiwach nach'ukurok k'oric chi quina̱. Tz'a̱b ru' re' take c'acharel re' wilic quiquetelbal cu̱c' take quich c'acharel, re' take re' nariqueteljic wo' quiwach naponok ri'orahil i ch'ukuj k'oric chi quina̱.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, jeno' c'acharel ma'eta nco'ljic xa ru'um ta nak erik'or chi aj niminel. Je' wo', ma'xta bih eritik reh i c'acharel re're' chi erik'or chi aj niminel reh Jesus wi ru̱c' take ribano̱j ma' nc'uhtunic ta wo' chi coric chi til aj niminel.
Chacapaj tak ri̱j i wili: Kak'or chi wilic jeno' kas kacha̱k' aj niminel wilic ric'axquilal chi ma'xta chic riso' eh ma'xta wo' riwa' riha̱' re' nariq'uic wi̱' k'i̱j.

Nok jeno' aj niminel rilow re're', ma'xta wo' bih to'bal riyew nanpahkaljic reh chi naribanam i to'bonic, je' la' chic wili rik'or reh rich aj niminel chi ch'iquinbal ric'ux: «Chawil awi̱b ar, chapotz awi̱b chi coric ru̱c' aso' eh til cha'n awa' aha̱' chi suk, nqui ok reh. Til nik'or aweh tak chi re' aj niminel je' re' riban, xa ma'xta bih nqui i niminic c'ahchi' ribanam.

Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab chi jeno' c'acharel nok camnak chic je ma'xta chic bih riban, je' wo' re' nc'uluric ru̱c' jeno' c'acharel re' ma' jeno' holohic laj bano̱j riban. Je' re' nik'or maj to̱b ta nak ricoj wach chi re're' aj niminel reh Jesus, re're' ma' ric'uhtaj ta wo' lok ru̱c' ribano̱j chi til coric chi aj niminel wo'.

Kak'or ti chic chi re' aj niminel re're', eta nak rik'or wi̱n chi je' wili: «Re' hat, hat wo' aj niminel reh i Jesus je' ricab i hin, ma' je'? Til na coric aweh chi je' re'? nqui ok nchel wi̱n. Re' hin enak nik'or reh chi je' wili: «Re' hin wilic take nibano̱j c'uhtbal reh chi hin wo' aj niminel reh Jesus, raj i hat ma'xta jeno' abano̱j re' enc'utunic lok wi̱' i k'oric na'n chi hat aj niminel reh Jesus, nqui enik'or reh.

Je' re' nok chacoj rehtal i nik'orom aweh tak wili: Re' hat nak'or chi naco̱j wach chi xa jenaj wo' i Dios wilic eh tare̱t c'ahchi'ca̱t chi je' re', xa re' la' ma' manlic ta ti ru̱c' re're' chi etico'ljic. Nik'or chi je' re' maj je' wo' re' nca'n take ma' tob laj uxlabal chi nquicoj wo' wach chi xa jenaj wo' i Dios wilic, xa re' la' ru' ma' eta quico'ljic chiwach i ti'c'axic re' queht'alim wo' chi nariye'eric chi quina̱ eh ru'um i re' quibarbatic ru'um quiyo'jic.

Hat c'acharel re' hamlic i memil laj no'jbal awu̱c', junpech chic nanic'uhtam aweh ricorquilal i k'oro̱j wili chi je' ricab nok re' c'acharel nok camnak chic je ma'xta chic bih riban, je' wo' re' nc'uluric ru̱c' i aj niminel reh Jesus nok ma' riban jeno' holohic laj bano̱j re' nc'utunic lok wi̱' chi til coric chi aj niminel.

Chacapaj aj chiri̱j re' xc'uluric cho wili ru̱c' i kaj najtir k'i̱j re' ma' Awraham: Re' Dios xipahkaj reh chi re' rac'u̱n ru' re' Isahac ribihnal narik'ahsam chiwach ru' chi je' ricab riwi̱' nbanjic reh jeno' chicop nye'eric johtok chi si̱ chiwach i Dios chiwach i lok' laj ye'a̱b c'atbal si̱. Ru'um aj rino'jbal chi xbirinic k'oric chiwach i Dios chi xip'ut wo' ribanaric haj wilic xk'ormojic reh, re' ma' Awraham xk'ormojic wo' reh ru'um i Dios chi coric wach ric'ux.

Ru̱c' ribiral i ma' Awraham wili, re' hat enawilow chi ma' xa re' ta xicoj wach i haj wilic i k'oro̱j reh ru'um i Dios, xiban la' wo' haj wilic i k'oro̱j reh eh ru'um re' naxiban wo' ribanaric re're', xic'ul wo' chi manlic i haj wilic i xicoj wach.

Je' re' ajic re' ribano̱j i ma' Awraham xc'uhtunic wi̱' chi re're' xicoj wach rik'orbal i Dios eh re' ricorquil ribiral re're' nc'utunic wach chi manlic ru'um i k'oro̱j ar chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios. Ar rik'or chi re' ma' Awraham xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i k'oro̱j reh ru'um i Dios eh ru'um chi je' re' xiban, re' Dios xipahba̱' chi jenaj c'acharel coric wach ric'ux. Ma' xa ta re're', je' la' wo' re' Dios xicoj i ma' Awraham til rich k'orom chic!

Je' re' nok ru̱c' ribiral i ma' Awraham, re' hat-tak enarak tak chiri̱j yu'na chi ru̱c' take quibano̱j take c'acharel quicahnic chi sak wach quic'acharic eh chi coric wo' chic wach quic'ux chiwach. Ru'um aj re' ma' manlic ta ti ru̱c' chi re' take c'acharel enquik'or chi aj niminel take reh Jesus xa re' la' ru' ma' nc'uhtunic ta ru̱c' quibano̱j chi je' re' quiwi̱'.

Chi re' Dios rilow cho kabano̱j chi ajwal wach chiwach, ar nc'utunic ru̱c' ribiral i ti' ixok Rahaw ribihnal. Ru̱c' re're' nkilow chi to̱b ta nak pan c'oyomal laj c'acharic nak wilic, pa ricapew-bal i Dios re' ixok re're' xcahnic chi jenaj c'acharel sak wach ric'acharic eh coric wo' wach ric'ux. Je' re' riwi̱' xcahnic ixok re're' chiwach i Dios ru'um chi xiyew quiwarbal take aj tz'e' wa̱ch re' tak'amaj take je ru'um i Joswe. Ma' xa re' ta re' xiban, xic'uhtaj wo' queh jenaj chic be̱h reh chi ma' xichoporic cu'um take caj ixowonel.

Je' re' ajic ru̱c' take k'oric wili, re' hin nwa̱j nicohlam wach nik'orbal chiri̱j xnik'or lok re're': Je' ricab nok jeno' c'acharel nquimic je ma'xta chic camaj chi wilic cho riti'jolal ribakil nok ma' wilic ta chic i uxlabal ru̱c', je' wo' re' nc'uluric ru̱c' i c'acharel re' rik'or chi aj niminel reh Jesus. Je' re' nik'or maj wi ma' ric'uhtaj lok ru̱c' ribano̱j chi til coric chi je' re', xa ma'xta bih camanel reh i rik'ormojic riban.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel reh Jesus, re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi k'e̱' wo' chic cowil wach ch'ukuj k'oric naribanaric chi kana̱ i hoj re' wilic kacamaj chi aj c'uhtunel reh riC'uhbal i Dios wi ma' nka'n ta chi coric kacamaj. Ru'um aj re' nipahkaj aweh tak chi ma̱c'ax tak wach i camanic wili wi ma' ena'n tak canar ribanaric chi coric.

Je' re' nik'or maj coric, re' hoj c'acharel ma' haj ta iq'ue̱l keh chi xa nic' yu' ekojcalajic ru̱c' ribanaric jeno' mahc, xa re' la' wi hab wach jeno' nchol ripitiric ri̱b ru̱c' take k'oric nelic lok ju' ra̱k' eh ma' nmahcanic ta nech' ok ru̱c' i ra̱k' chi k'oric ra̱j rik'orom chi re' c'acharel re're' til manlic wach rino'jbal chi coric eh chi nchol wo' rikotoric na̱ chi'nchel i riti'jolal

je' ricab nsakomjic wach ricorquil i k'oro̱j re're' ru̱c' take ribiral wili: Je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' i cawa̱y, wi ncojoric pa richi̱' jeno' ch'ihch' chi behsbal reh, re' wo' ch'ihch' re're' encamanic chi kotbal na̱ ru'um i hab wach enjohtic china̱.

Je' wo' chic re' nc'uluric ru̱c' i nim laj cano̱wa. To̱b ta yohbal wach nimal eh chi c'amoj je take ru'um i cow laj te̱w, re're' xa jenaj wo' ti chi t'uch coten laj ch'ihch' ncamanic chi behsbal reh eh ru̱c' re're' xa re' k'orel reh aj behsenel haj ra̱j ojic ar wo' eric'am je i ma' laj cano̱wa.

Je' aj re' nc'uluric ru̱c' i ka̱k' i hoj c'acharel. Je' re' nik'or maj re' ka̱k' to̱b ta jenaj t'uch riman kati'jolal kabakil, ru̱c' take k'oric riban lok xa rinimsaj chic ri̱b i c'acharel. Re' ka̱k' je' wo' ricab i xak k'a̱k' chi xa t'uch ti nankop xa re' la' naric'am wach xa nim chic ric'atej je cu rehtal ric'at juntuhm ok chi nimak tak che̱'.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' take k'oric nelic lok ju' ka̱k' risach wach chi'nchel je' ricab riban i k'a̱k'. Je' wo' chic, re' ka̱k' re' riman cho i kati'jolal kabakil, re're' riban chi erip'uta̱' jeno' c'ahbilal eh ru̱c' re're' erinih je chi'nchel riman kati'jolal kabakil. Chi je' re' k'uru' je' ricab nok re' k'a̱k' nkoporic risach wach xa pa' bih je' wo' re' i k'oric riban i c'acharel ru̱c' i ra̱k', re're' nbanic chi erijot' ri̱b ric'acharic nok re' pa' bih k'oric riban ar nchalic ru̱c' aj Yahm.

Je' re' c'ahchi' nik'orom ru'um reh i wili: Coric, re' take josk' laj chicop, je' ru̱c' take quirupunic, on re' take a̱k', on re' take chicop wilque̱b pan ha', chi'nchel take re're' riban chi nkotoric quina̱ eh chi je' re' wilic take c'acharel quikotbic quina̱ reh chi quibirinic k'oric chi quiwach.

Raj la' i c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' nchol ta ripitiric take k'oric nelic lok ju' ra̱k' ma' je' ta re' nc'uluric ru̱c' nok riban lok take k'oric je' ru̱c' nchalic ru̱c' i aj Yahm. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take c'ahbilal ric'am cho take k'oric rik'or lok i c'acharel re're' ma' jeno' winak eriban canar ripitiric eh je' ricab camanic riban ik'o̱m ncamanic chi cansbal je' wo' re' i camanic riban take k'oric re're', ricoj wo' chi ti' i jeno' c'acharel.

Je' wo' chic nok ar ru̱c' aj Yahm nchalic take k'oric riban jeno' c'acharel, wilic pech je' wili nc'uluric: Re' hoj ru̱c' i ka̱k' nkayew rilok'il i Ajabe̱s Dios eh je' wo' ru̱c' wo' i ka̱k' nkasihtaj take c'acharel re' ritik'inic i Dios take chi narilmijic i rino'jbal ru'.
Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, re' hin nik'or je aweh tak chi ma̱ban tak chi ru̱c' achi̱' ena'n tak ricuse'sjic jeno' c'acharel eh chi ru̱c' wo' chic achi̱' tak ena'n tak risihtjic.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' no'jbal re're' ma' riban ta chi enwih'ic awu̱c' tak, je' ricab nok chi ma' eta riban chi chipam i jenaj chi rasbal ha' enelic cho sak laj ha' eh chi ar ta wo' chic enelic cho i ch'uwa' laj ha'.

Je' wo' chic, ma' eta wo' riban chi re' riche'lal cak' eriwachej cho rum, on re' riche'lal u̱wa eriwachej cho cak'. Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, re' nc'uluric ru̱c' i ka̱k' je' wo' ricab nc'uluric cu̱c' take wach i che̱' re're', on je' wo' ricab nc'uluric cu̱c' take rasbal jeno' ha' chi ma' eta wo' riban chi enelic cho sak laj ha' eh chiri̱j chic ru' ewo' chic nelic cho i ch'uwa' laj ha' chipam.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, xa hab wach rik'or chi ar ru̱c' i Dios nchalic rino'jbal, curman wo' chi reh chi eric'uhtaj lok ru̱c' take ribano̱j chi til coric chi je' wo' re'. Re' c'acharel re're' curman wo' chi chak'lam ok ru̱c' rino'jbal eh ma' rinimsaj ri̱b. Je' ok re' chiban c'uhtbal lok reh chi re' no'jbal ar ru̱c' i Dios nchalic.

Raj nchel wi re' c'acharel riyew k'ab chi re' ixowonic njot'bic reh ricapew-bal chi yojoj c'uxlis, re're' xa nimsinic i̱b c'ahchi' ribanam ru̱c' rik'ormojic chi re' rino'jbal ar nchalic ru̱c' i Dios. Ru̱c' re're' ma' c'ahchi' ta rik'orom i coric, xa chucuj laj k'oric la' riban

maj re' rino'jbal ru' ma' re' ta ru̱c' i Dios nchalic, re' la' i no'jbal wilic ru̱c', xa je' ricab rino'jbal jeno' xa hab wach c'acharel ma' re' ta aj niminel eh re' rino'jbal ru' ru̱c' wo' aj Yahm nchalic.

Nik'or chi je' re' maj re' wilic wi̱' i ixowonic i̱b ch'i̱l wo' i yojoj c'uxlis, ra̱j rik'orom chi re' take c'acharel ma' wilque̱b ta pan jenaj sukquil laj c'uxlis chi quibil qui̱b eh xa na̱ ru' c'ahbilal i quibano̱j take re'.

Raj la' xa hab wach c'acharel re' ar ru̱c' i Dios nchalic rino'jbal, re' take wili no'jbal nc'uhtunic ru̱c': Wilic jenaj sak wach no'jbal ru̱c', c'acharic riban pan sukquil c'uxlis cu̱c' take rich c'acharel, wilic richak'lamil eh ma' cow ta wo' na̱ reh take pa' bih. Je' wo', re're' k'e̱' riquetelej quiwach take rich c'acharel eh q'uihal take riholohic laj bano̱j wilic. Je' wo' chic, re're' xa jenaj wach ric'ux eh til coric wach rino'jbal.

Je' re' ajic, re' k'oric wili chiri̱j i no'jbal re' ar ru̱c' i Dios nchalic nicohlaj ru̱c' rik'ormojic ru̱c' take k'oric wili: Re' c'acharel re' nc'acharic pan sukquil c'uxlis cu̱c' take rich c'acharel, pan sukquil c'uxlis wo' riban take ribano̱j re' nc'utunic wi̱' chi coric wach ric'ux.

Yu'na re' chic i wili nwa̱j k'oric chiri̱j chi je' wili: Chaj wo' wa'ric wilic peletenic, je' wo' take k'ak'anic chaxilac tak nok nacapaj tak? Re' take c'ahbilal laj no'jbal re're' ar nchalic pan awa̱mna tak re' wilic cho wi̱' i c'ahbilal nawotowej tak ribanaric.

Ru'um aj reh c'ahbilal laj no'jbal re're' nok re' hat-tak nac'ax tak wach jeno' xa chaj bih jaric wilic ayu' wach ac'al eh nanawilow chi ma' nwih'ic ta wo' aweh tak, je' wili nc'uluric awu̱c' tak: Re' hat-tak nanawilow tak chi ma' nwih'ic ta aweh tak re' wilic reh i jenaj chic c'acharel, nchalic ixowonic pan awa̱mna tak, cu rehtal toquic tak chi peletenic eh je' wo' chi cansanic ru'um. To̱b ta wo' je' re' na'n tak xa ta nak chi je' re' narak tak i haj wilic nac'ax tak wach maj ma' napahkaj ta tak reh Dios.

Wilic wo' nak pech napahkaj tak johtok reh Dios chi nariyeb cho aweh i chaj bih nawa̱j tak, xa re' la' ma' riyew ta cho aweh tak maj re' hat-tak xa reh ye'bal chi suk ati'jolal abakil tak nawa̱j tak wi̱' i napahkaj tak reh.

Re' hat-tak c'acharel re' ma' xa re' ta Dios wilic chawach tak je' ricab riban jeno' winak chi nkajic pan c'oyomal ru'um chi ma' xa re' ta i rehq'ue̱n wilic chiwach, chabiraj tak chi coric i nanik'orom wili: Re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi coric chi nok nawa̱j tak ribanaric i no'jbal nca'n take c'acharel aj ayu' wach ac'al re' quixowonic reh i Dios, re' hat-tak nacoj wo' tak awi̱b chiwach i Dios chi raj ixowonel. Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi re' take c'acharel nca̱j ca'nam i no'jbal nca'n take aj ayu' wach ac'al re' quixowonic reh i Dios, re' take c'acharel re're' nquicoj qui̱b chi raj ixowonel i Dios take.

Nik'or chi je' re' maj re' Dios ric'raj reh je' ricab ric'raj jeno' winak riban caxa̱ra chi xa re' wach i rehq'ue̱n ti' ric'raj. Je' wili rik'or chiri̱j ru' ar chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' i riC'uhbal i Dios: “Re' Dios riban chi re' Lok' laj Uxlabal enc'acharic ku̱c' i hoj aj niminel reh Jesus eh re' rUxlabal re're' til k'e̱' ra̱j chi xa re' wach i Dios ti' nakic'ram, nqui rik'or.

Je' re' k'uru' re' Dios ric'uhtaj richak'lamil queh take ma' nquinimsaj ta qui̱b chiwach eh k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal richak'lamil riban cu̱c' je' ricab rik'or chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' i riC'uhbal i Dios. Ar je' wili rik'or: “Re' Dios ric'uhtaj rijosk'il chi quina̱ take c'acharel re' nquinimsaj qui̱b, raj la' chi quina̱ take c'acharel re' xa ch'u̱b ti quiwach, re're' ric'uhtaj cho richak'lamil chi quina̱, nqui rik'or.

Je' re' k'uru' tiniminok tak chiwach i Dios eh ma̱c'am tak na̱ pa' bih no'jbal ricoj aj Yahm pan acapew-bal tak, chak'ihtaj la' tak awi̱b chi riye'eric pan ac'al i rajawric reh chi je' re' etiricana̱' tak.

Je' wo' chic, chajunehtej awi̱b tak ru̱c' i Dios eh re're' erijunehtej wo' cho ri̱b awu̱c' tak. Raj nchel hat-tak aj mahc, chacoj tak rehtal i wili: Chacana̱' tak ribanjic i c'ahbilal. Re' hat-tak re' quib ac'ux tak, chawesaj tak lok pan awa̱mna tak i no'jbal re're' eh chasakbej wach awa̱mna tak.

Je' wo', re' hat-tak aj mahc ch'i̱l xa quib wach ac'ux tak, chapahkaj cuybal amahc tak chi c'ahchi' ayot'om ac'ux tak ru'um amahc tak. Ti'bok ac'ux tak eh chayot' wo' ac'ux tak ru̱c' ok'ic. Re' awih'ic tak chi xa se'el awach tak mikrok ta nak chi ok'ic eh re' risukquil ac'ux tak mikrok ta nak chi ntz'iric laj c'uxlis.
Je' re' ajic chach'ubsaj wach ano'jbal tak chiwach i kAja̱w eh re're' erijohsaj wach awa'ric tak.

Hat-tak was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel reh Jesus, ma̱tz'uj tak jeno' awich c'acharel tak maj re' ritz'uj i ras richa̱k' on rich'uk k'oric china̱ jeno' ras richa̱k', re' aj niminel re're' c'ahchi' rik'ebem riwa'ric i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eh c'ahchi' wo' riq'uic k'e̱' china̱ i c'uhbal re're'. Ma̱ban tak je' re', re' la' cha'n tak chac'am tak na̱ i c'uhbal re're' chi coric.

Re' hat-tak k'uru' ma'xta awa'ric tak chi rich'ukuric k'oric china̱ awas acha̱k' tak, xa re' la' wo' Dios wilic rajawric chi ribanaric re're' maj xa re' wo' re' wilic chi aj ch'ukul wach i mahc eh xa re' wo' re' k'orel wi etirico'lej on erik'or chi enye'eric ti'c'axic chana̱ tak ru'um reh amahc tak.

Chaxilac hat-tak wilic take quik'oric chi je' wili: «Chiwach i k'i̱j wili on reh k'i̱j reh ikal nakojic chipam jenaj chic tinamit. Ar nakac'acharic chiwach jenaj ha̱b. Ar wo' naka'nam kayac reh chi ar naka'nam canar q'uih katz'a̱k, nqui nquik'or. Re' hat-tak re' je' re' nak'or tak chabiraj tak i wili:

Ma̱k'or tak chic chi je' re' maj ma' aweht'alim ta wo' tak chaj bih naric'uluric ikal. Je' re' nik'or maj re' kac'acharic chi'nchel i hoj xa je' na ricab riwi̱' i su̱tz' maj chawil ru', to̱b ta nak cu re' wo' ti c'ahchi' awilom tak wach eh pa̱m junc'am chic nsahchic wo' ti wach.

Re' cok haj wilic i ricorquilal k'oric raj chi na̱banam tak, re' i wili: «Wi la' re' kAja̱w ra̱j chi cu wilic chic so' kac'acharic, ar nakawih'ic ponok eh chi je' re' na wo' ka'nam ribanaric take pa' bih nkacapaj chi naka'nam, tiquirok tak.

Je' nak re' ru' ra̱j banaric xa re' la' hat-tak re' chic i wili na'n tak: Re' hat-tak ma' re' ta ru̱c' ch'ublic wach c'uxlis tik'oric tak chiri̱j i pa' bih nawa̱j abanam tak, xa nanimsaj la' chic awi̱b tak ru̱c' i k'oric na'n tak. Til nik'or aweh tak chi re' take no'jbal chi nimsinic i̱b, re're' ma' holohic ta nech' ok chi banaric.

Je' re' ajic cha'n tak i coric wach no'jbal maj re' xa hab wach c'acharel re' reht'alim ribanaric haj wilic i coric laj no'jbal, xa re' la' ru' ma' riban ta i haj wilic reht'al chi coric chi banaric, re' c'acharel re're' nmahcanic chiwach i kAja̱w.

Yu'na chawi̱j chic hat-tak bihomak re' ma' re' ta hat-tak aj niminel nwa̱j k'oric. Je' nok chabiraj tak i wili: Ti'bok ac'ux tak eh chayot' wo' ac'ux tak chi ok'ic maj jenaj ti'c'axic chalic reh chana̱ tak.
Re' nic' pa' nimal wilic aweh tak narisahchic wach. Je' ricab re' aso' tak naric'uxuric ru'um take ric'oyil tz'ih.

Je' wo', re' atumi̱n tak ru'um chi ma' nacoj ta tak chi quitobjic take awas acha̱k' tak narimu'kric wach. Re' mu'k re're' naricamanic chi c'uhtbal lok reh chi re' hat-tak xa aweh tak abihomal c'ahchi' amolom tak wach chipam take cohlsbal wach i k'i̱j wili eh ru'um chi je' re' naponok rik'ijil nachik'at k'oric i Dios chi quina̱ chi'nchel c'acharel, narichalic chana̱ tak jenaj nim laj ti'c'axic re' naribanam chi enawic'raj tak chi xa je' chic ricab nok re' k'a̱k' c'ahchi' ric'atam ati'jolal tak.

Je' re' k'uru' re' hat-tak bihomak ticapewenok wo' tak ru̱c' i wili: Re' hat-tak ma' xatoj ta tak ritz'akil quicamaj take awaj camanom tak re' xisic'bic wach atic pan awac'a̱l tak. Ru'um chi xawa̱j tak awelk'am take, re' Dios re' k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal rajawric xibiraj cho amahc tak c'ahchi' quicojom cok chiwach ru'.

Ma' xa ru'um ta re're' narichalic rinimal i ti'c'axic chana̱ tak, je' la' wo' ru'um take wili: Ayu' wach ac'al re' hat-tak xatc'acharic tak chi suk, xa'n wo' tak i ra̱j ma' raj ta banaric. Ru'um aj reh suk laj c'acharic wilca̱t tak wi̱', narichalic chana̱ tak i ti'c'axic chi ma' re' ta so' wilic pan ac'ux tak je' ricab nc'uluric cu̱c' take wacax nok xa k'ena' chic take, xa nic' yu' ti quic'amaric je pan cansbal chicop.

Je' wo' chic chana̱ hat-tak narichalic i ti'c'axic maj awu'um aweh hat-tak nok wilca̱t tak chi quiwach take aj ch'ukul wach mahc chi rich'ukuric k'oric chi quina̱ take c'acharel ma'xta nech' ok quimahc, quicansjic je awu'um tak. Chiwach chi'nchel re're', nacapaj na tak nchel chi re' Dios xa suk erilow cho ano'jbal tak re're'? Ma'xta, ma' je ta re'!

Hat-tak was nicha̱k' aj niminel, wih'ok awuyu'nbal tak cu rehtal cho ric'ulic lok i kAja̱w Jesus. Chacoj tak rehtal chi je' ricab nok jeno' winak aj banol abi̱x nwih'ic wo' ruyu'nbal chi nchalic i k'elej laj jab eh je' wo' nwih'ic ruyu'nbal cu rehtal nponic rik'ijil chi narisiq'uim i wach i lok' laj ritic, je' wo' re' cha'n hat-tak,
wih'ok wo' awuyu'nbal tak eh chacowsaj ac'ux tak chipam animinic tak maj re' kAja̱w Jesus xa ma' naht ta chic wilic cho rik'ijil risoljic.

Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel reh Jesus, ma̱cojlom amahc chi awibil awi̱b tak reh chi re' Dios ma' eta wo' ricoj amahc tak. Ma̱ban tak je' re' maj xa jenaj wo' i c'acharel til manlic wach chi aj ch'ukul k'oric eh re' c'acharel re're', re' i Jesus. Re're' q'uisi̱n ma' nc'ulic lok je' ricab riban jeno' c'acharel xa oquic chic cok reh chi' pa̱t chi ula'anic.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, cha'n wo' tak aweh je' ricab i no'jbal xca'n cho take aj k'orol c'uhbal najtir k'i̱j re' xik'oric cho reh take k'oric rik'orom cho i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s. Je' re' cha'n tak maj re' take re' ru̱c' k'uni̱l xquicuy ransil ti'c'axic xchalic chi quina̱.

Kacoj tak rehtal i k'oric nka'n chiqui̱j take xicuybic cho ransil i ti'c'axic. Re' hoj nkak'or chi re' take re' k'e̱' ato̱b queh maje'? Je' wo' re' hat-tak abiram tak chiri̱j i ti'c'axic xic'ul i ma' Jow eh nic' wach ricuyuric xiban. Aweht'alim wo' tak nic' wach ricuse'sjic xbanjic ru'um i Dios nok iq'uinak chic pan ti'c'axic. Je' re' k'oric niban maj re' kAja̱w til k'e̱' wo' chic ato̱b eh aj quetelenel wachi̱s wo'.

Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, cha'n tak je' ricab quino'jbal take c'acharel re're' eh je' wo' i no'jbal wili re' k'e̱' wo' chic curman chi banaric: Nok re' hat-tak xa re' wo' i coric nawa̱j ak'orom tak, ma̱k'or tak chi je' wili: «Wi ma' coric i c'ahchi' nik'orom, re' ok i kAja̱w Dios wilic ar pan taxa̱j chiyew cho ti'c'axic chi nina̱ on ma' je' re', re' ok take aj ch'ukul wach mahc ayu' wach ac'al quiye'bok wo' ti'c'axic chi nina̱, ma' nqui ta na nak'or tak.
Xa hab wach aweh tak wilic ti'c'axic china̱ niyew rino'jbal chi chiban riti̱j chiwach i Dios eh xa hab wach xa suk chic pa ric'ux, niyew wo' rino'jbal chi chiyew johtok rilok'il i Dios ru̱c' bi̱ch.

Wi wilic jeno' yowa̱b chaxilac tak re' wili no'jbal niyew reh: Chiyuk'ej take quinahsil i comonil moloj wach aj niminel eh naquiponok ru̱c', ca'n quiti̱j china̱. Je' wo' quibuch' pan yolic laj ik'o̱m chi c'ahchi' quipahkam reh Lok' laj Ajabe̱s i to'bal reh yowa̱b re're'.

Til nik'or aweh tak, chi re're' naribanam chi re' yowa̱b enuctic cho chi ma'xta chic riya'bilal, re' cok ru' reh chi je' re' enc'uluric ru̱c' i yowa̱b re're', curman chi re' take aj nahsil enca'n quiti̱j chi ch'iclic quic'ux chi re' Lok' laj Ajabe̱s wilic rajawric chi resmejic riya'bilal i c'acharel re're'. Wi je' re' enca'n, ma' xa ta re're' enc'uluric ru̱c' i yowa̱b re're', je' la' wo' wi re're' ribanam jeno' mahc, ewo' ncuyuric rimahc wi chipam i junc'am re're' eripahkaj wo' ricuybal.

Je' re' ajic til curman chi chayew tak chi eht'aljic chawach tak chaj bih xatmahcanic tak wi̱' eh je' wo' cha'n wo' tak ati̱j. Wi re' hat-tak c'ul na'n tak ati̱j chawi̱j chawibil awi̱b tak, wi wilic jeno' hab wach wilic riya'bilal chaxilac tak encowjic. Je' re' nik'or ru'um nok re' quiti̱j take aj niminel coric wach quic'ux k'e̱' wo' chic nim wach camanic riban.

Kacoj tak rehtal i jenaj tijbal wili chiri̱j nic' wach ncamanic i banoj ti̱j: Re' aj najtir k'i̱j re' ma' Eli̱yas ribihnal xa winak wo' je' kacab i hoj, xa re' la' re're' naxiban riti̱j ru̱c' chi'nchel ric'ux reh chi ma'xta chic ribanam i jab, ma' xkajic ta wo' chic cho i jab wach ac'al chiwach i xib ha̱b ru̱c' waki̱b poh.

Nok iq'uinak chic lok rik'ijil re're', xiban wo' chic johtok riti̱j chi narikajic wo' chic cho jab eh naxiban wo' chic i jab cu re' aj wo' chic ru' xwachanic chi'nchel nic' pa' nimal take tic wilic wach ac'al.

Hat-tak was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel reh Jesus, kak'or wi hab wach jeno' chaxilac tak ricana̱' rinimjic i coric laj c'uhtunic re' wilco̱j wi̱' ru'um reh mahcanic eh wilic jenaj chic chaxilac tak riban chi re' c'acharel re're' ewo' chic ritik ju' riniminic,

charak tak chiri̱j chi ru̱c' ribanaric chi re' rich aj niminel ricana̱' i mahcanic, xiban wo' chi xcuyuric chi'nchel nic' pa' nimal rimahc wilic eh je' wo' chic, xco'ljic chi ma'xta riquimic chi junpech naquimok je.

Re' hin ma' Luch, hin c'ahchi' nitz'ihminic reh i hu̱j wili. Re' hin wilic wajawric chi ritz'ihmjic i hu̱j wili ru'um nok hin pahbamaj chi aj k'orol ribiral i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' re' ajic aweh hat-tak aj niminel re' xapuhcaj awi̱b tak chipam atinami̱t tak, c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je hu̱j wili xa pa' yuk'ul wilca̱t tak ponok chi c'acharic, je' ricab ar pa riyuk'ul i Po̱nto, pa riyuk'ul i Cala̱sya, pa riyuk'ul i Caparo̱sya, pa riyuk'ul i A̱sya ch'i̱l wo' pa riyuk'ul i Witi̱nya.

Aweh hat-tak chawunchelal tak c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je hu̱j wili maj re' hat-tak wilca̱t tak chic chi ritinami̱t i Dios. Je' re' xa̱j i Dios chawi̱j tak eh ru'um re' xichih cho awach tak chi xatwih'ic tak chi ritinami̱t. Je' wo' chic re' Lok' laj Uxlabal xiban chi xayew ac'ux tak chi xatoquic tak chi ritinami̱t i Dios eh ru'um re' yu'na re' hat-tak nanimej tak chic i Dios. Re' chic chiri̱j riquimic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric nwa̱j nik'orom chi re' riquimic ru', re're' xbanic chi xcuyuric amahc tak je' ricab chi re' riquiq'ue̱l i me̱' xk'ahsjic cho chi si̱ chiwach i Dios xesaj lok quimahc take c'acharel naxquihrjic cho chi quina̱. Chiri̱j chic rik'ormojic lok re're', re' wili niti̱j niban yu'na chawi̱j tak: Re' ta nak i kAja̱w Dios chac'uhtaj chi k'e̱' wo' chic chak'lamil awu̱c' tak eh re' wo' ye'bok rinimal wach risukquil ac'ux tak.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, kayew tak rilok'il i Ajabe̱s Dios re' rAja̱w i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' re' nik'or chi ka'n tak ru'um reh rinimal wach quetelenic wachi̱s xic'uhtaj cho ku̱c' naxiban chi re' Jesus xip'ut johtok jenaj chic ac' c'acharic naxuctic wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak je' ricab nanc'ulic wach sakom jeno' ha'lac'un jenaj chic ac' c'acharel rip'ut johtok c'acharic. Nic' pa' wach nc'uluric re're' je' wo' re' xkac'ul i hoj, re' Dios xiyew wo' k'ab keh hoj chi xkarak jenaj chic ac' laj c'acharic chi junelic. Ru'um aj re' yu'na til ch'iclic kac'ux c'ahchi' kuy'em i k'i̱j nok re' c'acharic re're' naka'nam risukquil chi coric.

Je' re' nok je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' i co̱ch ritik'a̱' lok wach jeno' ajabe̱s chi naquic'ulum take riha'lac'u̱n, je' wo' re' xiban i Dios chi xiyew keh i hoj i junelic c'acharic chi jenaj kaco̱ch. Nok riyeb chic keh chi nakac'acharic chi junelic, re' hoj ma' eta chic nsahchic kawach, ma' eta wo' chic nka'n i mahc eh ma' wo' jalaric ta chic ra̱j wach kac'acharic chi junelic. Je' re' ajic til nariye'eric keh i kaco̱ch xa re' la' re' Dios xitik'a̱' wach chi cu re' nok wilco̱j chic ar pan taxa̱j nakac'ul

eh ru'um chi ch'iclic ac'ux tak chiri̱j, re' Dios yu'na xa c'ahchi' wo' ricojom i rajawric chi aco'ljic tak. Je' wo' xa naritikim wo' ju' ribanaric chi je' re' cu rehtal cho rik'ijil i cohlsbal wach take k'i̱j re' tiklic chic cho wach chi nakilom wi̱' chi manlic i co'lonic naribanam i Dios ku̱c' hoj chi'nchel aj niminel reh.

Ru'um aj re', re' wili riwi̱' chi re' hat-tak narisukbic wi̱' ac'ux tak. Coric ru', chipam i rik'ijil wili q'uihal take ti'c'axic nwih'ic chana̱ tak xa re' la', re' take re' ma'xta riwih'ic chana̱ tak chi junpech eh je' re' nik'or maj re' riwi̱' chi chi'nchel re're' nchalic chana̱ tak yu'na re' chi curman chaweh tak chi je' re' nac'ul tak

je' ricab nok curman chi re' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' niq'uic pan k'a̱k' niq'uinbal reh. Wi je' re' nc'uluric ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' ilbal reh ritz'akil to̱b ta nchel nariponic i k'i̱j chi ma' eta chic ncamanic, til wo' k'e̱' curman chaweh tak chi re' Dios eripaj nic' wach rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak c'ahchi'ca̱t tak chiri̱j. Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab chi re' ch'ihch' re're' wilic ritz'akil je' wo' chiwach i Dios til k'e̱' wo' ritz'akil rich'iquinjic ac'ux na'n tak chiri̱j ru'. Ru'um re', re' Dios tiripaj tak yu'na reh chi naponok rik'ijil na'ilmijok wo' chic wach i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, enk'ormojic chawi̱j tak chi k'e̱' holohic rich'iquinjic ac'ux xa'n tak chiri̱j i Dios eh ru̱c' re're' nariyeb wo' alok'il tak.

Coric ru', re' Jesus ma' janc'al ta awilom tak wach xa re' la' ru' to̱b ta wo' cu yu'na chi k'i̱j ma' janc'al ta awilom tak wach, re' hat-tak xach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiri̱j eh k'e̱' wo' ti' nawic'raj tak. Ma' xa ta re're', pan awa̱mna la' hat-tak yu'na nawic'raj tak i sukquil c'uxlis re' ma' pajoj ta wo' chic rik'ormojic. Je' re' nawic'raj tak
maj abiram tak chic i wili chi ru'um i rich'iquinjic ac'ux xa'n tak chiri̱j i Jesus nariye'eric aweh tak chi etico'ljic tak chi manlic ru'um i Dios naponok i rik'ijil reh cohlsbal wach chi'nchel.

Re' k'oro̱j wili chiri̱j i co'lbal riyew i Dios ru'um reh richak'lamil, xa nok wo' k'oro̱j cho ribiral cu'um take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios. Re' take re' naxik'oric cho chiri̱j i co'lbal re're' pe̱t xquiyew quic'ux chi ritijiljic ri̱j chi coric

jaruj enc'uluric take ti'c'axic naribanjic reh i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' wo' xquitijej ri̱j hab wach i pahbamaj re're'. Je' aj re' xca'n maj chiri̱j i pahbamaj re're' nk'oric i Lok' laj Uxlabal nanwih'ic cu̱c' take aj k'orol re're' chi rik'ormojic queh chiri̱j take ti'c'axic naric'ulum i pahbamaj re're' eh je' wo' nk'oric chiri̱j i lok'il nariye'eric wo' reh pahbamaj re're' nok ric'ulum chic take ti'c'axic k'oro̱j chi naric'ulum.

Ru'um reh i tijinic xca'n take aj k'oro̱l re're', re' Dios xic'uhtaj queh chi coric re' haj wilic i k'oro̱j cho chiri̱j i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Re' xk'ormojic aj chiri̱j re're', ma' xc'uluric ta chic chiwach quik'ijil take c'acharel xic'acharic chipam i rik'ijil re're', xc'uluric la' pan jenaj chic rik'ijil eh yu'na c'ahchi' rik'ormojic ribiral cu'um take quik'oric ribiral i lok' laj k'oric reh co'lbal i̱b chi ye'o̱j quik'orbal ru̱c' rajawric i Lok' laj Uxlabal re' tak'amaj cho cu pan taxa̱j. Re' k'oric nbirmijic chiri̱j i k'oro̱j wili til k'e̱' wo' chic holonquilal chi re' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios ar pan taxa̱j xa xca̱j nak chic rirakmajic chiri̱j nic' pa' nimal k'oro̱j cho re're'.

Ru'um chi chipam rik'ijil wilco̱j wi̱' wili c'ahchi' ric'uluric i k'oro̱j cho cu'um take aj k'orol cho reh rik'orbal i Dios, re' hin nipahkaj aweh tak chi chatik'a̱' awi̱b tak chi rirakmajic chiri̱j i k'oro̱j aweh tak je' ricab nok jeno' winak naritik'a̱' ri̱b ribac' riwe̱x chi coric. Cu rehtal aj nmanlajic wach i naribanam i Dios ru'um chi ti' tiric'raj tak, chapahba̱' ac'ux tak chi ruyu'njic. Re' aj wili naribanam i Dios: Re're' naribanam chi na'ilmijok wo' chic wach i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric re' hat-tak etico'ljic tak chi junpech ru'um.

Je' re' nok ru'um chi hat-tak chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios, curman chi na̱banam tak je' ricab riban i ac'unbe̱s re' rinimej i raja̱w. Til nipahkaj aweh tak k'uru' chi ma̱yew ac'ux tak chiri̱j ribanaric i c'ahbilal je' ricab xa'n tak cho najtir k'i̱j ru'um chi ma' ana'bem ta nak tak chiri̱j ribiral i Dios.

Re' chic yu'na chi wilca̱t tak chic chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios ru'um i yuk'unic xiban aweh tak, riwi̱' chaweh tak chi na̱wih'ic tak chi coric ok wach ano'jbal je' ricab i rino'jbal ru' chi lo̱k' wo'.

Je' re' nik'or maj je' wo' re' tz'ihmbimaj chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' i riC'uhbal i Dios re' k'oro̱j wi̱' chi je' wili: “Coric ok wach ano'jbal tak maj re' hin xa coric wo' wach nino'jbal, nqui k'oro̱j cho.

Ru'um chi re' hat-tak nana'n ati̱j tak nak'or tak johtok reh Dios chi re're' awAja̱w tak, re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi je' wili: Re' k'orel nic' pa' wach bano̱j ca'nam take c'acharel, re' wo' re' rich'ukuric quimahc naribanam chi quiju'junal maj re' Dios ma' richih ta quiwach take c'acharel narich'ukum k'oric china̱ quimahc. Ru'um aj re' curman chaweh tak chi cu rehtal riponic wach ac'acharic tak ayu' wach ac'al, chayohbalej wach i Dios chi c'ahchi' ayeb tak rilok'il chi coric pan ac'acharic tak.

Je' re' nipahkaj aweh tak chi na̱banam tak ru'um chi aweht'alim tak chic chi xatco'ljic tak cho chiwach i c'acharic nbanaric cho najtir k'i̱j, re' to̱b ta nak xa ma'xta cho ricorquilal xa xcanabjic wo' cahnok aweh tak cu'um atu̱t awaja̱w tak. Ma' xa re' ta re', aweht'alim la' wo' tak chi re' aco'lbal tak re're', ma' xarak ta tak xa ru̱c' ta nak nchel take xa pa' bih jaric re' ru̱c' xa sahchel wo' wach, je' ricab i k'an woric laj ch'ihch' on re' sak laj ch'ihch',

re' la' aco'ljic tak xbanaric xa ru̱c' i lok' laj quic' re' k'e̱' wo' chic ritz'akil chiwach quitz'akil take ch'ihch' re're'. Nik'or chi je' re' maj ru̱c' i riquiq'ue̱l i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xrakmajic i co'lbal aweh tak. Til pa ricorquil, re' Jesus xichihcaj riquiq'ue̱l chiki̱j chi ma' xiban ta jeno' mahc. Chi je' re', ru̱c' re're' xc'uluric je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' i jenaj me̱' nank'ahsjic chi si̱ chiwach i Dios chi curman chi reh chi ma'xta jeno' ya'bilal pa riti'jolal ribakil.

Je' re' k'uru' ru̱c' riquimic i Jesus re' Dios xatrico'lej tak chiwach c'ahbil laj c'acharic xa'n tak cho najtir k'i̱j. Re' quimic xic'ul i Jesus xa nok wo' tik'imaj cho wach ru'um i Dios nok cu ja' tik'imaj ta wo' cho wach ac'al wili xa re' la' ma' xc'uluric ta nok ma' ja' xta bih tik'imaj cho. Ru'um aj reh ric'axbal i Dios wilic chana̱ tak, xiban cho chi cu re' xc'uluric chiwach take k'i̱j wilco̱j wi̱' yu'na, re' narichalic wi̱' jenaj k'i̱j narojic manlajok wi̱' wach chi'nchel xc'ulic riban i Jesus chi kaco'ljic ayu' wach ac'al.

Ru'um aj xabiraj tak chi xiban i Jesus, re' hat-tak yu'na k'uru' ch'iclic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Dios. Ma' xa ru'um ta re' ch'iclic ac'ux tak, je' la' wo' ru'um chi re' Jesus xucsjic cho chi quixilac take camnak re' hat-tak ch'iclic wo' ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Dios chi re're' naca̱t wo' tak rucsam cho chi quixilac take camnak. Je' wo' chic, ru'um chi re' Dios xiyew rinimal rilok'il i Jesus naxponic wo' chic ar pan taxa̱j, yu'na re' hat-tak c'ahchi' wo' awuy'em tak i k'i̱j naye'erok wo' alok'il tak.

Nok re' hat-tak ru̱c' rito'bal i Lok' laj Uxlabal xac'ul tak i coric wilic chipam i riC'uhbal i Dios, xye'eric wo' aweh tak ru'um i Dios chi xatcahnic tak chi sak chic wach awa̱mna tak eh ru̱c' re're' xye'eric wo' aweh tak chi nachac'ax awi̱b tak ru̱c' ok chi'nchel awa̱mna tak chac'uhtaj tak i coric laj c'axoj i̱b cu̱c' awich aj niminel tak. Chi je' aj re' chi saksamaj chic wach awa̱mna tak chac'ax awi̱b chawibil awi̱b tak.

Re' hin niban i tak'anic re're' maj je' ricab nanasjic jeno' t'uch ha'lac'un np'uhtic jenaj chic c'acharic, je' wo' re' hat-tak xye'eric wo' aweh tak jenaj chic ac' ac'acharic tak. Re' c'acharic re're' ma' je' ta ricab i c'acharic re' xa nic' yu' ensahchic wach ru'um chi xa tiwic wo' ti take katu̱t kaja̱w re' xiye'bic kac'acharic, ra̱j la' i c'acharic re're' ma' jaruj ta sahchel wach maj re' Dios xye'bic aweh naxacoj tak wach rik'orbal eh chiwach ru' re' pa' bih rik'orbal riyeb xa ewo' nwih'ic eh xa ewo' nc'acharic chi junelic

je' ricab rik'or i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal. Ar je' wili rik'or: “Re' quic'acharic take chi'nchel c'acharel je' ricab i q'uiche̱' maj re' quiwa'ric xa nsahchic wo' wach je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' rixmac'al take q'uiche̱' chi quik'ehbic wo' ti naquichikic take xak.

Ra̱j la' i k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios xa chi junelic wo' wilic, nqui rik'or. Re' k'oro̱j cho re're' ru'um i Dios, re' wo' re' i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus. Re' c'uhbal re're' ric'am cho sukquil c'uxlis queh take quic'ulbic reh.

Ru'um chi xye'eric chic aweh tak chi na̱c'acharic tak chi junelic, re' hin nipahkaj aweh tak chi chak'eb lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak take chi'nchel ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal, chi'nchel jot'oj i̱b, take cakcatil ru'um ric'axaric wach xa chajaric wilic reh jeno', take qui̱b wach c'uxlis eh ch'i̱l wo' take tz'uju̱j i̱b.

Je' wo' chic, je' ricab chi re' jeno' t'uch ha'lac'un re' cu re' ti xasjic cho, xa re' wach ri̱s ch'u̱ch' re' ma' cojo̱j ta ha' ru̱c' rotowej cho, je' wo' re' cha'n hat-tak chawotowej tak ritijiljic ri̱j i riC'uhbal i Dios je' ricab riban i t'uch ha'lac'un ru̱c' i ri̱s rich'u̱ch' i ritu̱t. Re' cok ru' curman chi re' c'uhbal re're' ma' hab wach njopbic wach reh chi yu'na johtok chi kawach cu rehtal rimanlajic wach aco'ljic tak chi junpech xa c'ahchi' ok wo' atikim tak ju' ricowsjic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Dios.
Je' re' cha'n tak k'uru' maj re' hat-tak til xawilow tak chic pan ac'acharic chi re' Dios k'e̱' chak'lam je' re' rik'or chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios.

Re' hin nipahkaj wo' chic aweh tak chi chajil tak cok awi̱b ru̱c' i Jesus re' c'achlic chi junelic. Til coric, ru̱c' i Jesus nc'uluric je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' i abaj cojo̱j nak chi tik'inbal jeno' pa̱t. Je' ricab nok chi ru̱c' abaj re're' wilic take c'acharel ma' nca̱j ta quicojom chi tik'inbal jeno' pa̱t je' wo' re' nc'ulmujic ru̱c' i Jesus, wilic take c'acharel ma' nca̱j ta quic'ulum chi naquinimem. Re' cok ru' to̱b ta wo' wilic take c'acharel je' re' nca'n, ru̱c' i Dios ma' je' ta re' nc'uluric maj re' la' xiban ru' xichih cho i Jesus reh chi enwih'ic rinimal rilok'il chiwach.
