Je' re' ajic ru'um chi xa nakac'acharic wo' je' ricab i Jesus re' xa c'achlic wo' chi junelic, re' hin nik'or wo' aweh tak chi je' ricab nok wilic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' hat-tak je' wo' acab tak i abaj cojo̱j chi tik'inbal reh jeno' pa̱t. Nik'or chi je' re' maj chawunchelal hat-tak wilca̱t tak chi quixilac take awich c'acharel chi enalok'ej tak wach i Dios ru̱c' rito'bal i Lok' laj Uxlabal je' ricab chi ar chipam i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios, nalok'ej tak wach. Je' re' ajic je' ricab nok re' aj k'ahsem si̱ wilic chi rik'ahsjic si̱ chiwach i Dios, je' wo' re' chi aju'junal hat-tak wilca̱t wo' tak chi lok' laj aj lok'onel wach i Dios. Re' lok'onic re're', re' chic i Lok' laj Uxlabal nto'bonic aweh tak chi riye'eric chiwach i Dios eh nana'n tak natilok'onic, re' Dios ric'ul cho ru'um chi hat-tak chic aj niminel reh Jesus.

Je' re' nik'or maj re're' k'e̱' lo̱k' riwa'ric je' ricab rik'or chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' i riC'uhbal i Dios. Ar je' wili rik'or: “Chacoj tak rehtal i wili: Je' ricab nok re' caj tz'u'c laj ma' laj abaj ncamanic chi ch'iquinbal cho reh pa̱t, re' hin nanibanam chi ar china̱ i yu̱k' “Siyon” ribihnal nanicojom i jenaj re' naribanic chi re' take c'acharel naquich'ica̱b quic'ux chiwi̱j. Re' nanicojom re're', nichiho̱j eh til k'e̱' lo̱k' riwa'ric chi niwach, nqui rik'or. Ru'um aj wo' re', je' wo' wili tz'ihmbimaj cho pan Lok' laj Hu̱j re're': “Xa hab wach narich'ica̱b ric'ux chiri̱j, ma' jaruj ta narojic chi k'e̱b i riniminic, nqui tz'ihmbimaj cho.

Je' aj re' ru' chaweh hat-tak re' tiniminic tak reh Jesus, k'e̱' lo̱k' riwi̱' chawach tak ru', raj la' chi queh take ma' quiniminic ta reh ma' je' ta re'. Ru'um aj re' cu̱c' take re' no̱j elok wach i tz'ihmbimaj cho pan Lok' laj Hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios narik'or chi je' wili: “Re' cajtz'u'c laj ma' laj abaj ma' cojo̱j ta pa riman cu'um take toco̱m chic aj tz'ako̱l, re' pe' chic re' xoquic chi pe̱t ma' laj abaj ch'iquinbal cho reh ricajtz'u'c i pa̱t wili, nqui rik'or.

Je' wo' chic, cu̱c' take re' no̱j wo' elok wach i jenaj chic k'oric wilic chipam i riC'uhbal i Dios re' rik'or chi je' wili: “Je' ricab nok jeno' c'acharel ricoj jeno' abaj k'etbal pa̱m quibe̱h take c'acharel chi enquitohxaj nah co̱k china̱, re' hin nanibanam wo' chi ar Siyon enwih'ic jeno' naribanam chi k'etbal reh quiniminic take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, nqui rik'or. Je' aj re' ru'um chi ma' nquic'ul ta riC'uhbal i Dios riban chi cu̱c' take c'acharel re're' nc'uluric i xitik'a̱' cho wach wili chi narichalic i ti'c'axic chi quina̱.

Raj la' awu̱c' tak ma' je' ta re' nc'uluric maj chiho̱j chic cho awach tak ru'um i Dios chi ritinami̱t. Je' wo' til wilic chic abiral tak chi hat-tak chic aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach eh k'e̱' alok'il tak chiwach. Je' wo', re're' xatrichih tak chi aj k'orol reh riholonquilal i bano̱j xiban awu̱c' tak naxatriyuk'ej tak cho chi na̱c'acharic tak chi sutumaj chic awi̱j tak ru̱c' riholonquilal risakomil i Dios. Re' sakom re're', re' wo' re' nsakomonic pa̱m acapew-bal tak reh chi je' re' ma' eta chic tic'acharic tak chipam rik'ekomil acapew-bal tak ric'am cho i c'ahbil laj c'acharic xa'n tak cho.

Je' re' ajic to̱b ta najtir cho k'i̱j ma' re' ta nak hat-tak ritinami̱t cho i Dios, yu'na hat-tak chic ritinami̱t. Chi je' chic re' awi̱' tak, ma' je' ta chic acab cho najtir chi ma'xta nak cho riquetelbal i Dios chana̱ tak, re' la' chic yu'na wilic chic riquetelbal i Dios chana̱ tak.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak, re' hat-tak ar wilca̱t tak ponok pan tak toco̱m chic tinamit re' ma' re' ta atinamital tak. Re' wilca̱t tak ponok ar k'uru', nipahkaj aweh tak chi ma̱yew tak k'ab chi wilic awu̱c' tak re' c'ahbilal nbanic chi nawotowej tak ribanaric i mahc eh re' npitbic aweh tak reh chi ma' eta na'n tak i coric laj bano̱j.

Je' wo', ru'um chi c'ahchi' ac'acharic tak chi quixilac take c'acharel re' ru̱c' ma' re' ta aj niminel reh Dios take, nipahkaj aweh tak chi xa coric ok wach tibanok tak to̱b ta yohbal wach take chucuj laj k'oric wilic take nquitz'ak chawi̱j tak maj chi queh ru', re' hat-tak xa je nchel ma' to̱b ta tibanic tak nanquik'or. Wi je' re' xa'n tak, re' take re' naquik'orom wo' chi xa coric wo' na'n tak nachalok i Dios chi rik'ataric k'oric chi quina̱ chi'nchel i tinamit.

Je' wo' chic, ru'um chi re' kAja̱w Jesus xipahba̱' take chi'nchel wilic cajawric chi tak'anic ayu' wach ac'al je' ricab nok wilic i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma, re' hin nipahkaj aweh tak chi tiniminok tak chi quiwach maj re' take re' wilque̱b chi nahsil chi kana̱ chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel ru'um i Dios.

Je' wo' re' ra̱j banaric chi quiwach take aj nahsil re' xipahba̱' take chi raj to'o̱l chi k'atal k'oric chipam take ju'jun chi yuk'ul. Re' take nahsil re're' wilque̱b wo' chi riye'eric tojbal wach mahc chi quina̱ take ma' holohic ta quibanic eh je' wo' chi naquic'axam take holohic quibanic.

Chaj wa'ric nanipahkaj aweh tak chi je' re'? Je' re' nipahkaj ru'um chi re' Dios ra̱j chi na̱banam tak i wili: Chi re' hat-tak ru̱c' ribanaric i holohic eh je' wo' chi ru̱c' i coric laj c'acharic, chatz'ap tak quichi̱' take tinamit re' ma' nquirak ta chiri̱j chaj bih nquik'or ru'um quimemil.

Je' re' k'uru' tic'acharok tak pan jenaj holohic laj c'acharic ru'um chi tehlic chic awi̱j tak, xa re' la' ma' nchel nacapaj tak chi ru'um chi tehlic chic awi̱j tak ra̱j rik'orom chi ye'o̱j k'ab aweh tak chi ribanaric i ma' holohic ta laj bano̱j. Ma'xta! Ma̱capaj tak chi je' re', re' la' cha'n tak tic'acharok tak chi hat-tak raj camanom i Dios.
Je' wo' chayew alok'il chawibil awi̱b tak, chac'ax tak take awich aj niminel, chayohbalej tak wach i Dios eh chayew wo' tak rilok'il i c'acharel nk'atbic k'oric chana̱ tak.

Yu'na aweh hat-tak je' ru̱c' wilca̱t tak chi mosahic chiwach jeno' ajabe̱s ehcham camanic, nik'or chi tiniminok tak chiwach eh wilic ok riwa'ric chawach tak, re' cok ru' ma' xa chi quiwach ta take ajabe̱s holohic quino'jbal eh ch'ublic ti wach quic'ux chi quetelenic na̱banam tak je' re', je' la' wo' re' cu̱c' take k'e̱' josk' laj ajabe̱s.

Nik'or chi je' re' maj re' ricuse'sbal i Dios naric'ulum i c'acharel re' ricana̱' ri̱b chi ric'ul i ti'c'axic to̱b ta pa ra̱mna reht'alim cho chi chiwach i Dios ma'xta jeno' rimahc re' ric'ul chi reh chi eric'ul i ti'c'axic re're'.

Raj la' i c'acharel nmahcanic ma' je' ta re' naric'ulum. Nik'or chi je' re' maj pa rimahc wo' naric'ulum i ti'c'axic. Je' re' nok to̱b ta nak chicuy i ti'c'axic, re' c'acharel re're' xa ma' eta wo' ric'ul ricuse'sbal i Dios, re' la' naric'ulbic reh, re' i c'acharel re' ric'ul i ti'c'axic ru'um chi coric wach nbanic.

Je' re' k'uru' to̱b ta nchel enac'ul tak i ti'c'axic, re' hat-tak cha'n tak i coric maj til re' wili riwi̱' chi xatyuk'unjic tak chi rinimjic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Re're' ru'um chi xiban i coric, xic'ul i ti'c'axic eh ru̱c' re're' xic'uhtaj aweh tak chaj bih ra̱j chi na̱banam tak. Cha'n aj tak k'uru' je' ricab xiban ru'
maj re're' ma' xmahcanic ta eh ma' janc'al ta wo' xbirmijic jeno' k'oric ru̱c' chi xa jot'bal ta nak quicapew-bal take c'acharel xiban.

Je' wo' chic naxic'ul take tz'ujuric cu'um take quixowonic wach, re're' ma' xic'u'lej ta wo' take ru̱c' tz'uju̱j on naxic'ul take ti'c'axic cu̱c' take c'acharel, ma' xicapaj ta wo' ribanjic rijelow-bal queh take xibanic reh, re' la' xiban xik'ahsaj pan k'ab i Dios re' nch'ukbic k'oric pa ricorquilal.

Je' wo' ru'um take ti'c'axic xic'ul, re' Jesus xiban chi xwih'ic chic i sukquil c'uxlis pan awa̱mna tak. Je' re' nik'or maj re're' naxiyew ri̱b chi quimic ar wach curu̱s, xiban chi re' hat-tak xcuyuric amahc tak. Ma' xa ta re're', yu'na je' ricab nanquimic jeno' c'acharel ncahnic chi ma' nmahcanic ta chic, je' wo' re' hat-tak xye'eric aweh tak ru'um Jesus chi etic'acharic tak chi ma' c'ahchi' ta abanam tak i mahc, re' la' chic i coric laj bano̱j c'ahchi' abanam tak.

Coric ru', najtir k'i̱j je' nak acab tak take cho sahchel me̱' re' quipuhcam qui̱b xa haj pa' ye'a̱b, raj yu'na xatsoljic wo' tak chic cho ru̱c' i kAja̱w Jesus re' ncha'janic je' wo' nilbic aweh tak chi coric je' ricab riban aj ilol me̱' chi rilow take eh richa'jej wo' take rime̱'.

Re' chic hat-tak ehq'uenbe̱s aj niminel reh Jesus, yu'na til nik'or aweh tak chi chanimej abahi̱l tak eh re' hat-tak re' wilic abahi̱l tak re' ru̱c' ma' re' ta aj niminel reh rik'orbal i Dios tiniminok wo' tak chi quiwach. Je' re' nik'or aweh tak chi cha'n tak maj wi je' re' na'n tak to̱b ta yu'na ma' nquinimej ta i rik'orbal i Dios nak'or tak queh, narich'ukic wo' quic'ux chi rinimjic ru'um i holohic laj no'jbal na'n tak.
Je' wo' wi je' re' na'n tak, naquilom chi xa sak wo' wach c'acharic na'n tak chi hat-tak aj niminel eh je' wo' chi c'ahchi' ayeb tak rilok'il i Dios.

Je' wo' chic hat-tak chi'nchel ehq'uenbe̱s aj niminel reh Jesus til nik'or wo' aweh tak chi re' axoyba̱l nacoj tak, ma' riban nchel chi xa chawi̱j tak wilic lok chi xa xoybal reh ati'jolal tak je' ricab chi xa holohic chic ritik'injic rixihiric wach ana̱ tak, re' ricojoric chawalak tak je' wo' ricojoric chaxiquin tak take k'an woric laj ch'ihch' tik'imaj chi xoybal eh je' wo' re' ricojoric take holohic laj tz'ih xa q'uih chic quitz'akil,

re' la' tare̱t chi re' holohic laj no'jbal nelic cho pan awa̱mna tak wih'ok chi axoyba̱l tak maj re' riholonquilal i xoybal wili ma' jaruj ta sahchel wach. Ma'eta aj nsahchic wach ru' wi re' ano'jbal tak ch'ublic wach eh wi wilic wo' awu̱c' tak i tuklic wach c'uxlis re' til nponic chiwach i Dios.

Je' re' ajic re' no'jbal wilic cho pan awa̱mna tak wih'ok chi axoyba̱l tak maj je' wo' re' ritik'injic qui̱b xca'n cho najtir k'i̱j take lok' laj ixok quiniminic cho reh Dios. Je' wo' chic, re' take ixok re're' jenaj wo' cho wach quino'jbal ch'i̱l quibahi̱l chi rinimjic i Dios eh chi je' re' xiniminic wo' chiwach quibahi̱l.

Re' ti' Sa̱ra je' re' xiban, re're' xinimej cho ma' Awraham re' ribahi̱l eh c'uhtbal reh chi rinimej “ajabe̱s” nqui rik'or reh. Je' wo' re' cha'n hat-tak k'uru' maj re' hat-tak xatcahnic tak chi hat-tak rixk'u̱n i ti' Sa̱ra. Ho̱', wi la' na'n tak i coric laj c'acharic eh wi ma' nayohbalej tak wach ric'uluric i ti'c'axic re' nac'ul tak ru'um rinimjic i Dios.

Je' wo' re' hat-tak bahilbe̱s, til nik'or aweh tak chi chasic' ri̱j ano'jbal tak chi rirakmajic chiri̱j ricorquilal i c'acharic ra̱j banaric ru̱c' awehq'ue̱n tak. Coric ru', to̱b ta nchel re' ricowil quiti'jolal quibakil ma' jenaj ta wach ru̱c' ricowil ati'jolal abakil hat-tak, curman chi chayew tak quilok'il maj re' take re' awich'i̱l hat-tak awehcham wo' tak i xiban i Dios wili ru'um chi kojric'ax: Chi ekojc'acharic chi junelic. Je' re' ajic tic'acharok tak chi coric cu̱c' reh chi ma' eta npitiric re' xa pa' jaric napahkaj tak johtok pan ati̱j tak.

Chi cohlsbal wach take xnik'or lok, nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak i wili: Tiwih'ok tak chawunchelal chi xa jenaj wach ano'jbal tak, chaquetelej awach chawibil awi̱b tak, chac'ax take awas acha̱k' tak, chaquetelej tak quiwach i toco̱m chic awich c'acharel eh xa ch'u̱b ok awach tak.

Wi nchel pa' bih jeno' ma' coric ta laj bano̱j xbanaric aweh tak on wi xatsihtjic tak, re' hat-tak ma̱ban tak chic jelow-bal, re' la' cha'n tak chapahkaj tak i cuse'sbal chi quina̱. Je' wo', wi la' xat-tz'ujuric tak ma̱ban tak jenaj wach cu̱c', tipahkanok la' tak pan ati̱j chiqui̱j take c'ahchi' quibanic aweh tak, reh chi naquicuse'sjic cho maj wi je' re' na'n tak re' wo' Dios naricuse'senic aweh hat-tak.

Je' re' ajic re' hat-tak cha'n tak i coric maj chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' i riC'uhbal i Dios je' wili rik'or: “Wi jeno' c'acharel ra̱j c'acharic chi suk ric'ux eh ra̱j wo' chi enwih'ic sukquilal pa ric'acharic chiwach johtok take k'i̱j pa ric'acharic, re' c'acharel re're' curman chi naricana̱b rik'ormojic take chuh laj k'oric eh je' wo' curman chi ma'xta chic relic cho xak chi̱' rik'ormojic i chucuj laj k'oric.

Je' wo' curman chi naresam lok pa ricapew-bal take ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal eh re' chic i holohic laj no'jbal chiban ribanaric. Je' wo' chic til chiyew ric'ux chi wih'ic pan sukquil laj c'uxlis cu̱c' chi'nchel c'acharel.

Til je' re' chiban maj re' nak' wach i kAja̱w wilic cho chi quina̱ take re' xa coric wo' wach quic'ux. Je' wo', re' kAja̱w xa tehlic wo' cho xiquin chi ribirmijic quiti̱j nca'n johtok. Haj cok wilic ma' nponic ta chiwach i kAja̱w re' i quino'jbal take c'acharel re' ma' coric ta wach quibanic eh re' take re', ch'i'c rilow take, nqui rik'or.
Wi re' hat-tak xa re' wo' i coric wach no'jbal nasic' tak ribanaric, ma' hab ta wach naricojbic reh ti'c'axic chana̱ tak,

raj la' wi pa' bih jeno' ti'c'axic nac'ul tak ru'um i coric wach c'uxlis, k'e̱' je ato̱b aweh tak. Ru'um aj re' ma̱yohbalej wo' tak quiwach take aj cojol ti'c'axic chana̱ tak. Je' wo' ma' nchel riban chi xa nt'ort'otic chic awa̱mna tak cu'um,

re' la' cha'n tak chayew tak rilok'il i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' wo' chic, xa eli̱c ok tikilca̱t tak chi k'oric cu̱c' take c'acharel nquipahkaj quino'jbal aweh tak chiri̱j i niminic re' c'ahchi'ca̱t tak eh nacha'n tak quic'u'ljic tik'orok tak cu̱c' pan chak'lamil eh je' wo' pa ricorquilal.

Je' re' ajic cha'n tak take holohic laj no'jbal re' aweht'alim tak chi coric wach bano̱j take, reh chi je' re' ru̱c' take k'oric c'ahchi' quik'orlom lok take quixowonic aweh tak enelic lok quiq'uixbilal ru'um reh wolic nca'n chiri̱j ac'acharic tak ru'um nok hat-tak chic aj niminel reh Jesus re' Ajabe̱s Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Wi nchel re' Dios ra̱j chi enac'ul tak i ti'c'axic ru'um i k'oric na'n tak chiri̱j rik'orbal i Dios, chac'ul wo' tak i ti'c'axic nye'eric chana̱ tak ru'um nok k'e̱' wo' chic ato̱b ric'ulmujic i ti'c'axic ru'um ribanaric take coric laj no'jbal, chiwach chi enac'ul tak i ti'c'axic ru'um ribanaric i c'ahbilal.

Je' aj re' nik'or maj je' wo' re' xc'uluric ru̱c' i Jesus re' Ajabe̱s re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi xic'ul i ti'c'axic naxquimic je to̱b ta nak til wo' coric wach ric'ux. Re' aj riquimic re' xa junpech wo' xic'ul ru'um reh kamahc, re're' xcamanic chi chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel re' ma' coric ta nak wach kac'ux ekojwih'ic chic ar chiwach i Dios. To̱b ta wo' xcansjic i Jesus, re' Lok' laj Uxlabal xiban chi xa cu xc'acharic wo'
eh chi je' aj re' chi xa c'achlic wo' i Jesus ru'um i Lok laj Uxlabal, re're' xo̱j cu̱c' take tz'ahpel laj uxlabal eh xicana̱' cu̱c' ribiral jenaj c'uhbal.

Re' take uxlabal wili re' aj wo' ru̱c' take cho aj najtir k'i̱j re' ma' xiniminic ta cho reh rik'orbal i Dios chiwach take rik'ijil cho ric'acharic i ma' Noheh. Chiwach take k'i̱j re're' nok re' ma' Noheh c'ahchi' ritik'a̱b i ma' laj cano̱wa pa̱t riwi̱', re' Dios xuy'ej chi re' take c'acharel xquinimej nak rik'orbal xa re' la' ma' xca'n ta chi je' re'. Ru'um aj re' xa ma' q'uih ta take c'acharel xico'ljic chiwach i ti'c'axic, xa re' la' ti wach i wahxaki̱b chi c'acharel xi'oquic chipam i cano̱wa pa̱t riwi̱'. Re' take re' xico'ljic chiwach i buht ha' chiwach take k'i̱j naxkajic cho rinimal jab china̱ ac'al.

Re' xc'uluric cu̱c' re're' ncamanic keh yu'na chi rehtalil re' nc'uluric wili chiri̱j i co'lbal i̱b cu̱c' take nkahsjic quiha̱': Nok wilque̱b pan ha', re' take re' ma' re' ta ritz'ajnil quiti'jolal quibakil nelic lok re' la' nca'n take re' nquiyew quik'orbal chiwach i Dios chi naca'nam i holohic laj no'jbal re' queht'alim chi coric laj bano̱j take. Je' aj wo' re' nca'n xa ru'um ructic wo' chic cho Jesus chi c'acharic, re' Ajabe̱s Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Re're' xuctic wo' chic chi quixilac take camnak eh chiri̱j chic ru' xo̱j wo' chic johtok pan taxa̱j eh je' ricab i lok'il ric'ul jeno' c'acharel ntz'uhkic cok chi riche̱l jeno' k'atal k'oric, re' Jesus naxwih'ic wo' chic cok ru̱c' i Dios, xic'ul wo' rinimal rilok'il chi nariwih'ic rajawric chi quina̱ take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios ar pan taxa̱j eh je' wo' chi quina̱ take toco̱m chic wilic quiwa'ric on quitak'anic ar pan taxa̱j.

Naxc'acharic ayu' wach ac'al i Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re're' xic'ul i ti'c'axic. Ru'um chi re're' xc'acharic chi xa tiklic wo' chi ric'uluric i ti'c'axic, re' hin nipahkaj aweh tak chi cha'n wo' aweh tak i no'jbal je' ricab xiban ru' eh nipahkaj chi je' re' maj xa hab wach aj niminel tiklic chi ric'uluric ti'c'axic ru'um reh riniminic ru', re' aj niminel re're' ric'uhtaj lok chi ma' ra̱j ta chic ribanaric i take mahc xiban cho najtir.

Wi pan acapew-bal xacoj tak chi je' re', raj wo' rik'orom chi chiwach take k'i̱j reh ac'acharic tak re' cu c'ahchi'ca̱t tak ayu' wach ac'al, ra̱j chi na̱banam tak ribanaric take no'jbal ra̱j i Dios eh ma' re' ta chic take no'jbal re' nponic chi quiwach take tinamit.

Re' rik'ijil re' xa'n tak wi̱' i no'jbal bano̱j cho cu'um take ma' quilok'onic ta wach i kAja̱w Dios xiq'uic chic lok. Chipam take k'i̱j re're', re' hat-tak xaniq'uej wo' tak cho ribanaric i c'ahbilal je' ricab take c'oyomal, take xohc'sonic i̱b xa'n tak ar pan tak ma' holohic ta laj nink'i̱j xamol wi̱' awi̱b tak chi ric'uxuric xa pa' bih jaric. Chipam wo' take cho k'i̱j re're', xa'n wo' tak cho i c'ahbilal re' rilok'onjic take tik'imaj tiyo̱x,

raj la' chi'nchel take c'ahbil laj no'jbal re're' ma'xta chic abanam tak ribanaric eh ru'um aj re', re' take awich c'acharel re' aj banol take reh c'ahbilal, xa nsahchic chic quic'ux nanquilow chi re' hat-tak ma' hat ta tak chic jenaj cu̱c' chi ribanaric i c'ahbil laj no'jbal. Ru̱c' aj re', re' take c'acharel re're' naquip'utum atz'ujuric tak

xa re' la' take c'acharel re're' xa na wo' rich'ukuric k'oric chi quina̱ re' k'orel nic' pa' wach quibano̱j ca'nam. Ar naquik'ahsam chiwach i Dios re' aj ch'ukul wach mahc tiklic chic cho chi rich'ukuric k'oric chi quina̱ take cu c'achalque̱b eh je' wo' chi quina̱ take camnak chic take je.

Ru'um aj wo' chi chi'nchel narich'ukuric k'oric chi quina̱, wilic riwi̱' chi re' tijbal nye'bic reh sukquil c'uxlis queh c'acharel xk'ormojic wo' ru'um i Jesus queh take camnak chic take je. Je' ricab nc'uluric cu̱c' chi'nchel c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al, re' take re' xiquimic reh chi narich'ukuric k'oric chi quina̱ xa re' la' ru̱c' rik'ormojic i tijbal re're', xye'eric wo' queh take xic'ulbic reh tijbal re're' chi xquic'ul i junelic c'acharic ye'o̱j ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal ar re' wilic wo' wi̱' i Dios.

Re' aj i cohlsbal wach chi'nchel c'ulic chic lok reh. Je' aj re' k'uru' hat ok tak t'ulic ru̱c' ano'jbal tak eh ma̱cana̱' tak ribanaric johtok ati̱j tak chiwach i Dios reh chi je' re' naponok i k'ijil re're' ic'lic ok ana̱ tak chi uyunic reh.
Je' wo' chic til k'e̱' curman chi chawunchelal tak chatik tak ju' ribanaric i c'axoj i̱b maj re' no'jbal re're' eriban chi enacuy nic' pa' nimal amahc tak chawibil awi̱b tak.

Je' ricab wi chaxilac tak quiponic take behenel re' c'ahchi' quisiq'uim quihi'lbal, re' hat-tak chac'uhtaj wo' tak achak'lamil cu̱c' chi riye'eric quiwa' quiha̱' je' wo' quipatal. Je' re' cha'n tak reh chi ma' eta nawic'raj tak chi jenaj ch'i'o̱j c'ahchi' ribanaric aweh tak ru̱c' i to'bonic ena'n tak.

Ru'um aj reh rato'bil i Dios chana̱ tak, chi aju'junal hat-tak xye'eric aweh tak chi je' ricab jeno' si̱ i q'uihal wach no'jbal re' encamanic aweh tak chi ribanaric ricamaj i Dios. Chi je' aj re' chi wilca̱t tak chi rilmijic nic' wach quitobjic take c'acharel ena'n tak ru̱c' take no'jbal ye'o̱j aweh tak, nipahkaj aweh tak chi camanok aweh tak chi coric take ju'jun chi no'jbal re're'.

Je' re' ajic wi jeno' c'acharel xye'eric rino'jbal chi c'uhbalanic, holohic ok rik'ormojic rik'orbal i Dios chiban chi c'uhbalanic. Wi jeno' c'acharel ye'o̱j reh i cojo̱j no'jbal queh take toco̱m chic c'acharel, chiban wo' i cojo̱j no'jbal ru̱c' rajawric ye'o̱j reh ru'um i Dios. Chi je' aj re' ru̱c' ribanaric chi'nchel re're', re' Dios naric'ulum i rilok'il re' naquiyeb take toco̱m chic awich aj niminel chi c'ahchi' quitobjic take ru'um i Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Re' aj re' riwi̱' chi niban niti̱j chawi̱j tak eh pa niti̱j niyew wo' rilok'il reh i Dios chi c'ahchi' nik'orom chi til coric, chi junelic k'i̱j sakom re' Dios til nim wach rilok'il eh til nim wo' wach i rajawric.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel reh Jesus re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak, nik'or aweh tak chi ma' nsahchic nchel ac'ux tak nok re' ransil riti'quilal i pajaric nchalic chana̱ tak chi xa je' nchel xa re' hat-tak c'ahchi' ac'ulbic tak reh.

Re' la' hat-tak sukbok ac'ux tak ru'um chi hat-tak chic jenaj chipam ricuyuric take ti'c'axic xic'ul wo' cho kAja̱w Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' re' cha'n tak reh chi nachirak cho rik'ijil chi naric'uhtam wo' chic ri̱b ru̱c' i rinimal i rilok'il, yohbal wo' wach nasukbok ac'ux tak.

Je' wo' chic, k'e̱' wo' chic ato̱b chaweh tak nok nac'ul tak i tz'ujuric ru'um reh rinimjic i kAja̱w Jesus re' Ajabe̱s Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Nik'or chi je' re' maj nanac'ul tak i ti' ru'um reh animinic tak, re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios nwih'ic awu̱c' tak chi awaj to'o̱l tak. Coric aj ru', re' take c'acharel re' ma' re' ta aj niminel take ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal nquik'or chiri̱j i kAja̱w Jesus xa re' la' hat-tak riye'eric chic rilok'il i na'n tak.

Je' aj re' ru' ma' ok hab wach jeno' aweh tak eric'ul i ti'c'axic ru'um chi aj cansanel ras richa̱k' ta nak, on ru'um chi aj lek' ta nak, on ru'um chi ta nak ma' holohic ta wach ribano̱j, on ru'um chi rimin ta nak ri̱b chipam ric'acharic jeno' chic c'acharel re' ma' re' ta reh chi nariminim wi̱' ri̱b ru̱c'.

Ra̱j nchel wi̱' jeno' c'acharel ric'ul i ti'c'axic ru'um reh niminic riban, re're' ma' nq'uix'ic ru'um i c'ahchi' ric'ulum, re' la' chiban chiyew johtok rilok'il i Dios ru'um chi c'ahchi' ric'ulum take ti'c'axic re're' ru'um reh niminic.

Je' re' ajic, ma' ta nak nsahchic ac'ux tak ru'um reh ti'c'axic nchalic chana̱ tak eh je' re' nik'or maj xponic chic rik'ijil chi narip'utum ch'ukuj k'oric i Dios eh nachiban re're' ma' xa ta chi quina̱ take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n je' ru̱c' cu c'ahchi' quimahcanic erik'at k'oric chi enkajic i ti'c'axic chi quina̱ je' la' wo' re' naribanam cu̱c' chi'nchel c'acharel. Wi chi quina̱ take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios re're' enkajic jeno' cow laj ti'c'axic, re' ta na chic take c'acharel re' ma' quiniminic ta reh i riC'uhbal i Dios ma' eniq'uic na̱ ricowil wach ti'c'axic chi quina̱?

Nik'or chi je' re' maj re' riC'uhbal i Dios rik'or chi je' wili: “Wi nchel re' c'acharel re' xa coric wo' wach ric'ux xa ru̱c' ti' laj c'axic narico'lem ri̱j ric'acharic chiwach take ti'c'axic ye'o̱j cho chi tojbal wach mahc, haj wo' ti chic i c'acharel re' ma' n-niminic ta reh i Dios eh aj mahc, ma' enkajic rinimal ti'c'axic china̱? nqui rik'or.

Ru'um aj wo' chi re' take c'acharel re' quic'ulbic reh i ti'c'axic nquic'ul ru'um chi je' re' ra̱j i Dios, quicoj qui̱b k'uru' pan k'ab i Dios re' aj tik'inel reh chi'nchel wilic china̱ ac'al eh ca'n ta wo' nak i til coric laj no'jbal.

Re' hin ma' Luch, hin wo' jenaj chi quixilac take aj c'amol be̱h reh ritinami̱t i Dios eh je' wo' c'ahchi' niyeb nichi̱' chi rik'ormojic take ti'c'axic xic'ul cho i kAja̱w Jesus re' Ajabe̱s Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Re' hin xinehtric wo' rilok'il re' naric'uhtjic xa chi loq'uil ti k'i̱j. Chi je' aj re', re' hin re' i wili nipahkaj je queh take quinahsil aj niminel wilque̱b ponok chaxilac tak:

Re' take ritinami̱t i Dios re' wilic pan ak'ab tak quilmijic, coric ok wach quilmijic cha'n tak je' ricab nbanaric ru̱c' quilmijic juntuhm ok chi me̱'. Ru̱c' quilmijic c'ahchi'ca̱t tak, ma̱ban tak xa ru'um ta nak chi hat-tak mino̱j chipam, cha'n la' tak ru'um chi ru̱c' chi'nchel ac'ux awa̱mna tak nawa̱j tak ribanaric re're'. Je' wo' ma̱ban tak re're' xa ru'um ta nak risahq'uil tumi̱n nye'eric chi to'bal, cha'n la' tak ru'um chi je' re' rik'or ac'ux tak ribanaric.

Ma' riban wo' nchel chi ru'um ta nak chi wilic awajawric tak chi quina̱ take ye'o̱j pan ak'ab tak quilmijic eno̱j riban chi xa re' chic tak'anic nawa̱j abanam tak chi quina̱. Re' la' cha'n tak, c'uhtunok awu̱c' tak i holohic laj no'jbal reh chi je' re' je' wo' re' equibanic ru'.

Cha'n tak acamaj chi coric k'uru' reh chi naponok wo' i rik'ijil chi naric'uhtam ri̱b i Jesus re' Aj Nahsil keh hoj chi'nchel je' ru̱c' wilco̱j chi aj ilol reh ritinami̱t i Dios na̱c'ulum wo' tak jenaj aco̱ch tak je' ricab nye'eric queh take aj ajamanel quic'ulbic reh jenaj coten k'an woric laj ch'ihch' re' ncojoric wach quina̱. Xa re' la' ru' re' co̱ch na̱c'ulum tak re're' ma' jaruj c'uhlel sahchel wach i rilok'il.

Yu'na aweh hat-tak q'uijolak ch'i̱l hat-tak k'ahxokak, enik'or i wili: Tiniminok tak chiwach quik'orbal anahsil hat-tak aj niminel eh chawunchelal i hat-tak c'ul chanimej awi̱b tak ru̱c' ch'ublic wach c'uxlis chawibil awi̱b tak maj je' wili rik'or chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios: “Ru'um reh quino'jbal take c'acharel re' xa nquinimsaj chic qui̱b re' Dios ricoj ri̱b chi caj ixowonel, ra̱j take c'acharel re' xa ch'u̱b ti wach quic'ux, re' rito'bal i Dios wilic cho chi quina̱, nqui rik'or.

Je' aj re' k'uru' chanimej awi̱b tak chiwach i Dios re' xiq'uic na̱ rinimal wach rajawric eh cha'n tak re're' chi xa ch'ublic wach ac'ux tak reh chi re' Dios narijohsam wach awa'ric tak naponok i rik'ijil chi je' re' naric'uluric.
Ru'um chi xa c'ahchi' wo' ca̱t tak rilom cho i Dios, chak'ahsaj wo' tak reh chi'nchel acapew-bal tak nchalic pan ac'ux tak re' riban xa ji̱k' chic ac'ux tak chiri̱j.

Ma' nchel nsahchic acapew-bal tak ru̱c' animinic tak eh xa ic'lic ok wo' ana̱ tak chi cha'janic reh chi na̱wih'ic tak chi na'lic aweh tak, je' ricab nca'n re' take aj cha'janel pa̱t chi ma' quiwiric ta chi cha'janic. Curman aj ru' chi na'lic ok aweh tak maj re' aj Yahm re' til nxowonic awach tak, xa no̱j nchalic chic chi risiq'uiric ri̱j nic' wach na chik'et pa̱m abe̱h tak, je' ricab riban i jenaj cakcoj chi xa q'ueric chic chi̱' ru'um chi xa hab nak chic wach ra̱j chi naribik'im.

Je' re' k'uru' chi'nchel i pajaric ricoj pan abe̱h tak aj Yahm, chacuy tak ransil ru̱c' i ricowil acapew-bal tak wilic ru'um rich'iquinjic ac'ux na'n tak chiri̱j i Dios eh cha'n tak chi je' re' chi c'ahchi' ric'ulic pan ac'ux tak chi je' wo' re' ricuyuric ti'c'axic nca'n take toco̱m awich aj niminel tak re' c'acharic nca'n pan tak toco̱m chic ye'a̱b chi junsut wach ac'al.

Xa re' la' chaweht'alij wo' tak nok hat-tak chic iq'uinak chipam take ti'c'axic re're', re' Dios nariyeb riman ricowil acapew-bal tak, naca̱t tak rucsam ru̱c' acapew-bal tak eh naripahba̱b wo' ac'ux tak chi coric. Re' Dios re' nye'bic reh chi'nchel i cuse'sbal re' wo' re' xyuk'unic aweh tak chi niminic chiri̱j i Jesus reh chi enac'ul tak rilok'il re' ma' jaruj ta c'uhlel sahchel wach.
Re' aj re' riwi̱' chi nok niban niti̱j re' hin nik'or chi til coric, chi junelic k'i̱j sakom re' Dios nim rilok'il wilic eh nim wo' rajawric wilic.

Re' hu̱j wili xnitz'ihmbaj ru̱c' i to'bonic xiban wi̱n i ma' Silwa̱no re' jenaj wich aj niminel coric wach ric'ux. Re' riwi̱' chi xnitz'ihmbaj je aweh tak i hu̱j wili reh riye'eric ano'jbal tak je' wo' chi rich'oboric ribehil aweh tak chi til coric chi re' Dios til xic'uhtaj aweh tak rinimal wach richak'lamil. Je' re' nok chatik tak ju' riye'eric ac'ux tak chiri̱j re're'.

Re' take moloj wach aj niminel wilque̱b ayu' pan tinamit wili re' ribihnej chi “Wawilo̱nya”, re' take awich chiho̱j wo' take cho ru'um i Dios, nquitak'a̱' je risukquil ac'ux tak. Ritak'a̱' wo' je risukquil ac'ux tak i Cus, re' je' na wac'u̱n nok wilic chi niwach.

Chayew risukquil ac'ux tak chawibil awi̱b tak c'uhtbal reh i c'axoj i̱b wilic chaxilac tak. Re' ta nak Dios banok chi enwih'ic risukquil ac'ux hat-tak re' xa jenaj chic awi̱' tak rich'i̱l Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' ta nak re'.

Re' hin, hin Simon eh Luch i ricab nibihnal. Re' hin, hin raj camanom i kAja̱w Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh re' wo' re' xiripahba̱' chi aj k'orol ribiral i ric'uhbal. Re' hu̱j wili til re' hin c'ahchi' nitz'ihminic je reh aweh hat-tak wich aj niminel re' xa'n tak je' ricab xka'n i hoj chi xkach'ica̱' kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus eh k'e̱' lo̱k' chaweh tak i ch'iquinic c'uxlis na'n tak chiri̱j i Dios je' wo' chiri̱j i Jesus re' Aj Co'lonel keh ru'um chi coric wach ric'ux.

Je' re' k'uru' tinic'alenej tak je eh nik'or wo' je aweh tak chi niban niti̱j chawi̱j tak ru'um chi ana'bem tak chic rino'jbal i Dios ch'i̱l rino'jbal i kAja̱w Jesus. Je' aj wili ti̱j niban: Re' ta nak i kAja̱w Dios chiyew cho aweh tak chi enatik tak ju' ric'uluric rito'bal eh chi enatik wo' tak ju' ribanaric i c'acharic pan sukquil c'uxlis.

Re' Jesus re' sutumaj ri̱j ric'acharic ru̱c' riholonquilal risakomil eh re' k'e̱' wo' rinimal wach richak'lanquilal chi kana̱, re're' xojriyuk'ej chi ekojwih'ic chi ritinami̱t. Ru'um aj chi xiyew keh chi xkeht'alij rino'jbal i Jesus, re' Dios xiban wo' chi re' Jesus enwih'ic rajawric chi naricamanic pan kac'acharic chi riye'eric keh chi'nchel rito'bal reh chi eriban jenaj wach kano'jbal ch'i̱l i Dios.

Je' wo' chic ru'um chi xojriyuk'ej chi ekojwih'ic chi hoj ritinami̱t, re' Dios xiban chi re' take k'oric k'oro̱j cahnok chiri̱j richak'lamil je' wo' chiri̱j rinimal rato'bil wilic cho chi kana̱, xye'eric wo' keh reh chi re' take k'oric re're' equicamanic keh chi jalbal wach kano'jbal cu rehtal eriban jenaj wach ch'i̱l rino'jbal ru'. Chi je' re' nakaco'lem wo' ki̱b chiwach i jot'o̱j laj c'acharic re' nilmijic cu̱c' take c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al ru'um reh c'ahbilal laj no'jbal re' k'e̱' ncotowej ribanaric.

Ru'um aj chi re' take k'oro̱j re're' xye'eric reh chi naquicamanic keh, re' hat-tak wich aj niminel chayew ac'ux tak chi cow chi na̱ch'ica̱b ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus je' wo' chi na̱banam tak i holonquilal ch'i̱l i coric laj no'jbal eh chi na̱yeb wo' chic awi̱b tak chi rirakmajic chiri̱j chi'nchel rino'jbal i Dios.

Je' wo', ma' xa ta re' rirakmajic chiri̱j chi'nchel i no'jbal na̱yeb wi̱' ac'ux tak, je' la' wo' chi riye'eric pan awo̱k tak i rajawric i mahc. Ma' xa ta re're' na̱banam tak, je' la' wo' chacuy tak ransil i ti'c'axic re' nchalic chana̱ tak ru'um reh animinic tak. Je' wo' chic wih'ok awu̱c' tak i no'jbal re' nponic chiwach i Dios.
Ma' xa re' ta re're', je' la' wo' c'ul chawa̱j awi̱b tak chawach eh je' wo' chac'ax tak chi'nchel take c'acharel.

Je' re' ajic chi'nchel take re're' ma̱cana̱' tak ribanaric chatik la' tak ju' ribanaric maj wi je' re' na'n tak enana'bej tak chi coric nic' wach rino'jbal i Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Re' rinabjic wili encamanic aweh tak reh chi ena'n tak i holohic laj bano̱j eh chi ewo' nato'bej tak take c'acharel.

Ra̱j wi jeno' c'acharel ma' riban ta take no'jbal k'oro̱j lok re're', re' c'acharel re're' xa je' ricab i sot' ncahnic wi̱'. Je' re' nik'or maj re' pa' nquilow take c'acharel qui'ilbic ma'xta cho pa ricapew-bal i sot'. Nic' pa' wach nc'uluric ru̱c' i sot' je' wo' re' nc'uluric ru̱c' ricapew-bal i c'acharel re' ma' riban ta take no'jbal k'oro̱j lok reh. Nik'or chi je' re' maj ma'xta wo' cho pa ric'ux chajaric xiban i Dios ru̱c' naxc'acharic nak cho pan mahc eh yu'na cuyu̱j chic rimahc.

Je' re' ajic hat-tak wich aj niminel, chayew ac'ux tak chi ribanaric i chi'nchel k'oro̱j lok wili maj wi je' re' na'n tak echic riban chi re' niminic ra̱j i Dios ena'n tak ribanaric je' ricab xa̱j chawi̱j tak naxatrichih tak cho eh xatriyuk'ej tak chi xa'n tak chi hat-tak chic ritinami̱t. Je' wo' chic, ru̱c' ribanaric take no'jbal re're', re' hat-tak ma' jaruj ta enacana̱' animinic tak.

Chiri̱j chic lok chi'nchel re're', re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, kajCo'lonel eh Ajabe̱s wo' chi kana̱ nok wilic, re're' nariyeb aweh tak i rinimal wach c'axbal chi ar pan taxa̱j re' riban wi̱' k'atoj k'oric naca̱t tak ric'ulum ar chi etic'acharic tak ru̱c' chi junelic.

To̱b ta wo' aweht'alim nak tak chic chi'nchel take k'oro̱j aweh tak eh to̱b ta wo' nak cow ch'iclic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i c'uhbal re' cu yu' na chi k'i̱j nanimej tak chi coric, re' hin xa cu nanitikim wo' ju' rik'ormojic chi'nchel re' nik'orom chic lok aweh tak reh chi je' re' xa nariwih'ic wo' pan ac'ux tak.
Reh chi xa nariwih'ic wo' pan ac'ux tak chi'nchel re're', nik'or wo' chic aweh tak chi tare̱t chi re' nic' pa' nimal raj k'ormojic enik'or wo' aweh tak yu'na chi cu c'achalqui̱n pe.
Nik'or chi je' re' maj re' hin weht'alim chi xa ma' naht ta chic wilic je rik'ijil niquimic ru'um chi re' kAja̱w Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric riyeb chic cho rehtalil wi̱n.

Je' re' ajic chi cu c'achalqui̱n, re' hin cow niyew nic'ux chi ac'uhbaljic tak reh chi je' re' naricahnic pan ac'ux tak chi junelic take c'uhbal re're' eh nok hin chic camnak je xa cu naric'ulic wo' cho pan ac'ux tak chaj bih xnik'or aweh tak.

Re' c'uhbal k'oro̱j wu'um ch'i̱l take wich raj k'orol i Dios chiri̱j rinimal wach riwa'ric i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric je' wo' chiri̱j wo' chic ric'ulic lok, ma' xa ta pan kac'ux xkatik'a̱' wach je' ricab nbanaric ru̱c' take xa pa' bih c'uhbal xa tik'imaj wach, re' la' c'uhbal nkak'or re're' coric wach ru'um nok re' hoj xkilow chi manlic chi re' Jesus til wilic rinimal rilok'il.

Je' re' xc'uluric junpech. Re' hoj xkilow nic' wach nok re' Ajabe̱s Dios xiyew rilok'il i Jesus naxsutjic ri̱j ru̱c' rinimal wach risakomil i Ajabe̱s Dios. Re' wili xk'ormojic reh Jesus ru'um Ajabe̱s Dios re' wilic pa rilok'il chi sutumaj ri̱j ru'um rinimal wach risakomil: «Re' Jesus wili til k'e̱' ti' nwic'raj maj re're' i wAc'u̱n. Je' wo' chic re' wAc'u̱n wili k'e̱' wo' riyew risukquil nic'ux, nqui k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios.
Re' aj take k'oric re're' til coric maj re' hoj xkabiraj ru̱c' kaxiquin nok kihch'ilem ponok i Jesus ar china̱ i yu̱k' re' xye'eric wi̱' rilok'il ru'um i Dios naxk'oric cho cu ar pan taxa̱j.

Ru'um reh k'oric xiban i Dios ar re' hoj keht'alim chi til coric take nic' pa' nimal k'oro̱j cahnok chiri̱j i Jesus cu'um take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios re' xiwih'ic cho najtir k'i̱j. Ru'um aj re' til nipahkaj aweh tak chi chacoj tak rehtal chi coric i k'oro̱j cahnok chiri̱j i Jesus maj re' k'oro̱j re're' je' ricab jenaj sakombal re' nsakomonic take reh ye'a̱b re' xa k'ekom chic pa̱m. Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' i sakombal re're' chi ncamanic cu rehtal cho i sak'ic re' nelic cho wi̱' i nim laj ch'imi̱l re' nsakomonic pa̱m i k'i̱j, je' wo' re' nc'uluric ru̱c' i k'oro̱j cahnok chiri̱j i Jesus chi naricamanic wo' awu̱c' tak cu rehtal ric'ul awa̱mna tak re' sakom ye'o̱j ru'um richalic i Jesus.

Je' re' ajic chacoj tak rehtal i k'oro̱j cahnok chiri̱j i Jesus eh je' wo' i wili: Chi'nchel k'oric k'oro̱j cho cu'um take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios re' tz'ihmbimaj take chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' i riC'uhbal i Dios ma' eta nrakmajic chiri̱j wi ma' re' ru'um rito'bal i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' k'oric xca'n take cho aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios ma' xa ta pan quic'ux xquimiksaj cho wach rik'ormojic, re' la' wili xc'ulmujic ru'um nok re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios xk'oric cho pan quicapew-bal take lok' laj winak tak'amaj take ru'um i Dios.

Najtir cho k'i̱j xiwih'ic take cho chucul aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios chi quixilac take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel. Je' wo' re' yu'na naquiwih'ic wo' chaxilac tak take chucul aj tijinel re' xa chucuj laj c'uhbal naquik'orom chi xa re' wo' take re' queht'alanic reh chi xa chucuj k'oric c'ahchi'que̱b. Ru'um reh chucuj laj c'uhbal naca'nam take aj tijinel re're', narijot'om ri̱b quino'jbal take naquibirinic reh quic'uhbal eh narisahchic wo' wach quiniminic. Je' wo' re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi re' take aj tijinel re're' ma' nquic'ul ta i Jesus chi Ajabe̱s chi quina̱, to̱b ta re're' xtojbic ri̱j quic'acharic chi wilque̱b nak chic chi ritinami̱t. Ru'um chi je' re' nca'n, re' take re' xa nic' yu' nquiyuk'ej wach quina̱ take ti'c'axic re' narisachbic quiwach.

Cu'um queh aj tijinel re're' q'uih wo' take c'acharel naquik'ahsam qui̱b chi ribanaric i c'ahbilal re' enquilow chi nca'n take aj tijinel re're' eh ru'um reh ribanaric take c'ahbilal, narik'ormojic take i ma' holohic ta laj k'oric chiri̱j i coric laj tijbal k'oro̱j chiri̱j ric'uhbal i Jesus.

Je' wo' chic, re' take aj tijinel re're' xa aj sahc' tumi̱n take eh ru'um re' enquik'or aweh tak take k'oric re' xa miksimaj cho wach pan quicapew-bal reh chi nanabiraj hat-tak nayew tak atz'a̱k queh. Ru'um reh nic' nimal nca'n ribanjic, re' take aj tijinel re're' narichalic rinimal ti'c'axic chi quina̱ re' k'oro̱j wo' chic cho ribiral ru'um i Dios najtir k'i̱j

je' ricab i ti'c'axic xchalic chi quina̱ take c'acharel je' ru̱c' je' wo' wili quibiral: Je' ricab najtir cho k'i̱j re' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios ar pan taxa̱j naximahcanic chiwach, re' Ajabe̱s Dios ma' xicana̱' ta take chi ma' ta nak xquic'ul i tojbal wach quimahc, re' la' xiban xiyew take chipam ye'a̱b re' naquic'ulum wi̱' ti'c'axic take quimahcanic. Nok cojo̱j chic take chipam i ye'a̱b wili re' xa k'ekom chic pa̱m je' ricab riwi̱' pan che̱', xicanabjic ar cu rehtal ponok i k'i̱j re' naribanam wi̱' i ch'ukuj k'oric i Dios chi quina̱ eh je' wo' chi quina̱ take aj tijinel re're'.

Je' wo' re' xc'uluric cu̱c' take c'acharel c'ahbil quino'jbal najtir k'i̱j pa rik'ijil cho ric'acharic i ma' Noheh. Re' Dios ma' xicana̱' ta chi je' re' chi ma' ta nak xquitoj wach i quimahc, re' la' xiban i Dios xa re' wach i ma' Noheh re' xc'uhbalanic queh tinamit chi xca'n chi coric nak wach quic'ux chiwach i Dios, xa re' wach re' ch'i̱l take wuku̱b chic chi c'acharel xicana̱' take chi xic'acharic nok xiyew cho i buht ha' chi quina̱ take tinamit re' c'ahbil wach quino'jbal.

Je' wo', re' Dios xiyew wo' cho i rinimal ti'c'axic reh chi xsahchic quiwach take tinamit Soro̱ma ch'i̱l i Como̱ra. Je' re' xiban nok xic'at take cu rehtal xichajric chi junpech. Re' xiban re're' xcamanic chi jenaj rehtalil chi je' re' naric'uluric cu̱c' c'acharel re' je' ru̱c' c'ahbil quino'jbal.

Re' cok ru', naxisach quiwach take tinamit aj Soro̱ma ch'i̱l aj Como̱ra, re' Dios xico'lej i ma' Lot eh je' re' xiban maj re' Lot re're' jenaj c'acharel xa coric wo' wach ric'ux. Nik'or chi je' re' maj re' Lot wili xiban nyot'ic i ra̱mna ru'um i c'ahbilal nca'n take c'acharel wilque̱b chipam take tinamit re're' chi xa re' wach i mahcanic nca'n ribanaric.

Je' re' ajic re' Lot eli̱c i k'i̱j nyot'ic i ra̱mna narilow eh naribiraj take nic' nimal i ma' holohic ta laj bano̱j nca'n take tinamit re're'. Je' re' xic'raj maj xa coric wo' wach ric'ux pa ric'acharic chi quixilac take c'acharel re're'.

Je' aj re' k'uru' chi'nchel take wili riyew rehtal keh chi xa pa' jaric ti'c'axic nc'ulic lok chi quina̱ take quiniminic reh, re' Ajabe̱s Dios til rico'lej take chiwach chi'nchel re're', ra̱j la' take c'acharel ma' quiniminic ta reh, re' Dios c'ahchi' chic riyeb ti'c'axic chi quina̱ cu rehtal riyew risasil ti'c'axic chi quina̱ chipam i k'i̱j nachik'at k'oric chi quina̱ chi'nchel take aj mahc.

Chiwach i k'i̱j re're', k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal i ti'c'axic naquic'ulum take c'acharel re' xa cha'n aweh c'ahbil laj no'jbal nca'n ru'um chi ma' nca̱j ta quicana̱b ribanaric i mahc nquic'ax wach ribanaric. Je' wo' re' take c'acharel ma' quiniminic ta chiwach quik'orbal take wilic cajawric chi quina̱, naquic'ulum wo' ti'c'axic maj xa k'itk'it take eh xa eht take chi k'oric. Xa na̱ ru' ma' quiyo'jic ta nech' ok chi quitz'ujuric take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re' wilic quiwa'ric ar pan taxa̱j.

Til nik'or aweh tak ma' wo' re' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios je' re' nca'n eh re' take re' til wo' nak k'e̱' wo' chic ransil quiwa'ric wilic chi quiwach take c'acharel re' je' re' nca'n. Re' take aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' xa ta nak nquik'et wach i ajabe̱s Dios chi ch'ukuj k'oric chi quina̱ take c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al raj take c'acharel re're', re' ma' holohic ta quino'jbal je' re' nca'n.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' tz'uju̱j nca'n chiqui̱j take aj tz'e' wa̱ch chi ma' nquirak ta chiri̱j riwi̱' re' c'ahchi' quitz'ujum. Ru'um chi je' re' nca'n, re' take re' no̱j riban chi je' quicab take chicop re' ma'xta quino'jbal. Je' wo' nca'n chi xa je' quicab take aj q'uiche̱' chicop re' xa nic' yu' quicansjic pan xirab. Je' re' nok nic' pa' wach nc'uluric cu̱c' i chicop re're', je' wo' re' naric'uluric cu̱c' take c'acharel re're' nariponic wo' rik'ijil chi narisacharic quiwach ayu' wach ac'al.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' take c'acharel re're' k'e̱' rinimal wach ti'c'axic naquic'ulum chi tojbal wach ti'quilal ca'nam queh take toco̱m chic c'acharel. Ma' xa ta ru'um i ti'quilal ca'nam re're' naquic'ulum i ti'c'axic, je' la' wo' ru'um take i wili: Pe̱t k'oric, re' take re' chi suksbal quic'ux xa nink'ijinic wo' nca'n, je' chi pan k'i̱j je' chi pan tak chak'ab eh je' re' nca'n chi ribanaric i c'ahbil laj no'jbal re' ncotowej ribanaric. Ru'um aj re' til nik'or aweh tak chi chayohbalej awi̱b tak chi quiwach maj re' quiwih'ic chaxilac tak nanamol awi̱b tak chi wi'c xa q'uixbilal ric'am cho chana̱ tak eh riban chi re' holohic laj abiral tak wilic no̱j chi k'ehbel. Je' wo' chic, ru̱c' i ma' coric ta wach quiwih'ic chaxilac tak xa nsukbic chic quic'ux ru'um, maj re' til riwi̱' quiwih'ic chaxilac tak xa reh ribanaric i c'ahbil laj no'jbal.

Ricab k'oric, re' take toco̱m chic mahc nca'n take c'acharel re're', ric'am cho ti'c'axic chi quina̱. Re' aj take wili i mahc nca'n: Xa ma' nquilow ti wach jeno' ixok, xa nok wo' ti nquic'ax wach ribanaric i c'oyomal ru̱c'. Je' wo', xa eli̱c wo' c'ahchi'que̱b chi mahcanic chi xa ma' quich'i'tjic ta chic chi banoj mahc. Je' wo' chic, xa ma' c'axic ta chi queh quik'eb-eric pan mahc take ja' cow ta quic'ux pan niminic reh chi naquimahcanic quich'i̱l. Je' wo' chic, re' take re' ocronak take chi ric'axaric wach i bihomal ru'um risahq'uil i tumi̱n. Ru'um aj chi'nchel re're' narichalic rinimal ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take c'acharel re're'.

Nik'or chi je' re' maj re' take re' ru̱c' ricanabjic i coric laj c'uhbal re' nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus no̱j riban je' ricab xiban cho najtir k'i̱j re' rac'u̱n i ma' Wosor, re' Walaham ribihnal. Chawil ru' re' Walaham re're' ru'um risahq'uil tumi̱n chi ric'axaric wach ribihomal xicut ri̱b chi ribanaric c'ahbilal chi xipahkaj reh Dios sihtbal queh take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.

Ru'um reh c'ahbilal re're' xk'ormojic reh chi ma' holohic ta c'ahchi' ribanam eh je' wili xc'ulmujic ru̱c': Xk'eteric wach ricapew-bal ru'um jenaj t'uch rac'u̱n cawa̱y re' xk'oric ru̱c' chi je' ricab i k'oric riban jenaj c'acharel. Je' re' xc'uluric ru̱c' ru'um reh sabanil laj no'jbal c'ahchi' ritik'a̱b wach pa ric'ux ribanaric.

Je' aj re' k'uru' re' take c'acharel re' wilic quino'jbal je' ricab rino'jbal i Walaham xye'eric cho ti'c'axic chi quina̱ ru'um i Dios eh re' ti'c'axic xye'eric chi quina̱, re' chi naquiwih'ic chi junelic pan jenaj ye'a̱b yohbal wach k'ekomil pa̱m. Je' re' ric'ul queh chi naquic'ulum maj re' take re' je' quicab take ro̱k ha' quichikic on je' quicab take su̱tz' re' xa c'ul c'amoj take je ru'um i cak te̱w eh chi ma' re' ta wo' jab nquic'am cho.

Je' re' nik'or maj nok nquik'or i pa' bih k'oro̱j cho, ma' camanel ta chi queh take aj birinel queh, xa ncamanic chi nimsbal qui̱b je' ricab xiban i Walaham. Je' wo', re' take c'acharel re're' ma' xa ta holohic chic wach i k'oric nca'n chi rinimsjic qui̱b je' la' wo' je' wili nca'n cu̱c' take c'acharel je' ru̱c' quicana̱b chic ribanaric i c'ahbil laj no'jbal eh yu'na wilque̱b chic pan niminic: Re' take chucul aj c'uhbalanel re're' ru̱c' i jot'o̱j nca'n ru'um reh quic'uhbal nca'n wo' chi re' take cu ac' aj niminel quisoljic wo' chic pan mahc.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' quic'uhbaljic take junleh chic c'acharel nca'n je' wili nquik'or: «Re' hat-tak na̱wih'ic tak chi tehlic chic ri̱j ac'acharic tak eh ma' hab ta chic wach naritak'anic aweh tak chipam ac'acharic tak, nqui nquik'or. Coric ru' je' re' nquik'or xa re' la' re' take re' xa cu choplic wo' na̱ i quic'acharic ru'um i ma' coric ta laj no'jbal nca'n je' ricab i nelic wi̱' i k'oro̱j wili: «Wi jeno' choplic na̱ ru'um i jenaj ajabe̱s, re' wo' ajabe̱s re're' ntak'anic china̱ i c'acharel re're', nqui k'oro̱j.

Til ricorquilal re' take aj tijinel re're' junpech quina'bem nak chic chi re' Jesus re're' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' wo' chic, re' take re' wilic nak chic i Jesus chi Ajabe̱s chi quina̱ eh chi aj co'lonel wo' queh eh ru̱c' re're' quicana̱' nak ribanaric i c'ahbil laj no'jbal xa re' la' re' take re' xquiyew wo' chic qui̱b chi ribanaric i c'ahbilal eh ru̱c' re're' xchoporic wo' chic na̱ quic'acharic ru'um i c'ahbilal wilque̱b nak wi̱'. Chi je' chic re' riwi̱' quic'acharic, k'e̱' wo' chic yohbal wach c'ahbilal quibanic chiwach nok ja' qui'oquic ta nak chi niminic!

Je' re' nok ru'um reh rinimal i ti'c'axic narichalic chi quina̱ ru'um riwi̱' quic'acharic wilque̱b wi̱' yu'na, nik'or aweh tak chi sakbih nak chi queh chi ma' ta nak xquina'bej wach i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i coric wach c'acharic. Je' re' nik'or maj k'e̱' je ti' queh ru'um chi re' take re' chiri̱j chi quina'bem chic wach i c'uhbal tak'amaj re're' ru'um i Dios xquicana̱' ric'amaric na̱.

Ru'um chi je' re' nca'n re' take c'acharel re're' nc'uluric cu̱c' je' ricab i rik'or jenaj k'oric chi je' wili: «Re' tz'i' nsoljic wo' chic chi ric'uxuric rica'pech rixa'aw eh re' ahk chiri̱j nok ntz'ajaric ri̱j, no̱j wo' chic ritolej ri̱b pan ch'uwa', nqui rik'or.

Hat-tak wich aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak, re' wili ricab hu̱j c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak. Chipam cabchel nihu̱j xniyew je c'uhbal chana̱ tak reh chi re' pa' bih atijem tak ma' eta niq'uic pan ac'ux tak ela' ncamanic aweh tak chi eticapewenic tak chi coric.

Je' re' ajic xnitz'ihmbaj je aweh tak take k'oric wili reh chi xa naric'ulic wo' pan ac'ux tak take nic' pa' nimal k'oro̱j cho najtir k'i̱j cu'um take lok' laj aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios ch'i̱l wo' take tak'anic ribanam cho i Jesus re' Ajabe̱s chi quina̱ chi'nchel eh kajCo'lonel wo'. Re' take tak'anic wili, re' wo' re' c'ahchi' kak'orom ribiral aweh tak i hoj nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take raj tahkanel i Jesus.

Je' re' k'uru' til ajwal wach chi na̱cojom tak rehtal take wili: Chana'bej tak chi chipam i cohlsbal wach take k'i̱j naquic'ulic lok take c'acharel re' xa suk wo' quic'ux ru'um ribanaric i mahc nca'n. Re' take c'acharel re're' xa naquise'lam pa nak' kawach

ru̱c' rik'ororic chi je' wili: «Chaj bih xcahnic wi̱' ric'ulic lok rica'pech i Ajabe̱s Jesus re' k'oro̱j nak cho ribiral chi naric'uluric nak? Je' re' nkak'or maj xa re' wo' rehtal quiquimic cho take katu̱t kAja̱w xa riwi̱' wo' wilque̱b take chi'nchel cu yu'na chi k'i̱j. Xa je' wo' ricab nok tz'uhcric cho wach ac'al nok wilic yu'na, nqui naquik'orom take chi xa se'lbal keh.

Re' take k'oric re're' til rehtalil aj chi re' take c'acharel wili ma' nquirak chiri̱j rino'jbal i Dios re' nkilow ru̱c' take ribiral wili: Je' ricab, najtir cho k'i̱j pan p'utbal cho reh chi'nchel i tik'imaj, re' Dios xitik'a̱' i wach ac'al ch'i̱l i taxa̱j xa ru̱c' rik'orbal. Je' wo', re're' xbanic chi ximol ri̱b pa reh i ha' eh cahnic wo' pa reh i cow laj ac'al. Je' wo', re're' nbanic chi cu yu'na chi k'i̱j re' wach ac'al xtz'uhcric cho pan yejal ha'.
Je' wo', re' aj wo' re' xbanic cho najtir k'i̱j chi ru̱c' rinimal buht ha' q'uihal take c'acharel sacharic quiwach ayu' wach ac'al.

Re're' xitak'a̱' wo' chi re' wach ac'al ch'i̱l i taxa̱j ma' ja'xta pe chic risacharic wach cu rehtal i k'i̱j na chiban ch'ukuj k'oric chi quina̱ take aj mahc eh nariyeb ti'c'axic chi quina̱. Chipam aj i k'i̱j re're', re' ac'al ch'i̱l i taxa̱j narisahchic wach ru̱c' i k'a̱k'.

Jarub hab nariq'uic lok chi naric'uluric i wili ma' re' ta re' k'orel chiwach i Dios. Re' hat-tak wich aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak c'olok pan ac'ux tak chi chiwach i Ajabe̱s Dios nok niq'uic lok jenaj k'i̱j xa je na nchel ca'ik'ob lajc'ahl (1,000) hab niq'uic lok eh nok niq'uic lok ca'ik'ob lajc'ahl (1,000) hab xa je' na nchel xa jenaj ti k'i̱j niq'uic lok chi reh.

Coric ru', re' k'oro̱j cahnok ru'um i Dios chiri̱j ric'ulic lok rica'pech i Jesus ma' ja' nc'uluric ta eh ru'um re' wilic take quicapewenic reh chi re' Dios k'e̱' k'u̱n no̱j elok wach i rik'orom cho ribiral chi naribanam. Xa re' la' re' richahmic cho ric'ulic lok rica'pech i Jesus ma' re' ta re' riwi̱' chi je' re' c'ahchi' ric'uluric, c'ahchi' la' ric'uluric chi je' re' ru'um reh rinimal cho rik'uni̱l cu̱c' take je' ru̱c' c'ahbil quino'jbal. Je' re' nik'or maj re' wili riwi̱' chi ma' ja' nc'uluric ta ric'ulic lok rica'pech i Jesus: Re're' ra̱j chi ma' jeno' c'acharel chiri̱j nok camnak chic je ma' eta no̱j pan tojbal wach mahc chi junelic eh ru'um aj wo' re' c'ahchi' ruy'em chi chi'nchel take c'acharel naquiyot'om quic'ux eh naquijalam wach quic'acharic chi naquicana̱b ribanaric i c'ahbil laj no'jbal.

Je' re' k'uru' chana'bej tak chi re' i k'i̱j nok re' Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus naric'ulic lok rica'pech chi riye'eric ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take ma' re' ta aj niminel til naric'ulic lok xa re' la' ma' eht'alamaj ta nac'olok lok. Re' cok ru' naponok i k'i̱j re're', til naric'ulmujic je' ricab nc'uluric chipam jeno' pa̱t chi ma' hab ta wach neht'alanic reh riponic jeno' aj lek' pan chak'ab. Chipam i k'i̱j re're' naribirmijic jenaj ma' laj te̱w eh re' take nic' nimal wilque̱b pan taxa̱j naquikopic cho cu rehtal narojic sahchok quiwach. Ar aj ru' re' wach ac'al ch'i̱l chi'nchel tik'imaj china̱ na wo' quic'ahtic.
Ru'um wo' chi re' taxa̱j ch'i̱l ac'al eh ch'i̱l wo' take nic' pa' nimal wilque̱b chiwach xa narisahchic wo' quiwach, coric ok eh lok' ok wach ano'jbal pan ac'acharic tak.

Je' wo' chic ic'lic ok ana̱ tak chipam ac'acharic tak chi ruyu'njic naponok rik'ijil ric'ulic lok rica'pech i kAja̱w Jesus chiwach i k'i̱j re' tik'imaj cho wach ru'um i Dios. Chayew wo' ac'ux tak chi ribanaric i ra̱j ru' reh chi re' k'i̱j re're' loq'uil ti nponic wach. Naponok i k'i̱j re're', re' taxa̱j ch'i̱l chi'nchel nic' nimal wilic chipam narisahchic quiwach ru'um i k'a̱k'.

Til je' re' naric'uluric maj re' Dios xik'or wo' cahnok chi re' hoj aj niminel nariyeb keh chi ekojc'acharic ar pan jenaj chic ye'a̱b re' nariwih'ic wi̱' jenaj ac' ac'al ch'i̱l jenaj ac' laj taxa̱j eh ru'um chi til je' re' xik'or, re' hoj c'ahchi' kuy'em chi naric'uluric i k'oro̱j cahnok ru'um.

Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak, ru'um aj chi c'ahchi' awuy'em tak ric'uluric chi'nchel take k'oro̱j cahnok wili chayew ac'ux tak chi cow chi ribanaric re're' reh chi nac'olok lok i kAja̱w etirirak tak chi coric wach ac'ux tak, chi ma' ch'uwa' ta nech' ok na'n tak ru'um i mahc eh chi ma'xta wo' jeno' k'oric ra̱j banaric chana̱ tak. Re' la' wih'ok awu̱c' tak re' sukquil c'uxlis chi awibil awi̱b tak.

C'olok wo' pan ac'ux tak chi wilic riwi̱' chi nim wach ricuybal i kAja̱w cu̱c' take c'acharel eh re're', re' wili riwi̱': Chi re're' ra̱j chi ewo' quico'ljic take c'acharel re're' chiwach i ti'c'axic nariyeb i Dios chi quina̱ take aj mahc. Re' c'ahchi' nik'orom wili re' wo' re' xitz'ihmbaj i wich aj k'orol c'uhbal ma' Lu̱' re' k'e̱' ti' nkic'raj. Re're' k'e̱' nimal wach rino'jbal xye'eric ru'um i Dios chi ritz'ihmjic i c'ahchi' nik'orom wo' je aweh tak.

Ma' xa ta chiri̱j i re' nk'oric chipam take ju'jun i hu̱j xitz'ihmbaj, nk'oric la' wo' chiri̱j i Jesus, xa re' la' ru' nank'oric i ma' Lu̱' chiri̱j re're', wilic take k'oric pa rihu̱j k'e̱' c'axic chi rakmajic chiri̱j eh re're' riwi̱' chi toco̱m chic riwi̱' take k'oric nanelic chi quiwach take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' nqueht'alij ta chi coric take tijinic re' c'uhtumaj keh hoj aj niminel. Re' take c'acharel re're' ma' cow ta ch'iclic quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus eh xa na̱ ru' toco̱m wo' nelic chi quiwach take k'oric nanquilow wach take toco̱m chic hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj cahnok chi pa̱m i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios. Ru'um aj chi je' re' nca'n take c'acharel re're', re' Dios narisacham quiwach.

Je' aj re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak, ru'um aj chi re' hat-tak ana'bem tak chic quino'jbal take c'acharel re're', re' xa re' wo' i c'ahbil laj no'jbal nca'n pan quic'acharic, chayohbalej awi̱b tak chi ma' eta nacoj tak wach take chucuj laj tijinic nquic'uhtaj, maj wi re' hat-tak nac'am tak na̱ nquik'or, enacana̱' tak lok pa reh animinic tak re' pa'lic wi̱' ac'ux tak chi cow.

Je' re' k'uru' chayohbalej awi̱b tak chi ma' eta na'n tak chi je' re', re' la' wili cha'n tak: Chatik tak ju' ac'acharic tak chi c'ahchi' ac'ulum tak riman rato'bil i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh c'ahchi' ok wo' rimanlajic wach awu̱c' tak i reht'aljic pa̱m rino'jbal. Re' Jesus, re're' aj Co'lonel eh je' wo' Ajabe̱s nok wilic. Ru'um aj re' ye'erok rilok'il chipam take k'i̱j wili eh je' wo' chiwach rik'ijil i junelic c'acharic. Je' ta nak re' banarok.

Re' hin ma' Wa̱n re' c'ahchi' nitz'ihminic reh hu̱j wili nanik'oric chiri̱j i Sakomonel Wach riNo'jbal i Dios keh hoj c'acharel eh aj Ye'ol wo' reh Junelic C'acharic. Re' aj Sakomonel re're' xa wilic wo' cho nok cu ja' nch'ihquic ta cho wach ac'al. Naxchalic ayu' wach ac'al, re' hin ch'i̱l take wich nahsil raj tahkanel i Sakomonel Wach riNo'jbal i Dios, xkilow wach eh xkabiraj wo' naxiban take c'uhbalanic. Je' re' ajic chi'nchel nic' pa' nimal xiban ribanaric i Sakomonel Wach riNo'jbal i Dios queh tinamit, re' hoj til xkilow chi coric take eh ma' xa ta re're' xkilow je' la' wo' naxuctic cho chi quixilac take camnak, xkatz'a'j wo' ro̱k rik'ab.

Chaj wa'ric nok c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam aweh tak i wili? C'ahchi' la' nitz'ihmbam ru'um chi re' hin ch'i̱l take wich nahsil raj tahkanel nka̱j chi naweht'alij tak chi re' Dios naxitak'a̱' cho ayu' wach ac'al i aj Ye'ol reh Junelic C'acharic, xiban cho chi je' re' reh chi re' hoj c'acharel nakilom wach ru'. Re' hoj til xkilow wach i aj Ye'ol reh Junelic C'acharic re're' eh ru'um re' yu'na nkayew kachi̱' chiri̱j i ricorquil chi re' Dios xtak'anic cho reh. Ru'um aj re' nankak'or aweh tak i k'oric chiri̱j i junelic c'acharic xye'eric chic keh, nkak'or wo' aweh tak chi je' wili hat-tak aj niminel: Coric, re' Ye'ol reh Junelic C'acharic keh hoj c'acharel xa wilic wo' nak cho ru̱c' Ajabe̱s Dios xa re' la' re' hin ch'i̱l take wich nahsil aj tahkanel reh Ye'ol reh Junelic C'acharic re're', til xkilow wach chi c'acharic china̱ ac'al wili naxtak'abjic cho.

Je' aj re' k'uru' re' kilom cho ch'i̱l kabiram cho ru̱c' aj Ye'ol reh Junelic C'acharic, re' wo' re' c'ahchi' kak'orom ribiral aweh yu'na i hat-tak aj niminel reh chi je' re', re' hat-tak eriban xa jenaj wach ac'ux tak ku̱c' i hoj chi rik'ormojic ribiral i Jesus re' aj Ye'ol reh Junelic C'acharic je' ricab nankak'or i c'uhbal chiri̱j ru', til riban xa jenaj chic wach kac'ux ru̱c' Ajabe̱s Dios ch'i̱l wo' i Jesus re' Lok' laj rAc'u̱n re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Je' re' ajic ru̱c' take c'ahchi' nik'orom wili re' ta nak re're' enbanic chi enchalic rinimal risukquil ac'ux tak eh chi je' re' enponic pan awa̱mna tak i riholonquilal take k'oric c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak.

Nok re' Jesus xwih'ic ayu' wach ac'al, xkabiraj cho ru̱c' chi̱' jenaj tijbal re' kap'utum chic cho rik'ormojic aweh tak wich'i̱l take wich nahsil aj tahkanel eh yu'na nakak'orom wo' chic aweh tak. Je' aj wili rik'or i tijbal re're': «Re' Dios, xa je' na ricab jeno' sakom nok wilic cho chi kana̱ eh je' ricab nok re' sakom ma' nwih'ic ta so' k'ekom ru̱c' je' wo' re' i Dios ma' nmahcanic ta so' xa re' la' i coric riban ribanaric, nqui rik'or.

Ru'um chi je' re' rik'or i c'uhbal re're' wilic take c'acharel nquik'or aweh tak chi je' wili: «Re' hoj wilco̱j pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ch'i̱l i Dios. Ru'um aj re' ma' re' ta k'orel to̱b ta pa rik'ekomil i mahc c'acharic nka'n, nqui nquik'or. Re' take c'acharel re're' ma' coric ta laj k'oric c'ahchi' quik'orom, ma' wo' c'ahchi' ta quic'acharic so' je' ricab rik'or i coric laj tijbal c'uhtumaj ru'um Jesus.

Tz'a̱b ru', wi xa kojc'acharic wo' pan coric je' ricab riwi̱' ric'acharic i Dios chi xa re' wo' i coric riban ribanaric ra̱j rik'orom chi til wilco̱j wo' pan jenaj wach c'uxlis quich'i̱l take kas kacha̱k' je' wo' ru̱c' i Dios eh ru'um re', wi xojmahcanic chi quiwach i kas kacha̱k' on chiwach i Dios, re're' ericuy kamahc wi xkapahkaj reh chi naricuyum kamahc. Ru'um aj wo' re', re' kAja̱w Jesus re' rAc'u̱n i Dios re' Pahbamaj wo' chi K'atal K'oric, xquimic reh chi re' hoj ekojcahnic chi ma'xta chic kamahc chiwach i Dios.

Yu'na kak'or wi wilic jeno' c'acharel pa rik'ekomil i mahc c'acharic riban eh to̱b ta je' re' riwi̱' ric'acharic cu rik'or chi re're' ma'xta nech' ok rimahc. Til nik'or chi re' c'acharel re're' xa re' wo' re' rijot' ri̱b ru̱c' chucuj k'oric riban. Ma' xa re' ta re' riban c'acharel re're', je' la' wo' ma' c'ahchi' ta ribanam je' ricab rik'or i coric laj tijbal.

Je' re' k'uru' wi re' hoj xojmahcanic kak'or wo' tak johtok reh i Dios chi re' hoj, hoj aj mahc chiwach maj wi je' re' nka'n re' Dios re' til riban chi nmanlajic wach take rik'orom cho eh re' xa coric wo' nbanic, re're' ericuy take cho kamahc eh chi je' re', riban chi re' hoj kojcahnic chi ma'xta c'ahbilal pan ka̱mna.

Je' aj re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, nok xa hab wach jeno' xmahcanic rik'or chi ma' xiban ta nech' ok mahc, re're' xa c'ahchi' ricojom i Dios chi aj chucul k'oric eh nik'or chi je' re' maj re' wo' Dios nk'oric chi re're' wilic pan mahc. Je' wo' chic, re' c'acharel re're' ru'um chi ma' rik'or ta johtok chi aj mahc chiwach i Dios ric'uhtaj lok chi ma' c'ahchi' ta ric'amam na̱ riC'uhbal i Dios.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' wilca̱t tak chi je' hat-tak wac'u̱n wixk'u̱n chi niwach, c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak take k'oric re' cu re' xnik'or lok wili chi ma' eta nacoj tak cho mahc pan ac'acharic tak. Re' cok ru' wi hab wach ok nchel aweh tak xmahcanic, cheht'alij chi chiwach i Ajabe̱s Dios wilic jenaj kaj to'o̱l re' nk'oric chiki̱j chiri̱j i kamahc. Re' kaj to'o̱l re're', re' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Ru'um chi re're' til manlic coric wach ric'ux, til nbirmijic ru'um i Dios.

Je' wo' chic ru'um chi re' Jesus xik'ahsaj ri̱b pan quimic chiki̱j je' ricab nok jenaj si̱ nk'ahsjic chi tojbal ri̱j kamahc, re' Dios nchol ricuyuric chi'nchel kamahc. Ma' xa re' ta kamahc i hoj je' la' wo' quimahc chi'nchel c'acharel china̱ ac'al wili.

Re' hoj re' nkak'or chi keht'alim chic rino'jbal i Dios kac'am tak na̱ chi'nchel haj wilic rik'or riC'uhbal chi naka'nam maj re' til nc'uhtunic lok wi̱' chi re' hoj keht'alim chic rino'jbal i Dios, re' chi re' hoj nkac'am na̱ haj wilic i tak'anic riban keh ru̱c' riC'uhbal.

Je' re' nok wi hab wach rik'or chi re're' reht'alim rino'jbal i Jesus eh ma' ric'am ta na̱ chi'nchel haj wilic rik'or riC'uhbal i Dios chi naribanaric, re' aj k'orol re're' ncahnic chi xa aj chucul k'oric. Ru̱c' re're' ma' c'ahchi' ta wo' ribanam je' ricab rik'or i coric laj c'uhbal.

Je' wo' chic riban chi enk'ormojic chiri̱j chi re're' ma' ric'ax ta take rich c'acharel. Raj nchel hab wach ric'am na̱ haj wilic rik'or ritijbal i Jesus, til pan coric je' wili nc'uluric ru̱c': Re' ric'axbal i Dios nq'uihic wach pa ra̱mna cu rehtal re' c'acharel re're' ric'ax take rich c'acharel ru̱c' chi'nchel ric'ux. Je' aj re' ru' ru̱c' ric'amaric na̱ ritijbal i Jesus, re' hoj kojchol quic'axaric take kich c'acharel eh chi je' re' nkeht'alij chi wilco̱j pan jenaj chic wach c'uxlis ch'i̱l i kAja̱w Jesus.
Je' re' nik'or maj wi re' hoj nkak'or chi c'acharic nka'n chi ri'sil ro̱k k'ab i Jesus, ra̱j rik'orom chi nakac'acharic ru̱c' rino'jbal je' ricab xc'acharic wi̱' i Jesus.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel reh Jesus, re' k'oric chiri̱j c'axoj i̱b ma' re' ta nchel jeno' chic ac' laj tijbal, xa re' la' wo' i tijbal xap'ut tak cho ribirmijic pan p'utbal cho reh animinic tak. Je' re' k'uru' re' c'uhbal c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak xa re' wo' i najtir chic ap'utum tak cho ribirmijic eh ma' toco̱m ta chic.

Re' cok ru', ru̱c' i k'oric chiri̱j i c'axoj i̱b c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak nelic lok wach sakom i jenaj chic ac' c'uhbal re' rik'or chi til nic' pa' wach coric chi re' kAja̱w Jesus xa nsakomonic chic pa̱m i ra̱mna reh holonquilal laj no'jbal je' ricab nok jeno' sakombal xa nch'abch'atic chic risakomil. Til coric wo' chi re' c'ahbilal c'ahchi' chic resmejic lok pan ca̱mna take c'acharel je' ricab c'ahchi' ric'uhtunic lok chipam ac'acharic hat-tak.

Ru'um aj re', hab wach nk'oric chi wilic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ch'i̱l i Dios je' wo' quich'i̱l take quiniminic reh eh wi xa cu rixowej wo' wach i rich aj niminel, re' c'acharel re're' xa cu pan k'ekom laj no'jbal wo' c'acharic riban.
Raj hab wach ric'ax i rich aj niminel, re're' xa c'acharic wo' riban pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ch'i̱l i Dios je' wo' quich'i̱l take quiniminic reh eh chi je' re' ma'xta bih enk'ehbic wi̱' pan mahc.

Re' aj re' riwi̱' k'uru' chi nik'or je aweh tak chi xa hab wach rixowej wach i rich aj niminel xa cu pan k'ekom laj no'jbal wo' c'acharic riban. Ru'um chi ma' rirak ta chic chiri̱j jaruj enkajic pan mahc chi xa ma'xta pa ric'ux ru'um chi k'ekomsamaj chic wach ricapew-bal, re' c'acharel re're' no̱j riban chi je' ricab jenaj sot' ma' reht'alim ta wo' haj narimolom je ru'um chi ma' nilbic ta.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' wilca̱t tak chi je' hat-tak wac'u̱n wixk'u̱n chi niwach, c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak i wili reh chi na̱tikim tak ju' rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus. Re're' wilic rajawric chi narik'oric chiki̱j chiwach Ajabe̱s Dios eh ru'um re're' na nk'oric chawi̱j tak, re' hat-tak cuyu̱j chic amahc tak.

Je' wo' c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je wili queh take c'amol be̱h chaxilac tak re' je' quicab tutbe̱s ajabe̱s chana̱ tak pan niminic. Re' take re' queht'alim chic rino'jbal i Jesus chi manlic re' xa c'achlic wo' cho nok ja' nch'ihquic ta cho wach ac'al. Re' hin c'ahchi' wo' nitz'ihmbam je i wili aweh hat-tak caj to'bonel take c'amol be̱h re' je' acab tak take q'uijolak ch'i̱l k'ahxokak chi cu cow co̱k quik'ab. Je' re' nik'or maj re' hat-tak xayak'abej chic pan awo̱k tak i rajawric aj Yahm re' banol reh c'ahbilal. Je' aj re' ru' chawunchelal hat-tak wich aj niminel, c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak i wili ru'um nok re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chic rino'jbal i Ajabe̱s Dios.

Re' hat-tak aj c'amol be̱h re' je' quicab tutbe̱s ajabe̱s chi quina̱ take aj niminel, c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak i tijbal wili chiri̱j c'axoj i̱b ru'um nok aweht'alim tak chic rino'jbal i Jesus chi manlic re' xa c'achlic wo' cho nok ja' nch'ihquic ta cho wach ac'al. Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' wilca̱t tak chi je' hat-tak wac'u̱n wixk'u̱n chi niwach, re' je' acab tak take q'uijolak ch'i̱l take k'ahxokak chi cu cow co̱k quik'ab, c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak i c'uhbal wili ru'um nok cu yu'na chi k'i̱j c'ahchi' ac'amam tak na̱ riC'uhbal i Dios eh xayak'abej pan awo̱k tak rajawric aj Yahm re' banol reh c'ahbilal.

Ch'i̱l take k'oric c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak, nik'or wo' je aweh tak i wili: Ma̱yew tak chic ac'ux chiri̱j i c'ahbil laj no'jbal nbanaric china̱ ac'al wili, ma' wo' chiri̱j nca'n take i c'ahbil laj c'acharel wilic ayu' wach ac'al ma' holohic ta laj aj k'orol take. Wi hab wach riyew ric'ux chiri̱j ru' ra̱j rik'orom chi re' c'axoj i̱b nchalic ru̱c' Ajabe̱s Dios ma' ja'xta ru̱c'.

Nik'or chi je' re' maj nic' pa' nimal nca'n take c'ahbil laj c'acharel wilque̱b ayu' wach ac'al, je' ricab i c'ahbilal nquic'ax wach ribanaric nanquilow i ma' holohic ta c'ahchi' ribanaric chi quiwach, on re' ye'o̱j c'uxlis chiri̱j i mahc npok' cho pan ca̱mna ch'i̱l i nimsinic wachi̱s ru̱c' take pa' bih nwih'ic reh pa ric'acharic, chi'nchel re're' ma' re' ta Dios ncojbic pan ca̱mna ribanaric, pan ca̱mna la' take c'ahbil laj c'acharel wilque̱b china̱ ac'al wili npok' cho.

Chaj wa'ric ma' eta riban chi enkayew kac'ux chiri̱j quino'jbal take c'ahbil laj c'acharel? Ma'eta riban maj je' ricab chi re' ac'al wili tiklic cho wach i k'i̱j chi narisahchic wach, je' wo' re' take nquiyew quic'ux chiri̱j quino'jbal take c'ahbil laj c'acharel narisacharic wo' quiwach. Nik'or chi je' re' maj chi'nchel re're' ch'i̱l i ric'axaric wach take xa pa' bih wilic china̱, xa iq'ue̱l wo' take raj la' take nquiyew quic'ux chi ribanaric i ra̱j i Dios re' take re' ma'xta risahchic quiwach til la' naquic'amaric je chipam i junelic c'acharic.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' wilca̱t tak chi je' hat-tak wac'u̱n wixk'u̱n chi niwach, ru'um chi xabiraj tak chic chi nac'olok lok i k'etol wach rik'orbal i Jesus ra̱j rik'orom chi wilco̱j chic chipam take cohlsbal wach k'i̱j, re' wili nanik'orom aweh tak yu'na: Re' hoj wilco̱j chic chipam take cohlsbal wach k'i̱j k'oro̱j cho re're'. Nic' wo' wach nakeht'alij chi wilco̱j chic chipam take cohlsbal wach k'i̱j re're'? Keht'alim ru'um nok yohbal wach take aj k'etol wach rik'orbal i Jesus p'uht chic cuctic cho chaxilac tak.

Re' take aj k'etol wach rik'orbal i Jesus re're', chi xilac wo' nak acomonil tak wilque̱b xa re' la' ru'um chi ma' coric ta wo' quiwach chi kich raj tahkanel i Jesus take ru'um i re' xi'elic je chaxilac tak. Nic' wach naxkeht'alij chi ma' coric ta queh niminic chaxilac tak? Xkeht'alij ru'um nok yu'na re' take re' ma' wilque̱b ta chic chipam i kacomonil i hoj raj tahkanel i Jesus. Raj la' wili xye'eric k'ab queh ru'um i Dios chi xi'elic je chaxilac tak c'uhtbal reh chi chi'nchel take nic' nimal xi'elic lok re're' ma' re' ta kich aj niminel reh Jesus take chi coric

ru'um chi xquicoj wach i ma' coric ta laj c'uhtunic. Raj awu̱c' hat-tak ma' je' ta re' maj re' hat-tak ye'o̱j chic aweh tak i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios ru'um reh Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus eh chi je' re' naweht'alij tak chic chi ma' re' ta i coric laj tijinic c'ahchi' ric'uhtjic aweh tak cu'um take aj chucuj aj c'uhbalanel.

Ru'um aj re', re' hin c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak i hu̱j wili maj re' hat-tak ma' je' ta acab tak take ma' nqueht'alij ta na nc'uhtjic queh i coric laj tijinic. Je' wo' chic c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak chi je' re' maj re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi re' chucuj k'oric ma' re' ta ru̱c' i Dios nchalic ribanaric maj ru̱c' i Dios xa re' wach i coric wilic ru̱c'!

Nic' wach nakeht'alij nok c'ahchi' kabiram jeno' aj chucul k'oric? Re' hoj nkeht'alij ru' nok jeno' c'acharel rik'or chi ma' coric ta chi re' Jesus re' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh ru̱c' re're' ma' ricoj ta ru̱c' ra̱mna i tijbal rik'or chi re' Dios, re're' rAja̱w i Jesus eh chi re' Jesus xa re' wach re' i rAc'u̱n i Ajabe̱s Dios. Je' aj re', re' c'acharel re're' no̱j riban chi aj k'etol wach rik'orbal i Jesus.

Re' cok ru' xa hab wach rik'et wach rik'orbal Ac'unbe̱s Dios ra̱j rik'orom chi re' Ajabe̱s Dios ma' re' ta re' wilic chi Ajabe̱s china̱. Tz'a̱b ru' xa hab wach rik'or chi re' Jesus re're' rAc'u̱n i Dios ra̱j rik'orom chi re' wo' Ajabe̱s Dios wilic chi Ajabe̱s china̱.

Ru'um aj re', re' hin nik'or je aweh tak chi chac'am tak na̱ chi coric i tijbal ap'utum tak cho ribirmijic pan p'utbal cho reh animinic tak. Wi xac'am tak na̱ i tijbal re're' chi coric, re' hat-tak na̱wih'ic tak pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ru̱c' Ac'unbe̱s Dios ch'i̱l wo' ru̱c' Ajabe̱s Dios.
Ma' xa ta re're', wi la' xatniminic tak chi coric chipam i c'uhbal re're' na̱c'acharic wo' tak chi junelic ar pan taxa̱j maj je' re' rik'orbal riyeb cahnok i Jesus.

Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel reh Jesus, c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak i hu̱j wili chi riye'eric je rehtal aweh tak chiqui̱j take c'acharel xi'uctubic cho chi ajot'oric chipam animinic tak.

Re' take re' til nca̱j nak ajot'oric chipam animinic tak xa re' la' hin ch'iclic nic'ux chi re' hat-tak ma' eta tijot'oric tak chipam animinic tak maj re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios ye'o̱j aweh tak wilic pan awa̱mna tak chi awaj tijinel tak eh chi je' re' ma' curman ta chic chaweh tak chi hab ta nak wach jeno' chucul aj tijinel entijinic aweh tak. Chi je' aj re' nik'or je aweh tak, chatik tak ju' ric'amaric na̱ haj wilic i tiritijej tak wi̱' i Lok' laj Uxlabal maj re' Lok' laj Uxlabal, re're' nk'oric aweh tak nic' pa' nimal take tijinic naricamanic reh animinic tak eh chi'nchel nic' pa' nimal ric'uhtaj aweh tak, til coric ma' re' ta nchel xa chucuj k'oric.

Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' wilca̱t tak chi je' hat-tak wac'u̱n wixk'u̱n chi niwach, nik'or wo' chic je aweh tak chi tic'acharok tak chi ri'sil ro̱k k'ab i Jesus. Wi xa je' wo' re' c'acharic naka'nam chi'nchel i hoj aj niminel nac'olok lok i Jesus, ma'xta bih nakayo'jic wi̱' eh ma' xa ta re're', je' la' wo' wi ma' xoj-jot'oric chipam kaniminic, re're' ma'xta kojriyeb pan q'uixbilal nakojwih'ok cok chiwach.

Je' wo' nik'or wo' aweh tak chi je' ricab chi re' rino'jbal i jenaj c'acharel ric'uhtaj lok hab wach i raja̱w, chaweht'alij wo' tak chi xa hab wach aweh hat-tak aj niminel ritahkej ribanaric i coric wach no'jbal ric'uhtaj wo' lok chi re're' manlic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios ru'um nok re' Dios til coric wach rino'jbal je' ricab wo' aweht'alim hat-tak.

Je' re' k'uru', sahchok aj kac'ux ru̱c' i rik'orom i Dios chi re' take quiniminic reh re' cok take re' til rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n take. Re' riwi̱' chi je' re' rik'orom cho kAja̱w Dios ru'um chi k'e̱' kojric'ax. Je' re' ajic re' hoj yu'na, hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios eh wi coric chi je' re', chaj wa'ric k'uru' chi wilic take tinamit china̱ ac'al wili re' nquik'or chi ma' coric ta chi je' re'? Re' aj wili riwi̱': Re' take tinamit re're' ma' nquicoj ta wach re're' ru'um nok chi queh ma' coric ta wo' chi re' Jesus re're' i rAc'u̱n i Dios.

Hat-tak was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak, til coric yu'na hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios xa re' la' ru'um chi re' kAja̱w Jesus ma' ja' ric'uhtaj ta cho ri̱b chi c'ahchi' ric'uhtam cho rinimal rilok'il, re' Dios ma' ja' ric'uhtaj ta wo' keh hoj kojniminic reh nic' wach til kalok'il nariwih'ic i hoj. Xa re' cok haj wilic keht'alim re' chi nachic'uhtaj cho ri̱b i kAja̱w Jesus ch'i̱l rinimal rilok'il, re' Dios naric'uhtam wo' keh i kalok'il nariwih'ic eh ar aj ru' naric'uhtunic chi til hoj manlic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n maj nakilow wach til nic' wach rino'jbal eh nic' wo' wach nca'yic, ar ajic naka'nam chi jenaj chic wach kalok'il ch'i̱l i kAja̱w Jesus.
Je' re' ajic hab wach ch'iclic ric'ux chi narilom wach i kAja̱w Jesus curman chi reh chi ma'xta chic ribanam i c'ahbilal je' ricab nok re' Jesus ma' re' ta pan c'ahbilal wilic.

Je' wo' chic, re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi xa hab pa' wach ritik ju' wih'ic pan mahc, re're' c'ahchi' riyak'abem pa ro̱k take tak'anic riban i Dios maj re' ribanaric xa pa' bih c'ahbil laj no'jbal jenaj mahc nim wach chiwach i Dios eh xa na̱ ru' ru̱c' re're' c'ahchi' riyak'abem pa ro̱k chi'nchel c'uhbal.

Chi je' aj re' k'uru', nik'or aweh tak chi ma' timahcanic tak chic maj re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chic chi re' Jesus xc'ulic china̱ ac'al wili chi risacharic wach i ransil i mahc eh ma' xa ta re're' aweht'alim tak, je' la' wo' aweht'alim tak chi re' Jesus ma' re' ta wo' aj mahc.

Ru'um aj re' hab wach xinimej chic i c'uhbal ribiram cho pan p'utbal reh riniminic, ma' riyew ta chic ric'ux chi mahcanic maj re' xa cu c'ahchi' wo' chi mahcanic, re're' ja' reht'alim ta pa̱m i rino'jbal i Jesus eh ma' ricojom ta wo' wach i Jesus pa ric'acharic.

Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' wilca̱t tak chi je' hat-tak wac'u̱n wixk'u̱n chi niwach, ma' hab wach njot'bic aweh tak, charak la' tak chiri̱j ribanaric i coric maj re' nbanic i coric ric'uhtaj lok chi re're' rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios eh chi je' re' coric wo' wach ric'ux je' ricab nok re' Jesus coric wach ric'ux.

Raj i c'acharel re' riban ribanaric i mahc pa ric'acharic, re're' ric'uhtaj lok chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n aj Yahm eh je' re' nik'or maj re' aj Yahm xa re' wo' naxip'ut cho mahcanic, ma' rimayam ta cu yu'na chi k'i̱j. Raj cok i Jesus re' til manlic rAc'u̱n i Dios, re're' xc'ulic lok chi risacharic wach chi'nchel ricamaj riban aj Yahm china̱ ac'al wili.

Je' re' ajic hab wach rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n chic i Dios ma' eta chic ritahkej ribanaric i mahc. Je' re' nik'or ru'um i wili: Re' rija'quil ribanaric i coric xcojoric pa ra̱mna ru'um i Dios, re' chic re' wilic ru̱c' pa ric'acharic eh ru'um chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n chic i Dios, ma' riban ta wo' chi cu eritik ju' ribanaric i mahc chiwach i Dios.

Nic' wach nanc'uhtunic lok chi hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios? Re' wili nc'uhtunic lok wi̱': Wi hab wach jeno' ma' ritahkej ta i coric eh ma' ric'ax ta wo' take ras richa̱k' ra̱j rik'orom chi re're' rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n aj Yahm eh ma' re' ta rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios. Re' aj re' nc'utunic lok wi̱' chi jeno' c'acharel ma' re' ta rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios.

Je' wo' chic nik'or chi ma' re' ta rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios maj ma' c'ahchi' ta ric'amam na̱ i tijbal kabiram cho pan p'uhtbal reh kaniminic re' je' wili rik'or: «C'ul chac'ax awi̱b chawach tak, nqui rik'or.

Ru̱c' aj re', re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi c'ul kac'ax tak ki̱b chi kawach ma' ok nkixowej wach jeno' kas kacha̱k' je' ricab xiban i Cayin re' xicansaj i richa̱k' ru'um reh c'ahbilal xcojoric pa ra̱mna ru'um aj Yahm. Chaj bih riwi̱' naxicansaj i richa̱k'? Xa ru'um chi rixowej wach i richa̱k' maj re' take ribano̱j i Cayin ma' holohic ta take eh tz'a̱b ru' i richa̱k', holohic take ribano̱j eh xa coric wo' wach ric'ux chiwach i Dios.
Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel reh Jesus, ma' nsahchic ac'ux tak chi wilic take c'ahbil laj c'acharel nquixowej kawach i hoj aj niminel re' wilco̱j chic pa rik'ab i Ye'ol reh Junelic C'acharic.

Nic' wach na keht'alij re're' eh chi ma' wilco̱j ta chic chi quixilac take xa cu wilic wo' i junelic quimic chi quina̱? Re' hoj nkeht'alij chi je' re' maj c'ahchi' kac'axam ki̱b chi kaju'junal, re' cok hab wach ma' ric'ax ta wo' i ras richa̱k' re' cok re' xa cu wilic wo' i junelic quimic china̱.

Til coric nik'or aweh tak xa hab wach rixowej wach i ras richa̱k', re're' xa je' na ricab jeno' aj cansanel ras richa̱k' nok wilic chiwach i Dios eh re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi ma' jeno' aj cansanel erirak i junelic c'acharic ru̱c' i Dios wi ma' xicana̱' ribanaric i mahc.

Je' re' k'uru' chac'ax tak take c'acharel eh je' re' nik'or maj re' hat-tak aweht'alim wo' tak haj wilic rinimal ric'axbal i Dios xic'uhtaj i Jesus. Haj wilic rinimal i c'axo̱j re're'? Re' rinimal c'axo̱j re're', re' chi re' Jesus xiyew ri̱b pan quimic chi kajelow-bal i hoj. Ru'um aj re' je' wo' re' naka'nam i hoj cu̱c' take kas kacha̱k'. Ru'um chi je' re', kak'ahsaj wo' tak i kac'acharic pan k'ab i Dios chi quitobjic ru̱c' quic'axquilal pan quic'acharic.

Je' ricab wi hab wach jeno' wilic chi'nchel reh ayu' wach ac'al eh wi rilow i ras richa̱k' chi pan niba'il wilic chito'bej ru'. Raj la' wi re' wilic chi'nchel reh ayu' wach ac'al xa ta nak nc'uyu'jic so' i ra̱mna chi ritobjic, nic' wach nachik'or chi re' Dios ncamanic pa ra̱mna chi ric'axaric take ras richa̱k'?

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' wilca̱t tak chi je' hat-tak wac'u̱n wixk'u̱n chi niwach, til nik'or aweh tak chi kac'ax wo' tak ki̱b chi coric eh til wo' c'uhtunok lok wach chi je' re' ma' ok ma' xa re' kachi̱' nk'oric chi nkac'ax ki̱b.

Chi je' re' nok re' hoj c'ahchi' kac'axam take kas kacha̱k' chi coric re' hoj enkana'bej chi re' hoj c'ahchi' katahkem i coric laj c'uhtunic. Ma' xa re' ta re', je' la' wo' nanka'n kati̱j chiwach kAja̱w Dios, ma' kojyo'jic ta chi wilco̱j chiwach

to̱b ta nchel re' kacapew-bal ric'raj chi xka'n jeno' mahc. To̱b ta wo' je' re' ric'raj i kacapew-bal, re' Dios xa naribiram wo' cho kati̱j nka'n johtok chiwach. Je' re' nik'or ru'um chi re' kaDios re' neht'alanic cho reh chi'nchel chaj bih nc'uluric, k'e̱' wo' chic rajawric chi reht'aljic pa̱m kacapew-bal je' wo' chi narilom cho pa̱m i ka̱mna chi til coric wach chiwach.

Je' re' ajic was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak, nok re' ka̱mna til coric wach chiwach i Dios ma' riban ta chi enk'ormojic chi hoj aj mahc. Ru'um chi je' re' kawi̱' nok wilco̱j chiwach i Dios re' hoj til nkach'ica̱' kac'ux chi re' Dios naribiram cho kati̱j
eh chi xa ewo' nkac'ul i pa' bih enkapahkaj johtok reh ma' ru'um ta chi nponic chiwach i kano'jbal je' la' wo' ru'um chi nponic chiwach chi nkac'am wo' na̱ riC'uhbal ritak'a̱b keh chi nakanimem.

Re' c'uhbal re're' je' wili rik'or: «Chacoj tak wach i k'oro̱j chiri̱j i Jesus chi re're' rAc'u̱n i Dios eh je' wo' chi re're' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Chac'ax wo' awi̱b chawach tak maj re're' i tak'anic xiban cho i Dios, nqui rik'or i c'uhbal re're'.

Ru'um aj re' hab wach ric'am na̱ take riC'uhbal i Dios, re're' pan k'ab i Dios wilic ric'acharic eh re' wo' re' wilic ru̱c' chi junelic. Nic' aj wach nok re' hoj enkeht'alij chi re' Dios wilic pan kac'acharic? Re' hoj enkeht'alij re're' ru'um reh Lok' laj Uxlabal xiyew keh.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak, ru'um chi ayu' wach ac'al yohbal wach take chucul aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios xi'uctubic cho nwa̱j nik'orom je aweh tak i wili: Wi wilic jeno' rik'or chi re're' nk'oric chi sakomomaj pa̱m ricapew-bal ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios, ma' xa ru'um ta ti re' enanimej tak i c'uhbal rik'or. Ma' je' ta re', re' la' hat-tak til cha'n tak ri̱j chajaric chi uxlabal nquimelenic reh i winak re're', wi til re' i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios on ma' re' ta.

Nic' wach nacharak tak chiri̱j chi re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios nk'oric ru̱c' chi̱' jeno' aj c'uhbalanel? Re' wili na̱rakam tak wi̱' chiri̱j: Wi re' aj c'uhbalanel ricoj wach eh rik'or chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xc'ulic c'acharok china̱ ac'al wili chi til je' ricab kawi̱' i hoj c'acharel, re're' rehtalil chi re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios nk'oric ru̱c' chi̱' aj c'uhbalanel re're'.

Raj wi jeno' aj c'uhbalanel ma' ricoj ta wach eh ma' rik'or ta chi re' Jesus xc'ulic c'acharok china̱ ac'al wili chi til je' ricab kawi̱' i hoj c'acharel, re're' rehtalil chi ma' re' ta Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios nk'oric ru̱c' chi̱' aj c'uhbalanel re're', re' la' take k'oric rik'or i aj c'uhbalanel re're' ar nchalic ru̱c' aj k'etol wach rik'orbal i Dios. Pa ricorquilal, re' hat-tak abiram tak chic ribiral chi nariponic rik'ijil chi naquic'ulic lok take toco̱m chic aj c'uhbalanel je' re' quiwi̱', xa re' la' nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi re' take aj chucul laj aj c'uhbalanel re're' wilque̱b chic china̱ ac'al wili chi jot'o̱j.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' wilca̱t tak chi je' hat-tak wac'u̱n wixk'u̱n chi niwach, til coric chi re' aj Yahm nye'bic queh take k'oric k'oro̱j cu'um take aj c'uhbalanel re're', re're' wilic wo' rajawric, xa re' la' nik'or aweh tak chi re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios wilic pan awa̱mna hat-tak, re're' til k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal rajawric wilic chiwach ru'. Ru'um aj re', naxquiniq'uej nak ajot'oric tak cu'um take c'uhbalanel re're' ru̱c' c'uhtunic nca'n, ma' xac'ul ta tak i c'uhtunic re're'.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' quic'uhtunic ru' ma' re' ta ru̱c' Dios nchalic ar la' nchalic cu̱c' take c'acharel re' ma' nquinimej ta i Dios. Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi re' quic'uhtunic ru' xa re' wo' take c'acharel ma' quiniminic ta reh i Dios quic'ulbic reh.

Raj cok i hoj re' kojk'oric reh ribiral i Jesus, til hoj rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios eh ru'um chi je' re' kawi̱', til nkarak chiri̱j chi re' Lok' laj Uxlabal nc'uhtunic reh i ricorquilal eh wi re're' c'ahchi' riye'bic rik'orbal jeno' aj c'uhbalanel on wi re' aj Yahm c'ahchi' riye'bic rik'orbal. Je' wo', je' wili nc'uluric cu̱c' take c'acharel quibirinic reh kac'uhtunic: Re' c'acharel ricojom wach i Dios re're' til ric'ul chi coric kac'uhtunic. Raj nchel i c'acharel ma' re' ta rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios, re're' ma' ric'ul ta kac'uhtunic.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak, re' c'axoj i̱b ar nchalic ru̱c' i Dios. Ru'um aj re' kac'ax tak ki̱b chi kawach rehtalil chi hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios. Je' re' nik'or chi cha'n tak maj xa hab wach ric'ax i ras richa̱k' ra̱j rik'orom chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n chic i Dios. Ma' xa re' ta re', je' la' wo' wi je' re' riban re're' til c'ahchi' ric'uhtam chi reht'alim i rino'jbal i Dios chi coric.

Tz'a̱b ru' wi ma' ric'ax ta ras richa̱k', ra̱j rik'orom chi ma' reht'alim ta rino'jbal i Dios chi coric maj wi ta nak reht'alim rino'jbal i Dios re' wo' nak rino'jbal ru' ric'am tz'eht reh ru'um nok re' Dios manlic aj c'axo̱l.

Nic' wach nanc'uhtunic chi re' Dios wilic cho ric'axbal chi kana̱? Re' wili nc'utunic wi̱': Chi re're' xitak'a̱' cho ayu' wach ac'al i Lok' laj rAc'u̱n re' xa jenaj wo' ti chiwach eh je' re' xiban reh chi re' hoj nakac'acharic ru̱c' i Dios chi junelic.

Je' re' ajic re' ric'axbal i Dios re're', re' wili nc'utunic wi̱': Chi re're' xitak'a̱' cho rAc'u̱n chi xquimic chiki̱j chi tojbal wach i kamahc eh je' re' xiban ru'um chi k'e̱' rinimal cho ric'axbal chi kana̱, ma' ru'um ta nchel chi re' hoj c'ahchi' kac'axam i Dios.
Ru'um aj re' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak, ru'um chi re' Dios k'e̱' xojric'ax naxitak'a̱' cho rAc'u̱n chi quimic chiki̱j, je' wo' re' ric'axaric ki̱b ka'n i hoj chi kawach.
