Je' re' nik'or chi ka'n maj nok re' hoj nkac'ax take kas kacha̱k' ra̱j rik'orom chi re' Dios re' ma' nkilow ta wach til nic' wach je' riwi̱' ru'um nok ma' hab ta wach rilom wach riwi̱' i Dios, re're' til wilic ku̱c' eh re' ric'axbal wilic wo' pan ka̱mna chi manlic.
Re' hoj aj niminel keht'alim chi re' Dios wilic pan kac'acharic eh chi re' hoj wilco̱j wo' pan k'ab maj re' Dios xiyew cho keh i Lok' laj rUxlabal.

Ma' xa re' ta riye'eric cho keh i Lok' laj rUxlabal xiban i Dios, til la' wo' xitak'a̱' cho ayu' wach ac'al i Lok' laj rAc'u̱n re' xchalic chi kaco'ljic hoj chi'nchel c'acharel chiwach i ti'c'axic nariye'eric chi quina̱ take aj mahc. Re' Lok' laj Ac'unbe̱s re're', re' wo' re' nkayew kachi̱' chiri̱j ch'i̱l take wich nahsil raj tahkanel nok nkak'or chi til coric chi xkilow i ric'ulic i Lok' laj Ac'unbe̱s re're'.

Ru'um chi til coric chi re' Dios xitak'a̱' cho ayu' wach ac'al i Lok' laj rAc'u̱n, xa hab aj wach ricoj wach eh rik'or chi re' Jesus til rAc'u̱n i Dios re're', til ric'uhtaj chi pa rik'ab i Dios wilic ric'acharic eh chi re' wo' Dios wilic pa ric'acharic.

Je' aj re' nc'uhtunic wi̱' i c'acharel c'acharic riban pan c'axoj i̱b eh til wo' je' re' naribanam je' ricab ric'ul chi keh hoj aj niminel reh Jesus chi je' re' c'acharic naka'nam ru'um chi nkeht'alij chi xa re' wo' Dios til manlic aj c'axo̱l. Je' aj re' riwi̱' c'acharic nka'n ru'um chi keht'alim chic eh nkach'ica̱' wo' kac'ux chiri̱j i ricorquilal chi re' Dios aj c'axol cho keh.

Re' riwi̱' i c'acharic nka'n ayu' wach ac'al xa je' ricab riwi̱' i ric'acharic Jesus. Chi je' re' riwi̱' i kac'acharic, kojcholok aj quic'axaric take kas kacha̱k' chi manlic. Wi je' re' nka'n, til nachirak cho rik'ijil chi re' Dios narich'ukum k'oric chi quina̱ take c'acharel naribanam chi re' hoj nakawih'ic chiwach chi ch'iclic kac'ux chi ma' jeno' ti'c'axic nariye'eric chi kana̱.

Je' re' wih'ic chiwach naka'nam ru'um nok ru̱c' i ric'axbal i Dios wilic chic pan ka̱mna xkac'ax take kas kacha̱k'. Ru'um aj chi je' re' xka'n chi manlic, re' yo'jic re' nchalic nak chi kana̱ ru'um ti'c'axic nariyeb nak chi kana̱ i Dios ma'xta chic roquic cho ku̱c' pan ka̱mna nok ekojwih'ic chiwach. Je' re' nik'or maj keht'alim chi nabanarok ch'ukuj k'oric chi quina̱ tinamit, xa re' take wilic yo'jic pan ca̱mna riwi̱' chi queh chi naquic'ulum i ti'c'axic ru'um i Dios. Je' re' nik'or maj wi re' take c'acharel nok wilque̱b chiwach i Dios xa cu quiyo'jic wo' chi enchalic i ti'c'axic chi quina̱, re're' ra̱j rik'orom chi ma' xquic'ax ta take cas quicha̱k' chi manlic.
Ru'um chi re' Dios xojric'ax cho i hoj chi pe̱t, re' hoj nkac'ax wo' ru' eh nkac'ax wo' take kas kacha̱k', maje'?

Chi je' aj re' wi hab wach rik'or chi ric'ax i Dios xa re' la' cu rixowej wach i ras richa̱k', re' c'acharel re're' xa aj chucul k'oric nok wilic. Je' re' nik'or maj wi ma' ric'ax ta i ras richa̱k' re' c'ahchi' rilom wach nic' wach nachik'or chi ric'ax i Dios re' ma' rilow ta wach?

Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, kac'ax tak ki̱b chi kawach maj re' Dios je' wili tak'anic riban cho: “Xa hab wach c'acharel raj qui̱n ric'axam i hin Dios, chic'ax wo' i ras richa̱k', nqui tak'anic ribanam cho i Dios.

Je' wo' chic, ru'um chi re' Dios xye'bic reh i junelic c'acharic queh chi'nchel c'acharel nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' take re're' quic'axbic reh i Dios re' Ajabe̱s chi quina̱ take aj niminel riwi̱' chi queh chi naquic'axam wo' take quich aj niminel re' xye'eric wo' queh i junelic c'acharic ru'um i Dios je' ricab ric'axaric riban jeno' ajabe̱s ru̱c' take riha'lac'u̱n.

Je' re' ajic je' ricab keht'alim chi nankac'ax i kAja̱w Dios ra̱j rik'orom chi nkac'ax wo' take nic' nimal rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n ru', je' wo' re' keht'alim i hoj chi nankac'ax i Dios eh nankac'am wo' na̱ take tak'anic riban cho, c'ahchi' wo' kac'axam take kas kacha̱k'. Je' re' nik'or maj re' rehtalil nc'uhtunic wi̱' chi re' hoj nkac'ax take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios, re' chi re' hoj nkac'ax i Dios eh nkac'am wo' na̱ take tak'anic ribanam cho.

Je' re' k'uru' re' ric'amaric na̱ take tak'anic riban i Dios, re're' i rehtalil nkac'uhtaj wo' lok wi̱' i hoj chi c'ahchi' kac'axam i Dios. Re' take ritak'anic i Dios to̱b ta nak c'axic take chi c'amaric na̱, re' hoj xa ewo' nka'n ribanaric ric'amaric na̱

eh re' riwi̱' chi je' re' nka'n ru'um chi hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios. Ru'um chi je' chic re' kawi̱' chiwach, nkayak'abej wo' pan ko̱k take quic'ahbilal laj no'jbal nca'n take c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al. Chaj bih riwi̱' chi nkayak'abej pan ko̱k chi'nchel re're'? Nka'n ru'um chi ch'iclic chic kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus chi re're' rAc'u̱n i Dios.

Je' re' nik'or maj til coric, ma' hab ta wach xa chi ribil ri̱b riyak'abej pa ro̱k take c'ahbil laj no'jbal nca'n take c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al, re' la' i c'acharel re' rich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Jesus chi re're' rAc'u̱n i Dios xa re' wach re' til wilic rajawric chi ribanaric.

Naxc'ulic i Jesus ayu' wach ac'al, til re' wo' Dios tak'anic cho reh. Chi rehtalil i rip'uhtic cho i ricamaj, re're' xikahsaj riha̱'. Je' wo', naxiyew ri̱b chi quimic chiki̱j wach curu̱s re' xichihcaj wi̱' riquiq'ue̱l ar wo' xcahnic rehtalil chi ar xicohlaj wach ricamaj. Je' re' ajic re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, ma' xa re' ta rikahsjic riha̱' xiban je' la' wo' xiyew ri̱b chi quimic chiki̱j naxichihcaj riquiq'ue̱l eh re' hoj ch'iclic kac'ux chiri̱j i ricorquil k'oric re're' je' ricab rik'or wo' i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios maj re' Lok' laj Uxlabal re're' aj c'uhtem reh i coric.
Je' re' ajic, je' ricab ar pan taxa̱j til re' take xib wili nca'n jenaj wach quic'ux chi riye'jic quik'orbal: Re' Ajabe̱s Dios, re' Ac'unbe̱s Dios eh ch'i̱l i Lok' laj Uxlabal,

je' wo' re' ayu' china̱ ac'al, re' wo' take xib wili nkeht'alij wi̱' chi re' Jesus rAc'u̱n i Dios: Pe̱t, re' kahsanic ha' xiban. Ricab, re' richihcjic riquiq'ue̱l xiban naxquimic chiki̱j. Ro̱x, ru̱c' i Lok' laj Uxlabal. Re' take xib re're' xa jenaj chi capew-bal nquic'uhtaj lok, chi re' Jesus til rAc'u̱n i Dios.

Je' re' k'uru' je' ricab nok re' hoj nkacoj wach quik'orbal take kich c'acharel nanquik'or keh i coric, je' wo' re' ka'n tak ru̱c' k'oric rik'orom cho i Dios chiri̱j i rAc'u̱n eh je' re' ka'n maj re' take k'oric xik'or chiri̱j i Lok' laj Ac'unbe̱s til coric take eh ru'um i re' til raj cojoric wach maj til ch'iquenel c'uxlis take.

Ru'um aj re' nanik'or chi xa hab wach ncojbic wach i Jesus chi re're' rAc'u̱n i Dios, re're' c'ahchi' wo' ricojom wach i Dios chi re're' ch'iquenel c'uxlis eh ru'um re', re' rik'orbal i Dios rik'orom chiri̱j i Ac'unbe̱s til ric'ol pa ra̱mna i c'acharel re're'. Tz'a̱b ru' hab wach ma' ricoj ta wach rik'orbal i Dios re' xik'or chiri̱j i Ac'unbe̱s, re' c'acharel re're' c'ahchi' ribanam chi re' Dios re' aj ch'iquenel c'uxlis, xa aj chucul k'oric nok wilic ru'um nok ma' ricoj ta wo' wach i xik'or chiri̱j i rAc'u̱n.
Je' re' ajic re' k'oric xik'or i Dios chiri̱j i rAc'u̱n, re' wili: “Re' hin Dios xniban chi re' junelic c'acharic xniyew aweh hat-tak, xa pa rik'ab wo' i wAc'u̱n wilic riye'eric, nqui xik'or.

Ru'um aj re' nik'or wo' aweh tak chi wi jeno' c'acharel ric'ulum chic rAc'u̱n i Dios pa ric'acharic, re're' ye'o̱j wo' reh i junelic c'acharic. Tz'a̱b ru' re' ma' ja' ric'ulum ta pa ra̱mna, re're' ma'xta wo' riye'eric reh i junelic c'acharic.

Je' re' k'uru' re' hin c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak i k'oric xik'or i Dios chiri̱j i rAc'u̱n reh chi re' hat-tak re' ticojbic tak wach i k'oro̱j chiri̱j i Jesus chi re're' rAc'u̱n i Dios na̱weht'alim tak chi re' junelic c'acharic ye'o̱j chic aweh tak eh chi je' re' na̱tikim tak ju' rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i k'oric k'oro̱j chiri̱j i Jesus chi re're' i rAc'u̱n i Dios.

Ru'um chi kach'ica̱b chic kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus yu'na ch'iclic chic kac'ux chi re' Dios xa kojribiraj wo' cho ru̱c' kapahkanic nka'n johtok chiwach, re' cok ru' wi re' pahkanic nka'n johtok reh je' ru̱c' tare̱t chiwach i Dios chi naka'nam.
Chi je' re' k'uru' ru'um nok keht'alim chi re' Dios ekojric'u'lej cho ru̱c' kati̱j nka'n johtok chiwach, keht'alim wo' chi xa ewo' riyew cho keh pa' jaric i kapahkanic nka'n johtok reh.

Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak wi wilic jeno' aj niminel xcalajic ru̱c' jeno' mahc je' ru̱c' ma' nk'etbic ta pa̱m ribe̱h chi erik'eb chi junpech i junelic c'acharic eh wilic ok jeno' aweh tak xilow naxmahcanic, cha'n ati̱j tak chiri̱j awich aj niminel tak re're' maj re' Dios ewo' chic riyew reh i junelic c'acharic wi la' re' aj niminel re' xik'eb nak i junelic c'acharic ru'um reh i mahc xiban, ricana̱' wo' ribanaric i mahc re're'. Re' cok ru' re' take aj niminel re' quicalajic ru̱c' jeno' mahc re' nk'etbic pa̱m quibe̱h chi enye'eric queh i junelic c'acharic, re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi ma̱ban tak chic johtok pahkanic chiqui̱j ru',

ru'um nok re' mahc xca'n ru' toco̱m wo'. Til pan coric, chi'nchel take ma' holohic ta laj bano̱j nbanaric chiwach i Dios, mahc take, xa re' la' wilic take mahc ma' rik'et ta pa̱m kabe̱h chi re' Dios eriyew keh i junelic c'acharic.

Chi kunchelal i hoj aj niminel nakeht'alim chi nic' pa' nimal ka'nam chi hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios, chopo̱j chic na̱ kac'acharic ru'um i Jesus re' rAc'u̱n i Dios. Ru'um aj re', re' aj Yahm ma' eta chic kojrijot' chi enkatahkej chi ribanaric i mahc. Je' wo' ru'um re're', re' hoj aj niminel ma' re' ta chic i mahc enkayew rajawric chi kawach.
Je' re' ajic re' hoj keht'alim chic chi hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios eh chi je' re' to̱b ta chi'nchel take c'ahbilal laj no'jbal chopo̱j take na̱ ru'um aj Yahm china̱ ac'al wili,

ma' hab ta wach keh hoj narijot'om kacapew-bal maj re' hoj keht'alim chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh rAc'u̱n wo' i Dios, xc'ulic lok ayu' wach ac'al chi riye'eric keh chi eht'aljic wach i Dios re' ma' hab ta chic jeno' wach coric wach chiwach ru'. Ru'um aj re', re' hoj yu'na nkarak chic chiri̱j chi wilco̱j ri'sil ro̱k k'ab i coric wach Dios maj wilco̱j wo' chic pan k'ab i Jesus re' manlic wo' Dios chi kana̱ eh manlic aj Ye'ol Junelic C'acharic.

Je' re' ajic was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' wilca̱t tak chi je' hat-tak wac'u̱n wixk'u̱n chi niwach, ru'um chi re' hat-tak narak tak chic chiri̱j chi re' Jesus re're' i manlic wo' Dios chi kana̱ i hoj, chayohbalej awi̱b tak reh no'jbal chi lok'onic wach tz'akoj tiyo̱x nca'n take tinamit wach ac'al. Re' wili coric laj k'oric nik'or je aweh tak was tak nicha̱k'.

Re' hin ma' Wa̱n re' jenaj queh nahsil china̱ como̱n laj aj niminel, re' hin c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je hu̱j wili aweh hat-tak moloj wach aj niminel chipam i comonil chiho̱j wach ru'um i Dios chi na̱lok'em tak wach. Ru̱c' aj ac'alenjic tak niban je, re' hin ch'i̱l take nic' nimal queht'alim chic wach i coric laj niminic wilqui̱n wo' wi̱' i hin, nkak'or je aweh tak chi k'e̱' ti' tikic'raj tak.
Re' riwi̱' chi je' re' nka'n re' chi re' hoj tijimaj chipam i coric laj niminic wilco̱j wi̱' eh xa re' wo' niminic re're' nakawih'ic wi̱'.

Je' re' ajic chawunchelal hat-tak tinic'alenej tak je ru̱c' i k'oric wili: Re' ta nak Dios ch'i̱l i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh rAc'u̱n wo' i Dios quicuse'senok aweh tak eh quiquetelej ta wo' nak cho awach tak, je' wo' quiyew ta wo' nak cho sukquil c'uxlis pan awa̱mna tak reh chi xa wilca̱t wo' tak chipam i coric laj niminic eh xa c'ahchi' wo' ac'axam tak i Dios ch'i̱l i Lok' laj rAc'u̱n.

Re' hin ma' Wa̱n k'e̱' naxchalic risukquil nic'ux cu'um take jarub pa' chi aj niminel nquimol quib chipam acomonil tak maj nibiram chi re' take re' c'ahchi' quic'amam na̱ i coric laj niminic je' ricab ritak'a̱b cho i kAja̱w Dios.

Yu'na, til nipahkaj je aweh hat-tak moloj wach aj niminel i ato'bil wili chi chanimej tak i tijbal rik'or chi nakac'axam tak ki̱b. Re' tijbal c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak wili chi na̱nimem tak, ma' re' ta jeno' chic ac' tijbal xa re' la' wo' i c'uhbal kap'utum cho ribirmijic pan ch'iquinbal cho reh kaniminic

re' nc'uhtunic lok wi̱' chi nkac'ax i Dios. Nic' wach nanc'uhtunic chi nkac'ax i Dios? Re' nc'uhtunic lok wi̱' chi nkac'ax i Dios re' wo' nkac'am na̱ take ric'uhbal chi coric eh jenaj queh c'uhbal re're' je' ru̱c' xa najtir wo' kap'utum cho ribirmijic je' wili rik'or: “Tic'acharok tak pan c'axoj i̱b chawach tak, nqui rik'or.

Ayu' wach ac'al c'ahchi' ric'uluric chi yohbal wach take aj c'uhbalanel c'ahchi' quijot'om quicapew-bal take tinamit. Re' take aj c'uhbalanel re're' aj niminel nak take cho, xa re' la' yu'na c'ahchi' quik'orom chi ma' coric ta chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xc'ulic china̱ ac'al wili chi je' ricab kawi̱' i hoj c'acharel. Ru̱c' aj k'oric nca'n take re', re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi xa hab wach je' re' k'oric riban, re' c'acharel re're' xa aj k'etol wach rik'orbal i Jesus nok wilic.

Ru'um re're', re' hin nik'or wo' aweh tak chi chayohbalej awi̱b tak chiwach aj jot'o̱l re're'. Je' wo' chic nik'or wo' aweh tak i wili: Ma̱cana̱' tak ritahkaljic i tijinic chiri̱j i Jesus je' ricab xkac'uhtaj cho aweh tak. Je' re' nipahkaj chi cha'n tak reh chi re' c'axoj i̱b xasjic pan awa̱mna tak ru'um reh camanic xka'n chaxilac tak i hoj raj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios ma' eta no̱j sahchok wach, re' ta la' re're' q'uihok wach chaxilac tak eh chi je' re' enac'ul tak chi'nchel ricuse'sbal i Dios chi jenaj asi̱ tak.

Je' re' k'uru' ma̱cana̱' tak ritahkaljic i tijinic chiri̱j i Jesus re' xkac'uhtaj cho aweh tak reh chi je' re' naric'uhtunic chi re' Dios wilic pan ac'acharic tak. Je' re' nik'or chi cha'n tak maj hab wach resaj lok ri̱b chiri̱j i tijinic chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xc'ulic ayu' wach ac'al chi til je' ricab kawi̱' i hoj c'acharel ric'uhtaj lok chi ma' wilic ta chic i Dios ru̱c'. Raj la' i xa ritahkej wo' i tijinic re're' chiri̱j i Jesus, re' cok re' ric'uhtaj lok chi xa ma' re' ta Ajabe̱s Dios wilic pa ric'acharic je' la' wo' wilic ru̱c' i Ac'unbe̱s Dios.

Jenaj chic i pahkanic nanibanam, re' i wili: Wi xponic jeno' jot'o̱l laj aj tijinel awu̱c' tak chi rik'ormojic aweh tak jeno' toco̱m chic tijinic re' ma' rik'or ta chi re' Jesus xc'ulic wach ac'al chi til je' ricab kawi̱' i hoj c'acharel, ma̱k'or tak reh chi je' wili: «Hat c'ulu̱j chi suk ayu' chi na̱k'orom i tijbal nac'am cho keh, ma' tiqui tak reh. Je' re' ajic re' hat-tak ma̱c'ul tak i jot'o̱l laj aj tijinel re're' chipam i pa̱t namol wi̱' awi̱b tak chi niminic

eh je' re' nik'or maj hab wach aweh tak erik'or reh aj jot'o̱l re're' chi c'ulu̱j chi suk chi rik'ormojic i tijinic re're' c'ahchi' roquic jenaj ru̱c' ma' holohic ta laj bano̱j c'ahchi' ribanam i aj jot'o̱l re're'.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel, yohbal nak wach ru' raj k'ormojic je aweh tak chipam i hu̱j wili, xa re' la' ma' xwa̱j ta nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak yu'na. Je' re' xniban ru'um nok re' hin nwa̱j ojic awu̱c' tak chi ak'o'rjic tak eh chi je' re' nok wilqui̱n chic chaxilac tak naka'nam kac'utaj nakilow kawach ar. Ru̱c' re're', re' hat-tak ch'i̱l wo' i hin enkic'raj jenaj nim laj risukquil kac'ux.

A̱h! Jenaj chic k'oric nwa̱j nik'orom je aweh tak wili: Re' take kich aj niminel re' nquimol qui̱b chipam i comonil chiho̱j wo' cho wach ru'um i Dios chi naquilok'em wach, c'ahchi' quitak'a̱b je risukquil ac'ux tak ar. Re' aj wili nitz'ihmbaj je aweh tak hin Wa̱n.

Re' hin ma' Wa̱n re' jenaj queh nahsil chi quina̱ como̱n laj aj niminel, re' hin c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je hu̱j wili aweh hat wasbe̱s aj niminel ma' Ca̱yo re' k'e̱' ti' tiric'raj i Dios eh je' wo' re' hin, k'e̱' wo' ti' tiwic'raj chipam coric laj niminic wilco̱j wi̱'.

Wasbe̱s re' ti' tiwic'raj, re' hin naniban niti̱j chawi̱j, nipahkaj johtok reh kAja̱w Dios chi je' ricab nok chi xa suk laj c'acharic na'n chiwach chipam animinic, je' wo' re' nwa̱j i hin chi chi'nchel ta nak elok chawach chipam ac'acharic eh xa suk laj c'acharic ta wo' cha'n china̱ ac'al wili.

Re' riwi̱' chi niban niti̱j chi je' re', re' chi ju'jun take kich aj niminel naxic'ulic lok ayu' wu̱c' xquik'or wi̱n chiri̱j i c'acharic na'n chipam i coric laj niminic wilca̱t wi̱', til coric chi re' hat xa coric wo' wach ac'ux chiwach i Dios eh chi xa c'acharic wo' na'n chipam i coric laj niminic wilco̱j wi̱'.

Ru̱c' xk'ormojic wi̱n re're', ma'xta na nchel richalic sukquil c'uxlis wu̱c' ru'um? Je' re' nik'or maj nibiraj chi re' nic' pa' q'uihal take xo̱j ca'n chi je' chic wac'u̱n wixk'u̱n take pan niminic ru'um reh c'uhbalanic xniban queh, xca'n chi xa coric wo' wach quic'ux eh c'ahchi' quic'acharic chipam i coric laj niminic wilque̱b wi̱'.

Wasbe̱s aj niminel ma' Ca̱yo re' ti' tiwic'raj, re' hin nibiraj chi xa c'ahchi' wo' ac'amam na̱ chi coric i quitobjic take kich aj niminel nok re' hat nac'ul take chi hi'lic pan apa̱t to̱b ta nchel ma' aweht'alim ta wo' quiwach.

Re' take aj niminel re're' quik'orom chi quina̱ take kacomonil i hoj aj niminel re' wilqui̱n wi̱' ayu' chi re' hat k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal c'axo̱j abanam cho queh. Chi xa je' wo' re' na'n cu̱c' take kich aj niminel quiponic awu̱c', yu'na k'uru' chi cu ja' qui'elic ta je pan apa̱t take aj niminel re' xi'o̱j c'olok awu̱c' til chacuy nipahkaj wo' je aweh chi enayew je pa' bih queh reh nah quibe̱h ru'um nok je' re' ra̱j i Dios chi naribanaric queh take quik'oric reh riC'uhbal.

Je' wo' chic, re' take kas kacha̱k' aj niminel re're' xi'o̱j chi c'uhbalanic ru'um chi ti' nquic'raj i kAja̱w Jesus eh ma'xta bih jeno' to'bal c'ahchi' quic'ulum cu̱c' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel, to̱b ta nak c'ahchi' ribehsjic to'bal queh.

Ru'um aj re' k'uru' curman chi keh hoj aj niminel chi nakato'bem take kas kacha̱k' aj niminel re're' ru̱c' riye'eric quipatal on riye'eric pa' bih queh ru'um nok ru̱c' ribanaric re're', re' hoj enka'n chi hoj caj to'o̱l take c'ahchi' quik'oric reh coric laj niminic wilco̱j wi̱'.

Reh aj chi naquitobjic nak ru̱c' pa' bih queh take kas kacha̱k' aj niminel quiponic awu̱c', re' hin xnitz'ihmbaj je queh comonil awich aj niminel chi naquitikim ju' ribanaric i no'jbal re're', xa re' la' ma' Tiyo̱trepes til xik'ihtaj wo' ri̱b chiwach nik'orbal re're' ru'um chi xa re' wo' rik'orbal ru' ra̱j chi naripa'lajic maj ricapaj chi nim riwa'ric chi quixilac take comonil awich aj niminel ar.

Ru'um aj re', re' hin naquinponok awu̱c' tak nanik'orom chi quiwach take riq'uihal aj niminel chaj bih take no'jbal riban i ma' Tiyo̱trepes eh chi je' re' na̱weht'alim tak chaj bih take c'ahbil laj k'oric chi ma'xta ricorquil rik'or chiki̱j. Ru̱c' take k'oric riban re're' ma' nch'ihquic ta nchel ric'ux. Je' wo' chic re' riban wo' i wili: Re're' ma' ric'ul ta wo' take pa ripa̱t nic' nimal take kas kacha̱k' aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios quiponic ar eh xa na̱ ru' je' ricab nok wilic nak take kich aj niminel nca̱j quic'ulum take aj k'orol c'uhbal re're', ripit take chi naca'nam i c'ulu̱j eh wi hab wach ma' xinimej rik'orbal, resaj take je chipam i acomonil hat-tak aj niminel wilca̱t ar.

Wasbe̱s ma' Ca̱yo re' ti' tiwic'raj pan niminic, re' wili nwa̱j chawi̱j ru̱c' i k'oric niban je aweh yu'na: Ma̱tijej aweh i ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal je' ricab riban i Tiyo̱trepes re' la' chatijej riman aweh ribanaric i holohic laj no'jbal nca'n take toco̱m chic aj niminel eh chi je' re' xa naric'uhtunic wo' lok chi re' hat, hat chic rac'u̱n i Dios. Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab chi re're' ma' riban ta holohic laj no'jbal ric'uhtaj lok chi ma' rina'bem ta wach i Dios chi coric, je' wo' re' hab wach riban i holohic laj no'jbal ric'uhtaj wo' lok chi re're' rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios chic.

Chacoj rehtal i kasbe̱s aj niminel ma' Reme̱triyo, re're' k'e̱' take quik'oric chiri̱j chi k'e̱' tare̱t rino'jbal chipam riniminic re' nk'ormojic wi̱' ricorquilal i c'acharic raj i Dios chi naribanaric. Je' wo', re' hoj aj niminel wilco̱j ayu' nkayew kak'orbal chiri̱j chi re're' holohic rino'jbal eh coric laj aj niminel. Re' hat aweht'alim wo' chi re' kak'orbal i hoj til coric wo' chiwach i Dios maj ma' xa ta wo' k'oric keh chiri̱j i Reme̱triyo.
Wasbe̱s ma' Ca̱yo, cu wilic nak ru' k'oric nwa̱j nik'orom aweh xa re' la' ma' nwa̱j ta nik'orom je aweh xa pan hu̱j,
til nwa̱j chi cu re' la' nanik'orom aweh nakilow kawach kacabchelal eh je' re' nik'or maj c'ahchi' nicapam chi loq'uil quino̱j awu̱c' eh chi je' re' naka'nam kac'utaj chi kawach.

Re' take sukquil ku̱c' wilque̱b ayu' c'ahchi' quitak'a̱b je risukquil ac'ux eh nic' pa' wo' q'uihal take sukquil ku̱c' quic'acharic ponok ar, chayew wo' risukquil quic'ux ar. Je' aj re' ru' wasbe̱s, re' sukquil c'uxlis riyew i Dios wih'ok pan ac'acharic eh re' ta nak Dios to'bonok aweh ar.

Re' hin ma' Ju̱ras richa̱k' i ma' Jaco̱wo eh aj camanom wo' chi rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je i hu̱j wili aweh hat-tak lok' laj wich aj niminel xatyuk'unjic tak chi na̱banam tak chi jenaj tinamit c'axo̱j ru'um Ajabe̱s Dios eh je' wo' chi hat-tak cha'jamaj ru'um i Jesus.

Re' hat-tak k'uru' re' na̱c'ulbic tak reh sukquilal c'uxlis niyew je wili ma' ok xa pajoj ti cho richak'lamil i Dios wih'ok cho chana̱ tak je' la' wo' re' sukquil c'uxlis ch'i̱l i c'axbal chiyew cho i Dios chana̱ tak.

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak, re' hin k'e̱' nak xwa̱j ritz'ihmjic je aweh tak chiri̱j i kaco'lbal ye'o̱j keh hoj chi'nchel aj niminel, xa re' la' ma' re' ta chic chiri̱j re're' c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak i hu̱j wili ru'um nok xwic'raj pan wa̱mna chi curman chi nanitz'ihmbam je aweh tak chiri̱j take c'uhtunic ch'iclic wi̱' kac'ux re' ma' jalo̱j ta cho wach nok xa re' wo' rip'uhtic cho ric'uhtjic keh hoj aj niminel chiho̱j cho kawach chi ritinami̱t i Dios. Chiri̱j aj i c'uhtunic re're' tinik'il tak je reh chi til enayew ac'ux tak chiri̱j chi coric.

Je' re' nik'or je aweh tak cu'um queh take aj tijinel re' naxquimin ta qui̱b chaxilac tak ma' xquik'or ta aweh tak i ricorquilal i jot'o̱j laj c'uhtunic c'ahchi' ca'nam. Re' take aj tijinel re're' yu'na wilque̱b chic chaxilac tak eh xa c'ahbil laj no'jbal nquic'uhtaj xa jot'bal reh k'oric xik'or i Dios chi ma'xta chic riyeb ti'c'axic chi kana̱ i hoj re' hoj nak cho aj mahc. Re' take re' nquik'or wo' chi tehlic chic ki̱j chi enka'n xa pa' bih mahc nka̱j ka'nam pan kac'acharic. Ma' xa re' ta re're' nca'n, je' la' wo' ma' nquibiraj ta wo' i kAja̱w Dios re' xa re' wach re' wilic rajawric chi kana̱ eh ma' nquibiraj ta wo' i Jesus re' xa re' wach re' wilic rajawric chi kana̱ chi Ajabe̱s eh re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Chi je' re' quino'jbal, re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi, chi quina̱ take aj tijinel re're' nariwih'ic rinimal ti'c'axic k'oro̱j cho najtir k'i̱j chi narichalic chi quina̱ take nca'n i c'ahbilal.

C'uhtbal reh ricorquil i nik'or, nwa̱j chi c'olok cho pan ac'ux tak take ribiral nanik'orom wili je' ru̱c' ana'bem tak chic chi coric: Re' kAja̱w Dios nok resam chic take cho ritinami̱t ar Eji̱pto, xisach quiwach take nic' nimal ma' xquicoj ta wach i rik'orbal chi nacoquic chipam i yuk'ul Canahan ribihnal.

Je' wo', re're' xiban chi re' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch nak take cho ar pan taxa̱j je' ru̱c' xik'eb i rinimal wach quilok'il chi wilic nak cajawric ar pan taxa̱j xibac'aric take cahnok chi junelic pan k'ekom ak'ab reh chi ar encuy'ej rik'ijil riye'eric wi̱' ti'c'axic chi quina̱ ru'um chi re' take re' xquicana̱' cho i lok' laj ye'a̱b xic'acharic cho wi̱' pan taxa̱j.

Ch'i̱l take ribiral re're' chacoj tak rehtal chaj bih xiban i Dios cu̱c' take tinamit aj Soro̱ma ch'i̱l take aj Como̱ra. Re' ribiral rik'or chi re' take c'acharel re're' ch'i̱l wo' take c'acharel wilque̱b chipam take tinamit wilque̱b je pan quic'ula't take i tinamit re're' xquicut qui̱b chi c'acharic pan c'oyomal chi junpech je' wo' chi ritununjic qui̱b pan c'acharic cu̱c' quich winak. Ru'um aj re', re' Dios chi tojbal wach i quimahc xisach quiwach take c'acharel re're' ch'i̱l i quitinamital re' xsacharic wo' wach chi junpech ru'um i rinimal k'a̱k' xkajic cho c'uhtbal reh ti'c'axic xiyew cho chi quina̱ ru'um i mahc xca'n.

Je' re' k'uru' je' ricab chi re' take tinamit re're' xquik'eb qui̱b pan mahc, re' take aj tijinel oconak take cho chaxilac tak xa cu c'ahchi' wo' quitikim ju' mahcanic, to̱b ta narichalic ti'c'axic chi quina̱. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' ru'um chi je' na pa risukquil quiwiric wilque̱b nquik'or chi re' Dios c'ahchi' riye'bic k'ab queh chi ribanaric i c'oyomal. Ma' xa re' ta re' nca'n, je' la' wo' ma' nquibiraj ta k'oric chi quiwach take wilic cajawric chi quina̱, nquise'laj eh nquiyak'abej la' wo' pan co̱k cajawric take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios wilque̱b ar pan taxa̱j.

K'e̱' memil nca'n take aj tijinel re're'! Je' re' nik'or maj xa ta nak re' nim wach raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re' Que̱l ribihnal xiban reh no'jbal je' re' naxquichop qui̱b ch'i̱l i aj Yahm chi k'oric chiri̱j riti'jolal i Moyses. Nok je' re' nca'n, re' aj Yahm c'ahchi' rik'orom chi ma'xta rimuk'unjic riti'jolal i Moyses eh re' Que̱l cow c'ahchi' rik'orom chi narimuk'unjic xa re' la' ru' re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re're' til xiyohbalej wo' wach i Dios. Ru'um re' ma' xik'or ta reh aj Yahm chi re're' c'ahbil wach, ma' wo' sihtimaj ta nak, je' la' wili xik'or reh: «Re' ok Dios k'orok reh nic' wach ano'jbal chiwach eh haj wilic ac'axquilal na̱c'ulum ru'um re're', nqui xik'or reh.

Je' re' nok re' take aj tijinel re're' ma' nquirak ta chiri̱j i k'oro̱j chiqui̱j take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios. Chi je' re' quino'jbal nca'n queh je' ricab nca'n take chicop chi ma' nquirak ta chiri̱j chaj bih nca'n. Je' wo' re' nik'or maj re' pa' bih npok' cho pan quic'ux ribanaric to̱b ta ma' nquirak ta chiri̱j, xa re' wo' re' nca'n ribanaric eh ru'um re're' nquik'ahsaj qui̱b chi ribanaric i mahc.

Je' re' ajic k'e̱' ti' queh take aj tijinel re're' maj c'ahchi' quitahkem i rokbal i Cayin re' k'e̱' xixowej wach i richa̱k' eh c'ahchi' wo' ca'nam queh je' ricab xiban i Walaham re' xiban ric'uhtjic i ma' coric ta laj c'uhtunic xa reh chi naribihomric. K'e̱' ti' queh aj tijinel re're' k'uru' eh nica'pechej je rik'ormojic ru' maj c'ahchi' wo' quitahkem i rokbal i Coreh re' xik'ihtaj ri̱b chiwach i Dios. Ru'um chi je' re' no'jbal nca'n, re' take aj tijinel re're' narisahchic quiwach ru'um i Dios.

Je' re' nok, chayohbalej awi̱b tak ru̱c' quino'jbal i take c'acharel re're' je' ricab nok re' take aj behsem nimak tak cano̱wa nquiyohbalej qui̱b chi ma' no̱j quituhyaj qui̱b chiwach take abaj wilque̱b pan ha'. Je' re' nik'or maj je' wili i quino'jbal nquic'uhtaj take aj tijinel re're': Je' ricab, nanamol awi̱b tak chi ric'uxuric take pa' bih wi'c natik'a̱' tak, re' take re' xa ta nak nquic'uhtaj chi nquiyohbalej so' wach i Dios. Je' wo', to̱b ta nak wilque̱b chaxilac nanamol awi̱b tak chi rilok'onjic i Dios on nanamol awi̱b tak chi ric'uhtjic achak'lamil chawach tak, re' take re' quiwih'ic awu̱c' tak xa reh chi riye'eric chi suk quipa̱m. Je' wo' chic, re' take aj tijinel re're' xa je' quicab take su̱tz' re' xa c'ul c'amoj take je ru'um i te̱w ma' re' ta jab nquic'am cho, on xa je' quicab wo' take che̱' ma' quiwachanic ta pa rik'ijil. Je' re' nik'or maj ma'xta bih jeno' holonquilal ric'am cho queh take aj niminel chi naquiq'uihic chipam quiniminic. Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi re' take aj tijinel re're' til ma'xta cu̱c' i c'acharic ye'o̱j ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios eh ru'um chi ma' choplic ta wo' quic'ux chiri̱j rinimjic i Dios xa je' na quicab take che̱' chuku̱j take lok pa ra̱'.

Ma' xa re' ta re' nik'or chiqui̱j take aj tijinel re're', je' la' wo' nik'or chi xa je' na ricab nok re' nimak tak ribohl ha' xa pan ansil chic nc'ulic ricut lok chi' ha' take xa pa' bih jaric rimol cho, re' take aj tijinel re're' ru̱c' i c'ahbil laj quik'orbal ch'i̱l c'ahbil laj no'jbal nca'n nquesaj lok wach sakom chaj bih take ma' holohic ta laj capew-bal wilic cho pan ca̱mna. Chiri̱j lok chi'nchel wili, til nwa̱j wo' nik'orom aweh tak chi je' ricab take behel laj ch'imi̱l nok quichopom chic je quibe̱h qui'o̱j sahchok xa pa' pan k'ekom ak'ab, re' take aj tijinel re're' naquiye'eric wo' ru'um i Dios pa rinimal k'ekom ak'ab re' naquic'ulum wi̱' ti'c'axic

je' ricab k'oro̱j cho najtir k'i̱j ru'um raj camanom i Dios Henoc ribihnal re' nch'ihquic wi̱' riwu̱k buhr chi c'acharic p'uhtunak cho cu ru̱c' pe̱t c'acharel Aran ribihnal. Re' Henoc k'uru' je' wili rik'orom cho: “Chacoj tak rehtal i wili: Re' kAja̱w c'ulic lok reh ch'i̱l take ma' ajlamaj ta riq'uihal chi lok' laj raj tz'e' wa̱ch ar pan taxa̱j

chi rich'ukuric wach quimahc chi'nchel tinamit ayu' wach ac'al. Chi je' aj re' naric'ulic lok chi rik'ormojic haj wilic i ti'c'axic tanlic chiqui̱j chi naquic'ulum take c'acharel balc'ux wach quino'jbal ru'um reh quic'ahbil laj no'jbal nquik'ihtaj wi̱' qui̱b chiwach i Dios. Je' wo' re' naribanam ru'um reh take ma' holohic ta laj k'oric nca'n chiri̱j, nqui rik'orom cho.

Je' re' k'uru' tiklic chic cho wach i ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take aj tijinel re're' ru'um reh quino'jbal chi xa ma'xta bih nponic chi quiwach, je' wo' chi xa aj cakwachanel take eh xa cha'n wo' aweh c'acharic nca'n re' k'orel pa' bih rik'or quicapew-bal chi naca'nam. Je' wo' chic, re' take re' quik'oric xa reh chi nimsbal quiwach chiwach take tinamit eh nquik'unej wach jeno' c'acharel ru̱c' holohic laj c'uta̱j xa reh chi naquehcham i xa pa' bih wilic reh c'acharel re're'.

Je' aj re' ru' nca'n take aj tijinel re' wilque̱b chaxilac tak re're' eh chi je' re' nquik'eb lok ri̱j quic'ux chaj bih k'oric quik'orom cho take nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take raj tahkanel i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Ru'um aj re' ma̱ban aweh hat-tak je' re', re' la' hat-tak was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak, c'olok pan ac'ux tak i k'oro̱j cho cu'um take nahsil c'amol be̱h re're',

re' je' wili quik'orom cho: “Pan cohlsbal wach take k'i̱j nacuctic cho take winak xa se'lenel take pan nak' wach i Dios eh naca'nam xa pa' bih nca̱j ca'nam, re' nca̱j chiri̱j chi naquirakam risukquil quic'ux ru̱c' take c'ahbilal naca'nam, nqui quik'orom cho.

Je' re' ajic nic' pa' wach quik'orom cho take nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus je' wo' re' nca'n take aj tijinel re're' ma'xta cu̱c' i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios chi re're' enc'ambic quibe̱h. Ru'um aj re' xa nquitik'a̱' wach pan quicapew-bal re' xa pa' bih nca̱j ca'nam eh ru'um reh quino'jbal re're' wilic i ch'akoj i̱b chi niminic chaxilac hat-tak aj niminel.

Raj la' hat-tak was nicha̱k' re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak wilic awu̱c' tak i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios chi ric'amaric abe̱h tak eh ru'um aj re' nipahkaj aweh tak chi re' niminic ach'ica̱b cho wi̱' ac'ux tak eli̱c ok c'ahchi' rijohtic wach. Je' wo' nipahkaj aweh tak chi re' ati̱j na̱banam tak chiwach i Dios re' ok i Lok' laj rUxlabal narik'oric aweh tak nic' wach ribanaric na̱banam tak.

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um nok wilic awu̱c' tak i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chi tic'acharok tak chi xa eli̱c ch'iclic ac'ux tak chi re' Dios k'e̱' tiric'ax tak eh je' wo' chi xa c'ahchi' chic awuy'em tak i k'i̱j re' naric'uhtam wi̱' richak'lamil i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' re' nik'or ru'um nok chipam i k'i̱j re're' nariye'eric aweh tak i junelic c'acharic.

Ru'um aj chi re' richak'lamil i kAja̱w Jesus wilic chana̱ tak, re' wili nik'or aweh hat-tak: Chaquetelej tak wach take ma' tz'uklic ta quicapew-bal chi manlic chiri̱j i tijinic c'uhtumaj keh hoj aj niminel.

Chaco'lej wo' take chiwach i yohbal wilque̱b wi̱' chi equikajic pan quik'ab take aj jot'o̱l laj aj tijinel. Je' re' k'uru' xa je' na ricab nok jeno' c'acharel richohpaj jeno' rich ti'jolal chi narik'ehbic nak chic cok pan k'a̱k', re' hat-tak enawesaj tak take c'acharel re're' chipam i yohbal wilque̱b wi̱'. Tz'a̱b ru' wi re' take c'acharel re're' til ch'iclic quicapew-bal chiri̱j quino'jbal take aj jot'o̱l laj aj tijinel, re' wili raj banaric cu̱c': Chac'uhtaj ac'axbal tak cu̱c' re' cok ru' chawixowej tak wach quino'jbal eh ma' xa ta re're', chayohbalej la' tak awi̱b chi quiwach je' ricab nca'n i kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi nquiyohbalej qui̱b chi ritz'a'jic riso' jeno' aj mahc.

Je' aj re' ru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel yu'na nanicohlam ritz'ihmjic i hu̱j wili chi c'ahchi' nibanam niti̱j chawi̱j tak chi je' wili: Re' Dios re' k'e̱' nimal rajawric to'bonok tak aweh chi ac'oloric tak chiwach quino'jbal take aj jot'o̱l reh chi je' re' chi sakbamaj wach ac'acharic tak na̱wojic tak wih'ok chiwach i Dios k'e̱' nim rilok'il chi xa suk chic ac'ux tak.

Je' re' k'uru' re' ok i jenaj chi Dios nahsil aj no'jbal, re' xco'lonic keh ru'um reh riquimic i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, k'ormojok chi re're' jenaj K'atal K'oric xi̱c' na̱ rilok'il eh je' wo' k'ormojok chi xa re' wach re' wilic rinimal rajawric chi tak'anic chi kana̱, je' yu'na chi k'i̱j je' wo' chi junelic k'i̱j sakom. Je' ta nak re' k'ormojok.

Re' hin ma' Wa̱n aj niminel reh Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' hin c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam take k'oric wili chiri̱j re' xic'uhtaj wi̱n i Jesus naxitak'a̱' cho wu̱c' jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch re' xiban ric'uta̱j wu̱c'. Re' xic'uhtaj wi̱n i Jesus re' wo' i Dios xc'uhtunic reh ru', chi c'uhtbal queh raj camanom haj wilic take naric'uluric chi loq'uil ti.

Re' aj i hin Wa̱n til niyew nichi̱' chi ritz'ihmjic i coric wili chiri̱j take xik'or wi̱n i Dios naxiban take rehreh wach c'uhtunic eh je' wo' chiri̱j i chaj bih xic'uhtaj wi̱n i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Je' aj re' ru', ru'um chi coric i chi'nchel re're', re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi xa hab wach c'acharel narilbic pa̱m i hu̱j wili, k'e̱' wo' chic ato̱b reh ru'um nok nariwih'ic chi suk ric'ux. Je' wo' re' wih'ic naca'nam take c'acharel re' nquibiraj eh nquinimej i k'oro̱j ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal chipam i hu̱j wili re' nk'oric chiri̱j i naric'uluric johtok. Je' re' nik'or maj re' rik'ijil naric'uluric take wi̱' re're' xa ma' naht ta chic chi kawach.

Re' hin ma' Wa̱n c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je hu̱j wili aweh hat-tak re' wuku̱b ch'uk chi aj niminel re' namola̱' awi̱b tak chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios ar pa riyuk'ul i A̱sya. Tinic'alenej tak je ru̱c' niti̱j niban chi je' wili: Re' hat Ajabe̱s Dios, re' hat Ajabe̱s Jesus eh hat Ajabe̱s Lok' laj Uxlabal, nipahkaj aweh tak chi ena'n tak chi re' awato'bil tak ch'i̱l i sukquil c'uxlis nayew tak re' ta nak re' wih'ok pan quic'acharic i ju'jun ch'uk chi aj niminel re're'. Re' hat kAja̱w Dios nok ma' ja' natik'a̱' ta cho wach ac'al wili, xa wilca̱t wo' cho, xa wilca̱t wo' yu'na eh xa na wo' awih'ic chi junelic c'acharic. Re' hat Lok' laj Uxlabal re' wilca̱t chi junelic chiwach i kAja̱w Dios re' nk'atbic k'oric china̱ chi'nchel nic' nimal wilic, k'e̱' wo' chic manlic wach ano'jbal wilic, chi wilic wo' awu̱c' i wuku̱b chi manlic wach no'jbal wilic reh i Dios.

Re' aj i hat Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric, re' hat, hat aj ch'iquenel c'uxlis chiri̱j rik'ormojic i coric. Re' hat i pe̱t xatuctic cho chi quixilac take camnak chi jalo̱j chic wach ati'jolal abakil eh re' hat k'e̱' wo' chic awajawric chi quiwach take aj k'atal k'oric ayu' wach ac'al. Je' wo' chic kAja̱w Jesus, re' hat k'e̱' ti' koj-awic'raj eh ru'um re' xachihcaj aquiq'ue̱l naxak'ahsaj awi̱b pan quimic. Ru̱c' aj xa'n re're', re' hoj aj niminel chic aweh yu'na xoj-awesaj chipam i ti'c'axic nakac'ulum nak ru'um reh kamahc.

Re' hat Jesus xa'n wo' chi, chi kana̱ chic i hoj c'acharel na̱k'atbic k'oric eh awu'um i hat yu'na, nkalok'ej wach awAja̱w Dios eh wilco̱j wo' chic chi raj camanom je' ricab nok xiwih'ic take cho c'acharel xipahbabjic cho ru'um i Dios chi aj k'ahsem si̱. Ru'um aj chi'nchel re're', nipahkaj johtok reh Dios chi junelic k'i̱j sakom, ye'erok ta nak alok'il eh je' wo' re' chi etiwih'ic chi aj k'atal k'oric, nqui nik'or johtok pa niti̱j chi til coric wo' chi je' re' naric'uluric.

Re' aj xc'uhtjic wi̱n ru'um i Dios til coric chi naric'uluric. Ru'um re're' nik'or aweh tak i wili: Chacoj tak rehtal chi nac'olok wo' chic lok rica'pech i Jesus pa rinimal su̱tz', re' take c'acharel xicansanic reh naquilom wach je' wo' re' take chi'nchel take tinamit. Ru'um aj re', re' take c'acharel re' quichalic pan tak chi'nchel tinamit wilque̱b ayu' wach ac'al, k'e̱' wo' chic nariti'bic pan quic'ux chi cu rehtal xa na quibarbatic chic ru'um quiyo'jic chiwach i ti'c'axic narichalic chi quina̱.

Re' nk'oric chiri̱j i naric'uluric wili til wo' re' i Dios re' xa re' wach re' k'e̱' nimal wach rajawric wilic chi junelic. Re're' xp'utbic cho reh chi'nchel eh re' wo' re' naricohlsonic wach chi'nchel je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' ritusjic wach take tz'ihm chi wilic jenaj p'utbal cho reh eh wilic wo' jenaj cohlsbal wach. Je' wo' chic, nok ma' ja' ritik'a̱b ta cho wach ac'al, re're' xa wilic wo' cho, xa wilic wo' yu'na eh xa na wo' riwih'ic chi junelic c'acharic.

Re' hin ma' Wa̱n xa jenaj wo' niwach awu̱c' tak chi kich aj niminel ki̱b reh Jesus eh chi re' wo' Dios ntak'anic k'oric chi nina̱ je' wo' ricab hat-tak. Re' hin nicuy wo' ransil i ti'c'axic re' c'ahchi' nic'ulum ru'um reh rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios je' wo' ribiral i Jesus. Re' ti'c'axic wili re' chi re' hin xincanabjic lok chi c'acharic chi wutquel chipam i ye'a̱b sutumaj ri̱j chi ma' laj ha', Pa̱tmos ribihnal. Nok wilqui̱n chic ayu' je' wili xc'uhtjic wi̱n:

Pan jenaj queh take k'i̱j reh niwih'ic ayu', chipam i k'i̱j nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i kAja̱w, re' Lok' laj Uxlabal xiyew k'ab wi̱n chi ru̱c' nicapew-bal nanicojom rehtal i wili: Re' hin xnibiraj chi wilic jenaj xoquic cho chi k'oric chiwi̱j je. Re' rik'orbal xa je' chic cowil nk'oric i ch'ihch' laj su̱b.

Je' aj wili xik'or wi̱n: «Chatz'ihmbaj chiwach jeno' botomaj wach hu̱j chi'nchel i nic' pa' nimal i rehtalil c'ahchi' awilom wili eh chatak'a̱' je rik'ormojic cu̱c' take wukch'uk chi moloj wach aj niminel wilque̱b pan tak tinamit pa riyuk'ul A̱sya, re' take je' wili quibihnal: Re' E̱peso, re' Esmi̱rna, re' Pe̱rcamo, re' Tiyati̱ra, re' Sa̱rtis, re' Pilare̱lpiya eh je' wo' i Lahorise̱ya, nqui xik'or.
Naxinsolq'uij je wi̱b chi riliric je hab wach nk'o'ronic cho wi̱n, xwilow wach jenaj nim laj pa'a̱b cante̱la wuku̱b chi tz'ukunbal cante̱la wilic reh, re' tik'imaj ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch'.

Chiwach i ma' laj pa'a̱b cante̱la re're', til manlic pa riyejal queh wuku̱b chi tz'ukunbal cante̱la re're' xwilow chi jenaj c'acharel pa'lic ar je' ricab nilbic i Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic rajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel. Re' riso' wilic chiri̱j xa junpa'lic jok cu nponic chi ro̱k. Je' wo' wilic jenaj rich'ihch' laj pa̱s tik'imaj ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch', cu nah teleb nelic cho eh k'e'lic jok chi' ric'ux cu nponic nah ritu̱k.
Re' rismal na̱ xa sak chic, xa je' chic ricab risakil i sak laj no̱k' on xa je' chic ricab i risakil i sak laj su̱tz'. Re' take nak' wach xa nworwotic chic xa je' chic ricab xak i k'a̱k'.

Re' take ro̱k xa je' chic ricab take junch'uk chic k'an laj ch'ihch' ic'simaj pan k'a̱k', xa nhec'hetic chic riban ru'um ritz'a'quilal k'a̱k'. Re' rik'orbal xa je' chic ricab nk'oric cho jenaj ma' laj ro̱k ha' chi xa nrojic chic cho.

Je' wo' chic, xwilow wo' wuku̱b chi ch'imi̱l choplic ru'um ru̱c' risec'a̱j k'ab. Xwilow wo' chi re' take k'oric qui'elic cho pan chi̱' til wo' chic k'e̱' ransil camanic riban chi xa rijunehtej chic ri̱b ch'i̱l i manlic wach camanic riban i jenaj c'ul k'as re̱ ch'ihch' eh re' rilbal ru' xa je' chic ricab risakomil i k'i̱j nariyew ransil ritz'a'quilal yejal k'i̱j.

Naxwilow chi'nchel re're', re' hin xnixuc'a̱' wi̱b chiwach chi cu xnipach'a̱' jok wi̱b cu wach ac'al chi riye'eric rilok'il xa re' la' ma' xinc'uyu'jic ta chic ru'um chi xincahnic chi je' chic hin camnak. Chalic i kAja̱w xiyew risec'a̱j k'ab chi nina̱ eh je' wili xik'or wi̱n: «Ma' tiyo'jic chic. Re' hin i p'utbal cho reh chi'nchel eh re' wo' hin nanicohlsonic wach chi'nchel.

Re' hin xa c'achalqui̱n wo' eh til coric chi je' re'. Coric ru', xinquicansaj xa re' la' xinc'acharic wo' chic cho reh chi nanic'acharic chi junelic chic k'i̱j sakom. Je' wo' chic, je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' jeno' c'acharel chi nanye'eric reh i la̱wa nwih'ic rajawric chi riteheric i ocbal pan jeno' ye'a̱b, re' hin yu'na wilic wo' wajawric china̱ pa' bih nc'uluric cu̱c' take c'acharel camnak chic je take eh je' wo' china̱ pa' bih nc'uluric chipam i ye'a̱b “Ha̱res” ribihnal, re' qui'o̱j wi̱' take c'acharel naquiquimic je, nqui wi̱n.

Chiri̱j chic ru' xik'or wo' chic wi̱n chi je' wili: «Chatz'ihmbaj take nic' pa' nimal xc'uhtjic chic aweh re' c'ahchi' awilom chi c'ahchi' ric'ulmujic eh re' take c'ahchi' awilom chi cu naric'ulmujic johtok chi kawach.

Re' hat xawilow i wuku̱b chi ch'imi̱l choplic wu'um ru̱c' risec'a̱j nik'ab eh xawilow wo' i pa'a̱b cante̱la wuku̱b ritz'ukunbal cante̱la wilic reh je' ru̱c' tik'imaj ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' xa re' la' ma' xarak ta chiri̱j chaj bih ra̱j rik'orom re're'. Re' ma' xarak ta chiri̱j re're' je' wili nelic wi̱': Re' take wuku̱b chi ch'imi̱l rijalwachej i ju'jun queh wuku̱b chi aj tz'e' wa̱ch quic'ambic quibe̱h take ju'jun queh i wukch'uk chi aj niminel nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios. Je' wo' re' i ma' laj pa'a̱b cante̱la re' wuku̱b chi tz'ukunbal cante̱la wilic reh, ju'jun queh tz'ukunbal re're' rijalwachej i ju'jun queh wukch'uk chi aj niminel nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios, nqui wi̱n.

Chiri̱j chic re', je' wo' chic wili xik'or wi̱n: «Yu'na k'uru' chatz'ihmbaj i hu̱j wili reh i aj tz'e' wa̱ch re' ncha'janic queh juntuhm chi aj niminel wilque̱b ar pan tinamit E̱peso. Re' k'oric na̱tz'ihmbam wili re' wo' re' narik'ormojic queh take aj niminel re're' chi je' wili: ‹Re' hin re' choplic wu'um i wuku̱b chi ch'imi̱l pa risec'a̱j nik'ab eh re' wilqui̱n chiwach i ma' laj pa'a̱b cante̱la re' wilic wuku̱b ritz'ukunbal cante̱la china̱ re' tik'imaj ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' je' wili nik'or aweh tak:

Re' hin til weht'alim take i wili chiri̱j abano̱j tak, chi k'e̱' cowil wach acamaj c'ahchi'ca̱t tak eh je' wo' k'e̱' rinimal acuyunic na'n tak chiwach i ti'c'axic chalanak chana̱ tak ru'um chi quinanimej tak. Weht'alim wo' chi ma' najunehtej ta wach ano'jbal tak cu̱c' take c'acharel je' ru̱c' c'ahbil quino'jbal. Je' wo' chic, re' hat-tak xana'bej tak quino'jbal take nquitz'ak qui̱b chi pahbamaj take chi nahsil c'amol quibe̱h raj tahkanel i kAja̱w eh xacoj tak rehtal chi xa aj chucul k'oric wo' take.

Je' re' ajic, weht'alim wo' chi chiwach i ti'c'axic chalic chana̱ tak, re' hat-tak xa c'ahchi' wo' acuyum tak ransil ru'um chi quinanimej tak eh re' camanic na'n tak ma' c'ahchi' ta acana̱b tak ribanaric, riman la' chic c'ahchi' achopom ac'ux tak chiri̱j.

To̱b ta k'e̱' wo' chic holonquilal c'ahchi'ca̱t tak re're', re' wili amahc tak re' ma' nponic ta chi niwach chi c'ahchi'ca̱t tak: Chi ma' c'ahchi' ta chic qui̱n ac'axam tak je' ricab nic'axaric xa'n tak cho nok cu re' xap'ut tak rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak chiwi̱j.

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um abano̱j tak re're', nipahkaj aweh tak chi wilic ok pan ac'ux tak chi najtir cho xinac'ax tak cho chi coric raj yu'na ma' je' ta chic re' na'n tak. Ru'um aj re' til nipahkaj aweh tak chi chajal wach ano'jbal tak eh quinac'ax wo' tak chic chi coric je' ricab xa'n tak cho pan pe̱t. Je' re' nik'or chi cha'n tak maj wi ma' xa'n tak chi je' re', naric'ulmujic chi naquinponok awu̱c' tak chi rich'ukuric k'oric chana̱ tak, nanitak'a̱b chi narisacharic wach acomonil tak je' ricab chi re' ta nak i hin c'ahchi' nibanic chi naresmejic lok pa riye'a̱b i jeno' queh tz'uka̱b cante̱la wilic chiwach i ma' laj pa'a̱b cante̱la.

Coric ru', c'ahchi' amahcanic tak ru̱c' i no'jbal re're', xa re' la' cu wilic wo' take no'jbal nponic chi niwach, je' ricab take i wili: Re' hat-tak ma' nponic ta chawach tak i c'ahbilal nca'n take comonil Nicolayi̱ta quibihnal eh je' wo' re' hin ma' nponic ta wo' chi niwach, nqui xik'or wi̱n.

Re' xk'oric wu̱c' wili, re' wo' re' nk'oric reh chi xa hab wach enbirinic reh take k'oric wili curman wo' chi reh chi ericoj rehtal chi coric i k'oro̱j ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal queh take ju'jun ch'uk chi aj niminel nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios. Re're' rik'or wo' chi re' c'acharel re' riyew pa ro̱k ribanaric i c'ahbilal, enye'eric reh chi enc'acharic chi junelic, xa je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak riye'eric k'ab reh c'acharel re're' chi enwih'ic cok ru̱c' i che̱' re' wilic cok chipam i ye'a̱b wilic wi̱' i Dios eh naric'uxum reh wach i che̱' re're', re' nye'bic ric'acharic i xa hab wach ric'ux reh i riwach.

Re' c'ahchi' rik'oric wu̱c' xik'or wo' chic wi̱n chi je' wili: «Chatz'ihmbaj wo' i hu̱j wili reh aj tz'e' wa̱ch ncha'janic queh juntuhm aj niminel wilque̱b ar pan tinamit Esmi̱rna. Re' k'oric na̱tz'ihmbam wili re' wo' re' narik'ormojic queh take aj niminel re're' chi je' wili: ‹Re' hin i p'utbal cho reh chi'nchel eh re' wo' hin nanicohlsonic wach chi'nchel. Xincansjic wo' cho xa re' la' xinc'acharic wo' chic cho. Re' aj i hin je' wili nik'or:

Re' hin weht'alim nic' nimal ti'c'axic c'ahchi' ac'ulum tak. Weht'alim wo' chi to̱b ta xatniba'ric tak ma' xatcahnic ta tak chi je' re' ru'um nok re' hat-tak, hat-tak biho̱m chi niwach ru̱c' take q'uihal cuse'sbal ye'o̱j aweh tak. Je' wo' chic, weht'alim wo' chi ma' ricorquilal ta c'ahchi' rik'ormojic chawi̱j tak cu'um take c'acharel nquitz'ak qui̱b chi ritinami̱t i Dios take xa re' la' ma' re' ta wo' ritinami̱t i Dios take, ritinami̱t la' i aj Yahm take ru'um chi nanquimol wo' qui̱b pan ye'a̱b re' ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, re' wo' rino'jbal aj Yahm no̱j quitijej ri̱j.

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um chi weht'alim chi'nchel re're', til nik'or je aweh tak chi ma' tiyo'jic tak nachalok chana̱ tak i ti'c'axic re' naricojom i aj Yahm chana̱ tak. Je' re' nik'or maj re're' naca̱t tak ripajam pan animinic tak eh ru'um chi na̱cuyum tak ransil apajaric tak, re' aj Yahm naribanam chi wilic ju'jun aweh tak naritz'aparic pan che̱'. Ru'um aj re', lajeb aj k'i̱j na̱wih'ic tak pan ti'c'axic, xa re' la' hat-tak, chacowej ac'ux tak chi rinimjic i kAja̱w eh je' re' cha'n tak cu rehtal je aquimic tak. Wi je' re' xa'n tak re' hin naniyeb aweh tak chi aco̱ch chi etic'acharic tak chi junelic, nqui xik'or wi̱n.

Re' xk'oric wu̱c' wili, re' wo' re' nk'oric reh chi xa hab wach enbirinic reh take k'oric wili curman wo' chi reh chi ericoj rehtal chi coric i k'oro̱j ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal queh take ju'jun ch'uk chi aj niminel nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios. Re're' rik'or wo' chi re' c'acharel re' riyew pa ro̱k ribanaric i c'ahbilal enye'eric reh chi ma' eta chic rilow wach i junelic ti'c'axic re' nc'ambic je pan jenaj rica'pech quimic.

Re' c'ahchi' rik'oric wu̱c' xik'or wo' chic wi̱n chi je' wili: «Chatz'ihmbaj wo' i hu̱j wili reh aj tz'e' wa̱ch ncha'janic queh take juntuhm aj niminel wilque̱b ar pan tinamit Pe̱rcamo ribihnal. Re' k'oric na̱tz'ihmbam wili re' wo' re' narik'ormojic queh take aj niminel re're' chi je' wili: ‹Je' wili nik'or i hin re' til wo' chic k'e̱' ransil nik'orbal wilic chi re' camanic niban til rijunehtej ri̱b ru̱c' i camanic riban jenaj c'ul k'as re̱ ch'ihch':

Re' hin weht'alim ri̱j abano̱j tak wili: Chi to̱b ta re' wilca̱t tak wi̱' chi c'acharic ar wo' nk'atbic k'oric aj Yahm chi wilic rinimal rajawric, re' hat-tak xa ch'iclic wo' ac'ux tak chiwi̱j. Je' wo', weht'alim chi re' hat-tak ma' nacana̱' ta rinimjic niC'uhbal. Re' hin nik'or chi je' re' maj xa ta nak xacana̱' tak rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak chipam take cho k'i̱j nok xchal ti'c'axic china̱ i awich aj niminel tak re' Anti̱pas ribihnal. Re' awich aj niminel tak re're' xacoj tak chi manlic aj k'orol reh niC'uhbal eh ar xcansjic chipam atinamital tak re' nk'atbic wo' wi̱' k'oric aj Yahm.

Re' cok ru' to̱b ta wo' je' re' na'n tak, wilic take quib xib no'jbal ma' npon ta chi niwach na'n tak, je' ricab take wili: Pe̱t, re' hat-tak c'ahchi' ayeb tak k'ab chi c'ahchi' quiwih'ic take c'acharel chaxilac tak re' ma' nca̱j ta quicana̱b take no'jbal xitijej cho Walac ru̱c' i Walaham najtir k'i̱j. Re' no'jbal re're' xiban chi re' take wich aj najtir k'i̱j ra̱' ri'sil take cho ma' Israhel, xik'ehbic pan mahc naxye'eric queh chi xquic'ux tiwic k'ahsamaj chi si̱ chiwach tiyo̱x eh chi ri̱j re' xca'n i c'oyomal.

Ricab, chi re' hat-tak c'ahchi' ayeb tak k'ab chi quiwih'ic chaxilac tak take c'acharel re' ma' nca̱j ta quicana̱b i jenaj chic no'jbal re' ma' nponic ta chi niwach, re' quino'jbal take comonil Nicolayi̱ta quibihnal.

Til nipahkaj aweh tak chi chajal tak wach i ano'jbal re're'. Wi ma' xa'n tak haj wilic c'ahchi' nik'orom aweh tak, til naniponic awu̱c' tak chi rich'ukuric k'oric chana̱ tak. Je' wo' chic, naquinponok awu̱c' tak nanibanam k'ak'anic cu̱c' take c'acharel quic'ambic na̱ rik'orbal i Walaham, je' wo' re' cu̱c' take c'acharel quic'ambic na̱ quino'jbal take aj Nicolayi̱ta. Nic' pa' wach camanic riban i c'ul k'as re̱ ch'ihch' chi peletenic, je' wo' re' naricamanic wi̱n niC'uhbal chi peletenic cu̱c' take c'acharel re're', nqui xk'ormojic wi̱n i hin Wa̱n.

Re' xk'oric wu̱c' wili, re' wo' re' nk'oric reh chi xa hab wach enbirinic reh take k'oric wili curman wo' chi reh chi ericoj rehtal chi coric i k'oro̱j ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal queh take ju'jun ch'uk chi aj niminel nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios. Re're' rik'or wo' chi re' c'acharel re' riyew pa ro̱k ribanaric i c'ahbilal, enye'eric reh chi naric'uxum reh i wi'c c'olo̱j cho re' “Manah” ribihnal eh na wo' riye'eric reh i jenaj t'uch sak laj abaj tz'ihmbimaj jenaj ac' laj bihnal chiwach re' ma' hab ta wach neht'alanic reh, xa re' la' wo' naric'ulbic reh nareht'alanic reh.

Re' xk'oric wu̱c' xik'or wo' chic chi je' wili: «Chatz'ihmbaj wo' i hu̱j wili reh aj tz'e' wa̱ch ncha'janic queh take juntuhm aj niminel wilque̱b ar pan tinamit Tiyati̱ra ribihnal. Re' k'oric na̱tz'ihmbam wili re' wo' re' narik'ormojic queh take aj niminel re're' chi je' wili: ‹Re' hin rAc'u̱n i Dios re' xa quiworwotic chic take nak' niwach xa je' chic ricab i xak k'a̱k' eh re' take wo̱k xa je' chic ricab nch'ubch'utic k'an laj ch'ihch' ic'simaj take pan k'a̱k' xa quirepretic chic ru'um riholonquil, je' wili nik'or:

Re' hin weht'alim take abano̱j tak. Weht'alim chi nac'ax tak take awas acha̱k' tak eh chi xa ch'iclic wo' ac'ux tak chiwi̱j. Je' wo', weht'alim quilmijic awas acha̱k' na'n tak eh chi nacuy wo' tak ransil i ti'c'axic re' wilca̱t tak wi̱' yu'na. Je' re' ajic chi'nchel abano̱j tak wili re' k'e̱' wo' chic q'uihal chiwach take abano̱j xa'n tak naxatoquic tak cho pan pe̱t chi niminic, re' hin til weht'alim take re',

xa re' la' to̱b ta wo' xa holohic chic take na'n tak, re' wili i mahc ma' ric'ul ta niwach chi na'n tak: Je' ricab xc'uluric cho najtir ru̱c' ixok Jesawel ribihnal, re' xicoj ri̱b chi chucul raj k'oro̱l i Dios, wilic wo' chaxilac tak jenaj ixok je' re' c'ahchi' ribanam eh re' hat-tak xa c'ahchi' wo' ayeb tak k'ab chi c'ahchi' ribanam i c'uhtunic re' riyew wi̱' k'ab chi enbanaric i c'oyomal eh chi ewo' nc'uxuric i tiwic k'ahsamaj chi si̱ chiwach tiyo̱x, to̱b ta nchel re' c'uhtunic re're' xa rijot'oric quino'jbal take aj niminel c'ahchi' ribanam.
Re' ixok re're' xwuy'ej chi narijalam nak wach rino'jbal xa re' la' ma' jaruj ra̱j ricana̱b ribanaric i mahc wilic wi̱' chi banoj c'oyomal.

Ru'um aj re', re' hin nanibanam chi narikajic wach yoca̱b ru'um ya'bilal eh re' take xikajic pan c'oyomal ru̱c' ixok re're' na wo' niyeb nimak tak ti'c'axic chi quina̱ wi ma' nquicana̱' ribanaric take bano̱j c'uhtumaj queh ru'um ixok re're'.

Je' wo' chic, re' take raj tahkanel ixok re're' nanibanam chi naquiquimic je. Ru̱c' chi'nchel nanibanam re're', chi cunchelal take aj niminel nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic niwach naquina'bem chi re' hin weht'alim richamil pa̱m quino'jbal ch'i̱l quicapew-bal eh ru'um aj re', re' k'orel nic' pa' wach ribano̱j i ju'jun chi c'acharel je' wo' re' i ch'ukuj k'oric nanibanam chi quina̱.

Je' aj re' k'oric niban queh take c'acharel re're', raj nchel hat-tak aj Tiyati̱ra, re' hin ma'xta chic niyeb jeno' ihk chana̱ tak re' ma' xac'am ta tak na̱ ritijinic ixok ricoj ri̱b chi raj k'orol i Dios eh ma'eta niban chi je' re' ru'um chi ma' xac'ul ta wo' tak take c'uhtunic riban ixok re're', re' nk'ormojic chi ar pa richamil pa̱m rino'jbal aj Yahm nchalic.
Haj cok wilic nipahkaj aweh tak chi chatik tak ju' ricowsjic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i tijinic ye'o̱j aweh tak cu rehtal cho nic'ulic lok rica'pech.

Je' re' ajic re' c'acharel re' riyew pa ro̱k ribanaric i c'ahbilal cu rehtal nic'ulic wo' chic lok eh riban take bano̱j k'oro̱j wu'um, re're' nariye'eric riwa'ric chi naritak'anic chi quina̱ take tinamit je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil take cho ma' Israhel.

Re' ric'uluric riwa'ric ru' naribanam je' ricab ric'uluric cho niwa'ric xniban i hin ru̱c' i wAja̱w. Je' re' nik'or maj re' c'acharel re' naric'ulum riwa'ric, k'e̱' wo' chic nimal wach rajawric nariwih'ic xa je' na ricab rajawric nwih'ic reh i aj cha'jem me̱' nok richopom ch'imim je' ru̱c' wilic jenaj bolobic ch'ihch' china̱. Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab chi re' aj cha'janel me̱' re're' ric'am quibe̱h take rime̱' ru̱c' i riche̱', je' wo' re' i c'acharel re're', ru̱c' i rajawric nariye'eric reh narik'atam wo' k'oric chi quina̱ take tinamit je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel take eh ma' xa re' ta re', nariwih'ic la' wo' rajawric chi quina̱ take nquic'ul ti'c'axic re' narisahchic quiwach je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' ac'al xun nanpaxic.
Wi cu rehtal aj nic'ulic lok rica'pech re' c'acharel re're', c'ahchi' ribanam take bano̱j k'oro̱j wu'um, na wo' riye'eric reh rich'imilal i sak'ic, nqui xik'or re' xk'oric wu̱c'.

Re' xk'oric wu̱c' wili re' wo' re' nk'oric reh chi xa hab wach enbirinic reh take k'oric wili curman wo' chi reh chi ericoj rehtal chi coric i k'oro̱j ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal queh take ju'jun ch'uk chi aj niminel nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios.

Chiri̱j wo' chic ru', je' wo' chic wili xik'or wi̱n: «Chatz'ihmbaj wo' i hu̱j wili reh aj tz'e' wa̱ch ncha'janic queh juntuhm aj niminel wilque̱b ar pan tinamit Sa̱rtis. Re' k'oric na̱tz'ihmbam wili re' wo' re' narik'ormojic queh take aj niminel re're' chi je' wili: ‹Je' wili nik'or i hin re' choplic wu'um i wuku̱b chi ch'imi̱l ru̱c' risec'a̱j nik'ab eh re' wilic wo' wu̱c' i wuku̱b chi manlic wach no'jbal wilic reh i Dios. Re' hin weht'alim i wili chiri̱j abano̱j tak: To̱b ta wilic abiral tak chi xa cow chic i niminic na'n tak, til pa ricorquil ma' c'ahchi' ta wo' ac'acharic tak chi je' re'.

Ru'um aj re' nipahkaj aweh tak chi c'achlic ok awach tak eh ticowjok wo' tak pan animinic tak maj re' Dios ma' nponic ta chiwach nic' wach i c'acharic c'ahchi' abanam tak. Je' re' k'uru' re' animinic tak re' nc'utunic chi xa quimic chic reh, chayew tak ricowil chi manlic.

Chi je' re' na̱banam tak, nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chi chacana̱' tak ribanaric i c'ahbilal na'n tak cu yu'na chi k'i̱j eh re' chic i wili cha'n tak chi jelow-bal: C'olok pan ac'ux tak i tijinic re' xac'ul tak pan awa̱mna tak naxk'ormojic aweh tak eh chanimej wo' tak chi coric i tijinic re're'. Je' re' nik'or maj wi ma' xatc'acharic tak chi c'ahchi' acowonic pan animinic tak, re' hin nanic'ulic lok chi riye'eric chana̱ tak i ti'c'axic chi ma' c'ahchi' ta ana'bem tak nic'ulic je' ricab nok jeno' aj lek' ma' riyew ta rehtalil chi xa nic' yu' nc'ulic lok chi lek' pan jeno' pa̱t.

Je' re' nik'or maj chaxilac hat-tak aj niminel aj Sa̱rtis cu wilque̱b take ju'jun awich aj niminel tak re' ma' xquicana̱' ta chi jeno' mahc erijot' quiniminic je' ricab chi wilic take c'acharel ma' nca̱j ta quich'uwa'rem so' wach quiso'. Ru'um chi je' re' nca'n, re' take re' naquiwih'ic ru̱c' risakil wach no'jbal je' ricab chi sak ta nak wach quiso'. Je' re' nik'or maj ric'ul wo' chi queh chi je' re' naquiwih'ic.

Je' re' k'uru', xa hab wach c'acharel riyew pan ro̱k ribanaric i c'ahbilal, naniyeb reh jenaj sak laj tz'ih reh chi naricojom chi riso'. Ma' xa ta re're', chipam la' wo' i hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' quibihnal nic' pa' nimal take ye'o̱j chiqui̱j chi naquic'acharic chi junelic, nanibanam chi ma' jaruj ta chic enjuc'uric lok ribihnal chi junelic. Je' wo' chic, nach'ukurok k'oric china̱ i c'acharel re're', re' hin ar chiwach wAja̱w Dios rich'i̱l take raj tz'e' wa̱ch ar pan taxa̱j, naniyeb nichi̱' chiri̱j chi re're' til waj tahkanel nok wilic chi co'lbal reh i c'acharel re're', nqui xik'or wi̱n.

Re' xk'oric wu̱c' wili, re' wo' re' nk'oric reh chi xa hab wach enbirinic reh take k'oric wili curman wo' chi reh chi ericoj rehtal chi coric i k'oro̱j ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal queh take ju'jun ch'uk chi aj niminel nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios.

Chiri̱j chic ru', je' wo' chic wili xik'or wi̱n: «Chatz'ihmbaj wo' i hu̱j wili reh aj tz'e' wa̱ch ncha'janic queh juntuhm aj niminel wilque̱b ar pan tinamit Pilare̱lpiya. Re' k'oric na̱tz'ihmbam wili re' wo' re' narik'ormojic queh take aj niminel re're' chi je' wili: ‹Chiwi̱j hin nk'ormojic chi re' hin xnik'ahsaj wi̱b chi ribanaric ricamaj i Dios eh til xniban i camanic re're' chi manlic. Re' hin xye'eric wajawric je' ricab nok re' k'atal k'oric aj najtir re' ma' Tawiy xiyew rajawric i jenaj raj camanom naxiyew reh rila̱wahil i pa̱t re' riban wi̱' k'atoj k'oric. Je' re' nik'or maj xa re' aj wach i camanom re're' wilic ru̱c' i la̱wa chi riteheric je' wo' chi ritz'aparic ritz'ahpil i pa̱t re're' eh ma' hab ta chic wach jeno' enchol riteheric, ma' wo' ritz'aparic i tz'ahp re're'. Re' hin k'uru' nik'or aweh tak i wili:

Re' hin weht'alim i wili chiri̱j abano̱j tak: Chi re' hat-tak ma' acana̱b ta tak riye'eric ac'ux tak chiwi̱j, xa ch'iclic la' wo' ac'ux tak chiri̱j niC'uhbal, to̱b ta re' acomonil tak chi niminic ma' nim ta ti chipam i tinamit Pilare̱lpiya. Ru'um chi je' re' c'ahchi' abanam tak, re' hin xniban chi re' hat-tak xa wilic ok wo' awocbal tak chi c'uhbalanic cu̱c' take aj Pilare̱lpiya, je' ricab curman chi tehlic ok jeno' ocbal reh jeno' pa̱t wi jeno' hab wach ra̱j oquic ar chipam.

Je' wo' chic, ma' xa re' ta re' weht'alim, je' la' wo' chi, chi quixilac take aj niminel wilic take nquitz'ak qui̱b chi ritinami̱t i Dios take xa re' la' ma' re' ta wo' ritinami̱t i Dios take, ritinami̱t la' aj Yahm take ru'um chi nanquimol wo' qui̱b pan pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses, re' wo' rino'jbal ru' nquitijej ri̱j. Cu̱c' take chucul laj k'oric aj c'acharel re're', nanibanam chi naquiyeb alok'il tak chi xa naquitokom chic qui̱b chawach tak na'bal reh chi k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak.

Ru'um i re' naponok rik'ijil i pajaric re' nilmijic wi̱' wi coric chi re' take c'acharel ch'iclic quic'ux chiwi̱j, re' hin chiwach take k'i̱j re're' naca̱t tak nico'lem chiwach i ti'c'axic narichalic chi quina̱ wilque̱b ayu' wach ac'al re' ma' nquinimej ta i Dios. Je' re' nanibanam chawi̱j tak maj re' tijinic ye'o̱j aweh tak wu'um re' rik'or wi̱' chi na̱cuyum tak ransil i ti'c'axic, xanimej wo' tak chi manlic.

‹Je' re' k'uru' ru'um chi re' hin loq'uil wo' chic quinc'ulic lok, nipahkaj aweh tak chi re' tijinic niyeb aweh tak chatik tak ju' ricowsjic ac'ux tak chiri̱j reh chi ma' toco̱m ta enc'ulbic reh aco̱ch re' naniyeb aweh tak.

Re' co̱ch re're', re' i wili: Je' ricab chi jeno' queh take ro̱k Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios ma' eta riban chi enelic lok je' wo' re' xa hab wach aweh tak re' nariyeb pa ro̱k i c'ahbilal, re' hin nanibanam chi enc'acharic ar re' wilic wi̱' i Dios eh encahnic ar chi junelic. Je' wo' ricab nantz'ihmjic take bihnal chiwach take pa̱t eht'albal reh hab wach aj ehchenel reh on chajaric tinamital wilic wi̱' i pa̱t re're', je' wo' re' nanibanam hin ru̱c' i c'acharel re' riyew pa ro̱k i c'ahbilal. Yejal wach nanicojom jenaj rehtalil re' enc'utunic wi̱' chi re' wAja̱w Dios aj ehchenel reh. Je' wo', yejal wach i c'acharel re're' ewo' nicoj i ac' laj ehtalil ye'o̱j wo' wi̱n i hin re' nc'utunic wi̱' chi xniyew pan wo̱k i c'ahbilal. Ma' xa re' ta re', je' la' wo' yejal wach i c'acharel re're', ewo' nicoj i rehtalil re' enc'utunic wi̱' chi re're' enc'acharic johtok ar pan “Ac' laj ye'a̱b re' Jerusalen” ribihnal re' pan taxa̱j tik'imaj ru'um i wAja̱w Dios, nqui xk'o'ronic wi̱n.

Re' xk'oric wu̱c' wili, re' wo' re' nk'oric reh chi xa hab wach enbirinic reh take k'oric wili curman wo' chi reh chi ericoj rehtal chi coric i k'oro̱j ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal queh take ju'jun ch'uk chi aj niminel nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios.

Chiri̱j wo' chic ru', je' wo' chic wili xik'or wi̱n: «Chatz'ihmbaj wo' i hu̱j wili reh aj tz'e' wa̱ch ncha'janic queh juntuhm aj niminel wilque̱b ar pan tinamit Lahorise̱ya. Re' k'oric na̱tz'ihmbam wili re' wo' re' narik'ormojic queh take aj niminel re're' chi je' wili: ‹Re' hin re' nk'ormojic chiwi̱j chi re' hin quinbanic chi nponic wach nic' nimal k'oro̱j cahnok ru'um i Dios eh chi re' wo' hin aj ch'iquenel c'uxlis chiri̱j rik'ormojic i coric. Ru'um chi je' re' niwi̱', re' hin re' xintik'inic cho reh take chi'nchel nic' pa' nimal wilic, nik'or aweh tak wili:

Re' hin weht'alim wili chiri̱j abano̱j tak: Re' hat-tak ma' rik'or ta coric animinic tak xa je' nawa̱j eh xa je' ma' nawa̱j ta wo' tak niminic. Ru̱c' i no'jbal na'n tak re're' xa je' na acab i luhic laj ha' chi ma' tz'a' ta wo' eh ma' jot'ic ta wo'. Je' re' nik'or maj k'e̱' nak nwa̱j chi enapahba̱' ac'ux tak chiwi̱j chi coric on ma'xta wo' chi junpech.

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um chi ma' rik'or ta chic coric animinic tak chi xa je' ricab i luhic laj ha' chi ma' tz'a' ta eh ma' jot'ic ta wo', re' hin ma'xta chic nic'ulum ano'jbal tak re're' je' ricab nok jeno' c'acharel rixa'bej lok i qui'tok'ic laj ha' ru'um chi ma' ric'ul ta cho chi' ric'ux.

Ru̱c' i no'jbal re're' to̱b ta nak'or tak chi hat-tak biho̱m eh chi ma'xta chic bih ma' ta nak wilic aweh tak, ma' narak ta tak chiri̱j chi, chi wi̱n i hin xa je' na acab tak jenaj niba̱' re' ma'xta bih wilic reh, on je' acab tak jenaj sot', on je' acab tak jenaj c'acharel yonlic chi junpech.

Ru'um aj re' chabiraj take no'jbal naniyeb aweh tak wili: Je' ricab nok jeno' c'acharel nponic ru̱c' aj c'a̱y chi rilok'oric i k'an woric laj ch'ihch' ch'ubsamaj wach pan k'a̱k' reh chi naribihomric, je' wo' re' nisiq'uiric cha'n tak i hin reh chi q'uihal wach cuse'sbal enac'ul tak wu̱c'. Je' wo' chic, je' ricab nato̱j tak ru̱c' aj c'a̱y tz'ih chi rilok'oric take sak laj tz'ih nacoj chawi̱j tak reh chi ma' eta nac'uhtaj tak aq'uixbilal chi t'i'lica̱t tak, je' wo' re' nisiq'uiric cha'n tak i hin reh chi enpoyoric wach aq'uixbilal tak wilic ru'um amahc tak. Je' wo', je' ricab nato̱j tak ru̱c' aj c'a̱y ik'o̱m chi rilok'oric rik'omil nak' awach suksbal reh chi narilbic chi coric, je' wo' re' nisiq'uiric cha'n tak i hin reh chi re' acapew-bal tak erirak chiri̱j chi coric chaj bih k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios.

Re' hin naniyeb cho aweh tak take no'jbal re're' ru'um i wili: Wi re' take c'acharel re' k'e̱' ti' nwic'raj take ma' nquijal ta wach quino'jbal, re' hin ninak take eh nik'il wo' take ru̱c' ti'c'axic. Je' re' k'uru' reh chi ma' eta niban ti'c'axic aweh tak nipahkaj aweh tak chi chajal wach ano'jbal tak eh chiri̱j ok chic i Dios chayew ac'ux tak chi manlic.

Ru'um aj re' chacoj tak rehtal i yuk'unic c'ahchi' nibanam aweh tak chi chayew tak k'ab wi̱n chi naniwih'ic chaxilac tak maj re' hin c'ahchi'qui̱n chi k'o'ronic awu̱c' tak je' ricab nok jeno' c'acharel no̱j c'olok chi' ripa̱t jeno' c'acharel narik'or cok tuwe̱y. Je' aj ricab chi nanteheric cho reh i tz'ahp i c'acharel re're', noquic cok chipam i pa̱t eh nank'ormojic riwa' riha̱', riban wo' riwa' riha̱' pan junwachil ch'i̱l take aj pan pa̱t re're', je' wo' re' i hin, xa eli̱c wo' naniwih'ic ru̱c' i hab wach eriyew k'ab wi̱n chi nawihch'ilem.

Je' re' k'uru' re' c'acharel re' riyew pa ro̱k ribanaric i c'ahbilal, nanibanam chi enehtric wajawric je' ricab xiban wu̱c' i wAja̱w naxniyew pan wo̱k i c'ahbilal. Re're' xiban chi re' hin xinehtric ru̱c' rilok'il je' ricab riban jeno' k'atal k'oric nariyew k'ab reh jeno' c'acharel chi entz'uhkic chipam ritz'uk'a̱b riban wi̱' k'atoj k'oric, nqui xik'or wi̱n.

Re' xk'oric wu̱c' wili, re' wo' re' nk'oric reh chi xa hab wach enbirinic reh take k'oric wili curman wo' chi reh chi ericoj rehtal chi coric i k'oro̱j ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal queh take ju'jun ch'uk chi aj niminel nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios.

Chiri̱j chic take pe̱t c'uhtunic xbanjic wi̱n, wilic wo' chic take toco̱m chic c'uhtunic xwilow re' je' wili riwi̱': Pe̱t, xwilow chi tehlic cho jenaj ocbal ar pan taxa̱j. Chiri̱j i re' xbiraj wo' chic chi re' xk'oric wu̱c' chi pe̱t, xk'oric pe' wo' chic cho chi xa je' chic ricab jenaj ch'ihch' laj su̱b i ricowil pa̱m k'oric xiban cho naxik'or wi̱n chi je' wili: «Tijohten cho ayu' eh enic'uhtaj aweh nic' nimal naric'ulmujic chiwach take k'i̱j nakojic johtok wi̱' chi kawach, nqui wi̱n.

Chiwach i junc'am re're', re' Lok' laj Uxlabal xiban wu̱c' chi xinjohtic johtok ar pan taxa̱j eh nok wilqui̱n chic cok ar xwilow i wili: Ar wilic jenaj ritz'uk'a̱b k'atal k'oric eh chipam i tz'uka̱b re're' xwilow wo' chi wilic jenaj tz'uklic chipam.

Re' tz'uklic chipam i tz'uka̱b re're', xa nrepretic chic cho riholonquilal xa je' chic ricab riholonquil take chak'wach laj abaj “Ja̱spe” ch'i̱l i “Cornali̱na” ribihnal. Re' lok' laj ye'a̱b re're' sutumaj ri̱j ru'um jenaj xohcak'ab je' chak'wachquil abaj “Esmera̱lta” ribihnal ru'um xa nrepretic chic riholonquilal.

Je' wo' chic, re' tz'uka̱b re're' sutumaj ri̱j chi quejeb rica'winak (24) chi tz'uka̱b re' tz'ukulque̱b wi̱' quejeb rica'winak (24) chi c'acharel. Re' quiwa'ric take c'acharel re're' je' ricab i quiwa'ric take c'acharel rijeb chic take eh re' quiso' wilic chiqui̱j til xa sakp'onic chic eh wilic ju'jun coten k'an woric laj ch'ihch' wach quina̱.

Re' wilic wi̱' i tz'uka̱b k'atbal k'oric re're', nok wilic take k'oric xbirmijic, xic'uyu'jic take cho cohok eh xquirehpaj cho quisakomil. Je' wo', ar chiwach cok i tz'uka̱b re're' wilic i wuku̱b chi k'a̱k' sakombal kopolque̱b eh re' take k'a̱k' sakombal re're' nquijalwachej take wuku̱b chi uxlabal re' wilic cu̱c' i jenaj queh wuku̱b chi manlic wach no'jbal wilic reh Dios.

Ma' xa re' ta re', chiwach wo' i tz'uka̱b re're' wilic wo' jenaj xa je' ma' laj ha' tuklic ar xa sak chic wach, xa je' chic jenaj lemuh. Je' wo' chic, ar re' wilic wi̱' i tz'uka̱b k'atbal k'oric, ar pan yejal i lok' laj ch'a̱b wilic pan taxa̱j, wilque̱b quejeb chi c'acharel re' pa'alque̱b chiri̱j i tz'uka̱b re're'. Re' take c'acharel re're' xa nujunak chic i qui̱j chi nak' wachi̱s, wilic nak' quiwach chiqui̱j eh wilic wo' chi quiwach.
Re' pe̱t c'acharel xa je' nilbic jenaj cakcoj. Re' chic ricab je' nilbic jenaj rac'u̱n wacax. Re' ro̱x xa je' nilbic jenaj winak eh re' ricaj je' chic nilbic jenaj xihc' xiq'uinic riban.

Chi quiju'junal take quejeb chi c'acharel re're' waktak quixi̱c' wilic eh re' quiti'jolal ch'i̱l i quixi̱c' take c'acharel re're', nujunak take chi nak' wachi̱s. Re' take c'acharel re're' chi k'i̱j chi ak'ab ma' quihi'lic ta chi rik'ormojic i bi̱ch chi je' wili: «Hat kAja̱w re' xa re' wach hat k'e̱' rinimal wach awajawric wilic, Lo̱k' awa'ric, Lo̱k' awa'ric, Lo̱k' awa'ric. Nok ma' ja' tik'imaj ta cho i wach ac'al, re' hat xa wilca̱t wo' cho eh xa wilca̱t wo' yu'na eh xa na wo' awih'ic wo' chi junelic k'i̱j sakom, nqui take.

Je' re' k'uru' re' tz'uklic chipam tz'uka̱b k'atbal k'oric ma' ncanabjic ta rik'ormojic reh cu'um take c'acharel re're' chi k'e̱' nimal rilok'il riwa'ric. Ma' xa ta re're' nca'n, xa eli̱c la' wo' nca'n i tiyoxonic chiwach i c'achlic chi junelic k'i̱j sakom.

Chiwach wo' re', re' c'achlic chi junelic i k'i̱j sakom re're', re' take quejeb rica'winak (24) chi c'acharel re' wilic quiwa'ric je' ricab quiwa'ric take rijeb tak winak, nquipach'a̱' wo' qui̱b chi rehtalil rilok'onjic wach nca'n. Rehtalil aj chi re' chic re' wilic rajawric chi quina̱, re' take re' nquiyew cok chiwach i quicoten k'an woric laj ch'ihch' eh nok je' re' nca'n je' wo' wili nquik'or pan quibi̱ch:

«Hat kAja̱w, re' hat til ric'ul chaweh chi enk'ormojic chi k'e̱' nim alok'il eh chi k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal wach awa'ric. Je' wo', til ric'ul chaweh chi enk'ormojic chi k'e̱' nimal wach awajawric wilic ru'um nok nic' pa' nimal xawa̱j chi naquiwih'ic, re' hat xatik'a̱' wo' take, nqui take pan quibi̱ch.

Chiri̱j aj chic re', xwilow chi re' tz'uklic chipam i tz'uka̱b k'atbal k'oric wilic pa risec'a̱j k'ab jenaj hu̱j botomaj wach eh c'ultar tz'ihmbimaj wach. Re' hu̱j re're' wukt'u̱r chi k'olbal k'olomaj wi̱' i chi̱' reh chi ma' eta chic nteh wach.

Nok je' re' c'ahchi' wilom, xwilow wach jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios til nim chic riwa'ric. Re're' xa cow chic c'ahchi' rik'orom chi je' wili: «Hab wach wilic rajawric chi eresaj take wukt'u̱r chi k'olbal eh chi eriteh wach i hu̱j wili chi narilmijic wach? nqui c'ahchi' rik'orom.

Je' re' xik'or maj ma' xrakmajic ta jeno' hab wach wilic rajawric chi eresaj take wukt'u̱r chi k'olbal re're', ma' wo' chi erilow wach i hu̱j. Ma' wo' haj ta xcan jeno' aj tehol wach i hu̱j re're', xa ta nak pan taxa̱j, xa ta nak wach ac'al eh xa ta nak wo' chipam i ye'a̱b re' qui'o̱j wi̱' take c'acharel naquiquimic je.
Naxwilow chi je' re', re' hin k'e̱' naxinok'ic jok ru'um chi ma' haj ta xrakmajic jeno' wilic rajawric chi riteheric wach i hu̱j re're' eh xa ta wo' nak je chi erilow pa̱m.

Chiri̱j i wili xchalic jenaj queh take winak re' wilic quiwa'ric je' ricab quiwa'ric take rijeb tak c'acharel eh xik'or wi̱n chi je' wili: «Chacana̱' ok'ic maj cu wilic jenaj chic c'acharel re' eriban chi eresaj i wukt'u̱r chi k'olbal k'olomaj wi̱' i hu̱j re're' eh je' wo' chi eriteh wach i hu̱j re're'. Re' c'acharel wili “Cakcoj” nk'ormojic reh re' xiyew pa ro̱k i c'ahbilal ru'um reh rinimal wach rajawric wilic. Re're' ar chalanak rira'il chi quixilac take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Jurah. Je' wo', ra̱' ri'sil wo' cho k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy, nqui wi̱n.

Nok rik'orom chic wi̱n chi je' re', ar wo' pan yejal reh lok' laj ye'a̱b re' wilic wi̱' i tz'uka̱b k'atbal k'oric chi sutumaj ri̱j cu'um take quejeb rica'winak chi winak (24) re' wilic quiwa'ric je' ricab quiwa'ric take rijeb tak winak eh chi sutumaj wo' ri̱j cu'um take quejeb chi c'acharel re' wilic nak' quiwach chiqui̱j chi quiwach, xwilow chi ar pa'lic i Jesus re' rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱'. Re' rijalwachej ri̱b chi q'uijol me̱' re're' ja' sahchanak take rehtalil ti'c'axic bano̱j reh naxquicansaj chi je' ricab nok quicansjic take q'uijol me̱' re' quik'ahsjic chi si̱ chiwach i Dios. Je' wo' xnicoj rehtal chi re' rijalwachej ri̱b chi q'uijol me̱' re're' til wilic rajawric eh je' re' nik'or maj xwilow chi wilic wuku̱b ruc'a'. Re're' wilic wo' wuku̱b nak' wach re' rijalwachej i wuku̱b chi uxlabal re' wilic cu̱c' i jenaj queh wuku̱b chi manlic wach no'jbal wilic reh Dios. Re' take uxlabal wili re' wo' take xitak'abjic je ru'um i Dios chi naquicamanic chi junsut wach ac'al.

Je' re' ajic re' C'acharel re' rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱', xijil cok ri̱b ru̱c' i tz'uklic cho chipam i tz'uka̱b k'atbal k'oric eh xichop i hu̱j botomaj wach re' wilic pan risec'a̱j k'ab i tz'uklic cho ar.

Ar aj ru' naxichop i hu̱j re're', re' take quejeb chi c'acharel re' wilic nak' quiwach chiqui̱j chi quiwach quich'i̱l take quejeb rica'winak (24) chi c'acharel re' wilic quiwa'ric je' ricab quiwa'ric take rijeb tak winak, quipach'a̱' qui̱b chiwach i C'acharel re' rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' chi rehtalil rilok'onjic wach xca'n. Re' take c'acharel re're' wilic ju'jun quiculc tik'imaj ru̱c' k'anworic laj ch'ihch' nujunak chi se̱nsa re' rijalwachej quiti̱j take aj niminel. Re' take culc re're' xquik'ahsaj chiwach i C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱'. Je' wo', re' take re' wilic cu̱c' quik'ojbal reh banoj bi̱ch re' a̱rpa ribihnal

eh ru̱c' re' p'uht quibichem wach jenaj ac' laj bi̱ch je' wili rik'or: “Re' hat til ric'ul chaweh chi enachop i hu̱j botomaj wach eh chi enawesaj lok i wukt'u̱r chi k'olbal nlutz'bic reh i hu̱j re're' maj je' ricab ric'ul i q'uijol me̱' nank'ahsjic chi si̱ chiwach i Dios, re' hat xac'ul wo' rinimal ti'c'axic naxatcansjic je eh je' ricab jeno' aj camanom ntojoric ri̱j ric'acharic ru'um jeno' ajabe̱s ru'um chi ra̱j rehcham, ru̱c' wo' aquimic i hat xa'n chi nic' pa' q'uihal tinamit xa rehreh wach quima̱m cati't, xa rehreh wach quik'orbal eh xa rehreh wo' wach quitinamital wilque̱b chic chi ritinami̱t i kAja̱w Dios.

Je' wo' chic, re' hat xatbanic chi re' chic i Dios wilic chi k'atal k'oric chi quina̱ chi'nchel take c'acharel ritinami̱t chic eh chi wilque̱b chic chiwach ru' chi aj k'ahsem si̱. Je' wo', re' hat xa'n chi k'atoj k'oric chic nka'n chi quina̱ tinamit wach ac'al, nqui rik'or i bi̱ch xca'n.

Chiri̱j chic re', ar wo' chic pan yejal i lok' laj ye'a̱b wilic wi̱' i tz'uka̱b k'atbal k'oric, xwilow riq'uihal raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re' xquisutej ri̱j i tz'uka̱b re're' sutumaj wo' ri̱j cu'um take quejeb rica'winak (24) chi c'acharel re' wilic quiwa'ric je' ricab quiwa'ric take rijeb tak winak eh je' wo' sutumaj ri̱j cu'um take quejeb chi winak re' wilic nak' quiwach chiqui̱j chi quiwach. Re' take aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're', re' k'e̱' wo' chic q'uihal take chi ma' hab ta wach eriban canar cajaljic

je' wili bichinic nca'n chi cow: «Je' ricab i q'uijol me̱' nk'ahsjic chi si̱ chiwach i Dios, re' hat xatk'ahsjic wo' pan quimic. Ru'um aj re' xa re' wo' hat ric'ul chaweh chi enac'ul i lok'il wili: Re' rik'ormojic chi re' hat rira'il i rinimal wach awajawric, rira'il i bihomal, rira'il i no'jbal, rira'il i ansil eh re' wo' hat manlic coric wach k'atoj k'oric na'n. Ru'um reh chi'nchel re're', ric'ul chaweh chi enac'ul rinimal alok'il, chi enac'ul alok'onjic eh je' wo' chi enac'ul ribichjic awach, nqui take.

Nok k'oro̱j aj chic re're', re' hin xnibiraj chi chi'nchel take c'acharel je' chi wilque̱b pan taxa̱j, je' chi wilque̱b wach ac'al ch'i̱l wo' take camnak chic je take je' ricab take ximuhkic pan ac'al eh ch'i̱l wo' take xmuhkic quina̱ pan ma' laj ha', xi'oquic chi bichinic chi je' wili: «Hat Dios re' tz'ukulca̱t chipam i tz'uka̱b k'atbal k'oric ch'i̱l wo' i hat re' ajalwachem awi̱b chi je' ricab jenaj q'uijol me̱', chi junelic k'i̱j sakom ye'erok alok'il tak. Naye'erok alok'onjic tak, banjok ribichjic awach tak eh k'ormojok wo' chi re' hat-tak xa manlic wo' wach i k'atoj k'oric na'n tak, nqui take.

Nok k'oro̱j aj chic re're', re' take quejeb chi c'acharel re' wilic nak' quiwach chiqui̱j chi quiwach xquik'or chi je' ta nak re' banarok. Re' chic take quejeb rica'winak (24) chi rijeb tak winak re' wilic quiwa'ric je' ricab quiwa'ric take rijeb tak winak, xquipach'a̱' qui̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios ch'i̱l wo' i Jesus re' xijalwachej ri̱b chi q'uijol me̱'. Quicabchel re're' c'achalque̱b take chi junelic k'i̱j sakom.

Chiri̱j chic ru' xwilow chi re' C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱', xich'ep lok i pe̱t rit'uhr k'olbal k'olomaj wi̱' chi̱' i botomaj wach hu̱j re're'. Naxiban chi je' re' xnibiraj chi jenaj queh take quejeb chi c'acharel wilic nak' quiwach chiqui̱j chi quiwach, xk'oric cho chi xa je' chic cowil rik'orbal cohok eh je' wili xik'or: «Hiy i hat! nqui xik'or.

Ar ajic xwilow je chi jenaj sak ri̱j cawa̱y wilic jenaj tz'uklic china̱, wilic jenaj cansbal pan k'ab jenaj cansbal ncojoric reh k'ak'anic. Re' tz'uklic china̱ i cawa̱y re're' xye'eric reh jenaj ricoten ch'ihch' xoybal wach na̱ rehtalil chi re're' naribanam cho canar i k'ak'anic naroquic wi̱'. Nok ribiram aj chic i tak'anic xbanaric reh, re' tz'uklic china̱ i cawa̱y re're' xo̱j wo' reh chi nariban cho canar i k'ak'anic.

Chiri̱j re', xwilow wo' chic chi re' C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' xich'ep lok i ricab t'uhr k'olbal k'olomaj wi̱' chi̱' i botomaj wach hu̱j re're'. Ru̱c' re're', re' ricab c'acharel re' wilic nak' wach chiri̱j chiwach je' wili xik'or: «Hiy i hat! nqui xik'or.

Ar ajic xwilow chi wilic jenaj tz'uklic nah jenaj cak ri̱j cawa̱y xye'eric reh pan k'ab jenaj ma' laj c'ul k'as re̱ ch'ihch' rehtalil i rajawric ye'o̱j reh chi ribanaric chi re' take c'acharel ma' eta chic quiwih'ic pan sukquil c'uxlis, re' la' chic i cansanic i̱b chi quibil qui̱b nariwih'ic. Nok ribiram chic i tak'anic xbanaric reh, re' tz'uklic china̱ i cawa̱y re're' xo̱j wo'.

Chiri̱j wo' chic re', xwilow chi re' C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' xich'ep lok i roxt'uhr k'olbal k'olomaj wi̱' chi̱' i botomaj wach hu̱j re're'. Chi je' re' xbiraj chi re' ro̱x c'acharel re' wilic nak' wach chiri̱j chiwach je' wili k'oric xiban: «Hiy i hat! nqui xik'or. Ar aj ru' xwilow chi wilic jenaj tz'uklic china̱ jenaj k'ek ri̱j cawa̱y eh xye'jic pan k'ab jenaj pajbal ahlil.

Re' tz'uklic nah cawa̱y wili je' wili xk'ormojic cho reh ru'um i tz'uklic pan quiyejal take quejeb chi c'acharel wilic nak' quiwach chiqui̱j chi quiwach: «Re' hat na̱banam chi q'uih naric'ayjic wi̱' ixi̱m ch'i̱l riximal caxlan wi'c. Je' re' nok quib pajbal chi ixi̱m on waki̱b pajbal chi riximal caxlan wi'c, narilok'oric ru̱c' ritz'akil i jenaj k'i̱j chi camanic. Je' wo' na̱banam chi ma' eta nc'uhlic i yolic laj ik'o̱m ch'i̱l cak wach ha' nxohc'sonic, nqui xk'ormojic reh na xo̱j.

Chiri̱j chic ru' xwilow wo' chic chi re' C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' xich'ep lok i ricaj t'uhr chi k'olbal k'olomaj wi̱' chi̱' i botomaj wach hu̱j re're'. Naxiban chi je' re', re' ricaj c'acharel re' wilic nak' wach chiri̱j chiwach, je' wili xik'or: «Hiy i hat! nqui xik'or.

Ar aj ru' xwilow jenaj cawa̱y k'an moyic ri̱j eh re' jenaj tz'uklic china̱, “Cansanel” ribihnal. Re' tz'uklic china̱ i cawa̱y re're' xye'eric rajawric chi narik'orom chi naquiquimic take c'acharel junsut wach ac'al. K'e̱' wo' chic q'uihal c'acharel naquiquimic chi cu rehtal junseht reh ricaj seht chi c'acharel chi junsut wach ac'al nariponic quiq'uihal take naquiquimic. Wilic take naquiquimic ru'um banoj k'ak'anic, wilic take ru'um wi'jalel, wilic take ru'um ya'bilal eh wilic wo' naquiquimic cu'um take josk' laj chicop. Je' re' ajic re' tz'uklic china̱ i cawa̱y re're' xo̱j eh xtahkaljic wo' je ru'um jenaj chic tz'uklic wo' nah cawa̱y “Ha̱res” ribihnal eh re' “Ha̱res” wili re' wo' re' ribihnal i jenaj ye'a̱b re' no̱j ca'n wi̱' uyunic take camnak. Re' tz'uklic china̱ i cawa̱y re're', re' “Ha̱res” ribihnal wilic rajawric china̱ i ye'a̱b “Ha̱res” re're'.

Chiri̱j wo' chic i wili, xwilow chi re' C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' xich'ep lok i ro̱' t'uhr chi k'olbal k'olomaj wi̱' chi̱' i botomaj wach hu̱j re're'. Naxiban aj chi je' re', xwilow wach jenaj lok' laj ye'a̱b je' ricab nilbic i lok' laj ye'a̱b c'atbal si̱ chiwach i Dios eh chi rehquen i ye'a̱b re're' xwilow chi q'uihal take c'acharel re' xicansjic ru'um chi quich'ica̱b quic'ux chiri̱j riC'uhbal i Dios on ru'um rik'ormojic ribiral i c'uhbal re're', quimolom qui̱b ar.

Re' take re' quipahkanic cok chiwach i Dios eh cow nquik'or chi je' wili: «Lok' laj kAja̱w re' til coric wo' awach eh aj ehchenel wo' reh chi'nchel, cu nic' chic nahtil nakuy'em chi nariponic i k'i̱j nachach'uk k'oric chi quina̱ take c'acharel wach ac'al chi na̱yeb jelow-bal queh i ti' laj quimic xca'n cho keh hoj? nqui take.

Ar aj ru' je' wili quic'u'ljic xbanaric: «Cu wilic take toco̱m chic awich aj niminel tak quilok'onic reh Dios naquicansjic je' ricab acansjic tak xbanaric cho. Chahi'lsaj ac'ux tak eh chawuy'ej pe tak chic so' cu rehtal narimanlajic wach quiq'uihal take aj niminel naquiquimic, nqui xic'u'ljic wi̱'. Chiri̱j chic ru' xye'eric queh quiso' jenaj sak tz'ih re' naquicojom nachirak rik'ijil.

Chiri̱j chic wili, xwilow chi re' C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' xich'ep lok i riwa̱k t'uhr chi k'olbal k'olomaj wi̱' chi̱' i botomaj wach hu̱j re're'. Ar ajic naxiban chi je' re' xwilow chi xic'uluric take wili: Pe̱t, xchalic jenaj rinimal hihc. Chiri̱j chic ru' ar pan taxa̱j, xk'ekomric wach i k'i̱j eh je' ricab rik'ekil quiso' nquicoj take c'acharel nanquimic je jeno' hab wach je' wo' re' k'ekil xcahnic wach i k'i̱j. Je' wo' re' i poh cakbic wach xponic xa je' chic quic'.
Re' take ch'imi̱l xik'ehbic cho wach ac'al xa je' chic ricab quik'ehbic cho wach i che̱' naquipuh cho ru'um cow laj te̱w.

Je' wo' chic, re' taxa̱j xic'ul reh je' ricab ric'ul jeno' hu̱j nanbotjic wach eh ayu' wach ac'al chi'nchel wach xc'uluric, je' ricab ru' chi re' take yu̱k' q'uixca̱b ch'i̱l take ye'a̱b pan tak yejal ha', xsahchic quiwach ru'um chi xit'e'lejic.

Chiri̱j chic re', xc'uluric wo' chi re' take c'acharel ma' nquinimej ta i Dios, je' chi k'atal k'oric take, je' chi nimak quiwach, je' chi cajawil sol, ch'i̱l take bihomak, je' chi winak tehlic qui̱j on chopo̱j quina̱ pan cow laj camanic, chi'nchel re're' xquic'ol qui̱b xilac tak nim laj abaj eh chipam take nim laj ho̱p xicahnic naxit'e'lejic take cho yu̱k' q'uixca̱b.
