Re' take c'acharel re're' je' wili nquik'or chi cow nok c'ahchi' quisiq'uim nic' wach rico'ljic qui̱b naca'nam: «Re' ta nak take abaj wili camanok chi c'olbal keh reh chi ma' eta kojrilow i tz'uklic chipam i tz'uka̱b k'atbal k'oric eh reh wo' chi re' C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' ma' eta kojrirak chi riye'eric ti'c'axic chi kana̱ re' nariyeb cho ru'um reh chi kojrixowej chi hoj aj mahc. Je' aj re' nkapahkaj
maj xirak chic rik'ijil chi narichalic chi kana̱ jenaj rinimal laj ti'c'axic eh chiwach rik'ijil ti'c'axic re're' ma' jeno' keh hoj erico'lej ri̱b, nqui take.

Chiri̱j chic wili, xwilow wo' wach i quejeb chi raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re' pa'alque̱b china̱ i ju'jun reh ricaj tz'u'c i wach ac'al. Re' take re' c'ahchi' quipitim chi re' take quejeb chi te̱w qui'oquic cho pan cajtz'u'c reh wach ac'al ma' eta chic nquiyew cho quitewil je china̱ i ha' eh je' china̱ take che̱' c'aham.

Chiri̱j chic re', xwilow wo' chic jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re' wilic ru̱c' i cojbal ehtalil c'uhtbal reh chi re' take c'acharel co'lomaj chic take ru'um i Dios re' xa c'achlic wo' chi junelic. Re' aj tz'e' wa̱ch wili re' xchalic ar re' nelic cho wi̱' i k'i̱j je' wili xik'or chi cow queh take quejeb chi rich aj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios aj pitol take reh te̱w re' xye'eric wo' cajawric chi naca'nam ti'c'axic queh take wilque̱b wach ac'al eh je' wo' wilque̱b pan ha':

«Chawuy'ej pe tak, ma̱ban pe tak ti'c'axic wach ac'al, je' wo' pan tak ha' eh je' wo' china̱ take che̱' c'aham. Chacoj pe tak quehtalil yejal quiwach take c'acharel quik'ahsam qui̱b chiri̱j i ricamaj i kAja̱w Dios, cu re' aj wo' ru' na̱banam tak haj wilic k'oro̱j aweh tak, nqui queh.

Ar ajic chiri̱j chic rik'ormojic re're', xnibiraj chi re' quiq'uihal take cojo̱j quehtalil xponic wahxaklajc'ahl ik'ob (144,000) take. Re' take nic' pa' q'uihal naquic'ulum quehtalil re're' ar chi quixilac take cablaj ch'uk chi tinamit tz'uhcrunak cho cu̱c' take cablaj chi rac'u̱n i ma' Israhel quichalic.

Re' juntuhm chi c'acharel re' juninak ik'ob lajeb ik'ob (12,000) take chi winak, aj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Jurah take. Re' take re're' naricojoric quehtalil quich'i̱l take juninak ik'ob lajeb ik'ob (12,000) chi winak je' ru̱c' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Ruwen take, quich'i̱l wo' take juninak ik'ob lajeb ik'ob chi winak (12,000) je' ru̱c' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Ca̱t take.

Je' wo' naricojoric quehtalil take juninak ik'ob lajeb ik'ob chi winak (12,000) je' ru̱c' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Aser ch'i̱l take juninak ik'ob lajeb ik'ob (12,000) chi winak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Neptalih, quich'i̱l wo' juninak ik'ob lajeb ik'ob (12,000) chi winak je' ru̱c' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Manases.

Je' wo' re' take juninak ik'ob lajeb ik'ob (12,000) chi winak ra̱' ri'sil take cho i ma' Simyon naricojoric wo' quehtalil ch'i̱l take juninak ik'ob lajeb ik'ob (12,000) chi winak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Lewih ch'i̱l take juninak ik'ob lajeb ik'ob (12,000) chi winak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Isacar.

Ma' xa re' ta take re' je' la' wo' re' naric'uluric cu̱c' take juninak ik'ob lajeb ik'ob (12,000) chi winak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Sawulon ch'i̱l take juninak ik'ob lajeb ik'ob (12,000) chi winak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Chep eh ch'i̱l wo' take juninak ik'ob lajeb ik'ob (12,000) chi winak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Wenjamin.

Chiri̱j chic i wili, xwilow wach juntuhm chic riq'uihal c'acharel. K'e̱' wo' chic yohbal wach q'uihal take chi ma' wo' hab wach ta nak enchol cajaljic. Re' take c'acharel re're', c'ul elenak take cho chi junsut tinamit wach ac'al ru̱c' rehreh wach ja'quil c'acharel. Je' wo', ma' xa jenaj ta wach quik'orbal quik'oric wi̱' reh la' chi'nchel ju'jun chi k'orbal wilic ayu' wach ac'al. Chi'nchel riq'uihal tinamit re're' xwilow chi xa sak chic quiso' eh chi xa suk chic quic'ux c'ahchi' quic'uyu'sam i xak pac' pan quik'ab pa'alque̱b cok chiwach i Dios re' wilic chi k'atal k'oric china̱ chi'nchel eh je' wo' chiwach i C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi jenaj Q'uijol Me̱'.

Chi cunchelal aj take re're', xa junk'oric chic take chi cow chi lok'onic ru̱c' i bi̱ch wili: “Re' kaco'ljic xkac'ul i hoj xa re' wach i kAja̱w Dios re' wilic rajawric chi k'atal k'oric ch'i̱l wo' i C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱', xa re' wach take re' xiye'bic keh, nqui take.

Ar ajic naxk'ormojic chi je' re', chi'nchel take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios pa'alque̱b wo' cok ar xquixuc'a̱' qui̱b eh xquilok'ej wach i Dios. Re' take re' quisutem ri̱j i ye'a̱b riban wi̱' k'atoj k'oric i Dios chi rich'i̱l cok i C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi jenaj Q'uijol Me̱'. Je' wo', re' take re' quisutem wo' ri̱j take quejeb rica'winak chi winak re' wilic quiwa'ric je' ricab quiwa'ric take rijeb tak winak eh je' wo' re' take quejeb chi c'acharel re' wilic nak' quiwach chiqui̱j chi quiwach.

Je' aj wili lok'onic xca'n: “Til aj coric i k'oric wili chawi̱j i hat: Chi junelic i k'i̱j sakom xa re' wo' hat til rira'il rinimal wach ajawric, rira'il no'jbal, rira'il cuse'sbal, rira'il ansil eh re' wo' hat manlic wach k'atoj k'oric na'n. Ru'um reh chi'nchel re're', chac'ul alok'il, chac'ul alok'onjic eh je' wo' chac'ul atioxjic. Chi'nchel take k'oric chawi̱j wili, til coric take, nqui take.

Chipam i junc'am re're' jenaj queh take quejeb rica'winak chi winak re' wilic quiwa'ric je' ricab quiwa'ric take rijeb tak winak xiban wi̱n i pahkanic wili: «Re' take tinamit re' sak quiso' nawilow, hab wo' wach take pan ac'ux eh haj wo' xi'elic cho nanak'or i hat? nqui wi̱n.

Naxiban wi̱n i pahkanic re're', je' wili xnik'or reh: «Xa re' wo' hat teht'alanic reh ha̱w, quinqui reh. Re're' je' wili xik'or wi̱n ru̱c' pe̱t pahkanic: «Re' take c'acharel wili re' aj re' xicahnic chi sak wach i ca̱mna je' ricab sakil wach ncahnic i kaso' nantz'ajaric wach. Je' ricab riban i ha' chi re're' nbanic chi ncahnic chi sak wach i kaso' je' wo' re' xiban i C'acharel re' rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱', xisakbej wo' wach i ca̱mna take c'acharel re're' naxichihcaj riquiq'ue̱l chiqui̱j, nqui wi̱n. Chiri̱j i pe̱t pahkanic xiban wi̱n, je' wo' wili xik'or wi̱n chiri̱j i ricab pahkanic xiban cho wi̱n: «Re' take re' ar xi'elic cho chipam rinimal ti'c'axic wilque̱b nak cho wi̱'.

Ru'um aj re' xye'eric k'ab queh chi xiwih'ic cok chiwach i Dios re' wilic chi k'atal k'oric china̱ chi'nchel. Je' wo', xye'eric k'ab queh chi ayu' re' nlok'onjic wi̱' i Dios xquik'ahsaj qui̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios chi ma'xta ri'orahil. Ma' xa re' ta re', re' Dios re' k'atoj k'oric chic riban, xiyew k'ab queh chi xiwih'ic cok chipam i ye'a̱b nc'acharic wi̱' i Dios chi junelic i k'i̱j chi co'lomaj chic take.
Ar ajic ma' jaruj ta naquiwih'ic chi ma'xta quiwa' quiha̱', ma' wo' naquic'ataric ru'um ritz'a'quil i k'i̱j eh xa ta nak naquic'ram chic jeno' tz'a'.

Je' re' nik'or maj re' chic i C'acharel re' rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱', re' wilic wo' cok pan yejal reh lok' laj ye'a̱b re' wilic wi̱' i tz'uka̱b reh k'atbal k'oric, re' chic re' nilbic queh, je' ricab riban aj cha'jem me̱' chi ric'am je take rime̱' pan jeno' ro̱k ha' chi enca'n quiha̱' reh chi naquitikim ju' chi suk quic'acharic. Je' wo' chic, je' ricab wo' nok jeno' c'acharel njuc'uric ri̱s nak' wach chiri̱j chi ok'ic xiban ru'um ti'quil c'uxlis, je' wo' re' kAja̱w Dios naresam lok ti'quil c'uxlis cu̱c' take c'acharel re're', nqui wi̱n.

Naxirak cho rik'ijil, re' C'acharel re' rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' xich'ep lok i riwu̱k t'uhr chi k'olbal k'olomaj wi̱' chi̱' i botomaj wach hu̱j re're'. Naxiban chi je' re', ar pan taxa̱j ma' jenaj pe' chic k'oric xbirmijic chiwach jenaj junc'am chi naht.
Cu chiri̱j chic ru' xwilow chi xye'eric ju'jun chi ch'ihch' laj su̱b queh take wuku̱b chi raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re' pa'alque̱b cok chiwach.

Chiri̱j chic re' xwilow jenaj chic raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re' wilic ru̱c' jenaj c'atbal se̱nsa tik'imaj ru̱c' k'anworic laj ch'ihch'. Re' aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' ar pa'lic chiwach i lok' laj ye'a̱b je' ricab nilbic i ye'a̱b c'atbal si̱ chiwach i Dios. Nok wilic ar yohbal wach i se̱nsa xye'eric reh, chi naric'atam ar chipam lok' laj ye'a̱b je' ricab nilbic i lok' laj ye'a̱b c'atbal si̱. Re' lok' laj ye'a̱b re're' tik'imaj ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' eh ar wilic cok chiwach i tz'uka̱b reh k'atbal k'oric. Nanca'n quiti̱j take aj niminel, re're' noquic wo' chi c'atoj se̱nsa reh chi pan cabchelal ch'i̱l take ti̱j nbanjic, xa junponic chic ric'ohonquil ch'i̱l risukquilal chiwach i Dios.

Chi je' re' k'uru' re' risibil i se̱nsa ch'i̱l i quiti̱j take aj niminel xa junponic chic chiwach i Dios nok re' aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' c'ahchi' ric'atam i se̱nsa wilic chipam i c'atbal se̱nsa wilic pan k'ab.

Chiri̱j aj chic re', re' aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' xichop johtok i c'atbal se̱nsa, xinuksaj chiwach k'a̱k' je' ru̱c' wilic china̱ i lok' laj ye'a̱b je' ricab nilbic i lok' laj ye'a̱b c'atbal si̱ chiwach i Dios eh xiquilej cho chi quina̱ tinamit ayu' wach ac'al. Naxc'ulic wach ac'al, xa nok wo' xic'uyu'jic take cho cohok, xbirmijic take cow laj k'oric eh xirehpaj wo' take risakomil. Je' wo', xiban wo' jenaj cow laj hihc.
Ar ajic re' take wuku̱b chi raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios choplic quich'ihch' laj su̱b xi'oquic chi rupjic pa̱m quisu̱b eh naxca'n chi je' re', je' wili xc'uluric:

Nok re' pe̱t aj tz'e' wa̱ch xupej pa̱m risu̱b, xkajic cho wach ac'al yohbal wach sak'wach ch'i̱l k'a̱k' xilacamaj chi quic' re' xibanic chi k'e̱' wo' chic q'uihal take che̱' c'aham ch'i̱l rex laj pi̱m xic'ahtic chi cu rehtal jenaj reh ro̱x seht reh chi'nchel che̱' c'aham ch'i̱l i rex laj pi̱m ayu' wach ac'al xic'ahtic.

Nok re' ricab aj tz'e' wa̱ch xupej pa̱m rich'ihch' laj su̱b, xcuturic cho pan tak rinimal moloj wach ha' i xa je' jenaj yu̱k' xa ntenic chic rik'ak'il re' xbanic chi k'e̱' wo' chic q'uihal i moloj wach ha' xik'atej je na̱ chi cu rehtal jenaj reh ro̱x seht chi rinimal moloj wach ha' xmikric chi quic'

ru'um quiquiq'ue̱l take riq'uihal chicop xiquimic ar pan tak rinimal ha'. Chipam i k'i̱j re're' jenaj reh ro̱x seht chi riq'uihal chicop re're' xiquimic cahnok. Ma' xa re' ta re', k'e̱' la' wo' q'uihal take c'acharel xiquimic wo' ru'um chi xerebic take quinimak tak cano̱wa wilque̱b nak wi̱'. Jenaj reh ro̱x seht chi riq'uihal cano̱wa re're' sahchic quiwach chipam i k'i̱j re're'.

Nok re' ro̱x aj tz'e' wa̱ch xupej pa̱m i rich'ihch' laj su̱b xk'ehbic cho pan taxa̱j jenaj ma' laj ch'imi̱l xa ntenic chic rik'ak'il xa je' chic ricab jeno' ma' laj k'a̱k' sakombal. Re' ch'imi̱l wili re' xk'ehbic chi quina̱ take ro̱k tak ha' ch'i̱l take rasbal tak ha', til wo' nim xik'atej je na̱ chi cu rehtal jenaj reh ro̱x seht chi riq'uihal ro̱k tak ha' ch'i̱l take rasbal ha' xik'atej na̱.

Re' ch'imi̱l xk'ehbic cho re're' “C'ahi̱l” ribihnal maj yohbal wo' chic wach c'ahi̱l xic'am cho chi cu rehtal jenaj reh ro̱x seht chi riq'uihal take ro̱k tak ha' ch'i̱l take rasbal ha' xic'ahbic eh ru'um reh ruc'jic ha' re're' yohbal wach q'uihal take tinamit xiquimic.

Nok re' ricaj aj tz'e' wa̱ch xupej pa̱m rich'ihch' laj su̱b, re' quisakomil i k'i̱j ch'i̱l i poh ch'i̱l wo' take ch'imi̱l xijot' ri̱b. Je' re' xc'uluric cu rehtal re' jenaj reh ro̱x k'at reh rinimal quisakomil i ju'jun queh xichuhpic. Ru'um i re' ma' xc'uhtunic ta chic chi'nchel risakomil i k'i̱j ch'i̱l i poh ch'i̱l wo' take ch'imi̱l pan k'i̱j ak'ab eh chi je' re' xa re' chic jenaj reh ro̱x k'at risakomil riyew i k'i̱j ch'i̱l i poh ch'i̱l wo' take ch'imi̱l riyew cho risakomil chipam k'i̱j ak'ab.

Je' re' ajic naxwilow chaj bih c'ahchi' ric'uluric naxupej pa̱m rich'ihch' laj su̱b i ricaj aj tz'e' wach, xwilow chi jenaj chic chi aj tz'e' wa̱ch xiq'uinic riban ar pan taxa̱j eh xnibiraj chi oxpech xk'oric cho chi cow chi je' wili: «K'e̱' wo' chic quetal quiwach take c'acharel wach ac'al chi cu wilic take ti'c'axic naquic'ulum maj cu xib chic cho take toco̱m chi aj tz'e' wa̱ch re' cu wo' nacupem wo' pa̱m i quich'ihch' laj su̱b, nqui xik'or.

Chiri̱j chic ru' nok re' ro̱' aj tz'e' wa̱ch xupej pa̱m rich'ihch' laj risu̱b, xwilow jenaj chic raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xa je' chic jenaj ch'imi̱l xk'ehbic cho pan taxa̱j cu rehtal xc'ulic k'ehbok wach ac'al. Re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' xye'eric nak reh jenaj tehbal reh chi naritehem i tz'apbal na̱ jenaj ma' laj jul cahk.

Je' re' ajic naxiteh na̱ i ma' laj jul cahk re're' ru̱c' i ritehbal ye'o̱j, xa nbolic chic xelic cho jenaj rinimal sib xa je' chic ricab npokic cho risibil pan ac'al tu̱j. Je' re' xiban i rinimal sib re're' cu rehtal xik'ekomsaj wach risakomil i k'i̱j naxjohtic johtok pan te̱w. Je' re' nok, xcahnic chi muhlic wach chi'nchel.

Je' wo', xc'uluric chi chipam rinimal sib re're' xi'elic take cho q'uihal take nimak tak chili'l re' xye'eric k'ab queh ru'um i Dios chi k'e̱' ti'quil cojo̱j ti' naca'nam chi xa je' chic ricab ti'quilal i ti'o̱j nca'n take tzina'j. Chi je' re' riye'eric k'ab xbanaric queh, re' take re' naxquipuhcaj qui̱b chi junsut wach ac'al,

ma' xye'eric ta k'ab queh chi naquisacham wach take che̱', take tic ch'i̱l nic' pa' nimal take rex laj pi̱m wilic wach ac'al xa re' la' wach xye'eric k'ab queh chi naquiyeb chi ti' chi'nchel take tinamit re' ma' xcojoric ta quehtalil yejal quiwach c'uhtbal reh chi co'lomaj chic take ru'um i Dios.

Re' cok ru', ma' xye'eric ta k'ab queh chi naca'nam cansanic tinamit, xa cojol la' take ti' chiwach i ho'o̱b poh. Re' riqui̱ cojo̱j ti'quil naca'nam, xa je' chic ricab yot'quilal ti'o̱j riban i tzina'j naribanam queh.

Ru'um i ti'quil naquiwih'ic wi̱' take c'acharel chipam take cho k'i̱j re're', xa nacajwam nak chic chi chaj ta nak bih naricansanic queh xa re' la' ma' haj ta wo' chic charak cho quimic chi queh. Je' re' k'uru' xa rehreh nak chic wach rajmajic wach quiquimic naca'nam xa re' la' ma'xta chic bih narajwam chi naquiquimic.

Je' aj wili quiwi̱' take nimak tak chili'l xwilow quiwach: Re' take re' xa tikilque̱b chic chi ojic, xa je' chic quicab take cawa̱y chi xa tikilque̱b chic chi ojic pan k'ak'anic. Je' wo', re' take re' poylic wo' wach quina̱ chi je' ricab jenaj coten k'anworic laj ch'ihch' reh wach nahis eh re' quilbal xa je' chic ricab rilbal jeno' winak xa tiklic chic chi k'ak'anic.
Re' wach quina̱ xa je' chic ricab richamil rismal na̱ jeno' ixok eh re' take ritz'i̱' que̱ xa k'as chic take xa je' chic ricab take ritz'i̱' re̱ jeno' cakcoj.

Je' wo', re' quiti'jolal c'olo̱j take ru̱c' jenaj ch'ihch' laj tz'ih reh k'ak'anic eh nanquic'uyu'saj quixi̱c' xa quijup'lunic chic xa je' chic ricab i ahnic nca'n riq'uihal cawa̱y nok ojic nca'n pan k'ak'anic chi quikerem je behsbal queh aj k'ak'anel.

Je' re' ajic re' take nimak tak chili'l re're' chi ju' i quije̱ re' je' ricab quije̱ take tzina'j, wilic wo' quiqui̱ eh xye'eric k'ab queh ru'um i Dios chi naca'nam ti'c'axic chiwach ho'o̱b poh queh take c'acharel re' ma' xcojoric ta quehtalil yejal quiwach c'uhtbal reh chi co'lomaj chic take ru'um i Dios.

Je' wo' chic xwilow chi, chi quina̱ take nimak tak chili'l, xcojoric jenaj c'amol quibe̱h. Re' c'amol be̱h wili re' wo' i raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re' ye'o̱j reh i tehbal na̱ i ma' laj jul cahk re're' eh re' ribihnal ru', “Awaron” pan kak'orbal hoj aj hewre̱yo eh pan quik'orbal take aj criye̱co “Apolyon”. Re' cabchel bihnal re're', ra̱j rik'orom “Aj sachol wachi̱s”.
Ru̱c' chi'nchel re're' xcux'ic wach i pe̱t ti'c'axic chi quina̱ i tinamit xa re' la' chacoj tak rehtal chi cu wilic qui̱b chic chalic reh chiri̱j i wili.

Chiri̱j wo' chic re' xwilow chi re' riwa̱k raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xupej pa̱m rich'ihch' laj su̱b. Naxiban chi je' re', xelic cho jenaj k'oric ar re' wilic wi̱' i lok' laj ye'a̱b tik'imaj ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch'. Re' lok' laj ye'a̱b wili re' nc'ataric wi̱' se̱nsa, wilic wo' quejeb chi uc'a' china̱, ju'jun reh ritz'u'c eh ar wo' wilic cok chiwach i Dios.

Je' aj wili k'oric xbanjic cho reh riwa̱k aj tz'e' wa̱ch choplic rich'ihch' laj su̱b re're': «Chachej take cho quejeb chi aj tz'e' wa̱ch bac'alque̱b chi chi̱' ma' laj ro̱k ha' “E̱wrates” ribihnal, nqui k'oric xbanjic cho reh.

Chi je' aj re', re' take quejeb chi aj tz'e' wa̱ch bac'alque̱b chi chi̱' ro̱k ha' re're' xichejmejic cho. Re' take re' chi tikilque̱b chic til manlic pa ri'orahil rik'ijil chi ribanaric i camanic ye'o̱j chi quina̱ ru'um i Dios, xi'o̱j chi ricansjic jenaj ro̱x seht re' riq'uihal c'acharel wach ac'al re' ma' nquinimej ta i Dios.

Re' take re' tahkamaj je take cu'um yohbal wach q'uihal chi sol wilque̱b nah cawa̱y naxi'o̱j. Ar ajic re' hin xnibiraj chi re' quiq'uihal take sol re're', xi̱c' wo' chic na̱ quiq'uihal chi ma' cha'n ta wo' chic canar cajaljic

Naxc'uhtjic wo' chic wi̱n pan je' jenaj la' wa̱ch take sol re' tz'ukulque̱b nah cawa̱y re' wili xinwilow chiqui̱j: Re' take re' tz'ukulque̱b nah cawa̱y wilic jenaj co'lbal reh chi' quic'ux rehreh wach quica'yic. Wilic xa cak chic nca'n xa je' chic take ricakil k'a̱k'. Wilic xa rex chic take xa je' chic ricab i taxa̱j. Wilic wo' xa k'an chic riban je' ricab i asu̱pra. Re' chic i quina̱ take cawa̱y, xa je' chic ricab na̱ i cakcoj eh pan quichi̱' nelic cho k'a̱k' ch'i̱l wo' risibil ruxla̱b c'ahtanak asu̱pra.

Chi je' re' k'uru', re' jenaj reh roxseht chi riq'uihal chi c'acharel wach ac'al xiquimic take je ru'um i k'a̱k' ch'i̱l i sib ch'i̱l i k'an laj po̱k nkajic cho pan taxa̱j xelic cho pan quichi̱' take cawa̱y re're'.

Je' re' xc'uluric maj re' cajawric take cawa̱y re're' chi cansanic ar wilic pan quichi̱'. Je' wo', wilic cajawric chi cansanic ju' quije̱ re' xa je' chic take ricab na̱ a̱k' chi ti'o̱j chi quicansjic je take c'acharel.

Je' re' ajic q'uihal take c'acharel ma' quiniminic ta reh i Dios xiquimibic ru'um take ti'c'axic banaric ru̱c' quichi̱' ch'i̱l ju' quije̱ take cawa̱y re're', xa re' la' q'uihal wo' take ma' xiquimic ta. Re' take c'acharel wili to̱b ta xquilow i ti'c'axic c'ulu̱j lok re're', ma' xquicana̱' ta ribanaric i c'ahbilal laj quibano̱j, ma' xquicana̱' ta wo' rilok'onjic wach take ma' tob laj uxlabal on take tiyo̱x re' tik'imaj take ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' on ru̱c' sak woric laj ch'ihch' on ru̱c' cak c'atoj wach ch'ihch', on ru̱c' abaj on ru̱c' che̱' eh chi je' re' riwi̱' ma' qui'ilbic ta, ma' wo' quibirinic ta eh xa ta wo' quibehic.
Je' wo', re' take c'acharel re're' ma' xquicana̱' ta banoj cansanic, banoj waranic, banoj tak c'oyomal eh xa ta wo' nak xquicana̱' banoj ilek'.

Chiri̱j chic xc'uhtjic wi̱n re're', xwilow wo' chic chi jenaj chic raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios til xa nim chic riwa'ric xkajic cho pan taxa̱j chi sutumaj ri̱j ru'um jenaj su̱tz' eh wach na̱ wilic jenaj xohcak'ab. Re' rilbal i aj tz'e' wa̱ch wili xa nsakomonic chic xa je' chic ricab risakomil i k'i̱j eh re' take wach ch'ehc xa quirepretic chic riholonquilal xa je' chic ricab ricakil nimak tak xak k'a̱k'.

Je' wo', re' aj tz'e' wa̱ch wili re' wilic jenaj t'uch botomaj wach hu̱j pan k'ab chi tehlic chic wach. Re're' k'uru' chi xipahba̱' i risec'a̱j ro̱k china̱ rinimal ha' eh re' ritz'e̱t ro̱k xipahba̱' china̱ ac'al
xk'oric cho chi cow chi xa je' chic cowil nk'oric cho cakcoj xiban cho eh ru̱c' re're' wuku̱b take xa je' chic quik'orbal cohok i k'oric xca'n cho.

Naxquicohlaj k'oric take je' quik'orbal cohok nca'n, re' hin nawoquic nak chi ritz'ihmjic take k'oric xnibiraj, xa re' la' xnibiraj wo' chic chi wilic jenaj xk'oric cho ar pan taxa̱j chi je' wili c'ahchi' rik'orom: «Ma̱tz'ihmbaj take k'oric xquik'or take wuku̱b je' quik'orbal cohok re're', xa chac'ol la' pan ac'ux, nqui wi̱n.
Ar aj ru' re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re' xipahba̱' jenaj ro̱k china̱ rinimal ha' eh jenaj xipahba̱' wach ac'al xwilow chi xijohsaj johtok risec'a̱j k'ab pan taxa̱j

eh je' wili xik'or johtok: «Hat Lok' laj Dios, re' hat xa c'achalca̱t wo' chi junelic k'i̱j sakom. Re' hat xat-tik'inic reh taxa̱j ch'i̱l take chi'nchel quic'acharic johtok chiwach. Re' hat xat-tik'inic wo' reh wach ac'al ch'i̱l chi'nchel quic'acharic chiwach eh re' wo' hat xat-tik'inic reh rinimal ha' ch'i̱l chi'nchel i quic'acharic chipam. Re' ok hat tik'orok chi til coric take k'oric nanik'orom johtok yu'na, nqui xik'or. Chiri̱j re', p'uht rik'oric chi je wili: «Til coric, manlajic chic wach i rik'ijil

chi re' nic' pa' nimal xa c'olo̱j nak cho pa ric'ux i Dios re' xik'or cho ribiral queh take aj k'orol riC'uhbal chi cu narisakomem nak wach, yu'na narisakomjic chic wach. Re're' naric'uluric chipam take k'i̱j nachupej pa̱m rich'ihch' laj su̱b i riwu̱k aj tz'e' wa̱ch, nqui xik'or.

Chiri̱j chic wili, re' jenaj re' xk'oric wo' cho wu̱c' pan pe̱t cu ar cho pan taxa̱j, xk'oric wo' chic cho wu̱c' chi je' wili: «Hiy ru̱c' aj tz'e' wa̱ch re' jenaj ro̱k pa'lic china̱ rinimal ha' eh jenaj pa'lic china̱ ac'al. Ar chapahkaj reh i botomaj wach hu̱j tehlic wach wilic pan k'ab, nqui wi̱n.

Naxinbiraj chi je' re', xino̱j ru̱c' i aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' eh xnipahkaj reh chi nariyeb wi̱n i botomaj wach hu̱j wilic pan k'ab. Re're' je' wili xik'or wi̱n naxiyew wi̱n: «Wili i botomaj wach hu̱j. Chanuksaj awi̱b reh maj re' hu̱j wili xa qui' chic naponok pan achi̱' xa je' chic risca̱b naribanam, xa re' la' nok junc'am chic ac'uxum xa c'ah chic apa̱m naribanam, nqui wi̱n.

Re' hin xnic'ul wo' i botomaj wach hu̱j re' wilic nak pan k'ab i aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' eh naxnic'ux wo' wi̱n xa qui' chic i pa nichi̱' xiban til wo' xa je' chic risca̱b. Re' cok ru' nok junc'am chic nic'uxum, xa c'ah chic xiban chi nipa̱m.

Cu re' aj chic wi̱n ru', je' wo' chic wili xk'ormojic wi̱n ru'um i c'ahchi' rik'oric cho wu̱c': «Re' c'uhbal wili re' ye'o̱j ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal chiri̱j chaj bih take naric'ulmujic, curman chi na̱k'orom queh chi'nchel take tinamit, je' chi k'atal k'oric je' chi queh take q'uih ch'uk wach c'acharel reh ju'jun chi k'orbal quik'oric wi̱'. Je' wo' na̱k'orom queh take c'acharel quic'acharic pan tak cuc' tinamit on pan tak nimak tinamit ayu' wach ac'al, nqui wi̱n.

Chiri̱j chic ru' xye'jic pa nik'ab jenaj che̱' je' ricab caxlan a̱j ncamanic chi pajbal ye'a̱b eh re' Dios je' wili xik'or wi̱n: «Hiy, chapaj cho rinimal i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' niwach ch'i̱l wo' rinimal i lok' laj ye'a̱b c'atbal si̱ wilic chipam. Je' wo', chawajlaj jarub take chi c'acharel nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic niwach.

Re' cok ru', ma̱paj i ye'a̱b wilic lok chi chi̱' i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' niwach, re' quicahnic wi̱' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel maj k'ahsamaj chic wu'um pan quik'ab take c'acharel re're' naxquiyak'abej pan co̱k i lok' laj tinamit Jerusalen. Re' tinamit re're' je' re' naricahnic cu rehtal niq'uic lok xib ha̱b ru̱c' waki̱b poh.

Chiwach i xib ha̱b ru̱c' waki̱b poh re're', re' hin nanibanam chi naquiwih'ic quib chi aj k'orol niC'uhbal xa k'ask'as chic wach quiso' ru'um chi xa ti' chic quic'ux ru'um i naric'uluric cu̱c' take c'acharel. Chiwach wo' i waki̱b poh re're', re' hin nanitak'a̱b wo' take je, reh chi naquik'orom i nic'uhbal nariye'eric queh ru'um i Lok' laj wUxlabal, nqui Dios wi̱n.

Re' take quib chi aj k'orol c'uhbal re're', re' wo' take quib chi c'acharel jalwachamaj take ru'um i quib chi k'ab i che̱' “Oli̱wo” ribihnal ch'i̱l i quib chi pa'a̱b cante̱la re' wilque̱b cok chiwach Dios re' c'uhtjic cho najtir k'i̱j reh jenaj raj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios.

Ru'um chi re' take quib chi c'acharel re're' xye'eric cajawric chi narelic cho k'a̱k' pan quichi̱' cansbal queh take c'acharel re' nca̱j quiyeb chi ti' take quib re're', re' take re' naquisacham wo' wach take caj ixowonel ru̱c' cajawric ye'o̱j.

Je' wo' chic, re' take quib chi aj k'oro̱l re're' xye'eric cajawric chi naquipahba̱b rikajic cho jab chiwach xib ha̱b ru̱c' waki̱b poh re' naca'nam wi̱' rik'ormojic i c'uhbal ye'o̱j queh ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal. Ma' xa re' ta re', xye'jic la' wo' cajawric chi naquimiksam i ha' chi quic', je' wo' chi riye'eric ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take c'acharel wach ac'al xa jarpech pa' nca̱j ribanaric.

Chiri̱j ru' nok quicohlam chic wach quic'uhbalanic take quib chi raj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios re're', xwilow chi ar chipam i rinimal jul cahk xelic cho jenaj ma' laj chicop xa c'ahbil chic rilbal. Re're' xwilow chi xo̱j chi quina̱ i quib re're' chi quicojoric pan ti' c'axic cu rehtal xicansaj take.

Chiri̱j nok cansamaj chic take qui̱b re're', xwilow chi xcahnic i quiti'jolal chi tutz'ulque̱b chic chiwach jenaj be̱h wilic chipam i rinimal tinamit re' xcansjic wi̱' i kAja̱w wach curu̱s. Re' tinamit re're', xnicoj wo' rehtal chi quib wach ribihnal wilic, “Soro̱ma” ch'i̱l “Eji̱pto”. Je' re' nk'ormojic reh rehtalil chi c'ahbil quino'jbal take c'acharel wilque̱b pan tinamit re're'.

Je' re' nok wilic ricaj k'i̱j xcahnic quiti'jolal take quib chi aj k'orol c'uhbal re're' chi tutz'ulque̱b pan be̱h, q'uihal take c'acharel rehreh wach quitinamital xa pa' yuk'ul quichalic wi̱', rehreh wo' wach quik'orbal re' k'orel pa' quipuhcam qui̱b chi junsut wach ac'al xic'ulic lok chi quilmijic. Nok je' re' nca'n take tinamit, ma' hab ta wach queh take c'acharel re're' nye'eric k'ab reh chi narimuk'a̱b i quiti'jolal take quib chi aj k'orol c'uhbal re're',

til risukquil la' chic quic'ux nchalic ru̱c' quiquimic eh rehtalil chi xa suk chic pan quic'ux, xa xquisi̱j chic pa' bih queh chi quiwach. Je' re' xca'n maj chi queh ru' yohbal wo' wach i ti'c'axic xc'amaric cho chi quina̱ cu'um take quib chi aj k'orol c'uhbal re're'.
Chiri̱j ru' naxponic ricaj k'i̱j re' hin xwilow chi re' Dios xiyew wo' chic quic'acharic take quib chi aj k'orol re're' eh nic' pa' q'uihal take xi'ilbic reh yohbal wach naxoquic quiyo'jic.

Chiri̱j i wili re' take quib chi aj k'orol re're' xquibiraj chi wilic jenaj xk'oric cho ar pan taxa̱j chi je' wili c'ahchi' rik'orom cho chi cow: «Yu'na quim tak eh tijohten tak cho ayu', nqui banol cho queh. Cu re' aj chic ru' xijohtic johtok pan taxa̱j pan jenaj su̱tz' eh re' take xicansanic queh i quib chi aj k'oro̱l re're' xquilow wo' na xi'o̱j johtok pan taxa̱j.

Chipam wo' ti junc'am re're' jenaj rinimal hihc xiban eh ru'um i hihc re're' xt'e'lejic take cho pa̱t chipam i tinamit re're' cu rehtal xmoljic jenaj rila̱j seht reh riq'uihal pa̱t wilic ar. Ru̱c' re're' xiquimic wuklajik'ob lajc'ahl (7,000) chi c'acharel eh nic' pa' chic q'uihal take xicahnic chi c'achalque̱b yohbal wo' chic wach quiyo'jic xchalic cu̱c', re' xbanic chi xquilok'ej johtok wach i Dios re' wilic cho pan taxa̱j.
Re' aj wili ricab ti'c'axic xiq'uic lok xa re' la' ro̱x ti'c'axic loq'uil wo' ti cho richalic.

Chiri̱j chic ru' nok re' riwu̱k raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xupej cho pa̱m i rich'ihch' laj su̱b, re' take wilque̱b ar pan taxa̱j xbirmijic quik'orbal chi xa cow chic xquik'or chi je' wili: “Re' k'atoj k'oric wach ac'al pan k'ab chic i kAja̱w Dios wilic ch'i̱l i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Re' take re' naquik'atoj k'oric chi junelic i k'i̱j sakom, nqui xbirmijic.

Naxquibiraj chi je' re', re' aj chic take quejeb rica'winak (24) chi c'acharel re' wilic quiwa'ric je' ricab quiwa'ric take rijeb tak winak, re' chi tz'ukulque̱b take chipam i tz'uka̱b ar cok chiwach i Dios, xquixuc'a̱' qui̱b eh xquilok'ej wach

chi je' wili i c'ahchi' quik'orom: “K-Aja̱w Dios, xa re' wach i hat k'e̱' rinimal wach awajawric wilic. Nok ma' ja' tik'imaj ta wo' wach ac'al re' hat xa wilca̱t wo' nak chic cho, xa wilca̱t wo' yu'na eh xa na̱wih'ic wo' chi junelic k'i̱j sakom. Aweh aj i hat nkatioxej chi c'ahchi' ac'uhtam rinimal wach awajawric eh ru̱c' re're' c'ahchi' wo' ak'atbic k'oric chi quina̱ chi'nchel i tinamit wach ac'al.

Yu'na k'uru' xponic chic i rik'ijil chi re' hat chi wilca̱t chic chi k'atal k'oric, na̱yeb ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take tinamit re' xa josk'onak chic take awu̱c'. Je' wo' na̱k'atam wo' k'oric china̱ quibano̱j take chi'nchel take camnak chic je take eh na̱yeb quitojbal take awaj camanom re' take aj k'orol c'uhbal xye'eric queh ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal. Je' wo', na̱yeb quitojbal take lok' laj atinami̱t re' take quiyohbalanic wach abihnal chi nimak chi cuc'tak take. Je' re' k'uru' xponic chic rik'ijil chi na̱sacham quiwach take quibanic ti'c'axic ar wach ac'al, nqui take.

Ar aj ru' naxk'ormojic chi je' re', re' ye'a̱b re' nye'eric wi̱' rilok'il i Dios ar pan taxa̱j xteh cho eh naxc'uhtunic cho i caxo̱n re' wilque̱b wi̱' take perepic laj abaj re' wilque̱b wi̱' take tak'anic xiban i Dios naxiban i pe̱t tik'inic cu̱c' take ra̱' ri'sil cho i ma' Israhel, xic'uyu'jic take cho cohok eh xquirehpaj cho quisakomil. Je' wo', wilic take k'oric xbirmijic cho cu pan taxa̱j, xiban jenaj hihc yohbal wach cowil eh xwilow wo' chi yohbal wach take nimak tak sak'wach xik'ehbic cho.

Chiri̱j chic ru', xniban wo' chic jenaj chic ilo̱j sachbal c'uxlis ar pan taxa̱j chi je' wili: Xwilow chi jenaj ixok tz'uklic ar sutumaj ri̱j reh risakomal i k'i̱j re' ncamanic reh chi jelow-bal riso'. Je' wo', xwilow chi re' ncamanic reh chi riye'a̱b take ro̱k re' i poh eh chi wilic wo' jenaj ricoten laj ch'ihch', chi xoybal wach cablaj rich'imilal wilic.
Je' wo', xwilow wo' chi re' ixok re're' q'uisi̱n chic ma' nc'ulic ric'ux eh xa q'ueric chic chi̱' ru'um riti'quil riye'jic wach sakom riha'lac'u̱n maj ponic chic rik'ijil chi naric'ulic ric'ux.

Cu re' chic wi̱n ru', jenaj wo' chic ilo̱j xniban re' k'e̱' xsahchic wi̱' nic'ux. Je' wili ilo̱j xniban ar pan taxa̱j: Ar wilic cho jenaj ma' laj cak ri̱j wacax a̱k' wilic wuku̱b na̱ ch'i̱l lajeb chi ruc'a' eh chi xoybal wach i ju'jun china̱ wilic wo' ju'jun chi coten laj ch'ihch'.

Re' wacax a̱k' re're' ximolej take cho ru̱c' rije jenaj ro̱x seht reh riq'uihal take ch'imi̱l wilque̱b pan taxa̱j eh xit'ele'ej take cho wach ac'al. Chiri̱j chic re', xipahba̱' cok ri̱b chiwach ixok re' q'uisi̱n chic ma' nasjic i riha'lac'u̱n. Je' re' xiban reh chi na asjok nak ti i ha'lac'un re're' naric'uhxam nak ti pa ric'ux

xa re' la' naxasjic t'uch rac'u̱n ixok re're' ru̱c' ti junc'am xc'amaric johtok i t'uch ha'lac'un re're' ru̱c' i Dios ar pa riye'a̱b re' riban wi̱' k'atoj k'oric. Re' riwi̱' chi xc'amaric johtok, reh chi re' ac'un wili ru̱c' rinimal wach rajawric ye'o̱j erik'at k'oric chi quina̱ chi'nchel tinamit chi xa je' na chic wilic jenaj ribasto̱n ch'ihch' pan k'ab chi k'atoj k'oric.

Nok c'amoj chic johtok rac'u̱n ixok re're', re' ixok wili xo̱j ric'ol ri̱b chipam jenaj ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel ru'um chi ar tik'imaj cho riye'a̱b ru'um i Dios chi c'olbal ri̱b. Chi je' re' ajic chiwach i xib ha̱b ru̱c' waki̱b poh xo̱j ric'ol wi̱' ri̱b ixok re're', xtobjic ru̱c' chi'nchel riwa' riha̱' cu'um take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios.

Chiri̱j chic wili, cu re' chic wi̱n xwilow chi ar pan taxa̱j xtohk'ic jenaj k'ak'anic. Xwilow chi re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re' Que̱l ribihnal rich'i̱l take rich aj tz'e' wach xi'oquic chi k'ak'anic ru̱c' i ma' laj cak ri̱j wacax a̱k' rich'i̱l wo' take aj tz'e' wach quitahkanic reh ru'

xa re' la' re' ma' laj cak ri̱j wacax a̱k' re're' rich'i̱l take quitahkanic reh ma' xquicuy ta ransil i k'ak'anic ru̱c' i Que̱l ch'i̱l take rich aj tz'e' wach eh naxquik'eb i k'ak'anic re're', re' ma' laj cak ri̱j wacax a̱k' ch'i̱l take raj tahkanel ma' xye'eric ta chic k'ab queh chi xicahnic ar pan taxa̱j.

Je' aj re', re' ma' laj cak ri̱j wacax a̱k' re're', re' q'uih wach ribihnal wilic, je' ricab: “Re' Najtir A̱k'”, re' “Aj Yahm” eh re' “Aj Subul tinamit” wo' nok wilic, xcuturic cho wach ac'al rich'i̱l take raj tz'e' wa̱ch eh chi je' re', re' aj re' i jot'o̱l queh take c'acharel chi junsut wach ac'al.

Chiri̱j chic wili, xnibiraj ar pan taxa̱j jenaj cow laj k'oric chi je' wili: “Yu'na xc'uhtjic ayu' pan taxa̱j chi re' Dios nco'lonic queh take c'acharel eh chi re're' til wilic rajawric chi k'atal k'oric. Je' wo', xc'uhtjic wo' chi re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric til wilic wo' rajawric! Je' re' nik'or maj xcuturic chic jok wach ac'al re' ntz'akbic nak quimahc take kich aj niminel chi k'i̱j chi ak'ab chiwach i Dios.

Re' aj tz'akol wach mahc re're' xye'eric pan ac'al cu'um take kich aj niminel ru̱c' rich'iquinjic quic'ux xca'n chiri̱j riquimic i C'acharel re' rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱'. Ru'um chi xquich'ica̱' quic'ux, re' Dios xiyew pan ac'al i aj tz'akol mahc re're'. Ma' xa ta ru'um re're' xiban i Dios chi je' re', je' la' wo' ru'um chi re' take re' ma' ti' ta xquic'raj quic'acharic chi naquicansjic je ru'um rik'ormojic i c'uhbal ye'o̱j queh.

Je' re' k'uru' wih'ok sukquil c'uxlis ayu' pan taxa̱j. Til je' re' naric'uluric ayu' pan taxa̱j chi narisukbic kac'ux nic' pa' hoj q'uihal wilco̱j ayu' raj nchel awu̱c' hat-tak c'acharel wilca̱t tak wach ac'al ch'i̱l take quic'acharic chi chi̱' take nimak tak ha', til wo' chic k'e̱' je quetal awach tak ru'um nok k'e̱' ti'quil nawilom tak wach ru'um chi re' aj Yahm xcuturic chic jok wach ac'al eh til pa risasil ric'a̱ wilic maj reht'alim chi xa ajlamaj chic rik'ijil wilic chi ajot'oric tak, nqui xk'ormojic.
Nok re' ma' laj cak ri̱j wacax a̱k' xilow chi xcuturic cho wach ac'al, re're' xitok'a̱' risiq'uiric ri̱j ricojoric pan ti'c'axic i tutbe̱s re' xasjic t'uch rac'u̱n

xa re' la' re' Dios xiban chi xelic cho quib rixi̱c' je' ricab rixi̱c' nimak tak xihc' reh chi pan xiq'uinic narelic je chiwach i wacax a̱k'. Chi je' aj re' k'uru' re're' xo̱j wo' pan ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel eh ar xco'ljic ru'um i Dios chiwach i wacax a̱k' re're' chiwach xib ha̱b ru̱c' waki̱b poh.

Nok wilic chic ar ixok re're', re' wacax a̱k' re' chi c'ahchi' wo' chic risiq'uim ri̱j ricojoric pan ti'c'axic i tutbe̱s re're' xesaj cho ha' pan chi̱' xa cow chic ro̱k eh xitak'a̱' je chiri̱j i tutbe̱s re're' chi ricojoric pan ti'c'axic. Ru̱c' re're', re' nak ra̱j chi xiq'uic molorok ponok ru'um ricowil ro̱k ha' re're'.

Xa re' la' re' tutbe̱s re're' ma'xta wo' bih xic'ul maj xtobjic ru'um ac'al naxmikric cho i jenaj ma' laj ho̱p chipam eh xitz'ubej jok chi'nchel i ha' re' xesaj cho pan chi̱' i ma' laj wacax a̱k' re're'.

Ar ajic re' ma' laj wacax a̱k' re're' xchalic riman ric'a̱ ru̱c' i tutbe̱s re're' chi ma' xiban ta reh eh yu'na re' chic take ra̱' ri'sil cho i tutbe̱s re're' xo̱j riban k'ak'anic cu̱c'. Re' take re', re' wo' take quiniminic reh riC'uhbal i Dios eh til nquinimej wo' take c'uhtunic bano̱j ru'um i kAja̱w Jesus re' aj K'atal K'oric.

Chiri̱j wili, re' hin xinpah'ic pan sani̱b ar chi chi̱' ma' laj ha'. Ar ajic xwilow naxjohtic cho pan ma' laj ha' jenaj ma' laj chicop xa c'ahbil chic rica'ybal wilic lajeb ruc'a' eh wuku̱b i na̱. China̱ ju'jun queh lajeb chi ruc'a' wilic cojo̱j take ju'jun coten ch'ihch' eh chiwach take wuku̱b china̱ i chicop re're', ar tz'ihmbimaj take k'oric je' ru̱c' ma' holohic ta laj k'oric chiri̱j i Dios.

Re' ma' laj chicop re're' xa je' chic ri̱j jenaj ma' laj me̱s bahlam, re' take ro̱k xa je' chic ricab take ro̱k i chicop “Oso” ribihnal eh re' chi̱' xa je' chic ricab chi̱' i cakcoj. Je' re' ajic, re' chicop re're' nim wach rajawric xye'eric ru'um i ma' laj wacax a̱k' eh je' wo' xye'eric riwa'ric chi narik'atbic k'oric rich'i̱l i ma' laj wacax a̱k'.

Re' ma' laj chicop re're' ch'ako̱j pa̱m i jenaj queh na̱ eh ru'um chi xa ti' chic wilic xa quimic nak chic ruy'ej, xa re' la' re' riti'quilal re're' xik'olej wo' chic ri̱b eh ma' xquimic ta wo' je. Ru'um re're', re' take tinamit wach ac'al xsahchic quic'ux eh chiri̱j chic re' xquiyew quic'ux chi tahkanic.

Je' re' k'uru' re' take tinamit re're' xquiyew quic'ux chi rilok'onjic wach i ma' laj chicop wili ch'i̱l i ma' laj wacax a̱k' re' xye'bic rajawric chi tak'anic. Ru'um re' je' wili xquik'or: «Ma' hab ta wach jeno' til wilic rajawric je' ricab i ma' laj chicop wili! Ma' hab ta wach jeno' eripaj ri̱b ru̱c'! nqui take.

Re' ma' laj chicop re're' ru'um chi xye'eric wo' k'ab reh ru'um i Dios chi narik'oric pan eht laj k'oric eh chi naribanam wo' ma' holohic ta laj k'oric chiri̱j, xye'eric k'ab reh chi nariwih'ic rajawric chi ribanaric xa chaj bih ra̱j ribanam chiwach i xib ha̱b ru̱c' waki̱b poh.

Chi je' re', re' ma' laj chicop re're' p'uht wo' rik'oric chi eht chi ribanjic i ma' holohic ta laj k'oric chiri̱j i Dios eh je' wo' chiri̱j i Lok' laj Ye'a̱b re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i kAja̱w Dios ch'i̱l wo' chiqui̱j take nic' pa' nimal wilque̱b pan taxa̱j.

Je' wo' chic, re' ma' laj chicop wili xye'eric wo' k'ab reh chi naripajam ri̱b cu̱c' take lok' laj ritinami̱t i kAja̱w Dios eh je' wo' chi nariyeb take pan ac'al. Je' wo' xye'eric wo' k'ab reh chi nariwih'ic riwa'ric chi quina̱ take ju'jun seht chi tinamit wach ac'al xa nic' pa' wach quitinamital quic'acharic wi̱' eh xa nic' pa' wach quik'orbal quik'oric wi̱'.

Q'uihal queh take c'acharel re're', xquilok'ej wach i ma' laj chicop re're'. Re' take c'acharel re're' cu pan p'uhtbal cho reh taxa̱j ac'al ma' tz'ihmbimaj ta cho quibihnal ru'um i C'acharel re' rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' eh chi je' re' ma' wilic ta chiwach i hu̱j re' ritz'ihmbaj wi̱' quibihnal take nic' pa' nimal take c'acharel ye'o̱j chiqui̱j chi naquic'acharic chi junelic k'i̱j sakom.
Je' re' k'uru' ru'um chi naric'uluric i pa' bih tik'imaj chic cho wach, nipahkaj aweh tak chi chacoj tak rehtal chi coric i c'uta̱j rik'or chi je' wili:

“Wi hab wach wilic chic chiri̱j chi narojic pan che̱', re're' pan che̱' wo' narojic. Hab wach wilic chic chiri̱j chi naricansjic ru̱c' ch'ihch', ru̱c' wo' ch'ihch' naricansjic, nqui rik'or i k'oric re're'. Ru̱c' re're', re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi nachalok take ti'c'axic tik'imaj chic cho wach chi narichalic chana̱ tak, re' hat-tak ritinami̱t i Dios chacuy tak i ransil i ti'c'axic re're' eh je' wo' chach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiri̱j i kAja̱w.

Chiri̱j chic ru', xwilow wo' chi jenaj chic ma' laj chicop xelic cho pan ac'al. Re're' wilic quib ruc'a' je' ricab ruc'a' q'uijol laj me̱', xa re' la' ma' jenaj ta wach rik'orbal ch'i̱l jeno' me̱' maj je' la' nk'oric ma' laj wacax a̱k'.

Re' ricab ma' laj chicop re're' ncamanic chiwach i pe̱t ma' laj chicop re' xye'bic wo' rajawric chi naricamanic chiwach. Re' ricab ma' laj chicop re're' xiban chi re' chi'nchel take tinamit naquilok'em wach i pe̱t ma' laj chicop re' wilic nak jenaj yoc'onak chiwach jenaj queh na̱, re' xbanic chi xquimic nak je.
Re' ricab ma' laj chicop re're' xiban wo' take nimak tak sahchbal c'uxlis ru̱c' rajawric eh til wo' chic k'e̱' rajawric chi riban chi nkajic cho k'a̱k' pan taxa̱j chi quiwach take tinamit.

Ru'um take sahchbal c'uxlis ye'o̱j k'ab reh chi naribanam chi c'ahchi' ricamanic chiwach i pe̱t ma' laj chicop, jot'oric pa̱m quicapew-bal take c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al narik'or queh chi naquitik'a̱b jenaj tiyo̱x re' rijalwachej i pe̱t ma' laj chicop re' wilic nak jenaj ch'ako̱j reh na̱ chi ch'ihch' chi nariquimic nak xa re' la' ru' ma' xquimic ta wo'.

Je' re' k'uru' nok tik'imaj chic i tiyo̱x re' rijalwachil i pe̱t ma' laj chicop, re' ricab ma' laj chicop re're' xye'eric k'ab reh chi nariyeb ric'acharic i tiyo̱x re're'. Chi je' aj re', re' tiyo̱x tik'imaj re're' xk'oric wo' cho eh xiban chi jarub pa' take ma' xilok'onic ta wach xicansaj take.

Ru'um aj re' xiban wo' chi chi'nchel take c'acharel, chi nimak chi cuc'tak, chi niba̱' chi biho̱m, chi je' choplic on ma' choplic quina̱ ru̱c' cow laj camanic ru̱c' riwa'ric jeno' ajabe̱s, chi'nchel tinamit xiban chi xcojoric jenaj quehtalil pa risec'a̱j quik'ab on yejal quiwach.

Chi je' re' ma' jeno' chic eriban canar rilok'oric pa' bih reh on ric'ayjic pa' bih reh wi ma' ric'ulum i rehtalil yejal wach re' nc'uhtjic wi̱' ribihnal on re' rajlajic ri̱j ribihnal i pe̱t ma' laj chicop.

Reh chi enarak tak chiri̱j rajaljic ri̱j ribihnal i pe̱t ma' laj chicop re're' curman chi til wilic ok ano'jbal tak eh re' wilic rino'jbal chi rajaljic ri̱j i ju'jun chi rehtalil wilic reh ribihnal i ma' laj pe̱t chicop re're', naricojom rehtal chi re' rajaljic nelic wi̱' i bihnal re're', nk'oric chiri̱j ribihnal jenaj winak. Re' rajaljic ri̱j i bihnal re're' riyeb re' wili: Junik'ob waki̱b roxlaj c'ahl (666).

Chiri̱j aj chic ru' re' hin xwilow chi ar china̱ i yu̱k' Siyon ribihnal re' wilic ar Jerusalen, xpah'ic cho i C'acharel re' rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱', re' xcansjic je' ricab riwi̱' ncansjic jeno' me̱' ye'o̱j chi si̱. Re're' ar wilic chi sutumaj ri̱j cu'um take wahxaklajc'ahl ik'ob (144,000) chi aj niminel eh yejal quiwach take aj niminel re're' tz'ihmbimaj ribihnal i kAja̱w Dios ch'i̱l ribihnal i kAja̱w Jesus.

Chiri̱j chic re' xnibiraj jenaj ahnic ar pan taxa̱j. Re' ahnic re're' xa je' chic ricab cowil ahnic riban i ha' nank'ehbic cho wach sak rehp on xa je' chic ricab nk'oric cho jenaj cow laj cohok. Re' ahnic xnibiraj wili xa je' chic ricab take tz'uyunic riban i a̱rpa nank'ojmojic cu'um take aj k'ojonel reh.

Chi je' aj re', re' take c'acharel re're' bi̱ch nca'n chiwach i Dios re' wilic chi aj k'atal k'oric, je' wo' chi quiwach take quejeb rica'winak chi c'acharel (24) re' wilic quiwa'ric je' ricab quiwa'ric take rijeb tak winak, je' wo' chi quiwach take quejeb chi c'acharel re' wilic nak' quiwach chiqui̱j chi quiwach. Re' c'ahchi' quibichem wach, cu ac' laj bi̱ch eh ma' ja' hab ta chic jeno' wach ritijem reh i bi̱ch nca'n, xa re' la' take wahxaklajc'ahl ik'ob (144,000) re' take co'lomaj chic take chi quixilac take toco̱m chic c'acharel aj ayu' wach ac'al xichol ribichjic i bi̱ch re're'. Re' take c'acharel re're', re' take xwih'ic i Dios chi ac' aj ehcham queh, je' ricab nbanaric cu̱c' take aj camanom re' qui'ehchjic ru'um jeno' toco̱m chic ajabe̱s nantojoric qui̱j ru̱c' ajabe̱s nehchenic nak queh.

Re' take c'acharel wili til sak wach ca̱mna maj ma' xquijop ta wach quino'jbal ru̱c' lok'onic tiyo̱x. Re' take wili aj tahkanel wo' take reh C'acharel re' rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' eh ru'um i re' xa pa' no̱j i c'acharel re're' ar wo' qui'o̱j chiri̱j. Re' take c'acharel wili je' ricab nok quik'ahsjic take pe̱t wach i tic k'ahsamaj chi si̱ chiwach i Dios, chi quixilac take toco̱m c'acharel aj ayu' wach ac'al xicojoric chi pe̱t aj niminel take je' ru̱c' re' chic i Dios ch'i̱l i C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' wilic chi ac' aj ehchenel queh.

Re' take c'acharel wili xa sak chic wach ca̱mna ma' janc'al ta xquik'or chucuj laj k'oric eh ru'um re' naxiwih'ic chiwach i Dios ar chiwach i ye'a̱b riban wi̱' k'atoj k'oric, ma' jeno' chucuj k'oric xrakmajic chi ca'nam ta nak.

Re' hin Wa̱n xwilow wo' chic chi jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xiq'uinic riban johtok ar pan taxa̱j. Re' take ma' birimaj ta laj k'oric re' ma' c'uhlel ta wach, re're' c'ahchi' ric'uhbalem queh chi'nchel tinamit re' q'uihleh wach k'oric quik'oric wi̱', re' take quic'acharic pan tak cuc' tinamit on pan tak nimak tinamit ayu' wach ac'al, re' rehreh wach quija'quil, rehreh wach quik'orbal quik'oric wi̱'.

Re' aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' je' wili c'ahchi' rik'orom chi cow: «Chayohbalej tak wach i kAja̱w Dios eh chayew tak rilok'il maj xponic chic rik'ijil chi narich'ukum k'oric chi quina̱ chi'nchel tinamit. Chalok'ej tak wach maj re're' xtik'inic reh taxa̱j ac'al, re' xtik'inic reh rinimal ha' eh je' wo' take chi'nchel rasbal ha', nqui xik'or.

Chiri̱j wili re' pe̱t aj tz'e' wa̱ch xo̱j, jenaj wo' chic raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xchalic. Re're' xk'oric cho chi je' wili: «Xsahchic chic wach rinimal tinamit re' jalwachamaj ru̱c' i tinamit Wawilo̱nya ribihnal. Re' take c'acharel chipam i tinamit wili xic'ambic quibe̱h take chi'nchel nimak tak tinamit chi xquicana̱' rilok'onjic wach i Dios xa je' na ricab xixohc'saj take tinamit chi quic'amaric je take pan c'oyomal, nqui xik'or.

Chiri̱j wili nok re' ricab aj tz'e' wa̱ch xo̱j, jenaj wo' chic xchalic. Re' ro̱x aj tz'e' wa̱ch wili xk'oric cho chi cow chi je' wili: «Wi hab wach jeno' erilok'ej wach i ma' laj chicop xa c'ahbil chic rilbal on erilok'ej wach i tiyo̱x re' tik'imaj ru̱c' rilbal ru' eh wi eric'ul i rehtalil yejal wach on pan k'ab,

je' wili naric'uluric ru̱c' i c'acharel re're': Naricuturic chipam i ye'a̱b koplic rik'ak'il i asu̱pra wilic chipam. Je' re' ajic, je' ricab nok re' c'ah laj ha' ntik'mijic chi ma' xilacamaj ta ch'i̱l xa til ha' reh chi wilic ransil nancojoric pan culc nuc'jic wi̱', re' Dios ru'um reh ric'a̱ chiri̱j quimahc take c'acharel nariyeb cho jenaj rinimal wach ti'c'axic chi quina̱. Re' Dios naribanam wo' chi chiwach i C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' eh je' wo' chi quiwach take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios, naquic'ulum i ti'c'axic.

«Je' re' k'uru', re' take c'acharel nquilok'ej wach i chicop xa c'ahbil chic rilbal eh riban wo' chi re' take c'acharel nquilok'ej wach i tiyo̱x re' tik'imaj ru̱c' rilbal i ma' laj chicop re're', on re' take nquic'ul rehtalil i ribihnal i chicop re're', nic' pa' q'uihal take c'acharel re're' ma' jaruj ta enquicana̱' ric'ulmujic i ti'c'axic. Je' ricab nok njohtic i risibil i k'a̱k' je' wo' re' naca'nam take c'acharel ru'um reh ric'uluric i ti'c'axic chi junelic i k'i̱j sakom, chi k'i̱j chi ak'ab narijohtic tok pan taxa̱j i riq'ueric quichi̱' naca'nam, nqui xik'or.

Re' hin xnik'or take wili reh chi chiwach i ti'c'axic re're', re' hat-tak ritinami̱t i Dios tiniminic tak reh riC'uhbal, enacuy tak ransil i ti'c'axic re're' eh je' wo' chi enatik tak ju' rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus. Re' aj wo' re' riwi̱' chi xnitz'ihmbaj re' xc'uluric lok wili:

Wilic jenaj xk'oric cho ar pan taxa̱j chi je' wili c'ahchi' rik'orom cho wi̱n: «Chatz'ihmbaj take wili: Re' take quiniminic reh kAja̱w Dios k'e̱' ato̱b queh. Chi quiwach johtok yu'na, naquiquimok je, k'e̱' wo' chic holonquilal naquic'ulum, nqui cho. Chiri̱j i k'oro̱j lok wili xnibiraj wo' chi je' wili rik'or i Lok' laj Uxlabal: «Coric i k'oro̱j lok re're'. Re' take quiniminic reh kAja̱w Dios narisukbic quic'ux chi hi'lic ru'um chi cux'ic chic wach chi queh i camanic ayu' wach ac'al. Yu'na re' chic i quisi̱ naquic'ulum re' nariye'eric queh ru'um take i holohic laj bano̱j xca'n, nqui Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios.

Chiri̱j chic re', xinilbic johtok ar pan taxa̱j eh xwilow wach jenaj sak laj su̱tz' eh china̱ i su̱tz' re're' tz'uklic i Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic rajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel. Re're' wilic jenaj coten ch'ihch' wach na̱ tik'imaj ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' eh wilic wo' pan k'ab jenaj k'as laj ch'ihch' set'bal na̱ tic.

Nok c'ahchi' wilom re're', jenaj chic raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xelic cho chipam i Lok' laj Ye'a̱b re' nlok'onjic wi̱' i Dios ar pan taxa̱j. Re're' xa cow chic c'ahchi' rik'orom cho chi je' wili chi tz'uklic nah su̱tz': «Chawehtaj ric'sjic i ak'as laj ch'ihch' re' ncamanic chi yoc'bal na̱ tic rehtalil chi xponic chic rik'ijil i ch'ukuj wach k'oric je' ricab jeno' aj jacho̱l nanponic i jachbal k'i̱j ricoj i rimache̱t chi yoc'bal pitz'an, nqui reh.
Ar aj ru' re' tz'uklic na̱ su̱tz' xic'saj i ch'ihch' chi quina̱ chi'nchel i tic wach ac'al eh xisic' chi'nchel take wach i tic wilic wach ac'al.

Chiri̱j chic ru' jenaj wo' chic raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xelic cho chipam i Lok' laj Ye'a̱b re' nlok'onjic wi̱' i Dios ar pan taxa̱j. Re're' wilic wo' jenaj k'as laj ch'ihch' set'bal na̱ i tic pan k'ab.

Chiri̱j i wili ar chiwach i lok' laj ye'a̱b je' ricab nilbic i lok' laj ye'a̱b c'atbal si̱ chiwach i Dios, xelic cho jenaj chic raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios canamaj chi aj ilol reh i k'a̱k'. Re're' xa cow chic pa̱m rik'orbal je' wili c'ahchi' rik'orom reh rich aj tz'e' wa̱ch re' wilic pa rik'ab jenaj k'as laj ch'ihch' set'bal na̱ tic: «Chawic'saj i k'as laj ch'ihch' re' set'bal na̱ tic china̱ riche'lal i u̱wa wilic wach ac'al maj re' u̱wa xirak chic rik'a'nic, nqui reh.

Chi je' re', re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xehtaj ric'sjic i k'as laj ch'ihch' re' ncamanic chi yoc'bal ric'ahamil i u̱wa, rehtalil chi xponic chic rik'ijil i ch'ukuj wach k'oric naribanam i Dios. Ar ajic je' ricab chi re' c'acharel nok risiq'uim chic i u̱wa ricoj pan jenaj ye'a̱b eh til wo' resaj ransil chi ripuch'uric pa̱m i u̱wa chi resmejic lok i ri̱s, je' wo' re' i Dios til xic'uhtaj rinimal wach rijosk'il chi quina̱ take aj mahc.

Chipam i ye'a̱b re're', re' wilic lok chiri̱j i tinamit Jerusalen xyitz'iric take u̱wa eh naxbanaric chi je' re', xelic cho riq'uihal ri̱s u̱wa re' rijalwachej quiquiq'ue̱l take c'acharel xic'ulbic reh ti'c'axic. Re' riq'uihal ri̱s u̱wa re're' xiban chi xa cha̱m chic pa̱m chi cu xirak johtok xak quichi̱' take cawa̱y eh xik'et je wach je' na ho'lajuj ricajwinak (75) le̱wa chi ac'al.

Chiri̱j chic wili re' hin xwilow ar pan taxa̱j jenaj wo' chic rinimal ehtalil sahchbal c'uxlis je' wili riwi̱': Ar pan taxa̱j wilque̱b wuku̱b chi raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios eh chi quiju'junal ye'o̱j cajawric chi ribanjic jenaj queh i ti'c'axic narichalic ayu' wach ac'al pan cohlsbal wach chi'nchel. Ru̱c' re're' narimanlajic wach ric'uluric take ti'c'axic re' nariyeb cho i Dios ru'um i rinimal rijosk'il chiri̱j quimahc take c'acharel.

Chiri̱j chic ru' xwilow je' jenaj rinimal ha' xa lemuh chic riholonquilal xilacamaj ch'i̱l k'a̱k' eh chi chi̱' i je' ha' re're' pa'alque̱b chi'nchel take aj niminel re' xquiyew pan ac'al i ma' laj chicop re're' ru'um nok ma' xquilok'ej ta wach, ma' wo' xquiyew ta rilok'il ritiyoxil tik'imaj ru̱c' rilbal eh ma' wo' xquic'ul ta i rehtalil ribihnal. Re' take aj niminel re're' xye'eric jenaj quik'o̱j ru'um i Dios

re' xcamanic queh chi ribichjic wach i bi̱ch nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i C'acharel re' rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱'. Re' bi̱ch re're', xa je' chic ricab bi̱ch xiban cho najtir k'i̱j i Moyses re' raj camanom i Dios. Re' bi̱ch re're' je' wili rik'or: “Re' hat kAja̱w Dios, re' k'e̱' rinimal wach awajawric wilic, k'e̱' wo' chic coric awach eh coric wo' take k'oric na'n. Re' aC'uhbal til wo' manlic wach ricorquil xa je' na ricab jeno' be̱h xa coric chic wach. Re' hat k'uru' hat k'atal k'oric chi quina̱ chi'nchel tinamit

eh ru'um re' curman chi nariye'eric alok'il eh chi'nchel tinamit naquiyohbalem wo' awach maj xa re' wo' hat k'e̱' lo̱k' awa'ric. Ru'um aj re' chi'nchel nimak tak tinamit naca̱t quilok'em maj xc'utunic risakomal riholonquilal ano'jbal, nqui bi̱ch xca'n.

Chiri̱j wili xwilow ar pan taxa̱j jenaj lok' laj ye'a̱b xa je' chic ricab i najtir ye'a̱b re' ric'uhtaj wi̱' ri̱b i Dios cu̱c' take kama̱m kati't. Chipam i ye'a̱b wili xteh cho i lok' laj ye'a̱b re' c'ahchi' riye'eric wi̱' rilok'il i Dios

eh ar chipam i ye'a̱b re're' xi'elic cho wuku̱b chi raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re' ye'o̱j cajawric chi ritak'abjic cho take wukch'uk wach chi ti'c'axic naric'uluric chiwach ac'al. Re' take wuku̱b chi aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' xa nworwotic chic sakil quiso' wilic jenaj quipa̱s ch'ihch' tik'imaj ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' jelic na̱ quiteleb k'e'lic jok chi' quic'ux cu nponic nah quitu̱k.

Chiri̱j i wili, jenaj queh quejeb chi c'acharel wilic nak' quiwach chiqui̱j chi quiwach xik'ahsaj queh wuku̱b chi aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' ju'jun chi culc reh uc'unic tik'imaj take ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch'. Re' c'ah laj ha' re're' rijalwachej rinimal i ti'c'axic nariyeb chi quina̱ take c'acharel. Re' aj re' naribanam i Dios re' c'achlic chi junelic k'i̱j sakom, ru'um reh rinimal rijosk'il chiri̱j mahcanic nca'n take tinamit.

Je' re' ajic naxye'eric queh take culc re're', re' lok' laj ye'a̱b re're' xiban xa npokic chic i sib chipam. Je' re' xiban c'uhtbal reh chi re' wilic ar, re' wo' Dios re' k'e̱' wo' chic rajawric eh k'e̱' wo' rinimal wach rilok'il. Chi je' re' ma' jeno' chic xiban cok canar oquic chipam i ye'a̱b re're' cu rehtal naricux'ic wach take wukch'uk chi ti'c'axic re' naquic'amam cho wuku̱b chi raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios.

Chiri̱j chic ru' xnibiraj ar chipam i lok' laj ye'a̱b re' xa c'ahchi' wo' riye'eric wi̱' rilok'il i Dios cu'um aj tz'e' wa̱ch, jenaj xk'oric cho chi cow chi je' wili c'ahchi' rik'orom queh take wuku̱b chi raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios: «Hiy tak eh chi quina̱ take c'acharel wilque̱b xa haj yu̱k' q'uixca̱b chachihcaj tak cho i wilic chipam i wuku̱b chi ch'ihch' culc uc'bal re' rijalwachej rinimal ti'c'axic riyew i Dios ru'um i rinimal rijosk'il chiri̱j quimahc take c'acharel, nqui queh.

Cu re' aj ru' re' pe̱t aj tz'e' wa̱ch xo̱j richihca̱j i wilic chipam i ch'ihch' culc, ar china̱ take yu̱k' q'uixca̱b eh naxiban chi je' re' chi'nchel take c'acharel quic'ulum rehtalil ribihnal i ma' laj chicop on nquilok'ej wach i tiyo̱x re' tik'imaj ru̱c' rijalwachil i ma' laj chicop re're', xpok' cho jenaj ma' holohic ta laj k'a̱ chiqui̱j je' ru̱c' yohbal wach ti'quilal riban.

Chiri̱j i wili re' ricab raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xo̱j wo' richihca̱j i wilic chipam i ch'ihch' culc, ar china̱ i rinimal ha'. Naxiban chi je' re', re' rinimal ha' quic'ric wach eh xiban xa je' chic ricab ruxla̱b quic'. Je' re' k'uru' naxiban chi je' re' xiquimic take chi'nchel quic'acharic chipam rinimal ha' re're'.
Chiri̱j aj ru', re' ro̱x raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xo̱j richihca̱j i wilic chipam i ch'ihch' culc china̱ take ro̱k ha', je' wo' chi quina̱ take rasbal ha' eh chi'nchel re're' ximikric quic'.

Naxiban chi je' re' xnibiraj nok re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re' wilic rajawric chi quina̱ take ha' xik'or chi je' wili: «Lok' laj kaDios re' xawilca̱t wo' cho pan ch'iquinbal cho reh i c'acharic eh xa na̱wih'ic wo' chi junelic k'i̱j sakom, re' hat til coric wach ac'ux. Je' wo' re' i ano'jbal chi riye'eric take ti'c'axic queh take c'acharel wili
maj re' take re' xicansanic queh take aj niminel je' wo' take xik'oric aC'uhbal eh ru'um re' chi tojbal wach quimahc ric'ul wo' chi queh chi encuq'uej i quic' laj ha' re're', nqui xik'or.

Je' wo' xnibiraj wo' chic chi ar chiwach i lok' laj ye'a̱b je' ricab nilbic i lok' laj ye'a̱b c'atbal si̱ chiwach i Dios, wilic wo' jenaj chic xk'oric wo' cho chi je' wili: «K-Aja̱w Dios re' k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal wach awajawric wilic, til coric nana'n i tak'anic chi nye'eric ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take c'acharel wili, na'n chi je' re' ru'um nok coric wach ac'ux eh coric wo' wach ak'orbal, nqui xik'or cho.

Chiri̱j chic ru', re' ricaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xo̱j richihca̱j i wilic chipam i ch'ihch' culc ar china̱ i k'i̱j. Naxiban chi je' re', re' k'i̱j xye'eric k'ab reh chi xic'at take c'acharel ru̱c' i rik'ak'il.

Re' take re' naxic'ahtic ru'um ritz'a'quilal rik'ak'il i k'i̱j k'e̱' wo' chic naxchalic quic'a̱ chi xquitok'a̱' ritz'ujuric johtok i Dios ru'um nok re're' wilic rinimal rajawric chi xchalic chi quina̱ take ti'c'axic c'ahchi' quic'ulum. Re' take re' ma' xquijal ta wo' wach quino'jbal eh ma' xca̱j ta wo' quilok'em wach i Dios.

Je' re' k'uru' re' ro̱' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xo̱j richihca̱j i wilic chipam ch'ihch' culc ar china̱ i tz'uka̱b re' wilic wi̱' chi tak'anic i ma' laj chicop xa c'ahbil chic rilbal eh nok re' aj tz'e' wa̱ch je' re' xiban, re' take c'acharel re' quic'ulum chic i ma' laj chicop re're' chi quik'atal k'oric xicahnic pan k'ekom. Ru'um reh ti'c'axic re're', re' take c'acharel xiban chi xa nquitiw chic nah ca̱k' ru'um riti'quil c'ahchi' quic'ulum.

Ru'um reh riti'quil k'a̱ wili eh je' wo' ru'um reh ti'c'axic chalanak chi quina̱ xquitok'a̱' quitz'ujum johtok i Dios re' wilic cho pan taxa̱j eh to̱b ta nak wilque̱b chic pan ti'c'axic ma' xquicana̱' ta ribanaric i c'ahbilal laj quibano̱j.

Chi je' re' k'uru' re' riwa̱k raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xo̱j richihca̱j i wilic chipam i ch'ihch' culc ar china̱ rinimal ro̱k ha' “E̱wrates” ribihnal. Naxiban chi je' re', xchikic jok i ha' re're', xiban chi quibehbal chic take k'atal k'oric quich'i̱l take quiso̱l re' take quichalic pan tak tinamit wilque̱b ar pa rijohsbal cho wi̱' i k'i̱j.

Ar aj ru' nok c'ahchi' wilom i re're', xwilow quiwach xib chi ma' tob laj uxlabal je' take quiwi̱' ro̱ch'. Jenaj queh take ro̱ch' re're' ar xelic cho pan chi̱' i ma' laj wacax a̱k'. Re' ricab ar xelic cho pan chi̱' i ma' laj chicop xa c'ahbil chic rilbal. Re' chic i ro̱x ar xelic cho pan chi̱' i c'acharel re' xa chucul aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios.

Re' take xib re're', ru'um chi ma' tob laj uxlabal take, xca'n take rehreh wach sachbal quic'ux take c'acharel. Je' wo', xiponic wo' cu̱c' take k'atal k'oric ayu' wach ac'al chi rijohsjic quic'ux chi rimoloric qui̱b ch'i̱l quiso̱l chi nacoquic chi k'ak'anic cu̱c' take ritinami̱t i Dios re' k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal wach rajawric wilic.

Ru'um aj reh naric'uluric re're', re' Jesus rik'orom wo' nak chic cho i wili: «Chacoj tak rehtal: Re' nic'ulic lok i hin naribanam xa je' ricab nc'ulic lok jeno' aj lek'. Ru'um aj re', re' hat-tak cha'n tak je' ricab riban i c'acharel re' noquic chi cha'janic eh chi je' re' richa'jej ri̱j riso' chi ma' hab ta wach enelk'enic reh. Re' Dios rilow cho chi ato̱b reh c'acharel re' je' re' rino'jbal maj je' ricab nok jeno' c'acharel cha'janic riban, to̱b ta ponok i aj lek', xa ma'xta wo' ricahnic pan q'uixbilal ru'um chi re' take toco̱m chic c'acharel enquilow nak chi ma'xta chic riso', nqui rik'orom cho i Jesus.

Chi je' aj re', re' take xib chi ma' tob laj uxlabal xquimol wach take k'atal k'oric chi'nchel tinamit wach ac'al reh chi nacoquic chi k'ak'anic ru̱c' i Dios ar chipam i jenaj ye'a̱b “Armajeron” ribihnal pan k'oric hewre̱yo re' kak'orbal i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.

Chiri̱j ru' chalic i riwu̱k raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xo̱j wo' richihca̱j pan te̱w i wilic chipam i ch'ihch' culc. Naxiban chi je' re' ar pan taxa̱j chipam i lok' laj ye'a̱b re' xa c'ahchi' wo' riye'eric wi̱' rilok'il i Dios, xk'oric cho jenaj wilic cok ar re' wilic wi̱' i tz'uka̱b reh k'atbal k'oric eh je' wili xik'or cho: «Xmanlajic chic wach chi'nchel i ti'c'axic, nqui xik'or cho.

Xa re' aj wo' re' ru', xic'uyu'jic take cho cohok eh xquirehpaj cho quisakomil. Je' wo', wilic take k'oric xbirmijic cho cu pan taxa̱j eh xiban jenaj hihc yohbal wach cowil re' ma' wo' janc'al ta k'i̱j sakom ribanam cho cu rich'ihquic cho quic'acharic take c'acharel.

Je' re' k'uru' naxiban i hihc wili, xelic oxch'ak i ma' laj tinamit eh re' take nimak tak tinamit xihitlijic wach ac'al. Re' chi'nchel xc'uluric wili re're' nc'uhtunic reh chi re' Dios je' ricab nanye'eric i c'ah laj ha' chipam jenaj ch'ihch' culc, ma' jaruj ta xiq'uic pa ric'ux riye'eric cho rinimal wach ti'c'axic china̱ i tinamit Wawilo̱nya ru'um reh rinimal wach ric'a̱ chiri̱j i quimahc take c'acharel quic'acharic ar.
Naxchalic i ti'c'axic re're', chi'nchel take ye'a̱b sutumaj qui̱j ru'um ha', ch'i̱l take nimak tak yu̱k' sahchic quiwach, ma' cu ta chic xic'utunic take.

Je' wo' chic naxc'uluric re're', ar pan taxa̱j xik'ehbic take cho nimak tak sak'wach chi quina̱ tinamit, ju'jun na quental rahlil ju'jun. Ru'um re're', re' take tinamit xquitz'ujlom johtok i Dios ru'um riti'quil xbanaric queh maj re' sak'wach re're' jenaj rinimal ti'c'axic xiban queh.

Chiri̱j chic ru' xchalic jenaj queh wuku̱b chi raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re' wilic ju'jun chi ch'ihch' culc pan quik'ab, je' wili xik'or wi̱n: «Quim ayu', nanic'uhtam aweh i tojbal wach mahc wilic china̱ i tinamit wili. Re' tinamit wili re' wilic ribiral je' ricab ribiral jeno' aj banol reh c'oyomal

re're' wilic china̱ i tojbal wach i mahc re're' ru'um chi re're' xc'ambic quibe̱h take chi'nchel nimak tak tinamit chi xquicana̱' rilok'onjic wach i Dios, xa je' na ricab xixohc'saj take reh chi xic'am je take pan c'oyomal. Je' re' ajic, re' take k'atal k'oric ayu' wach ac'al xca'n i c'ahbilal je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak ca'nam i c'oyomal, nqui wi̱n.

Chiri̱j chic re', re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xiric'am wo' chic je pan jenaj chic ye'a̱b chi rilmijic jenaj chic ilo̱j chi hin to'bomaj ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal, re' xwilow wi̱' jenaj ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel. Chipam re' ilo̱j wili xwilow wo' wach jenaj ma' laj cak ri̱j chicop ma' holohic ta rilbal. Re' ma' laj cak ri̱j chicop wili re' nujunak ri̱j reh take k'oric tz'ujbal reh Dios, wilic wo' wuku̱b rina̱, wilic lajeb ruc'a' eh china̱ i chicop wili tz'uklic jenaj ixok

re' tiklic ru̱c' riso' chi cak laj tz'ih ch'i̱l k'ekmoyic ricakil laj tz'ih. Re' ixok wilic xa nrepretic chic riholonquil ritik'injic ri̱b ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' riban, je' wo' re' ru̱c' take holohic laj abaj q'uih tz'a̱k on ru̱c' holohic laj abaj “Pe̱rla” ribihnal. Re're' wilic wo' jenaj culc pan k'ab tik'imaj ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' nujunak ru̱c' c'ah laj ha' nxohc'sonic eh ru̱c' re're' rijalwachej i c'ahbilal riban ru̱c' ric'oyomal.

Je' wo', yejal wach ixok wili tz'ihmbimaj take k'oric re' ma' hab ta wach nrakbic chiri̱j chaj bih ra̱j rik'orom eh re' take k'oric re're' je' wili rik'or: «Re' tinamit Wawilo̱nya wili re' ma' holohic ta ribiral wilic, re're' quitutil chi'nchel take tinamit aj c'oyo̱m eh je' wo' quitutil wo' chi'nchel quibanic c'ahbilal laj no'jbal, nqui rik'or.

Chiri̱j chic ru' xwilow chi re' ixok re're' k'e̱' po' nchel q'uihal take aj niminel ricansam take je ru'um reh rik'ormojic ribiral i Jesus. Re' ixok wili, ru̱c' i xiban re're', xcahnic chi xa je' chic ricab ncahnic jeno' c'acharel ruq'uej yohbal wach q'uihal i c'ah laj ha' chi xa xohq'uel chic xcahnic. Re' hin yohbal wach xsahchic nic'ux naxwilow i re're' eh chi je' re',

re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xik'or wi̱n chi je' wili: «Chaj wa'ric nansahchic ac'ux? Re' hin nanisakomem wach aweh i ma' nrakmajic ta chiri̱j naxawilow wach ixok ch'i̱l i ma' laj cak ri̱j chicop tz'uklic wi̱' re' wilic wuku̱b i na̱ eh wilic lajeb ruc'a'.

Je' aj wili k'uru' quibiral: Re' ma' laj cak ri̱j chicop xawilow wach re' wo' re' wih'inak cho najtir k'i̱j ayu' wach ac'al eh to̱b ta yu'na ma'xta nak chic ayu' ru'um chi camnak nak chic, narijohtic wo' chic cho pan jul cahk reh chi naritak'abjic pan ti'c'axic sachbal wach chi junpech. Je' re' k'uru' re' ma' laj cak ri̱j chicop re're', re' wih'inak cho najtir k'i̱j ayu' wach ac'al xa re' la' yu'na ma' wilic ta chic ayu', naric'ulic wo' chic lok eh ru̱c' ric'ulic k'e̱' narisahchic quic'ux nic' pa' nimal take c'acharel je' ru̱c' cu pan p'uhtbal cho reh taxa̱j ac'al ma' tz'ihmbimaj ta cho quibihnal chiwach i hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' quibihnal nic' pa' nimal take ye'o̱j chiqui̱j chi naquic'acharic chi junelic k'i̱j sakom.

Ra̱j hat-tak wi wilic ano'jbal tak enarak tak chiri̱j chi coric i nanik'orom wili: Re' wuku̱b china̱ wilic reh i ma' laj cak ri̱j chicop re're', rijalwachej i wuku̱b chi yu̱k' wilque̱b chipam i tinamit re' tz'uklic wi̱' ixok eh je' wo' rijalwachej i wuku̱b chi aj k'atal k'oric.

Queh take wuku̱b chi k'atal k'oric re're', ho'o̱b chic iq'uinak take lok chi k'atoj k'oric eh xiquimic chic je. Jenaj c'ahchi' chi k'atoj k'oric yu'na eh re' jenaj chic ja' ritok'a̱' ta k'atoj k'oric. Nachitok'a̱' k'atoj k'oric ru' xa ma' naht ta wo' ti naribanam.

Je' wo', re' ma' laj cak ri̱j chicop wih'inak cho najtir k'i̱j re' ma' wilic ta chic yu'na ru'um chi camnak chic, re're' rijalwachej i riwahxak k'atal k'oric nariwih'ic. Re' jenaj chic k'atal k'oric wili, re' wo' jenaj chi quixilac take wuku̱b eh c'ahchi' rojic chipam i ye'a̱b narisahchic wi̱' wach chi junpech.

«Re' chic take lajeb chi ruc'a' i ma' laj cak ri̱j chicop xawilow wach, rijalwachej take lajeb chi k'atal k'oric ma' ja' nquic'ul ta cajawric chi k'atal k'oric, xa re' la' naquic'ul cajawric xa junc'am wo' ti nariwih'ic cajawric chi k'atoj k'oric quich'i̱l i ma' laj cak ri̱j chicop.

Re' take lajeb chi k'atal k'oric re're' naca'nam jenaj wach c'uxlis chi ritobjic i ma' laj chicop re're' eh chiri̱j re're', re' take k'atal k'oric wili naquik'ahsam pan k'ab i nic' pa' nimal i cajawric wilic.

Re' aj take re're' chi quich'i̱l i ma' laj cak ri̱j chicop, nacucsam jenaj k'ak'anic ru̱c' i C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱', xa re' la' ru' re're' nariyeb take pan ac'al chi ihch'ilimaj cu'um take nic' pa' nimal yuk'umaj take ru'um i Dios eh nquich'ica̱' wo' quic'ux chiri̱j ru'. Je' re' nik'or maj re're' wilic chi ajabe̱s chi quina̱ chi'nchel take wilque̱b chi ajabe̱s take eh je' wo' wilic chi quinahsil take k'atal k'oric, nqui xik'or wi̱n.

Chiri̱j ru' re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xik'or wi̱n chi je' wili: «Re' ro̱k ha' wilic chipam i tinamit xawilow wach chi tz'uklic wi̱' i c'oyo̱m, re're' rijalwachej take riq'uihal c'acharel re' c'ul elenak take cho chi junsut tinamit wach ac'al ru̱c' rehreh wach quik'orbal.

Re' ma' laj cak ri̱j chicop ch'i̱l take lajeb chi ruc'a' xawilow wach naribanam chi naquixowem wach i aj c'oyo̱m eh je' ricab nok jeno' ixok ncanabjic chi ma'xta chic riso', je' wo' re' naca'nam ru', naquicana̱b wo' i tinamit re're' chi ma'xta chic so' ribihomal eh xa ta wo' nak hab chic wach nariwih'ic chipam i tinamit re're'. Je' wo' chic, je' ricab nok re' c'uch ric'ux i camnak chicop cu rehtal risach wach je' wo' re' naca'nam ru̱c' i tinamit wili, naquisacham wo' wach chi junpech naquicut pan k'a̱k'.

Je' re' k'uru' chi'nchel wili naric'uluric maj re' Dios xicoj pan ca̱mna ribanaric re' haj wilic i xa̱j ru' chi xca'n je' ricab i wili: Chi xa jenaj chic wach quic'ux naquik'ahsam i cajawric reh i ma' laj cak ri̱j chicop chi to'bal reh, cu rehtal narinimjic haj wilic i k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios.

Re' aj chic ixok xawilow wach, rijalwachej i ma' laj tinamit re' k'e̱' nimal rajawric wilic, ru'um chi re' take aj k'atal k'oric xquiyew k'ab chi naribanjic i k'atoj k'oric chi quina̱ ayu' wach ac'al, nqui wi̱n.
Chiri̱j take wili, xwilow wo' chic jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios k'e̱' nimal rajawric, xkajic cho pan taxa̱j eh naxchalic til xa nsakomonic chic i wach ac'al xiban ru̱c' risakomil.

Re're' xa cow chic quiq'uer quichi̱' chi je' wili: «Narisahchic chic wach i ma' laj tinamit Wawilo̱nya! Yu'na naricahnic chi quipatbal chic take raj to'o̱l aj Yahm eh je' wo' quiye'a̱b chic take ma' tob laj uxlabal. Ar chipam i tinamit re're' naca'nam wo' quike̱s take tz'iquin je' ru̱c' chaweh hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel yibel quiwach eh ma' k'oro̱j ta wo' quibihnal chi tare̱t chipam C'uhbal Ye'o̱j cho reh Moyses.

Je' re' naric'ulum i tinamit re're' ru'um chi re're' xc'ambic quibe̱h take chi'nchel nimak tak tinamit chi xquicana̱' rilok'onjic wach i Dios xa je' na ricab xixohc'saj take tinamit chi quic'amaric je take pan c'oyomal. Je' re' ajic re' take k'atal k'oric ayu' wach ac'al xca'n i c'ahbilal je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak ca'nam i c'oyomal. Je' wo', re' take aj yaco̱l chi junsut wach ac'al xca'n wo' i c'ahbilal ru̱c' ribihomsjic qui̱b xca'n. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' xquic'o'nej quibihomal ru̱c' rilok'oric take xa pa' bih jaric ma' curman ta wo' nak chi queh, nqui xik'or.

Chiri̱j ru' xnibiraj wo' chic chi jenaj xk'oric cho ar pan taxa̱j chi je' wili c'ahchi' rik'orom: «Re' hat-tak nitinami̱t telen tak cho chipam quitinamital take aj Wawilo̱nya. Ma̱ban aweh tak i mahc nca'n ru' reh chi ma'xta ac'ulum aweh tak take ti'c'axic chalic reh chi quina̱.

Re' quimahc i tinamit wili k'e̱' wo' chic q'uihal chi eta nak ntusuric wach chi'nchel, cu enak rirak i rinahtil johtok na̱ taxa̱j. Ru'um aj re' chalic reh i ti'c'axic chi quina̱ maj re' Dios ma' iq'uinak ta pa ric'ux nic' pa' nimal i ma' holohic ta laj bano̱j xca'n, nqui wi̱n.

Ar aj ru' re' take tak'amaj cho chi riye'eric i ti'c'axic chi quina̱, je' wili xk'ormojic queh: Cha'n tak cho jelow-bal i ti'c'axic xiban queh take toco̱m. Re' cok ru' ca'pech ok chic johtonak wach ransil rijelow-bal i ti'c'axic cha'n tak queh chiwach xca'n ru'. Chayew tak jeno' rinimal riti'quil ric'ux xa je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak atik'a̱b tak jeno' riha̱' chi ca'pech iq'uinak na̱ ric'ahil chiwach xiyew queh toco̱m.

Re' take c'acharel wilque̱b chipam i tinamit re're' k'e̱' wo' chic xquinimsaj qui̱b eh k'e̱' sukquilal i xic'acharic wi̱'. Je' ricab rinimal wach no'jbal xca'n re're', je' ok wo' re' rinimal wach ok'ic ch'i̱l rinimal wach ti'c'axic chacoj chi quina̱. Je' wo' chic, re' take re' je' wili nquik'or pan quic'ux: ‘Re' katinamital wilic rajawric chi quina̱ chi'nchel tinamit eh je' ricab chi ma'xta bih jeno' ti' rilow wach jeno' ma' re' ta cahnel ixok, ma'xta wo' kilom wach jeno' ti'c'axic, nqui xquik'or.

«Chi je' aj re' xa chiwach ti jenaj k'i̱j re' ti'c'axic wili narichalic chi quina̱: Re' ti'quil c'uxlis, re' c'ahric, re' quimic ch'i̱l i c'ahtic pan k'a̱k'. Je' re' ru' naric'ulum maj re' Dios re' k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal wach rajawric narich'ukum k'oric china̱.

«Chi je' re' k'uru', re' aj wili naric'uluric ru̱c' i tinamit Wawilo̱nya re're': Re' take k'atal k'oric ayu' wach ac'al re' xca'n jenaj wach c'uxlis ru̱c' aj Wawilo̱nya chi xca'n i c'ahbilal eh je' wo' chi xca'n i c'oyomal, re' take re' nacok'ic ru'um riti'quilal quic'ux chiri̱j i tinamit re're' naquilow i risibil c'ahchi' rijohtic ru'um reh i c'ahtic c'ahchi' ric'ulum.

Naca'n chi je' re', xa cu naht wo' naquipahba̱b je qui̱b chi rilmijic i c'ahchi' ric'ulum i tinamit Wawilo̱nya ru'um quiyo'jic naroquic cho chi ewo' nquic'ul queh i ti'c'axic xchalic china̱ i tinamit re're'. Chi je' re', je' wili k'oric c'ahchi'que̱b: ‘K'e̱' je quetal awach, k'e̱' je quetal awach i hat ma' laj tinamit Wawilo̱nya. Coric ru' xa yohbal wo' nak chic wach awa'ric na'n awi̱b xa re' la' xa ru̱c' ti junc'am xchalic ti'c'axic chana̱, nqui naquik'orom.

«Je' wo', re' take aj yaco̱l quichalic chi junsut yu̱k' q'uixca̱b nacok'ic wo' ru'um riti'quilal quic'ux chiri̱j tinamit re're' maj ma' hab ta chic wach narilok'o̱j reh quic'a̱y ar chipam i tinamit Wawilo̱nya. Re' quic'a̱y take re', re' take wili:

Re' k'an woric laj ch'ihch', re' sak laj ch'ihch', ch'i̱l take holohak laj abaj q'uih quitz'akil, ch'i̱l i holohic laj abaj “Pe̱rla” ribihnal, ch'i̱l wo' take sak laj tz'ih, cak laj tz'ih, ch'i̱l take tz'ih c'ul k'e̱' sakom chipam eh ch'i̱l wo' take cak moyic laj tz'ih je' ru̱c' k'e̱' q'uihal quitz'akil. Je' wo' nquic'ayej take nc'ohnic laj tz'ilom eh je' wo' take xa pa' bih tik'imaj take ru̱c' ba̱k, ru̱c' q'uih tz'a̱k laj che̱', q'uih tz'a̱k laj ch'ihch' ch'i̱l wo' take pa' bih tik'imaj ru̱c' sak laj abaj.

«Je' wo', ma' hab ta chic wach narilok'o̱j reh quic'a̱y take wili: Re' take ri̱j tak che̱' ye'bal ric'ohonquil ha', re' take nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m ch'i̱l wo' se̱nsa. Je' wo' take nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m ncojoric wach tz'ih, je' wo' take latzbal che̱' ch'i̱l i c'ah laj ha' nxohc'sonic eh ch'i̱l wo' i yolic laj ik'o̱m. Ma' xa ta re're', je' wo' take holohic laj rik'oril caxlan wi'c ch'i̱l ixi̱m, je' wo' take aj ihkom laj chicop ch'i̱l take me̱', take cawa̱y, take behsbal, take c'acharel quic'ayjic chipam cow laj camanic eh ch'i̱l wo' take sol c'ayamaj take chi reh k'ak'anic.

Ru'um aj re', re' take c'acharel re're' je' wili naquik'orom reh ma' laj tinamit Wawilo̱nya: ‹Chi'nchel i nic' pa' nimal xayew wi̱' ac'ux chi nariwih'ic aweh ma'xta chic awilom wach. Ayu' xcahnic suk laj c'acharic nponic chawach eh xk'ehbic wo' abihomal chi junpech, nqui naquik'orom.

«Je' re' k'uru' re' take aj yaco̱l re're', re' xibihomric ru̱c' i c'a̱y nca'n ru̱c' i tinamit Wawilo̱nya nacok'ic chi xa ti' chic pan quic'ux eh ru'um quiyo'jic chi ewo' nchalic ti'c'axic chi quina̱ i xchalic chi quina̱ i tinamit re're' xa cu naht chic naquipah'ic je chi rilmijic re' xic'ul i tinamit re're'.

Je' aj wili naquik'orom naquipah'ok chi rilmijic: ‹Re' ma' laj tinamit Wawilo̱nya xa je' na ricab jenaj ixok re' xa holohic chic riso' ricoj chiri̱j je' ru̱c' tik'imaj ru̱c' sak laj tz'ih, on cak laj tz'ih, on ru̱c' tz'ih c'ul k'e̱' sakom chipam eh rixoyej wo' ri̱b ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch', je' wo' re' ru̱c' holohak laj abaj q'uih quitz'akil. Coric ru' chi je nak re' ritik'injic ri̱b riban, xa re' la' yu'na k'e̱' je quetal wach i ma' laj tinamit re're'

maj xa ru̱c' ti junc'am xsahchic wach i ribihomal nak wilic reh, nqui naquik'orom. «Je' wo', re' take nic' pa' nimal quitak'anic chipam i nimak tak cano̱wa ch'i̱l wo' take aj behsenel reh, ch'i̱l wo' chi'nchel take quicamanic na̱ ha' xa cu naht wo' naquipahba̱b cho qui̱b

naquilow rijohtic risibil i ma' laj tinamit Wawilo̱nya chi c'ahchi' ric'ahtic eh ru̱c' re're' je' wili naquik'orom: ‹Haj chic enchalic jeno' tinamit je' ricab rilok'il i ma' laj tinamit wili, nqui naquik'orom.

«Chi rehtalil aj chi wilic jenaj rinimal ti'quil c'uxlis cu̱c' take c'acharel re're', naquipokem poklaj pan quina̱ eh nacoquic chi ok'ic chi xa je' chic wili naquik'orom: ‹K'e̱' je quetal wach i ma' laj tinamit wili maj to̱b ta xa ru̱c' ribihomal xibihomric take aj ehcham nimak tak cano̱wa china̱ rinimal ha', xa chi junc'am wo' ti xsahchic wach ribihomal, nqui naquik'orom.

«Je' re' nok re' hat-tak wilca̱t tak ar pan taxa̱j sukbok ac'ux tak chi re' tinamit re're' xic'ul chic riti'c'axic. Sukbok wo' ac'ux hat-tak lok' laj ritinami̱t i Dios, je' wo' hat-tak pahbamaj chi nahsil c'amol quibe̱h aj tahkanel reh Dios, ch'i̱l wo' hat-tak aj k'orol riC'uhbal maj re' ti'c'axic xchalic china̱ tinamit re're' xchalic chi ye'bal jelow-bal i ti'c'axic ribanam cho aweh tak, nqui xk'ormojic queh take tak'amaj chi nariyeb i ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take aj Wawilo̱nya.

Chiri̱j chic ru', c'uhtbal reh chi re' ti'c'axic narichalic china̱ i ma' laj tinamit Wawilo̱nya, ar aj ru' jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re' k'e̱' nimal wach rajawric xichop cho jenaj ma' laj abaj je' ricab nimal jenaj ma' laj que'bal ixi̱m eh xicut jok chipam rinimal ha' chi je' wili c'ahchi' rik'orom: «Je' ricab sahchic wach xiban abaj wili je' wo' re' narisahchic awach i hat-tak c'acharel reh ma' laj tinamit Wawilo̱nya. Nachac'ul tak je' re', ma' jaruj ta chic narilmijic awach tak

eh ma' wo' jaruj ta chic naribirmijic chipam atinami̱t tak take bi̱ch nbanjic ru̱c' a̱rpa, nbanjic ru̱c' su̱b, je' wo' re' ru̱c' take caxlan su̱b. Je' wo', ma' jeno' chic camanom naricamanic awu̱c' tak eh ma' wo' eta chic nbirmijic i ahnic riban i abaj que'bal wach ixi̱m.

Je' wo' chic, ma' jeno' chic sakombal narikopic chipam aye'a̱b tak eh ma'xta wo' chic quiyeb quik'orbal take aj caxa̱ra chipam take nink'i̱j reh caxarahil. Nic' pa' nimal k'oro̱j wili til naric'uluric maj re' take awaj yaco̱l tak xquinimsaj qui̱b ru'um chi k'e̱' wo' chic quiwa'ric chiwach take toco̱m chic c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al eh je' wo' ru'um chi xajot' tak quicapew-bal take tinamit wach ac'al naxac'uhtaj tak queh i waranic i na'n tak, nqui raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios.

Je' aj re' riwi̱' k'uru', xinwilow i hin nok china̱ i ma' laj tinamit Wawilo̱nya til chalic reh i rinimal ti'c'axic eh je' re' naric'uluric ru̱c' maj chipam ru' wilque̱b take c'acharel re' xicansanic queh take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios eh queh take aj niminel reh Dios re' take lok' laj ritinami̱t. Je' wo' chic ru'um reh take aj Wawilo̱nya wili xicansjic take riq'uihal c'acharel reh toco̱m chik yu̱k' q'uixca̱b ayu' wach ac'al.

Chiri̱j chic ric'uhtjic wi̱n nic' wach risahchic wach i tinamit Wawilo̱nya, re' hin xnibiraj chi xa cow chic k'oric xca'n cho juntuhm chi tinamit ar pan taxa̱j eh je' wili c'ahchi' quik'orom: «Ye'erok rilok'il i Dios maj xa re' wo' re' nco'lonic keh eh xa re' wo' re' k'e̱' nimal wach rajawric. Je' wo', xa re' wo' re' sutumaj ri̱j ru'um i riholonquilal i sakom wilic wi̱'.

Ye'erok wo' rilok'il maj re' k'atoj k'oric riban ru̱c' coric wach c'uxlis riban eh coric wo' wach rik'orbal. Ru'um aj re' xiban chi xchalic i ti'c'axic china̱ i tinamit Wawilo̱nya re' wilic ribiral chi aj c'oyo̱m ru'um nok re' tinamit re're' je' ricab nok jeno' ixok nc'ambic be̱h pan c'oyomal, xic'am wo' quibe̱h take c'acharel wach ac'al chi rilok'onjic wach take tiyo̱x. Je' wo' chic re' Dios xiban chi xicansjic take aj Wawilo̱nya eh ru̱c' re're' xye'eric jelow-bal reh i nic' pa' nimal ti'c'axic xiban queh take quiniminic reh tak'anic ribanam i Dios chi naquicamanic wi̱', nqui take.
Chiri̱j chic ru' xquik'or wo' chic chi je' wili: «Ye'erok rilok'il i Dios maj re' risibil i tinamit re're' xa npokic wo' naricahnic chi junelic i k'i̱j sakom, nqui take.

Cu re' aj ru', re' take quejeb rica'winak (24) chi c'acharel re' wilic quiwa'ric je' ricab quiwa'ric take rijeb tak winak, quich'i̱l take c'acharel re' wilic nak' quiwach chiqui̱j chi quiwach xquilok'ej wach i Dios re' tz'uklic chipam ritz'uk'a̱b reh k'atbal k'oric. Til xquixuc'a̱' qui̱b chiwach chi xquik'or chi je' wili: «Ye'erok aj rilok'il i Dios maj til je' re' xc'uluric ru̱c' tinamit re're', nqui take.

Chiri̱j chic re', ar re' wilic wi̱' i tz'uka̱b reh k'atbal k'oric, ar xk'oric cho jenaj chi je' wili xik'or cho: «Re' hat-tak re' tiniminic tak reh take tak'anic ribanam i Dios chi na̱camanic tak wi̱', chalok'ej tak wach i Dios to̱b ta nchel xa nim chic awa'ric on xa ma'xta ti awa'ric tak, nqui.

Chiri̱j chic ru' xnibiraj wo' chic nok juntuhm chi c'acharel xa je' chic ricab cowil ahnic riban i ha' nank'ehbic cho wach sak rehp on xa je' chic ricab nk'oric cho jenaj cow laj cohok i k'oric xca'n cho chi je' wili: «Ye'erok rilok'il i Dios re' k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal wach rajawric wilic maj xa re' wach re' nk'atbic k'oric china̱ chi'nchel c'acharel.

Kalok'ej aj tak wach i Dios k'uru' eh sukbok kac'ux maj yu'na re' chiho̱j wach chi naribanam chi ehq'uenbe̱s, tiklic chic chi naribanam chic caxa̱ra ru'um chi xponic chic rik'ijil i caxarahil ru̱c' i C'acharel re' rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱'.

Je' re' k'uru' re' chiho̱j chic chi rehq'ue̱n i C'acharel re' rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' xye'eric reh i riso' reh caxarahil je' ru̱c' til k'e̱' q'uih tz'a̱k ru'um richak'wachquilal eh xa nrepretic wo' chic risakil. Re' holohic laj tz'ih wili rijalwachej i coric wach no'jbal xca'n take ritinami̱t i Dios sak chic wach quino'jbal, nqui take.

Chiri̱j chic ru' re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios je' wili xik'or wi̱n: «Chatz'ihmbaj take k'oric wili: Ato̱b je queh i yuk'umaj take chi wi'c chipam i nink'i̱j reh ricaxarahil i C'acharel re' rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱', nqui xik'or wi̱n. Je' wo' xik'or wi̱n chi je' wili: «Chi'nchel take k'oric wili, til rik'orbal i kAja̱w Dios. Je' re' nok til manlic coric wach take, nqui wo' wi̱n.

Ru'um re're', re' hin xnixuc'a̱' wi̱b chiwach raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios eh nok oquic nak chic wi̱n chi rilok'onjic wach, re're' je' wili xik'or wi̱n: «Ma̱ban je' re'! Ma̱lok'ej niwach i hin maj xa hin wo' ti raj camanom i Dios je' ricab nok wilca̱t i hat ch'i̱l wo' take awas acha̱k' aj niminel re' quiniminic reh c'uhtunic bano̱j take ru'um i Jesus eh re' take c'uhtunic re're', re' wo' take xiyew i Lok' laj Uxlabal chi narik'ormojic cu'um take hab wach xye'eric k'oric queh chi naquik'orom. Je' re' ajic xa re' wo' Dios nariye'eric rilok'il, nqui xik'or wi̱n.

Chiri̱j chic ru' xwilow chi re' taxa̱j xteh je pa̱m eh chi je' re' xwilow wach jenaj sak ri̱j cawa̱y eh china̱ tz'uklic i Jesus re' nk'ormojic chi re're' nbanic chi nmanlajic wach i nic' pa' nimal k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios eh je' wo' til aj ch'iquem c'uxlis chiri̱j i rik'ormojic i coric. Ma' xa re' ta re', coric la' wo' wach ric'ux chi k'atoj k'oric eh je' wo' chi k'ak'anic cu̱c' take raj ixowonel.

Re' Jesus re're' xa quirepretic chic take nak' wach xa je' chic take xak k'a̱k'. Je' wo' yohbal wach take coten laj ch'ihch' wilic chi xoybal wach na̱ eh yejal wach wilic wo' jenaj bihnal tz'ihmbimaj chiwach, re' xa re' wach re' neht'alanic reh chaj bih ra̱j rik'orom.
Je' wo' xa quic' chic riban riso' eh re' wili cojo̱j chi ribihnal: “Re' aj Sakomonel Wach No'jbal wilic chipam riC'uhbal i Dios”, nank'oric.

Chiri̱j re' xwilow chi re' Jesus xchalic ayu' wach ac'al eh xa je' chic ricab juntuhm ok chi sol ntahkanic reh, chi tahkamaj wo' cho cu'um take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios aj pan taxa̱j. Re' take aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' xa sak chic i quiso' wilic chiqui̱j eh ma' wo' ch'uwa' ta so' wach, tz'ukuk take ri̱j cawa̱y sak qui̱j.

Je' wo' chic, xwilow wo' chi re' rik'orbal re' ncamanic reh chi ricamanbal, xa je' chic ma' laj c'ul k'as re̱ ch'ihch'. Ru̱c' rik'orbal re're' riban chi re' take c'acharel reh ju'jun chi tinamit re' ma' nca̱j ta quiniminic reh nquic'ul i ti'c'axic. Je' wo' chic, xwilow wo' chi re're' riban ricamaj ru̱c' rinimal rajawric je' ricab rajawric wilic aj cha'janel me̱' nok wilic pa rik'ab rich'imim wilic ribolix laj ch'ihch' china̱. Je' ricab nok re' c'acharel resaj ransil chi ripuch'uric pa̱m i u̱wa chi resmejic lok i ri̱s, je' wo' re' i Jesus naribanam wo' chi re' Dios re' k'e̱' nimal wach rajawric, naresam rinimal wach ric'a̱ chi quina̱ take aj mahc chi riye'eric cho ti'c'axic chi quina̱.

Chiri̱j lok chi'nchel re're', xinwilow wo' chi ar chiwach riso' wilic waritu̱k tz'ihmbimaj take k'oric k'oro̱j chiri̱j chi je' wili: “Re' wili i K'atal K'oric re' wilic rajawric chi quina̱ chi'nchel take k'atal k'oric, nqui rik'or. Je' wo' rik'or chi je' wili: “Re' wo' wili Ajabe̱s re' wilic rajawric chi quina̱ take chi'nchel ajabe̱s, nqui rik'or i k'oric tz'ihmbimaj.

Chiri̱j chic rilmijic i tz'uklic nah sak ri̱j cawa̱y, re' hin xwilow nok jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios pa'lic chiwach i k'i̱j, xa cow chic rik'o'rej je take c'uch chi je' wili c'ahchi' rik'orom je queh: «Quim tak. Chamol awi̱b tak. Tiklic jenaj awa' tak ru'um i Dios.

Nachirak rik'ijil chac'ux aweh tak i quiti'jolal take k'atal k'oric eh je' wo' re' quiti'jolal take sol ch'i̱l tak c'amol quibe̱h. Je' re' nok chac'ux aweh tak i quiti'jolal take c'acharel nimak eh chi cuc' tak quiwach. Chac'ux wo' aweh tak i quiti'jolal take cawa̱y ch'i̱l wo' quiti'jolal take c'acharel quibehic china̱. Chac'ux wo' aweh tak i quiti'jolal take c'acharel choplic on ma' choplic quina̱ ru̱c' cow laj camanic ru̱c' riwa'ric jeno' ajabe̱s, nqui c'ahchi' rik'orom queh.
