Chiri̱j chic ru' re' hin xwilow wach i ma' laj chicop xa c'ahbil chic rilbal, ch'i̱l wo' take k'atal k'oric ayu' wach ac'al eh ch'i̱l wo' take q'uih tuhm chi sol quimolom qui̱b chi k'ak'anic ru̱c' i tz'uklic nah sak ri̱j cawa̱y chi rich'i̱l wo' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch re' quihch'ilinic reh chi riso̱l.

Xa re' la' re' tz'uklic china̱ i sak ri̱j cawa̱y xbanic canar i k'ak'anic eh chi je' re' xchoporic wo' i ma' laj chicop xa c'ahbil chic rilbal. Naxchoporic ru', xchoporic wo' i chucul aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios. Re' aj k'orol wili ar nak ric'ul rajawric ru̱c' i ma' laj chicop chi ribanaric take sahchbal c'uxlis eh chi ru̱c' take sachbal c'uxlis re're' k'e̱' take c'acharel xijot'. Chi jot'o̱j chic quicapew-bal, re' take re' xquic'ul i rehtalil ribihnal i ma' laj chicop eh xquilok'ej wo' wach i tiyo̱x re' tik'imaj ru̱c' rijalwachil i ma' laj chicop re're'. Naxichoporic aj take quib re're', re' ma' laj chicop ch'i̱l i raj k'orol, xicuturic chi c'acha̱ch take ar chipam i ye'a̱b re' xa ntenic chic cho rik'ak'il eh xa sute̱n chic pa̱m chi asu̱pra re' xa nquihic chic richuhil.

Chiri̱j re', re' chic take riq'uihal quiso̱l take k'atal k'oric xmoloric quiwach chi naquicansjic eh je' ricab nok jenaj c'ul k'as reh ch'ihch' ncojoric chi cansbal, re' xcamanic reh i tz'uklic china̱ i sak ri̱j cawa̱y, re' i rik'orbal re' xitak'a̱' wi̱' quicansjic take sol re're'. Naxiban chi je' re', chi'nchel take c'uch xquinuksaj qui̱b chi coric ru̱c' ric'uxuric quiti'jolal take chi'nchel take xicansjic re're'.
Chiri̱j ru' xwilow wo' chic i jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re' xkajic cho pan taxa̱j wilic pan k'ab i jenaj ma' laj c'aham ch'ihch' ch'i̱l i tehbal ritz'apa̱b na̱ i jenaj ma' laj jul cahk.

Re're' xichop i ma' laj cak ri̱j wacax a̱k' re' q'uih wach ribihnal wilic, je' ricab nk'ormojic reh wili: “Re' Najtir A̱k'”, “Re' Aj Yahm” eh “Re' Aj Subul Tinamit”. Re' aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' ma' xa ta re're' xiban je' la' wo' xibac' i wacax a̱k' chi c'aham ch'ihch' reh chi naricahnic bac'lic chiwach ca'ik'ob lajc'ahl (1,000) ha̱b.

Chi je' re' xicut jok chipam i ma' laj jul cahk re're'. Chiri̱j chic ru', xilutz' i tz'apbal na̱ i ma' laj jul cahk re're' ru̱c' i tz'apbal wilic pa rik'ab eh xicoj jenaj rehtalil re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' chi je' wili: “Ma' hab ta wach naritehbic reh i tz'apbal na̱ wili”. Je' re' xiban reh chi re' cak ri̱j wacax a̱k' ma'xta chic relic cho chi quijot'oric take nimak tak tinamit cu rehtal chic nponic wach ca'ik'ob lajc'ahl (1,000) ha̱b eh chiri̱j ru' na wo' chic richejeric cho junc'am ok.

Chiri̱j rilmijic i chaj bih xic'ul i ma' laj cak ri̱j wacax a̱k', re' hin xwilow wo' chic i wili: Ar pan taxa̱j re' wilque̱b wi̱' take tz'uka̱b reh k'atbal k'oric xquitz'uka̱' qui̱b take ye'o̱j cajawric chi banoj ch'ukuj k'oric. Quich'i̱l take re', xwilow wo' quiwach take c'acharel xesmejic lok calak chi cansbal queh ru'um rik'ormojic ribiral i Jesus, je' wo' ru'um reh rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios. Re' take re' je' ru̱c' take ma' xquilok'ej ta wach i ma' laj chicop, ma' wo' xquilok'ej ta wach i tiyo̱x re' nca'yic je' ricab i chicop re're'. Re' take re' ma' xquicana̱' ta wo' qui̱b chi xcojoric quehtalil yejal quiwach on nah quik'ab. Ru'um aj chi ma' nca'n ta chi je' re', re' take re' xic'acharic wo' chic cho rica'pech eh xquic'ul quiwa'ric chi ch'ukuj k'oric chiwach ca'ik'ob lajc'ahl (1,000) ha̱b. Je' re' ch'ukuj k'oric xca'n ch'i̱l i Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric.

Re' riq'uic lok take ha̱b re're' xcojoric ribihnal chi je' wili: “Re' rik'ijil cuctic wo' chic cho chi c'acharic take aj niminel”. Chiwach aj rik'ijil re're', re' take toco̱m chic c'acharel re' xiquimic wo' je chi ma' xquinimej ta i Dios ma'xta riye'eric queh i cuse'sbal chi nacuctic wo' chic cho, cu re' la' chic nacucsjic cho nok iq'uinak chic lok rik'ijil take ha̱b re're'.

Je' re' ajic ru'um nok ma' chi'nchel ta take c'acharel nacuctic wo' chic cho chi c'acharic chiwach rik'ijil take ha̱b re're', k'e̱' je ato̱b queh take c'acharel re' nacuctic wo' chic chi pe̱t chiwach rik'ijil re're' maj nac'ulurok i wili ma' eta chic nye'eric queh chi enquic'ul i jenaj chic quimic re' ribihnej wo' cho “Ricab Quimic”. Re' la' take re' je' ricab nok re' take aj k'ahsem si̱ wilque̱b chi aj lok'onel wach i Dios, nariye'eric queh chi ewo' quiwih'ic chi aj lok'onel wach i Dios eh chi aj lok'onel wo' take wach i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric. Je' wo' chic, chiwach i ca'ik'ob lajc'ahl (1,000) ha̱b nok re' Jesus c'ahchi' chi k'atoj k'oric, re' take re' nariye'eric wo' queh chi rich k'atal k'oric take cok i Jesus.
Naponok nacux'ok wach i ca'ik'ob lajc'ahl (1,000) ha̱b, re' aj Yahm naresmejic wo' chic cho chipam i ma' laj jul cahk re' tz'apo̱j jok wi̱'.

Ar aj ru' re're' narojic chi ribanaric riman quijot'oric take c'acharel ma' re' ta take aj niminel reh chi ma' eta nquicoj wach i coric eh chi je' re', re' take re' ch'i̱l i jenaj k'atal k'oric “C'ow” ribihnal re' nk'atbic k'oric chi quina̱ aj Mac'ow naquimolom qui̱b chi k'ak'anic ru̱c' i Jesus eh til wo' chic k'e̱' q'uihal take sol naquiwih'ic cu̱c' chi naca'nam chi xa je' chic ricab riq'uihal nak' wach sani̱b chi chi̱' i ma' laj ha'.

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um chi k'e̱' wo' chic q'uihal take c'acharel re're', xquinuksaj wach ac'al eh naxichalic ar Jerusalen re' tinamit k'e̱' ti' nic'rinjic ru'um i Dios xquisutej ri̱j eh je' wo' re' xbanjic queh take lok' laj aj niminel wilque̱b chipam, xa re' la' ru' na xca'n chi je' re' xkajic cho chi quina̱ jenaj k'a̱k' ar pan taxa̱j eh xic'atjic take raj ixowonel i Dios re're'.

Cu chiri̱j aj chic re', re' Aj Yahm re' xjot'bic queh take c'acharel chi ma' eta nquicoj wach i coric, xcuturic jok chipam i ye'a̱b je' riwi̱' cho̱ xa ntenic chic cho rik'ak'il eh xa sute̱n chic pa̱m chi asu̱pra re' xa nquihic chic richuhil. Re' ye'a̱b re're', re' wo' re' xcuturic wi̱' i ma' laj chicop rich'i̱l i aj chucul aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios. Ar ajic re' take xib re're' xquic'ul i ti'c'axic chi k'i̱j chi ak'ab chi junelic i k'i̱j sakom.

Chiri̱j chi wilom chic chaj bih xquic'ul take xib re're', re' hin xwilow jenaj nim laj tz'uka̱b re' riban wi̱' k'atoj k'oric i Dios xa sakrepic chic eh xwilow wo' wach i jenaj tz'uklic chipam. Chiwach ru' ma'xta chic bih xcahnic xa ta nak re' taxa̱j ch'i̱l wach ac'al maj re' take re' xsahchic quiwach eh ma'xta chic nilmijic quiwach.

Chiri̱j re're' xwilow quiwach chi'nchel take nic' pa' nimal camnak take je, chi nimak chi cuc' tak quiwach, pa'alque̱b cok chiwach tz'uka̱b reh k'atbal k'oric. Chi quiwach take re' xteheric cho wach take ju'jun chi hu̱j eh xteheric wo' wach i jenaj chic hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' quibihnal nic' pa' nimal take ye'o̱j chiqui̱j chi naquic'acharic chi junelic k'i̱j sakom. Chiri̱j chic re' xch'ukuric k'oric chi quina̱ re' k'orel nic' pa' wach quibano̱j ca'nam eh je' wo', re' k'orel chaj bih tz'ihmbimaj chipam take hu̱j re're'.

Chiri̱j ru' re' take camnak re' xiponic canabjok chipam i ye'a̱b “Ha̱res” ribihnal naxiquimic je, xi'elic wo' cho chipam i ye'a̱b re're'. Ma' xa ta re're' xc'uluric, je' la' wo' xi'elic take cho camnak je take chipam take nimak tak ha' eh naxi'elic take cho chi'nchel re're', xiponic wih'ok chiwach i tz'uklic chipam i tz'uka̱b reh k'atbal k'oric. Je' wo' re' xc'uluric cu̱c' take toco̱m chic c'acharel camnak take je. Nok wilque̱b chic chiwach i tz'uklic chipam i tz'uka̱b reh k'atbal k'oric, chi cunchelal take re' xch'ukuric k'oric chi quina̱ re' k'orel nic' pa' wach quibano̱j ca'nam.

Ar aj ru' naxch'ukuric k'oric chi quina̱ take c'acharel re're', xi'elic lok chipam i ye'a̱b “Ha̱res” ribihnal re' xi'o̱j cahnok wi̱' naxiquimic je eh xicuturic jok chipam i ye'a̱b re' xa ntenic chic cho rik'ak'il. Re' ti'c'axic naric'ulmujic ar ribihnej wo' chi “Ricab Quimic”.

Ar ajic, re' aj wili xwilow chi xc'uluric: Chipam i ye'a̱b re' xa ntenic chic cho rik'ak'il, ar xicuturic jok chi'nchel c'acharel ma' tz'ihmbimaj ta quibihnal chipam i hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' quibihnal take hab wach take ye'o̱j chiqui̱j chi naquic'acharic chi junelic k'i̱j sakom.
Chiri̱j chic ru', xwilow wach jenaj ac' taxa̱j rich'i̱l jenaj ac' laj ac'al maj re' pe̱t taxa̱j rich'i̱l i pe̱t ac'al ma' xilmijic ta chic quiwach, ma' wo' re' rinimal ha' xilmijic chic wach.

Je' wo', re' hin Wa̱n xwilow wach i lok' laj tinamit, re' Ac' Jerusalen. Ar c'ahchi' rikajic cho pan taxa̱j ru̱c' i Dios, xa holohic chic ritik'injic bano̱j, xa je' chic ricab naritik'a̱' ri̱b jeno' ixk'un nariban caxa̱ra.

Chi je' aj re' nok c'ahchi' wilom re're', re' hin xnibiraj nok jenaj xk'oric cho chi cow chi je' wili: «Je' ricab chi re' ta nak i ye'a̱b lok'onbal wi̱' wach i Dios enwih'ic cu̱c' take ritinami̱t, yu'na johtok chi kawach re' take c'acharel nye'eric queh chi enc'acharic i Dios chi quixilac. Ru̱c' i naric'uluric re're' nareht'aljic wo' i wili: Re' take c'acharel wilque̱b chi ritinami̱t i Dios eh narik'ormojic wo' chi re' wo' Dios nc'ulbic reh i lok'onic nca'n take re'.

Je' re' ajic, nok re' Dios wilic chic chi c'acharic chi quixilac, ma'xta chic riwih'ic chi quina̱ i ti'c'axic re' riban chi qui'ok'ic. Ar ma' hab ta chic wach enquimic je, ma' wo' hab ta chic wach enjik'jitic i ra̱mna ru'um ti'c'axic maj ma'xta chic riwih'ic ti'c'axic eh ma'xta wo' chic riwih'ic ntz'iric ru'um nok re' nic' pa' nimal xbanic chi xwih'ic i ti'c'axic, xiq'uic chic lok, nqui xik'or.

Chiri̱j re're', re' tz'uklic chipam i tz'uka̱b reh k'atbal k'oric, xik'or wo' chic chi je' wili: «Re' hin xinac'saj take chi'nchel chaj bih wilic, nqui xik'or. Chiri̱j chic ru' xik'or wo' wi̱n chi je' wili: «Chatz'ihmbaj take k'oric xnik'or lok wili maj til manlic coric wach eh ric'ul chi ench'iquinjic c'uxlis chiri̱j, nqui wi̱n.

Chiri̱j chic ru' je' wo' chic wili xik'or wi̱n: «Chi'nchel re' xnik'or lok, xo̱j chic elok wach. Je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' ritusjic wach take tz'ihm chi wilic jenaj p'utbal cho reh eh wilic wo' jenaj cohlsbal wach, je' wo' re' wu̱c' i hin, hin wo' xinp'utbic cho reh chi'nchel eh hin wo' chic nanicohlsonic wach. Je' wo' chic, re' hin quinbanic chi re' take c'acharel equic'acharic chi junelic eh je' re' nanibanam xa chi si̱ je' ricab nc'uluric nok jeno' c'acharel chiki̱j richi̱', ma' ritoj ta i ha' ruq'uej re' nelic cho cu pa rasbal. Re' c'acharel re're' naruq'uej reh i ha' re're', ma' ric'raj ta chic i chikchi'i̱l.

Je' wo' chic, xa hab wach eriyew pa ro̱k rajawric i c'ahbilal naniyeb reh chi narik'ormojic chiri̱j chi til rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios chic eh chi re' wo' Dios nc'ulbic cho reh i lok'onic riban i c'acharel re're'.

Tz'a̱b ru' take xa quiyo'jic chic chi riye'eric quic'ux chiwi̱j ch'i̱l take quibanic chi'nchel yibel wach no'jbal, ch'i̱l take aj cansanel, ch'i̱l take c'oyo̱m, ch'i̱l take aj war, ch'i̱l take quilok'onic wach take tik'imaj tiyo̱x eh ch'i̱l wo' take chi'nchel aj chucul k'oric, naquicuturic jok chipam i ye'a̱b re' xa ntenic chic cho rik'ak'il eh xa sute̱n chic pa̱m chi asu̱pra re' xa nquihic chic richuhil. Re' ti'c'axic naric'ulmujic ar ribihnej wo' chi “Ricab Quimic”, nqui xik'or.

Chiri̱j chic ru' xchalic wu̱c' jenaj queh wuku̱b chi raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re' wilic ju'jun chi ch'ihch' culc pan quik'ab nujunak pa̱m ru̱c' ha' re' quijalwachej take ju'jun chi wuku̱b chi ti'c'axic nariye'eric cho nacux'ok wach chi'nchel i wach ac'al. Re're' je' wili xik'or wi̱n: «Quim ayu', nanic'uhtam aweh i quiye'a̱b take aj niminel re' naquiwih'ic wi̱' chi je' ricab jenaj ehq'uenbe̱s c'axo̱j ru'um ribahi̱l. Nic' pa' wach riban i bahilbe̱s re're', je' wo' re' quic'axmajic take aj niminel nariban i C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱', nqui wi̱n.

Chiri̱j aj re', re' aj tz'e' wa̱ch xiric'am je chi rilmijic jenaj ilo̱j chi to'bomaj nicapew-bal ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal. Ar xinc'amaric je china̱ jenaj rinimal yu̱k' naht na̱ eh nok wilqui̱n chic ar xc'uhtjic wi̱n i lok' laj rinimal tinamit Jerusalen chi c'ahchi' rikajic cho pan taxa̱j ar ru̱c' i Dios.

Re' tinamit re're' xa nrepretic chic ru'um risakil ru'um chi re' risakomil i Dios nsutbic wo' ri̱j. Ru'um aj re' xa nworwotic chic nc'utunic xa je' chic ricab jenaj nworwotic laj abaj on xa je' chic ricab risakomil pa̱m i jenaj abaj “Ja̱spe” ribihnal.

Je' wo' chic, re' tinamit Jerusalen sutumaj ri̱j chi nimak tak tz'ak abaj naht na̱ eh til wo' naht na̱ i tz'ak abaj k'etbal ri̱j i tinamit re're'. Wilic cablaj ritz'ahpil eh chi chi̱' ju'jun chi tz'ahp wilic jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios chi aj cha'janel reh. Chi wach ju'jun chi tz'ahp tz'ihmbimaj quibihnal take ju'jun queh take cablaj ch'uk chi tinamit ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel.
Xib chi tz'ahp wilic chi ricorquil re' njohtic cho wi̱' i k'i̱j, xib wilic pa ritz'e̱t, xib chic wilic pa risec'a̱j eh xib chic wilic chi ricorquil re' nkajic wi̱' i k'i̱j.

Re' rinimal take nimak tak abaj sutumaj wi̱' ri̱j i tinamit re're', ar ch'iclic chi quina̱ take cablaj chi abaj re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' quibihnal take cablaj chi nahsil raj tahkanel i C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱'.

Nok c'ahchi' wilom i c'uhtumaj wi̱n chiri̱j i tinamit Jerusalen, re' hin xwilow wo' chi re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios c'ahchi' chi k'oric wu̱c' wilic jenaj ripajbal pa rik'ab tik'imaj ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch'. Re're' naricamanic reh chi ripajaric i tinamit Jerusalen ch'i̱l i ritz'ahpil eh ch'i̱l wo' ma' laj tz'ak sutumaj wi̱' ri̱j i tinamit re're'.

Je' re' ajic na xoquic chi ripajaric i tinamit Jerusalen, xelic junik'ob lajc'ahl (600) le̱wa rinimal ro̱k, je' wo' re' nahtil na̱ eh je' wo' re' rinimal wach maj re' tinamit re're' cajtz'u'c chi jenaj wach quinimal bano̱j nok tik'imaj.

Chiri̱j i pe̱t pa̱j xiban re're', re' aj tz'e' wa̱ch xipaj wo' i nimak tak abaj sutumaj wi̱' ri̱j i tinamit re're' eh je' na ca'winak (40) ja̱ xelic chiwach. Re' pajbal xicoj i raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios jenaj wo' wach ch'i̱l i pajbal cojo̱j ku'um hoj c'acharel. Naxiban i re're' je' wili xwilow chiri̱j i Jerusalen:

Re' tusuj abaj sutumaj wi̱' ri̱j i tinamit re're' je' ru̱c' i holohic laj rex abaj “Ja̱spe” ribihnal eh re' tik'imaj wi̱' take pa̱t chipam tinamit re're' je' ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' ma' xilacamaj ta wach ru̱c' toco̱m chic ch'ihch', xa nlemuhunic la' chic.

Re' take cablaj chi abaj ch'iquimaj wi̱' i tusuj abaj sutumaj wi̱' ri̱j i tinamit, xoyomaj take ru̱c' holohak laj abaj chi je' wili: Re' pe̱t abaj ch'iquinbal tz'ak xoyomaj ru̱c' i abaj “Ja̱spe” ribihnal. Re' chic ricab, xoyomaj ru̱c' abaj “Sapi̱ro” ribihnal re' rex taxa̱j nca'yic. Re' ro̱x, xoyomaj ru̱c' abaj “A̱kata” ribihnal rex nca'yic. Re' ricaj, xoyomaj ru̱c' abaj “Esmera̱lta” ribihnal rex nca'yic.

Re' ro̱', xoyomaj ru̱c' i abaj “Oni̱se” ribihnal sak moyic nca'yic. Re' riwa̱k, xoyomaj ru̱c' i abaj “Rubi̱” ribihnal cak nca'yic. Re' riwu̱k, xoyomaj ru̱c' abaj “Criso̱lito” ribihnal k'an nca'yic. Re' riwahxak, xoyomaj ru̱c' abaj “Weri̱lo” ribihnal rex nca'yic. Re' ribele̱j, xoyomaj ru̱c' abaj “Topa̱syo” ribihnal k'an nca'yic. Re' rila̱j, xoyomaj ru̱c' i abaj “Crisopra̱so” ribihnal rex nca'yic. Re' chic rijunla̱j, xoyomaj ru̱c' i abaj “Jasinto” ribihnal rex nca'yic. Re' ricabla̱j, xoyamaj ru̱c' i abaj “Amati̱sta” ribihnal, rex moyic nca'yic.

Re' chic take i cablaj chi tz'ahp wilic reh i tinamit re're' xa je' chic take holohic laj abaj “Pe̱rla” ribihnal eh je' re' quitik'injic bano̱j chi quiju'junal. Re' rinimal wach i be̱h chipam tinamit re're' tik'imaj ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' ma' xilacamaj ta ru̱c' toco̱m chic ch'ihch', xa nlemuhunic la' chic.

Chipam i tinamit re're' ma' xwilow ta chic wach i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios ru'um chi xa re' wo' i kAja̱w Dios re' k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal wach rajawric wilic, nariwih'ic ar chi ma'xta chic jeno' pa̱t narilok'onjic wi̱' wach rich'i̱l i C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱'.

Je' wo' chic, re' tinamit Jerusalen xinwilow ma'xta chic ricamanic reh i risakomal i k'i̱j ma' wo' re' chic i risakomal poh maj re' tinamit wili narisakomjic ru'um rinimal i sakom nsutunic ri̱j i kAja̱w Dios eh je' wo' ru'um i sakom nsutunic ri̱j C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱'.

Til k'e̱' wo' chic sakomal nariwih'ic chipam i Jerusalen re're', chi til narisakomem take tinamit co'lomaj take ru'um i Dios chiwach i ti'c'axic. Je' wo' chic, re' Jerusalen k'e̱' wo' rajawric nariwih'ic chi re' take k'atal k'oric ayu' wach ac'al, ar chic chipam naquic'amam cho quibihomal.
Je' wo', chipam i tinamit ma'xta chic roquic k'ekom eh chi je' re' ma' jaruj ta chic naritz'apjic ritz'ahpil i ocbal maj ma'xta wo' chic riwih'ic jeno' yohbal.
Chipam aj i Jerusalen re', re' take ju'jun chi tinamital naquic'amam cho rinimal wach quibihomal chi riye'eric rilok'il i Dios,

re' cok ru', xa re' wach take tz'ihmbimaj quibihnal chipam i hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' quibihnal take ye'o̱j chiqui̱j chi naquic'acharic chi junelic k'i̱j sakom ru'um i C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱', xa re' wach take re' nacoquic chipam take ritz'ahpil i ye'a̱b re're'. Ru'um aj re' ma' jeno' queh take aj banol reh i yibel wach no'jbal nacoquic cok ar, je' ricab take aj chucul k'oric. Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' wilque̱b chi quixilac take nca'n xa pa' jaric chic jeno' c'ahbilal eh chi je' re' quiwi̱' ma' jaruj ta nacoquic chipam i ye'a̱b re're'.

Chiri̱j ric'uhtjic wi̱n i “Ac' Jerusalen”, re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xic'uhtaj wo' wi̱n jenaj ma' laj ro̱k ha' re' nbanic chi re' take c'acharel equic'acharic chi junelic nancuq'uej queh i ha' re're'. Re' ro̱k ha' re're' xa holohic chic sakil wach xa je' chic ricab i lemuh. Ar nelic cho chipam i ye'a̱b re' nk'atbic wi̱' k'oric i Dios ch'i̱l i C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱'.

Re' ro̱k ha' re're', ribehej pa̱m i yejal be̱h wilic chipam i tinamit re' “Ac' Jerusalen”. C'ultar reh chi chi̱' ro̱k ha' re're' wilque̱b take che̱' re' nbanic chi re' take c'acharel equic'acharic chi junelic nanquic'ux queh i wach. Re' take che̱' re're' cablaj pech nwachanic chiwach jenaj ha̱b, raj rik'orom chi eli̱c poh nwachanic. Re' quixak ncamanic chi quik'o̱m take c'acharel reh take tinamit ayu' wach ac'al.

Je' wo' chic, chipam i “Ac' Jerusalen” xwilow wo' chi ar ma'xta chic riwih'ic sihtbal i̱b. Ar wo' wilic i tz'uka̱b re' nk'atbic wi̱' k'oric i Dios ch'i̱l i C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱'. Ar wo' wilic i Dios eh re' take aj niminel reh ar wo' nquilok'ej wach.
Chi'nchel take aj niminel til naquilom wach i Dios eh yejal quiwach ru' nariwih'ic wo' chi tz'ihmbimaj i ribihnal Dios.

Chi je' re' k'uru' chipam i “Ac' Jerusalen” re're' ma'xta chic roquic k'ekom chi junpech eh re' take naquic'acharic chipam ar ma'xta wo' chic ricamanic queh sakombal i k'i̱j maj re' chic i kAja̱w Dios narisakomonic queh. Je' re' k'uru' re' take re' nacoquic chi k'atoj k'oric chi junelic k'i̱j sakom rich'i̱l i Dios.

Chiri̱j chic rilmijic i wili, re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios je' wili xik'or wi̱n: «Re' take k'oric wili til manlic coric wach eh ric'ul chi ench'iquinjic c'uxlis chiri̱j. Re' kAja̱w Dios re' xye'bic cho quik'orbal take aj k'orol riC'uhbal, re're' xtak'anic cho wi̱n i hin raj tz'e' wa̱ch chi c'uhtbal queh raj camanom haj wilic take naric'uluric chi loq'uil ti, nqui xik'or wi̱n.

Chiri̱j chic ric'uhtjic wi̱n chi'nchel ilo̱j re're', re' kAja̱w Jesus je' wili xik'or wi̱n chi nanik'orom queh chi'nchel take c'acharel: «Chi'nchel hat-tak, chabiraj tak chi coric i wili: Loq'uil quinc'ulic lok. Ato̱b reh c'acharel re' ric'am na̱ i k'oro̱j ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal chipam i hu̱j wili re' nk'oric chiri̱j i naric'uluric johtok chi kawach, nqui wi̱n i Jesus.

Re' chi'nchel i nic' pa' nimal xk'ormojic lok re're' til xwilow eh xnibiraj i hin Wa̱n. Naxincohlaj rilmijic ch'i̱l ribirmijic take chi'nchel re're', re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xic'uhtaj wi̱n i ac' ye'a̱b “Re' Jerusalen” ribihnal eh chi je' re', re' hin xnixuc'a̱' wi̱b chi rilok'onjic wach

xa re' la' naxniban chi je' re', re' aj tz'e' wa̱ch je' wili xik'or wi̱n: «Ma̱ban je' re'! Ma̱lok'ej niwach i hin maj xa hin wo' ti raj camanom i Dios je' ricab nok wilca̱t i hat chiwach eh je' ricab wo' nok wilque̱b take awich aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios ch'i̱l wo' take chi'nchel i nic' pa' q'uihal quiniminic reh i k'oro̱j chipam i hu̱j wili. Je' re' ajic, xa re' wo' Dios nariye'eric rilok'il, nqui xik'or wi̱n.

Chiri̱j chic ru', je' wo' chic wili xik'or wi̱n: «Re' rik'ijil chi naric'ulmujic i nic' pa' nimal i k'oro̱j ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal chipam i hu̱j wili re' nk'oric chiri̱j i naric'uluric johtok, ponic chic reh. Ru'um aj re' ma̱cana̱' xa pan ac'ux take k'oric k'oro̱j aweh chi xatz'ihmbaj chipam i hu̱j wili chiri̱j re' xk'ormojic lok chi naric'ulmujic johtok chi kawach.

Je' wo' chic, ru'um chi re' rik'ijil re're' ponic chic reh, nik'or aweh chi xa hab wach c'acharel re' ma' ra̱j ta ricana̱b ribanaric i c'ahbilal laj no'jbal, re' chic k'orel ru' wi cu eritik ju' ribanaric i no'jbal re're'. Je' wo', re' ma' ra̱j ta ricana̱b ribanaric i mahc re' wo' k'orel ru' wi cu ewo' ritik ju' ribanaric i mahc. Raj nchel i c'acharel re' riban i holohic laj no'jbal chitik wo' ju' ribanaric i holohic laj no'jbal eh re' riyew ric'ux chi rinimjic i Dios chitik wo' ju' riye'eric ric'ux chi ribanjic re're', nqui xik'or.

Je' re' ajic, ru'um chi re' C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' naribanam i ch'ukuj k'oric re' k'orel nic' pa' wach quibano̱j take c'acharel, chabiraj tak chi coric re' rik'or ru' chi je' wili: ‹Re' hin Jesus loq'uil ti quinchalic! Naquinc'olok lok naniyeb i co̱ch tanlic chi nariye'eric queh take ju'jun chi c'acharel re' k'orel nic' pa' wach i quibano̱j.

Je' re' riban chi eniban ru'um reh i wili: Je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' ritusjic wach take tz'ihm chi wilic jenaj p'utbal cho reh eh wilic wo' jenaj cohlsbal wach tz'ihm, je' wo' re' wu̱c' i hin, hin wo' xinp'utbic cho reh chi'nchel eh hin wo' chic nanicohlsonic wach.

Je' re' nok k'e̱' ato̱b queh take c'acharel re' xa eli̱c wo' nquisakbej wach i ca̱mna je' ricab nca'n take c'acharel nok nquitz'aj wach i quiso' ncahnic chi sak chic wach. Je' re' nik'or maj wi je' re' nca'n nariye'eric queh chi naquic'uxum queh i wach i che̱' re' nye'bic c'acharic eh chi na wo' coquic chipam ritz'ahpil i “Ac' tinamit Jerusalen” ribihnal.

Tz'a̱b ru' re' take c'acharel re' take yibel wach quic'acharic, ch'i̱l take aj war, ch'i̱l take quibanic c'oyomal, ch'i̱l take aj cansanel, ch'i̱l wo' take quilok'onic tiyo̱x, re' chi'nchel re're' ch'i̱l wo' take quic'axbic wach i chucuj k'oric eh ma' nquicana̱' ta ribanaric ma'xta quic'uluric cho chipam tinamit re're', naquicahnic la' lok chiri̱j.

‹Re' hin, hin Jesus eh re' hin xintak'anic cho reh waj tz'e' wa̱ch reh chi xchalic k'orol reh ricorquil i c'uhbal wili queh i ju'jun ch'uk chi moloj wach aj niminel. Re' hin, hin ra̱' ri'sil cho i najtir aj k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy. Re' wo' hin je' nicab i nim laj ch'imi̱l re' xa nsakomonic chic riban cho nanoquic cho sak'ic, nqui Jesus, nqui wi̱n i aj tz'e' wach re're'.

Naxbirmijic i xik'or i Jesus re're', re' Lok' laj Uxlabal ch'i̱l take ric'ulum chic chi rehq'ue̱n i kAja̱w Jesus re' rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱', je' wili xquik'or reh i xa hab wach i ra̱j ricojom wach ru': «Tichalok yu'na! nqui take. Je' wo', curman chi re' naribirinic reh k'oric wili, chik'or wo' chi je' wili reh jeno' hab wach chic ra̱j wo' ricojom wach ru': «Tichalok yu'na! nqui chik'or. Je' re' k'uru' je' ricab nok curman chi xa hab wach chiki̱j richi̱' nchalic re' wilic wi̱' i c'a'chel laj ha', je' wo' re' wi hab wach ra̱j chi enchal ru̱c' i Jesus chic'ul wo' i k'oric k'oro̱j ru'um. Re' c'acharel riban chi je' re' til nariye'eric ric'acharic chi junelic xa chi si̱ je' ricab nok chi xa chi si̱ nye'eric riha̱' jeno' c'acharel chiki̱j richi̱'.

Re' hin Wa̱n re' xintz'ihminic lok reh take k'oric wili nwa̱j nibanam jenaj k'ilo̱j queh chi'nchel take naquibirinic reh i k'oro̱j ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal chipam i hu̱j wili re' nk'oric chiri̱j i naric'uluric johtok. Re' aj wili i k'ilo̱j niban: Ma' hab wach ncojbic na̱ take k'oric re're' maj hab wach je' re' riban, re' Dios nariyeb cho rinimal ti'c'axic wach na̱ re' tz'ihmbimaj ribiral chipam i hu̱j wili.

Je' wo', ma' jeno' c'acharel eresaj lok ru̱c' i k'oric tz'ihmbimaj chipam i hu̱j wili chiri̱j nic' pa' nimal xk'ormojic lok ribiral chi naric'uluric johtok chi kawach maj wi je' re' eriban ma'xta wo' riye'eric reh ru'um Dios chi naric'uxum reh i wach i che̱' re' nye'bic c'acharic chi junelic eh ma'xta wo' roquic chipam “Lok' laj Tinamit” re' wilic ribiral chipam i hu̱j wili.

Junpech aj wo' chic, re' Jesus re' nk'oric ricorquil i chi'nchel wili, rik'or wo' chic chi je' wili: «Til coric, xa loq'uil ti chalic wi̱n, nqui rik'or. Chi je' re', re' hin xnic'u'lej johtok chi je' wili: «Quim kAja̱w Jesus. Tichalen! quinqui reh.
Chi je' aj re', re' ta nak i kAja̱w Jesus chiyew cho rato'bil chana̱ chawunchelal tak. Je' ta nak re' banarok!
